eng: Let's try something.
I have to go to sleep.
What are you doing?
What is it?
Today is June 18th and it is Muiriel's birthday!
simp: 今天是６月１８号，也是Muiriel的生日！
trad: 今天是６月１８號，也是Muiriel的生日！

eng: Happy birthday, Muiriel!
Muiriel is 20 now.
The password is "Muiriel".
I will be back soon.
I have no idea.
I'm at a loss for words.
simp: 我不知道应该说什麽才好。
trad: 我不知道應該說什麼才好。

eng: This is never going to end.
I just don't know what to say.
simp: 我只是不知道应该说什麽而已……
trad: 我只是不知道應該說什麼而已……

eng: That was an evil bunny.
simp: 那是一隻有恶意的兔子。
trad: 那是一隻有惡意的兔子。

eng: I was in the mountains.
Is it a recent picture?
I don't know if I have the time.
simp: 我不知道我有没有时间。
trad: 我不知道我有沒有時間。

eng: For some reason the microphone didn't work earlier.
simp: 刚才我的麦克风没起作用，不知道为什麽。
trad: 剛才我的麥克風沒起作用，不知道為什麼。

eng: Everyone must learn on their own in the end.
simp: 到了最后，大家一定要靠自己学习。
trad: 到了最後，大家一定要靠自己學習。

eng: Education in this world disappoints me.
simp: 世界上的教育都让我失望。
trad: 世界上的教育都讓我失望。

eng: It is a difficult task, choosing what is "right" or "wrong", but you have to do it.
simp: 选择什么是“对”或“错”是一项艰难的任务，我们却必须要完成它。
trad: 選擇什麼是“對”或“錯”是一項艱難的任務，我們卻必須要完成它。

eng: That won't change anything.
simp: 这样做的话什麽都不会改变的。
trad: 這樣做的話什麼都不會改變的。

eng: This will cost €30.
I make €100 a day.
I may give up soon and just nap instead.
simp: 也许我会马上放弃然后去睡一觉。
trad: 也許我會馬上放棄然後去睡一覺。

eng: That won't happen.
I will try not to interrupt you while you are studying.
simp: 我会尽量不打扰你复习。
trad: 我會盡量不打擾你復習。

eng: Don't worry.
I miss you.
I'll call them tomorrow when I come back.
simp: 我明天回来的时候会跟他们联络。
trad: 我明天回來的時候會跟他們聯絡。

eng: I always liked mysterious characters more.
simp: 我一直都比较喜欢神秘一点的人物。
trad: 我一直都比較喜歡神秘一點的人物。

eng: You should sleep.
I'm going to go.
I told them to send me another ticket.
simp: 我请他们再寄给我一张票。
trad: 我請他們再寄給我一張票。

eng: I can't live that kind of life.
I once wanted to be an astrophysicist.
simp: 我曾经想过当个太空物理学家。
trad: 我曾經想過當個太空物理學家。

eng: I never liked biology.
simp: 我从来没喜欢过生物学。
trad: 我從來沒喜歡過生物學。

eng: It is unfortunately true.
Most people think I'm crazy.
simp: 大部份的人觉得我疯了。
trad: 大部份的人覺得我瘋了。

eng: No I'm not; you are!
That's MY line!
He's kicking me!
Are you sure?
Then there is a problem...
Oh, there's a butterfly!
Hurry up.
If I could be like that...
simp: 如果我可以像那样的话...
trad: 如果我可以像那樣的話...

eng: Are you freaking kidding me?!
When I grow up, I want to be a king.
I'm so fat.
So what?
I will shoot him.
That's because you're a girl.
I'd be unhappy, but I wouldn't kill myself.
simp: 我会不高兴，但我不会自杀。
trad: 我會不高興，但我不會自殺。

eng: Back in high school, I got up at 6 a.m. every morning.
simp: 以前读高中的时候﹐我每天早上六点起床。
trad: 以前讀高中的時候﹐我每天早上六點起床。

eng: Why do you ask?
How long did you stay?
I didn't know where it came from.
simp: 我不知道它是从哪里来的。
trad: 我不知道它是從哪裏來的。

eng: This is not important.
Where is the problem?
Stop seeing me as a "normal" person!
simp: 不要再把我当成“正常” 人!
trad: 不要再把我當成“正常” 人!

eng: All that which is invented, is true.
simp: 所有被发明的都是真的。
trad: 所有被發明的都是真的。

eng: To be surprised, to wonder, is to begin to understand.
simp: 感到惊讶、感到惊奇就是明白的开始。
trad: 感到驚訝、感到驚奇就是明白的開始。

eng: There's no doubt that the universe is infinite.
simp: 宇宙毫无疑问是无限的。
trad: 宇宙毫無疑問是無限的。

eng: To be perfect she lacked just one defect.
simp: 要变得完美，她就是少了一个缺点。
trad: 要變得完美，她就是少了一個缺點。

eng: And yet, the contrary is always true as well.
simp: 然而，相反的理论往往也是真的。
trad: 然而，相反的理論往往也是真的。

eng: We don't see things as they are, but as we are.
simp: 我们看东西不是看其实质，而是以我们的主观意识看它们的。
trad: 我們看東西不是看其實質，而是以我們的主觀意識看它們的。

eng: The world is a den of crazies.
simp: 世界就是一个疯子的囚笼。
trad: 世界就是一個瘋子的囚籠。

eng: My name is Jack.
Love is never wasted.
simp: 从来就没有徒劳的爱情。
trad: 從來就沒有徒勞的愛情。

eng: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
simp: 生活就是当你忙着进行你的计划时总有其他的事情发生。
trad: 生活就是當你忙著進行你的計劃時總有其他的事情發生。

eng: Not wanting is the same as having.
Merry Christmas!
Rome wasn't built in a day.
Which country are you from?
I have seen the film before.
simp: 我已经看过这部电影了。
trad: 我已經看過這部電影了。

eng: This room's orientation is great.
Do you know who they are?
You must be kidding!
He can also speak French.
I can speak French.
I received an invitation.
Where do you live?
Do you remember the day when we first met?
simp: 你记不记得我们认识的那一天？
trad: 你記不記得我們認識的那一天？

eng: Does he live here?
The station is not far from here.
Where is the railroad station?
It's hailing.
I love you.
I love trips.
I am looking forward to the trip.
I work in a travel agency.
I live with my parents.
He has no children.
This is my mother.
Talk to you later.
Damned if I know.
Everyone would like to believe that dreams can come true.
simp: 人人都愿意相信美梦可以成真。
trad: 人人都願意相信美夢可以成真。

eng: Thank you very much.
I contacted my parents.
I talked with my parents about my studying abroad.
simp: 我跟父母讲了留学的事情。
trad: 我跟父母講了留學的事情。

eng: I have run out of my traveling expenses.
I made use of the maps during my journey.
I am short of money for my trip.
He likes traveling and so do I.
simp: 他喜欢旅行. 我也是.
trad: 他喜歡旅行. 我也是.

eng: What is the date today?
I received an invitation.
She's leaving the country in six months.
Few people think so.
I worked all this week.
I will finish it by tomorrow afternoon.
simp: 明天下午之前我会把它完成。
trad: 明天下午之前我會把它完成。

eng: That discovery was quite accidental.
While in England I often consulted the guidebook.
simp: 在英国的时候，我经常看参考书。
trad: 在英國的時候，我經常看參考書。

eng: My brother will often sit up all night.
simp: 我弟弟会经常彻夜不睡。
trad: 我弟弟會經常徹夜不睡。

eng: You'll have to manufacture some kind of excuse.
simp: 你不得不制造一些借口。
trad: 你不得不制造一些借口。

eng: Something might have happened to her.
Do you take part in any community activities?
I found the key for which I had been looking.
simp: 我找到那把我一直在找的钥匙了。
trad: 我找到那把我一直在找的鑰匙了。

eng: I lost my umbrella.
She is everything to him.
Answer the phone.
I saw it in the newspaper.
We won't go out if it doesn't stop raining.
They are peace-loving people.
I think what you say is true.
Can you forgive me?
He vowed to give up smoking.
Finishing the report by tomorrow is next to impossible.
simp: 在明天前完成报告几乎是不可能的。
trad: 在明天前完成報告幾乎是不可能的。

eng: Yesterday, he read the most interesting novel.
simp: 他昨天看了一部最有趣的小说。
trad: 他昨天看了一部最有趣的小說。

eng: If possible, I'd like to travel around the world.
simp: 如果可能的话，我想环游世界。
trad: 如果可能的話，我想環遊世界。

eng: I belong to a tennis club.
simp: 我是网球俱乐部的会员。
trad: 我是網球俱樂部的會員。

eng: Doctor, please give this child first aid.
It is said that the weather on the mountain changes easily.
simp: 据说山上的天气变化很快。
trad: 據說山上的天氣變化很快。

eng: He regrets not having worked harder at school.
simp: 他后悔在校时没用功读书。
trad: 他後悔在校時沒用功讀書。

eng: May I pay by check?
If he were a little younger, he would be eligible for the post.
simp: 如果他年轻一点，他将很适合这个职位。
trad: 如果他年輕一點，他將很適合這個職位。

eng: He gave me precise instructions to do the job.
simp: 他给我的工作作出了明确指示。
trad: 他給我的工作作出了明確指示。

eng: He succumbed to authority.
It was yesterday that Jake broke this window.
simp: 是在昨天Jake打破了这扇窗。
trad: 是在昨天Jake打破了這扇窗。

eng: I had an awful experience today, so I'm going to have a beer and go straight to bed.
simp: 今天糟糕透了，所以我准备去喝一杯就直接上床。
trad: 今天糟糕透了，所以我準備去喝一杯就直接上床。

eng: I really like the concept of this website.
simp: 我觉得这个网站的概念非常好。
trad: 我覺得這個網站的概念非常好。

eng: Oh, I know this man!
Remain there and don't move.
Go straight down this street and turn right at the third light.
simp: 沿着这条路直走，到第三个红绿灯的地方右转。
trad: 沿著這條路直走，到第三個紅綠燈的地方右轉。

eng: He's sitting in the meeting room.
Ask her when she comes back.
simp: 等她回来的时候问问她。
trad: 等她回來的時候問問她。

eng: He spoke very loudly.
We must try to break the deadlock.
simp: 我们必须设法打破这个僵局。
trad: 我們必須設法打破這個僵局。

eng: In ten years our town will change a lot.
simp: 十年后，我们的城市将改变许多。
trad: 十年後，我們的城市將改變許多。

eng: You drink too much coffee.
I have several dozens of them.
I can't imagine life on another planet.
simp: 我无法想象另一个星球上的生物。
trad: 我無法想象另一個星球上的生物。

eng: Thermometers often go below zero.
Three months is too short a time to finish the experiment.
simp: 要完成实验，三个月太短了。
trad: 要完成實驗，三個月太短了。

eng: Are these your cars? "Yes, they are."
simp: “这些车是你的吗？”“是的，是我的。”
trad: “這些車是你的嗎？”“是的，是我的。”

eng: My uncle lives near the school.
Let's play soccer.
The contract is in the bag, so let's go out and celebrate.
simp: 合同已经到手了，那就出去庆祝一下吧。
trad: 合同已經到手了，那就出去慶祝一下吧。

eng: I find it hard to express my feelings in words.
simp: 我难以用言语表达我的感情。
trad: 我難以用言語表達我的感情。

eng: The cat caught the rats.
Only then did he realize he had been deceived.
simp: 直到那时，他才意识到他已经上当受骗。
trad: 直到那時，他才意識到他已經上當受騙。

eng: His doctor advised him to quit smoking.
My father is busy.
He contrived a means of speaking to Nancy privately.
simp: 他用了一些手段来和Nancy私下交谈。
trad: 他用了一些手段來和Nancy私下交談。

eng: Keep these seats for the elderly.
I can't take the place of her as an English teacher.
simp: 我无法取代她做英语老师。
trad: 我無法取代她做英語老師。

eng: They were carelessly unaware of the danger.
simp: 他们粗心大意，还没意识到危险。
trad: 他們粗心大意，還沒意識到危險。

eng: She waved her hand until the train was out of sight.
simp: 她挥着她的手，直到火车消失在视线之外。
trad: 她揮著她的手，直到火車消失在視線之外。

eng: When she saw that they had no schools, she started one.
simp: 当她发现他们还没有学校，她就办了一个。
trad: 當她發現他們還沒有學校，她就辦了一個。

eng: Thanks for your reply.
Jack can't afford to buy a new bicycle.
He looked for every possible means of escape.
simp: 他寻找一切可能的逃生途径。
trad: 他尋找一切可能的逃生途徑。

eng: Critics are coming down hard on tightened economic restrictions.
simp: 对严格限制经济的批评蜂拥而来。
trad: 對嚴格限制經濟的批評蜂擁而來。

eng: The medicine worked marvels.
I discovered my father collected 30 years of newpapers.
simp: 我发现了我爸爸收藏了30年的报纸。
trad: 我發現了我爸爸收藏了30年的報紙。

eng: How to overcome the high value of the yen is a big problem.
simp: 如何克服日元升高是个大问题。
trad: 如何克服日元升高是個大問題。

eng: Go when you want.
They awarded her first prize at the flower show.
simp: 他们在画展上授予了她一等奖。
trad: 他們在畫展上授予了她一等獎。

eng: You can have a ride on my motorcycle.
simp: 你可以骑上我的摩托车去遛一圈。
trad: 你可以騎上我的摩托車去遛一圈。

eng: He told us such a funny story that we all laughed.
simp: 他给我们讲了一个有趣的故事，我们都笑了起来。
trad: 他給我們講了一個有趣的故事，我們都笑了起來。

eng: How to prepare black porgy: Sashimi, Whatever anybody says sashimi is the tastiest.
simp: 如何料理黑鲷：做刺身是最好吃的。
trad: 如何料理黑鯛：做刺身是最好吃的。

eng: Let's clear up this problem.
simp: 让我们来澄清一下这个问题。
trad: 讓我們來澄清一下這個問題。

eng: Don't forget to put a stamp on your letter.
simp: 别忘了在你的信上贴张邮票。
trad: 別忘了在你的信上貼張郵票。

eng: My business has at last gotten on the right track.
simp: 我的生意终于走上了正轨。
trad: 我的生意終於走上了正軌。

eng: If you need a pen, I'll lend you one.
simp: 如果你需要笔的话，我借你一支。
trad: 如果你需要筆的話，我借你一支。

eng: I am going to my room, where I can study.
simp: 我要回房间了，在那儿我可以学习。
trad: 我要回房間了，在那兒我可以學習。

eng: As such is the case, I am sorry I can't accept your kind invitation.
simp: 照这样的情况，很抱歉，我不能接受你的盛情邀请。
trad: 照這樣的情況，很抱歉，我不能接受你的盛情邀請。

eng: It's next to impossible to finish it in a day.
simp: 在一天之内完成它几乎是不可能的。
trad: 在一天之內完成它幾乎是不可能的。

eng: I leave it in your hands what course of action to take.
simp: 接下来该采取什么行动就交给你了。
trad: 接下來該采取什麼行動就交給你了。

eng: The teacher gave us homework.
simp: 老师给我们布置了家庭作业。
trad: 老師給我們布置了家庭作業。

eng: We were watching the child at play.
Have you begun studying English?
They are melons.
We shall all miss you when you go away.
simp: 你走了，我们都会想你的。
trad: 你走了，我們都會想你的。

eng: Television has the advantage of providing sports fans with greater convenience.
simp: 电视的优点在于它给体育爱好者提供了更大的方便。
trad: 電視的優點在於它給體育愛好者提供了更大的方便。

eng: I didn't call on him because I had a cold.
simp: 我没有拜访他，因为我感冒了。
trad: 我沒有拜訪他，因為我感冒了。

eng: The bus will take time.
I was late as a result of the train delay.
simp: 由于火车延误，我迟到了。
trad: 由於火車延誤，我遲到了。

eng: He hasn't come yet. He must have missed the bus.
simp: 他还没来。他肯定错过公交车了。
trad: 他還沒來。他肯定錯過公交車了。

eng: This style of hat is now in fashion.
simp: 这种款式的帽子现在很流行。
trad: 這種款式的帽子現在很流行。

eng: Everything else is fine.
Can you imagine walking around on the moon?
simp: 你可以想象在月球上行走吗？
trad: 你可以想象在月球上行走嗎？

eng: Can you skate?
He is likely to win the game.
This is a matter of capital importance.
Don't pull my leg!
I can't believe my eyes.
simp: 我无法相信自己的眼睛。
trad: 我無法相信自己的眼睛。

eng: You were considerate not to disturb us.
simp: 你考虑周到，没有打扰我们。
trad: 你考慮周到，沒有打擾我們。

eng: The incident was etched in his memory.
This book is too difficult for you to read.
simp: 这本书对你来说读起来太难了。
trad: 這本書對你來說讀起來太難了。

eng: I don't want anything to drink.
A rock fell from above.
I have a headache.
Bush followed Reagan as president.
simp: 布什继里根之后当上了总统。
trad: 布什繼裏根之後當上了總統。

eng: Nothing has resulted from his efforts.
The wind is cold today.
You are lying.
God helps those who help themselves.
Compared with yours, my car is small.
simp: 和你的车比起来，我的车很小。
trad: 和你的車比起來，我的車很小。

eng: He is young and, what is more, handsome.
simp: 他很年轻，更重要的是，他很帅。
trad: 他很年輕，更重要的是，他很帥。

eng: It is no use arguing with her.
What a pity!
He was happy at the news of her success.
simp: 听到她成功的消息，他很高兴。
trad: 聽到她成功的消息，他很高興。

eng: The boys were whispering; I knew they were up to something.
simp: 男孩们窃窃私语，我知道他们准备做些什么。
trad: 男孩們竊竊私語，我知道他們準備做些什麼。

eng: I'd like to reserve a single room on June 3.
simp: 我要预订一间6月3日的单人房。
trad: 我要預訂一間6月3日的單人房。

eng: Please find me my wallet.
simp: 请帮我找一下我的钱包。
trad: 請幫我找一下我的錢包。

eng: She told me an interesting story.
simp: 她给我讲了一个有趣的故事。
trad: 她給我講了一個有趣的故事。

eng: He boarded a plane bound for Los Angeles.
simp: 他登上了前往洛杉矶的飞机。
trad: 他登上了前往洛杉磯的飛機。

eng: What time does it start?
His son died from cancer at a young age.
simp: 他儿子小时候就死于癌症了。
trad: 他兒子小時候就死於癌癥了。

eng: This book is beautifully illustrated.
She is no less kind than her sister is.
As time went on, rules were added to the game to make it safer.
simp: 随着时间的推移，比赛增加了规则以使之更安全。
trad: 隨著時間的推移，比賽增加了規則以使之更安全。

eng: He looks every inch a gentleman.
simp: 他看上去是一个十足的绅士。
trad: 他看上去是一個十足的紳士。

eng: Gold is far heavier than water.
Our task has been easy so far, but it will be difficult from now on.
simp: 我们的任务到目前为止很轻松，但从现在开始将会变得很难。
trad: 我們的任務到目前為止很輕松，但從現在開始將會變得很難。

eng: Please help yourself to the cake.
He told me the story of his life.
simp: 他给我讲述了他的一生。
trad: 他給我講述了他的一生。

eng: An accident delayed us for half an hour.
simp: 事故耽误了我们半小时。
trad: 事故耽誤了我們半小時。

eng: Such secrets are always eventually revealed.
simp: 这种秘密总有一天会被揭露的。
trad: 這種秘密總有一天會被揭露的。

eng: I have nothing to fall back on.
I read the book after I had finished my homework.
simp: 我做完我的功课后，就读这本书。
trad: 我做完我的功課後，就讀這本書。

eng: Sorry, but can you show me the way to the next village?
simp: 能不能麻烦你告诉我去邻村怎么走？
trad: 能不能麻煩你告訴我去鄰村怎麼走？

eng: She lived at 56 Russell Square.
We had a large audience.
Please write to me about conditions at your school.
simp: 请写信告诉我你们学校的情况。
trad: 請寫信告訴我你們學校的情況。

eng: The sight of fresh lobster gave me an appetite.
simp: 看见新鲜龙虾，我有了食欲。
trad: 看見新鮮龍蝦，我有了食欲。

eng: Jim has been trying to take me out to dinner for the last three weeks.
simp: 最后三周，Jim一直试图带我出去吃饭。
trad: 最後三周，Jim一直試圖帶我出去吃飯。

eng: This dog runs very fast!
You were late for work.
The nurse will tell you how to do it.
Don't trust a man whose past you know nothing about.
simp: 不要相信一个你一点都不了解他过去的人。
trad: 不要相信一個你一點都不了解他過去的人。

eng: I'm going off to Vancouver next week to see my sister.
simp: 下周我去温哥华看我妹妹。
trad: 下周我去溫哥華看我妹妹。

eng: The engagement of Mr Rogers and Miss Smith was announced yesterday.
simp: 罗杰斯先生和史密斯小姐昨天宣布订婚。
trad: 羅傑斯先生和史密斯小姐昨天宣布訂婚。

eng: How soon do you need it?
Honesty is a capital virtue.
simp: 诚信是一种重要的美德。
trad: 誠信是一種重要的美德。

eng: Bob reached the finish line first.
simp: 鲍勃第一个到达终点线。
trad: 鮑勃第一個到達終點線。

eng: This is the most beautiful sight that I have ever seen.
simp: 这是我见过最美的景色了。
trad: 這是我見過最美的景色了。

eng: I like both science and math.
Our plan went wrong from the beginning.
simp: 我们的计划从一开始就出错了。
trad: 我們的計劃從一開始就出錯了。

eng: She doesn't like the way I speak.
simp: 她不喜欢我说话的方式。
trad: 她不喜歡我說話的方式。

eng: He asked her to give him preferential treatment.
Could you pass me the salt, please?
simp: 能不能请你把盐递给我？
trad: 能不能請你把鹽遞給我？

eng: In this kind of weather it's best if I stay at home and don't go outside.
simp: 在这种天气下，我最好是待在家里而不要出去。
trad: 在這種天氣下，我最好是待在家裏而不要出去。

eng: Don't you think so?
Tom denied having stolen the money.
I want to lose weight.
I was surprised at the news.
simp: 我听到这个消息很吃惊。
trad: 我聽到這個消息很吃驚。

eng: She was always quarreling with her brothers.
simp: 她一直和她的兄弟争吵。
trad: 她一直和她的兄弟爭吵。

eng: Only a few TV programs are worth watching.
simp: 只有为数不多的几个电视节目值得关注。
trad: 只有為數不多的幾個電視節目值得關註。

eng: I can't understand why you are so critical of him.
simp: 我不明白为什么你这么批评他。
trad: 我不明白為什麼你這麼批評他。

eng: Would you like another glass of wine?
He works hard.
Freedom has a cost.
A few minutes later the telephone rang.
The moon is the earth's only satellite.
simp: 月球是地球唯一的卫星。
trad: 月球是地球唯一的衛星。

eng: His sisters as well as he are now living in Tokio.
simp: 他和他的姐妹们目前都住在东京。
trad: 他和他的姐妹們目前都住在東京。

eng: The children washed their feet.
My plan is visiting old castles in Scotland.
simp: 我的计划是参观苏格兰的古堡。
trad: 我的計劃是參觀蘇格蘭的古堡。

eng: He's a professor of biology at Harvard.
simp: 他是哈佛大学的生物学教授。
trad: 他是哈佛大學的生物學教授。

eng: I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this matter.
simp: 我期待听到你在这件事上的想法 。
trad: 我期待聽到你在這件事上的想法 。

eng: He is going to be a doctor when he grows up.
simp: 他长大了会成为一名医生。
trad: 他長大了會成為一名醫生。

eng: Banks charge higher interest on loans to risky customers.
simp: 银行对风险客户收取较高的贷款利息。
trad: 銀行對風險客戶收取較高的貸款利息。

eng: Why are you saying you want to walk in the park?
simp: 你为什么说要去公园散步？
trad: 你為什麼說要去公園散步？

eng: The audience was very large.
Write your name in capital letters.
simp: 写下你名字的大写字母。
trad: 寫下你名字的大寫字母。

eng: I don't quite understand what he says.
I don't have a prejudice against foreign workers.
simp: 我对外籍员工没有偏见。
trad: 我對外籍員工沒有偏見。

eng: I'll call for you at eight tomorrow morning.
I believed that he would keep his promise.
We saw a lot of live fish in the pond.
simp: 我们看见池里有很多活鱼。
trad: 我們看見池裏有很多活魚。

eng: He has a lot of books on history.
All the signs are that she is getting better.
simp: 所有迹象表明她好起来了。
trad: 所有跡象表明她好起來了。

eng: Even if they have a good wine menu, I will not want to dine here.
simp: 即使他们有很好的酒单，我也不想在这里用餐。
trad: 即使他們有很好的酒單，我也不想在這裏用餐。

eng: The buildings shook in the earthquake.
Is it right for a doctor to decide when someone should die?
simp: 由医生来决定某人何时该死是对的吗？
trad: 由醫生來決定某人何時該死是對的嗎？

eng: Who will provide capital for the venture?
simp: 谁来为风险投资提供资金？
trad: 誰來為風險投資提供資金？

eng: He quickly made friends with the new boy on the block.
simp: 他很快便与小区里新来的男孩交上了朋友。
trad: 他很快便與小區裏新來的男孩交上了朋友。

eng: His regime is bound to collapse.
The thief whipped out into the crowd.
simp: 小偷迅速地窜入了人群。
trad: 小偷迅速地竄入了人群。

eng: I wasn't busy last week.
Swimming makes your legs stronger.
People are more educated now than they used to be.
simp: 现在的人教育程度比以前高得多。
trad: 現在的人教育程度比以前高得多。

eng: I can't bring myself to do such a thing.
simp: 我不能让自己做这样的事。
trad: 我不能讓自己做這樣的事。

eng: Accepting the other's norms is submitting to the other's power.
simp: 接受对方的准则就是给予他权力。
trad: 接受對方的準則就是給予他權力。

eng: I'll see to it that you have a raise after the first year.
simp: 我将确保你们在第一年后有一个增长。
trad: 我將確保你們在第一年後有一個增長。

eng: He is very much interested in Japanese history. We are surprised at his vast knowledge of the subject.
simp: 他对日本的历史非常感兴趣。我们很惊讶他在这方面的丰富知识。
trad: 他對日本的歷史非常感興趣。我們很驚訝他在這方面的豐富知識。

eng: Put away your bicycle.
It was Alice who went to the concert yesterday.
We went for a walk in the forest.
A whistle blew, and the boat slowly began to pull out of port.
simp: 汽笛声响起，船开始慢慢地驶离港口。
trad: 汽笛聲響起，船開始慢慢地駛離港口。

eng: Children should drink milk every day.
simp: 孩子们应该每天喝牛奶。
trad: 孩子們應該每天喝牛奶。

eng: This photograph reminds me of enjoyable times when I was a child.
simp: 这张照片让我想起童年的快乐时光。
trad: 這張照片讓我想起童年的快樂時光。

eng: To put it briefly, I do not agree.
But he did not often smile.
You have to get on that bus to go to the museum.
simp: 要去博物馆，你就得乘那辆车。
trad: 要去博物館，你就得乘那輛車。

eng: We won't go out unless it stops raining.
simp: 除非雨停了，我们才会出去。
trad: 除非雨停了，我們才會出去。

eng: My father was no less affectionate and tender to me than my mother was.
simp: 我爸爸对我的爱和照顾不比我妈妈少。
trad: 我爸爸對我的愛和照顧不比我媽媽少。

eng: He failed in his attempt to swim the river.
simp: 他试图游过河，但是失败了。
trad: 他試圖遊過河，但是失敗了。

eng: Tell me what you did to Shounan.
simp: 告诉我你对湘南做了什么。
trad: 告訴我你對湘南做了什麼。

eng: I've had enough of this program.
simp: 我已经受够了这个计划。
trad: 我已經受夠了這個計劃。

eng: He isn't himself anymore.
I found him working in the garden.
simp: 我发现他在花园里干活。
trad: 我發現他在花園裏幹活。

eng: Picasso is a famous artist.
simp: 毕加索是个有名的艺术家。
trad: 畢加索是個有名的藝術家。

eng: This is an exception to the rule.
He said that he was hungry.
Life is hard, but I am harder.
simp: 生活很困难，但我更坚强。
trad: 生活很困難，但我更堅強。

eng: How many boys are there in this class?
The news confirmed my suspicions.
simp: 这一消息证实了我的怀疑。
trad: 這一消息證實了我的懷疑。

eng: Look at that mountain which is covered with snow.
She doesn't have any friends or relatives to take care of her.
simp: 她没有任何亲戚朋友照顾她。
trad: 她沒有任何親戚朋友照顧她。

eng: Can your mother drive a car?
Kids these days think that any issue in life can be resolved as easily as restarting a computer game.
simp: 现在的孩子认为解决任何生活问题都像重新开始一个电脑游戏那么简单。
trad: 現在的孩子認為解決任何生活問題都像重新開始一個電腦遊戲那麼簡單。

eng: We also went to the temple.
I'd like to go to London.
You needn't have taken an umbrella with you.
This box is empty. It has nothing in it.
simp: 这箱子是空的，里面什么也没有。
trad: 這箱子是空的，裏面什麼也沒有。

eng: He lived abroad for much of his life.
The situation is getting worse and worse day by day.
This airplane is capable of carrying 40 passengers at a time.
simp: 这架飞机一次可以携带40名乘客。
trad: 這架飛機一次可以攜帶40名乘客。

eng: Are you interested in foreign languages?
No one ran ahead of him.
If I had one million yen now, I would buy a car.
simp: 如果我现在有100万日元，我会买辆车。
trad: 如果我現在有100萬日元，我會買輛車。

eng: Do you believe in God?
In a way you are right, but I still have doubts.
simp: 在某种程度上你是对的，但我还是有疑问。
trad: 在某種程度上你是對的，但我還是有疑問。

eng: We gained the top of Mt. Fuji at last.
simp: 我们终于登上了富士山山顶。
trad: 我們終於登上了富士山山頂。

eng: They ate sandwiches for lunch.
I want the same jacket as you are wearing.
simp: 我也想要和你身上那件同样的外套。
trad: 我也想要和你身上那件同樣的外套。

eng: What souvenir do you think she would like most?
simp: 你觉得她最想要什么纪念品？
trad: 你覺得她最想要什麼紀念品？

eng: Do whatever you want.
The food looks very delicious.
simp: 这些食物看起来很好吃。
trad: 這些食物看起來很好吃。

eng: I don't know when he returned from France.
simp: 我不知道她什么时候从法国回来。
trad: 我不知道她什麼時候從法國回來。

eng: I have a large family.
Call me at nine tomorrow morning.
This isn't my bag.
How do you spell "pretty"?
Driving a car is really very simple.
There's no point telling me "Hi, how are you?" if you have nothing else to say.
simp: 对我说“你好，你怎么样？”什么用都没有，如果你没有其它可说的。
trad: 對我說“你好，你怎麼樣？”什麼用都沒有，如果你沒有其它可說的。

eng: The meeting room is occupied at the moment.
He tasted the cheesecake.
She couldn't look me straight in the face.
Sleep is the greatest thief, for it steals half one's life.
simp: 睡眠是最大的小偷，它偷了我们一半的生命。
trad: 睡眠是最大的小偷，它偷了我們一半的生命。

eng: I am interested in taking pictures.
I bought an ancient lamp.
You can go there in a boat.
Saying is quite different from doing.
He talks as if he knew the secret.
simp: 他说得好像知道这个秘密一样。
trad: 他說得好像知道這個秘密一樣。

eng: He majors in modern literature.
simp: 他拿到了现代文学的文凭。
trad: 他拿到了現代文學的文憑。

eng: He is not stupid.
Love is the process of breaking and mending the heart of another.
simp: 爱，就是一个人把另一个人的心揉碎的过程。
trad: 愛，就是一個人把另一個人的心揉碎的過程。

eng: They lived a happy life.
She has a lot of things to do.
The entire sales staff has worked around the clock for a week.
simp: 全体销售人员通宵达旦地工作了一周。
trad: 全體銷售人員通宵達旦地工作了一周。

eng: The poet and scholar is dead.
He gave his reasons in brief.
simp: 他简单地阐述了他的理由。
trad: 他簡單地闡述了他的理由。

eng: Do you still need tea?
What do you say we go skiing?
We took strong measures to prevent it.
simp: 我们采取了强有力的预防措施。
trad: 我們采取了強有力的預防措施。

eng: He lost his way in the woods.
Don't tell anyone our plan.
simp: 不要把我们的计划告诉任何人。
trad: 不要把我們的計劃告訴任何人。

eng: Tom hid under the table.
He told us many lessons.
simp: 他告诉了我们许多经验教训。
trad: 他告訴了我們許多經驗教訓。

eng: There appears to be a party in that house.
simp: 这房子里似乎在办派对。
trad: 這房子裏似乎在辦派對。

eng: I'll teach you how to drive a car.
St Mark's Square in Venice is always swarming with tourists in the summer.
simp: 威尼斯的圣马可广场在夏季总是挤满了游客。
trad: 威尼斯的聖馬可廣場在夏季總是擠滿了遊客。

eng: We must keep up the family traditions.
simp: 我们必须保持家庭传统。
trad: 我們必須保持家庭傳統。

eng: He can swim very fast.
A sacred ritual took place in the magnificent temple.
simp: 一个神圣的仪式在庄严的庙宇中举行。
trad: 一個神聖的儀式在莊嚴的廟宇中舉行。

eng: I am tired of my work.
Do you deliver on Sundays?
I feel like another beer.
He may have lost his way.
He sold me down the river.
The weather was so cold that the lake froze over.
I don't know, nor do I care.
She was out of Japan last year.
This means that others can only come to know you and like you by listening to what you say.
simp: 这意味着其他人只能从听你说的话来了解你和喜欢你。
trad: 這意味著其他人只能從聽你說的話來了解你和喜歡你。

eng: I will put up at my friend's tonight.
simp: 今晚我将在朋友家过夜。
trad: 今晚我將在朋友家過夜。

eng: I need to buy new spectacle frames.
My brother is holding a camera in his hand.
simp: 我弟弟手里拿着一个摄像机。
trad: 我弟弟手裏拿著一個攝像機。

eng: Let's get off here.
Sit down, Kate.
My sister is twenty-one years old and a college student.
You'll find it difficult to meet her requirements.
Over my dead body.
I respect elderly people.
What greater misfortune is there than to go blind?
simp: 有什么比失明更不幸的呢？
trad: 有什麼比失明更不幸的呢？

eng: Their contract is to run out at the end of this month.
simp: 他们的合同在这个月底到期。
trad: 他們的合同在這個月底到期。

eng: Help me.
There's no love without jealousy.
Only one third of the members turned up at the meeting.
simp: 仅三分之一的成员出席了会议。
trad: 僅三分之一的成員出席了會議。

eng: Let me have a look at those photos.
The toilet doesn't flush properly.
Our children like dogs, but I prefer cats.
simp: 我们的孩子喜欢狗，但我更喜欢猫。
trad: 我們的孩子喜歡狗，但我更喜歡貓。

eng: I owe ten dollars to her.
We must take into account the fact that he is young.
simp: 我们必须考虑到他很年轻。
trad: 我們必須考慮到他很年輕。

eng: I can't find fault with him.
Could you spare me a few minutes?
simp: 你能为我腾出几分钟时间吗?
trad: 你能為我騰出幾分鐘時間嗎?

eng: We had a short vacation in February.
You are liable for the debt.
She lived up to our expectations.
simp: 她没有辜负我们的期望。
trad: 她沒有辜負我們的期望。

eng: The parking lot is free of charge.
His parents expect too much of him.
The problem is how we cope with the present difficulties.
simp: 问题是我们如何应付目前的困难。
trad: 問題是我們如何應付目前的困難。

eng: She put on her hat.
I want to have a little look.
This river is dangerous for children to swim in.
simp: 孩子在这条河里游泳太危险了。
trad: 孩子在這條河裏遊泳太危險了。

eng: Newspapers, magazines, and newscasts tell what is going on in the world.
simp: 报纸、杂志和新闻广播讲述着世界上正在发生的事。
trad: 報紙、雜誌和新聞廣播講述著世界上正在發生的事。

eng: Thousands of foreigners visit Japan every year.
simp: 每年有成千上万的外国人访问日本。
trad: 每年有成千上萬的外國人訪問日本。

eng: This is considered to be a matter of great importance.
If you hurry, you will catch up with him.
simp: 如果你快一点，还能赶上他。
trad: 如果你快一點，還能趕上他。

eng: The old man attempted to swim five kilometers.
I go to the office by bicycle except on rainy days.
simp: 除了雨天，我都是骑车去上班的。
trad: 除了雨天，我都是騎車去上班的。

eng: She forgave the boy for his rudeness.
That patient may die at any time.
A man is responsible for his deeds.
simp: 一个人要为他的行为负责。
trad: 一個人要為他的行為負責。

eng: Will you go to the party instead of me?
She put aside the sewing and stood up.
simp: 她放下手中的针线活，并站了起来。
trad: 她放下手中的針線活，並站了起來。

eng: Here's the change.
He is one of the greatest artists in Japan.
simp: 他是日本最伟大的艺术家之一。
trad: 他是日本最偉大的藝術家之一。

eng: Father would often read detective stories in his spare time.
simp: 父亲常常在空闲时间读侦探小说。
trad: 父親常常在空閑時間讀偵探小說。

eng: I usually take a shower in the evening.
It has had no effect on him.
He goes to school to study every day.
Mother prepared lunch for me.
Would you please give me some more tea?
Some people relax by reading.
simp: 一些人通过阅读来放松。
trad: 一些人通過閱讀來放松。

eng: We spent happy days there all the summer.
simp: 整个夏天，我们在那里过得很愉快。
trad: 整個夏天，我們在那裏過得很愉快。

eng: With a firm goal in mind, you will do well.
simp: 有了坚定的目标，你会做得很好。
trad: 有了堅定的目標，你會做得很好。

eng: I was bored with his old jokes.
Her eyes gushed with tears.
There are many people in the park.
The charge for a front row seats is 5 dollars.
Which do you like better, this or that?
simp: 你更喜欢哪个，这个还是那个？
trad: 你更喜歡哪個，這個還是那個？

eng: I used to play alone when I was a child.
simp: 我小时候常常独自玩耍。
trad: 我小時候常常獨自玩耍。

eng: Is this the bus to Oxford?
simp: 这是去牛津大学的车吗？
trad: 這是去牛津大學的車嗎？

eng: We are to be married next Sunday.
What do you think of this sweater?
simp: 你觉得这件毛衣怎么样？
trad: 你覺得這件毛衣怎麼樣？

eng: The clown made a funny face.
She will return home next Sunday, that is, the tenth.
simp: 她下周日回家，也就是10号。
trad: 她下周日回家，也就是10號。

eng: We have your size, but not in that color.
simp: 我们有你的尺寸，但是没有那个颜色。
trad: 我們有你的尺寸，但是沒有那個顏色。

eng: I sustain my family.
Wait here till he comes back.
simp: 在这儿等到他回来为止。
trad: 在這兒等到他回來為止。

eng: You must not run in the school buildings.
simp: 你不应该在学校大楼里奔跑。
trad: 你不應該在學校大樓裏奔跑。

eng: We are not short of oil in this country.
He was elected mayor.
The man and his wife helped each other.
simp: 这男人和他妻子互相帮助。
trad: 這男人和他妻子互相幫助。

eng: Dad's in an impatient mood today.
That student runs fast, doesn't he?
simp: 那个学生跑得很快，不是吗？
trad: 那個學生跑得很快，不是嗎？

eng: You are my sunshine.
That music is worth listening to many times.
It made my blood boil to hear that.
simp: 听到这个让我感觉热血沸腾。
trad: 聽到這個讓我感覺熱血沸騰。

eng: Many people work in industrial towns.
simp: 许多人在工业城市工作。
trad: 許多人在工業城市工作。

eng: Is it serious?
Prices are going up.
That gray building?
The song reminds me of my home.
You should give up smoking and drinking.
Father takes the 7:00 subway to work.
simp: 爸爸乘早上7点的地铁去上班。
trad: 爸爸乘早上7點的地鐵去上班。

eng: I've known Mr Smith for many years.
simp: 我认识史密斯先生有好多年了。
trad: 我認識史密斯先生有好多年了。

eng: I can't speak French or German.
simp: 我不会说法语，也不会说德语。
trad: 我不會說法語，也不會說德語。

eng: We punished him according to the rules.
To tell the truth, I don't like him.
It's not easy to master French at all.
simp: 要掌握法语一点都不容易。
trad: 要掌握法語一點都不容易。

eng: What is my room number?
Danger past, God forgotten.
Printing ink is in short supply.
The old man sat down.
He studied abroad.
I paid two thousand yen for the book.
simp: 我用两千日元买了这本书。
trad: 我用兩千日元買了這本書。

eng: The movie gained her great popularity.
simp: 这部电影为她赢得了人气。
trad: 這部電影為她贏得了人氣。

eng: She showed the visitor her baby.
simp: 她给客人看了她的宝宝。
trad: 她給客人看了她的寶寶。

eng: He will be back soon.
That only happens occasionally.
He came in, and at the same time the bell rang.
It is said that his father died in a foreign country.
simp: 据说他爸爸在外国去世了。
trad: 據說他爸爸在外國去世了。

eng: The house burned to the ground before the fire truck arrived.
simp: 消防车到达之前，房子就全烧了。
trad: 消防車到達之前，房子就全燒了。

eng: I have neither seen nor heard of such a thing.
simp: 我没见过也没听过这样的事。
trad: 我沒見過也沒聽過這樣的事。

eng: Are you for or against abortion?
Ken is going to the United States at the end of July.
Is your school in this town?
simp: 你的学校在这个城市吗？
trad: 你的學校在這個城市嗎？

eng: After all she did not come.
Did your uncle let you drive his car?
simp: 你叔叔让你开他的车了吗？
trad: 你叔叔讓你開他的車了嗎？

eng: A fire broke out in my neighborhood last night.
Your proposal is worthy of being considered.
She is now staying at her uncle's house.
simp: 她现在正待在她叔叔家。
trad: 她現在正待在她叔叔家。

eng: You have a way with women.
I am charged with an important mission.
simp: 我身负一个重要的任务。
trad: 我身負一個重要的任務。

eng: Fire! Run!
Good habits should be cultivated in childhood.
We met her by accident.
I wish you a pleasant voyage.
In opening the door, I broke the lock.
simp: 我开门的时候弄坏了锁。
trad: 我開門的時候弄壞了鎖。

eng: I have two children, one in is Beijing and the other one is in Nagoya.
simp: 我有两个儿子，一个在东京，另一个在名古屋。
trad: 我有兩個兒子，一個在東京，另一個在名古屋。

eng: When was she born?
My stomach hurts.
Some classmates saw me give him chocolate.
simp: 一些同学看见我给了他巧克力。
trad: 一些同學看見我給了他巧克力。

eng: Many words are pronounced according to the spelling, but some are not.
simp: 许多词是根据拼写来发音的，不过有些不是。
trad: 許多詞是根據拼寫來發音的，不過有些不是。

eng: The IMF ruled out any new loans to that country.
simp: 国际货币基金组织不考虑再借款给该国。
trad: 國際貨幣基金組織不考慮再借款給該國。

eng: Because I want to be a translator.
There are lots of trees in the countryside.
Are you going by air or by train?
simp: 你乘飞机还是乘火车去？
trad: 你乘飛機還是乘火車去？

eng: Are we allowed to take pictures here?
He has no sense of right and wrong.
As is evident from the data, smoking is not decreasing among the young.
simp: 数据表明年轻人抽烟的现象没有减少。
trad: 數據表明年輕人抽煙的現象沒有減少。

eng: Nara is a very old city.
simp: 奈良是个非常古老的城市。
trad: 奈良是個非常古老的城市。

eng: She lost her way and on top of that it began to rain.
simp: 她迷路了，紧接着天开始下雨了。
trad: 她迷路了，緊接著天開始下雨了。

eng: She thought the plan was fine but impractical.
simp: 她认为计划很好，但不可行。
trad: 她認為計劃很好，但不可行。

eng: We gave the performer a clap.
I'm looking for books on Roman history.
simp: 我在找关于古罗马历史的书。
trad: 我在找關於古羅馬歷史的書。

eng: I have no friends to help me.
I don't want to wait that long.
His advice is always very sensible.
We are all looking forward to seeing you and your family.
simp: 我们都期待看到你和你的家人。
trad: 我們都期待看到你和你的家人。

eng: This is the village where the poet was born.
simp: 这是这个诗人出生的村子。
trad: 這是這個詩人出生的村子。

eng: Keep the window closed.
Part of his story is true.
simp: 他的故事一部分是真的。
trad: 他的故事一部分是真的。

eng: He is an American.
Mr. and Mrs. Smith live apart from each other now.
simp: 史密斯夫妇现在分居了。
trad: 史密斯夫婦現在分居了。

eng: We eat butter on bread.
She won't take an airplane for fear of a crash.
simp: 她不会乘飞机因为害怕坠机。
trad: 她不會乘飛機因為害怕墜機。

eng: Whether you succeed or not depends on your own efforts.
simp: 你成功与否取决于你自身的努力。
trad: 你成功與否取決於你自身的努力。

eng: He was invited to be the chairman of the club.
simp: 他受邀做俱乐部的主席。
trad: 他受邀做俱樂部的主席。

eng: Happy is the man who is contented.
You can get in touch with him at his home tonight.
simp: 今晚你可以在他家联络到他。
trad: 今晚你可以在他家聯絡到他。

eng: You work too hard.
It is the things that we do not possess which seem to us most desirable.
simp: 得不到的东西就最想得到。
trad: 得不到的東西就最想得到。

eng: School begins at eight-thirty.
We have to turn in our reports by the end of this month.
simp: 这个月底前，我们必须交报告。
trad: 這個月底前，我們必須交報告。

eng: This is the time he normally arrives.
It's hard to say what the weather will be like tomorrow.
simp: 很难说明天的天气将会怎样。
trad: 很難說明天的天氣將會怎樣。

eng: I'll give you a prescription.
Don't pry into the affairs of others.
How large is the population of New York City?
Who knows where he has gone.
She was sitting under a tree.
An uncle of mine gave me some useful advice.
simp: 我的一个叔叔给我了一些有用的建议。
trad: 我的一個叔叔給我了一些有用的建議。

eng: She wants a new dress badly.
simp: 她很想要一条新的连衣裙。
trad: 她很想要一條新的連衣裙。

eng: The Japanese people have renounced war.
To control a class calls for all your skills as a teacher.
simp: 控制一个班级需要你做老师的所有技能。
trad: 控制一個班級需要你做老師的所有技能。

eng: I wonder if it will snow in our town this winter.
simp: 我想知道这个冬天在我们的城市会不会下雪。
trad: 我想知道這個冬天在我們的城市會不會下雪。

eng: His little brother is a famous soccer player.
simp: 他弟弟是个有名的足球选手。
trad: 他弟弟是個有名的足球選手。

eng: The bell rang.
No words can express her deep sorrow.
I'm sure you'll love what we have on the menu tonight.
simp: 我肯定你会喜欢我们今晚的菜肴。
trad: 我肯定你會喜歡我們今晚的菜肴。

eng: May I ask a few questions?
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
simp: 我期待很快就能收到你的信。
trad: 我期待很快就能收到你的信。

eng: He was brought up in Australia.
My brother is not as tall as I was two years ago.
He's always worrying about his daughter.
simp: 他一直很担心他的女儿。
trad: 他一直很擔心他的女兒。

eng: No wonder she didn't show up to see him off. They broke up.
simp: 难怪她表示不想再见到他了。因为他们分手了。
trad: 難怪她表示不想再見到他了。因為他們分手了。

eng: He is poor at chemistry.
The church is at the foot of a mountain.
A stranger spoke to me in the bus.
simp: 在公车上，一个陌生人和我说了话。
trad: 在公車上，一個陌生人和我說了話。

eng: I feel admiration for his talent.
You could be right, I suppose.
The teacher cannot have said such a thing.
simp: 老师不可能说过这样的事。
trad: 老師不可能說過這樣的事。

eng: Slight inattention can cause a great disaster.
I have a bad headache today.
His income was diminished by half after retirement.
simp: 退休后他的收入少了一半。
trad: 退休後他的收入少了一半。

eng: When did she promise to meet him?
I am amazed at your audacity.
simp: 我对你的厚颜无耻感到惊讶。
trad: 我對你的厚顏無恥感到驚訝。

eng: She lets her children have their own way too much.
simp: 她太放任她的孩子们了。
trad: 她太放任她的孩子們了。

eng: The young should respect the old.
He isn't going to buy a camera.
simp: 他不打算买一个摄像机。
trad: 他不打算買一個攝像機。

eng: He was always annoyed in the city by noises of one sort or another.
simp: 他在城市里一直受到噪音或者其他的干扰。
trad: 他在城市裏一直受到噪音或者其他的幹擾。

eng: Their journey was delayed because of the train.
simp: 他们的旅行因为火车延期了。
trad: 他們的旅行因為火車延期了。

eng: Steve looks quite happy.
She has been to Paris.
I see a flower on the desk.
I bumped my head against the door and got a lump.
simp: 我头撞到了门，肿了一块。
trad: 我頭撞到了門，腫了一塊。

eng: You'll have to start at once.
Let's stop at the next gas station.
simp: 我们在下个加油站停一下。
trad: 我們在下個加油站停一下。

eng: What did you make?
Are there any famous musicians on the stage?
simp: 舞台上有着名音乐家吗？
trad: 舞臺上有著名音樂家嗎？

eng: Please turn up the AC a little bit.
This is not my type.
I think your work is all right.
I broke the lock opening the door.
simp: 开门的时候我把锁弄坏了。
trad: 開門的時候我把鎖弄壞了。

eng: My stomach hurts.
Some classmates saw me give him chocolate.
simp: 一些同学看到我给他巧克力了。
trad: 一些同學看到我給他巧克力了。

eng: That child can count to twenty.
The show was wonderful, but the tickets were too expensive.
simp: 这场秀棒极了，但是门票太贵了。
trad: 這場秀棒極了，但是門票太貴了。

eng: The train was delayed because of heavy snowfall.
This pear smells nice.
Will you have some more coffee? "No, thanks. I've had enough."
simp: “你想再来点咖啡吗？”“不，谢谢。我够了。”
trad: “你想再來點咖啡嗎？”“不，謝謝。我夠了。”

eng: Last month our twenty-year-old daughter gave birth to a baby girl.
simp: 上个月，我们20岁的女儿生了个女孩。
trad: 上個月，我們20歲的女兒生了個女孩。

eng: They insist that he should go.
I have been busy writing a short story.
simp: 我一直忙于写一部短篇小说。
trad: 我一直忙於寫一部短篇小說。

eng: It is expensive running this car.
The lake is deepest at this point.
Who is the woman in the brown coat?
simp: 那个穿棕色大衣的女人是谁？
trad: 那個穿棕色大衣的女人是誰？

eng: You may be right, but I am against your opinion.
simp: 你可能是对的，但我和你意见相反。
trad: 你可能是對的，但我和你意見相反。

eng: This shop is open from 9 to 6 o'clock.
Do you know when the musician will come here?
simp: 你知道音乐家什么时候来这儿吗？
trad: 你知道音樂家什麼時候來這兒嗎？

eng: I always keep a dictionary close at hand.
simp: 我总是在离手不远的地方放一本字典。
trad: 我總是在離手不遠的地方放一本字典。

eng: What do you want?
Ann wrote something on the blackboard.
He is the manager of the marketing department.
Without water, we cannot exist.
I hope so.
I returned the books I borrowed from the library, and I borrowed some new ones.
simp: 我还了从图书馆借的书，又借了些新的。
trad: 我還了從圖書館借的書，又借了些新的。

eng: It becomes warmer day after day.
He should have arrived by now.
We take great pleasure in meeting all of you this evening.
simp: 我们很高兴今晚能见到大家。
trad: 我們很高興今晚能見到大家。

eng: It's our pleasure.
I got on the train for London.
Please don't do anything that would besmirch the Matsuno family name!
simp: 请不要做任何有损松野家族名声的事！
trad: 請不要做任何有損松野家族名聲的事！

eng: My sister takes piano lessons twice a week.
simp: 我妹妹每周上两次钢琴课。
trad: 我妹妹每周上兩次鋼琴課。

eng: All the apple trees were cut down.
simp: 所有苹果树都被砍倒了。
trad: 所有蘋果樹都被砍倒了。

eng: He had his hair cut short.
He succeeded in the face of great difficulties.
simp: 面对巨大的困难，他成功了。
trad: 面對巨大的困難，他成功了。

eng: Ann is a cheerleader.
He is as smart as any other boy in the class.
simp: 他和班上其他男生一样聪明。
trad: 他和班上其他男生一樣聰明。

eng: While you are reading to me, I can do my sewing.
simp: 你读给我听的时候，我就可以做缝纫了。
trad: 你讀給我聽的時候，我就可以做縫紉了。

eng: We enjoyed swimming in the lake.
I don't agree with you.
As a man sows, so he shall reap.
It is illegal for bicycles to pass on the right of cars.
simp: 自行车从右侧超过汽车是不合法的。
trad: 自行車從右側超過汽車是不合法的。

eng: A brilliant future lay before him.
simp: 大好的前途摆在他面前。
trad: 大好的前途擺在他面前。

eng: There is a television in this room.
simp: 这个房间里有个电视机。
trad: 這個房間裏有個電視機。

eng: It's fine today.
Some people like sports. Others don't.
simp: 有些人喜欢运动，有些人不喜欢。
trad: 有些人喜歡運動，有些人不喜歡。

eng: There is no school during August.
Can you guess what I have here?
Your pen is better than mine.
Write your name in capitals.
simp: 把你的名字用大写写下来。
trad: 把你的名字用大寫寫下來。

eng: He would be the last to deceive you.
simp: 这将是你最后一次被欺骗了。
trad: 這將是你最後一次被欺騙了。

eng: We thought his threat was only a joke.
simp: 我们觉得他的威胁只是一个玩笑。
trad: 我們覺得他的威脅只是一個玩笑。

eng: We used to go skating every weekend.
simp: 过去我们每个周末都去熘冰。
trad: 過去我們每個周末都去溜冰。

eng: There is a beautiful park near my home.
simp: 我家附近有个漂亮的公园。
trad: 我家附近有個漂亮的公園。

eng: If it had not been for your help, I couldn't have completed the work.
simp: 如果不是因为有你的帮助，我不可能完成了这个工作。
trad: 如果不是因為有你的幫助，我不可能完成了這個工作。

eng: What a dictionary says is not always right.
simp: 字典上写的不总是对的。
trad: 字典上寫的不總是對的。

eng: Donna was born with a silver spoon in her mouth.
Were I in your place I would do the same thing.
simp: 如果我是你，我也会这么做。
trad: 如果我是你，我也會這麼做。

eng: Good evening.
This dress is a good bargain.
She taught me how to swim.
Many of the workers died of hunger.
She is very thoughtful and patient.
You are everything to me.
For the time being, my sister is an assistant in a supermarket.
simp: 目前，我妹妹在一家超市当收银员。
trad: 目前，我妹妹在一家超市當收銀員。

eng: I'll call you around five o'clock.
simp: 我会在5点左右打电话给你。
trad: 我會在5點左右打電話給你。

eng: My sister married a doctor.
simp: 我妹妹嫁给了一个医生。
trad: 我妹妹嫁給了一個醫生。

eng: They say that she was born in Germany.
simp: 他们说她是在德国出生的。
trad: 他們說她是在德國出生的。

eng: You are tired, aren't you?
My father insisted that I should go to see the place.
simp: 我爸爸坚持要我去那地方看看。
trad: 我爸爸堅持要我去那地方看看。

eng: She kept crying all night long.
He gave me a ring at midnight.
simp: 他半夜打了个电话给我。
trad: 他半夜打了個電話給我。

eng: He's a strange character.
School was closed for the day due to the snow.
Every dog has his day.
He won the prize for excellence in all subjects.
The wind blew too hard for them to play in the park.
simp: 风刮得太勐，他们没法在公园里玩了。
trad: 風刮得太猛，他們沒法在公園裏玩了。

eng: Don't interfere in my affairs.
I'm afraid you can't marry her.
The university was founded by his father twenty years ago.
simp: 大学在20年前由他的父亲建立。
trad: 大學在20年前由他的父親建立。

eng: Shall I have him call you when he gets back? "Yes, please."
simp: “等他回来，我要让他给你打电话吗？”“是的，谢谢。”
trad: “等他回來，我要讓他給你打電話嗎？”“是的，謝謝。”

eng: He has just left home.
The party was put off for a week.
Water turns into steam when it is boiled.
He said he did not enter the room, which was a lie.
simp: 他说他没有进房间，那是骗人的。
trad: 他說他沒有進房間，那是騙人的。

eng: I was very surprised to hear the news.
simp: 我听到这个消息很惊讶。
trad: 我聽到這個消息很驚訝。

eng: My vision is getting worse these days.
simp: 这些天我的视力正在变差。
trad: 這些天我的視力正在變差。

eng: My attitude towards him changed.
I went for a walk in the park.
It is strange that he should say so.
What movies are playing this week?
Good health is inseparable from exercise and moderation.
simp: 健康与运动及节制密不可分。
trad: 健康與運動及節制密不可分。

eng: I'm at work now, so I'll call you later.
simp: 我现在在上班，所以晚点打给你。
trad: 我現在在上班，所以晚點打給你。

eng: I agree.
He will come back sooner or later.
Take as many cookies as you want.
simp: 想吃多少饼干就吃多少。
trad: 想吃多少餅幹就吃多少。

eng: Dogs have a keen sense of smell.
It seemed to be cheap.
The death penalty had been done away with in many states in the USA.
simp: 死刑在美国的很多州都被废除了。
trad: 死刑在美國的很多州都被廢除了。

eng: I have been studying English for four years.
This letter is wrongly addressed.
Blessed are the pure in heart.
The capital of Japan is Tokyo.
Waiter, I'd like to order.
We were just about to enter the room.
Take this medicine in case you get sick.
simp: 万一你生病了，吃这个药。
trad: 萬一你生病了，吃這個藥。

eng: Men can not exist without air.
Yesterday was my seventeenth birthday.
When will the world come to an end?
I want to go to Seattle.
Mr. Brown, a friend from Oregon, will visit us tomorrow.
simp: 一个从俄勒冈州来的朋友，布朗先生明天会来拜访我们。
trad: 一個從俄勒岡州來的朋友，布朗先生明天會來拜訪我們。

eng: My television was broken down, so I had to get it repaired.
simp: 我的电视机出故障了，所以我不得不拿去修。
trad: 我的電視機出故障了，所以我不得不拿去修。

eng: Everybody knew she could speak English well.
simp: 大家都知道她的英语说得很好。
trad: 大家都知道她的英語說得很好。

eng: All of them are good teachers.
Should I cancel the call?
Exercise is good for your health.
Can I use your dictionary for a minute?
simp: 我能用一下你的字典吗？
trad: 我能用一下你的字典嗎？

eng: They grow oranges in California.
simp: 他们在加利福尼亚种橙子。
trad: 他們在加利福尼亞種橙子。

eng: The price of cabbage fell because of overproduction.
simp: 由于产量过剩，卷心菜的价格下降了。
trad: 由於產量過剩，卷心菜的價格下降了。

eng: He always drinks black coffee.
Mr Davis looks very tired.
This desk is made of wood.
I'm free today.
Our house was robbed while we were away.
simp: 我们走开的时候，房子被盗窃了。
trad: 我們走開的時候，房子被盜竊了。

eng: Music is a common speech for humanity.
simp: 音乐是人类共通的语言。
trad: 音樂是人類共通的語言。

eng: They are arriving here soon from Hong Kong.
simp: 他们就快从香港抵达了。
trad: 他們就快從香港抵達了。

eng: How dare he open my letters!
He saluted the lady.
Try to make the most of your time.
simp: 尽量试着用好你的时间。
trad: 盡量試著用好你的時間。

eng: He went to America to study medicine.
It is believed that whales have their own language.
simp: 人们相信鲸有他们自己的语言。
trad: 人們相信鯨有他們自己的語言。

eng: There are about forty students in her class.
We should tell children how to protect themselves.
simp: 我们应该告诉孩子怎么保护自己。
trad: 我們應該告訴孩子怎麼保護自己。

eng: I have known her for two years.
You have to change trains at Shibuya.
Let me in.
You will soon get used to eating Japanese food.
simp: 你很快就会习惯吃日本料理了。
trad: 你很快就會習慣吃日本料理了。

eng: I have a lot of friends to help me.
There are forty students in our class.
Tokyo is a big city.
simp: 东京是一个很大的城市。
trad: 東京是一個很大的城市。

eng: The quickest means of travel is by plane.
simp: 旅行最快的方式是乘飞机。
trad: 旅行最快的方式是乘飛機。

eng: How long do you plan to stay?
I wonder which of the runners will come first.
simp: 我在想哪个跑步运动员会跑第一。
trad: 我在想哪個跑步運動員會跑第一。

eng: My dad doesn't like soccer.
Can I borrow your pencil for a bit?
simp: 我能用一下你的铅笔吗？
trad: 我能用一下你的鉛筆嗎？

eng: Will you pick me up at seven tomorrow morning?
The leaves fall off the trees in the fall.
I listened, but I didn't hear anything.
simp: 我听了，但什么也没听到。
trad: 我聽了，但什麼也沒聽到。

eng: The police have been searching for the stolen goods for almost a month.
simp: 警察大概从一个月前就开始找被偷物品了。
trad: 警察大概從一個月前就開始找被偷物品了。

eng: There are some books on the desk.
He did it at the expense of his health.
simp: 他以牺牲自己的健康为代价完成了这项工作。
trad: 他以犧牲自己的健康為代價完成了這項工作。

eng: My father graduated from Harvard University.
simp: 我爸爸是哈佛大学毕业的。
trad: 我爸爸是哈佛大學畢業的。

eng: She picked up one of the glass vases.
simp: 她拿了其中一个玻璃花瓶。
trad: 她拿了其中一個玻璃花瓶。

eng: 3 cubed is 27.
If it rains tomorrow, I'll just stay at home.
simp: 如果明天下雨，我就待在家。
trad: 如果明天下雨，我就待在家。

eng: I need it ASAP.
The weather was not only cold, it was also damp.
We used to play in the park.
Let's give the book to whoever wants it.
simp: 这本书谁想要就给谁吧。
trad: 這本書誰想要就給誰吧。

eng: I know every inch of New York.
Many a young girl likes the singer.
simp: 许多年轻女孩喜欢这个歌手。
trad: 許多年輕女孩喜歡這個歌手。

eng: The man you saw yesterday is my uncle.
simp: 你昨天看到的那个男人是我叔叔。
trad: 你昨天看到的那個男人是我叔叔。

eng: What we need is help.
That man, the child of whom is very friendly.
simp: 那个男人，就是他的孩子很友好的那个.
trad: 那個男人，就是他的孩子很友好的那個.

eng: The reporter rented an expensive room.
That's the computer he used to write the article.
simp: 那就是那台他用来写文章的电脑。
trad: 那就是那臺他用來寫文章的電腦。

eng: He works for a newspaper with a large circulation.
simp: 他为一份印刷量很大的报纸工作。
trad: 他為一份印刷量很大的報紙工作。

eng: I'm pregnant.
No matter how often I tell her, she keeps making the same mistake.
simp: 不管我跟她说了多少次，她还是继续犯同样的错误。
trad: 不管我跟她說了多少次，她還是繼續犯同樣的錯誤。

eng: They live in peace.
His acts of courage brought him glory.
simp: 他英勇的行为带给了他光荣。
trad: 他英勇的行為帶給了他光榮。

eng: She is as clever as she is beautiful.
I have two English books.
How many books do you have?
A year has twelve months.
My dad is not at home for the moment.
This is not your book, it's mine.
simp: 这不是你的书,这是我的书。
trad: 這不是你的書,這是我的書。

eng: I do not work.
I have an older brother and an older sister.
simp: 我有一个哥哥,也有一个姐姐。
trad: 我有一個哥哥,也有一個姐姐。

eng: Little Ming still doesn't know where he's going to go next year.
simp: 小明还不知道他明年去哪儿。
trad: 小明還不知道他明年去哪兒。

eng: My friend is seventeen years old.
This afternoon I have English class for two hours and then two hours of Chinese.
simp: 今天下午我有两个小时的英语课和两个小时的汉语课。
trad: 今天下午我有兩個小時的英語課和兩個小時的漢語課。

eng: Chinese characters are very beautiful.
Japan relies on Arab countries for oil.
simp: 日本靠阿拉伯国家提供石油。
trad: 日本靠阿拉伯國家提供石油。

eng: Our school is in the center of the town.
Are you for or against the plan?
simp: 你赞成还是反对这个计划？
trad: 你贊成還是反對這個計劃？

eng: Here is a letter for you.
She insisted that it was my fault.
simp: 她坚持认为那是我的错。
trad: 她堅持認為那是我的錯。

eng: Habit is second nature.
Shinya married a pretty girl.
The price of rice has come down.
You must learn from mistakes.
simp: 你必须从失败中吸取教训。
trad: 你必須從失敗中吸取教訓。

eng: Kyoto has many universities.
Over-sleeping is no excuse for being late.
simp: 睡过头不是迟到的理由。
trad: 睡過頭不是遲到的理由。

eng: I also heard a similar story.
simp: 我也听过一个类似的故事。
trad: 我也聽過一個類似的故事。

eng: See above.
Kent is a born leader.
It is very dangerous to jump aboard the train when it is moving.
simp: 跳上一列正在开的火车是很危险的。
trad: 跳上一列正在開的火車是很危險的。

eng: He painted his bicycle red.
simp: 他把他的自行车刷成红色。
trad: 他把他的自行車刷成紅色。

eng: She helped her father with the work in the garden.
simp: 她帮她爸爸干了花园里的活。
trad: 她幫她爸爸幹了花園裏的活。

eng: I wish to become a dentist in future.
simp: 我希望将来成为一名牙医。
trad: 我希望將來成為一名牙醫。

eng: You have to pay special attention to what you eat and drink.
simp: 尤其是要注意你吃的和喝的东西。
trad: 尤其是要註意你吃的和喝的東西。

eng: I won't be home next Sunday.
Quit smoking if you don't want to die early.
simp: 如果你想活得久一点就戒烟。
trad: 如果你想活得久一點就戒煙。

eng: Are you busy today?
A famous architect built this house.
simp: 一个有名的建筑师造了这个房子。
trad: 一個有名的建築師造了這個房子。

eng: He went mad when he heard the story.
simp: 他听到消息后失去了理智。
trad: 他聽到消息後失去了理智。

eng: This is the most massive structure I have ever seen.
simp: 这是我所见过的最大型的构造了。
trad: 這是我所見過的最大型的構造了。

eng: A true gentleman never betrays his friends.
simp: 一个真正的绅士不会出卖他的朋友。
trad: 一個真正的紳士不會出賣他的朋友。

eng: The conflict between blacks and whites in the city became worse.
simp: 在这个城市，白人和黑人间的争端愈演愈烈。
trad: 在這個城市，白人和黑人間的爭端愈演愈烈。

eng: You'd better go to the infirmary.
The government of this country oppresses its people.
simp: 这个国家的政府压迫人民。
trad: 這個國家的政府壓迫人民。

eng: My throat feels dry.
Bird watching is a nice hobby.
simp: 观察鸟类是个很好的业余爱好。
trad: 觀察鳥類是個很好的業余愛好。

eng: Who is your Chinese teacher?
Whose teacher is coming from the United Kingdom?
simp: 谁的老师是从英国来的?
trad: 誰的老師是從英國來的?

eng: I work in a bank.
I don't like working at the bank.
Wang Xiaoming speaks English, but doesn't have a lot of English books.
simp: 王小明说英语,可是他的英语书不多.
trad: 王小明說英語,可是他的英語書不多.

eng: How many people are there in your family?
Where's his home?
My Chinese teacher is a man.
Whose grammar book is this?
The dictionary he talked about isn't available in the library.
simp: 他说的词典图书馆没有.
trad: 他說的詞典圖書館沒有.

eng: Do all of you speak Chinese?
Xiaoming Wang has never been to America. He really wants to go next year.
simp: 王小明还没有去过美国,他很想明年去.
trad: 王小明還沒有去過美國,他很想明年去.

eng: He is now working in France.
He still hasn't been to France; he really wants to go next year.
simp: 他还没有去过法国,他很想明年去.
trad: 他還沒有去過法國,他很想明年去.

eng: I am French.
Mom is older than Dad.
His scores are always better than mine, even though he doesn't study very much.
simp: 他的分数总比我高，尽管他学习得少一点。
trad: 他的分數總比我高，盡管他學習得少一點。

eng: This film is really boring - the best bit is when it finishes.
simp: 这部电影很无聊，最好的部分是结局。
trad: 這部電影很無聊，最好的部分是結局。

eng: I am a man.
The news made her happy.
What do his words imply?
It's a good thing to read good books when you are young.
simp: 年轻的时候多看点好书是件好事。
trad: 年輕的時候多看點好書是件好事。

eng: Don't conceal what you feel about it.
simp: 不要隐瞒你对此的想法。
trad: 不要隱瞞你對此的想法。

eng: She is gracious to everyone.
With just a little more effort, he would have succeeded.
simp: 如果他再努力一点，就可能已经成功了。
trad: 如果他再努力一點，就可能已經成功了。

eng: There's too much salt in this soup.
It is not easy to distinguish good from evil.
Stand the ladder against the wall.
She is fond of animals.
She is a clerk in the supermarket.
Smoking affects your health.
I don't like the way you laugh at her.
simp: 我不喜欢你嘲笑她的方式。
trad: 我不喜歡你嘲笑她的方式。

eng: You should not waste your time.
He works hardest in his class.
simp: 他在他班里学习最努力。
trad: 他在他班裏學習最努力。

eng: Everybody knows that happiness is in contentment.
Can you guess how old I am?
He will be at home tomorrow.
He kissed her, with his eyes closed.
I'm sorry. I have another appointment.
simp: 很抱歉，我还有另一个约会。
trad: 很抱歉，我還有另一個約會。

eng: The whole class is present once a week.
simp: 全班同学每周出席一次。
trad: 全班同學每周出席一次。

eng: He was standing at the street corner.
It is cruel of him to say such things to her.
simp: 他跟她说这样的话真是太残忍了。
trad: 他跟她說這樣的話真是太殘忍了。

eng: Where have you been? "I have been to the station to see a friend off."
simp: “你去哪儿了？”“我去了火车站送我的一个朋友。”
trad: “你去哪兒了？”“我去了火車站送我的一個朋友。”

eng: I always take a bath before going to bed.
He must be a gentleman to act that way.
simp: 这样的举止只可能是个绅士。
trad: 這樣的舉止只可能是個紳士。

eng: Any task may become painful.
simp: 任何任务都可能变得费力。
trad: 任何任務都可能變得費力。

eng: He really likes baseball.
It doesn't matter.
She talked childishly.
I am very sad.
Thanks to the development of agricultural science, world food production has managed to keep up with population growth - but only at the expense of the future.
simp: 由于农业的发展，食品全球产量能够跟上人口的增长，但只是牺牲了将来。
trad: 由於農業的發展，食品全球產量能夠跟上人口的增長，但只是犧牲了將來。

eng: Do you like music?
Can anyone pronounce this word?
simp: 有人能发这个词的音吗？
trad: 有人能發這個詞的音嗎？

eng: She was satisfied with the new dress.
simp: 那条新裙子让她很满意。
trad: 那條新裙子讓她很滿意。

eng: Who taught her how to speak English?
simp: 是谁教她怎么说英语的？
trad: 是誰教她怎麼說英語的？

eng: Solve the mystery lurking behind the murder!
simp: 要解开谋杀背后潜藏之谜！
trad: 要解開謀殺背後潛藏之謎！

eng: The ice on the lake is too thin to bear your weight.
simp: 湖上的冰太薄了，承受不了你的重量。
trad: 湖上的冰太薄了，承受不了你的重量。

eng: Say it in English.
Put your hands up!
I don't like to go out when it's dark.
The camera was essential for me.
simp: 摄像机对我而言是必需品。
trad: 攝像機對我而言是必需品。

eng: She saw a tall man yesterday.
simp: 她昨天看见一个高大的男人。
trad: 她昨天看見一個高大的男人。

eng: The friend who I thought would pass the exam failed it.
simp: 那个我认为会通过考试的朋友失败了。
trad: 那個我認為會通過考試的朋友失敗了。

eng: Did you feed the dog this morning?
simp: 你今天早上喂过狗了吗？
trad: 你今天早上餵過狗了嗎？

eng: I don't feel like taking a walk this morning.
He was late for school yesterday.
We wish to invite Peter to Japan in the near future.
simp: 我们希望在不久的将来邀请彼得去日本。
trad: 我們希望在不久的將來邀請彼得去日本。

eng: They left there the day before yesterday.
He is as tall as I.
We have a test tomorrow.
Da Vinci could see farther than others.
simp: 达芬奇比别人高瞻远瞩。
trad: 達芬奇比別人高瞻遠矚。

eng: We gather here once a week.
simp: 我们每周在这儿聚一次。
trad: 我們每周在這兒聚一次。

eng: I sort of understand.
Instead of going to Europe, I decided to go to America.
simp: 我决定去美国，而不是欧洲。
trad: 我決定去美國，而不是歐洲。

eng: It is good to be a winner.
The phone rang while I was taking a shower.
simp: 我在洗澡的时候，电话响了。
trad: 我在洗澡的時候，電話響了。

eng: It is highly probable that the deletion of element C will still yield the same result.
simp: 很有可能去掉C元素会得出同样的结果。
trad: 很有可能去掉C元素會得出同樣的結果。

eng: We're classmates.
It was through his influence that she became interested in ecology.
simp: 她开始对生态学感兴趣，是受到他的影响。
trad: 她開始對生態學感興趣，是受到他的影響。

eng: There is no denying that she is very efficient.
simp: 无可否认她非常有能力。
trad: 無可否認她非常有能力。

eng: When we think of the traditional roles of men and women in society, we think of husbands supporting the family, and wives taking care of the house and children.
simp: 当我们想到男女在社会中的传统角色时，我们认为丈夫养家，妻子照顾孩子和家庭。
trad: 當我們想到男女在社會中的傳統角色時，我們認為丈夫養家，妻子照顧孩子和家庭。

eng: My parents aren't old yet.
I met him at the barber's.
He will be back in a second.
He pulled aside to let a truck pass.
There was no one there besides me.
simp: 那儿除了我，一个人都没有。
trad: 那兒除了我，一個人都沒有。

eng: He left his daughter a great fortune.
simp: 他留给他女儿一大笔财产。
trad: 他留給他女兒一大筆財產。

eng: Well, I must be going.
And open your textbook at page ten.
simp: 把你的课本翻到第十页。
trad: 把你的課本翻到第十頁。

eng: Does that mean you won't come?
simp: 这是不是意味着你不会来了？
trad: 這是不是意味著你不會來了？

eng: That accounts for why the door was open.
simp: 那（就）解释了为什么门是开着的。
trad: 那（就）解釋了為什麼門是開著的。

eng: It proved the truth of the rumor.
In that case, I think you should come in today.
simp: 在这种情况下，我认为你今天应该来。
trad: 在這種情況下，我認為你今天應該來。

eng: One, three, and five are odd numbers.
I walked about 1 mile.
He has two children, aged 4 and 1.
simp: 他有2个孩子，一个4岁，另一个1岁。
trad: 他有2個孩子，一個4歲，另一個1歲。

eng: I am going on a picnic tomorrow.
Will it be hot again tomorrow?
I wonder if it will rain tomorrow.
simp: 我想知道明天是否会下雨。
trad: 我想知道明天是否會下雨。

eng: It may rain tomorrow.
I can't tell if it will be raining tomorrow.
simp: 我不知道明天是否会下雨。
trad: 我不知道明天是否會下雨。

eng: I don't think that it will rain tomorrow.
I will go skiing in Hokkaido.
I know him by name, but not by sight.
simp: 我知道他的名字，但不知道他长什么样。
trad: 我知道他的名字，但不知道他長什麼樣。

eng: We elected her captain of our team.
simp: 我们选她为我们队的队长。
trad: 我們選她為我們隊的隊長。

eng: They set out with a guide just in case they lost their way.
simp: 他们和一个导游一起出发，只是为了以防迷路。
trad: 他們和一個導遊一起出發，只是為了以防迷路。

eng: The hair style of the Beatles created a sensation.
simp: 披头士的发型引起了轰动。
trad: 披頭士的發型引起了轟動。

eng: He stretched his arm.
See you tomorrow in the office.
I don't think she takes after her mother.
The date of the festival coincides with that of the exam.
simp: 节日和考试碰巧在同一天。
trad: 節日和考試碰巧在同一天。

eng: The train leaves at 6 o'clock.
She had just come home when I called.
simp: 我打电话的时候，她刚回到家。
trad: 我打電話的時候，她剛回到家。

eng: We have a 20% share of the market.
You should make better use of your free time.
simp: 你要更好地利用闲暇时间。
trad: 你要更好地利用閑暇時間。

eng: It is dangerous to drink too much.
That is a high building, is it not?
You should especially not drink on an empty stomach.
Bring two breakfasts, please. Number 2 on the menu, and two teas with milk.
simp: 请送两份早餐过来。2号餐加两杯奶茶。
trad: 請送兩份早餐過來。2號餐加兩杯奶茶。

eng: Call an ambulance.
First, I should hear both sides.
simp: 首先，我要听听双方的意见。
trad: 首先，我要聽聽雙方的意見。

eng: About how much will I have to pay for all the treatments?
simp: 所有的医药费我大概要付多少？
trad: 所有的醫藥費我大概要付多少？

eng: I had already left before you returned.
simp: 你回来之前我已经走了。
trad: 你回來之前我已經走了。

eng: I don't see any reason why I have to apologize.
simp: 我没发现任何我该道歉的理由。
trad: 我沒發現任何我該道歉的理由。

eng: Weather permitting, we will leave in an hour.
simp: 如果天气允许的话，我们1小时后出发。
trad: 如果天氣允許的話，我們1小時後出發。

eng: Please feed the dog every day.
What do you think should be done about it?
The little girl will go astray if no one cares much about her.
simp: 这小女孩如果没人关心的话，就要走上歪路了。
trad: 這小女孩如果沒人關心的話，就要走上歪路了。

eng: I want to eat apple pie.
Before taking a journey, I got a haircut.
Edison was not a bright student.
simp: 爱迪生不是个优秀的学生。
trad: 愛迪生不是個優秀的學生。

eng: I want a box in which to keep these toys.
simp: 我想要个能装这些玩具的盒子。
trad: 我想要個能裝這些玩具的盒子。

eng: My father is always cool.
That was the first time that a man walked on the moon.
simp: 那是人类第一次在月球上行走。
trad: 那是人類第一次在月球上行走。

eng: Put the egg into boiling water.
He likes hunting.
That is the man I see every day on the train.
simp: 那是我每天在火车上看到的男人。
trad: 那是我每天在火車上看到的男人。

eng: Anybody would be better than nobody.
This bomb can kill a lot of people.
simp: 这个炸弹可以炸死很多人。
trad: 這個炸彈可以炸死很多人。

eng: I'll be very happy if I can serve you.
simp: 能为你服务我会感到非常高兴。
trad: 能為你服務我會感到非常高興。

eng: He is learning how to drive a car.
He cannot buy a car, still less a house.
simp: 他买不起汽车，更不要说买房子了。
trad: 他買不起汽車，更不要說買房子了。

eng: My fingers are so numb with cold that I can't play the piano.
simp: 我的手指冻僵了，以至于无法弹钢琴了。
trad: 我的手指凍僵了，以至於無法彈鋼琴了。

eng: He is not a good driver.
I left home early so as to get a good seat.
simp: 为了弄到一个好位子，我很早就出门了。
trad: 為了弄到一個好位子，我很早就出門了。

eng: Do you have a condom?
I hurried in order to catch the first train.
simp: 我匆匆忙忙，为的是能赶上第一班火车。
trad: 我匆匆忙忙，為的是能趕上第一班火車。

eng: She has a son and two daughters.
simp: 她有一个儿子和两个女儿。
trad: 她有一個兒子和兩個女兒。

eng: I'm exhausted.
She is collecting material for a book.
Will it rain tomorrow?
Was Ken at home yesterday?
He knows how to make a radio.
Nobody believes what I say.
The average height of the girls in class is over 155 centimeters.
simp: 这个班的女生平均身高超过了155公分。
trad: 這個班的女生平均身高超過了155公分。

eng: It is on this point that our opinions differ.
simp: 是在这点上我们的意见有分歧。
trad: 是在這點上我們的意見有分歧。

eng: Do you mind if I open the window?
I want to watch this film.
Switzerland is located between France, Italy, Austria and Germany.
simp: 瑞士位于法国、意大利、奥地利和德国之间。
trad: 瑞士位於法國、意大利、奧地利和德國之間。

eng: I see a woman wearing black.
simp: 我看见一个穿黑衣服的女人。
trad: 我看見一個穿黑衣服的女人。

eng: She lived for a long time.
Is death the only release?
It was not until I had a baby myself that I knew what mother's love is.
simp: 直到我自己有了孩子我才明白了什么是母爱。
trad: 直到我自己有了孩子我才明白了什麼是母愛。

eng: A sea separates Ireland and England.
simp: 爱尔兰和英格兰被海分割。
trad: 愛爾蘭和英格蘭被海分割。

eng: The dog came running to me.
Ogai is his favorite author.
Can you tell me what this is?
simp: 你能告诉我这是什么吗？
trad: 你能告訴我這是什麼嗎？

eng: Did anyone call me while I was out?
simp: 我出去的时候有人打我电话吗？
trad: 我出去的時候有人打我電話嗎？

eng: I hope everything will be fine in the end.
Alice has had a cold since last Sunday.
She's coming!
It's a hassle trying to decide what to wear to the party.
simp: 要决定在节日的时候穿什么是件累人的事。
trad: 要決定在節日的時候穿什麼是件累人的事。

eng: It rained for a week.
How long do you plan on staying in this country?
simp: 你打算在这个国家待多久？
trad: 你打算在這個國家待多久？

eng: You might have heard of it.
Yesterday I went and fished by the river.
He sleeps during the day and works at night.
The boy denied having stolen the bicycle.
simp: 那个男孩否认偷了自行车。
trad: 那個男孩否認偷了自行車。

eng: The clock does not run.
Living in the city is really different to living in the country.
simp: 在城市生活和在农村生活很不同。
trad: 在城市生活和在農村生活很不同。

eng: I waited for my friend for an hour.
simp: 我等我的一个朋友等了一小时。
trad: 我等我的一個朋友等了一小時。

eng: My little sister looks like my mum.
The whole country was covered in snow.
simp: 整个国家被大雪覆盖了。
trad: 整個國家被大雪覆蓋了。

eng: When he retired, his son took over the business.
simp: 他退休的时候，他儿子接手了他的生意。
trad: 他退休的時候，他兒子接手了他的生意。

eng: She married a rich man.
She told me her mum bought it for her.
simp: 她告诉我她妈妈买给她了。
trad: 她告訴我她媽媽買給她了。

eng: Can you show me this skirt please?
simp: 请你给我看一下这条裙子好吗？
trad: 請你給我看一下這條裙子好嗎？

eng: Ken cried for help.
He's started looking for a job.
He's getting along well with all of his classmates.
simp: 他和他所有的同学相处融洽。
trad: 他和他所有的同學相處融洽。

eng: I can't afford that.
Where did you get the idea?
Modern travel enables us to go around the world in a few days.
simp: 现代交通使我们能在几天内环绕地球。
trad: 現代交通使我們能在幾天內環繞地球。

eng: I will give you a bike for your birthday.
simp: 你生日的时候，我送你一辆自行车。
trad: 你生日的時候，我送你一輛自行車。

eng: In the light of what you told us, I think we should revise our plan.
simp: 根据你所说的话，我认为我们应该重新审视我们的计划。
trad: 根據你所說的話，我認為我們應該重新審視我們的計劃。

eng: Politicians never tell us their inner thoughts.
simp: 政治家从来不告诉我们他们的别有用心。
trad: 政治家從來不告訴我們他們的別有用心。

eng: He was kind enough to take me to the hospital.
simp: 他好心地把我送到医院。
trad: 他好心地把我送到醫院。

eng: She looked more beautiful than ever.
simp: 她似乎比以往任何时候都漂亮。
trad: 她似乎比以往任何時候都漂亮。

eng: He is always laughing.
Do you think he is good for the position?
simp: 你认为他适合这个职位吗？
trad: 你認為他適合這個職位嗎？

eng: Don't cry like a child!
simp: 不要哭得像个孩子似的。
trad: 不要哭得像個孩子似的。

eng: I always enjoy listening to classical music in my free time.
simp: 有空的时候，我总喜欢听古典音乐。
trad: 有空的時候，我總喜歡聽古典音樂。

eng: She will give her picture to whoever wants it.
simp: 她会把她的照片给想要的人。
trad: 她會把她的照片給想要的人。

eng: This red hat corresponds well to her dress.
simp: 这顶红帽子很衬她的裙子。
trad: 這頂紅帽子很襯她的裙子。

eng: How long does it take to walk to the station?
The man sitting next to me spoke to me.
simp: 坐在我旁边的男人跟我说话了。
trad: 坐在我旁邊的男人跟我說話了。

eng: They helped one another to make the school festival a success.
simp: 他们互帮互助，把校庆搞得很成功。
trad: 他們互幫互助，把校慶搞得很成功。

eng: Teaching English is his profession.
She likes cooking for her family.
simp: 她喜欢为她的家人做饭。
trad: 她喜歡為她的家人做飯。

eng: I am getting off at the next station.
Will you lend me your bicycle?
simp: 你能把你的自行车借给我吗？
trad: 你能把你的自行車借給我嗎？

eng: I'm not tired at all.
I wonder what this phrase means.
simp: 我想知道这句话的意思。
trad: 我想知道這句話的意思。

eng: She must be over eighty.
Water becomes solid when it freezes.
My uncle gave me a present.
simp: 我叔叔给了我一份礼物。
trad: 我叔叔給了我一份禮物。

eng: Your father is tall.
As far as I'm concerned, she's a complete stranger.
simp: 她对我来说是一个完全陌生的人。
trad: 她對我來說是一個完全陌生的人。

eng: Who's your favourite TV star?
simp: 谁是你最喜爱的电视明星？
trad: 誰是你最喜愛的電視明星？

eng: He put away his toys.
What a wonderful family.
Destroy this temple.
The girl wore a yellow ribbon in her hair.
simp: 那女孩的头发上绑了一根黄丝带。
trad: 那女孩的頭發上綁了一根黃絲帶。

eng: He caught a cold.
London, the capital of England, is on the Thames.
simp: 英国首都伦敦在泰晤士河畔。
trad: 英國首都倫敦在泰晤士河畔。

eng: I want to know where she went.
It's already 11.
I couldn't be any more tired.
I got a bee sting.
Nothing's as important as peace.
simp: 没有什么和和平一样重要。
trad: 沒有什麼和和平一樣重要。

eng: Don't forget smoking is bad for your health.
simp: 不要忘记吸烟对你的健康有害。
trad: 不要忘記吸煙對你的健康有害。

eng: It took me more than two hours to translate a few pages of English.
simp: 翻译几页英文花了我2个多小时。
trad: 翻譯幾頁英文花了我2個多小時。

eng: I can walk to school in 10 minutes.
Do whatever he tells you.
simp: 他跟你说什么，你就做什么。
trad: 他跟你說什麼，你就做什麼。

eng: What do you say to dining out tonight?
simp: 我们今晚出去吃饭，你说怎么样？
trad: 我們今晚出去吃飯，你說怎麼樣？

eng: A cat? asked the old man.
They're required to work eight hours every day.
simp: 他们每天必须工作8小时。
trad: 他們每天必須工作8小時。

eng: I married eight years ago.
At best he may take third place.
I think exams ruin education.
Let me know if I need to change.
simp: 让我知道我是否需要改变。
trad: 讓我知道我是否需要改變。

eng: Life without love is just totally pointless.
simp: 没有爱情的生活毫无意义。
trad: 沒有愛情的生活毫無意義。

eng: Many people drift through life without a purpose.
simp: 许多人毫无目的地随波逐流。
trad: 許多人毫無目的地隨波逐流。

eng: Nothing is achieved without effort.
simp: 没有什么是不劳而获的。
trad: 沒有什麼是不勞而獲的。

eng: I couldn't have done it without you. Thank you.
simp: 没有你我无法做到，谢谢。
trad: 沒有你我無法做到，謝謝。

eng: I can't live without TV.
I want to know how long it'll take.
simp: 我想知道这需要用多久时间。
trad: 我想知道這需要用多久時間。

eng: That is rather unexpected.
You'll forget about me someday.
Imagination affects every part of our lives.
simp: 想像力影响着我们生活的各个方面。
trad: 想像力影響著我們生活的各個方面。

eng: It's quite difficult to master French in 2 or 3 years.
How do you feel? he asked.
May I ask a question?
Mum, can I have a biscuit? "No, you shouldn't eat between meals."
simp: 妈妈，我能吃一块饼干吗？ "不行，不该在3餐间吃。"
trad: 媽媽，我能吃一塊餅幹嗎？ "不行，不該在3餐間吃。"

eng: It is said that "Hamlet" is the most interesting play ever written.
simp: 据说《哈姆雷特》是写出来的最有意思的剧本。
trad: 據說《哈姆雷特》是寫出來的最有意思的劇本。

eng: Do you speak Italian?
Excuse me; allow me to point out three errors in the above article.
simp: 抱歉，请允许我指出上文中的三个错误。
trad: 抱歉，請允許我指出上文中的三個錯誤。

eng: How long does it take to get to the station?
You're not even phased, you must have known all along!
simp: 看你并不感到惊讶，你肯定已经知道了。
trad: 看你並不感到驚訝，你肯定已經知道了。

eng: It looks like an egg.
The weather today is great, as it will be tomorrow.
simp: 今天天气很好，和明天一样。
trad: 今天天氣很好，和明天一樣。

eng: She liked tennis and became a tennis coach.
simp: 她喜欢网球并成为了一个网球教练。
trad: 她喜歡網球並成為了一個網球教練。

eng: Taro has a really strong sense of responsibility.
I wonder who has come.
I want to marry a girl like her.
simp: 我想和一个像她那样的女孩结婚。
trad: 我想和一個像她那樣的女孩結婚。

eng: I'm very sorry, we can't accept your request.
simp: 很抱歉，我们不能接受你的要求。
trad: 很抱歉，我們不能接受你的要求。

eng: We swam by the lake.
The high building can be seen from the window.
Let's keep in touch.
Oh, what is this?
A lot of houses were washed away by the flood.
simp: 许多房屋被洪水冲走了。
trad: 許多房屋被洪水沖走了。

eng: He is not a singer, but an actor.
simp: 他不是歌手，但是个演员。
trad: 他不是歌手，但是個演員。

eng: The eight o'clock bus was early today.
To what degree are you interested in baseball?
simp: 你喜欢棒球到什么程度？
trad: 你喜歡棒球到什麼程度？

eng: She plays tennis every day.
It was love at first sight.
Shut the door.
My father must have been handsome in his youth.
simp: 我爸爸年轻的时候一定很英俊。
trad: 我爸爸年輕的時候一定很英俊。

eng: My father retired to make way for younger people.
simp: 我爸爸退休了，以便为更年轻的人让路。
trad: 我爸爸退休了，以便為更年輕的人讓路。

eng: Father is busy writing letters.
My father has been in good shape since his operation.
simp: 自从手术后，我父亲一直处于良好的状态。
trad: 自從手術後，我父親一直處於良好的狀態。

eng: Father is going to undergo an operation.
My father neither drinks nor smokes.
simp: 我爸爸既不喝酒也不抽烟。
trad: 我爸爸既不喝酒也不抽煙。

eng: Father stopped drinking.
My father will come home at the end of this week.
simp: 我爸爸会在这周末回家。
trad: 我爸爸會在這周末回家。

eng: My father is an expert surgeon.
simp: 我父亲是一名外科专家。
trad: 我父親是一名外科專家。

eng: Father is out, but Mother is at home.
simp: 爸爸出去了，但妈妈在家。
trad: 爸爸出去了，但媽媽在家。

eng: My father is getting better by degrees.
My father often goes to America on business.
simp: 我爸爸经常去美国出差。
trad: 我爸爸經常去美國出差。

eng: I wouldn't have thought I would someday look up "Viagra" in Wikipedia.
simp: 我不会想到有一天我会在维基百科查找“伟哥”。
trad: 我不會想到有一天我會在維基百科查找“偉哥”。

eng: After all, you're right.
If possible, this weekend.
Mary is not poor. On the contrary, she is quite rich.
simp: 玛丽不穷，相反，她相当富裕。
trad: 瑪麗不窮，相反，她相當富裕。

eng: Even though he has a lot of money, he's not happy.
simp: 虽然他很有钱，但他不幸福。
trad: 雖然他很有錢，但他不幸福。

eng: What do you have for breakfast?
The United States borders Canada.
The fire alarm rang.
It is true that he got full marks on the test.
simp: 他考试拿了满分是真的。
trad: 他考試拿了滿分是真的。

eng: Shakespeare's "Macbeth" is a tragedy.
simp: 莎士比亚的麦克白是一部悲剧。
trad: 莎士比亞的麥克白是一部悲劇。

eng: Grandpa bought it for me!
We kept quiet.
My period hasn't come.
We saw the child get on the bus.
I'm afraid I differ with you on this point.
simp: 恐怕就这点上，我和你持不同意见。
trad: 恐怕就這點上，我和你持不同意見。

eng: Any student of this school must learn one more foreign language besides English.
simp: 除了英语，这个学校的所有学生必须多学一门外语。
trad: 除了英語，這個學校的所有學生必須多學一門外語。

eng: Her mother will continue to work.
Yours is over there.
Let's go!
The doctor told her that she should take a rest.
I feel much better today.
He's been awarded a gold medal once.
She still hasn't heard this news.
His room was in disorder.
He's changed a lot in his looks.
She said that she was happy.
We must go to school.
I'm doubtful that he's going to come.
I'm studying economics at university.
Does your new computer run well?
simp: 你的新电脑运行得好吗？
trad: 你的新電腦運行得好嗎？

eng: She has a rose in her hand.
You made a mistake.
I'm afraid of earthquakes.
They looked relieved only when it was in motion.
simp: 当它运转了，他们才看起来放心了。
trad: 當它運轉了，他們才看起來放心了。

eng: I wonder what has happened to her.
simp: 我想知道她发生什么事了。
trad: 我想知道她發生什麼事了。

eng: Oh, I'm really sorry.
They say love is blind.
She spoke in soft tones.
John is very proud of his new house.
At Christmas we send Christmas cards to our friends.
simp: 圣诞节的时候，我们送圣诞卡给朋友。
trad: 聖誕節的時候，我們送聖誕卡給朋友。

eng: May I borrow this book?
Her words were as follows.
I need a new computer.
He's talking on the telephone.
It gets very humid here in the summer. In the winter, on the other hand, it gets very dry.
simp: 这里的夏天很潮湿，另外，冬天很干燥。
trad: 這裏的夏天很潮濕，另外，冬天很幹燥。

eng: She turned down the subsidy that I offered.
The problem is we can't use our car on that car.
simp: 问题是那天我们的车不能用。
trad: 問題是那天我們的車不能用。

eng: We've gone to the park to take photos.
This is my book.
This is my dictionary.
These pictures are really very beautiful.
Can I take pictures here?
I enjoy taking pictures.
I need your passport and three photographs.
simp: 我需要你的护照和三张照片。
trad: 我需要你的護照和三張照片。

eng: My younger brother really likes to take photos of mountains.
simp: 我弟弟很喜欢拍山的照片。
trad: 我弟弟很喜歡拍山的照片。

eng: You can take your time.
Yoshida, don't stress.
Take it slowly.
Our eyes take time to adjust to the darkness.
simp: 我们的眼睛需要时间来适应黑暗。
trad: 我們的眼睛需要時間來適應黑暗。

eng: Be patient and persistent. These things take time.
simp: 耐心地坚持下去，这些事急不来。
trad: 耐心地堅持下去，這些事急不來。

eng: Take your time. There's no hurry.
Do it when you have time.
I don't have time for reading.
We just have enough time to eat breakfast.
simp: 我们刚好有时间吃早饭。
trad: 我們剛好有時間吃早飯。

eng: I don't know if I'll have time to do it.
simp: 我不知道我是否有时间做。
trad: 我不知道我是否有時間做。

eng: This is the tallest man I've ever seen.
simp: 这是我见过的最高的男人了。
trad: 這是我見過的最高的男人了。

eng: The people here are used to the cold.
I don't really read newspapers.
I don't know when she got married.
simp: 我不知道她是什么时候结婚的。
trad: 我不知道她是什麼時候結婚的。

eng: He gave us not only clothes but some money.
simp: 他不仅给了我们衣服，还有一点钱。
trad: 他不僅給了我們衣服，還有一點錢。

eng: She spends most of her money on her dresses.
simp: 她把大部分钱都用在买裙子上了。
trad: 她把大部分錢都用在買裙子上了。

eng: What's the matter?
Round trip? Only one-way.
That's a good idea!
It's a surprise.
I'll take him.
Where are the eggs, please?
Thank you very much!
Are they all the same?
Did you miss me?
Well, the night is quite long, isn't it?
People from Madrid are weird.
simp: 从马德里来的人都很怪。
trad: 從馬德裏來的人都很怪。

eng: With so many people around he naturally became a bit nervous.
simp: 他被很多人围着，自然变得有点紧张。
trad: 他被很多人圍著，自然變得有點緊張。

eng: Democracy is the worst form of government, except all the others that have been tried.
simp: 除了那些我们尝试过的政府形态，民主是最差的那种了。
trad: 除了那些我們嘗試過的政府形態，民主是最差的那種了。

eng: I lived for more than a month in Nagoya.
simp: 我在名古屋生活了1个多月。
trad: 我在名古屋生活了1個多月。

eng: One million people lost their lives in the war.
Why aren't you going? "Because I don't want to."
simp: 你为什么不去？"因为我不想去。
trad: 你為什麼不去？"因為我不想去。

eng: I'm sorry, I can't stay long.
The Germans are very crafty.
If you see a mistake, then please correct it.
simp: 如果你发现错误，那就请你纠正它。
trad: 如果你發現錯誤，那就請你糾正它。

eng: In the 1950's, the Finns were cited as having one of the least healthy diets in the world.
simp: 50年代，芬兰人被认为是世界上饮食最不健康的例子。
trad: 50年代，芬蘭人被認為是世界上飲食最不健康的例子。

eng: Allen is a poet.
I feel like playing cards. "So do I."
It is up to you to decide whether we will go there or not.
simp: 该由你来决定我们去不去那儿。
trad: 該由你來決定我們去不去那兒。

eng: It may be that the happiness awaiting us is not at all the sort of happiness we would want.
simp: 很可能等待着我们的幸福根本不是我们要的那种幸福。
trad: 很可能等待著我們的幸福根本不是我們要的那種幸福。

eng: She likes music. "So do I."
The phone is ringing. "I'll get it."
Trust me, he said.
To tell you the truth, I am scared of heights. "You are a coward!"
simp: “坦白说，我有恐高症。”“你是个胆小鬼！”
trad: “坦白說，我有恐高癥。”“你是個膽小鬼！”

eng: What's going on in the cave? I'm curious. "I have no idea."
simp: “洞里发生了什么？我很好奇。”“我一点也不知道。”
trad: “洞裏發生了什麼？我很好奇。”“我一點也不知道。”

eng: When will you be back? "It all depends on the weather."
simp: “你什么时候回来？”“这都要看天气。”
trad: “你什麼時候回來？”“這都要看天氣。”

eng: Who is it? "It's your mother."
What would you like to drink?
I'm taking an exam in January.
Can I eat this orange?
He likes oranges.
This fruit is shaped like an orange and tastes like a pineapple.
simp: 这种水果形状像橙子，味道像菠萝。
trad: 這種水果形狀像橙子，味道像菠蘿。

eng: I am eating rice.
I had my bicycle stolen last night.
simp: 昨晚我的自行车被偷了。
trad: 昨晚我的自行車被偷了。

eng: Whose bicycle is this?
This is my bicycle.
This bike needs to be repaired.
His bicycle is blue.
He went by bicycle.
The news made her sad.
I feel like crying.
I feel lonely.
Never have I felt better.
simp: 我从来没感觉那么好过。
trad: 我從來沒感覺那麼好過。

eng: I feel dead.
I felt as if I were in a dream.
I felt so sleepy that I could hardly keep my eyes open.
simp: 我感觉困得几乎不能睁开我的眼睛了。
trad: 我感覺困得幾乎不能睜開我的眼睛了。

eng: I should stop procrastinating.
Why don't we go home?
This work doesn't pay.
No point in threatening me. I'll still tell you nothing.
simp: 威胁我也没用，我什么都不会说的。
trad: 威脅我也沒用，我什麼都不會說的。

eng: My father participated in a cooking contest and came in first.
simp: 我爸爸参加了料理竞赛并得了第一名。
trad: 我爸爸參加了料理競賽並得了第一名。

eng: I ran into Ken at the park.
Carrefour's Ham offcuts are not expensive at all, but are nonetheless delicious.
simp: 家乐福的火腿剩料一点都不贵，然而却很好吃。
trad: 家樂福的火腿剩料一點都不貴，然而卻很好吃。

eng: He graduated from Cambridge with honors.
simp: 他以优异的成绩毕业于剑桥大学。
trad: 他以優異的成績畢業於劍橋大學。

eng: For what purpose did he come here?
simp: 他来这里的目的是什么？
trad: 他來這裏的目的是什麼？

eng: Have you ever been to Hawaii?
simp: 你已经去过夏威夷了吗？
trad: 你已經去過夏威夷了嗎？

eng: There were two cakes.
Are you going to visit any other countries?
simp: 你会去访问其他国家吗？
trad: 你會去訪問其他國家嗎？

eng: The boy I love doesn't love me.
simp: 我爱的那个男孩不爱我。
trad: 我愛的那個男孩不愛我。

eng: By the way, have you seen him lately?
simp: 顺便说一句，你最近见过他吗？
trad: 順便說一句，你最近見過他嗎？

eng: She passed away peacefully in her sleep.
simp: 她在睡眠中安详地去世了。
trad: 她在睡眠中安詳地去世了。

eng: Have you ever had any serious illness?
Industry as we know it today didn't exist in those days.
simp: 我们今天所认识的工业在那个时代不存在。
trad: 我們今天所認識的工業在那個時代不存在。

eng: The magician had the children's attention.
simp: 魔术师吸引了孩子们的注意。
trad: 魔術師吸引了孩子們的註意。

eng: They are jealous of our success.
Will he be able to come tomorrow?
She pretended to be a student.
Another step, and you would have fallen down the stairs.
simp: 再走一步的话，你就已经跌下楼梯了。
trad: 再走一步的話，你就已經跌下樓梯了。

eng: That can't be Mary. She's in the hospital now.
simp: 那不可能是玛丽，她现在在医院。
trad: 那不可能是瑪麗，她現在在醫院。

eng: Are the drinks free? "Only for ladies."
My boss assigned the hard job to me.
simp: 我老板把艰巨的任务指派给了我。
trad: 我老板把艱巨的任務指派給了我。

eng: They are sure to fall in love.
I don't have any change.
What do you call this bird in English?
simp: 这鸟你们用英语怎么称呼？
trad: 這鳥你們用英語怎麼稱呼？

eng: I heard the song sung in French.
simp: 我听过这首歌的法语版。
trad: 我聽過這首歌的法語版。

eng: He's afraid of dogs.
Which is your book?
What will you be doing at this time tomorrow?
simp: 你明天这个时候会是在做什么？
trad: 你明天這個時候會是在做什麼？

eng: This medicine will make you feel better.
Don't walk so fast! I can't keep up with you.
simp: 不要走得那么快！我跟不上你们了。
trad: 不要走得那麼快！我跟不上你們了。

eng: You had better go now.
Where there's a will, there's a way.
What does he say in his letter?
It is rude of you to say so.
The boy lay listening to the radio.
This is a post office and that is a bank.
His house was small and old.
I ordered a pizza on the phone.
He has some money in the bank.
They can overcome their fear.
We should do our best.
I live in a big city.
Please give me a cup of water.
It's cold.
I hope we stay in touch.
simp: 我希望我们能保持联系。
trad: 我希望我們能保持聯系。

eng: I am married and have two children.
simp: 我结婚了，而且有两个孩子。
trad: 我結婚了，而且有兩個孩子。

eng: Can I rest a bit?
Ask him if he can speak Japanese.
The bird was covered with white feathers.
simp: 鸟儿身上铺满了白色的羽毛。
trad: 鳥兒身上鋪滿了白色的羽毛。

eng: Have you ever visited Kyoto?
Men should work.
The policemen said to them, "Stop."
You can't drink seawater because it is too salty.
simp: 你不能喝海水，因为它太咸了。
trad: 你不能喝海水，因為它太鹹了。

eng: I cannot do without this dictionary even for a single day.
simp: 我一天也离不开这本字典。
trad: 我一天也離不開這本字典。

eng: Ken's dog is very big.
I walk my dog in the park every morning.
simp: 我每天早上到公园里遛狗。
trad: 我每天早上到公園裏遛狗。

eng: Eat your soup while it is hot.
For now, I will wait at the hotel.
Smoking has affected his lungs.
He saw brightly-colored birds, flowers and leaves.
simp: 他看见色彩鲜艳的鸟、花朵和树叶。
trad: 他看見色彩鮮艷的鳥、花朵和樹葉。

eng: It can't be!
It would take me too much time to explain to you why it's not going to work.
simp: 给你解释这为什么行不通要花很多时间。
trad: 給你解釋這為什麼行不通要花很多時間。

eng: It's no use pretending to make me believe that I believe things you don't believe!
simp: 要我相信我会相信你不相信的东西是没用的！
trad: 要我相信我會相信你不相信的東西是沒用的！

eng: You really don't have the right priorities!
I just wanted to check my email.
simp: 我只想查一下我的电子邮件。
trad: 我只想查一下我的電子郵件。

eng: I have too many things on my mind these days.
simp: 这几天我脑袋里的事情太多了。
trad: 這幾天我腦袋裏的事情太多了。

eng: I need to know tomorrow.
There is an apple on the table.
He is always complaining of his room being small.
simp: 他一直抱怨他的房间很小。
trad: 他一直抱怨他的房間很小。

eng: We must conform to the rules.
I feel a little guilty that I didn't invite him to join the celebration.
simp: 我没请他来参加庆祝会，感到有点内疚。
trad: 我沒請他來參加慶祝會，感到有點內疚。

eng: Who built it?
The ages of the two children put together was equivalent to that of their father.
simp: 两个孩子的年龄加起来和他们的父亲相当。
trad: 兩個孩子的年齡加起來和他們的父親相當。

eng: You can go or stay, as you wish.
The lost fishing boat made a safe return to harbour.
simp: 迷路的渔船安全地返回了港口。
trad: 迷路的漁船安全地返回了港口。

eng: We have two daughters.
He has already had lunch.
One is new, and the other is old.
simp: 一个是新的，另一个是旧的。
trad: 一個是新的，另一個是舊的。

eng: I'm very sorry I came home so late.
Our teacher will give us difficult problems.
simp: 我们的老师会给我们出难题。
trad: 我們的老師會給我們出難題。

eng: Thousands of people wanted to know the answer.
simp: 成千上万的人想要知道答桉。
trad: 成千上萬的人想要知道答案。

eng: I ordered several books from England.
simp: 我从英国订了好几本书。
trad: 我從英國訂了好幾本書。

eng: What time does the play begin?
This is the house where I used to live when I was young.
simp: 这是我年轻时候住的房子。
trad: 這是我年輕時候住的房子。

eng: The United States is abundant in natural resources.
simp: 美国的自然资源很丰富。
trad: 美國的自然資源很豐富。

eng: We were able to catch the last train.
simp: 我们能赶上最后一班火车。
trad: 我們能趕上最後一班火車。

eng: I ate bread and butter this morning.
simp: 今天早上，我吃了面包夹黄油。
trad: 今天早上，我吃了面包夾黃油。

eng: Who are you to tell me to get out?
In hard times like this, no ordinary effort can get our company out of the red.
simp: 在这种困难的时候，任何寻常的努力都无法使我们的公司摆脱赤字。
trad: 在這種困難的時候，任何尋常的努力都無法使我們的公司擺脫赤字。

eng: It is time you left off your childish ways.
simp: 是你该放弃你幼稚手段的时候了。
trad: 是你該放棄你幼稚手段的時候了。

eng: I find this book is very difficult to read.
He said that he was afraid it would be rainy.
Quite by chance, I met my old friend in the airport.
simp: 很幸运地，我在机场遇到了我的老朋友。
trad: 很幸運地，我在機場遇到了我的老朋友。

eng: He doesn't care much for baseball.
The price is not reasonable.
I'd like to visit your country someday.
simp: 我想某一天拜访你的国家。
trad: 我想某一天拜訪你的國家。

eng: We've sent the invitations yesterday.
He is mean.
I thanked Mary for her help.
simp: 我对玛丽的帮助表示了感谢。
trad: 我對瑪麗的幫助表示了感謝。

eng: She is sensitive to current fashions.
simp: 她对当下的流行很敏感。
trad: 她對當下的流行很敏感。

eng: There are fifty states in the United States.
Many children die of starvation in Africa.
simp: 在非洲有许多孩子死于饥饿。
trad: 在非洲有許多孩子死於饑餓。

eng: Have you ever been to Kobe?
He married an air hostess.
This river flows rapidly.
Your conduct is perfectly legal.
