I sat by his side.
The show was very interesting. You should have seen it.
simp: 演出真的很有意思，你该去看看的。
trad: 演出真的很有意思，你該去看看的。

eng: Yesterday evening we heard the President talk on television.
simp: 昨晚我们听了总统在电视上的讲话。
trad: 昨晚我們聽了總統在電視上的講話。

eng: He speaks poor French.
I learned to live without her.
Nobody understands me.
I don't speak Japanese.
I don't have anyone who'd travel with me.
simp: 我没有一个愿意跟我一起旅行的人。
trad: 我沒有一個願意跟我一起旅行的人。

eng: Foreigners astound me.
Everyone wants to meet you. You're famous!
simp: 大家都想见到你，你太有名了！
trad: 大家都想見到你，你太有名了！

eng: How do you find food in outer space?
simp: 你怎么在太空里找到食物？
trad: 你怎麼在太空裏找到食物？

eng: We don't have class on Wednesday afternoons.
Jesus was born of Mary.
simp: 耶稣是圣母玛利亚生的。
trad: 耶穌是聖母瑪利亞生的。

eng: What kind of music do you like?
simp: 你喜欢什么风格的音乐？
trad: 你喜歡什麼風格的音樂？

eng: He's a doctor.
Like me, Lucy has many friends.
simp: 露西和我一样有很多朋友。
trad: 露西和我一樣有很多朋友。

eng: One must be an executive in some company.
simp: 我们在任何公司都应该是执行者。
trad: 我們在任何公司都應該是執行者。

eng: He went to some place or other.
Does anyone here speak Japanese?
Could I park my car here?
simp: 我能把我的车停在这儿吗？
trad: 我能把我的車停在這兒嗎？

eng: I hope I can see you at Christmas.
simp: 我期望能在圣诞节见到你。
trad: 我期望能在聖誕節見到你。

eng: We'd like to order 18 tonnes of olive oil.
I had never seen a windmill until I visited the Netherlands.
simp: 在我去荷兰之前，我从没见过风车。
trad: 在我去荷蘭之前，我從沒見過風車。

eng: You have a choice of black tea, coffee, or milk.
simp: 你可以选择红茶，咖啡或牛奶。
trad: 你可以選擇紅茶，咖啡或牛奶。

eng: Please can we have two teas and one coffee.
simp: 请来两杯茶和一杯咖啡。
trad: 請來兩杯茶和一杯咖啡。

eng: Would you like tea or coffee?
I can choose between tea and coffee.
simp: 我可以在茶和咖啡之间做个选择。
trad: 我可以在茶和咖啡之間做個選擇。

eng: Does doing things in this way have a benefit?
Doing things in this way has no benefit.
On his arrival in London, he sent me a telegram.
simp: 他一到伦敦就给我发了个电报。
trad: 他一到倫敦就給我發了個電報。

eng: Be sure to drop us a line as soon as you get to London.
simp: 别忘了一到伦敦就给我们留言啊。
trad: 別忘了一到倫敦就給我們留言啊。

eng: Are you really going to London to study?
simp: 你要去伦敦读书是真的吗？
trad: 你要去倫敦讀書是真的嗎？

eng: When I am in London, I will most probably go catch a few performances.
simp: 我在伦敦的时候，应该会去看一两场演出。
trad: 我在倫敦的時候，應該會去看一兩場演出。

eng: There are a lot of parks in London.
When did you go to London?
He is fond of adventure.
My mom doesn't speak English very well.
simp: 我妈妈英语说得不太好。
trad: 我媽媽英語說得不太好。

eng: Don't underestimate my power.
This diamond is not real.
I'm thinking of going abroad next year.
This is a comfortable chair.
This is the same pen that I lost yesterday.
simp: 这支笔和我昨天掉的那支一样。
trad: 這支筆和我昨天掉的那支一樣。

eng: What do you think I've been doing?
simp: 你觉得我之前在做什么？
trad: 你覺得我之前在做什麼？

eng: I don't know if I still have it.
It's not something anyone can do.
simp: 这不是任何人都能做的事。
trad: 這不是任何人都能做的事。

eng: How could I be a robot? Robots don't dream.
simp: 我怎么可能是机器人呢？机器人不会做梦。
trad: 我怎麼可能是機器人呢？機器人不會做夢。

eng: Everyone has strengths and weaknesses.
simp: 每个人都有他的长处和短处。
trad: 每個人都有他的長處和短處。

eng: I can't explain it either.
I can’t do any better.
simp: 我做得好到不能再好了。
trad: 我做得好到不能再好了。

eng: I didn't want this to happen.
I hate chemistry.
It is inevitable that I go to France someday, I just don't know when.
simp: 有一天我去法国是无可避免的，我只是不知道何时。
trad: 有一天我去法國是無可避免的，我只是不知道何時。

eng: For once in my life I'm doing a good deed... And it is useless.
simp: 我生平难得做了一件好事...却是没用的。
trad: 我生平難得做了一件好事...卻是沒用的。

eng: Why don't you come visit us?
Congratulations!
I am curious.
I don't love you anymore.
I will play Sudoku then instead of continuing to bother you.
simp: 那我就不继续打扰你，玩数独游戏去了。
trad: 那我就不繼續打擾你，玩數獨遊戲去了。

eng: You never have class or what?!
What did you answer?
I like candlelight.
He is far from a good tennis player.
simp: 他离网球高手还差得远呢。
trad: 他離網球高手還差得遠呢。

eng: He is rather poor at tennis.
He's a quiet man, a little bald on top.
simp: 他是个很安静的人，头顶有点秃。
trad: 他是個很安靜的人，頭頂有點禿。

eng: He put the book on the table.
He withdrew his hand from the table.
simp: 他把他的手从桌上移开了。
trad: 他把他的手從桌上移開了。

eng: He erased his speech from the tape.
simp: 他把他的那段话从磁带里删除了。
trad: 他把他的那段話從磁帶裏刪除了。

eng: He is an expert at fishing.
He always wears dark glasses.
He can play tennis very well.
He is good at playing tennis.
He's a tennis player.
He played tennis.
He can play both tennis and baseball.
simp: 他既会打网球，又会打棒球。
trad: 他既會打網球，又會打棒球。

eng: He went fishing instead of playing tennis.
simp: 他去钓鱼了，而没去打网球。
trad: 他去釣魚了，而沒去打網球。

eng: What does this word mean?
That child may have been kidnapped on his way home.
simp: 那个孩子可能在回家的路上被绑架了。
trad: 那個孩子可能在回家的路上被綁架了。

eng: Can you teach me to play chess?
simp: 您能教我下国际象棋吗？
trad: 您能教我下國際象棋嗎？

eng: He knows a lot of people.
He tires easily.
In the end he achieved his objective.
simp: 他终于完成了他的目标。
trad: 他終於完成了他的目標。

eng: He finally became the president of IBM.
He is a bit like his father.
He's a little pale.
He stopped for a quick cigarette.
He is something of a scholar.
We're the same age.
He just got home.
He arrived at school exactly on time.
Without the slightest hesitation, he sold his own car.
simp: 他毫不犹豫地把自己的车卖了。
trad: 他毫不猶豫地把自己的車賣了。

eng: Which do you like better, spring or autumn?
simp: 春天和秋天，你更喜欢哪个？
trad: 春天和秋天，你更喜歡哪個？

eng: Don't be too sensitive to criticism.
I gave you a book.
The things he says are not the least bit important.
simp: 他说的话根本毫无意义。
trad: 他說的話根本毫無意義。

eng: It is going to rain.
A computer is a complex machine.
What time does this train reach Yokohama?
A fox is not caught twice in the same snare.
simp: 一只狐狸不会两次掉入同一个陷阱里。
trad: 一只狐貍不會兩次掉入同一個陷阱裏。

eng: When was it finished?
What time does it open?
I am Chinese.
He studies Chinese.
Are you Chinese or Japanese?
simp: 你是中国人还是日本人？
trad: 你是中國人還是日本人？

eng: Who is your Chinese teacher?
They were for the most part young people.
He is as tall as her.
It's me.
How far is it from here?
I teach.
I laughed.
I overslept.
I think I understand.
These fireworks are spectacular!
We enjoyed watching the fireworks on a bridge last summer.
simp: 去年夏天，我们在桥上看焰火看得很过瘾。
trad: 去年夏天，我們在橋上看焰火看得很過癮。

eng: Summers are very hot in Kyoto.
Someone has taken my shoes by mistake.
He took the wrong bus by mistake.
How long will you be staying?
Dozens of young people attended the demonstration.
simp: 几十个年轻人参加了示威游行。
trad: 幾十個年輕人參加了示威遊行。

eng: I am convinced that things will change for the better.
simp: 我深信事情会往更好的方向转变。
trad: 我深信事情會往更好的方向轉變。

eng: Nancy is afraid of dogs.
I am afraid of dying.
There's nothing to be afraid of.
I travelled around Europe.
We are against war.
Nobody likes war.
War doesn't make anybody happy.
simp: 战争不会使任何人幸福。
trad: 戰爭不會使任何人幸福。

eng: You're a human.
I am the leader of this team.
Japan is the leader of the world's high-tech industry.
simp: 日本是世界高科技产业的领头人。
trad: 日本是世界高科技產業的領頭人。

eng: She took night classes in the art of self-defense.
simp: 她在夜校上自卫术课程。
trad: 她在夜校上自衛術課程。

eng: It is becoming important for us to know how to use a computer.
simp: 知道如何使用电脑对我们来说变得很重要。
trad: 知道如何使用電腦對我們來說變得很重要。

eng: He was absent from school yesterday because he was ill.
simp: 他昨天没来上学，因为他病了。
trad: 他昨天沒來上學，因為他病了。

eng: It's healthy to breathe deeply.
All cats are grey in the dark.
simp: 猫在黑暗中都是灰色的。
trad: 貓在黑暗中都是灰色的。

eng: Though very busy, she came to see me off.
simp: 尽管很忙，她还是来送我了。
trad: 盡管很忙，她還是來送我了。

eng: I haven't smoked for ages.
This dictionary contains about 40,000 headwords.
simp: 这本字典包含了约4万个词条。
trad: 這本字典包含了約4萬個詞條。

eng: Do your best in anything you do.
simp: 你做任何事都要尽全力。
trad: 你做任何事都要盡全力。

eng: You must not speak with your mouth full.
simp: 嘴里有东西的时候不准说话。
trad: 嘴裏有東西的時候不準說話。

eng: The couple had a son.
Jim hasn't been home yet.
I saw a wonderful fall there.
simp: 我看见那儿有个很美的瀑布。
trad: 我看見那兒有個很美的瀑布。

eng: A cold front swept over Europe.
Would you like your ears to show?
You should be more reasonable.
Why don't we order pizza?
I want to eat pizza tonight.
We often associate black with death.
simp: 我们常把黑色跟死亡联系起来。
trad: 我們常把黑色跟死亡聯系起來。

eng: The deadline is approaching.
I am amazed at your audacity.
simp: 我对你的大胆感到很惊讶。
trad: 我對你的大膽感到很驚訝。

eng: She was amazed to hear the news.
simp: 她听到那个消息后惊呆了。
trad: 她聽到那個消息後驚呆了。

eng: I'm amazed at his rapid progress in English.
simp: 我被他英语的快速进步惊呆了。
trad: 我被他英語的快速進步驚呆了。

eng: If I were to tell you all I know, you would be amazed.
simp: 要是我告诉你我所知的一切，你会被惊呆的。
trad: 要是我告訴你我所知的一切，你會被驚呆的。

eng: You've both been very impressive today. I'm proud of you.
simp: 今天你们俩很让人印象深刻。我为你们感到骄傲。
trad: 今天你們倆很讓人印象深刻。我為你們感到驕傲。

eng: The Internet is an invaluable source of information.
simp: 互联网是一种无法估量的信息资源。
trad: 互聯網是一種無法估量的信息資源。

eng: A slip of the tongue is sometimes fatal to a politician.
simp: 有时候口误对政治家来说是致命的。
trad: 有時候口誤對政治家來說是致命的。

eng: I wonder what I should do today.
simp: 我在想我今天该干什么。
trad: 我在想我今天該幹什麼。

eng: What do you have?
Mike really likes animals.
Please pass me the butter.
The children's room is in bad order.
We have plenty of time tonight.
simp: 今晚我们有充分的时间。
trad: 今晚我們有充分的時間。

eng: In any case, it's troublesome, isn't it?
simp: 无论怎样，都很讨厌，不是吗？
trad: 無論怎樣，都很討厭，不是嗎？

eng: The accident arose from a simple mistake.
simp: 事故由一个简单的错误产生。
trad: 事故由一個簡單的錯誤產生。

eng: I am 30 years old now.
Were I to die, who would look after my children?
simp: 要是我死了，谁来照顾我的孩子们？
trad: 要是我死了，誰來照顧我的孩子們？

eng: Few students knew his name.
simp: 很少学生知道他的名字。
trad: 很少學生知道他的名字。

eng: Let's dance, my darling.
There is a map on the wall.
It is not what you read but how you read that matters.
simp: 重要的是你怎么读，而不是你读什么。
trad: 重要的是你怎麼讀，而不是你讀什麼。

eng: The old church by the lake is very beautiful.
Good morning!
Their wedding will be tomorrow.
simp: 他们的婚礼将在明天举行。
trad: 他們的婚禮將在明天舉行。

eng: Father will never approve of my marriage.
simp: 父亲绝不会赞成我结婚。
trad: 父親絕不會贊成我結婚。

eng: She fainted when she saw blood.
We will have learned English for five years next year.
simp: 到明年我们学英语就有5年了。
trad: 到明年我們學英語就有5年了。

eng: The company spends a lot of money on advertising.
simp: 那家公司在广告上花了很多钱。
trad: 那家公司在廣告上花了很多錢。

eng: There was no money left in my wallet.
It happened that I met Mr Uno on the street.
simp: 我碰巧在街上遇到了Uno先生。
trad: 我碰巧在街上遇到了Uno先生。

eng: The number of traffic accidents seems to be on the increase.
simp: 交通事故的数量似乎在增长。
trad: 交通事故的數量似乎在增長。

eng: My brother seems to enjoy himself at college.
simp: 我弟弟似乎在大学过得很愉快。
trad: 我弟弟似乎在大學過得很愉快。

eng: I found him a genius at chemistry.
simp: 我发现了他在化学方面的天赋。
trad: 我發現了他在化學方面的天賦。

eng: He tried to act cheerfully, but we all knew how sad he felt.
simp: 他试图表现得很愉快，但我们都知道他有多悲伤。
trad: 他試圖表現得很愉快，但我們都知道他有多悲傷。

eng: The boy has an apple in his pocket.
simp: 这男孩的口袋里有个苹果。
trad: 這男孩的口袋裏有個蘋果。

eng: Would you please wait for a few minutes?
He is to blame for the failure.
This turkey tastes good.
I listen to the radio every night.
The ambulances carried the injured to the nearest hospital.
simp: 救护车把伤者送往了最近的医院。
trad: 救護車把傷者送往了最近的醫院。

eng: I like to travel alone.
He took part in the Olympic Games.
School uniforms are just out of fashion.
What was the cause of the explosion?
How tall are you?
I believe you.
He is doing very well considering he lacks experience.
simp: 考虑到他缺乏经验，他做得[已经]非常好了。
trad: 考慮到他缺乏經驗，他做得[已經]非常好了。

eng: This is the book which you are looking for.
simp: 这就是你正在找的那本书。
trad: 這就是你正在找的那本書。

eng: How dare you speak to me like that!
simp: 你怎么敢这样跟我说话！
trad: 你怎麼敢這樣跟我說話！

eng: Will you please hold this edge?
The prisoner escaped under cover of night.
Why do I have to do that?
simp: 我为什么一定要那么做？
trad: 我為什麼一定要那麼做？

eng: The lions fought with each other to get food.
simp: 狮子为了得到食物相互争斗。
trad: 獅子為了得到食物相互爭鬥。

eng: This camera was made in Germany.
simp: 这个照相机是德国制造的。
trad: 這個照相機是德國制造的。

eng: It's unlike him to get so angry.
If she had married you, she would be happy now.
simp: 如果她和你结婚了，她现在会很幸福。
trad: 如果她和你結婚了，她現在會很幸福。

eng: You'll soon get used to speaking in public.
simp: 你很快就会习惯在大庭广众说话了。
trad: 你很快就會習慣在大庭廣眾說話了。

eng: It was raining heavily when I got up this morning.
simp: 我今天早上起来的时候雨下得很大。
trad: 我今天早上起來的時候雨下得很大。

eng: That is how he got out of danger.
simp: 他就是那样脱离危险的。
trad: 他就是那樣脫離危險的。

eng: This is the place where the battle took place.
I hope you will soon get well.
simp: 我希望您快就会好起来。
trad: 我希望您快就會好起來。

eng: This beach is a paradise for surfers.
simp: 这个海滩是冲浪者的天堂。
trad: 這個海灘是沖浪者的天堂。

eng: How's the weather there?
My grandmother posted the letter this morning.
simp: 今天早上我祖母寄出了这封信。
trad: 今天早上我祖母寄出了這封信。

eng: When you returned, I had already left.
simp: 你回来的时候，我已经走了。
trad: 你回來的時候，我已經走了。

eng: This is an important event.
This room does not get much sun.
simp: 这间房照不到很多阳光。
trad: 這間房照不到很多陽光。

eng: There are no clouds in the sky.
You should have come earlier.
I cannot give you a definite answer today.
simp: 我今天无法给您一个最终的答复。
trad: 我今天無法給您一個最終的答復。

eng: I can't put up with that noise any longer.
simp: 我无法再忍受那噪音了。
trad: 我無法再忍受那噪音了。

eng: Unfortunately, there was no one around.
Students generally like a teacher who understands their problems.
simp: 通常学生们喜欢理解他们问题的老师。
trad: 通常學生們喜歡理解他們問題的老師。

eng: Tom walks slowly.
Is this ladder strong enough to bear my weight?
simp: 这个梯子是否足够坚固以承受我的重量？
trad: 這個梯子是否足夠堅固以承受我的重量？

eng: John did not know how to explain to his wife that he had quit his job.
simp: John不知道怎么跟他老婆解释他辞了职。
trad: John不知道怎麼跟他老婆解釋他辭了職。

eng: These issues have no effect on us.
simp: 这些问题对我们毫无效果。
trad: 這些問題對我們毫無效果。

eng: Let's discuss the matter right now.
simp: 让我们马上讨论这个问题吧。
trad: 讓我們馬上討論這個問題吧。

eng: Let's discuss the problem with them.
simp: 让我们和他们讨论这个问题吧。
trad: 讓我們和他們討論這個問題吧。

eng: He is a baseball player.
Do you know which book sells well now?
simp: 你知道现在哪本书卖得好吗？
trad: 你知道現在哪本書賣得好嗎？

eng: With the weather getting worse, the departure was put off.
simp: 由于天气变差，出发延迟了。
trad: 由於天氣變差，出發延遲了。

eng: Doctors have discovered some startling facts.
simp: 医生发现了一些令人吃惊的事实。
trad: 醫生發現了一些令人吃驚的事實。

eng: I went swimming in the river yesterday.
It took me three hours to do my homework.
That's the stupidest thing I've ever said.
simp: 那是我说过的最愚蠢的话了。
trad: 那是我說過的最愚蠢的話了。

eng: Thanks for having explained to me at last why people take me for an idiot.
simp: 感谢最后为我说明了为什么人们把我当作傻瓜了。
trad: 感謝最後為我說明了為什麼人們把我當作傻瓜了。

eng: All you can do is trust one another.
simp: 你们除了信任对方，没什么要做的了。
trad: 你們除了信任對方，沒什麼要做的了。

eng: You can't expect me to always think of everything!
simp: 你不能指望我一直考虑周到！
trad: 你不能指望我一直考慮周到！

eng: Don't expect others to think for you!
simp: 别指望别人来为你考虑！
trad: 別指望別人來為你考慮！

eng: I suppose it's different when you think about it over the long term.
simp: 我认为你考虑久了就会不一样了。
trad: 我認為你考慮久了就會不一樣了。

eng: Are you going out tomorrow?
You must put an end to this foolish behavior.
simp: 你该结束这种愚蠢的行为了。
trad: 你該結束這種愚蠢的行為了。

eng: I'd like to be a guitarist.
The sooner, the better.
We have no time.
We all miss you very much.
The law is full of ambiguities.
simp: 法律有很多不明确的地方。
trad: 法律有很多不明確的地方。

eng: I've got to stop eating such sweet ice cream.
simp: 我必须停止吃那么甜的冰激凌。
trad: 我必須停止吃那麼甜的冰激淩。

eng: They bought a box of cookies.
She made cookies for the children.
Though wounded, they continued to fight.
simp: 尽管受了伤，他们还是继续战斗。
trad: 盡管受了傷，他們還是繼續戰鬥。

eng: Jim was able to hold back his anger and avoid a fight.
simp: Jim抑制住了怒火，避免了一场斗争。
trad: Jim抑制住了怒火，避免了一場鬥爭。

eng: What's the weight of your suitcase?
One of my suitcases is missing.
simp: 我的其中一个行李不见了。
trad: 我的其中一個行李不見了。

eng: No matter how important the question may or may not be, you must solve it.
simp: 不管这个问题重不重要，你必须解决它。
trad: 不管這個問題重不重要，你必須解決它。

eng: The dress suits you very well.
The dress fits you very well.
simp: 这条裙子你穿着很合身。
trad: 這條裙子你穿著很合身。

eng: The first attack missed the target.
simp: 第一次攻击错过了目标。
trad: 第一次攻擊錯過了目標。

eng: Was I wrong?
It's four o'clock by my watch.
Thank you for your patience.
Patience is sometimes the most effective weapon.
simp: 耐心有时候是最有效的武器。
trad: 耐心有時候是最有效的武器。

eng: That architect builds very modern houses.
simp: 那个建筑师创建了非常现代的房屋。
trad: 那個建築師創建了非常現代的房屋。

eng: These tools are used for building a house.
simp: 这些工具是用来造房子的。
trad: 這些工具是用來造房子的。

eng: I forgot.
The party was a success.
We were caught in a storm.
The company's going to go bankrupt really soon.
Many small companies went bankrupt.
An unforgettable event occurred.
simp: 一场令人难忘的事件发生了。
trad: 一場令人難忘的事件發生了。

eng: The boy rode a horse for the first time.
He returned home for the first time in ten years.
We want further information.
The box is almost empty.
How much will it cost?
I owe him 1,000 dollars.
He will be a good husband to my sister.
simp: 他会是我妹妹的好丈夫的。
trad: 他會是我妹妹的好丈夫的。

eng: He is able to do it better than I am.
simp: 他有能力比我做得更好。
trad: 他有能力比我做得更好。

eng: He's very good at playing baseball.
The pain is unbearable.
The top of the mountain is covered in snow.
He was glad to avail himself of any means to succeed in life.
simp: 他很高兴能通过各种方法在人生中取得成功。
trad: 他很高興能通過各種方法在人生中取得成功。

eng: We call our dog Pochi.
Only then did I realize that I had left my wallet at home.
simp: 那个时候我才意识到我把钱包忘在家里了。
trad: 那個時候我才意識到我把錢包忘在家裏了。

eng: She seems to hate you.
Will you stay at home?
I would like to take a walk, but the day is too hot.
simp: 我本来很想走走，但是天太热了。
trad: 我本來很想走走，但是天太熱了。

eng: This factory manufactures CD players.
Where're the shoes?
Seen from the sky, the river looked like a huge snake.
simp: 从天上看下来，这条河像一条巨蛇。
trad: 從天上看下來，這條河像一條巨蛇。

eng: I must have caught a cold.
Where does he work?
When did she get married?
This song makes me think of when I was young.
simp: 这首歌使我想起了我年轻的时候。
trad: 這首歌使我想起了我年輕的時候。

eng: I couldn't bear to look at her.
The radio is powered off.
He told me to be kind to others.
This food does not agree with me.
The bank secured the city from a flood.
simp: 堤坝保护了城市免受洪灾。
trad: 堤壩保護了城市免受洪災。

eng: He relies on his wife financially.
simp: 他经济上依靠他的太太。
trad: 他經濟上依靠他的太太。

eng: How about going out to eat tonight?
This book is really difficult to finish reading in a week.
simp: 这本书很难在一周内读完。
trad: 這本書很難在一周內讀完。

eng: Bill, open the door.
He studies English, but he's also studying German.
simp: 他学英语，但他也学德语。
trad: 他學英語，但他也學德語。

eng: Whoever knows him well respects him.
Taro drew 10,000 yen from the bank.
Her goal is to become a teacher.
Sooner or later he will tell me everything.
I arrived at the village before dark.
simp: 我天黑之前到达了村庄。
trad: 我天黑之前到達了村莊。

eng: Some people like volleyball, others enjoy tennis.
simp: 有些人喜欢排球，其他人喜欢网球。
trad: 有些人喜歡排球，其他人喜歡網球。

eng: She climbed down from the roof.
I didn't get the point of his speech.
simp: 我没有抓到他演讲的重点。
trad: 我沒有抓到他演講的重點。

eng: He is speaking quickly.
The car broke down.
I wonder if it will be sunny outside.
simp: 我想知道天会不会变晴。
trad: 我想知道天會不會變晴。

eng: I want to learn Chinese next year.
At last, the bus stopped.
I want to study abroad next year.
On February 14 Americans celebrate St. Valentine's Day.
simp: 美国人在2月14日庆祝情人节。
trad: 美國人在2月14日慶祝情人節。

eng: Sir, you have left your lighter on the table.
simp: 先生，您把您的打火机留在桌子上了。
trad: 先生，您把您的打火機留在桌子上了。

eng: She raised her voice.
Japan has many distinctive traits.
simp: 日本有许多别具一格的特色。
trad: 日本有許多別具一格的特色。

eng: What is the fare from Osaka to Akita?
simp: 从大坂到秋田的车费是多少？
trad: 從大阪到秋田的車費是多少？

eng: It is said that treasure is buried in this area.
simp: 据说这个区域埋着财宝。
trad: 據說這個區域埋著財寶。

eng: It comes natural to him to speak French.
simp: 说法语对他来说很自然。
trad: 說法語對他來說很自然。

eng: We are badly in need of food.
My father is a skilled fisherman.
He is very handsome.
My house is big.
Look at that house.
I am at home.
I don't like school.
I am a student of this school.
That is our school.
Please take more care in the future.
In case of an emergency, get in touch with my agent.
simp: 万一有紧急情况，联系我的代理人。
trad: 萬一有緊急情況，聯系我的代理人。

eng: Don't miss the bus.
He said nothing, which made her angry.
simp: 他什么也没说，这让她很生气。
trad: 他什麼也沒說，這讓她很生氣。

eng: I only got to the station after the train had left.
simp: 我在火车开后才到达车站。
trad: 我在火車開後才到達車站。

eng: Unfortunately I was not in time for his speech.
simp: 很不幸，我没来得及听他的演讲。
trad: 很不幸，我沒來得及聽他的演講。

eng: Can you make it on time?
He stressed the convenient aspects of city life.
simp: 他强调都市生活的便利方面。
trad: 他強調都市生活的便利方面。

eng: My father is a bit old-fashioned.
He rushed into the room with his coat on.
Because just one minute costs nearly four pounds.
simp: 因为仅一分钟就要差不多花费4镑。
trad: 因為僅一分鐘就要差不多花費4鎊。

eng: You are honest to admit your mistake.
simp: 你很诚实地承认了你的错误。
trad: 你很誠實地承認了你的錯誤。

eng: There is no connection between them.
I didn't like beer at that time.
He is an expert in the area of city planning.
simp: 他是个城市规划的专家。
trad: 他是個城市規劃的專家。

eng: He has set out for Canada.
Our teacher really stands on ceremony, doesn't she?
simp: 我们老师确实很讲究礼节，不是吗？
trad: 我們老師確實很講究禮節，不是嗎？

eng: She spends a lot of time practicing the piano.
It appears that he is mistaken.
The audience was deeply affected.
Time for dinner.
He is full of energy.
The judgement went against the government.
She has a round face.
Tears filled her eyes.
Having lived in Tokyo, I know the city well.
simp: 因为住过东京，我对这个城市非常了解。
trad: 因為住過東京，我對這個城市非常了解。

eng: She was different from most women in the neighborhood, for she was able to read and write.
simp: 她和小区里大部分妇女不同，因为她会读书写字。
trad: 她和小區裏大部分婦女不同，因為她會讀書寫字。

eng: He couldn't hold his temper any longer.
He is poor.
I'll wait here till he comes back.
simp: 我会等在这儿直到他回来。
trad: 我會等在這兒直到他回來。

eng: He went to stay with his cousin.
simp: 他去和他的表弟待在一起了。
trad: 他去和他的表弟待在一起了。

eng: What has become of her son?
He stayed at his aunt's house.
Come and see me tomorrow.
The birds were flying in a group.
He was involved in the trouble.
He is rather an active person.
She shall never forget listening to the sad tune.
simp: 她将永远不会忘记听过这首悲伤的曲子。
trad: 她將永遠不會忘記聽過這首悲傷的曲子。

eng: He is hardly friendly with his fellow workers.
simp: 他几乎不和他的同僚友好相处。
trad: 他幾乎不和他的同僚友好相處。

eng: He has gained weight.
Can we talk in private?
She is an obstinate girl.
It seems that Jack is sick.
There's a skeleton choking on a crust of bread.
simp: 一尊骷髅被硬面包噎到。
trad: 一尊骷髏被硬面包噎到。

eng: It was a week before Jane got over her cold.
We can seat you soon.
simp: 我们很快就可以安排您入座。
trad: 我們很快就可以安排您入座。

eng: The company abandoned that project.
How do you heat the house?
We came in sight of the hill.
Bob helped me.
That responsibility is a burden to him.
simp: 那个责任对他是个负担。
trad: 那個責任對他是個負擔。

eng: You can take whichever road you like.
simp: 你可以走任何你喜欢的路。
trad: 你可以走任何你喜歡的路。

eng: Developing his ability of speaking English, it seems, is his purpose of studying abroad.
simp: 看来他出国学习的目的是要提高他说英语的能力。
trad: 看來他出國學習的目的是要提高他說英語的能力。

eng: The poor young man finally became a great artist.
simp: 这个可怜的年轻人最后成为了一个了不起的艺术家。
trad: 這個可憐的年輕人最後成為了一個了不起的藝術家。

eng: Whether you like it or not doesn't matter.
London's climate differs from that of Tokyo.
simp: 伦敦的气候和东京的不同。
trad: 倫敦的氣候和東京的不同。

eng: See you again.
The cake tastes divine!
simp: 这蛋糕吃起来不同一般。
trad: 這蛋糕吃起來不同一般。

eng: What does PTA stand for?
I'm glad you could come to the party.
simp: 我很高兴你能来参加派对。
trad: 我很高興你能來參加派對。

eng: Is there a zoo in the park?
The more books you read, the more you'll know.
simp: 你看的书越多，你知道的越多。
trad: 你看的書越多，你知道的越多。

eng: Let's talk over a cup of tea, shall we?
simp: 我们用喝茶的时间谈谈，好吗？
trad: 我們用喝茶的時間談談，好嗎？

eng: The assignment took me longer than I had expected.
simp: 我用了比我预期更长的时间来完成作业。
trad: 我用了比我預期更長的時間來完成作業。

eng: It was not until I reached home that I missed my purse.
simp: 那是在我到家以后，我才不见了我的钱包。
trad: 那是在我到家以後，我才不見了我的錢包。

eng: Where does it leave from?
The rumor turned out to be false.
This is what I want.
I'm dripping with sweat.
Take any train on track 5.
simp: 到5号轨道乘随便什么火车。
trad: 到5號軌道乘隨便什麼火車。

eng: Jim accompanied her on the piano.
Beth was asked by her lazy boyfriend to do his history homework.
simp: Beth被她懒惰的男朋友要求帮他做历史作业。
trad: Beth被她懶惰的男朋友要求幫他做歷史作業。

eng: We were astonished to hear what had happened.
simp: 我们听到所发生的事，感到很惊讶。
trad: 我們聽到所發生的事，感到很驚訝。

eng: Take as much as you like.
Don't laugh at him for making a mistake.
It is founded on supposition.
simp: 这是建立在猜测的基础上。
trad: 這是建立在猜測的基礎上。

eng: When did you get back from your trip?
simp: 你什么时候旅游回来的啊？
trad: 你什麼時候旅遊回來的啊？

eng: The baby fell asleep in the cradle.
You must not eat too much.
It came to nothing.
You're old enough to know better.
simp: 你年龄足够大了，该了解更多。
trad: 你年齡足夠大了，該了解更多。

eng: Tom looked worried about the result of an English test.
simp: Tom看上去对英语测试的结果很担心。
trad: Tom看上去對英語測試的結果很擔心。

eng: Do you know how to operate a computer?
simp: 你知道怎么操作电脑吗？
trad: 你知道怎麼操作電腦嗎？

eng: The fire broke out after the staff went home.
simp: 在全体职员回家后，火事爆发了。
trad: 在全體職員回家後，火事爆發了。

eng: The tire leaks air.
The weather changes very often in England.
That's the point.
There is a cat under the desk.
You say one thing and then act just the opposite.
The engineer told us how to use the machine.
simp: 工程师告诉我们如何使用机器。
trad: 工程師告訴我們如何使用機器。

eng: I'll talk it over with Marty and see what he thinks.
simp: 我要和Marty讨论一下，看看他怎么想。
trad: 我要和Marty討論一下，看看他怎麼想。

eng: The vase crashed to pieces.
Why did you paint the bench red?
simp: 为什么你把长凳漆成红色了？
trad: 為什麼你把長凳漆成紅色了？

eng: We had a lot of snow last year.
This textbook is written in simple English.
simp: 这本教科书是用简单的英语写的。
trad: 這本教科書是用簡單的英語寫的。

eng: Do you get along with your boss?
The stadium was flooded with baseball fans.
Strange to say, he didn't know the news.
simp: 说来奇怪，他不知道这个消息。
trad: 說來奇怪，他不知道這個消息。

eng: It makes sense to pay off your credit card balance every month.
simp: 每个月还清信用卡负债很重要。
trad: 每個月還清信用卡負債很重要。

eng: In addition to English, he can speak French.
simp: 除了英语，他还会说法语。
trad: 除了英語，他還會說法語。

eng: Thereafter we heard no more from him.
simp: 从那时以后，我们再也没听到他的任何音讯。
trad: 從那時以後，我們再也沒聽到他的任何音訊。

eng: We hoped to have done with the work before the holidays.
simp: 我们希望在放假前做完了工作。
trad: 我們希望在放假前做完了工作。

eng: That is how he got out of danger.
simp: 他就是那样如何脱离危险的。
trad: 他就是那樣如何脫離危險的。

eng: The summer sun glared down on us.
simp: 夏日的阳光照在我们身上。
trad: 夏日的陽光照在我們身上。

eng: The best way to know what a country is like is to go and see it with your own eyes.
simp: 了解一个国家最好的方法是亲自去看一看。
trad: 了解一個國家最好的方法是親自去看一看。

eng: I don't think John is suited for the job.
simp: 我不认为John适合这份工作。
trad: 我不認為John適合這份工作。

eng: It makes no difference to me whether Fred came to the party or not.
simp: Fred来不来聚会对我来说没分别。
trad: Fred來不來聚會對我來說沒分別。

eng: Won't you have some tea with me?
simp: 你不和我一起喝点茶吗？
trad: 你不和我一起喝點茶嗎？

eng: Nick can speak Portuguese very well. That's because he's been studying it for 5 years.
simp: Nick说葡萄牙语说得很好。那是因为他学了有5年了。
trad: Nick說葡萄牙語說得很好。那是因為他學了有5年了。

eng: The accused is to appear before the court on Friday.
simp: 被告周五将会出现在法庭上。
trad: 被告周五將會出現在法庭上。

eng: The train will probably arrive at the station before noon.
simp: 火车大概会在中午前到站。
trad: 火車大概會在中午前到站。

eng: Of course I should read this book.
simp: 我本来应该读一下这本书。
trad: 我本來應該讀一下這本書。

eng: He is a reporter for Time magazine.
My father caught three fish yesterday.
simp: 昨天我爸爸抓到了3条鱼。
trad: 昨天我爸爸抓到了3條魚。

eng: He is totally immersed in family life and has no wish to work.
simp: 他完全沉浸于家庭生活中，不想工作了。
trad: 他完全沈浸於家庭生活中，不想工作了。

eng: The town was destroyed by the flood after the storm.
simp: 小镇被暴风雨后的洪水摧毁了。
trad: 小鎮被暴風雨後的洪水摧毀了。

eng: I wish he would write more often.
They say that he will never return.
simp: 他们说他再也不会回来了。
trad: 他們說他再也不會回來了。

eng: I'd like to make a call to Tokyo, Japan. The number is 3202-5625.
simp: 我想要打个电话到日本东京，号码是3202－5625。
trad: 我想要打個電話到日本東京，號碼是3202－5625。

eng: Two months have passed since he left for France.
simp: 自从他离开去法国，已经有两个月了。
trad: 自從他離開去法國，已經有兩個月了。

eng: My parents have gone to the airport to see my uncle off.
simp: 我父母去机场送我叔叔了。
trad: 我父母去機場送我叔叔了。

eng: Looks like it's not that easy, huh?
We usually walk to school.
It is hard to keep our balance on icy streets.
simp: 在结冰的街道上我们很难保持平衡。
trad: 在結冰的街道上我們很難保持平衡。

eng: Could you put my name on the waiting list?
simp: 你能把我的名字加到等候批准的申请人名单上吗？
trad: 你能把我的名字加到等候批準的申請人名單上嗎？

eng: She is very proud of her talent.
simp: 她对自己的才能很自豪。
trad: 她對自己的才能很自豪。

eng: I don't know when he will come.
simp: 我不知道他什么时候会来。
trad: 我不知道他什麼時候會來。

eng: It is easy to read this book.
The cap is too small for me.
simp: 这顶帽子对我来说太小了。
trad: 這頂帽子對我來說太小了。

eng: This book is easy enough for them to read.
simp: 这本书他们读起来够简单了。
trad: 這本書他們讀起來夠簡單了。

eng: We easily figured out the password.
simp: 我们毫不费力地想出了密码。
trad: 我們毫不費力地想出了密碼。

eng: A new team was formed in order to take part in the boat race.
simp: 为了参加划船比赛，一支新的队伍组成了。
trad: 為了參加劃船比賽，一支新的隊伍組成了。

eng: Do you have a camera?
I just wish we could leave this horrible place.
simp: 我只是希望我们能离开这个可怕的地方。
trad: 我只是希望我們能離開這個可怕的地方。

eng: Have a nice day.
Where did you see Nancy?
The picture looks better at a distance.
It is necessary for you to go there immediately.
Grand opening sale.
There were ten police officers on the spot.
There was a lot of snow last winter.
There were 20 failures among 50 applicants.
These figures don't add up.
Sure. Good luck!
The lady looked sad, also tired.
simp: 这个女士看起来很悲伤，也很疲惫。
trad: 這個女士看起來很悲傷，也很疲憊。

eng: It can be dangerous for young people to ride motorcycles.
simp: 年轻人骑摩托车可能会很危险。
trad: 年輕人騎摩托車可能會很危險。

eng: I would like to purchase some boots.
Which cap is yours?
It looks as if it is going to rain.
I don't want there to be any misunderstanding.
Entering the house, I tripped over the mat.
simp: 进家门后，我被垫子绊倒了。
trad: 進家門後，我被墊子絆倒了。

eng: I am quite pleased with you.
The whole neighborhood was surprised at the news.
simp: 整个小区对这个消息很惊讶。
trad: 整個小區對這個消息很驚訝。

eng: That is a pencil.
Some people pursue only pleasure.
Picasso is a famous artist whom everyone knows.
simp: 毕加索是个人尽皆知的着名艺术家。
trad: 畢加索是個人盡皆知的著名藝術家。

eng: Few, if any, will criticize him.
simp: 很少有人会批评他，即使有也不多。
trad: 很少有人會批評他，即使有也不多。

eng: The word is not in my dictionary.
simp: 我的字典里没有这个词。
trad: 我的字典裏沒有這個詞。

eng: I hope I'm not disturbing you.
No less than three hundred dollars was needed for the work.
simp: 这个工作需要不低于300美金。
trad: 這個工作需要不低於300美金。

eng: Why did you come to Japan?
Let's go and see as many things as we can.
simp: 我们走，尽可能多看点东西。
trad: 我們走，盡可能多看點東西。

eng: Ted was finally able to communicate his thoughts in Japanese.
simp: Ted最终能用日语交流他的想法了。
trad: Ted最終能用日語交流他的想法了。

eng: English has become an international language.
simp: 英语成为了一门国际语言。
trad: 英語成為了一門國際語言。

eng: We gladly accept your offer.
simp: 我们很高兴接受你的提议。
trad: 我們很高興接受你的提議。

eng: Round trip or one-way?
To know a language is one thing, and to teach it is another.
simp: 知道一门语言是一回事，教这门语言又是另一回事。
trad: 知道一門語言是一回事，教這門語言又是另一回事。

eng: It is time you went to bed. Turn off the radio.
simp: 你该上床了。把收音机关了。
trad: 你該上床了。把收音機關了。

eng: What do you think of it?
The knife has a keen blade.
The devil destroyed Hiroshima and Nagasaki.
simp: 恶魔摧毁了广岛和长崎。
trad: 惡魔摧毀了廣島和長崎。

eng: The man reading a paper over there is my uncle.
simp: 在那儿看报纸的男人是我叔叔。
trad: 在那兒看報紙的男人是我叔叔。

eng: Thanks very much for having me to dinner the other night.
simp: 谢谢那天晚上请我吃了饭。
trad: 謝謝那天晚上請我吃了飯。

eng: Mike is the only man on the board.
simp: Mike是董事会里唯一的男性。
trad: Mike是董事會裏唯一的男性。

eng: If you have done with that book, I'd like to have it.
simp: 如果你用完了那本书，我想借一下。
trad: 如果你用完了那本書，我想借一下。

eng: He did not get up early.
This kind of magazine can do harm to young people.
simp: 这种杂志对年轻人有害。
trad: 這種雜誌對年輕人有害。

eng: This is the ideology to which my speech is written.
simp: 我的演讲稿就是依据这个理论写的。
trad: 我的演講稿就是依據這個理論寫的。

eng: Where do you suppose you'll spend your vacation?
simp: 你认为你会到哪儿度假？
trad: 你認為你會到哪兒度假？

eng: On a rainy morning he left his house early so as to be in time for school.
simp: 在一个下雨的早晨，他很早出门为的是及时到学校。
trad: 在一個下雨的早晨，他很早出門為的是及時到學校。

eng: We must always be prepared for disasters.
simp: 我们必须始终为灾害做好准备。
trad: 我們必須始終為災害做好準備。

eng: Lay down all arms.
It was not long before we met again by chance.
simp: 没多久，我们又碰巧遇到了。
trad: 沒多久，我們又碰巧遇到了。

eng: Hurry up, or you will miss the train.
simp: 快点，不然你就要错过火车了。
trad: 快點，不然你就要錯過火車了。

eng: Japanese management must learn how to deal with American workers, he said.
simp: 他说：“日本管理层必须学会如何处理美国员工。”
trad: 他說：“日本管理層必須學會如何處理美國員工。”

eng: I hope you will be quite well again before long.
simp: 我希望不久以后你又能好起来。
trad: 我希望不久以後你又能好起來。

eng: The drowning man grasped at the rope.
simp: 那个溺水的男人抓紧了绳子。
trad: 那個溺水的男人抓緊了繩子。

eng: Plastics have taken the place of many conventional materials.
simp: 塑料代替了许多传统的原料。
trad: 塑料代替了許多傳統的原料。

eng: I spent idle days during the vacation.
simp: 假期里，我度过了悠闲的日子。
trad: 假期裏，我度過了悠閑的日子。

eng: The town was full of activity.
This medicine will do you good.
Recession is a temporary falling off of business activity during a period when such activity is generally increasing.
simp: 经济萧条是一段时间内，当这样的经济活动普遍增长而造成的一种临时性的经济活动衰退。
trad: 經濟蕭條是一段時間內，當這樣的經濟活動普遍增長而造成的一種臨時性的經濟活動衰退。

eng: Give us the tools, and we will finish the job.
simp: 给我们工具，我们会完成工作。
trad: 給我們工具，我們會完成工作。

eng: What should they do in this situation?
simp: 在这种情况下，他们该做什么？
trad: 在這種情況下，他們該做什麼？

eng: You had better do as the doctor advised you.
simp: 你最好照着医生的建议做。
trad: 你最好照著醫生的建議做。

eng: Would you like to dance with me?
What time is it by your watch?
You speak so softly that I cannot quite hear what you say.
simp: 你说得太轻了，以至于我没办法听清楚你在说什么。
trad: 你說得太輕了，以至於我沒辦法聽清楚你在說什麼。

eng: This problem is too difficult for primary school children to solve.
simp: 这个问题让小学生解决太难了。
trad: 這個問題讓小學生解決太難了。

eng: We will only consent on that condition.
simp: 我们只会在那样的条件下同意。
trad: 我們只會在那樣的條件下同意。

eng: In doing anything, you must do your best.
simp: 做任何事，你必须要做到最好。
trad: 做任何事，你必須要做到最好。

eng: The young man put out his hand and I shook it.
simp: 年轻人伸出他的手，接着我和他握了手。
trad: 年輕人伸出他的手，接著我和他握了手。

eng: Can I make a reservation for golf?
simp: 我能预定一下打高尔夫球吗？
trad: 我能預定一下打高爾夫球嗎？

eng: A beautiful valley lies behind the hill.
simp: 小山后面有个美丽的山谷。
trad: 小山後面有個美麗的山谷。

eng: The sky looks angry.
The two teams fought very hard.
There is a mass of dark clouds in the sky.
The baby cannot use a spoon yet.
I believe you'll get over it soon.
simp: 我相信你很快就能复原。
trad: 我相信你很快就能復原。

eng: I admit this may not be the best way of doing it.
simp: 我承认这可能不是最好的方法。
trad: 我承認這可能不是最好的方法。

eng: Due to a number of unfortunate causes, one-parent families are on the increase.
simp: 由于诸多不幸因素，单亲家庭在增长中。
trad: 由於諸多不幸因素，單親家庭在增長中。

eng: Quit talking, will you?
She went into her room to change her dress.
simp: 她进了她的房间换裙子。
trad: 她進了她的房間換裙子。

eng: Your behavior leaves much to be desired.
simp: 你的行为离要求的太远了。
trad: 你的行為離要求的太遠了。

eng: She wept reading the letter.
The length of this ship is 30 meters.
We eat so we can live.
As we went around the corner, the lake came into view.
simp: 当我们走到转角处，湖就映入了眼帘。
trad: 當我們走到轉角處，湖就映入了眼簾。

eng: He worked very hard.
This is a book.
These days John drinks too much.
What fruit do you like the best?
I was just about to leave the house when the telephone rang.
simp: 我正要离开家的时候电话响了。
trad: 我正要離開家的時候電話響了。

eng: We lost sight of the man in the crowd.
simp: 在人群中，我们失去了那个男人的踪影。
trad: 在人群中，我們失去了那個男人的蹤影。

eng: Years of resistance to misfortune ended when the settlers' village was overcome by the savages and their hopes and lives came to the bitter end.
simp: 当移居者的村庄被野蛮人征服后，他们的希望和生活到了痛苦的尽头，数年对灾祸的抵抗结束了。
trad: 當移居者的村莊被野蠻人征服後，他們的希望和生活到了痛苦的盡頭，數年對災禍的抵抗結束了。

eng: Which goes faster, a ship or a train?
Your words must correspond with your actions.
I don't believe the child came to Tokyo alone.
simp: 我不相信孩子能独自到东京。
trad: 我不相信孩子能獨自到東京。

eng: He said he was tired, so he would go home early.
simp: 他说他累了，所以他想早点回家。
trad: 他說他累了，所以他想早點回家。

eng: I can produce several pieces a day if I'm lucky.
simp: 如果运气好的话，我一天可以生产好几件。
trad: 如果運氣好的話，我一天可以生產好幾件。

eng: The train is bound for London.
The accident happened the day before yesterday.
He felt in his pocket for his wallet.
simp: 他在口袋里摸着找他的钱包。
trad: 他在口袋裏摸著找他的錢包。

eng: This is the worst movie I have ever seen.
simp: 这是我看过的最差劲的电影了。
trad: 這是我看過的最差勁的電影了。

eng: The rivers were flooded by the heavy rain.
This library has over 50,000 volumes.
simp: 这个图书馆有超过50000册书。
trad: 這個圖書館有超過50000冊書。

eng: This fish is free from poison.
She spoke scarcely a word of English.
There are not many books on these shelves.
simp: 这些书架上没有很多书。
trad: 這些書架上沒有很多書。

eng: The clouds opened and the sun shone through.
My father told me where to go.
She goes under the name of Yotchan.
It makes no difference to me whether he comes or not.
simp: 他来不来对我来说没区别。
trad: 他來不來對我來說沒區別。

eng: How did he make his living in such poverty?
simp: 他怎么在这样的贫困中谋生？
trad: 他怎麼在這樣的貧困中謀生？

eng: Jack is bound to succeed this time.
Without an air conditioner, people nowadays cannot live.
simp: 现今人们没有空调无法生活。
trad: 現今人們沒有空調無法生活。

eng: If Ted were here, he could help us clean our room.
simp: 如果Ted在这儿，他就能帮我们打扫房间了。
trad: 如果Ted在這兒，他就能幫我們打掃房間了。

eng: There is a bank in front of the station.
The girl has no mother.
It is our rainy season.
He is to come to my house tonight.
She is not only beautiful but also kind to everybody.
simp: 她不仅漂亮，而且对每个人都很好。
trad: 她不僅漂亮，而且對每個人都很好。

eng: Don't be cruel to animals.
Luciano might have the crowd behind him, but he's still wet behind the ears.
simp: 虽然Luciano可能已经是出类拔萃，但他还是乳臭未干。
trad: 雖然Luciano可能已經是出類拔萃，但他還是乳臭未幹。

eng: She tied up the parcel with string.
simp: 她用绳子把包裹紧紧绑好了。
trad: 她用繩子把包裹緊緊綁好了。

eng: It was not until I had a baby myself that I knew what mother's love is.
simp: 自己生了孩子后才明白母爱到底是怎麽一回事。
trad: 自己生了孩子後才明白母愛到底是怎麼一回事。

eng: Let's have a swim in the afternoon.
This racket of Jane's is a little heavier than the one which I bought yesterday.
simp: 珍的这个球拍比我昨天买的那个重了一点点。
trad: 珍的這個球拍比我昨天買的那個重了一點點。

eng: He went to some place or other.
About one third of the earth's surface is land.
simp: 地球的表面约有三分之一是陆地。
trad: 地球的表面約有三分之一是陸地。

eng: We have two daughters.
Strictly speaking, you are wrong.
The storm brought about much damage.
simp: 暴风雨带来了许多损害。
trad: 暴風雨帶來了許多損害。

eng: The style is nice, but do you have it in a different color?
simp: 款式很不错，不过有没有别的颜色？
trad: 款式很不錯，不過有沒有別的顏色？

eng: Honesty was the most important factor in his success.
simp: 诚实是他成功最重要的因素。
trad: 誠實是他成功最重要的因素。

eng: He made up his mind quickly.
No one is free; even the birds are chained to the sky.
simp: 没有人是自由的；就连小鸟也被铐在天空中。
trad: 沒有人是自由的；就連小鳥也被銬在天空中。

eng: They drank two bottles of wine.
How many sandwiches are there left?
I have climbed Mt. Fuji.
Shall I go for the doctor?
I major in economics.
There are two doctors in his circle of friends, a surgeon and an ophthalmologist.
simp: 他的圈子里有两人是医生，一个是外科医生，另一个是眼科医生。
trad: 他的圈子裏有兩人是醫生，一個是外科醫生，另一個是眼科醫生。

eng: I awoke to find everything had been a dream.
simp: 我醒来，发现原来一切都是场梦。
trad: 我醒來，發現原來一切都是場夢。

eng: This movie is worth seeing.
Nobody came to the party.
You've improved your English.
How many cars does Alex have?
They have no house to live in.
He put a Band-Aid on his hand.
simp: 他在手上贴了一块胶布。
trad: 他在手上貼了一塊膠布。

eng: At last, they reached the top of the mountain.
Open the window.
Should he hear of your marriage, he will be furious.
simp: 要是给他知道你要结婚的事，他肯定会大发雷霆。
trad: 要是給他知道你要結婚的事，他肯定會大發雷霆。

eng: We shall all die some day.
simp: 我们始终都有死的一天。
trad: 我們始終都有死的一天。

eng: This textbook is too hard for me.
simp: 这本教科书对我来说太深了。
trad: 這本教科書對我來說太深了。

eng: The moon is invisible behind the clouds.
simp: 在云的遮蔽下无法见到月亮。
trad: 在雲的遮蔽下無法見到月亮。

eng: I saw a white cloud sailing across the sky.
simp: 我见到一片白云在空中飘过。
trad: 我見到一片白雲在空中飄過。

eng: I don't feel like waiting any longer.
Many homes were washed away by the flood.
simp: 很多家园被洪水冲走了。
trad: 很多家園被洪水沖走了。

eng: I can no longer remain silent.
simp: 我不可能继续保持沉默了。
trad: 我不可能繼續保持沈默了。

eng: He took over his father's business.
We usually sleep in this room.
I feel better today.
The game was called off on account of the rain.
simp: 因为下雨的关係，比赛被取消了。
trad: 因為下雨的關係，比賽被取消了。

eng: This is by far the best method.
He stood there for a while.
He came across this old coin in an antique shop.
simp: 他偶然在古董店里发现了这个旧硬币。
trad: 他偶然在古董店裏發現了這個舊硬幣。

eng: I promised to help my brother with his homework.
simp: 我答应了弟弟教他做功课。
trad: 我答應了弟弟教他做功課。

eng: He is almost six feet tall.
No one believed me at first.
His wounded leg began to bleed again.
simp: 他受伤的脚又开始流血了。
trad: 他受傷的腳又開始流血了。

eng: A large amount of money was spent on the bridge.
His mother is American.
His illness caused her great misery.
What's the name of your insurance company?
simp: 你的保险公司叫甚麽名字？
trad: 你的保險公司叫甚麼名字？

eng: Would you like to come to my party?
As a boy, I used to swim in the pond.
simp: 我还是个小男孩时常去池塘游泳。
trad: 我還是個小男孩時常去池塘遊泳。

eng: Don't forget about us!
Helen is very worried about her daughter.
See you soon!
I bought this book at Maruzen Bookstore.
simp: 我在书商Maruzen那里买了这本书。
trad: 我在書商Maruzen那裏買了這本書。

eng: What are you punishing them for?
It's too bad the college dining hall doesn't have fig cookies.
simp: 可惜大学食堂没有无花果饼干。
trad: 可惜大學食堂沒有無花果餅幹。

eng: I'm very impatient to see the new version of Tatoeba.
simp: 我迫不及待地想要看到Tatoeba的新版本。
trad: 我迫不及待地想要看到Tatoeba的新版本。

eng: I've seen an article on the Tatoeba blog about a new version coming soon. Have you read it?
simp: 我在Tatoeba的博客上看到一篇文章，提到很快就会出一个新的版本，你们看到了吗？
trad: 我在Tatoeba的博客上看到一篇文章，提到很快就會出一個新的版本，你們看到了嗎？

eng: He hasn't answered my letter yet.
The front windshield of a car was smashed to pieces.
simp: 车头的挡风玻璃被砸至粉碎。
trad: 車頭的擋風玻璃被砸至粉碎。

eng: Please tell me where the bus stop is.
simp: 请告诉我巴士站在哪里。
trad: 請告訴我巴士站在哪裏。

eng: He must have been on steroids to have run that fast.
simp: 他肯定是吃了兴奋剂才会跑得那么快。
trad: 他肯定是吃了興奮劑才會跑得那麼快。

eng: Are you referring to me?
Say hello to your mum for me.
He is happy.
Can you help me to translate these sentences into Chinese?
simp: 你可不可以帮我把这些句子翻译成中文？
trad: 你可不可以幫我把這些句子翻譯成中文？

eng: What?
It's raining cats and dogs tonight.
Good question!
I want a person who can speak French.
How about a cup of tea?
My father drinks no spirits.
She turned down his invitation.
Mrs. West is busy getting breakfast ready.
simp: 威斯特夫人正在忙碌地准备早餐。
trad: 威斯特夫人正在忙碌地準備早餐。

eng: We're friends from way back.
It is necessary to prepare for the worst.
simp: 必须为最坏的情况作好准备。
trad: 必須為最壞的情況作好準備。

eng: Not knowing what to do, he asked me for help.
simp: 他不知道该怎麽做，于是便找我帮忙。
trad: 他不知道該怎麼做，於是便找我幫忙。

eng: Get the meaning of a word from its context.
simp: 从前文后理来推断一个字的意思。
trad: 從前文後理來推斷一個字的意思。

eng: This is the passage to the sea.
I have been to the airport to see him off.
simp: 我去飞机场为他送行了。
trad: 我去飛機場為他送行了。

eng: That's the way it is.
I have a black and white speckled dog.
I'm a bank clerk.
I am afraid I can't help you.
The doctor is known to everyone in the village.
simp: 村里的每一个人都认识这位医生。
trad: 村裏的每一個人都認識這位醫生。

eng: Would you like to leave a message for him?
The check, please.
How much is it?
You had better go to bed now.
You had better do it at once.
I didn't do it on purpose.
Say hello to your sister for me.
He apologized to the teacher for coming to school late.
simp: 他为上学迟到一事向老师道了歉。
trad: 他為上學遲到一事向老師道了歉。

eng: We didn't know what train they'd be on.
simp: 我们不知道他们会乘哪一班列车。
trad: 我們不知道他們會乘哪一班列車。

eng: If we begin early, we can finish by lunch.
simp: 如果我们早点开始的话，就能在午饭时间之前完成。
trad: 如果我們早點開始的話，就能在午飯時間之前完成。

eng: There are many countries and many cultures on Earth.
simp: 地球上有很多国家和文化。
trad: 地球上有很多國家和文化。

eng: I have lost both principal and interest.
She pressed her lips together and willed herself not to cry.
simp: 她合上双唇，并告诉自己不要哭。
trad: 她合上雙唇，並告訴自己不要哭。

eng: Young people are apt to go to extremes.
I made a desk of wood.
These problems will be solved in the near future.
simp: 在不久的将来这些问题都会迎刃而解。
trad: 在不久的將來這些問題都會迎刃而解。

eng: This a recent photo?
simp: 这张照片是最近拍的吗？
trad: 這張照片是最近拍的嗎？

eng: He handed the letter to the secretary.
All the world desires peace.
simp: 世界所有人都渴望和平。
trad: 世界所有人都渴望和平。

eng: He wants these shirts washed.
simp: 他想把这些衬衫洗乾淨。
trad: 他想把這些襯衫洗乾淨。

eng: I miss you very much.
She has a very radical opinion about the problem.
simp: 她对于这个问题有很激进的意见。
trad: 她對於這個問題有很激進的意見。

eng: Her mind is filled with dreams of becoming an actress.
simp: 她心中充满了成为女演员的梦想。
trad: 她心中充滿了成為女演員的夢想。

eng: You have to polish your English.
simp: 你要改善一下你的英语。
trad: 你要改善一下你的英語。

eng: You are not supposed to smoke here.
What grade are you in?
Finally she gave in to temptation and ate the whole cake.
simp: 她终于受不了诱惑，吃掉了整件蛋糕。
trad: 她終於受不了誘惑，吃掉了整件蛋糕。

eng: Fasten your seat belt at all times.
simp: 无论何时都要扣好安全带。
trad: 無論何時都要扣好安全帶。

eng: Come quick!
He applied himself to his study.
simp: 他把全副心神放在学业上。
trad: 他把全副心神放在學業上。

eng: You cannot separate the milk from the coffee once you put it in.
simp: 你一把它放进去，就不能把牛奶和咖啡分开了。
trad: 你一把它放進去，就不能把牛奶和咖啡分開了。

eng: The novel is centered on the Civil War.
simp: 这篇小说的中心点是南北战争。
trad: 這篇小說的中心點是南北戰爭。

eng: My friend has had three jobs in a year; he never sticks to anything for long.
simp: 我的朋友在一年内换了三份工作。他总是三分钟热度。
trad: 我的朋友在一年內換了三份工作。他總是三分鐘熱度。

eng: When the counter value reaches the assigned 'lucky-number' it displays a congratulatory message.
simp: 当计数器的数值达到预设的「幸运号码」时，就会显示一则恭喜讯息。
trad: 當計數器的數值達到預設的「幸運號碼」時，就會顯示一則恭喜訊息。

eng: The higher we go up, the thinner the air becomes.
simp: 我们登得愈高，空气就愈稀薄。
trad: 我們登得愈高，空氣就愈稀薄。

eng: The rain lasted five days.
The next day Jesus decided to leave for Galilee.
simp: 第二天，耶稣决定要出发前往加利利。
trad: 第二天，耶穌決定要出發前往加利利。

eng: Fresh fruit is good for your health.
I came here yesterday.
When I try to listen to music with media player there's an error and I can't play the file.
simp: 我尝试用多媒体播放器听音乐时，却出现了错误讯息而不能播放。
trad: 我嘗試用多媒體播放器聽音樂時，卻出現了錯誤訊息而不能播放。

eng: She looked lonely.
No gratuity accepted.
It's four against you. You'll be beaten up.
simp: 你的对手有四人。你一定会输的。
trad: 你的對手有四人。你一定會輸的。

eng: She cried all night.
My father tries to abstain from drinking.
His brother is a famous soccer player.
simp: 他哥哥是个有名的足球员。
trad: 他哥哥是個有名的足球員。

eng: Make good use of this opportunity.
You may give this picture to whoever wants it.
simp: 你可以随意把相片送给想要它的人。
trad: 你可以隨意把相片送給想要它的人。

eng: I saw nothing.
Bon voyage!
Don't talk nonsense!
Don't talk to me!
Don't talk!
Don't talk so impudently.
Don't talk about such a thing.
Don't talk so loud.
Don't you talk in the classroom.
Don't talk like that.
He flapped the flies away.
She started for Kyoto yesterday.
She took her book.
What an old book this is!
The whole school agreed to the proposal.
simp: 全校学生都赞成了这个建议。
trad: 全校學生都贊成了這個建議。

eng: Dad isn't home.
I hope to see you again.
My dream is to make it as an actor in Hollywood.
simp: 我的梦想是成为一个成功的荷里活演员。
trad: 我的夢想是成為一個成功的荷裏活演員。

eng: Someone else profits from the situation.
If it had not been for your advice, I would have failed.
simp: 如果没有你的忠告，我大概已经失败了吧。
trad: 如果沒有你的忠告，我大概已經失敗了吧。

eng: It won't be long before we know the truth.
simp: 真相很快就会水落石出了。
trad: 真相很快就會水落石出了。

eng: The baby is not capable of walking yet.
simp: 这个婴儿还没有学会走路。
trad: 這個嬰兒還沒有學會走路。

eng: Did you accomplish the task?
They go to church on Sunday morning.
simp: 他们每星期日都去教堂做礼拜。
trad: 他們每星期日都去教堂做禮拜。

eng: I always buy expensive items on credit.
simp: 我买贵的东西时总是赊帐。
trad: 我買貴的東西時總是賒帳。

eng: I, as well as he, am not convinced.
He left the room without so much as saying good-bye to me.
simp: 他连再见也没说就离开了房间。
trad: 他連再見也沒說就離開了房間。

eng: I am anxious about his health.
I was born in Osaka, but I grew up in Tokyo.
simp: 我在大坂出生，但在东京长大。
trad: 我在大阪出生，但在東京長大。

eng: We must consider the financial aspects of this project.
simp: 我们必须从财政方面考虑一下这个计划。
trad: 我們必須從財政方面考慮一下這個計劃。

eng: In any case, I'll call you tomorrow.
simp: 无论如何我明天都会打电话给你。
trad: 無論如何我明天都會打電話給你。

eng: She is living in London.
Your soul has been condemned to hell.
simp: 你的灵魂已坠进了地狱。
trad: 你的靈魂已墜進了地獄。

eng: Come back soon.
The pirates buried their treasure in the ground.
simp: 海盗把财宝藏进了地底。
trad: 海盜把財寶藏進了地底。

eng: Kanji are difficult to read.
This problem seems difficult.
She's grown out of her favorite dress, so her mother will have to make it over for her.
simp: 她最爱的裙子已经不合身了，所以她母亲得重新造一件给她。
trad: 她最愛的裙子已經不合身了，所以她母親得重新造一件給她。

eng: I still don't write Chinese well.
Will you have some coffee?
Please pay at this counter.
I don't know what to do.
I don't know how much this motorcycle is.
simp: 我不知道这辆摩托车多少钱。
trad: 我不知道這輛摩托車多少錢。

eng: We have to abandon the plan.
simp: 我们必须放弃这个计划。
trad: 我們必須放棄這個計劃。

eng: I got a stomach tumor and had to have it operated on.
simp: 我得了胃肿瘤，必须动手术切除。
trad: 我得了胃腫瘤，必須動手術切除。

eng: In this way, we waste a lot of time.
simp: 这样的话我们会浪费很多时间。
trad: 這樣的話我們會浪費很多時間。

eng: She doesn't have any enemies.
Do you believe him?
I cannot put up with her behavior.
Take care not to awake the sleeping baby.
simp: 小心不要弄醒了正在睡觉的婴儿。
trad: 小心不要弄醒了正在睡覺的嬰兒。

eng: We carried out that plan.
I'm not in the least afraid of it.
You are not to neglect your duty.
It was not easy to put out the fire at once.
simp: 要即时扑灭那火灾并不容易。
trad: 要即時撲滅那火災並不容易。

eng: You have to make efforts if you are to succeed.
simp: 如果你想成功，必先付出努力。
trad: 如果你想成功，必先付出努力。

eng: My mother used to be into tennis.
simp: 母亲以前很喜欢打网球。
trad: 母親以前很喜歡打網球。

eng: I must make an apology to her.
Life is beautiful.
No music, no life.
Life is very short.
Country life is healthier than city life.
simp: 乡村生活比都市生活健康。
trad: 鄉村生活比都市生活健康。

eng: How strange life is!
This is the life.
Is this my life?
This is life!
Country life is very peaceful in comparison with city life.
simp: 和都市生活相比，乡村生活和谐多了。
trad: 和都市生活相比，鄉村生活和諧多了。

eng: I have life insurance.
Life is beautiful.
Air is indispensable to life.
simp: 空气是生命中不可或缺的。
trad: 空氣是生命中不可或缺的。

eng: The music carried me back to my childhood.
simp: 这些音乐勾起了我儿时的回忆。
trad: 這些音樂勾起了我兒時的回憶。

eng: He laid his bag on the table.
There's no success without perseverance.
He and I have been good friends since we were children.
simp: 我和他从小就是好朋友了。
trad: 我和他從小就是好朋友了。

eng: Can you lift this stone?
How fast does he run?
He saw that he was wrong.
He saves what he earns.
simp: 他把赚到的钱都存了起来。
trad: 他把賺到的錢都存了起來。

eng: Try it out yourself.
He departed without so much as saying good bye.
simp: 他连再见也不说就走了。
trad: 他連再見也不說就走了。

eng: He waited until she came.
simp: 他一直等到她来了为止。
trad: 他一直等到她來了為止。

eng: She made believe that she was sick.
The hare was outdistanced by the tortoise.
simp: 野兔被乌龟抛了在后头。
trad: 野兔被烏龜拋了在後頭。

eng: Is there any life on Mars?
Mr Smith and I have been acquainted with each other for a long time.
simp: Smith 先生和我是老相识。
trad: Smith 先生和我是老相識。

eng: Your son took part in the student movement, I hear.
simp: 听说你儿子参与了学生运动。
trad: 聽說你兒子參與了學生運動。

eng: They want to increase food production by growing new kinds of rice.
simp: 他们想栽培新品种的米来增加粮食生产。
trad: 他們想栽培新品種的米來增加糧食生產。

eng: We eat with our mouths.
It appears that she might change her mind.
Do in Rome as the Romans do.
He had never seen such a bad boy.
simp: 他从没见过那么坏的男孩。
trad: 他從沒見過那麼壞的男孩。

eng: Jeff seems to know where she is.
simp: Jeff 好像知道她在哪里。
trad: Jeff 好像知道她在哪裏。

eng: The other day something horrible happened in a Tokyo suburb.
simp: 前几天，东京郊外发生了件可怕的事情。
trad: 前幾天，東京郊外發生了件可怕的事情。

eng: Who teaches you English? "Miss Yamada does."
He played a minor part in the play.
simp: 他在剧中演了一个小角色。
trad: 他在劇中演了一個小角色。

eng: I'd like to take a 9:30 flight.
simp: 我想乘九时三十分的那班机。
trad: 我想乘九時三十分的那班機。

eng: The president is presently in Miami.
This was the best-selling book last week.
simp: 这本是上个礼拜销量最高的书。
trad: 這本是上個禮拜銷量最高的書。

eng: I am busy now and can't play with you.
simp: 我现在很忙，没空和你玩。
trad: 我現在很忙，沒空和你玩。

eng: He said he would run 200 kilometers in a day and he did.
simp: 他说他会在一天内跑 200 公里，而真的做到了。
trad: 他說他會在一天內跑 200 公裏，而真的做到了。

eng: He won't beat me.
His composition leaves nothing to be desired.
simp: 他的文章写得完美无瑕。
trad: 他的文章寫得完美無瑕。

eng: I have a favor to ask of you.
He went to Austria for the purpose of studying music.
If it rains tomorrow, we'll not go there.
simp: 如果明天下雨，我们就不会去那里。
trad: 如果明天下雨，我們就不會去那裏。

eng: After losing his job, he went through a very difficult time.
simp: 失业之后他捱过了一段非常艰苦的日子。
trad: 失業之後他捱過了一段非常艱苦的日子。

eng: A smell of lilies filled the room.
simp: 百合的香气充满了整个房间。
trad: 百合的香氣充滿了整個房間。

eng: He is furious at what they have done to him.
simp: 他们对他做的事使他感到十分愤怒。
trad: 他們對他做的事使他感到十分憤怒。

eng: You should try to behave better.
The total expense for the project amounts to one hundred million yen.
simp: 计划的总开支为一亿円。
trad: 計劃的總開支為一億円。

eng: I am very pleased to meet them.
simp: 我很高兴能和他们会面。
trad: 我很高興能和他們會面。

eng: I'm sorry.
I have read the book before.
He hardly ever opens a book.
simp: 他几乎从来没揭开过一本书。
trad: 他幾乎從來沒揭開過一本書。

eng: He flew to Chicago, where he happened to see a friend.
simp: 他乘飞机去了芝加哥，在那里偶然遇见了一个朋友。
trad: 他乘飛機去了芝加哥，在那裏偶然遇見了一個朋友。

eng: The doctor advised me to stop smoking.
Her hands were as cold as ice.
We take a bath every day.
There is no substance in his speech.
She is going to part from her boyfriend.
The President is usually accompanied by his wife when he goes abroad.
simp: 总统出国通常有妻子陪伴。
trad: 總統出國通常有妻子陪伴。

eng: Who is that old woman?
This apple tastes sour.
It is time not only to equalize men's and women's wages, but also to equalize responsibility for housework.
simp: 现在不止要男女薪金平等，而且还要平均分配家务。
trad: 現在不止要男女薪金平等，而且還要平均分配家務。

eng: You don't have to go getting so hairy about such a small thing.
The eternal silence of these infinite spaces terrifies me.
simp: 这些无限空间的永恆沉默使我恐惧。
trad: 這些無限空間的永恆沈默使我恐懼。

eng: Hold it with both hands.
Are you not tired?
Gardening has been popular for some years.
Would you show us some samples of your work?
simp: 可以给我们看看你的一些作品样本吗？
trad: 可以給我們看看你的一些作品樣本嗎？

eng: She is a difficult person to deal with.
He is afraid of making mistakes.
I don't love her.
Love is blind.
Love and Peace.
Does everybody love music?
Cats usually hate dogs.
Most writers hate being criticized.
simp: 大多数的作家都讨厌被批评。
trad: 大多數的作家都討厭被批評。

eng: Fuck you!
I do not like spring.
His attempt to escape was successful.
Deaf-mute people talk using sign language.
They are saving their money for the purchase of a house.
I had to give up my plan.
simp: 我不得不放弃我的计划。
trad: 我不得不放棄我的計劃。

eng: We arrived to find a huge meal ready for us.
simp: 我们到达后发现一顿大餐已经为我们准备好了。
trad: 我們到達後發現一頓大餐已經為我們準備好了。

eng: Everybody is waiting for you.
When did the accident take place?
The manager ordered all the rooms to be swept clean as soon as possible.
simp: 经理命令要把所有房间儘快打扫乾淨。
trad: 經理命令要把所有房間儘快打掃乾淨。

eng: A small car is more economical than a large one.
The garrison was forced to surrender.
There was a broken cup on the table.
This book is very small.
Her charm is beyond description.
simp: 她的魅力难以用笔墨形容。
trad: 她的魅力難以用筆墨形容。

eng: The truth finally came out at his trial.
simp: 在他的裁判下，真相终于大白。
trad: 在他的裁判下，真相終於大白。

eng: The piano was out of tune; it sounded very bad.
simp: 钢琴走调了，音色很难听。
trad: 鋼琴走調了，音色很難聽。

eng: He doesn't care much for baseball.
However, I have no money.
Move up to the front, please.
She married John, not because she loved him, but because he was a rich man.
simp: 她嫁了 John，不是因为爱他，而是因为 John 是个有钱人。
trad: 她嫁了 John，不是因為愛他，而是因為 John 是個有錢人。

eng: You will understand it as time passes.
I thank you.
You will keep your word, won't you?
The people crowded round the injured man, but they made way for the doctor when he reached the scene of the accident.
simp: 人群把伤者团团围住，但医生来到现场时都让了路给他。
trad: 人群把傷者團團圍住，但醫生來到現場時都讓了路給他。

eng: The accent of "guitar" falls on the second syllable.
We must study the affair as a whole.
simp: 我们必须总体地研究这事件。
trad: 我們必須總體地研究這事件。

eng: In spite of the storm, he went out.
simp: 虽然正在刮暴风雨，但他还是出去了。
trad: 雖然正在刮暴風雨，但他還是出去了。

eng: Please get a lot of pencils.
He is burning with anger.
Keep away from me.
Penny wise, pound foolish.
Don't be afraid to ask questions.
What are you about?
Quite a few students played truant from school.
This is the fifth concert by this orchestra.
simp: 这是管弦乐团的第五场音乐会。
trad: 這是管弦樂團的第五場音樂會。

eng: Can you drive a car?
One out of three persons in this city has his own car.
simp: 这城市每三个人中有一个拥有自己的车。
trad: 這城市每三個人中有一個擁有自己的車。

eng: The invention of the transistor marked a new era.
simp: 晶体管的发明标志着一个新时代的开始。
trad: 晶體管的發明標誌著一個新時代的開始。

eng: If you are going to smoke, please go outside.
I love to dance.
Ken is as tall as Bill.
I don't get it.
Can you speak French?
Who teaches you French?
Jack can speak French.
I love French films.
I cannot read French.
His wife is French.
He speaks French.
Do you like French wines?
simp: 你喜欢喝法国的葡萄酒吗？
trad: 你喜歡喝法國的葡萄酒嗎？

eng: Can he speak French?
She can speak French.
Does she speak French?
French is her mother tongue.
French is their mother tongue.
Are you American or French?
simp: 你是美国人还是法国人？
trad: 你是美國人還是法國人？

eng: I can't speak French.
I want to learn French.
He speaks English and French.
She majors in French literature.
simp: 她的专业是法国的文学
trad: 她的專業是法國的文學

eng: I want to eat French cuisine.
I don't speak French very much.
Curiosity killed the cat.
The cat is very cute.
A cat has nine lives.
There is a cat under the bed.
That is not a tiger.
Which dog is yours?
This is my dog.
What she said wasn't true.
simp: 她所说的话是不真实的。
trad: 她所說的話是不真實的。

eng: It's driving me crazy.
I did smoke when I was young.
It snowed a good deal last night.
If it is worth doing, do it well.
simp: 如果事情值得做就值得做好。
trad: 如果事情值得做就值得做好。

eng: Please put your baggage on this scale.
simp: 请把你的行李放在这秤上。
trad: 請把你的行李放在這秤上。

eng: This milk has a peculiar smell.
I have an appointment at 3.
Will you marry me?
Do come again.
See you next week!
Which of the TV programs do you like best?
What is the good of reading such books?
The earth is small compared with the sun.
Tom and I have nothing in common.
Does your dog bite?
Karin is Austrian.
Football is my favorite game.
simp: 踢球是我的最喜欢的运动。
trad: 踢球是我的最喜歡的運動。

eng: We've become a mockery to the whole village.
simp: 我们成了整个村庄的笑柄。
trad: 我們成了整個村莊的笑柄。

eng: You may bring whoever wants to come.
Now that it has stopped raining, we can go home.
simp: 既然雨已经停了, 我们可以回家了.
trad: 既然雨已經停了, 我們可以回家了.

eng: With all his efforts, he couldn't succeed.
simp: 他用尽了全力, 还是没有成功.
trad: 他用盡了全力, 還是沒有成功.

eng: It's absurd of you to do that.
simp: 你那么做真是太过荒谬了.
trad: 你那麼做真是太過荒謬了.

eng: Can I reserve a seat to Hawaii for Christmas?
simp: 我能不能够订一个圣诞节时去夏威夷的位子?
trad: 我能不能夠訂一個聖誕節時去夏威夷的位子?

eng: How formal is this ceremony?
These oranges have gone bad.
Come and see me right now.
I'll call you at seven.
My home is in the outskirts of that city.
simp: 我的家在那座城市的郊外.
trad: 我的家在那座城市的郊外.

eng: Can you speak English?
The sky is blue.
This photo was taken in Nara.
simp: 这张照片是在奈良市拍的.
trad: 這張照片是在奈良市拍的.

eng: From my point of view, Australia is one of the best countries in the world.
simp: 在我看来,澳洲是世界上最好的国家之一.
trad: 在我看來,澳洲是世界上最好的國家之一.

eng: What is the ultimate purpose of education?
simp: 教育的最终目的到底是什么?
trad: 教育的最終目的到底是什麼?

eng: His son became a famous pianist.
simp: 他的儿子成为了一位着名钢琴家。
trad: 他的兒子成為了一位著名鋼琴家。

eng: I hope that she'll get well soon.
Viewed from a distance, the island looked like a cloud.
simp: 这个岛从远方看起来像一片云。
trad: 這個島從遠方看起來像一片雲。

eng: Not until this morning did I learn the truth.
simp: 直到今早我才知道了真相。
trad: 直到今早我才知道了真相。

eng: Are you concerned with politics?
In any case, I did my duty.
simp: 无论如何，我也尽了我的责任。
trad: 無論如何，我也盡了我的責任。

eng: My primary concern is your safety.
simp: 我最关心的是你的安全。
trad: 我最關心的是你的安全。

eng: Several years went by.
We took lunch at noon.
Draft beer tastes especially good on a hot day.
simp: 生啤酒在大热天时特别好喝。
trad: 生啤酒在大熱天時特別好喝。

eng: It is strange that he should be put up at such a cheap hotel.
simp: 真奇怪，他竟然被安排入住这种廉价酒店。
trad: 真奇怪，他竟然被安排入住這種廉價酒店。

eng: At any rate I will go out when it stops raining.
simp: 停雨时我无论如何都会出外。
trad: 停雨時我無論如何都會出外。

eng: About how long will it take?
I was eating lunch when the phone rang.
simp: 电话响起时我正在吃午饭。
trad: 電話響起時我正在吃午飯。

eng: She assumed that everyone would be for the plan.
simp: 她以为所有人都会赞成计划。
trad: 她以為所有人都會贊成計劃。

eng: I want to be a doctor.
I don't see any point in persuading him.
simp: 我认为没有必要游说他。
trad: 我認為沒有必要遊說他。

eng: Snow has begun to melt.
Do you have an English dictionary?
He kept talking.
Buying such an expensive car is out of the question.
simp: 根本不可能买到这麽贵的车子。
trad: 根本不可能買到這麼貴的車子。

eng: Tom and John are good friends.
simp: Tom 和 John 是好朋友。
trad: Tom 和 John 是好朋友。

eng: Whatever game I play with you, you never win.
simp: 无论我和你玩甚麽游戏，你也总是输。
trad: 無論我和你玩甚麼遊戲，你也總是輸。

eng: Do I have to change my diet?
The hydrangea blooms in June.
He is still green in business.
The men followed him.
It is a shame not to keep your promise.
I approve of your plan.
That boy talks as if he were a grown up.
simp: 那个男孩说起话来像个大人。
trad: 那個男孩說起話來像個大人。

eng: Why were you absent yesterday?
Does this book belong to you?
He went to America last week.
American children grow up hearing those words.
simp: 美国的儿童听着这些话长大。
trad: 美國的兒童聽著這些話長大。

eng: Is your mother at home?
One-third of the six members were women.
simp: 六个成员中有三分之一是女性。
trad: 六個成員中有三分之一是女性。

eng: A spring rain revived the flower.
simp: 一场春雨使花朵回复了生气。
trad: 一場春雨使花朵回復了生氣。

eng: Don't touch the wound.
Mt. Fuji is the highest mountain in Japan.
simp: 富士山是日本最高的山。
trad: 富士山是日本最高的山。

eng: I have a car.
I'm sorry for your not having come with us.
simp: 我很遗憾您没有和我们一起来。
trad: 我很遺憾您沒有和我們一起來。

eng: Please hold the line a moment.
I'm very glad to see you.
This is a book to read.
I can't put up with the noise.
I couldn't make out what he meant by 'megafeps'.
simp: 我不能明白他说的「megafeps」是甚麽意思。
trad: 我不能明白他說的「megafeps」是甚麼意思。

eng: Strange to say, no one voted for the candidate.
simp: 奇怪的是，谁也没有投那候选人一票。
trad: 奇怪的是，誰也沒有投那候選人一票。

eng: I'll let you off this time, but I don't ever want to catch you stealing again.
simp: 今次就原谅你吧，但我不希望再看见你偷东西。
trad: 今次就原諒你吧，但我不希望再看見你偷東西。

eng: She called me in the afternoon.
simp: 她在中午打了电话给我。
trad: 她在中午打了電話給我。

eng: I will give it a try.
This plan requires secrecy.
simp: 这个计划必须保持秘密。
trad: 這個計劃必須保持秘密。

eng: Let's break off, shall we?
Heat is a form of energy.
To begin with, we must tackle the problem.
simp: 首先我们必须处理这个问题。
trad: 首先我們必須處理這個問題。

eng: No sooner had she caught sight of me than she started running in my direction.
simp: 她一见到我就马上跑了过来。
trad: 她一見到我就馬上跑了過來。

eng: I can't keep up with you if you walk so fast.
simp: 你走得这麽快，我跟不上呀。
trad: 你走得這麼快，我跟不上呀。

eng: His failing the test is no laughing matter.
simp: 他这次测验不合格可不是开玩笑的。
trad: 他這次測驗不合格可不是開玩笑的。

eng: Is he a doctor?
Many cars passed by.
All these books are mine.
Please think no more about it.
She lives in an apartment alone.
simp: 她单独一人在公寓里住。
trad: 她單獨一人在公寓裏住。

eng: You're the only one who can do it.
It will get warmer soon.
Several yachts were sailing side by side far out at sea.
simp: 数艘游艇在远方的海洋并列航行。
trad: 數艘遊艇在遠方的海洋並列航行。

eng: I believe this fish is a freshwater fish.
simp: 我相信这条鱼是澹水鱼。
trad: 我相信這條魚是淡水魚。

eng: Each year the world's population increases on average by two percent.
simp: 每年世界人口都有 2% 的平均增长。
trad: 每年世界人口都有 2% 的平均增長。

eng: He is the son of a wealthy family.
I bumped into an old friend on the bus.
simp: 我偶然在巴士上碰见了一位旧朋友。
trad: 我偶然在巴士上碰見了一位舊朋友。

eng: Hanako is set on going to Paris.
You should get your hair cut.
He has a big family.
He refused to shake hands with me.
His English is not bad, seeing that he has studied for only two years.
simp: 他虽然只学了两年的英文，但也说得不错。
trad: 他雖然只學了兩年的英文，但也說得不錯。

eng: He told me he was going to America.
simp: 他告诉了我他要去美国。
trad: 他告訴了我他要去美國。

eng: Please call me up between seven and eight.
Not a few monkeys were found in the mountain.
I'll go shopping tomorrow.
He is driving at top speed.
His story was pretty simple.
I have a problem urinating.
His music and words appeal to young people.
simp: 他的曲和词都很受年轻人欢迎。
trad: 他的曲和詞都很受年輕人歡迎。

eng: The man blushed like a boy.
simp: 男人的脸像小孩般红了起来。
trad: 男人的臉像小孩般紅了起來。

eng: Is it all right to take pictures in this building?
simp: 我们可以在大楼里拍照吗？
trad: 我們可以在大樓裏拍照嗎？

eng: Yes, he's almost as tall as I am.
simp: 是的，他几乎和我一样高。
trad: 是的，他幾乎和我一樣高。

eng: Blossoms have come out on the embankment.
This bottle is able to contain two liters of hot water.
simp: 这个瓶子可以装两升热水。
trad: 這個瓶子可以裝兩升熱水。

eng: Information is given in English at every airport.
simp: 每个机场都有英文指示。
trad: 每個機場都有英文指示。

eng: He is not a doctor but a teacher.
He wishes he had gone to the theater last night.
simp: 昨晚他希望他去了剧场。
trad: 昨晚他希望他去了劇場。

eng: My car is at your disposal.
He came back from China.
No other mountain in the world is as tall as Mt. Everest.
simp: 世界上任何山峰都达不到珠穆朗玛峰的高度。
trad: 世界上任何山峰都達不到珠穆朗瑪峰的高度。

eng: Japan depends on other countries for oil.
I like the way you walk.
He was born in Africa.
It is difficult to satisfy everyone.
He slept well last night.
Is something wrong?
Almost no one believes her.
Very many people know him.
Why are you crying?
This place has a mysterious atmosphere to it.
simp: 这个地方的气氛很神秘。
trad: 這個地方的氣氛很神秘。

eng: I am sure the condition will turn for the better.
simp: 我肯定事情会往好的方向发展。
trad: 我肯定事情會往好的方向發展。

eng: I like your car.
Ask him if he will attend the meeting.
simp: 问他会不会来参加会议。
trad: 問他會不會來參加會議。

eng: The Hilton Hotel, please.
This is a good newspaper, isn't it?
She doesn't have any enemies.
Hearing the sad news, she collapsed in tears.
simp: 听到这个悲伤的消息，她泣不成声。
trad: 聽到這個悲傷的消息，她泣不成聲。

eng: I'm from Tokyo.
That white parasol is hers.
His older brother is two years older than I.
No problem.
She sent me a letter.
He ascribes his failure to bad luck.
simp: 他把他的错误归咎于坏运气。
trad: 他把他的錯誤歸咎於壞運氣。

eng: She works very hard.
Are you sure?
I want you to come at once.
Happy Halloween!
He gave me a nice Christmas present.
simp: 他给了我一个很棒的圣诞礼物。
trad: 他給了我一個很棒的聖誕禮物。

eng: It's already time to go home.
This flower is the most beautiful of all flowers.
simp: 这朵花是所有花中最漂亮的。
trad: 這朵花是所有花中最漂亮的。

eng: He is as tall as his father.
He was severe with his children.
simp: 他对自己的孩子很严格。
trad: 他對自己的孩子很嚴格。

eng: Who invented the telephone?
Cows provide us with milk.
I don't like him much, in fact I hate him.
simp: 我不太喜欢他，其实我讨厌他。
trad: 我不太喜歡他，其實我討厭他。

eng: He took a quick look at the magazine.
Elizabeth II is the Queen of England.
That's exactly what he said.
Oxygen and hydrogen make water.
I have never read such a scary novel.
simp: 我从没读过那么恐怖的小说。
trad: 我從沒讀過那麼恐怖的小說。

eng: Iron is a useful metal.
Welcome.
Her father devoted his life to science.
simp: 她父亲把一生都贡献给科学事业了。
trad: 她父親把一生都貢獻給科學事業了。

eng: The train from Geneva will arrive at the station.
simp: 从日内瓦来的火车就要进站了。
trad: 從日內瓦來的火車就要進站了。

eng: I‘m ironing my handkerchiefs.
I brought you a little something.
I will do the shopping for her birthday.
simp: 我要去给她生日买点东西。
trad: 我要去給她生日買點東西。

eng: I can't get at the exact meaning of the sentence.
simp: 我抓不到句子的确切含义。
trad: 我抓不到句子的確切含義。

eng: Computers save us a lot of time and trouble.
simp: 电脑为我们节省了很多时间，解决了很多问题。
trad: 電腦為我們節省了很多時間，解決了很多問題。

eng: He gave me 10,000 yen.
Can I call you Bob?
He'd prefer not to eat that.
These machines aren't working now.
He always mistakes me for my sister.
simp: 他老是把我和我姐姐搞错。
trad: 他老是把我和我姐姐搞錯。

eng: I have a computer.
I should have gone home.
By the way, are you free tonight?
simp: 顺便问一句，你今晚有空吗？
trad: 順便問一句，你今晚有空嗎？

eng: Prices are double what they were ten years ago.
My house is near the station.
My name is Hopkins.
I'll stay at home tomorrow.
If it rains tomorrow, we'll stay at home.
simp: 如果明天下雨，我们就呆在家。
trad: 如果明天下雨，我們就呆在家。

eng: Columbus discovered America.
He's lazy.
He made his son a wealthy man.
simp: 他使他儿子成了个有钱人。
trad: 他使他兒子成了個有錢人。

eng: I'm running out of ideas.
I don't wash my hair in the morning.
He told me that I looked pale and asked me what the matter was.
simp: 他跟我说我很苍白，并问我怎么了。
trad: 他跟我說我很蒼白，並問我怎麼了。

eng: Due to the water shortage, all the flowers in the garden have died.
simp: 由于缺水，花园里所有的花都死了。
trad: 由於缺水，花園裏所有的花都死了。

eng: John's two years older than me.
Japan is poor in natural resources.
Above all, be patient.
He carried six boxes at a time.
I had to take shelter under a tree.
I found the book interesting.
simp: 我觉得这本书很有意思。
trad: 我覺得這本書很有意思。

eng: He is concerned about his father's illness.
I can't leave home, even if only for a while.
simp: 我不能离开家，即使是一会儿。
trad: 我不能離開家，即使是一會兒。

eng: I got up at seven.
I had to stay in bed all day.
simp: 我不得不一整天都呆在床上。
trad: 我不得不一整天都呆在床上。

eng: People who will lie for you, will lie to you.
simp: 会为你说谎的人，就会对你说谎。
trad: 會為你說謊的人，就會對你說謊。

eng: Did he admit that he was wrong?
He kept a diary during the trip.
simp: 他旅行期间，写了旅游日记。
trad: 他旅行期間，寫了旅遊日記。

eng: It's time to take a bath.
Red is out of fashion.
He was discovered unconscious on the floor of the kitchen.
simp: 他被人发现倒在厨房的地板上，不省人事。
trad: 他被人發現倒在廚房的地板上，不省人事。

eng: Every man has his price.
Do you believe me?
I feel like a rest.
Can I have a look at your newspaper?
simp: 我能不能看一下你的报纸？
trad: 我能不能看一下你的報紙？

eng: I hope I won't still be ill next week.
simp: 我希望下周不要再生病了。
trad: 我希望下周不要再生病了。

eng: I believe that story.
When I saw the picture, I remembered the story.
simp: 我一见到那幅画就想起了那个故事。
trad: 我一見到那幅畫就想起了那個故事。

eng: Sorry, but I think you've got the wrong number.
simp: 不好意思，你好像打错电话了。
trad: 不好意思，你好像打錯電話了。

eng: We could not tell the twins one from the other.
simp: 我们不能分辨那对双胞胎。
trad: 我們不能分辨那對雙胞胎。

eng: You'll have to work hard if you want to pass the exam.
simp: 如果你想考试合格的话，就要努力温习了。
trad: 如果你想考試合格的話，就要努力溫習了。

eng: I can't drink coffee as sweet as this.
simp: 我喝不下这麽甜的咖啡。
trad: 我喝不下這麼甜的咖啡。

eng: You should make good use of this opportunity.
simp: 你应该好好利用这个机会。
trad: 你應該好好利用這個機會。

eng: We look forward to seeing you again.
The problem remains unsolved.
May I go home now?
Must the woman always play the secondary role?
simp: 女性永远只能扮演次要角色吗？
trad: 女性永遠只能扮演次要角色嗎？

eng: However hard you may study, you can't master English in a year or so.
simp: 无论你多麽努力，也不可能只花一年左右就精通英文。
trad: 無論你多麼努力，也不可能只花一年左右就精通英文。

eng: I helped my father yesterday.
I helped him yesterday.
Mr. Meier thought the Neumann family was away on vacation.
simp: Meier先生以为Neumann一家去度假了。
trad: Meier先生以為Neumann一家去度假了。

eng: I have lost my wallet.
How far is it to the airport?
How long does the airport bus take to the airport?
simp: 乘机场大巴去机场要多久？
trad: 乘機場大巴去機場要多久？

eng: I will explain it to her.
Tom watched TV yesterday.
If you have a question, please raise your right hand.
simp: 如果有问题，请举起你的右手。
trad: 如果有問題，請舉起你的右手。

eng: She left the hospital an hour ago.
simp: 她一小时前离开了医院。
trad: 她一小時前離開了醫院。

eng: I wish you good luck.
There is a library in every city in America.
simp: 美国的每个城市都有一个图书馆。
trad: 美國的每個城市都有一個圖書館。

eng: I don't have any children.
Would you like some more salad?
His leg was bitten by a crocodile.
Do be kind to your children!
simp: 要对自己的小孩好一点！
trad: 要對自己的小孩好一點！

eng: It was careless of you to leave the door unlocked.
simp: 你没锁好门，真不小心呢。
trad: 你沒鎖好門，真不小心呢。

eng: Cool off!
Good luck!
Good question!
To make matters worse, it began to rain.
simp: 更糟的是天开始下雨了。
trad: 更糟的是天開始下雨了。

eng: That's too much!
No, no, that's okay.
It was long before he knew it.
simp: 他很久以前已经知道了。
trad: 他很久以前已經知道了。

eng: I stayed up till late at night.
Could you give me some advice?
simp: 你可以给我一些建议吗？
trad: 你可以給我一些建議嗎？

eng: She can drive a car.
The girl in a white uniform took my temperature.
simp: 有个穿白色制服的女孩帮我量了体温。
trad: 有個穿白色制服的女孩幫我量了體溫。

eng: Keep accounts.
I have a toothache.
I must finish my homework in an hour.
simp: 我必须在一小时内做完功课。
trad: 我必須在一小時內做完功課。

eng: I couple this song with his name.
simp: 我一听这首歌就会想起他的名字。
trad: 我一聽這首歌就會想起他的名字。

eng: I'd like two kilos of apples.
The town developed into the center of the economy.
simp: 这座城镇发展成为了一个经济中心。
trad: 這座城鎮發展成為了一個經濟中心。

eng: Could you recommend a nice restaurant near here?
simp: 你可以介绍一间附近的好餐厅吗？
trad: 你可以介紹一間附近的好餐廳嗎？

eng: He lives in this neighborhood.
No one will know.
As you already know.
Mayuko can't bear living alone.
simp: Mayuko 受不了一个人的生活。
trad: Mayuko 受不了一個人的生活。

eng: We have a parking lot for the customers.
simp: 我们有一个顾客专用的停车场。
trad: 我們有一個顧客專用的停車場。

eng: I was forced to take medicine.
He has a bicycle.
Let's dance to her song.
simp: 我们随着她的音乐起舞吧。
trad: 我們隨著她的音樂起舞吧。

eng: He stared at me from head to foot.
simp: 他把我从头到脚打量了一番。
trad: 他把我從頭到腳打量了一番。

eng: What happened here?
She plays tennis after school.
That house is the place where I was born.
simp: 那房子是我出生的地方。
trad: 那房子是我出生的地方。

eng: The manners and customs of a country reflect its culture.
simp: 一个国家的风俗习惯反映了它的文化。
trad: 一個國家的風俗習慣反映了它的文化。

eng: We learn English at school.
How long will you stay here?
She doesn't pay attention to others; in other words, she is selfish.
simp: 她不关心别人；也就是说，她很自私。
trad: 她不關心別人；也就是說，她很自私。

eng: We have overlooked this important fact.
simp: 我们看漏了这件重要的事。
trad: 我們看漏了這件重要的事。

eng: I cannot forbear expressing my doubts.
simp: 我忍不住要说出我的疑惑。
trad: 我忍不住要說出我的疑惑。

eng: He was able to do everything at will.
simp: 他想做甚麽就能做甚麽。
trad: 他想做甚麼就能做甚麼。

eng: I thought you liked to learn new things.
simp: 我以为你喜欢学习新事物。
trad: 我以為你喜歡學習新事物。

eng: He is our boss, and must be treated as such.
simp: 他是我们的老闆，所以一定要受到这样的礼待。
trad: 他是我們的老闆，所以一定要受到這樣的禮待。

eng: I can't speak English as well as he.
simp: 我的英文没有他说得那麽好。
trad: 我的英文沒有他說得那麼好。

eng: She spends much money on dresses.
Judging from the look on his face, it seems that he has succeeded.
simp: 从他脸上的神情来看，他似乎是成功了。
trad: 從他臉上的神情來看，他似乎是成功了。

eng: I'll lend it to you.
It is about ten minutes' walk to the station.
simp: 这里到车站约十分钟路程。
trad: 這裏到車站約十分鐘路程。

eng: Your wonderful lecture was pearls before swine.
simp: 你的演讲十分精彩，但竟没人懂得欣赏。
trad: 你的演講十分精彩，但竟沒人懂得欣賞。

eng: I had expected him at the meeting.
This year promises a good harvest of rice.
The train was so crowded that we were obliged to stand all the way to Osaka.
simp: 火车很挤迫，一直驶到了大坂我们都要站着。
trad: 火車很擠迫，一直駛到了大阪我們都要站著。

eng: Let me help you with your luggage.
But a man is not made for defeat. A man can be destroyed but not defeated.
simp: 人不是为失败而生的, 一个人可以被毁灭, 但不能给打败。
trad: 人不是為失敗而生的, 一個人可以被毀滅, 但不能給打敗。

eng: The boughs that bear most hang lowest.
Isn't that annoying?
A garden planted with pine trees.
Does the applicant have suitable abilities to carry out the job?
simp: 那位求职者能胜任工作吗？
trad: 那位求職者能勝任工作嗎？

eng: A couple of flights were delayed on account of a minor accident.
simp: 因为一些小事故，两、三班机被延迟了。
trad: 因為一些小事故，兩、三班機被延遲了。

eng: I heard from someone that she got married.
Don't dodge the issue, I want you to answer my question.
simp: 不要逃避，我要你回答我的问题。
trad: 不要逃避，我要你回答我的問題。

eng: Japanese people take three meals a day.
Whoever comes, don't open the door.
This robot does whatever I say. That's a big help when I'm too tired to do anything. Not too likely, huh?
simp: 我叫这个机器人做甚麽，它就做甚麽。我累得不想动的时候，它就很帮得上忙。- 这种事不太可能吧？
trad: 我叫這個機器人做甚麼，它就做甚麼。我累得不想動的時候，它就很幫得上忙。- 這種事不太可能吧？

eng: Who invented the telephone?
And on sunny days all the pigeons flew home.
simp: 而在晴天的时候鸽子们都飞回家了。
trad: 而在晴天的時候鴿子們都飛回家了。

eng: It is the first step which is troublesome.
Advice is like salt.
She knows nothing about the birds and the bees.
Make love, not war.
Her father is Japanese.
Her father is Japanese.
Her father is Japanese.
Her father is Japanese.
Her father is Japanese.
The Japanese are an industrious people.
He took a pencil in his hand.
He put down the pencil on the desk.
A good many people were there.
Do not bother to come to my home.
You should avail yourself of every opportunity.
simp: 你应该好好利用一切的机会。
trad: 你應該好好利用一切的機會。

eng: We were filled with anger against the murderer.
simp: 我们对杀人犯感到悲愤填膺。
trad: 我們對殺人犯感到悲憤填膺。

eng: You will soon get accustomed to living in this country.
simp: 你很快就会习惯这个国家的生活模式了。
trad: 你很快就會習慣這個國家的生活模式了。

eng: The story was very interesting.
I was very busy yesterday.
He must have missed his usual train.
simp: 他定已错过了他平常坐的那班列车。
trad: 他定已錯過了他平常坐的那班列車。

eng: The thick fog made it hard to see the road.
I decided to come to Japan last year.
I decided to come to Japan last year.
simp: 我去年下决心要到日本来。
trad: 我去年下決心要到日本來。

eng: He was nearly hit by the car while crossing the street.
simp: 他过马路时差点被车撞。
trad: 他過馬路時差點被車撞。

eng: It must have rained during the night.
Can you make it to our usual place at 7:00 p.m. tonight?
simp: 今晚七点老地方见。没问题吧？
trad: 今晚七點老地方見。沒問題吧？

eng: I caught a big fish yesterday.
I caught a big fish yesterday.
I all but lost you in the crowd.
simp: 我差点在人群中和你失散了。
trad: 我差點在人群中和你失散了。

eng: I was happy yesterday.
Hospital doctors don't go out very often as their work takes up all their time.
simp: 住院医生们所有时间都在工作，所以他们不常出外。
trad: 住院醫生們所有時間都在工作，所以他們不常出外。

eng: We will become happy in the long run.
simp: 我们最终都会获得幸福的。
trad: 我們最終都會獲得幸福的。

eng: He likes sports as well as music.
simp: 他喜欢运动，也喜欢音乐。
trad: 他喜歡運動，也喜歡音樂。

eng: If I knew his address, I could write to him.
simp: 如果我知道他的地址，就能写信给他了。
trad: 如果我知道他的地址，就能寫信給他了。

eng: When will it suit you to start?
simp: 甚麽时候出发最方便你？
trad: 甚麼時候出發最方便你？

eng: The two streets run parallel to one another.
You must live in the present, not in the past.
simp: 你一定要活在当下，不能总是留恋过去。
trad: 你一定要活在當下，不能總是留戀過去。

eng: There is no end to his complaining.
The world's population tends to increase.
simp: 世界人口有上升的趋势。
trad: 世界人口有上升的趨勢。

eng: That is his car.
Who discovered America?
I began living by myself.
simp: 我开始了一个人的生活。
trad: 我開始了一個人的生活。

eng: We were flying about six hours.
simp: 我们乘了约六小时的飞机。
trad: 我們乘了約六小時的飛機。

eng: A thousand yen is owed to you.
Technology will make a lot of progress in the nineties.
simp: 科技在 1990 年代会有很大进步吧。
trad: 科技在 1990 年代會有很大進步吧。

eng: Man can't live without dreams.
Knowledge can only be obtained by study.
simp: 只有学习才能获得知识。
trad: 只有學習才能獲得知識。

eng: It is impossible for me to finish the work in an hour.
simp: 我不可能在一小时内就完成工作。
trad: 我不可能在一小時內就完成工作。

eng: Please check my vision.
He carries a bag on his back.
Can't you put it off until tomorrow?
simp: 你不可以把它延迟到明天吗？
trad: 你不可以把它延遲到明天嗎？

eng: The bear left no stone unturned in his search for fat bugs under the rocks.
simp: 熊为了找肥虫，把所有石子都翻过了。
trad: 熊為了找肥蟲，把所有石子都翻過了。

eng: I watch television after supper.
Come along with us if you like.
simp: 可以的话你也一起来吧。
trad: 可以的話你也一起來吧。

eng: Good. No absentees.
simp: 太好了。没有一个人缺席。
trad: 太好了。沒有一個人缺席。

eng: Good. No absentees.
simp: 太好了。一个缺席的人都没有。
trad: 太好了。一個缺席的人都沒有。

eng: The European likes to drink wine.
It has been ten years since I came here.
Once bitten, twice shy.
simp: 一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳。
trad: 一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井繩。

eng: The people exulted over their good luck.
simp: 人们都为他们的好运感到十分高兴。
trad: 人們都為他們的好運感到十分高興。

eng: These apples are good cookers.
You can take her at her word on that.
simp: 这件事上你大可相信她的话。
trad: 這件事上你大可相信她的話。

eng: Everyone recognized his skill.
She became rich by virtue of hard work and good business sense.
simp: 她的努力和生意头脑让她成为了一个富翁。
trad: 她的努力和生意頭腦讓她成為了一個富翁。

eng: I am afraid of what the teacher will say.
simp: 我很害怕老师会说些甚麽。
trad: 我很害怕老師會說些甚麼。

eng: Tom and Jane got married last month.
simp: Tom 和 Jane 在上个月结婚了。
trad: Tom 和 Jane 在上個月結婚了。

eng: We were surprised at the sight.
simp: 我们被那景象吓了一跳。
trad: 我們被那景象嚇了一跳。

eng: I am honored to meet you.
I should have studied harder before the term exams.
simp: 在考期末试前那阵子我应该再努力一点。
trad: 在考期末試前那陣子我應該再努力一點。

eng: During hot season, perishables go bad easily.
simp: 在炎热的季节时，有些食品很容易变坏。
trad: 在炎熱的季節時，有些食品很容易變壞。

eng: I saw you with a tall boy.
simp: 我看见你和一个个子高的男孩在一起。
trad: 我看見你和一個個子高的男孩在一起。

eng: Don't judge a person by his appearance.
Only a few TV programs are worth watching.
simp: 值得观看的电视节目寥寥无几。
trad: 值得觀看的電視節目寥寥無幾。

eng: I am not concerned with this affair.
I am not concerned with this affair.
I feel very lonely these days.
I feel very lonely these days.
Tom is still in the hospital.
He filled the bottle with water.
I was out of words to say.
Oceans do not so much divide the world as unite it.
simp: 海洋不是将世界分隔开来，而是将世界连接起来
trad: 海洋不是將世界分隔開來，而是將世界連接起來

eng: I have to go now.
Most Americans are descended from immigrants.
simp: 若追根溯源，绝大多数美国人都是移民。
trad: 若追根溯源，絕大多數美國人都是移民。

eng: Most Americans are descended from immigrants.
simp: 如果追根溯源的话，绝大多数美国人都是移民。
trad: 如果追根溯源的話，絕大多數美國人都是移民。

eng: How old are you?
How old are you?
What's your age?
How old are you?
How old are you?
No one will know.
This is longer than any other bridge in the world.
simp: 这是世界上最长的大桥。
trad: 這是世界上最長的大橋。

eng: I had a cup of coffee at the cafe.
simp: 我在咖啡店里喝了一杯咖啡。
trad: 我在咖啡店裏喝了一杯咖啡。

eng: Jesus was born of Mary.
Jesus was born of Mary.
simp: 耶稣是圣母玛丽亚所生。
trad: 耶穌是聖母瑪麗亞所生。

eng: In any case, I must finish this work by tomorrow.
simp: 无论如何我一定要在明天前完成这工作。
trad: 無論如何我一定要在明天前完成這工作。

eng: The driver was charged with speeding.
simp: 那个司机被指控超速驾驶。
trad: 那個司機被指控超速駕駛。

eng: We went camping in August.
Come to think of it, I promised to see him at five.
simp: 我想起了，我答应了和他在五点见面。
trad: 我想起了，我答應了和他在五點見面。

eng: The same old problem.
He hid his emotions and pretended to be enthusiastic.
simp: 他把真实的感情埋进了心底，装出很热心的样子。
trad: 他把真實的感情埋進了心底，裝出很熱心的樣子。

eng: Don't drink any alcohol.
She asked them to take their shoes off.
I have one final piece of advice related to handshakes: Remember to smile.
simp: 握手的最后一个贴士：记住要笑。
trad: 握手的最後一個貼士：記住要笑。

eng: This door will not open.
He bought me a nice camera.
simp: 他买了部不错的相机给我。
trad: 他買了部不錯的相機給我。

eng: I saw an old friend of mine.
The three boys had only two dollars among them.
simp: 三个男孩合共只有两元。
trad: 三個男孩合共只有兩元。

eng: The eaves are dripping.
There is a book on the desk.
His novel had a great vogue for a long time.
simp: 他的小说风行了一段长时间。
trad: 他的小說風行了一段長時間。

eng: He taught me how to swim.
I spent Saturday afternoon watching entirely too much TV.
simp: 我看电视度过了星期六的下午。
trad: 我看電視度過了星期六的下午。

eng: We heard tigers roaring in the distance.
simp: 我们听到远处老虎的怒吼。
trad: 我們聽到遠處老虎的怒吼。

eng: His painting wasn't particularly good, so no one praised him for it.
simp: 他的画并不是画得很好，所以没有获得人们的讚赏。
trad: 他的畫並不是畫得很好，所以沒有獲得人們的讚賞。

eng: They abandoned their country.
simp: 他们离弃了自己的国家。
trad: 他們離棄了自己的國家。

eng: The temperature has been below freezing for several days.
simp: 零度以下的气温持续了好几天。
trad: 零度以下的氣溫持續了好幾天。

eng: Space travel will be commonplace some time in the future.
simp: 在未来大空旅行会变成平凡事吧。
trad: 在未來大空旅行會變成平凡事吧。

eng: Could you move the chair a bit?
simp: 你可以移一移那张椅子吗？
trad: 你可以移一移那張椅子嗎？

eng: When I was taking a bath, the telephone rang.
simp: 我正在洗澡的时候电话响了。
trad: 我正在洗澡的時候電話響了。
