eng: I have a lot of things to do today.
She told me his name after he had left.
simp: 他走了后，她便把他的名字告诉了我。
trad: 他走了後，她便把他的名字告訴了我。

eng: I've got to hang up now. Someone is waiting to use the phone.
simp: 我要挂线了。有人正在等着用电话。
trad: 我要掛線了。有人正在等著用電話。

eng: This is the hottest summer we have had in fifty years.
simp: 这是 50 年来最热的夏天。
trad: 這是 50 年來最熱的夏天。

eng: I'd like to have a test for breast cancer.
simp: 我想检查一下我是否患了乳癌。
trad: 我想檢查一下我是否患了乳癌。

eng: I met him on the previous day.
She is careful about her child's nutrition.
simp: 她很关心孩子的营养问题。
trad: 她很關心孩子的營養問題。

eng: This village is free from air pollution.
Please attach a certificate of quality.
She is very afraid of the dark.
No fewer than five hundred students were present.
simp: 出席的学生不下五百人。
trad: 出席的學生不下五百人。

eng: She stopped before the mirror to admire herself.
simp: 她在镜前停下脚步，自我欣赏了一番。
trad: 她在鏡前停下腳步，自我欣賞了一番。

eng: It seems that there will be a storm soon.
It is really marvelous of you to remember my birthday.
simp: 你还记得我的生日，那真是太好了。
trad: 你還記得我的生日，那真是太好了。

eng: Do you have any foreign stamps?
Ben learned to make a fire without matches.
simp: Ben学会了不用火柴就能生火。
trad: Ben學會了不用火柴就能生火。

eng: It was a heartbreaking story.
simp: 那是一个叫人心碎的故事。
trad: 那是一個叫人心碎的故事。

eng: My father is retiring next spring.
simp: 我爸爸明年春天就要退休了。
trad: 我爸爸明年春天就要退休了。

eng: Forget it.
Forget about that right now.
I completely forgot it.
Forget him.
I forget his name.
Forget the sad affair.
How do you pronounce this word?
Forget your sorrows.
He asked me whether I like math.
I'll never forget you.
I forget who said it.
I forget to telephone him.
He lost his umbrella again.
He is apt to forget.
I can't forget her.
I quite forget your name.
simp: 我完全记不起你的名字了。
trad: 我完全記不起你的名字了。

eng: I think I'd better stay here.
You'll forget about me someday.
Please accept this little gift.
I forget your phone number.
Reading a book is interesting.
I will never forget seeing you.
simp: 我永远不会忘记和你的见面。
trad: 我永遠不會忘記和你的見面。

eng: You must not forget your schoolbooks.
simp: 千万不要忘记带教科书。
trad: 千萬不要忘記帶教科書。

eng: Will you join our club?
Have you got a lighter?
The phone is ringing. "I'll get it."
Several factors operated to help prices go up.
simp: 物价上涨是多方因素造成的。
trad: 物價上漲是多方因素造成的。

eng: It wasn't until then that I felt really frightened.
simp: 直到那时我才真正感到害怕。
trad: 直到那時我才真正感到害怕。

eng: He is my brother, not my father.
simp: 他是我哥哥，不是我爸爸。
trad: 他是我哥哥，不是我爸爸。

eng: Walk on the pavement.
How can I forget those days?
simp: 我怎能忘记那些日子呢？
trad: 我怎能忘記那些日子呢？

eng: Don't forget to flush the toilet.
I cannot swim at all.
Don't forget to post the letter.
It is easy for a monkey to climb a tree.
simp: 对猴子来说，爬树很容易。
trad: 對猴子來說，爬樹很容易。

eng: Never shall I forget the sight.
simp: 我永远不会忘记那景象。
trad: 我永遠不會忘記那景象。

eng: Don't forget your ice skates.
She was accused of telling a lie.
I shall never forget your kindness.
simp: 我永远不会忘记你的亲切。
trad: 我永遠不會忘記你的親切。

eng: We'll never forget your kindness.
simp: 我们永远不会忘记你的亲切。
trad: 我們永遠不會忘記你的親切。

eng: In case I forget, please remind me.
simp: 如果我忘记了请提醒我。
trad: 如果我忘記了請提醒我。

eng: I was the happiest man on earth.
simp: 我曾是世界上最幸福的男人。
trad: 我曾是世界上最幸福的男人。

eng: Don't forget that we have homework.
Don't forget to write to me.
A single room with bath, please.
simp: 我要一个带浴室的单人房。
trad: 我要一個帶浴室的單人房。

eng: She is all skin and bone.
I know that he went to London.
This morning I missed the 8:30 train by five minutes.
simp: 今早我以五分钟之差错失了八时半的那班火车。
trad: 今早我以五分鐘之差錯失了八時半的那班火車。

eng: Life in prison is worse than the life of an animal.
simp: 监狱生活比做畜牲还不如。
trad: 監獄生活比做畜牲還不如。

eng: She has no less than ten children.
There is no factory in this village.
My dad keeps a journal every day.
Japan is a rich country.
She will make him a good wife.
His salary rose 10%.
I usually walk to school.
I felt somebody pat me on the shoulder.
simp: 我感觉有人拍了拍我的肩。
trad: 我感覺有人拍了拍我的肩。

eng: If it rains tomorrow, I won't go to the picnic.
simp: 如果明天下雨的话，我就不去野餐了。
trad: 如果明天下雨的話，我就不去野餐了。

eng: There's a telephone in my room.
According to today's paper, there was a fire in the city.
simp: 今天的报纸说城里发生了火灾。
trad: 今天的報紙說城裏發生了火災。

eng: It seems the rural area will be developed on a large scale.
simp: 农村好像要大规模发展了。
trad: 農村好像要大規模發展了。

eng: Tears rolled down my cheeks.
simp: 泪水沿着我的面颊流了下来。
trad: 淚水沿著我的面頰流了下來。

eng: All the villagers went into the mountains to look for a missing cat.
simp: 所有村民出发去山里寻找一只失踪的猫。
trad: 所有村民出發去山裏尋找一只失蹤的貓。

eng: Furniture made of good materials sells well.
simp: 用优质材料做的家具卖得很好。
trad: 用優質材料做的家具賣得很好。

eng: He would have succeeded had he tried.
simp: 如果他有尝试的话，就可能已经成功了。
trad: 如果他有嘗試的話，就可能已經成功了。

eng: Be kind to little animals.
I owe my success to his help.
A forest fire broke out in this area.
I wear contact lenses.
When I got up this morning, it was raining.
simp: 我今早起床时天正在下雨。
trad: 我今早起床時天正在下雨。

eng: Eat a lot of vegetables.
Don't run across the street.
We sat in total silence.
The door was suddenly opened by Mike.
simp: 门突然被 Mike 门启了。
trad: 門突然被 Mike 門啟了。

eng: I haven't seen her in a long time.
Rome has a lot of ancient buildings.
Did you hear the news?
The train gathered speed.
I buy the goods at $3 a dozen.
simp: 我用三元一打的价钱买了这些东西。
trad: 我用三元一打的價錢買了這些東西。

eng: I will wait until she comes.
Ann gave me this present.
simp: Ann 送了这份礼物给我。
trad: Ann 送了這份禮物給我。

eng: I'll work as long as I live.
My brother has been living in London for many years.
simp: 我哥哥已在伦敦住了很多年。
trad: 我哥哥已在倫敦住了很多年。

eng: My heart began to beat fast.
We reached our destination just as I thought the car was going to give up the ghost.
simp: 正当我以为车会坏掉的时候，我们到达了目的地。
trad: 正當我以為車會壞掉的時候，我們到達了目的地。

eng: He is always on time for an appointment.
She hurried to the station so as not to miss the train.
simp: 她匆忙赶去车站，以免错过火车。
trad: 她匆忙趕去車站，以免錯過火車。

eng: Is there any difference between your idea and hers?
simp: 你的想法和她的想法有甚麽不同吗？
trad: 你的想法和她的想法有甚麼不同嗎？

eng: The injured were removed from the scene.
Men and women between the ages of 25 and 54 have the most stressful lives.
simp: 25 岁至 54 岁的男女生活压力最大。
trad: 25 歲至 54 歲的男女生活壓力最大。

eng: He promised me that he won't tell anybody.
simp: 他答应了我不会对任何人说。
trad: 他答應了我不會對任何人說。

eng: Can I speak with the teacher?
I told her not to let go of the rope, but she did.
simp: 我叫她不要松开绳子，但是她做了。
trad: 我叫她不要松開繩子，但是她做了。

eng: A gentleman wouldn't do such a thing.
simp: 一个绅士是不会做这种事的。
trad: 一個紳士是不會做這種事的。

eng: I want to have my own room.
simp: 我想要有我自己的房间。
trad: 我想要有我自己的房間。

eng: She's fond of taking pictures.
Health is above wealth.
He was born in the 19th century.
He is by no means bright.
He pretends to be enthusiastic when his boss is around.
simp: 老闆在的时候他就装成一副很热心的样子。
trad: 老闆在的時候他就裝成一副很熱心的樣子。

eng: He represented our company at the conference.
simp: 他代表我们公司出席了会议。
trad: 他代表我們公司出席了會議。

eng: Mr Tani is not so much a scholar as a journalist.
simp: Tani 先生与其说是学者，倒不如说是新闻工作者。
trad: Tani 先生與其說是學者，倒不如說是新聞工作者。

eng: I attended the party just to be sociable.
simp: 我去那个派对纯粹是为了交际。
trad: 我去那個派對純粹是為了交際。

eng: Seiko has no sisters.
I like English Breakfast tea the best.
Knowledge is power, but it is power for evil just as much as for good.
simp: 知识就是力量，但这力量可以用来做好事，也可以用来做坏事。
trad: 知識就是力量，但這力量可以用來做好事，也可以用來做壞事。

eng: It seems to be becoming hard to get a good job.
simp: 好工作似乎愈来愈难找了。
trad: 好工作似乎愈來愈難找了。

eng: In the last typhoon, the wind blew at over 200 kilometers per hour!
simp: 上次颳颱风时，风速超过了 200 公里每小时！
trad: 上次颳颱風時，風速超過了 200 公裏每小時！

eng: I was so excited that I could not fall asleep.
Cathy can speak French and German.
She gave me a pretty doll.
simp: 她给了我一个漂亮的洋娃娃。
trad: 她給了我一個漂亮的洋娃娃。

eng: Spring came on.
A 6% yield is guaranteed on the investment.
simp: 这投资保证有 6% 的回报。
trad: 這投資保證有 6% 的回報。

eng: If you have any money, please lend me some.
simp: 如果你有钱的话，借点给我吧。
trad: 如果你有錢的話，借點給我吧。

eng: He has no house to live in.
The cause of the fire is not known.
What did you say?
He is living apart from his wife.
Her composition is very good except for a few errors in spelling.
simp: 她的作文作得十分好，只不过有几个字拼错了。
trad: 她的作文作得十分好，只不過有幾個字拼錯了。

eng: That sounds really interesting.
Was the book interesting?
The movie was interesting.
This book looks interesting.
A girl phoned me.
simp: 有个女孩打了电话给我。
trad: 有個女孩打了電話給我。

eng: This soup is too salty to eat.
The report is not to be depended upon.
The tower can be seen from here.
simp: 从这里可以见到那座塔。
trad: 從這裏可以見到那座塔。

eng: Is there a museum in this town?
It was cloudy that night.
My sister sings songs very well.
He picked up a mirror and examined his tongue.
simp: 他拿了面镜子细看自己的舌头。
trad: 他拿了面鏡子細看自己的舌頭。

eng: Where are you?
I'm tired of watching television.
Do you know the meaning of this word?
simp: 您知道这个词的意思吗？
trad: 您知道這個詞的意思嗎？

eng: I don't want to get you into trouble.
I haven't eaten breakfast yet.
He may well be fired.
I usually get home by six o'clock.
I'd like to have a word with you.
The baby was sleeping in the cradle.
A long day has passed on.
Little did they dream of losing the game.
simp: 他们作梦也想不到会输掉这场比赛。
trad: 他們作夢也想不到會輸掉這場比賽。

eng: There were only six people at the meeting.
Time is short, we must act NOW.
simp: 时间不多，我们必须马上行动。
trad: 時間不多，我們必須馬上行動。

eng: She showed me around the campus.
I had to look after the children.
We spent the day in the open air.
simp: 我们在户外度过了一整天。
trad: 我們在戶外度過了一整天。

eng: A few months later they return to their breeding grounds in the Arctic.
simp: 数月后，牠们回到了北极的繁殖地。
trad: 數月後，牠們回到了北極的繁殖地。

eng: What was his motive for doing it?
I'm sick of listening to her complaints.
simp: 我听她的埋怨听得十分厌烦。
trad: 我聽她的埋怨聽得十分厭煩。

eng: Would you mind shutting the door? "No, not at all."
simp: 「你可以帮忙把门关上吗？」「可以，当然可以。」
trad: 「你可以幫忙把門關上嗎？」「可以，當然可以。」

eng: I took it for granted that he would pass the exam.
simp: 我以为他一定会考试合格。
trad: 我以為他一定會考試合格。

eng: Mother prepared us lunch.
simp: 母亲为我们准备了午餐。
trad: 母親為我們準備了午餐。

eng: Wrong.
Heaven knows why.
I have four times more CDs than you do.
simp: 我的 CD 有你的两倍多。
trad: 我的 CD 有你的兩倍多。

eng: We will be together forever.
Now that she has quit her job, we can't depend on her.
simp: 现在她没了工作，我们再不能依靠她了。
trad: 現在她沒了工作，我們再不能依靠她了。

eng: I finished the work yesterday.
Monday through Friday are work-days in this company.
simp: 这间公司的工作日为星期一到星期五。
trad: 這間公司的工作日為星期一到星期五。

eng: Correct the errors if there are any.
Correct the underlined words.
Please correct my pronunciation.
Is my answer correct?
Your answer is correct.
Correct errors.
Correct the following sentences.
Is your watch correct?
The two answers are both correct.
This sentence is grammatically correct.
simp: 这句句子的文法是对的。
trad: 這句句子的文法是對的。

eng: This watch keeps correct time.
My watch is not correct.
Please check the correct answer.
That is almost correct.
His opinion is generally correct.
simp: 他的意见大体上说是对的。
trad: 他的意見大體上說是對的。

eng: I think your answer is correct.
Wearing glasses should correct your vision.
simp: 戴眼镜应该能纠正你的视力。
trad: 戴眼鏡應該能糾正你的視力。

eng: Correct my spelling if it's wrong.
simp: 如果我拼错了的话，请你纠正。
trad: 如果我拼錯了的話，請你糾正。

eng: Correct me if I am wrong.
Nobody could give the correct answer.
You are correct in thinking so.
However, the quantity was not correct.
I guarantee that this information is correct.
simp: 我保证这些资料是无误的。
trad: 我保證這些資料是無誤的。

eng: Am I correct in thinking thus?
His action throughout was correct.
simp: 他的行为由始至终都是对的。
trad: 他的行為由始至終都是對的。

eng: He writes correct English.
You are correct in your judgement.
Your pronunciation is more or less correct.
Strictly speaking, the theory is not correct.
simp: 严格地说，这套理论不算正确。
trad: 嚴格地說，這套理論不算正確。

eng: Strictly speaking, his answer is not correct.
simp: 严格地说，他的答桉并不对。
trad: 嚴格地說，他的答案並不對。

eng: See if my answer is correct.
simp: 看看我的答桉是不是对的。
trad: 看看我的答案是不是對的。

eng: I had Mr Jones correct my composition.
simp: Jones先生帮我纠正了文章的错误。
trad: Jones先生幫我糾正了文章的錯誤。

eng: A clock must be above all correct.
simp: 一个时钟最重要的是准确。
trad: 一個時鐘最重要的是準確。

eng: If you see a mistake, then please correct it.
simp: 如果你发现有错的话请帮忙改正。
trad: 如果你發現有錯的話請幫忙改正。

eng: Your answer isn't correct. Try again.
simp: 你的答桉不对。再试试看。
trad: 你的答案不對。再試試看。

eng: All that you say is perfectly correct.
Correct the mistake and return the file to Mr Luxemburg.
simp: 请把错误改正过来，然后把文件夹还给 Luxemburg 先生。
trad: 請把錯誤改正過來，然後把文件夾還給 Luxemburg 先生。

eng: The sign means that the answer is correct.
simp: 这个符号代表答桉正确。
trad: 這個符號代表答案正確。

eng: I'm not sure if this is correct.
simp: 我不肯定这是不是对的。
trad: 我不肯定這是不是對的。

eng: She is a very correct lady.
simp: 她是一位品行端正的女士。
trad: 她是一位品行端正的女士。

eng: This course will help you master correct pronunciation.
simp: 这个课程能帮助你掌握正确发音。
trad: 這個課程能幫助你掌握正確發音。

eng: In this case, I think he is correct.
simp: 这样的话，我想他是对的。
trad: 這樣的話，我想他是對的。

eng: You should have Mr Green correct your English pronunciation.
simp: 你应该请 Green 先生帮你纠正英文发音。
trad: 你應該請 Green 先生幫你糾正英文發音。

eng: My first impression of him proved to be correct.
simp: 我对他的第一印象果然没有错。
trad: 我對他的第一印象果然沒有錯。

eng: Here's a big map of Germany.
simp: 这儿有张德国的大地图。
trad: 這兒有張德國的大地圖。

eng: March 15 will be my last day of school.
simp: 3月15日将是我最后一天上学的日子。
trad: 3月15日將是我最後一天上學的日子。

eng: The taxi has arrived.
It is warmer today than yesterday.
The boss has a good opinion of your work.
simp: 老板对你的工作有很高的评价。
trad: 老板對你的工作有很高的評價。

eng: Is this fish still alive?
I saw a light in the distance.
What has brought you here?
simp: 是什么风把你吹来了啊？
trad: 是什麼風把你吹來了啊？

eng: Tom has no manners.
There goes our bus.
The sky is full of stars.
A Mr. Tanaka came to see you yesterday.
simp: 昨天有个田中先生来找您。
trad: 昨天有個田中先生來找您。

eng: It is true that she is pretty, but she is selfish.
simp: 她确实很漂亮，但她很自私。
trad: 她確實很漂亮，但她很自私。

eng: Horses are useful animals.
A map helps us to know where we are.
simp: 地图帮助我们知道所在的位置。
trad: 地圖幫助我們知道所在的位置。

eng: We have no choice but to go.
simp: 我们除了走之外没有其它选择。
trad: 我們除了走之外沒有其它選擇。

eng: Would 8:30 be convenient for you?
She shed plentiful tears when her beloved dog was killed in an accident.
simp: 她的爱犬在意外中离去时，她流下了很多眼泪。
trad: 她的愛犬在意外中離去時，她流下了很多眼淚。

eng: Don't bother your parents with such a trivial thing.
simp: 别为了这样的小事麻烦你父母。
trad: 別為了這樣的小事麻煩你父母。

eng: Study English every day.
When I met my former teacher, he inquired after my parents.
simp: 我遇见了以前的班主任时，他问候了我的父母。
trad: 我遇見了以前的班主任時，他問候了我的父母。

eng: I became aware of someone looking at me.
simp: 我感觉到有人在看着我。
trad: 我感覺到有人在看著我。

eng: Happy birthday to you!
You have only to read this article to see how serious the accident was.
simp: 你只要读读这篇文章，就能知道那意外有多严重。
trad: 你只要讀讀這篇文章，就能知道那意外有多嚴重。

eng: He's really in good shape.
My grandfather is five times as old as I am.
simp: 祖父的年龄比我大五倍。
trad: 祖父的年齡比我大五倍。

eng: He wrote three books in as many years.
He would have his own way.
The service in this restaurant is none too fast.
simp: 这餐厅的服务一点效率也没有。
trad: 這餐廳的服務一點效率也沒有。

eng: The toy department is on the fifth floor.
She closed all the windows in the room.
simp: 她把房间里的窗子全都关上了。
trad: 她把房間裏的窗子全都關上了。

eng: Where is the information counter?
We are husband and wife.
He laughed a hearty laugh.
A population policy should be considered on the international viewpoint so as to balance the interests of both sides.
simp: 从国际的观点看，应该考虑推行人口政策来平衡两方的利益。
trad: 從國際的觀點看，應該考慮推行人口政策來平衡兩方的利益。

eng: You cannot take back what you have said.
But his friends call him Ken.
simp: 但他的朋友都叫他做 Ken。
trad: 但他的朋友都叫他做 Ken。

eng: Communism will never be reached in my lifetime.
simp: 在我有生之年，共产主义不可能达到。
trad: 在我有生之年，共產主義不可能達到。

eng: If today was Sunday, I would go fishing.
simp: 如果今天是星期日，我会去钓鱼。
trad: 如果今天是星期日，我會去釣魚。

eng: It wasn't until I heard him speak that I recognized him.
simp: 我听到他的声音以后才把他认出来了。
trad: 我聽到他的聲音以後才把他認出來了。

eng: I felt like a fish out of water at this firm.
simp: 我不太适应在这间公司工作。
trad: 我不太適應在這間公司工作。

eng: Catherine stayed indoors because it was raining.
simp: 因为外面正在下雨，所以 Catherine 留在室内。
trad: 因為外面正在下雨，所以 Catherine 留在室內。

eng: Most people killed by smoking were not heavy smokers.
simp: 大多数被香烟害死的人吸的烟都不多。
trad: 大多數被香煙害死的人吸的煙都不多。

eng: He shook his son by the shoulder.
You can't lift the piano.
Can I get you something to drink?
I caught a cold and was in bed yesterday.
simp: 我感冒了，昨天便在床上睡觉。
trad: 我感冒了，昨天便在床上睡覺。

eng: You needn't have bought that book.
He is very depressed.
The price of vegetables varies from day to day.
His bike ran into a guard-rail.
I was at a loss what to say.
Next time you come, don't forget to give it back to me.
simp: 你下次来的时候，别忘了把它还给我。
trad: 你下次來的時候，別忘了把它還給我。

eng: I met him the other day.
Your conduct is absolutely shameful.
simp: 你的行为是绝对可耻的。
trad: 你的行為是絕對可恥的。

eng: We went due north.
The weather will delay the start of the race.
simp: 因为天气的关係，赛跑比赛将会延迟。
trad: 因為天氣的關係，賽跑比賽將會延遲。

eng: A dragon is a creature of fancy.
simp: 龙是人幻想出来的动物。
trad: 龍是人幻想出來的動物。

eng: You will soon get to like him.
simp: 你很快就会开始喜欢他的。
trad: 你很快就會開始喜歡他的。

eng: A big bomb fell, and a great many people lost their lives.
simp: 一个大炸弹跌了下来，并夺走了很多人的生命。
trad: 一個大炸彈跌了下來，並奪走了很多人的生命。

eng: The only person who's looking forward to Miss Cobb's return.
simp: 期望 Cobb 小姐回来的唯一一人。
trad: 期望 Cobb 小姐回來的唯一一人。

eng: If you should die, what would become of your family?
simp: 如果你死了，你的家庭会变成怎样呢？
trad: 如果你死了，你的家庭會變成怎樣呢？

eng: He lived in France for some time, then went to Italy.
simp: 他在法国住了一段时间，然后就去了意大利。
trad: 他在法國住了一段時間，然後就去了意大利。

eng: Who is the man that you were talking with?
simp: 刚才和你说话的人是谁？
trad: 剛才和你說話的人是誰？

eng: What's your real purpose?
He claimed to be an expert in finance.
Some people read the newspaper and watch TV at the same time.
simp: 有些人边看电视边读报纸。
trad: 有些人邊看電視邊讀報紙。

eng: English is a very important language in today's world.
simp: 英语是当今世界上一种非常重要的语言。
trad: 英語是當今世界上一種非常重要的語言。

eng: Mary swims as fast as Jack.
He will come back.
You arrived at the moment I left.
He loves to fish.
You can stay as long as you like.
simp: 你想要待多久就待多久。
trad: 你想要待多久就待多久。

eng: Do you know my brother Masao?
The fire reduced the house to ashes.
simp: 房子被大火烧成了灰烬。
trad: 房子被大火燒成了灰燼。

eng: The plane was three hours late due to bad weather.
simp: 由于天气不好，飞机迟到了3小时。
trad: 由於天氣不好，飛機遲到了3小時。

eng: Education starts at home.
My friend George is coming to Japan this summer.
simp: 我朋友George今年夏天要来日本。
trad: 我朋友George今年夏天要來日本。

eng: It can't be true.
I keep a female cat.
I was a high school student at that time.
He's very smart, and he's handsome too.
She has lost weight.
I got up at seven this morning.
Her apology was nothing but show.
That makes no sense at all.
Get serious.
Both of my sisters are married.
simp: 我的两个姐妹都结婚了。
trad: 我的兩個姐妹都結婚了。

eng: He lives by himself.
He's an excellent tennis player.
simp: 他是个很棒的网球选手。
trad: 他是個很棒的網球選手。

eng: I trust Ken.
He shows no mark of progress.
Look at the large building over there.
He doesn't know any one of us.
simp: 他不认识我们中的任何一个。
trad: 他不認識我們中的任何一個。

eng: He studied hard in order to get into college.
simp: 他努力学习，为的是能够考上大学。
trad: 他努力學習，為的是能夠考上大學。

eng: I hear you passed the entrance exam. Congratulations!
simp: 我听说你通过了入学考试。恭喜你了！
trad: 我聽說你通過了入學考試。恭喜你了！

eng: He was absent from school yesterday.
He took care of the business after his father's death.
simp: 在他父亲死后，他接管了公司。
trad: 在他父親死後，他接管了公司。

eng: It is raining.
Dad! Mom! I have some great news for you!
simp: 爸！妈！我有个好消息要告诉你们！
trad: 爸！媽！我有個好消息要告訴你們！

eng: Cancer is a great enemy of humanity.
She has many faults, but I trust her none the less.
simp: 她有很多缺点，但我还是这麽信她。
trad: 她有很多缺點，但我還是這麼信她。

eng: My son is busy studying for the examinations tomorrow.
simp: 我儿子正在忙着为明天的考试温习。
trad: 我兒子正在忙著為明天的考試溫習。

eng: I've never been beyond Okayama.
simp: 我从来没到过比冈山更远的地方。
trad: 我從來沒到過比岡山更遠的地方。

eng: He used to get up early when he was young.
Any student with an I.D. card has access to the library.
simp: 所有持有 ID 卡的学生都能进入图书馆。
trad: 所有持有 ID 卡的學生都能進入圖書館。

eng: She laid herself on the grass.
You may stay here as long as you like.
simp: 你想在这儿待多久就待多久。
trad: 你想在這兒待多久就待多久。

eng: Some of my classmates like volleyball and others enjoy tennis.
simp: 我有些同学喜欢排球，也有些喜欢网球。
trad: 我有些同學喜歡排球，也有些喜歡網球。

eng: You should be careful in your choice of friends.
He talked with his eyes shining.
The fire went out by itself.
He deprived my little sister of all her toys.
simp: 他把我妹妹的玩具都抢走了。
trad: 他把我妹妹的玩具都搶走了。

eng: Brush your teeth clean.
There is not a scrap of truth in his words.
simp: 他说的话没有一句是真的。
trad: 他說的話沒有一句是真的。

eng: In relation to this, I am to blame.
simp: 关于这件事，我必须负上责任。
trad: 關於這件事，我必須負上責任。

eng: He is afraid of his father.
She has got over her illness.
I'd like to say yes, but...
You have no heart.
I see why you don't want to go there.
simp: 我明白你为甚麽不想去了。
trad: 我明白你為甚麼不想去了。

eng: He teaches in a girls' high school.
simp: 他在一间女子中学教书。
trad: 他在一間女子中學教書。

eng: Has he lived here for two years?
simp: 他在这里已经住了两年了吗？
trad: 他在這裏已經住了兩年了嗎？

eng: What do you mean?
The hoarfrost has not begun to thaw yet.
Lesson Two is easy.
He looked in at the door.
In the name of mercy, stop crying.
He put the books on the shelf out of order.
simp: 他胡乱把书本放在架上。
trad: 他胡亂把書本放在架上。

eng: My mother is certain to say no.
Excuse me, I'm lost.
She opened the window, even though I told her not to.
simp: 她开了窗，尽管我叫她别这么做。
trad: 她開了窗，盡管我叫她別這麼做。

eng: I have some time, but never very much...
simp: 我有一点时间，但总是不多...
trad: 我有一點時間，但總是不多...

eng: When was this university founded?
simp: 这所大学是什么时候建的？
trad: 這所大學是什麼時候建的？

eng: What is your name?
Cancer can be cured easily if it is found in its first phase.
simp: 癌症如果在第一阶段被发现的话是很容易治愈的。
trad: 癌癥如果在第一階段被發現的話是很容易治愈的。

eng: Today I went to the dentist's.
I want to go somewhere in Europe.
simp: 我想去欧洲的某个地方。
trad: 我想去歐洲的某個地方。

eng: Those old laws were all done away with.
He was more than a king.
How about a cup of tea or something, if you aren't in a hurry?
simp: 如果你不赶时间的话，为不麽不喝杯茶甚麽的呢？
trad: 如果你不趕時間的話，為不麼不喝杯茶甚麼的呢？

eng: Each individual is different.
Careful as he was, he made an unexpected mistake.
simp: 虽然他很小心，但还是犯了个想不到的错误。
trad: 雖然他很小心，但還是犯了個想不到的錯誤。

eng: My father died of cancer.
simp: 我的父亲是患癌症死的。
trad: 我的父親是患癌癥死的。

eng: The prince was lost in the woods.
He said with a perplexed expression, "I've heard nothing, so I can't say anything."
simp: 他的目光十分困惑：「我甚麽也没听过，所以甚麽也说不出来。」
trad: 他的目光十分困惑：「我甚麼也沒聽過，所以甚麼也說不出來。」

eng: She gave them some apples.
Would you speak more slowly, please?
Even if it rains, I'll go swimming tomorrow.
simp: 明天就算下雨，我也会去游泳。
trad: 明天就算下雨，我也會去遊泳。

eng: How do you like your coffee? Strong and black?
simp: 你喜欢甚麽口味的咖啡？浓的黑咖啡？
trad: 你喜歡甚麼口味的咖啡？濃的黑咖啡？

eng: How many people do you think have an ear for music?
simp: 你觉得有多少人懂得欣赏音乐？
trad: 你覺得有多少人懂得欣賞音樂？

eng: Necessity knows no law.
Ten years have gone by since his death.
simp: 他死后已经过了十年的时间了。
trad: 他死後已經過了十年的時間了。

eng: I will make a man of you.
simp: 我会使你成为一个男子汉。
trad: 我會使你成為一個男子漢。

eng: I'm afraid it will rain tonight.
One should love one's own mother.
simp: 每个人都应该爱自己的母亲。
trad: 每個人都應該愛自己的母親。

eng: Someone has torn two pages out of this book.
simp: 有人把这本书撕下了两页。
trad: 有人把這本書撕下了兩頁。

eng: Please answer me.
I could hardly follow what Jane said in her speech.
simp: 我几乎完全跟不上 Jane 的演讲内容。
trad: 我幾乎完全跟不上 Jane 的演講內容。

eng: His appearance deceived me.
The unhappy event made him put an end to himself.
simp: 那件不幸的事故使他自杀身亡。
trad: 那件不幸的事故使他自殺身亡。

eng: She is not in the least worried about her test scores.
simp: 她完全不担心测验的分数。
trad: 她完全不擔心測驗的分數。

eng: It doesn't matter whether she admits her guilt or not.
simp: 就算她认罪不认罪也没有关係。
trad: 就算她認罪不認罪也沒有關係。

eng: There's very little paper left.
Why don't you have your motorcycle fixed up?
simp: 你为甚麽不把摩托车拿去修理？
trad: 你為甚麼不把摩托車拿去修理？

eng: Why not go to the movies?
The rain is raining all around.
He made a robot.
It is imperative for you to finish by Sunday.
simp: 你必须在星期日前完成。
trad: 你必須在星期日前完成。

eng: I'll buy a pen for him.
She is busy at present and can't speak to you.
simp: 她现在很忙，不能和你谈话。
trad: 她現在很忙，不能和你談話。

eng: He promised me to pay back the money.
They are after happiness.
Live a riotous life.
I like lyric better than epic.
simp: 我喜欢抒情诗多于史诗。
trad: 我喜歡抒情詩多於史詩。

eng: I want to have a telephone installed.
What did you eat for breakfast?
He went to New York as soon as he got the letter.
simp: 他一拿了信就去了纽约。
trad: 他一拿了信就去了紐約。

eng: Get out of my life!
She told us not to make a noise.
simp: 她叫我们不要製造噪音。
trad: 她叫我們不要製造噪音。

eng: Less noise, please.
The noise woke me.
This noise is annoying.
His son is serving his sentence.
Autumn came and the leaves started to fall.
simp: 秋天到了，树叶也开始落下。
trad: 秋天到了，樹葉也開始落下。

eng: She demanded to see the manager.
Bill called me last night.
simp: Bill 昨晚打了电话给我。
trad: Bill 昨晚打了電話給我。

eng: Do you agree with what he says in the book?
simp: 你赞成他在书中说的话吗？
trad: 你贊成他在書中說的話嗎？

eng: I have to go shopping.
Many young men went to war.
He is watching TV.
He has a wife and two young children to provide for.
simp: 他有一个妻子和两个孩子要养活。
trad: 他有一個妻子和兩個孩子要養活。

eng: I just opened the lid, and a foul smell filled my nose.
simp: 我刚打开锅盖，一股恶臭就扑鼻而来。
trad: 我剛打開鍋蓋，一股惡臭就撲鼻而來。

eng: Spanish is her native language.
It snowed from Monday to Friday.
First come, first serve.
I am a new student.
Give me a little money.
I bought a few eggs and a little milk.
simp: 我买了几个鸡蛋和一点牛奶。
trad: 我買了幾個雞蛋和一點牛奶。

eng: I'd like to invite you to the party.
He cannot be ill.
People of all ages like this song.
You're a new student?
He is a doctor by profession.
Generally speaking, women are better linguists than men.
simp: 总体上说，女人是比男人好的语言学家。
trad: 總體上說，女人是比男人好的語言學家。

eng: Let me do that.
He is a Japanese boy.
The weather suddenly got warmer.
Please move back.
Stand back, please.
Would you come here a moment?
He spent the evening reading a book.
He kept me waiting.
You might as well read a novel instead of staring at the ceiling.
simp: 望着天花板发呆,还不如读一读小说。
trad: 望著天花板發呆,還不如讀一讀小說。

eng: The train is to arrive on time.
He will have to go to the station.
Someone knocked on the door.
Fuck you!
He died yesterday.
He died yesterday.
He died yesterday.
Dead men tell no tales.
simp: 死人是无法开口说话的。
trad: 死人是無法開口說話的。

eng: What did you say? Dead?
I love her so much I could die.
He died aged 54 years.
An old woman was burnt to death.
You're all cowards.
You don't have to worry about her anymore.
simp: 她的事你再也不必担心。
trad: 她的事你再也不必擔心。

eng: The cat is sitting on the table.
I'm sitting on the sofa.
When happiness comes knocking at your door.
Knock on the door of happiness.
Knock before entering the bathroom.
Please wash your hands after using the bathroom.
Christmas is approaching.
The new year drew closer.
The enemy won't get close.
We can't get close to the enemy.
This is a book.
What is this?
What's this?
My surname is Zhou.
I am delighted to have met you today.
Yoko avoided answering my question.
simp: 洋子回避我提出的问题。
trad: 洋子回避我提出的問題。

eng: May I ask your name?
Who is he?
I'm Shanghainese.
Where do you work?
She is a particularily interesting person.
simp: 她是一个非常有意思的人.
trad: 她是一個非常有意思的人.

eng: Oil and water don't mix.
That market has been rapidly expanding.
simp: 那个市场一直在急速扩展。
trad: 那個市場一直在急速擴展。

eng: I'm looking for my key.
I reminded him of his interview with the president.
simp: 我提醒他要去会见总裁。
trad: 我提醒他要去會見總裁。

eng: Anyone can use this dictionary.
simp: 所有人都可以用这本词典。
trad: 所有人都可以用這本詞典。

eng: Ann is a little girl.
I lost my way and, what was worse, it began to rain.
simp: 我迷了路，而且更糟的是天开始下雨了。
trad: 我迷了路，而且更糟的是天開始下雨了。

eng: But he wanted a son very much.
The patient got better little by little.
We ran around the park.
simp: 我们在公园里跑来跑去。
trad: 我們在公園裏跑來跑去。

eng: The nurse attended the patient.
Keep a good heart and go on writing.
The water in this river is very clean.
We have had lots of typhoons this fall.
Whose are these pens?
Don't make the same mistake again.
Tom wants to be a pilot.
simp: Tom 想成为一个飞机师。
trad: Tom 想成為一個飛機師。

eng: They stood talking for a long time.
From the practical point of view, there are many shortcomings in his plan.
simp: 从现实的角度看，他的计划有很多缺点。
trad: 從現實的角度看，他的計劃有很多缺點。

eng: It's a cold day, isn't it?
Having failed many times, he never gave up the plan.
simp: 虽然失败了很多次，但是他仍从不放弃。
trad: 雖然失敗了很多次，但是他仍從不放棄。

eng: The accident almost cost him his life.
simp: 事故差点让他丢了性命。
trad: 事故差點讓他丟了性命。

eng: I like playing the piano.
Last night my house was robbed while I was still awake.
simp: 昨晚我还没有睡觉家里就被小偷光顾了
trad: 昨晚我還沒有睡覺家裏就被小偷光顧了

eng: Last night my house was robbed while I was still awake.
simp: 昨晚睡觉之前家里进了小偷。
trad: 昨晚睡覺之前家裏進了小偷。

eng: My father has gone to America.
Signing off, gonna take a shower.
Break for bath & food, back in about 40 minutes!
simp: 暂时下线洗澡吃饭，过40分左右回来!
trad: 暫時下線洗澡吃飯，過40分左右回來!

eng: Don't worry. I'll do it.
Unable to sense the situation.
It's not what you wear, it's how you wear it.
simp: 关键不在穿什么，而是怎么穿。
trad: 關鍵不在穿什麼，而是怎麼穿。

eng: I know they are in love with each other.
It's on the tip of my tongue.
It's on the tip of my tongue.
It's on the tip of my tongue.
There's no love without jealousy.
Love is never without jealousy.
It's up to you.
It's up to you.
Filth breeds illnesses.
It is better to do well than to say well.
Actions speak louder than words. Stop complaining and do it.
simp: 行动比语言更有说服力。别发牢骚多做事。
trad: 行動比語言更有說服力。別發牢騷多做事。

eng: My way is action not words.
simp: 我的做法是要行动不要空话。
trad: 我的做法是要行動不要空話。

eng: It's not fair! I have to do the hard work!
simp: 这不公平！凭什么我必须做艰苦的工作。
trad: 這不公平！憑什麼我必須做艱苦的工作。

eng: A misfortune befell him.
You should try to forget your unhappy past.
simp: 你应该要尝试着忘掉不快乐的过去。
trad: 你應該要嘗試著忘掉不快樂的過去。

eng: You should try to forget your unhappy past.
simp: 你应该努力忘掉那些不快乐的过去。
trad: 你應該努力忘掉那些不快樂的過去。

eng: I don't think she is fit for the job.
simp: 我不觉得她适合做这份工作。
trad: 我不覺得她適合做這份工作。

eng: What is important is not what you do, but the way you do it.
simp: 重要的不是你做的是甚麽，而是你怎样去做它。
trad: 重要的不是你做的是甚麼，而是你怎樣去做它。

eng: Which is the best hotel in the town?
simp: 城里最好的是哪间酒店？
trad: 城裏最好的是哪間酒店？

eng: I feel like throwing up.
Look at the picture at the top of the page.
Show me what you bought.
simp: 让我看一下你买的东西。
trad: 讓我看一下你買的東西。

eng: I saw you with a tall boy.
simp: 我看见你和一个高个子男孩在一起。
trad: 我看見你和一個高個子男孩在一起。

eng: He is no more foolish than you are.
He is no more foolish than you are.
All the events described in this story are imaginary.
simp: 故事里发生的事都是虚构出来的。
trad: 故事裏發生的事都是虛構出來的。

eng: We have just cleaned the lavatory.
I am going to do it whether you agree or not.
simp: 不管你同意还是不同意，我还是要做。
trad: 不管你同意還是不同意，我還是要做。

eng: I am going to do it whether you agree or not.
simp: 不管你同不同意，我都要做。
trad: 不管你同不同意，我都要做。

eng: I don't object to your going out to work, but who will look after the children?
simp: 我并不反对你出去工作，可是小孩靠谁来照看呢？
trad: 我並不反對你出去工作，可是小孩靠誰來照看呢？

eng: You can't apply this rule to every case.
simp: 你不能把这规则应用在所有事上。
trad: 你不能把這規則應用在所有事上。

eng: If there is anyone out there who still doubts that America is a place where all things are possible; who still wonders if the dream of our founders is alive in our time; who still questions the power of our democracy, tonight is your answer.
simp: 如果外头还有人怀疑，美国是否真的是任何事都可能发生的地方，怀疑我们开国先贤的梦想今天是否依然存在，怀疑我们民主的力量；今夜，就是你们要的答桉。
trad: 如果外頭還有人懷疑，美國是否真的是任何事都可能發生的地方，懷疑我們開國先賢的夢想今天是否依然存在，懷疑我們民主的力量；今夜，就是你們要的答案。

eng: It's the answer told by lines that stretched around schools and churches, in numbers this nation has never seen. By people who waited three hours and four hours, many for the first time in their lives, because they believed that this time must be different, that their voices could be that difference.
simp: 这是个用这个国家前所未见的，环绕学校、教堂的无数人龙，所说出的答桉。这些人苦等三、四个小时投票，许多人还是生平头一次，因为他们相信，这次一定要不一样，他们的声音就是明证。
trad: 這是個用這個國家前所未見的，環繞學校、教堂的無數人龍，所說出的答案。這些人苦等三、四個小時投票，許多人還是生平頭一次，因為他們相信，這次一定要不一樣，他們的聲音就是明證。

eng: For how long are you in Shanghai?

It's the answer spoken by young and old, rich and poor, Democrat and Republican, black, white, Hispanic, Asian, Native American, gay, straight, disabled and not disabled. Americans who sent a message to the world that we have never been just a collection of individuals or a collection of red states and blue states. We are, and always will be, the United States of America.
simp: 这是个由不分老少、贫富、民主党、共和党；黑人、白人、拉丁裔、亚裔、美洲原住民；同性恋、异性恋人；肢障与四体健全者，大家共同诉说的答桉。美国民众向全世界发出讯息，我们绝非一盘散沙，也不是由红州、蓝州拼凑而成的集合体。
trad: 這是個由不分老少、貧富、民主黨、共和黨；黑人、白人、拉丁裔、亞裔、美洲原住民；同性戀、異性戀人；肢障與四體健全者，大家共同訴說的答案。美國民眾向全世界發出訊息，我們絕非一盤散沙，也不是由紅州、藍州拼湊而成的集合體。

eng: Look, this is my business card.

It's the answer that led those who've been told for so long, by so many, to be cynical and fearful and doubtful about what we can achieve, to put their hands on the arc of history and bend it once more toward the hope of a better day.
simp: 就是这个答桉，让那些长久以来被灌输要嘲讽、害怕和怀疑自身能力的人们 把他们的手放在历史的弧线上，将它弯向一个更美好的一天的希望。
trad: 就是這個答案，讓那些長久以來被灌輸要嘲諷、害怕和懷疑自身能力的人們 把他們的手放在歷史的弧線上，將它彎向一個更美好的一天的希望。

eng: It's been a long time coming; but tonight, because of what we did on this day, in this election, at this defining moment, change has come to America.
simp: 已经过去了很长时间，但是今晚，由于我们今天在这场选举所采取的行动，在这个决定性的时候，变革来到了美国。
trad: 已經過去了很長時間，但是今晚，由於我們今天在這場選舉所采取的行動，在這個決定性的時候，變革來到了美國。

eng: A little bit earlier this evening, I received an extraordinarily gracious call from Senator McCain. Senator McCain fought long and hard in this campaign. And he's fought even longer and harder for the country that he loves. He has endured sacrifices for America that most of us cannot begin to imagine. We are better off for the service rendered by this brave and selfless leader.
simp: 今晚稍早，我接到马侃参议员打来，态度非常恳切的电话。马侃参议员已打完一场漫长艰苦的选战。他为这个他所热爱的国家所打的仗更久，更艰苦。他为美国的奉献牺牲，是我们多数同胞难以想像的。因为有他这位勇敢无私的领袖的奉献，我们才能过比较好的日子。
trad: 今晚稍早，我接到馬侃參議員打來，態度非常懇切的電話。馬侃參議員已打完一場漫長艱苦的選戰。他為這個他所熱愛的國家所打的仗更久，更艱苦。他為美國的奉獻犧牲，是我們多數同胞難以想像的。因為有他這位勇敢無私的領袖的奉獻，我們才能過比較好的日子。

eng: I congratulate him, I congratulate Governor Palin for all that they've achieved. And I look forward to working with them to renew this nation's promise in the months ahead.
simp: 我向他道贺；也向裴林州长道贺，为他们所成就的一切。我迫不及待想和他们携手合作，在未来数月更新这个国家的许诺。
trad: 我向他道賀；也向裴林州長道賀，為他們所成就的一切。我迫不及待想和他們攜手合作，在未來數月更新這個國家的許諾。

eng: I want to thank my partner in this journey, a man who campaigned from his heart, and spoke for the men and women he grew up with on the streets of Scranton, and rode with on the train home to Delaware, the vice president-elect of the United States, Joe Biden.
simp: 我要感谢我的选举搭档，这位先生全心全意竞选，为与他在史克兰顿街头一起长大的男男女女代言。在前往德拉瓦州的路上，和我一起以火车为家，他就是副总统当选人，拜登先生。
trad: 我要感謝我的選舉搭檔，這位先生全心全意競選，為與他在史克蘭頓街頭一起長大的男男女女代言。在前往德拉瓦州的路上，和我一起以火車為家，他就是副總統當選人，拜登先生。

eng: And I would not be standing here tonight without the unyielding support of my best friend for the last 16 years, the rock of our family, the love of my life, the nation's next first lady, Michelle Obama.
simp: 如果没有我过去16年最好的朋友、我们家庭的中坚、我生命中的挚爱，我今天晚上不可能站在这里，美国下一位第一夫人米歇尔-奥巴马。
trad: 如果沒有我過去16年最好的朋友、我們家庭的中堅、我生命中的摯愛，我今天晚上不可能站在這裏，美國下一位第一夫人米歇爾-奧巴馬。

eng: Sasha and Malia! I love you both more than you can imagine. And you have earned the new puppy that's coming with us to the White House.
simp: 萨沙和马莉娅，我爱你们，我对你们的爱超出了你们的想象。你们已赢得了新的宠物狗，它将和我们一起前往新的白宫。
trad: 薩沙和馬莉婭，我愛你們，我對你們的愛超出了你們的想象。你們已贏得了新的寵物狗，它將和我們一起前往新的白宮。

eng: And while she's no longer with us, I know my grandmother's watching, along with the family that made me who I am. I miss them tonight. I know that my debt to them is beyond measure. To my sister Maya, my sister Alma, all my other brothers and sisters, thank you so much for all the support that you've given me. I'm grateful to them.
simp: 尽管她没能和我们在一起，但我知道，我的祖母和养大我的家人在看着我，我今晚很想念他们，我知道我欠他们的东西是无法计量的。我的妹妹马娅、我的姐姐奥玛，我其他的兄弟和姐妹，非常感谢你们对我的支持，我感谢他们。我的妹妹马娅、我的姐姐奥玛，我其他的兄弟和姐妹，非常感谢你们对我的支持，我感谢他们。
trad: 盡管她沒能和我們在一起，但我知道，我的祖母和養大我的家人在看著我，我今晚很想念他們，我知道我欠他們的東西是無法計量的。我的妹妹馬婭、我的姐姐奧瑪，我其他的兄弟和姐妹，非常感謝你們對我的支持，我感謝他們。我的妹妹馬婭、我的姐姐奧瑪，我其他的兄弟和姐妹，非常感謝你們對我的支持，我感謝他們。

eng: To my campaign manager, David Plouffe! The unsung hero of this campaign, who built the best, the best political campaign, I think, in the history of the United States of America.
simp: 我的竞选经理大卫-普劳夫，这位竞选活动的无名英雄，他进行了最好的政治竞选活动，我认为这是美国历史上最棒的。
trad: 我的競選經理大衛-普勞夫，這位競選活動的無名英雄，他進行了最好的政治競選活動，我認為這是美國歷史上最棒的。

eng: To my chief strategist, David Axelrod, who's been a partner with me every step of the way. To the best campaign team ever assembled in the history of politics! You made this happen, and I am forever grateful for what you've sacrificed to get it done.
simp: 我的首席策略师大卫-艾克斯罗德，他一直是追随我的伙伴。你们组建了政治史上最好的竞选团队，是你们成就了今天，我永远感谢你们为此所作出的牺牲。
trad: 我的首席策略師大衛-艾克斯羅德，他一直是追隨我的夥伴。你們組建了政治史上最好的競選團隊，是你們成就了今天，我永遠感謝你們為此所作出的犧牲。

eng: But above all, I will never forget who this victory truly belongs to. It belongs to you. It belongs to you.
simp: 但最重要的是，我永远不会忘记这场胜利真正属于谁，它属于你们，它属于你们。
trad: 但最重要的是，我永遠不會忘記這場勝利真正屬於誰，它屬於你們，它屬於你們。

eng: I was never the likeliest candidate for this office. We didn't start with much money or many endorsements. Our campaign was not hatched in the halls of Washington. It began in the backyards of Des Moines, and the living rooms of Concord, and the front porches of Charleston. It was built by working men and women who dug into what little savings they had to give $5 and $10 and $20 to the cause.
simp: 我从来不是最有可能获得这一职务的候选人。我们刚开始并没有太多资金，也没有得到许多人的支持。我们的竞选活动并非始自华盛顿的大厅里，而是始于得梅因、康科德、查尔斯顿这些地方的普通民众家中。那些辛勤工作的人们从自己微薄的储蓄中捐出5美元、10美元、20美元。
trad: 我從來不是最有可能獲得這一職務的候選人。我們剛開始並沒有太多資金，也沒有得到許多人的支持。我們的競選活動並非始自華盛頓的大廳裏，而是始於得梅因、康科德、查爾斯頓這些地方的普通民眾家中。那些辛勤工作的人們從自己微薄的儲蓄中捐出5美元、10美元、20美元。

eng: It drew strength from the young people who rejected the myth of their generation's apathy, who left their homes and their families for jobs that offered little pay and less sleep.
simp: 竞选活动因为年轻人的支持而越来越有声势，他们拒绝了他们那一代对政治不感兴趣的神话，他们离开家，从事那些薪水少而且辛苦的工作。
trad: 競選活動因為年輕人的支持而越來越有聲勢，他們拒絕了他們那一代對政治不感興趣的神話，他們離開家，從事那些薪水少而且辛苦的工作。

eng: It drew strength from the not-so-young people who braved the bitter cold and scorching heat to knock on doors of perfect strangers, and from the millions of Americans who volunteered and organized and proved that more than two centuries later a government of the people, by the people, and for the people has not perished from the Earth.
simp: 竞选活动的声势也来自那些已不再年轻的人们，他们冒着严寒酷暑，敲开陌生人的家门进行竞选宣传；竞选声势也源自数百万的美国民众，他们充当志愿者和组织者，他们证明了在两百多年以后，民有、民治、民享的政府并未从地球上消失。这是你们的胜利。
trad: 競選活動的聲勢也來自那些已不再年輕的人們，他們冒著嚴寒酷暑，敲開陌生人的家門進行競選宣傳；競選聲勢也源自數百萬的美國民眾，他們充當誌願者和組織者，他們證明了在兩百多年以後，民有、民治、民享的政府並未從地球上消失。這是你們的勝利。

eng: This is your victory.

And I know you didn't do this just to win an election. And I know you didn't do it for me. You did it because you understand the enormity of the task that lies ahead. For even as we celebrate tonight, we know the challenges that tomorrow will bring are the greatest of our lifetime: two wars, a planet in peril, the worst financial crisis in a century.
simp: 我知道你们的所做的一切并不只是为了赢得选举，我也知道你们做这一切并不是为了我。你们这样做是因为你们明白前面的任务有多么艰巨。即便我们今晚欢呼庆祝，我们也知道明天将面临我们一生之中最艰难的挑战——两场战争、一个面临危险的星球，一个世纪以来最严重的金融危机。
trad: 我知道你們的所做的一切並不只是為了贏得選舉，我也知道你們做這一切並不是為了我。你們這樣做是因為你們明白前面的任務有多麼艱巨。即便我們今晚歡呼慶祝，我們也知道明天將面臨我們一生之中最艱難的挑戰——兩場戰爭、一個面臨危險的星球，一個世紀以來最嚴重的金融危機。

eng: Even as we stand here tonight, we know there are brave Americans waking up in the deserts of Iraq and the mountains of Afghanistan, to risk their lives for us.
simp: 就在我们今晚站在这里的时刻，我们知道勇敢的美国士兵在伊拉克的沙漠里和阿富汗的群山中醒来，他们冒着生命危险来保护着我们的生命。
trad: 就在我們今晚站在這裏的時刻，我們知道勇敢的美國士兵在伊拉克的沙漠裏和阿富汗的群山中醒來，他們冒著生命危險來保護著我們的生命。

eng: There are mothers and fathers who will lie awake after the children fall asleep and wonder how they'll make the mortgage, or pay their doctor's bills, or save enough for their child's college education.
simp: 仍有在孩子熟睡后仍难以入眠的父母，他们担心如何偿还按揭月供、付医药费或是存够钱让孩子上大学。
trad: 仍有在孩子熟睡後仍難以入眠的父母，他們擔心如何償還按揭月供、付醫藥費或是存夠錢讓孩子上大學。

eng: There's new energy to harness, new jobs to be created, new schools to build, and threats to meet, alliances to repair.
simp: 我们需要开发新的能源、创造新的工作岗位，我们需要修建新学校，应对众多威胁、修复与许多国家的盟友关系。
trad: 我們需要開發新的能源、創造新的工作崗位，我們需要修建新學校，應對眾多威脅、修復與許多國家的盟友關系。

eng: The road ahead will be long. Our climb will be steep. We may not get there in one year or even in one term. But, America, I have never been more hopeful than I am tonight that we WILL get there.
simp: 前方的道路将很漫长，我们攀登的脚步会很艰辛。我们可能无法在一年甚至一个任期内实现这些目标，但我从未像今晚这样满怀希望，我们将实现我们的目标。
trad: 前方的道路將很漫長，我們攀登的腳步會很艱辛。我們可能無法在一年甚至一個任期內實現這些目標，但我從未像今晚這樣滿懷希望，我們將實現我們的目標。

eng: I promise you, we as a people will get there.
simp: 我向你们承诺——我们作为一个整体将会达成目标。
trad: 我向你們承諾——我們作為一個整體將會達成目標。

eng: But I will always be honest with you about the challenges we face. I will listen to you, especially when we disagree. And above all, I will ask you to join in the work of remaking this nation, the only way it's been done in America for 221 years; block by block, brick by brick, calloused hand by calloused hand.
simp: 但我将总是会向你们坦陈我们所面临的挑战。我会听取你们的意见，尤其是存在不同意见的时候。最重要的是，我会请求你们参与重建这个国家，以美国221年来从未改变的唯一方式-一砖一瓦、同心协力。
trad: 但我將總是會向你們坦陳我們所面臨的挑戰。我會聽取你們的意見，尤其是存在不同意見的時候。最重要的是，我會請求你們參與重建這個國家，以美國221年來從未改變的唯一方式-一磚一瓦、同心協力。

eng: There will be setbacks and false starts. There are many who won't agree with every decision or policy I make as president. And we know the government can't solve every problem.
simp: 我们会遭遇挫折和不成功的起步。我作为总统所做的每项决定或政策，会有许多人持有异议，我们也知道，政府不能解决所有问题。
trad: 我們會遭遇挫折和不成功的起步。我作為總統所做的每項決定或政策，會有許多人持有異議，我們也知道，政府不能解決所有問題。

eng: What began 21 months ago in the depths of winter cannot end on this autumn night. This victory alone is not the change we seek. It is only the chance for us to make that change. And that cannot happen if we go back to the way things were. It can't happen without you, without a new spirit of service, a new spirit of sacrifice. So let us summon a new spirit of patriotism, of responsibility, where each of us resolves to pitch in and work harder and look after not only ourselves but each other.
simp: 21个月前在寒冬所开始的一切不应当在今天这个秋夜结束。今天的选举胜利并不是我们所寻求的改变--这只是我们进行改变的机会。如果我们仍然按照过去的方式行事，我们所寻求的改变将不会发生。没有你们，没有服务和牺牲的新精神，就不可能发生改变。因此，让我们发扬新的爱国和负责精神，所有的人都下定决心参与其中，更加努力地工作，不仅是为自己而是为彼此。
trad: 21個月前在寒冬所開始的一切不應當在今天這個秋夜結束。今天的選舉勝利並不是我們所尋求的改變--這只是我們進行改變的機會。如果我們仍然按照過去的方式行事，我們所尋求的改變將不會發生。沒有你們，沒有服務和犧牲的新精神，就不可能發生改變。因此，讓我們發揚新的愛國和負責精神，所有的人都下定決心參與其中，更加努力地工作，不僅是為自己而是為彼此。

eng: Let us remember that if this financial crisis taught us anything, it's that we cannot have a thriving Wall Street while Main Street suffers.
simp: 让我们记住这一点，如果说这场金融危机教会了我们什么东西的话，那就是我们不可能在金融以外的领域处于困境的同时拥有繁荣兴旺的华尔街。
trad: 讓我們記住這一點，如果說這場金融危機教會了我們什麼東西的話，那就是我們不可能在金融以外的領域處於困境的同時擁有繁榮興旺的華爾街。

eng: In this country, we rise or fall as one nation, as one people. Let's resist the temptation to fall back on the same partisanship and pettiness and immaturity that has poisoned our politics for so long.
simp: 在这个国家，我们患难与共。让我们抵制重走老路的诱惑，避免重新回到令美国政治长期深受毒害的党派纷争、小题大作、不成熟的表现。
trad: 在這個國家，我們患難與共。讓我們抵制重走老路的誘惑，避免重新回到令美國政治長期深受毒害的黨派紛爭、小題大作、不成熟的表現。

eng: Let's remember that it was a man from this state who first carried the banner of the Republican Party to the White House, a party founded on the values of self-reliance and individual liberty and national unity. Those are values that we all share. And while the Democratic Party has won a great victory tonight, we do so with a measure of humility and determination to heal the divides that have held back our progress.
simp: 让我们记住，是伊利诺伊州的一名男子首次将共和党的旗帜扛到了白宫。共和党是建立在自立、个人自由以及国家团结的价值观之上的。这也是我们所有人共同的价值观。虽然民主党今天晚上赢得了巨大的胜利，但我们是以谦卑的态度和弥合阻碍我们进步的分歧的决心赢得这场胜利的
trad: 讓我們記住，是伊利諾伊州的一名男子首次將共和黨的旗幟扛到了白宮。共和黨是建立在自立、個人自由以及國家團結的價值觀之上的。這也是我們所有人共同的價值觀。雖然民主黨今天晚上贏得了巨大的勝利，但我們是以謙卑的態度和彌合阻礙我們進步的分歧的決心贏得這場勝利的

eng: As Lincoln said to a nation far more divided than ours, we are not enemies but friends. Though passion may have strained, it must not break our bonds of affection.
simp: 林肯在向远比我们眼下分歧更大的国家发表讲话时说，我们不是敌人，而是朋友……虽然激情可能会褪去，但这不会割断我们感情上的联系。
trad: 林肯在向遠比我們眼下分歧更大的國家發表講話時說，我們不是敵人，而是朋友……雖然激情可能會褪去，但這不會割斷我們感情上的聯系。

eng: And to those Americans whose support I have yet to earn, I may not have won your vote tonight, but I hear your voices. I need your help. And I will be your president, too.
simp: 对于那些现在没有投票给我的美国人，我想说，我可能没有赢得你们的选票，但是我听到了你们的声音，我需要你们的帮助，而且我也将是你们的总统
trad: 對於那些現在沒有投票給我的美國人，我想說，我可能沒有贏得你們的選票，但是我聽到了你們的聲音，我需要你們的幫助，而且我也將是你們的總統

eng: And all those watching tonight from beyond our shores, from parliaments and palaces, to those who are huddled around radios in the forgotten corners of the world, our stories are singular, but our destiny is shared, and a new dawn of American leadership is at hand.
simp: 对于那些彻夜关注美国大选的海外人士，从国会到皇宫，以及在被遗忘的角落里挤在收音机旁的人们，我们的经历虽然各有不同，但是我们的命运是一样的，新的美国领导层已产生了。
trad: 對於那些徹夜關註美國大選的海外人士，從國會到皇宮，以及在被遺忘的角落裏擠在收音機旁的人們，我們的經歷雖然各有不同，但是我們的命運是一樣的，新的美國領導層已產生了。

eng: To those who would tear the world down: we will defeat you.
simp: 那些想要颠覆这个世界的人们，我们将击败你们。
trad: 那些想要顛覆這個世界的人們，我們將擊敗你們。

eng: To those who seek peace and security. We support you. And to all those who have wondered if America's beacon still burns as bright, tonight we proved once more that the true strength of our nation comes not from the might of our arms or the scale of our wealth, but from the enduring power of our ideals: democracy, liberty, opportunity and unyielding hope.
simp: 那些追求和平和安全的人们，我们支持你们。那些所有怀疑美国的灯塔能否能像以前一样明亮的人们，今天晚上我们再次证明，我们国家真正的力量并非来自我们武器的威力或财富的规模，而是来自我们理想的持久力量：民主、 自由、机会、不屈服的希望。
trad: 那些追求和平和安全的人們，我們支持你們。那些所有懷疑美國的燈塔能否能像以前一樣明亮的人們，今天晚上我們再次證明，我們國家真正的力量並非來自我們武器的威力或財富的規模，而是來自我們理想的持久力量：民主、 自由、機會、不屈服的希望。

eng: That's the true genius of America; that America can change. Our Union can be perfected. What we've already achieved gives us hope for what we can and must achieve tomorrow.
simp: 这才是美国真正的精华——美国能够改变。我们的联邦会日渐完美。我们现在已取得的成就为我们将来能够取得和必须取得的成就增添了希望。
trad: 這才是美國真正的精華——美國能夠改變。我們的聯邦會日漸完美。我們現在已取得的成就為我們將來能夠取得和必須取得的成就增添了希望。

eng: This election had many firsts and many stories that will be told for generations. But one that's on my mind tonight is about a woman who cast her ballot in Atlanta. She's a lot like the millions of others who stood in line to make their voice heard in this election, except for one thing: Ann Nixon Cooper is 106 years old.
simp: 这次大选创造了多项第一，也诞生了很多将世代流传的故事。但是今天晚上令我难忘的却是在亚特兰大投票的一名妇女：安-尼克松-库波尔。她和其他数百万排队等待投票的选民没有什么差别，除了一点：她已是106岁的高龄。
trad: 這次大選創造了多項第一，也誕生了很多將世代流傳的故事。但是今天晚上令我難忘的卻是在亞特蘭大投票的一名婦女：安-尼克松-庫波爾。她和其他數百萬排隊等待投票的選民沒有什麼差別，除了一點：她已是106歲的高齡。

eng: She was born just a generation past slavery. A time when there were no cars on the road or planes in the sky, when someone like her couldn't vote for two reasons: because she was a woman, and because of the color of her skin.
simp: 她出生的那个时代奴隶制度刚刚结束；那时路上没有汽车，天上也没有飞机。当时像她这样的人由于两个原因不能投票，首先她是女性，其次她是黑人。
trad: 她出生的那個時代奴隸制度剛剛結束；那時路上沒有汽車，天上也沒有飛機。當時像她這樣的人由於兩個原因不能投票，首先她是女性，其次她是黑人。

eng: And tonight, I think about all that she's seen throughout her century in America. The heartache and the hope, the struggle and the progress. The times we were told that we can't, and the people who pressed on with that American creed: Yes, we can.
simp: 今天晚上，我想到了她在美国过去一百年间所经历的种种：心痛和希望；斗争和进步；在那里时代，我们被告知我们办不到，一些人继续坚信着美国的信念——是的，我们能做到。
trad: 今天晚上，我想到了她在美國過去一百年間所經歷的種種：心痛和希望；鬥爭和進步；在那裏時代，我們被告知我們辦不到，一些人繼續堅信著美國的信念——是的，我們能做到。

eng: At a time when women's voices were silenced and their hopes dismissed, she lived to see them stand up and speak out and reach for the ballot. Yes, we can.
simp: 妇女当时没有投票权，她们的希望被挫败，但是安-尼克松-库波尔活着看到妇女们站了起来，看到她们站出来发表自己的见解，看到她们参加大选投票。是的，我们能做到。
trad: 婦女當時沒有投票權，她們的希望被挫敗，但是安-尼克松-庫波爾活著看到婦女們站了起來，看到她們站出來發表自己的見解，看到她們參加大選投票。是的，我們能做到。

eng: When there was despair in the dust bowl and depression across the land, she saw a nation conquer fear itself with a New Deal, new jobs, a new sense of common purpose. Yes, we can.
simp: 当30年代的沙尘暴和大萧条使人们感到绝望时，她看到一个国家用新政、新的就业机会以及对新目标的共同追求战胜恐慌。是的，我们能做到。
trad: 當30年代的沙塵暴和大蕭條使人們感到絕望時，她看到一個國家用新政、新的就業機會以及對新目標的共同追求戰勝恐慌。是的，我們能做到。

eng: When the bombs fell on our harbor and tyranny threatened the world, she was there to witness a generation rise to greatness, and a democracy was saved. Yes, we can.
simp: 当炸弹袭击了我们的港口、暴政威胁到全世界，她见证了一代美国人的伟大崛起，见证了一个民主国家获得拯救。是的，我们能做到。
trad: 當炸彈襲擊了我們的港口、暴政威脅到全世界，她見證了一代美國人的偉大崛起，見證了一個民主國家獲得拯救。是的，我們能做到。

eng: She was there for the buses in Montgomery, the hoses in Birmingham, a bridge in Selma, and a preacher from Atlanta who told a people that "We Shall Overcome." Yes, we can.
simp: 她看到蒙哥马利通了公共汽车、伯明翰接上了水管、塞尔马建了桥，一位来自亚特兰大的传教士告诉人们：“我们将克服阻力。”是的，我们能做到。
trad: 她看到蒙哥馬利通了公共汽車、伯明翰接上了水管、塞爾馬建了橋，一位來自亞特蘭大的傳教士告訴人們：“我們將克服阻力。”是的，我們能做到。

eng: A man touched down on the moon. A wall came down in Berlin. A world was connected by our own science and imagination.
simp: 人类登上月球、柏林墙倒下，世界被我们的科学和想像被连接在一起。
trad: 人類登上月球、柏林墻倒下，世界被我們的科學和想像被連接在一起。

eng: And this year, in this election, she touched her finger to a screen, and cast her vote; because after 106 years in America, through the best of times and the darkest of hours, she knows how America can change.
simp: 今年，在这场选举中，她用手指触摸屏幕投下自己的选票，因为在美国生活了106年之后，经历了最好的时光和最黑暗的时刻之后，她知道美国如何能够发生变革。
trad: 今年，在這場選舉中，她用手指觸摸屏幕投下自己的選票，因為在美國生活了106年之後，經歷了最好的時光和最黑暗的時刻之後，她知道美國如何能夠發生變革。

eng: America, we have come so far. We have seen so much. But there is so much more to do. So tonight, let us ask ourselves, if our children should live to see the next century, if my daughters should be so lucky to live as long as Ann Nixon Cooper, what change will they see? What progress will we have made?
simp: 美国，我们已经走过了一条漫漫长路。我们已经历了很多。但是我们仍有很多事情要做。因此今夜，请让我们自问--如果我们的孩子能够活到下个世纪；如果我的女儿有幸活得和安一样长，她们将会看到怎样的改变？我们将会取得什么样的进步。
trad: 美國，我們已經走過了一條漫漫長路。我們已經歷了很多。但是我們仍有很多事情要做。因此今夜，請讓我們自問--如果我們的孩子能夠活到下個世紀；如果我的女兒有幸活得和安一樣長，她們將會看到怎樣的改變？我們將會取得什麼樣的進步。

eng: Yes, we can.

This is our chance to answer that call. This is our moment. This is our time, to put our people back to work and open doors of opportunity for our kids; to restore prosperity and promote the cause of peace; to reclaim the American dream and reaffirm that fundamental truth, that out of many, we are one; that while we breathe, we hope. And where we are met with cynicism and doubt and those who tell us that we can't, we will respond with that timeless creed that sums up the spirit of a people: Yes,
simp: 现在是我们回答这个问题的机会。这是我们的时刻这是我们的时代--让我们的人民重新就业，为我们的后代敞开机会之门，恢复繁荣，推进和平，重新确立“美国梦”，再次证明这样一个基本的真理：我们是一家人；只要一息尚存，我们就有希望；当我们遇到嘲讽和怀疑，当有人说我们办不到的时候，我们要以这个永恒的信条来回应他们。是的，我们能做到
trad: 現在是我們回答這個問題的機會。這是我們的時刻這是我們的時代--讓我們的人民重新就業，為我們的後代敞開機會之門，恢復繁榮，推進和平，重新確立“美國夢”，再次證明這樣一個基本的真理：我們是一家人；只要一息尚存，我們就有希望；當我們遇到嘲諷和懷疑，當有人說我們辦不到的時候，我們要以這個永恒的信條來回應他們。是的，我們能做到

eng: Thank you. God bless you. And may God bless the United States of America.
simp: 感谢你们。上帝保佑你们。愿上帝保佑美利坚合众国
trad: 感謝你們。上帝保佑你們。願上帝保佑美利堅合眾國

eng: I don't speak Japanese.
Great!
Great!
I was very tired, so I went to bed early.
I'm worried for you.
We are worried about you.
He is in college.
Thank you for your present.
Happy are those who love flowers.
You may well not remember, but I'll never forget it.
simp: 你也许不会记得，而我永远不会忘记。
trad: 你也許不會記得，而我永遠不會忘記。

eng: As for me, there is nothing more I want to say.
simp: 至于我, 我没有什么更多要说的。
trad: 至於我, 我沒有什麼更多要說的。

eng: He is a doctor.
The girl was always following her mother.
simp: 女孩总是跟随在母亲背后。
trad: 女孩總是跟隨在母親背後。

eng: This is what I was looking for! he exclaimed.
simp: 「这就是我要找的东西！」他大叫。
trad: 「這就是我要找的東西！」他大叫。

eng: I never say what is not true.
She is poor, but she looks happy.
They were taking care of a girl from India and a boy from Italy.
simp: 他们照顾了一个印度女孩和一个意大利男孩。
trad: 他們照顧了一個印度女孩和一個意大利男孩。

eng: He felt alienated from society.
He promised to return and yet he didn't.
simp: 他答应了会回来，但还是没有回来。
trad: 他答應了會回來，但還是沒有回來。

eng: How fast the new Shinkansen goes!
He can speak French, not to mention English.
simp: 他会说法语，英语当然也会说。
trad: 他會說法語，英語當然也會說。

eng: He raised his hand in order that the taxi might stop.
I can type 50 words a minute.
simp: 我每分钟能打五十个英文字。
trad: 我每分鐘能打五十個英文字。

eng: Enjoy your life while you are able to.
simp: 能够的时候就好好享受人生吧。
trad: 能夠的時候就好好享受人生吧。

eng: She wore such thin clothes that she might well catch a cold.
simp: 她穿的衣服那麽薄，可能会着凉。
trad: 她穿的衣服那麼薄，可能會著涼。

eng: I've been to the seaside by car.
I don't drink much wine.
I got up about five.
My sister is crazy about tennis.
I have been in Paris.
May I leave school early today?
Let's put a stop to this discussion.
I look forward to seeing you again very soon.
She solved the problem with ease.
simp: 她不费吹灰之力就把问题解决了。
trad: 她不費吹灰之力就把問題解決了。

eng: I don't know whether you like her or not.
simp: 我不知道你喜不喜欢她。
trad: 我不知道你喜不喜歡她。

eng: I love Nara, particularly in the fall.
simp: 我很喜欢奈良，尤其在秋季的时候。
trad: 我很喜歡奈良，尤其在秋季的時候。

eng: Can you change the room for me?
Welcome.
Come in.
Come in.
Come in.
The brake stopped working.
Charge this bill to me.
She was wearing a black hat.
Who wants some hot chocolate?
When do we arrive?
How did your interview go?
You can't park your car here.
simp: 你不能把你的车停在这里。
trad: 你不能把你的車停在這裏。

eng: He married Ann.
This invention was the result of years of patient experiment.
simp: 这发明是多年来耐心实验的成果。
trad: 這發明是多年來耐心實驗的成果。

eng: It is hard to convince John.
Don't forget to take an umbrella in case it rains.
simp: 如果下雨的话，别忘了带把伞。
trad: 如果下雨的話，別忘了帶把傘。

eng: Man consists of soul and body.
simp: 人是由灵魂和肉身组成的。
trad: 人是由靈魂和肉身組成的。

eng: I've found something amazing!
simp: 我发现了一件惊人的事！
trad: 我發現了一件驚人的事！

eng: I always got up early in my childhood.
I am very sorry that I have to ask you to change the meeting date to March 6 due to personal reasons.
simp: 真的很对不起，因为一些私人的理由，我想请你把见面日期改为三月六日。
trad: 真的很對不起，因為一些私人的理由，我想請你把見面日期改為三月六日。

eng: The story was amusing.
Never confuse pity with love.
simp: 绝对不要把同情心和爱心搞乱。
trad: 絕對不要把同情心和愛心搞亂。

eng: It helped me a lot.
The second button of your shirt is coming off.
simp: 你衬衫的第二粒衣钮好像快要掉下来了。
trad: 你襯衫的第二粒衣鈕好像快要掉下來了。

eng: He threw the ball against the wall.
The trouble is that you are too young.
Whatever he may say, I won't change my mind.
simp: 无论他说甚麽，我也不会改变主意。
trad: 無論他說甚麼，我也不會改變主意。

eng: A good idea occurred to me just then.
simp: 我刚想到了一个好主意。
trad: 我剛想到了一個好主意。

eng: I have breakfast at seven every morning.
As far as I know, he has never made such a mistake.
simp: 据我所知，他从来没有犯过这样的错。
trad: 據我所知，他從來沒有犯過這樣的錯。

eng: Have you seen any movies lately?
He stopped over at Los Angeles and Chicago.
simp: 他中途在洛杉矶和芝加哥停留。
trad: 他中途在洛杉磯和芝加哥停留。

eng: I beat him at chess.
simp: 我下国际象棋打败了他。
trad: 我下國際象棋打敗了他。

eng: He won the third prize.
They always associated a heavy rain with flood.
simp: 他们总是把大雨和洪水联想在一起。
trad: 他們總是把大雨和洪水聯想在一起。

eng: To defend ourselves, we had to tell a lie.
simp: 为了保护自己，我们只好说谎。
trad: 為了保護自己，我們只好說謊。

eng: I took it that you would come.
She got out of the taxi at the department store.
simp: 她在百货公司门前下了的士。
trad: 她在百貨公司門前下了的士。

eng: He was a weak and delicate child.
simp: 他以前是个柔弱的小孩。
trad: 他以前是個柔弱的小孩。

eng: She came to Tokyo with a view to getting a new job.
simp: 她为了找新工作而来了东京。
trad: 她為了找新工作而來了東京。

eng: I don't know at all why he quit his job suddenly.
simp: 我完全不明白他为甚麽会突然辞职。
trad: 我完全不明白他為甚麼會突然辭職。

eng: This is an historic city.
Butter is made from milk.
I heard a dog barking in the distance.
simp: 我听到远处传来狗叫声。
trad: 我聽到遠處傳來狗叫聲。

eng: I heard a dog barking in the distance.
simp: 我听到了远处的狗叫声。
trad: 我聽到了遠處的狗叫聲。

eng: They went along the street singing the song.
simp: 他们一边唱歌一边走路。
trad: 他們一邊唱歌一邊走路。

eng: Would you like to order?
She said she will go to Paris in August.
I'm done up.
I'm done up.
I can't walk any farther.
I can't go any farther.
I can't go any farther.
I'm not sure I can afford it.
simp: 我不知道我能不能负担得起。
trad: 我不知道我能不能負擔得起。

eng: A man is as old as he feels and a woman as old as she looks.
simp: 男人老不老,自己心中有数;女人老不老,别人一目了然.
trad: 男人老不老,自己心中有數;女人老不老,別人一目了然.

eng: Let's leave her alone.
Is it still raining?
This word has two meanings.
Mary is both intelligent and kind.
This pen belongs to me.
He tried to kill himself because he lost her love.
simp: 他失恋了，所以便尝试自杀。
trad: 他失戀了，所以便嘗試自殺。

eng: There are pretty flowers in the garden.
simp: 花园里有些漂亮的花朵。
trad: 花園裏有些漂亮的花朵。

eng: I have a feeling you'll be a very good lawyer.
simp: 我感觉你将来会成为一名优秀的律师。
trad: 我感覺你將來會成為一名優秀的律師。

eng: I have been studying English for three years.
simp: 我学英文已经学了三年了。
trad: 我學英文已經學了三年了。

eng: The rear-view mirror fell off.
Nothing can be worse than that.
How can we abolish war?
simp: 我们怎样才能停止战争？
trad: 我們怎樣才能停止戰爭？

eng: We use chopsticks in place of knives and forks.
He didn't say a word.
I found the book by accident.
It took John only one day to make friends with his classmates at the school.
simp: 约翰只上了一天的学，就和班上的同学都成了朋友。
trad: 約翰只上了一天的學，就和班上的同學都成了朋友。

eng: I had my leg hurt while playing football.
simp: 我踢足球的时候弄伤了腿。
trad: 我踢足球的時候弄傷了腿。

eng: He has an interest in collecting insects.
simp: 他对收集昆虫很有兴趣。
trad: 他對收集昆蟲很有興趣。

eng: Sally lost the contact lenses she had bought the day before.
simp: Sally 把前一天买的隐形眼镜弄不见了。
trad: Sally 把前一天買的隱形眼鏡弄不見了。

eng: My wife told me to do away with this old hat.
simp: 老婆叫我把这顶旧帽子丢掉。
trad: 老婆叫我把這頂舊帽子丟掉。

eng: I chose this dictionary of my own accord.
simp: 这本词典是我自己选的。
trad: 這本詞典是我自己選的。

eng: Bourbon is made from corn.
simp: 波本威士忌是用玉米做的。
trad: 波本威士忌是用玉米做的。

eng: I began to doubt the accuracy of his statement.
simp: 我开始怀疑他陈述的准确性。
trad: 我開始懷疑他陳述的準確性。

eng: But I want a car.
It's Monday.
It is Monday today.
Joking aside, how are things going?
simp: 言归正传，事情进展得怎麽样了？
trad: 言歸正傳，事情進展得怎麼樣了？

eng: She looked all around.
There is a fence marking the boundary between our yard and the neighbor's.
simp: 我家和邻居家以院子之间的篱笆为分界线。
trad: 我家和鄰居家以院子之間的籬笆為分界線。

eng: There is a fence marking the boundary between our yard and the neighbor's.
simp: 我家院子和邻居家院子之间有一道篱笆做为分界线。.
trad: 我家院子和鄰居家院子之間有一道籬笆做為分界線。.

eng: However, it seems that just because it's a 'low risk day' doesn't mean that you won't get pregnant from intravaginal ejaculation.
simp: 但是，虽然说是安全期，但似乎也不代表体内射精不会怀孕。
trad: 但是，雖然說是安全期，但似乎也不代表體內射精不會懷孕。

eng: She looked all around.
She looked all around.
Englishmen are, on the whole, conservative.
simp: 英国人大体上说都是保守的。
trad: 英國人大體上說都是保守的。

eng: It was raining, and Joe's long hair was completely wet by the time he got home.
simp: 那时正在下雨，而 Joe 回到家时长髮已湿透了。
trad: 那時正在下雨，而 Joe 回到家時長髮已濕透了。

eng: Our teacher is always on time for class.
simp: 我们的老师总是准时来上课。
trad: 我們的老師總是準時來上課。

eng: Divide these apples between you three.
simp: 你们分了这三个苹果吧。
trad: 你們分了這三個蘋果吧。

eng: Would you care for some more cake?
He has much more money than I have.
Joking aside, how are things going?
simp: 玩笑归玩笑，事情进展得怎么样了？
trad: 玩笑歸玩笑，事情進展得怎麼樣了？

eng: She turned over the page with excitement.
Would you care for some more cake?
Divide these apples between you three.
simp: 这些苹果你们三个人分。
trad: 這些蘋果你們三個人分。

eng: There seems no need to help that country.
simp: 看来没有必要帮助这个国家。
trad: 看來沒有必要幫助這個國家。

eng: In addition to being a great statesman, Churchill was a great writer.
simp: 邱吉尔除了是一个伟大的政治家，还是一个伟大的作家。
trad: 邱吉爾除了是一個偉大的政治家，還是一個偉大的作家。

eng: Refer to the dictionary as often as possible.
It is no wonder that he failed.
The hungry baby did nothing but cry.
That song always reminds me of my childhood.
simp: 那首歌总是让我想起我的童年。
trad: 那首歌總是讓我想起我的童年。

eng: I don't care much for coffee.

trad: 請順著這條路一直往前走。

eng: Go straight ahead along this street.

trad: 請沿著這條路一直往前走。

eng: Don't be late for school tomorrow.
I vowed that I would never speak to her again.

eng: He has dubbed in "Avatar".

eng: Shocked by the events of September 11th, politicians all over the world condemned the terrorists for their reprehensible deed.
simp: 911事件让世人震惊，全球所有的政治家都一致谴责恐怖分子的这一应受人斥责的行径。
trad: 911事件讓世人震驚，全球所有的政治家都一致譴責恐怖分子的這一應受人斥責的行徑。

eng: Dinner is ready, so we can eat whenever we want.
simp: 晚餐已经准备好了，我们可以随时开始吃。
trad: 晚餐已經準備好了，我們可以隨時開始吃。

eng: She didn't reply.
Don't lie to me!
Don't try to trick me!
She didn't answer.
The price is reasonable.

simp: 那个年轻女人手抱着婴儿。
trad: 那個年輕女人手抱著嬰兒。

eng: You should get yourself a new car now.
I like a solitary walk.
The professor smiled.
I live in Japan.
I'm lucky today.
I cannot see you without thinking of your late father.
simp: 我一见到你就会想起你已故的父亲。
trad: 我一見到你就會想起你已故的父親。

eng: It is thirty years since we married.
simp: 我们结婚已经有三十年了。
trad: 我們結婚已經有三十年了。

eng: The professor grinned.
The professor smiled slightly.
I like a solitary walk.
I saw him three years ago.
A woman asked me for directions.
I vowed that I would never speak to her again.
simp: 我发誓再也不和她说话了。
trad: 我發誓再也不和她說話了。

eng: The clouds floating in the sky are beautiful.
As I returned from school yesterday, I was caught in a sudden shower.
simp: 昨天我在放学回家的路上突然遇上了一阵大雨。
trad: 昨天我在放學回家的路上突然遇上了一陣大雨。

eng: The fire spread out in a fan-shape.
Tomorrow is Christmas.
He is British.
Boil chestnuts for at least 15 minutes.
This newspaper is free.
This is a free newspaper.
He reads the newspaper every morning.
Where is the newspaper?

He has nothing in him.
Put this stamp on the postcard and drop it in the mailbox.
simp: 把这张邮票贴在明信片上，然后投到邮箱里。
trad: 把這張郵票貼在明信片上，然後投到郵箱裏。

eng: We had our vacation at the lake.
Roger works from morning till night.
Children grow up so quickly.
simp: 孩子的成长快得令人吃惊。
trad: 孩子的成長快得令人吃驚。

eng: My room is a mess.
I'll call by at the post office on the way home.
simp: 我回家时会顺道去一去邮政局。
trad: 我回家時會順道去一去郵政局。

eng: Look at the house with the red roof.
simp: 看看那间红色屋顶的房子。
trad: 看看那間紅色屋頂的房子。

eng: I don't know anything about Japan.
I will keep you warm.
What does that word mean?

trad: 請問最近的公用電話在哪裏?

eng: What does this word mean?

Please look at that red-roofed house.

trad: 請看那座紅屋頂的房子。

eng: I'll pay you back once I receive my salary.
simp: 一领到工资就把钱还给你。
trad: 一領到工資就把錢還給你。

eng: How blue the sky is!

simp: 我的帽子比 Jim 的大。
trad: 我的帽子比 Jim 的大。

eng: She asked me if I knew his address.
simp: 她问我知不知道他的地址。
trad: 她問我知不知道他的地址。

eng: They attained their purpose at last.
I remember him as a cute, bright little boy.
simp: 我印象中的他是个可爱聪明的小男孩。
trad: 我印象中的他是個可愛聰明的小男孩。

eng: The ice in the water melted.
I went into the air force.
It is always difficult for a son to live up to the expectations of his parents.
simp: 要孩子满足父母的期望总是很难的。
trad: 要孩子滿足父母的期望總是很難的。

eng: It was Jack that broke the window yesterday.
simp: 昨天打破窗子的人是杰克。
trad: 昨天打破窗子的人是傑克。

eng: There is a bit of whisky in this bottle.
The ground is still wet.
This desk is used by Tom.
simp: 这张桌子被 Tom 用过。
trad: 這張桌子被 Tom 用過。

eng: The girl talking with John is Susan.
simp: 正在和约翰谈话的女孩叫苏珊。
trad: 正在和約翰談話的女孩叫蘇珊。

eng: How long do you think it takes to go from here to Tokyo?
simp: 你认为从这里去东京要花多久时间？
trad: 你認為從這裏去東京要花多久時間？

eng: Japan is full of surprises!
That bridge isn't long.
From childhood I dreamed of being a pastry cook.
simp: 我从小的梦想就是做一名糕点师。
trad: 我從小的夢想就是做一名糕點師。

eng: From childhood I dreamed of being a pastry cook.
simp: 我从小就梦想着做一名糕点师。
trad: 我從小就夢想著做一名糕點師。

eng: You'll catch cold in such thin clothing.
You'll catch cold in such thin clothing.
He has ample experience.
They believed that the earth was flat.
They will find out sooner or later.

I'm very tired from working all day.
My job is taking care of the baby.
simp: 我的工作是照顾那婴儿。
trad: 我的工作是照顧那嬰兒。

eng: All you have to do is follow his advice.
simp: 你跟随他的指示做就行了。
trad: 你跟隨他的指示做就行了。

eng: My grandfather gave me a birthday present.
simp: 祖父送了一份生日礼物给我。
trad: 祖父送了一份生日禮物給我。

eng: Is there a mall near here?
simp: 附近是不是有一间购物商场？
trad: 附近是不是有一間購物商場？

eng: He repeated his name slowly.
simp: 他慢慢地把自己的名字再说了一遍。
trad: 他慢慢地把自己的名字再說了一遍。

eng: I was a baby in those days.
I could hardly believe my ears when I heard the news.
simp: 我听到这个消息时，简直不能相信自己的耳朵。
trad: 我聽到這個消息時，簡直不能相信自己的耳朵。

eng: It's too small.
You're right.
You're so beautiful!
I'm happy to see you.
Nice to see you.
What exactly are you doing?
She is known as the Japanese Picasso.
simp: 她被视为日本的毕加索。
trad: 她被視為日本的畢加索。

eng: The keys are on the table.
He seldom, if ever, comes.
Why do you like coffee strong?
He's able to speak Japanese.
I will never forget your kindness so long as I live.
simp: 只要还活着，我永远忘不了你的好意。
trad: 只要還活著，我永遠忘不了你的好意。

eng: They give presents to one another.
You shouldn't have told her such a thing.
Why would you marry a woman if you like men?
simp: 喜欢男人，为什么还要和女人结婚？
trad: 喜歡男人，為什麼還要和女人結婚？

eng: She is a woman of great beauty.
simp: 她是一个非常美的女人。
trad: 她是一個非常美的女人。

eng: As the sun rose, the fog disappeared.
I was in Canada then.
I think that you're wrong.
The summer vacation is only a week away.
You should choose your friends very carefully.
You should choose your friends very carefully.
simp: 选择朋友一定要十分谨慎。
trad: 選擇朋友一定要十分謹慎。

eng: I made a big mistake in choosing my wife.
simp: 我在选择妻子时犯了一个很大的错误
trad: 我在選擇妻子時犯了一個很大的錯誤

eng: Will he get well soon?
I don't know how to operate this computer.
simp: 我不知道怎么操作这台电脑.
trad: 我不知道怎麼操作這臺電腦.

eng: Mummy has to do the washing this afternoon.
Mummy cried.
You helped Mommy?
You'll catch it from Mummy.
My eyelid feels hot.
You must bear it in mind.
No man is without his faults.

simp: 请把内容浓缩至六十个英文字以内。
trad: 請把內容濃縮至六十個英文字以內。

eng: This pair of shoes doesn't fit me.
There is not one person who is in agreement with the plan.
simp: 赞成计划的人一个也没有。
trad: 贊成計劃的人一個也沒有。

eng: We are anxious for peace.
We sat in the center of the room.
simp: 我们坐在房间的正中间。
trad: 我們坐在房間的正中間。

eng: He comes to visit us every now and then.
Japan is rich in beautiful scenery.
simp: 日本有很多美丽的景色。
trad: 日本有很多美麗的景色。

eng: Could I get some water, please?

simp: 他为自己的行为感到非常羞耻。

eng: Dad bought me a camera.

simp: 虽然她有许多缺点，但我却情不自禁地爱着她。
trad: 雖然她有許多缺點，但我卻情不自禁地愛著她。

eng: What do you think we should do to make for world peace?
simp: 你觉得我们应该为世界和平做些甚麽？
trad: 你覺得我們應該為世界和平做些甚麼？

eng: He made a desk and two benches for us.
simp: 他给我们做了一张桌子和两把长椅。
trad: 他給我們做了一張桌子和兩把長椅。

eng: She lives in comfort.
The price of gold varies from day to day.

simp: 地面仍然很湿滑，看来比赛要被取消了。
trad: 地面仍然很濕滑，看來比賽要被取消了。

eng: Our teacher demanded that we keep quiet.
simp: 我们的老师要求我们保持安静。
trad: 我們的老師要求我們保持安靜。

eng: This news is important to us.
simp: 这篇新闻对我们来说很重要。

eng: He must be over sixty.

simp: 我们应该尽力不要污染环境。
trad: 我們應該盡力不要汙染環境。

eng: I couldn't keep my anger down.
simp: 我无法压抑心中的怒火。

eng: Jane was a stewardess when she was young.
simp: Jane 年轻时曾做过女乘务员。
trad: Jane 年輕時曾做過女乘務員。

eng: What would our lives be like without electricity?
simp: 如果没有电，那我们生活会怎样?
trad: 如果沒有電，那我們生活會怎樣?

eng: He is a quick-witted man.
He is a quick-witted man.
simp: 他是一个脑子灵活的人。
trad: 他是一個腦子靈活的人。

eng: He makes good use of his time.
I didn't know that she was ill.
Luckily she did not die.
I am going to write about our parks and mountains.
simp: 我打算描写我们的公园和山。
trad: 我打算描寫我們的公園和山。

eng: She didn't mind doing the dishes.
This rule is applied to foreigners only.
simp: 这条规则只适用于外国人。
trad: 這條規則只適用於外國人。

eng: He was the first to arrive.
They are engaged in cancer research.
simp: 他们从事癌症研究工作。
trad: 他們從事癌癥研究工作。

eng: I have two dogs. One is white and the other black.
simp: 我有两条狗。一条是白色的，另一条是黑色的。
trad: 我有兩條狗。一條是白色的，另一條是黑色的。

eng: French has many more vowels than Japanese.
simp: 法语的元音比日语的多得多。
trad: 法語的元音比日語的多得多。

eng: He didn't die happily.
I like this picture, not just because it is famous, but because it really is a masterpiece.
simp: 我喜欢这幅画，不仅是因为它的名气，而是因为它真的是一个杰作。
trad: 我喜歡這幅畫，不僅是因為它的名氣，而是因為它真的是一個傑作。

eng: Do you have any Japanese beer?
Was there anyone in the room?
They only sell women's shoes here.
His dream has come true at last.
As for me, I am satisfied.
That store sells newspapers and magazines.
We won the battle.
Don't forget to bring a camera.
All our efforts were in vain.
simp: 我们所有的努力都白费了。
trad: 我們所有的努力都白費了。

eng: He was expelled from school.
Adversity makes a man wise, not rich.
He earns double my salary.
I have decided to carry on the work.
It seems that I have lost my keys.
May I see your passport, please?
simp: 请让我看一下您的护照好吗？
trad: 請讓我看一下您的護照好嗎？

eng: She looked at me.
She looked at me.
Do you see her often?
Follow your sister's example.
We still have plenty of time.
He earns twice as much as me.
simp: 他赚的薪水是我的两倍。
trad: 他賺的薪水是我的兩倍。

eng: We have run out of sugar.
Someone is at the front door. Go and see who it is.
simp: 前门有人，你去看看是谁。
trad: 前門有人，你去看看是誰。

eng: Such a ridiculous superstition no longer exists.
simp: 这种荒谬的迷信已不复存在了。
trad: 這種荒謬的迷信已不復存在了。

eng: She has a rich vocabulary of English words.
Hello, I am Nancy.
We debated on the question of world population.
simp: 我们在世界人口问题上争辩了一番。
trad: 我們在世界人口問題上爭辯了一番。

eng: She is American, but she lives in England.
simp: 她是美国人，但在英国居住。
trad: 她是美國人，但在英國居住。

eng: The post office is adjacent to the library.
You must not despise someone because they are poor.
simp: 你不能因为别人穷就看不起别人。
trad: 你不能因為別人窮就看不起別人。

eng: The fog began to disappear around ten o'clock.
simp: 雾在十时左右开始散了。
trad: 霧在十時左右開始散了。

eng: My decision to study abroad surprised my parents.
simp: 我决定要去外国读书，把父母吓了一跳。
trad: 我決定要去外國讀書，把父母嚇了一跳。

eng: Nobody can control us.
She is good-natured.
Excuse me for not having answered your letter sooner.
simp: 我这麽迟才回信，真不好意思。
trad: 我這麼遲才回信，真不好意思。

eng: The driver increased his speed.
He was excluded from the club for infractions of the rules.
simp: 他因为触犯会规，被踢出了俱乐部。
trad: 他因為觸犯會規，被踢出了俱樂部。

eng: We need flour, sugar and eggs to make this cake.
simp: 我们需要麵粉、砂糖和鸡蛋来做这个蛋糕。
trad: 我們需要麵粉、砂糖和雞蛋來做這個蛋糕。

eng: I would like to borrow fifty dollars from you.
How did you feel about the game?
simp: 你对这场比赛有甚麽感想？
trad: 你對這場比賽有甚麼感想？

eng: I made up my mind to get married to Margaret.
simp: 我决定要和 Margaret 结婚。
trad: 我決定要和 Margaret 結婚。

eng: You will have to be responsible for what you've done.
simp: 你要为自己做的事负上责任。
trad: 你要為自己做的事負上責任。

eng: Let me help you.
Alice, not knowing where to find the book, asked her mother where it was.
simp: Alice 不知道书本放了在哪里，于是便去问母亲。
trad: Alice 不知道書本放了在哪裏，於是便去問母親。

eng: We must provide for the future.
simp: 我们必须为未来作好准备。
trad: 我們必須為未來作好準備。

eng: Oh, really? When did he leave?
simp: 真的吗？他是甚麽时候走的？
trad: 真的嗎？他是甚麼時候走的？

eng: The weather was getting worse and worse.
I have my supper at a quarter past seven.
simp: 我在七时十五分吃晚饭。
trad: 我在七時十五分吃晚飯。

eng: The track meet was called off on account of the heavy rain.
simp: 田径运动会因天雨关係取消了。
trad: 田徑運動會因天雨關係取消了。

eng: Divide the candies among you.
Above all, you must take good care of yourself.
simp: 最重要的是你要好好照顾自己。
trad: 最重要的是你要好好照顧自己。

eng: You'll get used to it soon.
During hot weather, be sure to drink lots of water.
simp: 天气热的时侯记住要多喝水。
trad: 天氣熱的時侯記住要多喝水。

eng: It's a very delicate question.
Have you learned the number by heart?
The number of tourists has increased greatly in recent years.
simp: 近年的游客数量大幅增加。
trad: 近年的遊客數量大幅增加。

eng: I must apologize to Ann.
simp: 我必须向 Ann 道歉。
trad: 我必須向 Ann 道歉。

eng: It is kind of you go out of your way to help me.
This is how I made the machine.
simp: 我就是这样把机器造出来的。
trad: 我就是這樣把機器造出來的。

eng: It will take an hour to get there.
Take a short cut.
She has a good many friends here.
Jim is on bad terms with his classmates.
simp: Jim 和同学的关係不太好。
trad: Jim 和同學的關係不太好。

eng: We have to get at the truth of the matter.
simp: 我们必须知道事情的真相。
trad: 我們必須知道事情的真相。

eng: We are doing business with many countries.
simp: 我们和很多国家有生意来往。
trad: 我們和很多國家有生意來往。

eng: Please wait until we get the results of the examination.
simp: 请耐心等候检查的结果。
trad: 請耐心等候檢查的結果。

eng: Who invented karaoke?
simp: 卡拉 OK 是谁发明的？
trad: 卡拉 OK 是誰發明的？

eng: The dog was wagging his tail.
It is too dark to see clearly.
He cannot so much as write his own name.
simp: 他连自己的名字也不会写。
trad: 他連自己的名字也不會寫。

eng: Every mother has affection for her child.
simp: 每个母亲都疼爱自己的孩子。
trad: 每個母親都疼愛自己的孩子。

eng: The conference is to be held in Tokyo.
As a child, he went to Paris three times.
simp: 他童年时去过巴黎三次。
trad: 他童年時去過巴黎三次。

eng: I met my teacher by accident at the restaurant last night.
simp: 昨晚我在餐厅里踫见老师。
trad: 昨晚我在餐廳裏踫見老師。

eng: He said to her under his breath, "I love you."
simp: 他压低嗓门对她说：「我爱你。」
trad: 他壓低嗓門對她說：「我愛你。」

eng: I'd like something to drink.
This meat is roasted well.
Even if you do not like it, you must take charge of it.
simp: 就算你不喜欢，你也要负责管理。
trad: 就算你不喜歡，你也要負責管理。

eng: Sean really greatly resembles Conner!
simp: Sean 和 Conner 长得真像！
trad: Sean 和 Conner 長得真像！

eng: Are you a high school student?
This tie and that jacket go well together.
simp: 这条领带和那件上衣很配。
trad: 這條領帶和那件上衣很配。

eng: There is little chance of my meeting him again.
simp: 我应该不能再见到他了。
trad: 我應該不能再見到他了。

eng: John was married to Jane.
simp: John 和 Jane 是两夫妇。
trad: John 和 Jane 是兩夫婦。

eng: Whether you like it or not, you'll have to do it.
Today's minimum temperature was 3 °C.
simp: 今天的最低气温是三度。
trad: 今天的最低氣溫是三度。

eng: From childhood I was fond of reading, and all the little money that ever came into my hands was laid out in books.
simp: 从小开始我就很喜欢读书，那时有的钱虽然不多，但也都全花在书本上。
trad: 從小開始我就很喜歡讀書，那時有的錢雖然不多，但也都全花在書本上。

eng: I am eighteen years old.
Don't forget to come here at seven tomorrow.
simp: 别忘了明天七点到这里来。
trad: 別忘了明天七點到這裏來。

eng: Time flies.
Where is your father?
How about your father?
I cannot speak English, much less German.
simp: 我不会讲英语，更不用说德语了。
trad: 我不會講英語，更不用說德語了。

eng: The top of Mt. Fuji was covered with snow.
He is reasonable in his demands.
Not having dealt with such a problem, they don't know what to do.
simp: 他们从来没有遇过这样的问题，所以不知道怎样处理才好。
trad: 他們從來沒有遇過這樣的問題，所以不知道怎樣處理才好。

eng: There is a bookstore in front of my house.
He died previous to my arrival.
My sister's work is teaching English.
So far as this matter is concerned, I am completely satisfied.
simp: 我对这件事感到十分满意。
trad: 我對這件事感到十分滿意。

eng: Why can't you take things just as they are?
simp: 你为甚麽不随遇而安呢？
trad: 你為甚麼不隨遇而安呢？

eng: Why do they say you have to learn English to survive?
simp: 怎麽会有人认为不懂英语就不能生存？
trad: 怎麼會有人認為不懂英語就不能生存？

eng: They are inquiring into the matter.
A slip of the tongue often brings about unexpected results.
simp: 一时失言常常会带来意想不到的结果。
trad: 一時失言常常會帶來意想不到的結果。

eng: Can I leave my bags with you until I come to check in?
simp: 我来登记之前你可以先帮我看管行李吗？
trad: 我來登記之前你可以先幫我看管行李嗎？

eng: This sticky liquid can be substituted for glue.
simp: 这些黏液可以当胶水用。
trad: 這些黏液可以當膠水用。

eng: Her honesty is beyond question.
simp: 她的诚实是无庸置疑的。
trad: 她的誠實是無庸置疑的。

eng: It is close to seven o'clock. We have to go to school.
simp: 快到七时了。我们要上学了。
trad: 快到七時了。我們要上學了。

eng: Who is the owner of this house?
You have your right sock on wrong side out.
You will soon get accustomed to the work.
simp: 你很快就会习惯新工作了。
trad: 你很快就會習慣新工作了。

eng: The computer is a recent invention.
Their trouble stems from a trifling matter.
simp: 他们的烦恼是由一件琐碎的事而起的。
trad: 他們的煩惱是由一件瑣碎的事而起的。

eng: Your plan is sure to succeed.
simp: 你的计划一定会成功的。
trad: 你的計劃一定會成功的。

eng: Some people say that cartoons on television are educational in themselves.
simp: 有人说电视上的卡通本身是有教育意义的。
trad: 有人說電視上的卡通本身是有教育意義的。

eng: Add salt and pepper to taste.
You have no one but yourself to blame.
We should always act in obedience to the law.
simp: 我们无论如何也应该遵守法律。
trad: 我們無論如何也應該遵守法律。

eng: Lend money only to such as will repay it.
Giant pandas live only in China.
simp: 大熊猫只能在中国找到。
trad: 大熊貓只能在中國找到。

eng: Have you ever seen a panda?
Pandas feed on bamboo grass.
The glass is full of milk.
If I don't do it now, I never will.
simp: 如果我现在不做，就永远也不会做。
trad: 如果我現在不做，就永遠也不會做。

eng: Good night. Sweet dreams.
This song is so moving that it brings tears to my eyes.
simp: 这首歌太感人了，使我不禁流下了眼泪。
trad: 這首歌太感人了，使我不禁流下了眼淚。

eng: There are a lot of things you don't know about my personality.
simp: 你对我的个性还不太清楚。
trad: 你對我的個性還不太清楚。

eng: Perhaps you are right, I have been selfish.
simp: 也许你说得对。我一直都很自私。
trad: 也許你說得對。我一直都很自私。

eng: The tree was blown down.
You can buy whichever you like, but not both.
simp: 你喜欢哪个就买哪个,但不能两个都买。
trad: 你喜歡哪個就買哪個,但不能兩個都買。

eng: He shut the door behind him.
You finally succeeded in getting a job.
simp: 你终于成功找到工作了。
trad: 你終於成功找到工作了。

eng: Don't go near the dog.
Did you read it at all?
How many siblings do you have?
Kate's voice is clearly different from the other girls'.
simp: Kate 的声音明显和其它女孩不同。
trad: Kate 的聲音明顯和其它女孩不同。

eng: That textbook is out of date.
Please feel free to ask me questions.
Four multiplied by two is eight.
I'll never forget visiting Paris last summer.
simp: 我永远不会忘记去年夏天到访巴黎的经历。
trad: 我永遠不會忘記去年夏天到訪巴黎的經歷。

eng: I'm busy because the finals are drawing on.
simp: 快要考期末试了，所以我很忙。
trad: 快要考期末試了，所以我很忙。

eng: If I had bought the painting then, I would be rich now.
simp: 如果当时买了那幅画，我现在就是一个富翁了。
trad: 如果當時買了那幅畫，我現在就是一個富翁了。

eng: Englishmen rarely talk to strangers in the train.
simp: 英国人很少在火车上和陌生人搭讪。
trad: 英國人很少在火車上和陌生人搭訕。

eng: I wonder where he is hiding.
simp: 他到底躲在甚麽地方呢？
trad: 他到底躲在甚麼地方呢？

eng: I don't want to go if you don't go with me.
simp: 如果你不一起去的话，我也不想去了。
trad: 如果你不一起去的話，我也不想去了。

eng: By and by the party ended and everyone went home.
simp: 不久派对完结，大家也都回家去了。
trad: 不久派對完結，大家也都回家去了。

eng: Such things as television and computers could not have been dreamed of fifty years ago.
simp: 五十年前，人们作梦也不会想到有电视和电脑之类的东西。
trad: 五十年前，人們作夢也不會想到有電視和電腦之類的東西。

eng: I regularly go to bed at nine.
Is there any salt left?
I cannot approve of your going out with him.
Rome is an old city.
I'll miss you very much if you go.
We must carry out the plan at once.
simp: 我们必须马上实行这个计画。
trad: 我們必須馬上實行這個計畫。

eng: He would still be alive if he had been wearing his seat belt when the car crashed.
simp: 如果他在撞车前戴好了安全带，现在就不会死了。
trad: 如果他在撞車前戴好了安全帶，現在就不會死了。

eng: It is far from here to Tokyo.
She looked up at the sky.
I am convinced of your innocence.
They made him sign the contract against his will.
You probably think she told me she was on her way to visit her sick grandmother.
simp: 你们大概会以为她告诉了我她当时正在去探望生病的祖母。
trad: 你們大概會以為她告訴了我她當時正在去探望生病的祖母。

eng: How do you account for your absence?
simp: 你怎麽解释你缺席的原因？
trad: 你怎麼解釋你缺席的原因？

eng: You do such a thing once too often and get punished.
simp: 你一错再错，当然会被处罚。
trad: 你一錯再錯，當然會被處罰。

eng: Advance two steps.
Some of the money was stolen.
You depend too much on others.
The fiction reduced girls to tears.
simp: 这本小说使无数女孩流下了眼泪。
trad: 這本小說使無數女孩流下了眼淚。

eng: The class consists of fifty students.
He is the only American who has swum the English Channel.
simp: 他是游过英吉利海峡的唯一一个美国人。
trad: 他是遊過英吉利海峽的唯一一個美國人。

eng: No matter how much you hurry your effort is just a drop in the bucket.
simp: 就算你多焦急，也不能帮上甚麽忙。
trad: 就算你多焦急，也不能幫上甚麼忙。

eng: He must have gotten over his cold.
How long have you lived here?
At length the discord between them came to an end.
simp: 他们的冲突终于平息了。
trad: 他們的衝突終於平息了。

eng: I don't know how to swim.
Can't think of an answer?
Ken took the wrong bus by mistake.
simp: Ken 不小心上错了巴士。
trad: Ken 不小心上錯了巴士。

eng: He is the only American who has swum the English Channel.
simp: 他是唯一一个游过英吉利海峡的美国人。
trad: 他是唯一一個遊過英吉利海峽的美國人。

eng: I love reading books.
That experiment was a failure.
I don't have any money.
I don't have any money.
A committee was constituted to investigate prices.
simp: 为了调查物价，成立了一个委员会。
trad: 為了調查物價，成立了一個委員會。

eng: Those shoes won't do for climbing.
simp: 那种鞋子用来登山是不行的。
trad: 那種鞋子用來登山是不行的。

eng: Please don't cut me off like that.
simp: 请不要这样打断我说话。
trad: 請不要這樣打斷我說話。

eng: Tell me exactly where he lives.
simp: 请把他确实的地址告诉我。
trad: 請把他確實的地址告訴我。

eng: Save for a rainy day.
Two years ago I could not play basketball at all.
simp: 两年前我完全不懂得打篮球。
trad: 兩年前我完全不懂得打籃球。

eng: This is the biggest cat that I've ever seen.
The washing machine is a wonderful invention.
simp: 洗衣机是个绝妙的发明。
trad: 洗衣機是個絕妙的發明。

eng: His coolness has alienated his friends.
simp: 他冷酷的性格使朋友们一个一个地疏远了他。
trad: 他冷酷的性格使朋友們一個一個地疏遠了他。

eng: Money counts for much in political circles.
simp: 金钱在政界是十分重要的。
trad: 金錢在政界是十分重要的。

eng: Where is the elevator?
She was filled with deep grief to hear of her father's sudden death.
simp: 她得知父亲突然离去的消息时，简直伤透了心。
trad: 她得知父親突然離去的消息時，簡直傷透了心。

eng: Do you have a plan?
The baseball game was called off due to rain.
simp: 因为天雨关係，棒球比赛被取消了。
trad: 因為天雨關係，棒球比賽被取消了。

eng: Turn up the radio. I can't hear it.
simp: 把收音机调大声点。我听不清楚。
trad: 把收音機調大聲點。我聽不清楚。

eng: My house is only a mile from here.
simp: 我的家离这里只有一英里。
trad: 我的家離這裏只有一英裏。

eng: Kate must be sick, for she looks pale.
simp: 凯特的脸色这麽差，一定是生病了。
trad: 凱特的臉色這麼差，一定是生病了。

eng: An old man sat next to me on the bus.
simp: 巴士上有个老人坐在我旁边。
trad: 巴士上有個老人坐在我旁邊。

eng: It will clear up soon.
But, he didn't keep his promise.
This hotel is conveniently located in terms of public transportation.
simp: 这间酒店的交通位置很方便。
trad: 這間酒店的交通位置很方便。

eng: English cannot be mastered overnight.
simp: 英语不是一朝一夕就能学会的。
trad: 英語不是一朝一夕就能學會的。

eng: This medicine cured me of my cold.
You remind me of your father.
simp: 你让我想起了你的父亲。
trad: 你讓我想起了你的父親。

eng: Has it stopped raining yet?
Mrs. Brown wrote a book on politics.
simp: 布朗夫人写了一本关于政治的书。
trad: 布朗夫人寫了一本關於政治的書。

eng: Will you excuse me for just a moment?
Smoking is not allowed in this room.
Ladies first.
Please come over with your wife.
It is dangerous to bathe in this river.
simp: 在这条河里游泳很危险。
trad: 在這條河裏遊泳很危險。

eng: Do you want to get married first or have a child first?
simp: 你想我们先结婚还是先生孩子？
trad: 你想我們先結婚還是先生孩子？

eng: I have no more than ten English books.
I feel cold.
After ten minutes, they passed on to a new topic.
He rested for a while.
He plays baseball every day.
Do you mind if I turn off the light?
simp: 您介不介意我把灯关了？
trad: 您介不介意我把燈關了？

eng: How about dining out tonight?
simp: 我们今晚出去吃怎么样？
trad: 我們今晚出去吃怎麼樣？

eng: I know him by sight, but not by name.
simp: 我知道他的样子，但不知道他的名字。
trad: 我知道他的樣子，但不知道他的名字。

eng: A bird has wings.
I'm sorry, I love you.
I have no patience.
Whatever happens, keep calm.
simp: 无论发生甚麽事也要保持冷静。
trad: 無論發生甚麼事也要保持冷靜。

eng: It was only much later that I came to understand the importance of child education.
simp: 很久以后我才明白到教育儿童有多重要。
trad: 很久以後我才明白到教育兒童有多重要。

eng: He wouldn't be available until four.
simp: 他到了四时以后才有空。
trad: 他到了四時以後才有空。

eng: Your school is so kind to reimburse you for the return airfare.
simp: 你们学校真好，还帮你们报销来回的机票。
trad: 你們學校真好，還幫你們報銷來回的機票。

eng: If you know the answer to this question, please tell me.
simp: 如果你知道这个问题的答桉的话,就请告诉我。
trad: 如果你知道這個問題的答案的話,就請告訴我。

eng: Are you a student?
All horses are animals, but not all animals are horses.
simp: 所有的马都是动物, 但并非所有的动物都是马。
trad: 所有的馬都是動物, 但並非所有的動物都是馬。

eng: Are you bringing your camera?
