eng: The performers danced whilst singing - they performed extremely well.
simp: 演员们一边唱，一边跳，表演得好极了。
trad: 演員們一邊唱，一邊跳，表演得好極了。

eng: You can't park here.
Although he did well in the exam, his spoken Chinese is not necessarily as good as yours.
simp: 虽然他考得很好，他口语的汉语不见得比你的好。
trad: 雖然他考得很好，他口語的漢語不見得比你的好。

eng: We hurried to the train station.
simp: 我们匆忙地去火车站了。
trad: 我們匆忙地去火車站了。

eng: Unfortunately, by the time we got there the train had been gone for fifteen minutes.
simp: 可惜，我们来到的时候，火车已经十五分钟以前走了。
trad: 可惜，我們來到的時候，火車已經十五分鐘以前走了。

eng: I phoned my son before boarding the plane, telling him to come to the airport to pick me up.
simp: 我上机之前打了电话给儿子，叫他去机场接我。
trad: 我上機之前打了電話給兒子，叫他去機場接我。

eng: Have you decided whether you are going into town by bike or by bus?
simp: 你决没决定骑自行车还是坐公共汽车去城里？
trad: 你決沒決定騎自行車還是坐公共汽車去城裏？

eng: I made a paper plane.
Everyone says the food in this restaurant is both delicious and inexpensive.
simp: 大家说这家饭馆儿的菜又好吃又便宜。
trad: 大家說這家飯館兒的菜又好吃又便宜。

eng: She cried throughout the night.
We tried it out yesterday; as expected, it was really good.
simp: 我们昨天试了一下，果然是很好。
trad: 我們昨天試了一下，果然是很好。

eng: I will leave everything about the party up to you.
simp: 派对的准备工作就全交给你了。
trad: 派對的準備工作就全交給你了。

eng: Don't worry.
Nancy is the most beautiful of the four girls.
simp: 在四位姑娘之中最美的是南希。
trad: 在四位姑娘之中最美的是南希。

eng: In 2009, I had graduated from high school but I still hadn't started university.
simp: 二零零九年我高中毕业了可是还没上大学。
trad: 二零零九年我高中畢業了可是還沒上大學。

eng: Shut the door.
There are some empty bottles in the box.
I have a stomachache.
In my opinion this kind of work is both uninteresting and difficult, but I don't have any other way to earn money.
simp: 我认为这种工作既不有趣又困难, 可是我没有别的方法赚钱。
trad: 我認為這種工作既不有趣又困難, 可是我沒有別的方法賺錢。

eng: No one can help me.
I've been feeling poorly for the last couple of days.
simp: 过去两天我觉得不太舒服。
trad: 過去兩天我覺得不太舒服。

eng: In addition to a blocked nose, I'm also suffering from a high temperature.
simp: 除了鼻子不通以外，我还发着高烧。
trad: 除了鼻子不通以外，我還發著高燒。

eng: You can't get in without your key anyway, so you may as well come to have supper with us.
simp: 没有你的钥匙的话，你还是进不去，所以你不放来跟我们一起吃晚饭。
trad: 沒有你的鑰匙的話，你還是進不去，所以你不放來跟我們一起吃晚飯。

eng: It is time you had a haircut!
simp: 你到了该去理发的时候了。
trad: 你到了該去理發的時候了。

eng: Her face turned red.
She is inferior to him in math.
She suddenly became famous.
The inverse of a non-square matrix is a dangerous thing.
simp: 非方矩阵的逆阵是一个危险的东西。
trad: 非方矩陣的逆陣是一個危險的東西。

eng: Would you like to have a cup of tea?
I did not sleep well last night.
Where did you get it?
Although Jane had one suitcase less than me, she still said she had too much to carry.
simp: 虽然Jane的手提箱比我的少一个, 她还是说她要提的东西太多了。
trad: 雖然Jane的手提箱比我的少一個, 她還是說她要提的東西太多了。

eng: Because of heavy snow, the plane from Beijing arrived 20 minutes late.
simp: 由于下大雪，从北京来的班机延迟二十分钟。
trad: 由於下大雪，從北京來的班機延遲二十分鐘。

eng: I don't want to hear any more of your complaining.
But he needed a job.
Thank you in advance for your help.
She had to accept her fate.
Don't be sad.
The policeman arrested him for speeding.
simp: 他超速驾驶，被警察逮捕了。
trad: 他超速駕駛，被警察逮捕了。

eng: We weren't at home yesterday.
Have you arrived at a decision yet?
Battery is low!
These days I am very busy.
Do you keep a diary?
Drop by drop, the water can conglomerate into a lake.
simp: 一滴一滴的水能聚成湖泊。
trad: 一滴一滴的水能聚成湖泊。

eng: This is the girl that came yesterday.
simp: 这是昨天来的那个女孩。
trad: 這是昨天來的那個女孩。

eng: The teacher explained the meaning of the word to us.
You may go.
Naoko is a swimmer.
What did John sing on the stage?
simp: 约翰在台上唱了甚麽歌？
trad: 約翰在臺上唱了甚麼歌？

eng: What am I to do next?
He pulled with all his strength but the rock would not move.
simp: 他用尽全力地拉，但那块大石还是纹丝不动。
trad: 他用盡全力地拉，但那塊大石還是紋絲不動。

eng: Never rub the eyes when the hands are dirty.
simp: 手髒的时候千万不要揉眼睛。
trad: 手髒的時候千萬不要揉眼睛。

eng: This isn't my umbrella; it's somebody else's.
simp: 这把伞不是我的，是别人的。
trad: 這把傘不是我的，是別人的。

eng: You had better go to bed right away, or your cold will get worse.
simp: 你还是快点上床睡觉吧，不然感冒会愈来愈严重的。
trad: 你還是快點上床睡覺吧，不然感冒會愈來愈嚴重的。

eng: The door of the office is yellow.
It's the thought that counts.
Will you sing me a Beatles' song?
simp: 可以唱首披头四的歌给我听吗？
trad: 可以唱首披頭四的歌給我聽嗎？

eng: Which is your book?
It was not until three days after that I knew she had disappeared.
simp: 过了三天我才知道原来她失踪了。
trad: 過了三天我才知道原來她失蹤了。

eng: The machine generates a lot of electricity.
simp: 那台机器可以发很多电。
trad: 那臺機器可以發很多電。

eng: Raw fish easily goes bad.
I wonder if he can lend me his guitar during the vacation.
simp: 不知道他放假的时候可不可以把结他借给我呢？
trad: 不知道他放假的時候可不可以把結他借給我呢？

eng: She was brought up by her grandmother.
simp: 她是由她的祖母带大的。
trad: 她是由她的祖母帶大的。

eng: I don't like being treated like this.
simp: 我不喜欢以这种方式被对待。
trad: 我不喜歡以這種方式被對待。

eng: The mountain is covered with snow.
Capital, land and labor are the three key factors of production.
simp: 资本、土地和劳动是生产的三大要素。
trad: 資本、土地和勞動是生產的三大要素。

eng: To tell you the truth, I've been scolded by my mom.
simp: 老实说，我被我妈妈骂了。
trad: 老實說，我被我媽媽罵了。

eng: I will badly miss you if you leave Japan.
simp: 如果你离开日本，我会非常想你的。
trad: 如果你離開日本，我會非常想你的。

eng: He accepted her gift.
I want to go with you.
Errors are few, if any, in his English composition.
simp: 他的英文作文没有甚麽错处。
trad: 他的英文作文沒有甚麼錯處。

eng: He did not die of cancer.
What? It's only eleven? We still have an hour to go before lunch.
simp: 甚麽？现在才十一点？还有一个小时才吃饭呢。
trad: 甚麼？現在才十一點？還有一個小時才吃飯呢。

eng: Check that your username and password are written correctly.
simp: 检查一下用户名和密码有没有填错。
trad: 檢查一下用戶名和密碼有沒有填錯。

eng: She attracted me at first sight.
It's not an issue if he argues with his wife, but he shouldn't hit her.
simp: 他和老婆吵架没问题，但是动手打老婆就不应该了。
trad: 他和老婆吵架沒問題，但是動手打老婆就不應該了。

eng: Do you like singing?
She is my girlfriend.
Is this book the one he always uses?
simp: 这本书是不是他一直用的？
trad: 這本書是不是他一直用的？

eng: That CD is my son's.
There's someone at the doorway.
There are only books on the bookshelf.
There's a convenience store diagonally across the street.
simp: 有一家便利店在马路斜对面。
trad: 有一家便利店在馬路斜對面。

eng: Do you have this new book?
Is there a telephone anywhere?
Do you have two computers?
This computer is yours, isn't it?
Have you a receipt?
I bought the book yesterday.
My mother gets up early in the morning.
Dad, this a real sword? "Of course, it is a duel after all."
simp: “爸爸，这是真的剑吗？”“当然，毕竟这是一场对决。”
trad: “爸爸，這是真的劍嗎？”“當然，畢竟這是一場對決。”

eng: Do you have many friends?
My son is now as tall as I am.
simp: 我儿子现在和我一样高了。
trad: 我兒子現在和我一樣高了。

eng: The little girl laughed a merry laugh.
The snow has disappeared.
And now?
I'm an engineer.
She is writing a letter now.
I'm tired.
That's not a knife. THIS is a knife.
Don't study.
Recently I attended the wedding of a Chinese friend. The bride and groom had been classmates at university, and both graduated from the Chinese faculty. They've already been together for five years.
simp: 最近我参加了一个中国朋友的婚礼，新郎和新娘是大学同学，都是中文系毕业的，他们已经恋爱五年了。
trad: 最近我參加了一個中國朋友的婚禮，新郎和新娘是大學同學，都是中文系畢業的，他們已經戀愛五年了。

eng: The groom works for a company now, and the bride is our teacher.
simp: 新郎现在在一家公司工作，新娘是我们的老师。
trad: 新郎現在在一家公司工作，新娘是我們的老師。

eng: In class she's our teacher; after class she's our friend, and a good friend too.
simp: 上课时她是我们的老师，下课以后是我们的朋友，而且是很好的朋友。
trad: 上課時她是我們的老師，下課以後是我們的朋友，而且是很好的朋友。

eng: When they heard that their teacher was going to get married, everyone wanted to attend her wedding.
simp: 听说老师要结婚，大家都想参加她的婚礼。
trad: 聽說老師要結婚，大家都想參加她的婚禮。

eng: We'd still never been to a Chinese person's wedding.
simp: 我们还从来没参加过中国人的婚礼呢。
trad: 我們還從來沒參加過中國人的婚禮呢。

eng: We asked our teacher: "Can we come to your wedding?"
simp: 我们问老师：“我们可以参加你的婚礼吗？”
trad: 我們問老師：“我們可以參加你的婚禮嗎？”

eng: Our teacher said: "Of course you can."
Our teacher also said that her wedding wouldn't be the same as other people's; we asked how it would be different, but she didn't say.
simp: 老师又说，她的婚礼跟别人不一样，我们问怎么不一样，老师不说。
trad: 老師又說，她的婚禮跟別人不一樣，我們問怎麼不一樣，老師不說。

eng: All she said was that we would know when the time came.
simp: 她只说到时候你们就知道了。
trad: 她只說到時候你們就知道了。

eng: On the day of the wedding, we arrived at our teacher's house.
simp: 婚礼那天，我们来到老师家。
trad: 婚禮那天，我們來到老師家。

eng: There were many guests - most of them were our teacher's classmates and friends.
simp: 客人很多，大部分都是老师的同学和朋友。
trad: 客人很多，大部分都是老師的同學和朋友。

eng: We asked our teacher: "Where will the wedding be held?"
simp: 我们问老师：“婚礼在哪里举行？”
trad: 我們問老師：“婚禮在哪裏舉行？”

eng: The teacher said: "Let's set off right now."
simp: 老师说：“咱们现在就出发。”
trad: 老師說：“咱們現在就出發。”

eng: The teacher and her partner took the people attending the wedding to a park.
simp: 老师和她爱人带着参加婚礼的人来到一个公园。
trad: 老師和她愛人帶著參加婚禮的人來到一個公園。

eng: This park is pretty big; it has a lot of trees and many flowers.
simp: 这个公园不小，有很多树，还有很多花。
trad: 這個公園不小，有很多樹，還有很多花。

eng: The teacher said to everyone: "Our wedding is starting now."
simp: 老师对大家说：“我们的婚礼现在开始。”
trad: 老師對大家說：“我們的婚禮現在開始。”

eng: As everyone knows, today is a very significant day for us.
simp: 大家知道，今天对我们来说是一个很有意义的日子。
trad: 大家知道，今天對我們來說是一個很有意義的日子。

eng: In order to make us and everyone else remember this day, I ask everyone to plant a tree with us.
simp: 为了让我们和大家都记住这个日子，我请大家跟我们一起来种树。
trad: 為了讓我們和大家都記住這個日子，我請大家跟我們一起來種樹。

eng: Everyone listened and was very happy, thinking this wedding was both original and meaningful.
simp: 大家听了，都很高兴，觉得这个婚礼又新颖又有意义。
trad: 大家聽了，都很高興，覺得這個婚禮又新穎又有意義。

eng: About a dozen trees had soon been planted.
simp: 十几棵树很快就种好了。
trad: 十幾棵樹很快就種好了。

eng: Just then, the workers in the park brought over some small playing cards.
simp: 这时候公园里的工人拿来了一些小纸牌。
trad: 這時候公園裏的工人拿來了一些小紙牌。

eng: Underneath we wrote the names of the students in our class.
simp: 下面写上我们班同学的名字。
trad: 下面寫上我們班同學的名字。

eng: I'll come back.
Too much money?
I explained the matter to him.
You would do well to stay here.
We have enough time.
Rome wasn't built in a day.
It was already twelve when he reached home.
simp: 他回家的时候已经十二点了。
trad: 他回家的時候已經十二點了。

eng: When he came and found me, his whole body reeked of alcohol.
simp: 他来找我的时候全身都是酒的味道。
trad: 他來找我的時候全身都是酒的味道。

eng: It's not far from here to there.
Where there is grass, there is no water. Where there is water, there is no grass.
simp: 有草的地方无水，有水的地方无草。
trad: 有草的地方無水，有水的地方無草。

eng: I just got up.
I'm just kidding.
Leave now.
Spiders like to build spiderwebs.
Hello, world!
People like him because he is kind.
simp: 因为他是个友好的人，所以大家都喜欢他。
trad: 因為他是個友好的人，所以大家都喜歡他。

eng: Do as you like.
I don't like this shirt. Show me another.
simp: 这件衬衫我不喜欢。把另外一件给我看一下。
trad: 這件襯衫我不喜歡。把另外一件給我看一下。

eng: Social security? Who do they think they're kidding.
simp: 社会保障吗？他们在说什么笑话？
trad: 社會保障嗎？他們在說什麼笑話？

eng: This book will be printed next year.
I came from China.
Sometimes I go, sometimes I don't.
I don't smoke.
It's the third of October.
Love me, love my dog.
She likes Russian pop.
simp: 她喜欢听俄罗斯流行音乐。
trad: 她喜歡聽俄羅斯流行音樂。

eng: Life is not convex.
“The Satanic Verses” by Salman Rushdie is a real masterpiece of modern literature.
simp: 萨尔曼·鲁西迪的《撒旦诗篇》是现代文学的真正的杰作
trad: 薩爾曼·魯西迪的《撒旦詩篇》是現代文學的真正的傑作

eng: I often have nightmares.
Good morning, everybody.
Thank you very much!
Can I use a credit card?
I am translating.
I love Korean food.
You ought to listen to your mother.
Why are your eyes so big?
simp: 你的眼睛为什么那么大？
trad: 你的眼睛為什麼那麼大？

eng: I want to go to Lviv...
Paper catches fire easily.
Where does John live?
Tell me why she is crying.
Look up the word in your dictionary.
simp: 把这个词在你的词典查一查。
trad: 把這個詞在你的詞典查一查。

eng: I can't understand why James always finds fault with his wife.
simp: 我不懂得詹姆斯为什么一直给他的妻子吹毛求疵。
trad: 我不懂得詹姆斯為什麼一直給他的妻子吹毛求疵。

eng: I was born and raised in Tokyo.
I put quantity after quality.
simp: 对我来说，是质量不如数量。
trad: 對我來說，是質量不如數量。

eng: I didn't get the joke.
There are cats on Mars, too.
Will you go by train?
How long have you lived in Japan?
I took my temperature every six hours.
simp: 我每六小时量一次体温。
trad: 我每六小時量一次體溫。

eng: Do you like snakes? "Of course not."
I have to write a letter. Do you have some paper?
simp: 我需要写一封信。你有纸吗？
trad: 我需要寫一封信。你有紙嗎？

eng: I have a daughter.
I admit that he is right.
I like tea.
I'm married.
I got up early as usual.
simp: 我和往常一样起得很早。
trad: 我和往常一樣起得很早。

eng: I am terribly hungry.
He takes the initiative in helping his mother do the housework.
simp: 他主动帮他妈妈做家务。
trad: 他主動幫他媽媽做家務。

eng: He lost face.
The weather forecast is not reliable at all.
simp: 天气预报一点也不可靠。
trad: 天氣預報一點也不可靠。

eng: I jumped for joy.
Would you like to go see a movie with me?
Tom is the captain of this baseball team.
simp: 汤姆是这队棒球队的队长。
trad: 湯姆是這隊棒球隊的隊長。

eng: On leaving school, we presented him with a table clock as a token of our thanks.
simp: 我们毕业的时候送了一个桌上时钟给他作为谢礼。
trad: 我們畢業的時候送了一個桌上時鐘給他作為謝禮。

eng: I had a bite at around 3 o'clock.
simp: 我三时左右随便吃了点东西。
trad: 我三時左右隨便吃了點東西。

eng: A man whose wife is dead is called a widower.
simp: 死了妻子的人叫做鳏夫。
trad: 死了妻子的人叫做鰥夫。

eng: The money was hidden beneath the floorboards.
simp: 那些钱藏了在地板下面。
trad: 那些錢藏了在地板下面。

eng: I want a cup of iced-tea.
Just a little more.
Which one do you prefer?
Did you bring cash or your (credit) card with you?
simp: 你钱或者信用卡带来没有？
trad: 你錢或者信用卡帶來沒有？

eng: He left me with tons of hard work to do.
simp: 他把那么难做的活儿丢给我。
trad: 他把那麼難做的活兒丟給我。

eng: We often compare Japan with Britain.
simp: 我们常常把英国和日本作比较。
trad: 我們常常把英國和日本作比較。

eng: This morning, I saw an angel.
simp: 我今晨看见了一个天使。
trad: 我今晨看見了一個天使。

eng: Forget it.
In that case, let's go.
Some people are good, some people are bad.
simp: 有的人是好的，有的人是坏的。
trad: 有的人是好的，有的人是壞的。

eng: You should go too!
First we'll eat, and then we'll go.
Clean the dust off the shelf.
simp: 把架子上的灰尘擦一下。
trad: 把架子上的灰塵擦一下。

eng: Hang your clothes out to dry!
Look at these two photographs - which one is better?
simp: 你看这两张照片哪张好？
trad: 你看這兩張照片哪張好？

eng: Spaniards love to stroll around in the evening cool.
simp: 西班牙人最爱在晚上外出散散步、乘乘凉。
trad: 西班牙人最愛在晚上外出散散步、乘乘涼。

eng: You may choose whichever you like.
Is that thing yours?
The doctor is a great authority on children's diseases.
simp: 那位医生是儿童疾病的专家。
trad: 那位醫生是兒童疾病的專家。

eng: It's mine, not his.
Do you know this thing?
Don't you know how?
How can I make a telephone call to Japan?
simp: 请问怎样打电话到日本？
trad: 請問怎樣打電話到日本？

eng: It's just that I admire you.
There's a great view from the rooftop of that building. Want to go see?
simp: 那座大厦天台的景色很美的，想去看看吗？
trad: 那座大廈天臺的景色很美的，想去看看嗎？

eng: However you do it, the result will be the same.
simp: 你无论用甚麽方法，结果都是一样。
trad: 你無論用甚麼方法，結果都是一樣。

eng: Tomorrow, I'm going to study at the library.
Einstein was a mathematical genius.
simp: 爱因斯坦是个数学天才。
trad: 愛因斯坦是個數學天才。

eng: I'm dying of thirst.
He did nothing wrong.
I've been to Hokkaido before.
It isn't easy to write a love letter in English.
simp: 用英文写情信不容易写得好。
trad: 用英文寫情信不容易寫得好。

eng: Those letters are all the wrong way around! "No, it's supposed to be like that, it's Russian."
simp: 「这些字母全都左右倒转了！」「才不是呢，这是俄文，俄文的字母就是这样写的。」
trad: 「這些字母全都左右倒轉了！」「才不是呢，這是俄文，俄文的字母就是這樣寫的。」

eng: Driving too fast is dangerous.
Even now, many years after the Cold War, there is still much rancor between the Russians and the Germans, especially in areas once occupied by the Soviet Union.
simp: 虽然冷战已经过了这麽多年，俄罗斯人和德国人之间的仇恨还是没有消除，在苏联曾经侵佔过的地区，这种仇恨就更深了。
trad: 雖然冷戰已經過了這麼多年，俄羅斯人和德國人之間的仇恨還是沒有消除，在蘇聯曾經侵佔過的地區，這種仇恨就更深了。

eng: I also went.
There's all kinds of people in the world.
If you came, that would be great.
simp: 要是你来得了，那就太好了。
trad: 要是你來得了，那就太好了。

eng: You might not find it.
If you have time, let's go shopping.
simp: 要是你有空的话，我们就去购物吧。
trad: 要是你有空的話，我們就去購物吧。

eng: Concerning this matter... I really don’t know.
simp: 关于这件事。。。我真的不知道。
trad: 關於這件事。。。我真的不知道。

eng: The work over, we went home.
simp: 我们工作完后就回家了。
trad: 我們工作完後就回家了。

eng: Social conditions are going backward rather than forward.
simp: 社会不是在进步，而是在退步。
trad: 社會不是在進步，而是在退步。

eng: The president laughed in spite of himself.
simp: 总统不由自主地笑了起来。
trad: 總統不由自主地笑了起來。

eng: Paul made a lot of money last year.
I bought this book for myself, not for my wife.
simp: 这本书我是买给自己的，不是买给老婆的。
trad: 這本書我是買給自己的，不是買給老婆的。

eng: The writer's furniture is all shown in this museum.
simp: 那位作家用过的傢俱全都存放在这间博物馆里。
trad: 那位作家用過的傢俱全都存放在這間博物館裏。

eng: For years he is at the market every Tuesday morning with his fish stall.
simp: 他在街市卖鱼卖了许多年了，这些年来每逢星期二都会在街市见到他。
trad: 他在街市賣魚賣了許多年了，這些年來每逢星期二都會在街市見到他。

eng: It is necessary for you to help her.
I'm about to leave.
Is this your bicycle?
Baristas need to make a sitcom.
simp: 咖啡师们该创造一个情景喜剧。
trad: 咖啡師們該創造一個情景喜劇。

eng: I bought a Daily News.
I don't want to participate in the ceremony.
Go along this street, and you'll find the movie theater.
simp: 沿着这条大道走，你就会找到电影院了。
trad: 沿著這條大道走，你就會找到電影院了。

eng: I am learning two foreign languages.
She died of stomach cancer.
He studies much harder than before.
simp: 他比以前学得更努力了。
trad: 他比以前學得更努力了。

eng: Nothing is worse than war.
simp: 没有什么比战争更糟的了。
trad: 沒有什麼比戰爭更糟的了。

eng: I asked her to wait a minute.
Would you like to wait?
Money cannot buy happiness.
Let's take a rest.
Alcohol consumption is increasing every year.
simp: 酒的消费每年都在上升。
trad: 酒的消費每年都在上升。

eng: He's curious about everything.
Mary is interested in politics.
My sister is cooking in the kitchen.
Must I clean the room?
We studied English.
This is the dictionary I use every day.
simp: 这是我每天都用的字典。
trad: 這是我每天都用的字典。

eng: Two times two is four.
I finished the work in less than an hour.
simp: 我用不到一小时就完成了这个工作。
trad: 我用不到一小時就完成了這個工作。

eng: I couldn't answer all the questions.
My hair curls easily.
I lost my camera the other day.
simp: 那天我丢了我的照相机。
trad: 那天我丟了我的照相機。

eng: Do Japanese eat a lot of fish?
I will give you a call as soon as I get home.
simp: 我一回到家就打电话给你。
trad: 我一回到家就打電話給你。

eng: I wish I had much money.
Ms. Roland, what do you think about this problem?
simp: Roland女士，你对这个问题怎么看？
trad: Roland女士，你對這個問題怎麼看？

eng: He hates air travel.
I have a lot of homework to do.
You have to wait in line.
For me, this is not a problem.
My brother is an idiot.
While getting off the bus, she heard her name called.
simp: 她一下车，就听到有人叫她的名字。
trad: 她一下車，就聽到有人叫她的名字。

eng: The bus hasn't come yet.
Give me a reason for doing such a thing.
simp: 告诉我你为怎麽要这样做。
trad: 告訴我你為怎麼要這樣做。

eng: I used to keep a diary when I was at high school.
simp: 我上中学的时候有写日记的习惯。
trad: 我上中學的時候有寫日記的習慣。

eng: People say I look about the same age as my sister.
simp: 有人说我和妹妹看起来年纪差不多。
trad: 有人說我和妹妹看起來年紀差不多。

eng: She ignored me even when she met me on the street.
simp: 她在街上看到我也不跟我打招呼。
trad: 她在街上看到我也不跟我打招呼。

eng: Here is a letter for you.
He pretended not to hear his boss.
simp: 他假装听不见老闆和他说话。
trad: 他假裝聽不見老闆和他說話。

eng: All the doctor's efforts were in vain and the man soon died.
simp: 医生虽然已经竭尽全力，但不久病人还是死了。
trad: 醫生雖然已經竭盡全力，但不久病人還是死了。

eng: There are hundreds of books in his study.
I remember that man's name very well.
simp: 他的名字我记得很清楚。
trad: 他的名字我記得很清楚。

eng: Although he may be clever, he is not wise.
simp: 他只不过是有点小聪明。
trad: 他只不過是有點小聰明。

eng: It would be unfair if we treated him so badly.
simp: 我们这样待他，好像不是太好。
trad: 我們這樣待他，好像不是太好。

eng: Who is it? "It's me."
To kill two birds with one stone.
Not only did I eat pilaf, but I also ate kebabs.
simp: 我不但吃了抓饭，而且吃了烤肉串。
trad: 我不但吃了抓飯，而且吃了烤肉串。

eng: What are you doing at school this afternoon?
simp: 你们今天下午在学校做些什么？
trad: 你們今天下午在學校做些什麼？

eng: I bought a pen like yours yesterday.
simp: 我昨天买了一支像你那样的笔。
trad: 我昨天買了一支像你那樣的筆。

eng: I know that he can draw.
simp: 他会画画这件事我知道。
trad: 他會畫畫這件事我知道。

eng: We associate the name of Einstein with the theory of relativity.
simp: 一提到爱因斯坦，我们就会想起相对论。
trad: 一提到愛因斯坦，我們就會想起相對論。

eng: Do you have any further questions?
I've got to see a dentist.
When will you be back?
Cornered prey is the most dangerous kind.
simp: 最危险的猎物是无路可走的那种。
trad: 最危險的獵物是無路可走的那種。

eng: He keeps his word.
I walk in the forest every day.
I bought two bottles of milk.
I'm trying hard, but can't think of her name.
simp: 我怎麽想也想不起她的名字。
trad: 我怎麼想也想不起她的名字。

eng: How are you getting along with your English study?
I tried to open the door, and the doorknob came off.
simp: 我开门的时候把门柄扭了出来。
trad: 我開門的時候把門柄扭了出來。

eng: Los Angeles is one of the places that I'd like to visit.
simp: 洛杉矶是我想去的其中一个地方。
trad: 洛杉磯是我想去的其中一個地方。

eng: Look at the blackboard, everyone.
I'll talk the matter over with my father.
simp: 我会和父亲谈谈这件事的。
trad: 我會和父親談談這件事的。

eng: Is there a gas station around here?
simp: 这里附近有没有加油站？
trad: 這裏附近有沒有加油站？

eng: It is often said that nothing is more precious than time.
simp: 人们常说没有甚麽比时间更重要。
trad: 人們常說沒有甚麼比時間更重要。

eng: I will never sell my friend down the river for anything in the world.
simp: 无论发生甚麽事，我也绝对不会出卖我的朋友。
trad: 無論發生甚麼事，我也絕對不會出賣我的朋友。

eng: People used to think that only humans could use language.
simp: 以前人们以为只有人类才懂得用语言沟通。
trad: 以前人們以為只有人類才懂得用語言溝通。

eng: The turkeys in my grandfather's farm are very noisy, I can't wait for them to get eaten.
simp: 我爷爷农场养的火鸡吵得要命，真想牠们快点被人吃掉。
trad: 我爺爺農場養的火雞吵得要命，真想牠們快點被人吃掉。

eng: December is the last month of the year.
simp: 十二月是一年的最后一个月。
trad: 十二月是一年的最後一個月。

eng: I can't take it anymore! I haven't slept for three days!
simp: 我已经三天没睡觉了，真是睏死了！
trad: 我已經三天沒睡覺了，真是睏死了！

eng: It's the same to me.
This dictionary is very expensive, but is worth buying.
simp: 这本字典虽然很贵，但还是值得买的。
trad: 這本字典雖然很貴，但還是值得買的。

eng: I hear you have been sick.
Have love for your classmates! Have love for your parents! Have love for your country!
simp: 爱你们的同学！爱你们的父母！爱你们的国家！
trad: 愛你們的同學！愛你們的父母！愛你們的國家！

eng: If you don't watch out, you'll soon fall in the water.
simp: 如果你走路不看路，等一下你就会掉到水裡面。
trad: 如果你走路不看路，等一下你就會掉到水裡面。

eng: How's life?
Please eat something.
I saw it with my own eyes.
Are you free tonight?
What a pity!
That's a real person.
He got a better score than us.
simp: 他得到了比我们还高的分数。
trad: 他得到了比我們還高的分數。

eng: Jim hasn't come yet.
The wind sounds scary, like screaming ghosts.
simp: 风声有点恐怖，听起来好像鬼叫一般。
trad: 風聲有點恐怖，聽起來好像鬼叫一般。

eng: I like to eat watermelon.
In our time, there were many students who passed the graduation exam without studying.
simp: 我那个年代的学生大多不读书，但考试却不会不合格。
trad: 我那個年代的學生大多不讀書，但考試卻不會不合格。

eng: Life is often compared to a journey.
simp: 我们常常把人生比作一场旅程。
trad: 我們常常把人生比作一場旅程。

eng: The students receive a 15,000 euro scholarship for their return trip and daily expenses.
simp: 学生们每人有一万五千欧罗的奖学金，用来支付回程机票和其他日常的费用。
trad: 學生們每人有一萬五千歐羅的獎學金，用來支付回程機票和其他日常的費用。

eng: You can't prove that.
I'm only reading the scraps on news on the Internet, but, well, I get the general picture.
simp: 虽然我只是在网上看了几则新闻，但也大概知道了整件事的来龙去脉。
trad: 雖然我只是在網上看了幾則新聞，但也大概知道了整件事的來龍去脈。

eng: The sign '&' stands for 'and'.
The door opened and a man came out.
simp: 有个男人开门走了出来。
trad: 有個男人開門走了出來。

eng: Beyond this I know nothing.
Gorillas cannot use their lips and tongues to speak, but they can communicate with people in other ways.
simp: 虽然猩猩不懂得开口说话，但牠们能用其他方式和人类沟通。
trad: 雖然猩猩不懂得開口說話，但牠們能用其他方式和人類溝通。

eng: All the answers to this question were wrong.
simp: 这条问题的答桉全是错的。
trad: 這條問題的答案全是錯的。

eng: Did anyone come in my absence?
simp: 我不在的时候有没有人来？
trad: 我不在的時候有沒有人來？

eng: Whatever you said to him made him feel better.
simp: 你对他说的话让他感觉好多了。
trad: 你對他說的話讓他感覺好多了。

eng: You may as well return home at once.
I got up early in order to catch the first train.
simp: 我为了乘头班火车，一大早就起了床。
trad: 我為了乘頭班火車，一大早就起了床。

eng: I haven't had time to do the dishes for two days; they are in a pile in the kitchen sink.
simp: 这两天我没时间洗碗，现在厨房已经堆满了碗碗碟碟。
trad: 這兩天我沒時間洗碗，現在廚房已經堆滿了碗碗碟碟。

eng: I was watching TV then.
It's ten o'clock sharp.
Thomas Edison invented the light bulb.
He may be clever, but he is not very helpful.
simp: 他很聪明，但却不太帮得上忙。
trad: 他很聰明，但卻不太幫得上忙。

eng: I don't understand this word.
I'm dying to see Paris.
simp: 我真的好想去巴黎看看。
trad: 我真的好想去巴黎看看。

eng: The things in this village are cheaper than those in ours.
simp: 这条村的东西比我们村的便宜多了。
trad: 這條村的東西比我們村的便宜多了。

eng: No matter how he tried, he could not open the door.
simp: 他用尽九牛二虎之力也开不了那道门。
trad: 他用盡九牛二虎之力也開不了那道門。

eng: How come you call on us so late at night?
simp: 你怎麽这麽晚才来看我们？
trad: 你怎麼這麼晚才來看我們？

eng: This machine is easy to handle.
Did you read the whole book?
I don't like men like him.
I'll have exams right after the summer holidays.
simp: 我放完暑假马上就要考试了。
trad: 我放完暑假馬上就要考試了。

eng: I hear that his father is in another country.
Everybody knows that.
A good neighbour is better than a brother far off.
She's loved by her friends.
Our school has ten classes.
I'm working for a trading firm.
simp: 我在一间贸易公司工作。
trad: 我在一間貿易公司工作。

eng: That cost him his job.
Can I borrow your radio?
simp: 可以借你的收音机给我吗？
trad: 可以借你的收音機給我嗎？

eng: The boy fell off the bed.
Don't run here.
Do you know how to use this camera?
If I had known about your illness, I could have visited you in the hospital.
simp: 如果我知道你病了，怎麽也会赶来看你的。
trad: 如果我知道你病了，怎麼也會趕來看你的。

eng: There's only one bath towel in our bathroom.
simp: 我们的浴室只有一条浴巾。
trad: 我們的浴室只有一條浴巾。

eng: Whatever results may follow, I will carry out my plan.
simp: 无论结果会是怎样，我也不会改变我的计划。
trad: 無論結果會是怎樣，我也不會改變我的計劃。

eng: I wonder if I should answer his letter.
How long does it take to walk from here to the station?
simp: 从这里步行到车站要多少时间？
trad: 從這裏步行到車站要多少時間？

eng: Do as I told you to do.
simp: 我叫你怎麽做，你就怎麽做。
trad: 我叫你怎麼做，你就怎麼做。

eng: She loves watching tennis matches on TV.
simp: 她很喜欢在电视上看网球比赛。
trad: 她很喜歡在電視上看網球比賽。

eng: Have you ever been to a foreign country?
You don't need to worry about it.
I don't know yet.
Did you have a nice Christmas?
The color of her dress and that of her shoes go well together.
simp: 她裙子和鞋子的颜色很配。
trad: 她裙子和鞋子的顏色很配。

eng: I looked up the words in my dictionary.
simp: 我用我的字典查了那几个字。
trad: 我用我的字典查了那幾個字。

eng: Call me at four; I must take the first train.
simp: 麻烦你在四时叫我起床。我一定要乘到头班火车。
trad: 麻煩你在四時叫我起床。我一定要乘到頭班火車。

eng: He is not the cheerful man he was.
simp: 他已经不再是以前那个快乐的男孩了。
trad: 他已經不再是以前那個快樂的男孩了。

eng: The time will come when you will be sorry for it.
She is particular about what she wears.
He is sure to pass the exam if he studies at this rate.
simp: 他保持现在这种速度温习的话，考试合格绝对没问题。
trad: 他保持現在這種速度溫習的話，考試合格絕對沒問題。

eng: China is much larger than Japan.
She didn't marry him of her own will.
I had just written the letter when he came back.
simp: 他回来的时候，我刚好写完了信。
trad: 他回來的時候，我剛好寫完了信。

eng: He has not come yet. Something may have happened to him.
simp: 他还没有来，不知道是不是发生了甚麽意外？
trad: 他還沒有來，不知道是不是發生了甚麼意外？

eng: But your function isn't Lipschitz continuous!
simp: 可是你的函数不符合利普希茨条件！
trad: 可是你的函數不符合利普希茨條件！

eng: This is the doctor whom I spoke of last night.
simp: 他就是我昨晚提过的那位医生。
trad: 他就是我昨晚提過的那位醫生。

eng: That painting is a masterpiece of impressionist art.
simp: 那幅画是印象派的大师级作品。
trad: 那幅畫是印象派的大師級作品。

eng: What happened on the bus?
simp: 公共汽车上发生了什么事？
trad: 公共汽車上發生了什麼事？

eng: What did you do then?
The tropical rainforests, located in a narrow region near the equator, are disappearing so fast that by the year 2000 eighty percent of them may be gone.
simp: 位处赤道附近一个狭窄区域的热带雨林，正在不断地遭受人类的破坏，预计在二零零零年之前，该区域将会有五分之四的热带雨林从地球上消失。
trad: 位處赤道附近一個狹窄區域的熱帶雨林，正在不斷地遭受人類的破壞，預計在二零零零年之前，該區域將會有五分之四的熱帶雨林從地球上消失。

eng: I was mistaken in thinking that he was a trustworthy man.
simp: 我还以为他是个信得过的人。
trad: 我還以為他是個信得過的人。

eng: Cross off the names of the people who have paid their dues.
simp: 麻烦你把付了钱的人的名字删掉。
trad: 麻煩你把付了錢的人的名字刪掉。

eng: In a dictionary like this one there should be at least two sentences with "fridge".
simp: 这样的字典最少也应该有两句「冰箱」的例句吧。
trad: 這樣的字典最少也應該有兩句「冰箱」的例句吧。

eng: I was really moved by this.
Could you call again later, please?
simp: 你可以晚点再打电话来吗？
trad: 你可以晚點再打電話來嗎？

eng: There is a book on the table.
Where do I get an airport bus?
simp: 到机场去的汽车在哪里可上？
trad: 到機場去的汽車在哪裏可上？

eng: She may be cute, but I don't like her.
simp: 她倒很可爱，但我不喜欢她。
trad: 她倒很可愛，但我不喜歡她。

eng: I already have an envelope.
It is important for him to get the job.
simp: 那份工作对他来说很重要。
trad: 那份工作對他來說很重要。

eng: He boasted of having won the first prize.
simp: 他赢了冠军就自吹自擂了起来。
trad: 他贏了冠軍就自吹自擂了起來。

eng: How much did you pay for the dress?
simp: 那条裙子你买了多少钱？
trad: 那條裙子你買了多少錢？

eng: I'll certainly go and see him.
I'm so tired that I can't walk any longer.
Your help is indispensable for the success of the scheme.
simp: 没有你帮忙，计划就不能成功了。
trad: 沒有你幫忙，計劃就不能成功了。

eng: If you go to that supermarket, you can buy most things you use in your daily life.
simp: 你去那个超级市场，几乎甚麽日用品都买得到。
trad: 你去那個超級市場，幾乎甚麼日用品都買得到。

eng: Would you please not leave the door open?
Christmas is just two weeks from now.
simp: 还有两个星期就到圣诞节了。
trad: 還有兩個星期就到聖誕節了。

eng: How much is the monthly fee of this swimming school?
simp: 这间游泳学校每个月的学费是多少？
trad: 這間遊泳學校每個月的學費是多少？

eng: What time do you usually get up?
After all, even the gods may err at times.
simp: 终究天神偶尔也会出差错。
trad: 終究天神偶爾也會出差錯。

eng: Can I be of any service to you?
Can I be of any service to you?
They not only washed off the sweat, dirt and cares of the day in the hot water, but also enjoyed gossiping about everyday affairs.
simp: 他们不只是洗去汗水、污垢和镇日的操劳，同时也沉浸在閒话家常日常生活当中。
trad: 他們不只是洗去汗水、汙垢和鎮日的操勞，同時也沈浸在閒話家常日常生活當中。

eng: People are most angry when they feel they are being mocked. That's why those who are confident in themselves seldom become angry.
simp: 人们在备感嘲讽时最生气。这也是为何对自己感到自信的人们不容易生气。
trad: 人們在備感嘲諷時最生氣。這也是為何對自己感到自信的人們不容易生氣。

eng: Almaty means "The Father of Apples" in many Turkic languages.
simp: 在许多突厥语族的语言中，“阿拉木图”有“苹果之父”的意思。
trad: 在許多突厥語族的語言中，“阿拉木圖”有“蘋果之父”的意思。

eng: No one is working. Everyone's watching the World Cup.
simp: 谁也不工作。大家在看世界杯。
trad: 誰也不工作。大家在看世界杯。

eng: They are both in the room.
Fill out this form, please.
Yeah. I think so, too.
Man will die sooner or later.
This amount includes tax.
There's no doubt.
Nobody knows when the earthquake will occur.
simp: 没有人知道地震何时会来。
trad: 沒有人知道地震何時會來。

eng: Please keep this a secret.
Can I borrow your car?
You look stupid.
South Africa is far away.
Self-help is the best help.
simp: 自助是最好的一种帮助。
trad: 自助是最好的一種幫助。

eng: I am glad that you have succeeded.
Thank you very much for your present.
My dream is to become a pilot.
simp: 我的梦想是成为一名飞行员。
trad: 我的夢想是成為一名飛行員。

eng: I am beginning to remember it.
He has a brother and two sisters.
simp: 他有一个兄弟和两个姐妹。
trad: 他有一個兄弟和兩個姐妹。

eng: I remember writing to her.
Close your eyes.
Why aren't you going? "Because I don't want to."
How many pens do you have?
I made a doll for Ann.
I didn't know he drank so much.
simp: 我不知道他喝那么多酒。
trad: 我不知道他喝那麼多酒。

eng: It's a waste of time.
Would you like another cup of tea?
Don't throw away this magazine. I haven't read it yet.
simp: 这本杂志不要扔。我还没看呢。
trad: 這本雜誌不要扔。我還沒看呢。

eng: I go to school by bus.
He committed suicide.
He comes here almost every day.
Everybody wants to sit beside her.
What do you say to taking a walk in the park?
simp: 去公园散步你觉得怎么样？
trad: 去公園散步你覺得怎麼樣？

eng: What a pain!
Ghulja has very many kinds of apples.
simp: 伊宁的苹果种类非常多。
trad: 伊寧的蘋果種類非常多。

eng: Oh boy...
I'm going there alone.
I'm outta here.
I came, didn't I?
Don't make trouble.
Who doesn't love a rebel?
I'm free now.
A wise man would not say such a thing.
simp: 一个聪明人不会说这种话。
trad: 一個聰明人不會說這種話。

eng: She slowly lost hope.
We're going to eat a lot tonight so I hope you're not on a diet.
simp: 我们今晚会吃很多，所以我希望你没有在节食。
trad: 我們今晚會吃很多，所以我希望你沒有在節食。

eng: I think he'll come.
The conference will end tomorrow.
That man who is looking at you, do you know him?
simp: 那个看着你的男人，你认识吗 ?
trad: 那個看著你的男人，你認識嗎 ?

eng: I simply don't understand this.
Russia is facing great financial difficulties.
simp: 俄罗斯面临着严重的财政困难。
trad: 俄羅斯面臨著嚴重的財政困難。

eng: She hung the picture upside down.
She went to Mexico by herself.
simp: 她独自一人去了墨西哥。
trad: 她獨自一人去了墨西哥。

eng: You’ll use the computer for studying, and not for playing games.
simp: 你们会用电脑是为了学习，不是为了玩游戏。
trad: 你們會用電腦是為了學習，不是為了玩遊戲。

eng: Don't mind me.
This lake is the deepest in Japan.
Since you're going to the supermarket, buy some eggs while you're there.
simp: 既然你要去超市，那就顺便买些鸡蛋吧。
trad: 既然你要去超市，那就順便買些雞蛋吧。

eng: Are you at home?
Are you interested in music?
The more you eat Kuqa's apricots, the more of them you'll want to eat.
simp: 库车的杏子你越吃越想吃。
trad: 庫車的杏子你越吃越想吃。

eng: The figs of Atush are sweet and juicy.
simp: 阿图什的无花果是甜蜜多汁的。
trad: 阿圖什的無花果是甜蜜多汁的。

eng: He is two inches taller than I am.
I turned right.
My mother often said that time is money.
simp: 母亲常说时间就是金钱。
trad: 母親常說時間就是金錢。

eng: Nothing is so tasty as the dish you make.
simp: 没有甚麽比你做的菜更好吃了。
trad: 沒有甚麼比你做的菜更好吃了。

eng: There is a fly on the ceiling.
He is regretting his action.
simp: 他对他的行为感到后悔。
trad: 他對他的行為感到後悔。

eng: His memory amazes me.
I'm very happy to see you.
He will be a good doctor.
simp: 他会成为一个好的医生的。
trad: 他會成為一個好的醫生的。

eng: Soccer is my favorite sport.
simp: 足球是我最喜欢的运动。
trad: 足球是我最喜歡的運動。

eng: How's the weather there?
Do you smoke?
He has never played golf.
It is up to you to decide whether we will go there or not.
simp: 我们去不去那儿由你来决定。
trad: 我們去不去那兒由你來決定。

eng: He carried on working from morning till night.
Well, even so my score is far above yours isn't it? "What did you say!? If I was to go all out you'd be as nothing to me!"
simp: 「哼，就算是这样，我的分数还是比你高得多呀！」「你说甚麽？！如果我用尽全力，你还会是我的对手吗？」
trad: 「哼，就算是這樣，我的分數還是比你高得多呀！」「你說甚麼？！如果我用盡全力，你還會是我的對手嗎？」

eng: In case anything happens, call me immediately.
simp: 如果发生了甚麽事，马上打电话给我。
trad: 如果發生了甚麼事，馬上打電話給我。

eng: In looking through the mist, I caught a glimpse of my future.
simp: 透过薄雾，我隐约看见了我的未来。
trad: 透過薄霧，我隱約看見了我的未來。

eng: When a friend comes from afar, is that not delightful?
simp: 有朋自远方来，不亦乐乎？
trad: 有朋自遠方來，不亦樂乎？

eng: Could you please tell me how to get to the station?
Do they sell notebooks at that store?
He does not smoke.
You should learn to restrain yourself.
simp: 你应该学习控制自己的情绪。
trad: 你應該學習控制自己的情緒。

eng: I can put up with a house being untidy, but I don't like it to be dirty.
simp: 房子乱七八糟也没问题，但是肮髒的话我接受不了。
trad: 房子亂七八糟也沒問題，但是骯髒的話我接受不了。

eng: Hmm. I have a feeling I'm going to get lost whichever road I take.
simp: 唔。我有预感我走哪边都会迷路。
trad: 唔。我有預感我走哪邊都會迷路。

eng: I got terrible grades this term.
simp: 我这个学期的成绩很差。
trad: 我這個學期的成績很差。

eng: We're going up into the mountains, so why don't you come with us?
simp: 我们打算去登山，你也去吗？
trad: 我們打算去登山，你也去嗎？

eng: I have no excuse.
The baby is sleeping.
He doesn't know how to swim.
Can you tell me where the nearest bus stop is?
simp: 你能把最近的公车站指给我看吗?
trad: 你能把最近的公車站指給我看嗎?

eng: He has only read 10 pages so far, I've already read 60.
simp: 在他只看了10页的时候，我已经看了60页了。
trad: 在他只看了10頁的時候，我已經看了60頁了。

eng: Don't pry into my private life.
I'm never at home on Sundays.
It's already nine o'clock.
We often hear you sing.
Let’s go now. Otherwise, we’ll be late.
simp: 咱们现在走吧。要不咱们要迟到了。
trad: 咱們現在走吧。要不咱們要遲到了。

eng: If you won ten million dollars in a lottery, what would you do with that money?
simp: 如果你彩票中一千万美金的话，你会用那点钱干什么？
trad: 如果你彩票中一千萬美金的話，你會用那點錢幹什麼？

eng: And then?
What else?
You must leave.
I want to submerge myself in the ocean depths, and to disappear there so as to never be seen again.
simp: 我想沉到海里去，在这个世界上消失，这样就不会再有人看见我了。
trad: 我想沈到海裏去，在這個世界上消失，這樣就不會再有人看見我了。

eng: Lucy is certain to come.
Father, What were you just doing?
Give us two knives and four forks, please.
simp: 请给我们两把刀和四把叉。
trad: 請給我們兩把刀和四把叉。

eng: I do not have a cat.
What a beautiful flower!
I like my job very much.
You like elephants.
He has been sick for a week.
Two beers, please.
My house is a long way from here.
We're friends from way back.
Pass me the salt, please.
If you can sing, that's good enough.
According to the weather report, the rainy season will start next week.
simp: 根据天气预报，雨季下周会开始。
trad: 根據天氣預報，雨季下周會開始。

eng: She's almost the same height as you.
This work is not necessarily easy.
The situation in Kyrgyzstan is a real mess.
simp: 吉尔吉斯斯坦的情况十分溷乱。
trad: 吉爾吉斯斯坦的情況十分混亂。

eng: It is time for you to go to bed.
simp: 到了你该去睡觉的时候了。
trad: 到了你該去睡覺的時候了。

eng: She wrote a lot of poems.
In real combat, you must not forget that hesitation is a very dangerous thing.
simp: 在实战中，你要知道三心二意是很危险的。
trad: 在實戰中，你要知道三心二意是很危險的。

eng: We need to help Kyrgyzstan, said Putin to Hu Jintao... in my dream.
simp: 普京对胡锦涛说：“咱们必须帮吉尔吉斯斯坦”……不过那只是在我梦里的情形。
trad: 普京對胡錦濤說：“咱們必須幫吉爾吉斯斯坦”……不過那只是在我夢裏的情形。

eng: My wife is a native of Ürümqi.
simp: 我的妻子是乌鲁木齐人。
trad: 我的妻子是烏魯木齊人。

eng: We have two kids.
I'm the only one who doesn't know Uyghur.
Nobody knows the truth.
He left the house without so much as saying good-bye.
simp: 他甚至没说再见就离开了家。
trad: 他甚至沒說再見就離開了家。

eng: Black suits you.
Why is he here?
Please write with a pen.
I'm tired of living this kind of life.
She asked how to cook the fish.
I had no choice but to stay in bed all day.
simp: 我不得不一整天都待在床上。
trad: 我不得不一整天都待在床上。

eng: I agree with him.
All you can do is to wait.
simp: 所有你能做的就是等待。
trad: 所有你能做的就是等待。

eng: I miss her so much.
Where are they going to right now?
I have to write a letter. Do you have some paper?
simp: 我要写一封信。你有纸吗？
trad: 我要寫一封信。你有紙嗎？

eng: My wife is cooking right now.
Strictly speaking, the tomato is not a vegetable. It's a fruit.
simp: 严格来说，蕃茄不是蔬菜，是水果。
trad: 嚴格來說，蕃茄不是蔬菜，是水果。

eng: I made friends with a student from abroad.
simp: 我和一个外国的学生做了好朋友。
trad: 我和一個外國的學生做了好朋友。

eng: He worked day and night so that he might become rich.
simp: 他想成为有钱人，所以便从早到晚不断地工作。
trad: 他想成為有錢人，所以便從早到晚不斷地工作。

eng: I'd better drive you home.
simp: 我还是开车送你回家吧。
trad: 我還是開車送你回家吧。

eng: As soon as she read the letter, she began to cry.
simp: 她一开始读那封信就哭了起来。
trad: 她一開始讀那封信就哭了起來。

eng: To him, hunger was an abstract concept; he always had enough to eat.
simp: 对他来说，「肚子饿」是个抽象的概念，因为他从来就没有饿过。
trad: 對他來說，「肚子餓」是個抽象的概念，因為他從來就沒有餓過。

eng: I'll make you happy.
He is a member of the tennis club in our school.
simp: 他是学校网球俱乐部的成员。
trad: 他是學校網球俱樂部的成員。

eng: She may be a nurse. I am not sure.
simp: 她可能是护士。我不太肯定。
trad: 她可能是護士。我不太肯定。

eng: How did you get to know him?
A boy is walking across the street.
Our school is very close to the park.
simp: 我们学校离公园非常近。
trad: 我們學校離公園非常近。

eng: Does he go to school on foot or by bicycle?
simp: 他走路去学校还是骑车去学校？
trad: 他走路去學校還是騎車去學校？

eng: He is washing his car.
Even superheroes need an occasional break.
simp: 连超级英雄们偶尔也该休息一下。
trad: 連超級英雄們偶爾也該休息一下。

eng: They didn't swim because it was cold.
simp: 他们之所以没有游泳，就因为天气很冷。
trad: 他們之所以沒有遊泳，就因為天氣很冷。

eng: Is anybody home?
Wood floats in water.
I could not afford to buy a bicycle.
He knows how to swim.
I don't know when he came back from France.
simp: 我不知道他是什么时候从法国回来的。
trad: 我不知道他是什麼時候從法國回來的。

eng: As a whole, the plan seems to be good.
simp: 从整体看，计划似乎很好。
trad: 從整體看，計劃似乎很好。

eng: Haven't we met before?
This word does not translate well.
There are a few shops next to my house.
Does she work in this city?
He shaved his mustache off.
How long do you plan on staying here?
She's very beautiful.
He is very influential in the world of medicine.
simp: 他在医学界有很大的影响力。
trad: 他在醫學界有很大的影響力。

eng: He answered his parents back.
Stones don't swim.
We’ll buy one car for each.
simp: 我们要为每个人买一辆车。
trad: 我們要為每個人買一輛車。

eng: Do you have something that you want to say to me?
One of the students didn’t come today.
simp: 学生们其中的一个今天没来。
trad: 學生們其中的一個今天沒來。

eng: Please say ‘yes’!
What's the date today?
God willing...
Misfortunes never come singly.
Afrikaners are the people originated in South Africa.
simp: 阿非利康族是源在南非形成的民族。
trad: 阿非利康族是源在南非形成的民族。

eng: Everybody gets a second chance.
simp: 每个人都有第二次机会
trad: 每個人都有第二次機會

eng: Constant effort yields sure success.
The chance is gone.
I miss you.
Hurry up.
You can take whatever you like.
Hello, who is this?
Relying on strength alone cannot guarantee victory.
simp: 单凭力量不能保证取胜。
trad: 單憑力量不能保證取勝。

eng: This is not true.
I don't like your girlfriend.
It is Sunday tomorrow.
Good luck on the exam!
I am the best.
I don't get it.
It is raining.
I am very busy these days.
Do you want to know my secret? It's very simple...
simp: 你想不想知道我的秘密？它很简单……
trad: 你想不想知道我的秘密？它很簡單……

eng: Do you want to know my secret? It's very simple...
simp: 您想不想知道我的秘密？它很简单……
trad: 您想不想知道我的秘密？它很簡單……

eng: Do you want to know my secret? It's very simple...
simp: 你们想不想知道我的秘密？它很简单……
trad: 你們想不想知道我的秘密？它很簡單……

eng: He is able to speak ten languages.
She is more of an acquaintance than a friend.
simp: 与其说她是我的朋友，不如说她只是一个我认识的人。
trad: 與其說她是我的朋友，不如說她只是一個我認識的人。

eng: A great warrior radiates strength. He doesn't have to fight to the death.
simp: 一名伟大的战士放射出力量。他不用死战。
trad: 一名偉大的戰士放射出力量。他不用死戰。

eng: It’s a quarter past eight.
All three of us are students.
Maybe, maybe not...
Do you have any drinks?
The substance is light enough to float on the water.
simp: 这种物质很轻，可以浮在水面上。
trad: 這種物質很輕，可以浮在水面上。

eng: The student became very nervous with the teacher watching him.
simp: 那个学生被老师盯着看，觉得浑身不自在。
trad: 那個學生被老師盯著看，覺得渾身不自在。

eng: Leaves lay thick in the lane.
What is on Channel 10?
He went up the steps slowly.
simp: 他一步一步地拾级而上。
trad: 他一步一步地拾級而上。

eng: While swimming in the pool, she lost her locker key.
simp: 她在游泳池游泳的时候把储物柜的钥匙弄丢了。
trad: 她在遊泳池遊泳的時候把儲物櫃的鑰匙弄丟了。

eng: Each country has its own customs.
simp: 不同的国家有不同的习俗。
trad: 不同的國家有不同的習俗。

eng: I went to Kobe by train.
You mustn't tell that to your parents.
simp: 你千万不要和你父母说这件事。
trad: 你千萬不要和你父母說這件事。

eng: Many words are acquired through reading.
simp: 读书可以学会很多生字。
trad: 讀書可以學會很多生字。

eng: I don't like coffee.
I haven't had a chance to see the movie yet.
simp: 我还没有机会看那部电影。
trad: 我還沒有機會看那部電影。

eng: I am hungry because I did not eat breakfast.
simp: 我没吃早餐，所以肚子很饿。
trad: 我沒吃早餐，所以肚子很餓。

eng: Who was it that read my diary while I was out?
simp: 是谁趁我不在的时候看我的日记？
trad: 是誰趁我不在的時候看我的日記？

eng: His picture was in the newspaper.
We discussed the problem.
Come on, we'll be late if you don't hurry up.
simp: 快点快点，你还慢吞吞的话我们就要迟到了。
trad: 快點快點，你還慢吞吞的話我們就要遲到了。

eng: I don't care for smoking; it's bad for the health.
simp: 我不喜欢吸烟，因为吸烟对身体不好。
trad: 我不喜歡吸煙，因為吸煙對身體不好。

eng: Bob's father teaches at a girls' school.
simp: 鲍勃的父亲在女校教书。
trad: 鮑勃的父親在女校教書。

eng: The man cheated the old woman out of her money.
He is one of the candidates running for mayor.
simp: 他是其中一个市长的候选人。
trad: 他是其中一個市長的候選人。

eng: I couldn't do otherwise.
This store is closed at nine.
He'll be done soon.
A little nap and, just like that, I'm as fresh as a daisy.
simp: 我小睡后就感到生龙活虎。
trad: 我小睡後就感到生龍活虎。

eng: As he had no way of making fire, he ate the fish raw.
simp: 他没有办法生火，便只好把鱼活生生的吃掉。
trad: 他沒有辦法生火，便只好把魚活生生的吃掉。

eng: I study abroad.
He is wearing gloves.
He must be about forty.
The function of the brake is to stop the car.
simp: 刹车的功能是使车停下。
trad: 剎車的功能是使車停下。

eng: I went to a park this morning.
Can his story be true?
simp: 他的故事可能是真的吗?
trad: 他的故事可能是真的嗎?

eng: He was elected president.
Dark clouds are a sign of rain.
A little nap and, just like that, I'm as fresh as a daisy.
simp: 我小睡后就感到精力充沛。
trad: 我小睡後就感到精力充沛。

eng: You've been had.
Who looks after the children?
The other team took us lightly.
simp: 那另外一队轻视了我们。
trad: 那另外一隊輕視了我們。

eng: If you can use gravity to your advantage, do so.
simp: 你如果能利用重力，那就这么做吧。
trad: 你如果能利用重力，那就這麼做吧。

eng: Either you go, or I go.
In case I can’t come, I’ll give you a call beforehand.
simp: 万一来不了，我会先给你打电话。
trad: 萬一來不了，我會先給你打電話。

eng: Oh right, I have something tomorrow.
I had a good dream last night.
Had I known about it, I would have told you.
simp: 如果我知道的话，我早就已经告诉你了。
trad: 如果我知道的話，我早就已經告訴你了。

eng: Can I eat this?
Do you drink alcohol?
I had my wallet stolen.
The early bird catches the worm.
Who taught you how to dance?
In the kitchen.
Call me at six tomorrow morning.
simp: 明天早上6点给我打电话。
trad: 明天早上6點給我打電話。

eng: I had two cars.
He came in person.
They have twelve children.
I bought it for about twelve dollars.
When we are very sad, we will cry.
simp: 我们非常难过的时候就会哭。
trad: 我們非常難過的時候就會哭。

eng: I have never been to the States.
He borrowed one hundred bucks from me.
The pigeons of Boston are fat and proud.
simp: 波士顿的鸽子又胖又自豪。
trad: 波士頓的鴿子又胖又自豪。

eng: She has very few close friends.
The weak are food for the strong.
These shoes are too small.
Are you married?
This is my father's.
Radishes might be more expensive than the carrots.
simp: 白萝卜可能比红萝卜贵。
trad: 白蘿蔔可能比紅蘿蔔貴。

eng: She depends on her husband for everything.
Divide this line into twenty equal parts.
simp: 把这条线分成二十个等分。
trad: 把這條線分成二十個等分。

eng: The Amazon is the second longest river in the world after the Nile.
simp: 亚马逊河的长度仅次于尼罗河，是世界第二长的河。
trad: 亞馬遜河的長度僅次於尼羅河，是世界第二長的河。

eng: If we don't hit the road soon, we'll get caught in the morning rush hour traffic.
simp: 快要到早上的繁忙时段了，我们还不出发就要堵车了。
trad: 快要到早上的繁忙時段了，我們還不出發就要堵車了。

eng: I bought this T-shirt on sale.
simp: 我买了这件减价的汗衫。
trad: 我買了這件減價的汗衫。

eng: It's very easy to drink potato shochu now that the potato-like smell has been reduced to a low level through use of the latest biotechnology.
simp: 透过现今的生物科技，蕃薯烧酒已经变得十分容易入口了，因为那种难闻的蕃薯味道大部分已经被去除了。
trad: 透過現今的生物科技，蕃薯燒酒已經變得十分容易入口了，因為那種難聞的蕃薯味道大部分已經被去除了。

eng: What is the language spoken in Brazil?
It was hot yesterday.
He became famous.
Bob is my friend.
I was born in Kyoto.
You have changed so much that I can hardly recognize you.
simp: 你变了那么多，以至于我几乎认不出你了。
trad: 你變了那麼多，以至於我幾乎認不出你了。

eng: He asked me questions similar to those asked by many others.
simp: 他和许多其他人一样问了我同样的问题。
trad: 他和許多其他人一樣問了我同樣的問題。

eng: He seldom writes to his father.
We are both to blame.
simp: 不只是你，就连我也该受责难。
trad: 不只是你，就連我也該受責難。

eng: How about some chocolate cheese?
simp: 想吃一点巧克力奶酪吗？
trad: 想吃一點巧克力奶酪嗎？

eng: One side of a coin is called 'heads' and the other side is called 'tails'.
simp: 硬币的一面叫做"公"，另一面叫做"字"。
trad: 硬幣的一面叫做"公"，另一面叫做"字"。

eng: I have a dog.
Next time, he said.
I like short hair.
I've already eaten breakfast.
Playing cards is very interesting.
Silence gives consent.
I run every day.
Everybody agrees with you.
This chair is very comfortable.
I've a yen for adventures.
Better late than never.
Would you please shut the window?
There are many hotels downtown.
Winter is my favorite season.
simp: 冬天是我最喜欢的季节。
trad: 冬天是我最喜歡的季節。

eng: Don't scatter your things about.
simp: 不要把你的东西四处乱放。
trad: 不要把你的東西四處亂放。

eng: I had a good dinner at his expense.
simp: 他请我吃了顿美味的晚饭。
trad: 他請我吃了頓美味的晚飯。

eng: The number of muffins that you'll receive will be inversely proportional to the number of times you talk on IRC.
simp: 你能得到松饼数量将和你去IRC聊天的次数成反比。
trad: 你能得到松餅數量將和你去IRC聊天的次數成反比。

eng: What's radical today may be cliché tomorrow.
simp: 今天的激进也许是明天的老生常谈。
trad: 今天的激進也許是明天的老生常談。

eng: Please have a seat.
What time is it? "It is ten-thirty."
The economy of the island is dependent on the fishing industry.
simp: 这个岛的经济依靠的是渔业。
trad: 這個島的經濟依靠的是漁業。

eng: I saw him sawing a tree.
simp: 我看见他正在锯一棵树。
trad: 我看見他正在鋸一棵樹。

eng: That toy is made of wood.
Tennis is very popular among students.
simp: 网球在学生中非常流行。
trad: 網球在學生中非常流行。

eng: Could you sign here?
Who is the man sitting in the corner?
simp: 坐在角落的那个男人是谁？
trad: 坐在角落的那個男人是誰？

eng: That bus will take you to the zoo.
simp: 乘那辆巴士就可以到达动物园了。
trad: 乘那輛巴士就可以到達動物園了。

eng: Must I go there at once?
Does the room have a bath?
Finish your homework by the time they return.
simp: 你要在他们回来之前把功课做完。
trad: 你要在他們回來之前把功課做完。

eng: This is the finest view I have ever seen.
simp: 这是我见过最美丽的景色。
trad: 這是我見過最美麗的景色。

eng: It's a good rule to look both ways before you cross the street anywhere.
simp: 无论在甚麽地方，过马路前也应该先看清楚左右。
trad: 無論在甚麼地方，過馬路前也應該先看清楚左右。

eng: There are only five minutes left till the train leaves and she hasn't appeared.
simp: 火车还有五分钟就要开了，她却还没有出现。
trad: 火車還有五分鐘就要開了，她卻還沒有出現。

eng: What if he should happen to be late?
simp: 万一他迟到的话怎麽辨？
trad: 萬一他遲到的話怎麼辨？

eng: What time is it? "It's 3:20."
Thanks to television, boys and girls are apt to neglect reading books.
simp: 拜电视所赐，现在的小孩都不喜欢看书了。
trad: 拜電視所賜，現在的小孩都不喜歡看書了。

eng: It is quiet here at night.
He asked me my age, my name, my address, and so forth.
simp: 他问了我的年龄、姓名、地址等等。
trad: 他問了我的年齡、姓名、地址等等。

eng: We live in the neighborhood of the school.
I can't remember how to say "Thank you" in German.
simp: 我想不起「谢谢」用德语怎麽说。
trad: 我想不起「謝謝」用德語怎麼說。

eng: Showing your real feelings is not considered a virtue in Japan.
simp: 直率在日本人的眼中并不是一种美德。
trad: 直率在日本人的眼中並不是一種美德。

eng: We named the cat Mimi.
simp: 我们帮小猫取了一个名字，叫做 Mimi。
trad: 我們幫小貓取了一個名字，叫做 Mimi。

eng: She was ill with heart disease.
Where was Tom born?
They are hugging and kissing.
He is about your age.
simp: 他的岁数和你的差不多。
trad: 他的歲數和你的差不多。

eng: Is that a common name?
It's quiet in the suburbs...
Twenty years already passed.
Don't let the cops find a heater on you.
simp: 不要给警察发现你身上有枪。
trad: 不要給警察發現你身上有槍。

eng: He cannot be hungry; he has just had lunch.
simp: 他刚刚才吃完午饭，不可能会肚子饿。
trad: 他剛剛才吃完午飯，不可能會肚子餓。

eng: Four-fifths of all the members were against the plan.
simp: 有五分之四的会员反对这个计划。
trad: 有五分之四的會員反對這個計劃。

eng: Tell us the story from beginning to end.
simp: 请你把故事从头到尾给我们说一遍。
trad: 請你把故事從頭到尾給我們說一遍。

eng: Both you and I are students.
Both you and I are students.
Both you and I are students.
They are both good students.
They are both good students.
They are both good students.
simp: 他们两个人都是好学生。
trad: 他們兩個人都是好學生。

eng: They are both good students.
simp: 她们两个人都是好学生。
trad: 她們兩個人都是好學生。

eng: You and I are both students at this school.
simp: 你和我都是这个学校的学生们。
trad: 你和我都是這個學校的學生們。

eng: Don't look back.
If you don't go skiing, I won't, either.
simp: 要是你不去滑雪我也不去。
trad: 要是你不去滑雪我也不去。

eng: Today's mission: milk tea with mochi.
simp: 今天的使命：奶茶跟麻糬。
trad: 今天的使命：奶茶跟麻糬。

eng: The taste of wine is largely dependent upon the weather.
simp: 葡萄酒的味道很受天气影响。
trad: 葡萄酒的味道很受天氣影響。

eng: Please drop in at my house on your way home.
simp: 你回家途中顺道来看看我吧。
trad: 你回家途中順道來看看我吧。

eng: These customs differ from those our country.
simp: 这些习俗和我们国家不同。
trad: 這些習俗和我們國家不同。

eng: This is a difficult math problem.
simp: 这是一道深奥的数学题。
trad: 這是一道深奧的數學題。

eng: Will you take me there?
I wonder if you don't get tired of doing the same thing every day.
simp: 你每天都是做一模一样的东西，难道不会觉得闷吗？
trad: 你每天都是做一模一樣的東西，難道不會覺得悶嗎？

eng: The accident was brought about by his carelessness.
simp: 因为他不小心，所以才会发生意外。
trad: 因為他不小心，所以才會發生意外。

eng: As a rule of thumb, you should plan on one pound of beef for every two guests.
simp: 一般来说，你应该为每两个客人准备一磅牛肉。
trad: 一般來說，你應該為每兩個客人準備一磅牛肉。

eng: I can't stand the heat.
I will deal with this problem.
In the teeth of their strong opposition, we carried out our plan.
simp: 虽然受到他们的强烈反对，但我们还是实行了我们的计划。
trad: 雖然受到他們的強烈反對，但我們還是實行了我們的計劃。

eng: I'll bewitch him into a frog!
simp: 我要用魔法把他变成一隻青蛙！
trad: 我要用魔法把他變成一隻青蛙！

eng: How kind of him to help us move on such a rainy day!
simp: 下这麽大的雨，也帮我们搬家，他人真好！
trad: 下這麼大的雨，也幫我們搬家，他人真好！

eng: Mike is always nagging his father to buy him a car.
simp: 米克整天都在求爸爸买车给他。
trad: 米克整天都在求爸爸買車給他。

eng: I'm none the wiser for his explanation.
simp: 他给我解释了半天，但我还是不明白。
trad: 他給我解釋了半天，但我還是不明白。

eng: It's been almost ten years, but you're as beautiful as ever.
simp: 过了差不多十年，你还是和以前一样漂亮。
trad: 過了差不多十年，你還是和以前一樣漂亮。

eng: Do you really love me?
Miss Baker knew that the young man would have to leave very soon, so she decided to ask him to move his car a bit, so that she could park hers in the proper place for the night before going to bed.
simp: 贝克小姐知道那个年轻男子很快就要离开了，所以决定请求他将车稍微移开，如此一来她就能在夜间入睡前将她的车停到正确的位置。
trad: 貝克小姐知道那個年輕男子很快就要離開了，所以決定請求他將車稍微移開，如此一來她就能在夜間入睡前將她的車停到正確的位置。

eng: Please let me pick up your sister at the station.
simp: 请让我到火车站去接你的姐姐。
trad: 請讓我到火車站去接你的姐姐。

eng: Minnesota's state bird is the mosquito.
simp: 明尼苏达州的官方鸟就是蚊子。
trad: 明尼蘇達州的官方鳥就是蚊子。

eng: When I got home, I was very hungry.
simp: 我回到家的时候肚子十分饿。
trad: 我回到家的時候肚子十分餓。

eng: The picture is colorful in contrast with this one.
simp: 和这幅比起上来，那幅画的色彩鲜艳多了。
trad: 和這幅比起上來，那幅畫的色彩鮮艷多了。

eng: I would rather work for any company than waste another year.
simp: 我宁愿到不喜欢的公司工作，也不想浑浑噩噩的又过一年。
trad: 我寧願到不喜歡的公司工作，也不想渾渾噩噩的又過一年。

eng: Write these words in your notebook.
simp: 把这些生字写进你的笔记簿内。
trad: 把這些生字寫進你的筆記簿內。

eng: When did you get back from London?
simp: 你甚麽时候从伦敦回来了？
trad: 你甚麼時候從倫敦回來了？

eng: You mustn't answer your mother back when she scolds you.
simp: 给母亲责骂的时候不要回嘴。
trad: 給母親責罵的時候不要回嘴。

eng: At the turn of the century, children still worked in factories.
simp: 虽然已经踏入了新世纪，但是工厂僱用童工的情况还是没有改善。
trad: 雖然已經踏入了新世紀，但是工廠僱用童工的情況還是沒有改善。

eng: A camel is to the desert what a ship is to the sea.
There's the chance to get a huge income in this business, a million yen a month is possible!
simp: 这门生意是个赚大钱的好机会，月入可以达到一百万円！
trad: 這門生意是個賺大錢的好機會，月入可以達到一百萬円！

eng: Open the door and let me in, please.
simp: 拜託你开门让我进来吧。
trad: 拜託你開門讓我進來吧。

eng: The development of the computer industry has been very rapid.
simp: 电脑产业的发展一日千里。
trad: 電腦產業的發展一日千裏。

eng: You must consider what kind of work you want to do.
simp: 你一定要考虑清楚你想做怎麽样的工作。
trad: 你一定要考慮清楚你想做怎麼樣的工作。

eng: Put those flowers wherever we can see them well.
simp: 这些花放在哪里也没关係，显眼就行了。
trad: 這些花放在哪裏也沒關係，顯眼就行了。

eng: The invention of TV caused a drastic change in our daily life.
simp: 电视的发明为我们的生活模式带来了巨大的变化。
trad: 電視的發明為我們的生活模式帶來了巨大的變化。

eng: He is anxious to know the result.
simp: 他迫不及待地想要知道结果。
trad: 他迫不及待地想要知道結果。

eng: The security level, as established by the Department of Homeland Security, is orange.
simp: 根据国土安全部的规定，目前的安全水准是橙色等级。
trad: 根據國土安全部的規定，目前的安全水準是橙色等級。

eng: What a good tennis player Tony is!
simp: 托尼打网球打得真好啊！
trad: 托尼打網球打得真好啊！

eng: Where are you going to go on your vacation?
simp: 你放假打算去甚麽地方玩呢？
trad: 你放假打算去甚麼地方玩呢？

eng: He carried off the first prize at the chess tournament.
simp: 他在国际象棋比赛中取得了冠军。
trad: 他在國際象棋比賽中取得了冠軍。

eng: Did you have a lot of happy experiences in your childhood?
simp: 你小时候是不是有很多快乐的经历呢？
trad: 你小時候是不是有很多快樂的經歷呢？

eng: This river is one mile across.
She cut the apple in half.
Students are forbidden to smoke on the school grounds.
simp: 学生不得在校园范围内吸烟。
trad: 學生不得在校園範圍內吸煙。

eng: Who is playing the guitar?
We differ from them in some respects.
simp: 我们有某些地方和他们不同。
trad: 我們有某些地方和他們不同。

eng: Nowadays, almost every home has one or two televisions.
simp: 现在几乎每家每户也有一两台电视机了。
trad: 現在幾乎每家每戶也有一兩臺電視機了。

eng: Can't you just picture Ed in woman's disguise?
simp: 想像一下 Ed 男扮女装之后会变成甚麽样子。
trad: 想像一下 Ed 男扮女裝之後會變成甚麼樣子。

eng: What do you want to eat?
What would you like to eat?
What would you like to eat?
What would you like to drink?
What would you like to drink?
What would you like to drink?
I'm coming.
How many of you are there?
Is it okay if I take a break?
simp: 我如果休息一会没问题吧？
trad: 我如果休息一會沒問題吧？

eng: Why didn't you come?
Wouldn't you like to eat?
Wouldn't you like to eat?
Wouldn't you like to eat?
Emet, we need more meat!
simp: 艾马提，我们需要更多肉！
trad: 艾馬提，我們需要更多肉！

eng: Do you have vegetarian pilaf?
I would like something to drink.
We only have tea.
There's a fly in the noodle broth.
We only make Uighur food.
simp: 我们只做维族式的饭菜。
trad: 我們只做維族式的飯菜。

eng: How many kebabs will you have?
How many kebabs will you have?
How many kebabs will you have?
Those fated to meet will do so regardless of distance. Those not fated will not, even if they are across from one another.
simp: 有缘千里来相会，无缘对面不相逢。
trad: 有緣千裏來相會，無緣對面不相逢。

eng: When do you usually get off work?
When do you usually get off work?
When do you usually get off work?
We have five kinds of kebab.
A plate of pilaf with some kebabs is heaven on earth.
simp: 一盘抓饭配一些烤肉串就是人间天堂。
trad: 一盤抓飯配一些烤肉串就是人間天堂。

eng: She had her handbag stolen.
Do you approve of what he is doing?
simp: 他做的事情你赞成的吧？
trad: 他做的事情你贊成的吧？

eng: Did you eventually respond?
I don't really know.
Are you willing to go to the beach?
simp: 海滩上你到底愿意去吗？
trad: 海灘上你到底願意去嗎？

eng: Why aren't you even moving at all?
How come you're so slow?!
Why do you go about being cross at people?
I'm really sorry!
Open the door a bit!
Come with me!
Wait for me, wait a second!
Here, this is for you!
I don't have enough time, hurry up!
simp: 我时间来不及啦，你快一点呀！
trad: 我時間來不及啦，你快一點呀！

eng: Don't speak nonsense!
I get up at six every day.
I'm getting dressed right after I eat breakfast.
simp: 我穿好衣服以后就吃早饭。
trad: 我穿好衣服以後就吃早飯。

eng: What are you doing?
I'm using the computer.
What has your friend been doing recently?
simp: 你的朋友近来在忙些什么？
trad: 你的朋友近來在忙些什麼？

eng: He's always trading.
He is slowly catching up.
I'm not waiting for anyone.
I was busily typing for the whole morning.
simp: 整个上午，我都在忙着打字。
trad: 整個上午，我都在忙著打字。

eng: What were you doing when I called you yesterday?
simp: 昨天我打电话来的时候，你在干什么？
trad: 昨天我打電話來的時候，你在幹什麼？

eng: Look guys, the window and even the kitchen door have both been left open!
simp: 你们看，窗开着，厨房门也没关！
trad: 你們看，窗開著，廚房門也沒關！

eng: There were some graphic novels mixed into the pile of specialty books on the desk.
simp: 书桌上一迭专业书里有几本卡通书溷在里面。
trad: 書桌上一疊專業書裏有幾本卡通書混在裏面。

eng: It's still early. We should all just chill for a bit.
simp: 时间还早着呢，大家坐下来侃一会儿吧。
trad: 時間還早著呢，大家坐下來侃一會兒吧。

eng: We've got to wait for them to finish playing - there's still a while to go!
simp: 要等它踢完啊，有一点时间啦！
trad: 要等它踢完啊，有一點時間啦！

eng: Have you eaten yet?
I haven't eaten yet.
Can I go out today wearing this shirt that has a little bit of red?
simp: 今天穿了这件有点儿红的衬衫，我能走出去吗？
trad: 今天穿了這件有點兒紅的襯衫，我能走出去嗎？

eng: Perhaps he would not celebrate Chinese New Year again.
We'll most likely go, but we'll decide once we see what the weather is like.
simp: 我们大概去了，不过要看天气怎么样再决定。
trad: 我們大概去了，不過要看天氣怎麼樣再決定。

eng: The suits in this row are all made of imported European fabric.
simp: 这里一排都是进口面料欧版的西装。
trad: 這裏一排都是進口面料歐版的西裝。

eng: This color is a bit darker than that one.
simp: 这种颜色比那种稍微深一点。
trad: 這種顏色比那種稍微深一點。

eng: See how much more carefully made these are compared to those?
simp: 你看这两件做工要比那些讲究。
trad: 你看這兩件做工要比那些講究。

eng: There is no difference between this row of clothes and the one next to it.
simp: 旁边一排衣服跟这里的衣服没什么不一样。
trad: 旁邊一排衣服跟這裏的衣服沒什麼不一樣。

eng: This tie has a more vibrant color and goes better with this suit.
simp: 这条领带颜色亮一点，跟这件西装比较配。
trad: 這條領帶顏色亮一點，跟這件西裝比較配。

eng: I think it's too expensive; besides, it doesn't even look that good...
simp: 我觉得价钱太贵，再说没什么特别好看……
trad: 我覺得價錢太貴，再說沒什麼特別好看……

eng: Do you want dry cleaning or regular wash?
It's good now; neither too heavy nor too light.
Where's your date tonight?
simp: 今天晚上你在什么地方有约会？
trad: 今天晚上你在什麼地方有約會？

eng: It's not even a little bit cheap, it's extremely expensive!
simp: 一点也不便宜，贵得不得了。
trad: 一點也不便宜，貴得不得了。

eng: Take a good look, it's really fresh!
Potatoes are very cheap.
How much for half a kilo?
Fine!
Wait just a little bit, will be done immediately!
Shanghai has everything under the sun when it comes to food.
simp: 上海这个地方，海内海外什么菜肴都有。
trad: 上海這個地方，海內海外什麼菜肴都有。

eng: What is the size of this district's greenery area ?
simp: 这里小区的绿地面积有多少？
trad: 這裏小區的綠地面積有多少？

eng: For example, if I want to get downtown what bus should I take?
simp: 比如说，我要到市中心，有什么车子可以坐吗？
trad: 比如說，我要到市中心，有什麼車子可以坐嗎？

eng: The rental should be somewhat close to where I work.
simp: 租的房屋要离我工作地方近一点。
trad: 租的房屋要離我工作地方近一點。

eng: Great! Is the apartment bought as a concrete shell, or is it ready to move into?
simp: 太棒了！是毛坯房还是装修房？
trad: 太棒了！是毛坯房還是裝修房？

eng: Miss, are there any available rooms for tonight?
simp: 小姐，今天晚上有没有空房间？
trad: 小姐，今天晚上有沒有空房間？

eng: Yes, there are. How many of you are there, Sir?
This is a three-star hotel; three hundred dollars a night.
simp: 这里是三星级宾馆，三百元住一晚。
trad: 這裏是三星級賓館，三百元住一晚。

eng: Does this car go to Jingan temple?
What's the next station?
Stop the car here.
How long would a train from Shanghai to Zhengzhou take?
simp: 从上海坐火车到郑州需几个小时？
trad: 從上海坐火車到鄭州需幾個小時？

eng: Do you smoke?
Do you want to eat noodles or rice? Do you want to drink fruit juice or coffee?
simp: 你吃面条还是吃饭？喝橙汁还是喝咖啡？
trad: 你吃面條還是吃飯？喝橙汁還是喝咖啡？

eng: It's five o' clock. If you quickly post your letter, it still might make it in time.
simp: 五点钟，你的信赶快投进去还来得及。
trad: 五點鐘，你的信趕快投進去還來得及。

eng: I'm sorry, without an I.D. you cannot receive a remittance。
simp: 对不起，没有身份证是不能领汇款的。
trad: 對不起，沒有身份證是不能領匯款的。

eng: Sir, I would like to deposit my money. How do I do that?
So, how's the card used?
Excuse me, I'd like to exchange US dollars for RMB - can I get RMB here?
simp: 请问，我要用美元换人民币，这儿可以换给我人民币吗？
trad: 請問，我要用美元換人民幣，這兒可以換給我人民幣嗎？

eng: Please sign here.
simp: 请你在这个地方签个字。
trad: 請你在這個地方簽個字。

eng: I'm going to call my daughter.
simp: 我要打给我女儿一个电话。
trad: 我要打給我女兒一個電話。

eng: Tell him to call me tomorrow at noon.
simp: 明天中午叫他打给我一个电话。
trad: 明天中午叫他打給我一個電話。

eng: Sorry, you have the wrong number.
OK, what kind of place do you live at?
Please give me the exact address.
A small European shop opened inside, the mood is great!
simp: 里面开了一个个欧式的小店，情调好极了！
trad: 裏面開了一個個歐式的小店，情調好極了！

eng: How much does this cost?
Which of these two do you think is better?
It's kind of in vogue, but the price is too much!
simp: 虽然时髦一点，但是价钱太大！
trad: 雖然時髦一點，但是價錢太大！

eng: Can the price be discounted?
This is your change.
Hey, how much does one pound of these oranges cost?
simp: 喂，这橘子多少钱买一斤啊？
trad: 餵，這橘子多少錢買一斤啊？

eng: Alright! Ten yuan buys five kilos, OK?
Well, take it.
What tea do you drink? Is lemon tea okay?
simp: 你要喝什么茶？泡壶柠檬红茶好吧？
trad: 你要喝什麼茶？泡壺檸檬紅茶好吧？

eng: Mr. Wang, what kind of business are you engaged in?
simp: 王兄，你现在在做什么生意了？
trad: 王兄，你現在在做什麼生意了？

eng: I've troubled you!
If I don't come, who will?
I just found out that he's sick, so I'll visit him later.
simp: 我刚知道你在生病，所以下了班来看望你。
trad: 我剛知道你在生病，所以下了班來看望你。

eng: This time, when he went into the hospital, he finally understood that one's health is really the most important thing of all.
simp: 这次一进医院，才知道身体健康最最重要。
trad: 這次一進醫院，才知道身體健康最最重要。

eng: Could you get a hammer for me from the kitchen please?
simp: 你到厨房里替我把一把锤子拿来。
trad: 你到廚房裏替我把一把錘子拿來。

eng: Help me send out these two letters, all right?
simp: 你帮我把这两封信寄掉好吗？
trad: 你幫我把這兩封信寄掉好嗎？

eng: One of the lights is not working. Do you think you could come take a look?
simp: 一盏电灯不亮了，你帮我来看看好吗？
trad: 一盞電燈不亮了，你幫我來看看好嗎？

eng: Next week I have things to do except on Monday and Wednesday, I am free on all the other days though.
simp: 下个礼拜除了星期一星期三有事，我其他日子都有空在那儿。
trad: 下個禮拜除了星期一星期三有事，我其他日子都有空在那兒。

eng: Because I don't have to go to work today and tomorrow, so I will use the opportunity to quickly finish moving it.
simp: 因为今天明天我休息，所以趁机会快点搬好它。
trad: 因為今天明天我休息，所以趁機會快點搬好它。

eng: She dresses so outrageously; it looks completely ridiculous!
simp: 她打扮得妖里妖气，一副傻样！
trad: 她打扮得妖裏妖氣，一副傻樣！

eng: Is it my turn?
The pain is here, right? That's a stomach ache.
It's ached before, but never as badly as right now.
simp: 痛过，但是没现在这么厉害。
trad: 痛過，但是沒現在這麼厲害。

eng: Feel a little nauseous, but unable to puke.
simp: 有点恶心，但是吐不出来。
trad: 有點惡心，但是吐不出來。

eng: These medicines should be taken three times a day.
Already retired, but often get asked by them to consult.
simp: 已经退休了，但还常常被他们请去做顾问。
trad: 已經退休了，但還常常被他們請去做顧問。

eng: I like to do oil painting, but I don't intend to make that my lifelong occupation.
simp: 我喜欢画油画，但是我不想拿它做我的终身职业。
trad: 我喜歡畫油畫，但是我不想拿它做我的終身職業。

eng: Even if I don't get a high salary, I'm not willing to quit this way of making a living.
simp: 即使我拿不到高工资，我也不肯放弃这个饭碗。
trad: 即使我拿不到高工資，我也不肯放棄這個飯碗。

eng: Even though it's busy today, this bit of work must be finished before leaving.
simp: 今天即使再忙，也要做完这些事情才走。
trad: 今天即使再忙，也要做完這些事情才走。

eng: Because your business can play to my strengths.
simp: 因为你们公司的业务能够发挥我的特长。
trad: 因為你們公司的業務能夠發揮我的特長。

eng: What kind of job are you looking for?
simp: 你想找哪个方面的工作？
trad: 你想找哪個方面的工作？

eng: Either as a waiter at a restaurant or a bartender, both are OK.
simp: 做餐馆服务员啊、酒吧招待员啊，都可以。
trad: 做餐館服務員啊、酒吧招待員啊，都可以。

eng: Can you speak Mandarin?
Sure I can, although I can't really speak Shanghainese.
simp: 当然会的，不过上海话不太会讲。
trad: 當然會的，不過上海話不太會講。

eng: Zailaiba Bar is hiring waiters; are you interested?
simp: “再来吧”酒吧要招一个服务员，你有兴趣吗？
trad: “再來吧”酒吧要招一個服務員，你有興趣嗎？

eng: Please fill out this form and wait for us to notify you.
simp: 请你把这张表填一下，等我们的通知。
trad: 請你把這張表填一下，等我們的通知。

eng: Do not talk nonsense, My job is very boring!
simp: 不是瞎说，我这份工作真是没劲！
trad: 不是瞎說，我這份工作真是沒勁！

eng: I'm bored and I have nothing to do.
However, these days everyone has a bathtub. Isn't it pretty simple to take a bath?
simp: 不过现在家家人家都有浴缸，洗个澡不是挺方便的吗？
trad: 不過現在家家人家都有浴缸，洗個澡不是挺方便的嗎？

eng: When I sing Karaoke, I sing everything from oldies from my childhood to the latest hits.
simp: 我唱卡拉OK，从小时候的歌唱起，一直唱到劲歌金曲最新版。
trad: 我唱卡拉OK，從小時候的歌唱起，一直唱到勁歌金曲最新版。

eng: If I have time and enough money, I'd want to go traveling in Europe.
simp: 如果我有时间有钱，我要到欧洲去旅游。
trad: 如果我有時間有錢，我要到歐洲去旅遊。

eng: Have a pleasant trip.
River Suzhou is Shanghai's "mother river"; twisting and turning, it stretches across and flows through the city center.
simp: 苏州河是上海的母亲河，弯弯曲曲横跨流过市中心。
trad: 蘇州河是上海的母親河，彎彎曲曲橫跨流過市中心。

eng: Some Shanghainese hold large banquets when they get married.
simp: 上海人结婚，有的人家办酒宴场面很大。
trad: 上海人結婚，有的人家辦酒宴場面很大。

eng: Because families in Shanghai today have only one son or daughter, the head of the family places a strong emphasis on their childs studying.
simp: 因为现在上海家家都是独生子女，家长对小孩的读书非常重视。
trad: 因為現在上海家家都是獨生子女，家長對小孩的讀書非常重視。

eng: The raising of children is something that concerns the entire community. There will be an education reform.
simp: 子女培养全社会都很关心，教育要进行改革。
trad: 子女培養全社會都很關心，教育要進行改革。

eng: One must be respectful when speaking, and not say obscene things.
simp: 开口要有礼貌，不讲下流话。
trad: 開口要有禮貌，不講下流話。

eng: When the light is green, cars turning must yield to pedestrians.
Native Chinese people are working alongside foreigners to change the culture of Shanghai.
simp: 本地人、外来人齐心共创上海新文明。
trad: 本地人、外來人齊心共創上海新文明。

eng: I remember his face but I can't remember his name.
simp: 我记得他的长相但忘了他叫甚麽名字。
trad: 我記得他的長相但忘了他叫甚麼名字。

eng: Yes, of course.
Let's eat a watermelon!
I can come tomorrow.
Though I may be in the jaws of death, I am as a firm as a rock.
simp: 我虽然在虎口里，却是安如泰山。
trad: 我雖然在虎口裏，卻是安如泰山。

eng: Liu Bei and Zhuge Liang are an unbeatable team.
simp: 刘备和诸葛亮是一支无法战胜的队伍。
trad: 劉備和諸葛亮是一支無法戰勝的隊伍。

eng: I found your house with difficulty.
simp: 我好不容易找到了你们的房子。
trad: 我好不容易找到了你們的房子。

eng: What sort of coats are in fashion this year?
simp: 今年流行甚麽款式的外套？
trad: 今年流行甚麼款式的外套？

eng: Only a handful of people know the fact.
simp: 知道真相的人只有几个。
trad: 知道真相的人只有幾個。

eng: Please let me know the schedule beforehand.
simp: 请你事先把计划告诉我。
trad: 請你事先把計劃告訴我。

eng: We've been having strange weather the past few years.
No, thank you.
If you are going to the safari park, take the No.5 bus.
simp: 你想去野生动物园就乘五号巴士吧。
trad: 你想去野生動物園就乘五號巴士吧。

eng: The building will be completed in a year.
simp: 那座建筑物会在一年内完工。
trad: 那座建築物會在一年內完工。

eng: Andersen was afraid of dogs, too.
It is almost three.
Did you enjoy your holiday?
What happened to your nose? "When I was backing my car up I went to check behind me, convinced that the car window was open, and bashed my face into it!"
simp: 「你鼻子怎麽了？」「我刚才倒车的时候，想探头出窗看清楚后面有没有人。我以为车窗是开着的，谁知原来是关上了，于是就一头撞到车窗上了。」
trad: 「你鼻子怎麼了？」「我剛才倒車的時候，想探頭出窗看清楚後面有沒有人。我以為車窗是開著的，誰知原來是關上了，於是就一頭撞到車窗上了。」

eng: In Thailand, bringing up the children isn't the father's responsibility; it's entirely up to the mother.
simp: 在泰国，照顾子女不是父亲的责任，而是由母亲一手包办的。
trad: 在泰國，照顧子女不是父親的責任，而是由母親一手包辦的。

eng: You can see the stars with your naked eye, and even better through a telescope.
simp: 你可以用肉眼观星，用望远镜的话，还能看得更清楚。
trad: 你可以用肉眼觀星，用望遠鏡的話，還能看得更清楚。

eng: His plan is to build a bridge over that river.
simp: 他的计划是在那条河上建一座桥。
trad: 他的計劃是在那條河上建一座橋。

eng: The two men were seen to steal into the house.
simp: 那两个人偷偷熘进了房子里，给人看见了。
trad: 那兩個人偷偷溜進了房子裏，給人看見了。

eng: I suggest that you should write him a thank-you letter.
simp: 我觉得你应该给他写一封感谢信。
trad: 我覺得你應該給他寫一封感謝信。

eng: Can you recommend any vegetarian dishes?
Which house did you live in?
simp: 你以前住的是哪一座房子？
trad: 你以前住的是哪一座房子？

eng: I often used to play tennis with him on Sundays.
simp: 我以前星期天常常和他去打网球。
trad: 我以前星期天常常和他去打網球。

eng: I feel like going out rather than staying at home today.
simp: 我今天想外出，不想留在家中。
trad: 我今天想外出，不想留在家中。

eng: The world which I saw in my dream was a peaceful world devoid of war.
simp: 我梦见的是一个没有战争的、和平的世界。
trad: 我夢見的是一個沒有戰爭的、和平的世界。

eng: Linda stuck her tongue out.
You will find him home whenever you call.
simp: 你甚麽时候去，他也会在家。
trad: 你甚麼時候去，他也會在家。

eng: We have to make a close analysis of the accident.
simp: 我们要详细的分析一下意外发生的前因后果。
trad: 我們要詳細的分析一下意外發生的前因後果。

eng: Are you students? "Yes, we are."
This song reminds me of my childhood.
simp: 这首歌勾起了我童年的回忆。
trad: 這首歌勾起了我童年的回憶。

eng: It must be dangerous to swim in this rapid stream.
simp: 在这麽急的急流里游泳，一定会很危险的。
trad: 在這麼急的急流裏遊泳，一定會很危險的。

eng: These trees were planted by them.
Both those students passed all the tests.
simp: 这两个学生都通过了所有的测验。
trad: 這兩個學生都通過了所有的測驗。

eng: Don't forget to take your umbrella when you leave.
simp: 你出门的时候别忘了带伞。
trad: 你出門的時候別忘了帶傘。

eng: All you have to do is sign your name here.
simp: 你在这里签个名就行了。
trad: 你在這裏簽個名就行了。

eng: This word is derived from Greek.
simp: 这个字是希腊语衍生出来的。
trad: 這個字是希臘語衍生出來的。

eng: Can we meet February 28, around 3:00 pm?
simp: 我们可以在二月二十八日三时左右见面吗？
trad: 我們可以在二月二十八日三時左右見面嗎？

eng: How did you come to know it?
Mary made a cake without her mother's knowledge.
simp: 玛莉不让母亲知道，自己做了一个蛋糕。
trad: 瑪莉不讓母親知道，自己做了一個蛋糕。

eng: The mixture of these substances is dangerous.
simp: 把这些物质溷合起来是很危险的。
trad: 把這些物質混合起來是很危險的。

eng: Try to estimate how much you spent on books.
simp: 算一算你花了多少钱买书。
trad: 算一算你花了多少錢買書。

eng: What is the price of this radio?
Do you think you can live on a dollar a day in America?
simp: 你觉得你在美国每天只用一美元能生活吗？
trad: 你覺得你在美國每天只用一美元能生活嗎？

eng: He would be very glad to hear the news.
simp: 他听到这个消息，一定会很高兴。
trad: 他聽到這個消息，一定會很高興。

eng: Not a few houses were destroyed by the typhoon.
Did you ever see that movie?
simp: 你有没有看过那部电影？
trad: 你有沒有看過那部電影？

eng: I'll lend you the book, provided you return it next week.
simp: 如果你可以在下个星期还给我的话，这本书就借给你吧。
trad: 如果你可以在下個星期還給我的話，這本書就借給你吧。

eng: If you are going to the library this afternoon, would you please return two books for me whilst you are there?
simp: 你今天下午去图书馆的话，可以顺道替我还两本书吗？
trad: 你今天下午去圖書館的話，可以順道替我還兩本書嗎？

eng: May I bring my family along?
simp: 我可以和家人一起来吗？
trad: 我可以和家人一起來嗎？

eng: What kind of food do you have?
We have pilaf, lo mein, and kebabs in our restaurant.
simp: 在我们的饭店抓饭，拌面，烤肉串都有。
trad: 在我們的飯店抓飯，拌面，烤肉串都有。

eng: Let me cut the carrots.
In America, the consumption of fast-food has tripled between 1977 and 1995.
simp: 美国人快餐食物的消耗量在一九七七至一九九五年间大幅增长了三倍。
trad: 美國人快餐食物的消耗量在一九七七至一九九五年間大幅增長了三倍。

eng: She does not eat cake, so as not to put on any more weight.
simp: 她不想一直胖下去，所以正在戒吃蛋糕。
trad: 她不想一直胖下去，所以正在戒吃蛋糕。

eng: I have no money, but I have dreams.
simp: 我没有钱，但是我有梦想。
trad: 我沒有錢，但是我有夢想。

eng: He got mad at me for calling him Shorty.
simp: 我把他叫做「矮子」，他就气得不得了。
trad: 我把他叫做「矮子」，他就氣得不得了。

eng: That word describes it perfectly.
Had they known what was about to happen, they would have changed their plans.
simp: 如果他们知道会发生那样的事，一定会改用别的计划的。
trad: 如果他們知道會發生那樣的事，一定會改用別的計劃的。

eng: Wow! That's cheap!
We hurried to the airport only to miss the plane.
simp: 我们匆匆忙忙的赶到机场，飞机却已经起飞了。
trad: 我們匆匆忙忙的趕到機場，飛機卻已經起飛了。

eng: I mean to go tomorrow if the weather is fine.
simp: 如果天气好的话，我打算明天出发。
trad: 如果天氣好的話，我打算明天出發。

eng: I take my camera wherever I go.
simp: 我无论去甚麽地方也带着相机。
trad: 我無論去甚麼地方也帶著相機。

eng: Let's have lunch downtown and take in a show.
simp: 我们去市区吃饭，然后再看场电影吧。
trad: 我們去市區吃飯，然後再看場電影吧。

eng: If you leave now, I'm sure you'll be caught in a traffic jam.
simp: 你现在出门的话，肯定会堵车的。
trad: 你現在出門的話，肯定會堵車的。

eng: He is sure of winning the game.
simp: 他很有信心赢这场比赛。
trad: 他很有信心贏這場比賽。

eng: I wish I could see the ancient world.
simp: 我真想看看古代的世界是怎样的。
trad: 我真想看看古代的世界是怎樣的。

eng: What a good idea!
Whether Shakespeare wrote this poem or not will probably remain a mystery.
simp: 这首诗是不是莎士比亚写的，恐怕是无从考究的了。
trad: 這首詩是不是莎士比亞寫的，恐怕是無從考究的了。

eng: Are you an Uighur?
My mother's American, and my father is Uighur. "Really?" "No! I was joking!"
simp: “母亲是美国人，父亲是维族。”　“是真的吗？”　“不！开玩笑的！”
trad: “母親是美國人，父親是維族。”　“是真的嗎？”　“不！開玩笑的！”

eng: Won't you have some more tea?
There's no beer here.
Let me go to the store.
What should I buy?
Please wait a bit.
After a while, the man came into the room.
simp: 过了一会，那人就走进了房间。
trad: 過了一會，那人就走進了房間。

eng: We dug a hole in the ground.
simp: 我们在地上掘了一个洞。
trad: 我們在地上掘了一個洞。

eng: Their way of thinking is behind the times.
I almost stepped on a skunk last night.
simp: 我昨晚差点踩到一只臭鼬。
trad: 我昨晚差點踩到一只臭鼬。

eng: She is mad at me.
I'm not a real fish, I'm just a mere plushy.
simp: 我不是一条真的鱼，我只是一个长毛绒玩具。
trad: 我不是一條真的魚，我只是一個長毛絨玩具。

eng: He speaks English a little.
She was wearing a blue coat.
Like it?
Red and blue - which one do you like?
simp: 红色和蓝色，你喜欢那一个?
trad: 紅色和藍色，你喜歡那一個?

eng: The Xinhong River is longer than any river in Japan.
simp: 信浓川比日本的任何一条河川更长。
trad: 信濃川比日本的任何一條河川更長。

eng: Do you know why they stopped talking?
simp: 你知道为什麽他们安静下来了呢？
trad: 你知道為什麼他們安靜下來了呢？

eng: Put your name on the notebook in case you forget it.
simp: 在笔记本上写上你的名字吧，这样就不怕弄不见了。
trad: 在筆記本上寫上你的名字吧，這樣就不怕弄不見了。

eng: Where will you be this time tomorrow?
simp: 你明天这个时间会在甚麽地方？
trad: 你明天這個時間會在甚麼地方？

eng: On my way home, I met him.
simp: 我在回家途中踫见了他。
trad: 我在回家途中踫見了他。

eng: A man can live and be healthy without killing animals for food; therefore, if he eats meat, he participates in taking animal life merely for the sake of his appetite. And to act so is immoral.
simp: 一个人就算不吃肉，也可以健健康康的生活。所以人杀生、吃肉，只不过是为了满足自己的口腹之慾而已。这种行为是不道德的。
trad: 一個人就算不吃肉，也可以健健康康的生活。所以人殺生、吃肉，只不過是為了滿足自己的口腹之慾而已。這種行為是不道德的。

eng: I usually ride my bike to school. I mean to the office.
simp: 我通常踏单车上学⋯⋯啊，说错了，应该是上班才对。
trad: 我通常踏單車上學⋯⋯啊，說錯了，應該是上班才對。

eng: Playing golf is great fun.
Our chef is very busy today.
I'm not an Uighur. I'm a Russian.
simp: 我不是维族人。是俄罗斯人。
trad: 我不是維族人。是俄羅斯人。

eng: No wonder he is so angry.
Judging from her appearance, I think that she's rich.
simp: 从她的外表上看，我想她大半是个有钱人。
trad: 從她的外表上看，我想她大半是個有錢人。

eng: I first met him three years ago.
simp: 我第一次见他是三年前的事了。
trad: 我第一次見他是三年前的事了。

eng: She has three sisters: one is a nurse and the others are teachers.
simp: 她有三个姊妹，一个是护士，另外的两个是教师。
trad: 她有三個姊妹，一個是護士，另外的兩個是教師。

eng: I don't want to go outside this afternoon.
May I have another piece of cake?
simp: 我可以再吃一块蛋糕吗？
trad: 我可以再吃一塊蛋糕嗎？

eng: I will never tell a lie from now on.
simp: 我从今以后不会再说谎了。
trad: 我從今以後不會再說謊了。

eng: You should turn in your term papers by the end of April.
simp: 请在四月底之前交上你的学期报告。
trad: 請在四月底之前交上你的學期報告。

eng: The child had no overcoat on although it was very cold.
simp: 虽然天气很冷，但那小孩也没有穿外套。
trad: 雖然天氣很冷，但那小孩也沒有穿外套。

eng: Today's paper contains nothing of importance.
simp: 今天的报纸没有甚麽值得看的新闻。
trad: 今天的報紙沒有甚麼值得看的新聞。

eng: With all his efforts, he failed the test.
simp: 虽然他已经用尽全力温习，但测验还是不及格。
trad: 雖然他已經用盡全力溫習，但測驗還是不及格。

eng: When did you get up this morning?
I felt as if I were an uninvited guest.
simp: 我觉得自己像是不请自来似的。
trad: 我覺得自己像是不請自來似的。

eng: The sales are slipping.
Fashions of thirty years ago have come back in style.
simp: 三十年前的时装款式又流行起来了。
trad: 三十年前的時裝款式又流行起來了。

eng: Both girls have blue eyes.
simp: 两个女孩都有一双蓝眼睛。
trad: 兩個女孩都有一雙藍眼睛。

eng: Do you have a double room?
If God doesn't exist in our world, then I will create God with my own hands.
simp: 如果世界上没有神，那么我就用双手创造出神。
trad: 如果世界上沒有神，那麼我就用雙手創造出神。

eng: Bill and his younger brother are nothing alike.
She's only two years old, but she can already count to 100.
simp: 她只有两岁，但她已经会数到100了。
trad: 她只有兩歲，但她已經會數到100了。

eng: The train is going at a speed of 50 miles per hour.
simp: 火车以每小时50英里的速度前行。
trad: 火車以每小時50英裏的速度前行。

eng: Please write your name with a pencil.
Write with a pen, not with a pencil.
simp: 用钢笔写，不要用铅笔写。
trad: 用鋼筆寫，不要用鉛筆寫。

eng: The point of the pencil has become dull.
Do you have any pencils?
What do you want to do while you're here?
simp: 你在这儿的时候想做什么？
trad: 你在這兒的時候想做什麼？

eng: Except for me, there wasn't a single person there.
simp: 这儿除了我，一个人也没有。
trad: 這兒除了我，一個人也沒有。

eng: In the summer, we're used to going swimming in the river.
simp: 夏天我们习惯去河里游泳。
trad: 夏天我們習慣去河裏遊泳。

eng: What time do you get up?
It takes eight hours to fly from Zurich to Boston, but only six for the return trip.
simp: 从苏黎世到波士顿坐飞机要八个小时，但是返回时只要六个。
trad: 從蘇黎世到波士頓坐飛機要八個小時，但是返回時只要六個。

eng: I found a pot in which there were several old coins.
simp: 我找到一个装有几枚古钱币的锅子。
trad: 我找到一個裝有幾枚古錢幣的鍋子。

eng: This bus can hold fifty people.
simp: 这辆巴士可以载五十个人。
trad: 這輛巴士可以載五十個人。

eng: They heard a gun go off in the distance.
simp: 他们听到远处传来一下枪声。
trad: 他們聽到遠處傳來一下槍聲。

eng: My boy can't do addition properly yet.
The lecture was very long, but I enjoyed it none the less.
simp: 那场演讲很长，但我却听得津津有味。
trad: 那場演講很長，但我卻聽得津津有味。

eng: John asked Mary whether she would like to go shopping in the afternoon.
simp: 约翰问玛莉下午想不想一起去买东西。
trad: 約翰問瑪莉下午想不想一起去買東西。

eng: This movement from rural to urban areas has been going on for over two hundred years.
simp: 在这二百年来，有很多人从农村搬到了市区居住。
trad: 在這二百年來，有很多人從農村搬到了市區居住。

eng: No pro golfer in Japan is as popular as Jumbo Ozaki.
simp: 尾崎将司是日本最受欢迎的专业高尔夫球手。
trad: 尾崎將司是日本最受歡迎的專業高爾夫球手。

eng: My house was broken into last night.
simp: 我家昨晚给强盗光顾了。
trad: 我家昨晚給強盜光顧了。

eng: The Alpinists carried out the ascent, but they did not return safely.
simp: 登山者成功登上了山顶，但回程时却出了意外。
trad: 登山者成功登上了山頂，但回程時卻出了意外。

eng: A little knowledge of Spanish will go a long way toward making your trip to Mexico enjoyable.
simp: 懂一点西班牙语的话，你去墨西哥一定会玩得更愉快。
trad: 懂一點西班牙語的話，你去墨西哥一定會玩得更愉快。

eng: I bought this camera for 25,000 yen.
simp: 我用二万五千円买了这台相机。
trad: 我用二萬五千円買了這臺相機。

eng: You can get a fine view of the sea from the mountaintop.
simp: 从山顶上可以欣赏到秀丽的海景。
trad: 從山頂上可以欣賞到秀麗的海景。

eng: This flower is yellow, but all the others are blue.
simp: 这朵花是黄色的，但是其他全都是蓝色的。
trad: 這朵花是黃色的，但是其他全都是藍色的。

eng: Parents have responsibilities to look to their children's health.
simp: 父母有责任照顾子女的健康。
trad: 父母有責任照顧子女的健康。

eng: You understand best how to use the machine.
simp: 你最会操作这台机器了。
trad: 你最會操作這臺機器了。

eng: Yesterday I was caught in a shower on my way home from school.
simp: 我昨天放学回家的时候突然下起了大雨。
trad: 我昨天放學回家的時候突然下起了大雨。

eng: Please don't get mad, sir! I'm a new worker!
simp: 先生，请别生我的气！我是新来的工人！
trad: 先生，請別生我的氣！我是新來的工人！

eng: How do people manage to sleep on the plane?
simp: 人们怎么能在飞机上睡觉？
trad: 人們怎麼能在飛機上睡覺？

eng: Are there taxis around here?
What time do you go to work?
If there’s a big earthquake, the house could really collapse!
simp: 若有大地震，房屋会倒塌呀！
trad: 若有大地震，房屋會倒塌呀！

eng: Just as if it were my tail, wherever I go, it goes too.
simp: 它就像我的尾巴一样，我去哪里它就去哪里。
trad: 它就像我的尾巴一樣，我去哪裏它就去哪裏。

eng: We often play chess.
Would you mind me smoking here?
simp: 你介意我在这里抽烟吗？
trad: 你介意我在這裏抽煙嗎？

eng: He could not help jumping for joy at the good news.
simp: 他听到那个好消息，高兴得跳了起来。
trad: 他聽到那個好消息，高興得跳了起來。

eng: India is the seventh largest country in the world.
simp: 印度是世界第七大的国家。
trad: 印度是世界第七大的國家。

eng: The shock of her father's death lingered on and she didn't feel like going out at all.
simp: 她完全没有出外的心情，因为那种突然失去父亲的痛苦，一直在她的心头挥之不去。
trad: 她完全沒有出外的心情，因為那種突然失去父親的痛苦，一直在她的心頭揮之不去。

eng: I didn't like rock music at first, but it soon grew on me.
simp: 我本来对摇滚乐没甚麽好感，但后来却渐渐喜欢上了。
trad: 我本來對搖滾樂沒甚麼好感，但後來卻漸漸喜歡上了。

eng: Your hair is too long.
He caused his parents a lot of anxiety.
For some reason or other I cannot bring myself to work.
simp: 不知怎麽我总是没心情工作。
trad: 不知怎麼我總是沒心情工作。

eng: It was obvious that they had told a lie.
Sorry, the line is busy now.
simp: 不好意思，现在线路繁忙。
trad: 不好意思，現在線路繁忙。

eng: It looks like rain. We had better shut the windows.
simp: 好像快要下雨了。我们把窗关上吧。
trad: 好像快要下雨了。我們把窗關上吧。

eng: Japanese children brought up overseas sometimes face great difficulty in adjusting themselves to Japanese schools after returning, even though they have a perfect command of Japanese.
simp: 在海外长大的日本孩子虽然能说流利的日文，但他们回国读书的时候，有时也会觉得难以适应新环境。
trad: 在海外長大的日本孩子雖然能說流利的日文，但他們回國讀書的時候，有時也會覺得難以適應新環境。

eng: It's by smithing that one becomes a blacksmith.
Why are you so happy?
I am moving next month.
She is a real beauty.
Exactly!
A job that you don't love is... a job.
simp: 一份我们不喜欢的工作就是。。。一份工作。
trad: 一份我們不喜歡的工作就是。。。一份工作。

eng: I wish you a Merry Christmas.
Never trust a woman with a pistol in hand.
simp: 千万别相信一个手里拿手枪的女人。
trad: 千萬別相信一個手裏拿手槍的女人。

eng: I asked Mother to wake me up at four.
simp: 我请妈妈四点叫我起床。
trad: 我請媽媽四點叫我起床。

eng: I'll do my homework after I watch television.
simp: 我看完电视才去做功课。
trad: 我看完電視才去做功課。

eng: This book will awaken your imagination.
simp: 这本书会让你发挥想像力。
trad: 這本書會讓你發揮想像力。

eng: The boy could not so much as write his own name.
simp: 那男孩连自己的名字也不会写。
trad: 那男孩連自己的名字也不會寫。

eng: You may come whenever you like.
simp: 你喜欢甚麽时候来就甚麽时候来吧。
trad: 你喜歡甚麼時候來就甚麼時候來吧。

eng: The Zulu tribe in South Africa has its own language.
simp: 南非的祖鲁族人有着自己独特的语言。
trad: 南非的祖魯族人有著自己獨特的語言。

eng: I'm sure he is a man of ability.
simp: 我相信他是个能干的人。
trad: 我相信他是個能幹的人。

eng: Let me see the pictures you took in Paris.
simp: 给我看看你在巴黎拍的照片吧。
trad: 給我看看你在巴黎拍的照片吧。

eng: He is said to have been the richest man in the village.
simp: 据说他以前是整个村子最有钱的人。
trad: 據說他以前是整個村子最有錢的人。

eng: I like this skirt. May I try it on?
simp: 这条裙子挺漂亮的，可以试穿吗？
trad: 這條裙子挺漂亮的，可以試穿嗎？

eng: This battle left Napoleon master of Europe.
simp: 这场战役让拿破崙称霸了整个欧洲。
trad: 這場戰役讓拿破崙稱霸了整個歐洲。

eng: Which is the capital of the United States, Washington or New York?
simp: 美国的首都是华盛顿还是纽约？
trad: 美國的首都是華盛頓還是紐約？

eng: He went out of the room without being noticed by anyone.
simp: 他静悄悄地走出了房间，谁也没有发现。
trad: 他靜悄悄地走出了房間，誰也沒有發現。

eng: You are a good tennis player, as beginners go.
simp: 以初学者来说，你打网球已经算是打得不错了。
trad: 以初學者來說，你打網球已經算是打得不錯了。

eng: The solution of the problem took me five minutes.
simp: 我用五分钟就算好了那道题。
trad: 我用五分鐘就算好了那道題。

eng: They live in a good environment.
We are staying at our uncle's.
The sky turned dark.
I didn't answer your letter, because I was busy.
simp: 我是因为太忙，所以才没有回信给你的。
trad: 我是因為太忙，所以才沒有回信給你的。

eng: I may have left my umbrella in the bus.
simp: 我可能把雨伞留在公车上了。
trad: 我可能把雨傘留在公車上了。

eng: You should talk to the teacher yourself.
From now on, let's keep in touch.
simp: 我们以后要保持联络啊。
trad: 我們以後要保持聯絡啊。
