eng: It takes years to master a foreign language.
simp: 学外语要花好几年的时间才能学得精通。
trad: 學外語要花好幾年的時間才能學得精通。

eng: My ballpoint pen just ran out of ink.
Three more passengers got on the bus.
simp: 接着又有三个人上了巴士。
trad: 接著又有三個人上了巴士。

eng: We don't have enough time.
There is a bag on the desk.
I want to mend this watch.
Your eyes remind me of stars.
simp: 你的眼睛让我想到了星星。
trad: 你的眼睛讓我想到了星星。

eng: Air quality has deteriorated these past few years.
simp: 这些年空气质量恶化了。
trad: 這些年空氣質量惡化了。

eng: You shouldn't break promises.
Why did you buy such an expensive dictionary?
simp: 为什么你买了一本那么贵的词典？
trad: 為什麼你買了一本那麼貴的詞典？

eng: I'm afraid of spiders.
The old couple embarked on a tour around the world.
simp: 老夫妇出发去环游世界了。
trad: 老夫婦出發去環遊世界了。

eng: Your composition is very good, and it has few mistakes.
simp: 你的作文非常好，而且错误很少。
trad: 你的作文非常好，而且錯誤很少。

eng: In my opinion, he is correct.
simp: 在我看来，他是有道理的。
trad: 在我看來，他是有道理的。

eng: Oh, could you please answer the phone for me?
simp: 哦，能不能请你帮我听一下电话？
trad: 哦，能不能請你幫我聽一下電話？

eng: Your hair wants cutting.
The Chinese people are exceptionally hardworking.
I saw a dirty dog enter the garden.
simp: 我看见一条脏狗进了花园。
trad: 我看見一條臟狗進了花園。

eng: We looked out the window, but we didn't see anything.
simp: 我们看了窗外，但什么都没看见。
trad: 我們看了窗外，但什麼都沒看見。

eng: There isn't a cloud in the sky.
I need to configure this server with an appropriate firewall system.
simp: 我该在这个服务器上设置一个防火墙。
trad: 我該在這個服務器上設置一個防火墻。

eng: I took him to the most expensive restaurant on campus.
simp: 我把他带到校区里最贵的餐馆去了。
trad: 我把他帶到校區裏最貴的餐館去了。

eng: I'm an honest person.
Foxes are wild animals.
I believe that he's happy.
I don't know what to say.
He said, "I'm from Canada."
An enemy of an enemy is a friend.
Will the police come?
Please forgive me.
There's no one sitting here.
There's not very many customers today.
I can't find the knife.
Do you want pepper on it?
My children like saccharum.
simp: 我的孩子们喜欢甘草棒。
trad: 我的孩子們喜歡甘草棒。

eng: He doesn't speak French, neither do I.
simp: 他不会讲法语。我也不会。
trad: 他不會講法語。我也不會。

eng: It's all Greek to me.
The food's not ready yet.
Pay attention!
Sorry, the book is out of stock.
simp: 不好意思，这本书已经卖完了。
trad: 不好意思，這本書已經賣完了。

eng: I'm not sure as to when he will turn up.
simp: 我不知道他甚麽时候会出现。
trad: 我不知道他甚麼時候會出現。

eng: I must give back the book to him by tomorrow.
simp: 我一定要在明天前把书还给他。
trad: 我一定要在明天前把書還給他。

eng: He managed to pass his driving test even though he was a poor driver.
simp: 他的驾驶技术很差，但也勉强通过了驾驶考试。
trad: 他的駕駛技術很差，但也勉強通過了駕駛考試。

eng: Tom enjoys playing tricks on me.
My parents keep arguing about stupid things. It's so annoying!
simp: 我父母整天都在为鸡毛蒜皮的事情吵架，真是烦死人了！
trad: 我父母整天都在為雞毛蒜皮的事情吵架，真是煩死人了！

eng: Commentators have variously described the sound of vuvuzelas as "annoying" and "satanic" and compared it with "a stampede of noisy elephants", "a deafening swarm of locusts", "a goat on the way to slaughter", "a giant hive full of very angry bees", and "a duck on speed".
simp: 评论员对巫巫兹拉的声音作出了各种各样的描述：除了「烦人」、「像魔鬼一般」之外，还把它比作「一群嘈吵的大象」、「一群嗡嗡狂叫的蝗虫」、「一隻准备给屠宰的山羊」、「一个装满发狂的蜜蜂的巨大蜂巢」、「一隻吃了摇头丸的鸭子」等等。
trad: 評論員對巫巫茲拉的聲音作出了各種各樣的描述：除了「煩人」、「像魔鬼一般」之外，還把它比作「一群嘈吵的大象」、「一群嗡嗡狂叫的蝗蟲」、「一隻準備給屠宰的山羊」、「一個裝滿發狂的蜜蜂的巨大蜂巢」、「一隻吃了搖頭丸的鴨子」等等。

eng: This is a Chinese fan.
She is progressing in Chinese.
No admittance except on business.
That's the best approach to the study of English.
simp: 那是学英语最好的方法。
trad: 那是學英語最好的方法。

eng: I can hear you, but I can't see you.
simp: 我听得见你，但我看不见你。
trad: 我聽得見你，但我看不見你。

eng: He may have been ill.
Tell me what you have in your hand.
Far from eye far from heart.
Generally speaking, the climate of Japan is mild.
simp: 总体上说，日本的气候温和。
trad: 總體上說，日本的氣候溫和。

eng: I want to leave this difficult job to her.
simp: 我想让她干这项艰难的工作。
trad: 我想讓她幹這項艱難的工作。

eng: No one can keep me from going there.
He used to live here.
He is very angry.
I got a makeup-induced rash.
simp: 我因为化妆品皮肤过敏了。
trad: 我因為化妝品皮膚過敏了。

eng: Beth has a strong habit of interrupting people while they are talking.
simp: 贝丝很喜欢在别人说话的时候插嘴。
trad: 貝絲很喜歡在別人說話的時候插嘴。

eng: Last week five students were absent from class.
It is essential that every child have the same educational opportunities.
simp: 每一个孩子都应该享有平等的学习机会。
trad: 每一個孩子都應該享有平等的學習機會。

eng: I have a lot of flowers. Some are red and some are yellow.
simp: 我种了很多花，有些是红色的，有些是黄色的。
trad: 我種了很多花，有些是紅色的，有些是黃色的。

eng: I wonder if life exists on other planets.
simp: 不知道别的星球上有没有生物呢？
trad: 不知道別的星球上有沒有生物呢？

eng: This hotel has accommodations for 1000 guests.
simp: 这家酒店可以容纳一千人。
trad: 這家酒店可以容納一千人。

eng: I'm not in the least interested in physics.
simp: 我对物理学完全没有兴趣。
trad: 我對物理學完全沒有興趣。

eng: She lived in five different countries by age 25.
simp: 她二十五岁的时候，就已经在五个不同的国家住过。
trad: 她二十五歲的時候，就已經在五個不同的國家住過。

eng: Do you have any grounds for thinking so?
simp: 你这种想法有没有根据？
trad: 你這種想法有沒有根據？

eng: I had my pocket picked on the train.
simp: 我在火车上给偷了东西。
trad: 我在火車上給偷了東西。

eng: Korean food is noted for its spicy flavor.
However, I recommend that you take the JR Narita Express (a train leaves every 30-60 minutes from the airport), to avoid the complexity of changing trains.
simp: 但是，我建议你乘 JR 的成田特急（每三十分钟至一个小时就有一班列车从机场开出），不用转车这麽麻烦。
trad: 但是，我建議你乘 JR 的成田特急（每三十分鐘至一個小時就有一班列車從機場開出），不用轉車這麼麻煩。

eng: I'm a nomad for life.
simp: 我一辈子就是个流浪者。
trad: 我一輩子就是個流浪者。

eng: This is totally worthless.
Do you smoke?
He left his parents when he was eight years old.
simp: 他八岁时离开了他的父母。
trad: 他八歲時離開了他的父母。

eng: Switzerland is a neutral country.
simp: 瑞士是一个中立的国家。
trad: 瑞士是一個中立的國家。

eng: I have a memory like a goldfish.
Man is the only animal that can make use of fire.
simp: 人是唯一会使用火的动物。
trad: 人是唯一會使用火的動物。

eng: We have a cat. We are all fond of the cat.
simp: 我们有一只猫。我们都喜欢猫。
trad: 我們有一只貓。我們都喜歡貓。

eng: Fur coats are on sale.
Why don't you have some sushi?
I have no objection to paying a special fee if it is necessary.
simp: 如果必要的话，我不反对付特别费用。
trad: 如果必要的話，我不反對付特別費用。

eng: I refuse to be treated like a child.
simp: 我拒绝被像一个孩子般对待。
trad: 我拒絕被像一個孩子般對待。

eng: I'll let you decide.
That scandal cost him his reputation.
simp: 丑闻让他付出了失去声誉的代价。
trad: 醜聞讓他付出了失去聲譽的代價。

eng: At that time, Mexico was not yet independent of Spain.
simp: 那个时候，墨西哥还没有独立于西班牙。
trad: 那個時候，墨西哥還沒有獨立於西班牙。

eng: Someone has taken my shoes by mistake.
What do you do after school?
Let's order twenty kebabs!
simp: 我们就点十二个烤肉串吧!
trad: 我們就點十二個烤肉串吧!

eng: I need to go home a little early today.
We need fire.
We have a really good cook.
simp: 我们有一位非常好的厨师。
trad: 我們有一位非常好的廚師。

eng: Who's working tonight?
There's a lot of stuff in our lo mein.
simp: 在我们的拌面里有好多东西。
trad: 在我們的拌面裏有好多東西。

eng: Do you eat meat?
There's blood in my urine.
He sang a song.
Our pilaf is four yuan.
Where's the cook?
Although her house is nearby, I seldom see her.
simp: 虽然我住在她家附近，可是也很少见到她。
trad: 雖然我住在她家附近，可是也很少見到她。

eng: To love and to be loved is the greatest happiness.
simp: 爱和被爱是人生最大的乐事。
trad: 愛和被愛是人生最大的樂事。

eng: Most Swiss people can speak three or four languages.
simp: 瑞士人大多能说三、四种语言。
trad: 瑞士人大多能說三、四種語言。

eng: It is not until you go abroad that you realize how small Japan is.
simp: 你出国看看，才会知道日本是多麽的细小。
trad: 你出國看看，才會知道日本是多麼的細小。

eng: The castle is haunted, he said with a shiver.
simp: 他边颤抖边说：「那座城堡有鬼。」
trad: 他邊顫抖邊說：「那座城堡有鬼。」

eng: It may safely be said that he will never succeed in business.
simp: 我可以肯定的说，他做生意一定永远不会成功。
trad: 我可以肯定的說，他做生意一定永遠不會成功。

eng: He went to London in 1970.
No one can help me.
He returned at six.
I swim once a week.
You must stop smoking.
Believe it or not, she has three children.
simp: 她有三个孩子，信不信由你。
trad: 她有三個孩子，信不信由你。

eng: He is not stupid.
I don't want to get a suntan.
He filled the bottle with water.
It snowed for ten consecutive days.
Here is Japan.
She put on her hat to go out.
simp: 她戴上了帽子准备出去。
trad: 她戴上了帽子準備出去。

eng: He ought to be punished if he commits a crime.
simp: 如果他犯了罪，他应该受到惩罚。
trad: 如果他犯了罪，他應該受到懲罰。

eng: I think a film is more interesting than any book.
simp: 我觉得一部电影比任何书都有趣。
trad: 我覺得一部電影比任何書都有趣。

eng: Both brothers are musicians.
What have you come here for?
I'm afraid not.
The student is working at sociology.
simp: 那个学生正在学习社会学。
trad: 那個學生正在學習社會學。

eng: They gave him a chance to escape.
simp: 他们给了他逃脱的机会。
trad: 他們給了他逃脫的機會。

eng: It was in 1939 that the Second World War broke out.
simp: 第二次世界大战是在1939年开始的。
trad: 第二次世界大戰是在1939年開始的。

eng: When did you see her?
Go along this street and turn right at the bank.
simp: 请沿着这条路走，在银行那里向右转。
trad: 請沿著這條路走，在銀行那裏向右轉。

eng: I got my decayed tooth pulled out.
What stuff is this jacket made of?
simp: 这外套是什么材料作的？
trad: 這外套是什麼材料作的？

eng: I cannot get in touch with him.
I cannot get in touch with him.
I left my umbrella on the train.
simp: 我把雨伞留在电车上了。
trad: 我把雨傘留在電車上了。

eng: I wrote the song for her.
Please go on with your story.
He paid me a compliment.
I have breakfast every morning.
In Singapore, one way to punish a criminal is to whip him or her.
simp: 在新加坡，鞭刑是处置犯人的方法之一。
trad: 在新加坡，鞭刑是處置犯人的方法之一。

eng: That's too much.
That's too much.
My metabolism is such that no matter how much I eat I don't put on weight. "Just now, this second, you've made enemies of people throughout the world."
simp: “我就算吃得再多也不会发胖。” “你在那一瞬间成了世界众人的敌人。“
trad: “我就算吃得再多也不會發胖。” “你在那一瞬間成了世界眾人的敵人。“

eng: My father's condition seems to improve one moment, but the next moment he sinks again.
simp: 我父亲的状况时好时坏。
trad: 我父親的狀況時好時壞。

eng: He is close to sixty.
She strongly resembles her grandmother.
What did you do with my baggage?
I plan to stay in the city.
I plan to stay in the city.
I can understand your position perfectly.
We had to pay ten thousand yen in addition.
simp: 我们还得付多一万日元。
trad: 我們還得付多一萬日元。

eng: War isn't something to be done lightly, also changing the constitution isn't something that should be done because "I just really want to go to war".
simp: 战争不是轻易就应该开始的，所以也不能够因为像打仗就改变宪法。
trad: 戰爭不是輕易就應該開始的，所以也不能夠因為像打仗就改變憲法。

eng: Please explain in detail.
I'm absolutely sure!
He says that he will lend me the book when he is done with it.
simp: 他说用完这本书后会借给我。
trad: 他說用完這本書後會借給我。

eng: I think it's somewhere around here.
Man is the hunter, woman is his game.
simp: 男人是猎人而女人就是他的猎物。
trad: 男人是獵人而女人就是他的獵物。

eng: He answered as follows.
I bought five books a month.
simp: 我当时每个月都会购买五本书。
trad: 我當時每個月都會購買五本書。

eng: Few people are free from cares.
simp: 只有少数的人是无忧无虑的。
trad: 只有少數的人是無憂無慮的。

eng: The rat's here! Go call the cat!
The pilaf with meat is eight yuan. The vegetarian pilaf is only four yuan.
simp: 抓饭肉是八块钱。素抓饭只是四块钱。
trad: 抓飯肉是八塊錢。素抓飯只是四塊錢。

eng: Are you new?
You came alone today?
Our food is cheap.
Our restaurant is near the southern bus station.
simp: 我们的饭店在汽车南站的附近。
trad: 我們的飯店在汽車南站的附近。

eng: Do you have paper?
If you bite me, then I'll bite you, too.
simp: 你如果咬我，我也要咬你。
trad: 你如果咬我，我也要咬你。

eng: For example, if a chain-smoking teacher cautions a pupil for smoking, that warning is self-contradictory.
simp: 举例说，如果一个老师警告学生不要吸烟，但自己却每天吸个不停，那麽这个警告就是自相矛盾的了。
trad: 舉例說，如果一個老師警告學生不要吸煙，但自己卻每天吸個不停，那麼這個警告就是自相矛盾的了。

eng: You may not smoke in this room.
When I try to walk, I get an awful pain here.
Clouds sail across the sky.
simp: 一片一片的白云在上空飘过。
trad: 一片一片的白雲在上空飄過。

eng: She plays piano as well as the guitar.
simp: 她除了懂得弹钢琴，还懂得弹吉他。
trad: 她除了懂得彈鋼琴，還懂得彈吉他。

eng: Does she play the piano?
It will take him two hours to finish the work.
simp: 我想他得花两个小时才能把工作做完。
trad: 我想他得花兩個小時才能把工作做完。

eng: We've been matched up with some strong teams this year.
simp: 我们今年和不少强队交过手。
trad: 我們今年和不少強隊交過手。

eng: Who is that gentleman in spectacles?
simp: 那位戴眼镜的男士是谁？
trad: 那位戴眼鏡的男士是誰？

eng: The wet vase left a mark on the table.
simp: 花瓶在桌上留下了水迹。
trad: 花瓶在桌上留下了水跡。

eng: Are you from Urumqi?
Who's going to clean up tonight?
Give me the spoon.
Do you love music?
You're right. The noodle broth here is a bit expensive.
simp: 您说得对。这里的面汤比较贵。
trad: 您說得對。這裏的面湯比較貴。

eng: Sugar melts in hot water.
My little toe hurts.
But no man could help me.
He has three sons.
Does he speak English?
He is nothing but a poet.
Stop talking loudly.
No more, thank you. I'm full.
My heart is beating so fast!
His teeth are yellow from smoking too much.
This table is clean.
It may not be clean, but you won't get sick from eating it.
This is Cao Cao's trickery.
Cut the potatoes.
But I don't know how to cook kebabs!
I'm sorry, we're all out of manti.
We're also out of eggs.
Our restaurant is the best.
Will you come back tomorrow?
They are the only students who study Chinese.
simp: 学中文的学生只有他们几个。
trad: 學中文的學生只有他們幾個。

eng: How's business?
Emi looks happy.
Nancy cannot have read this book.
I don't care.
It is this window that he broke.
A boat suddenly appeared out of the mist.
simp: 一艘船突然从雾中出现。
trad: 一艘船突然從霧中出現。

eng: At last, it began to rain.
I smell smoke in the elevator.
Have you finished cleaning your room yet?
simp: 你把你的房间打扫好了没有？
trad: 你把你的房間打掃好了沒有？

eng: After asking for my key at the front desk, I took the elevator to my floor.
simp: 我到柜檯拿了钥匙，然后就乘电梯去了我房间的楼层。
trad: 我到櫃檯拿了鑰匙，然後就乘電梯去了我房間的樓層。

eng: There are things in this world which simply cannot be expressed in the form of words.
simp: 这个世界上有些事物根本不能用言语形容。
trad: 這個世界上有些事物根本不能用言語形容。

eng: Don't avoid my question.
School starts next Monday.
Do you know him?
The two brothers are quite unlike in their appearance.
simp: 哥哥和弟弟的样子一点也不像。
trad: 哥哥和弟弟的樣子一點也不像。

eng: We have three airplanes.
Hey, Tom, forget about your worries.
The reason why we cannot support his view will be given below.
simp: 以下是我们不支持他的看法的理由。
trad: 以下是我們不支持他的看法的理由。

eng: He likes to work in the garden.
He likes to work in the garden.
Admission to the show is $5.
The volcano has erupted twice this year.
simp: 这座火山在这年内爆发了两次。
trad: 這座火山在這年內爆發了兩次。

eng: The accident happened two years ago.
The man passed by without so much as glancing at her.
simp: 那人连瞧也不瞧她一眼就走过了。
trad: 那人連瞧也不瞧她一眼就走過了。

eng: Could you drive more slowly?
She bought her son a camera.
simp: 她买了一部照相机给她儿子。
trad: 她買了一部照相機給她兒子。

eng: I decided to go to college to major in English.
simp: 我决定上大学主修英语。
trad: 我決定上大學主修英語。

eng: He who would the daughter win, with the mother must begin.
simp: 想要得到女儿，就必须从她母亲那儿开始努力。
trad: 想要得到女兒，就必須從她母親那兒開始努力。

eng: Don't you think the air conditioner is turned up too high in here?
simp: 你不觉得这房里的冷气太强了吗？
trad: 你不覺得這房裏的冷氣太強了嗎？

eng: Shit! I've got a flat.
She advised him to use a bicycle.
I was surprised at the news of his sudden death.
simp: 他突然过世的消息让我感到惊讶。
trad: 他突然過世的消息讓我感到驚訝。

eng: Though young, he is wise.
He does not seem pleased with his condition.
simp: 他似乎对自己的状况不满意。
trad: 他似乎對自己的狀況不滿意。

eng: I'm sick of her excuses.
simp: 她的借口我已经听腻了。
trad: 她的借口我已經聽膩了。

eng: I do not like mathematics very much.
The tree is about as high as the roof.
simp: 这棵树和屋顶差不多一样高。
trad: 這棵樹和屋頂差不多一樣高。

eng: Everybody had a good time.
Don't worry about what others say.
There is much water in the pond today.
He is the best player on our team.
simp: 他是我们队上最优秀的选手。
trad: 他是我們隊上最優秀的選手。

eng: I was late for the meeting with the result that I missed the most important part.
simp: 会议我迟到了，结果错过了最重要的部分。
trad: 會議我遲到了，結果錯過了最重要的部分。

eng: The more you earn, the more you spend.
simp: 挣的越多钱，就花得越多钱。
trad: 掙的越多錢，就花得越多錢。

eng: I do not doubt it in the least.
simp: 我对这个一点都不怀疑。
trad: 我對這個一點都不懷疑。

eng: I'm a little taller than you.
What? I can't hear you.
simp: 什么？你说的话我听不见。
trad: 什麼？你說的話我聽不見。

eng: I don't think we should do that.
simp: 我觉得我们不应该那样做。
trad: 我覺得我們不應該那樣做。

eng: I think we can be friends.
simp: 我觉得我们可以做朋友。
trad: 我覺得我們可以做朋友。

eng: I would love to write hundreds of sentences on Tatoeba, but I've got things to do.
simp: 我真想在 Tatoeba 写很多很多的句子，不过我有别的事要做。
trad: 我真想在 Tatoeba 寫很多很多的句子，不過我有別的事要做。

eng: On behalf of the company, I would like to express our hearty thanks to you all.
simp: 在此仅代表本公司向各位致上衷心的谢意。
trad: 在此僅代表本公司向各位致上衷心的謝意。

eng: If you're tired, why don't you go to sleep? "Because if I go to sleep now I will wake up too early."
simp: 「你累的话怎麽不去睡觉？」「因为我现在去睡的话，就会太早醒过来了。」
trad: 「你累的話怎麼不去睡覺？」「因為我現在去睡的話，就會太早醒過來了。」

eng: He has no girlfriend.
I hear you've got a new girlfriend.
Don't be that worried.
Your problems don't concern me.
simp: 你的问题和我没有关系。
trad: 你的問題和我沒有關系。

eng: We're not afraid of any difficulties.
The plane flew over Mt. Fuji.
simp: 飞机飞过了富士山的上空。
trad: 飛機飛過了富士山的上空。

eng: I was a teacher.
I guess the dog bites.
Why don't you drop in for tea at your convenience?
simp: 你有空的时候来喝杯茶吧。
trad: 你有空的時候來喝杯茶吧。

eng: I doubt that I'm a good writer.
simp: 我怀疑我是不是一个好作家。
trad: 我懷疑我是不是一個好作家。

eng: Some of the students are in the library, but the others are in the classroom.
simp: 有些学生去了图书馆，但其他的都在课室里。
trad: 有些學生去了圖書館，但其他的都在課室裏。

eng: On a clear day, you can see Mt. Fuji.
simp: 睛天的时候，就可以看见富士山了。
trad: 睛天的時候，就可以看見富士山了。

eng: I hurried to the house only to find it empty.
simp: 我匆匆忙忙的赶到那房子去，但却发现里面原来是空的。
trad: 我匆匆忙忙的趕到那房子去，但卻發現裏面原來是空的。

eng: Compare the two carefully, and you will see the difference.
simp: 仔细的比较一下，就会发现两者之间的分别了。
trad: 仔細的比較一下，就會發現兩者之間的分別了。

eng: Don't forget to extinguish your cigarette.
This book is difficult to read as it is written in French.
simp: 因为是用法文写的，所以这本书很难读。
trad: 因為是用法文寫的，所以這本書很難讀。

eng: You still don't have enough experience.
He was too tired to go any further.
simp: 他因为太疲劳而无法继续前进。
trad: 他因為太疲勞而無法繼續前進。

eng: Your memory is good.
What do you think about young people today?
simp: 你对于现在的年轻人有什么看法？
trad: 你對於現在的年輕人有什麼看法？

eng: 2001 is the year when the 21st century begins.
Seems like I'm the third wheel here. I should go.
simp: 好像我做电灯泡了。我该走了。
trad: 好像我做電燈泡了。我該走了。

eng: His birthday is August 21st.
simp: 他的生日是八月二十一日。
trad: 他的生日是八月二十一日。

eng: Birds of a feather flock together.
I'm going to bed.
I have been busy lately.
He worked hard for peace for these ten years.
simp: 这十年间，他为了和平尽力。
trad: 這十年間，他為了和平盡力。

eng: He is a promising young man.
Why didn't you say so earlier?
It was much worse than we initially thought.
simp: 事情比我们最初想象的更严重。
trad: 事情比我們最初想象的更嚴重。

eng: There are so many mistakes in this book that the teacher has dubbed it "The Drunkard's Edition".
simp: 这本书里错误多得以至于老师把它叫作“醉鬼版”。
trad: 這本書裏錯誤多得以至於老師把它叫作“醉鬼版”。

eng: You can't have your cake and eat it.
simp: 既要马好，又要马不吃草。
trad: 既要馬好，又要馬不吃草。

eng: Tom, who had been working all day, wanted to have a rest.
simp: 工作了一整天的汤姆想要休息一下。
trad: 工作了一整天的湯姆想要休息一下。

eng: A punch is just a punch. A kick is just a kick.
simp: 出拳就是出拳。出脚就是出脚。
trad: 出拳就是出拳。出腳就是出腳。

eng: You can study, no matter your age.
She's thinking of taking a couple of courses at a cooking school.
simp: 她打算去烹饪学校上几堂课。
trad: 她打算去烹飪學校上幾堂課。

eng: This book is a result of his enthusiastic research.
simp: 这本书是他热心研究的成果。
trad: 這本書是他熱心研究的成果。

eng: The doctor continued to observe the patient's behavior.
simp: 医生继续观察病人的一举一动。
trad: 醫生繼續觀察病人的一舉一動。

eng: I spend what time I can spare in reading.
simp: 我把空閒时间全都花在阅读上。
trad: 我把空閒時間全都花在閱讀上。

eng: This account does not agree with the facts.
Bring a couple more chairs.
The soldiers fought valiantly, but finally they had to give in.
simp: 士兵作战时毫无畏缩，但到了最后还是不得不投降。
trad: 士兵作戰時毫無畏縮，但到了最後還是不得不投降。

eng: Who is the boy that is swimming over there?
simp: 在那边游泳的男孩是谁？
trad: 在那邊遊泳的男孩是誰？

eng: I'll give you five dollars.
The graduation from elementary school to middle school is regarded by some as the first step towards adulthood.
simp: 有些人认为从小学升到中学是踏入成年的第一步。
trad: 有些人認為從小學升到中學是踏入成年的第一步。

eng: It would be great if that were true.
simp: 如果这是真的，那就太好了。
trad: 如果這是真的，那就太好了。

eng: It's already eleven o'clock. I must be leaving now.
simp: 现在已经十一时了。我一定要走了。
trad: 現在已經十一時了。我一定要走了。

eng: Don't you feel the house shaking?
simp: 你不觉得房子在摇动吗？
trad: 你不覺得房子在搖動嗎？

eng: Is there a Percy in your class?
simp: 你班里有没有一个叫做珀西的人？
trad: 你班裏有沒有一個叫做珀西的人？

eng: This form looks kind of complicated. Help me fill it out.
simp: 这个表格好像有点複杂，你可以帮我填吗？
trad: 這個表格好像有點複雜，你可以幫我填嗎？

eng: Can you read this kanji?
One day, the police raided a whole group of prostitutes, and the girl was among them.
simp: 有一天，警方突击搜捕了一个娼妓集团，而她正是被捕的人的其中一个。
trad: 有一天，警方突擊搜捕了一個娼妓集團，而她正是被捕的人的其中一個。

eng: What do you say to taking a rest?
I'd like to have a glass of wine.
The soldiers were ready to die for their country.
simp: 士兵们已经准备好为国牺牲了。
trad: 士兵們已經準備好為國犧牲了。

eng: That young man can't get the sort of jobs he wants and doesn't have any friends; he's really at a loss.
simp: 那个年轻人既找不到自己喜欢的工作，又一个朋友也没有 ﹣ 他真的不知道该怎麽办好。
trad: 那個年輕人既找不到自己喜歡的工作，又一個朋友也沒有 ﹣ 他真的不知道該怎麼辦好。

eng: She values health above wealth.
simp: 她觉得健康比财富重要。
trad: 她覺得健康比財富重要。

eng: That is too small a box to hold all these things.
simp: 那个箱子太小了，放不下这里这麽多东西。
trad: 那個箱子太小了，放不下這裏這麼多東西。

eng: Though I failed, I will try again.
simp: 虽然我失败了，但我会再试一次的。
trad: 雖然我失敗了，但我會再試一次的。

eng: What is your impression of America?
simp: 你对美国的感觉是怎样的？
trad: 你對美國的感覺是怎樣的？

eng: He has an eye for the beautiful.
I put the receiver to my ear.
The palace was heavily guarded.
This is the most beautiful flower in the garden.
simp: 这朵是整个花园最漂亮的花。
trad: 這朵是整個花園最漂亮的花。

eng: Honesty is a virtue.
She suddenly became famous.
Didn't you know that he passed away two years ago?
simp: 你不知道他两年前死了吗？
trad: 你不知道他兩年前死了嗎？

eng: America did away with slavery in 1863.
simp: 美国在一八六三年废除了奴隶制度。
trad: 美國在一八六三年廢除了奴隸制度。

eng: My life would be completely empty without you.
simp: 如果没有你，我的人生就会变得空白一片。
trad: 如果沒有你，我的人生就會變得空白一片。

eng: The can is empty.
I don't think it's possible to finish that amount of work in one day.
simp: 我觉得很难用一天就做完这麽多的工作。
trad: 我覺得很難用一天就做完這麼多的工作。

eng: I have diarrhea.
Lao Gan Ma and I have a love-hate relationship.
simp: 我和老干妈有爱恨交加的关系。
trad: 我和老幹媽有愛恨交加的關系。

eng: I find it difficult to do all this work in a day.
simp: 我觉得很难用一天时间做完所有这些工作。
trad: 我覺得很難用一天時間做完所有這些工作。

eng: I hope you have a good trip.
I hope you have a good trip.
I hope you have a good trip.
When Dad came home, I was watching TV.
simp: 爸爸回到家的时候，我正在看电视。
trad: 爸爸回到家的時候，我正在看電視。

eng: He's a man of outstanding character.
She shrieked whenever she saw a spider.
He has already finished his homework.
Parrots imitate human speech.
simp: 鹦鹉懂得模彷人类说话。
trad: 鸚鵡懂得模仿人類說話。

eng: All sold out!
The girl's eyes were filled with tears.
simp: 女孩的眼睛充满了泪水。
trad: 女孩的眼睛充滿了淚水。

eng: He had gone there to help garbage workers strike peacefully for better pay and working conditions.
simp: 他去了那里帮助清洁工人和平地争取更高的薪金和更好的工作环境。
trad: 他去了那裏幫助清潔工人和平地爭取更高的薪金和更好的工作環境。

eng: Mary is at a loss what to say to him.
simp: 玛莉不知道该和他说甚麽才好。
trad: 瑪莉不知道該和他說甚麼才好。

eng: On the whole I am satisfied with the result.
simp: 总的来说，我对这个结果很满意。
trad: 總的來說，我對這個結果很滿意。

eng: Fresh fruit is good for your health.
simp: 新鲜的水果对你的健康有益。
trad: 新鮮的水果對你的健康有益。

eng: I was abducted by aliens.
She's not prettier than her mother.
simp: 她没有比她妈妈更漂亮。
trad: 她沒有比她媽媽更漂亮。

eng: I've got nothing to do with it.
He's much younger than Tom.
If so, what should we do?
simp: 如果是这样的话，我们该做什么？
trad: 如果是這樣的話，我們該做什麼？

eng: I'm not ashamed of my father being poor.
simp: 我父亲很穷并不让我觉得丢脸。
trad: 我父親很窮並不讓我覺得丟臉。

eng: Don't throw a stone at the dog.
He likes coffee without sugar.
Just follow your heart.
I don't know why she is this worried.
simp: 不知道她为什么这么担心呢。
trad: 不知道她為什麼這麼擔心呢。

eng: So friendly was his letter that she was deeply moved and began to cry.
simp: 他的信写得很亲切，她读了以后不禁感动得哭了起来。
trad: 他的信寫得很親切，她讀了以後不禁感動得哭了起來。

eng: The buses left one after another.
simp: 公车一辆一辆地开出了。
trad: 公車一輛一輛地開出了。

eng: We must work as long as we live.
What will you have to drink?
He decided not to buy the house, because in the first place it was too expensive, and in the second place it was too far from his office.
simp: 他决定不买那座房子，首先是因为太贵了，其次是因为房子离他公司太远了。
trad: 他決定不買那座房子，首先是因為太貴了，其次是因為房子離他公司太遠了。

eng: I got up early enough to catch the first train.
simp: 我起了个大早为了赶第一班火车。
trad: 我起了個大早為了趕第一班火車。

eng: Do you have a points card?
I am studying now.
I want to leave Paris.
This gun has a range of 300 meters.
He invented an excuse for being late.
simp: 他为他的迟到制造了一个借口。
trad: 他為他的遲到制造了一個借口。

eng: I feel like the window was open all night.
simp: 我感觉窗子一整晚都开着。
trad: 我感覺窗子一整晚都開著。

eng: Who do you think I am?
I introduced Mary to my parents.
simp: 我把玛丽介绍给我的父母了。
trad: 我把瑪麗介紹給我的父母了。

eng: City dwellers have a higher death rate than country people do.
simp: 城市居民的死亡率高于农村里的人。
trad: 城市居民的死亡率高於農村裏的人。

eng: He came.
I'm back! Oh? Have we got a guest?
simp: 我回来了！啊？我们有客人啊？
trad: 我回來了！啊？我們有客人啊？

eng: Two years have passed since he went over to American in order to study English.
simp: 他去美国学英文已经有两年的时间了。
trad: 他去美國學英文已經有兩年的時間了。

eng: I've got little time for reading these days.
simp: 我最近没甚麽时间看书。
trad: 我最近沒甚麼時間看書。

eng: He had a lot of work to do.
I speak a little Japanese.
A stranger tapped me on the shoulder from behind. He took me for some other person, I'm sure.
simp: 有个陌生人从后面拍了拍我的肩。我肯定他是认错人了。
trad: 有個陌生人從後面拍了拍我的肩。我肯定他是認錯人了。

eng: I forgot to lock the storeroom.
I cried all night long.
Her new novel has been highly praised.
Do you know this man in the picture?
simp: 你认识照片里的男人吗？
trad: 你認識照片裏的男人嗎？

eng: What's the nationality of that cameraman over there?
Tell me when to start.
Hope is not a strategy.
Do you run every day?
He tried to kill himself but it ended in failure.
simp: 他试图自杀，但是失败了。
trad: 他試圖自殺，但是失敗了。

eng: I aimed my gun at the target.
simp: 我把我的手枪指向了目标。
trad: 我把我的手槍指向了目標。

eng: I will be free in ten minutes.
This house is mine.
Your voice reminds me of my late grandmother.
simp: 我的声音让我想起了我已故的祖母。
trad: 我的聲音讓我想起了我已故的祖母。

eng: I've already come here before.
There are forty thousand cameras in Urumqi.
simp: 在乌鲁木齐有四万个摄像机。
trad: 在烏魯木齊有四萬個攝像機。

eng: You look as if you don't have a care in the world.
simp: 你看似对这世间已了无牵挂。
trad: 你看似對這世間已了無牽掛。

eng: I think so, too.
When did this occur?
simp: 这件事是什么时候发生的？
trad: 這件事是什麼時候發生的？

eng: They change everything.
You're the boss.
I'm in Boston going for my Ph.D. right now.
simp: 我正在在波士顿读博士。
trad: 我正在在波士頓讀博士。

eng: This website is very useful.
Twenty dollars are one hundred and forty yuan.
simp: 二十美金等于一百四十元。
trad: 二十美金等於一百四十元。

eng: Put the carrots in the pot.
Betty killed him.
You're completely right!
I live in this place.
My pen isn't as good as yours.
simp: 我的钢笔不像你那支那么好。
trad: 我的鋼筆不像你那支那麼好。

eng: This coffee is too hot for me to drink.
simp: 这咖啡热得我没办法喝。
trad: 這咖啡熱得我沒辦法喝。

eng: No Trespassing.
He rescued the dog at the risk of his own life.
simp: 他冒着生命危险救了那条狗。
trad: 他冒著生命危險救了那條狗。

eng: How fast you walk!
Nothing is as difficult as becoming a person.
This flag is very beautiful.
I need help from several people.
My right hand is Uighur, and my left is Han.
simp: 我的右手是维族的，左手是汉族的。
trad: 我的右手是維族的，左手是漢族的。

eng: Mother bakes cookies on Sundays.
The trees are green.
He has written a letter.
He got a lot of money.
There's nothing that can be done.
There is one way.
I need to go to the China Construction Bank.
simp: 我需要去一趟中国建设银行。
trad: 我需要去一趟中國建設銀行。

eng: He stretched out his arm to take the book.
simp: 他伸长了手臂为了能拿到书。
trad: 他伸長了手臂為了能拿到書。

eng: A green carpet will not go with this blue curtain.
simp: 绿色的毯子和这条蓝色的帘子不配。
trad: 綠色的毯子和這條藍色的簾子不配。

eng: Life is a long, long road.
simp: 生活是一条很长、很长的道路。
trad: 生活是一條很長、很長的道路。

eng: He accepted my idea.
He hung a lamp from the ceiling.
simp: 他把一盏灯挂在了天花板上。
trad: 他把一盞燈掛在了天花板上。

eng: Mr Suzuki, as far as I know, has not returned from Hawaii yet.
simp: 就我所知，铃木先生还没从夏威夷回来。
trad: 就我所知，鈴木先生還沒從夏威夷回來。

eng: A plastic dish will melt on the stove.
simp: 塑料盘子在烤箱里会化的。
trad: 塑料盤子在烤箱裏會化的。

eng: When Michael is at home, his work is to clean the windows.
simp: 在家里，麦克的工作就是擦窗户。
trad: 在家裏，麥克的工作就是擦窗戶。

eng: I miss you badly.
What is your name?
My train left at 7 and arrived in New York at 10.
simp: 我乘的火车7点出发，10点到了纽约。
trad: 我乘的火車7點出發，10點到了紐約。

eng: The United States is a republic.
Follow me into the room.
How long have you known her?
God knows we did everything we could.
simp: 上帝知道我们做了我们所能做的事。
trad: 上帝知道我們做了我們所能做的事。

eng: Don't depend too much on others.
I like to eat apples.
Hi, Roger. I'm doing well.
Do you remember?
A crowd gathered on this street.
I don't go to school on Sundays.
An earthquake can take place at any time.
The family received me very warmly.
simp: 这个家庭热情地接待了我。
trad: 這個家庭熱情地接待了我。

eng: Do you need this book?
The total comes to 3,000 yen.
I was puzzled about what to do next.
simp: 我对以后做什么很迷茫。
trad: 我對以後做什麼很迷茫。

eng: No one lives in this building.
I'd like something to eat.
Is the cat on the chair or under the chair?
simp: 猫在椅子上面，还是在椅子下面呢？
trad: 貓在椅子上面，還是在椅子下面呢？

eng: He went from Tokyo to Osaka by plane.
simp: 他在东京乘飞机去了大坂。
trad: 他在東京乘飛機去了大阪。

eng: They lost their way; otherwise, they would have arrived long ago.
simp: 他们肯定是迷路了，不然他们应该已经到了很久了。
trad: 他們肯定是迷路了，不然他們應該已經到了很久了。

eng: If I had eaten breakfast this morning, I would not be hungry now.
simp: 如果我今早吃了早餐，现在肚子就不会这麽饿了。
trad: 如果我今早吃了早餐，現在肚子就不會這麼餓了。

eng: Why are there crickets in my room?
simp: 在我的房间里为什么有蟋蟀？
trad: 在我的房間裏為什麼有蟋蟀？

eng: I would like to improve my English pronunciation.
simp: 我想改善我的英语发音。
trad: 我想改善我的英語發音。

eng: I forgot what his name was.
simp: 我忘记他叫什么名字了。
trad: 我忘記他叫什麼名字了。

eng: He's crazy about soccer.
All tragedies end with a death.
simp: 所有悲剧都由死亡终结。
trad: 所有悲劇都由死亡終結。

eng: He studied English history.
I went to his place straight away.
My uncle's hobby is playing baseball.
It's nothing, don't be afraid!
These plants are too small. I don't think that they'll grow.
simp: 这些植物太小了，我觉得它们长不大。
trad: 這些植物太小了，我覺得它們長不大。

eng: You've come back?
You've come back?
You've come back?
You've come back?
Stop!
We have a cat. We are all fond of the cat.
simp: 我们有一只猫。我们都喜欢这只猫。
trad: 我們有一只貓。我們都喜歡這只貓。

eng: In China, there's a saying that you can't judge a person by appearance.
simp: 在中国有一种说法：人不可貌相。
trad: 在中國有一種說法：人不可貌相。

eng: What should I do?
Is the bank far from here?
I would like you to assist me with my gardening.
simp: 我想请你帮我整理花园。
trad: 我想請你幫我整理花園。

eng: Who wants hot chocolate?
It's hot today.
It's rather cold today.
Is anybody here?
Prostitution, gambling, the use of narcotic substances, drunkenness, disorder, and all other illegal activities are STRICTLY FORBIDDEN.
simp: 严禁卖淫嫖娼，赌博，吸毒，酗酒滋事等违法犯罪活动！
trad: 嚴禁賣淫嫖娼，賭博，吸毒，酗酒滋事等違法犯罪活動！

eng: This is for you.
I have a high fever.
He just arrived.
He broke the law.
It's not that far.
I haven't seen her for a long time.
simp: 我已经好久没有看到她了。
trad: 我已經好久沒有看到她了。

eng: We will tidy up our room so that Mom is satisfied.
simp: 我们将要整理房间，这样妈妈就会满意了。
trad: 我們將要整理房間，這樣媽媽就會滿意了。

eng: Mother told me to mow the lawn.
He deliberately exposed her to danger.
I will not borrow money from those people.
simp: 我是不会向那些人借钱的。
trad: 我是不會向那些人借錢的。

eng: We spent a lot of time looking for a parking lot.
simp: 我们花了很长时间找停车场。
trad: 我們花了很長時間找停車場。

eng: After a six month period, his leg was healed and is normal again.
simp: 过了六个月，他的腿便治好，回复正常了。
trad: 過了六個月，他的腿便治好，回復正常了。

eng: Either you or I must attend the meeting.
simp: 你和我其中一个要出席这次的会议。
trad: 你和我其中一個要出席這次的會議。

eng: This is a matter of great importance.
simp: 这是一件十分重要的事。
trad: 這是一件十分重要的事。

eng: The box he found was empty.
There are some cases where the rule does not hold good.
simp: 有些情况之下，这条规则不能成立。
trad: 有些情況之下，這條規則不能成立。

eng: I have a friend whose father is a famous pianist.
simp: 我有一个朋友，他的父亲是位名钢琴家。
trad: 我有一個朋友，他的父親是位名鋼琴家。

eng: Your composition was good except for the spelling.
simp: 你的文章写得很好，但却有很多字拼错了。
trad: 你的文章寫得很好，但卻有很多字拼錯了。

eng: We have no school tomorrow.
If you go by bus, you can get there in about one-third of the time.
simp: 你乘公车去的话，可以省掉三分之二的时间。
trad: 你乘公車去的話，可以省掉三分之二的時間。

eng: I wanna have dinner in a restaurant.
My uncle lives in Madrid, the capital of Spain.
simp: 我叔叔住在西班牙的首都马德里。
trad: 我叔叔住在西班牙的首都馬德裏。

eng: He believes himself to be infallible.
You should apologize to her for being rude.
simp: 你应该为你的粗鲁向她道歉。
trad: 你應該為你的粗魯向她道歉。

eng: John lives in New York.
Take me to your leader.
If you don't want to stay alone, I can keep you company.
simp: 如果你不想一个人呆着，我可以陪着你。
trad: 如果你不想一個人呆著，我可以陪著你。

eng: Ken plays soccer every day.
He sat there looking out the window.
He fired three shots.
I'm not too sure how to pronounce that word.
simp: 我不太确定这个单词的发音。
trad: 我不太確定這個單詞的發音。

eng: I saw a young man lying on the bench under the cherry tree in the park.
simp: 在公园里，我看到一个年轻人躺在一棵樱桃树下的长椅上。
trad: 在公園裏，我看到一個年輕人躺在一棵櫻桃樹下的長椅上。

eng: My mother speaks slowly.
I would rather stay here.
I come here every Fourth of July.
simp: 我每年7月4号都会来这里。
trad: 我每年7月4號都會來這裏。

eng: Give him an inch and he'll take a yard.
How old is he?
His room's a mess.
When you leave the bathroom, you should wash your hands.
He doesn't tan.
Even times odd is even, odd times odd is odd.
simp: 偶数乘以奇数是偶数，奇数乘以奇数是奇数。
trad: 偶數乘以奇數是偶數，奇數乘以奇數是奇數。

eng: I don't want to lose my ideas, even though some of them are a bit extreme.
simp: 我不想放弃我的想法，虽然一些想法有点极端。
trad: 我不想放棄我的想法，雖然一些想法有點極端。

eng: Even though he apologized, I'm still furious.
simp: 即使他道歉了，我还是很愤怒。
trad: 即使他道歉了，我還是很憤怒。

eng: Adam was furious with me when I broke his watch.
simp: 我把亚当的手錶弄坏了，气得他七窍生烟。
trad: 我把亞當的手錶弄壞了，氣得他七竅生煙。

eng: This is the pen that he signed the document with.
simp: 这就是他用来签署那份文件的笔了。
trad: 這就是他用來簽署那份文件的筆了。

eng: The plan was given up under the pressure of public opinion.
simp: 计划受到舆论的压力而被取消了。
trad: 計劃受到輿論的壓力而被取消了。

eng: You may take this book as long as you keep it clean.
simp: 你可以拿走这本书，但可别把它弄髒了。
trad: 你可以拿走這本書，但可別把它弄髒了。

eng: I differ from you on that point.
simp: 关于这一点，我的想法和你不同。
trad: 關於這一點，我的想法和你不同。

eng: We had better sit down here.
simp: 我们还是在这里坐下吧。
trad: 我們還是在這裏坐下吧。

eng: Don't worry about us.
Do you live in Tokyo?
Two boys came running out of the room.
simp: 两个男孩子从房间里跑出来了。
trad: 兩個男孩子從房間裏跑出來了。

eng: I haven't met him.
When will you get ready to leave?
simp: 你什么时候才会准备好出发？
trad: 你什麼時候才會準備好出發？

eng: How come you say nothing?
The fat woman was holding a monkey.
simp: 那个胖女人拿着一只猴子。
trad: 那個胖女人拿著一只猴子。

eng: The contents of the box are listed on the label.
simp: 箱子的内容在标签上面写着。
trad: 箱子的內容在標簽上面寫著。

eng: Got it?
I think that they're a lot of fun.
Blind people sometimes develop a compensatory ability to sense the proximity of objects around them.
simp: 某些失明者会产生一个弥补性的能力，这个能力让他们察觉到他们与离他们很近的物体的距离。
trad: 某些失明者會產生一個彌補性的能力，這個能力讓他們察覺到他們與離他們很近的物體的距離。

eng: Would you like another cup of tea?
There's no such thing as a perfect sentence. Just as there's no such thing as perfect despair.
simp: 世界上并没有所谓完美的句子。就好像没有完美的绝望一样。
trad: 世界上並沒有所謂完美的句子。就好像沒有完美的絕望一樣。

eng: Let's leave the decision to our teacher.
simp: 我们还是让老师决定吧。
trad: 我們還是讓老師決定吧。

eng: The water mains burst due to the earthquake.
simp: 一条主要水管被地震震裂了。
trad: 一條主要水管被地震震裂了。

eng: Another war, and we will be ruined.
simp: 再来一场战争，我们就完蛋了。
trad: 再來一場戰爭，我們就完蛋了。

eng: How long is this pencil?
I've heard nothing.
I heard the news that there had been a big earthquake in Awaji.
simp: 我听到了澹路发生大地震的消息。
trad: 我聽到了淡路發生大地震的消息。

eng: I think it's you who should apologize to her.
simp: 我觉得应该向她道歉的人是你。
trad: 我覺得應該向她道歉的人是你。

eng: It's time for you to buy a new car.
I wish we had more time.
simp: 如果我们有多点时间就好了。
trad: 如果我們有多點時間就好了。

eng: Mathematics is the part of science you could continue to do if you woke up tomorrow and discovered the universe was gone.
simp: 就算你明天起床，发现整个宇宙消失了，还有一门科学是可以继续研究的 ﹣ 那就是数学了。
trad: 就算你明天起床，發現整個宇宙消失了，還有一門科學是可以繼續研究的 ﹣ 那就是數學了。

eng: How much is the entrance fee?
She lives next door to him.
I'll call you my boss.
This is Brian Rock.
Their two shadows overlap.
simp: 他们俩的影子重迭在一起。
trad: 他們倆的影子重疊在一起。

eng: I have a cat and a dog. The cat is black and the dog is white.
simp: 我养了一隻猫和一隻狗。猫是黑色的，狗是白色的。
trad: 我養了一隻貓和一隻狗。貓是黑色的，狗是白色的。

eng: Man has a great capacity to adapt to environmental changes.
simp: 人类适应环境变化的能力很强。
trad: 人類適應環境變化的能力很強。

eng: Even though he was poor, he was happy.
simp: 他虽然穷，但生活却过得很快乐。
trad: 他雖然窮，但生活卻過得很快樂。

eng: Madeira is the name of a wine.
With the approach of Christmas, business improved somewhat.
simp: 圣诞节快到了，生意也好了点。
trad: 聖誕節快到了，生意也好了點。

eng: I would buy the car, but I am poor.
simp: 我想买那辆车，可是我却没有钱。
trad: 我想買那輛車，可是我卻沒有錢。

eng: It is a pity that he has no sense of humor.
simp: 可惜他是一个完全没有幽默感的人。
trad: 可惜他是一個完全沒有幽默感的人。

eng: Everybody is waiting for you.
Can I borrow your tennis racket today?
simp: 今天可以借你的网球拍一用吗？
trad: 今天可以借你的網球拍一用嗎？

eng: I just don't know what to say.
simp: 我就是不知道说些什麽。
trad: 我就是不知道說些什麼。

eng: The myth offers insights into the ancient civilization.
simp: 神话让我们能透悉古文明。
trad: 神話讓我們能透悉古文明。

eng: The aim of this game is to explode all the bombs on the screen.
simp: 这个游戏的目的是引爆萤幕上所有的炸弹。
trad: 這個遊戲的目的是引爆螢幕上所有的炸彈。

eng: I have to take the entrance examination today.
I had my hair cut at a barber's shop.
Should he be given another chance, he would do his best.
simp: 再给他一次机会的话，他会尽力做到最好的。
trad: 再給他一次機會的話，他會盡力做到最好的。

eng: When I'm sad, my friends encourage me.
simp: 我伤心的时候，我的朋友会鼓励我。
trad: 我傷心的時候，我的朋友會鼓勵我。

eng: Mother has gone shopping.
I like Japanese food and customs, so it follows that I like living in Japan.
simp: 我很喜欢日本的美食，也很喜欢日本的风俗，所以我自然也很喜欢在日本生活。
trad: 我很喜歡日本的美食，也很喜歡日本的風俗，所以我自然也很喜歡在日本生活。

eng: This telephone is out of order.
Compare your sentence with the one on the blackboard.
simp: 比较一下你写的句子和黑板上的句子。
trad: 比較一下你寫的句子和黑板上的句子。

eng: I will lend you any book that I have, so long as you keep it clean.
simp: 我的书每一本都可以借给你，只要你不把它们弄髒就行了。
trad: 我的書每一本都可以借給你，只要你不把它們弄髒就行了。

eng: Never try to die.
As the lion is king of beasts, so is the eagle king of birds.
simp: 如果狮子是百兽之王的话，鹰就是百鸟之王了。
trad: 如果獅子是百獸之王的話，鷹就是百鳥之王了。

eng: In British English, "to get the sack" means to be fired from your job.
simp: 英式英语的「to get the sack」是被解僱的意思。
trad: 英式英語的「to get the sack」是被解僱的意思。

eng: I wasn't fired. I quit.
simp: 我不是被解僱，是自己辞职不干的。
trad: 我不是被解僱，是自己辭職不幹的。

eng: At one time Nigeria was a British colony.
simp: 尼日利亚曾经是英国的殖民地。
trad: 尼日利亞曾經是英國的殖民地。

eng: Don't underestimate us.
Rock, paper, scissors.
You're a reporter.
Chris gets 7 gold coins!
simp: 克里斯取得了七枚金币！
trad: 克裏斯取得了七枚金幣！

eng: She is a good swimmer.
Never did I dream that George would cheat me.
simp: 我连做梦也没有想过乔治会骗我。
trad: 我連做夢也沒有想過喬治會騙我。

eng: British English differs from American English in many ways.
simp: 英式英语和美式英语在很多地方上有所不同。
trad: 英式英語和美式英語在很多地方上有所不同。

eng: This building is near completion.
Open the window and you'll have fresh air.
simp: 打开窗子，就会有新鲜空气了。
trad: 打開窗子，就會有新鮮空氣了。

eng: I can place the palms of my hands on the floor without bending my knees.
simp: 我不弯膝也能把手掌平放在地上。
trad: 我不彎膝也能把手掌平放在地上。

eng: What does SFX stand for?
Help!
The flowers have all withered.
Is English more difficult than Japanese?
Tom and I have nothing in common.
simp: 汤姆和我没有相似之处。
trad: 湯姆和我沒有相似之處。

eng: She said good-bye with a smile, but there was a good deal of bitterness in her heart.
simp: 她说再见的时候，脸上挂着笑容，但其实心中是十分难受的。
trad: 她說再見的時候，臉上掛著笑容，但其實心中是十分難受的。

eng: The boy standing over there is my son.
simp: 站在那边的男孩是我的儿子。
trad: 站在那邊的男孩是我的兒子。

eng: I'm busy now.
The past can only be known, not changed. The future can only be changed, not known.
simp: 我们可以回顾过去，但不能改变过去；我们可以改变未来，但不能预知未来。
trad: 我們可以回顧過去，但不能改變過去；我們可以改變未來，但不能預知未來。

eng: At first sight, the question seemed easy.
simp: 第一眼看起来，那条问题似乎很容易。
trad: 第一眼看起來，那條問題似乎很容易。

eng: Start right now, and you'll catch up with them.
simp: 你马上出发，就可以赶上他们了。
trad: 你馬上出發，就可以趕上他們了。

eng: Do you love me?
It is difficult for me to get up before six.
simp: 我早上六时之前总是起不了床。
trad: 我早上六時之前總是起不了床。

eng: She's famous as a singer but not as a poet.
simp: 她是一个有名的歌手，但却没有多少人知道她也有写诗。
trad: 她是一個有名的歌手，但卻沒有多少人知道她也有寫詩。

eng: He must be very angry to say such a thing.
simp: 他一定是十分生气了，不然他不会说出这样的话来的。
trad: 他一定是十分生氣了，不然他不會說出這樣的話來的。

eng: I don't understand what you are talking about.
simp: 我不太明白你在说甚麽。
trad: 我不太明白你在說甚麼。

eng: When the bomb exploded, I happened to be there.
simp: 炸弹爆炸的时候，我刚好就在现场。
trad: 炸彈爆炸的時候，我剛好就在現場。

eng: I am a vegetarian.
Jack always finds fault with others. That's why everybody avoids him.
simp: 杰克很喜欢挑别人的毛病，所以没有人愿意和他交朋友。
trad: 傑克很喜歡挑別人的毛病，所以沒有人願意和他交朋友。

eng: Every time I hear that song, I think of my high school days.
simp: 那首歌总是勾起我中学时代的回忆。
trad: 那首歌總是勾起我中學時代的回憶。

eng: All at once they began to laugh.
simp: 他们突然一起大笑了起来。
trad: 他們突然一起大笑了起來。

eng: The dragon is an imaginary creature.
simp: 龙是人幻想出来的生物。
trad: 龍是人幻想出來的生物。

eng: Imported cars account for less than eight percent.
simp: 进口车佔了不到百分之八。
trad: 進口車佔了不到百分之八。

eng: When he reached the station, the train had already left almost half an hour before.
simp: 他到了火车站的时候，火车已经开出了差不多半小时。
trad: 他到了火車站的時候，火車已經開出了差不多半小時。

eng: I sprained my finger while playing volleyball.
simp: 我打排球的时候扭伤了手指。
trad: 我打排球的時候扭傷了手指。

eng: Cool the burned finger in running water.
I want to spend my life with you.
Please let me know the result by telephone.
simp: 请你打电话把结果告诉我。
trad: 請你打電話把結果告訴我。

eng: I want to tell you a strange thing.
I want to work with your company.
In case of fire, do not use the lift.
simp: 如有火警，切勿使用升降机。
trad: 如有火警，切勿使用升降機。

eng: Mind your head.
Has he come yet?
I've paid parking fines a number of times myself.
simp: 我自己也因违例泊车而被罚了许多次款。
trad: 我自己也因違例泊車而被罰了許多次款。

eng: I wrote a love letter last night.
Please give me something to eat. I am so hungry.
simp: 可以给我一点吃的吗？我快饿疯了啦。
trad: 可以給我一點吃的嗎？我快餓瘋了啦。

eng: Written in easy English, the book is easy to read.
simp: 这本书是用简单英语写成的，所以十分易读。
trad: 這本書是用簡單英語寫成的，所以十分易讀。

eng: Our branches extend all over the country.
We heard the bomb go off.
The enemy dropped bombs on the factory.
simp: 敌方投下炸弹，把工厂炸毁了。
trad: 敵方投下炸彈，把工廠炸毀了。

eng: So, we finally meet! I've waited so long for this moment.
simp: 我们终于见面了！我等这一刻等了好久了。
trad: 我們終於見面了！我等這一刻等了好久了。

eng: The tree was ready to fall at any moment.
I can't keep this up. It's an emotional roller coaster around here and all we have to do is look at the boss's face to know whether everybody is going to be happy or sad.
simp: 我们上班时的情绪，就像坐过山车一样 ﹣ 老闆脸上一现出不悦的神色，我们就要吃苦头；老闆脸上有了笑容，我们才能鬆一口气。这样的工作，我不想再干下去了。
trad: 我們上班時的情緒，就像坐過山車一樣 ﹣ 老闆臉上一現出不悅的神色，我們就要吃苦頭；老闆臉上有了笑容，我們才能鬆一口氣。這樣的工作，我不想再幹下去了。

eng: A hundred years is called a century.
He's your senior fellow apprentice.
Her surprise was so great that she could not speak.
I'm not serious.
True art of life is to see the extraordinary amongst the ordinary.
simp: 生活真正的艺术是在平凡中看到不平凡。
trad: 生活真正的藝術是在平凡中看到不平凡。

eng: Rumor says he resigned.
This discovery will be recorded in history.
simp: 这个发现将会在历史上留下光辉的一页。
trad: 這個發現將會在歷史上留下光輝的一頁。

eng: The accident took place near his home.
simp: 意外是在他家附近发生的。
trad: 意外是在他家附近發生的。

eng: She hit the ball hard.
I feel like I'm being drawn into your eyes.
simp: 我觉得自己好像被你的眼睛吸住了。
trad: 我覺得自己好像被你的眼睛吸住了。

eng: Chrysanthemums smell sweet.
How long did it take you to translate this book?
simp: 你翻译这本书用了多少时间？
trad: 你翻譯這本書用了多少時間？

eng: I must say good-bye to you.
Such manuals should be written in simpler language.
simp: 这种说明书应该写得简单易懂一点。
trad: 這種說明書應該寫得簡單易懂一點。

eng: The policeman aimed his gun at the man.
Please forgive me.
I will only buy the car if they repair the brakes first.
simp: 除非他们事先修好刹车，我才会买车子。
trad: 除非他們事先修好剎車，我才會買車子。

eng: Read this book.
I will not allow you to use my pen.
simp: 我不允许你用我的钢笔。
trad: 我不允許你用我的鋼筆。

eng: I'm not going to apologize. What are you going to do about it?
simp: 我就是不道歉，你奈我何？
trad: 我就是不道歉，你奈我何？

eng: I must apologize to you for breaking the vase.
simp: 我把你的花瓶打破了，真对不起。
trad: 我把你的花瓶打破了，真對不起。

eng: This device made it possible to turn sea-water into fresh water easily.
simp: 有了这个装置，把海水淨化成澹水就不是难事了。
trad: 有了這個裝置，把海水淨化成淡水就不是難事了。

eng: Instead of preparing a dinner by candlelight, she put her boyfriend up for auction on eBay.
simp: 她没有准备烛光晚餐，而是把她的男友放到Ebay上拍卖。
trad: 她沒有準備燭光晚餐，而是把她的男友放到Ebay上拍賣。

eng: That wasn't my intention.
I didn't mean it.
Don't move.
It is said that Japanese people are kind to people they know, but rather cold to those they don't.
simp: 据说日本人对认识的人亲切，对不认识的人却是十分冷澹。
trad: 據說日本人對認識的人親切，對不認識的人卻是十分冷淡。

eng: He took her words as a compliment.
simp: 他把她的话当作是一种赞美。
trad: 他把她的話當作是一種贊美。

eng: Hong Kong is referred to as the Pearl of Asia.
Do you know if she can speak English?
What did she say?
The sun rose from the sea.
I'm using Twitter.
It's incredible that your mother speaks six languages!
simp: 你母亲说六种语言真是让人难以置信！
trad: 你母親說六種語言真是讓人難以置信！

eng: My room is a pigsty.
This is your dog.
He did not answer the phone, so I sent him an email.
simp: 他没有接电话，所以我给他发了封邮件。
trad: 他沒有接電話，所以我給他發了封郵件。

eng: His lie got him into trouble when his boss discovered the truth.
simp: 当他老板发现真相的时候，谎言给他带来了麻烦。
trad: 當他老板發現真相的時候，謊言給他帶來了麻煩。

eng: I see her sweeping the room.
Something has happened to my car.
I like each of them.
He came in with his eyes shining.
Come on! Give me a chance.
She told me that she would go to Paris in August.
simp: 她跟我说八月份她会去巴黎。
trad: 她跟我說八月份她會去巴黎。

eng: He likes taking a walk by himself.
Excuse me, I have to get off at the next stop.
simp: 对不起，我要在下一站下。
trad: 對不起，我要在下一站下。

eng: I save what money I got.
He does nothing but complain from morning till night.
simp: 他从早到晚只是在抱怨。
trad: 他從早到晚只是在抱怨。

eng: You idiot!
Where is your dog?
Show me your passport, please.
Will you show me your passport, please?
simp: 能否请您给我看一下您的护照？
trad: 能否請您給我看一下您的護照？

eng: Beauty is but skin deep.
simp: 美貌只是表面性的东西。
trad: 美貌只是表面性的東西。

eng: Where were you yesterday?
I'd like three of these.
Please leave me alone.
He is not religious.
I did not participate in the dialog.
How's the breakfast at McDonald's?
simp: 在麦当劳吃早饭怎么样？
trad: 在麥當勞吃早飯怎麼樣？

eng: What language is spoken in Egypt?
What did he say?
He stills comes visit me from time to time.
He likes to go to the beach sometimes
Sometimes I see him at the club.
simp: 我偶尔会在俱乐部碰到他。
trad: 我偶爾會在俱樂部碰到他。

eng: We go fishing from time to time.
I will be at the meeting.
It is said that the Japanese are very friendly to those that they know, and very indifferent to those they don't.
simp: 据说日本人对他们认识的人非常友好，对不认识的人非常冷澹。
trad: 據說日本人對他們認識的人非常友好，對不認識的人非常冷淡。

eng: I'm sure that this is a fresh water fish.
They are my brothers.
Managing your stocks with Big Wisdom shows that you are serious about investing!
simp: 用大智慧做股票，说明您对投资是认真的！
trad: 用大智慧做股票，說明您對投資是認真的！

eng: Good water for Tibet is good water for the world.
simp: 西藏的好水就是世界的好水。
trad: 西藏的好水就是世界的好水。

eng: Friendly Reminder: Please keep in mind the closing time of the line you need to switch to, so as to avoid delays in your trip.
simp: 友情提示：请留意您需要换乘线路的首末班时间，以免耽误您的出行。
trad: 友情提示：請留意您需要換乘線路的首末班時間，以免耽誤您的出行。

eng: Some babies learn to swim even before they are one year old.
simp: 有些宝宝甚至在一岁之前就学习游泳了。
trad: 有些寶寶甚至在一歲之前就學習遊泳了。

eng: That nurse is very kind and polite.
simp: 那个护士人很好，又有礼貌。
trad: 那個護士人很好，又有禮貌。

eng: It was difficult for him to hide his pride in his success.
simp: 他很难掩饰对自己成功的骄傲。
trad: 他很難掩飾對自己成功的驕傲。

eng: I looked after him for a period of time.
As far as I'm concerned, this coffee is too strong.
simp: 这咖啡对我来说太浓了。
trad: 這咖啡對我來說太濃了。

eng: Here's where they usually have dinner.
simp: 这儿是他们通常吃晚饭的地方。
trad: 這兒是他們通常吃晚飯的地方。

eng: I was alone in the classroom.
I love pizza very much.
We woke up very early in order to see the sunrise.
simp: 我们起得很早为了看到日出。
trad: 我們起得很早為了看到日出。

eng: I can love.
He did it for money.
How come Mary is going on a picnic with him?
simp: 为什么玛丽和他去野餐？
trad: 為什麼瑪麗和他去野餐？

eng: Next to China, Switzerland is an abandoned village.
simp: 在中国的旁边，瑞士像一个荒废的乡村似的。
trad: 在中國的旁邊，瑞士像一個荒廢的鄉村似的。

eng: He opposes racism.
Discriminating against people because of their race is a mistake.
simp: 因为人的种族而歧视他们是一种错误。
trad: 因為人的種族而歧視他們是一種錯誤。

eng: There is a bus every 20 minutes.
He has no reason to be late.
The bus was behind schedule.
You need to pay extra for the batteries.
Possibly because he's got a beard, he looks scary at first glance but he's really a kind man.
simp: 或许是因为他有胡子而让他乍看之下很可怕，其实他是个非常好的人。
trad: 或許是因為他有胡子而讓他乍看之下很可怕，其實他是個非常好的人。

eng: My parents won't let me date.
simp: 我父母不让我和男生约会。
trad: 我父母不讓我和男生約會。

eng: He shot an arrow at the deer.
I followed the deer's tracks.
We played soccer yesterday.

Nature never deceives us; it is always we who deceive ourselves.
simp: 自然从不会欺骗我们，骗我们的永远是我们自己。
trad: 自然從不會欺騙我們，騙我們的永遠是我們自己。

eng: Man is born free; and everywhere he is in chains.
simp: 人是生而自由的，但却无往不在枷锁之中。
trad: 人是生而自由的，但卻無往不在枷鎖之中。

eng: The woman observes and the man thinks.
There are more and more sentences.
Mike and Ken are friends.
Time is the most precious thing in the world.
simp: 时间是世界上最宝贵的东西。
trad: 時間是世界上最寶貴的東西。

eng: She does not like sushi.
Cats like fish more than they like meat.
The fish he caught yesterday is still alive.
simp: 他昨天抓住的鱼一直还活着。
trad: 他昨天抓住的魚一直還活著。

eng: He doesn't eat raw fish.

I visited Dan.
She looks a lot like her mother.
Please shuffle the cards carefully.
Are you lost?
Are you lost?
What I'm about to say is strictly between you and me.
simp: 我要说的只能是你知我知。
trad: 我要說的只能是你知我知。

eng: What have you done today?
I told you not to talk about the matter in her presence.
simp: 我跟你说过她在的时候不要说这件事。
trad: 我跟你說過她在的時候不要說這件事。

eng: Now I will introduce you to my parents.
simp: 现在我将把我的父母介绍给你。
trad: 現在我將把我的父母介紹給你。

eng: Now I want to introduce my parents to you.
simp: 现在我要向你介绍我的父母。
trad: 現在我要向你介紹我的父母。

eng: I met an old woman.
Turn to the left.
My computer has frozen.
Sleeping on a carpet is great.
He was wounded in the shoulder.
Did you come here alone?
simp: 你是一个人来这儿的吗？
trad: 你是一個人來這兒的嗎？

eng: We'll always be friends.
They say that he has been dead for two years.
She began to sing.
I love my life.
I love my life.
I'm glad that I didn't buy something like this.
simp: 我很高兴没有买这样的东西。
trad: 我很高興沒有買這樣的東西。

eng: He is still here.
Your dog is very big.
Your dog is very big.
Mary has already started.
She cannot be over thirty.

The police are looking into the matter.
It might rain.
What's that?

Good night!

Take me home.
It's not difficult if you study.
simp: 如果你学习的话，这不难的。
trad: 如果你學習的話，這不難的。

eng: I don't like this one.
I don't particularly like her.

For what reason did you cry?
This book is hard for me to read.
simp: 这本书对我来说很难读。
trad: 這本書對我來說很難讀。

eng: Her diligence is a good example to us all.
simp: 她的用功对我们所有人是一个好的榜样。
trad: 她的用功對我們所有人是一個好的榜樣。

eng: In this secret code, each number stands for a letter of the alphabet.
simp: 在这个密码里，每个数字取代了一个字母。
trad: 在這個密碼裏，每個數字取代了一個字母。

eng: He gave his life for the nation.
simp: 他把他的生命给了国家。
trad: 他把他的生命給了國家。

eng: Everything went well.

simp: 我从没见过一条那么大的鲸鱼。

eng: He tends to lie.

simp: 你说今晚改变一下，去外面吃晚饭怎么样？
trad: 你說今晚改變一下，去外面吃晚飯怎麼樣？

eng: The computer is placed to the left of the women.
simp: 电脑放在女士们的左边。

eng: The building has 20 floors.

simp: 家父是在三年前离世的，也就是一九七七年。
trad: 家父是在三年前離世的，也就是一九七七年。

eng: The concert ticket costs more than the cinema ticket.
simp: 演唱会门票比电影票贵。
trad: 演唱會門票比電影票貴。

eng: The colors of the American flag are red, white and blue.
simp: 美国国旗的颜色是红白蓝。
trad: 美國國旗的顏色是紅白藍。

eng: The coffee is cold.

It's just your imagination.

I'll attend the next meeting.
Jane calls a spade a spade.
simp: 珍是一个有话直说的人。
trad: 珍是一個有話直說的人。

eng: It is stupid of you to believe in him.
simp: 你相信他真是太愚蠢了。
trad: 你相信他真是太愚蠢了。

eng: I may have made a mistake.

simp: 我父亲很老了，耳朵也听不清楚了。
trad: 我父親很老了，耳朵也聽不清楚了。

eng: There is a spoon missing.
My dictionary is very useful.
You'd better hurry.

simp: 五十岁以后学一门新的语言不是那么容易。
trad: 五十歲以後學一門新的語言不是那麼容易。

eng: Come along with me.
I couldn't put up with her arrogant behavior.
simp: 我无法忍受她傲慢的态度。
trad: 我無法忍受她傲慢的態度。

eng: We did it ourselves.
I got that news from Hashimoto.

simp: 对了，我有一件事要告诉你。
trad: 對了，我有一件事要告訴你。

eng: The town is two miles away from the coast.
simp: 那小镇离岸边有两英里。
trad: 那小鎮離岸邊有兩英裏。

eng: He closed the window for fear of rain.
simp: 他怕会下雨，所以就把窗关上了。
trad: 他怕會下雨，所以就把窗關上了。

eng: They say fine words are no virtue if they're insincere and that's him in a nutshell. He's all talk but doesn't mean a word of it.
simp: 「巧言令色，鲜矣仁」这句说话，用来形容他最适合不过了。他说的话，没有一句是有诚意的。
trad: 「巧言令色，鮮矣仁」這句說話，用來形容他最適合不過了。他說的話，沒有一句是有誠意的。

eng: She said to herself, "Where shall I go next?"
simp: 她自言自语地说：「我接着该到哪儿去呢？」
trad: 她自言自語地說：「我接著該到哪兒去呢？」

eng: Telephone booths are as scarce as hen's teeth around here.
simp: 这里附近的电话亭少得可怜。
trad: 這裏附近的電話亭少得可憐。

eng: I got hurt during an experiment, and the injury was pretty serious.
simp: 我做实验的时候弄伤了，而且还伤得十分严重。
trad: 我做實驗的時候弄傷了，而且還傷得十分嚴重。

eng: Does Tom have to stay home today?
simp: 汤姆今天要留在家中吗？
trad: 湯姆今天要留在家中嗎？

eng: You're already useless.
Hi, everybody!

simp: 我们把他称为“英雄”，但是他却背叛了我们。
trad: 我們把他稱為“英雄”，但是他卻背叛了我們。

eng: The new secretary types about 70 words per minute.
simp: 新来的秘书一分钟可以打七十几个字。
trad: 新來的秘書一分鐘可以打七十幾個字。

eng: As their conversation was in French, I could not understand a word.
simp: 因为他们是用法语谈话的，所以我一句也听不懂。
trad: 因為他們是用法語談話的，所以我一句也聽不懂。

eng: From nine in the morning to three in the afternoon
simp: 从早上九时到下午三时。
trad: 從早上九時到下午三時。

eng: She gave him the money.
She gave him all the money that she had then.
simp: 她把她那时的全副积蓄都给了他。
trad: 她把她那時的全副積蓄都給了他。

eng: If you want to keep meat for long, freeze it.
simp: 如果你想把肉类保存久一点，就要把它们放进冰箱里冷藏。
trad: 如果你想把肉類保存久一點，就要把它們放進冰箱裏冷藏。

eng: Have you read this article?
simp: 你有没有看过这篇文章？
trad: 你有沒有看過這篇文章？

eng: How dare you speak like that to your elders and betters!
simp: 你竟敢这样对长辈说话？！
trad: 你竟敢這樣對長輩說話？！

eng: A sprained ankle disabled him from walking for a month.
simp: 他把足踝扭伤了，整整一个月不能走路。
trad: 他把足踝扭傷了，整整一個月不能走路。

eng: He is not as smart as his older brother.
simp: 他不像他的兄长那样聪明。
trad: 他不像他的兄長那樣聰明。

eng: He has three daughters; one is married, but the others aren't.
simp: 他有三个女儿，一个结了婚，其馀两个还没有。
trad: 他有三個女兒，一個結了婚，其餘兩個還沒有。

eng: He has three elder sisters.
The little fridge is dirty.
She's my older sister.
You must rid yourself of bad habits.
You've set a bad example.
You must make up for the loss.
You had better put on a raincoat.
You don't like love stories.
Did you go to the doctor?
You'll never be alone.
simp: 你们永远不会一个人的。
trad: 你們永遠不會一個人的。

eng: You'll never be alone.
You'd better consult the doctor.
You'd better consult the doctor.
I'm surprised that you're so naïve.
simp: 我很惊讶你们竟然那么天真。
trad: 我很驚訝你們竟然那麼天真。

eng: I'm surprised that you're so naïve.
simp: 我很惊讶你竟然那么天真。
trad: 我很驚訝你竟然那麼天真。

eng: I'm surprised that you're so naïve.
simp: 我很惊讶您竟然那么天真。
trad: 我很驚訝您竟然那麼天真。

eng: You are in a safe place.
I think you'll have very little difficulty in getting a driver's license.
simp: 我想你要拿到驾照根本不难。
trad: 我想你要拿到駕照根本不難。

eng: What do you call this vegetable in English?
simp: 这种蔬菜英语叫甚麽名字？
trad: 這種蔬菜英語叫甚麼名字？

eng: You must quit smoking.
Do you study English?
Do you study English?
What do you want now?
What do you want now?
Do you belong to any clubs?
You are not a coward.
You are not a coward.
The victory was won at the cost of many lives.
simp: 胜利是用许多人的性命换来的。
trad: 勝利是用許多人的性命換來的。

eng: You dropped your pencil.
How foolish I was not to discover that simple lie!
simp: 我竟然蠢得被这麽简单的谎话骗倒了！
trad: 我竟然蠢得被這麼簡單的謊話騙倒了！

eng: You're too suspicious about everything.
What do you want to be?
What do you want to be?
You continue making the same mistakes time after time.
simp: 你每次都继续犯同样的错误。
trad: 你每次都繼續犯同樣的錯誤。

eng: You may go anywhere.
You may go anywhere.
Stop complaining and do as you're told.
simp: 别挑剔这、挑剔那的，叫你怎麽做就怎麽做。
trad: 別挑剔這、挑剔那的，叫你怎麼做就怎麼做。

eng: The dolphin is a very intelligent animal.
simp: 海豚是十分聪明的动物。
trad: 海豚是十分聰明的動物。

eng: I'm sorry, my father is out.
simp: 不好意思，我爸爸不在家。
trad: 不好意思，我爸爸不在家。

eng: What a pity!
What should I do?
Will you tell me where I am wrong?
simp: 你可以告诉我我错在哪儿吗？
trad: 你可以告訴我我錯在哪兒嗎？

eng: What are my responsibilities?
What are my tasks?
Would you mind my using this dictionary?
simp: 你介意我用这本字典吗？
trad: 你介意我用這本字典嗎？

eng: Was the movie good?
What color is your hair?
simp: 您的头发是什么颜色的？
trad: 您的頭發是什麼顏色的？

eng: What do you like to do in your free time?
simp: 您空闲时间喜欢做什么？
trad: 您空閑時間喜歡做什麼？

eng: What do you like to do in your free time?
simp: 你空闲时间喜欢做什么？
trad: 你空閑時間喜歡做什麼？

eng: Put him in.
Dad bought me a camera.
simp: 爸爸给我买了一个照相机。
trad: 爸爸給我買了一個照相機。

eng: A ring and some cash are missing.
simp: 少了一个戒指和一点现金。
trad: 少了一個戒指和一點現金。

eng: I helped her translate this sentence so many times.
simp: 我为她翻译了好几次这个词。
trad: 我為她翻譯了好幾次這個詞。

eng: All roads lead to Rome.
The country code for Italy is +39.
simp: 意大利的国际号码前缀是三十九(+39)。
trad: 意大利的國際號碼前綴是三十九(+39)。

eng: He doesn't have a job. He's retired.
What do you want it for?
What does it contain?
What does this stand for?
What have I got to do so that you'll pay attention to me?
simp: 我该怎么做才能让你更注意我？
trad: 我該怎麼做才能讓你更註意我？

eng: Today is my treat.
Once a war breaks out, both sides are in the wrong.
simp: 从战争开始的那一瞬间开始，两方都是罪恶的。
trad: 從戰爭開始的那一瞬間開始，兩方都是罪惡的。

eng: What fruit is red?
How did you come to know her?
He often walks with his hand in his pocket.
simp: 他走路时常常把一隻手插在裤袋里。
trad: 他走路時常常把一隻手插在褲袋裏。

eng: It's getting dark. Please turn the light on for me.
simp: 天色开始暗了。麻烦你帮我开灯。
trad: 天色開始暗了。麻煩你幫我開燈。

eng: An ostrich does not fly through the air.
The house in which we lived was torn down.
simp: 我们以前住的房子被拆毁了。
trad: 我們以前住的房子被拆毀了。

eng: There is no shortcut to success.
My father bought me a digital watch for birthday present.
simp: 我爸爸送了一块电子錶给我作为生日礼物。
trad: 我爸爸送了一塊電子錶給我作為生日禮物。

eng: The mayor's family was harassed with threatening phone calls all day.
simp: 市长一家人一整天不断遭到了恐吓电话的骚扰。
trad: 市長一家人一整天不斷遭到了恐嚇電話的騷擾。

eng: The mail train lost most of its mail in the fire.
simp: 那场火灾把邮车上的邮件烧掉了一大半。
trad: 那場火災把郵車上的郵件燒掉了一大半。

eng: Lincoln was opposed to slavery.
Mr Wang is from China.
Never have I seen such a beautiful picture.
simp: 我从来没有看过这麽漂亮的画。
trad: 我從來沒有看過這麼漂亮的畫。

eng: This bike belongs to my younger brother.
simp: 这台自行车是我弟弟的。
trad: 這臺自行車是我弟弟的。

eng: Each boy has a bike.
simp: 每个男孩都有一台自行车。
trad: 每個男孩都有一臺自行車。

eng: There are more girls than boys in this school.
simp: 这间学校女孩比男孩多。
trad: 這間學校女孩比男孩多。

eng: He drinks a glass of water every morning.
simp: 他每天早上都会喝一杯水。
trad: 他每天早上都會喝一杯水。

eng: I have lived here for thirty years.
simp: 我在这里住了三十年了。
trad: 我在這裏住了三十年了。

eng: I hadn't recognized the importance of this document until you told me about it.
simp: 你告诉了我以后，我才知道这份文件有多重要。
trad: 你告訴了我以後，我才知道這份文件有多重要。

eng: Having been written in haste, the book has a lot of errors.
simp: 这本书是匆匆忙忙地写的，所以有很多谬误。
trad: 這本書是匆匆忙忙地寫的，所以有很多謬誤。

eng: The bus stopped suddenly in the middle of the street.
simp: 巴士突然在路中心停了下来。
trad: 巴士突然在路中心停了下來。

eng: At that time, my mother was younger than I am now.
simp: 我母亲那时比我还要年轻。
trad: 我母親那時比我還要年輕。

eng: Many stars are twinkling in the sky.
simp: 一颗一颗的星星在空中闪闪发光。
trad: 一顆一顆的星星在空中閃閃發光。

eng: He never says thanks in spite of all that I've done for him.
simp: 我帮了他那麽多的忙，他却连一句感谢的话也没有。
trad: 我幫了他那麼多的忙，他卻連一句感謝的話也沒有。

eng: As I entered the café, I found two young men watching a wrestling match on television.
simp: 我步进咖啡室，看见两个年轻人正在电视上看摔角比赛。
trad: 我步進咖啡室，看見兩個年輕人正在電視上看摔角比賽。

eng: What do you call a man who takes care of sheep in the field?
simp: 在草原上照顾羊群的人叫甚麽？
trad: 在草原上照顧羊群的人叫甚麼？

eng: I'm sure people ask you this question all the time, but it's all that comes to mind right now.
simp: 这条问题你大概已经听过很多次了，但我暂时还想不到别的来问你。
trad: 這條問題你大概已經聽過很多次了，但我暫時還想不到別的來問你。

eng: As far as English is concerned, nobody can beat me.
simp: 在英语能力方面，没有人能比我好。
trad: 在英語能力方面，沒有人能比我好。

eng: I'll go on QQ immediately.
Yes, we have met before, said Mr Jordan.
simp: 「对的，我们以前见过面。」佐敦先生说。
trad: 「對的，我們以前見過面。」佐敦先生說。

eng: I don't go on QQ very often.
I'd like to marry a girl who likes to play video games.
simp: 我想和一个喜欢打电动的女孩结婚。
trad: 我想和一個喜歡打電動的女孩結婚。

eng: The red lines on the map represent a railway.
simp: 地图上的红线代表铁路。
trad: 地圖上的紅線代表鐵路。

eng: It's fifty kilometers to Paris.
simp: 还有五十公里就到巴黎了。
trad: 還有五十公裏就到巴黎了。

eng: I am proud to be a part of this project.
simp: 我以身为这个计划的一份子为荣。
trad: 我以身為這個計劃的一份子為榮。

eng: You don't have to wait until the end.
If the weather is nice tomorrow, we will have a picnic.
simp: 如果明天天气好，我们就去野餐。
trad: 如果明天天氣好，我們就去野餐。

eng: Please give me some more coffee.
simp: 可以再给我一点咖啡吗？
trad: 可以再給我一點咖啡嗎？

eng: My pet cat died yesterday.
At last, John and Sue decided to cut the apple into halves.
simp: 约翰和苏最后决定把苹果切成两半。
trad: 約翰和蘇最後決定把蘋果切成兩半。

eng: If you are by my side, I don't need anything else.
simp: 只要有你在我的身边，我就别无他求了。
trad: 只要有你在我的身邊，我就別無他求了。

eng: Are there any movie theaters near here?
simp: 这里附近有没有电影院？
trad: 這裏附近有沒有電影院？

eng: Our committee consists of ten members.
simp: 我们的委员会是由十位会员组成的。
trad: 我們的委員會是由十位會員組成的。

eng: I want to go with a friend to Hokkaido next month.
simp: 我想下个月和一个朋友去北海道。
trad: 我想下個月和一個朋友去北海道。

eng: You cannot solve this problem with the usual method.
simp: 这个问题不能以常规方法解决。
trad: 這個問題不能以常規方法解決。

eng: What time does the first train leave?
simp: 第一班火车什么时候出发？
trad: 第一班火車什麼時候出發？

eng: We used to be neighbours.
I will help you buy one concert ticket.
simp: 我会帮你买一张演唱会门票。
trad: 我會幫你買一張演唱會門票。

eng: Is this seat available?
That is my sister's camera.
That's my coat.
I hate studying.
Where do we go?
He seldom comes to see me.
What does your father do?
The first group studies in the morning, the second in the evening.
simp: 第一组早上学习，第二组晚上学习。
trad: 第一組早上學習，第二組晚上學習。

eng: I am divorced.
Iron is a useful metal.
My butt hurts.
What did you open it with?
He is drunk.
You have many books.
You have many books.
You've been had.
You've been had.
What have you come here for?
You are very brave.
You are very brave.
That's very sweet of you.
You're really wonderful.
You may go anywhere you like.
simp: 你喜欢去哪儿就可以去哪儿。
trad: 你喜歡去哪兒就可以去哪兒。

eng: What do you need the money for?
Why did you use up all the money?
How high can you jump?
How high can you jump?
You look very tired.
Why do you accuse my son?
Why did you leave the class yesterday?
simp: 您昨天为什么离开教室？
trad: 您昨天為什麼離開教室？

eng: Why do you want to study abroad?
simp: 为什么你想到外国读书？
trad: 為什麼你想到外國讀書？

eng: Why do you want to study abroad?
simp: 为什么您想到外国读书？
trad: 為什麼您想到外國讀書？

eng: You haven't changed at all.
You haven't washed your hands yet, have you?
You are now an adult.
You must get up a little earlier.
I am cold.
This room is too small to contain 50 men.
simp: 这房间太小了，容纳不下五十人。
trad: 這房間太小了，容納不下五十人。

eng: They wash their hands with soap.
Is this your family?
Paris is one of the largest cities in the world.
simp: 巴黎是世界上最大的城市之一。
trad: 巴黎是世界上最大的城市之一。

eng: He was able to put up remarkable performances at the sports competition.
simp: 他在运动会上的表现十分出色。
trad: 他在運動會上的表現十分出色。

eng: You should have completed it long ago.
simp: 你们很久前就应该完成了。
trad: 你們很久前就應該完成了。

eng: In the summer I wear short-sleeved shirts.
How dare you speak like that?
By lack of attention, she hit the post with her car.
simp: 她心不在焉的把车子撞在了柱子上。
trad: 她心不在焉的把車子撞在了柱子上。

eng: So far as I know, he is an honest man.
simp: 据我所知，他是一个诚实的人。
trad: 據我所知，他是一個誠實的人。

eng: He was disqualified from the competition.
China is the largest country in Asia.
simp: 中国是亚洲最大的国家。
trad: 中國是亞洲最大的國家。

eng: There is no need to be frightened. He won't harm you.
simp: 不用怕，他不会伤害你的。
trad: 不用怕，他不會傷害你的。

eng: She participates in many school activities.
simp: 她在学校参加了很多活动。
trad: 她在學校參加了很多活動。

eng: As far as I know, the book has never been translated into Japanese.
simp: 据我所知，这本书从来没有被翻译成日文。
trad: 據我所知，這本書從來沒有被翻譯成日文。

eng: Do you want a T-shirt? "Yes, I want a red one."
simp: 「你想要一件衬衫吗？」「对，我想要一件红色的。」
trad: 「你想要一件襯衫嗎？」「對，我想要一件紅色的。」

eng: Such a man is bound to fail.
I'll come and see you at 3:00 p.m. on Sunday.
simp: 我星期天下午三时会来看你。
trad: 我星期天下午三時會來看你。

eng: Have you finished packing yet?
Knowing their languages is not enough to communicate effectively, because the methods of communication are determined by their cultures.
simp: 要和他们有效地沟通，只懂得说他们的语言是不够的，因为沟通的方式是由他们的文化来决定的。
trad: 要和他們有效地溝通，只懂得說他們的語言是不夠的，因為溝通的方式是由他們的文化來決定的。

eng: We will never give in to terrorist demands.
simp: 我们决不会屈服于恐怖份子的要求之下。
trad: 我們決不會屈服於恐怖份子的要求之下。

eng: Even though he apologized, I'm still furious.
simp: 虽然他道歉了，但我还是很生气。
trad: 雖然他道歉了，但我還是很生氣。

eng: What is she saying? "You don't even know 'norito'?" "Norito?" "It's something like a Shinto spell."
simp: 「她在说些甚麽？」「你连『祝词』也不知道吗？」「祝词？」「就是神道咒语之类的东西。」
trad: 「她在說些甚麼？」「你連『祝詞』也不知道嗎？」「祝詞？」「就是神道咒語之類的東西。」

eng: It was not long before Mr Yamazaki recovered.
simp: 山崎先生不久就康复了。
trad: 山崎先生不久就康復了。

eng: Judging from the present look of the sky, we may have a downpour any moment.
simp: 现在天空这个样子，看起来似乎随时会下大雨。
trad: 現在天空這個樣子，看起來似乎隨時會下大雨。

eng: Who is your favorite composer?
simp: 你最喜欢哪一个作曲家？
trad: 你最喜歡哪一個作曲家？

eng: I'm a British girl from Manchester.
simp: 我是个从曼彻斯特来的英国女孩。
trad: 我是個從曼徹斯特來的英國女孩。

eng: Hey, when do the dorms lock up? "9 o'clock" "Whoops, if we don't run we won't make it!"
simp: 「喂，宿舍甚麽时候锁门？」「九点。」「糟了，我们不跑回去的话就赶不及了！」
trad: 「餵，宿舍甚麼時候鎖門？」「九點。」「糟了，我們不跑回去的話就趕不及了！」

eng: You don't get on well with your father? "..." "Sorry, that was none of my business."
simp: 「你和父亲关係不好吗？」「……」「不好意思，我不应该多事的。」
trad: 「你和父親關係不好嗎？」「……」「不好意思，我不應該多事的。」

eng: Hey! It's dangerous to run here. "Eh? ... A-a-Aaah!!" "Oh dear, what did I tell you?"
simp: 「喂！这里跑步很危险的。」「嗯？……啊、啊、啊！！」「唉，我刚才不是和你说了吗？」
trad: 「餵！這裏跑步很危險的。」「嗯？……啊、啊、啊！！」「唉，我剛才不是和你說了嗎？」

eng: That's my cat.
Her grandmother lived to be eighty-eight years old.
simp: 她的祖母活到了八十八岁。
trad: 她的祖母活到了八十八歲。

eng: She received a doctor's degree.
Nobody can foresee when the war will end.
simp: 没有人知道战争何时会完结。
trad: 沒有人知道戰爭何時會完結。

eng: Who are you referring to?
There! She comes!
That film's really interesting.
That cloud is in the shape of a fish.
May I eat that cake?
I'm sorry.
Miss! I feel sick.
It's my duty to help you.
I was born to love you.
simp: 我生来就是为了爱你的。
trad: 我生來就是為了愛你的。

eng: Are you free tomorrow?
I admire you.
I suppose you like him.
Can you ride a horse?
Did you visit the Tokyo Tower?
Do you have a car?
Can you drive a car?
He fixed the watch for me.
simp: 他帮我把手錶修理好了。
trad: 他幫我把手錶修理好了。

eng: The king ordered that the prisoner should be set free.
I have a lot of work to do.
It was a lovely autumn evening.
A square has four sides.
My resolution dissolved at the last moment.
simp: 到了最后的一刻，我的决心突然动摇了。
trad: 到了最後的一刻，我的決心突然動搖了。

eng: Beware of pickpockets here.
This table is just as large as ours.
simp: 这桌子和我们家的一样大。
trad: 這桌子和我們家的一樣大。

eng: Please tell me your name and telephone number.
simp: 请你把你的名字和电话号码告诉我。
trad: 請你把你的名字和電話號碼告訴我。

eng: My dream is to become a very strong mahjong player.
simp: 我的梦想是要成为一个顶级的麻将高手。
trad: 我的夢想是要成為一個頂級的麻將高手。

eng: Many criminals in America are addicted to drugs.
simp: 美国的罪犯大多是吸毒成瘾的瘾君子。
trad: 美國的罪犯大多是吸毒成癮的癮君子。

eng: My father works for a power company.
simp: 我父亲在电力公司工作。
trad: 我父親在電力公司工作。

eng: I want something to eat.
It rained five successive days.
So we'd better stay home.
simp: 所以我们还是留在家中吧。
trad: 所以我們還是留在家中吧。

eng: The twenty-first century begins in 2001.
simp: 二十一世纪是在二零零一年开始的。
trad: 二十一世紀是在二零零一年開始的。

eng: You can't be hungry. You've just had dinner.
simp: 你刚刚才吃过晚饭，不可能饿得这麽快的。
trad: 你剛剛才吃過晚飯，不可能餓得這麼快的。

eng: I wish the rain would stop.
My spoon is bigger!
Can you mend these shoes for me?
Mary went on a voyage around the world.
Her grandmother lived to be 88 years old.
She got very angry with her children.
simp: 她对她的孩子非常生气。
trad: 她對她的孩子非常生氣。

eng: I thought he was my brother.
We found out that he was her father.
simp: 我们发现他是她的父亲。
trad: 我們發現他是她的父親。

eng: She has blue eyes.
How would you like your steak?
I'd send my kid out on his own for a while if I were you. A few hard knocks at this point might do him some good.
simp: 换了是我，就会要孩子自己一个人去游历一下。他现在这个年纪，吃一点苦是好的。
trad: 換了是我，就會要孩子自己一個人去遊歷一下。他現在這個年紀，吃一點苦是好的。

eng: I'll pick you up at your home.
He can speak five languages.
He was home alone at the time.
I'll bring it to you tomorrow.
I carried the box on my shoulder.
I don't understand music.
I didn't know she was married.
I don't have to clean my room.
I'm 17, too.
I am never at home on Sundays.
Is there a nonstop flight to New York?
simp: 请问有没有飞往纽约的不停站航班？
trad: 請問有沒有飛往紐約的不停站航班？

eng: She got a present from her boyfriend.
simp: 她的男朋友送了一份礼物给她。
trad: 她的男朋友送了一份禮物給她。

eng: I fed the leftovers to my dog.
simp: 我把剩下的东西给我的狗吃。
trad: 我把剩下的東西給我的狗吃。

eng: I don't want to eat lunch now.
Please mind the gap between the train and the platform.
simp: 请小心月台与车厢之间的空隙。
trad: 請小心月臺與車廂之間的空隙。

eng: I decided not to go to Europe.
I bought a pen, but I lost it.
simp: 我买了一支钢笔，但我把它丢了。
trad: 我買了一支鋼筆，但我把它丟了。

eng: I can eat anything but onions.
simp: 除了洋葱我什么都可以吃。
trad: 除了洋蔥我什麼都可以吃。

eng: I didn't catch your last name.
I don't know how to go there.
I thought of a good idea.
In the United States the automobile is a necessity and not a luxury.
simp: 在美国，汽车并不是奢华的象徵，而是生活的必需品。
trad: 在美國，汽車並不是奢華的象徵，而是生活的必需品。

eng: Today, I have a lot of homework.
simp: 今天我有很多功课要做。
trad: 今天我有很多功課要做。

eng: Now I remember.
What is missing?
Let's turn back.
If he studied hard, he would pass the test.
simp: 如果他努力学习，他会通过考试的。
trad: 如果他努力學習，他會通過考試的。

eng: Oh! Show it to me please.
To tell the truth, I would rather stay at home than go out.
simp: 老实说，我其实想留在家中，不想出外的。
trad: 老實說，我其實想留在家中，不想出外的。

eng: The post office is a few minutes' walk from here.
simp: 邮政局离这里只有几分钟的路程。
trad: 郵政局離這裏只有幾分鐘的路程。

eng: I tried to reach you on the phone, but I was unable to get through.
simp: 我打了电话给你，但却接不通。
trad: 我打了電話給你，但卻接不通。

eng: The boy opened the window, although his mother told him not to.
simp: 虽然小男孩的母亲叫他不要开窗，但他还是开了。
trad: 雖然小男孩的母親叫他不要開窗，但他還是開了。

eng: Do come in, please.
May I use your toilet?
simp: 我能用一下你们的厕所吗？
trad: 我能用一下你們的廁所嗎？

eng: The communication of news by TV and radio is very common now.
simp: 这个年代用电视和收音机报道新闻已是十分平常的事了。
trad: 這個年代用電視和收音機報道新聞已是十分平常的事了。

eng: I don't speak German.
Germany was once allied with Italy.
simp: 德国曾是意大利的同盟国。
trad: 德國曾是意大利的同盟國。

eng: Germany adopted a social security system in the 1880's.
simp: 德国在1880年代采取了一种社会保障制度。
trad: 德國在1880年代采取了一種社會保障制度。

eng: Shut the door.
Please knock on the door.
I heard the door close.
As soon as the door opened, they ran away.
Turn on the TV.
According to TV news, there was a plane crash in India.
simp: 根据电视新闻，一架飞机在印度坠毁了。
trad: 根據電視新聞，一架飛機在印度墜毀了。

eng: But I am able to cook well.
But I was always too lazy.
But you like it!
I will ask him about it tomorrow, then.
Ted loves his wife Elizabeth.
simp: 特德爱他的妻子伊丽莎白。
trad: 特德愛他的妻子伊麗莎白。

eng: How was your test?
I will help you as far as I can.
I ran as fast as possible.
I'll finish it as quickly as I can.
Let me know the result as soon as you can.
Do this work by tomorrow if possible.
simp: 如果可能的话，在明天前做好这个工作。
trad: 如果可能的話，在明天前做好這個工作。

eng: I want a map of Texas on a scale of 1 to 250000.
simp: 我想要一张1比250000的得克萨斯州的地图。
trad: 我想要一張1比250000的得克薩斯州的地圖。

eng: This is the reason why I came here.
simp: 这就是我为什麽回来的原因。
trad: 這就是我為什麼回來的原因。

eng: He dropped his wallet, and now it's mine.
simp: 他把自己的钱包掉到地上，现在是我的了。
trad: 他把自己的錢包掉到地上，現在是我的了。

eng: You must study hard.
Have you got a red pencil?
I found a bird whose wing was severely damaged.
simp: 我发现了一隻翅膀受了重伤的鸟儿。
trad: 我發現了一隻翅膀受了重傷的鳥兒。

eng: Were it not for music, the world would be a dull place.
simp: 如果没有了音乐，这个世界就会变得十分沉闷。
trad: 如果沒有了音樂，這個世界就會變得十分沈悶。

eng: The situation is worse than we believed.
simp: 情况比我们想像的要糟。
trad: 情況比我們想像的要糟。

eng: We can continue playing, as long as we don't make too much noise.
simp: 我们可以继续玩，别吵到别人就行了。
trad: 我們可以繼續玩，別吵到別人就行了。

eng: The transportation in this city is very convenient.
simp: 这个城市的交通方便得很。
trad: 這個城市的交通方便得很。

eng: My house has a fruit garden.
Don't ramble.
His ideas never earned him a single penny.
simp: 他的看法真是一文不值。
trad: 他的看法真是一文不值。

eng: I'm going to go buy some materials today.
I use Twitter.
Best served chilled.
Bob is popular at school.
This river is three times longer than that one.
He is immediately above me in rank.
I strolled along the streets to kill time.
simp: 我在街上散步，消磨时间。
trad: 我在街上散步，消磨時間。

eng: I'm really sorry to trouble you!
It would take forever for me to explain everything.
simp: 我就算说上三天三夜，恐怕也不能把一切解释清楚。
trad: 我就算說上三天三夜，恐怕也不能把一切解釋清楚。

eng: Your answer is right.
My mind is at ease believing you'll keep the secret.
simp: 我十分安心，因为我知道你会保守秘密。
trad: 我十分安心，因為我知道你會保守秘密。

eng: Tom may have missed the train. He hasn't come yet.
simp: 汤姆到了现在还没来，说不定是没赶上火车。
trad: 湯姆到了現在還沒來，說不定是沒趕上火車。

eng: What was that noise?
Butterflies of this species are now extinct.
simp: 这品种的蝴蝶现在已经绝种了。
trad: 這品種的蝴蝶現在已經絕種了。

eng: If it were not for examinations, how happy our school life would be!
simp: 如果不用考试，我们的校园生活该有多快乐啊！
trad: 如果不用考試，我們的校園生活該有多快樂啊！

eng: You should go to the dentist and have that tooth pulled out.
simp: 你应该去看牙医，把牙拔掉。
trad: 你應該去看牙醫，把牙拔掉。

eng: This is a good textbook.
Their trip was postponed because of the rain.
simp: 他们的旅行因为下雨延期了。
trad: 他們的旅行因為下雨延期了。

eng: One plus two is equal to three.
How is it going?
Does she speak French?
She rides her bike to school.
Did you sleep well?
Are you a college student?
It's still too early to talk about this now.
simp: 现在谈这件事还为时过早。
trad: 現在談這件事還為時過早。

eng: I can't stand it anymore.
Many young men died in the cause of democracy during the war.
simp: 许多年轻人在战争中因为民主而死去。
trad: 許多年輕人在戰爭中因為民主而死去。

eng: I understand how to solve the problem.
I like shopping on Ebay.
I truly do not understand the question.
They became very nervous.
I hate when other people make me wait a long time.
simp: 我讨厌别人让我等很久。
trad: 我討厭別人讓我等很久。

eng: Hurry, and you will catch the train.
simp: 快一点，你就能赶上火车了。
trad: 快一點，你就能趕上火車了。

eng: He lost his most beloved son.
I study Korean.
I was wrong.
That's not a cat. That's a dog.
Mary was proud of her beauty.
simp: 玛丽对她自己的美感到很自豪。
trad: 瑪麗對她自己的美感到很自豪。

eng: How are you doing?
Don't be afraid of making mistakes when speaking English.
simp: 讲英语的时候不要怕会不会说错什么。
trad: 講英語的時候不要怕會不會說錯什麼。

eng: Is there anything you want that you don't have?
simp: 有什么你想要但是没有的东西吗？
trad: 有什麼你想要但是沒有的東西嗎？

eng: You must always keep your hands clean.
simp: 你应该一直让手保持干净。
trad: 你應該一直讓手保持幹凈。

eng: You must always keep your hands clean.
simp: 您应该一直让手保持干净。
trad: 您應該一直讓手保持幹凈。

eng: How long have you been alienated from your family?
You're starting to warm up now.
Where did you go last Sunday?
You will soon get accustomed to your new school.
simp: 你很快就会适应你的新学校。
trad: 你很快就會適應你的新學校。

eng: Have you finished reading that novel?
All you have to do is to wait.
simp: 所有您要做的，就是等待。
trad: 所有您要做的，就是等待。

eng: Why did you try to run away?
Are you mad?
Are you mad?
This is my question.
Have you taken your medicine yet?
My hometown is very pretty.
Go straight on down this street.
Let's go now.
You should keep your valuables in a safe place.
simp: 你该把你的值钱物品保存在一个安全的地方。
trad: 你該把你的值錢物品保存在一個安全的地方。

eng: Another day gone by.
Her mother always accompanies her.
I suppose you're hungry.
I suppose you're hungry.
May I leave now?
May I go now?
Sunday is the last day of the week.
simp: 周日是一周的最后一天。
trad: 周日是一周的最後一天。

eng: My camera was stolen on the train.
simp: 我的照相机在火车上被偷了。
trad: 我的照相機在火車上被偷了。

eng: Do you plan to go abroad?
Did you play tennis yesterday?
You've got a big hole in your sock.
I don't understand what you're trying to say.
What you are saying does not make sense.
We all consider your idea to be impractical.
simp: 我们都认为你的想法是行不通的。
trad: 我們都認為你的想法是行不通的。

eng: Where have you come from?
I know that money isn't everything.
simp: 我知道金钱不是万能的。
trad: 我知道金錢不是萬能的。

eng: We call him "Skunk Man".
Tokyo, which is the largest city in Japan, is awake 24 hours.
simp: 东京是日本最大的城市，也是一个每天二十四小时都充满活力的地方。
trad: 東京是日本最大的城市，也是一個每天二十四小時都充滿活力的地方。

eng: It's still too early to talk about this now.
simp: 现在时间还早着呢，还是不谈这件事好。
trad: 現在時間還早著呢，還是不談這件事好。

eng: Shoes are sold in pairs.
simp: 鞋子是一对一对的卖的。
trad: 鞋子是一對一對的賣的。

eng: Are my socks dry already?
If you sign up to Facebook, your information will be sent to intelligence agencies.
simp: 如果你在 Facebook 注册，你的个人资料就会被送到情报机关的手里。
trad: 如果你在 Facebook 註冊，你的個人資料就會被送到情報機關的手裏。

eng: They defused the bomb before it could blow up.
simp: 他们趁炸弹还没有爆炸的时候就把它拆掉了。
trad: 他們趁炸彈還沒有爆炸的時候就把它拆掉了。

eng: I want to do it myself.
Oh, you are early this morning.
I'm all for it.
Fill in the blanks with suitable words.
simp: 请在空格上填上适当的字词。
trad: 請在空格上填上適當的字詞。

eng: Please tell me how to get to the airport.
simp: 请你告诉我机场怎麽去。
trad: 請你告訴我機場怎麼去。

eng: I'll phone you as soon as I get to the airport.
simp: 我一到了机场就打电话给你。
trad: 我一到了機場就打電話給你。

eng: The papers that were in the safe are gone.
simp: 放在保险箱里面的文件不见了。
trad: 放在保險箱裏面的文件不見了。

eng: Today, we are going to unravel the mystery of the English subjunctive.
simp: 今天我们来揭开英文虚拟式的神秘面纱。
trad: 今天我們來揭開英文虛擬式的神秘面紗。

eng: She was blind, deaf, and dumb.
I want to live in a world where people love one another.
simp: 我想在一个人人相亲相爱的世界里生活。
trad: 我想在一個人人相親相愛的世界裏生活。

eng: Yes.
Oh, no! My house is on fire!
It seems that the burglar broke in through an upstairs window.
simp: 强盗似乎是在上层破窗而入的。
trad: 強盜似乎是在上層破窗而入的。

eng: The revolution has brought about many changes.
simp: 这场革命已经带来了很多改变。
trad: 這場革命已經帶來了很多改變。

eng: If you do not have this program, you can download it now.
simp: 假如你没有这个程序，你现在就可以去下载。
trad: 假如你沒有這個程序，你現在就可以去下載。

eng: I have recently given up smoking.
How old are your children?
She left home with everything she owned.
simp: 她带着她所拥有的一切东西离家出走了。
trad: 她帶著她所擁有的一切東西離家出走了。

eng: The audience was largely made up of very young children.
simp: 大部分观众是年幼的儿童。
trad: 大部分觀眾是年幼的兒童。

eng: I do not trust him any longer.
He asked us to help him.
This novel is difficult to understand.
I have a Facebook account.
Are you talking to me?
He likes mathematics, but I don't.
simp: 他喜欢数学，但我不喜欢。
trad: 他喜歡數學，但我不喜歡。

eng: She's quick on her feet, so no matter what you say to her, she'll have a witty comeback.
simp: 她的脑筋转得很快，无论你对她说些什麽，她总能巧妙地作出反驳。
trad: 她的腦筋轉得很快，無論你對她說些什麼，她總能巧妙地作出反駁。

eng: People under 18 cannot get married.
Is there anything else you want me to do?
simp: 你还有什么事情需要我去做的吗？
trad: 你還有什麼事情需要我去做的嗎？

eng: I'll do whatever you want me to do.
simp: 无论你要我做什么，我都会去做的。
trad: 無論你要我做什麼，我都會去做的。

eng: He overcame all sorts of hardship and setbacks to succeed in a solo crossing of Antarctica.
simp: 他克服了种种困难和挫折，终于成功一个人越过了南极洲。
trad: 他克服了種種困難和挫折，終於成功一個人越過了南極洲。

eng: His sudden appearance surprised us all.
simp: 他的突然出现，让我们都感到惊讶。
trad: 他的突然出現，讓我們都感到驚訝。

eng: Are you there?
How many cats are there in this house?
simp: 这房子里面有多少隻猫？
trad: 這房子裏面有多少隻貓？

eng: Paraguay is a country in South America.
simp: 巴拉圭是一个南美洲的国家。
trad: 巴拉圭是一個南美洲的國家。

eng: That comic's jokes are all old hat and we've heard them before.
simp: 那个喜剧演员说的全都是我们以前已经听过的老笑话。
trad: 那個喜劇演員說的全都是我們以前已經聽過的老笑話。

eng: This room has fine ventilation.
simp: 这房间的通风设备很好。
trad: 這房間的通風設備很好。

eng: I think you had better stick to your present job.
simp: 我觉得你应该继续做这份工作。
trad: 我覺得你應該繼續做這份工作。

eng: Don't forget that good jobs are very hard to come by these days.
simp: 别忘了这年头好工作已经很难找了。
trad: 別忘了這年頭好工作已經很難找了。

eng: The students' lunch period is from twelve to one.
simp: 学生的午饭时间是十二点到一点。
trad: 學生的午飯時間是十二點到一點。

eng: At the age of six he had learned to use the typewriter and told the teacher that he did not need to learn to write by hand.
simp: 他六岁的时候学会了用打字机，便和老师说他不用学执笔写字了。
trad: 他六歲的時候學會了用打字機，便和老師說他不用學執筆寫字了。

eng: Don't forget to return the book to the library.
simp: 别忘了把书还给图书馆。
trad: 別忘了把書還給圖書館。

eng: Come, I'll serve some for you.
You can't live on this side anymore.
simp: 你再也不能住在这一边。
trad: 你再也不能住在這一邊。

eng: Do you want to come along?
This is the monsoon season.
He has a lot of money.
Linux is a free operating system; you should try it.
simp: Linux是一个免费的操作系统。你应该去试用一下。
trad: Linux是一個免費的操作系統。你應該去試用一下。

eng: It’s not a bug, it’s an undocumented feature.
simp: 这不是一个漏洞，而是一个没有写进文档的特性。
trad: 這不是一個漏洞，而是一個沒有寫進文檔的特性。

eng: Whose notebook is that?
I like shopping in used-book stores and in used-clothing shops.
simp: 我很喜欢逛二手书店和二手衣店。
trad: 我很喜歡逛二手書店和二手衣店。

eng: Everyone says that he's a good man.
Don't speak with your mouth full!
I learned English words by heart all day yesterday.
simp: 我昨天整天都在背英文字。
trad: 我昨天整天都在背英文字。

eng: Regardless what you may do, the outcome will still be the same.
simp: 不管你怎么做，结果都一样。
trad: 不管你怎麼做，結果都一樣。

eng: I was absorbed in a book and didn't hear you call.
simp: 我看书看得入神，听不到你叫我。
trad: 我看書看得入神，聽不到你叫我。

eng: He had used up all the money which his friend had lent him.
simp: 他把朋友借给他的钱全都花光了。
trad: 他把朋友借給他的錢全都花光了。

eng: Windows is the most used operating system in the world.
simp: Windows是世界上使用得最多的操作系统。
trad: Windows是世界上使用得最多的操作系統。

eng: He asked me what I had bought.
The problem was that I had nothing to say to him.
simp: 问题是 我没什么要跟他说的。
trad: 問題是 我沒什麼要跟他說的。

eng: We can't go outside because it's raining.
simp: 因为下雨，我们不能出去。
trad: 因為下雨，我們不能出去。

eng: Where's the nearest train station?
Your watch is more expensive than mine.
Frank was waiting with pleasure for the date in the evening.
simp: 法兰克高兴地等待着他晚上的约会。
trad: 法蘭克高興地等待著他晚上的約會。

eng: The meaning of a word is determined by the context where it is used.
simp: 一个字的意思是由上文下理决定的。
trad: 一個字的意思是由上文下理決定的。

eng: In 1958, Brazil won its first World Cup victory.
simp: 在一九五八年，巴西首次夺得了世界盃的冠军。
trad: 在一九五八年，巴西首次奪得了世界盃的冠軍。

eng: Let's wait until it stops raining.
What season do you like the best?
The baby started to cry.
My baby began crying, asking for milk.
simp: 我的宝宝开始哭了，他想要吃奶。
trad: 我的寶寶開始哭了，他想要吃奶。

eng: How often do you see him?
The event is still fresh in our memory.
simp: 那件事在我们的脑海中还记忆犹新。
trad: 那件事在我們的腦海中還記憶猶新。

eng: Here is my baggage.

In China, there is a large number of characters, so the goal of the character simplification was to replace the complex traditional characters with easy to remember simplified characters and increase the literacy rate.
simp: 中国的汉字数量繁多，推行汉字简化的目的，是把结构複杂的繁体字转换成易学易记的简体字，从而提高国民的识字水平。
trad: 中國的漢字數量繁多，推行漢字簡化的目的，是把結構複雜的繁體字轉換成易學易記的簡體字，從而提高國民的識字水平。

eng: Do you know how high the television tower is?
simp: 你知道那座电视塔有多高吗？
trad: 你知道那座電視塔有多高嗎？

eng: May I call you tomorrow?
simp: 我明天可以打电话给你吗？
trad: 我明天可以打電話給你嗎？

eng: A water molecule has two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.
simp: 一个水分子是由两个氢原子和一个氧原子组成的。
trad: 一個水分子是由兩個氫原子和一個氧原子組成的。
