eng: He was happy to have passed the examination.
simp: 他为考试及格感到高兴。
trad: 他為考試及格感到高興。

eng: He went to London to study English.
Air pollution will be a threat to our survival.
simp: 空气污染将会威胁我们的生存。
trad: 空氣汙染將會威脅我們的生存。

eng: I heard someone scream.
I do not like to make mistakes.
His story amused everyone.
simp: 他的故事把大家给逗乐了。
trad: 他的故事把大家給逗樂了。

eng: You are only young once.
The bird was half the size of a hawk.
simp: 那只鸟的体积有半只老鹰那么大。
trad: 那只鳥的體積有半只老鷹那麼大。

eng: The position requires applicants to be skilled in spoken English.
simp: 这份职位要求应征者有一定的英语口语表达能力。
trad: 這份職位要求應征者有一定的英語口語表達能力。

eng: Can I pick my ticket up at the airport?
simp: 我能在机场领取机票吗？
trad: 我能在機場領取機票嗎？

eng: It had the head of a woman, the body of a lion, the wings of a bird, and the tail of a serpent.
simp: 它长着女人的头、狮子的身体、一双羽翅以及蛇尾巴。
trad: 它長著女人的頭、獅子的身體、一雙羽翅以及蛇尾巴。

eng: I'm disturbing you.
He's picky about suits and ties.
simp: 他对西装和领带的选择非常挑剔。
trad: 他對西裝和領帶的選擇非常挑剔。

eng: She decided to study abroad.
She set the bird free from the cage.
simp: 她把小鸟从笼子里释放出来。
trad: 她把小鳥從籠子裏釋放出來。

eng: God is our salvation, said the priest.
Give your whole attention to what you are doing.
simp: 请专心做你正在做的事情。
trad: 請專心做你正在做的事情。

eng: Will you please help me carry this suitcase?
simp: 你能帮我拿这个行李箱吗？
trad: 你能幫我拿這個行李箱嗎？

eng: I ordered some new books from America.
simp: 我从美国订购了一些新书。
trad: 我從美國訂購了一些新書。

eng: Their friendship ripened into a deep love.
simp: 他们的友情酝酿成爱情的果实。
trad: 他們的友情醞釀成愛情的果實。

eng: All the workers went home save one.
simp: 所有的员工都回家了，只剩一位。
trad: 所有的員工都回家了，只剩一位。

eng: She bent down and picked up the coin.
simp: 她弯低身子，把钱币捡了起来。
trad: 她彎低身子，把錢幣撿了起來。

eng: Someone has ripped out the first three pages of this book.
simp: 这本书的头三页被人撕掉了。
trad: 這本書的頭三頁被人撕掉了。

eng: I was ashamed of my behavior.
simp: 我对自己的行为感到羞愧。
trad: 我對自己的行為感到羞愧。

eng: I don't feel like studying.
simp: 我没有强烈的欲望去学习。
trad: 我沒有強烈的欲望去學習。

eng: Maybe you are working too hard.
Don't disturb me while I'm studying.
simp: 当我学习的时候不要打扰我。
trad: 當我學習的時候不要打擾我。

eng: While traveling in Europe, I was pickpocketed on a train.
simp: 我去欧洲旅行的时候，在火车上给人偷了东西。
trad: 我去歐洲旅行的時候，在火車上給人偷了東西。

eng: You have to wear a helmet to protect your head.
simp: 你要戴上头盔来保护你的头部。
trad: 你要戴上頭盔來保護你的頭部。

eng: My parents had already eaten by the time I got home.
simp: 我回到家的时候，爸爸妈妈都已经吃完饭了。
trad: 我回到家的時候，爸爸媽媽都已經吃完飯了。

eng: He helps whoever asks him to help.
simp: 无论是甚麽人请他帮忙，他也会帮忙。
trad: 無論是甚麼人請他幫忙，他也會幫忙。

eng: The President is to speak on television this evening.
simp: 总统今晚将会在电视上发表演说。
trad: 總統今晚將會在電視上發表演說。

eng: You have only to answer the first question.
simp: 你只需要回答头一个问题。
trad: 你只需要回答頭一個問題。

eng: The weather has a great deal to do with our health.
simp: 天气和我们的健康有很大的关係。
trad: 天氣和我們的健康有很大的關係。

eng: Are there many people in Europe who believe in ghosts even now?
simp: 欧洲现在是不是还有很多人信鬼？
trad: 歐洲現在是不是還有很多人信鬼？

eng: I study English an hour every day.
simp: 我每天都会花一小时来学英文。
trad: 我每天都會花一小時來學英文。

eng: My hobby is collecting coins.
He wasn't earning a large salary when he retired.
simp: 他退休时的薪金并不高。
trad: 他退休時的薪金並不高。

eng: He is leading an easy life in the country.
simp: 他在乡村里过着无忧无虑的生活。
trad: 他在鄉村裏過著無憂無慮的生活。

eng: I'm accustomed to sleeping in a room without air conditioning.
simp: 我习惯在没有空调的房间里睡觉。
trad: 我習慣在沒有空調的房間裏睡覺。

eng: We made friends with Jane.
It seems to have that he knows everything.
He looked at me in surprise.
He will come to you tomorrow.
I often feel like just going over there.
What is the difference between this and that?
It's almost six o'clock.
Do you often travel abroad?
Do you think the weather will be fine tomorrow?
simp: 你觉得明天天气会变好吗？
trad: 你覺得明天天氣會變好嗎？

eng: She teaches us French.
He tried to concentrate on the letter.
simp: 他试图把注意力集中在信上。
trad: 他試圖把註意力集中在信上。

eng: He is giving his whole attention to that.
You have no fever.
Don't pay any attention to what your father says.
The world is full of incompetent doctors.
simp: 社会上满是不称职的医生。
trad: 社會上滿是不稱職的醫生。

eng: Concerning this issue, I feel that the trash media only report biased information.
simp: 关于这个问题，我觉得垃圾媒体只报道了很片面的信息。
trad: 關於這個問題，我覺得垃圾媒體只報道了很片面的信息。

eng: A growing child who doesn't seem to have much energy perhaps needs medical attention.
simp: 一个成长中的孩子如果没有充足的能量，可能需要药物治疗。
trad: 一個成長中的孩子如果沒有充足的能量，可能需要藥物治療。

eng: You have cute eyes.
simp: 你有一双很可爱的眼睛。
trad: 你有一雙很可愛的眼睛。

eng: Yes, it's such a nice evening.
The sky was clear when I left home.
simp: 当我离开家的时候天空很明朗。
trad: 當我離開家的時候天空很明朗。

eng: Do you often travel abroad?
We bought some vegetables and fish at the market.
simp: 我们在市场上买了些蔬菜和鱼。
trad: 我們在市場上買了些蔬菜和魚。

eng: You're so beautiful!
He was laughed at in public.
Whose idea was it?
He is mad about music.
Would you please wait for a few minutes?
You're still green.
The baby was sound asleep in her mother's arms.
simp: 孩子在母亲的怀中熟睡。
trad: 孩子在母親的懷中熟睡。

eng: I wanted to go to the concert.
simp: 我本想去参加音乐会的。
trad: 我本想去參加音樂會的。

eng: I have lived here since I was a boy.
simp: 我还是一个小男孩的时候就住在这里。
trad: 我還是一個小男孩的時候就住在這裏。

eng: Not knowing what to do, I asked the teacher for advice.
simp: 因为不知道做什么，所以我向老师寻求建议。
trad: 因為不知道做什麼，所以我向老師尋求建議。

eng: This river is safe to swim in.
simp: 在这条河里游泳很安全。
trad: 在這條河裏遊泳很安全。

eng: She usually goes to bed at nine.
She was in a hurry to see her father.
He had hoped to succeed, but he didn't.
simp: 他本希望可以成功，但是他没有。
trad: 他本希望可以成功，但是他沒有。

eng: The earth is made up of sea and land.
simp: 地球是由海洋和陆地组成的。
trad: 地球是由海洋和陸地組成的。

eng: London is among the largest cities in the world.
simp: 伦敦是世界上最大的城市之一。
trad: 倫敦是世界上最大的城市之一。

eng: I was born in 1979.
Nobody is perfect.
I've never eaten Chinese food before.
simp: 我以前从来没有尝过中餐。
trad: 我以前從來沒有嘗過中餐。

eng: Everyone dies.
Germany adjoins the Netherlands.
She speaks German and French, not to mention English.
simp: 她不仅讲德语、法语，还讲英语。
trad: 她不僅講德語、法語，還講英語。

eng: He got accustomed to the new way of living.
simp: 他适应了新的生活方式。
trad: 他適應了新的生活方式。

eng: She always clears the table after a meal.
simp: 她经常在饭后收拾桌子。
trad: 她經常在飯後收拾桌子。

eng: This is the biggest car in the world.
She thought of a good solution.
simp: 她想到了一个好的解决办法。
trad: 她想到了一個好的解決辦法。

eng: It'll cost at least five dollars.
You look pale. You had better lie down in bed at once.
simp: 你看上去很苍白。你最好立刻去床上躺会儿。
trad: 你看上去很蒼白。你最好立刻去床上躺會兒。

eng: They are trying to keep costs down.
If he knew her phone number, he could call her.
simp: 如果他知道她的电话，他会打给她。
trad: 如果他知道她的電話，他會打給她。

eng: They opposed Darwin's theory of evolution.
simp: 他们反对达尔文的进化论。
trad: 他們反對達爾文的進化論。

eng: Who she saw was not herself but a different woman.
simp: 她见到的不是自己，而是另一个女人。
trad: 她見到的不是自己，而是另一個女人。

eng: Generally speaking, Americans are very fond of coffee.
simp: 美国人一般都很喜欢喝咖啡。
trad: 美國人一般都很喜歡喝咖啡。

eng: We had a snowball fight.
simp: 我们打了一场雪球大战。
trad: 我們打了一場雪球大戰。

eng: The building on the hill is our school.
simp: 山上的那栋建筑物就是我们的学校了。
trad: 山上的那棟建築物就是我們的學校了。

eng: The Murais have gone back to Japan?
simp: 村井一家已经回日本了？
trad: 村井一家已經回日本了？

eng: Oranges contain a lot of vitamin C.
simp: 香橙含有丰富的维他命 C。
trad: 香橙含有豐富的維他命 C。

eng: The last three coaches of the train were badly damaged.
simp: 火车的尾三节车厢损坏得很严重。
trad: 火車的尾三節車廂損壞得很嚴重。

eng: This box is made of paper.
Given good weather, we will reach there tomorrow.
simp: 如果天气好的话，我们明天就会到达了。
trad: 如果天氣好的話，我們明天就會到達了。

eng: How many times has Japan hosted the Olympics?
simp: 日本办过多少次奥运会？
trad: 日本辦過多少次奧運會？

eng: He is older than you by eight years.
The man you saw yesterday was my uncle.
simp: 你昨天看到的那个男人是我伯伯。
trad: 你昨天看到的那個男人是我伯伯。

eng: Do you know that nice-looking girl?
Crying out, the little girl was looking for her mother.
simp: 小女孩哭着找她的妈妈。
trad: 小女孩哭著找她的媽媽。

eng: In China, the 11th of November is Singles Day.
simp: 在中国十一月十一号是光棍节。
trad: 在中國十一月十一號是光棍節。

eng: Japan and South Korea are neighbors.
We want complete sentences.
Don't change sentences that are correct. You can, instead, submit natural-sounding alternative translations.
simp: 请勿更改没有错误的句子。请添加一个新的更自然的翻译。
trad: 請勿更改沒有錯誤的句子。請添加一個新的更自然的翻譯。

eng: Don't add sentences from copyrighted sources.
simp: 请勿由享有版权的来源添加句子。
trad: 請勿由享有版權的來源添加句子。

eng: We want natural-sounding translations, not word-for-word direct translations.
simp: 我们想要听起来自然的翻译，而不需要逐字的翻译。
trad: 我們想要聽起來自然的翻譯，而不需要逐字的翻譯。

eng: Make a good translation of the sentence that you are translating. Don't let translations into other languages influence you.
simp: 请给您所译的句子一个良好的翻译。请勿让其他语言的翻译影响到您所做的翻译。
trad: 請給您所譯的句子一個良好的翻譯。請勿讓其他語言的翻譯影響到您所做的翻譯。

eng: Don't add annotations.
It's difficult to learn a foreign language.
He is an industrious student to the best of my knowledge.
simp: 就我所知，他是个很用功的学生。
trad: 就我所知，他是個很用功的學生。

eng: You can't speak French, can you?
She woke up.
She is a taxi driver.
I don't see anything.
Arabic is a very important language.
simp: 阿拉伯语是一种很重要的语言。
trad: 阿拉伯語是一種很重要的語言。

eng: I have a friend who lives in England.
simp: 我有个住在英国的朋友。
trad: 我有個住在英國的朋友。

eng: There is too much furniture in the house.
Wood burns easily.
I read a book as I walked.
Water and oil are both liquids.
She has anxiety for your safety.
We believe in democracy.
Do you often travel abroad?
She woke up.
My radio has broken down again.
I don't like to swim in pools.
simp: 我不喜欢在泳池里游泳。
trad: 我不喜歡在泳池裏遊泳。

eng: I'm sorry to have kept you waiting for a long time.
simp: 让你等了这麽久，真不好意思。
trad: 讓你等了這麼久，真不好意思。

eng: My father sometimes goes to Australia on business.
simp: 我爸爸有时会去澳洲公干。
trad: 我爸爸有時會去澳洲公幹。

eng: Mr Kato is a teacher.
He was, is, and will be, my best friend.
simp: 他以前是我最好的朋友，他现在是我最好的朋友，他以后也会是我最好的朋友。
trad: 他以前是我最好的朋友，他現在是我最好的朋友，他以後也會是我最好的朋友。

eng: The wind blew her hat off.
He keeps two cats: one is black, and the other white.
simp: 他养了两头猫：一头是黑色的，一头是白色的。
trad: 他養了兩頭貓：一頭是黑色的，一頭是白色的。

eng: We had dinner at a restaurant.
simp: 我们去了一家餐厅吃晚饭。
trad: 我們去了一家餐廳吃晚飯。

eng: She lifted up her head and looked at him.
Can you explain how this machine works?
simp: 你可以说明一下这台机器是怎样运作的吗？
trad: 你可以說明一下這臺機器是怎樣運作的嗎？

eng: Draw a line on your paper.
They were made of rough brown leather.
simp: 它们是用粗糙的褐色皮革製成的。
trad: 它們是用粗糙的褐色皮革製成的。

eng: I want a compact car with an air conditioner.
simp: 我想要一辆有空调的小型车。
trad: 我想要一輛有空調的小型車。

eng: My eyes are sore.
I wrote a letter in English.
It was not until he was thirty that he started to paint.
simp: 他到了三十岁才开始画画。
trad: 他到了三十歲才開始畫畫。

eng: He has recently returned from France.
In short, it is because the 'plan.doc' file I attached in the previous email was infected with a virus.
simp: 简单来说，就是因为我附在上一封电邮的「plan.doc」档桉被电脑病毒感染了。
trad: 簡單來說，就是因為我附在上一封電郵的「plan.doc」檔案被電腦病毒感染了。

eng: On his left sat his mother.
simp: 他的母亲坐在他的左边。
trad: 他的母親坐在他的左邊。

eng: We have a lot of problems to deal with.
simp: 我们有很多问题要处理。
trad: 我們有很多問題要處理。

eng: He goes to work on foot every day except on rainy days.
simp: 除了下雨天以外，他每天都会走路上班。
trad: 除了下雨天以外，他每天都會走路上班。

eng: Do you think he did the job on his own?
simp: 你认为他是自己独立完成这份工的吗？
trad: 你認為他是自己獨立完成這份工的嗎？

eng: This is secret between you and me.
I have been to Rome.
Are you free on Tuesday?
I want to study math.
I had sore legs the next day.
His parents ran a hotel.
simp: 他的父母经营一家酒店。
trad: 他的父母經營一家酒店。

eng: I went to the station to see my friend off.
simp: 我去车站为我朋友送行。
trad: 我去車站為我朋友送行。

eng: He was wounded in the war.
The lock is broken.
We are glad to have you in our class.
simp: 我们很高兴你加入了我们班。
trad: 我們很高興你加入了我們班。

eng: How far is it from here to Ueno?
This morning I got up an hour earlier than usual.
simp: 今早我比平时早了一个小时起床。
trad: 今早我比平時早了一個小時起床。

eng: It has finally stopped snowing and has warmed up.
simp: 雪终于停了，天气也开始暖和了。
trad: 雪終於停了，天氣也開始暖和了。

eng: All the eggs in the box were broken.
simp: 箱子里面的鸡蛋全都破掉了。
trad: 箱子裏面的雞蛋全都破掉了。

eng: The girl had a long scarf around her neck.
simp: 女孩的脖子上围着一条长长的围巾。
trad: 女孩的脖子上圍著一條長長的圍巾。

eng: Hitler assumed power in 1933.
simp: 希特勒在一九三三年取得了权力。
trad: 希特勒在一九三三年取得了權力。

eng: Can I have a dance with you?
simp: 我可以和你跳一支舞吗？
trad: 我可以和你跳一支舞嗎？

eng: If it were not for water, no one could live on earth.
simp: 如果没有了水，没有人能够在地球上生存。
trad: 如果沒有了水，沒有人能夠在地球上生存。

eng: He has little experience in teaching.
The pond was encircled with trees.
simp: 池溏的四周长满了树木。
trad: 池溏的四周長滿了樹木。

eng: We found many strange plants in a botanical garden.
simp: 我们在一家植物园里找到了许多稀奇古怪的植物。
trad: 我們在一家植物園裏找到了許多稀奇古怪的植物。

eng: What is the difference between imitation and real diamonds?
simp: 假的鑽石和真的鑽石有甚麽分别？
trad: 假的鑽石和真的鑽石有甚麼分別？

eng: My elder brother finished his homework very quickly.
simp: 我哥哥很快就把功课做完了。
trad: 我哥哥很快就把功課做完了。

eng: Nancy never fails to write to me once a month.
simp: 南希每个月都会写信给我，风雨不改。
trad: 南希每個月都會寫信給我，風雨不改。

eng: There used to be big trees around the pond.
simp: 池塘的四周以前种满了大树。
trad: 池塘的四周以前種滿了大樹。

eng: Tom was badly injured in a traffic accident.
simp: 汤姆在交通意外中受了重伤。
trad: 湯姆在交通意外中受了重傷。

eng: I don't know whether to accept or refuse.
simp: 我不知道应该接受还是拒绝。
trad: 我不知道應該接受還是拒絕。

eng: The dance had already started when I got there.
simp: 我到达的时候，舞会已经开始了。
trad: 我到達的時候，舞會已經開始了。

eng: The policeman caught the thief.
She is beautiful, intelligent and, what is best of all, very kind-hearted.
simp: 她又漂亮，又聪明，而最棒的是，她还是一个十分善良的人。
trad: 她又漂亮，又聰明，而最棒的是，她還是一個十分善良的人。

eng: He has been engaged in the study of biology for nearly ten years.
simp: 他研究生物学已经有差不多十年的时间了。
trad: 他研究生物學已經有差不多十年的時間了。

eng: The United States is composed of 50 states.
simp: 美国是由五十个州组成的。
trad: 美國是由五十個州組成的。

eng: His son cannot so much as write his own name.
simp: 他的儿子连自己的名字也不会写。
trad: 他的兒子連自己的名字也不會寫。

eng: The nurse took his temperature with a thermometer.
simp: 护士用温度计量了量他的体温。
trad: 護士用溫度計量了量他的體溫。

eng: I met a friend there.
simp: 我在那里碰见一个朋友。
trad: 我在那裏碰見一個朋友。

eng: I don't have a bicycle, let alone a car.
simp: 我连自行车都没有，更不用说汽车了。
trad: 我連自行車都沒有，更不用說汽車了。

eng: They had no alternative but to retreat.
He speaks only English and German, neither of which I understand.
simp: 他只会说英语和德语，这两种语言我都不懂。
trad: 他只會說英語和德語，這兩種語言我都不懂。

eng: Two glasses of orange juice, please.
The main duty of a priest is to preach in church.
simp: 牧师的主要职责是在教堂里讲道。
trad: 牧師的主要職責是在教堂裏講道。

eng: Where is the emergency exit?
My hobby is playing the guitar.
There is a dragonfly on the ceiling.
She practises the piano every day.
A dog's sense of smell is much keener than a human's.
simp: 狗的嗅觉比人类敏锐得多。
trad: 狗的嗅覺比人類敏銳得多。

eng: It saddens me to hear you say that.
simp: 听到你这样说，我真的很伤心。
trad: 聽到你這樣說，我真的很傷心。

eng: They take their meals at the hotel.
My acquaintance with his works is slight.
What is the unemployment rate at the moment?
I suggested that we should stay there another day.
simp: 我提议我们在那里再待一天。
trad: 我提議我們在那裏再待一天。

eng: The plane flew above the clouds.
My father bought this hat for me.
simp: 这顶帽子是爸爸买给我的。
trad: 這頂帽子是爸爸買給我的。

eng: I may have seen that film before, but I can hardly remember it.
simp: 我以前可能看过这部电影，但是我却不怎麽记得了。
trad: 我以前可能看過這部電影，但是我卻不怎麼記得了。

eng: I have to do a lot of things.
Even though he was tired, he went on with his work.
simp: 他虽然很累，但是也继续工作。
trad: 他雖然很累，但是也繼續工作。

eng: Gold is similar in color to brass.
simp: 金的颜色和黄铜很相似。
trad: 金的顏色和黃銅很相似。

eng: I met your mother through Facebook. So, if Facebook didn't exist, neither would you, my little angel.
simp: 我是在 Facebook 认识你妈妈的。所以，如果没有 Facebook，你也不会在这个世界上了，我的小宝宝。
trad: 我是在 Facebook 認識你媽媽的。所以，如果沒有 Facebook，你也不會在這個世界上了，我的小寶寶。

eng: She wore a white dress.
simp: 她穿了一条白色的洋装。
trad: 她穿了一條白色的洋裝。

eng: The square of 5 is 25.
I could not find my brother who was to meet me at the station.
simp: 我的弟弟应该会来车站接我的，但是我却找不到他。
trad: 我的弟弟應該會來車站接我的，但是我卻找不到他。

eng: You should stay in the hospital for treatment.
simp: 你应该留在医院，接受治疗。
trad: 你應該留在醫院，接受治療。

eng: Smoking affects our health.
simp: 吸烟会影响我们的健康。
trad: 吸煙會影響我們的健康。

eng: I gave the beggar what money I had.
simp: 我把身上的钱全都给了那个乞丐。
trad: 我把身上的錢全都給了那個乞丐。

eng: Mental health is as important as physical health.
simp: 精神的健康和身体的健康一样重要。
trad: 精神的健康和身體的健康一樣重要。

eng: It was not until then that I realized my mistake.
simp: 到了那时，我才发现自己错了。
trad: 到了那時，我才發現自己錯了。

eng: The couple spent a lot of money on furnishing their house.
simp: 那对夫妇花了很多钱来佈置他们的房子。
trad: 那對夫婦花了很多錢來佈置他們的房子。

eng: I was only a seven-year-old girl at that time.
simp: 我那时还是一个七岁的小女孩。
trad: 我那時還是一個七歲的小女孩。

eng: The heroine of this story is a little girl.
simp: 这个故事的女主角是一个小女孩。
trad: 這個故事的女主角是一個小女孩。

eng: My big sister washes her hair every morning.
simp: 我姐姐每天早上都会洗头。
trad: 我姐姐每天早上都會洗頭。

eng: She had white shoes on.
He often comes late to school.
I like stories that have sad endings.
simp: 我喜欢以悲剧收场的故事。
trad: 我喜歡以悲劇收場的故事。

eng: She finished writing a letter.
I arrived here about five o'clock.
The number of students who were late for school was much smaller than I had expected.
simp: 上学迟到的学生人数比我想像中少很多。
trad: 上學遲到的學生人數比我想像中少很多。

eng: The antiques my father left when he died turned out to be nothing but worthless junk.
simp: 父亲生前留下来的老古董，原来只是一堆不值钱的垃圾。
trad: 父親生前留下來的老古董，原來只是一堆不值錢的垃圾。

eng: The old man bribed a young girl with money and jewelry.
simp: 老人用金钱和珠宝取得了少女的欢心。
trad: 老人用金錢和珠寶取得了少女的歡心。

eng: My friends were so boozed up that I had to drive them home.
simp: 我的朋友全都喝得酩酊大醉，我只好开车把他们送回家。
trad: 我的朋友全都喝得酩酊大醉，我只好開車把他們送回家。

eng: You can hear the sound of the sea in this hotel room.
simp: 在这间酒店房间里，你可以听见海的声音。
trad: 在這間酒店房間裏，你可以聽見海的聲音。

eng: We came through a busy street.
simp: 我们穿过了一条人来人往的街道。
trad: 我們穿過了一條人來人往的街道。

eng: When are you going to leave for London?
simp: 你甚麽时候出发去伦敦？
trad: 你甚麼時候出發去倫敦？

eng: The committee is composed of three men and seven women.
simp: 委员会是由三男七女组成的。
trad: 委員會是由三男七女組成的。

eng: The more difficult the questions are, the less likely I'll be able to answer them.
simp: 问题愈难，我懂得回答的机会就愈低。
trad: 問題愈難，我懂得回答的機會就愈低。

eng: Passengers became nervous when the plane began to vibrate.
simp: 飞机开始震动的时候，乘客们都紧张了起来。
trad: 飛機開始震動的時候，乘客們都緊張了起來。

eng: The policeman lifted the box carefully.
simp: 警察小心翼翼地抬起了箱子。
trad: 警察小心翼翼地擡起了箱子。

eng: She had been proposed to five times by the time she was twenty.
simp: 她二十岁的时候，就已经有五个人向她求过婚了。
trad: 她二十歲的時候，就已經有五個人向她求過婚了。

eng: That event happened 15 years ago.
simp: 那件事是在十五年前发生的。
trad: 那件事是在十五年前發生的。

eng: Father translated the French document into Japanese.
simp: 爸爸把那份法文的文件翻译成了日文。
trad: 爸爸把那份法文的文件翻譯成了日文。

eng: Rabbits like to eat carrots.
The two runners reached the finish line at the same time.
simp: 两位跑手同时到达了终点线。
trad: 兩位跑手同時到達了終點線。

eng: The atomic number of iron is 26.
simp: 铁的原子序数是二十六。
trad: 鐵的原子序數是二十六。

eng: She was born at six a.m. on July 17, 1990.
simp: 她是在一九九零年七月十七日的早上六时出生的。
trad: 她是在一九九零年七月十七日的早上六時出生的。

eng: Light travels around the earth seven and a half times a second.
simp: 光一秒钟能够环绕地球七圈半。
trad: 光一秒鐘能夠環繞地球七圈半。

eng: This coat is nice, but too expensive.
simp: 这件外套挺不错，但是太贵了。
trad: 這件外套挺不錯，但是太貴了。

eng: The weather was very bad yesterday.
The moon and stars were shining above us.
simp: 月亮和星星在我们的头顶照耀着。
trad: 月亮和星星在我們的頭頂照耀著。

eng: I went to the park yesterday.
May I use this pencil? "Yes, you may."
simp: “我可不可以用你的笔？” “嗯，可以。”
trad: “我可不可以用你的筆？” “嗯，可以。”

eng: There are more girls than boys in our school.
simp: 我们学校女孩比男孩多。
trad: 我們學校女孩比男孩多。

eng: I remember the man's face but I can't call his name to mind.
simp: 我记得那个人的样子，但是我却想不起他的名字。
trad: 我記得那個人的樣子，但是我卻想不起他的名字。

eng: I like to study foreign languages.
The question was too difficult to answer.
The surface of the earth is 70% water.
simp: 地球的表面有七成是水。
trad: 地球的表面有七成是水。

eng: How do you spell "pretty"?
I bought a red tie.
simp: 我买了一条红色的领带。
trad: 我買了一條紅色的領帶。

eng: Put down your name on the list and pass it on to the next person.
simp: 把你的名字写在名单上，然后把名单传给下一个人。
trad: 把你的名字寫在名單上，然後把名單傳給下一個人。

eng: He is still not accustomed to city life.
simp: 他还没有习惯城市生活。
trad: 他還沒有習慣城市生活。

eng: This castle is more beautiful than that.
He put on his hat at once.
simp: 他马上戴上了他的帽子。
trad: 他馬上戴上了他的帽子。

eng: Tufts University is a very famous school in Boston.
simp: 塔夫斯大学是波士顿一家十分有名的大学。
trad: 塔夫斯大學是波士頓一家十分有名的大學。

eng: They don't know that I'm Japanese.
simp: 他们不知道我是日本人。
trad: 他們不知道我是日本人。

eng: The dishes were not so delicious, but otherwise the party was a success.
simp: 虽然食物不怎麽好吃，但是派对在其它方面办得很出色。
trad: 雖然食物不怎麼好吃，但是派對在其它方面辦得很出色。

eng: I tried writing with my left hand.
The plane flew at an altitude of 3,000 meters.
simp: 飞机在三千米的高空飞行。
trad: 飛機在三千米的高空飛行。

eng: He drank three glasses of water.
I like to walk in the rain.
Do you speak Italian?
The Mississippi is the longest river in the United States.
simp: 密西西比河是全美国最长的河。
trad: 密西西比河是全美國最長的河。

eng: I've done half the work, and now I can take a break.
simp: 我已经做完了一半工作，现在可以休息一下了。
trad: 我已經做完了一半工作，現在可以休息一下了。

eng: No one succeeds in the world without effort.
simp: 世界上没有人能够不付出努力就获得成功。
trad: 世界上沒有人能夠不付出努力就獲得成功。

eng: Our school was founded in 1990.
simp: 我们的学校是在一九九零年创立的。
trad: 我們的學校是在一九九零年創立的。

eng: I usually have dinner at seven.
This hospital has a lot of new equipment.
simp: 这间医院有很多新设备。
trad: 這間醫院有很多新設備。

eng: I'm going to join the school orchestra.
simp: 我打算加入学校的管弦乐团。
trad: 我打算加入學校的管弦樂團。

eng: Please circle the right answer.
Frank left a message by means of a secret code.
simp: 法兰克用暗号留下了一则讯息。
trad: 法蘭克用暗號留下了一則訊息。

eng: Your telegram arrived just as I was about to telephone you.
simp: 我正想打电话给你，你的电报就送来了。
trad: 我正想打電話給你，你的電報就送來了。

eng: A big earthquake occurred in India yesterday.
simp: 印度昨天发生了一场大地震。
trad: 印度昨天發生了一場大地震。

eng: I farted in class and the teacher threw me out.
simp: 我上课的时候放屁，被老师赶出了班房。
trad: 我上課的時候放屁，被老師趕出了班房。

eng: Translation is by no means easy.
simp: 翻译绝对不是一件易事。
trad: 翻譯絕對不是一件易事。

eng: Please give me a piece of bread.
It was a pleasure to spend the evening with a smart, funny and beautiful girl like you.
simp: 和你这样又聪明、又幽默、又漂亮的女孩共渡一晚，实在是一件赏心乐事。
trad: 和你這樣又聰明、又幽默、又漂亮的女孩共渡一晚，實在是一件賞心樂事。

eng: Maybe I shouldn't tell you this, but I am truly mesmerized by your beauty.
simp: 我或许不应该告诉你，但我真的被你的美丽迷倒了。
trad: 我或許不應該告訴你，但我真的被你的美麗迷倒了。

eng: I couldn't take my eyes off of you from the minute I entered this room.
simp: 从我走进这房间的那一刻开始，我的视线就不能再从你的身上移开了。
trad: 從我走進這房間的那一刻開始，我的視線就不能再從你的身上移開了。

eng: My mother is busy cooking supper.
She picked me an apple.
The hall was filled with such a large audience that there wasn't even standing room.
simp: 会堂里挤满了听众，连一点站立的空间也没有。
trad: 會堂裏擠滿了聽眾，連一點站立的空間也沒有。

eng: It is true Wendy grew up at the seaside, but she isn't a good swimmer.
simp: 温迪的确是在海边长大的，但是她却不太会游泳。
trad: 溫迪的確是在海邊長大的，但是她卻不太會遊泳。

eng: You don't have to come here every day.
He wants to come along with us to the movie.
simp: 他想和我们一起去看电影。
trad: 他想和我們一起去看電影。

eng: I'll accompany you to the airport.
You must do it even if you don't want to.
simp: 你就算不想做，也一定要做。
trad: 你就算不想做，也一定要做。

eng: It will not be long before we can know the truth of the matter.
simp: 我们很快就可以知道事情的真相了。
trad: 我們很快就可以知道事情的真相了。

eng: All of a sudden, she began to laugh.
The problem is whether my parents will agree or not.
simp: 问题是我爸爸妈妈会不会同意。
trad: 問題是我爸爸媽媽會不會同意。

eng: The weak point of this book is that it's less than persuasive when the married author recommends not being married.
simp: 这本书有一个弱点 ﹣ 作者自己结了婚，但却建议别人不要结婚，没有甚麽说服力。
trad: 這本書有一個弱點 ﹣ 作者自己結了婚，但卻建議別人不要結婚，沒有甚麼說服力。

eng: He speaks Japanese well.
Copy-and-paste is very useful.
Many Americans are obese.
Does she know you?
When did you learn to swim?
simp: 你什么时候学会游泳的？
trad: 你什麼時候學會遊泳的？

eng: Ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, sixty, seventy, eighty, ninety, hundred.
simp: 十、二十、三十、四十、五十、六十、七十、八十、九十、一百。
trad: 十、二十、三十、四十、五十、六十、七十、八十、九十、一百。

eng: He didn't believe Ben's words.
Where is the closest metro stop?
What's my book doing here?
simp: 我的书为什么会在这里？
trad: 我的書為什麼會在這裏？

eng: Who do you think came to see me yesterday?
Can't you reach the book on the shelf?
simp: 你能拿到架子上的书吗？
trad: 你能拿到架子上的書嗎？

eng: He went over to the other side.
Spring is here. It is getting warmer every day.
The population of the world will double before long.
simp: 世界人口将在不久的将来增加两倍。
trad: 世界人口將在不久的將來增加兩倍。

eng: She has very good manners.
With respect to financial matters, Mr Jones knows more than anyone else in the company.
simp: 关于财务方面的事项，公司里没有人比琼斯先生更了解。
trad: 關於財務方面的事項，公司裏沒有人比瓊斯先生更了解。

eng: To my horror, the man took a gun out of his pocket.
simp: 男子从口袋中掏出枪，吓了我一跳。
trad: 男子從口袋中掏出槍，嚇了我一跳。

eng: I'm glad you could come.
It took me 2 hours to finish the essay.
simp: 这篇作文花了我两个小时来完成。
trad: 這篇作文花了我兩個小時來完成。

eng: He is nothing more than a politician.
Teachers should treat all their students impartially.
simp: 老师应该一视同仁地对待他们的学生。
trad: 老師應該一視同仁地對待他們的學生。

eng: If you sleep for a while, you will feel much better.
simp: 小睡一会儿，你会好一些。
trad: 小睡一會兒，你會好一些。

eng: There is a shortage of good building wood.
simp: 现在正缺良好的建筑木材。
trad: 現在正缺良好的建築木材。

eng: How many letters are there in the alphabet?
simp: 英文字母中有几个字母?
trad: 英文字母中有幾個字母?

eng: I would rather kill myself than reconcile myself to my fate.
simp: 与其向命运妥协，我宁可自杀。
trad: 與其向命運妥協，我寧可自殺。

eng: A new road is under construction.
simp: 一条新的马路正在修建中。
trad: 一條新的馬路正在修建中。

eng: Some people think of reading as a waste of time.
simp: 有些人认为阅读简直浪费时间。
trad: 有些人認為閱讀簡直浪費時間。

eng: I'm not going to go to the party.
You don't need to answer that letter.
She has decided to live in America for good.
If anybody is still absent, please send their names to me.
simp: 如果仍然有人缺席的，请将名单发给我。
trad: 如果仍然有人缺席的，請將名單發給我。

eng: Watanabe is my family name.
Study!
The pot calls the kettle black.
He has left already.
He has left already.
Maria Callas was a famous opera singer.
simp: Maria Callas 以前是一位着名歌剧演员。
trad: Maria Callas 以前是一位著名歌劇演員。

eng: I do not think that she is at home.
It doesn't matter which, just pick three books.
simp: 不管哪几本，就选择三本书吧。
trad: 不管哪幾本，就選擇三本書吧。

eng: Do you go to school by bus?
simp: 你是否坐公共汽车去上学？
trad: 你是否坐公共汽車去上學？

eng: He requested me to keep it secret.
Do you speak Arabic?
Come sing with me.
I wash myself.
Prospectuses must be signed by two sponsor representatives.
simp: 招股说明书必须由两名保荐代表人签字。
trad: 招股說明書必須由兩名保薦代表人簽字。

eng: You should understand, this is serious.
simp: 你应该理解，这是严肃的。
trad: 你應該理解，這是嚴肅的。

eng: Draw a circle.
He is a thief.
I'm actually relatively good at written language, but with spoken language I often can't remember the tone on some word.
simp: 其实，书面语我搞得相当好，但是口语中，我经常会记不起来某个字的音调。
trad: 其實，書面語我搞得相當好，但是口語中，我經常會記不起來某個字的音調。

eng: Learn Uyghur!
I've never met anyone who was able to learn how to play basketball just by reading a book. The same holds true for learning foreign languages as well.
simp: 从来没有见过有谁能仅通过读书就能学会打篮球的，其实学习外语也是一样的道理。
trad: 從來沒有見過有誰能僅通過讀書就能學會打籃球的，其實學習外語也是一樣的道理。

eng: The earth makes one revolution around the sun in about 365 days.
simp: 地球大约每三百六十五天就会围绕太阳旋转一周。
trad: 地球大約每三百六十五天就會圍繞太陽旋轉一周。

eng: There is an abundant supply of foodstuffs.
My brother sometimes helps me with my homework.
simp: 我哥哥有时会教我做功课。
trad: 我哥哥有時會教我做功課。

eng: The airplane landed at Narita Airport.
He is not a poet but a novelist.
If one day you leave, I will be very sad.
simp: 如果有一天你走了，我会很难过的。
trad: 如果有一天你走了，我會很難過的。

eng: I think fondly of my childhood.
I like him.
The girl in the picture is smiling.
I promise to return this videotape within a week.
simp: 我保证在一个星期内把这盘录影带还给你。
trad: 我保證在一個星期內把這盤錄影帶還給你。

eng: I would like to have a word with you.
How far is it to the library from here?
Let me go, you're choking me.
simp: 放开我，你正在掐着我的脖子。
trad: 放開我，你正在掐著我的脖子。

eng: Nobody can solve this problem.
simp: 没有人能够解决这个问题。
trad: 沒有人能夠解決這個問題。

eng: I regret telling you.
If it had not been for his help, I would have failed.
simp: 他没帮助我的话，我就失败了。
trad: 他沒幫助我的話，我就失敗了。

eng: Do you mind my smoking here?
simp: 你介不介意我在这里吸烟？
trad: 你介不介意我在這裏吸煙？

eng: She left for America the day before yesterday.
I saw John at the library.
simp: 我在图书馆看见了约翰。
trad: 我在圖書館看見了約翰。

eng: If only I can go to the concert!
simp: 要是我能去音乐会就好了。
trad: 要是我能去音樂會就好了。

eng: She likes her school a lot.
I like apples.
New York is the biggest city in the world.
simp: 纽约是世界上最大的城市。
trad: 紐約是世界上最大的城市。

eng: The climate of Tokyo is different from that of London.
simp: 东京的气候和伦敦不同。
trad: 東京的氣候和倫敦不同。

eng: We have a single for 50 dollars per night.
simp: 我们有一间五十美元一晚的单人房。
trad: 我們有一間五十美元一晚的單人房。

eng: The table was groaning with food.
The village which I visited last summer was a small one in Nagano Prefecture.
simp: 我去年夏天到访的是一个位于长野县的小村落。
trad: 我去年夏天到訪的是一個位於長野縣的小村落。

eng: Who's going with me?
I am taller than he.
I am Teochew.
I don't like a fat diet.
Unfortunately I will not have much free time.
simp: 遗憾的是我空闲时间不会有很多。
trad: 遺憾的是我空閑時間不會有很多。

eng: I could answer his question.
I still have to buy your book.
They regarded him as the best doctor in town.
simp: 他们把他视为城里最好的医生。
trad: 他們把他視為城裏最好的醫生。

eng: At first many things seemed different, but I soon got involved in my new life.
simp: 一开始许多事情看上去不同了，但我很快习惯了我的新生活。
trad: 一開始許多事情看上去不同了，但我很快習慣了我的新生活。

eng: Don't read that kind of book.
It was near the river that I lost my way.
simp: 我迷路的时候，我就在河边。
trad: 我迷路的時候，我就在河邊。

eng: He walked away.
She allowed him to go alone.
How long did you stay abroad?
Your sister cannot swim well, can she?
simp: 你的姐姐游泳得不好，是不是？
trad: 你的姐姐遊泳得不好，是不是？

eng: Money is the last thing he wants.
simp: 钱是他想要的最后的东西。
trad: 錢是他想要的最後的東西。

eng: I didn't know that dogs swim well.
simp: 我不知道狗游泳游得好。
trad: 我不知道狗遊泳遊得好。

eng: You should use words to make sentences, rather than try to learn them with rote memorisation.
simp: 你应该宁可用词汇来造句，也不要试着死记硬背。
trad: 你應該寧可用詞匯來造句，也不要試著死記硬背。

eng: His dog follows him wherever he goes.
simp: 不管他去哪儿，他的狗就随着走。
trad: 不管他去哪兒，他的狗就隨著走。

eng: She frequently gets sugar and salt mixed up.
The languages that have obtained transliteration in the Tatoeba Project are Japanese, Chinese, Shanghainese, Georgian and Uzbek.
simp: Tatoeba 计划获得了音译的语言为日语、汉语、上海话、格鲁吉亚语及乌兹别克语。
trad: Tatoeba 計劃獲得了音譯的語言為日語、漢語、上海話、格魯吉亞語及烏茲別克語。

eng: Welcome to Tatoeba!
She weighs 120 pounds.
Tatoeba means "for example" in Japanese.
simp: 日语 “Tatoeba” 是例如的意思。
trad: 日語 “Tatoeba” 是例如的意思。

eng: She is very intelligent.
The airport is over there.
The heater is broken.
It was terribly cold yesterday.
An island came in sight.
I have several good friends.
I think your new hair color looks good.
simp: 我觉得你新的头发颜色好看。
trad: 我覺得你新的頭發顏色好看。

eng: He's very fair-minded.
You are very fortunate that you have such friends.
simp: 你们很幸运有这样的朋友们。
trad: 你們很幸運有這樣的朋友們。

eng: I don't know whether he will come or not.
How many pupils are there in your school?
simp: 你的学校有多少个学生？
trad: 你的學校有多少個學生？

eng: If you run into Mr. Long, don't forget to ask him about how his wife is doing.
simp: 如果你踫到朗先生，别忘了问候一下他的太太。
trad: 如果你踫到朗先生，別忘了問候一下他的太太。

eng: Everybody in the picture is smiling.
simp: 照片中的每一个人都在微笑着。
trad: 照片中的每一個人都在微笑著。

eng: He offered his seat to an old woman.
simp: 他把座位让给了一个老婆婆。
trad: 他把座位讓給了一個老婆婆。

eng: I have some acquaintance with chemistry.
The capital of Italy is Rome.
My father does not like the heat of summer.
simp: 我爸爸不喜欢夏天炎热的天气。
trad: 我爸爸不喜歡夏天炎熱的天氣。

eng: My mother bought me a new dress.
simp: 妈妈买了一条新的裙子给我。
trad: 媽媽買了一條新的裙子給我。

eng: Birds were singing in the woods.
The body quickly adjusts itself to changes in temperature.
simp: 人体能够快速地适应气温的转变。
trad: 人體能夠快速地適應氣溫的轉變。

eng: The examples in this dictionary are easy to understand.
simp: 这本字典的例句十分浅白易懂。
trad: 這本字典的例句十分淺白易懂。

eng: All at once we heard a shot outside.
simp: 我们突然听见外面传来了一下枪声。
trad: 我們突然聽見外面傳來了一下槍聲。

eng: This beer tastes bitter.
Even the fastest runner in the world cannot run if he is hungry.
simp: 就算是全世界跑得最快的人，也要吃饱了才跑得动。
trad: 就算是全世界跑得最快的人，也要吃飽了才跑得動。

eng: You have to go there whether you like it or not.
simp: 无论你想去还是不想去，你也要去。
trad: 無論你想去還是不想去，你也要去。

eng: It's already seven.
She was told to accompany me.
Have you ever been to Africa?
I carelessly dropped a vase.
simp: 我不小心打落了一个花瓶。
trad: 我不小心打落了一個花瓶。

eng: A bowl of rice is about 180 grams.
simp: 一碗饭大约重一百八十克。
trad: 一碗飯大約重一百八十克。

eng: The novel takes its title from the Bible.
simp: 这本小说的名字出自《圣经》。
trad: 這本小說的名字出自《聖經》。

eng: My favorite pastime is strolling along the shore.
simp: 我閒时最喜欢到海边散步。
trad: 我閒時最喜歡到海邊散步。

eng: This horror movie is really scary. I couldn't sleep after I watched it.
simp: 这部恐怖片很吓人，我一看就睡不着觉了。
trad: 這部恐怖片很嚇人，我一看就睡不著覺了。

eng: A recent survey shows that the number of smokers is decreasing.
simp: 最近的一项调查显示吸烟的人数减少了。
trad: 最近的一項調查顯示吸煙的人數減少了。

eng: You see? You must study a foreign language.
simp: 看到了吧？你应该学一门外语。
trad: 看到了吧？你應該學一門外語。

eng: I follow my mom's example.
You are too, son!
My name is Jack.
I usually do the dishes.
I still remember his name.
The plane will take off in one hour.
simp: 飞机将在一小时后起飞。
trad: 飛機將在一小時後起飛。

eng: I bet he doesn't make it.
He showed me his album.
This dress fits me very well.
simp: 这件连衣裙完全适合我。
trad: 這件連衣裙完全適合我。

eng: He cut the meat with a knife.
Do you come here every day?
She writes with her left hand.
Are there always so many people here?
simp: 在这里一直有那么多人吗？
trad: 在這裏一直有那麼多人嗎？

eng: I'm glad you liked it.
I'm sorry, my mother's not at home.
simp: 不好意思，我母亲不在家。
trad: 不好意思，我母親不在家。

eng: I asked him not to play the piano late at night.
simp: 我叫他不要太晚弹钢琴。
trad: 我叫他不要太晚彈鋼琴。

eng: Muiriel is an Indian.
Muiriel is an Indian.
Read it once more.
What are you doing?
Why is he angry?
I will get in touch with him as soon as possible.
He weighs 270 pounds.
After business came to a halt, many bathhouses added new facilities, such as saunas and exercise equipment, in an effort to attract customers.
simp: 生意停顿了以后，许多公共浴堂都添置了桑拿浴室、健身器材等的新设备，希望能吸引多点人来光顾。
trad: 生意停頓了以後，許多公共浴堂都添置了桑拿浴室、健身器材等的新設備，希望能吸引多點人來光顧。

eng: Which is mine?
Bill often doesn't keep his promises.
The teacher gave us a lot of homework.
simp: 老师给了我们很多功课。
trad: 老師給了我們很多功課。

eng: Mathematics is his strongest subject.
I once worked in a restaurant.
simp: 我曾在一家饭店工作过。
trad: 我曾在一家飯店工作過。

eng: She repeated her name slowly.
simp: 她慢慢地重复了一遍她的名字。
trad: 她慢慢地重復了一遍她的名字。

eng: I love her all the more for her faults.
He moved the desk to the right.
Please tell him to wait.
She is two years younger than I.
When do you plan to leave for Japan?
simp: 你打算甚麽时候出发去日本？
trad: 你打算甚麼時候出發去日本？

eng: Being sick in bed, my father can't see you.
simp: 我爸爸病了，正在床上休息，不能见你。
trad: 我爸爸病了，正在床上休息，不能見你。

eng: You are to observe traffic rules.
My father took me to a movie last night.
simp: 我爸爸昨天带了我去看电影。
trad: 我爸爸昨天帶了我去看電影。

eng: Monkeys kill people too, but only if they have guns.
simp: 猴子也会杀人 ﹣ 如果牠们有枪的话。
trad: 猴子也會殺人 ﹣ 如果牠們有槍的話。

eng: We usually have breakfast at 7:30.
simp: 我们通常在七点半吃早饭。
trad: 我們通常在七點半吃早飯。

eng: On New Year's Day many Japanese go to the shrine to worship.
simp: 很多日本人都会在元旦到神社参拜。
trad: 很多日本人都會在元旦到神社參拜。

eng: I will have repaired your watch by tomorrow.
simp: 我会在明天之前把你的手錶修理好。
trad: 我會在明天之前把你的手錶修理好。

eng: You have only to practice every day.
simp: 你只要每天练习就可以了。
trad: 你只要每天練習就可以了。

eng: I'd like a fish.
His father died last year.
We ate Peking duck in the Chinese restaurant.
simp: 我们吃北京烤鸭在中国餐厅了。
trad: 我們吃北京烤鴨在中國餐廳了。

eng: We call that color "midnight blue".
simp: 我们叫那个颜色“午夜蓝”。
trad: 我們叫那個顏色“午夜藍”。

eng: One hundred, two hundred, three hundred, four hundred, five hundred, six hundred, seven hundred, eight hundred, nine hundred, one thousand.
simp: 一百， 二百， 三百， 四百， 五百， 六百， 七百， 八百， 九百， 一千。
trad: 一百， 二百， 三百， 四百， 五百， 六百， 七百， 八百， 九百， 一千。

eng: Today is Saturday.
This book contains forty photographs.
simp: 这本书里面有四十张照片。
trad: 這本書裏面有四十張照片。

eng: I'm anemic.
No one could tell where she was.
simp: 没有人说得出来她在哪里。
trad: 沒有人說得出來她在哪裏。

eng: He resembles his father very much.
Fighting won't settle anything.
Thank you for your assistance.
Tom worked the clay into a vase.
simp: 汤姆把黏土塑成了一个花瓶。
trad: 湯姆把黏土塑成了一個花瓶。

eng: All of a sudden the sky became overcast.
I think I'll lie down for a while.
The more chocolate you eat, the fatter you'll get.
simp: 你越是吃巧克力，越是会变胖。
trad: 你越是吃巧克力，越是會變胖。

eng: I will speak to you tomorrow.
He will walk in the park this afternoon.
simp: 他下午会去公园走一走。
trad: 他下午會去公園走一走。

eng: He begged me to stay.
I hear the grass in England is green even in the winter.
simp: 我听说英国的草在冬天也还是绿的。
trad: 我聽說英國的草在冬天也還是綠的。

eng: Write it down here, please.
We agree.
May I try on this dress?
simp: 我可不可以试一下这条裙子？
trad: 我可不可以試一下這條裙子？

eng: He saw a UFO flying last night.
simp: 昨晚他看见天上有个飞碟。
trad: 昨晚他看見天上有個飛碟。

eng: He is playing golf.
The perfume of roses filled the room.
simp: 玫瑰的香气在房间的每一个角落里飘荡着。
trad: 玫瑰的香氣在房間的每一個角落裏飄蕩著。

eng: Not knowing what answer to make, I kept silent.
simp: 我不知道该怎麽回答，便乾脆甚麽也不说。
trad: 我不知道該怎麼回答，便乾脆甚麼也不說。

eng: Sit down, please.
I'm the only one who knows them.
simp: 我是唯一一个认识他们的人。
trad: 我是唯一一個認識他們的人。

eng: I'll be back within two hours.
simp: 我会在两个小时内回来。
trad: 我會在兩個小時內回來。

eng: Shakespeare compared the world to a stage.
simp: 莎士比亚把世界比喻成一个舞台。
trad: 莎士比亞把世界比喻成一個舞臺。

eng: There was a large harvest of peaches last year.
Don't you know cheese is made from milk?
simp: 你不知道乳酪是用牛奶做的吗？
trad: 你不知道乳酪是用牛奶做的嗎？

eng: You are not to speak to him while he is studying.
simp: 你不应该在他温习的时候和他说话。
trad: 你不應該在他溫習的時候和他說話。

eng: America is ahead in space technology.
simp: 美国的太空科技十分先进。
trad: 美國的太空科技十分先進。

eng: She is said to have been a model.
simp: 据说她曾经是一个模特儿。
trad: 據說她曾經是一個模特兒。

eng: Is it true that your family will travel in Hokkaido? I envy you.
simp: 你们家去北海道旅游是真的么？我羡慕你。
trad: 你們家去北海道旅遊是真的麼？我羨慕你。

eng: Sorry I won't be there.
I am fond of the cinema.
Let the fathers be fathers and the sons sons.
I do not know if it will rain tomorrow.
simp: 我不知道明天会不会下雨。
trad: 我不知道明天會不會下雨。

eng: How old are you?
What do you like?
The cows were moving very slowly through the long green grass.
simp: 牛群在鬱鬱葱葱的草地上缓缓移动着。
trad: 牛群在鬱鬱蔥蔥的草地上緩緩移動著。

eng: More than a third of the world population lives near a coast.
simp: 全世界有超过三分之一的人在沿岸地区居住。
trad: 全世界有超過三分之一的人在沿岸地區居住。

eng: They knocked the box to pieces.
simp: 他们把箱子砸成了碎片。
trad: 他們把箱子砸成了碎片。

eng: The Pacific is the largest ocean in the world.
simp: 太平洋是世界上最大的海洋。
trad: 太平洋是世界上最大的海洋。

eng: She is a fluent speaker of English.
There were not more than one hundred passengers on board the ferry.
simp: 渡轮上的乘客不多于一百人。
trad: 渡輪上的乘客不多於一百人。

eng: Our country grows stronger day by day.
We provided food and clothes for them.
simp: 我们为他们提供了食物和衣服。
trad: 我們為他們提供了食物和衣服。

eng: Don't say that.
He studies American history.
May I have a look at your ticket?
I played tennis.
He explained the plan's main objective.
simp: 他解释了这个计划的主要目标。
trad: 他解釋了這個計劃的主要目標。

eng: Helen always keeps her room clean.
simp: 海伦的房间一直很干净。
trad: 海倫的房間一直很幹凈。

eng: A dog does not eat a dog.
I don't eat supper because I want to lose some weight.
simp: 我不吃晚饭因为我想减肥。
trad: 我不吃晚飯因為我想減肥。

eng: I went to the hospital to see my wife.
simp: 我去医院看了我的老婆。
trad: 我去醫院看了我的老婆。

eng: I've put on weight recently.
Yes. She used to be a very shy girl.
simp: 对啊，她以前是一个很害羞的女孩。
trad: 對啊，她以前是一個很害羞的女孩。

eng: How did you get acquainted with her?
We were completely victorious.
The government transported goods to the island by helicopter.
simp: 政府用直升机把物资送到了那个小岛。
trad: 政府用直升機把物資送到了那個小島。

eng: I want to play on the computer.
I'm originally from China.
The fire fighters put out the fire.
I watched the baseball game last night.
simp: 我昨晚看了那场棒球比赛。
trad: 我昨晚看了那場棒球比賽。

eng: We've just received intelligence that the enemy is waiting in ambush two miles down the road.
simp: 我们刚刚收到情报，敌方正在前方两英里处埋伏。
trad: 我們剛剛收到情報，敵方正在前方兩英裏處埋伏。

eng: The basket was full of apples.
He keeps a diary in English.
simp: 他有用英文写日记的习惯。
trad: 他有用英文寫日記的習慣。

eng: French is taught by Mr White, not by Miss Green.
simp: 教法语的是怀特老师，不是格林老师。
trad: 教法語的是懷特老師，不是格林老師。

eng: The Indian flag is called the tricolour because it has stripes of three colours – saffron, white and green.
simp: 印度国旗叫做「三色旗」，因为它是由三条不同颜色的色条组成的 ﹣ 橙黄色、白色和绿色。
trad: 印度國旗叫做「三色旗」，因為它是由三條不同顏色的色條組成的 ﹣ 橙黃色、白色和綠色。

eng: He drew a straight line on the wall.
simp: 他在牆上画了一条直线。
trad: 他在牆上畫了一條直線。

eng: The bird likes rice.
Is he sleeping?
She is curious to find who sent the flowers.
simp: 她很想知道那束花是谁寄来的。
trad: 她很想知道那束花是誰寄來的。

eng: It was so hot that I got into the shade and took a rest.
simp: 因为天气很热，所以我就走到阴凉的地方歇了一会儿。
trad: 因為天氣很熱，所以我就走到陰涼的地方歇了一會兒。

eng: He can run faster than I.
By degrees the friendship between him and her grew into love.
simp: 他和她之间的友谊，渐渐地酝酿成了爱情。
trad: 他和她之間的友誼，漸漸地醞釀成了愛情。

eng: Going to church doesn't make you a Christian any more than standing in a garage makes you a car.
simp: 去教堂参加礼拜，不会马上就变成一个基督徒，就好像站在车房里，不会变成一辆车一样。
trad: 去教堂參加禮拜，不會馬上就變成一個基督徒，就好像站在車房裏，不會變成一輛車一樣。

eng: I don't know where he went.
You may have read this book already.
simp: 你可能已经看过这本书。
trad: 你可能已經看過這本書。

eng: A blind person's hearing is often very acute.
simp: 盲人的耳朵通常十分灵敏。
trad: 盲人的耳朵通常十分靈敏。

eng: Who am I? How did I come to be?
simp: 我是谁？我是怎样来到这个世界的？
trad: 我是誰？我是怎樣來到這個世界的？

eng: No matter which musical instrument you want to learn to play, the most important thing is not to make any mistakes from the beginning on, because mistakes are always imprinted on your mind more easily than everything you do right.
simp: 无论你想学甚麽乐器，最重要的都是不要在开始的时候犯错，因为做错的事情，往往都会比做对的事情更容易在脑里留下深刻的印象。
trad: 無論你想學甚麼樂器，最重要的都是不要在開始的時候犯錯，因為做錯的事情，往往都會比做對的事情更容易在腦裏留下深刻的印象。

eng: He said to me, "Please do me a favor".
simp: 他对我说：「请你帮我一个忙。」
trad: 他對我說：「請你幫我一個忙。」

eng: I heard my name called by someone on the street.
simp: 我在街上听到有人叫我的名字。
trad: 我在街上聽到有人叫我的名字。

eng: He was injured in a traffic accident.
simp: 他在交通意外中受了伤。
trad: 他在交通意外中受了傷。

eng: Do you know who invented the microscope?
simp: 你知道显微镜是谁发明的吗？
trad: 你知道顯微鏡是誰發明的嗎？

eng: Every player is under obligation to keep the rules.
simp: 每一位选手都有义务遵守规则。
trad: 每一位選手都有義務遵守規則。

eng: Love is like the measles; we all have to go through it.
simp: 爱情就像痲疹 ﹣ 每个人在一生中都要经历一次。
trad: 愛情就像痲疹 ﹣ 每個人在一生中都要經歷一次。

eng: I know the name of this animal.
simp: 我知道这种动物的名字。
trad: 我知道這種動物的名字。

eng: Add a little more milk to my tea, please.
simp: 请再在我的茶里加点牛奶。
trad: 請再在我的茶裏加點牛奶。

eng: I saw the children walk across the street.
He didn't see anybody.
I'd like to stay one more night. Is that possible?
I have looked everywhere, but I can not find my wallet.
simp: 我到处都看了，可还是没找到我的皮夹。
trad: 我到處都看了，可還是沒找到我的皮夾。

eng: Children want to act like grown-ups.
simp: 孩子想和大人一样表现。
trad: 孩子想和大人一樣表現。

eng: We have no sugar.
I mostly have fruit for breakfast.
I believe in him.
German is not an easy language.
simp: 德语不是一门容易的语言。
trad: 德語不是一門容易的語言。

eng: I went to bed at ten yesterday.
What is his name?
America abounds in oil.
simp: 美国的石油资源十分丰富。
trad: 美國的石油資源十分豐富。

eng: Do it your own way if you don't like my way.
simp: 如果你不喜欢我的方法，就用你自己的方法去做吧。
trad: 如果你不喜歡我的方法，就用你自己的方法去做吧。

eng: There was a beautiful woman with black hair in the park.
simp: 公园里有一个漂亮的黑髮姑娘。
trad: 公園裏有一個漂亮的黑髮姑娘。

eng: You think you're awake, but you may, in fact, be dreaming.
simp: 你以为自己醒着，但其实你可能是在做梦。
trad: 你以為自己醒著，但其實你可能是在做夢。

eng: What did you do on your vacation?
simp: 你们放假的时候做了什么？
trad: 你們放假的時候做了什麼？

eng: He brought his dog to school.
simp: 他把他的狗带到学校去了。
trad: 他把他的狗帶到學校去了。

eng: These animals feed on grass.
I'd better go to bed now.
They missed the train.
May I take a shower in the morning?
We hired a car for a week when we were in Italy.
simp: 我们在意大利的时候，租车用了一个礼拜 。
trad: 我們在意大利的時候，租車用了一個禮拜 。

eng: Your plan is a good one, but mine is a better one.
simp: 你们的计划很好，可是我的更好。
trad: 你們的計劃很好，可是我的更好。

eng: There is little, if any, hope of his being alive.
simp: 我们几乎不抱他还活着的希望。
trad: 我們幾乎不抱他還活著的希望。

eng: Do you have a match?
He is really a perfect idiot.
He has a long nose.
Can all birds fly?
My bag was stolen.
He said that he had told you to speak more slowly.
English is not my native language.
I have several silver coins.
Some of the apples in the box were rotten.
simp: 盒子里的一些苹果烂了。
trad: 盒子裏的一些蘋果爛了。

eng: I shave every morning.
I have two children.
I've decided that we won't go.
What do you want to drink?
Every time I listen to this song, I cry.
simp: 我每次听这首歌都会听到哭。
trad: 我每次聽這首歌都會聽到哭。

eng: He is the last person to speak ill of others.
simp: 他绝不是说人坏话的人。
trad: 他絕不是說人壞話的人。

eng: My eyes are tired.
I'm starved.
A drunken man was sleeping on the bench.
simp: 一个醉了的男人在长椅上睡觉。
trad: 一個醉了的男人在長椅上睡覺。

eng: Why were you late this morning?
simp: 今天早上你为什麽迟到了呢?
trad: 今天早上你為什麼遲到了呢?

eng: Bears can climb trees.
A swallow flies very swiftly.
How many colors are there?
Where are you guys from?
A sponge absorbs water.
I have a bath every day.
A great number of citizens went into the army.
simp: 许多老百姓加入了军队。
trad: 許多老百姓加入了軍隊。

eng: Please call me up between seven and eight.
simp: 请在7点到8点钟之间打电话给我。
trad: 請在7點到8點鐘之間打電話給我。

eng: Father keeps a diary every day.
She applied her mind to her new job.
simp: 她专注在她的新工作上。
trad: 她專註在她的新工作上。

eng: His speech lasted three hours.
simp: 他的演讲持续了三个小时。
trad: 他的演講持續了三個小時。

eng: We want to know the facts.
These three pretty girls are all nieces of mine.
simp: 这三个漂亮的女孩都是我的侄女。
trad: 這三個漂亮的女孩都是我的侄女。

eng: I lost my way in the woods.
The ears of a rabbit are longer than those of a fox.
We will have a math quiz tomorrow.
simp: 我们明天会有一个数学小测。
trad: 我們明天會有一個數學小測。

eng: There is no doubt as to her innocence.
A man chooses; a slave obeys.
simp: 人有选择的权利，但是奴隶却只有服从的份儿。
trad: 人有選擇的權利，但是奴隸卻只有服從的份兒。

eng: After the storm, the road was blocked with fallen trees.
simp: 暴风雨过后，那条路被倒下来的树堵住了。
trad: 暴風雨過後，那條路被倒下來的樹堵住了。

eng: There's not a cloud in the sky.
He has made the same mistake twice.
simp: 他犯了两次相同的错误。
trad: 他犯了兩次相同的錯誤。

eng: I'm breast-feeding my baby.
We could see nothing but fog.
simp: 除了雾我看不见任何东西。
trad: 除了霧我看不見任何東西。

eng: I ran across an old friend near the bank.
simp: 我在银行附近碰见老朋友。
trad: 我在銀行附近碰見老朋友。

eng: We are against working on Sundays.
Did you leave a tip?
Don't confuse Austria with Australia.
simp: 不要把奥地利和澳大利亚溷淆。
trad: 不要把奧地利和澳大利亞混淆。

eng: He's my first love.
I love jokes.
I have an older brother.
I will give you a bicycle for your birthday.
simp: 我在你的生日会送给你一辆自行车。
trad: 我在你的生日會送給你一輛自行車。

eng: I have the same dictionary as your brother has.
simp: 我有和你哥哥一样的词典。
trad: 我有和你哥哥一樣的詞典。

eng: I agree with you.
My bag was stolen.
He wants to be a policeman in the future.
Who was it that forgot to lock the door of the warehouse?
simp: 是谁忘了把仓库的门锁上？
trad: 是誰忘了把倉庫的門鎖上？

eng: The train leaves at one-thirty this afternoon.
simp: 火车在今天下午一点半出发。
trad: 火車在今天下午一點半出發。

eng: The fire station is next to the police station.
simp: 消防局在警察局的旁边。
trad: 消防局在警察局的旁邊。

eng: I didn't understand in the least what he said.
simp: 他说的话我一句也听不懂。
trad: 他說的話我一句也聽不懂。

eng: She turned down my request.
There are six sentences in Mongolian in Tatoeba for now.
simp: Tatoeba 现在有六句蒙古语的句子。
trad: Tatoeba 現在有六句蒙古語的句子。

eng: He'll never show it, but I think that deep down, he's seriously worried.
simp: 他虽然摆着一副若无其事的样子，但是我想他心里一定担心得不得了。
trad: 他雖然擺著一副若無其事的樣子，但是我想他心裏一定擔心得不得了。

eng: His claim is that there is a close relation between birth order and personality.
simp: 他主张的是出生的先后次序和个性有很密切的关係。
trad: 他主張的是出生的先後次序和個性有很密切的關係。

eng: I don't need it.
It snowed more this year than last.
simp: 今年的雪下得比去年多。
trad: 今年的雪下得比去年多。

eng: My country is far away from Japan.
Being ill, I stayed at home all day long.
simp: 我生病了，我在家待了一整天。
trad: 我生病了，我在家待了一整天。

eng: If I had money, I'd buy this computer.
simp: 我有钱的话，我就买这台电脑。
trad: 我有錢的話，我就買這臺電腦。

eng: If he keeps drinking like that, he'll have to take a taxi home.
simp: 如果他继续这样喝酒，他该乘出租车回家。
trad: 如果他繼續這樣喝酒，他該乘出租車回家。

eng: How dare he complain?
Everybody likes him.
I think that she's honest.
He regrets having wasted his time.
simp: 他后悔浪费了他的时间。
trad: 他後悔浪費了他的時間。

eng: The friend was absent.
Have you eaten?
Is this true?
What are you doing right now?
Oh my god, it's delicious!
How many Christmas cards did you write last year?
simp: 你去年写了多少张圣诞卡？
trad: 你去年寫了多少張聖誕卡？

eng: Everybody is busy except me.
simp: 除了我以外，大家都很忙。
trad: 除了我以外，大家都很忙。

eng: Though it was very cold, I went out.
simp: 虽然天气很冷，但我还是出去了。
trad: 雖然天氣很冷，但我還是出去了。

eng: A passport is something you cannot do without when you go to a foreign country.
simp: 去外国旅行不能不带护照。
trad: 去外國旅行不能不帶護照。

eng: It rained all day yesterday.
She can speak French fluently.
Bank robbery will cost you ten years in prison.
simp: 抢劫银行的后果就是在监狱里蹲十年。
trad: 搶劫銀行的後果就是在監獄裏蹲十年。

eng: A dead leaf fell to the ground.
I'm going to buy a camera for my daughter.
simp: 我打算买一台照相机给我的女儿。
trad: 我打算買一臺照相機給我的女兒。

eng: I wrote three letters last night.
I ran into an old friend.
He kept silent during the meeting.
simp: 他开会的时候一句话也没有说。
trad: 他開會的時候一句話也沒有說。

eng: Many countries have abolished capital punishment.
simp: 许多国家已经废除了死刑。
trad: 許多國家已經廢除了死刑。

eng: He is not an American but a Frenchman.
simp: 他不是美国人，是法国人。
trad: 他不是美國人，是法國人。

eng: Japanese high school students go to school 35 weeks a year.
simp: 日本的高校生每年要上三十五个星期的学。
trad: 日本的高校生每年要上三十五個星期的學。

eng: She could sing well when she was a child.
simp: 她小时候唱歌唱得很好。
trad: 她小時候唱歌唱得很好。

eng: They're unlikely to get married.
simp: 他们没有甚麽可能会结婚。
trad: 他們沒有甚麼可能會結婚。

eng: In the long run, we can save a lot of money by buying this machine.
simp: 长远来说，我们买了这台机器可以省回很多钱。
trad: 長遠來說，我們買了這臺機器可以省回很多錢。

eng: My son wants to become a professional golf player.
simp: 我的儿子想成为一个专业高尔夫球手。
trad: 我的兒子想成為一個專業高爾夫球手。

eng: If I could rearrange the alphabet, I would put U and I together.
simp: 如果我可以把英文字母重新排序，我会把「U」和「I」放在一起。
trad: 如果我可以把英文字母重新排序，我會把「U」和「I」放在一起。

eng: He came back from China.
He returned from China.
Quite a lot of friends and acquaintances have come.
They went to the zoo by bus yesterday.
simp: 他们昨天乘巴士去了动物园。
trad: 他們昨天乘巴士去了動物園。

eng: She used to be a teacher.
Come what may, I will never leave you.
simp: 无论发生甚麽事，我也不会离开你。
trad: 無論發生甚麼事，我也不會離開你。

eng: There was an earthquake yesterday.
Japanese women get married at 25 on average.
simp: 日本女性平均在二十五岁结婚。
trad: 日本女性平均在二十五歲結婚。

eng: Betty came last.
Let's go out to eat.
Koko is not an ordinary gorilla.
simp: 可可不是一隻普通的猩猩。
trad: 可可不是一隻普通的猩猩。

eng: Merry Christmas!
I'm sorry, I love you.
Many students bought the book.
Many students bought the book.
I am still keeping up my tennis craze.
simp: 我仍然热爱着网球运动。
trad: 我仍然熱愛著網球運動。

eng: I am still keeping up my tennis craze.
simp: 我仍然热爱着网球运动。
trad: 我仍然熱愛著網球運動。

eng: The mountains were all around the city.
The mountains were all around the city.
His regime is bound to collapse.
Hurry up, or you'll be late.
simp: 快点儿，不然你就要迟到了。
trad: 快點兒，不然你就要遲到了。

eng: Hurry up, or you'll be late.
simp: 快点儿，不然你就要迟到了。
trad: 快點兒，不然你就要遲到了。

eng: Was there enough money?
Was there enough money?
He cast off the problem from his mind.
simp: 他把问题从脑子裡排除了。
trad: 他把問題從腦子裡排除了。

eng: He cast off the problem from his mind.
simp: 他把问题从脑子里排除了。
trad: 他把問題從腦子裏排除了。

eng: Bite the bullet.
Bite the bullet.
I've never been there before.
I've never been there before.
I'd like breakfast in my room at 8 sharp.
simp: 我打算八点在房裡吃早餐。
trad: 我打算八點在房裡吃早餐。

eng: I'd like breakfast in my room at 8 sharp.
simp: 我打算八点在房里吃早餐。
trad: 我打算八點在房裏吃早餐。

eng: Farmers are busy working in the field.
simp: 农夫们在田地里忙碌地耕种。
trad: 農夫們在田地裏忙碌地耕種。

eng: This is how he killed the big bear.
simp: 他就是这么杀了那头大熊。
trad: 他就是這麼殺了那頭大熊。

eng: The United States of America is a democratic country.
The United States of America is a democratic country.
Tell me how you got over such troubles?
simp: 告诉我你是如果解决这些问题的？
trad: 告訴我你是如果解決這些問題的？

eng: There are several peoples in the country.
simp: 这个国家裡有很多人种。
trad: 這個國家裡有很多人種。

eng: You were just listening to the talk, without thinking.
simp: 你只是在听讲，没有思考。
trad: 你只是在聽講，沒有思考。

eng: She is in the habit of keeping late hours.
I do want to go to Italy.
There is a metro in Kazan.
My uncle gave me a pair of shoes.
However much advice we give him, he still does exactly what he wants.
simp: 即使我们给他提了很多建议，他还是做了他想做的。
trad: 即使我們給他提了很多建議，他還是做了他想做的。

eng: I want to go to America.
He can read.
I got him to wash my car for a hundred dollars.
simp: 我付他一百美元给我洗车。
trad: 我付他一百美元給我洗車。

eng: He heard someone calling for help.
Please follow the nurse's directions.
What happened to them is still a mystery.
simp: 在他们身上发生了什麽仍然是个谜。
trad: 在他們身上發生了什麼仍然是個謎。

eng: We often went skiing in winter.
simp: 我们在冬天经常去滑雪。
trad: 我們在冬天經常去滑雪。

eng: For how long will continue to have these symptoms?
simp: 这种症状在我身上将会持续多久？
trad: 這種癥狀在我身上將會持續多久？

eng: The party was, on the whole, successful.
I don't give a fuck about what you say!
Her days are numbered.
The loss amounts to a million dollars.
That hotel was established about 50 years ago.
simp: 这家宾馆建于大约五十年前。
trad: 這家賓館建於大約五十年前。

eng: You might be late for school.
It is to your advantage to join us.
I see little of my father these days.
I have a question.
It seems like he knows the secret.
I want to see this movie.
The police arrested the man who had murdered the girl.
simp: 警察逮捕了谋杀这位小姐的凶手。
trad: 警察逮捕了謀殺這位小姐的兇手。

eng: I wrote five letters before I went to bed.
simp: 在睡觉前我写了五封信。
trad: 在睡覺前我寫了五封信。

eng: My heart beats fast.
Long hair is out of fashion.
We walked for a long time.
Until next week.
I teach Spanish.
I'd like to sail around the world.
Put on the hat.
I am learning two foreign languages.
Words fail me.
He is twice as old as I am.
She needs help.
Sorry to trouble you.
Sorry to trouble you.
This song reminds me of my childhood.
simp: 这首歌让我想起了我的童年。
trad: 這首歌讓我想起了我的童年。

eng: I have many books.
I love my father.
Out of all four seasons, I like spring the best.
simp: 一年四季中我最喜欢春天了。
trad: 一年四季中我最喜歡春天了。

eng: Let's go Dutch today.
You're always making mistakes.
Nobody understands me.
The young man lives in an old house.
simp: 那个年经人住在一座老房子里。
trad: 那個年經人住在一座老房子裏。

eng: Don't let him touch it.
I used to go fishing with my father when I was a child.
simp: 我小的时候经常跟我父亲一起去钓鱼的。
trad: 我小的時候經常跟我父親一起去釣魚的。

eng: I get along well with him.
Whose room is this?
These books are new.
I'm poor.
In fact she lied.
I really like these stories.
The more contributors there are, the more useful Tatoeba will become!
simp: 做贡献的人越多，Tatoeba就越有用！
trad: 做貢獻的人越多，Tatoeba就越有用！

eng: Her hair is very short.
He wants to come with us.
I have no money.
Do you have time the day after tomorrow?
I will drive you home.
As is often the case with him, he went to the office without shaving.
simp: 他一如往常，没有剃鬍子就上班去了。
trad: 他一如往常，沒有剃鬍子就上班去了。

eng: The first phase of construction has been completed.
simp: 工程的第一阶段已经完成了。
trad: 工程的第一階段已經完成了。

eng: The Japanese at large consider themselves better off than they used to be.
simp: 日本人一般都觉得自己的生活比以前过得好。
trad: 日本人一般都覺得自己的生活比以前過得好。

eng: I lost the watch Father had given me.
simp: 我把爸爸送给我的手錶弄不见了。
trad: 我把爸爸送給我的手錶弄不見了。

eng: What a beautiful picture!
I'll leave this with you.
My father is not home yet.
His concert was very good.
I would like to exchange this watch with a cheaper one.
simp: 我想用这块手表换一块便宜一点的。
trad: 我想用這塊手表換一塊便宜一點的。

eng: School begins tomorrow.
He's got a headache.
We will be living in England.
He is the older of the two.
I bought two dozen pencils.
I went to elementary school in Nagoya.
You gave a bad example.
simp: 你举了一个不好的例子。
trad: 你舉了一個不好的例子。

eng: Is this bread's best-by OK?
simp: 这个面包的保质期可以吗？
trad: 這個面包的保質期可以嗎？

eng: Somebody is shouting my name.
I wore a hat yesterday because it was very cold.
simp: 昨天的天气很冷，所以我戴了一顶帽子。
trad: 昨天的天氣很冷，所以我戴了一頂帽子。

eng: The earth revolves on its axis once every 24 hours.
simp: 地球每二十四小时就会绕轴自转一周。
trad: 地球每二十四小時就會繞軸自轉一周。

eng: I have to go to the airport to meet my family.
simp: 我要去机场迎接我的家人。
trad: 我要去機場迎接我的家人。

eng: My credit card was stolen on the subway.
simp: 我的信用卡在地铁上被扒了。
trad: 我的信用卡在地鐵上被扒了。

eng: There has never been a savior nor an immortal emperor to rely on.
simp: 从来就没有什么救世主， 也不靠神仙皇帝！
trad: 從來就沒有什麼救世主， 也不靠神仙皇帝！

eng: He made an official visit to the French president the day before yesterday.
simp: 他前天拜会了法国总统。
trad: 他前天拜會了法國總統。

eng: For Valentine's day, I used rose petals to spell out my sweetheart's name.
simp: 在情人节，我用玫瑰花瓣拼出了我的另一半的名字。
trad: 在情人節，我用玫瑰花瓣拼出了我的另一半的名字。

eng: Italy is a peninsula.
He notified the police of the traffic accident.
simp: 他把交通事故通知了警察。
trad: 他把交通事故通知了警察。

eng: It won't be easy to find someone capable of taking his place.
simp: 找到一位能够代替他的人不会是容易的任务。
trad: 找到一位能夠代替他的人不會是容易的任務。

eng: This word doesn't exist in French.
Facts do not cease to exist because they are ignored.
simp: 不是因为某人不理事实它们就会不复存在了。
trad: 不是因為某人不理事實它們就會不復存在了。

eng: We need to band together to beat the enemy.
simp: 我们必须团结起来才能战胜敌人。
trad: 我們必須團結起來才能戰勝敵人。

eng: I remember what he said.
Are you related to the Nagashima family?
simp: 你是不是长岛家的亲戚？
trad: 你是不是長島家的親戚？

eng: Are you related to the Nagashima family?
simp: 你是不是跟长岛家有关系的？
trad: 你是不是跟長島家有關系的？

eng: This city is called the Japanese Denmark.
simp: 这个城市被称为日本的丹麦。
trad: 這個城市被稱為日本的丹麥。

eng: My mother often slaps passers-by.
simp: 我的母亲经常让行人吃耳光。
trad: 我的母親經常讓行人吃耳光。

eng: Well prepared means no worries.
simp: 好好准备就不会出问题。
trad: 好好準備就不會出問題。

eng: The boy gathered a handful of peanuts and put them in a small box.
simp: 男孩收集了一把花生，然后把它们放到了一个小箱子里。
trad: 男孩收集了一把花生，然後把它們放到了一個小箱子裏。

eng: He was holding a large box in his arms.
simp: 他用双手抱着一个大箱子。
trad: 他用雙手抱著一個大箱子。

eng: My father neither smokes nor drinks.
Even if it is true, it matters little.
simp: 就算是真的，也没有多大的关係。
trad: 就算是真的，也沒有多大的關係。

eng: I have just finished eating lunch.
How about you?
I don't have a ticket.
I found this book interesting from beginning to end.
simp: 我觉得这本书从头到尾都很有趣。
trad: 我覺得這本書從頭到尾都很有趣。

eng: Neither team played well in the game.
simp: 两组在比赛中的表现都不太好。
trad: 兩組在比賽中的表現都不太好。

eng: I couldn't understand his joke.
Ten people were injured in the accident.
simp: 意外中有十个人受了伤。
trad: 意外中有十個人受了傷。

eng: With all the talent he has, he never makes any effort.
simp: 他虽然很有才能，但却不肯努力上进。
trad: 他雖然很有才能，但卻不肯努力上進。

eng: Dinner is probably ready, so we had better hurry home.
simp: 晚饭大概已经准备好了，我们还是快点回家吧。
trad: 晚飯大概已經準備好了，我們還是快點回家吧。

eng: Could you turn the volume down?
simp: 你可以把音量调低一点吗？
trad: 你可以把音量調低一點嗎？

eng: In severe weather, it's best to stay indoors.
simp: 天气恶劣的时候尽量不要外出。
trad: 天氣惡劣的時候盡量不要外出。

eng: He ordered a beer.
No wonder we associate bats with dark places.
simp: 难怪我们会把蝙蝠和黑暗的地方联想在一起了。
trad: 難怪我們會把蝙蝠和黑暗的地方聯想在一起了。

eng: When were you born?
He found that the things he had studied in school were not useful in the business world.
simp: 他发现他上学学的东西，在商界根本派不上用场。
trad: 他發現他上學學的東西，在商界根本派不上用場。

eng: He is cleverer than I.
Both his father and mother are dead.
simp: 他的爸爸和妈妈都不在人世了。
trad: 他的爸爸和媽媽都不在人世了。

eng: Fabien has a lot of good ideas.
Ask her when she will come back.
Her father won't come, he is really busy.
simp: 她爸爸不会来的，他很忙。
trad: 她爸爸不會來的，他很忙。

eng: Can I have a cup of tea?
The computer is broken.
This is a dog.
That depends on whether you are interested or not.
simp: 那就要看你有没有兴趣了。
trad: 那就要看你有沒有興趣了。

eng: Although he was born in England, he speaks English very badly.
simp: 他虽然是在英国出生的，但英语却说得很差。
trad: 他雖然是在英國出生的，但英語卻說得很差。

eng: I watched a ring of smoke that floated from his cigar into the air.
simp: 我看着一轮烟圈从他的雪茄里冒出来，飘到了空气中。
trad: 我看著一輪煙圈從他的雪茄裏冒出來，飄到了空氣中。

eng: What is the use of reading magazines?
The politician didn't appear in public after the incident.
simp: 发生了那件事以后，那位政治家一直没有公开露面。
trad: 發生了那件事以後，那位政治家一直沒有公開露面。

eng: I'm sure that he is clever.
I have a dictionary.
This event suddenly happened on its own.
simp: 这件事突然自己发生的。
trad: 這件事突然自己發生的。

eng: He is Li Ying.
He can speak Japanese.
In a democracy, it is important for journalism to be independent.
simp: 在民主国家，报刊的独立是很重要的。
trad: 在民主國家，報刊的獨立是很重要的。

eng: She loves to fish.
Do not fold!
Thank you for your help.
Thanks for your gift.
Thanks for your answer.
You're the best.
You're welcome.
You're welcome.
You should wash your hands before you eat.
January is the first month of the year.
simp: 一月是一年之中的头一个月。
trad: 一月是一年之中的頭一個月。

eng: He is often late for school.
I don't put sugar in my coffee.
I was called into the office first, my name being at the head of the list.
simp: 我的名字在名单中排得最前，所以我第一个被叫进了办工室。
trad: 我的名字在名單中排得最前，所以我第一個被叫進了辦工室。

eng: The thermometer went down below zero.
simp: 温度计上的温度跌到了零度以下。
trad: 溫度計上的溫度跌到了零度以下。

eng: He found my bicycle.
Due to a lack of balance the ship turned over.
simp: 那艘船失去平衡，翻了过来。
trad: 那艘船失去平衡，翻了過來。

eng: Who owns this villa?
You need to be more careful.
I paid him the money last week.
simp: 我上星期把钱付了给他。
trad: 我上星期把錢付了給他。

eng: Do you want something to drink?
You can pick up a lot of words by reading.
simp: 看书可以学会很多生字。
trad: 看書可以學會很多生字。

eng: I have little interest in history.
simp: 我对历史没有甚麽兴趣。
trad: 我對歷史沒有甚麼興趣。

eng: Language is one of man's most important inventions.
simp: 语言是人类最重要的发明之一。
trad: 語言是人類最重要的發明之一。

eng: We hadn't so much as heard of her name.
simp: 我们连她的名字也没有听过。
trad: 我們連她的名字也沒有聽過。

eng: Argh! My computer froze up again.
The earth is just a sphere suspended in space.
simp: 地球只不过是悬浮在太空中的一个球体。
trad: 地球只不過是懸浮在太空中的一個球體。

eng: I like sashimi.
Do not fear the heavens and the earth, but be afraid of hearing a person from Wenzhou speak in their local tongue.
simp: 天不怕，地不怕，就怕温州人说温州话。
trad: 天不怕，地不怕，就怕溫州人說溫州話。

eng: Our sister bought some eggplants, potatoes, zucchinis and Chinese cabbage at the market.
simp: 姐姐在市场买了一点茄子、土豆、丝瓜和大白菜。
trad: 姐姐在市場買了一點茄子、土豆、絲瓜和大白菜。

eng: Shit! You scared me half to death!
Religion is the opiate of the masses.
A man's will is nothing when compared to that of the heavens.
Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
I studied for one hour.
My son took a candy from the box.
simp: 我的儿子从盒子里拿了一粒糖。
trad: 我的兒子從盒子裏拿了一粒糖。

eng: Tom bought a brand-new car.
He is wearing glasses.
Does someone here speak Japanese?
Where is your room?
Which do you prefer, apples or bananas?
simp: 你们比较喜欢什么，苹果还是香蕉？
trad: 你們比較喜歡什麼，蘋果還是香蕉？

eng: I see him in the library now and then.
simp: 有时我会在图书馆看见他。
trad: 有時我會在圖書館看見他。

eng: He will come this afternoon.
Call a taxicab to take us.
Shit! You scared me half to death!
simp: 该死的！你吓了我一大跳！
trad: 該死的！你嚇了我一大跳！

eng: I will be back in two week's time.
She is hard on them.
I have no friend to talk with.
We are men.
How much is the most expensive car?
I'll lend it to you.
I bought him a tie.
A fox is not caught twice in the same snare.
He caught a cold.
Don't bother.
Fine, thanks.
I'm on my way.
Let me see.
It's all my fault.
I take a bath every night.
He is near forty.
It takes time.
Your car is fast, but mine is faster.
simp: 你的车很快，但是我的更快。
trad: 你的車很快，但是我的更快。

eng: She would often play tricks on me.
He bought a new pair of shoes.
Our teacher told us what to read.
simp: 老师告诉我们必须看什么书。
trad: 老師告訴我們必須看什麼書。

eng: Don't make a noise.
The bridge was built by the Romans.
simp: 那座桥是罗马人修建的。
trad: 那座橋是羅馬人修建的。

eng: In America cars drive on the right side of the road.
His elder sister is older than my eldest brother.
I like mathematics.
I'm Japanese, the boy answered.
You are nothing but a student.
The cat had a ribbon around its neck.
simp: 小猫的脖子上繫着一条丝带。
trad: 小貓的脖子上繫著一條絲帶。

eng: Jane is fat and rude, and smokes too much. However, Ken thinks she's lovely and charming. That's why they say love is blind.
simp: Jane 又胖、又没礼貌、又烟不离手，可是 Ken 却觉得她可爱、动人，所谓「爱情是盲目的」，大概就是这个意思了吧。
trad: Jane 又胖、又沒禮貌、又煙不離手，可是 Ken 卻覺得她可愛、動人，所謂「愛情是盲目的」，大概就是這個意思了吧。

eng: He did not come back until nine o'clock.
He plays the piano better than I do.
There is no telling what will happen in the future.
simp: 谁也不知道将来会发生甚麽事。
trad: 誰也不知道將來會發生甚麼事。

eng: Whoever said so, it is false.
He loves his puppy. His puppy is really adorable.
simp: 他爱他的狗，那隻小狗真的很可爱。
trad: 他愛他的狗，那隻小狗真的很可愛。

eng: When she heard the news, she sighed disappointedly.
simp: 她听到那个消息，失望地叹了一口气。
trad: 她聽到那個消息，失望地嘆了一口氣。

eng: Suddenly the lion came at his trainer.
simp: 狮子突然向训练员扑了过去。
trad: 獅子突然向訓練員撲了過去。

eng: Of us all, Tom was by far the best swimmer.
simp: 汤姆的泳术比我们所有人都要好得多。
trad: 湯姆的泳術比我們所有人都要好得多。

eng: You must have a driver's license before you can drive a car.
simp: 没有驾驶执照不能开车。
trad: 沒有駕駛執照不能開車。

eng: This hotel is far from deserving the four stars the guidebook gives it.
simp: 这家酒店在旅行指南上有四星级的评分，但是却完全没有四星级的水准。
trad: 這家酒店在旅行指南上有四星級的評分，但是卻完全沒有四星級的水準。

eng: I'd like to be a millionaire.
I hope that I'll see her.
He speaks English very well.
This is my father.
I have lost the key.
I got hurt in the shoulder.
I keep a dog.
I traded in my old car for a new one.
simp: 我用我的旧车换了一辆新的。
trad: 我用我的舊車換了一輛新的。

eng: I am afraid of dogs.
I'm proud of my brother.
simp: 我为我的兄弟感到自豪。
trad: 我為我的兄弟感到自豪。

eng: I go to the movies once a month.
simp: 我一个月去一次电影院。
trad: 我一個月去一次電影院。

eng: I go to the same school as Kenji.
simp: 我和见次去同一间学校。
trad: 我和見次去同一間學校。

eng: Absolutely impossible.
You have many books.
This knife is very sharp.
I don't have a computer at home.
Do you have a car?
I like my coffee without sugar.
This summer I went on vacation in Scotland.
simp: 这个夏天，我去苏格兰度假了。
trad: 這個夏天，我去蘇格蘭度假了。

eng: We want to analyze your urine.
simp: 我们想验一下您的尿液。
trad: 我們想驗一下您的尿液。

eng: I know that she is Spanish.
Is this really worth it?
I call him Mike.
There's no salt.
Count to thirty.
He lives far away from my house.
May I eat this?
The telephone is ringing.
How should I know?
The cow cast her calf.
It is not a watch.
Open the door, please.
Thank you, sir.
You'll get used to it.
The beer is stale.
I'll be right with you.
Give her the book.
He sings treble.
Maybe some other time.
I've never flown in an airplane.
The lion is king of beasts.
Who was radium discovered by?
Myths and legends should be handed down from generation to generation.
simp: 神话和传说应该一代一代的传承下去。
trad: 神話和傳說應該一代一代的傳承下去。

eng: We plunged into the river.
He is in conference.
Haven't seen you for ages.
Everything will be OK.
He likes to throw the bull.
She draws on her socks.
Every time I see you, I think of your mother.
simp: 我每次见到你就会想起你的母亲。
trad: 我每次見到你就會想起你的母親。

eng: Which station are you going to?
I have many discs.
My pen is new.
He doesn't like fish.
By the way, have you ever been to Hokkaido?
simp: 顺便问一句，你们已经去过北海道了吗？
trad: 順便問一句，你們已經去過北海道了嗎？

eng: It is time to shut the gate.
Is your mother at home now?
He came into my room.
It was in London that I last saw her.
simp: 我最后一次见她是在伦敦。
trad: 我最後一次見她是在倫敦。

eng: I play the violin.
I don't know how to spell the word.
simp: 我不知道这个单词怎么拼写。
trad: 我不知道這個單詞怎麼拼寫。

eng: I don't feel like going out right now.
It's all Greek to me.
That was all Chinese to me.
Kaliningrad was once called Koenigsberg.
simp: 加里宁格勒旧称为哥尼斯堡。
trad: 加裏寧格勒舊稱為哥尼斯堡。

eng: Suits me fine.
Yes, of course.
He is at her side.
Please show me the menu.
He's just gone on leave.
My phone was out of order.
You will be missed by your friends.
He closed his eyes.
He was very tired.
His story can't be false.
I asked him if I could read his book.
simp: 我问他我可不可以看他的书。
trad: 我問他我可不可以看他的書。

eng: Did you meet her?
Don't be afraid of making mistakes.
Six divided by two is three.
I was just about to come looking for you.
I really have to be going.
He jumped onto the table.
A new difficulty has arisen.
Last night there was a full moon.
His hat isn't on straight.
He studies Chinese as well.
Better luck next time.
He is my senior by two years.
That suits me all right.
It's much more convenient.
I shave every morning.
I don't think you ought to.
We started at six.
The crops need rain.
It really comes in handy.
I know the feeling.
My watch is five minutes slow.
You will have to wait and see.
The child will be six.
I've worn holes in my socks.
You have put your hat on backwards.
I have no idea of what to do.
He is a tall boy.
Show me where it hurts you.
I tried to tell you.
He is said to be rich.
That just goes to prove that you are a liar.
simp: 这正可以说明您是个骗子。
trad: 這正可以說明您是個騙子。

eng: You need to have breakfast.
He often appears on TV.
I want a car, but I have no money to buy one.
simp: 我想要一辆车，但我没钱买。
trad: 我想要一輛車，但我沒錢買。

eng: Every man desires to live long, but no man would be old.
simp: 谁都想活得长久，但没人想变老。
trad: 誰都想活得長久，但沒人想變老。

eng: I am on duty now.
You have helped me so much, I'd like to express my sincere gratitude.
simp: 大家帮我这么大的忙，真心向大家道谢。
trad: 大家幫我這麼大的忙，真心向大家道謝。

eng: His first work gained great popularity among people.
simp: 他的处女作受到了大家的极大欢迎。
trad: 他的處女作受到了大家的極大歡迎。

eng: His words set everybody roaring with laughter.
simp: 他的话把大家惹得哈哈大笑。
trad: 他的話把大家惹得哈哈大笑。

eng: Isn't he Italian?
Is this your book?
He often appears on TV.
This is what I bought in Spain.
simp: 这就是我在西班牙买的东西。
trad: 這就是我在西班牙買的東西。

eng: Did you see a doctor?
Where is the museum?
I like coffee very much.
How long can you hold your breath?
Show me.
It's a pity that you can't come.
I must leave early tomorrow.
I just got your letter yesterday.
Knowing that you're doing fine over there, I'm really pleased for you.
simp: 知道你在那裡过得不错，我替你感到高兴。
trad: 知道你在那裡過得不錯，我替你感到高興。

eng: I haven't heard from you for a long time.
I'm just wondering how you are getting on and if you have adjusted to the new environment.
simp: 不知近况如何，你适应新环境了没有。
trad: 不知近況如何，你適應新環境了沒有。

eng: Sorry I haven't replied to your letter earlier.
simp: 抱歉，我没能早点回覆你的信。
trad: 抱歉，我沒能早點回覆你的信。

eng: I've been really busy with my graduation dissertation recently.
simp: 我最近真忙于我的毕业论文。
trad: 我最近真忙於我的畢業論文。

eng: Please give my regards to your family.
I don't have a lot of work, but it's enough to keep me in the office this week.
simp: 其实我工作并不多，但足以让我这周在办公室里忙着了。
trad: 其實我工作並不多，但足以讓我這周在辦公室裏忙著了。

eng: Can you make yourself understood in English?
That house is mine.
I want to go to see a movie.
We have to win seven times in a row to win this tournament.
simp: 我们要连胜七局，才能在这场锦标赛中夺得冠军。
trad: 我們要連勝七局，才能在這場錦標賽中奪得冠軍。

eng: Some months have thirty days, others thirty one.
simp: 有些月份有三十天，有些月份有三十一天。
trad: 有些月份有三十天，有些月份有三十一天。

eng: She did not so much as look at me.
simp: 她连看也没有看我一眼。
trad: 她連看也沒有看我一眼。

eng: I came to the conclusion that I had been deceived.
simp: 我得到一个结论 ﹣ 我被骗了。
trad: 我得到一個結論 ﹣ 我被騙了。

eng: To the best of my knowledge, the lake is the deepest here.
simp: 据我所知，这里是整个湖最深的地方。
trad: 據我所知，這裏是整個湖最深的地方。

eng: He saved the drowning boy at the risk of his own life.
simp: 他奋不顾身地把遇溺的男孩救了起来。
trad: 他奮不顧身地把遇溺的男孩救了起來。

eng: My house is only five minutes' walk from the station.
simp: 我的家离地铁站很近，走路只要五分钟就到了。
trad: 我的家離地鐵站很近，走路只要五分鐘就到了。

eng: This is the best book I have ever read.
simp: 这本是我读过最好的书。
trad: 這本是我讀過最好的書。

eng: In the era of email, I'm so happy when a friend sends me a real letter.
simp: 在这个电邮的年代里，我一收到朋友寄给我的信，就会高兴得不得了。
trad: 在這個電郵的年代裏，我一收到朋友寄給我的信，就會高興得不得了。

eng: The turbulent sands above our heads, the flinging of our swords... they're naught but falling stars in the night sky.
simp: 在我们头顶飞舞着的沙粒，在我们手中挥动着的刀剑……它们不是甚麽，只不过是在夜空中擦过的一朵朵流星。
trad: 在我們頭頂飛舞著的沙粒，在我們手中揮動著的刀劍……它們不是甚麼，只不過是在夜空中擦過的一朵朵流星。

eng: Supposing you had one million yen, what would you do with it?
simp: 如果你有一百万円，你会用它来做甚麽？
trad: 如果你有一百萬円，你會用它來做甚麼？

eng: Canada is a good place to go if it's your first experience living abroad.
simp: 如果你是第一次到外国生活的话，加拿大会很适合你。
trad: 如果你是第一次到外國生活的話，加拿大會很適合你。

eng: Both of these are Song Dynasty block-printed editions.
I'm Italian.
Lots of companies have implemented an eight-hour working day.
simp: 很多公司实行8小时工作制。
trad: 很多公司實行8小時工作制。

eng: A student wants to see you.
He doesn't like fish.
I advised him to keep the secret.
Are you not tired?
Do you travel a lot?
Her husband is usually drunk.
simp: 她的老公通常醉醺醺的。
trad: 她的老公通常醉醺醺的。

eng: She is dead.
I've been waiting for you for 5 hours.
The elephant was killed by the hunter.
No one knows where he lives.
I pigged out on pizza.
Who made this cake?
The style of this item of clothing is good; it's just a bit expensive.
simp: 这件衣服样式倒是挺好，就是贵了点儿。
trad: 這件衣服樣式倒是挺好，就是貴了點兒。

eng: I'd certainly like to go and watch the match; it's just that I'm not sure if I have time.
simp: 我倒是很想去看这场比赛，可是不知道有没有时间。
trad: 我倒是很想去看這場比賽，可是不知道有沒有時間。

eng: It's still not certain who's going to win this match.
simp: 谁能赢这场比赛还说不定。
trad: 誰能贏這場比賽還說不定。

eng: I haven't seen Xiaowang for a month now; perhaps he's already gone back to his own country.
simp: 我一个月没见到小王了，他说不定已经回国了。
trad: 我一個月沒見到小王了，他說不定已經回國了。

eng: What time will you go home today?
My work at the TV station is handling letters written in by viewers.
simp: 我在电视台的工作就是处理观众们写来的信。
trad: 我在電視臺的工作就是處理觀眾們寫來的信。

eng: Today I haven't dealt with the things I wanted to deal with; I'll have to work overtime again.
simp: 今天我要处理的事还没处理完，又要加班了。
trad: 今天我要處理的事還沒處理完，又要加班了。

eng: The population of China has already exceeded 1.3 billion.
simp: 中国的人口已经超过了十三亿。
trad: 中國的人口已經超過了十三億。

eng: This year, the speed of development in our company far exceeds that of last year.
simp: 今年我们公司的发展速度大大超过去年。
trad: 今年我們公司的發展速度大大超過去年。

eng: With the T.V. on, how can you keep your mind on your studies?
simp: 你开着电视怎么能安心学习呢？
trad: 你開著電視怎麼能安心學習呢？

eng: These days many young people work without much focus; my friend's son hadn't gone two years after graduating before he'd changed jobs five times.
simp: 现在许多年轻人工作都不太安分，朋友的儿子大学毕业不到两年，已经换了五个工作了。
trad: 現在許多年輕人工作都不太安分，朋友的兒子大學畢業不到兩年，已經換了五個工作了。

eng: In other aspects, the results of Laowang's health examination were all quite normal; it was just that his blood pressure was a bit high.
simp: 老王身体检查的结果别的方面都挺正常，就是血压有点高。
trad: 老王身體檢查的結果別的方面都挺正常，就是血壓有點高。

eng: This year's weather isn't very typical.
Our company's technology has already reached the level of a developed country in the 1990s.
simp: 我们公司的技术已经达到了发达国家九十年代的水平。
trad: 我們公司的技術已經達到了發達國家九十年代的水平。

eng: No matter how hard I strive, I fail to achieve my parents' requirements.
simp: 不管我怎么努力，也达不到父母的要求。
trad: 不管我怎麼努力，也達不到父母的要求。

eng: Chinese is too easy to learn.
I can already write in Chinese.
I come from China.
For this race, people under the age of 35 (including 35) join the young people's group; people from 36 to 50 years old join the middle-aged group and people 51 or over join the elderly group.
simp: 这次跑步比赛，三十五岁以下（包括三十五岁）的人参加青年组；三十六岁到五十岁的人参加中年组；五十一岁以上的人参加老年组。
trad: 這次跑步比賽，三十五歲以下（包括三十五歲）的人參加青年組；三十六歲到五十歲的人參加中年組；五十一歲以上的人參加老年組。

eng: In China, children shorter than 1.1m don't need to buy a ticket to travel by train.
simp: 在中国，身高 1.1 米以下的儿童坐火车不用买票。
trad: 在中國，身高 1.1 米以下的兒童坐火車不用買票。

eng: Whilst at university, Xiaowang held the post of class monitor.
simp: 上大学的时候，小王担任过班长。
trad: 上大學的時候，小王擔任過班長。

eng: From graduation to retirement, Laowang worked as a teacher without intermission.
simp: 从大学毕业到退休，老王一直担任教学工作。
trad: 從大學畢業到退休，老王一直擔任教學工作。

eng: During the probation period of my friend's new job, each month's salary is 3000 RMB; once the probation period has been fulfilled, each month's salary is 3500 RMB.
simp: 我朋友新工作的试用期每月工资三千人民币，试用期满后每月的工资三千五百人民币。
trad: 我朋友新工作的試用期每月工資三千人民幣，試用期滿後每月的工資三千五百人民幣。

eng: I have a new bicycle.
Night has fallen!
Time flies.
I studied around the clock.
I often go out with friends in the evening.
simp: 我常常在晚上跟朋友出去玩儿。
trad: 我常常在晚上跟朋友出去玩兒。

eng: I applied for a summer internship.
simp: 我应徵了一个暑期实习。
trad: 我應徵了一個暑期實習。

eng: Can you wake me up at 7:00 tomorrow?
simp: 你明天早上七点可不可以叫我起床。
trad: 你明天早上七點可不可以叫我起床。

eng: She was visibly afraid to be here.
To me, it is important.
What did you do during the holidays?
simp: 你放假的时候做了什么？
trad: 你放假的時候做了什麼？

eng: Ah, wonderful.
He had the impudence to cut across our garden.
simp: 他竟然厚着脸皮穿过我们的花园。
trad: 他竟然厚著臉皮穿過我們的花園。

eng: This whisky is too strong.
Our friend finished the race in second place.
simp: 我们的朋友完成了比赛，得了第二名。
trad: 我們的朋友完成了比賽，得了第二名。

eng: His hobby is painting pictures of flowers.
simp: 他的爱好是画有花的图。
trad: 他的愛好是畫有花的圖。

eng: Life is indeed a good thing.
Let's leave as soon as he arrives.
Did you play baseball yesterday?
Even if it rains, I'll start.
simp: 即使明天下雨，我也会开始。
trad: 即使明天下雨，我也會開始。

eng: I owe him $100.
Please call me Taro.
He is so heartless.
The elevators in a skyscraper are vital systems.
simp: 摩天大厦里的电梯是至关重要的。
trad: 摩天大廈裏的電梯是至關重要的。

eng: He has a good reputation.
I wish it were fine today.
simp: 我希望今天的天气是晴朗的。
trad: 我希望今天的天氣是晴朗的。

eng: Would you care for a cup of tea?
As I entered the room, they applauded.
simp: 我进屋的时候，他们都鼓掌了。
trad: 我進屋的時候，他們都鼓掌了。

eng: Waste not, want not.
Scott first changed a watch for a book, then the book for money.
simp: Scott先用一隻手錶换了一本书，再把书换成钱。
trad: Scott先用一隻手錶換了一本書，再把書換成錢。

eng: He is very hard on lazy people.
He is inferior to you in all respects.
simp: 他在各方面都比不上你。
trad: 他在各方面都比不上你。

eng: He talks as if he were a teacher.
He has visited France three times.
This house is mine.
Ken has more books than you.
I was happy to see her again.
simp: 我很高兴再次见到了她。
trad: 我很高興再次見到了她。

eng: Someone is calling for help.
They planned to get together here at 7 o'clock.
simp: 他们约了七点在这儿碰头。
trad: 他們約了七點在這兒碰頭。

eng: I'll stay there till six o'clock.
simp: 我会在那儿一直待到六点。
trad: 我會在那兒一直待到六點。

eng: He bought a new pair of gloves.
My friend studies Korean.
What's your problem?
You're wet through.
Colorless green ideas sleep furiously.
simp: 无色的绿色的观念疯狂地睡觉。
trad: 無色的綠色的觀念瘋狂地睡覺。

eng: He's a citizen of China.
I plan to never drink again.
Looking back at 2010, I think I wasted too much time.
simp: 回顾2010年，我认为我浪费太多时间了。
trad: 回顧2010年，我認為我浪費太多時間了。

eng: My hope for the new year is to study harder.
simp: 我新年的新希望是更努力地学习。
trad: 我新年的新希望是更努力地學習。

eng: You should prepare for the worst.
In my view, studying hard is the best way to achieve success.
simp: 对我来说，努力学习就是最好取得成功的办法。
trad: 對我來說，努力學習就是最好取得成功的辦法。

eng: Open the door for love.
I have two books.
Do we already have that text?
simp: 我们已经有那篇课文了吗？
trad: 我們已經有那篇課文了嗎？

eng: He is living abroad at the moment.
She is always losing her handkerchief.
It is said that the price of wine may go up at any time now.
simp: 据说葡萄酒的价格可以随时增长。
trad: 據說葡萄酒的價格可以隨時增長。

eng: It is rumoured that a spaceship has been seen near Shanghai.
simp: 谣传一架宇宙飞船在上海附近被见到了。
trad: 謠傳一架宇宙飛船在上海附近被見到了。

eng: He is a man of strong, stable and trustworthy character.
simp: 他是个性格强、稳定且可靠的男人。
trad: 他是個性格強、穩定且可靠的男人。

eng: I cannot praise them too highly.
simp: 不管我怎么称赞他们，都不会过分。
trad: 不管我怎麼稱贊他們，都不會過分。

eng: The term 'greenhouse effect' is often used when people talk about global changes of climate nowadays.
simp: 人们谈到全球气候变化的时候，常常用到“温室效应”这个词。
trad: 人們談到全球氣候變化的時候，常常用到“溫室效應”這個詞。

eng: It is a term used to describe the warming of the earth due to increasing amounts of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere.
simp: 这个词指的是由于大气层里二氧化碳含量增多而导致全球变暖。
trad: 這個詞指的是由於大氣層裏二氧化碳含量增多而導致全球變暖。

eng: How did you make it?
I told him to come.
I do not need a loan anymore.
Suddenly he saw me.
I cut myself shaving.
simp: 刮胡子时，我把脸刮破了。
trad: 刮胡子時，我把臉刮破了。

eng: He teaches us English.
It seems to be difficult for her to get along with students in the new school.
simp: 她和新学校的同学好像不怎麽合得来。
trad: 她和新學校的同學好像不怎麼合得來。

eng: My father gets along with his friends.
simp: 我爸爸和朋友的关係很好。
trad: 我爸爸和朋友的關係很好。

eng: Meetings are to be held on the afternoon of July 15 (Tuesday), all day July 16 (Wednesday), and the morning of July 17 (Thursday).
simp: 会议将会在七月十五日（星期二）的下午、七月十六日（星期三）的全天和七月十七日（星期四）的早上举行。
trad: 會議將會在七月十五日（星期二）的下午、七月十六日（星期三）的全天和七月十七日（星期四）的早上舉行。

eng: Every time I go to Paris, I visit the Sacred Heart Basilica, sit on the steps, and listen to the people below singing and playing musical instruments.
simp: 我每次去巴黎，都会去圣心大教堂，坐在台阶上，听下面的人唱歌、弹琴。
trad: 我每次去巴黎，都會去聖心大教堂，坐在臺階上，聽下面的人唱歌、彈琴。

eng: He is always happy.
simp: 他无论甚麽时候都是开开心心的。
trad: 他無論甚麼時候都是開開心心的。

eng: Copper and silver are both metals.
At first I did not like rock music, but now I do.
simp: 我起初不怎麽喜欢摇滚音乐，不过现在喜欢上了。
trad: 我起初不怎麼喜歡搖滾音樂，不過現在喜歡上了。

eng: In general, children are fond of candy.
simp: 小孩一般来说都喜欢吃糖果。
trad: 小孩一般來說都喜歡吃糖果。

eng: The doctor treated her injury.
His victory at this age in an international competition is a good indication of a bright future.
simp: 他现在这个年纪，就已经在国际比赛中取胜，前途实在无可限量。
trad: 他現在這個年紀，就已經在國際比賽中取勝，前途實在無可限量。

eng: The supermarket opens at ten o'clock.
How fluently he speaks English!
simp: 他的英语说得真流利啊！
trad: 他的英語說得真流利啊！

eng: Kenya used to be a British colony.
simp: 肯尼亚曾经是英国的殖民地。
trad: 肯尼亞曾經是英國的殖民地。

eng: My father helped me with my homework.
The feelings of "love at first sight" and "faithful unto death" are unrealistic; this sort of unrealistic and illusory feeling is not what we need.
simp: 「一见锺情」以及「从一而终」的感情是不切实际的，我们需要的不是这种不切实际而虚幻的感情。
trad: 「一見鍾情」以及「從一而終」的感情是不切實際的，我們需要的不是這種不切實際而虛幻的感情。

eng: The way some people see it, associating with the opposite sex is just like going to the seaside and gathering stones; everyone can pick up the ones they like.
simp: 有人形容，跟异性交往就好像在海边捡石头，大家都能捡喜欢的那一个。
trad: 有人形容，跟異性交往就好像在海邊撿石頭，大家都能撿喜歡的那一個。

eng: Once you've picked up a stone that you like, take it home as soon as you can and treat it well, because that's the only stone you've got.
simp: 一旦捡到一颗你喜欢的石头，尽快将它带回家并好好对待它，因为那是妳唯一得到的石头。
trad: 一旦撿到一顆你喜歡的石頭，盡快將它帶回家並好好對待它，因為那是妳唯一得到的石頭。

eng: What's more, from now on you must remember that you cannot go to the seaside again (by believing this forever, I have already found the biggest, best and most fitting one for me).
simp: 而且要记住，从此后不要再到海边去。（永远相信，我已经找到最大、最好、最适合我的那一颗）。
trad: 而且要記住，從此後不要再到海邊去。（永遠相信，我已經找到最大、最好、最適合我的那一顆）。

eng: The most important thing about relations with the opposite sex is not how good the other person is, but that they treat you well.
simp: 跟异性交往最重要的不是他有多好,而是他对你有多好。
trad: 跟異性交往最重要的不是他有多好,而是他對你有多好。

eng: If one person's qualities are really good, and they have one hundred points, but of those hundred they only give you thirty or forty, or even ten or twenty and then inversely, another person maybe only has seventy or eighty points but they treat you with their heart and soul, then which person should you choose?
simp: 一个人如果条件很好,有一百分,可是这一百分之中,他只给你三四十分,或一二十分;相反地,另一 个人也许只有七八十分,可是他却是全心全意的对待你,那你应该选择那一个?
trad: 一個人如果條件很好,有一百分,可是這一百分之中,他只給你三四十分,或一二十分;相反地,另一 個人也許只有七八十分,可是他卻是全心全意的對待你,那你應該選擇那一個?

eng: In fact, each person's qualities are the same.
simp: 其实,每一个人的条件都是一样的。
trad: 其實,每一個人的條件都是一樣的。

eng: No matter how good you are, there will always be people who are better than you.
simp: 不管你有多好,都还有人比你更好。
trad: 不管你有多好,都還有人比你更好。
