trad: 一個人的恐怖分子為另人的自由戰士。

eng: Hawaii is a popular tourist resort.
simp: 夏威夷是一个大众化旅游圣地。
trad: 夏威夷是一個大眾化旅遊聖地。

eng: Can you answer this riddle?
The doctor felt my pulse.
I waited until the last minute.
simp: 我一直等到了最后一分钟。
trad: 我一直等到了最後一分鐘。

eng: His trouble was chiefly mental.
I had a good sleep last night.
I returned the book to the library.
A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
simp: 一鸟在手胜过二鸟在林。
trad: 一鳥在手勝過二鳥在林。

eng: I accidentally mistakenly took his umbrella.
simp: 我不小心拿错了他的伞。
trad: 我不小心拿錯了他的傘。

eng: They built their empire in Peru about five hundred years ago.
simp: 他们大约五百年前在秘鲁建立了帝国。
trad: 他們大約五百年前在秘魯建立了帝國。

eng: Please let me try the game.
simp: 请让我试试这个游戏吧。
trad: 請讓我試試這個遊戲吧。

eng: When in Ukraine, I always speak Ukrainian.
simp: 当我在乌克兰时，我总是讲乌克兰语。
trad: 當我在烏克蘭時，我總是講烏克蘭語。

eng: You are absolutely right.
He often quotes from Shakespeare.
He might change his mind.
Your time is up.
He broke into a house.
It's true.
Life is fun.
You've been deceived.
She despised him.
It's improved.
Second semester has ended.
This book is yours.
Let's get together again!
He married a stewardess.
He witnessed the murder.
I'm just looking around.
I like playing sports.
Aren't you happy?
Tom broke the window.
Jack resembles his father.
Ken wants a bicycle.
Mary can dance well.
Where does it hurt?
Please wrap it up.
Can't you speak English?
Of course!
I like instrumental music.
He's my younger brother.
Ken looks happy.
I'll see to it.
I'll visit him tomorrow.
His grandmother looks healthy.
I'll treat you.
I think it's OK.
She disliked him.
Get out of bed!
Don't you play tennis?
That's life.
That's life.
We played basketball yesterday.
Bill was in Japan.
Please think it over.
It's a secret.
Do it now.
You look pale.
Alice may possibly come.
I wanted red shoes.
Mike was elected chairperson.
No drinkers allowed.
Can you swim?
Turn off the light.
Clean your room.
Long time, no see.
Can you do bookkeeping?
Large, isn't it?
I'll miss your cooking.
I voted for Ken.
Welcome to Japan.
That was my mistake.
We need your help.
She doesn't like sushi.
Why were you there?
How should I know?
Do you drink coffee?
You're still young.
He taught himself French.
I'll return at 6:30.
I'll see you later.
Betty likes classical music.
Their wedding is tomorrow.
I continued working.
I made a mistake.
Mary ran.
Honey, come to bed. "No, not yet. I still have to translate some sentences on Tatoeba."
simp: 亲爱的, 上床吧。 "不, 还不行。我在Tatoeba上还必须翻译一些句子。"
trad: 親愛的, 上床吧。 "不, 還不行。我在Tatoeba上還必須翻譯一些句子。"

eng: If cheese is good, but the cake is a lie, what is a cheesecake? A good lie.
simp: 如果乳酪是好的, 但是蛋糕是个谎言, 什麽是乳酪蛋糕? 一个好的谎言。
trad: 如果乳酪是好的, 但是蛋糕是個謊言, 什麼是乳酪蛋糕? 一個好的謊言。

eng: He tells a new lie to cover up those that came before.
simp: 他说新的谎话来圆以前说的谎话。
trad: 他說新的謊話來圓以前說的謊話。

eng: You never get a second chance to make a first impression.
simp: 你永远没有第二次机会去打造第一印象。
trad: 你永遠沒有第二次機會去打造第一印象。

eng: I want to eat warm soup.
Never knew before what eternity was made for. It is to give some of us a chance to learn German.
simp: 以前从来不知道永恆是为了什麽。它是为了给我们一些机会学习德语。
trad: 以前從來不知道永恆是為了什麼。它是為了給我們一些機會學習德語。

eng: Date of last revision of this page: 2010-11-03
simp: 最后修订此页日期：2010年11月3日
trad: 最後修訂此頁日期：2010年11月3日

eng: They sailed along the west coast of Africa.
simp: 他们沿着非洲西岸航行了。
trad: 他們沿著非洲西岸航行了。

eng: People will accept your idea much more readily if you tell them Benjamin Franklin said it first.
simp: 如果你告诉他们富兰克林是第一个这麽说的, 人们会更乐意接受你的想法。
trad: 如果你告訴他們富蘭克林是第一個這麼說的, 人們會更樂意接受你的想法。

eng: Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana.
It's wrong to deceive people, but worse to deceive yourself.
simp: 欺骗别人是错的, 但更糟的欺骗自己。
trad: 欺騙別人是錯的, 但更糟的欺騙自己。

eng: Paris is the capital of France.
In this society where everything is disposable, it is a virtue to use something until it wears out.
simp: 在这个社会裡一切都是用完即丢, 用东西直到它磨损是一种美德。
trad: 在這個社會裡一切都是用完即丟, 用東西直到它磨損是一種美德。

eng: Books are for people who wish they were somewhere else.
simp: 书是为了那些希望自己在另一个地方的人。
trad: 書是為了那些希望自己在另一個地方的人。

eng: It's easy to make friends, but hard to get rid of them.
simp: 交朋友很容易, 但摆脱他们很难。
trad: 交朋友很容易, 但擺脫他們很難。

eng: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
simp: 善良是聋子能听盲人能看的语言。
trad: 善良是聾子能聽盲人能看的語言。

eng: Eat a live frog every morning, and nothing worse will happen to you the rest of the day.
simp: 每天早上吃一隻活青蛙, 那麽你一天中其他的时间就不会发生什麽更糟糕的事了。
trad: 每天早上吃一隻活青蛙, 那麼你一天中其他的時間就不會發生什麼更糟糕的事了。

eng: If we were supposed to talk more than listen, we would have been given two mouths and one ear.
simp: 如果我们应该少听多说话, 那麽我们应该得到两个嘴巴一隻耳朵才是。
trad: 如果我們應該少聽多說話, 那麼我們應該得到兩個嘴巴一隻耳朵才是。

eng: In life there are ups and downs.
No love is foul nor prison fair.
simp: 没有肮髒的爱情, 也没有美丽的监狱。
trad: 沒有骯髒的愛情, 也沒有美麗的監獄。

eng: We are cut from the same cloth.
The walls have ears.
The walls have ears.
I've got a frog in my throat.
simp: 我紧张得说不出话来了。
trad: 我緊張得說不出話來了。

eng: Don't listen to him, he's talking nonsense.
simp: 别听他的, 他在说废话。
trad: 別聽他的, 他在說廢話。

eng: We are sorry, the person you are trying to contact is not available.
simp: 对不起, 你要联络的人没空。
trad: 對不起, 你要聯絡的人沒空。

eng: I don't want it anymore.
Here is your change.
I'm sorry, I don't have change.
simp: 对不起, 我没有零钱。
trad: 對不起, 我沒有零錢。

eng: How come you know so much about Japanese history?
simp: 你为什麽知道这麽多的日本历史?
trad: 你為什麼知道這麼多的日本歷史?

eng: You may as well withdraw from the club right away.
simp: 你还不如立刻退出这个俱乐部。
trad: 你還不如立刻退出這個俱樂部。

eng: The victim of blackmail has been paying hush money for years, but now he realizes it is foolish, and he has decided not to pay a red cent more.
simp: 被害人被勒索支付封口费已经很多年, 但现在他意识到这样做是愚蠢的, 而且他已经决定再也不付一毛钱了。
trad: 被害人被勒索支付封口費已經很多年, 但現在他意識到這樣做是愚蠢的, 而且他已經決定再也不付一毛錢了。

eng: Mother-in-law and daughter-in-law are a tempest and hailstorm.
simp: 婆婆和媳妇就像是暴风雨和冰雹。
trad: 婆婆和媳婦就像是暴風雨和冰雹。

eng: There is no time to be lost.
We've been horsing around too much; it's high time we got down to brass tacks.
simp: 我们胡闹太久了, 现在该是我们考虑基本事实的时候了。
trad: 我們胡鬧太久了, 現在該是我們考慮基本事實的時候了。

eng: Why am I the only one they complain of? They're just making an example out of me and using me as a scapegoat.
simp: 为什麽我是他们唯一抱怨的人? 他们就这样拿我作例子, 利用我当代罪羔羊。
trad: 為什麼我是他們唯一抱怨的人? 他們就這樣拿我作例子, 利用我當代罪羔羊。

eng: Every Jack must have his Jill.
simp: 每个人都可以找到他的另一半 。
trad: 每個人都可以找到他的另一半 。

eng: The tiger cub looked like a large kitten.
simp: 小老虎看起来像隻大猫。
trad: 小老虎看起來像隻大貓。

eng: The insect grew out of a pupa into an imago.
simp: 昆虫破蛹而出变成成虫。
trad: 昆蟲破蛹而出變成成蟲。

eng: The ship was flying the American flag.
The warrior is conscious of both his strength and his weakness.
simp: 战士知道自己的力量和弱点。
trad: 戰士知道自己的力量和弱點。

eng: John cannot keep his family.
Let's toss up for it.
She sets your world alight.
Those young men are independent of their parents.
simp: 那些年轻人脱离父母独立。
trad: 那些年輕人脫離父母獨立。

eng: Tell me your story. I am all ears.
simp: 告诉我你的故事。 我会注意听。
trad: 告訴我你的故事。 我會註意聽。

eng: Jane had her hair cut short before the athletic meet.
simp: Jane在运动会之前把头发剃短了。
trad: Jane在運動會之前把頭發剃短了。

eng: I have to be there by 7:00.
The general strike paralyzed the whole country.
simp: 全面罢工瘫痪了整个国家。
trad: 全面罷工癱瘓了整個國家。

eng: Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.
simp: 天使畏惧处, 愚人敢闯入。
trad: 天使畏懼處, 愚人敢闖入。

eng: Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.
We're fed up with your complaining.
We enjoyed watching the TV.
We talked and talked until the day broke.
simp: 我们一直聊天直到天明。
trad: 我們一直聊天直到天明。

eng: My comment sparked off an argument in the group.
simp: 我的评论引起了小组内的争论。
trad: 我的評論引起了小組內的爭論。

eng: Wires are used to convey electricity.
He that will thrive must ask leave of his wife.
simp: 会成功的男人必须请求妻子让他离开出外打拼。
trad: 會成功的男人必須請求妻子讓他離開出外打拼。

eng: Cheese is a solid food made from the milk of cows, goats, sheep, and other mammals.
simp: 奶酪是由母牛、山羊、绵羊或其它哺乳动物的奶被加工制造的坚硬的食物。
trad: 奶酪是由母牛、山羊、綿羊或其它哺乳動物的奶被加工制造的堅硬的食物。

eng: The baby caught sight of my ballpoint pen and reached out for it.
simp: 这个婴儿盯着我的原子笔看, 并且伸手要拿它。
trad: 這個嬰兒盯著我的原子筆看, 並且伸手要拿它。

eng: I'll show you around the town.
I should have known better than to call him.
simp: 早知道我不应该打电话给他。
trad: 早知道我不應該打電話給他。

eng: He is a screwball.
He was walking with his shoulders squared.
He himself was not the light.
He is endowed with unusual ability in mathematics.
simp: 他天生具有不寻常的数学能力。
trad: 他天生具有不尋常的數學能力。

eng: He spared no pains to help me.
I get a kick out of her cheerful personality.
simp: 她开朗的个性使我觉得快乐。
trad: 她開朗的個性使我覺得快樂。

eng: She drew up the curtain.
She cried her heart out.
The mother bird brought worms for her young ones.
Is he breathing?
She is hard up for money.
The lawyer warned his client against testifying, but he did it anyway.
simp: 律师警告过他的当事人反对作证, 但是他还是这麽做了。
trad: 律師警告過他的當事人反對作證, 但是他還是這麼做了。

eng: It is easy to swim.
When you're trying to prove something, it helps to know it's true.
simp: 当你试图去证明某件事, 有助于了解它是真的。
trad: 當你試圖去證明某件事, 有助於了解它是真的。

eng: Any universe simple enough to be understood is too simple to produce a mind able to understand it.
simp: 任何简单到可以被了解的宇宙便太过简单而无法产生可以了解它的心灵。
trad: 任何簡單到可以被了解的宇宙便太過簡單而無法產生可以了解它的心靈。

eng: If you think education is expensive, wait till you see what ignorance costs you.
simp: 如果你认为教育是昂贵的, 那麽你等着看无知让你付出的代价。
trad: 如果你認為教育是昂貴的, 那麼你等著看無知讓你付出的代價。

eng: More money for education will spur economic growth.
simp: 更多投资在教育的钱将会刺激经济成长。
trad: 更多投資在教育的錢將會刺激經濟成長。

eng: If a sick person folds one thousand paper cranes, her wish will come true.
simp: 如果一个病人折一千隻纸鹤, 她的愿望就会成真。
trad: 如果一個病人折一千隻紙鶴, 她的願望就會成真。

eng: Something must be wrong with the machinery.
simp: 这个机器一定有什麽地方不对劲。
trad: 這個機器一定有什麼地方不對勁。

eng: This book is worth reading twice.
I find it difficult to express my meaning in words.
simp: 我觉得很难用言语表达我的意思。
trad: 我覺得很難用言語表達我的意思。

eng: What is your favorite sentence?
simp: 什麽是你最喜欢的句子?
trad: 什麼是你最喜歡的句子?

eng: I know her.
My business has at last gotten on the right track.
simp: 我的生意终于上了轨道。
trad: 我的生意終於上了軌道。

eng: I was surprised to see a lion.
simp: 我很惊讶竟然看到了狮子。
trad: 我很驚訝竟然看到了獅子。

eng: Beware of the dog!
Wise men talk about ideas, intellectuals about facts, and the ordinary man talks about what he eats.
simp: 智者谈论想法, 知识分子谈论事实, 普通人谈论他吃什麽。
trad: 智者談論想法, 知識分子談論事實, 普通人談論他吃什麼。

eng: You must share your jobs with others.
simp: 你必须分些零工给其他人做。
trad: 你必須分些零工給其他人做。

eng: I think your basic theory is wrong.
simp: 我认为你的基本理论是错的。
trad: 我認為你的基本理論是錯的。

eng: As long as you are here, we might as well begin.
simp: 既然你在这裡, 那我们就开始吧。
trad: 既然你在這裡, 那我們就開始吧。

eng: That you don't believe me is a great pity.
I don't know how to express my thanks.
simp: 我不知道如何表达我的谢意。
trad: 我不知道如何表達我的謝意。

eng: There is a certain amount of truth in what he's saying.
simp: 他说的话有一定的道理。
trad: 他說的話有一定的道理。

eng: Put his address down.
Those photos are hers.
No student is allowed to enter the room.
simp: 学生不准进入这个房间。
trad: 學生不準進入這個房間。

eng: The input method also works with this version.
simp: 此输入法也适用于这个版本。
trad: 此輸入法也適用於這個版本。

eng: Tom is a friend of mine.
simp: 汤姆是我朋友中的其中一位。
trad: 湯姆是我朋友中的其中一位。

eng: It was in 1832 that Evariste Galois fell in love with Stephanie-Felicie Poterin du Motel.
simp: 1832年Evariste Galois和Stephanie-Felicie Poterin du Motel陷入热恋。
trad: 1832年Evariste Galois和Stephanie-Felicie Poterin du Motel陷入熱戀。

eng: The more cheese, the more holes. The more holes, the less cheese. Thus: The more cheese, the less cheese.
simp: 越多奶酪越多洞。洞越多则奶酪越少。因此: 奶酪越多就越少奶酪。
trad: 越多奶酪越多洞。洞越多則奶酪越少。因此: 奶酪越多就越少奶酪。

eng: Our goose is cooked.
Our goose is cooked.
He met with a traffic accident.
How many are there in your class?
I use flash cards to study my German vocabulary.
simp: 我用字卡来学德文生字。
trad: 我用字卡來學德文生字。

eng: Paris is best in autumn.
simp: 巴黎在秋天的时候最美。
trad: 巴黎在秋天的時候最美。

eng: When I study, I listen to music with earphones.
simp: 我温习的时候会戴着耳机听音乐。
trad: 我溫習的時候會戴著耳機聽音樂。

eng: I have been reading that book all afternoon.
simp: 我整个下午都在看那本书。
trad: 我整個下午都在看那本書。

eng: He is a teacher, as is clear from his way of talking.
simp: 他是一位老师 ﹣ 这点从他说话的口吻就能看得出来。
trad: 他是一位老師 ﹣ 這點從他說話的口吻就能看得出來。

eng: Can you speak English?
You killed my father, and today I'll have my vengeance.
simp: 你杀了我父亲，我今天要为他报仇。
trad: 你殺了我父親，我今天要為他報仇。

eng: You have to leave.
Blacken the circles next to the correct answers with an HB pencil.
simp: 请用 HB 铅笔把正确答桉旁边的圆圈填满。
trad: 請用 HB 鉛筆把正確答案旁邊的圓圈填滿。

eng: The Romans would never have had the chance to conquer the world if they had first been required to study Latin.
simp: 如果他们必须先学拉丁文的话，是没有机会让罗马人征服世界的对吧。
trad: 如果他們必須先學拉丁文的話，是沒有機會讓羅馬人征服世界的對吧。

eng: The relationships of socialisers are often reflected in the distance between them.
simp: 交际者的关係往往会反映在他们之间的距离上。
trad: 交際者的關係往往會反映在他們之間的距離上。

eng: However, what's interesting is that whilst there are people whose computer use has become a problem, there are also people who have recovered from illness because of using computers.
simp: 不过，有趣的是，有人因为玩电脑玩出毛病，但也有人因为玩电脑而治好疾病。
trad: 不過，有趣的是，有人因為玩電腦玩出毛病，但也有人因為玩電腦而治好疾病。

eng: On gift-giving occasions, people generally avoid giving money, but there are exceptions.
simp: 人们送礼通常都不会送钱，但是也会有例外的情况。
trad: 人們送禮通常都不會送錢，但是也會有例外的情況。

eng: Do you want this shirt?
Harry is only 40.
People are getting more concerned about the matter.
simp: 公众对这件事越来越关心了。
trad: 公眾對這件事越來越關心了。

eng: He is a great scientist.
simp: 他是一个伟大的科学家。
trad: 他是一個偉大的科學家。

eng: It seems that he is interested in astronomy.
simp: 他好像对天文学挺有兴趣。
trad: 他好像對天文學挺有興趣。

eng: You read the paper?
He committed suicide by hanging himself.
Olympus? Isn't that where Greek gods hang out or something?
simp: 奥林匹斯山? 那不是希腊众神鬼溷的地方?
trad: 奧林匹斯山? 那不是希臘眾神鬼混的地方?

eng: I go to work every day.
This book is written in easy English for beginners to understand.
simp: 这本书是用简单英语写成的，让初学者看得懂。
trad: 這本書是用簡單英語寫成的，讓初學者看得懂。

eng: When do you drink coffee?
This verb is normally used only in the third person.
simp: 这个动词通常只用在第三人称。
trad: 這個動詞通常只用在第三人稱。

eng: My best friend dances really well.
simp: 我最好的朋友舞跳得很好。
trad: 我最好的朋友舞跳得很好。

eng: How much does a beer cost?
Why should you be so sad?
Okay, okay, said the doctor. "I'll definitely take a look at her."
simp: 好的, 好的 医生说。"我一定检查她。"
trad: 好的, 好的 醫生說。"我一定檢查她。"

eng: You began to learn Esperanto.
There were no hats in that store that fit me.
simp: 那个店里没有适合我的帽子。
trad: 那個店裏沒有適合我的帽子。

eng: It's eleven and he's not coming.
simp: 已经十一点了他还没来。
trad: 已經十一點了他還沒來。

eng: My eyes get tired very easily.
I heard someone shout outside the window.
One lives in Fukuoka, and the others live in Niigata.
simp: 有一个人住在福冈，其他人住在新泻。
trad: 有一個人住在福岡，其他人住在新瀉。

eng: The bus stopped suddenly in the middle of the street.
simp: 公车突然在路中央停下来。
trad: 公車突然在路中央停下來。

eng: The kitchen lacks a dishwasher.
simp: 厨房里缺少一台洗碗机。
trad: 廚房裏缺少一臺洗碗機。

eng: I have an old bicycle.
Who knows Hu Jintao's birthday?
simp: 胡锦涛的生日谁知道啊？
trad: 胡錦濤的生日誰知道啊？

eng: I have an old bicycle.
I have brothers.
We don't have any sledders here.
simp: 我们这里没有任何乘橇的人。
trad: 我們這裏沒有任何乘橇的人。

eng: Democracy is the dictatorship of the majority.
simp: 民主主义是多数选举的独裁。
trad: 民主主義是多數選舉的獨裁。

eng: Your bag is on my desk.
simp: 你的背包在我办公桌上面。
trad: 你的背包在我辦公桌上面。

eng: Make the hoe your sword, and the sword your hoe.
I felt bad.
Julie received a Christmas card from her brother in Italy.
simp: 茱莉的哥哥从意大利寄了一张圣诞贺卡给她。
trad: 茱莉的哥哥從意大利寄了一張聖誕賀卡給她。

eng: Betty murdered him.
Could you do me a favour please?
He was detected in the very act of stealing.
simp: 他在行窃的时后被发现。
trad: 他在行竊的時後被發現。

eng: Winter is over and spring has come.
simp: 冬天结束了春天已经来了。
trad: 冬天結束了春天已經來了。

eng: It cannot be denied that we cannot do without the telephone in our modern life.
simp: 不可否认的，在现代生活中我们不能没有电话。
trad: 不可否認的，在現代生活中我們不能沒有電話。

eng: This may sound like blowing my own horn, but ...
simp: 这听起来可能像是我在自吹自擂, 但是...
trad: 這聽起來可能像是我在自吹自擂, 但是...

eng: You have to be patient about your recovery.
simp: 你必须对你的康复有耐心。
trad: 你必須對你的康復有耐心。

eng: To distinguish right from wrong is difficult.
She was elected chairman of the committee.
Their quarrel sprung from misunderstanding.
simp: 他们的争吵因误解而起。
trad: 他們的爭吵因誤解而起。

eng: The school is located within five minutes' walk of the station.
simp: 学校坐落于距离车站步行五分钟的地方。
trad: 學校坐落於距離車站步行五分鐘的地方。

eng: Don't complain. You have to go.
Not all of the passengers escaped injury.
simp: 并非所有的乘客都免于受伤。
trad: 並非所有的乘客都免於受傷。

eng: You aren't quite right about that — let me explain.
simp: 关于那件事你不是很正确- 让我解释一下。
trad: 關於那件事你不是很正確- 讓我解釋一下。

eng: Do you ever listen to English programs on the air?
simp: 你曾经听过英语广播节目吗?
trad: 你曾經聽過英語廣播節目嗎?

eng: I will wait for you in front of the radio station.
I lead a fast way of living.
The vagabond, when rich, is called a tourist.
simp: 当流浪汉有钱了, 就被称为游客。
trad: 當流浪漢有錢了, 就被稱為遊客。

eng: The policy fluctuated between two opinions.
simp: 该政策在两种意见之间摇摆。
trad: 該政策在兩種意見之間搖擺。

eng: The law is not always fair.
It is our duty to obey the law.
simp: 遵守法律是我们的义务。
trad: 遵守法律是我們的義務。

eng: All men are equal under the law.
Respect for law is fundamental to our society.
simp: 尊重法律是我们社会的基础。
trad: 尊重法律是我們社會的基礎。

eng: The objective of law is justice.
The law should not be violated.
People who break the law are punished.
simp: 触犯法律的人受到惩罚。
trad: 觸犯法律的人受到懲罰。

eng: You will be punished if you break the law.
simp: 如果你违反了法律, 你将受到惩罚。
trad: 如果你違反了法律, 你將受到懲罰。

eng: You are not to break the law.
The bill will never go through.
simp: 该法桉将永远不会通过。
trad: 該法案將永遠不會通過。

eng: This bill is safe to pass.
The bill was passed after a hard fight in the House.
simp: 该法桉在众议院争议后获得通过。
trad: 該法案在眾議院爭議後獲得通過。

eng: The bill passed both Houses.
simp: 该法桉在两议院获得通过。
trad: 該法案在兩議院獲得通過。

eng: Lobbyists for the bill funneled bribes into a campaign fund.
simp: 该法桉的说客把游说贿款汇入了竞选基金。
trad: 該法案的說客把遊說賄款匯入了競選基金。

eng: What a waste to buy such an expensive machine even though he doesn't even know how to use computers.
simp: 买这麽贵的机器真是浪费, 而他甚至不知道怎麽用电脑。
trad: 買這麼貴的機器真是浪費, 而他甚至不知道怎麼用電腦。

eng: It's possible to branch out from computing to jobs in banking, accountancy and so on.
simp: 有可能将电脑工作扩展到银行业务, 会计业务等等。
trad: 有可能將電腦工作擴展到銀行業務, 會計業務等等。

eng: This is the second time I have arrived in China on my own.
simp: 这是我第二次独自到中国。
trad: 這是我第二次獨自到中國。

eng: The first time, I spoke pretty much no Chinese at all, and didn't understand China's conventions and customs.
simp: 第一次，我差不多完全不会普通话，而且不懂中国的常规和传统。
trad: 第一次，我差不多完全不會普通話，而且不懂中國的常規和傳統。

eng: But when I arrived in China that time, I had a family waiting for me.
simp: 但是我那次到中国有家人等着我。
trad: 但是我那次到中國有家人等著我。

eng: This time, although I'm more experienced, there's nobody waiting to meet me.
simp: 这次，虽然我的阅历更多但是没有人等着接待我。
trad: 這次，雖然我的閱歷更多但是沒有人等著接待我。

eng: My final destination in China is the city of Harbin in the north-east, about one thousand kilometres from Beijing.
simp: 我在中国最后的目的地是东北的哈尔滨，离北京大概一千公里左右。
trad: 我在中國最後的目的地是東北的哈爾濱，離北京大概一千公裏左右。

eng: You have the same racket as I have.
When booking flights, I decided the easiest way would be to fly to Beijing first, then get the train to complete my journey.
simp: 预定机票时我决定最容易的办法就是先坐飞机到北京，然后坐火车完成我的旅程。
trad: 預定機票時我決定最容易的辦法就是先坐飛機到北京，然後坐火車完成我的旅程。

eng: You should know better than to ask a lady her age.
simp: 你应该知道不要问小姐的年龄。
trad: 你應該知道不要問小姐的年齡。

eng: Doing it this way was probably the most fun, too.
simp: 这样也很可能是最好玩儿的。
trad: 這樣也很可能是最好玩兒的。

eng: You should take care of your sick mother.
simp: 你应该照顾你生病的母亲。
trad: 你應該照顧你生病的母親。

eng: You look tired. You ought to rest for an hour or two.
simp: 你看起来很累。你应该休息一两个小时。
trad: 你看起來很累。你應該休息一兩個小時。

eng: I think that you ought to apologize to her.
simp: 我认为你应该跟她道歉。
trad: 我認為你應該跟她道歉。

eng: You told her that you had finished the work three days before.
simp: 你告诉她你已经在三天前完成这个工作了。
trad: 你告訴她你已經在三天前完成這個工作了。

eng: You must be careful not to make him angry.
However, as soon as I saw the situation at the train station I began to regret this decision.
simp: 但是，我一看到在火车站的场面是就开始对这个决定表示遗憾。
trad: 但是，我一看到在火車站的場面是就開始對這個決定表示遺憾。

eng: You should have helped him with his work.
The queue for buying tickets was unbelievably long.
simp: 买票的人龙竟然那么长！
trad: 買票的人龍竟然那麼長！

eng: In China, you have to go to the departure station and buy train tickets there.
simp: 在中国，人人必须去出发的火车站买车票。
trad: 在中國，人人必須去出發的火車站買車票。

eng: What's more, you can only buy train tickets one week in advance.
simp: 再说，只能一个星期以前买到票。
trad: 再說，只能一個星期以前買到票。

eng: You should pay more attention to what he says.
simp: 你应该多注意他说的话。
trad: 你應該多註意他說的話。

eng: You should pay more attention to his warnings.
simp: 你应该多注意他的警告。
trad: 你應該多註意他的警告。

eng: You work as hard as he did at your age.
simp: 你跟他在你这个年纪时一样努力工作。
trad: 你跟他在你這個年紀時一樣努力工作。

eng: At the train station, once I had figured out where the queue for tickets actually was, I began the long wait.
simp: 在车站，我把排队买票的地点弄清楚后，开始久等。
trad: 在車站，我把排隊買票的地點弄清楚後，開始久等。

eng: What do you usually do on Sundays?
Do you know how to cook meat?
You could count to ten when you were two.
simp: 在你两岁时, 你可以数到十。
trad: 在你兩歲時, 你可以數到十。

eng: You are working too hard. Take it easy for a while.
simp: 你工作得太辛苦了。放轻鬆一下。
trad: 你工作得太辛苦了。放輕鬆一下。

eng: I didn't arrive in Harbin until very late, and the queue for taxis was already extremely long.
simp: 我很晚才到了哈尔滨，等出租汽车的队伍已经长极了。
trad: 我很晚才到了哈爾濱，等出租汽車的隊伍已經長極了。

eng: Not long after I joined the queue, a man approached and asked if I wanted a taxi.
simp: 我排队不久后，一个男人来问我要不要租车。
trad: 我排隊不久後，一個男人來問我要不要租車。

eng: I took it for granted that you were on my side.
simp: 我理所当然认为你会站在我这边。
trad: 我理所當然認為你會站在我這邊。

eng: You don't go to school on Sunday, do you?
simp: 你週日不上学, 对吗?
trad: 你週日不上學, 對嗎?

eng: But I'm already queuing, I tell him.
You'll learn how to do it sooner or later.
You may take either the big box or the small one.
simp: 你可以拿大的盒子或是小的盒子。
trad: 你可以拿大的盒子或是小的盒子。

eng: I am suspicious that this is an illegal taxi.
You made the same mistake as last time.
simp: 你犯了跟上次相同的错误。
trad: 你犯了跟上次相同的錯誤。

eng: You don't have to queue for my car, he offers.
simp: “我的车不需要排队阿，”他提议。
trad: “我的車不需要排隊阿，”他提議。

eng: You ought to ask for your teacher's permission.
simp: 你应该请求你的老师允许。
trad: 你應該請求你的老師允許。

eng: Is it an illegal taxi? I ask him.
You have to get this work finished by noon.
simp: 你必须在中午以前完成这个工作。
trad: 你必須在中午以前完成這個工作。

eng: Then I don't want it, I reply.
You will soon get used to speaking in public.
simp: 你很快就会习惯在公开场合讲话了。
trad: 你很快就會習慣在公開場合講話了。

eng: That evening, the university held a meeting for foreign students and Chinese students studying foreign languages.
simp: 那天晚上，大学给留学生和中国的学习外语学生举行一个会议。
trad: 那天晚上，大學給留學生和中國的學習外語學生舉行一個會議。

eng: Without warning, the teachers ask students from each country to take the microphone and explain to everyone their reasons for coming to Harbin.
simp: 冷不防，老师让每个国家的学生用话筒给大家讲一下自己来哈尔滨的原因。
trad: 冷不防，老師讓每個國家的學生用話筒給大家講一下自己來哈爾濱的原因。

eng: When it comes to my turn to speak, I confuse the words 'standard' and 'common', and end up saying that the north-eastern accent is 'the most common'.
simp: 轮到我说话时，我不觉地把“标准”溷成“普通”，后来说东北的口音是最普通的。
trad: 輪到我說話時，我不覺地把“標準”混成“普通”，後來說東北的口音是最普通的。

eng: Fortunately, everybody understood what this foreigner meant, knew I was only making a fool of myself, and laughed at me.
simp: 幸运的是大家都明白了这个老外的意思，知道我只是闹笑话而友好地对我笑一下。
trad: 幸運的是大家都明白了這個老外的意思，知道我只是鬧笑話而友好地對我笑一下。

eng: In Harbin, many people invite me to their homes to have dinner.
simp: 在哈尔滨，许多人邀请我到他们家吃饭。
trad: 在哈爾濱，許多人邀請我到他們家吃飯。

eng: You had better be careful not to overeat.
simp: 你最好小心不要吃过量。
trad: 你最好小心不要吃過量。

eng: This manga is pretty popular in China.
You should have known better than to take an examination without preparing for it.
simp: 你应该知道要为考试作准备。
trad: 你應該知道要為考試作準備。

eng: Did you do your homework by yourself?
simp: 你自己做回家作业的吗?
trad: 你自己做回家作業的嗎?

eng: You ought to get to work on time.
You should look after the children from time to time.
I wish you had told me the truth.
simp: 我希望你告诉我真相了。
trad: 我希望你告訴我真相了。

eng: You ought to have come to our party.
simp: 你应该到我们的派对的。
trad: 你應該到我們的派對的。

eng: You had better take an umbrella with you.
You ought to have come to see me yesterday.
You didn't come to school yesterday, did you?
simp: 你昨天没来学校, 是吗?
trad: 你昨天沒來學校, 是嗎?

eng: Did you hear about the fire yesterday?
simp: 你听说了昨天的火灾吗?
trad: 你聽說了昨天的火災嗎?

eng: Are you a senior high school student?
You don't have to go to the party unless you want to.
simp: 除非你想去, 否则你不必去这个派对。
trad: 除非你想去, 否則你不必去這個派對。

eng: You are free to do as you please with your money.
simp: 你可以随你高兴的用你的钱。
trad: 你可以隨你高興的用你的錢。

eng: You've got to learn to hold your tongue.
simp: 你应该学着闭上你的嘴。
trad: 你應該學著閉上你的嘴。

eng: You have to turn in the reports on Monday.
simp: 星期一你必须缴交报告。
trad: 星期一你必須繳交報告。

eng: You should do the honorable thing and resign.
You need to have friends who can help you out.
simp: 你需要可以帮助你的朋友。
trad: 你需要可以幫助你的朋友。

eng: What do you base your theory on?
simp: 你的理论是以什麽为基础?
trad: 你的理論是以什麼為基礎?

eng: You do your part and I'll do the rest.
simp: 你做你的部份, 其他的我来做。
trad: 你做你的部份, 其他的我來做。

eng: You should make an effort to stop smoking.
You had better not smoke while on duty.
simp: 当你值勤时最好不要抽烟。
trad: 當你值勤時最好不要抽煙。

eng: Do you know who Rie Miyazawa is?
Have you ever read any Chinese poems?
simp: 你读过任何一首中国诗词吗?
trad: 你讀過任何一首中國詩詞嗎?

eng: What subjects are you taking at school?
simp: 你在学校裡读哪些科目?
trad: 你在學校裡讀哪些科目?

eng: You seem to be prejudiced against ideas that come from foreign countries.
simp: 你似乎对来自国外的想法有偏见。
trad: 你似乎對來自國外的想法有偏見。

eng: What time are you going on duty?
What do you intend to do?
You've worked hard for months and have certainly earned a holiday.
simp: 你已经辛苦地工作好几个月了, 当然可以休假。
trad: 你已經辛苦地工作好幾個月了, 當然可以休假。

eng: I wonder if you have something to write with.
simp: 我怀疑你是否有东西可写。
trad: 我懷疑你是否有東西可寫。

eng: You should return home before it gets dark.
simp: 你应该在天黑之前回家。
trad: 你應該在天黑之前回家。

eng: You nearly poked me in the eye with your pencil.
simp: 你的铅笔差点戳到我的眼睛了。
trad: 你的鉛筆差點戳到我的眼睛了。

eng: Are men who don't drink still men?
simp: 不喝酒的男人还是男人吗？
trad: 不喝酒的男人還是男人嗎？

eng: You had better stay here a little longer.
simp: 你最好在这裡待久一点。
trad: 你最好在這裡待久一點。

eng: Have you finished doing your homework yet?
Have you finished reading that book yet?
You have made the very same mistake again.
You should practice playing the violin every day.
simp: 你应该每天练习拉小提琴。
trad: 你應該每天練習拉小提琴。

eng: What prevented you from coming earlier?
What prevented you from coming earlier?
Which club do you belong to?
Which bed do you want to use?
Where do you attend high school?
Why did you say such a thing?
simp: 你为什麽说了这样的事?
trad: 你為什麼說了這樣的事?

eng: You smoke far too much. You should cut back.
simp: 你吸太多烟了。你应该少抽一点。
trad: 你吸太多煙了。你應該少抽一點。

eng: You may think those shoes are in fashion, but they aren't.
simp: 你可能认为那些鞋子很时髦, 但是他们不是。
trad: 你可能認為那些鞋子很時髦, 但是他們不是。

eng: You don't need to worry about such a thing.
simp: 你不必担心这样的事情。
trad: 你不必擔心這樣的事情。

eng: You are old enough to know better than to act like that.
simp: 你够大了知道不要那样做。
trad: 你夠大了知道不要那樣做。

eng: Who did you give it to?
You will wish you had never seen it.
simp: 你会希望你从来没有看过它。
trad: 你會希望你從來沒有看過它。

eng: You should have done it earlier. It cannot be helped now.
simp: 你应该早点做的。现在没人可以帮你。
trad: 你應該早點做的。現在沒人可以幫你。

eng: You will not be able to catch the train.
You should have introduced yourself to the girl.
simp: 你应该向那个女孩自我介绍的。
trad: 你應該向那個女孩自我介紹的。

eng: You ought to know better at your age.
simp: 在你这个年纪你应该要更懂事。
trad: 在你這個年紀你應該要更懂事。

eng: Do you deny that you went there?
You should have told me a long time ago.
simp: 很久以前你就应该告诉我的。
trad: 很久以前你就應該告訴我的。

eng: You'd better have your hair cut at once.
You will soon get accustomed to living here.
simp: 你很快就会习惯住在这裡。
trad: 你很快就會習慣住在這裡。

eng: You'd better go to see your family doctor at once.
simp: 你最好立刻去看你的家庭医生。
trad: 你最好立刻去看你的家庭醫生。

eng: You may have mistaken Jane for his sister.
simp: 你可能误认珍为他的妹妹。
trad: 你可能誤認珍為他的妹妹。

eng: Did you do this on your own?
You must get this homework finished by the day after tomorrow.
simp: 你必须在后天以前完成回家作业。
trad: 你必須在後天以前完成回家作業。

eng: You'll soon get accustomed to this cold weather.
simp: 你很快就会习惯这种冷天气。
trad: 你很快就會習慣這種冷天氣。

eng: How did you come by this money?
You had better get away from here at once.
You have to study hard to catch up with your class.
simp: 你必须用功读书赶上同学。
trad: 你必須用功讀書趕上同學。

eng: Where are you from in Canada?
You should ask your father for his advice and follow it.
simp: 你应该问你父亲的忠告并遵守它。
trad: 你應該問你父親的忠告並遵守它。

eng: You should apologize to Dad for not coming home in time for supper.
simp: 你应该为你没有及时回家吃晚餐向你父亲道歉。
trad: 你應該為你沒有及時回家吃晚餐向你父親道歉。

eng: When did you come to Japan?
What on earth are you talking about?
You must be tired after such a long trip.
simp: 在这麽长程的旅途后你一定很累了。
trad: 在這麼長程的旅途後你一定很累了。

eng: You shouldn't talk back to your parents like that.
simp: 你不应该对你父母那样顶嘴。
trad: 你不應該對你父母那樣頂嘴。

eng: You shouldn't have eaten so much ice cream.
simp: 你不应该吃这麽多冰淇淋。
trad: 你不應該吃這麼多冰淇淋。

eng: I wish you had told me the truth then.
simp: 但愿你那时候就告诉我真相。
trad: 但願你那時候就告訴我真相。

eng: You must be at the station by 5 o'clock.
simp: 五点以前你必须在车站。
trad: 五點以前你必須在車站。

eng: You look the way your father did thirty years ago.
simp: 你看上去就像是三十年前你父亲的样子。
trad: 你看上去就像是三十年前你父親的樣子。

eng: You'll be able to drive a car in a few days.
simp: 几天之后你就可以开车了。
trad: 幾天之後你就可以開車了。

eng: You made the mistake on purpose, didn't you?
simp: 你故意犯这个错, 是吗?
trad: 你故意犯這個錯, 是嗎?

eng: You may as well tell me all about it.
This is too big.
What did you do last night?
This matter is very urgent.
I played with the baby on my knee.
It is evident that he has made a mistake.
It's better to chill white wine before you serve it.
simp: 在你侍酒前最好先将白葡萄酒冷却一下。
trad: 在你侍酒前最好先將白葡萄酒冷卻一下。

eng: The enemy dropped many bombs on the factory.
simp: 敌人在工厂投下了很多炸弹。
trad: 敵人在工廠投下了很多炸彈。

eng: There are too many people here. Let's go somewhere else.
simp: 这里人太多了。咱们换个地方吧。
trad: 這裏人太多了。咱們換個地方吧。

eng: Are you listening?
I cannot afford a camera above 300 dollars.
simp: 我买不起300块美元以上的照相机。
trad: 我買不起300塊美元以上的照相機。

eng: She has remained abroad ever since.
She knows ten times as many English words as I do.
simp: 她认识的英语词比我认识的多十倍。
trad: 她認識的英語詞比我認識的多十倍。

eng: That's true as well.
My French is crappy.
Hey, twirp! This here is our territory!
simp: 喂，小鬼！这里是我们的地盘！
trad: 餵，小鬼！這裏是我們的地盤！

eng: How about having dinner together?
Can somebody help me? "I will."
simp: 谁可以来帮我一下? "我帮你。"
trad: 誰可以來幫我一下? "我幫你。"

eng: We'll need a head hunting agency to find the right man for this executive position.
simp: 我们需要人力仲介公司帮我们找到合适的人来担任这个管理职位。
trad: 我們需要人力仲介公司幫我們找到合適的人來擔任這個管理職位。

eng: You have nice skin.
How much of what I've written here do you understand?
simp: 你了解多少我写在这裡的东西?
trad: 你了解多少我寫在這裡的東西?

eng: She scoffed at my poem.
Hurry up, we are leaving!
simp: 快点, 我们要离开了!
trad: 快點, 我們要離開了!

eng: If you ironed Switzerland, it would be bigger than Germany.
simp: 如果把瑞士熨了，会比德国还要大。
trad: 如果把瑞士熨了，會比德國還要大。

eng: You can remove the NNC.
simp: 你可以删除「需要母语确认」的标签。
trad: 你可以刪除「需要母語確認」的標簽。

eng: It's snowing today.
It's easy to catch a cold.
It took me a little more time than usually to fall asleep.
simp: 我花了比平常多一点的时间入睡。
trad: 我花了比平常多一點的時間入睡。

eng: Would you please look over my report?
simp: 你可以仔细检查一下我的报告吗?
trad: 你可以仔細檢查一下我的報告嗎?

eng: Would you please look after the children?
simp: 你可以照顾一下孩子们吗?
trad: 你可以照顧一下孩子們嗎?

eng: Would you please look after my dog tomorrow?
simp: 你明天可以帮我照顾一下我的狗吗?
trad: 你明天可以幫我照顧一下我的狗嗎?

eng: Would you look after my cat?
simp: 你可以照顾一下我的猫吗?
trad: 你可以照顧一下我的貓嗎?

eng: Maybe you licked it?
They won many competitions.
You won many competitions.
She won many competitions.
Hi, I'd like a deep-fried pizza roll.
simp: 嗨, 我要一个炸薄饼卷。
trad: 嗨, 我要一個炸薄餅卷。

eng: Where does she want to go?
Where does he want to go?
Do you trust her?
The hunter shot the fox dead.
Would you lend me your pencil?
simp: 你可以借我你的铅笔吗?
trad: 你可以借我你的鉛筆嗎?

eng: Would you lend me your knife?
Would you lend me your dictionary?
simp: 你可以借我你的字典吗?
trad: 你可以借我你的字典嗎?

eng: Would you lend me your bicycle?
simp: 你可以借我你的脚踏车吗?
trad: 你可以借我你的腳踏車嗎?

eng: Would you lend me some money?
Would you leave the door open, please?
He's a sucker for beautiful women.
simp: 他非常喜欢漂亮的女人。
trad: 他非常喜歡漂亮的女人。

eng: You're a sicko!
My neighbour's name is Deng Daping.
In a horrifying chain of events, Christopher Columbus once bit his own lip.
simp: 在一连串可怕的事件中, 哥伦布曾经咬紧牙关撑过去。
trad: 在一連串可怕的事件中, 哥倫布曾經咬緊牙關撐過去。

eng: Take my hand. The two of us are going to construct a utopia.
simp: 握着我的手。我们两个将要建立一个乌托邦。
trad: 握著我的手。我們兩個將要建立一個烏托邦。

eng: Tony's voice is nice.
Your head was bursting with new ideas.
simp: 你的脑袋充满了新点子。
trad: 你的腦袋充滿了新點子。

eng: Her head was bursting with new ideas.
simp: 她的脑袋充满了新点子。
trad: 她的腦袋充滿了新點子。

eng: What more would you want?
The better he knows the language, the less he likes it.
simp: 他越通晓这个语言, 他越不喜欢它。
trad: 他越通曉這個語言, 他越不喜歡它。

eng: It's stable because all the roots of this equation are negative.
simp: 它是可靠的, 因为这个方程式所有的根都是负的。
trad: 它是可靠的, 因為這個方程式所有的根都是負的。

eng: There aren't supposed to be any men in this house.
simp: 这家里应该没有男人才对。
trad: 這家裏應該沒有男人才對。

eng: It's clear that there's a rather strong disagreement between the two.
simp: 很明显的是这两者之间有很强烈的分歧。
trad: 很明顯的是這兩者之間有很強烈的分歧。

eng: This is not very stylish.
I'm scared shitless.
Worried, the shopkeeper ran over and kneeled beside Dima, who was breathing heavily - his forehead covered in sweat.
simp: 店主担心地跑过去跪在迪马身旁, 迪马沉重地喘着气, 他的额头覆着一层汗。
trad: 店主擔心地跑過去跪在迪馬身旁, 迪馬沈重地喘著氣, 他的額頭覆著一層汗。

eng: I like watching lesbian porn.
simp: 我喜欢看女同性恋色情片。
trad: 我喜歡看女同性戀色情片。

eng: She has big boobs.
All your entertainment in one place.
simp: 一个地方, 完全娱乐。
trad: 一個地方, 完全娛樂。

eng: All your entertainment in one place.
simp: 在一个地方有你想要的所有娱乐。
trad: 在一個地方有你想要的所有娛樂。

eng: His salary is composed of basic salary and commission.
simp: 他的薪水包括基本工资和提成。
trad: 他的薪水包括基本工資和提成。

eng: If you think that I'm still going to help a bastard like you, then you couldn't be any further away from the truth.
simp: 如果你认为我还会帮你这样的溷蛋，那你大错特错了。
trad: 如果你認為我還會幫你這樣的混蛋，那你大錯特錯了。

eng: He passed on quietly at his home last night.
simp: 他昨晚在家中安详地离世了。
trad: 他昨晚在家中安詳地離世了。

eng: They sat on a park bench and began talking.
simp: 他们坐在公园的长椅上，谈起了话来。
trad: 他們坐在公園的長椅上，談起了話來。

eng: They sat in the shade of that big tree.
simp: 他们在那棵大树的树荫下坐了下来。
trad: 他們在那棵大樹的樹蔭下坐了下來。

eng: Who made this pie?
He was loved by everyone that knew him.
I was sacked yesterday.
The criminal was arrested.
The tiger was killed.
My car was stolen by a thief.
That child was told off by the teacher.
simp: 那个孩子被老师批评了。
trad: 那個孩子被老師批評了。

eng: My beer was finished off by my room-mate.
simp: 我的啤酒被我的同屋喝完了。
trad: 我的啤酒被我的同屋喝完了。

eng: He made me so angry that I got a headache.
He was beaten to within an inch of his life.
The army was unexpectedly attacked.
Due to global warming, cities could be completely submerged.
simp: 由于全球气候变暖，城市可能被完全地淹没。
trad: 由於全球氣候變暖，城市可能被完全地淹沒。

eng: Her toy was broken by her little sister.
simp: 她的玩具是被她妹妹弄坏的。
trad: 她的玩具是被她妹妹弄壞的。

eng: I was woken up by the noise of the traffic outside.
simp: 我是被外面的交通噪音唤醒的。
trad: 我是被外面的交通噪音喚醒的。

eng: Don't get caught.
Don't get yourself killed.
The batteries in my calculator are dead.
simp: 我计算机的电池没电了。
trad: 我計算機的電池沒電了。

eng: I have to iron my shirt.
Food you eat which you don't like will not digest well.
simp: 你吃不喜欢的食物会消化不良。
trad: 你吃不喜歡的食物會消化不良。

eng: I have no regrets about what I did.
simp: 我对我做过的事不后悔。
trad: 我對我做過的事不後悔。

eng: Helen is seventeen years old.
We are going to climb that mountain.
After he had graduated from the university, he taught English for two years.
simp: 从他大学毕业以后, 他教了两年的英语。
trad: 從他大學畢業以後, 他教了兩年的英語。

eng: He leaves for school at seven.
Japan is confronted with severe economic problems.
simp: 日本正面临着严重的经济问题。
trad: 日本正面臨著嚴重的經濟問題。

eng: Tony broke it.
Cosmetic surgery is not covered by most insurance plans.
simp: 大部份的保险计划不包含整容手术。
trad: 大部份的保險計劃不包含整容手術。

eng: Older couples often appreciate cash more than gifts because they neither need nor have room for them.
simp: 年纪大的夫妻往往喜欢礼金胜于礼物, 因为他们既不需要礼物也没有空间放礼物。
trad: 年紀大的夫妻往往喜歡禮金勝於禮物, 因為他們既不需要禮物也沒有空間放禮物。

eng: I want a cellular phone, but I don't have enough money to pay for one.
simp: 我想要一支手机, 但是我没有足够的钱买一支。
trad: 我想要一支手機, 但是我沒有足夠的錢買一支。

eng: Tom was at a loss how to express himself.
simp: 汤姆不知道如何表达自己。
trad: 湯姆不知道如何表達自己。

eng: Everyone ought to be a master of his own destiny.
simp: 每个人都应该是自己命运的主宰。
trad: 每個人都應該是自己命運的主宰。

eng: I am going to play tennis.
I can't bear this kind of pain.
simp: 我不能再承受这种痛苦。
trad: 我不能再承受這種痛苦。

eng: Answer the question.
This year we offer the same language course as last year.
simp: 今年我们提供与去年相同的语言课程。
trad: 今年我們提供與去年相同的語言課程。

eng: I want to become an engineer.
simp: 我想要成为一位工程师。
trad: 我想要成為一位工程師。

eng: I took two cups of coffee.
If you use this modern equipment, it will save a lot of manpower.
simp: 如果人们使用这些现代化的机器, 那将节省很多人力。
trad: 如果人們使用這些現代化的機器, 那將節省很多人力。

eng: He looked in all directions, but didn't see anyone.
simp: 他看了看四周，但没看见任何人。
trad: 他看了看四周，但沒看見任何人。

eng: This isn't Spanish.
Betty's Esperanto is really great.
simp: 贝蒂世界语讲得非常棒。
trad: 貝蒂世界語講得非常棒。

eng: All of the cookies are in the shape of stars.
simp: 所有饼乾都是星星的形状。
trad: 所有餅乾都是星星的形狀。

eng: I sent you the letter just when you called.
simp: 当您打电话来的时候我已经把信寄给您了。
trad: 當您打電話來的時候我已經把信寄給您了。

eng: This food contains all the minerals without which our bodies would not function.
simp: 这食物中含有所有的矿物质, 若没有这些矿物质我们的身体将无法正常运作。
trad: 這食物中含有所有的礦物質, 若沒有這些礦物質我們的身體將無法正常運作。

eng: Will six o'clock suit you?
He took a drink of whiskey neat.
simp: 他喝了一杯纯威士忌酒。
trad: 他喝了一杯純威士忌酒。

eng: I think of the woman as a journalist.
simp: 我想到那位当记者的女人。
trad: 我想到那位當記者的女人。

eng: This is all he has to do.
simp: 这是所有他必须做的事。
trad: 這是所有他必須做的事。

eng: There's no disguising the fact that she is dishonest.
simp: 不需掩饰她不诚实的事实。
trad: 不需掩飾她不誠實的事實。

eng: How many does he want?
She was a tall, thin girl with long, soft brown hair.
simp: 她是个又高又瘦, 留着一头又长又软的褐色头髮的女孩。
trad: 她是個又高又瘦, 留著一頭又長又軟的褐色頭髮的女孩。

eng: She has kept a diary for 3 years.
simp: 她已经写了三年的日记。
trad: 她已經寫了三年的日記。

eng: New Year's Day is close at hand.
The old woman knitted her brows.
Not a star was to be seen.
Not a star was to be seen.
She cannot but laugh.
She is wearing the same dress that she had on yesterday.
simp: 她穿着跟昨天相同的衣服。
trad: 她穿著跟昨天相同的衣服。

eng: How deep is the hole?
Always be true to yourself.
He is remarkable for his wisdom.
My ex-husband no longer lives in this city.
simp: 我前男友不再住在这个城市了。
trad: 我前男友不再住在這個城市了。

eng: He that hears much and speaks not at all shall be welcome both in bower and hall.
simp: 多听不多言, 裡外人不嫌。
trad: 多聽不多言, 裡外人不嫌。

eng: He that hears much and speaks not at all shall be welcome both in bower and hall.
simp: 他听得多说得少, 在闺房和大厅都很受欢迎。
trad: 他聽得多說得少, 在閨房和大廳都很受歡迎。

eng: We failed due to a lack of preparation.
simp: 我们因缺乏准备而失败了。
trad: 我們因缺乏準備而失敗了。

eng: He admonished them for being noisy.
Nancy invited him to a party.
She is looking for her missing wallet.
simp: 她正在找她不见了的皮夹。
trad: 她正在找她不見了的皮夾。

eng: Do you know which road leads to my house?
simp: 你知道哪一条路到我家吗?
trad: 你知道哪一條路到我家嗎?

eng: Bread is made from wheat.
I was told I would feel better after this medicine.
simp: 他们告诉我吃完这个药我就会觉得舒服一点。
trad: 他們告訴我吃完這個藥我就會覺得舒服一點。

eng: Tom and Nancy broke up last month.
simp: 汤姆和南西上个月分手了。
trad: 湯姆和南西上個月分手了。

eng: I'm sorry, but it's just not possible.
simp: 我很抱歉, 但它就是不可能的。
trad: 我很抱歉, 但它就是不可能的。

eng: A year has twelve months.
The man behind them is playing the piano.
simp: 在他们身后的男人正在弹钢琴。
trad: 在他們身後的男人正在彈鋼琴。

eng: Because people in the world don't speak the same language, much effort is now devoted to translation.
simp: 因为世界上的人不是讲同一种语言, 所以现在很多人努力致力于翻译。
trad: 因為世界上的人不是講同一種語言, 所以現在很多人努力致力於翻譯。

eng: Where's the checkout counter?
I felt the earth shake.
Tom has been struck by lightning three times.
simp: 汤姆被闪电击中过三次。
trad: 湯姆被閃電擊中過三次。

eng: Who does the gun belong to?
Yamada is second to none in English in his class.
simp: 山田的英语在他的班上是首屈一指的。
trad: 山田的英語在他的班上是首屈一指的。

eng: My neighbor's dog is dead.
He drove the car, listening to music on the radio.
simp: 他一面开车一面听收音机的音乐。
trad: 他一面開車一面聽收音機的音樂。

eng: The phone rang when I was having lunch.
simp: 当我正在吃午餐时, 电话响了。
trad: 當我正在吃午餐時, 電話響了。

eng: We didn't go out last night. We could have gone to the movies, but we decided to stay home.
simp: 我们昨晚没有出去。我们可以出去看电影的, 但是我们决定留在家裡。
trad: 我們昨晚沒有出去。我們可以出去看電影的, 但是我們決定留在家裡。

eng: My daughter graduated from the university today.
What did you do with that money?
He sells cars.
The explanation below was achieved by comparing and contrasting a variety of different theories.
simp: 下面的解释是通过比较和对比各种不同的理论。
trad: 下面的解釋是通過比較和對比各種不同的理論。

eng: Well, have you decided?
simp: 那麽, 你决定好了吗?
trad: 那麼, 你決定好了嗎?

eng: He grinned with delight.
Sorry, that was none of my business.
simp: 对不起, 那不关我的事。
trad: 對不起, 那不關我的事。

eng: Your order has been submitted.
This paragraph is vague.
simp: 这一个段落是模煳不清的。
trad: 這一個段落是模糊不清的。

eng: Someone's knocking at the door.
Just as if that was proof that that English was correct.
simp: 就好像那证明了英语是正确的。
trad: 就好像那證明了英語是正確的。

eng: Pardon all but thyself.
simp: 严以律己, 宽以待人。
trad: 嚴以律己, 寬以待人。

eng: Mary has a bad back. It's hard for her to lift things.
simp: 玛丽的背不好, 她很难把东西举起来。
trad: 瑪麗的背不好, 她很難把東西舉起來。

eng: I count the sparkle of constellations to foretell the future of my love.
simp: 我数着星宿的星光来预测我爱情的未来。
trad: 我數著星宿的星光來預測我愛情的未來。

eng: I remember seeing her.
Get up at once, or you will be late for school.
simp: 立刻起床, 否则你上学会迟到。
trad: 立刻起床, 否則你上學會遲到。

eng: To hire a good lawyer? Al-Sayib asked.
simp: 要雇用一个好的律师? Al-Sayib问。
trad: 要雇用一個好的律師? Al-Sayib問。

eng: You should put your coat on.
Having a driver's license is an advantage for this job.
simp: 有驾照者优先得到这个职位。
trad: 有駕照者優先得到這個職位。

eng: We traveled to Mexico by plane.
simp: 我们搭飞机去墨西哥旅行。
trad: 我們搭飛機去墨西哥旅行。

eng: Mother always tells me not to sit up late at night.
simp: 妈妈总是告诉我晚上不要熬夜太晚。
trad: 媽媽總是告訴我晚上不要熬夜太晚。

eng: None of them could understand what she was implying.
simp: 他们没有人了解她暗示什麽。
trad: 他們沒有人了解她暗示什麼。

eng: I delight in going to the apple orchard each fall.
simp: 我乐意每年秋季去苹果园。
trad: 我樂意每年秋季去蘋果園。

eng: In the sphere of thought, absurdity and perversity remain the masters of the world, and their dominion is suspended only for brief periods.
simp: 在思想的领域中, 荒诞和堕落仍然主宰着世界, 它们的操控只是短时间地被暂停。
trad: 在思想的領域中, 荒誕和墮落仍然主宰著世界, 它們的操控只是短時間地被暫停。

eng: The soul animates the body.
The poor girl went blind.
Tom broke some bones in his arm and hand.
simp: 汤姆的手臂和手断了些骨头。
trad: 湯姆的手臂和手斷了些骨頭。

eng: I met a novelist and a poet.
simp: 我遇到一位小说家和一位诗人。
trad: 我遇到一位小說家和一位詩人。

eng: What are the points of interest here?
She studied abroad in order to brush up her English.
simp: 她在国外学习以便提升她的英语。
trad: 她在國外學習以便提升她的英語。

eng: The train will pass Motomachi Station.
They cleared the street of snow.
simp: 他们清理了街上的积雪。
trad: 他們清理了街上的積雪。

eng: I'd like you to have a blood test.
If the distance you move the pen is too small, the speed too slow, it can't recognize the gestures well and you can't operate it in the way you thought.
simp: 如果你移动笔的距离太小, 速度太慢, 它就无法辨识出你的手势, 那麽你便无法用你想要的方式操作它。
trad: 如果你移動筆的距離太小, 速度太慢, 它就無法辨識出你的手勢, 那麼你便無法用你想要的方式操作它。

eng: Keep on smiling.
We were just about to leave when it rained.
simp: 我们正要离开的时候下雨了。
trad: 我們正要離開的時候下雨了。

eng: You are sharp.
Just give me your name and address.
simp: 只要给我你的姓名和住址。
trad: 只要給我你的姓名和住址。

eng: You lied to me, didn't you?
simp: 你对我说了谎, 没有吗?
trad: 你對我說了謊, 沒有嗎?

eng: The legal system in America is the world's finest.
simp: 美国的司法制度是世界上最好的。
trad: 美國的司法制度是世界上最好的。

eng: The soil here is fertile.
He is wanting in courage.
Let's order two bottles.
The girl, her eyes shining brightly from that single hint, makes her cute cat-motif automatic pencil run across her notebook.
simp: 这女孩的眼睛闪烁着光亮, 这个暗示让她可爱的猫图桉自动铅笔越过了她的笔记本。
trad: 這女孩的眼睛閃爍著光亮, 這個暗示讓她可愛的貓圖案自動鉛筆越過了她的筆記本。

eng: He has the problem of adapting to a new way of life.
simp: 他在适应新的生活方式上有问题。
trad: 他在適應新的生活方式上有問題。

eng: I doubt if he'll come to school today.
simp: 我怀疑他今天是否会来上学。
trad: 我懷疑他今天是否會來上學。

eng: The snow was knee deep.
Don't bite on the right side.
He repented having betrayed his country to the enemy.
simp: 他后悔对敌人出卖了他的国家。
trad: 他後悔對敵人出賣了他的國家。

eng: The gas gives off a strong, bad smell.
simp: 这个气体散发出强烈难闻的气味。
trad: 這個氣體散發出強烈難聞的氣味。

eng: He can speak a little English.
I wish I was young again.
That toy is made of wood.
simp: 这个玩具是用木头做的。
trad: 這個玩具是用木頭做的。

eng: The child doesn't cry anymore.
What was the score at halftime?
Stay calm.
He was equal to the job.
The handyman was supposed to arrive at twelve noon, but got stuck in a traffic jam for a few hours.
simp: 这个工人本来应该在中午十二点到达, 但他被交通堵塞困住了几个小时。
trad: 這個工人本來應該在中午十二點到達, 但他被交通堵塞困住了幾個小時。

eng: He looks like a clever boy.
simp: 他看起来像是个聪明的男孩。
trad: 他看起來像是個聰明的男孩。

eng: He was alone there.
I fear this work will take up most of my time.
simp: 我怕这项工作会佔用我大部份的时间。
trad: 我怕這項工作會佔用我大部份的時間。

eng: I like Ozodbek's songs.
I'll stop speaking to you in French.
simp: 我不会再跟你说法文了。
trad: 我不會再跟你說法文了。

eng: I'm drunk, but I can still speak German.
simp: 我喝醉了，但是还会说德语。
trad: 我喝醉了，但是還會說德語。

eng: He took many pictures in London.
simp: 他在伦敦的时候照了很多照片儿。
trad: 他在倫敦的時候照了很多照片兒。

eng: Come with us.
This website seems quite good.
What's going on in the cave? I'm curious. "I have no idea."
simp: 山洞裡发生了什麽事? 我很好奇。"我不知道。"
trad: 山洞裡發生了什麼事? 我很好奇。"我不知道。"

eng: What I'm about to say is strictly between you and me.
simp: 我要告诉你的只能你我知道。
trad: 我要告訴你的只能你我知道。

eng: It happened that he found the treasure.
Those records are not accessible to the public.
simp: 这些记录不对公众开放。
trad: 這些記錄不對公眾開放。

eng: She is unable to withstand the pressure.
You live in Tokyo, don't you?
simp: 你住在东京, 不是吗?
trad: 你住在東京, 不是嗎?

eng: Every nation should help each other.
simp: 每个国家都应该彼此帮助。
trad: 每個國家都應該彼此幫助。

eng: They went to Tottori.
She enjoyed herself a lot at the party.
simp: 她在聚会上玩得很开心。
trad: 她在聚會上玩得很開心。

eng: We should try to avoid imposing our own beliefs on others.
simp: 我们应该尽量避免把我们自己的信念强加在别人身上。
trad: 我們應該盡量避免把我們自己的信念強加在別人身上。

eng: Wild animals live in the forest.
Ken's dog is white.
You may call him a liar, but you cannot call him a bad man.
simp: 你可以说他是个骗子, 但是你不能称他为坏人。
trad: 你可以說他是個騙子, 但是你不能稱他為壞人。

eng: By whom was this picture painted?
He was at a loss for an answer.
Few things give us as much pleasure as music.
simp: 很少有东西像音乐一样带给我们这麽多的快乐。
trad: 很少有東西像音樂一樣帶給我們這麼多的快樂。

eng: Did you make that mistake on purpose?
It is necessary to take some exercise every day.
simp: 每天作一些练习是必须的。
trad: 每天作一些練習是必須的。

eng: A parent or teacher should bring home to children the pleasure of reading.
simp: 家长或老师应该让孩子们享受阅读的乐趣。
trad: 家長或老師應該讓孩子們享受閱讀的樂趣。

eng: His sense of guilt was diminished.
I always say yes!
Today, the temperature rose as high as 30 degrees Celsius.
simp: 今天的气温升高到摄氏三十度。
trad: 今天的氣溫升高到攝氏三十度。

eng: I generally agree with her.
Who would be its next victim?
I can comfort her.
If you are to succeed, you must start studying now.
simp: 如果你要成功, 你必须现在开始学习。
trad: 如果你要成功, 你必須現在開始學習。

eng: Our plans are to advance toward the city.
simp: 我们的计划是向都市前进。
trad: 我們的計劃是向都市前進。

eng: When did you immigrate to our country?
simp: 你何时移民到我们国家?
trad: 你何時移民到我們國家?

eng: She ran as fast as possible.
This house is as large again as that one.
simp: 这栋房子是那栋的两倍大。
trad: 這棟房子是那棟的兩倍大。

eng: How handsome!
I caught him by the arm before he could fall.
simp: 在他倒下前我抓住了他的手臂。
trad: 在他倒下前我抓住了他的手臂。

eng: Write your name and address on this envelope.
simp: 把你的姓名和地址写在这个信封上。
trad: 把你的姓名和地址寫在這個信封上。

eng: A man who asks his wife's permission before taking any action except breathing is a henpecked husband.
simp: 一个除了呼吸之外做任何事之前都要经过老婆同意的男人是一个怕老婆的男人。
trad: 一個除了呼吸之外做任何事之前都要經過老婆同意的男人是一個怕老婆的男人。

eng: If you were stranded on a desert island, what books would you want to have with you to read?
simp: 如果你被困在一个荒岛上, 你会想要随身带着哪些书来看?
trad: 如果你被困在一個荒島上, 你會想要隨身帶著哪些書來看?

eng: There is a clock on the wall.
Have you ever seen Mt. Fuji? It is beautiful beyond description.
simp: 你看过富士山吗? 它美得无法形容。
trad: 你看過富士山嗎? 它美得無法形容。

eng: With the money Mr Johnson had saved, he would be able to live high on the hog when he retired.
simp: 用这些杰森先生存下来的钱, 在他退休后他可以生活的很宽裕。
trad: 用這些傑森先生存下來的錢, 在他退休後他可以生活的很寬裕。

eng: I, for one, am for the plan.
simp: 就个人而言, 我赞同这个计划。
trad: 就個人而言, 我贊同這個計劃。

eng: You can count on her.
She carried that habit to her grave.
simp: 她到死都改不了那个习惯。
trad: 她到死都改不了那個習慣。

eng: The homework was easily done.
simp: 这个回家作业很容易就做完了。
trad: 這個回家作業很容易就做完了。

eng: Is there a shorter road to get there?
simp: 到那裡有比较短的路吗?
trad: 到那裡有比較短的路嗎?

eng: Kelly cut physical education and went home.
simp: 凯莉没上体育课就回家了。
trad: 凱莉沒上體育課就回家了。

eng: My father repaired my old watch.
simp: 我父亲修理了我的旧手錶。
trad: 我父親修理了我的舊手錶。

eng: The situation went from bad to worse.
Here is the book you are looking for.
Michael, this is the restaurant where your father and I had our first date.
simp: 麦可, 这家餐厅就是你爸爸和我第一次约会的地方。
trad: 麥可, 這家餐廳就是你爸爸和我第一次約會的地方。

eng: Please.
It took us half an hour to set up the tent.
simp: 搭帐篷花了我们半小时。
trad: 搭帳篷花了我們半小時。

eng: They arrived here safely yesterday.
simp: 他们昨天平安抵达这裡。
trad: 他們昨天平安抵達這裡。

eng: Don't forget to put out the light before you go to bed.
simp: 你睡觉之前不要忘了熄灯。
trad: 你睡覺之前不要忘了熄燈。

eng: It would be ridiculous to spend all their money.
simp: 花光他们所有的钱会很荒谬。
trad: 花光他們所有的錢會很荒謬。

eng: If you do your best, you will succeed.
simp: 如果你尽力而为, 你就会成功。
trad: 如果你盡力而為, 你就會成功。

eng: The explanation is by no means satisfactory.
simp: 这个解释不是很令人满意。
trad: 這個解釋不是很令人滿意。

eng: They congratulated us on our victory.
Not a few foreigners like Japanese food.
simp: 也有不少外国人喜欢日本料理。
trad: 也有不少外國人喜歡日本料理。

eng: I can't afford to pay so much.
I am going to see him today.
The bank was held up a week ago.
simp: 这家银行一週前被抢劫。
trad: 這家銀行一週前被搶劫。

eng: I am not quite sure if we can meet your requirements.
simp: 我不太确定我们是否能够满足你的要求。
trad: 我不太確定我們是否能夠滿足你的要求。

eng: Fiona's letters were becoming less and less frequent.
She gave birth to her first child at twenty years old.
simp: 她在二十岁的时候生下第一个孩子。
trad: 她在二十歲的時候生下第一個孩子。

eng: That is because I got up late.
He told me not to tell lies.
Karaoke is good for reducing stress.
Some believe that the British Royal Family is directly descended from the line of King David.
simp: 有些人相信英国皇室是大卫王的后裔。
trad: 有些人相信英國皇室是大衛王的後裔。

eng: The people whom I meet are kind.
I am used to sitting up late.
I didn't want to get up early.
He doesn't realise that he's tone deaf.
simp: 他不知道他自己五音不全。
trad: 他不知道他自己五音不全。

eng: The number of the chairs in the hall is 80.
He seized me by the neck.
Experience is the best teacher.
I have ten pens.
He's always been living in Tokyo.
Each of us is like the moon: there is a dark side of us that we do not let others see.
simp: 我们每个人就像是月亮: 我们从来没有让别人看到我们黑暗的一面。
trad: 我們每個人就像是月亮: 我們從來沒有讓別人看到我們黑暗的一面。

eng: As long as you keep quiet, you can stay here.
simp: 只要你保持安静, 你可以留在这裡。
trad: 只要你保持安靜, 你可以留在這裡。

eng: How old are you?
Merry Christmas!
Nobody knows what will happen in the future.
simp: 人不知道未来可能发生什麽事。
trad: 人不知道未來可能發生什麼事。

eng: It's so obvious we don't need proof.
simp: 事情如此明显所以我们不需要证明。
trad: 事情如此明顯所以我們不需要證明。

eng: I'll give you a painkilling injection.
Ask her how much soup she wants.
He himself did it.
All of them are not present.
simp: 他们所有的人都没有出席。
trad: 他們所有的人都沒有出席。

eng: He compared his car to the new model.
simp: 他拿他的车和新款车作比较。
trad: 他拿他的車和新款車作比較。

eng: In the end we reached a compromise.
This water tastes good.
Don't tell her anything.
These young people are talking loudly amongst themselves and have absolutely no regard for those around them.
simp: 这些年轻人彼此之间大声说话, 丝毫不在意周围的人。
trad: 這些年輕人彼此之間大聲說話, 絲毫不在意周圍的人。

eng: Yesterday was Sunday, not Saturday.
simp: 昨天是星期天，不是星期六。
trad: 昨天是星期天，不是星期六。

eng: I slept all day yesterday, because it was Sunday.
simp: 昨天是星期天，所以我睡了一整天的觉。
trad: 昨天是星期天，所以我睡了一整天的覺。

eng: The milk turned sour.
Our world is only a small part of the universe.
simp: 我们的世界只不过是宇宙的一小部分。
trad: 我們的世界只不過是宇宙的一小部分。

eng: I wouldn't object if you wanted to go with her.
simp: 如果你想和她一起去，我不会反对。
trad: 如果你想和她一起去，我不會反對。

eng: Don't worry. I have completely recovered.
simp: 别担心，我已经完全康复了。
trad: 別擔心，我已經完全康復了。

eng: Is there a mailbox near here?
Put your hands down!
Which TV show do you like the most?
simp: 你最喜欢哪一个电视节目？
trad: 你最喜歡哪一個電視節目？

eng: Early explorers used the stars for navigation.
simp: 古代的探险家用星星来辨别方向。
trad: 古代的探險家用星星來辨別方向。

eng: This is where I was born and brought up.
simp: 这里就是我出生、长大的地方了。
trad: 這裏就是我出生、長大的地方了。

eng: It's the law: always buckle your safety belt in cars and airplanes.
simp: 法律规定，在车辆和飞机上，一定要扣上安全带。
trad: 法律規定，在車輛和飛機上，一定要扣上安全帶。

eng: Yes, Dima replied, brushing off a piece of half-eaten fish that had gotten stuck to his right sleeve. "I'd like to buy that one there."
simp: 「是的，」狄马一边回答，一边把黏在他右边衣袖的一块吃剩的鱼肉拨走：「我想要那边的那一件。」
trad: 「是的，」狄馬一邊回答，一邊把黏在他右邊衣袖的一塊吃剩的魚肉撥走：「我想要那邊的那一件。」

eng: They conducted a series of experiments under zero gravity.
simp: 他们在无重力状态下进行了一连串的实验。
trad: 他們在無重力狀態下進行了一連串的實驗。

eng: Sorry, I've got part-time work from the morning tomorrow.
simp: 对不起, 明天早上我有兼职的工作。
trad: 對不起, 明天早上我有兼職的工作。

eng: He's the chairman of the committee.
The lady really flipped out when she learned she had won a million dollars.
simp: 当这位女士得知她已经赢得了百万美元, 她真的乐疯了。
trad: 當這位女士得知她已經贏得了百萬美元, 她真的樂瘋了。

eng: Did you bring your family with you?
These are pens.
He was made captain.
Would you like some of those pictures?
simp: 你想要那些照片中的一些吗?
trad: 你想要那些照片中的一些嗎?

eng: Let's stop off and see a movie.
simp: 让我们中途下车看场电影吧。
trad: 讓我們中途下車看場電影吧。

eng: Can you drive a manual transmission?
She withdrew her head from a window.
simp: 她把头从窗户外缩回来。
trad: 她把頭從窗戶外縮回來。

eng: Is his pulse regular?
This law is applicable to all cases.
A theory must be followed by practice.
Let me remind you again that March 31st is the due date.
simp: 让我再次提醒你3月31日是到期日。
trad: 讓我再次提醒你3月31日是到期日。

eng: Anything that can be misunderstood will be.
To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?
simp: 要你在多大程度上同意或不同意这种说法？
trad: 要你在多大程度上同意或不同意這種說法？

eng: They granted his request.
The doctor advised him to do more exercise.
There is too much acid in this orange.
Boston is too cold for me, let alone Chicago.
simp: 波士顿对我来说已经太冷了,更遑论是芝加哥。
trad: 波士頓對我來說已經太冷了,更遑論是芝加哥。

eng: I was writing a letter when he came.
simp: 当他进来的时候, 我正在写信。
trad: 當他進來的時候, 我正在寫信。

eng: I don't know what this symbol stands for.
simp: 我不知道这个符号代表什麽意思。
trad: 我不知道這個符號代表什麼意思。

eng: Let's begin at the last line but one.
simp: 让我们从最后一行开始吧。
trad: 讓我們從最後一行開始吧。

eng: More often than not, she had to go in person.
He saved my life at the risk of his own.
simp: 他冒着生命危险救了我的命。
trad: 他冒著生命危險救了我的命。

eng: By reading books and discussing concepts, a person can gain wisdom and tolerance of differing ideas.
simp: 藉由读书和讨论概念, 一个人能获得智慧并包容不同的想法。
trad: 藉由讀書和討論概念, 一個人能獲得智慧並包容不同的想法。

eng: Cathy, please stay out of my way for a while.
I've finally got the whole set!
She has a husband and two daughters.
Pretty good. Did you go to today's history seminar?
simp: 非常好。你去了今天的历史研讨会吗？
trad: 非常好。你去了今天的歷史研討會嗎？

eng: Just one part of what he said got picked up by the media and took on a life of its own.
simp: 媒体对他所说的话断章取义并发展到无法控制的地步了。
trad: 媒體對他所說的話斷章取義並發展到無法控制的地步了。

eng: This means nil.
I feel the want of money.
So, was there a time when you were a wizard, too?
simp: 所以, 有段时间你也是个巫师吗?
trad: 所以, 有段時間你也是個巫師嗎?

eng: He could not get through his work, though the examination was near.
simp: 虽然考试近了, 他还无法做完他的工作。
trad: 雖然考試近了, 他還無法做完他的工作。

eng: He could not get through his work, though the examination was near.
simp: 虽然考试近了, 他还没有把书唸完。
trad: 雖然考試近了, 他還沒有把書唸完。

eng: Are you drunk enough to speak German once again?
simp: 你是不是喝醉到能再说一遍德语的程度？
trad: 你是不是喝醉到能再說一遍德語的程度？

eng: Having met him before, I recognized him at once.
simp: 因为以前见过他, 所以我立刻就认出他来。
trad: 因為以前見過他, 所以我立刻就認出他來。

eng: That's something like a movie scenario.
simp: 这件事情像是电影情节。
trad: 這件事情像是電影情節。

eng: It was the sort of weird car that made me want to blurt out, "what the heck is that?"
simp: 这辆有点怪的车让我脱口而出"那是什麽鬼东西啊?"
trad: 這輛有點怪的車讓我脫口而出"那是什麼鬼東西啊?"

eng: If she was displeased, she never showed it.
simp: 如果她不高兴, 她从来不表现出来。
trad: 如果她不高興, 她從來不表現出來。

eng: Their excuses were all alike.
simp: 他们的藉口都是一样的。
trad: 他們的藉口都是一樣的。

eng: It's not blood. It's beet.
Keeton put magnets on the heads of his pigeons.
simp: 基顿把磁铁放在他的鸽子的头上。
trad: 基頓把磁鐵放在他的鴿子的頭上。

eng: There's an important difference between talking "with" someone and talking "to" them.
simp: 和某人交谈 和"对谁说话" 之间有很重要的不同之处。
trad: 和某人交談 和"對誰說話" 之間有很重要的不同之處。

eng: It's my brother's.
It belongs to my brother.
I telephoned her at once.
He made no progress in his speaking ability.
simp: 他说话的能力没有任何的进步。
trad: 他說話的能力沒有任何的進步。

eng: His wife is in the hospital because she was injured in a car crash.
simp: 他的妻子在医院裡因为她在一场车祸中受伤了。
trad: 他的妻子在醫院裡因為她在一場車禍中受傷了。

eng: There was little traffic, so we made good time on our trip to New York.
simp: 路上几乎没有车子, 所以我们挑了个好时间去纽约。
trad: 路上幾乎沒有車子, 所以我們挑了個好時間去紐約。

eng: I will be happy to attend your party.
simp: 我很快乐能参加你的派对。
trad: 我很快樂能參加你的派對。

eng: She has inherent dignity.
It is sometimes difficult to make yourself understood in public.
simp: 有时很难在公众场合表达你自己的意思。
trad: 有時很難在公眾場合表達你自己的意思。

eng: Peter's cottage is very big.
I really like him, but not his circle of friends.
simp: 我真的很喜欢他, 可是我不喜欢他周围的朋友。
trad: 我真的很喜歡他, 可是我不喜歡他周圍的朋友。

eng: Under the circumstances I cannot allow the request.
simp: 在这种情况之下,我不能允许这个要求。
trad: 在這種情況之下,我不能允許這個要求。

eng: He wants affection.
I attached my name-tag to my baggage, but it soon came off.
simp: 我在我的行李上附上了有我名字的标籤, 但是它很快就剥落了。
trad: 我在我的行李上附上了有我名字的標籤, 但是它很快就剝落了。

eng: We went on a picnic together.
Scientists can easily compute the distance between planets.
simp: 科学家们可以很容易地计算出行星之间的距离。
trad: 科學家們可以很容易地計算出行星之間的距離。

eng: That's my dictionary.
I noticed a note on my desk, but I do not know who wrote it.
simp: 我发现了我办公桌上有张字条, 但是我不知道是谁写的。
trad: 我發現了我辦公桌上有張字條, 但是我不知道是誰寫的。

eng: I was ill yesterday.
There are no chairs in this room.
I looked around me.
It snowed.
Why do you say that?
We ate curry rice last night.
Could you exchange rooms with me?
Please send me a letter.
As this girl entered the room, every child was laughing at her little hat.
simp: 当这个女孩走进房间时, 每个孩子都在嘲笑她的小帽子。
trad: 當這個女孩走進房間時, 每個孩子都在嘲笑她的小帽子。

eng: He asked me two questions.
Answer my questions.
I like mathematics.
I am sick.
I was surprised at John's death.
Suddenly, my feet stopped.
May I come in?
He's a good person.
She looks unhappy.
We saw the gleam of a distant lighthouse.
simp: 我们看到了远方灯塔的微光。
trad: 我們看到了遠方燈塔的微光。

eng: This is a pencil.
We defeated the enemy.
I had some trouble in finding his house.
Nothing happened.
This is the police. Would you mind coming down to the station? "W-why?" "You can't think it's not a crime to go shooting guns off in the middle of town?!"
simp: 我是警察。你可以到警察局来吗? "为-为什麽?" "你不能认为在市中心开枪射击不是犯罪行为?!"
trad: 我是警察。你可以到警察局來嗎? "為-為什麼?" "你不能認為在市中心開槍射擊不是犯罪行為?!"

eng: Get rid of it, of course! answered the farmer.
simp: 摆脱它, 当然! 这个农夫回答。
trad: 擺脫它, 當然! 這個農夫回答。

eng: Fire!, he cried.
That is, she is a poor dancer.
simp: 那是, 她是个贫穷的舞者。
trad: 那是, 她是個貧窮的舞者。

eng: The difference is this: he works harder than you.
simp: 不同之处在于: 他比你更努力工作。
trad: 不同之處在於: 他比你更努力工作。

eng: He came home late last night.
They are leaving in three days, that is to say June 10th.
simp: 他们将在三天后离开, 那也就是说在六月十日。
trad: 他們將在三天後離開, 那也就是說在六月十日。

eng: He came home late last night.
He would like to take part in the competition.
We are in the era of atomic energy.
Six pence per second, Bob reminds her.
simp: 每秒六便士 鲍勃提醒她。
trad: 每秒六便士 鮑勃提醒她。

eng: They can think and speak.
simp: 他们有思考和说话的能力。
trad: 他們有思考和說話的能力。

eng: Father suggested to go to the movies this afternoon.
simp: 爸爸建议今天下午去看电影。
trad: 爸爸建議今天下午去看電影。

eng: Every time it rains, the roof leaks.
The bell rings at noon.
All my homework is done.
simp: 我做完了所有的回家作业。
trad: 我做完了所有的回家作業。

eng: When will they arrive?
She folded her baby in her arms.
simp: 她把她的宝宝抱在怀裡。
trad: 她把她的寶寶抱在懷裡。

eng: I am quite all right now.
You'll never achieve anything if you don't study harder.
simp: 如果你不更加努力地学习, 你将永远不会有所成就。
trad: 如果你不更加努力地學習, 你將永遠不會有所成就。

eng: Everybody talks about the weather, but nobody does anything about it.
simp: 每个人都在谈论天气, 但是没有人为它做任何事情。
trad: 每個人都在談論天氣, 但是沒有人為它做任何事情。

eng: That had not occurred to him before.
simp: 他从来没有想过那样的事。
trad: 他從來沒有想過那樣的事。

eng: Seeing that, he stood up.
simp: 看见那样, 他站了起来。
trad: 看見那樣, 他站了起來。

eng: She went there yesterday.
Mt. Fuji as seen from Suruga Bay is beautiful.
simp: 从骏河湾看, 富士山很美丽。
trad: 從駿河灣看, 富士山很美麗。

eng: I was greatly moved by her kindness.
simp: 我深深地被她的仁慈所感动。
trad: 我深深地被她的仁慈所感動。

eng: This is a collect call from Mr Nakamura in Osaka. Will you accept the charge?
simp: 这是来自大坂中村先生的付费电话。你愿意付费吗?
trad: 這是來自大阪中村先生的付費電話。你願意付費嗎?

eng: We are to meet him at seven this evening.
simp: 我们今天晚上七点跟他见面。
trad: 我們今天晚上七點跟他見面。

eng: That documentary about the environmental crisis was a real eye-opener.
simp: 这部有关环境危机的纪录片真是令人大开眼界。
trad: 這部有關環境危機的紀錄片真是令人大開眼界。

eng: Christopher Columbus wasn't an explorer because he loved the sea. He was an explorer because he hated Spanish jails.
simp: 哥伦布不是一位探险家, 因为他热爱大海。他是一位探险家, 因为他讨厌西班牙监狱。
trad: 哥倫布不是一位探險家, 因為他熱愛大海。他是一位探險家, 因為他討厭西班牙監獄。

eng: I met Fred on the street.
My memory failed me. I just could not remember his name.
simp: 我的记性不好。我简直不记得他的名字了。
trad: 我的記性不好。我簡直不記得他的名字了。

eng: When will you be free?
Who is the Administrative Assistant?
Freedom of speech is now taken as a matter of course.
simp: 现在言论自由被当作是理所当然的事。
trad: 現在言論自由被當作是理所當然的事。

eng: I want beef, too.
With all her merits she was not proud.
simp: 她不自豪她所有的优点。
trad: 她不自豪她所有的優點。

eng: That requires careful consideration.
I am looking for an assistant.
These are people.
They had their houses destroyed by a strong earthquake.
simp: 他们的房屋被强烈地震摧毁了。
trad: 他們的房屋被強烈地震摧毀了。

eng: His death was broadcast all over the world.
simp: 他去世的消息在世界各地播出。
trad: 他去世的消息在世界各地播出。

eng: They showed me a lot of beautiful photos.
simp: 他们给我看了很多漂亮的照片。
trad: 他們給我看了很多漂亮的照片。

eng: There is an old castle at the foot of the mountain.
simp: 山脚下有一座古老的城堡。
trad: 山腳下有一座古老的城堡。

eng: I have a metal table.
Karen bought a lot of things at the flea market.
simp: 凯伦在跳蚤市场买了很多东西。
trad: 凱倫在跳蚤市場買了很多東西。

eng: He is rotten to the core.
They sued the government for damages.
simp: 他们状告政府赔偿损失。
trad: 他們狀告政府賠償損失。

eng: Mass production reduced the price of many goods.
simp: 大量生产降低许多商品的价格。
trad: 大量生產降低許多商品的價格。

eng: My plan is to buy a car.
You're barking up the wrong tree.
He's suffering from acute pain in his life.
simp: 他一生为急性疼痛所苦。
trad: 他一生為急性疼痛所苦。

eng: He-heh... there's a tale behind that, for that place.
simp: 嘿-嘿... 那个地方的背后有一个故事。
trad: 嘿-嘿... 那個地方的背後有一個故事。

eng: Life today is fast-moving and complex.
simp: 今日的生活是迅息万变和複杂的。
trad: 今日的生活是迅息萬變和複雜的。

eng: I was left out in the cold by everyone.
Do you really wish that? asked the little white rabbit.
simp: 你真的想那样吗? 小白兔问。
trad: 你真的想那樣嗎? 小白兔問。

eng: I excited her.
It exploded with a loud noise.
Where do you want to go?
I like spring the best of the seasons.
simp: 春天是我最喜欢的季节。
trad: 春天是我最喜歡的季節。

eng: I stood waiting for a bus.
Down fell the house a week later.
Tom is leaving Kobe tomorrow morning.
simp: 汤姆明天早上离开神户。
trad: 湯姆明天早上離開神戶。

eng: They went in opposite directions.
Let's try and swim against the current.
His advice counted for little.
The train is running fast.
With your approval, I would like to offer him the job.
simp: 如果您同意, 我想给他这份工作。
trad: 如果您同意, 我想給他這份工作。

eng: She came home very late.
I finished writing the letter by noon.
simp: 我中午前写完这封信了。
trad: 我中午前寫完這封信了。

eng: I'd like to live in the suburbs of Kobe.
simp: 我喜欢住在科比的郊区。
trad: 我喜歡住在科比的郊區。

eng: We promised to stand by him in case of trouble.
simp: 我们承诺万一他有麻烦的时候支持他。
trad: 我們承諾萬一他有麻煩的時候支持他。

eng: We study according to the schedule.
simp: 我们按照预定计划研读。
trad: 我們按照預定計劃研讀。

eng: You have every reason to say so.
simp: 你有很好的理由这样说。
trad: 你有很好的理由這樣說。

eng: Do you enjoy plays, films, and such?
simp: 你喜欢戏剧, 电影等等吗?
trad: 你喜歡戲劇, 電影等等嗎?

eng: I think that you do know about that.
My eyes are watering.
You will be able to see him tomorrow.
Ask your dad to help you.
This room is air-conditioned.
Do you have anything for a cold?
simp: 你有任何治感冒的东西吗?
trad: 你有任何治感冒的東西嗎?

eng: The man is loading the moving truck on his own.
simp: 这个男人独自把东西搬上搬家卡车上。
trad: 這個男人獨自把東西搬上搬家卡車上。

eng: My camera doesn't need to be fixed.
simp: 我的照相机不需要修理。
trad: 我的照相機不需要修理。

eng: She pretended not to hear him yesterday.
simp: 昨天她装作没有听见他。
trad: 昨天她裝作沒有聽見他。

eng: Opinion is divided on this point.
I had a lot to say in relation to that affair.
simp: 关于那件事我有很多话要说。
trad: 關於那件事我有很多話要說。

eng: My land abuts on the river.
I don't know what to do with that guy. No matter how mad I get at him he just takes it in stride and pays no attention.
simp: 我不知道对那个傢伙该怎麽办。不论我对他生多大的气, 他就是蛮不在乎而且置之不理。
trad: 我不知道對那個傢夥該怎麼辦。不論我對他生多大的氣, 他就是蠻不在乎而且置之不理。

eng: Money takes a long time to earn, but you can spend it in no time.
simp: 钱要花很长的时间来赚, 但你可以一下子就花掉它了。
trad: 錢要花很長的時間來賺, 但你可以一下子就花掉它了。

eng: He has not only learning but experience.
simp: 他不仅有学识还有经验。
trad: 他不僅有學識還有經驗。

eng: I do not remember seeing the letter, but perhaps I read it.
simp: 我不记得我看过这封信, 但或许我读过它。
trad: 我不記得我看過這封信, 但或許我讀過它。

eng: What did you go to Kyoto for?
For a moment I forgot what her name was.
simp: 一下子之间我忘了她的名字了。
trad: 一下子之間我忘了她的名字了。

eng: My father's hobby is fishing.
They killed time playing cards.
He came back last August.
This is beyond the scope of my imagination.
simp: 这超出了我的想像范围。
trad: 這超出了我的想像範圍。

eng: Let me think for a while.
The prisoner was brought before a judge.
simp: 这个囚犯被带到法官面前。
trad: 這個囚犯被帶到法官面前。

eng: Let me relieve you of your suitcase.
I think he's happy.
Call up is a phrase that means to telephone.
simp: call up 是一个片语, 它的意思是打电话。
trad: call up 是一個片語, 它的意思是打電話。

eng: Not knowing what to say, he remained silent.
simp: 因为不知道该说什麽, 他保持沉默。
trad: 因為不知道該說什麼, 他保持沈默。

eng: When I was in Salem, I would often play tennis with John.
simp: 当我在塞勒姆的时候, 我常常和约翰打网球。
trad: 當我在塞勒姆的時候, 我常常和約翰打網球。

eng: He would not agree to our proposal.
I had hardly left home when it began to rain heavily.
simp: 当雨开始下得很大的时候, 我几乎不能出门了。
trad: 當雨開始下得很大的時候, 我幾乎不能出門了。

eng: I like the old car more than the new.
The rumor was without foundation.
Not worth the remembered value.
Mary placed her baby in a car seat for the flight.
simp: 航程中玛丽把她的宝宝放在婴儿汽车座椅上。
trad: 航程中瑪麗把她的寶寶放在嬰兒汽車座椅上。

eng: I think you're quite right.
She divorced her husband.
Don't keep your eyes on the ground; look at me.
simp: 你的眼睛不要看着地上
trad: 你的眼睛不要看著地上

eng: The house stands on the hill.
There's around 6 billion people in the world.
She can wait till the cows come home but he'll never come back.
simp: 她可以无止尽的等待, 但是他将永远不会回来。
trad: 她可以無止盡的等待, 但是他將永遠不會回來。

eng: We have more customers than we can count.
simp: 我们的顾客比我们可以计数的更多。
trad: 我們的顧客比我們可以計數的更多。

eng: The butler announced Mr. and Mrs. Smith.
simp: 男管家宣佈史密斯先生和夫人驾到。
trad: 男管家宣佈史密斯先生和夫人駕到。

eng: You must do all you can lest you should regret later.
simp: 你必须尽一切可能尽力而为, 免得你以后后悔。
trad: 你必須盡一切可能盡力而為, 免得你以後後悔。

eng: The rumor turned out false.
A great Empire, like a great Cake, is most easily diminished at the Edges.
simp: 一个伟大的帝国, 就像是一个大蛋糕, 最容易消失的地方就在边缘。
trad: 一個偉大的帝國, 就像是一個大蛋糕, 最容易消失的地方就在邊緣。

eng: I took it for granted that he would keep his word.
simp: 我理所当然地认为他会履行诺言。
trad: 我理所當然地認為他會履行諾言。

eng: Japan is very subject to earthquakes.
simp: 日本非常容易遭受到地震。
trad: 日本非常容易遭受到地震。

eng: He was tense with his new business.
simp: 他对他的新业务感到紧张。
trad: 他對他的新業務感到緊張。

eng: We started a campaign against smoking.
simp: 我们开始了一个反对吸烟运动。
trad: 我們開始了一個反對吸煙運動。

eng: She showed me her album.
Don't wake up the sleeping child.
simp: 不要吵醒熟睡中的孩子。
trad: 不要吵醒熟睡中的孩子。

eng: At the meeting he monopolized the discussion and completely disrupted the proceeding.
simp: 在这次会议上, 他垄断了讨论并彻底打乱了议程。
trad: 在這次會議上, 他壟斷了討論並徹底打亂了議程。

eng: This is a dog resembling a horse.
He has a habit of looking down on coloured people.
simp: 他有瞧不起有色人种的习惯。
trad: 他有瞧不起有色人種的習慣。

eng: Once across the river, you are safe.
simp: 一旦过了河, 你就安全了。
trad: 一旦過了河, 你就安全了。

eng: Who are you waiting for?
According to what she said, he's culpable.
simp: 根据她所说的, 他是有罪的。
trad: 根據她所說的, 他是有罪的。

eng: My father became old.
Our neighbour bought himself a charming horse.
simp: 我们的邻居买给他自己一匹迷人的马。
trad: 我們的鄰居買給他自己一匹迷人的馬。

eng: Confirm the order.
His father passed away last year.
What's your name?
Stop joking around.
He might not have eaten for days.
simp: 他可能已经好几天没吃东西了。
trad: 他可能已經好幾天沒吃東西了。

eng: It must be a very expensive restaurant!
simp: 它一定是一家很贵的餐厅。
trad: 它一定是一家很貴的餐廳。

eng: It might be a wedding.
The child who ate almost all this cake must be very fat.
simp: 这个几乎吃掉了一整个蛋糕的孩子一定很胖。
trad: 這個幾乎吃掉了一整個蛋糕的孩子一定很胖。

eng: It must be a birthday cake!
The sentences "Let's eat grandpa." and "Let's eat, grandpa." are only one proof that punctuation can change a lot.
simp: 我们吃爷爷吧。 和"我们吃了吧, 爷爷。" 这两个句子可以证明标点符号能让句子有很大的不同。
trad: 我們吃爺爺吧。 和"我們吃了吧, 爺爺。" 這兩個句子可以證明標點符號能讓句子有很大的不同。

eng: That makes sense.
I hugged him tightly and cried.
I don't regret it.
The herb used in that pasta sauce might be parsley.
simp: 用于那个义大利酱的香草可能是荷兰芹。
trad: 用於那個義大利醬的香草可能是荷蘭芹。

eng: Tonight in the night sky, the stars are shining very brightly.
simp: 今晚的夜空星光非常明亮。
trad: 今晚的夜空星光非常明亮。

eng: 'Story'? the woman asked. "What do you mean?"
simp: 「故事？」妇女问道。「您是什么意思？」
trad: 「故事？」婦女問道。「您是什麼意思？」

eng: She wouldn't even piss on me if I were on fire.
simp: 如果我着火了, 她甚至不会尿在我身上。
trad: 如果我著火了, 她甚至不會尿在我身上。

eng: She wouldn't even piss on me if I were on fire.
simp: 如果我有麻烦了, 她甚至不会理我。
trad: 如果我有麻煩了, 她甚至不會理我。

eng: Daddy must be able to cook at least one egg!
simp: 当爸爸的必须至少会煮蛋。
trad: 當爸爸的必須至少會煮蛋。

eng: I wanted to phone you, but I thought you wouldn't get it so I didn't phone you in the end.
simp: 我想打电话给你, 但我以为你不会接电话, 所以到最后我也没打电话你。
trad: 我想打電話給你, 但我以為你不會接電話, 所以到最後我也沒打電話你。

eng: Heroes always arrive late.
This might not be a genuine diamond.
When the landlord's away, the tenants will play.
simp: 当房东不在, 房客就会大玩特玩。
trad: 當房東不在, 房客就會大玩特玩。

eng: When the landlord's away, the tenants will play.
simp: 山中无老虎, 猴子称大王。
trad: 山中無老虎, 猴子稱大王。

eng: How far is it from here to Ueno?
He is able to speak five languages.
You will fail.
The moon is not a good place to live on.
simp: 月球不是一个适合居住的地方。
trad: 月球不是一個適合居住的地方。

eng: In common with many people he likes holidays.
simp: 跟很多人一样, 他喜欢假期。
trad: 跟很多人一樣, 他喜歡假期。

eng: Does he have any brothers?
He is familiar with Japanese culture.
We went out and never returned.
simp: 我们出去后, 再也没有回来。
trad: 我們出去後, 再也沒有回來。

eng: This TV was made ten years ago and there are no parts available, so it is impossible to repair it.
simp: 这台电视机是十年前製造的, 现在已经没有零件可换, 所以要修理它是不可能的事了。
trad: 這臺電視機是十年前製造的, 現在已經沒有零件可換, 所以要修理它是不可能的事了。

eng: They say she and her husband can't agree on anything.
simp: 他们说她和她的丈夫不可能对任何事达成协议。
trad: 他們說她和她的丈夫不可能對任何事達成協議。

eng: She will be glad if you go to see her in person.
simp: 如果你单独去看她, 她会很高兴的。
trad: 如果你單獨去看她, 她會很高興的。

eng: I don't want to live alone.
He was appointed ambassador to Britain.
simp: 他被任命为驻英国大使。
trad: 他被任命為駐英國大使。

eng: Japanese companies have built up a reputation for quality.
simp: 日本公司已经建立了品质的信誉。
trad: 日本公司已經建立了品質的信譽。

eng: Shoppers crowded the streets.
I want to play the guitar.
It's about time you got the tea ready.
simp: 是你准备好茶的时候了。
trad: 是你準備好茶的時候了。

eng: You used to be able to see the church from here.
simp: 你以前可以从这裡看到教堂。
trad: 你以前可以從這裡看到教堂。

eng: Damn! Swiss trains have everything!
simp: 靠！瑞士的火车什么都有！
trad: 靠！瑞士的火車什麼都有！

eng: I was unable to leave home last Saturday, with my mother being ill.
simp: 上周六，因为我母亲病了，我无法离开家。
trad: 上周六，因為我母親病了，我無法離開家。

eng: I will notify you of the arrival of the goods.
simp: 货物运到，我会通知你们的。
trad: 貨物運到，我會通知你們的。

eng: Do you have something to say?
Do you have something to say?
He went to London, where he stayed for a week.
simp: 他去了伦敦，并在那儿待了一周。
trad: 他去了倫敦，並在那兒待了一周。

eng: Japan is not as big as Canada.
simp: 日本不像加拿大那么大。
trad: 日本不像加拿大那麼大。

eng: He is the father of three children.
I know her address.
A whale is a mammal.
Every time I read the Bible, I am deeply moved.
simp: 每次我读圣经都会被深深地感动。
trad: 每次我讀聖經都會被深深地感動。

eng: I can't put up with him.
Take care not to catch a cold.
She thought that I was a doctor.
An ambassador is an honest man sent to lie abroad for the good of his country.
simp: 大使是为了本国的利益被派去外国撒谎的正直的人。
trad: 大使是為了本國的利益被派去外國撒謊的正直的人。

eng: Long long ago, there lived a pretty girl.
simp: 很久很久以前住着一个漂亮的小女孩。
trad: 很久很久以前住著一個漂亮的小女孩。

eng: Was his story true?
Was her story true?
I think this medicine will do you good.
simp: 我想这药会对您有好处的。
trad: 我想這藥會對您有好處的。

eng: Didn't you lock up your car?
simp: 你没有把你的车上锁吗？
trad: 你沒有把你的車上鎖嗎？

eng: Write your surname on the fourth line.
Please tell me your address.
You'll succeed if you try.
simp: 如果你尝试的话，你会成功的。
trad: 如果你嘗試的話，你會成功的。

eng: This is a book about stars.
simp: 这是一本关于星星的书。
trad: 這是一本關於星星的書。

eng: Spring is the best season to visit Kyoto.
simp: 春天是访问京都最好的季节。
trad: 春天是訪問京都最好的季節。

eng: One dollar is equivalent to 110 yen.
My mother was up late last night.
simp: 我母亲昨天很晚还醒着。
trad: 我母親昨天很晚還醒著。

eng: The forest is teeming with monkeys.
I would like to have a look at your collection of stamps.
simp: 我想看看您的邮票收藏。
trad: 我想看看您的郵票收藏。

eng: They come from the south of France.
simp: 他们是从法国南部来的。
trad: 他們是從法國南部來的。

eng: See you tonight! See you soon!
Singing is her strong point.
Cheese is made from milk.
It is less cold today than it was yesterday.
He weighs a lot more than before.
He will have to go to the station.
They adopted the little girl.
simp: 他们收养了那个小女孩。
trad: 他們收養了那個小女孩。

eng: You look very pale.
You are not a doctor.
His name is not on the list.
The exact time is three now.
I'm afraid you'll have to go in person.
The car is ready.
I don't go in for that sort of thing.
Kyoto is worth visiting.
This is the town where he was born.
I gave her a doll in return.
simp: 作为回报，我给了她一个娃娃。
trad: 作為回報，我給了她一個娃娃。

eng: This ticket will admit two persons free.
simp: 这票能让两个人免费入场。
trad: 這票能讓兩個人免費入場。

eng: Keep children away from the pond.
The man wore a mask of a tiger.
simp: 男人戴了一个老虎面具。
trad: 男人戴了一個老虎面具。

eng: The sea is very wide.
Europeans like to drink wine.
I don't know who he is.
When was this temple built?
It's a nice day, isn't it?
Keep an eye on the child for me for a moment.
My father will retire at the age of sixty.
simp: 我父亲六十岁就要退休了。
trad: 我父親六十歲就要退休了。

eng: She asked me if anything was the matter.
simp: 她问我是不是发生了什么事。
trad: 她問我是不是發生了什麼事。

eng: I'd like to attend the party.
They are jealous of our success.
You must keep quiet for a few days.
Your cake is delicious.
Your cake is delicious.
The room key, please.
It is not the means which matters, it is the end.
simp: 方法并不重要，结果才重要。
trad: 方法並不重要，結果才重要。

eng: All at once, he spoke out.
Is there anything you can do?
simp: 有什么事是你能做的吗？
trad: 有什麼事是你能做的嗎？

eng: May I try it on?
She speaks a little Arabic.
Breakfast is ready.
I have no time.
We will visit our teacher next week.
simp: 下周我们要去看望我们的老师。
trad: 下周我們要去看望我們的老師。

eng: A policeman was watching it, with his arms crossed.
I would like to see Mr Terry Tate.
She kept me waiting for 30 minutes.
She kept me waiting for 30 minutes.
He was accused of murder.
You have only to push the button.
simp: 您只要按下按钮就行了。
trad: 您只要按下按鈕就行了。

eng: You can call me anytime you like.
simp: 你喜欢什么时候打给我就什么时候打。
trad: 你喜歡什麼時候打給我就什麼時候打。

eng: It was nice meeting you here.
simp: 在这里见到您真是太好了。
trad: 在這裏見到您真是太好了。

eng: I know how old you are.
I got her to wash dishes.
He has not been to France.
Everybody loves his country.
simp: 每个人都爱自己的国家。
trad: 每個人都愛自己的國家。

eng: He translated Homer from the Greek into English.
simp: 他把荷马的史记从希腊语翻译成了英语。
trad: 他把荷馬的史記從希臘語翻譯成了英語。

eng: Ken was reading when I came home.
simp: 我回到家的时候，Ken正在读书。
trad: 我回到家的時候，Ken正在讀書。

eng: This tradition originates from China.
simp: 这个传统在中国诞生了。
trad: 這個傳統在中國誕生了。

eng: Marriage isn't really something that young people are interested in.
simp: 结婚不是什么使年轻人感兴趣的东西。
trad: 結婚不是什麼使年輕人感興趣的東西。

eng: In fact, he too loved her.
Please come as soon as possible.
He retired at the age of 65.
My father is in good health.
The girl doesn't like to play soccer.
simp: 那个女孩不喜欢踢足球。
trad: 那個女孩不喜歡踢足球。

eng: Don't worry, everything will be OK.
simp: 不要担心，一切都会好的。
trad: 不要擔心，一切都會好的。

eng: The committee consists of four members.
simp: 委员会由四个成员组成。
trad: 委員會由四個成員組成。

eng: I feel fine.
How many friends do you have?
How old is that painting?
I can't believe he had the balls to ask the boss for a raise.
simp: 我无法相信他有种向老板要求加工资。
trad: 我無法相信他有種向老板要求加工資。

eng: She asked him for help.
I went fishing last Monday.
As soon as she wakes up, we'll turn on the music.
I want you to stay here until I get back.
simp: 我想你待在这里直到我回来。
trad: 我想你待在這裏直到我回來。

eng: Admission is free for children.
People who want to share their religious views with you almost never want you to share yours with them.
simp: 想要跟你分享他们宗教信仰的人几乎从不愿你跟他们分享你的。
trad: 想要跟你分享他們宗教信仰的人幾乎從不願你跟他們分享你的。

eng: I am fed up with his behaviour.
I wash my hands before eating lunch.
David Beckham is English.
There are a lot of eggs in the box.
There are many famous historic buildings in Kyoto.
simp: 京都有很多有名的古建筑。
trad: 京都有很多有名的古建築。

eng: I spent the whole day in reading the novel.
simp: 我一整天都在看这本小说。
trad: 我一整天都在看這本小說。

eng: Could you lend me your bicycle for a couple of days?
simp: 你能把你的自行车借我两天吗？
trad: 你能把你的自行車借我兩天嗎？

eng: I can't go with you because I'm very busy.
simp: 我不能和你们一起去，因为我很忙。
trad: 我不能和你們一起去，因為我很忙。

eng: I'm sorry I wasn't able to see you when you came by today.
simp: 我很抱歉今天您来的时候没能见您。
trad: 我很抱歉今天您來的時候沒能見您。

eng: He kept his promise and helped his brothers.
simp: 他履行了他的承诺，并且帮助了他的兄弟。
trad: 他履行了他的承諾，並且幫助了他的兄弟。

eng: That dress looks good on you.
I listen to the radio after dinner.
My dad died before I was born.
simp: 我出生前，我父亲就死了。
trad: 我出生前，我父親就死了。

eng: I've never heard of this actor.
simp: 我从没听说过这个演员。
trad: 我從沒聽說過這個演員。

eng: Do you have a table in the patio?
Your father is Japanese.
Did you just get to know him?
Where shall I wait for you?
In comparison with Tokyo, London is small.
Whom should I inform?
Wait here for a while.
You must gather further information.
simp: 你们应该收集进一步的信息。
trad: 你們應該收集進一步的信息。

eng: This apple is bad.
There is insufficient light to take pictures.
I like taking walks.
The police assembled a lot of evidence against him.
simp: 警察收集了很多对他不利的证据。
trad: 警察收集了很多對他不利的證據。

eng: Many boys and girls were present.
simp: 许多男生和女生都出席了。
trad: 許多男生和女生都出席了。

eng: He is married to an American lady.
simp: 他和一个美国女人结婚了。
trad: 他和一個美國女人結婚了。

eng: This smell might come from the oven!
simp: 这味道可能是微波炉传出来的!
trad: 這味道可能是微波爐傳出來的!

eng: Do you have an e-mail address?
simp: 你有没有电子邮件地址？
trad: 你有沒有電子郵件地址？

eng: Do you have an e-mail address?
Is the system linear?
I'm tired of eating fast food.
We have the same problem.
Where is the vodka?
A drunk driver was responsible for the car accident.
simp: 喝醉的驾驶员对车祸有责任。
trad: 喝醉的駕駛員對車禍有責任。

eng: Don't go for a walk naked!
simp: 那就不要光着身子散步!
trad: 那就不要光著身子散步!

eng: He left the office in great haste.
simp: 他急急忙忙地离开了办公室。
trad: 他急急忙忙地離開了辦公室。

eng: I think it's better for us to adopt his plan.
simp: 我认为采用他的计划对我们比较好。
trad: 我認為采用他的計劃對我們比較好。

eng: The bus will take you to the center of the city.
simp: 巴士会把你们带到市中心。
trad: 巴士會把你們帶到市中心。

eng: Ken put his shirt on inside out.
You should apologize for your rudeness.
It is easy to talk.
He has been studying for two hours.
Please come again in three days time.
Answer me this.
I've never been to New York, and my sister hasn't, either.
simp: 我从没去过纽约，我妹妹也没有。
trad: 我從沒去過紐約，我妹妹也沒有。

eng: Where do I pay for the gas?
We will begin the party when he comes.
simp: 他来了，我们就开始派对。
trad: 他來了，我們就開始派對。

eng: I'm the king of the world!
He endeavored to win the contest.
I like children. That's why I became a teacher.
simp: 我喜欢孩子。这就是为什么我成为了教师。
trad: 我喜歡孩子。這就是為什麼我成為了教師。

eng: This is what I can do for you.
Let's begin with this problem.
'Radioactivity' is a chemistry term.
I have two brothers and three sisters.
simp: 我有两个兄弟和三个姐妹。
trad: 我有兩個兄弟和三個姐妹。

eng: She cannot write or read.
simp: 她不能写字也不能看书。
trad: 她不能寫字也不能看書。

eng: She looked well when I last saw her.
simp: 上次我见到她的时候，她看上去挺好的。
trad: 上次我見到她的時候，她看上去挺好的。

eng: You must go outside if you want to smoke.
simp: 如果您想抽烟的话，您必须出去。
trad: 如果您想抽煙的話，您必須出去。

eng: You talk too much, he said.
I have a lot of problems at the moment.
She decorated her room with roses.
simp: 她用玫瑰花装饰了她的房间。
trad: 她用玫瑰花裝飾了她的房間。

eng: I get dizzy spells when I stand up.
simp: 我一站起来就觉得头晕。
trad: 我一站起來就覺得頭暈。

eng: I am far from satisfied with the result.
simp: 距离令我满意的结果还很远。
trad: 距離令我滿意的結果還很遠。

eng: I foolishly imagined that he was going to help me.
simp: 我傻乎乎地以为他会帮助我。
trad: 我傻乎乎地以為他會幫助我。

eng: I gave my mother carnations on Mother's Day.
simp: 母亲日我送给我的妈妈一束康乃馨。
trad: 母親日我送給我的媽媽一束康乃馨。

eng: Have you ever been to Mexico?
I was given this watch by my uncle.
simp: 这只手表是叔叔送给我的。
trad: 這只手表是叔叔送給我的。

eng: I don't like your going there by yourself.
simp: 我不要你一个人去那个地方。
trad: 我不要你一個人去那個地方。

eng: Ai finds it difficult to make friends with Ken.
simp: 艾发现和开恩交朋友很难。
trad: 艾發現和開恩交朋友很難。

eng: It might have been Miss Satoh who sent these flowers.
simp: 送这束花的人可能是佐藤小姐。
trad: 送這束花的人可能是佐藤小姐。

eng: George is very enthusiastic about his new job.
simp: 乔治对自己的新工作充满热情。
trad: 喬治對自己的新工作充滿熱情。

eng: Jeff searched for three months before he found a job.
simp: 杰夫找了三个月以后才找到了一份工作。
trad: 傑夫找了三個月以後才找到了一份工作。

eng: This dog is a mongrel.
The house I bought is pretty far from downtown.
simp: 我买的房子离市中心比较远。
trad: 我買的房子離市中心比較遠。

eng: The house I'm living in isn't very large.
The bike parked over there is my brother's.
simp: 那边停着的那辆自行车是我哥哥的。
