trad: 那邊停著的那輛自行車是我哥哥的。

eng: He decided not to go to the party.
Please feel free to call me up.
simp: 请随时都可以打电话给我。
trad: 請隨時都可以打電話給我。

eng: I lie on the grass.
It is out of the question for you to go to New York this weekend.
simp: 这个週末去纽约对你来说是不可能的事。
trad: 這個週末去紐約對你來說是不可能的事。

eng: She lost no time in reading a best-selling novel.
simp: 她抓紧时间地阅读一本畅销小说。
trad: 她抓緊時間地閱讀一本暢銷小說。

eng: This bus will take you to the museum.
simp: 这辆公车会载你去博物馆。
trad: 這輛公車會載你去博物館。

eng: Let's take it easy.
She writes a very good hand.
simp: 她写了一手漂亮的好字。
trad: 她寫了一手漂亮的好字。

eng: Today no one can imagine a life without television.
simp: 今天没有人能想像一个没有电视的生活。
trad: 今天沒有人能想像一個沒有電視的生活。

eng: He wore a mask so that no one could recognize him.
simp: 他戴着面具以至于没有人认出他。
trad: 他戴著面具以至於沒有人認出他。

eng: He belongs to the camera club.
They kept on feeling their way.
Children are to be deceived with comfits and men with oaths.
simp: 孩子因糖果受骗, 大人因誓言上当。
trad: 孩子因糖果受騙, 大人因誓言上當。

eng: Our car is equipped with air conditioning.
You look very delighted.
If I had worked hard in my youth, I would be successful now.
simp: 如果我年轻的时候努力工作, 我现在就成功了。
trad: 如果我年輕的時候努力工作, 我現在就成功了。

eng: She went astray in the woods.
She was all eyes as he opened the jewelry box.
simp: 她非常注意地看着他打开了珠宝盒。
trad: 她非常註意地看著他打開了珠寶盒。

eng: He took it literally.
My scalp is very itchy.
It was sensible of you to follow her advice.
simp: 你听从她的忠告是明智的。
trad: 你聽從她的忠告是明智的。

eng: To make matters worse, it began snowing.
simp: 更糟糕的是开始下雪了。
trad: 更糟糕的是開始下雪了。

eng: He is sometimes absent from school.
He seems to have told a lie.
The dog is blind in one eye.
simp: 这隻狗的一隻眼睛瞎了。
trad: 這隻狗的一隻眼睛瞎了。

eng: She was prohibited from smoking.
I was at my wit's end when I heard the news.
simp: 当我听到这个消息时, 我束手无策。
trad: 當我聽到這個消息時, 我束手無策。

eng: I am tired; nevertheless, I must finish my homework.
simp: 我很累, 然而, 我必须完成我的回家作业。
trad: 我很累, 然而, 我必須完成我的回家作業。

eng: Why is it important to know about a company’s culture?
simp: 了解一家公司的文化为什么是重要的？
trad: 了解一家公司的文化為什麼是重要的？

eng: I am waiting for the store to open.
Brush your teeth, however sleepy you are.
simp: 无论你多麽想睡, 还是要刷牙。
trad: 無論你多麼想睡, 還是要刷牙。

eng: Businesses often have a list of 5-10 'mission statements' featured in their brochures, on their websites or hanging in their office detailing the values they hold as a form of communication to their employees, their clients and the public.
simp: 为了详述它们的价值观，公司常常在它们的册子里，在网站上或者在办公室里挂着有五到十个“目标宣言”的单子，作为一种对雇员、顾客和民众的交流。
trad: 為了詳述它們的價值觀，公司常常在它們的冊子裏，在網站上或者在辦公室裏掛著有五到十個“目標宣言”的單子，作為一種對雇員、顧客和民眾的交流。

eng: We bought a pound of tea.
There are some misprints, but all in all, it's a good book.
simp: 虽然有一些印刷错误, 但大致上说来, 这是一本好书。
trad: 雖然有一些印刷錯誤, 但大致上說來, 這是一本好書。

eng: Our country's climate is temperate.
If you are a potential employee then you should be aware of what the company stands for and how it treats its employees before attending an interview.
simp: 如果你有意应徵，应该在面试前明白公司的主张以及公司如何对待员工。
trad: 如果你有意應徵，應該在面試前明白公司的主張以及公司如何對待員工。

eng: He announced that he would come at once and investigate the matter.
simp: 他宣布他将立刻来调查此事。
trad: 他宣布他將立刻來調查此事。

eng: Mary is a very pretty girl.
simp: 玛丽是一个非常漂亮的姑娘。
trad: 瑪麗是一個非常漂亮的姑娘。

eng: If you need to use the services of a company, you may be interested to know what standards they work towards before choosing to work with them.
simp: 如果你需要使用一家公司的服务, 在选择与他们合作之前, 你可能有兴趣知道他们朝什麽样的标准努力。
trad: 如果你需要使用一家公司的服務, 在選擇與他們合作之前, 你可能有興趣知道他們朝什麼樣的標準努力。

eng: In this album all the sounds that you hear are really elaborate computer voices.
simp: 在这张专辑裡, 所有你听到的声音都是用电脑精密製作出的声音。
trad: 在這張專輯裡, 所有你聽到的聲音都是用電腦精密製作出的聲音。

eng: You may not agree with some of their major policies and this could affect your working relationship.
simp: 你也许不同意他们某些重大政策，这可能会影响你的工作关係。
trad: 你也許不同意他們某些重大政策，這可能會影響你的工作關係。

eng: I traded old newspapers for toilet paper.
Don't interfere with matters that do not concern you!
Is that your car?
When he writes, he always keeps a dictionary at hand.
simp: 当他写字时, 他总是随手拿着一本字典。
trad: 當他寫字時, 他總是隨手拿著一本字典。

eng: For some companies their treatment of their employees or clients at any given time could affect their share prices and so inevitably have a great influence on the company’s success or failure.
simp: 因为有些公司对待雇员和顾客的态度可以随时影响它们的股价，所以对公司的成功或失败不可避免地有巨大的影响。
trad: 因為有些公司對待雇員和顧客的態度可以隨時影響它們的股價，所以對公司的成功或失敗不可避免地有巨大的影響。

eng: After all they came to terms with each other.
simp: 最后他们互相达成了协议。
trad: 最後他們互相達成了協議。

eng: I can't help feeling sorry for him.
If you are not going to the concert, then neither am I.
simp: 如果你不去音乐会, 我也不去。
trad: 如果你不去音樂會, 我也不去。

eng: Something is stuck in the pipe.
When I was inside my mother's womb, I looked through my mother's navel at the house where I would be born and I thought: "No way I'm going there".
simp: 当我在我母亲的子宫裡, 我从我母亲的肚脐看到我将要出生的房子, 我心想: 我不要到那裡。"
trad: 當我在我母親的子宮裡, 我從我母親的肚臍看到我將要出生的房子, 我心想: 我不要到那裡。"

eng: If the pain continues you have to go to the doctor.
simp: 如果持续疼痛, 你必须去看医生。
trad: 如果持續疼痛, 你必須去看醫生。

eng: Science is still not capable of solving all of life's problems.
simp: 科学还无法解决所有生活上的问题。
trad: 科學還無法解決所有生活上的問題。

eng: To better understand what a company’s culture is you should consider the following points and see how the company deals with them.
simp: 为了更好地理解一家公司的文化，你应该考虑下面的论点，并看公司把它们怎么处理。
trad: 為了更好地理解一家公司的文化，你應該考慮下面的論點，並看公司把它們怎麼處理。

eng: Our team defeated our opponent 5-4.
She's my best friend.
World War I began in the year 1914.
simp: 第一次世界大战开始于1914年。
trad: 第一次世界大戰開始於1914年。

eng: I'm so tired.
It is not necessary for us to attend this lecture.
simp: 我们没有必要出席这个讲座。
trad: 我們沒有必要出席這個講座。

eng: Worrying doesn't take away tomorrow's concerns, but it does take away today's power.
simp: 烦恼带不走明天的忧虑, 但却拿走了今天的力量。
trad: 煩惱帶不走明天的憂慮, 但卻拿走了今天的力量。

eng: Many on-line companies need to have a new approach to business to survive.
simp: 许多网路公司为求生存而需要新颖的商业模式。
trad: 許多網路公司為求生存而需要新穎的商業模式。

eng: One of the major Internet search engines states that ‘Fast is better than slow’.
simp: 主要互联网的搜索引擎之一说：“快比慢好”。
trad: 主要互聯網的搜索引擎之一說：“快比慢好”。

eng: This shows they have listened to the needs of their clients.
simp: 这表明它们注意听了顾客的需要。
trad: 這表明它們註意聽了顧客的需要。

eng: They also have ‘You can be serious without a suit’ as one of their key beliefs.
simp: 它们主要的看法其中也有“没有西装革履也可以很正经”。
trad: 它們主要的看法其中也有“沒有西裝革履也可以很正經”。

eng: I think you went too far.

This implies a fun and relaxed working atmosphere where team achievement is highly valued, communication is extremely important and traditional 3-hour meetings have been replaced by informal chats in the queue for coffee.
simp: 这即表明的是工作气氛不但又好玩儿又放松，而且非常重视协力的成就和交流，并把传统三个小时的会议换成为排队等咖啡时非正的聊天。
trad: 這即表明的是工作氣氛不但又好玩兒又放松，而且非常重視協力的成就和交流，並把傳統三個小時的會議換成為排隊等咖啡時非正的聊天。

eng: That company hires people without regard to race, religion, or nationality.
simp: 这家公司不分种族、宗教或国籍雇用人。
trad: 這家公司不分種族、宗教或國籍雇用人。

eng: Don't give up!
They bound the thief to a tree.
simp: 他们把小偷绑在树上了。
trad: 他們把小偷綁在樹上了。

eng: You may write in any language you want. On Tatoeba, all languages are equal.
simp: 你可以用任何你想要用的语言写。在Tatoeba，所有语言都是平等的。
trad: 你可以用任何你想要用的語言寫。在Tatoeba，所有語言都是平等的。

eng: You may write in any language you want. On Tatoeba, all languages are equal.
simp: 您可以用任何您想要用的语言写。在Tatoeba，所有语言都是平等的。
trad: 您可以用任何您想要用的語言寫。在Tatoeba，所有語言都是平等的。

eng: Mr Smith is a good teacher.
simp: 史密斯先生是个好老师。
trad: 史密斯先生是個好老師。

eng: Unity, justice and freedom are the pledge of fortune.
simp: 团结、公正和自由是幸福的保证。
trad: 團結、公正和自由是幸福的保證。

eng: I only know him by name.
She finished her work an hour in advance.
simp: 她提前一小时完成了工作。
trad: 她提前一小時完成了工作。

eng: He responded kindly to the question.
Could you teach me how to play the piano?
He told me to do it, so I did it.
I was vaccinated against the flu.
Give me something to do.
This table is made out of wood.
This table is made of wood.
This is a wooden table.
He is often absent from school.
He shared his box of biscuits with all his friends.
simp: 他和他所有的朋友分享了他的那盒饼干。
trad: 他和他所有的朋友分享了他的那盒餅幹。

eng: I could not keep the tears from my eyes.
Will you explain the rule to me?
simp: 你能帮我说明一下规则吗？
trad: 你能幫我說明一下規則嗎？

eng: John has confidence in his ability.
simp: 约翰对自己的能力很有自信。
trad: 約翰對自己的能力很有自信。

eng: He went to the store.
He refuses to believe us.
May I pay with a credit card?
Tom helped me with the move.
Do you go often?
The rumor turned out true.
I'd like to go to France one day.
I bought a new television.
She laughed at the sight of his hat.
He was always as good as his word.
Your prophecy has come true.
They won't allow us to enter the garden.
simp: 他们不会允许我们进花园的。
trad: 他們不會允許我們進花園的。

eng: Translation is like a woman. If it is beautiful, it is not faithful. If it is faithful, it is most certainly not beautiful.
simp: 翻译就像一个女人。她漂亮就会不忠诚；她忠诚就肯定不会漂亮。
trad: 翻譯就像一個女人。她漂亮就會不忠誠；她忠誠就肯定不會漂亮。

eng: I think you went too far.
The radio is a bit loud.
Tomorrow there is a forecast of snow.
When he saw Jesus passing by, he said...
simp: 当他看见耶稣经过，他说...
trad: 當他看見耶穌經過，他說...

eng: What do you think of those Japanese writers?
simp: 你觉得那些日本作家怎么样？
trad: 你覺得那些日本作家怎麼樣？

eng: I don't know her, nor do I want to.
simp: 我不认识她，也不想认识。
trad: 我不認識她，也不想認識。

eng: Despite his riches, he's not contented.
simp: 尽管他很富有，他还是不满足。
trad: 盡管他很富有，他還是不滿足。

eng: I want to sleep with your wife.
How much do I owe you?
He's my neighbour.
He is proud that his father was a great scientist.
simp: 他很自豪他父亲是个伟大的科学家。
trad: 他很自豪他父親是個偉大的科學家。

eng: One fifth of the earth's surface is covered by permafrost.
simp: 地球表面的五分之一被冻土覆盖了。
trad: 地球表面的五分之一被凍土覆蓋了。

eng: Yes, as far as I know.
Who runs faster, Ken or Tony?
Please don't forget to put a stamp on the letter before mailing it.
simp: 请不要忘记寄信前要在上面贴邮票。
trad: 請不要忘記寄信前要在上面貼郵票。

eng: Do you think I'm joking?
simp: 你觉得我是在开玩笑吗？
trad: 你覺得我是在開玩笑嗎？

eng: The next train arriving at platform 2 will depart for Shibuya at 4:35pm.
simp: 下一班火车将在第二月台, 于下午四点三十五分前往涩谷。
trad: 下一班火車將在第二月臺, 於下午四點三十五分前往澀谷。

eng: He backed us up during that incident.
simp: 他在那个事件期间支持我们。
trad: 他在那個事件期間支持我們。

eng: If you would move over, there would be room for everyone.
simp: 如果您移过去一点, 每个人就可以有空间了。
trad: 如果您移過去一點, 每個人就可以有空間了。

eng: There is no use in making excuses.
I got tired with the work.
simp: 我对这份工作感到疲乏了。
trad: 我對這份工作感到疲乏了。

eng: Can't you get by on your salary?
simp: 靠你的收入你不能过活吗?
trad: 靠你的收入你不能過活嗎?

eng: Did Paula study for today's test?
simp: 宝拉为今天的考试唸书了吗?
trad: 寶拉為今天的考試唸書了嗎?

eng: Where did you buy the shoes?
Teaching ESL is usually a gig for losers and boozers.
simp: 教英语通常是失败者和酒鬼的工作。
trad: 教英語通常是失敗者和酒鬼的工作。

eng: The grass sprouts all over the garden.
It's wasteful to leave the land lying idle.
A fire broke out the day before yesterday.
Get off the lawn!
Rousseau was mad but influential; Hume was sane but had no followers.
simp: 卢梭是疯狂的, 但有影响力; 休谟是理智的, 但没有追随者。
trad: 盧梭是瘋狂的, 但有影響力; 休謨是理智的, 但沒有追隨者。

eng: He is apt to be late.
He used to be an imaginative boy.
simp: 他曾经是一个富有想像力的男孩。
trad: 他曾經是一個富有想像力的男孩。

eng: Can you arrange for a night tour bus?
simp: 你能安排一个晚上坐观光巴士吗?
trad: 你能安排一個晚上坐觀光巴士嗎?

eng: The beginning of the trouble was his careless remark.
simp: 麻烦的开头是他草率的评论。
trad: 麻煩的開頭是他草率的評論。

eng: This is the place where the battle of Hastings took place.
simp: 这裡是黑斯廷斯战役发生的地方。
trad: 這裡是黑斯廷斯戰役發生的地方。

eng: Ten to one it'll clear up in an hour or so.
simp: 天气八成在一个小时之内就会放晴。
trad: 天氣八成在一個小時之內就會放晴。

eng: Birds build nests of twigs.
I went into the navy.
Traffic is a major urban problem.
simp: 交通是都市的一个主要问题。
trad: 交通是都市的一個主要問題。

eng: Miyazaki is not what it used to be.
simp: 宫崎不是它往日的样子了。
trad: 宮崎不是它往日的樣子了。

eng: Do you speak Chinese well?
His life after retirement was unhappy.
simp: 他退休后的生活不快乐。
trad: 他退休後的生活不快樂。

eng: I've got married ten years ago.
They have the same habits.
I think she will divorce him.
I was caught in a shower and got drenched to the skin.
simp: 我遇上了阵雨被淋得全身湿透。
trad: 我遇上了陣雨被淋得全身濕透。

eng: He crossed the river in a small boat.
The jacket, which I wanted, costed three hundred dollars.
simp: 这件我想要的夹克花费三百美元。
trad: 這件我想要的夾克花費三百美元。

eng: Is this snake safe to touch?
How long will it stop there?
In crossing the street, you must watch out for cars.
simp: 过马路的时候, 你必须小心车辆。
trad: 過馬路的時候, 你必須小心車輛。

eng: He got wet from the waist to the knees.
simp: 他从腰部到膝盖都湿了。
trad: 他從腰部到膝蓋都濕了。

eng: He taught us that Columbus discovered America.
simp: 他教导我们说, 哥伦布发现了美洲。
trad: 他教導我們說, 哥倫布發現了美洲。

eng: Please show me your stamp album.
simp: 请让我看看你的集邮册。
trad: 請讓我看看你的集郵冊。

eng: Add a little milk.
Does she know your telephone number?
simp: 她知道您的电话号码吗?
trad: 她知道您的電話號碼嗎?

eng: Are you writing a letter?
Washington, D.C., is the capital of the United States of America.
Read as much as possible.
I believe he will triumph.
That's bullshit!
She ran very fast to catch up with the other members.
simp: 她跑得很快是为了赶上其他成员。
trad: 她跑得很快是為了趕上其他成員。

eng: This is Tony's book.
This book is Tony's.
This book belongs to Tony.
How can I get to the police station?
I had an accident at work.
The area of the factory is 1,000 square meters.
It won't take long to finish the job.
simp: 完成这个工作不会花太长时间。
trad: 完成這個工作不會花太長時間。

eng: The smell of roses filled the room.
simp: 玫瑰香水的味道充满了房间。
trad: 玫瑰香水的味道充滿了房間。

eng: I think the sentence would sound more natural like that.
simp: 我觉得像这样句子听起来更自然。
trad: 我覺得像這樣句子聽起來更自然。

eng: It is extremely hot and humid in Bali in December.
simp: 12月份巴厘岛极其炎热和潮湿。
trad: 12月份巴厘島極其炎熱和潮濕。

eng: You must pay in advance.
My dad's name is Fritz.
An hexagon has six sides.
It is more blessed to give than to receive.
simp: 赠与比接受更让人觉得幸福。
trad: 贈與比接受更讓人覺得幸福。

eng: He was the last but two to arrive.
Translating helps us to know our mother tongue better.
simp: 翻译帮助我们更好地了解自己的母语。
trad: 翻譯幫助我們更好地了解自己的母語。

eng: Where did you get your camera repaired?
They had a good command of French.
simp: 他们对法语有很好的掌握度。
trad: 他們對法語有很好的掌握度。

eng: She has a little bread.
I really hate his dirty jokes.
We closed the discussion.
There is not much traffic on this road.
You should tell the truth.
This sofa can seat three people easily.
simp: 这张沙发起码可以坐三个人。
trad: 這張沙發起碼可以坐三個人。

eng: Water is liquid. When it freezes, it becomes solid.
simp: 水是液体。冻起来就成了固体。
trad: 水是液體。凍起來就成了固體。

eng: They have mutual respect.
You'll be able to see the difference very easily.
simp: 您很容易就能看出区别。
trad: 您很容易就能看出區別。

eng: You'll be able to see the difference very easily.
simp: 你们很容易就能看出区别。
trad: 你們很容易就能看出區別。

eng: When I opened the door, I found him asleep.
simp: 当我打开门的时候，我发现他睡着了。
trad: 當我打開門的時候，我發現他睡著了。

eng: He prefers poetry to fiction.
simp: 比起小说，他更喜欢诗歌。
trad: 比起小說，他更喜歡詩歌。

eng: He is no fool.
I cannot help thinking that my son is still alive.
simp: 我不禁想我的儿子一直都在生。
trad: 我不禁想我的兒子一直都在生。

eng: Jane is not able to swim.
She was a genius in mathematics.
I don't recommend eating in that restaurant. The food is awful.
simp: 我不推荐在那家餐馆吃饭。食物糟糕透了。
trad: 我不推薦在那家餐館吃飯。食物糟糕透了。

eng: There's no mistake.
He is very good at poker.
Air is to us what water is to fish.
simp: 空气对人来说就是水对鱼的意义。
trad: 空氣對人來說就是水對魚的意義。

eng: I feel relieved.
Rub salt in the wound.
Japanese companies generally provide their employees with uniforms.
simp: 日本的公司通常都会为员工提供制服。
trad: 日本的公司通常都會為員工提供制服。

eng: Refugees poured in from all over the country.
He is our teacher of English.
I really need a drink now.
simp: 我现在真需要来杯喝的。
trad: 我現在真需要來杯喝的。

eng: He came in spite of the heavy snow.
simp: 虽然下着大雪，但他还是来了。
trad: 雖然下著大雪，但他還是來了。

eng: Your tooth must be extracted.
A dog was run over by a truck.
Has anybody here been to Hawaii?
simp: 这儿有人去过夏威夷吗？
trad: 這兒有人去過夏威夷嗎？

eng: Where can I buy tickets?
Spell your name, please.
I'll keep that book for myself.
simp: 我要把这本书留给自己。
trad: 我要把這本書留給自己。

eng: How much does the wooden chair cost?
That car is the most beautiful of the three.
simp: 那辆车是三辆之中最漂亮的。
trad: 那輛車是三輛之中最漂亮的。

eng: I may win if I have luck.
simp: 如果我运气够好的话，说不定会赢。
trad: 如果我運氣夠好的話，說不定會贏。

eng: His shirt was stained with sauce.
simp: 他的衬衫被酱汁弄脏了。
trad: 他的襯衫被醬汁弄臟了。

eng: She declared that she was not guilty.
The house stood out because of its unusual shape.
simp: 那房子因为其少有的形状被突显出来。
trad: 那房子因為其少有的形狀被突顯出來。

eng: The boy has been absent from school for eight days.
simp: 那个男孩已经有八天没上学了。
trad: 那個男孩已經有八天沒上學了。

eng: We were deeply moved by her story.
simp: 我们被她的故事深深的感动了。
trad: 我們被她的故事深深的感動了。

eng: I can't concentrate on my work because of the noise.
simp: 由于噪音，我无法集中精力工作了。
trad: 由於噪音，我無法集中精力工作了。

eng: Sometimes I have to read boring novels.
simp: 有时候，我不得不读一些无聊的小说。
trad: 有時候，我不得不讀一些無聊的小說。

eng: He is an aggressive person.
simp: 他是个咄咄逼人的的人。
trad: 他是個咄咄逼人的的人。

eng: I am thinking of closing my savings account.
simp: 我想关闭我的储蓄账户。
trad: 我想關閉我的儲蓄賬戶。

eng: I usually eat out.
I asked Bill what the weather had been like during his travel.
simp: 我问了比尔他旅行期间天气怎么样。
trad: 我問了比爾他旅行期間天氣怎麼樣。

eng: Ha - this work finished! Let's go to next stage!
simp: 这个工作完成了!我们进入下一步吧!
trad: 這個工作完成了!我們進入下一步吧!

eng: Be careful not to drive the wrong way on a one-way street.
simp: 小心不要在单行道逆向行驶。
trad: 小心不要在單行道逆向行駛。

eng: Click the picture to go to the next page!
Bringing up a baby is hard work.
simp: 养大一个宝宝是一项艰难的工作。
trad: 養大一個寶寶是一項艱難的工作。

eng: How often do you wash your car a month?
The barometer is falling. It is going to rain.
simp: 气压计下降了 - 要下雨了。
trad: 氣壓計下降了 - 要下雨了。

eng: Is there anyone in the room?
Someone is standing behind the wall.
My son is going to leave for France next week.
simp: 我儿子下周要去法国了。
trad: 我兒子下周要去法國了。

eng: The temperature has suddenly dropped.
In the city, the information is flooding.
Speaking English is useful.
My father is a doctor.
Give me the same, please.
Tell him where he should go.
I like dogs and my sister likes cats.
simp: 我喜欢狗，我妹妹喜欢猫。
trad: 我喜歡狗，我妹妹喜歡貓。

eng: The train for Birmingham leaves from platform 3.
simp: 去伯明翰的火车从3号站台出发。
trad: 去伯明翰的火車從3號站臺出發。

eng: Dad said he'd be promoted to section manager next year.
simp: 爸爸说他明年就要被升为部门主管了。
trad: 爸爸說他明年就要被升為部門主管了。

eng: She is going to wash the bike this afternoon.
I lost a school key when I was cleaning up after the school festival and I was then required to write an apology letter.
simp: 我在校庆后打扫的时候弄掉了一把学校的钥匙，我被迫写了一份检讨。
trad: 我在校慶後打掃的時候弄掉了一把學校的鑰匙，我被迫寫了一份檢討。

eng: Who is your teacher?
I don't want to be involved in that matter.
simp: 我不想被牵扯到这件事里。
trad: 我不想被牽扯到這件事裏。

eng: I heard the telephone ringing.
He lost his eyesight.
Mary can swim.
You should acknowledge your failure.
simp: 你应该承认自己的失败。
trad: 你應該承認自己的失敗。

eng: He zipped his bag shut.
Are we making a nonstop flight to the U.S.?
Her father is tall.
Her writing is very good.
You should learn from his example.
He pretends to be gay.
The trouble is that I can't remember where I parked the car.
simp: 问题就是我忘记把车停在哪里。
trad: 問題就是我忘記把車停在哪裏。

eng: You're one of them too, aren't you?!
Soldiers are used to danger.
simp: 士兵们对危险习以为常。
trad: 士兵們對危險習以為常。

eng: Where's your father?
Ellen does not speak English.
Pretty soon you will stop thinking of her.
How I wished I could drive a car!
Aoi dances.
I'm Tom Hunter.
His joke was great.
Do you know who painted this picture?
simp: 你知道这张画是谁画的吗？
trad: 你知道這張畫是誰畫的嗎？

eng: She didn't give me my money back.
His success is out of question.
simp: 他的成功是毫无疑问的。
trad: 他的成功是毫無疑問的。

eng: He applied himself to the study of music.
He went to Italy for the purpose of studying music.
simp: 他去义大利的目的是学习音乐。
trad: 他去義大利的目的是學習音樂。

eng: He has a remarkable aptitude for music.
He has gone to Italy to study music.
simp: 他已经去义大利学习音乐了。
trad: 他已經去義大利學習音樂了。

eng: He likes both music and sports.
He is playing music.
He was listening to music.
He wrote a letter, listening to music.
He went to Italy in order to study music.
simp: 为了研读音乐他去了义大利。
trad: 為了研讀音樂他去了義大利。

eng: He knows almost nothing about that animal.
simp: 他几乎对那个动物一无所知。
trad: 他幾乎對那個動物一無所知。

eng: Is this a river?
Going out in this rain is out of the question.
simp: 在雨中走出去是不可能的。
trad: 在雨中走出去是不可能的。

eng: Don't bother coming in this rain.
simp: 不用麻烦在这样的雨天来。
trad: 不用麻煩在這樣的雨天來。

eng: Thank you for coming all the way in this rain.
simp: 谢谢你大老远在这样的雨天来。
trad: 謝謝你大老遠在這樣的雨天來。

eng: This drink is on the house.
simp: 这种饮料是免费招待的。
trad: 這種飲料是免費招待的。

eng: You are always to knock before entering my room.
simp: 你进入我的房间之前都要敲门。
trad: 你進入我的房間之前都要敲門。

eng: Don't come into my room.
My apartment is on the fourth floor.
My room is just below.
My room is just above.
My room is very small.
My room is very untidy. I must put it in order.
simp: 我的房间很乱。我必须把它弄整齐。
trad: 我的房間很亂。我必須把它弄整齊。

eng: My room is three times as large as yours.
simp: 我的房间是你的三倍大。
trad: 我的房間是你的三倍大。

eng: My room is comfortable, if it is a little small.
simp: 我的房间很舒适, 即使它小了一点。
trad: 我的房間很舒適, 即使它小了一點。

eng: My room is an inviolable refuge.
simp: 我的房间是不可侵犯的避难所。
trad: 我的房間是不可侵犯的避難所。

eng: My room looks out on the street.
simp: 从我的房间望出去是街道。
trad: 從我的房間望出去是街道。

eng: My room faces the garden.
My room faces east.
As my room faces south, it is not so cold even in winter.
simp: 因为我的房间面向南边, 即使在冬天都不会那麽冷。
trad: 因為我的房間面向南邊, 即使在冬天都不會那麼冷。

eng: How long did they live in England?
My room faces south, which makes it sunny and very comfortable.
simp: 我的房间面向南边, 阳光充足非常舒适。
trad: 我的房間面向南邊, 陽光充足非常舒適。

eng: My room is upstairs on the left.
simp: 我的房间在楼上的左边。
trad: 我的房間在樓上的左邊。

eng: My room is twice as big as his.
simp: 我的房间是他的两倍大。
trad: 我的房間是他的兩倍大。

eng: I'll show you my room.
simp: 我会带你看看我的房间。
trad: 我會帶你看看我的房間。

eng: May I see the room, please?
simp: 请问我可以看看这个房间吗?
trad: 請問我可以看看這個房間嗎?

eng: I have all suits made to order.
simp: 我所有的西装都是订做的。
trad: 我所有的西裝都是訂做的。

eng: My clothes were dirty with oil.
Mine is not so good as yours.
Her only hobby is collecting stamps.
I often read books.
As she's a very practical person, she often fixes her friends' cars.
simp: 因为她是一个喜欢动手实践的人，她常常把朋友的汽车修好。
trad: 因為她是一個喜歡動手實踐的人，她常常把朋友的汽車修好。

eng: When my brother was young, I often used to take him to the park.
simp: 我弟弟小的时候，我常常陪他去公园。
trad: 我弟弟小的時候，我常常陪他去公園。

eng: If I had the money, I would often go out and have fun.
simp: 要是我有钱的话，我将常常出去玩儿。
trad: 要是我有錢的話，我將常常出去玩兒。

eng: As soon as I have a dog, I'll start going for walks frequently.
simp: 我一有小狗，就会开始常常散步。
trad: 我一有小狗，就會開始常常散步。

eng: He's not a big drinker, but his friends all like to drink, so he often gets drunk.
simp: 他不太能喝酒，但是朋友都喜欢喝，所以他往往会喝醉。
trad: 他不太能喝酒，但是朋友都喜歡喝，所以他往往會喝醉。

eng: Xiaoli often loses sleep because his neighbours are always arguing loudly.
simp: 小李经常失眠，因为他的邻居老是大声地吵架。
trad: 小李經常失眠，因為他的鄰居老是大聲地吵架。

eng: I have asked him.
I would rather die than yield.
An earthquake, 8.9 on the Richter scale, hits Japan and causes a massive tsunami.
simp: 日本发生规模8.9的强烈地震, 引发强大海啸。
trad: 日本發生規模8.9的強烈地震, 引發強大海嘯。

eng: Tsunamis swept through rice fields and flooded the towns.
simp: 海啸席捲稻田, 淹没了城镇。
trad: 海嘯席捲稻田, 淹沒了城鎮。

eng: National rescue teams are on standby ready to fly to Japan.
simp: 国际救难队伍随时待命准备前往日本。
trad: 國際救難隊伍隨時待命準備前往日本。

eng: We are all praying for Japan.
Let's take up the second problem, shall we?
simp: 我们处理第二个问题吧。
trad: 我們處理第二個問題吧。

eng: It is no use looking for the cake; I already ate it.
simp: 找蛋糕也没用，我已经吃完了。
trad: 找蛋糕也沒用，我已經吃完了。

eng: Great weather, isn't it?
This is my car.
A tiger is a very ferocious kind of animal.
simp: 老虎是一种非常凶勐的动物。
trad: 老虎是一種非常兇猛的動物。

eng: I do not drink coffee.
I came to this country for the purpose of studying music.
simp: 我来这个国家的目的是学习音乐。
trad: 我來這個國家的目的是學習音樂。

eng: After the incident I came to have a higher opinion of him.
simp: 这个事件过后我对他的评价很高。
trad: 這個事件過後我對他的評價很高。

eng: Come in, the door's open.
Make your choice.
My uncle has a flower shop near the station.
simp: 我叔叔在车站附近有一家花店。
trad: 我叔叔在車站附近有一家花店。

eng: Sorry to be late.
We walked more quickly than usual.
Arabia abounds in oil.
Is there a doctor on board?
It cost me a thousand yen to get my bicycle fixed.
simp: 修理我的脚踏车花了我一千日圆。
trad: 修理我的腳踏車花了我一千日圓。

eng: Nobody can deny that the prisoner is guilty.
simp: 人们不能否认犯人是有罪的。
trad: 人們不能否認犯人是有罪的。

eng: I don't know why he's so mad.
simp: 我不知道她为什麽如此生气。
trad: 我不知道她為什麼如此生氣。

eng: Humility often gains more than pride.
That's bullshit!
That's bullshit!
That's bullshit!
Human pride is human weakness.
It's five and you're still not in bed! You just came back from the bar, didn't you?
simp: 你五点钟还没睡觉！刚从酒吧回来了，是不是？
trad: 你五點鐘還沒睡覺！剛從酒吧回來了，是不是？

eng: Even though he's got a lot of girlfriends, he's still not a player.
simp: 他虽然有好多女朋友，但是还不是一个花花公子。
trad: 他雖然有好多女朋友，但是還不是一個花花公子。

eng: It's my bad.
There are times when I find you really interesting.
simp: 偶尔，我觉得你是一个很有趣的人。
trad: 偶爾，我覺得你是一個很有趣的人。

eng: He always imposes his opinion on me.
simp: 他总是把他的看法强加给我。
trad: 他總是把他的看法強加給我。

eng: One day, Natsume Soseki was lost in London.
simp: 有一天, 夏目漱石在伦敦迷路了。
trad: 有一天, 夏目漱石在倫敦迷路了。

eng: Do you think he will come? "I hope not."
simp: 你认为他会来吗? "我希望不会。"
trad: 你認為他會來嗎? "我希望不會。"

eng: What's the program for tomorrow?
Is he going to swim tomorrow? "Yes, he is."
simp: 他明天会去游泳吗? "是的, 他会。"
trad: 他明天會去遊泳嗎? "是的, 他會。"

eng: Who is he? "He is Jim."
Is he right? "I don't think so."
simp: 他是对的吗? "我不这麽认为。"
trad: 他是對的嗎? "我不這麼認為。"

eng: Will he succeed? "I fear not."
Is he by the car? "No, he is in the car."
simp: 他在车子旁边吗? "不, 他在车子裡面。"
trad: 他在車子旁邊嗎? "不, 他在車子裡面。"

eng: Will he pass the examination? "I am afraid not."
simp: 他会通过考试吗? "我怕是不会。"
trad: 他會通過考試嗎? "我怕是不會。"

eng: He'd like to have a coffee after work. "I would too."
simp: 他想在下班后喝杯咖啡。 "我也想。"
trad: 他想在下班後喝杯咖啡。 "我也想。"

eng: Did he write a letter yesterday? "Yes, he did."
simp: 他昨天写了一封信吗? "是的, 他写了。"
trad: 他昨天寫了一封信嗎? "是的, 他寫了。"

eng: Does he like music? "Yes, he does."
simp: 他喜欢音乐吗? "是的, 他喜欢。"
trad: 他喜歡音樂嗎? "是的, 他喜歡。"

eng: Speaking English is very difficult for me.
simp: 说英语对我来说很困难。
trad: 說英語對我來說很困難。

eng: She speaks English better than any of her classmates.
simp: 她的英语说得比班上任何人都好。
trad: 她的英語說得比班上任何人都好。

eng: Don't be afraid to make mistakes when speaking English.
simp: 说英语的时候不要怕犯错。
trad: 說英語的時候不要怕犯錯。

eng: It is not difficult to speak English.
I found it easy to speak English.
You speak good English.
Speaking English is not easy.
Speaking English is difficult.
Is it hard to speak English?
To speak English is not easy, but it is interesting.
simp: 说英语不容易但它却很有趣。
trad: 說英語不容易但它卻很有趣。

eng: When the heater in the barn fails, you get milk-flavoured ice cubes.
simp: 当牛舍的暖气坏了, 你就会有牛奶味的冰块。
trad: 當牛舍的暖氣壞了, 你就會有牛奶味的冰塊。

eng: When the full moon falls down on the roof at night, all the farmers are woken up.
simp: 当夜晚满月掉落在屋顶上时, 所有的农夫都被吵醒了。
trad: 當夜晚滿月掉落在屋頂上時, 所有的農夫都被吵醒了。

eng: When the cow flies high and the ox flies low, there probably is a twister.
simp: 当母牛飞得高, 公牛飞得低, 就有可能是一个龙捲风。
trad: 當母牛飛得高, 公牛飛得低, 就有可能是一個龍捲風。

eng: When the chickens are flat as pancakes, then again the tractor must have been faster than them.
simp: 当鸡像煎饼一样平的时候, 那麽一定是拖拉机跑得比它们快。
trad: 當雞像煎餅一樣平的時候, 那麼一定是拖拉機跑得比它們快。

eng: I will never force you to marry him.
simp: 我永远不会逼你跟他结婚。
trad: 我永遠不會逼你跟他結婚。

eng: If you find a bad wife and get married to her, then it will certainly be difficult to be happy later.
simp: 如果你找到一个坏妻子并和她结婚, 那麽以后一定会很难过得快乐。
trad: 如果你找到一個壞妻子並和她結婚, 那麼以後一定會很難過得快樂。

eng: People grow more cynical with age.
simp: 人会随着年龄的增长而更加地玩世不恭。
trad: 人會隨著年齡的增長而更加地玩世不恭。

eng: There are many ways to improve one's life.
simp: 有很多的方法可以改善人的一生。
trad: 有很多的方法可以改善人的一生。

eng: The two of us are still rather young, and so we don't have this kind of problem.
simp: 我们两个还相当年轻, 所以我们没有这种问题。
trad: 我們兩個還相當年輕, 所以我們沒有這種問題。

eng: If you have hope, then you'll certainly find happiness, and will become a role model for others as well.
simp: 如果你怀抱希望, 那麽你一定会找到幸福, 而且也会成为其他人的榜样。
trad: 如果你懷抱希望, 那麼你一定會找到幸福, 而且也會成為其他人的榜樣。

eng: To be honest, I've gradually come to dislike the life here.
simp: 老实说, 我已经渐渐地不喜欢这裡的生活。
trad: 老實說, 我已經漸漸地不喜歡這裡的生活。

eng: I must say that your writing is at a pretty good level!
simp: 我必须说, 你的写作达到了非常好的水准。
trad: 我必須說, 你的寫作達到了非常好的水準。

eng: You, Sir, are an imperialist! "And you, Sir, are a troll."
simp: 先生, 你是一个帝国主义者! "而你, 先生, 是一个巨魔。"
trad: 先生, 你是一個帝國主義者! "而你, 先生, 是一個巨魔。"

eng: What did Brainless and Unhappy do?
simp: 没头脑和不高兴做了什么事？
trad: 沒頭腦和不高興做了什麼事？

eng: Open Sesame!
Don't go above the speed limit.
We ran after the cat.

With bronze as a mirror one can dress neatly; with the example of another person one can see the advantages and disadvantages of himself; from the mirror of history one can know the reason for the rise and fall of states.
simp: 用铜做镜子，可以整理好一个人的穿戴；用别人作自己的镜子，可以知道自己每一天的得失；用历史作为镜子，可以知道历史上的兴盛衰亡。
trad: 用銅做鏡子，可以整理好一個人的穿戴；用別人作自己的鏡子，可以知道自己每一天的得失；用歷史作為鏡子，可以知道歷史上的興盛衰亡。

eng: How do I contribute audio in Tatoeba?
I can't afford a new car this year.
The floor was covered with blood.
Fish have ceased to live in this river.
simp: 这条河里已经没有鱼了。
trad: 這條河裏已經沒有魚了。

eng: Abraham Lincoln, the 16th president of the United States, was born in a log cabin in Kentucky.
simp: 伯拉罕·林肯，美国第16任总统，生于肯塔基州的一个简陋的小屋里。
trad: 伯拉罕·林肯，美國第16任總統，生於肯塔基州的一個簡陋的小屋裏。

eng: I've had a good sleep.
He is better than anyone else.
It is important for old people to stay strong.
She greeted me with a smile.
simp: 她用一个微笑迎接了我。
trad: 她用一個微笑迎接了我。

eng: Speak the truth, even if your voice shakes.
simp: 即使您的声音颤抖，也要说出事实。
trad: 即使您的聲音顫抖，也要說出事實。

eng: Those good-for-nothing layabouts were sacked.
simp: 那些一无是处的废物被炒了。
trad: 那些一無是處的廢物被炒了。

eng: I was just going to write a letter.
He will not be able to do the work.
I'm not in the least bit happy now.
There was a cold wind blowing from the north.
simp: 有一阵从北边吹来的冷风。
trad: 有一陣從北邊吹來的冷風。

eng: It is hard for me to believe this.
How about for tomorrow?
This book is new.
Jim works hard, but John is idle.
simp: 吉姆工作努力，而约翰却无所事事。
trad: 吉姆工作努力，而約翰卻無所事事。

eng: That animal feeds on flesh.
He bought a ticket for Paris.
Publication of the article was timed to coincide with the professor's birthday.
simp: 文章的发表被预定在教授生日那天。
trad: 文章的發表被預定在教授生日那天。

eng: We cannot overestimate the value of health.
simp: 我们不能高估健康的价值。
trad: 我們不能高估健康的價值。

eng: It is because his mother is ill that he cannot come to school.
simp: 他是因为母亲病了而不能来学校。
trad: 他是因為母親病了而不能來學校。

eng: This is the only book I have.
The child had no overcoat on although it was very cold.
simp: 尽管天气很冷，孩子却没有大衣穿。
trad: 盡管天氣很冷，孩子卻沒有大衣穿。

eng: This car is very economical on gas.
Music gratifies the ears.
The President spoke to the nation on TV.
simp: 总统在电视上对国民讲话。
trad: 總統在電視上對國民講話。

eng: Please find a solution to the problem.
simp: 请找到问题的解决方法。
trad: 請找到問題的解決方法。

eng: The elevator seems to be out of order.
Please call the fire department.
He'll come on foot or by bicycle.
I bought two tickets for a concert.
simp: 我买了两张音乐会的票。
trad: 我買了兩張音樂會的票。

eng: Did he succeed in the examination?
This writer is Russian.
I don't see what he says.
He decided not to buy the house, because in the first place it was too expensive, and in the second place it was too far from his office.
simp: 他决定不买那个房子了，首先是因为太贵了，其次是因为离他的办公室太远了。
trad: 他決定不買那個房子了，首先是因為太貴了，其次是因為離他的辦公室太遠了。

eng: He seems not to be aware of the conflict between my father and me.
simp: 他似乎不知道我父亲和我之间的纠葛。
trad: 他似乎不知道我父親和我之間的糾葛。

eng: I asked Tom to play the guitar.
Today we can go to distant countries easily by plane.
simp: 现在我们很容易就能乘飞机去遥远的国度。
trad: 現在我們很容易就能乘飛機去遙遠的國度。

eng: She took me for my brother.
The shell of an egg is easily broken.
I was never so humiliated in my life.
simp: 我一生中从没那么糗过。
trad: 我一生中從沒那麼糗過。

eng: I met the prince himself.
London was a city built for the horse.
simp: 伦敦是一个为马而建立的城市。
trad: 倫敦是一個為馬而建立的城市。

eng: Four is an unlucky number in Japanese.
Children depend on their parents for food, clothing and shelter.
simp: 孩子们的衣食住行靠的是他们的父母。
trad: 孩子們的衣食住行靠的是他們的父母。

eng: His methods are not scientific.
My sister has made remarkable progress in English.
simp: 我妹妹的英语有了明显的进步。
trad: 我妹妹的英語有了明顯的進步。

eng: I like watching Code Lyoko.
She left her son a lot of money.
simp: 她留了很多钱给她儿子。
trad: 她留了很多錢給她兒子。

eng: It seems that Ali is very interested in Myrmecology.
simp: 阿里似乎对蚁类研究很感兴趣。
trad: 阿裏似乎對蟻類研究很感興趣。

eng: The thieves knocked off another bank today in a daytime robbery.
simp: 今天强盗大白天的就抢了另一家银行。
trad: 今天強盜大白天的就搶了另一家銀行。

eng: The whole family was sick in bed.
The baby smiled at me.
Do you know the concert schedule of London Symphony Orchestra?
simp: 你知道伦敦交响乐团的演奏会行程吗？
trad: 你知道倫敦交響樂團的演奏會行程嗎？

eng: I have an egg.
Please take more care in the future.
You're sick!
I'll be sixteen in September.
Well do I remember the man's name.
simp: 这个男人的名字我记得很清楚。
trad: 這個男人的名字我記得很清楚。

eng: He is beginning to lose his hair.
I know who lives in this house.
simp: 我知道谁住在这房子里。
trad: 我知道誰住在這房子裏。

eng: He thinks he knows everything.
Formerly this building was a hospital.
How shameful!
Shame on you!
It is a pity that you cannot come to the party.
Don't throw anything onto the floor.
simp: 不要往地上扔任何东西。
trad: 不要往地上扔任何東西。

eng: Seeing me, she was embarrassed.
My father is in the garden.
This house is not for sale.
She asked me for help.
Would you like to have a drink before dinner?
It is me that is wrong.
It is blowing very hard.
Mr Jones teaches us English conversation.
simp: 琼斯先生教我们英语会话。
trad: 瓊斯先生教我們英語會話。

eng: English has now become the common language of several nations in the world.
simp: 英语现已成为世界上许多国家的通用语言了。
trad: 英語現已成為世界上許多國家的通用語言了。

eng: You're very sexy.
She ordered the book from London.
These pearls are genuine, not artificial.
simp: 这些珍珠是真的，不是人造的。
trad: 這些珍珠是真的，不是人造的。

eng: Pretend you're me.
In various Turkish restaurants, shishkabob is the main food.
simp: 在各大土耳其餐馆，烤羊肉串是主食。
trad: 在各大土耳其餐館，烤羊肉串是主食。

eng: How fast you walk!
Please reconfirm the reservation by March 10.
simp: 请在3月10日前再次确认预订。
trad: 請在3月10日前再次確認預訂。

eng: What goes around comes around.
I don't have the slightest idea.
I don't know where we'll arrive.
simp: 我不知道我们会到达哪裡。
trad: 我不知道我們會到達哪裡。

eng: I didn't know what to say.
I can't say for sure.
You don't understand.
They're taking us for cash cows.
simp: 他们把我们当成摇钱树。
trad: 他們把我們當成搖錢樹。

eng: What you're saying isn't logical.
simp: 你说的话在逻辑上有问题。
trad: 你說的話在邏輯上有問題。

eng: He can't answer their questions.
simp: 他不能回答他们的问题。
trad: 他不能回答他們的問題。

eng: I've no way of telling whether or not what he says is true.
simp: 我无法判断他的话是真是假。
trad: 我無法判斷他的話是真是假。

eng: I want you to commit seppuku.
Elephants are several times the size of mice.
simp: 大象的体型比老鼠的体型大好几倍。
trad: 大象的體型比老鼠的體型大好幾倍。

eng: I don't have any money and I don't have any friends either.
Nicole can speak Japanese very well.
She looks happy, but deep down, she suffers.
simp: 她看上去很幸福，但是在她内心深处，她受着痛苦。
trad: 她看上去很幸福，但是在她內心深處，她受著痛苦。

eng: I've boldfaced the articles that I found interesting.
simp: 我加粗了我觉得有趣的文章。
trad: 我加粗了我覺得有趣的文章。

eng: All he thinks about is himself.
Hit me.
The consequences of Sendai's earthquake were dreadful!
simp: 仙台地震的结果很恐怖。
trad: 仙臺地震的結果很恐怖。

eng: We ought to obey the law.
We knew it all along.
They forgave him for his crimes.
That man stole my wallet.
The accident seemed to have something to do with the heavy snow.
simp: 事故似乎和厚厚的积雪有关。
trad: 事故似乎和厚厚的積雪有關。

eng: Because it is there.
Because it is there.
His encounter with her is enriching his inner life.
simp: 与她的相遇丰富了他的精神生活。
trad: 與她的相遇豐富了他的精神生活。

eng: I cannot forbid a person to marry several wives, for it does not contradict Scripture.
simp: 我不能禁止一个人娶好几个妻子，因为这与圣经不矛盾。
trad: 我不能禁止一個人娶好幾個妻子，因為這與聖經不矛盾。

eng: They are all artless children.
They are all innocent children.
I don't want to hear any more excuses.
simp: 我不想再听到其他借口了。
trad: 我不想再聽到其他借口了。

eng: This desk cost me no less than 30000 yen.
simp: 这张书桌花了我不下30000日元。
trad: 這張書桌花了我不下30000日元。

eng: Tell me the right answer to it.
I'll be staying here for another three days.
simp: 我会在这儿再待上三天。
trad: 我會在這兒再待上三天。

eng: I'd like to buy menu of the day.
Will you permit me to go there?
Hurry up, and you will be in time for the bus.
simp: 快点，你就能准时搭上公交车了。
trad: 快點，你就能準時搭上公交車了。

eng: Yes, this one is very nice. How much does it cost?
simp: 是呀，这个很漂亮。多少钱？
trad: 是呀，這個很漂亮。多少錢？

eng: It is I that am bad.
What time do you go home?
The majority of people marry sooner or later.
You should try to form the habit of using your dictionaries.
simp: 你们该养成使用字典的习惯。
trad: 你們該養成使用字典的習慣。

eng: This clock loses three minutes a day.
Evidently, it's going to rain tomorrow.
I have to take my medicine every six hours.
simp: 我每六小时要服一次药。
trad: 我每六小時要服一次藥。

eng: His word is law.
He looked young beside his brother.
simp: 他在他弟弟旁边显得很年轻。
trad: 他在他弟弟旁邊顯得很年輕。

eng: It is becoming warmer day by day.
This is the best restaurant I know of.
simp: 这是我知道的最好的餐馆。
trad: 這是我知道的最好的餐館。

eng: I need to study math.
Mr Smith is an acquaintance of hers.
simp: 史密斯先生是她的一个相识。
trad: 史密斯先生是她的一個相識。

eng: Kill two birds with one stone.
The rest follows naturally.
Who is playing the piano?
Every one of his songs was a hit.
simp: 他的每首歌都长期备受欢迎。
trad: 他的每首歌都長期備受歡迎。

eng: Every one of her songs was a hit.
simp: 她的每首歌都长期备受欢迎。
trad: 她的每首歌都長期備受歡迎。

eng: I sat between Tom and John.
simp: 我坐在汤姆和约翰中间。
trad: 我坐在湯姆和約翰中間。

eng: Give it to them.
Your turn to split!
Once he had written the letter, he sent it.
simp: 信一写好，他就把它寄了。
trad: 信一寫好，他就把它寄了。

eng: Would you please replace the broken one promptly?
simp: 请快点把碎了的那个换掉好吗？
trad: 請快點把碎了的那個換掉好嗎？

eng: She scraped her shoes clean before she entered the house.
The shadow of the stick is visible.
Excuse me for opening your letter by mistake.
simp: 对不起, 我错开了你的信。
trad: 對不起, 我錯開了你的信。

eng: Why did you turn down his offer?
simp: 你为什麽拒绝了他的提议？
trad: 你為什麼拒絕了他的提議？

eng: The days are getting longer and longer.
I slapped his face.
I find it hard to get up early on cold mornings.
simp: 我觉得在寒冷的早晨很难早起。
trad: 我覺得在寒冷的早晨很難早起。

eng: She warmed herself by the fire.
simp: 她在火旁边让自己暖和起来。
trad: 她在火旁邊讓自己暖和起來。

eng: That house belongs to him.
That house is very small.
The house is haunted.
He fell in love with her at first sight.
Have you seen my cell phone? "It's on the table."
simp: 你有看到我的手机吗? "它在桌子上。"
trad: 你有看到我的手機嗎? "它在桌子上。"

eng: When she was in Los Angeles, she had at least six different jobs.
simp: 当她在洛杉矶的时候, 她至少有六份工作。
trad: 當她在洛杉磯的時候, 她至少有六份工作。

eng: Bill got up early in order to catch the first train.
simp: 为了赶上第一班火车, 比尔很早就起床了。
trad: 為了趕上第一班火車, 比爾很早就起床了。

eng: Bill got up early in order that he might catch the first train.
simp: 为了能够赶上第一班火车, 比尔很早就起床了。
trad: 為了能夠趕上第一班火車, 比爾很早就起床了。

eng: A friend of mine is studying abroad.
simp: 我有一位朋友在国外留学。
trad: 我有一位朋友在國外留學。

eng: You must control yourself.
You look happy today.
What woke you up?
You can swim, can't you?
You should know it.
Why can't you come?
Have you finished it?
Do you have one?
You are always complaining.
I admire you for your courage.
Write your address here.
Are your hands clean?
Where are your things?
Your English is improving.
I want your opinion.
Your plan sounds great.
simp: 你的计划听起来很不错。
trad: 你的計劃聽起來很不錯。

eng: Here is your bag.
You deserve the prize.
You really are hopeless.
simp: 你真的是一点希望也没有。
trad: 你真的是一點希望也沒有。

eng: I don't blame you.
Take off your socks, please.
I'm a free man.
Don't worry about me.
Let me handle this.
I can't do it.
Study hard, and you'll succeed.
simp: 努力学习, 那麽你就会成功。
trad: 努力學習, 那麼你就會成功。

eng: I'd rather go swimming.
I'll get some glasses.
Fill it with regular, please.
Five gallons of regular, please.
Read it once more, please.
I'm about ready.
Leave my camera alone.
Pass me the butter, please.
It was really cheap.
Who does Toshio like?
I'm just looking, thank you.
simp: 我只是看看, 谢谢你。
trad: 我只是看看, 謝謝你。

eng: Turn on the light, please.
It's on the sofa.
This chair is ugly.
Is this your car?
This wasn't cheap, was it?
Are you all ready?
The bath is ready.
I'm counting on you.
Sit wherever you like.
He shot at me.
You talk too much.
I'll think it over.
I'm on a diet.
Yesterday was my birthday.
Give me some milk, too.
I'm thinking about you.
I'll join you later.
I'm thinking about you.
I worry about him.
I've climbed Mt. Fuji twice.
I have never climbed Mt. Fuji.
simp: 我从来没有爬过富士山。
trad: 我從來沒有爬過富士山。

eng: It's time to go.
It's time to go.
I'm sorry, but it's impossible.
simp: 我很抱歉, 但它是不可能的。
trad: 我很抱歉, 但它是不可能的。

eng: Even if we don't get lucky on the first try we can just keep fucking till I get pregnant.
simp: 即使我们第一次不够幸运, 我们可以就一直做爱直到我怀孕。
trad: 即使我們第一次不夠幸運, 我們可以就一直做愛直到我懷孕。

eng: I can't find any logic to English spelling. "Ghoti'' can be pronounced as 'fish'.
simp: 我找不到任何英文拼写的逻辑。"T- O- G- H" 可以被发音成"fish"。
trad: 我找不到任何英文拼寫的邏輯。"T- O- G- H" 可以被發音成"fish"。

eng: Hemingway had a poor writing style.
simp: 海明威的写作风格很差劲。
trad: 海明威的寫作風格很差勁。

eng: Everybody is immune to smallpox nowadays.
simp: 现今每个人都对天花免疫了。
trad: 現今每個人都對天花免疫了。

eng: Don't worry! Even if I drink, it doesn't have an effect on my driving.
simp: 别担心! 即使我喝酒了, 它对我的驾驶没有影响。
trad: 別擔心! 即使我喝酒了, 它對我的駕駛沒有影響。

eng: I'm not a sentence. I should be deleted from Tatoeba.
simp: 我不是一个句子。我应该从Tatoeba当中被删除掉。
trad: 我不是一個句子。我應該從Tatoeba當中被刪除掉。

eng: When you want to say "I promise", if you say "koko ni chikaimasu" you'll sound more like a native.
simp: 当你想说"我保证", 如果你说"koko ni chikaimasu", 你听起来会更象一个本地人。
trad: 當你想說"我保證", 如果你說"koko ni chikaimasu", 你聽起來會更象一個本地人。

eng: The Netherlands have won the 2010 World Cup.
simp: 荷兰赢得了2010年世界杯足球赛。
trad: 荷蘭贏得了2010年世界杯足球賽。

eng: Communism is the system practiced in the Soviet Union.
simp: 共产主义是在苏联被实行的制度。
trad: 共產主義是在蘇聯被實行的制度。

eng: Let's call the dog Skipper.
The dog went away.
Who could melt that stone heart of yours?
simp: 谁能把你的那个石心融化？
trad: 誰能把你的那個石心融化？

eng: Do you need an ambulance?
You have to be patient.
I need to get a stamp.
I need to get some stamps.
You don't need to hurry.
I will go with you if necessary.
simp: 如果必要的话, 我会和你一起去。
trad: 如果必要的話, 我會和你一起去。

eng: I have to get some sleep.
Children need a lot of sleep.
simp: 孩子们需要大量的睡眠。
trad: 孩子們需要大量的睡眠。

eng: The school needed a new teacher.
simp: 学校需要一个新的老师。
trad: 學校需要一個新的老師。

eng: You didn't need to buy the book.
She cannot do without her car.
She cannot do without her car.
You don't need to carry lunch with you.
simp: 你不需要随身带着午餐。
trad: 你不需要隨身帶著午餐。

eng: If you don't want to go, you don't need to.
simp: 如果你不想去, 就不必去了。
trad: 如果你不想去, 就不必去了。

eng: I have lost my umbrella somewhere in the park. I have to buy one.
simp: 我的雨伞遗失在公园裡某个地方。我必须再买一把。
trad: 我的雨傘遺失在公園裡某個地方。我必須再買一把。

eng: Hey, you there!
I'm not a university student, but I'm brighter than them.
simp: 我不是一个大学生, 但我比他们更聪明。
trad: 我不是一個大學生, 但我比他們更聰明。

eng: I will sue you.
I moved a chess piece on the board one forward.
simp: 我在棋盘上把一个棋子在向前移动一步。
trad: 我在棋盤上把一個棋子在向前移動一步。

eng: Zeal for your house will consume me.
simp: 我为你的殿，心裡焦急，如同火烧。
trad: 我為你的殿，心裡焦急，如同火燒。

eng: He came to that which was his own, but his own did not receive him.
simp: 祂到自己的地方来，自己的人却不接受祂。
trad: 祂到自己的地方來，自己的人卻不接受祂。

eng: Hide not your light under a bushel.
simp: 不要把你的灯藏在斗笠下。
trad: 不要把你的燈藏在鬥笠下。

eng: The man on whom you see the Spirit come down and remain is he who will baptize with the Holy Spirit.
simp: 你如果看见圣灵降下，落在谁身上，谁就是用圣灵替人施洗的了。
trad: 你如果看見聖靈降下，落在誰身上，誰就是用聖靈替人施洗的了。

eng: I made him sweep the floor.
He is popular among his colleagues.
simp: 他在他的同事之中受到欢迎。
trad: 他在他的同事之中受到歡迎。

eng: News of the recent blast is all over the radio.
simp: 收音机广播充斥着有关最近爆炸的新闻。
trad: 收音機廣播充斥著有關最近爆炸的新聞。

eng: I like this scene in particular.
Yesterday, we had a blast!
simp: 昨天我们玩得特别痛快!
trad: 昨天我們玩得特別痛快!

eng: An icy blast of wind cut me to the bone.
simp: 冰冷的疾风吹到我骨子裡去了。
trad: 冰冷的疾風吹到我骨子裡去了。

eng: A blast of cold air swept through the house.
simp: 冷空气疾风席捲整栋房子。
trad: 冷空氣疾風席捲整棟房子。

eng: I am going to stay here for a couple of days.
Life being very short, we ought not to waste time.
simp: 人生十分短暂，我们不应该浪费时间。
trad: 人生十分短暫，我們不應該浪費時間。

eng: The photo takes me back to my childhood days.
simp: 这张照片带我回到我的童年时光。
trad: 這張照片帶我回到我的童年時光。

eng: What have you done with my pen? It was here a minute ago.
simp: 你把我的钢笔怎麽了? 一分钟前它还在这裡。
trad: 你把我的鋼筆怎麼了? 一分鐘前它還在這裡。

eng: It is of no consequence to me that he is coming.
simp: 他要来这件事对我而言无关紧要。
trad: 他要來這件事對我而言無關緊要。

eng: He pinched and scraped for many years to save money.
simp: 为了存钱他省吃俭用了许多年。
trad: 為了存錢他省吃儉用了許多年。

eng: How large is the audience?
Me, too.
You'll get a lot of presents on your birthday.
simp: 你生日那天会收到很多礼物。
trad: 你生日那天會收到很多禮物。

eng: Nobody knows where he has escaped to.
simp: 没有人知道他逃到了哪里。
trad: 沒有人知道他逃到了哪裏。

eng: I have no intention of telling you the result.
simp: 我并不打算把结果告诉你。
trad: 我並不打算把結果告訴你。

eng: I would like to travel alone.
My brother sent me a letter last week.
simp: 我哥哥上个星期寄了一封信给我。
trad: 我哥哥上個星期寄了一封信給我。

eng: He was attracted by her smile.
simp: 他被她的笑容吸引住了。
trad: 他被她的笑容吸引住了。

eng: A mugger robbed him of all of his money.
simp: 他身上的钱全被强盗抢走了。
trad: 他身上的錢全被強盜搶走了。

eng: I have never seen a red refrigerator.
simp: 我从来没有见过红色的冰箱。
trad: 我從來沒有見過紅色的冰箱。

eng: Management of a company is different from ownership of a company.
simp: 管理一间公司和拥有一间公司是不能相提并论的两回事。
trad: 管理一間公司和擁有一間公司是不能相提並論的兩回事。

eng: This is the place where the incident happened.
He always tells the truth.
I returned the knife which I had borrowed.
I gave her her dictionary back.
simp: 我把她的字典还给了她。
trad: 我把她的字典還給了她。

eng: The rain is beating against the windows.
She is interested in learning new ideas.
simp: 她有兴趣学习新的想法。
trad: 她有興趣學習新的想法。

eng: You may choose whichever you want.
simp: 你可以选择任何你想要的。
trad: 你可以選擇任何你想要的。

eng: He had decided on a new policy.
simp: 他已经决定了新的政策。
trad: 他已經決定了新的政策。

eng: I'll give you anything but this.
simp: 除了这个之外我会给你任何东西。
trad: 除了這個之外我會給你任何東西。

eng: They don't always obey their parents.
simp: 他们并不总是服从他们的父母。
trad: 他們並不總是服從他們的父母。

eng: You may choose whichever book you like.
simp: 你可以选择任何你喜欢的书。
trad: 你可以選擇任何你喜歡的書。

eng: You may choose what you like.
He decided to quit smoking.
I'll wait here until she comes.
simp: 我会在这儿等着直到她来。
trad: 我會在這兒等著直到她來。

eng: You may choose any of them.
simp: 你可以选择他们之中的任何一个。
trad: 你可以選擇他們之中的任何一個。

eng: He may be on the next train.
simp: 他可能在下一班火车上。
trad: 他可能在下一班火車上。

eng: We may be late for school.
He may be jogging around the park.
simp: 他可能在公园周围慢跑。
trad: 他可能在公園周圍慢跑。

eng: You may as well come with me.
They married when they were young.
simp: 他们在还很年轻的时候就结婚了。
trad: 他們在還很年輕的時候就結婚了。

eng: She is married to an American.
She is married to a foreigner.
The knife is not sharp.
The matter is all settled.
The king governed the country.
The king crushed his enemies.
The Joneses love their daughter.
simp: 琼斯一家人爱他们的女儿。
trad: 瓊斯一家人愛他們的女兒。

eng: The job offer still stands.
simp: 这份工作录取仍然有效。
trad: 這份工作錄取仍然有效。

eng: Welcome back. We missed you!
Welcome back. We missed you!
I have to hurry!
The firm went under due to lack of capital.
simp: 公司由于缺乏资本倒闭了。
trad: 公司由於缺乏資本倒閉了。

eng: The job is half done.
simp: 这项工作已经完成了一半。
trad: 這項工作已經完成了一半。

eng: The jet landed at Tokyo.
simp: 这架客机降落在东京了。
trad: 這架客機降落在東京了。

eng: Do you live with your parents?
Just as the body needs exercise, so the mind needs stimulation to stay healthy.
simp: 正如身体需要锻炼，所以心灵需要刺激才能保持健康。
trad: 正如身體需要鍛煉，所以心靈需要刺激才能保持健康。

eng: What newspaper do you take?
He has traveled around the world in eighty days by himself.
simp: 他独自环游了世界八十天。
trad: 他獨自環遊了世界八十天。

eng: Speaking of Mr. Tanaka, have you seen him lately?
simp: 说到田中先生，你最近有没有见过他？
trad: 說到田中先生，你最近有沒有見過他？

eng: I'm sorry, but I can't hear you well.
simp: 对不起，但我听不太清楚你说话。
trad: 對不起，但我聽不太清楚你說話。

eng: Could you please speak a little bit more slowly?
Jimmy insisted on my taking him to the zoo.
simp: 吉米坚持要我带他去动物园。
trad: 吉米堅持要我帶他去動物園。

eng: Kentaro is staying with his friend in Kyoto.
simp: 健太郎与他的朋友待在京都。
trad: 健太郎與他的朋友待在京都。

eng: The end does not always justify the means.
simp: 为了正当目的并非总是可以不择手段.
trad: 為了正當目的並非總是可以不擇手段.

eng: Tatsuya has some friends who live in New York.
simp: 达也有一些朋友住在纽约。
trad: 達也有一些朋友住在紐約。

eng: The policeman took the thief by the arm.
My father insisted on our waiting for the train.
simp: 我的父亲坚持要我们等火车。
trad: 我的父親堅持要我們等火車。

eng: Would you please explain the rules to me?
simp: 请你为我解释规则好吗?
trad: 請你為我解釋規則好嗎?

eng: I've been coming to work one train earlier lately.
simp: 我已经搭了最近比较早一点的火车来上班。
trad: 我已經搭了最近比較早一點的火車來上班。

eng: A tsunami is coming, so please be on the alert.
Are you all listening to me?
Even though he's poor, he's happy.
She always believes me.
I am ready to do anything for you.
Open the door, please.
I'm fine.
It's a piece of cake.
I really need to read all this.
simp: 我真的需要把这都读了。
trad: 我真的需要把這都讀了。

eng: The Japanese have dark eyes.
No, that's not right. You have to set α equal to β.
simp: 不，这样不对。应该设α等于β。
trad: 不，這樣不對。應該設α等於β。

eng: Their son's name is John.
simp: 他们儿子的名字是约翰。
trad: 他們兒子的名字是約翰。

eng: Their losses reached one million yen.
simp: 他们的损失到达了一百万日圆。
trad: 他們的損失到達了一百萬日圓。

eng: My sister married her high school classmate.
simp: 我的姐姐嫁给了她的高中同学。
trad: 我的姐姐嫁給了她的高中同學。

eng: Their house is being remodeled.
The recent shortage of coffee has given rise to a lot of problems.
simp: 近来咖啡的短缺造成了许多问题。
trad: 近來咖啡的短缺造成了許多問題。

eng: Will six o'clock suit you?
Their cattle are all fat.
Their boy was named Edward.
simp: 他们的儿子被命名为爱德华。
trad: 他們的兒子被命名為愛德華。

eng: The investigation is under way.
In case of emergency, call 119.
Come on, try again.
His daughter has become a pretty woman.
simp: 他的女儿已经成为了一个漂亮的女人。
trad: 他的女兒已經成為了一個漂亮的女人。

eng: What made her so angry?
All their secrets have been revealed.
simp: 他们所有的秘密都已经被揭晓了。
trad: 他們所有的秘密都已經被揭曉了。

eng: All their efforts were in vain.
His second son married and settled down.
simp: 他的第二个儿子结婚并定居下来了。
trad: 他的第二個兒子結婚並定居下來了。

eng: Birds build nests.
She married again in her mid-forties.
simp: 她在四十多岁的时候再次结婚。
trad: 她在四十多歲的時候再次結婚。

eng: She married a rich old man.
simp: 她嫁给了一个富有的老男人。
trad: 她嫁給了一個富有的老男人。

eng: Yumiko married a childhood friend last June.
simp: 由美子去年六月嫁给了一个儿时的朋友。
trad: 由美子去年六月嫁給了一個兒時的朋友。

eng: Mother Nature is generous.
Why are you angry?
Patience is not my forté.
We managed to swim across the river.
I managed to make him understand it.
She lives in a huge house.
simp: 她住在一个很大的房子裡。
trad: 她住在一個很大的房子裡。

eng: My brother lives in a small village.
simp: 我的兄弟住在一个小村庄裡。
trad: 我的兄弟住在一個小村莊裡。

eng: He managed to make both ends meet.
He lives in a cozy little house.
simp: 他住在一个舒适的小房子裡。
trad: 他住在一個舒適的小房子裡。

eng: She managed to keep up appearances.
The reservation is already made.
I managed to get there in time.
I do not know the train schedules, could you find out for me?
simp: 我不知道火车时间，你能帮我打听一下吗？
trad: 我不知道火車時間，你能幫我打聽一下嗎？

eng: A massive earthquake of magnitude 8.8 hit the Japanese islands today.
simp: 今天8.8级的强大地震袭击了日本的岛屿。
trad: 今天8.8級的強大地震襲擊了日本的島嶼。

eng: I married when I was 19 years old.
She was so curious that she opened the box.
simp: 她太过好奇，以至于打开了盒子。
trad: 她太過好奇，以至於打開了盒子。

eng: At first, I thought they were sick.
I invited him to the party and he accepted.
simp: 我邀请他去派对，他接受了。
trad: 我邀請他去派對，他接受了。

eng: Will you have time to have lunch with me?
simp: 你有时间跟我吃午饭吗？
trad: 你有時間跟我吃午飯嗎？

eng: I'm not absolutely sure.
Tom married an older girl.
simp: 汤姆娶了一个比他大的女孩。
trad: 湯姆娶了一個比他大的女孩。

eng: If he had taken his doctor's advice, he might still be alive.
simp: 如果他听了他医生的建议，他可能还活着。
trad: 如果他聽了他醫生的建議，他可能還活著。

eng: I met him on my way home.
simp: 我在回家的路上遇到了他。
trad: 我在回家的路上遇到了他。

eng: I do not like tea, so I generally drink coffee for breakfast.
simp: 我不喜欢茶，所以我早餐大致上都喝咖啡。
trad: 我不喜歡茶，所以我早餐大致上都喝咖啡。

eng: I'd like a hotel reservation.
What number bus do I take to get to Waikiki?
Please get me hotel security.
My baggage is missing.
I'm glad to see you back.
I'm glad to see you back.
Good question!
The film lasted 2 hours.
Please write back soon.
Remember me to your parents.
That guitar is so expensive that I can't buy it.
simp: 那把吉他太贵了，我买不起。
trad: 那把吉他太貴了，我買不起。

eng: Ah, when will they meet again?
simp: 啊，他们什么时候会再见？
trad: 啊，他們什麼時候會再見？

eng: What a surprise!
I remember the first time.
Bring your children along.
I'm at the airport now.
Nothing is missing.
Parents love their children.
Switch off the light. I can't get to sleep.
Switch on the light. I can't see anything.
simp: 把灯打开。我什么都看不见了。
trad: 把燈打開。我什麼都看不見了。

eng: I will not do it again.
Bring him in.
I'm sure that she will come back soon.
simp: 我肯定她很快就会回来的。
trad: 我肯定她很快就會回來的。

eng: Show me another example.
See you tomorrow at the library.
You'll get lost.
The good thing about this electronic dictionary is that it's easy to carry.
simp: 这电子辞典的好处就是便于携带。
trad: 這電子辭典的好處就是便於攜帶。

eng: He has poor eyesight.
What's new?
It began to snow.
What do I have to do now that I'm registered?
simp: 我注册了，现在该干什么呢？
trad: 我註冊了，現在該幹什麼呢？

eng: I'd rather not say.
I'd rather die than marry you!
simp: 我宁愿死也不要跟你结婚！
trad: 我寧願死也不要跟你結婚！

eng: It's really unfortunate. You don't understand at all its essence.
simp: 太可惜了，你一点也不懂它的真髓。
trad: 太可惜了，你一點也不懂它的真髓。

eng: He'd prefer to go on Friday.
How come are you still not sleeping?
Would you rather lie than make him angry?
simp: 你宁愿说谎也不愿让他生气吗？
trad: 你寧願說謊也不願讓他生氣嗎？

eng: I'd rather not sleep and finish reading this book.
simp: 我宁愿不睡觉也要看完这本书。
trad: 我寧願不睡覺也要看完這本書。

eng: I'd rather have no money but find love.
simp: 我宁愿没有钱也要找到爱情。
trad: 我寧願沒有錢也要找到愛情。

eng: I'd rather skip school and play video games.
simp: 我宁愿逃学也要玩电子游戏。
trad: 我寧願逃學也要玩電子遊戲。

eng: Is he a teacher?
I live in Tokyo.
My eyes are blue.
Our school is ten minutes' walk from here.
simp: 我们的学校离这儿要十分钟走路。
trad: 我們的學校離這兒要十分鐘走路。

eng: This house belongs to Mr Yamada.
Shanghai is referred to as the Paris of the East.
simp: 上海被称为东方的巴黎。
trad: 上海被稱為東方的巴黎。

eng: He's a Parisian.
The victims of the earthquake disaster are numerous.
simp: 地震灾难的受害者非常多。
trad: 地震災難的受害者非常多。

eng: He told me that tomorrow he goes from Beijing to England by plane.
simp: 他跟我说了他明天从北京机场飞往英格兰。
trad: 他跟我說了他明天從北京機場飛往英格蘭。

eng: His own survival is more important now.
simp: 他自己的生存现在更重要了。
trad: 他自己的生存現在更重要了。

eng: We should cancel the hike.
simp: 我们应该取消这次远足。
trad: 我們應該取消這次遠足。

eng: We managed to get some foreign stamps.
simp: 我们设法得到一些外国的邮票。
trad: 我們設法得到一些外國的郵票。

eng: I had bought it the week before.
She managed to drive a car.
No one man could do it.
simp: 没有一个人能做到这一点。
trad: 沒有一個人能做到這一點。

eng: This hut is a very special place.
simp: 这个窝棚是个很特别的地方。
trad: 這個窩棚是個很特別的地方。

eng: I put the money into the safe.
He is one of my neighbors.
She is making progress with her English.
I'm sorry I was so rude.
I put it in the drawer.
He is making preparations for a trip.
I'm not always home on Sundays.
simp: 我并不总是在星期天回家。
trad: 我並不總是在星期天回家。

eng: The scenery was beautiful beyond description.
He is making great progress in English.
simp: 他的英语有很大的进步。
trad: 他的英語有很大的進步。

eng: I prefer working to doing nothing.
simp: 我宁愿工作也不愿閒着。
trad: 我寧願工作也不願閒著。

eng: I prefer to travel by air.
This process has a lot of inconveniences.
Ken makes his own bed every morning.
simp: 肯每天早上自己整理床舖。
trad: 肯每天早上自己整理床舖。

eng: I'm not accustomed to such treatment.
I'm very worried about my weight.
Tom started the engine.
He cut the envelope open.
She makes herself up every morning.
John makes fun of his dog.
He makes friends with everybody he meets.
simp: 他跟所有他遇见的人交朋友。
trad: 他跟所有他遇見的人交朋友。

eng: He makes the most of his opportunities.
We make milk into cheese and butter.
simp: 我们把牛奶製成乳酪和奶油。
trad: 我們把牛奶製成乳酪和奶油。

eng: May I speak to you a minute?
simp: 我可以和你讲一下话吗?
trad: 我可以和你講一下話嗎?

eng: You make me feel so guilty.
An elephant has a long nose.
She kept the secret to herself.
Ten houses were burned down.
I'm not about to ask him.
They make good use of their rooms.
simp: 他们好好地利用他们的房间。
trad: 他們好好地利用他們的房間。

eng: We make milk into cheese and butter.
simp: 我们把牛奶製成奶酪和黄油。
trad: 我們把牛奶製成奶酪和黃油。

eng: I make a point of being punctual.
I ran away in a hurry.
I majored in philosophy at my university.
You are selling him short.
You've got a lot of guts.
My grandfather cannot walk without a stick.
simp: 我的祖父要用拐杖才能走路。
trad: 我的祖父要用拐杖才能走路。

eng: She has already lived in that town for five years.
simp: 她在那个小镇已经住了五年了。
trad: 她在那個小鎮已經住了五年了。

eng: She was crying for a toy.
I saw an old woman cross the street.
simp: 我看见一个老太太穿过了马路。
trad: 我看見一個老太太穿過了馬路。

eng: The man whom she is going to marry is an astronaut.
simp: 她的未婚夫是一个太空人。
trad: 她的未婚夫是一個太空人。

eng: Go easy on the beer!
I had to change my plans.
The sun rises earlier in summer than in winter.
simp: 太阳在夏天比冬天升起得早。
trad: 太陽在夏天比冬天升起得早。

eng: I'm too sleepy to do my homework.
You'd better wear a sweater under your jacket.
simp: 您最好在外衣里穿一件套衫。
trad: 您最好在外衣裏穿一件套衫。

eng: I kept the $20 I found in the street.
simp: 我留着在街上发现的20美元。
trad: 我留著在街上發現的20美元。

eng: I was late for school on account of an accident.
simp: 因为一起事故，我上学迟到了。
trad: 因為一起事故，我上學遲到了。

eng: There are seven men and four women in my section.
simp: 在我的部门里有七男四女。
trad: 在我的部門裏有七男四女。

eng: He went back to the store.
Can I ask you a question?
You can get from Washington to New York by train.
simp: 你们可以乘火车从华盛顿去纽约。
trad: 你們可以乘火車從華盛頓去紐約。

eng: New York is accessible by train from Washington.
simp: 从华盛顿乘火车可以到纽约。
trad: 從華盛頓乘火車可以到紐約。

eng: Would you mind coming with me?
He is a Hongkonger.
Marco thinks he writes well.
The potato was so hot that it burned my mouth.
simp: 土豆太热，以至于烫到了我的嘴。
trad: 土豆太熱，以至於燙到了我的嘴。

eng: It seems that you are not having a good time here.
simp: 好像你们在这儿玩得不愉快啊。
trad: 好像你們在這兒玩得不愉快啊。

eng: Most Americans do not object to my calling them by their first names.
simp: 大多数美国人似乎不反对我直呼其名。
trad: 大多數美國人似乎不反對我直呼其名。

eng: She seemed to have been ill.
The dolphin and trainer communicated much better than we expected.
simp: 海豚和驯养员交流得比我们所期望的好得多。
trad: 海豚和馴養員交流得比我們所期望的好得多。

eng: I went there yesterday.
Good to see you.
Did you drive her home last night?
simp: 昨晚你把她送回家了吗？
trad: 昨晚你把她送回家了嗎？

eng: The river is the widest in Europe.
There's nothing better than taking a nice walk.
simp: 没有什么比散步更好的了。
trad: 沒有什麼比散步更好的了。

eng: I have just come back from school.
She stopped to smoke a cigarette.
My sister has a nice piano.
simp: 我妹妹有架漂亮的钢琴。
trad: 我妹妹有架漂亮的鋼琴。

eng: Our true nationality is mankind.
simp: 我们真正的国籍是人类。
trad: 我們真正的國籍是人類。

eng: Russians never smile.
His son's criminal activities caused him great pain.
simp: 他儿子的犯罪行为给他带来了很大的痛苦。
trad: 他兒子的犯罪行為給他帶來了很大的痛苦。

eng: Must I stay in bed?
Where do you watch television?
There are a lot of hot springs in Japan.
She need not have done the work.
I'm suffering from a bad headache.
I majored in chemistry at the university.
I majored in American literature at college.
simp: 我在大学主修美国文学。
trad: 我在大學主修美國文學。

eng: They made us work all night.
I'm looking for an old man.
He could not breathe deeply.
They made us work all day long.
simp: 他们让我们工作了一整天。
trad: 他們讓我們工作了一整天。

eng: He couldn't get the job.
The worst is over.
I ran as fast as possible.
I ran a race with him.
We go to the same school.
The teacher made us repeat the word.
simp: 老师要我们重複这个字。
trad: 老師要我們重複這個字。

eng: They made up and became friends again.
simp: 他们和解了，并再次成为了朋友。
trad: 他們和解了，並再次成為了朋友。

eng: They made their way toward the town.
If you don't make the promise, then I'll just stand by and watch.
simp: 你要是不答应的话，我就袖手旁观。
trad: 你要是不答應的話，我就袖手旁觀。

eng: He collected bits of information.
Even though someone came, she still remained uneasy.
simp: 虽然有人来了，但是她还是忐忑不安。
trad: 雖然有人來了，但是她還是忐忑不安。

eng: We must not break our promise.
simp: 我们不能违背我们的承诺。
trad: 我們不能違背我們的承諾。

eng: I prefer red wine to white.
simp: 我喜欢红葡萄酒胜过白葡萄酒。
trad: 我喜歡紅葡萄酒勝過白葡萄酒。

eng: They made their way through the crowd.
simp: 他们从人群中挤过去了。
trad: 他們從人群中擠過去了。

eng: There are more clouds today than yesterday.
They made their way across the river.
Sam made the school basketball team.
simp: 山姆组了学校的篮球队。
trad: 山姆組了學校的籃球隊。

eng: She made the same mistake as before.
simp: 她犯了和以前同样的错误。
trad: 她犯了和以前同樣的錯誤。

eng: We go to school by bus.
simp: 我们乘公共汽车去上学。
trad: 我們乘公共汽車去上學。

eng: She made the same mistake again.
simp: 她又犯了同样的错误了。
trad: 她又犯了同樣的錯誤了。

eng: I'm too busy to help him.
He came back from America.
He came to see me.
Put in a little more sugar.
She is very pretty.
Hey! There's an American who speaks Uyghur here! Hurry up and get over here to inspect his computer!
simp: 喂！这里有个会说维语的美国人！快来把他的电脑检查一下！
trad: 餵！這裏有個會說維語的美國人！快來把他的電腦檢查一下！

eng: What percentage of all taxi drivers make unscrupulous detours, do you think?
simp: 你觉得绕路的司机占所有的出租车司机的百分之多少？
trad: 你覺得繞路的司機占所有的出租車司機的百分之多少？

eng: They made the novel into a drama.
simp: 他们把这本小说变成戏剧。
trad: 他們把這本小說變成戲劇。

eng: I'm so proud of my boys.
simp: 我为我的孩子们感到很骄傲。
trad: 我為我的孩子們感到很驕傲。

eng: I had a little fever this morning.
simp: 今天上午我有一点儿发烧。
trad: 今天上午我有一點兒發燒。

eng: I've got blisters on my feet.
I work for a bank.
We made the most of the opportunity.
simp: 我们尽力地利用了这个机会。
trad: 我們盡力地利用了這個機會。

eng: I'm really concerned about your future.
simp: 我真的很关心你的未来。
trad: 我真的很關心你的未來。

eng: Would you like some scrambled egg?
I've never seen a live whale.
simp: 我从来没有见过一条活生生的鲸鱼。
trad: 我從來沒有見過一條活生生的鯨魚。

eng: I'm not used to spicy food.
He made the most of his opportunity.
simp: 他尽力地利用了这个机会。
trad: 他盡力地利用了這個機會。

eng: He made the most of his opportunities.
simp: 他尽力地利用了他的机会。
trad: 他盡力地利用了他的機會。

eng: She made the doll for me.
An electric current can generate magnetism.
You go to school, don't you?
He made the best of the opportunity.
They made straight for their destination.
We made statues out of wood.
Could you shut the door?
He knows how to captivate his audience.
simp: 他知道如何去吸引他的听众。
trad: 他知道如何去吸引他的聽眾。

eng: You'd better go home.
You should begin with easier questions.
simp: 你应该先从最简单的问题开始。
trad: 你應該先從最簡單的問題開始。

eng: We should call the doctor.
We should call the police.
We had an unpleasant experience there.
simp: 我们在那裡有一个不愉快的经历。
trad: 我們在那裡有一個不愉快的經歷。

eng: I had been reading for an hour.
simp: 我已经持续读了一个小时了。
trad: 我已經持續讀了一個小時了。

eng: She had an appointment with the doctor.
I made several mistakes in the exam.
simp: 在这次考试中我犯了几个错误。
trad: 在這次考試中我犯了幾個錯誤。

eng: I had a very good time today.
We had a welcome party for her.
simp: 我们为她举办了一个欢迎会。
trad: 我們為她舉辦了一個歡迎會。

eng: We had an early lunch at school.
simp: 我们在学校有一个早午餐。
trad: 我們在學校有一個早午餐。

eng: She had already gone when I arrived.
simp: 当我到的时候，她已经走了。
trad: 當我到的時候，她已經走了。

eng: I had a terrible dream last night.
simp: 昨晚我作了一个可怕的梦。
trad: 昨晚我作了一個可怕的夢。

eng: I had a tennis match with him.
We had a stopover in Chicago.
simp: 我们中途在芝加哥停留。
trad: 我們中途在芝加哥停留。

eng: She had a vague feeling of guilt.
simp: 她隐约地有一种的内疚感。
trad: 她隱約地有一種的內疚感。

eng: I had a telephone call from her.
simp: 我有一通来自她的电话。
trad: 我有一通來自她的電話。

eng: I had a telephone call from her.
He had a second helping of soup.
We had a rest in the shade.
We had a slight difference of opinion.
simp: 我们的看法有一点不同。
trad: 我們的看法有一點不同。

eng: They had a rest for a while.
I had a nice chat with her.
We had a party last night.
I had a pleasant dream last night.
The boy had a red face.
simp: 这个男孩有一张红润的脸。
trad: 這個男孩有一張紅潤的臉。

eng: They had a lovely time together.
We had a kid just last year.
simp: 就在去年我们有了一个孩子。
trad: 就在去年我們有了一個孩子。

eng: We had a lot of furniture.
We had a late lunch at two.
simp: 我们在两点钟吃了晚午餐。
trad: 我們在兩點鐘吃了晚午餐。

eng: We had a late lunch at two.
simp: 我们在两点钟很晚才吃午餐。
trad: 我們在兩點鐘很晚才吃午餐。

eng: We had a heavy rain last night.
We had a heavy rainfall last night.
We had a heavy frost this morning.
We had a heavy frost this morning.
We had a heated discussion about it.
simp: 我们激烈的讨论了这个问题。
trad: 我們激烈的討論了這個問題。

eng: We had a heavy fog in London.
He is my father.
This is my daughter.
How old is your son?
Please shave my beard.
It is pleasant to shave off my beard.
The beard does not make the philosopher.
simp: 光有胡子是不能成为哲学家的。
trad: 光有胡子是不能成為哲學家的。

eng: I know that German with a long beard.
simp: 我认识那位长胡子德国人。
trad: 我認識那位長胡子德國人。

eng: The recent frequency of earthquakes makes us nervous.
simp: 最近频繁的地震让我们很焦虑。
trad: 最近頻繁的地震讓我們很焦慮。

eng: In the near future, we may have a big earthquake in Japan.
simp: 在不久的将来，可能有一场大地震将在日本发生。
trad: 在不久的將來，可能有一場大地震將在日本發生。

eng: The rescue workers are going to hand out supplies to the victims of the earthquake.
simp: 救助人员将为地震受灾者提供资助。
trad: 救助人員將為地震受災者提供資助。

eng: According to some scholars, a major earthquake could occur at any moment now.
simp: 据一些学者称，现在可能随时发生一场特大地震。
trad: 據一些學者稱，現在可能隨時發生一場特大地震。

eng: Bill kept on crying for hours.
simp: 比尔连续哭了几个小时。
trad: 比爾連續哭了幾個小時。

eng: I talk to myself.
I want to buy a cheap dictionary.
I am not a witch.
Your nickname is quite lovely.
Excessive drinking is one of the causes of impotence.
simp: 酗酒是导致阳痿的一个因素。
trad: 酗酒是導致陽痿的一個因素。

eng: I want to be you.
I want to be you.
I prefer cats to dogs.
She was on the verge of crying.
The buildings look so tiny.
Tiny particles in the air can cause cancer.
simp: 空气中的微粒可以引发癌症。
trad: 空氣中的微粒可以引發癌癥。

eng: I have hiccups.
I hiccup a lot.
I am not a witch.
The prosecutor asked me a leading question.
simp: 检察官问了我一个引导性的问题。
trad: 檢察官問了我一個引導性的問題。

eng: The bill amounted to 100 dollars.
One who has everything can lose everything.
simp: 拥有一切的人可能会失去一切。
trad: 擁有一切的人可能會失去一切。

eng: Let's sit on the grass.
As far as I know, he did nothing wrong.
simp: 据我所知，他没做错任何事。
trad: 據我所知，他沒做錯任何事。

eng: Friends are like flowers in the garden of life.
simp: 朋友就像生命之园里的花朵。
trad: 朋友就像生命之園裏的花朵。

eng: I'm a poor student and I can't pay you.
simp: 我是个穷学生，我没法付你钱。
trad: 我是個窮學生，我沒法付你錢。

eng: Every dog is a lion at home.
simp: 每条狗在自己家就是狮子。
trad: 每條狗在自己家就是獅子。

eng: I spilled my coffee on the carpet.
simp: 我把咖啡倒翻在地毯上了。
trad: 我把咖啡倒翻在地毯上了。

eng: We should call the police.
I could answer all the questions.
Don't tell lies.
I don't want him to touch me.
I was surprised by his perseverance.
simp: 我对他的坚持感到很惊讶。
trad: 我對他的堅持感到很驚訝。

eng: I have been living in Canada for almost five years.
simp: 我在加拿大生活了近五年。
trad: 我在加拿大生活了近五年。

eng: I need something for an adult.
simp: 我需要一些成人的东西。
trad: 我需要一些成人的東西。

eng: Marriage is the main cause of all divorces.
simp: 结婚是所有离婚的主要原因。
trad: 結婚是所有離婚的主要原因。

eng: If human life is convex, we can optimize it.
simp: 如果人生是凸的，那我们可以优化它。
trad: 如果人生是凸的，那我們可以優化它。

eng: That's the thing about people who think they hate computers. What they really hate is lousy programmers.
simp: 那些自认为讨厌电脑的人就是这么回事。他们真正讨厌的是差劲的程序员。
trad: 那些自認為討厭電腦的人就是這麼回事。他們真正討厭的是差勁的程序員。

eng: You will get into trouble if your girlfriend finds out the truth.
simp: 如果你女朋友发现真相的话，你会有麻烦的。
trad: 如果你女朋友發現真相的話，你會有麻煩的。

eng: Be quiet. The kids are asleep.
I refuse to be treated like a slave by you.
simp: 我拒绝被你像奴隶一样对待。
trad: 我拒絕被你像奴隸一樣對待。

eng: You are the man I've been looking for.
simp: 你就是我一直要找的人。
trad: 你就是我一直要找的人。

eng: Love makes the world go round.
