simp: 他在他还是小孩的时候就来到日本。
trad: 他在他還是小孩的時候就來到日本。

eng: I'll come as soon as I can.
Sorry, I've got to go.
simp: 不好意思，我必须要走了。
trad: 不好意思，我必須要走了。

eng: Can you tell my age?
Most people think so.
simp: 大部分的人是这麽想的。
trad: 大部分的人是這麼想的。

eng: The situation is very serious.
I could not catch her words.
He took out the wallet from his inside jacket pocket.
simp: 他从他外套内袋裡拿出皮夹。
trad: 他從他外套內袋裡拿出皮夾。

eng: Jane sometimes runs to school.
My friends call me Beth.
They invited me to play cards.
He was appointed chairman.
Come here!
I forgive you.
If I had money, I would travel around the world.
simp: 如果有钱的话，我要环游世界。
trad: 如果有錢的話，我要環遊世界。

eng: I ordered two hamburgers.
He is my brother.
That's a great idea.
Where are you going?
Please use a pencil to write down your name.
simp: 请用铅笔写下你的名字。
trad: 請用鉛筆寫下你的名字。

eng: Whose guitar is this?
A friend in need is a friend indeed.
When the cat is away, the mice will play.
simp: 猫儿不在，老鼠玩的轻鬆自在。
trad: 貓兒不在，老鼠玩的輕鬆自在。

eng: When the cat is away, the mice will play.
simp: 上司不在，部下就轻鬆自在。
trad: 上司不在，部下就輕鬆自在。

eng: A friend in need is a friend indeed.
simp: 在你有需要的时候，会帮你的朋友才是真正的朋友。
trad: 在你有需要的時候，會幫你的朋友才是真正的朋友。

eng: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
simp: 婚前张开眼，婚后半闭眼。
trad: 婚前張開眼，婚後半閉眼。

eng: Haste makes waste.
Money is the root of all evil.
Let well alone.
Much ado about nothing.
Caesar is not above grammarians.
Don't look a gift horse in the mouth.
simp: 不要对人家送的礼物挑三拣四，嫌东嫌西的。
trad: 不要對人家送的禮物挑三揀四，嫌東嫌西的。

eng: All that glitters is not gold.
Don't look a gift horse in the mouth.
All that glitters is not gold.
The end justifies the means.
simp: 为了正当目的可以不择手段。
trad: 為了正當目的可以不擇手段。

eng: Strike while the iron is hot.
Moderation in all things.
No pain, no gain.
Everyone deserves a second chance.
simp: 每个人都值得被给予第二次机会。
trad: 每個人都值得被給予第二次機會。

eng: He laughs best who laughs last.
simp: 最后笑的人，才是笑得最得意的人。
trad: 最後笑的人，才是笑得最得意的人。

eng: Speech is silver, but silence is golden.
Hunger is the best sauce.
Health is better than wealth.
Money does not grow on trees.
What is done cannot be undone.
Faint heart never won fair lady.
The danger past and God forgotten.
simp: 遇难求上帝，过后全忘记。
trad: 遇難求上帝，過後全忘記。

eng: To err is human, to forgive divine.
After a storm comes a calm.
After a storm comes a calm.
Women will have the last word.
simp: 通常女人都是最后发言有决定权的。
trad: 通常女人都是最後發言有決定權的。

eng: Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
simp: 小别胜新婚，久别情更深。
trad: 小別勝新婚，久別情更深。

eng: There is no place like home.
simp: 金窝银窝不如自己的狗窝。
trad: 金窩銀窩不如自己的狗窩。

eng: There is no fire without smoke.
Secret gifts are openly rewarded.
simp: 秘密的礼物公开的奖励。
trad: 秘密的禮物公開的獎勵。

eng: Secret gifts are openly rewarded.
simp: 如果在暗中做善事，也总是有一个良好的回报。
trad: 如果在暗中做善事，也總是有一個良好的回報。

eng: Better be the head of a cat than the tail of a lion.
An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth.
There's no use crying over spilt milk.
simp: 为打翻的牛奶而哭泣是没用的。
trad: 為打翻的牛奶而哭泣是沒用的。

eng: Short accounts make long friends.
simp: 借钱还得快，友情永不坏。
trad: 借錢還得快，友情永不壞。

eng: I have the right to speak, too.
Every cloud has a silver lining.
Every cloud has a silver lining.
simp: 山穷水尽疑无路，柳暗花明又一村。
trad: 山窮水盡疑無路，柳暗花明又一村。

eng: Too much spoils, too little is nothing.
simp: 过多会坏事，过少不济事。
trad: 過多會壞事，過少不濟事。

eng: A little learning is a dangerous thing.
Forewarned is forearmed.
Forewarned is forearmed.
A stitch in time saves nine.
simp: 小洞及时补，免遭大洞苦。
trad: 小洞及時補，免遭大洞苦。

eng: A stitch in time saves nine.
Children are poor men's riches.
Today above ground tomorrow under.
simp: 今天在地上，明天在地下。
trad: 今天在地上，明天在地下。

eng: Our house, our rules.
simp: 我们的房子，我们的规则。
trad: 我們的房子，我們的規則。

eng: Ill weeds grow apace.
simp: 莠草易长， 恶习易染。
trad: 莠草易長， 惡習易染。

eng: A cornered rat will bite a cat.
Dead men tell no tales.
After rain comes fair weather.
To see is to believe.
One man's meat is another man's poison.
simp: 对某人有利的对另外的人未必有利。
trad: 對某人有利的對另外的人未必有利。

eng: The spirit is willing, but the flesh is weak.
Raise up your left hand.
A fool's bolt is soon shot.
simp: 蠢人一下子就把箭射完。
trad: 蠢人一下子就把箭射完。

eng: What time is dinner?
A fool and his money are soon parted.
No cross, no crown.
No sweet without sweat.
Money ruins many.
The eagle does not catch flies.
Like water off a duck's back.
simp: 如水流过鸭背般毫无反应。
trad: 如水流過鴨背般毫無反應。

eng: This chair is too small.
Throw a sprat to catch a whale.
It's never too late to make amends.
A loaf of bread is better than the songs of birds.
There is no rose without a thorn.
Everything comes to those who wait.
simp: 成功属于耐心等待的人。
trad: 成功屬於耐心等待的人。

eng: Don't cry before you're hurt.
Speak of angels and you hear their wings.
simp: 说到天使，你就听到他们翅膀挥动的声音。
trad: 說到天使，你就聽到他們翅膀揮動的聲音。

eng: Many a true word is spoken in jest.
New Year's Day is the key to the year.
His wife is our Italian teacher.
simp: 他太太是我们义大利文的老师。
trad: 他太太是我們義大利文的老師。

eng: I don't like coffee.
Do you know his older brother?
She tossed me grapes and I tried to catch them with my mouth.
simp: 她朝我丢葡萄，我试着用嘴接住它们。
trad: 她朝我丟葡萄，我試著用嘴接住它們。

eng: The cough syrup has a licorice flavoring.
simp: 咳嗽糖浆有股甘草的味道。
trad: 咳嗽糖漿有股甘草的味道。

eng: You have to clean your room.
At last, we reached our destination.
simp: 我们终于达到了我们的目标。
trad: 我們終於達到了我們的目標。

eng: I paid the bill.
He's a comedian.
This book will be of great use to us.
simp: 这本书会对我们有很大用处。
trad: 這本書會對我們有很大用處。

eng: They are talking about music.
Don't sit upon it.
If you want a pencil, I'll lend you one.
simp: 如果你需要铅笔，我借你一支。
trad: 如果你需要鉛筆，我借你一支。

eng: Her speech moved the audience.
I love you, sweet heart.
We ran in the park.
There was a castle here many years ago.
simp: 许多年前这里有一座城堡。
trad: 許多年前這裏有一座城堡。

eng: I won't sell this tree shade.
He came here ten minutes ago.
Tatoeba: Ever heard of sentence fights? Yeah, that's what we do for fun.
simp: Tatoeba:听过句子打架吗？是啊，那是我们为好玩做的。
trad: Tatoeba:聽過句子打架嗎？是啊，那是我們為好玩做的。

eng: Because we love you, we are updating Tatoeba to bring you a better user experience. See? We love you huh?
simp: 因为我们爱你，我们正在更新Tatoeba以便为您带来更好的用户体验。看吧？我们爱你吧？
trad: 因為我們愛你，我們正在更新Tatoeba以便為您帶來更好的用戶體驗。看吧？我們愛你吧？

eng: In its home country, France, Tatoeba became a social and cultural phenomenon.
simp: 在其本国，法国，Tatoeba成为一种社会文化现象。
trad: 在其本國，法國，Tatoeba成為一種社會文化現象。

eng: Sentences past this ID are sentences added by contributors of Tatoeba Project.
simp: 过去这个ID的句子是被Tatoeba计划的贡献者所添加的。
trad: 過去這個ID的句子是被Tatoeba計劃的貢獻者所添加的。

eng: Tatoeba is created for adding and collecting example sentences.
simp: Tatoeba是为了添加和收集例句而被创建。
trad: Tatoeba是為了添加和收集例句而被創建。

eng: Audio in Tatoeba sentences are provided by Shtooka.
simp: Tatoeba句子的音频是由Shtooka所提供。
trad: Tatoeba句子的音頻是由Shtooka所提供。

eng: The audio feature is only available in some sentences in Chinese, Dutch, French, German and Shanghainese.
simp: 音频功能仅适用在某些语言的句子中，如中文，荷兰语，法语，德语和上海话。
trad: 音頻功能僅適用在某些語言的句子中，如中文，荷蘭語，法語，德語和上海話。

eng: Tatoeba: Join the dark side. We have chocolate cookies.
simp: Tatoeba:加入黑暗的一面。我们有巧克力饼乾。
trad: Tatoeba:加入黑暗的一面。我們有巧克力餅乾。

eng: Tatoeba: Sentences, sentences, and more sentences.
simp: Tatoeba:句子，句子和更多的句子。
trad: Tatoeba:句子，句子和更多的句子。

eng: Tatoeba: Because you can't meet enough frenchies.
simp: Tatoeba: 因为你不能遇到够多的法国人。
trad: Tatoeba: 因為你不能遇到夠多的法國人。

eng: Tatoeba: As if the geek invasion wasn't enough.
simp: Tatoeba:好像怪客入侵还不够似的。
trad: Tatoeba:好像怪客入侵還不夠似的。

eng: FSI officer: "Sir, there is a website where ANYONE can add a sentence in a foreign language!". FSI president: "What?! Bomb them!".
simp: FSI人员:"长官，有一个网站，任何人都可以加上一个外国语言的句子!"。FSI主席:"什麽? 炸掉他们!"。
trad: FSI人員:"長官，有一個網站，任何人都可以加上一個外國語言的句子!"。FSI主席:"什麼? 炸掉他們!"。

eng: Honey, quick, quick. There's this website called Tatoeba that's auctioning its sentence collection for a cent each! They've even got special offers like buy 100 sentences and get 1 free! "Ah great! now people collect sentences as a hobby?! What's the world coming to!"
simp: 亲爱的，快，快。有个名为Tatoeba的网站正在拍卖它的句子收藏一句每一分钱！他们甚至有个优惠像是买一百句送一句！ "啊太好了！现在人们收集句子当作嗜好？！这是什麽世界来着！"
trad: 親愛的，快，快。有個名為Tatoeba的網站正在拍賣它的句子收藏一句每一分錢！他們甚至有個優惠像是買一百句送一句！ "啊太好了！現在人們收集句子當作嗜好？！這是什麼世界來著！"

eng: In Tatoeba, you gotta always listen to veteran members. They'll tell you what can't be done and why. Then do it.
simp: 在Tatoeba，你必须总是倾听资深成员。他们会告诉你什麽不能做，以及为什麽。然后你去做。
trad: 在Tatoeba，你必須總是傾聽資深成員。他們會告訴你什麼不能做，以及為什麼。然後你去做。

eng: Tatoeba: Where debates are hotter than two rabbits making babies in a sock!
simp: Tatoeba:凡辩论温度超过两隻兔子的会使婴儿在袜子裡！
trad: Tatoeba:凡辯論溫度超過兩隻兔子的會使嬰兒在襪子裡！

eng: Tatoeba is open source software.
Tatoeba: Where quotes go to die.
simp: Tatoeba:是一个引述都去死的地方。
trad: Tatoeba:是一個引述都去死的地方。

eng: You have added a comment, not a translation. To add a translation, click on the «あ→а» icon above the sentence.
simp: 您已添加了评论，而不是一个翻译。要添加一个翻译，点击这句话上面的«あ→а»图标。
trad: 您已添加了評論，而不是一個翻譯。要添加一個翻譯，點擊這句話上面的«あ→а»圖標。

eng: Tatoeba: Where sentences are always sentences, except when they aren't.
simp: Tatoeba:句子永远是句子，除非他们不是。
trad: Tatoeba:句子永遠是句子，除非他們不是。

eng: I think that it's too big.
He will be sorry for it some day.
simp: 他总有一天会为此感到愧疚的。
trad: 他總有一天會為此感到愧疚的。

eng: Do you know what the time is?
You don't like chocolate, do you?
Does anyone here speak English?
The teacher recommended that I read Shakespeare.
simp: 老师建议我读莎士比亚。
trad: 老師建議我讀莎士比亞。

eng: He is a novelist and poet.
simp: 他是一位小说家和诗人。
trad: 他是一位小說家和詩人。

eng: When do you work?
The girl didn't like to wash dishes.
Answer in English.
It is said that she is an expert in skiing.
I'd like to study in China to improve the level of my Chinese.
simp: 为了提高我的汉语水平，我想去中国学习。
trad: 為了提高我的漢語水平，我想去中國學習。

eng: The reason we're on strike is that the company hasn't improved our wages.
simp: 我们罢工是因为公司没有改善我们的工资。
trad: 我們罷工是因為公司沒有改善我們的工資。

eng: The reason we're on strike is that the company hasn't improved our wages.
simp: 我们罢工之所以是因为公司没有涨我们的工资。
trad: 我們罷工之所以是因為公司沒有漲我們的工資。

eng: I'm a foreigner.
Tatoeba: Join the dark side. We have chocolate cookies.
simp: Tatoeba：加入黑暗的一面。我们有巧克力曲奇饼。
trad: Tatoeba：加入黑暗的一面。我們有巧克力曲奇餅。

eng: A good neighbour is better than a brother far off.
simp: 一个好邻居胜于一个遥远的朋友。
trad: 一個好鄰居勝於一個遙遠的朋友。

eng: I met him just as he was coming out of school.
simp: 正当他从学校回来的时候，我遇见了他。
trad: 正當他從學校回來的時候，我遇見了他。

eng: Look at that smoke.
Mathematicians are poets, except that they have to prove what their fantasy creates.
simp: 数学家是诗人，不过他们必须也能证明他们想像力的果实。
trad: 數學家是詩人，不過他們必須也能證明他們想像力的果實。

eng: We should break up.
Tatoeba: Because you can't meet enough frenchies.
simp: Tatoeba： 因为从来不能遇到够多的法国人。
trad: Tatoeba： 因為從來不能遇到夠多的法國人。

eng: The reason we're on strike is that the company hasn't improved our wages.
simp: 我们要罢工的理由是因为公司没有改善我们的工资。
trad: 我們要罷工的理由是因為公司沒有改善我們的工資。

eng: When are you going home?
Will you lend me your CD player for an hour?
simp: 你能借我你的CD播放机一小时吗？
trad: 你能借我你的CD播放機一小時嗎？

eng: She thought of herself as being charming enough.
simp: 她认为她自己够迷人的了。
trad: 她認為她自己夠迷人的了。

eng: He thought of himself as being charming enough.
simp: 他认为他自己够迷人的了。
trad: 他認為他自己夠迷人的了。

eng: Who will take care of the dog while we are away?
simp: 当我们离开的时候，谁来照顾狗？
trad: 當我們離開的時候，誰來照顧狗？

eng: The company invested a lot of money in this project.
simp: 该公司在这个企划中投入了很多钱。
trad: 該公司在這個企劃中投入了很多錢。

eng: As far as I know, your letter is under that book.
simp: 据我所知，你的信在那本书下面。
trad: 據我所知，你的信在那本書下面。

eng: Columbus's Law of Discovery states: If you discovered something BEFORE Christopher Columbus, then what you discovered does not exist.
simp: 哥伦布的发现新大陆法则：如果你在克里斯多福·哥伦布之前发现了某个东西，那麽你所发现的是不存在的。
trad: 哥倫布的發現新大陸法則：如果你在克裏斯多福·哥倫布之前發現了某個東西，那麼你所發現的是不存在的。

eng: With Renaissance, scholastic ideas gave place to positive ideas.
simp: 随着文艺复兴，学院派的想法被积极的想法取而代之了。
trad: 隨著文藝復興，學院派的想法被積極的想法取而代之了。

eng: Whose book is this?
Some of the roses in my garden are white, and others are red.
simp: 一些在我的花园裡的玫瑰是白色的，其他的则是红色的。
trad: 一些在我的花園裡的玫瑰是白色的，其他的則是紅色的。

eng: I can’t stand panties.
The serpent tempted Eve.
Tony speaks English as well as you.
simp: 汤尼英语说得和你一样好。
trad: 湯尼英語說得和你一樣好。

eng: This is old news to me.
If I were a brain in a vat, I wouldn't write this.
simp: 如果我的大脑在大桶裡，我就不会写这个了。
trad: 如果我的大腦在大桶裡，我就不會寫這個了。

eng: A fish rots from the head down.
A fish rots from the head down.
I want to watch the concert of Kylie Minogue.
simp: 我想看凯莉米洛的演唱会。
trad: 我想看凱莉米洛的演唱會。

eng: I was almost crying for Kylie Minogue.
simp: 我几乎要为凯莉米洛哭了。
trad: 我幾乎要為凱莉米洛哭了。

eng: Here goes nothing.
I know that some people value my work.
simp: 我知道有些人看重我的工作。
trad: 我知道有些人看重我的工作。

eng: He wears glasses.
Don't marry. Be happy!
Won't somebody please think of the children?!
simp: 拜託不会有人想到孩子们吗?!
trad: 拜託不會有人想到孩子們嗎?!

eng: Mortal enemies are immortal friends.
simp: 不共戴天的敌人是不朽的朋友。
trad: 不共戴天的敵人是不朽的朋友。

eng: I'm not always right, I just always correct you when you make mistakes.
simp: 我并不总是正确的，我只是总在你犯错的时候纠正你。
trad: 我並不總是正確的，我只是總在你犯錯的時候糾正你。

eng: I know that I know it, but I can't remember it.
simp: 我知道我知道它，但我想不起来了。
trad: 我知道我知道它，但我想不起來了。

eng: Saeb thinks mathematicians are self-contained walking pieces of heaven.
simp: 赛义认为数学家自给自足的独行于一小块天堂。
trad: 賽義認為數學家自給自足的獨行於一小塊天堂。

eng: The interviewer identifies his interviewees.
simp: 这名採访者确认了他的採访对象。
trad: 這名採訪者確認了他的採訪對象。

eng: The interviewer introduces the topic of the interview.
simp: 採访者介绍了採访的主题。
trad: 採訪者介紹了採訪的主題。

eng: When you pose a question, you expect an answer.
simp: 当你提出一个问题，你期望得到答桉。
trad: 當你提出一個問題，你期望得到答案。

eng: The project was a great success.
We suggest raising the fees.
She renewed the soil in the flower pot.
We're on strike because the company hasn't improved our wages.
simp: 我们之所以罢工是因为公司没有改善我们的工资。
trad: 我們之所以罷工是因為公司沒有改善我們的工資。

eng: There is always something happening here.
simp: 这裡总有一些事情在发生。
trad: 這裡總有一些事情在發生。

eng: Paint our house. Use the orange paint.
simp: 油漆我们的房子。使用橙色的油漆。
trad: 油漆我們的房子。使用橙色的油漆。

eng: He decided to become a pilot.
simp: 他决定成为一名飞行员。
trad: 他決定成為一名飛行員。

eng: Who solved the hard problem?
He is not as intelligent as his brother.
His words gave me hope.
The high house was covered with a thatched roof.
simp: 这栋很高的房子被茅草屋顶覆盖着。
trad: 這棟很高的房子被茅草屋頂覆蓋著。

eng: Not yet.
You should not adulterate wine with water.
simp: 你不应该把水溷入葡萄酒裡。
trad: 你不應該把水混入葡萄酒裡。

eng: I am afraid that I shall not be free till the examination is over.
simp: 恐怕直到考试结束前我都没空。
trad: 恐怕直到考試結束前我都沒空。

eng: You're the only one who can help me.
That old guy is really nice.
simp: 那个老人非常 亲切。
trad: 那個老人非常 親切。

eng: She is quite pretty, but looks unhealthy.
simp: 她佷美， 可是看起来不健康。
trad: 她佷美， 可是看起來不健康。

eng: You cannot compare the strength of a man to that of a tiger, but nevertheless, the tiger is still the inferior creature.
simp: 虎与人是无法比拼力量的，但是，老虎还是比人类低等。
trad: 虎與人是無法比拼力量的，但是，老虎還是比人類低等。

eng: I'll try again, thank you.
I provided him with food.
You don't like gambling, do you?
Do you think your schooldays are the happiest days of your life?
simp: 你认为你的学生时代是你一生中最快乐的日子吗？
trad: 你認為你的學生時代是你一生中最快樂的日子嗎？

eng: You live and learn.
The dwarves are great smiths.
Lips that touch liquor shall not touch mine.
simp: 碰过酒的嘴唇就别想碰我的唇。
trad: 碰過酒的嘴唇就別想碰我的唇。

eng: As people get older, their brain cells become less efficient.
simp: 随着人们年龄的增长，其脑细胞就变得比较没有效率。
trad: 隨著人們年齡的增長，其腦細胞就變得比較沒有效率。

eng: Use it or lose it.
You're weird - I like you.
Feel free to stay.
I know it, but I can't hit on it.
You are vegetarian.
Do you have a house on your own?
I am on the right.
Tomorrow, tomorrow, just not today - say all lazy people.
simp: 明天，明天，只是不是今天-所有的懒惰的人都这麽说。
trad: 明天，明天，只是不是今天-所有的懶惰的人都這麼說。

eng: He still has springtime on the brain.
Do you have two computers?
If I were healthy, I would be happy.
simp: 如果我很健康，我会很快乐。
trad: 如果我很健康，我會很快樂。

eng: Johnny was a chemist; now Johnny is no more. For what he thought was water, was H2SO4.
simp: Johny以前是个化学家，但现在Johny不再是了。他以前所想的是水，是硫酸。
trad: Johny以前是個化學家，但現在Johny不再是了。他以前所想的是水，是硫酸。

eng: You're delusional. Go to bed!
What would you do in the event of a zombie apocalypse?
simp: 在殭尸启示录的事件中你会怎麽做？
trad: 在殭屍啟示錄的事件中你會怎麼做？

eng: Switching on a fleshlight won't help you see in the dark.
simp: 开启野战手电筒不会帮助你在黑暗中看得到。
trad: 開啟野戰手電筒不會幫助你在黑暗中看得到。

eng: The building is one hundred meters high.
The hawk caught a mouse.
You have foul breath.

Read, every day, something no one else is reading. Think, every day, something no one else is thinking. Do, every day, something no one else would be silly enough to do. It is bad for the mind to be always part of unanimity.
simp: 每天读一些没有人读的东西。每天想一些没有人想的东西。每天做一些没有人会傻到去做的事。一直和别人保持一致对头脑有害。
trad: 每天讀一些沒有人讀的東西。每天想一些沒有人想的東西。每天做一些沒有人會傻到去做的事。一直和別人保持一致對頭腦有害。

eng: Teaching is learning.
Life never ends but earthly life does.
simp: 生活从不会停止，但世俗生活却会。
trad: 生活從不會停止，但世俗生活卻會。

eng: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.
simp: 惧怕爱就是惧怕生活，那些惧怕生活的人已经有四分之三部分死了。
trad: 懼怕愛就是懼怕生活，那些懼怕生活的人已經有四分之三部分死了。

eng: Please select a language for the Image Viewer interface.
simp: 请为Image Viewer的界面选择语言。
trad: 請為Image Viewer的界面選擇語言。

eng: I need a pencil. Can I use one of yours?
simp: 我需要一支铅笔，我能用你的其中一支吗？
trad: 我需要一支鉛筆，我能用你的其中一支嗎？

eng: The red flag indicated the presence of danger.
When is it convenient for you?
Who's in charge of this section?
Who is the author of this story?
Who is the boss of this company?
Who is hiding behind the curtain?
Who is the woman standing there?
Where is the wedding to be?
Who is the girl at the door?
Who is the girl standing over there?
Who is going to speak tonight?
Who is that boy running toward us?
simp: 那个朝我们跑过来的男孩是谁？
trad: 那個朝我們跑過來的男孩是誰？

eng: Who's in charge of the sales section?
When and where is breakfast served?
Where is the longest tunnel in Japan?
simp: 日本最长的隧道在哪里？
trad: 日本最長的隧道在哪裏？

eng: Who is that woman holding the flowers?
simp: 那个拿着花的女人是谁？
trad: 那個拿著花的女人是誰？

eng: There are a lot of things you don't know about my personality.
simp: 我的个性还有很多方面是你不了解的。
trad: 我的個性還有很多方面是你不了解的。

eng: Do you have difficulty understanding what women or small children say to you?
simp: 你难以理解女人和小孩子对你说的话吗？
trad: 你難以理解女人和小孩子對你說的話嗎？

eng: I would like to try the blue striped skirt.
simp: 我想试一下那条蓝色条纹裙。
trad: 我想試一下那條藍色條紋裙。

eng: The tap is running.
Please tell us where there is a spice shop.
simp: 请告诉我们哪儿有食品杂货店。
trad: 請告訴我們哪兒有食品雜貨店。

eng: We suspect it's about a poisoning by snake bite.
simp: 我们猜这是一种被蛇咬伤的毒。
trad: 我們猜這是一種被蛇咬傷的毒。

eng: However, the singer does not deny her ancestry.
simp: 但是歌手并不否认她的出身。
trad: 但是歌手並不否認她的出身。

eng: To the man who only has a hammer in the toolkit, every problem looks like a nail.
simp: 对工具箱里只有一把榔头的人来说，所有的问题都像钉子。
trad: 對工具箱裏只有一把榔頭的人來說，所有的問題都像釘子。

eng: The second half of a man's life is made up of nothing but the habits he has acquired during the first half.
simp: 人的后半生就是由他前半生养成的习惯所构成的，其他什么都没有。
trad: 人的後半生就是由他前半生養成的習慣所構成的，其他什麼都沒有。

eng: Pick up your things and go away.
Since Mario lied to me, I don't speak to him anymore.
simp: 自从马里奥对我撒了谎，我就再也不跟他说话了。
trad: 自從馬裏奧對我撒了謊，我就再也不跟他說話了。

eng: Almost half the men in Great Britain regularly give chocolate to their partner, especially for their birthday.
simp: 大部分大不列颠的男人定期送巧克力作礼物给他们的合伙人，尤其是在他们生日的时候。
trad: 大部分大不列顛的男人定期送巧克力作禮物給他們的合夥人，尤其是在他們生日的時候。

eng: She's selling drugs at concerts.
simp: 她在演唱会的场地贩卖毒品。
trad: 她在演唱會的場地販賣毒品。

eng: Here comes the bride!
I hope that your brother is better.
He is less clever than his elder brother.
You should obey your parents.
The girl playing the piano is my sister.
simp: 弹钢琴的女孩是我妹妹。
trad: 彈鋼琴的女孩是我妹妹。

eng: My sister often cries.
He has two daughters.
My uncle gave me a gift.
simp: 我叔叔送了我一样礼物。
trad: 我叔叔送了我一樣禮物。

eng: Image Viewer is an image viewing software. This software is a very small program. This software has basic functions only. This is translatable by Tatoeba Project users.
simp: Image Viewer是一款图片查看软件。该软件是一个非常小的程序。只有基础功能。可以被Tatoeba项目的用户翻译。
trad: Image Viewer是一款圖片查看軟件。該軟件是一個非常小的程序。只有基礎功能。可以被Tatoeba項目的用戶翻譯。

eng: So that's Tatoeba.
That's awesome, right?
And actually, this project needs everyone.
simp: 事实上，这个项目需要大家。
trad: 事實上，這個項目需要大家。

eng: Tatoeba is really multilingual. All the languages are interconnected.
simp: Tatoeba确实是多语言的。所有的语言都互相关联。
trad: Tatoeba確實是多語言的。所有的語言都互相關聯。

eng: And everyone has the ability to contribute.
simp: 每个人都有能力作贡献。
trad: 每個人都有能力作貢獻。

eng: It doesn't require you to be a polyglot.
Everyone speaks a language.
simp: 每个人都会说一种语言。
trad: 每個人都會說一種語言。

eng: Tatoeba is a dictionary.
But where do we get those sentences? And how do we translate them?
simp: 但我们从哪儿弄到那些句子？我们又要如何翻译呢？
trad: 但我們從哪兒弄到那些句子？我們又要如何翻譯呢？

eng: Obviously, this cannot be the work of one person. This is why Tatoeba is collaborative.
simp: 很明显，这不可能是一个人的工作。这就是为什么Tatoeba是一个合作项目。
trad: 很明顯，這不可能是一個人的工作。這就是為什麼Tatoeba是一個合作項目。

eng: You can search words, and get translations. But it's not exactly a typical dictionary.
simp: 你们可以搜索词并得到翻译。但这真不是一本寻常的字典。
trad: 你們可以搜索詞並得到翻譯。但這真不是一本尋常的字典。

eng: You can search sentences containing a certain word and get translations for these sentences.
simp: 你们可以搜索含有某个词的句子并得到这些句子的翻译。
trad: 你們可以搜索含有某個詞的句子並得到這些句子的翻譯。

eng: Why sentences? …you may ask. Well, because sentences are more interesting.
simp: 为什么是句子呢？。。。你们可能要问。好吧，那是因为句子更有意思。
trad: 為什麼是句子呢？。。。你們可能要問。好吧，那是因為句子更有意思。

eng: So we love sentences. But, even more, we love languages.
simp: 所以我们喜欢句子。更进一步来说，我们喜欢语言。
trad: 所以我們喜歡句子。更進一步來說，我們喜歡語言。

eng: Mr. Suzuki studied French before he went to France.
simp: 铃木先生在去法国之前学了法语。
trad: 鈴木先生在去法國之前學了法語。

eng: She has a good command of English though she was brought up in Japan.
simp: 虽然她在日本被抚养长大，但是她精通英语。
trad: 雖然她在日本被撫養長大，但是她精通英語。

eng: Julia's native language is Italian.
This book is for students whose native language is not Japanese.
simp: 这本书是给母语不是日语的学生的。
trad: 這本書是給母語不是日語的學生的。

eng: Our native language is Japanese.
This book is intended for students who do not speak Japanese as a native language.
simp: 这本书是打算给不以日语为母语的学生所使用的。
trad: 這本書是打算給不以日語為母語的學生所使用的。

eng: English is my native language.
Italian is my mother tongue.
Do you speak German? "No, I don't."
What was that person saying? "He couldn't communicate in Russian at all so I told him off in Russian."
simp: 那个人在说什麽? "他一点也无法用俄语沟通，所以我用俄语责备他。"
trad: 那個人在說什麼? "他一點也無法用俄語溝通，所以我用俄語責備他。"

eng: 80% of all English words come from other languages.
Eighty percent of all information on computers around the world is in English.
simp: 全世界百分之八十电脑上的资讯都是用英语写的。
trad: 全世界百分之八十電腦上的資訊都是用英語寫的。

eng: Four hundred million people speak English as their first language.
simp: 四亿人以英语作为他们的第一语言。
trad: 四億人以英語作為他們的第一語言。

eng: A lot of students around the world are studying English.
simp: 世界上许多学生正在学习英语。
trad: 世界上許多學生正在學習英語。

eng: According to my experience, it takes one year to master French grammar.
simp: 根据我的经验，掌握法语语法需要一年的时间。
trad: 根據我的經驗，掌握法語語法需要一年的時間。

eng: Accordingly, besides noun declension patterns, there also existed a greater variety of verb conjugation patterns than in Modern English.
simp: 因此，除了名词的变格之外，也存在比现代英语多的动词的各种变型。
trad: 因此，除了名詞的變格之外，也存在比現代英語多的動詞的各種變型。

eng: After I got all worked up about ordering in English, I walked in the store and they greeted me with "Irasshaimase!" I felt, like, "What the ...?"
simp: 在我准备好用英语来订购东西之后，我走进商店，他们对我打招呼时却说"Irasshaimase!" 我感觉像是，"搞什麽东西啊...?"
trad: 在我準備好用英語來訂購東西之後，我走進商店，他們對我打招呼時卻說"Irasshaimase!" 我感覺像是，"搞什麼東西啊...?"

eng: After school, I go to an English school to practice English conversation.
simp: 放学后，我到一所英语学校去练习英语会话。
trad: 放學後，我到一所英語學校去練習英語會話。

eng: All languages are equal, but English is more equal than the others.
simp: 所有语言都是平等的，但英语比其他语言更平等。
trad: 所有語言都是平等的，但英語比其他語言更平等。

eng: All languages being equal, English is the most equal of all.
simp: 所有的语言都是平等的，但英语是所有语言中最平等的。
trad: 所有的語言都是平等的，但英語是所有語言中最平等的。

eng: All of these meetings are in English.
simp: 所有这些会议都是以英语进行的。
trad: 所有這些會議都是以英語進行的。

eng: All of us talk in English.
simp: 我们所有的人用英语交谈。
trad: 我們所有的人用英語交談。

eng: All students of English should have a good English-English dictionary at hand.
simp: 所有学英语的学生应该随手有一本好的英英词典。
trad: 所有學英語的學生應該隨手有一本好的英英詞典。

eng: All you have to do is try hard to master English.
simp: 所有您必须要做的事就是努力地学好英语。
trad: 所有您必須要做的事就是努力地學好英語。

eng: Almost all the students like English.
simp: 几乎所有的学生喜欢英语。
trad: 幾乎所有的學生喜歡英語。

eng: An English-Japanese dictionary is surely a must have book, not just for those taking TOEIC, but for all studying English.
simp: 一本英日字典无疑地是一本必备的书，不仅是对那些参加多益考试的人，而且是对所有学习英语的人。
trad: 一本英日字典無疑地是一本必備的書，不僅是對那些參加多益考試的人，而且是對所有學習英語的人。

eng: Andy is master of French and German.
simp: 安迪是精通法语和德语。
trad: 安迪是精通法語和德語。

eng: Answer the following questions in English.
Are there any English magazines in this library?
simp: 这间图书馆有任何英语杂志吗?
trad: 這間圖書館有任何英語雜誌嗎?

eng: Are you listening to English?
Are you studying English?
Are you teaching Spanish?
As a matter of fact, I do speak Spanish.
As it is written in simple English, this book is easy to read.
simp: 由于是用简单的英语所写的，这本书很容易阅读。
trad: 由於是用簡單的英語所寫的，這本書很容易閱讀。

eng: As more time passed, these Creoles became separate languages: Spanish, French, Italian, etc.
simp: 随着时间的流逝，这些克里奥尔语成为了独立的语言：西班牙语，法语，意大利语等等。
trad: 隨著時間的流逝，這些克裏奧爾語成為了獨立的語言：西班牙語，法語，意大利語等等。

eng: At first, he could not speak English at all.
At school I had enjoyed reading Japanese literature in English translation, in particular Soseki's I am a Cat and Kokoro, and Akutagawa's The Nose and Kappa.
simp: 在学校我喜欢阅读日本文学的英文翻译，特别是夏目漱石的我是一隻猫和心，和芥川龙之介的鼻子和河童。
trad: 在學校我喜歡閱讀日本文學的英文翻譯，特別是夏目漱石的我是一隻貓和心，和芥川龍之介的鼻子和河童。

eng: At the time I managed to make myself understood in English.
simp: 当时我设法让别人听得懂我说的英语。
trad: 當時我設法讓別人聽得懂我說的英語。

eng: At the time there were no native English speakers teaching in any public school.
simp: 当时没有任何以英语为母语的人在公立学校任教。
trad: 當時沒有任何以英語為母語的人在公立學校任教。

eng: At this language centre, about 15 international languages are taught, including English.
simp: 在这个语言中心，教授约15种国际语言，包括英语。
trad: 在這個語言中心，教授約15種國際語言，包括英語。

eng: Aya has good reason to speak perfect German.
simp: 绫有充分的理由能说流利的德语。
trad: 綾有充分的理由能說流利的德語。

eng: Because it is written in simple English even a child can understand it.
simp: 因为这是用简单的英语写的，所以甚至连孩子都能理解。
trad: 因為這是用簡單的英語寫的，所以甚至連孩子都能理解。

eng: Because of its origins, Canadian English has features of both American and British English.
simp: 由于它的起源，加拿大英语具有美国英语和​​英国英语两者的特色。
trad: 由於它的起源，加拿大英語具有美國英語和​​英國英語兩者的特色。

eng: Before going to France we decided to study French.
simp: 我们决定在去法国之前学习法语。
trad: 我們決定在去法國之前學習法語。

eng: Before going to France, Mr. Suzuki studied French.
simp: 铃木先生在去法国之前学习法语。
trad: 鈴木先生在去法國之前學習法語。

eng: Beginners should learn spoken English first.
simp: 初学者应先学习口说英语。
trad: 初學者應先學習口說英語。

eng: Being a good conversationalist does not just mean being a good speaker of English.
simp: 作为一个良好的交谈者，并不只意味着作一个英语说得好的说话者。
trad: 作為一個良好的交談者，並不只意味著作一個英語說得好的說話者。

eng: Bob is the only student that can speak Spanish in our class.
simp: 鲍勃是我们班上唯一会讲西班牙语的学生。
trad: 鮑勃是我們班上唯一會講西班牙語的學生。

eng: Born in America, Taro speaks good English.
simp: 因为出生在美国，Taro英语讲得很好。
trad: 因為出生在美國，Taro英語講得很好。

eng: Born in England, he speaks British English.
simp: 因为出生在英国，他说英国英语。
trad: 因為出生在英國，他說英國英語。

eng: Both French and English are spoken in Canada.
simp: 在加拿大的人说法语和英语。
trad: 在加拿大的人說法語和英語。

eng: Brian studied English for this trip.
simp: 布莱恩为了这次旅行学英语。
trad: 布萊恩為了這次旅行學英語。

eng: But he is bad at reading English.
simp: 但是他不擅于阅读英文。
trad: 但是他不擅於閱讀英文。

eng: By the way, my English is absolutely hopeless.
simp: 顺道一提，我的英语是绝对没有希望了。
trad: 順道一提，我的英語是絕對沒有希望了。

eng: Can he speak English?
Can you communicate in English what you want to say?
simp: 您能用英语沟通您想要说的话吗？
trad: 您能用英語溝通您想要說的話嗎？

eng: Can you count to ten in Chinese?
Can you express yourself in English?
simp: 你能用英语表达自己吗？
trad: 你能用英語表達自己嗎？

eng: Can you make yourself understood in English?
simp: 别人听得懂你说的英语吗?
trad: 別人聽得懂你說的英語嗎?

eng: Can you make yourself understood in French?
simp: 别人听得懂你说的法语吗？
trad: 別人聽得懂你說的法語嗎？

eng: Can you speak either Chinese or Russian?
Can you translate English into Japanese?
simp: 你可以把英文翻译成日语吗？
trad: 你可以把英文翻譯成日語嗎？

eng: Can you write a letter in English?
simp: 你会用英语写一封信吗？
trad: 你會用英語寫一封信嗎？

eng: Carol is studying Spanish.
simp: 卡罗正在学习西班牙语。
trad: 卡羅正在學習西班牙語。

eng: Could she make herself understood in French in Paris?
simp: 在巴黎别人听得懂她说的法语吗？
trad: 在巴黎別人聽得懂她說的法語嗎？

eng: Could you put this report into Italian for me?
simp: 你可以为我把这份报告翻译成意大利文吗？
trad: 你可以為我把這份報告翻譯成意大利文嗎？

eng: Could you say that in plain English?
David can speak French fluently.
Despite being fascinated with English, many Japanese don't even try to study it.
simp: 儘管迷上了英语，许多日本人甚至不设法学习它。
trad: 儘管迷上了英語，許多日本人甚至不設法學習它。

eng: Did he study English yesterday?
Did you ever make a speech in English?
simp: 你曾经用英语演讲过吗？
trad: 你曾經用英語演講過嗎？

eng: Didn't you hear her speaking French?
Do they learn English?
Do they speak French in Canada?
simp: 他们在加拿大说法语吗？
trad: 他們在加拿大說法語嗎？

eng: Do you have a book written in English?
simp: 你有一本用英文写的书吗？
trad: 你有一本用英文寫的書嗎？

eng: Do you have an extra English dictionary by any chance?
simp: 您碰巧有一本额外的英文字典吗？
trad: 您碰巧有一本額外的英文字典嗎？

eng: Do you know how to speak English?
Do you know whether she can speak English?
simp: 你知道她是否会讲英语吗？
trad: 你知道她是否會講英語嗎？

eng: Do you like English?
Do you speak Chinese?
Can you speak French?
Do you speak German?
Do you study English every day?
Does anyone speak English?
Does he study English every day?
Does he write English letters?
Does he write letters in English?
Does she speak English?
Does the letter need to be written in English?
simp: 这封信需要用英文写吗？
trad: 這封信需要用英文寫嗎？

eng: Does this letter have to be written in English?
simp: 这封信必须用英文写吗?
trad: 這封信必須用英文寫嗎?

eng: Don't be afraid of making mistakes when you speak English.
simp: 当你说英语的时候不要怕犯错。
trad: 當你說英語的時候不要怕犯錯。

eng: Don't translate English into Japanese word for word.
simp: 不要逐字逐句的把英文翻译成日文。
trad: 不要逐字逐句的把英文翻譯成日文。

eng: Dutch is closely related to German.
simp: 荷兰语与德语关係密切。
trad: 荷蘭語與德語關係密切。

eng: Emi will study English.
English and German are two related languages.
simp: 英语和德语是两种相关的语言。
trad: 英語和德語是兩種相關的語言。

eng: English has spread all over the country.
English is a Germanic language.
English is a hard language to learn.
simp: 英语是一种难学的语言。
trad: 英語是一種難學的語言。

eng: English is a kind of universal language.
English is a language spoken all over the world.
simp: 英语是一种全世界通用的语言。
trad: 英語是一種全世界通用的語言。

eng: English is a means of communication.
simp: 英语是一种沟通的手段。
trad: 英語是一種溝通的手段。

eng: English is a universal language and is used all over the world.
simp: 英语是一种世界性的语言，用于世界各地。
trad: 英語是一種世界性的語言，用於世界各地。

eng: English is an international language.
English is by far the most widely-spoken language in the world.
simp: 英语是目前在世界上使用最广泛的语言。
trad: 英語是目前在世界上使用最廣泛的語言。

eng: English is difficult to learn.
English is difficult, isn't it?
English is easy to learn.
English is just one of over 2,700 languages in the world today.
simp: 今天，英语只是世界上超过2,700种语言的其中之一。
trad: 今天，英語只是世界上超過2,700種語言的其中之一。

eng: English is not difficult to learn.
English is not easy for him to learn.
simp: 英语对他来说是不容易学的。
trad: 英語對他來說是不容易學的。

eng: English is not easy for me.
simp: 英语对我来说并不容易。
trad: 英語對我來說並不容易。

eng: English is not spoken here.
English is spoken by more people than any other language.
simp: 说英语的人比说任何其他语言的人多。
trad: 說英語的人比說任何其他語言的人多。

eng: People in the United States speak English.
English is spoken in Australia.
English is spoken in Canada.
English is spoken in many countries around the world.
simp: 全世界许多国家的人说英语。
trad: 全世界許多國家的人說英語。

eng: English is spoken in many countries.
English is spoken in Singapore.
English is studied in China, too.
simp: 英语在中国也被学习了。
trad: 英語在中國也被學習了。

eng: English is studied in China, too.
simp: 在中国的人也研读英语了。
trad: 在中國的人也研讀英語了。

eng: English is studied in Japan.
English is studied in Japan.
English is taught almost all over the world today.
simp: 今天几乎全世界都在教授英语。
trad: 今天幾乎全世界都在教授英語。

eng: English is taught in most countries.
simp: 英语在大部份的国家被教授。
trad: 英語在大部份的國家被教授。

eng: English is taught in most countries.
simp: 大部份的国家都教英语。
trad: 大部份的國家都教英語。

eng: English is too difficult for me to understand.
simp: 英语对我来说太难理解了。
trad: 英語對我來說太難理解了。

eng: English is used by many people.
English is useful in commerce.
English isn't easy to master.
simp: 要精通英语是不容易的。
trad: 要精通英語是不容易的。

eng: English will take you a long time to master.
simp: 要精通英语将会花费你很长的时间。
trad: 要精通英語將會花費你很長的時間。

eng: Even though she grew up in Japan, she speaks fluent English.
simp: 儘管她在日本长大，她说一口流利的英语。
trad: 儘管她在日本長大，她說一口流利的英語。

eng: Every great writer seems to have been interested in English.
simp: 每一个伟大的作家似乎已经对英语感兴趣。
trad: 每一個偉大的作家似乎已經對英語感興趣。

eng: Every morning I make it a rule to watch the English course on TV.
simp: 每天早上我养成看电视英语课程的习惯。
trad: 每天早上我養成看電視英語課程的習慣。

eng: Excuse me. Do you speak English?
Few Japanese can use English well.
simp: 极少数的日本人可以很好地使用英语。
trad: 極少數的日本人可以很好地使用英語。

eng: Few people can speak English better than Sachiko.
simp: 很少人能讲英语讲得比幸子好。
trad: 很少人能講英語講得比幸子好。

eng: Fluency in English is a must.
Fluency in English is a very marketable skill today.
simp: 流利的英语在今天是一种十分抢手的技能。
trad: 流利的英語在今天是一種十分搶手的技能。

eng: For the first time in her life, Yuka has finished reading an English book.
simp: 这是优香生命中第一次读完一本英语书。
trad: 這是優香生命中第一次讀完一本英語書。

eng: For the other 600 million people, English is either a second language or a foreign language.
simp: 对于其他的六亿人口而言，英语不是第二语言就是外语。
trad: 對於其他的六億人口而言，英語不是第二語言就是外語。

eng: For the time being, I am studying French at this language school.
simp: 目前，我正在这所语言学校学习法语。
trad: 目前，我正在這所語言學校學習法語。

eng: Christopher Columbus once decided to burn absolutely everything in an entire village after one of the natives stole his parrot. He was disappointed that he couldn't burn their water. So he invented fluorine.
simp: 哥伦布曾经在当地人偷了他的鹦鹉之后决定完全地烧毁整个村庄。因为他不能焚烧他们的水，所以他感到失望。于是他发明了氟。
trad: 哥倫布曾經在當地人偷了他的鸚鵡之後決定完全地燒毀整個村莊。因為他不能焚燒他們的水，所以他感到失望。於是他發明了氟。

eng: I was very nervous as the plane took off.
simp: 飞机起飞的时候我很紧张。
trad: 飛機起飛的時候我很緊張。

eng: We'll fly there in 50 minutes.
Flying is the quickest method of travelling.
simp: 搭飞机是旅行最快捷的方法。
trad: 搭飛機是旅行最快捷的方法。

eng: Maybe it's the low air pressure that means you get drunk more easily on planes.
simp: 也许这是低气压，这意味着你在飞机上更容易喝醉。
trad: 也許這是低氣壓，這意味著你在飛機上更容易喝醉。

eng: How long does it take to go to Okinawa by plane?
simp: 坐飞机去冲绳要花多长时间？
trad: 坐飛機去沖繩要花多長時間？

eng: How much will it cost you to go by air?
It will cost you more to go by plane.
simp: 搭飞机将花你比较多的钱。
trad: 搭飛機將花你比較多的錢。

eng: He was tired from reading.
He was completely engrossed in the book.
I am not connected to this crime in any way.
simp: 我与这起犯罪没有任何关系。
trad: 我與這起犯罪沒有任何關系。

eng: They are baseball players.
The army forced him to resign.
He got a broken jaw and lost some teeth.
simp: 他磕碎了下巴，掉了几颗牙。
trad: 他磕碎了下巴，掉了幾顆牙。

eng: He said that it was nine o'clock.
Here we are at Ueno Station.
How long will this rain go on?
She has had to stay here.
America likes to claim that it is a "classless" society.
simp: 美国是一个自称没有社会阶层的国家。
trad: 美國是一個自稱沒有社會階層的國家。

eng: After they argued, they didn't speak to each other for a week.
simp: 他们争吵后，一周都没有再说话。
trad: 他們爭吵後，一周都沒有再說話。

eng: The population of Japan is larger than that of New Zealand.
simp: 日本的人口比新西兰多。
trad: 日本的人口比新西蘭多。

eng: In case the shipment is delayed, we have special delay insurance.
simp: 万一船运迟了，我们有特别的迟到保险。
trad: 萬一船運遲了，我們有特別的遲到保險。

eng: They worked jointly on this project.
simp: 他们一起为这个项目工作过。
trad: 他們一起為這個項目工作過。

eng: Everybody's business is nobody's business.
Everybody's business is nobody's business.
He lives by himself.
You cannot eat your cake and keep it.
Have you put winter tyres on your car, yet?
simp: 你在你的车上装雪地轮了吗？
trad: 你在你的車上裝雪地輪了嗎？

eng: What is the difference between a piano and a fish?
You should read many books when you are young.
They named her baby Jenny.
simp: 他们把她的宝宝叫做珍妮。
trad: 他們把她的寶寶叫做珍妮。

eng: Have you ever been to New York?
Let's take a trip to New York.
Let's take a trip to New York.
I'd like a nonstop flight to New York.
simp: 我想要一个直飞纽约的航班。
trad: 我想要一個直飛紐約的航班。

eng: She has a real knack for getting people to do what she wants.
simp: 她真的有本事让别人做她想做的事。
trad: 她真的有本事讓別人做她想做的事。

eng: What time does the train for New York depart?
simp: 去纽约的火车几点出发？
trad: 去紐約的火車幾點出發？

eng: He crashed his car because someone tampered with the brakes.
simp: 他撞车是因为有人在刹车上做了手脚。
trad: 他撞車是因為有人在剎車上做了手腳。

eng: I know her very well.
Have you bought a raffle ticket yet?
Sir, that CD is available only by special order.
simp: 先生，那盘CD需要预定才有。
trad: 先生，那盤CD需要預定才有。

eng: I think this lamp has a short because the light comes on only if I jiggle the cord.
simp: 我觉得这盏灯短路了，因为只有我摇线的时候灯才会亮。
trad: 我覺得這盞燈短路了，因為只有我搖線的時候燈才會亮。

eng: The senator was censured by the congressional ethics committee.
simp: 议员受到了议会道德委员会的谴责。
trad: 議員受到了議會道德委員會的譴責。

eng: A drop of mustard fell and stained my tie during lunch.
simp: 吃午饭的时候，一坨芥末酱滴下来弄脏了我的领带。
trad: 吃午飯的時候，一坨芥末醬滴下來弄臟了我的領帶。

eng: We take it for granted that he will succeed in his business.
simp: 我们认为他的生意理所当然会获得成功。
trad: 我們認為他的生意理所當然會獲得成功。

eng: I consider you one of my closest friends.
simp: 我把你视为我最要好的朋友之一。
trad: 我把你視為我最要好的朋友之一。

eng: Give me a chance to make you proud of me.
simp: 给我机会来让你为我感到自豪。
trad: 給我機會來讓你為我感到自豪。

eng: He had his girlfriend blow on the dice for luck before he threw them.
simp: 他掷骰子之前让他的女友在上面吹气来给他带来好运。
trad: 他擲骰子之前讓他的女友在上面吹氣來給他帶來好運。

eng: When I was a teenager I had lots of hair on my head and none on my chest. Now it's just the opposite.
simp: 当我还是年轻人的时候，我脑袋上有很多头发，胸上无毛。现在，恰恰相反。
trad: 當我還是年輕人的時候，我腦袋上有很多頭發，胸上無毛。現在，恰恰相反。

eng: I wonder if a day will come when money will be something found only in museums.
simp: 我想知道是不是会有一天钱会变成只有在博物馆才能找到的东西。
trad: 我想知道是不是會有一天錢會變成只有在博物館才能找到的東西。

eng: I bet my friend $100 that he wouldn't eat a live cockroach. I lost!
simp: 我用100美元跟我的朋友赌他不会吃活蟑螂。我输了！
trad: 我用100美元跟我的朋友賭他不會吃活蟑螂。我輸了！

eng: My father and I nursed my sister back to health after her accident.
simp: 我妹妹出事之后，我爸爸和我照顾她直到康复。
trad: 我妹妹出事之後，我爸爸和我照顧她直到康復。

eng: That cloud looks like a rabbit to me.
simp: 那朵云对我来说像一只兔子。
trad: 那朵雲對我來說像一只兔子。

eng: Somehow I thought you'd say that.
Why is the sky blue?
The earthworm wriggled when I touched it.
simp: 我碰蚯蚓的时候，它扭动起来。
trad: 我碰蚯蚓的時候，它扭動起來。

eng: My hands were shaking too much to thread the needle.
simp: 我的手抖得太厉害，没法穿针了。
trad: 我的手抖得太厲害，沒法穿針了。

eng: Just pull the door shut. It'll lock by itself.
simp: 只要推门就好了。它自己会锁上的。
trad: 只要推門就好了。它自己會鎖上的。

eng: He is on the radio.
I can't decide if I'm happy or sad.
simp: 我无法确定我是高兴还是难过。
trad: 我無法確定我是高興還是難過。

eng: There's something I need to tell you, and I know you're not going to like it.
simp: 有些事我要跟你说，而且我知道你不会喜欢。
trad: 有些事我要跟你說，而且我知道你不會喜歡。

eng: The only thing I have now are memories.
simp: 我现在仅有的东西就是我的记忆了。
trad: 我現在僅有的東西就是我的記憶了。

eng: Thanks for adding me as a friend.
My camera can shoot high-definition video.
simp: 我的录像机可以拍高清视频。
trad: 我的錄像機可以拍高清視頻。

eng: Since I installed solar panels on my house, my energy bill has been cut in half.
simp: 自从我在我的房子上装了太阳能电池板，我的电费单就减半了。
trad: 自從我在我的房子上裝了太陽能電池板，我的電費單就減半了。

eng: It's more polite to say thin than skinny.
simp: 说苗条比说瘦更有礼貌。
trad: 說苗條比說瘦更有禮貌。

eng: I was nine years old when I asked my mom if Santa Claus really existed.
simp: 我九岁的时候问我妈妈圣诞老人是否真的存在。
trad: 我九歲的時候問我媽媽聖誕老人是否真的存在。

eng: Would it be ethical to sacrifice one person to save many?
simp: 为了救许多人牺牲一个人是否道德？
trad: 為了救許多人犧牲一個人是否道德？

eng: The new Harry Potter movie is pretty lame.
simp: 哈利波特的新片十分差。
trad: 哈利波特的新片十分差。

eng: It's hard to tell if that's the sound of children laughing or screaming.
simp: 很难判断是孩子的笑声还是哭声。
trad: 很難判斷是孩子的笑聲還是哭聲。

eng: I've heard it said that English is for making money, French for making love, and Spanish for praying to God.
simp: 我听说英语是用来赚钱的，法语是用来做爱的，西班牙语是用来祈求上帝的。
trad: 我聽說英語是用來賺錢的，法語是用來做愛的，西班牙語是用來祈求上帝的。

eng: We have less than five minutes to evacuate the whole building.
simp: 我们有不到五分钟来疏散整栋楼的人。
trad: 我們有不到五分鐘來疏散整棟樓的人。

eng: My blood type is A positive.
It's a pity they're getting divorced.
Nice guys finish last.
I'm in charge of the propaganda.
Good luck.
Bless you!
Good afternoon.
The cadres inspected our school.
simp: 干部们视察了我们的学校。
trad: 幹部們視察了我們的學校。

eng: I don't care for green tea.
Don't worry about my dog. He won't do you any harm.
simp: 不要担心我的狗，它不会伤害你。
trad: 不要擔心我的狗，它不會傷害你。

eng: The baby isn't crying anymore.
I don't like spicy food.
Would you like some tea or coffee?
simp: 你想喝点儿咖啡或茶吗？
trad: 你想喝點兒咖啡或茶嗎？

eng: Do you prefer the blue one or the red one?
simp: 你喜欢蓝色的还是红色的？
trad: 你喜歡藍色的還是紅色的？

eng: Is this a newspaper or a magazine?
Every day I either ride a bike or get the bus to work.
simp: 每天我骑自行车或者坐公车上班。
trad: 每天我騎自行車或者坐公車上班。

eng: Do you want to eat French, Japanese or Chinese food?
simp: 你想吃法国菜，日本菜还是中国菜？
trad: 你想吃法國菜，日本菜還是中國菜？

eng: Would you like tea or coffee?
When I'm feeling low, I talk with friends or go out for a walk.
simp: 觉得难过的时候，我会跟朋友谈心或出去散步。
trad: 覺得難過的時候，我會跟朋友談心或出去散步。

eng: We have consumed all the natural resources.
simp: 我们消耗了所有的自然资源。
trad: 我們消耗了所有的自然資源。

eng: Computers are used to send messages by e-mail.
simp: 电脑被用来通过电子邮件发送信息。
trad: 電腦被用來通過電子郵件發送信息。

eng: They wanted to take pictures of Kyoto.
He is as young a teacher as ever taught here.
simp: 他是在这里教书的最年轻的教师。
trad: 他是在這裏教書的最年輕的教師。

eng: He is still somewhere about.
simp: 他还在这里附近的某个地方。
trad: 他還在這裏附近的某個地方。

eng: I remember my mother's teaching me the alphabet.
simp: 我记得我母亲教我认字。
trad: 我記得我母親教我認字。

eng: The novel ends with the heroine's death.
simp: 小说以女主角的死告终。
trad: 小說以女主角的死告終。

eng: There are many good reasons not to do it.
I would like to learn to play the piano, guitar or flute.
simp: 我想学钢琴，吉它或长笛。
trad: 我想學鋼琴，吉它或長笛。

eng: She must come home by 9 at latest.
A woman visited us while you were sleeping.
simp: 您睡觉的时候，一个女人来看过我们。
trad: 您睡覺的時候，一個女人來看過我們。

eng: A woman visited us while you were sleeping.
simp: 你睡觉的时候，一个女人来看过我们。
trad: 你睡覺的時候，一個女人來看過我們。

eng: I missed you.
The flag is up.
A true German can't stand the French, yet willingly he drinks their wines.
simp: 一个真正的德国人无法忍受法国人，但他很愿意喝他们的酒。
trad: 一個真正的德國人無法忍受法國人，但他很願意喝他們的酒。

eng: Is it always a sin to tell a lie?
This book was printed in England.
You must take his age into account.
We'll think about it in due time.
He wanted to do it, whatever the consequences.
simp: 不管结果如何，他想要做。
trad: 不管結果如何，他想要做。

eng: Let's take a rest for a while.
A sharp crack of thunder split the sky.
She sang better than him.
Between you and me, he has a shallow way of thinking.
simp: 他思考的方式缺乏深度，这个我们知道就好。
trad: 他思考的方式缺乏深度，這個我們知道就好。

eng: This is just between you and me.
simp: 这只是我们之间的秘密。
trad: 這只是我們之間的秘密。

eng: Between you and me, the fat ugly man is on a diet.
simp: 那个丑男人在节食，这个我们知道就好。
trad: 那個醜男人在節食，這個我們知道就好。

eng: Between you and me, he's in trouble with the boss.
simp: 他和老板有矛盾，这个我们知道就好。
trad: 他和老板有矛盾，這個我們知道就好。

eng: Between you and me, he's a shallow thinker.
simp: 他思想肤浅，这个我们知道就好。
trad: 他思想膚淺，這個我們知道就好。

eng: Between you and me, Tom's idea doesn't appeal to me very much.
simp: 汤姆的主意我不太感兴趣，这个我们之间说说就好。
trad: 湯姆的主意我不太感興趣，這個我們之間說說就好。

eng: Between you and me, John's idea doesn't appeal to me very much.
simp: 约翰的主意我不太喜欢，这个我们知道就好。
trad: 約翰的主意我不太喜歡，這個我們知道就好。

eng: This is a secret just between you and me, so don't let it slip out.
simp: 这只是你和我之间的秘密，所以不要让它流出去。
trad: 這只是你和我之間的秘密，所以不要讓它流出去。

eng: Let's divide this money between you and me.
Between you and me, what is your opinion of her?
simp: 你就只告诉我一个人，你对她的意见如何？
trad: 你就只告訴我一個人，你對她的意見如何？

eng: This is just between you and me, he is a big eater.
simp: 我就只告诉你，他是个大胃王。
trad: 我就只告訴你，他是個大胃王。

eng: Between you and me, he cannot be relied upon.
simp: 我就只告诉你，他靠不住。
trad: 我就只告訴你，他靠不住。

eng: Between you and me, he is rather stupid.
Between you and me, I think our boss is stupid.
simp: 我觉得我们老板很蠢，这我就只跟你说。
trad: 我覺得我們老板很蠢，這我就只跟你說。

eng: Between you and me, I don't like our new team captain.
simp: 我就只告诉你，我不喜欢我们的新队长。
trad: 我就只告訴你，我不喜歡我們的新隊長。

eng: Between you and me, I'm going to quit my present job soon.
simp: 我只跟你说，我很快就要辞掉我现在的工作了。
trad: 我只跟你說，我很快就要辭掉我現在的工作了。

eng: Can you describe to me the difference between black tea and green tea?
simp: 你能告诉我红茶和绿茶的区别吗？
trad: 你能告訴我紅茶和綠茶的區別嗎？

eng: The lake is deepest at this spot.
We did not expect him to finish the task in so short a time.
simp: 我们没指望过他在那么短的时间里完成工作。
trad: 我們沒指望過他在那麼短的時間裏完成工作。

eng: Do you get up at six?
Have you finished reading that book?
The rope wasn't strong enough to support him.
simp: 绳子不够牢固，撑不住他。
trad: 繩子不夠牢固，撐不住他。

eng: He needs an umbrella.
Beethoven goes to the piano, sits down at it, and begins to play.
simp: 贝多芬走向钢琴，坐下来并开始弹。
trad: 貝多芬走向鋼琴，坐下來並開始彈。

eng: We set a trap to catch a fox.
simp: 我们设了个陷阱来抓狐狸。
trad: 我們設了個陷阱來抓狐貍。

eng: My dream is to be a doctor.
Carry the injured to the hospital.
He had, I thought, no right to do that.
simp: 我以为他没有任何权利这么做。
trad: 我以為他沒有任何權利這麼做。

eng: My grandfather sometimes talks to himself when he is alone.
simp: 我祖父一个人的时候，有时会自言自语。
trad: 我祖父一個人的時候，有時會自言自語。

eng: Who are you voting for?
The image quality is really bad - the resolution is so low.
simp: 画质真的很差 - 分辨率那么低。
trad: 畫質真的很差 - 分辨率那麼低。

eng: I have so many clothes I don't know what to wear tomorrow.
simp: 我有那么多衣服，以至于我不知道明天穿什么了。
trad: 我有那麼多衣服，以至於我不知道明天穿什麼了。

eng: Tom is a good cook.
We must sleep at least eight hours a day.
simp: 我们每天至少该睡八小时。
trad: 我們每天至少該睡八小時。

eng: He may not be happy.
She has great respect for her teacher.
I don't have much time.
Does any other country fan the flames of patriotism as much as America?
simp: 有没有一个国家比美国更提倡爱国主义？
trad: 有沒有一個國家比美國更提倡愛國主義？

eng: China is an emerging market.
This medicine will increase the survival rate of the patients.
simp: 这个药品会提高病人的存活率。
trad: 這個藥品會提高病人的存活率。

eng: The aim of this policy is to improve the environment in the poorest cities.
simp: 这个政策的目的是改善最贫困城市的环境。
trad: 這個政策的目的是改善最貧困城市的環境。

eng: He believes that Tai Ji has improved his life.
simp: 他认为太极拳改善了他的生活。
trad: 他認為太極拳改善了他的生活。

eng: The UK must improve the problems with its rail network.
simp: 英国必须改善它在铁路网的问题。
trad: 英國必須改善它在鐵路網的問題。

eng: The manager wants to improve the company's structuring.
simp: 经理打算改良公司的结构。
trad: 經理打算改良公司的結構。

eng: Through genetic modification, we can improve crops.
simp: 通过遗传修饰，我们可以改良农作物。
trad: 通過遺傳修飾，我們可以改良農作物。

eng: This new market may improve the entire industry.
simp: 这个新的市场可能改良全部的工业。
trad: 這個新的市場可能改良全部的工業。

eng: We've made a lot of progress today.
simp: 今天我们取得了很多进步。
trad: 今天我們取得了很多進步。

eng: If you want to criticise other people, first you must improve your own methods.
simp: 要是你想批评别人的话，首先需要改进自己的做法。
trad: 要是你想批評別人的話，首先需要改進自己的做法。

eng: I hope to improve my attitude to work.
simp: 我希望改进自己的工作态度。
trad: 我希望改進自己的工作態度。

eng: In order to improve the students' attitude to their studies, the school let them start class an hour later.
simp: 为了改进学生的学习态度，学校让他们晚一个小时来上课。
trad: 為了改進學生的學習態度，學校讓他們晚一個小時來上課。

eng: I don't know how long I'll have to wait before my creative ability improves.
simp: 不知道要等多长时间，我的创作能力才能进步。
trad: 不知道要等多長時間，我的創作能力才能進步。

eng: Bob plays not only the guitar but also the flute.
simp: Bob不仅会弹吉他还会吹笛。
trad: Bob不僅會彈吉他還會吹笛。

eng: Lake Baikal in Russia is the deepest lake in the world.
simp: 在俄罗斯的贝加尔湖是世界上最深的湖泊。
trad: 在俄羅斯的貝加爾湖是世界上最深的湖泊。

eng: I have a friend who works for NASA.
simp: 我有个朋友在美国太空总署工作。
trad: 我有個朋友在美國太空總署工作。

eng: He put a Closed sign on the front door of the store.
simp: 他在店子的正门上挂上了一个「休息」的牌子。
trad: 他在店子的正門上掛上了一個「休息」的牌子。

eng: Canada is on the north side of America.
Keeping a diary is a good habit.
The offer is too good to be turned down.
simp: 此提议好得令人难以拒绝。
trad: 此提議好得令人難以拒絕。

eng: My house has two flights of stairs.
Was this wall built to keep people out or to keep them in?
simp: 建造这堵墙是为了把人隔在外面还是把他们留在里面？
trad: 建造這堵墻是為了把人隔在外面還是把他們留在裏面？

eng: We all chipped in to buy our teacher a birthday present.
simp: 我们所有人凑份子给老师买生日礼物。
trad: 我們所有人湊份子給老師買生日禮物。

eng: I found the secret compartment quite by accident.
simp: 我完全是在偶然的情况下发现了密室。
trad: 我完全是在偶然的情況下發現了密室。

eng: Cats hate to get wet.
She wouldn't let up until I agreed to go to the movies with her.
simp: 她不愿松开我，直到我同意和她去电影院。
trad: 她不願松開我，直到我同意和她去電影院。

eng: He swam until he could swim no more.
He knows every inch of this area.
simp: 他对这个地方了如指掌。
trad: 他對這個地方了如指掌。

eng: Play us a tune.
Do you go running daily?
I have high blood pressure.
How do I gain weight?
Leave the room as it is.
I want to see what there is inside.
simp: 我想看一下里面有什么。
trad: 我想看一下裏面有什麼。

eng: I don't believe the rumours. Do you believe them?
I must put my ideas together before I take up a pen.
simp: 在拿笔之前，我要集中一下思想。
trad: 在拿筆之前，我要集中一下思想。

eng: He wrote this book at the age of twenty.
simp: 他在20岁的时候写了这本书。
trad: 他在20歲的時候寫了這本書。

eng: They appointed him as a director.
That car is quite new.
Most boys like computer games.
simp: 大多数男生喜欢电脑游戏。
trad: 大多數男生喜歡電腦遊戲。

eng: He was very busy all day.
He was very busy all day.
Tell me why he was absent.
simp: 告诉我他为什么缺席了。
trad: 告訴我他為什麼缺席了。

eng: I'm looking forward to seeing you next Sunday.
simp: 我期待下周日能见到你。
trad: 我期待下周日能見到你。

eng: I fell in love with her.
He is unsatisfied with the result.
She is working on the problem.
The room is full of people.
We have to put off the game till next Sunday.
simp: 我们不得不把游戏搁到下周日了。
trad: 我們不得不把遊戲擱到下周日了。

eng: He threatened to make it public.
I just want you to come.
She was too short to see over the fence.
simp: 她太矮了，看不到围墙外面。
trad: 她太矮了，看不到圍墻外面。

eng: I want some potatoes.
I managed to repair my car by myself.
simp: 我自己搞定，修好了我的车。
trad: 我自己搞定，修好了我的車。

eng: He rushed out of the office.
Start at once, or you will miss the bus.
simp: 马上出发，不然你就要错过公车了。
trad: 馬上出發，不然你就要錯過公車了。

eng: They talked over the plan for hours.
simp: 他们谈计划谈了几个小时。
trad: 他們談計劃談了幾個小時。

eng: He is a learned man.
What a wonderful night!
Tell me what to do with it.
A wounded whale washed up on the beach.
simp: 一条受伤的鲸鱼在海滩边搁浅了。
trad: 一條受傷的鯨魚在海灘邊擱淺了。

eng: Mary treated her wounded knee.
simp: 玛丽处理了膝盖的伤口。
trad: 瑪麗處理了膝蓋的傷口。

eng: After the hurricane, their house was a wreck.
simp: 暴风雨过后，他们的房子成了废墟。
trad: 暴風雨過後，他們的房子成了廢墟。

eng: Driving on a slippery road can lead to a car wreck.
simp: 在光滑的路上开车会导致车祸。
trad: 在光滑的路上開車會導致車禍。

eng: A hundred people were hurt in a train wreck.
simp: 一百多个人在一个火车事故中受了伤。
trad: 一百多個人在一個火車事故中受了傷。

eng: I wrote the wrong address on the envelope.
simp: 我在信封上写错了地址。
trad: 我在信封上寫錯了地址。

eng: Parents teach their children that it's wrong to lie.
simp: 父母教育他们的孩子说谎是不好的。
trad: 父母教育他們的孩子說謊是不好的。

eng: The x-ray showed two broken fingers.
simp: X光片显示两根手指断了。
trad: X光片顯示兩根手指斷了。

eng: Dentists take x-rays to examine your teeth.
simp: 牙医用X光检查你的牙齿。
trad: 牙醫用X光檢查你的牙齒。

eng: The doctors are looking at an x-ray.
Tom has lived in Chicago for a year.
simp: 汤姆在芝加哥住了一年。
trad: 湯姆在芝加哥住了一年。

eng: I love my yellow sweater.
simp: 我很喜欢我的黄色套衫。
trad: 我很喜歡我的黃色套衫。

eng: In the United States, school buses are yellow.
Tom's birthday was yesterday.
Yesterday was the last day of school.
There are two zeros in the number "2010."
Scientists haven't found a cure for cancer yet.
simp: 科学家们还没有找到癌症的治疗方法。
trad: 科學家們還沒有找到癌癥的治療方法。

eng: Zero comes before one.
Sow the wind, reap the whirlwind.
simp: 种的是风，而收获的是旋风。
trad: 種的是風，而收獲的是旋風。

eng: My computer has been infected with BraveSentry.
simp: 我的电脑已经中了BraveSentry病毒。
trad: 我的電腦已經中了BraveSentry病毒。

eng: I don't believe the rumours. Do you believe them?
simp: 我不相信谣言。你相信吗？
trad: 我不相信謠言。你相信嗎？

eng: The sale prices are written in red ink.
Sow the wind, reap the whirlwind.
The novel "All Quiet on the Western Front" by Erich Maria Remarque has been translated into more than fifty languages.
simp: 埃里希马里亚雷马克所写的小说"西线无战事"已被翻译成超过五十种语言。
trad: 埃裏希馬裏亞雷馬克所寫的小說"西線無戰事"已被翻譯成超過五十種語言。

eng: Do you know if my father is still in the office?
simp: 你知道我父亲是否还在办公室吗？
trad: 你知道我父親是否還在辦公室嗎？

eng: Are you a tubist?
Enjoy the moment!
The apple does not fall far from the trunk.
simp: 苹果掉落的地方不会离树干很远。
trad: 蘋果掉落的地方不會離樹幹很遠。

eng: I'll be sixteen in September.
Are you coming along with us?
I'm right.
I see a book.
You don't understand anything about it.
Do you know a good dentist?
They stepped a few paces forward.
The fox and the bear lived together.
simp: 这隻狐狸和这隻熊一起生活了。
trad: 這隻狐貍和這隻熊一起生活了。

eng: This tea tastes good.
Once is like never, implied the young lady. Yet the gynecologist implied: "twins."
simp: 一次就像是从未有， 年轻的姑娘暗示。然而，妇科医生暗示："双胞胎。"
trad: 一次就像是從未有， 年輕的姑娘暗示。然而，婦科醫生暗示："雙胞胎。"

eng: He bought himself a dog.
Swimming in the sea doesn't mean owning the sea.
simp: 在海裡游泳并不意味着就拥有大海。
trad: 在海裡遊泳並不意味著就擁有大海。

eng: You can ask the child that is playing over there.
simp: 你可以问问在那裡玩的孩子。
trad: 你可以問問在那裡玩的孩子。

eng: Take control of the command post.
The girl playing the piano is named Akiko.
simp: 弹钢琴的女孩被命名为秋子。
trad: 彈鋼琴的女孩被命名為秋子。

eng: Can you play the dutar?
simp: 你会弹都塔尔二弦琴吗？
trad: 你會彈都塔爾二弦琴嗎？

eng: I'll be there at half seven.
Let's hope she comes.
It will make you think about the things you think about in your thoughts.
simp: 它会让你思考起在你思想裡考虑的事情。
trad: 它會讓你思考起在你思想裡考慮的事情。

eng: Before I start doing small talk, I'd rather not talk at all.
simp: 在我开始聊天之前，我宁愿不说话。
trad: 在我開始聊天之前，我寧願不說話。

eng: If you and Marco are well, Paulo and I are well.
simp: 如果你和马可很好，那麽保罗和我也很好。
trad: 如果你和馬可很好，那麼保羅和我也很好。

eng: No day without a line.
Guatemala was once qualified as a banana republic.
simp: 瓜地马拉曾经被称作香蕉共和国。
trad: 瓜地馬拉曾經被稱作香蕉共和國。

eng: Please alight at the next stop.
Because his salary is low, he can't buy that house.
simp: 因为他的薪水太低，他买不起那栋房子。
trad: 因為他的薪水太低，他買不起那棟房子。

eng: I warned him, but he ignored the warning.
simp: 我警告过他，但他不理会警告。
trad: 我警告過他，但他不理會警告。

eng: Since I had met him once before, I recognized him right away.
simp: 由于我以前见过他一次，所以我马上就认出他了。
trad: 由於我以前見過他一次，所以我馬上就認出他了。

eng: Every time I went to his place, he was studying.
simp: 每次我去他住处，他都在读书。
trad: 每次我去他住處，他都在讀書。

eng: France is running a welfare state it can no longer afford.
simp: 法国是一个福利国家，但它却不再能够负担得起了。
trad: 法國是一個福利國家，但它卻不再能夠負擔得起了。

eng: Unhappiness comes without being called.
My grandson is still a baby.
I'm surrounded by linguaphiles!
simp: 我被各国语言及文字的爱好者所围绕。
trad: 我被各國語言及文字的愛好者所圍繞。

eng: I'm surrounded by linguaphiles!
simp: 我周围都是各国的语言及文字的爱好者。
trad: 我周圍都是各國的語言及文字的愛好者。

eng: The bassoon is a stumbling block in the english translation.
simp: 巴松管很难翻译成英文。
trad: 巴松管很難翻譯成英文。

eng: The bassoon is a stumbling block in the english translation.
simp: 巴松管在英文翻译中是一个困难。
trad: 巴松管在英文翻譯中是一個困難。

eng: Puerto Rico is not a sovereign state.
simp: 波多黎各不是一个主权国家。
trad: 波多黎各不是一個主權國家。

eng: He is at home.
I can't calculate the final cost without first discussing it with our contractors.
simp: 不先与我们的承包商讨论的话我无法计算出最后的费用。
trad: 不先與我們的承包商討論的話我無法計算出最後的費用。

eng: They warned the ship about the danger.
simp: 他们警告过这艘船这个危险。
trad: 他們警告過這艘船這個危險。

eng: They will not pass!
The others can't be bothered.
Do you know where he lives?
Cold and dry, splendid sunshine, what beautiful winter weather!
simp: 寒冷乾燥，灿烂的阳光，多麽美丽的冬日天气!
trad: 寒冷乾燥，燦爛的陽光，多麼美麗的冬日天氣!

eng: Even in rain and snow I enjoy mountain-climbing.
simp: 即使在雨中和在雪中，我喜欢登山。
trad: 即使在雨中和在雪中，我喜歡登山。

eng: I didn't participate in the conversation.
I wish all those an unhurried night who want a revision of the existing copyright laws, but actually all the others too.
simp: 我希望所有那些想要修订现行着作权法的人一个从容不迫的夜晚，但实际上所有其他的人也一样。
trad: 我希望所有那些想要修訂現行著作權法的人一個從容不迫的夜晚，但實際上所有其他的人也一樣。

eng: Oh! Seriously?
I must help her.
The telephone was invented in 1876 by Bell.
simp: 电话于1876年由贝尔所发明。
trad: 電話於1876年由貝爾所發明。

eng: What happened then?
He hadn't eaten in two days.
simp: 他已经两天没吃东西了。
trad: 他已經兩天沒吃東西了。

eng: He can't distinguish between left and right.
Come on, let us talk about flowers.
He is good at football.
I come from Colombia.
It's in the internet, so it must be true.
simp: 它在网际网路上，所以它一定是真实的。
trad: 它在網際網路上，所以它一定是真實的。

eng: Friday is housewarming party!
I screwed up the very first note.
Some analysts consider Somalia as the failed state par excellence.
simp: 一些分析家认为索马里是非常失败的国家。
trad: 一些分析家認為索馬裏是非常失敗的國家。

eng: He seduced her with his didgeridoo.
simp: 他用他的迪吉里杜管勾引了她。
trad: 他用他的迪吉裏杜管勾引了她。

eng: I hope you practiced your flute solo!
simp: 我希望你练习了你的长笛独奏！
trad: 我希望你練習了你的長笛獨奏！

eng: In the late 20th century, Yugoslavia was considered a rogue state by the United States.
simp: 在二十世纪末期，南斯拉夫被美国认为是一个流氓国家。
trad: 在二十世紀末期，南斯拉夫被美國認為是一個流氓國家。

eng: She was a tiny girl, but she really held her own on the baritone sax. Nonetheless, I couldn't help but imagine the thing wrapping itself around her and devouring her like a boa constrictor.
simp: 她是一个非常娇小的女孩，但她真的自己抱着中音萨克斯。不过，我忍不住想像这个东西缠绕包裹住她，并像蟒蛇般的吞噬她。
trad: 她是一個非常嬌小的女孩，但她真的自己抱著中音薩克斯。不過，我忍不住想像這個東西纏繞包裹住她，並像蟒蛇般的吞噬她。

eng: A guy I met in my physics class made a didgeridoo out of PVC pipe.
simp: 我在物理课遇到一个傢伙用PVC管做了迪吉里杜管。
trad: 我在物理課遇到一個傢夥用PVC管做了迪吉裏杜管。

eng: During the 15th century, the Ryukyu Kingdom was a tributary state of Imperial China.
simp: 在15世纪，琉球王国是中国帝国的附庸国。
trad: 在15世紀，琉球王國是中國帝國的附庸國。

eng: During the Great Game, Afghanistan was a buffer state.
simp: 在大博弈期间，阿富汗是一个缓冲国。
trad: 在大博弈期間，阿富汗是一個緩衝國。

eng: Saxophonists often double on flutes, which have similar fingerings to their primary instruments.
simp: 萨克斯管吹奏者常常兼演奏长笛，对主要乐器而言它们具有类似的指法。
trad: 薩克斯管吹奏者常常兼演奏長笛，對主要樂器而言它們具有類似的指法。

eng: During the 20th century, Manchukuo was a puppet state.
simp: 在20世纪期间，满洲国是一个傀儡国家。
trad: 在20世紀期間，滿洲國是一個傀儡國家。

eng: Famous vibraphonist Stefon Harris has recorded at least one balafon solo.
simp: 着名的铁琴演奏家Stefon Harris已经录製了至少一个巴拉风独奏。
trad: 著名的鐵琴演奏家Stefon Harris已經錄製了至少一個巴拉風獨奏。

eng: Trombones: it may be fun to go wild, but try not to blat the notes.
simp: 长号:狂野可能有趣，但尽量不要发出粗哑的音符。
trad: 長號:狂野可能有趣，但盡量不要發出粗啞的音符。

eng: I play the tenor saxophone.

I bet you'd never heard of a Stroh violin before Tom Waits dug it back up! Anyway, it used a large metal horn as its resonator instead of a wooden box so it could be picked up better by recording equipment before the late 1920s.
simp: 我敢打赌，在Tom Waits发掘它当幕后支援前你从来没有听说过斯特罗小提琴！无论如何，1920年代末前它採用了一个大型金属喇叭谐振器来代替木製音箱，以便它可以更好地被录音设备收音。
trad: 我敢打賭，在Tom Waits發掘它當幕後支援前你從來沒有聽說過斯特羅小提琴！無論如何，1920年代末前它採用了一個大型金屬喇叭諧振器來代替木製音箱，以便它可以更好地被錄音設備收音。

eng: I wouldn't ask this of you if it weren't important.
simp: 如果不是它很重要，我不会问你。
trad: 如果不是它很重要，我不會問你。

eng: Woe to the vanquished.
These flowers you see are roses.
simp: 你看到的这些花是玫瑰。
trad: 你看到的這些花是玫瑰。

eng: Rain is water falling from clouds.
Our topic of the week is: _____.
Let's find sentences with new vocabulary on this topic, add them to the following list: _____; and translate them.
simp: 让我们找关于这一主题有新单字的句子，将其添加到下面的列表：_____
trad: 讓我們找關於這一主題有新單字的句子，將其添加到下面的列表：_____

eng: Their plan sounds interesting to me.
simp: 他们的计划对我来说很有意思。
trad: 他們的計劃對我來說很有意思。

eng: They were marooned on a desert isle.
simp: 她们被抛弃在一座荒岛上。
trad: 她們被拋棄在一座荒島上。

eng: They were marooned on a desert isle.
simp: 他们被抛弃在一座荒岛上。
trad: 他們被拋棄在一座荒島上。

eng: My dad gives me a weekly allowance that I use to buy comics and ice cream.
simp: 我爸爸每周给我零用钱，我会用来买漫画书和冰激凌。
trad: 我爸爸每周給我零用錢，我會用來買漫畫書和冰激淩。

eng: Susan, I'm sorry if I lead you on but the truth is that I'm just not interested.
simp: 苏珊，我很抱歉让你抱有希望，但事实是我就是不感兴趣。
trad: 蘇珊，我很抱歉讓你抱有希望，但事實是我就是不感興趣。

eng: Ryoko has a cute little face.
simp: 凉子有一张漂亮的小脸蛋。
trad: 涼子有一張漂亮的小臉蛋。

eng: I've never heard of the actor.
simp: 我还从没听说过这个演员。
trad: 我還從沒聽說過這個演員。

eng: Osaka is the center of commerce in Japan.
simp: 大坂是日本的商业中心。
trad: 大阪是日本的商業中心。

eng: I visited many parts of England.
simp: 我游览了英国许多地方。
trad: 我遊覽了英國許多地方。

eng: How high is Mt. Fuji?
In the early days people communicated by smoke signals.
simp: 以前人们用烟作为联络信号。
trad: 以前人們用煙作為聯絡信號。

eng: She worked hard.
His plan was discarded.
My teacher recommended me to read Shakespeare.
simp: 我老师建议我读莎士比亚。
trad: 我老師建議我讀莎士比亞。

eng: Is there anybody who can drive a car?
The meeting was called off.
Somebody has stolen my suitcase.
He is my type!
He brought us sad news.
simp: 他给我们带来了令人难过的消息。
trad: 他給我們帶來了令人難過的消息。

eng: It was heartless of him to say such a thing to the sick man.
simp: 他对一个生病的男人说这种事真是没良心。
trad: 他對一個生病的男人說這種事真是沒良心。

eng: It is definite that he will go to America.
Have you worked the puzzle out?
I bought two pairs of trousers.
She grows tomatoes in her garden.
simp: 她在她花园里种西红柿。
trad: 她在她花園裏種西紅柿。

eng: I can't afford to rent a house like this in Tokyo.
simp: 我在东京租不起这样的房子。
trad: 我在東京租不起這樣的房子。

eng: Stories like Cinderella can be found in China, Japan and in every land of the world.
simp: 像灰姑娘这样的故事可以在中国、日本及世界任何国家都可以找到。
trad: 像灰姑娘這樣的故事可以在中國、日本及世界任何國家都可以找到。

eng: He came five minutes behind the appointed time.
simp: 他在指定时间的五分钟后到了。
trad: 他在指定時間的五分鐘後到了。

eng: I can't tell you how to pronounce the word.
simp: 我不知道怎么告诉你这个词的发音。
trad: 我不知道怎麼告訴你這個詞的發音。

eng: He craned his neck a bit in hopes of hearing what they were whispering.
simp: 他伸长了脖子，希望能听到她们低声说的话。
trad: 他伸長了脖子，希望能聽到她們低聲說的話。

eng: He craned his neck a bit in hopes of hearing what they were whispering.
simp: 他伸长了脖子，希望能听到他们低声说的话。
trad: 他伸長了脖子，希望能聽到他們低聲說的話。

eng: In Asian culture it's customary to take one's shoes off before entering a house or temple.
simp: 在亚洲文化里，习惯在进一个房子或一座寺庙前先脱鞋子。
trad: 在亞洲文化裏，習慣在進一個房子或一座寺廟前先脫鞋子。

eng: She got all dolled up for her big date.
simp: 为了她的重要约会，她精心打扮了一下。
trad: 為了她的重要約會，她精心打扮了一下。

eng: I have to wear earplugs to drown out all the noise from the construction site next door.
simp: 我不得不戴耳塞来阻隔旁边建筑工地的所有噪音。
trad: 我不得不戴耳塞來阻隔旁邊建築工地的所有噪音。

eng: The populations of China and India dwarf those of every other nation.
simp: 中国和印度的人口超过了其他任何国家。
trad: 中國和印度的人口超過了其他任何國家。

eng: The leaves fell to the earth.
You must return the book to him.
Can you play any musical instruments?
It was nice to converse with her.
The television doesn't work.
Did you hear the click?
The dancer's every move was perfect.
simp: 这舞者的每一个动作都是完美的。
trad: 這舞者的每一個動作都是完美的。

eng: What time do you usually get up?
You don't like love stories, do you?
simp: 你不喜欢爱情故事，是吗？
trad: 你不喜歡愛情故事，是嗎？

eng: A hungry pig dreams of acorns.
She was an intelligent woman with an erotic aura.
simp: 她是一个有着性爱光环的聪明女人。
trad: 她是一個有著性愛光環的聰明女人。

eng: I waited for five hours.
He is a member of the parochial board.
simp: 他是教区委员会的成员。
trad: 他是教區委員會的成員。

eng: Who are you?
I find that it's typical for him to come too late.
simp: 我发现他就是会很晚才来这样的人。
trad: 我發現他就是會很晚才來這樣的人。

eng: The dog chased the rabbit.
There are people drowning in debt.
I would really like to know why he did something like that.
simp: 我真的很想知道他为什麽做了像那样的事。
trad: 我真的很想知道他為什麼做了像那樣的事。

eng: I don't trust him any more.
I arrived just now.
He thinks that blue is the most beautiful colour.
simp: 他认为蓝色是最美丽的颜色。
trad: 他認為藍色是最美麗的顏色。

eng: I'm sure that he'll succeed.
We lived there a long time, by the river.
simp: 我们在河边那裡住了很长一段时间。
trad: 我們在河邊那裡住了很長一段時間。

eng: Jane and I play the piano well.
You should add those sentences to Tatoeba.
simp: 你应该把那些句子添加到Tatoeba上。
trad: 你應該把那些句子添加到Tatoeba上。

eng: Express yourself as clearly as possible.
simp: 尽可能明确地表达你自己。
trad: 盡可能明確地表達你自己。

eng: He's running very quickly.
What exactly happened there?
simp: 那裡究竟发生了什麽事？
trad: 那裡究竟發生了什麼事？

eng: Many of our pioneers are still alive... but, alas, many of them aren't alive any more.
simp: 我们的先驱者中许多还活着...但是，唉，其中有许多已经死了。
trad: 我們的先驅者中許多還活著...但是，唉，其中有許多已經死了。

eng: No one listened to me.
The student handed the examination papers in to the teacher.
simp: 该学生把考试卷交给了老师。
trad: 該學生把考試卷交給了老師。

eng: I'm tired of translating.
What do you have to lose by asking her out on a date? A little pride maybe?
simp: 问她出去约会你有什麽好输的? 也许一点点的骄傲?
trad: 問她出去約會你有什麼好輸的? 也許一點點的驕傲?

eng: When are you going to get married?
I'll be your first patient.
simp: 我将是你的第一个病人。
trad: 我將是你的第一個病人。

eng: He has been to Hokkaido.
He postponed leaving for Hokkaido until next month.
simp: 他延迟到下个月去北海道。
trad: 他延遲到下個月去北海道。

eng: He is not from Hokkaido.
Did you carry out your plan?
You must go through with your plan.
simp: 你必须按照你的计划行事。
trad: 你必須按照你的計劃行事。

eng: Don't deceive me.
It's true.
I need a doctor!
Can I enter a sentence in French?
simp: 我能用法语加一句句子吗？
trad: 我能用法語加一句句子嗎？

eng: It was just a joke. Lighten up!
The cat arched its back and stretched itself.
If geometry is the science of space, what is the science of time?
simp: 如果说几何学是空间的科学，那时间的科学是什么？
trad: 如果說幾何學是空間的科學，那時間的科學是什麼？

eng: A stay of execution was ordered at the eleventh hour.
simp: 缓期执行在最后关头决定了下来。
trad: 緩期執行在最後關頭決定了下來。

eng: I had my fortune read by an old lady with an eery-looking glass eye.
simp: 我让一个有着奇怪玻璃眼珠的老太太帮我算了命。
trad: 我讓一個有著奇怪玻璃眼珠的老太太幫我算了命。

eng: The space race was an exciting time in history.
simp: 太空跑步是历史上激动人心的时刻。
trad: 太空跑步是歷史上激動人心的時刻。

eng: Step out of the car and place your hands behind your back.
Parents try to impress upon their children the importance of honesty and hard work.
simp: 父母试图将诚实和工作的重要性灌输给孩子。
trad: 父母試圖將誠實和工作的重要性灌輸給孩子。

eng: I give up. What do an Irish priest and Congolese witch doctor have in common?
simp: 我放弃了。爱尔兰牧师和非洲巫婆有什么共同点？
trad: 我放棄了。愛爾蘭牧師和非洲巫婆有什麼共同點？

eng: The room was jam-packed with reporters waiting for the press conference to begin.
simp: 房间挤满了等待发布会开始的记者。
trad: 房間擠滿了等待發布會開始的記者。

eng: Don't get sassy with me young lady!
It's very big of you to admit you're wrong.
simp: 你能承认你错了是很伟大的。
trad: 你能承認你錯了是很偉大的。

eng: When Dad finds out what you've done, he's going to hit the roof.
simp: 当爸爸发现你做了什么的时候，他会发疯的。
trad: 當爸爸發現你做了什麼的時候，他會發瘋的。

eng: I'm going to run a couple of errands. Wanna tag along?
simp: 我要去购物。你要跟着来吗？
trad: 我要去購物。你要跟著來嗎？

eng: Oh, how we laughed!
The best hairdressers are gay.
simp: 最好的理发师是同性恋。
trad: 最好的理發師是同性戀。

eng: You must have been surprised to meet your teacher in such a place.
simp: 在那种地方碰到你的老师，你应该很惊讶吧。
trad: 在那種地方碰到你的老師，你應該很驚訝吧。

eng: His brazen act of defiance almost cost him his life.
simp: 他怀疑的无耻行为差点要了他的命。
trad: 他懷疑的無恥行為差點要了他的命。

eng: Is it really worth it?
Now shake hands and make up.
If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all.
simp: 如果你没好话说，那就什么都别说。
trad: 如果你沒好話說，那就什麼都別說。

eng: There is a strike.
Harry had to back out of the competition because of a broken arm.
simp: 亨利因为伤了手臂而被撤销了比赛资格。
trad: 亨利因為傷了手臂而被撤銷了比賽資格。

eng: They didn't act quickly.
Here and now.
I shouldn't have told you anything.
simp: 我本不该告诉您什么的。
trad: 我本不該告訴您什麼的。

eng: Nancy never fails to arrive on time.
simp: 南希从来没有不准时到达。
trad: 南希從來沒有不準時到達。

eng: Test pilots are constantly tempting fate.
These books are not fit for young readers.
simp: 这本书不是给年轻读者看的。
trad: 這本書不是給年輕讀者看的。

eng: She gave birth to a baby boy.
She gave away all her dolls.
simp: 她把她所有的娃娃送给了别人。
trad: 她把她所有的娃娃送給了別人。

eng: They gave a series of concerts.
simp: 他们办了一系列的音乐会。
trad: 他們辦了一系列的音樂會。

eng: I gather that they'll agree with us.
simp: 我猜想他们会同意我们的。
trad: 我猜想他們會同意我們的。

eng: The teacher gathered his students around him.
simp: 老师把他的学生们聚集在他周围。

eng: They gave a big party for me.
simp: 他们为我办了一个盛大的派对。
trad: 他們為我辦了一個盛大的派對。

eng: They furnished the library with new books.

eng: We furnished the refugees with blankets.

eng: She furnished the room with beautiful furniture.

eng: She freshened herself up before supper.

eng: I am fully convinced of your innocence.
simp: 我完全相信你是清白的。
trad: 我完全相信你是清白的。

eng: She fumbled with a piece of paper.

simp: 他在五年前创立了这所学校。

eng: The teacher made him stay after school.

eng: Miss Ito made her students work hard.

trad: 伊藤小姐要她的學生們努力學習。

eng: He made good use of the opportunity.

It's an easy victory.

She hated her husband.

Let's go!
Take whichever you want.

See you later!

Please leave.

eng: This place gives me a really bad vibe.
simp: 这地方给我一个很差的印象。

trad: 但我不確定它會把幸福帶給每個人。

simp: 周四早上之前我们要全部完成。

eng: Our plans for the summer are taking shape.
simp: 我们夏天的计划成型了。
trad: 我們夏天的計劃成型了。

eng: Electricity made candles of little use in our life.
simp: 电使蜡烛在我们的生活中变得没什么用了。
trad: 電使蠟燭在我們的生活中變得沒什麼用了。

eng: The activity of foreign trade has been declining of late.
simp: 最近对外贸易活动减少了。
trad: 最近對外貿易活動減少了。

eng: Bill will return next week.
He didn't hear his name called.
simp: 他没听见有人叫他的名字。
trad: 他沒聽見有人叫他的名字。

eng: I want to move out of this cramped room as soon as I can.
simp: 我想尽快从这个不透气的屋子里出去。
trad: 我想盡快從這個不透氣的屋子裏出去。

eng: She can't make up her mind whether to get a job or to go on to college.
simp: 她在找工作和读大学之前无法取舍。
trad: 她在找工作和讀大學之前無法取舍。

eng: I should have tried out this electric shaver before buying it.
simp: 我本该在买下这个电动剃须刀之前试一下的。
trad: 我本該在買下這個電動剃須刀之前試一下的。

eng: He has all kinds of books.
I don't care what color ink, just bring me a pen.
simp: 颜色无所谓，给我一支笔就行了。
trad: 顏色無所謂，給我一支筆就行了。

eng: This is not a sentence.

simp: 他忘记给她买过一个礼物了。
trad: 他忘記給她買過一個禮物了。

eng: The tie doesn't go with my suit.
Are you planning to take part in the meeting?

simp: 我们学校的图书馆很小，但是是新的。
trad: 我們學校的圖書館很小，但是是新的。

eng: As I am busy, I cannot go.
simp: 我很忙，所以我不能去了。
trad: 我很忙，所以我不能去了。

eng: All my cakes are delicious!
simp: 我所有的蛋糕都很美味!
trad: 我所有的蛋糕都很美味!

eng: He is playing in his room.
They made a great effort to settle the problem.
simp: 为了解决问题，他们尽了很大努力。
trad: 為了解決問題，他們盡了很大努力。

eng: The women work in a restaurant.
simp: 女人们在一家餐馆工作。
trad: 女人們在一家餐館工作。

eng: She doesn't like soccer.
The strike affected the nation's economy.
The strike affected the nation's economy.
He helped me to get over the difficulties.
He looks old, but he is still in his twenties.
simp: 他看上去老，但他还不到30岁。
trad: 他看上去老，但他還不到30歲。

eng: He'll never beat me.
I heard her singing.
He had a shower before breakfast.
It's the truth.
I would like to have a cup of coffee.
It is not easy to write in chalk.
He wanted to succeed, even at the cost of his health.
simp: 他想要成功，即使是以他的健康作为代价。
trad: 他想要成功，即使是以他的健康作為代價。

eng: Let me know the time you are leaving.
Please remind me to mail the report tomorrow.
