Rub salt in the wound.
Dick talks as if he knew everything.
simp: 迪克讲起话来好像他什麽都知道。
trad: 迪克講起話來好像他什麼都知道。

eng: Did you know that if you plug a pickle into an electrical outlet, it glows and makes buzzing noises?
simp: 你知道如果你把泡菜插入电源插座，它会发光并且发出嗡嗡的声音吗？
trad: 你知道如果你把泡菜插入電源插座，它會發光並且發出嗡嗡的聲音嗎？

eng: Look out! There's a hole in the road.
Reduce to pulp by boiling.
simp: 藉由煮沸以减少黏浆状物质。
trad: 藉由煮沸以減少黏漿狀物質。

eng: I think you will have done all the work soon.
simp: 我想你很快就可以做完所有的工作。
trad: 我想你很快就可以做完所有的工作。

eng: The earth is small in comparison with the sun.
She put her CDs in a row on the shelf.
simp: 她把她的CD在书架上排成一排。
trad: 她把她的CD在書架上排成一排。

eng: All of the milk was spilled.
simp: 所有的牛奶都溢出去了。
trad: 所有的牛奶都溢出去了。

eng: All of the milk was spilled.
simp: 所有的牛奶都洒出去了。
trad: 所有的牛奶都灑出去了。

eng: He held her hand in a firm clasp.
3 cubed is 27.
You are just saying that.
Remember me to your family.
She is an industrial designer.
That film was a great draw.
It's only a matter of time.
The major religions in China are Taoism, Buddhism, Islam and Christianity.
simp: 中国重要的宗教是道教、佛教、伊斯兰教和基督教。
trad: 中國重要的宗教是道教、佛教、伊斯蘭教和基督教。

eng: Of these, Taoism is a native religion, the others having been introduced from foreign lands.
simp: 其中，道教是本国的，其他是从国外引进的。
trad: 其中，道教是本國的，其他是從國外引進的。

eng: Taoism was founded on the teachings of Laozi, a sage born in 604 B.C. in present-day Henan Province.
simp: 道教是用老子的教导创立的，他是公元前六零四年在现代的河南省出生的圣贤。
trad: 道教是用老子的教導創立的，他是公元前六零四年在現代的河南省出生的聖賢。

eng: He taught contemplation as a means of spiritual purification and the attainment of the Dao, a principle that signifies the highest spiritual ideals of mankind.
simp: 他为精神的洁净和获得道的方法教深思，道是表示人类最高的精神理想的一个原则。
trad: 他為精神的潔凈和獲得道的方法教深思，道是表示人類最高的精神理想的一個原則。

eng: His teachings are incorporated in a profound book Daode Jing which Taoists regard as the final authority and doctrines of the religion.
simp: 他的教导都包含在道教者看作关于宗教最后的权威的道德经那本深刻的书。
trad: 他的教導都包含在道教者看作關於宗教最後的權威的道德經那本深刻的書。

eng: It is generally believed that Buddhism first came to China in 67 A.D. during the reign of Emperor Mingdi of the Eastern Han Dynasty.
simp: 普遍认为佛教公元六七年在东汉明帝的统治时先来中国。
trad: 普遍認為佛教公元六七年在東漢明帝的統治時先來中國。

eng: Afterwards, because it was sanctioned by many of the successive dynasties Buddhism became widespread and had a tremendous impact on the development of Chinese thought, culture and art.
simp: 后来，因为接连的许多朝代都批准它，佛教变得更分部广的并对中国精神、文化和艺术的发展有极大的影响。
trad: 後來，因為接連的許多朝代都批準它，佛教變得更分部廣的並對中國精神、文化和藝術的發展有極大的影響。

eng: Islam first reached China about the middle of the 7th century.
simp: 伊斯兰教大约在七世纪中传到中国。
trad: 伊斯蘭教大約在七世紀中傳到中國。

eng: As commercial and cultural contacts between East and West developed, Arab and Persian traders began calling on China along the Silk Road in increasing numbers.
simp: 随着东西方之间的贸易及文化往来日渐发展，越来越多的阿拉伯和波斯商人开始沿着丝路拜访中国。
trad: 隨著東西方之間的貿易及文化往來日漸發展，越來越多的阿拉伯和波斯商人開始沿著絲路拜訪中國。

eng: In 1807, Robert Morrison, the first British Protestant missionary to China arrived in Guangzhou.
simp: 一八零七年，第一个到中国的英国新教徒传教士罗伯特马礼逊到了广州。
trad: 一八零七年，第一個到中國的英國新教徒傳教士羅伯特馬禮遜到了廣州。

eng: He and a colleague who went to China later translated The New Testament into Chinese.
simp: 他跟一个去中国的同事后来把圣经中的新约翻译成中文。
trad: 他跟一個去中國的同事後來把聖經中的新約翻譯成中文。

eng: It has: it is in the heart of the Chinese people.
simp: 有了，在中国人民的心中。
trad: 有了，在中國人民的心中。

eng: I'm looking for a warm, woolen skirt.
simp: 我想找一件温暖的羊毛裙。
trad: 我想找一件溫暖的羊毛裙。

eng: John cannot be living in London now.
simp: 约翰现在不可能住在伦敦。
trad: 約翰現在不可能住在倫敦。

eng: What is John doing now?
John finished the work at the expense of his health.
simp: 约翰牺牲自己的健康，完成工作。
trad: 約翰犧牲自己的健康，完成工作。

eng: John is brave in appearance, but is in reality a coward.
simp: 约翰看起来很勇敢，但其实是个胆小鬼。
trad: 約翰看起來很勇敢，但其實是個膽小鬼。

eng: John writes a letter to his parents once a month.
simp: 约翰每个月写一封信给他的父母。
trad: 約翰每個月寫一封信給他的父母。

eng: John passed among the crowd.
John is envious of your new car.
John is head and shoulders above any of his classmates in French.
simp: 约翰的法文比他的同学都来得好。
trad: 約翰的法文比他的同學都來得好。

eng: Meg bought a can of tomatoes.
Walk faster, or you'll miss the train.
simp: 走快一点，不然你会错过火车。
trad: 走快一點，不然你會錯過火車。

eng: I'm sorry I didn't reply to you sooner.
simp: 抱歉，我没有早点回覆你。
trad: 抱歉，我沒有早點回覆你。

eng: Had I arrived earlier, I could have seen Kelly.
simp: 如果我早点到，就能遇到凯莉了。
trad: 如果我早點到，就能遇到凱莉了。

eng: I should have left earlier.
You should have started by now.
You ought to have come here earlier.
Sorry I didn't e-mail you sooner.
simp: 抱歉，我没有早点写e-mail给你。
trad: 抱歉，我沒有早點寫e-mail給你。

eng: The woman to whom you were talking is my sister.
simp: 跟你讲话的那个女人是我姐姐。
trad: 跟你講話的那個女人是我姐姐。

eng: What do my hobbies bring to my life?
simp: 我的爱好为我的生活带来什么？
trad: 我的愛好為我的生活帶來什麼？

eng: My hobbies are not only wide-ranging but also useful.
simp: 我的爱好不但广泛而且有用。
trad: 我的愛好不但廣泛而且有用。

eng: In my view, everyone should have intellectual hobbies as well as an interest in physical activities.
simp: 对我自己来说，每个人应该有学知识的爱好，也应该对体育活动感兴趣。
trad: 對我自己來說，每個人應該有學知識的愛好，也應該對體育活動感興趣。

eng: In terms of intellectual hobbies, I really like learning Chinese characters.
simp: 对知识的爱好而言，我真的喜欢学汉字。
trad: 對知識的愛好而言，我真的喜歡學漢字。

eng: Normally I might study Chinese characters for an hour a day.
simp: 我平时每天可能练习一个小时汉字。
trad: 我平時每天可能練習一個小時漢字。

eng: Last time I counted, I estimated that I know around 2500 Chinese characters.
simp: 我上次计算，估计我已经学会了两千五百个汉字左右。
trad: 我上次計算，估計我已經學會了兩千五百個漢字左右。

eng: It's obvious that I spend too much time studying Chinese characters, so I ought to study other aspects of the language more.
simp: 可想而知我在学汉字上花太多时间，所以我应该更好地练习语言的其他方面。
trad: 可想而知我在學漢字上花太多時間，所以我應該更好地練習語言的其他方面。

eng: Apart from languages, I'm also interested in technology.
simp: 除了语言，我也对技术感兴趣。
trad: 除了語言，我也對技術感興趣。

eng: I think that computers can help students use more effective study methods.
simp: 我认为电脑会帮助学生以高效方式使学得更好。
trad: 我認為電腦會幫助學生以高效方式使學得更好。

eng: I use all kinds of software to study Chinese.
simp: 我用各种各样的软件学习中文。
trad: 我用各種各樣的軟件學習中文。

eng: Of those, the one I use most often is a flashcard system.
simp: 其中我最常用的是一种抽认卡系统。
trad: 其中我最常用的是一種抽認卡系統。

eng: I often read English and Chinese blogs online.
simp: 我经常上网看英文和中文的博客。
trad: 我經常上網看英文和中文的博客。

eng: Because Chinese blogs use a lot of slang, I usually don't understand them that well, but I still think it's good for my Chinese.
simp: 因为中文的博客常常是用许多俚语写的，我往往看得不太懂，但是我还是觉得这个活动对我的中文水平有好的影响。
trad: 因為中文的博客常常是用許多俚語寫的，我往往看得不太懂，但是我還是覺得這個活動對我的中文水平有好的影響。

eng: I also run my own website, to try and record my progress and to help other people a little bit.
simp: 我也管理自己的网站，试试记录我的进步而且给别人帮助。
trad: 我也管理自己的網站，試試記錄我的進步而且給別人幫助。

eng: As for physical exercise, although I loathe most sports (I think they're really boring), I do like going to the gym to lift weights.
simp: 要说锻炼身体，虽然我痛恨大部分的运动，觉得它们真的无聊，但是我喜欢去健身房举重。
trad: 要說鍛煉身體，雖然我痛恨大部分的運動，覺得它們真的無聊，但是我喜歡去健身房舉重。

eng: Every other day I go with a friend; we lift weights whilst chatting together.
simp: 我每隔一天就跟一个好朋友一起去，我们一起一边谈话一边举重。
trad: 我每隔一天就跟一個好朋友一起去，我們一起一邊談話一邊舉重。

eng: Because there's the chance to help each other, as well as some healthy competition, I think going to the gym with friends is the best way.
simp: 因为有互相帮助的机会也有正常竞争，所以我觉得跟朋友去健身房是最好的办法。
trad: 因為有互相幫助的機會也有正常競爭，所以我覺得跟朋友去健身房是最好的辦法。

eng: When you're about to have exams, lifting weights really does relieve stress, and it's also good for your mind and body.
simp: 快要考试的时候，举重真的消愁解闷，再说对身体和精神都很好。
trad: 快要考試的時候，舉重真的消愁解悶，再說對身體和精神都很好。

eng: All in all, I think my hobbies are balanced; they bring some relaxation to my life, and at the same time bring focus to my studies.
simp: 大体上，我认为我的爱好很均衡，它们给我的生活带来轻松，并同时为我学习带来更集中的精力。
trad: 大體上，我認為我的愛好很均衡，它們給我的生活帶來輕松，並同時為我學習帶來更集中的精力。

eng: He's the scapegoat.
How many keys? asked Pepperberg.
They are not singing, they are flirting with each other.
simp: 他们不是在演唱，他们在调情说爱。
trad: 他們不是在演唱，他們在調情說愛。

eng: Tie your shoelaces.
I do not agree with you at all.
simp: 我完全不赞成你的意见。
trad: 我完全不贊成你的意見。

eng: I dislike big cities.
We have less snow than usual.
He amazed everyone by passing his driving test.
simp: 他通过驾驶考试的事让每一个人都觉得惊讶。
trad: 他通過駕駛考試的事讓每一個人都覺得驚訝。

eng: It's now my turn.
I have never heard him speak ill of others.
simp: 我从没听说他关于其他人说坏话。
trad: 我從沒聽說他關於其他人說壞話。

eng: The trouble is that we have no money.
Some of the drivers were laughing and yelling.
simp: 一些司机笑的笑，喊的喊。
trad: 一些司機笑的笑，喊的喊。

eng: Is it far from here?
Young tigers resemble cats.
We don't have much time. Let's hurry.
Every man has his own strong points.
I came.
I came.
Father came home.
Oṃ - the gem is in the lotus - hūṃ
Tom, what would you like to have for dinner?
That's the stupidest thing I've ever said.
simp: 我曾说过的废话当中那是最愚蠢的一句。
trad: 我曾說過的廢話當中那是最愚蠢的一句。

eng: Freedom is the center of American democracy.
simp: 美国民主的中心思想是自由。
trad: 美國民主的中心思想是自由。

eng: Water freezes at zero degrees Celsius.
When water freezes it becomes ice.
Fresh food is wonderful.
Fresh fruits and vegetables are good for your health.
simp: 新鲜水果和蔬菜有益健康。
trad: 新鮮水果和蔬菜有益健康。

eng: They became friends in elementary school.
simp: 他们在小学时就是朋友了。
trad: 他們在小學時就是朋友了。

eng: We spent the weekend with friends.
simp: 我们和朋友一起度过週末。
trad: 我們和朋友一起度過週末。

eng: Marriage frightens some people.
Scary movies will frighten the children.
Is bungee jumping frightening or fun?
simp: 高空弹跳是恐怖还是好玩？
trad: 高空彈跳是恐怖還是好玩？

eng: This movie is frightening to the children.
simp: 这部电影对小孩来说很可怕。
trad: 這部電影對小孩來說很可怕。

eng: The school is five kilometers from my home.
simp: 学校离我家有五公里远。
trad: 學校離我家有五公裏遠。

eng: Put the chair in front of the desk.
They wanted a wedding picture in front of the Eiffel Tower.
simp: 他们想在艾菲尔铁塔前面拍张结婚照。
trad: 他們想在艾菲爾鐵塔前面拍張結婚照。

eng: Coal and natural gas are natural fuels.
simp: 煤和天然气是天然燃料。
trad: 煤和天然氣是天然燃料。

eng: The bus is full. You'll have to wait for the next one.
simp: 这班公车客满了。你必须等下一班。
trad: 這班公車客滿了。你必須等下一班。

eng: The fuel tank in the car is full.
The streets in Tokyo are full on Saturdays.
simp: 週六，东京街上人满为患。
trad: 週六，東京街上人滿為患。

eng: Tom's funeral will be this weekend.
simp: 汤姆的葬礼订在这週末。
trad: 湯姆的葬禮訂在這週末。

eng: The funeral was yesterday.
Jazz fusion is a combination of rock and jazz.
simp: 融合爵士是摇滚乐与爵士乐的融合。
trad: 融合爵士是搖滾樂與爵士樂的融合。

eng: You gain more than you spend when you go to college.
simp: 上大学的时候，你得到的比付出的还多。
trad: 上大學的時候，你得到的比付出的還多。

eng: Tom has gained weight.
Monopoly is a popular game for families to play.
simp: 大富翁是一个家庭玩的热门游戏。
trad: 大富翁是一個家庭玩的熱門遊戲。

eng: What's your favorite game to play with friends?
simp: 你最喜欢和朋友玩什麽游戏？
trad: 你最喜歡和朋友玩什麼遊戲？

eng: Tom puts gas in his car twice a week.
simp: 汤姆每週帮车子加两次油。
trad: 湯姆每週幫車子加兩次油。

eng: I love the sound of children laughing.
simp: 我喜欢孩子们笑的声音。
trad: 我喜歡孩子們笑的聲音。

eng: Be quiet, please! Don't make a sound.
There's no space in the room for another bed.
simp: 这间房间没有空间再放一张床了。
trad: 這間房間沒有空間再放一張床了。

eng: Tom only wears a suit on special occasions.
simp: 汤姆只在特殊场合穿西装。
trad: 湯姆只在特殊場合穿西裝。

eng: This work must be finished by Monday.
simp: 这项工作必须在週一​​前完成。
trad: 這項工作必須在週一​​前完成。

eng: Why did you come here this morning?
simp: 今天早上你为什麽来这裡?
trad: 今天早上你為什麼來這裡?

eng: Will you please show me the way?
simp: 请您给我指一指路好吗？
trad: 請您給我指一指路好嗎？

eng: They came all the way from Brazil.
The admission is ten dollars a person.
The admission is ten dollars a person.
We moved to New York last fall.
simp: 我们去年秋天搬到了纽约。
trad: 我們去年秋天搬到了紐約。

eng: That man grabbed the young girl's wrist.
simp: 那个男人抓住了这个年轻女孩的手腕。
trad: 那個男人抓住了這個年輕女孩的手腕。

eng: There are some boys under the tree.
She used to play tennis on Sunday.
There are many stores in this area.
We had a mild winter last year.
She warned him not to go alone.
simp: 她警告了他不要一个人去。
trad: 她警告了他不要一個人去。

eng: There are many books in my room.
You don't have to talk so loud.
We have been to Tokyo many times.
simp: 我们去过东京很多次了。
trad: 我們去過東京很多次了。

eng: Taxi fares will go up next month.
simp: 计程车费将在下个月涨价。
trad: 計程車費將在下個月漲價。

eng: We asked Hanako to play the piano.
What is the name of this river?
What is the name of this river?
When did he say he would come?
The sky is clear almost every day.
simp: 天空几乎每天是晴朗的。
trad: 天空幾乎每天是晴朗的。

eng: You are a good painter, aren't you?
simp: 你是个很棒的画家，不是吗？
trad: 你是個很棒的畫家，不是嗎？

eng: You're in better shape than I am.
There is little chance of his winning.
There is a path through the wood.
simp: 有一个穿过树林的小路。
trad: 有一個穿過樹林的小路。

eng: The medicine didn't do me any good.
simp: 这药对我没有任何好处。
trad: 這藥對我沒有任何好處。

eng: The plane takes off in ten minutes.
Tom is not as old as you.
Will you have another slice of pie?
Someone has walked off with my pencil.
You'd better go back home now.
They waited in line for the bus.
She went down to the fifth floor.
Where in Australia did you grow up?
She's not as beautiful as her sister.
The weather is usually hot in July.
We have four French classes a week.
simp: 我们一週有四堂法语课。
trad: 我們一週有四堂法語課。

eng: The old man walked with a stick.
simp: 这个老人拄着一根拐杖走路。
trad: 這個老人拄著一根拐杖走路。

eng: The girl sitting over there is Nancy.
simp: 坐在那裡的女孩是南希。
trad: 坐在那裡的女孩是南希。

eng: This song is very popular in Japan.
simp: 这首歌曲在日本很受欢迎。
trad: 這首歌曲在日本很受歡迎。

eng: There was little water in the well.
The history of China is older than that of Japan.
simp: 中国历史比日本历史更悠久。
trad: 中國歷史比日本歷史更悠久。

eng: What is the purpose of your visit?
This book has a lot of pictures.
She took a taxi to the hospital.
There is a school near my house.
The doctor cured him of his cancer.
We can hear the ocean from here.
simp: 我们从这裡可以听到海的声音。
trad: 我們從這裡可以聽到海的聲音。

eng: She waited for you for two hours.
When will the rainy season be over?
The bicycle by the door is mine.
simp: 在门口的自行车是我的。
trad: 在門口的自行車是我的。

eng: They believe in a life after death.
They believe in a life after death.
Will you go to America next year?
We're expecting a good harvest this year.
Watch him and do the same thing.
simp: 看着他并且跟他做同样的事情。
trad: 看著他並且跟他做同樣的事情。

eng: This T-shirt is too small for me.
She thought that he was wasting electricity.
Would you mind my moving your car?
simp: 你介意我移动你的车吗？
trad: 你介意我移動你的車嗎？

eng: She used to work for our company.
simp: 她以前在我们公司工作。
trad: 她以前在我們公司工作。

eng: The girl is small for her age.
simp: 就她的年龄来说，这个女孩算是矮小的。
trad: 就她的年齡來說，這個女孩算是矮小的。

eng: We talked until two in the morning.
The light changed from red to green.
What she bought there was a camera.
simp: 她在那裡买的是一台照相机。
trad: 她在那裡買的是一臺照相機。

eng: We flew from London to New York.
Yoko is unable to buy a computer.
She was not a very good pianist.
simp: 她不是一个很好的钢琴家。
trad: 她不是一個很好的鋼琴家。

eng: They've decided to get married next month.
simp: 他们已经决定下个月结婚。
trad: 他們已經決定下個月結婚。

eng: There is a post office close by.
Would you mind saying that once more?
Would you mind saying that once more?
What're you going to do this weekend?
They made him captain of the team.
You have good reason to be angry.
You'd better not have driven my car.
simp: 你最好不要开了我的车。
trad: 你最好不要開了我的車。

eng: The baby is sleeping in the cradle.
Which group do you want to join?
We are going downtown to eat pizza.
simp: 我们要去市中心吃比萨。
trad: 我們要去市中心吃比薩。

eng: Without your advice, I would have failed.
simp: 没有你们的意见，我就失败了。
trad: 沒有你們的意見，我就失敗了。

eng: We talked over the plan with him.
simp: 我们和他谈了这个计划。
trad: 我們和他談了這個計劃。

eng: Where is the bus stop for downtown?
simp: 到市区的公车站牌在哪裡？
trad: 到市區的公車站牌在哪裡？

eng: Who is the woman dressed in pink?
simp: 那个穿粉红色衣服的女人是谁？
trad: 那個穿粉紅色衣服的女人是誰？

eng: We saw him walk across the street.
There is no hope of his recovery.
You had better not go there again.
Where in Japan did you grow up?
That hotel was very near the lake.
There used to be a prison here.
Why did you come here so early?
simp: 你为什麽这麽早来这裡？
trad: 你為什麼這麼早來這裡？

eng: The car he's driving is not his.
simp: 这辆他正在开的车不是他的。
trad: 這輛他正在開的車不是他的。

eng: She was very happy with my gift.
simp: 她对于我送的礼物感到很开心。
trad: 她對於我送的禮物感到很開心。

eng: What have you been doing this week?
simp: 你这个星期一直在做什麽？
trad: 你這個星期一直在做什麼？

eng: As usual, I mispronounced words and broke my sentences up in the wrong places.
I gave all of the Chinese proverbs back to the teacher.
simp: 我把成语全部还给老师了。
trad: 我把成語全部還給老師了。

eng: I bared my soul to her.
I spoke from the heart.
He ordered a chop suey.
He ordered a chop suey.
How often do you eat fish?
Lucy cannot use chopsticks.
I'd like a city map.
The Japanese government can't cope with the problem.
simp: 日本政府无法管理问题。
trad: 日本政府無法管理問題。

eng: Not that he couldn't, but he's too lazy one man.
simp: 却不是不能作而是他这个男人太懒了。
trad: 卻不是不能作而是他這個男人太懶了。

eng: Not that he couldn't, but he's too lazy one man.
simp: 并不是作不到而是他这个男人太懒了。
trad: 並不是作不到而是他這個男人太懶了。

eng: What made you come here so early?
simp: 什麽原因让你这麽早来这裡？
trad: 什麼原因讓你這麼早來這裡？

eng: I can answer your question.
You're never satisfied!
Who owns this house?
I looked on him as the boss.
His secretary seems to know the truth.
simp: 他的秘书好像了解真相。
trad: 他的秘書好像了解真相。

eng: The capital of the Ukraine is Kiev.
He wants the money.
He is very fond of music.
You'd better not keep company with him.
I haven't forgotten.
You look good in a kimono.
simp: 你穿着和服看上去很漂亮。
trad: 你穿著和服看上去很漂亮。

eng: I'm stuffed!
At times I can't understand him.
simp: 有时候我不懂他的意思。
trad: 有時候我不懂他的意思。

eng: Where are the plates?
The customer did not come.
I'm full!
Kids go to school to study.
simp: 孩子去学校就是为了学习。
trad: 孩子去學校就是為了學習。

eng: I have no idea why he did that.
simp: 我不明白他为何搞这样。
trad: 我不明白他為何搞這樣。

eng: I want to know what you did this summer.
simp: 我想知道，你这个夏天干了些什么？
trad: 我想知道，你這個夏天幹了些什麼？

eng: Come back soon.
In a word, life is short.
simp: 总而言之，生命是很短的。
trad: 總而言之，生命是很短的。

eng: I feel homesick.
The road was wet from the rain.
simp: 这条路因为下雨所以是湿的。
trad: 這條路因為下雨所以是濕的。

eng: Which do you prefer, rice or bread?
simp: 你比较喜欢哪一个，米饭还是麵包？
trad: 你比較喜歡哪一個，米飯還是麵包？

eng: The boy playing the guitar is Ken.
simp: 那个正在弹吉他的男孩是肯。
trad: 那個正在彈吉他的男孩是肯。

eng: Yesterday I met Mary on the street.
simp: 昨天我在街上遇见了玛丽。
trad: 昨天我在街上遇見了瑪麗。

eng: What were you doing at that time?
We saw many ships in the harbor.
simp: 我们在港口裡看到了许多船。
trad: 我們在港口裡看到了許多船。

eng: The world is running out of oil.
simp: 世界上的石油快用完了。
trad: 世界上的石油快用完了。

eng: That fox must have killed the hen.
simp: 那隻狐狸杀了一隻母鸡。
trad: 那隻狐貍殺了一隻母雞。

eng: Were you on time for work today?
What do you think of this plan?
What do you have the first period?
You should try to be more polite.
This is the tallest tower in Japan.
Will she go to America next year?
We'll change trains at the next station.
simp: 我们会在下一站换火车。
trad: 我們會在下一站換火車。

eng: The cancer has spread to her stomach.
simp: 癌细胞已经扩散到她的胃。
trad: 癌細胞已經擴散到她的胃。

eng: When I came home, Tom was studying.
simp: 当我回家的时候，汤姆正在读书。
trad: 當我回家的時候，湯姆正在讀書。

eng: She will accompany me on the piano.
Tom's hope was to win first prize.
Yoko will go to Kyoto next week.
You should be ashamed of your stupidity.
simp: 你应该为你的愚蠢感到羞耻。
trad: 你應該為你的愚蠢感到羞恥。

eng: The price does not include the box.
simp: 这个价格不包含这个箱子。
trad: 這個價格不包含這個箱子。

eng: There is the train at 10 o'clock.
The baby went to sleep at once.
simp: 这个小婴儿立刻去睡觉了。
trad: 這個小嬰兒立刻去睡覺了。

eng: There is a cat in the kitchen.
She told me she knew my brother.
simp: 她告诉我她认识我的哥哥。
trad: 她告訴我她認識我的哥哥。

eng: She was scared to cross the road.
This is a picture of my mother.
Why do you study English every day?
Was it Jack that broke the window?
You didn't need to come so early.
We will know the truth before long.
When did you graduate from high school?
They had to work all year round.
simp: 他们一整年都必须工作。
trad: 他們一整年都必須工作。

eng: Will you go to the party tonight?
Why don't you listen to his advice?
simp: 你为什麽不听他的忠告?
trad: 你為什麼不聽他的忠告?

eng: She wasn't able to open the bottle.
This tie doesn't go with my suit.
simp: 这条领带跟我的西装不配。
trad: 這條領帶跟我的西裝不配。

eng: Would you mind lending me your car?
simp: 你介意把你的车借给我吗?
trad: 你介意把你的車借給我嗎?

eng: Would you like to have some coffee?
The red dress looked good on her.
simp: 她穿这套红色的洋装很好看。
trad: 她穿這套紅色的洋裝很好看。

eng: The game will probably be called off.
simp: 这场比赛将可能被取消。
trad: 這場比賽將可能被取消。

eng: Will you drive me to the hospital?
Won't you come over to my place?
Where is the United Airlines check-in counter?
simp: 联合航空公司办理登机手续的柜檯在哪裡？
trad: 聯合航空公司辦理登機手續的櫃檯在哪裡？

eng: She will be back within a week.
Watch him and do what he does.
The teacher told us a funny story.
simp: 老师跟我们说了一个有趣的故事。
trad: 老師跟我們說了一個有趣的故事。

eng: Take the first street to the right.
The library is on the 4th floor.
Food goes bad easily in this season.
simp: 这个季节食物很容易变坏。
trad: 這個季節食物很容易變壞。

eng: Mathematics is his strongest subject.
simp: 他最擅长的科目是数学。
trad: 他最擅長的科目是數學。

eng: We rested for a while.
He can speak both English and French very well.
simp: 他的英语和法语都说得十分流利。
trad: 他的英語和法語都說得十分流利。

eng: Which is the heavier of the two?
simp: 两者之中哪一个比较重？
trad: 兩者之中哪一個比較重？

eng: As soon as man is born, he begins to die.
simp: 从出生的一刻开始，我们就在步向死亡。
trad: 從出生的一刻開始，我們就在步向死亡。

eng: Her father intends her to be a pianist.
simp: 她的父亲想她成为一个钢琴家。
trad: 她的父親想她成為一個鋼琴家。

eng: It is a pleasure to watch a baseball game on TV.
simp: 在电视上看棒球比赛是一件乐事。
trad: 在電視上看棒球比賽是一件樂事。

eng: We can hardly imagine our daily life without television.
simp: 如果没有了电视，实在很难想像我们的日常生活会变成怎样。
trad: 如果沒有了電視，實在很難想像我們的日常生活會變成怎樣。

eng: Pollution has a disastrous effect on the ecology of a region.
simp: 环境污染可以对一个区域的生态造成极大的影响。
trad: 環境汙染可以對一個區域的生態造成極大的影響。

eng: We should learn from those who have gone before us.
She died on a cold night in December.
simp: 她在十二月的一个寒夜里去世了。
trad: 她在十二月的一個寒夜裏去世了。

eng: He saved the drowning child at the cost of his own life.
simp: 他把溺水的小孩救了起来，但是却牺牲了自己的生命。
trad: 他把溺水的小孩救了起來，但是卻犧牲了自己的生命。

eng: The storm caused a lot of damage.
simp: 暴风雨造成了很大的损害。
trad: 暴風雨造成了很大的損害。

eng: What do you think about this plan?
simp: 你觉得这个计划怎麽样？
trad: 你覺得這個計劃怎麼樣？

eng: They kept me waiting for an hour.
simp: 他们让我等了一个小时。
trad: 他們讓我等了一個小時。

eng: Why can Taro speak English so well?
simp: 为什麽太郎英语可以说得这麽好？
trad: 為什麼太郎英語可以說得這麼好？

eng: Why did her father go to Japan?
simp: 为什麽她的父亲去了日本？
trad: 為什麼她的父親去了日本？

eng: We were surprised to hear the news.
simp: 我们听到这个消息很惊讶。
trad: 我們聽到這個消息很驚訝。

eng: We took a walk along the river.
We have lived in Osaka six years.
simp: 我们在大坂已经住了六年。
trad: 我們在大阪已經住了六年。

eng: We must cancel our trip to Japan.
simp: 我们必须取消我们去日本的旅行。
trad: 我們必須取消我們去日本的旅行。

eng: We will go on a picnic tomorrow.
Would you like to leave a message?
Will you help me move this desk?
simp: 你能帮我搬这张桌子吗？
trad: 你能幫我搬這張桌子嗎？

eng: We have many rainy days in June.
What do you need this money for?
What do you want me to do?
Who was in charge of today's party?
Speaking English isn't easy, but it's fun.
simp: 说英语不容易，但是它很有趣。
trad: 說英語不容易，但是它很有趣。

eng: Tom can swim as fast as you.
simp: 汤姆游泳可以游得跟你一样快。
trad: 湯姆遊泳可以遊得跟你一樣快。

eng: We went to the mountains to ski.
Tom is as tall as his father.
The bus stop is across the street.
Would you mind my opening the door?
You'd better not have eaten the cake.
We saw Jane swimming across the river.
This stone is too heavy to lift.
simp: 这块石头太重了无法抬起来。
trad: 這塊石頭太重了無法擡起來。

eng: She told me to open the window.
What you said does not make sense.
You didn't need to take a taxi.
What do you want for Christmas, Jenny?
This plane flies between Osaka and Hakodate.
simp: 这架飞机往返于大坂和函馆之间。
trad: 這架飛機往返於大阪和函館之間。

eng: There's been a death in his family.
Something must have happened to Bob yesterday.
simp: 昨天鲍伯一定发生了什麽事。
trad: 昨天鮑伯一定發生了什麼事。

eng: Why don't you sit down and relax?
simp: 你为什麽不坐下来放鬆一下。
trad: 你為什麼不坐下來放鬆一下。

eng: What he said would happen has happened.
simp: 他说会发生的事情已经发生了。
trad: 他說會發生的事情已經發生了。

eng: They built a bridge across the river.
simp: 他们建了一座横跨河流的桥。
trad: 他們建了一座橫跨河流的橋。

eng: Tom's Japanese is improving little by little.
simp: 汤姆的日语一点一点地渐渐进步中。
trad: 湯姆的日語一點一點地漸漸進步中。

eng: Tom has no friends to play with.
simp: 汤姆没有朋友可以一起玩耍。
trad: 湯姆沒有朋友可以一起玩耍。

eng: If you don't understand, ask a question.
simp: 如果你不了解，就问问题。
trad: 如果你不了解，就問問題。

eng: It's not that simple.
The man kept talking for an hour.
simp: 这个男人连续说了一个小时的话。
trad: 這個男人連續說了一個小時的話。

eng: They are having a really good time.
Will you go to America next month?
What do the initials NTT stand for?
We saw a funny movie last Sunday.
simp: 我们上星期天看了一场很有趣的电影。
trad: 我們上星期天看了一場很有趣的電影。

eng: She went to the movies by herself.
The price of eggs is going up.
Why don't you take the day off?
We often eat fish raw in Japan.
simp: 我们在日本常常吃生鱼。
trad: 我們在日本常常吃生魚。

eng: Where would you like to go first?
While I was reading, I fell asleep.
simp: 当我读书的时候，我睡着了。
trad: 當我讀書的時候，我睡著了。

eng: What she said did not make sense.
We watched the soccer game on TV.
simp: 我们看了电视上的足球比赛。
trad: 我們看了電視上的足球比賽。

eng: There is a military base near here.
simp: 这附近有一个军事基地。
trad: 這附近有一個軍事基地。

eng: What time do you leave for school?
They looked as if they would cry.
simp: 他们看起来好像要哭了。
trad: 他們看起來好像要哭了。

eng: Will John come to see us tomorrow?
simp: 约翰明天会来看我们吗？
trad: 約翰明天會來看我們嗎？

eng: You can keep this one for yourself.
simp: 你可以把这个保留给自己。
trad: 你可以把這個保留給自己。

eng: There were few people on the beach.
When were potatoes introduced into Japan?
simp: 马铃薯是甚麽时候传到日本的？
trad: 馬鈴薯是甚麼時候傳到日本的？

eng: When my mother was young, she was very beautiful.
simp: 我母亲年轻的时候十分漂亮。
trad: 我母親年輕的時候十分漂亮。

eng: Defenestrate your clock to see how time flies.
simp: 只要把时钟丢出窗外，你就可以知道甚麽叫做「时光飞逝」了。
trad: 只要把時鐘丟出窗外，你就可以知道甚麼叫做「時光飛逝」了。

eng: They are in danger of extinction.
simp: 牠们正面临绝种的危机。
trad: 牠們正面臨絕種的危機。

eng: We learn by experience.
This is the picture of his own painting.
simp: 这是一幅他自己画的画。
trad: 這是一幅他自己畫的畫。

eng: His behavior is contrary to his belief.
simp: 他的行为和他的信念背道而驰。
trad: 他的行為和他的信念背道而馳。

eng: If you want something done right, do it yourself.
Quiet down.
He comes from Genoa.
He comes from Geneva.
Europeans like to drink wine.
What is that building with the green roof?
simp: 那幢绿色屋顶的建筑是什么？
trad: 那幢綠色屋頂的建築是什麼？

eng: This is your doing!
Mr. Green is a history teacher.
I get you.
I haven't decided yet.
She invited Tom and me to the party.
simp: 她邀请我和汤姆去派对。
trad: 她邀請我和湯姆去派對。

eng: She's as busy as Tom.
She can play the drum.
She especially likes music.
The soldier became a teacher.
I was not scolding you.
Don't listen to her.
Just as food feeds the body, so reading feeds the mind.
simp: 就像食物喂养身体，所以阅读喂养心灵。
trad: 就像食物餵養身體，所以閱讀餵養心靈。

eng: He's later than you think.
It's later than you think.
What is love?
We all hope for peace.
When I put 100 yen in and pressed the button to buy a coffee at the vending machine, four cans dropped down all at once!
simp: 当我把100日元放进自动贩卖机并按下按钮要买一罐咖啡的时候，突然间四罐咖啡掉了下来！
trad: 當我把100日元放進自動販賣機並按下按鈕要買一罐咖啡的時候，突然間四罐咖啡掉了下來！

eng: Everyone admired his courage.
simp: 每个人都佩服他的勇气。
trad: 每個人都佩服他的勇氣。

eng: She voted for Mr Nishioka irrespective of party lines.
simp: 她不论党派把票投给了西冈先生。
trad: 她不論黨派把票投給了西岡先生。

eng: Do your best.
I was in an IAA meeting.
simp: 我参加了一个 IAA 的会议。
trad: 我參加了一個 IAA 的會議。

eng: The unemployment rate went up to 5% because of the recession.
simp: 经济不景气失业率上升到了5％。
trad: 經濟不景氣失業率上升到了5％。

eng: The dog was hit by a car.
What is the meaning of this word?
What is the meaning of this word?
There are four people in my family.
Tokyo is the largest city in Japan.
simp: 东京是日本最大的城市。
trad: 東京是日本最大的城市。

eng: The oranges in this bag are rotten.
simp: 这个袋子裡的柳橙都烂了。
trad: 這個袋子裡的柳橙都爛了。

eng: She keeps a record of everything she buys.
simp: 她把每一样买了的东西都记录起来。
trad: 她把每一樣買了的東西都記錄起來。

eng: The boat is to leave for England this evening.
simp: 这艘船会在傍晚出发去英国。
trad: 這艘船會在傍晚出發去英國。

eng: This desk is better than that one.
Tell me how to solve the problem.
simp: 告诉我如何解决这个问题。
trad: 告訴我如何解決這個問題。

eng: Will you please lend me a stapler?
simp: 请你借给我一支订书机好吗？
trad: 請你借給我一支訂書機好嗎？

eng: What did you major in at college?
The girl talking with Jim is Mary.
simp: 那个正在跟吉姆说话的女孩是玛丽。
trad: 那個正在跟吉姆說話的女孩是瑪麗。

eng: She walked slowly so she wouldn't slip.
simp: 她慢慢地走，这样她就不会滑倒了。
trad: 她慢慢地走，這樣她就不會滑倒了。

eng: Why did you come home so late?
This bridge was built two years ago.
simp: 这座桥是在两年前建造的。
trad: 這座橋是在兩年前建造的。

eng: You had better go to the dentist's.
Was he still here when you arrived?
simp: 当你到达的时候他还在这裡吗？
trad: 當你到達的時候他還在這裡嗎？

eng: You'd better wait for the next bus.
By the year 2020, the population of our city will have doubled.
simp: 在2020年以前，我们的城市的人口将增加一倍。
trad: 在2020年以前，我們的城市的人口將增加一倍。

eng: She was tired, but she kept working.
When did you come back from Tokyo?
simp: 你什麽时候从东京回来的？
trad: 你什麼時候從東京回來的？

eng: There are some apples in the basket.
We chose John to be our captain.
simp: 我们选了约翰作我们队长。
trad: 我們選了約翰作我們隊長。

eng: We had a good time playing chess.
The sun is larger than the moon.
They asked Kate to babysit their child.
simp: 他们请凯特帮忙照看他们的孩子。
trad: 他們請凱特幫忙照看他們的孩子。

eng: That desk is too small for Meg.
simp: 那张桌子对梅格来说太小了。
trad: 那張桌子對梅格來說太小了。

eng: This ticket is good for three days.
simp: 这张票的有效期是三天。
trad: 這張票的有效期是三天。

eng: Would you like to eat with us?
Tell me where to put these books.
simp: 告诉我这些书要放在哪裡。
trad: 告訴我這些書要放在哪裡。

eng: Who do you think broke the window?
simp: 你认为是谁打破了窗户?
trad: 你認為是誰打破了窗戶?

eng: Why did she go to the station?
Would you mind lending me your pen?
simp: 你介意把你的笔借给我吗?
trad: 你介意把你的筆借給我嗎?

eng: Would you mind lending me your pen?
Would you mind if I used your car?
simp: 如果用了你的车，你会介意吗?
trad: 如果用了你的車，你會介意嗎?

eng: Tom fed his leftovers to his dog.
simp: 汤姆把他的厨馀喂给他的狗吃。
trad: 湯姆把他的廚餘餵給他的狗吃。

eng: The news of his death spread around.
simp: 他去世的消息传遍各地。
trad: 他去世的消息傳遍各地。

eng: China gives me many different impressions.
simp: 中国给我许多不同的印象。
trad: 中國給我許多不同的印象。

eng: Firstly, I think that the first time each foreigner is in China, the earliest impression is certainly the size of the country.
simp: 首先，我认为每个外国人第一次在中国的时候，最初的印象一定是国家的大小。
trad: 首先，我認為每個外國人第一次在中國的時候，最初的印象一定是國家的大小。

eng: I still remember the first time I was in China; I was in Shandong, and I realised that that province alone is twenty six thousand square kilometres bigger than England.
simp: 我还记得我第一次去中国，我在山东，意识到那个单纯的省比英格兰大两万六千平方公里。
trad: 我還記得我第一次去中國，我在山東，意識到那個單純的省比英格蘭大兩萬六千平方公裏。

eng: The box is too heavy to carry.
simp: 这个箱子太重了无法携带。
trad: 這個箱子太重了無法攜帶。

eng: She was very proud of her father.
simp: 她为她的父亲感到非常骄傲。
trad: 她為她的父親感到非常驕傲。

eng: She was very proud of her father.
simp: 她非常地以她父亲为荣。
trad: 她非常地以她父親為榮。

eng: Because it's a developing country, some aspects of China aren't as good as those in Western countries.
simp: 因为中国是个发展中的国家，所以有的方面没有西方国家那么好。
trad: 因為中國是個發展中的國家，所以有的方面沒有西方國家那麼好。

eng: There is something wrong with my car.
However, other aspects have already surpassed the standards of many Western countries.
simp: 不过，其它的方面已经超过了很多西方国家的程度。
trad: 不過，其它的方面已經超過了很多西方國家的程度。

eng: There is something wrong with my car.
You can use this computer any time.
simp: 你可以随时使用这台电脑。
trad: 你可以隨時使用這臺電腦。

eng: For example, China's public transport is without a doubt better than the UK's, but the UK's public welfare may be better than China's.
simp: 例如，中国的公共交通毫不怀疑比英国的好，但英国的公益事业可能比中国的好。
trad: 例如，中國的公共交通毫不懷疑比英國的好，但英國的公益事業可能比中國的好。

eng: This kind of strange situation typifies my impressions of China.
simp: 这种奇怪的情况是我对中的印象的典型。
trad: 這種奇怪的情況是我對中的印象的典型。

eng: In China's agricultural and industrial areas, some people are still very poor.
simp: 在中国乡村和工业区，有的人还是很穷的。
trad: 在中國鄉村和工業區，有的人還是很窮的。

eng: We left the final decision to him.
simp: 我们让他做最后的决定。
trad: 我們讓他做最後的決定。

eng: What are you going to do today?
This coffee is too strong for me.
simp: 这个咖啡对我来说太浓了。
trad: 這個咖啡對我來說太濃了。

eng: What did you do over the weekend?
The boy talking with Fred is Mike.
simp: 那个正在跟Fred讲话的男孩是Mike。
trad: 那個正在跟Fred講話的男孩是Mike。

eng: This may not be a real diamond.
simp: 这可能不是一颗真的鑽石。
trad: 這可能不是一顆真的鑽石。

eng: This time Bob is likely to win.
She will have to cook for everyone.
The typhoon caused the river to flood.
She went to the museum by taxi.
simp: 她搭计程车去博物馆了。
trad: 她搭計程車去博物館了。

eng: They have been married for ten years.
This is about as large as that.
simp: 这个大约跟那个一样大。
trad: 這個大約跟那個一樣大。

eng: We didn't know which bus to take.
simp: 我们不知道要搭哪一班公车。
trad: 我們不知道要搭哪一班公車。

eng: There are some eggs in the box.
They are plotting to kill the king.
simp: 他们正密谋要杀害国王。
trad: 他們正密謀要殺害國王。

eng: What is the matter with your car?
Which one do you think is correct?
simp: 你认为哪一个是正确的?
trad: 你認為哪一個是正確的?

eng: This is the only camera I've got.
We don't need to attend that meeting.
simp: 我们不必参加那场会议。
trad: 我們不必參加那場會議。

eng: Whether he comes or not, I'll go.
simp: 不论他来或不来，我都会去。
trad: 不論他來或不來，我都會去。

eng: Why don't you go home early today?
simp: 你今天为什麽不早点回家呢？
trad: 你今天為什麼不早點回家呢？

eng: There is a fence around the house.
simp: 这栋房子的周围有篱笆。
trad: 這棟房子的周圍有籬笆。

eng: There is a park near my house.
Why did they turn down your proposal?
simp: 他们为什麽否决了你的建议呢？
trad: 他們為什麼否決了你的建議呢？

eng: There are 50 members in the club.
That is the office where he works.
There is a church near my house.
This dress cost me over 40,000 yen.
Two people can enter with this ticket.
simp: 两个人可以用这张票入场。
trad: 兩個人可以用這張票入場。

eng: They went to the station by car.
What'll you be doing over the weekend?
The roof was damaged by the storm.
You're dating a Keio student, aren't you?
simp: 你在跟一个庆应的学生约会，不是吗？
trad: 你在跟一個慶應的學生約會，不是嗎？

eng: Work harder if you plan to succeed.
simp: 如果你计划要成功，就要更加努力地工作。
trad: 如果你計劃要成功，就要更加努力地工作。

eng: She worked side by side with men.
You'd better not go out today.
When will it be convenient for you?
simp: 什麽时候对你来说是方便的？
trad: 什麼時候對你來說是方便的？

eng: This is a picture of an airport.
That just doesn't make sense to me.
simp: 那只是对我来说没有意义。
trad: 那只是對我來說沒有意義。

eng: What color do you think she likes?
simp: 你认为她喜欢什麽颜色？
trad: 你認為她喜歡什麼顏色？

eng: What time did your friend go home?
This is the house that Jack built.
We had a history quiz this morning.
simp: 我们今天早上有历史小考。
trad: 我們今天早上有歷史小考。

eng: You ought to be ashamed of yourself.
simp: 你应该为你自己感到羞耻。
trad: 你應該為你自己感到羞恥。

eng: Tom doesn't run as fast as Bill.
She got over the shock of her father's death.
simp: 她从她父亲过世的震惊中恢复了。
trad: 她從她父親過世的震驚中恢復了。

eng: Yes, I think so too.
It is our obligation to help.
Did you know that some foxes lived on this mountain?
simp: 你知道有些狐狸住在这座山上吗?
trad: 你知道有些狐貍住在這座山上嗎?

eng: I am interested in Japanese history.
They tasted the bread.
The parents named their baby Akira.
simp: 父母把他们的婴儿取名为晃。
trad: 父母把他們的嬰兒取名為晃。

eng: She testified that she saw the man.
simp: 她作证说她看见了这名男子。
trad: 她作證說她看見了這名男子。

eng: Where do I have to change trains?
This is the cheapest store in town.
simp: 这是镇上最便宜的商店。
trad: 這是鎮上最便宜的商店。

eng: Would you like me to help you?
Tom is living with his uncle now.
simp: 汤姆现在跟他叔叔住在一起。
trad: 湯姆現在跟他叔叔住在一起。

eng: What does she do in the evening?
What time did he say he'd come?
We arrived at the office on time.
simp: 我们准时到达了办公室。
trad: 我們準時到達了辦公室。

eng: Will you live in Sasayama next year?
We worked on a farm last summer.
simp: 我们去年夏天在一个农场上工作。
trad: 我們去年夏天在一個農場上工作。

eng: Tom is the tallest in his family.
Were you at school at that time?
What did you do with my glasses?
What did you do with my glasses?
simp: 你用我的眼镜做了什麽?
trad: 你用我的眼鏡做了什麼?

eng: We should have told him the truth.
simp: 我们应该告诉他真相的。
trad: 我們應該告訴他真相的。

eng: In Esperanto there are only 16 grammar rules.
simp: 世界语只有16个语法规则。
trad: 世界語只有16個語法規則。

eng: They made him do the work again.
simp: 他们要他再做一次这个工作。
trad: 他們要他再做一次這個工作。

eng: You don't have to work on Sundays.
There wasn't any furniture in that room.
simp: 那个房间裡没有任何傢俱。
trad: 那個房間裡沒有任何傢俱。

eng: She was married to a rich man.
simp: 她嫁给了一个有钱的男人。
trad: 她嫁給了一個有錢的男人。

eng: Tom is a fluent speaker of Japanese.
You can swim much better than him.
simp: 你游泳游得比他好得多。
trad: 你遊泳遊得比他好得多。

eng: The flood caused a lot of damage.
simp: 洪水造成了很大的损害。
trad: 洪水造成了很大的損害。

eng: This jacket is a little too big.
Why don't you stay a little while?
simp: 你为什麽不留下来一会儿？
trad: 你為什麼不留下來一會兒？

eng: Who did you see at the station?
She went out to buy some food.
Will you mail this letter for me?
simp: 你可以帮我寄这封信吗?
trad: 你可以幫我寄這封信嗎?

eng: Their baby is able to walk already.
simp: 他们的小婴孩已经会走路了。
trad: 他們的小嬰孩已經會走路了。

eng: Tom is coming to our school tomorrow.
simp: 汤姆明天会来我们的学校。
trad: 湯姆明天會來我們的學校。

eng: There are many fish in this lake.
When are you going to quit smoking?
You are not to leave this room.
simp: 你不应该离开这个房间。
trad: 你不應該離開這個房間。

eng: You are not to leave this room.
simp: 你不可以离开这个房间。
trad: 你不可以離開這個房間。

eng: When you are hungry, anything tastes good.
simp: 当你饿的时候，任何东西都好吃。
trad: 當你餓的時候，任何東西都好吃。

eng: There is little water in the pond.
They have been here for an hour.
simp: 他们已经在这裡一个小时了。
trad: 他們已經在這裡一個小時了。

eng: We left home early in the morning.
simp: 我们早上很早就离开家了。
trad: 我們早上很早就離開家了。

eng: There isn't any milk in the glass.
simp: 这个玻璃杯裡没有任何的牛奶。
trad: 這個玻璃杯裡沒有任何的牛奶。

eng: You can say whatever you want to.
The old man lived there by himself.
simp: 这个老人独自住在那裡。
trad: 這個老人獨自住在那裡。

eng: Everybody says I look like my father.
simp: 每个人都说我看起来像我爸爸。
trad: 每個人都說我看起來像我爸爸。

eng: There is a basket under the table.
Tom lived in Japan for ten years.
There is a picture on the wall.
There was a big earthquake last night.
What have you done with my pen?
What have you done with my pen?
The weather has been unusual this year.
The shopping center is one mile ahead.
simp: 这个购物中心在前面一英里远的地方。
trad: 這個購物中心在前面一英裏遠的地方。

eng: There is an urgent message for you.
There will be a math test tomorrow.
We had a lot of rain yesterday.
The day after tomorrow is Tom's birthday.
What do you think of Japanese food?
simp: 你觉得日本料理怎麽样？
trad: 你覺得日本料理怎麼樣？

eng: Do you like Japanese food?
Who is the author of this book?
Your friendship means a lot to me.
simp: 你的友谊对我来说意义重大。
trad: 你的友誼對我來說意義重大。

eng: There were some boats on the lake.
Why did Jane go to the station?
Which do you prefer, tea or coffee?
simp: 你比较喜欢哪一个，茶还是咖啡?
trad: 你比較喜歡哪一個，茶還是咖啡?

eng: You've got a great sense of humor.
Short skirts are already out of fashion.
Short skirts are already out of fashion.
Would you like me to explain it?
Would you like me to explain it?
What subjects do you like the best?
She did nothing but cry all the while.
This is the office in which he works.
What he said yesterday is not true.
The firemen soon put out the fire.
simp: 消防队员很快就把火扑灭了。
trad: 消防隊員很快就把火撲滅了。

eng: You had better not stay up late.
If you gamble on the stock market, you are an investor... If you gamble on the derivatives market, you are a trader... If you gamble at the casino, you are a loser... Morality?
simp: 如果你在股票市场上赌博，你是个投资者...如果你在衍生性金融商品市场上赌博，你是个商人...如果你在赌场上赌博，你是个失败者...道德？
trad: 如果你在股票市場上賭博，你是個投資者...如果你在衍生性金融商品市場上賭博，你是個商人...如果你在賭場上賭博，你是個失敗者...道德？

eng: She sometimes goes into a mood of depression.
She sometimes goes into a mood of depression.
That company is managed by a foreigner.
simp: 这家公司由一个外国人经营。
trad: 這家公司由一個外國人經營。

eng: We reached the top of the mountain.
The balloon was caught in the tree.
Tom gets up at six every morning.
simp: 汤姆每天早上六点起床。
trad: 湯姆每天早上六點起床。

eng: The cat is sleeping on the sofa.
The board is about two meters long.
simp: 这块木板大约两公尺长。
trad: 這塊木板大約兩公尺長。

eng: Which team are you a fan of?
Which is your favorite team?
The address on this parcel is wrong.
simp: 这个包裹上的地址是错的。
trad: 這個包裹上的地址是錯的。

eng: She was surprised that he showed up.
Tracy had never used chopsticks before then.
simp: 崔西在那之前从来没有使用过筷子。
trad: 崔西在那之前從來沒有使用過筷子。

eng: Tom made some mistakes in the test.
simp: 汤姆在考试中犯了一些错误。
trad: 湯姆在考試中犯了一些錯誤。

eng: You're a month behind in your rent.
simp: 你的租金迟交了一个月。
trad: 你的租金遲交了一個月。

eng: Since he has ambitions, he works hard.
simp: 因为他有野心，他很努力地工作。
trad: 因為他有野心，他很努力地工作。

eng: The train is 10 minutes late today.
We're going to have a test today.
simp: 我们今天将有一个考试。
trad: 我們今天將有一個考試。

eng: You must be back by 10 o'clock.
We felt the house shake a little.
simp: 我们感觉到房子摇动了一下。
trad: 我們感覺到房子搖動了一下。

eng: She was run over by a car.
When will you go back to Japan?
Tom attached the string to the kite.
simp: 汤姆把绳子加在了这个风筝上。
trad: 湯姆把繩子加在了這個風箏上。

eng: What do you do for a living?
What do you do?
You can drive a car, can't you?
Can I help?
The button came off.
Did you push the button?
I like pop music.
Do you play soccer?
He shaved his moustache.
Almost everybody was invited.
simp: 几乎每个人都被邀请了。
trad: 幾乎每個人都被邀請了。

eng: I can hardly walk.
The girl made an awkward bow.
simp: 这个女孩做了一把很难使用的弓。
trad: 這個女孩做了一把很難使用的弓。

eng: The girl made an awkward bow.
simp: 这个女孩做了一把不称手的弓。
trad: 這個女孩做了一把不稱手的弓。

eng: I made an apple pie for you.
simp: 我做了一个苹果派给你。
trad: 我做了一個蘋果派給你。

eng: We made an appeal for support.
simp: 我们提出了请求支持的呼吁。
trad: 我們提出了請求支持的呼籲。

eng: Jane is not as tall as Mary.
I made an abstract of a book.
simp: 我为一本书写了内容提要。
trad: 我為一本書寫了內容提要。

eng: I made all my family leave home.
simp: 我要我所有的家人离开家。
trad: 我要我所有的家人離開家。

eng: My uncle made a will last year.
simp: 我叔叔去年立下了遗嘱。
trad: 我叔叔去年立下了遺囑。

eng: He and I walked together.
I think it won't rain tomorrow.
We are happy.
The professor teaches Czech.
Smoking one cigarette a day is a good habit.
simp: 每天吸一根香烟是个好习惯。
trad: 每天吸一根香煙是個好習慣。

eng: Emet is very interested in soccer, but simply does not know how to play.
simp: 埃梅特对足球很有兴趣，只是不知道怎麽玩。
trad: 埃梅特對足球很有興趣，只是不知道怎麼玩。

eng: I'd like to know the phone number of the nearest American Express office.
simp: 我想知道最近的美国运通办事处的电话号码。
trad: 我想知道最近的美國運通辦事處的電話號碼。

eng: In a crisis, you must get in touch with your teacher.
simp: 在危险的时候你必须跟你的老师联繫。
trad: 在危險的時候你必須跟你的老師聯繫。

eng: He made a speech in plain English.
Jiro made a sketch of Mt. Fuji.
simp: 次郎画了一幅富士山的素描。
trad: 次郎畫了一幅富士山的素描。

eng: She made a series of medical discoveries.
simp: 她提出了一连串的医学发现。
trad: 她提出了一連串的醫學發現。

eng: I'm more interested in spoken English.
simp: 我对口语英语更感兴趣。
trad: 我對口語英語更感興趣。

eng: He runs a supermarket in the town.
simp: 他在这个镇上经营一家超级市场。
trad: 他在這個鎮上經營一家超級市場。

eng: I admire your ignorance.
This novel is boring.
I'm looking forward to your visit.
Who is to blame for the accident?
The meat has gone bad.
He has made the baseball team.
simp: 他已经成为了棒球队员。
trad: 他已經成為了棒球隊員。

eng: He has no interest in politics.
I am a Hyogo University student.
simp: 我是个兵库大学的学生。
trad: 我是個兵庫大學的學生。

eng: She made a point of visiting me.
He climbed Mt. Fuji.
I don't think he'll say yes.
I don't think he'll say yes.
I don't remember.
I can't remember.
I can't remember.
I prefer hardwood floors to carpet.
simp: 我喜欢硬木地板胜过地毯。
trad: 我喜歡硬木地板勝過地毯。

eng: What are you cooking?
My aunt lives in New York.
I'll give you a ride.
She made a mess of the work.
She made a mess of the work.
She made a lot of spelling mistakes.
I made a long journey last year.
simp: 我去年做了一次长途旅行。
trad: 我去年做了一次長途旅行。

eng: He made a journey around the world.
I do not play the piano.
Do you have a soup dish?
I am Lin.
Let's make a cake.
My wife likes apple pie a lot.
simp: 我老婆非常喜欢苹果饼。
trad: 我老婆非常喜歡蘋果餅。

eng: If it doesn't rain, let's go out.
simp: 不下雨的话，我们出去吧。
trad: 不下雨的話，我們出去吧。

eng: Class doesn't begin until eight-thirty.
Friends today, enemies tomorrow.
simp: 今日的朋友是明日的敌人。
trad: 今日的朋友是明日的敵人。

eng: All of you have to read it.
If you want to learn Chinese well, you can study in China.
simp: 如果你想要学好中文，你可以在中国学习。
trad: 如果你想要學好中文，你可以在中國學習。

eng: Isn't she a doctor?
I love you. Is there any chance you might love me back?
simp: 我爱你。可不可以你也很巧的爱上我？
trad: 我愛你。可不可以你也很巧的愛上我？

eng: His argument is rational.
I'm closing my store.
I'm closing my store.
Don't be afraid.
Is this Arabic? "No, it's Uyghur - a language that's spoken in northwestern China."
simp: 「这是阿拉伯文吗？」「不是，这是维吾尔文，一种中国西北部的语言。」
trad: 「這是阿拉伯文嗎？」「不是，這是維吾爾文，一種中國西北部的語言。」

eng: What is happiness?
Happiness is probably wanting what you already have, not having what you want.
simp: 幸福应该是想要你已经有的东西，而不是拥有你想要的东西。
trad: 幸福應該是想要你已經有的東西，而不是擁有你想要的東西。

eng: In my opinion, happiness has a few fundamental requirements.
simp: 对我自己来说，幸福有些根本的要素。
trad: 對我自己來說，幸福有些根本的要素。

eng: However, apart from Buddhists, hardly anyone can consistently follow this principle.
simp: 不过，除了佛教者以外，没有任何人可以一直遵循这个原则。
trad: 不過，除了佛教者以外，沒有任何人可以一直遵循這個原則。

eng: Firstly, happiness is related to money.
Claiming that money is not a requirement for happiness is foolish.
simp: 声称钱不是幸福的一个要素是愚蠢的。
trad: 聲稱錢不是幸福的一個要素是愚蠢的。

eng: If you have no way to buy food, clothing, accommodation and other such daily necessities, you definitely won't be able to have peace of mind.
simp: 如果你没办法买饭、衣服、住处这种日常需要等，你并不会得安心。
trad: 如果你沒辦法買飯、衣服、住處這種日常需要等，你並不會得安心。

eng: Money is important in this way.
simp: 以这种方式钱是重要的。
trad: 以這種方式錢是重要的。

eng: This shows that happiness and sadness are only separated by attitude.
simp: 这表明幸福和悲痛之间只隔着看法。
trad: 這表明幸福和悲痛之間只隔著看法。

eng: Other requirements come from your relationships with other people and your daily activities.
simp: 其它的要素来自你跟别人的关系和你平日的活动。
trad: 其它的要素來自你跟別人的關系和你平日的活動。

eng: As human beings are social animals, friendship is an essential part of life.
simp: 因为人类是一种群居动物，所以友情是生活里面一个必要的方面。
trad: 因為人類是一種群居動物，所以友情是生活裏面一個必要的方面。

eng: When you encounter difficulties, friends can help you deal with them.
simp: 你遇到苦难的时候，朋友们可以帮助你经受住。
trad: 你遇到苦難的時候，朋友們可以幫助你經受住。

eng: Even if you're really going through hard times, a good friend can improve your spirits.
simp: 即使你受苦受难，一位好友还可以改进你的心情。
trad: 即使你受苦受難，一位好友還可以改進你的心情。

eng: So friendship is also a requirement for happiness.
simp: 所以，友情也是幸福的一个要素。
trad: 所以，友情也是幸福的一個要素。

eng: Chinese is much more difficult than other foreign languages.
simp: 中文比其它外语难多了。
trad: 中文比其它外語難多了。

eng: This stuff is worth its weight in gold!
I think you had better call on him.
simp: 我认为你最好去拜访他。
trad: 我認為你最好去拜訪他。

eng: I wish copyrights didn't last so long.
simp: 我希望版权不用持续这麽久。
trad: 我希望版權不用持續這麼久。

eng: If I hadn't remembered, I would have forgotten.
simp: 如果我不记得了，那我早就已经忘了。
trad: 如果我不記得了，那我早就已經忘了。

eng: She told me not to tell anyone, so I didn't.
simp: 她跟我说不要告诉任何人。所以我没有说。
trad: 她跟我說不要告訴任何人。所以我沒有說。

eng: The Emperor's Birthday fell on Sunday.
She made a man of him.
AI stands for artificial intelligence.
I am shorter than you.
I caught a cold two days ago.
I decided to be a doctor.
I'm very thirsty.
I appreciate good music.
I'm not busy now.
I'm free tonight.
I am tired of reading.
I am tired of reading.

trad: 這座山貝蒂已經爬過三次了。

eng: I always keep my promises.
Dad looked at Mom shyly.
His father doesn't play golf.
I can't shake off my cold.
simp: 我的感冒怎麽也不会好。
trad: 我的感冒怎麼也不會好。

eng: I am good friends with Bill.
George has an incredibly large Adam's apple.
simp: 乔治有一个令人难以置信的大喉结。
trad: 喬治有一個令人難以置信的大喉結。

eng: I agree with him on that point.
simp: 我在那一个观点上同意他。
trad: 我在那一個觀點上同意他。

eng: I almost laughed out loud.
That's strange.
Luke, I am your cousin.
Luke, I am your father.
Luke, I am your son.

simp: 我们都想知道她为什麽甩了这麽好的一个男人。
trad: 我們都想知道她為什麼甩了這麼好的一個男人。

eng: I'm too old to be playing with bugs, said the boy.
simp: 我已经长大了不玩虫了，这个男孩说。
trad: 我已經長大了不玩蟲了，這個男孩說。

eng: I agreed with him on the plan.
simp: 对于这个计划我同意他的意见。
trad: 對於這個計劃我同意他的意見。

eng: I caught the man stealing the money.
simp: 我抓到了这个男人正在偷钱。
trad: 我抓到了這個男人正在偷錢。

eng: I am leaving at four.
Thou shalt not kill.
I'm a computer scientist.

simp: 我给她买了一个不错的圣诞礼物。
trad: 我給她買了一個不錯的聖誕禮物。

eng: I did nothing out of the ordinary.

simp: 我没做什麽与众不同的事。
trad: 我沒做什麼與眾不同的事。

eng: Betty seemed surprised at the news.
simp: 贝蒂似乎对这个消息感到惊讶。

eng: I'm sure they'll win.
I'm sure they'll win.

eng: I'll take him with me to the hospital.
simp: 我会带他跟我一起去医院。

eng: The teacher said that the earth is round.

trad: 我和一位朋友住在一起。

eng: I couldn't sleep.

simp: 我的教练说："失败乃成功之母"。
trad: 我的教練說："失敗乃成功之母"。

eng: Under no circumstances must you leave the room.

eng: I had otitis media last year.
She won't be back till five.
She won't be back till five.

eng: I can't hear you.

eng: Betty is crazy about dancing.

eng: I am sorry to trouble you.
I am in Tokyo today.

eng: I am not writing a letter.

simp: 我们在火车上十个小时。
trad: 我們在火車上十個小時。

eng: But it smells strange.
But it smells strange.
Everybody knows his name.
simp: 每个人都知道他的名字。
trad: 每個人都知道他的名字。

eng: The kid is clanging away with his toy.
simp: 这个孩子正在铿铿锵锵地玩着他的玩具。
trad: 這個孩子正在鏗鏗鏘鏘地玩著他的玩具。

eng: Gordon is interested in the Japanese way of life.
simp: 戈登对日本的生活方式感兴趣。

eng: You've got to set the alarm clock before you go to bed.
simp: 在你上床睡觉之前，你必须把闹钟设定好。
trad: 在你上床睡覺之前，你必須把鬧鐘設定好。

eng: Don't touch.
Don't touch.

His speech captured our attention.
simp: 他的演讲吸引了我们的注意。
trad: 他的演講吸引了我們的註意。

eng: The evidence was in his favor.
You can't get the suitcase closed because you've stuffed too much into it.
simp: 你无法把这个手提箱关上，因为你已经塞了太多东西进去了。
trad: 你無法把這個手提箱關上，因為你已經塞了太多東西進去了。

eng: To the best of my knowledge, she's hard to please.
simp: 据我所知，她很难被取悦。
trad: 據我所知，她很難被取悅。

eng: They buried him in the graveyard by the church.
simp: 他们把他埋葬在教堂旁的墓园。
trad: 他們把他埋葬在教堂旁的墓園。

eng: Sing us a song, please.
I saw Liz this morning.
simp: 今天早上我看到了利兹。
trad: 今天早上我看到了利茲。

eng: My salary was high this month.
I asked for my father's help.
I asked for my father's help.
I couldn't agree with you more.
I couldn't agree with you more.
I am an optimist by nature.
simp: 我天生是一个乐观主义者。
trad: 我天生是一個樂觀主義者。

eng: I am an optimist by nature.
I almost caught the fish.
I'm not quite well.

simp: 我负担不起打网球的费用。
trad: 我負擔不起打網球的費用。

eng: I always keep promises.

trad: 我買給了他們每人一份禮物。

eng: I am from Shikoku.

eng: I can wait for you.

eng: An old man broke into our conversation.

trad: 一位老人打斷了我們的談話。

eng: When does the movie start?

eng: I can't remember which is my racket.
simp: 我不记得哪个是我的球拍。
trad: 我不記得哪個是我的球拍。

eng: I belong to the drama club.

eng: George works on a big farm.

eng: I'm satisfied with my work.

eng: There is a village over the mountain.

simp: 去年他在海上度过了三个月。
trad: 去年他在海上度過了三個月。

eng: Look at that mountain.

simp: 你什么时候看见过冰雹吗？
trad: 你什麼時候看見過冰雹嗎？

eng: Coffee does not arouse my interest.
simp: 咖啡不能引起我的兴趣。
trad: 咖啡不能引起我的興趣。

eng: I wash my face every morning.
How long did you live there?
He spent the morning reading a book.
simp: 他花了一上午的时间看书。
trad: 他花了一上午的時間看書。

eng: He spent the morning reading a book.
Many moons orbit around Saturn.
simp: 许多卫星绕着土星运行。
trad: 許多衛星繞著土星運行。

eng: The moon is shining.

simp: 我的生活似乎不是真实的。
trad: 我的生活似乎不是真實的。

eng: I'm as tall as you.

trad: 弗雷留給了他的妻子一大筆財富。

eng: I am familiar with this subject.

simp: 我几乎总是在放学后打棒球。
trad: 我幾乎總是在放學後打棒球。

eng: I am interested in this story.

eng: I can't stand it.
I am familiar with the author's name.

eng: I cannot afford to buy a car.
I can't find my pen.

simp: 我对他的进步感到很满意。
trad: 我對他的進步感到很滿意。

eng: I am playing the piano now.

eng: The traffic accident deprived him of his sight.
simp: 这场交通意外让他失明了。
trad: 這場交通意外讓他失明了。

eng: It's insanely hot today.

simp: 整个地方完全地被雪遮盖住了。

eng: I have five sons. Two of them are engineers, another is a teacher and the others are students.

trad: 我有五個兒子。其中兩個是工程師，另一個是老師，其餘的是學生。

eng: Women like men the way they like their coffee: strong and hot to keep them awake all night long.
simp: 女人喜欢男人的方式跟他们喜欢自己的咖啡一样：强，热，并且让她们整夜醒着。
trad: 女人喜歡男人的方式跟他們喜歡自己的咖啡一樣：強，熱，並且讓她們整夜醒著。

eng: Watch out for falling objects!
Do you remember your father's birthday?
simp: 你记得你父亲的生日吗？
trad: 你記得你父親的生日嗎？

eng: Someone is waiting for you downstairs.
What did you drink?
Did the union participate in the demonstration?
simp: 工会参加了示威游行吗？
trad: 工會參加了示威遊行嗎？

eng: Tell me what you did in Shounan.
simp: 告诉我你在湘南做了什么。
trad: 告訴我你在湘南做了什麼。

eng: I don't know whether he is dead or alive.
simp: 我不知道他活着还是死了。
trad: 我不知道他活著還是死了。

eng: I introduced her to you last week.
simp: 我上个礼拜把她介绍给你了。
trad: 我上個禮拜把她介紹給你了。

eng: That man was wearing a tiger mask.
simp: 那个男人戴着一个老虎的面具。
trad: 那個男人戴著一個老虎的面具。

eng: Luke, I am your cousin.
I don't know if there's time.
The movie's about to start.
My wife's trying to sleep.
We were wondering who it was, and it turns out that it was you!
simp: 我们以为是谁，原来是您呀！
trad: 我們以為是誰，原來是您呀！

eng: There's only two days left.
This person is your slave, right?
simp: 这个人是您的奴隶，是吧？
trad: 這個人是您的奴隸，是吧？

eng: The customers have started to come.
You can understand Swedish.
Get with it.
I trust what Matthew, Mark, Luke and John said, and if I were ever the victim in a car accident I'd be very happy if they were my witnesses.
simp: 我相信马太, 马可, 路加和约翰 所说的话。假如我在一场车祸中是受害者的话，如果他们成为我的证人（目击者）我会很欣慰。
trad: 我相信馬太, 馬可, 路加和約翰 所說的話。假如我在一場車禍中是受害者的話，如果他們成為我的證人（目擊者）我會很欣慰。

eng: I caught a cold, and I have a fever.
I am watering the flowers.
I anticipate that there will be trouble.
I couldn't think of anything to say.
I bought that car.
Dave never returned to school again.
simp: 大卫再也没有回到学校了。
trad: 大衛再也沒有回到學校了。

eng: I bought a book.
I always try to tell the truth.
I add a few finishing touches.
simp: 我加上一些最后的润饰。
trad: 我加上一些最後的潤飾。

eng: I didn't get your name.
I'm interested in history.
I'm good at skiing.
I bought two bags of popcorn.
I'm tired of her complaints.
I didn't enjoy it very much.
I believe he is coming tomorrow.
I am a stranger here.
I asked for a table over there.
simp: 我在那裡要了一张桌子。
trad: 我在那裡要了一張桌子。

eng: Bob was popular with all his classmates.
simp: 鲍勃很受他所有同学们的欢迎。
trad: 鮑勃很受他所有同學們的歡迎。

eng: I am poor at drawing.
I can't imagine life without you.
simp: 我无法想像没有你的生活。
trad: 我無法想像沒有你的生活。

eng: I believe that he'll do fine.
I couldn't speak Japanese.
I'm very busy today.
I decided to study abroad.
I didn't know about your plan.
I can't help admiring his talent.
I can't study with you watching me.
simp: 你盯着我看使我无法读书。
trad: 你盯著我看使我無法讀書。

eng: I can't give up smoking.
I believe Tom is right.
I cannot bear her endless love.
simp: 我受不了她没完没了的爱。
trad: 我受不了她沒完沒了的愛。

eng: He is shit out of luck.
Do you want to eat prawns?
The witch hunt has begun.
He is shit out of luck.
My father doesn't drink so much sake.
My father doesn't drink too much sake.
simp: 我爸爸不喝太多的烧酒。
trad: 我爸爸不喝太多的燒酒。

eng: If it's okay for him to buy a knife, then why on earth can't I?
simp: 他买一个刀行，我买就不行了吗？
trad: 他買一個刀行，我買就不行了嗎？

eng: Horse, lion, dog, goat: these are animals.
A bird is singing in the tree.
The King of France is bald.
What a pity you can't dance!
Hooray!
She talks a lot.
White to play and win.
Not yet.
First I'll go to the bank, and then I'll buy the tickets.
simp: 我先要去银行，然后去买票。
trad: 我先要去銀行，然後去買票。

eng: He had an accident.
What browser are you using?
What's your favorite web browser?
simp: 你最喜欢哪一个网络浏览器？
trad: 你最喜歡哪一個網絡瀏覽器？

eng: My father was happy with the result.
I didn't have more than 1,000 yen.
My dogs are white.
She spends way too much time surfing the web.
simp: 她花实在太多的时间在网上冲浪。
trad: 她花實在太多的時間在網上沖浪。

eng: I wish I had a friend like you.
simp: 我希望我有一个像你一样的朋友。
trad: 我希望我有一個像你一樣的朋友。

eng: That's how it is.
He sat listening to the radio.
It was so cold that no one wanted to go outside.
simp: 天太冷了，以至于没人想去外面。
trad: 天太冷了，以至於沒人想去外面。

eng: He is past forty.
Cars took the place of bicycles.
simp: 车取代了自行车（的地位）。
trad: 車取代了自行車（的地位）。

eng: Pharamp wants Trang all for herself.
Give me a piece of chalk.
This is my own bike.
Members of that tribe settled along the river.
simp: 部落成员沿着河岸定居了。
trad: 部落成員沿著河岸定居了。

eng: The policeman arrested the thief.
simp: 公安人员把小偷抓住了。
trad: 公安人員把小偷抓住了。

eng: In Hawaii, we can enjoy swimming in the ocean all year round.
simp: 我们在厦威夷一年到头都可以享受在海里游泳的乐趣。
trad: 我們在廈威夷一年到頭都可以享受在海裏遊泳的樂趣。

eng: In Hawaii, one can enjoy sea bathing all the year round.
simp: 在厦威夷，一个人可以一年到头享受海水浴的乐趣。
trad: 在廈威夷，一個人可以一年到頭享受海水浴的樂趣。

eng: They're carrying out a book burning.
I suggested that we bring the meeting to an end.
simp: 我建议让我们结束会议。
trad: 我建議讓我們結束會議。

eng: In my opinion, Esperanto is very difficult.
Please turn off your engine.
Please turn off your engine.
If it's okay for him to buy a knife, then why on earth can't I?
simp: 难道他可以买一把刀，而我就不行了？
trad: 難道他可以買一把刀，而我就不行了？

eng: We had neither known nor heard about it.
simp: 我们既不知道而又没听到过这件事。
trad: 我們既不知道而又沒聽到過這件事。

eng: She made a vanilla chocolate cake for four people.
simp: 她做了一个四人份的巧克力香草蛋糕。
trad: 她做了一個四人份的巧克力香草蛋糕。

eng: 3 Malay nationals and a Filipino were killed in the Davao bombing on Mindanao.
simp: 3个马来西亚侨民与一个菲律宾国民在棉兰老岛达沃市爆炸里被炸死了。
trad: 3個馬來西亞僑民與一個菲律賓國民在棉蘭老島達沃市爆炸裏被炸死了。

eng: 3 Malay nationals and a Filipino were killed in the Davao bombing on Mindanao.
simp: 3个马来西亚侨民与一个菲律宾国民在棉兰老岛纳卯市爆炸里被炸死了。
trad: 3個馬來西亞僑民與一個菲律賓國民在棉蘭老島納卯市爆炸裏被炸死了。

eng: I believe it is a genuine Picasso.
simp: 我认为是一幅毕加索的原画。
trad: 我認為是一幅畢加索的原畫。

eng: My mother from Malaysia thinks that those three horses are so-so.
simp: 我从马来西亚来的妈妈觉得那三匹马马马虎虎。
trad: 我從馬來西亞來的媽媽覺得那三匹馬馬馬虎虎。

eng: What does USB stand for?
All Quiet on the Western Front
What do you want to eat this weekend?
I like to eat Korean food.
I don't drink coffee.
Yumi keeps getting better at Korean.
I know she is sleeping.
Please do not write in this library book.
simp: 请不要在图书馆的书上涂写。
trad: 請不要在圖書館的書上塗寫。

eng: Please do not write in this library book.
simp: 请不要在图书馆的书籍上写字。
trad: 請不要在圖書館的書籍上寫字。

eng: I think that it's you.
An intellectual is a person who has discovered something more interesting than sex.
simp: 一个知识分子是发现到一种比性行为更有意思的活动的人。
trad: 一個知識分子是發現到一種比性行為更有意思的活動的人。

eng: Turn big problems into small ones, and make small problems into nothing.
There is no smoke without fire.
No matter how low the target, always aim higher.
He makes a mountain out of a molehill.
Dictatorship can be summed up by "shut up!", democracy by "keep talking".
simp: 就算独裁国家是“闭上你的嘴”，民主国家才是“当你放屁”。
trad: 就算獨裁國家是“閉上你的嘴”，民主國家才是“當你放屁”。

eng: I agree with his suggestion.
After you take the medicine, your stomachache will be much relieved.
simp: 你吃了这药，胃痛就会缓解很多。
trad: 你吃了這藥，胃痛就會緩解很多。

eng: What is the population of New York?
We are looking into the cause of the accident.
simp: 我们在调查事故发生的原因。
trad: 我們在調查事故發生的原因。

eng: If I had the money, I would immediately buy this computer.
simp: 如果我有钱，我马上就买这台电脑。
trad: 如果我有錢，我馬上就買這臺電腦。

eng: Does she know you?
He is like a frog in a well.
My older brother knows how to drive.
How many is nine minus six?
Tomorrow I won't be here.
He can't have written this; it's not his handwriting.
simp: 这不是他写的，他的字迹不是这样的。
trad: 這不是他寫的，他的字跡不是這樣的。

eng: This drink's flavor is obviously that of tea.
simp: 这个饮料的味道很明显是茶的味道。
trad: 這個飲料的味道很明顯是茶的味道。

eng: During this period, there was a way to get into the French clubhouse without standing in line: you had to eat the products inside, but it was really expensive.
simp: 当时进法国馆，有一种不用排队的办法，就是去吃法国馆里的食品，但是实在太贵了。
trad: 當時進法國館，有一種不用排隊的辦法，就是去吃法國館裏的食品，但是實在太貴了。

eng: I know what you mean.
Old women like dating young men.
Please don't be so surprised that I'm speaking this language and listen to the content of what I'm actually saying.
simp: 请不要惊讶我讲这种语言，请注意我讲的内容。
trad: 請不要驚訝我講這種語言，請註意我講的內容。

eng: He is ill.
Are you alright?
The house is cold.
This is a horse.
Father is a good person.
This dog is mine.
Apart from my sister, my family doesn't watch TV.
simp: 除了我的妹妹之外，我家人都不看电视。
trad: 除了我的妹妹之外，我家人都不看電視。

eng: My sister will have finished her homework before she goes to Hokkaido.
simp: 我妹妹去北海道之前, 完成她的功课.
trad: 我妹妹去北海道之前, 完成她的功課.

eng: Wash your hands before each meal.
We hold a meeting once a month.
How often do you go to the movies every month?
My phone is out of battery.
I really like travelling.
This is the car Linda mentioned yesterday.
simp: 这就是昨天Linda提到的那个车。
trad: 這就是昨天Linda提到的那個車。

eng: Canada's crime rate is decreasing.
simp: 加拿大的犯罪率下降了。
trad: 加拿大的犯罪率下降了。

eng: At the time, we were very tired.
She keeps her hair long.
Trains come more often than buses.
simp: 火车的班次比巴士频密。
trad: 火車的班次比巴士頻密。

eng: This is his answer to my letter.
simp: 这就是他写给我的回信了。
trad: 這就是他寫給我的回信了。

eng: The population is growing.
I had to attend two meetings yesterday, and there was no time to have lunch between.
simp: 我昨天要开两个会，连吃午饭的时间也没有。
trad: 我昨天要開兩個會，連吃午飯的時間也沒有。

eng: Notice how the hero in an action flick never seems to run out of ammo?
simp: 你有没有发现动作片主角的子弹好像永远都不会用完？
trad: 你有沒有發現動作片主角的子彈好像永遠都不會用完？

eng: Rules are meant to be broken.
Please mail this form to your insurance company.
simp: 请把这份表格寄给您的保险公司。
trad: 請把這份表格寄給您的保險公司。

eng: Jane wrote the letter herself.
His body shivered with excitement.
John took a key out of his pocket.
simp: 约翰从口袋里取出了一把钥匙。
trad: 約翰從口袋裏取出了一把鑰匙。

eng: I exchanged stamps with him.
It is utterly impossible to finish the work within a month.
simp: 这份工作绝对没有可能在一个月之内完成。
trad: 這份工作絕對沒有可能在一個月之內完成。

eng: The time will come when you will regret it.
No man is so old he cannot learn.
He entered the room.
Where can you buy a ticket to get in?
It amazed us that she had been to Brazil alone.
simp: 让我们惊讶的是她独自去过巴西。
trad: 讓我們驚訝的是她獨自去過巴西。

eng: I don't understand what you are saying.
simp: 我不明白你们在说什么。
trad: 我不明白你們在說什麼。

eng: Food, clothing and shelter are the foundations of survival.
Can you prove it?
She doesn't speak Japanese at home.
I'm wondering what to cook for dinner.
simp: 我在考虑我晚饭做什么菜。
trad: 我在考慮我晚飯做什麼菜。

eng: I must take my oboe for repair.
simp: 我必须拿我的双簧管去修理。
trad: 我必須拿我的雙簧管去修理。

eng: I really want to speak English fluently.
I like to eat chocolate flavored ice cream.
simp: 我喜欢吃巧克力味的冰激凌。
trad: 我喜歡吃巧克力味的冰激淩。

eng: After work I go straight home.
My father is in the habit of reading the newspaper before breakfast.
simp: 我父亲有个习惯，早餐之前读报纸。
trad: 我父親有個習慣，早餐之前讀報紙。

eng: There is no such thing as God or Buddha.
The leaves on the trees rustle gentle in the wind.
I'm very grateful for everything you've done for me.
simp: 非常感谢你所做的一切。
trad: 非常感謝你所做的一切。

eng: Other people aren't interested.
Young children are often fascinated by science.
simp: 小孩常常对科学很有热情。
trad: 小孩常常對科學很有熱情。

eng: Yes, this is my house.
The hunter shot and killed the fox.
If you want to, you can use my car.
simp: 如果你愿意，你可以用我的车。
trad: 如果你願意，你可以用我的車。

eng: Is there any salt left?
He came back two days late.
The Earth moves around the sun.
That was three days ago.
He always opens the window when he goes to sleep.
simp: 当他睡觉的时候，他让窗子一直开着。
trad: 當他睡覺的時候，他讓窗子一直開著。

eng: He often goes with her to watch movies.
simp: 他常和她一起去看电影。
trad: 他常和她一起去看電影。

eng: I will arrive on 23 May.
He has too many books.
You are stupid.
There is no greater insult to life than premature ejaculation.
simp: 没有什么比早泄更糟蹋生活的了
trad: 沒有什麼比早泄更糟蹋生活的了

eng: When only death remains, the last resort is to beg for food.
simp: 除死无大事，讨饭到了家。
trad: 除死無大事，討飯到了家。

eng: He is very much concerned about the future of his son.
simp: 他非常关心他儿子的将来。
trad: 他非常關心他兒子的將來。

eng: Ubuntu includes lots of software.
Linux experts are able to use the command line.
simp: Linux系统的高手都会用命令行。
trad: Linux系統的高手都會用命令行。

eng: We have illustrated the story with pictures.
simp: 我们给这个故事配了插图。
trad: 我們給這個故事配了插圖。

eng: I am more handsome than you.
I'm smarter than you.
My laptop is running Linux.
I'm running Linux on my laptop.
simp: 我在笔记本电脑上运行Linux。
trad: 我在筆記本電腦上運行Linux。

eng: Ubuntu is a popular Linux distribution.
My laptop is running Linux.
simp: 我的笔记本电脑是Linux系统。
trad: 我的筆記本電腦是Linux系統。

eng: GCC is a compiler while Python is an interpreter.
simp: Gcc是一个编译器而python是一个解释器。
trad: Gcc是一個編譯器而python是一個解釋器。

eng: The syntax of Python scripts is very simple.
Meet you there on Sunday morning. Can't wait for it.
simp: 星期日上午在那边和你碰头。都等不及了。
trad: 星期日上午在那邊和你碰頭。都等不及了。

eng: Do you like tennis?
A fall into a pit, a gain in your wit.
This is only known by Obama.
simp: 这个只有奥巴马知道了。
trad: 這個只有奧巴馬知道了。

eng: I often hiccup.
Is it really everywhere?
Is it really all over?
simp: 事情真的已经了结了吗？
trad: 事情真的已經了結了嗎？

eng: Whether you believe it or not, I believe it.
simp: 至于你信不信，由你，我反正信了。
trad: 至於你信不信，由你，我反正信了。

eng: Before you can board the plane, you'll have to go through airport security checks.
simp: 你要通过了机场的安全检查才能登机。
trad: 你要通過了機場的安全檢查才能登機。

eng: That's the cause of his failure.
simp: 这就是他失败的原因了。
trad: 這就是他失敗的原因了。

eng: You can only drink water from the water dispenser.
simp: 你只能喝从饮水器来的水。
trad: 你只能喝從飲水器來的水。

eng: Today we went to the shopping mall. I was very bored.
simp: 今天我们去了商城。我很无聊。
trad: 今天我們去了商城。我很無聊。

eng: I ordered frogs and noodles.
She must have forgotten the promise.
simp: 她一定是忘了她的承诺了。
trad: 她一定是忘了她的承諾了。

eng: He seems to have been ill for a long time.
simp: 他好像已经病了很久了。
trad: 他好像已經病了很久了。

eng: Sheep are feeding in the meadow.
I know everything.
Did they understand?
I bought the book which the children need.
simp: 我买了那些小孩需要的书。
trad: 我買了那些小孩需要的書。

eng: She said, "He is handsome."
The radio is broken.
I have to leave you.
To obey the law is everyone's duty.
simp: 遵守法律是每个人的责任。
trad: 遵守法律是每個人的責任。

eng: She's smarter than Mary, but she's not as pretty as Mary.
simp: 她比玛丽聪明，但她却没玛丽漂亮。
trad: 她比瑪麗聰明，但她卻沒瑪麗漂亮。

eng: I am afraid he will fail.
I cried all night.
Betty is a serial killer.
I met him on the street.
The sum of 5 and 3 is 8.
Come on over to have a try.
We are confident of victory.
I am not good at mathematics.
We had some chicken soup.
The child's body felt feverish.
Don't all speak at the same time.
I do very much. Thank you.
What you say makes no sense.
She likes all kinds of sports.
She never wears green.
simp: 她从来不穿绿色的衣服。
trad: 她從來不穿綠色的衣服。

eng: Give my love to your kids.
simp: 替我向你的孩子们问好。
trad: 替我向你的孩子們問好。

eng: That meal was simply divine.
The horse trotted down the road.
I'm glad to see you again.
It makes no difference to me.
The old man set off at a quick trot.
I'll see you in the new year.
There is only one can of meat left.
We travelled all over the country.
My knowledge of Japanese is rather poor.
I want to reserve a room.
She patted her hair into place.
He is a mathematical genius.
His opinion is reasonable.
Do you have today's tickets?
Where is her book? "It's on the table."
Whenever I see you, I feel happy.
simp: 当我看到你时，我感到很开心。
trad: 當我看到你時，我感到很開心。

eng: That street is very noisy.
I speak nothing but the truth.
simp: 除了真相，我什么都不说。
trad: 除了真相，我什麼都不說。

eng: Where were you last night?
Can you practice Japanese with me?
simp: 你可以和我一起练习日语吗？
trad: 你可以和我一起練習日語嗎？

eng: I own a horse.
How can I get to heaven?
Any time will suit me.
How did the secret get out?
simp: 这秘密是怎么泄漏出去的？
trad: 這秘密是怎麼泄漏出去的？

eng: I told her what to do.
The apple fell from the tree.
They are actors.
It will be fine tomorrow.
Are you mad?
I don't feel like eating anything now.
simp: 我现在不想吃任何东西。
trad: 我現在不想吃任何東西。

eng: Can I have a paper bag?
We can see a church over there.
simp: 我们可以看到那里的教堂。
trad: 我們可以看到那裏的教堂。

eng: Generally speaking, women live longer than men.
simp: 一般来说，女人活得比男人久。
trad: 一般來說，女人活得比男人久。

eng: In Australia, one speaks English.
What's wrong with what we were doing?
You never know what you can do till you try.
simp: 在你试过之前，你不会知道你能做什么。
trad: 在你試過之前，你不會知道你能做什麼。

eng: A car stopped at the entrance.
Would you help me look for my keys?
simp: 你能帮我找我的钥匙吗？
trad: 你能幫我找我的鑰匙嗎？

eng: I am not satisfied with my performance today.
simp: 我对我今天的表演不满意。
trad: 我對我今天的表演不滿意。

eng: My brother is two years older than I, but he is three centimeters shorter.
simp: 我的哥哥比我大两岁，但他却比我矮三厘米。
trad: 我的哥哥比我大兩歲，但他卻比我矮三厘米。

eng: I cannot speak Mandarin well.
Yes, I can speak Mandarin.
No, I can't speak English.
Do you like China?
I like the green colour.
I come with myself.
She groped for the light switch in the dark.
simp: 她摸黑摸不到灯的开关。
trad: 她摸黑摸不到燈的開關。

eng: You've finished your work.
Every student has to leave school by six.
simp: 每位学生必须最晚六点放学。
trad: 每位學生必須最晚六點放學。

eng: School has started and I like it so far.
simp: 开学了，目前感觉还不错。
trad: 開學了，目前感覺還不錯。

eng: The scars of your love remind me of us.
simp: 你的爱情留下的疤痕使我想起我们。
trad: 你的愛情留下的疤痕使我想起我們。

eng: He bought an English book at a bookstore.
simp: 他在书店买了本英文书。
trad: 他在書店買了本英文書。

eng: You've already read the book?
Money is not everything.
Give me five days.
I know that you're a teacher.
He spoke for ten minutes without a pause.
simp: 他不停顿地说了十分钟。
trad: 他不停頓地說了十分鐘。

eng: Let us tell you everything we know.
simp: 让我们告诉你我们知道的。
trad: 讓我們告訴你我們知道的。

eng: It's getting cloudy.
How dare you laugh at me!
Please tell me the truth.
Please put out your cigarettes before entering the museum.
simp: 请你在进入博物馆之前先把烟弄熄。
trad: 請你在進入博物館之前先把煙弄熄。

eng: What is important is not how many books you read, but what books you read.
simp: 最重要的不是你看了多少书，而是你看的是甚麽书。
trad: 最重要的不是你看了多少書，而是你看的是甚麼書。

eng: Are they tall?
This is my email address.
If you want to be free, destroy your television set.
simp: 你想成为自由就摧毁你的电视。
trad: 你想成為自由就摧毀你的電視。

eng: I like the Occitan language.
We made friends with at least ten Americans.
simp: 我们和至少十个美国人交了朋友。
trad: 我們和至少十個美國人交了朋友。

eng: Adding comments makes the code easier to read.
Jump as high as you can.
What is this nonsense?
We have to go to sleep now.
It is their only choice.
I realize I messed up.
How fascinating!
Tell me about your program for the future.
simp: 给我谈谈你未来的计划。
trad: 給我談談你未來的計劃。

eng: It's been raining non-stop for three days.
He cut the apple in half.
A person like that would have no trouble getting elected president.
simp: 像他那样的人，很容易赢总统选举。
trad: 像他那樣的人，很容易贏總統選舉。

eng: We have a white cat.
Variable names in C are case sensitive.
simp: C语言的变量名是区分大小写的。
trad: C語言的變量名是區分大小寫的。

eng: Only one store carries this book.
simp: 只有一家商店卖这本书。
trad: 只有一家商店賣這本書。

eng: She supposed me to be a doctor.
Do you have any pets?
Could you say that again?
Let's watch TV.
I'm a teacher.
He doesn't have much money.
Tom doesn't like cats.
Our world is getting smaller and smaller.
simp: 我们的世界正变得越来越小。
trad: 我們的世界正變得越來越小。

eng: Please tell me your name.
Where is the school?
This dish is tasty.
You should exercise more.
What's the matter?
Thank you for everything you've done for Canada.
simp: 感谢您为加拿大所做的一切。
trad: 感謝您為加拿大所做的一切。

eng: Revolutions that don't succeed are soon forgotten.
simp: 失败的革命很快就被遗忘了。
trad: 失敗的革命很快就被遺忘了。

eng: You have to adapt to circumstances.
I am used to going to bed very late.
She gave him something hot to drink.
Do you have an address?
She went to the hospital by taxi.
This dish is tasty.
Music is his passion.
Music is her passion.
Music is your passion.
She gave him a slap in the face.
You can't say four-letter words on TV.
simp: 你不能在电视上骂粗口。
trad: 你不能在電視上罵粗口。

eng: She is about as tall as me.
In my opinion, you're wrong.
They kicked him out of the disco without any explanation.
simp: 他们什麽也没解释就把他踢出迪斯科了。
trad: 他們什麼也沒解釋就把他踢出迪斯科了。

eng: Thank you for all your contributions. We expect to see you again soon.
simp: 谢谢您的贡献。预计我们很快又会见面。
trad: 謝謝您的貢獻。預計我們很快又會見面。

eng: He entered the hall of fame.
If you understand this one, then the others are nearly the same.
simp: 如果你理解这一个,其它的也大同小异。
trad: 如果你理解這一個,其它的也大同小異。

eng: Where are the apples?
He's a newcomer.
You have very piercing eyes.
I have a fever.
Read such books as will be useful in later life.
simp: 读这样的书会对今后的生活会有用。
trad: 讀這樣的書會對今後的生活會有用。

eng: There is a lot of money.
Someone farted. "It wasn't me!"
I think he won't come.
You are really crafty.
I haven't washed my hair.
This man has a horse.
She saved some money for a rainy day.
simp: 她存了一些钱，以备不时之需。
trad: 她存了一些錢，以備不時之需。

eng: Is it a butterfly or a moth?
simp: 这是一只蝴蝶还是一只飞蛾？
trad: 這是一只蝴蝶還是一只飛蛾？

eng: Moths are attracted by light.
He is sure to accomplish his purpose.
simp: 他很肯定可以达到目标。
trad: 他很肯定可以達到目標。

eng: She was beautiful when she was young.
I am accustomed to working hard.
simp: 我习惯辛勤努力地工作。
trad: 我習慣辛勤努力地工作。

eng: I'm not interested.
The vending machines are over there.
She likes red bayberries.
Do you agree?
There's nothing there.
I am in Lyon, but maybe I'll go to Paris for hunting a job.
simp: 我在里昂，不过没准去巴黎找工作。
trad: 我在裏昂，不過沒準去巴黎找工作。

eng: Failure is the mother of success.
I have a lot of work to do tomorrow.
simp: 明天有许多要干的事情。
trad: 明天有許多要幹的事情。

eng: Several delegates disagreed.
Does the mid-autumn festival fall on Monday this year?
simp: 今年中秋节是星期一吗？
trad: 今年中秋節是星期一嗎？

eng: In an emergency, use the stairway, not the elevator.
simp: 事故发生时，敬勿使用电梯，请使用楼梯。
trad: 事故發生時，敬勿使用電梯，請使用樓梯。

eng: For all you say about him, I still like him.
simp: 你说尽他的坏话，但我依然喜欢他。
trad: 你說盡他的壞話，但我依然喜歡他。

eng: The heavens are bright with stars tonight.
Tony runs every day.
He surpasses his rivals in all ways.
simp: 他在各方面都超出他的对手。
trad: 他在各方面都超出他的對手。

eng: Miss Yamada is in charge of the 2nd year class this year.
simp: 今年，山田先生教二年班。
trad: 今年，山田先生教二年班。

eng: You can't view Flash content on an iPad. However, you can easily email yourself the URLs of these web pages and view that content on your regular computer when you get home.
simp: 虽然Flash的内容在不能iPad显示，只要把网页的URL发到自己的邮箱，回家便可以在普通电脑裡观看。
trad: 雖然Flash的內容在不能iPad顯示，只要把網頁的URL發到自己的郵箱，回家便可以在普通電腦裡觀看。

eng: The magazine Look is no longer being published.
The magazine Look is no longer being published.
The president said, "I don't give a damn."
She rejected me.
I'll take a cup of tea.
I think we need a doggy bag.
We ordered too much food.
Can we catch the train?
Our train is delayed.
Not bad.
Father gestured to me to leave the room.
I borrowed Tom's phone this morning.
This is Edward.
One more time!
Her girlfriend is completely flat-chested.
simp: 她的女朋友真算飞机场。
trad: 她的女朋友真算飛機場。

eng: The megalomaniac differs from the narcissist by the fact that he wishes to be powerful rather than charming, and seeks to be feared rather than loved. To this type belong many lunatics and most of the great men of history.
simp: 自大狂和自恋狂的分别，在于自大狂渴望能够手握大权、受人敬畏，而自恋狂却比较想拥有魅力、得到爱戴。许多疯子和历史上的伟人都属于前者。
trad: 自大狂和自戀狂的分別，在於自大狂渴望能夠手握大權、受人敬畏，而自戀狂卻比較想擁有魅力、得到愛戴。許多瘋子和歷史上的偉人都屬於前者。

eng: No man can live to be two hundred years old.
simp: 没有人能够活到两百岁。
trad: 沒有人能夠活到兩百歲。

eng: Russell was a brilliant philosopher, but even the simplest practical task was quite beyond him.
simp: 罗素是一个极出色的哲学家，可是他对日常生活中的事务却是一窍不通。
trad: 羅素是一個極出色的哲學家，可是他對日常生活中的事務卻是一竅不通。

eng: Keep in mind that you must die.
simp: 不要忘记你终会有死去的一天。
trad: 不要忘記你終會有死去的一天。

eng: Finding a decent man is more difficult than winning a lottery.
simp: 找一个好男人比中彩票还要难。
trad: 找一個好男人比中彩票還要難。

eng: Within hours, the world knew the news.
simp: 消息在数小时内就传遍了全世界。
trad: 消息在數小時內就傳遍了全世界。

eng: I will have spent all this money in three months.
simp: 不消三个月，这笔钱就会全给我花清光。
trad: 不消三個月，這筆錢就會全給我花清光。

eng: If we ever came in contact with an alien race, how would we communicate with it?
simp: 如果有天我们真的和外星人有了接触，我们应该怎样和他们沟通呢？
trad: 如果有天我們真的和外星人有了接觸，我們應該怎樣和他們溝通呢？

eng: Such magazines have a great influence on children.
simp: 这些杂志对小孩的影响很大。
trad: 這些雜誌對小孩的影響很大。

eng: He has a fair income.
We eat fish raw.
Tom is a Muslim.
It's cold today.
I have a magazine in my room.
simp: 我的房间里有一本杂志。
trad: 我的房間裏有一本雜誌。

eng: The text of the national anthem of Canada was first written in French.
simp: 加拿大国歌的歌词最初是用法文写的。
trad: 加拿大國歌的歌詞最初是用法文寫的。

eng: The news of the merger of the two companies broke yesterday.
simp: 昨天突然传出了两间公司合併的消息。
trad: 昨天突然傳出了兩間公司合併的消息。

eng: He came to Japan when he was a boy of ten.
simp: 他十岁的时候就来到了日本。
trad: 他十歲的時候就來到了日本。

eng: He is the very man that we've been looking for.
simp: 他就是我们一直要找的那一个人。
trad: 他就是我們一直要找的那一個人。

eng: He does not, in short, write with the candor of a man who is completely confident of his thesis.
simp: 简单来说，他的文笔并没有流露出那种对自己的论文充满信心的人应有的直率和坦诚。
trad: 簡單來說，他的文筆並沒有流露出那種對自己的論文充滿信心的人應有的直率和坦誠。

eng: If you want to become thin, you should cut back on the between-meal snacks.
simp: 如果你想变瘦，就应该少点在正餐以外吃零食。
trad: 如果你想變瘦，就應該少點在正餐以外吃零食。

eng: Fish and meat are both nourishing, but the latter is more expensive than the former.
simp: 虽然肉比鱼昂贵，但是两者的营养价值其实是差不多的。
trad: 雖然肉比魚昂貴，但是兩者的營養價值其實是差不多的。

eng: The demon grabbed my sister and, with howling laughter, cast her into a bottomless pit.
simp: 恶魔一把抓住了我的妹妹，一边狰狞地狂笑着，一边把她丢进了一个无底洞里。
trad: 惡魔一把抓住了我的妹妹，一邊猙獰地狂笑著，一邊把她丟進了一個無底洞裏。

eng: On May 18, a young Japanese couple was arrested after their one-year-old baby was found wrapped in a plastic bag and dumped in a gutter.
simp: 一对年轻日本夫妇，把一岁大的亲生婴儿放进胶袋，弃置于排水沟中，于五月十八日被捕。
trad: 一對年輕日本夫婦，把一歲大的親生嬰兒放進膠袋，棄置於排水溝中，於五月十八日被捕。

eng: You rarely ever wake up this early.
Have you been in contact with him recently?
simp: 你最近有没有和他联络？
trad: 你最近有沒有和他聯絡？

eng: Since he was able to walk so far, he must have strong legs.
simp: 他走了那麽远的路，脚力一定很不错。
trad: 他走了那麼遠的路，腳力一定很不錯。

eng: The art of modern warfare does not necessarily require soldiers to be armed to the teeth to be effective as combatants.
simp: 现代战术并无指明士兵必须全副武装上阵才能发挥其最大的战斗力。
trad: 現代戰術並無指明士兵必須全副武裝上陣才能發揮其最大的戰鬥力。

eng: The article on Buddhism revived my interest in Oriental religions.
simp: 那篇关于佛教的文章勾起了我对东方宗教的兴趣。
trad: 那篇關於佛教的文章勾起了我對東方宗教的興趣。

eng: Do you like to travel?
Despite all his faults he is popular.
simp: 他虽然有许多缺点，但却很受人欢迎。
trad: 他雖然有許多缺點，但卻很受人歡迎。

eng: I don't have a cat.
The market is big.
I'm helping people to buy things online.
simp: 我在帮人在网上买东西。
trad: 我在幫人在網上買東西。

eng: The banks aren't open on Saturdays.
I am writing my internship report.
This expression is very Chinese.
simp: 这种表达方式很中国化。
trad: 這種表達方式很中國化。

eng: You had better wait until the police come.
He gave me what money he had with him.
simp: 他把他身上所有的钱都给了我。
trad: 他把他身上所有的錢都給了我。

eng: My phone is beautiful.
I got bitten by mosquitoes.
What should I do if my husband is impotent?
simp: 老公性无能，我该怎么办？
trad: 老公性無能，我該怎麼辦？

eng: What should I do if my wife snores?
simp: 老婆打呼噜，我该怎么办？
trad: 老婆打呼嚕，我該怎麼辦？

eng: My wife has no libido since she got pregnant. What can I do?
simp: 老婆怀孕没了性欲我该怎么办？
trad: 老婆懷孕沒了性欲我該怎麼辦？

eng: Very happy to meet you.
Sorry, I don't understand.
I love bread.
Congratulations on your face.
A cup of coffee, please.
Children are fond of cake.
Happy birthday, Shishir!
The professor teaches English conversation.
He might have lost his way.
It'll come all right in the end.
The heat is terrible today.
He walked home.
Tom filled out the job application form.
Tom should do as Mary suggests.
simp: 汤姆应该跟着玛丽的见意去做。
trad: 湯姆應該跟著瑪麗的見意去做。

eng: He persisted in his work until he succeeded.
simp: 他一直坚持他的工作直至他成功了。
trad: 他一直堅持他的工作直至他成功了。

eng: I never felt this way before I met you.
simp: 遇到你之前，我从来都没感觉到这样。
trad: 遇到你之前，我從來都沒感覺到這樣。

eng: Is it splendid, this world?
I'm sorry I have no pencil to write with.
simp: 对不起我没有铅笔去写。
trad: 對不起我沒有鉛筆去寫。

eng: I like L.A. better.
A good idea came into my mind.
He has a good reputation.
A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony, in a moment.
simp: 女人的思维很有跳跃性：从仰慕到爱慕，从爱慕到结婚都是一眨眼间的事。
trad: 女人的思維很有跳躍性：從仰慕到愛慕，從愛慕到結婚都是一眨眼間的事。

eng: What's your sign?
I am not too tired.
Does he like China?
They are not tired.
I'm going to the restaurant.
I'm incredibly busy.
Is that so?
Don't cry. I love you.
I know that you live here.
I know how to do it.
Is that a cat?
As you look at your face, you try to figure out what is happening behind it, in your mind.
simp: 当你看着自己的脸时，你会试图去发现这张脸后面的心灵里在发生着什么。
trad: 當你看著自己的臉時，你會試圖去發現這張臉後面的心靈裏在發生著什麼。

eng: I don't want to get married.
In spite of the heavy rain, he decided to go out.
simp: 虽然下着大雨，但是他还是决定了要出外。
trad: 雖然下著大雨，但是他還是決定了要出外。

eng: It is said that he is the richest man in the world.
simp: 据说他是世界上最富有的人。
trad: 據說他是世界上最富有的人。

eng: Actually, the present method has plenty of room for improvement.
simp: 其实现时的方法还有很大的改善空间。
trad: 其實現時的方法還有很大的改善空間。

eng: She had no difficulty in learning the poem by heart.
simp: 她轻而易举的就把诗背熟了。
trad: 她輕而易舉的就把詩背熟了。

eng: Take it, or leave it.
Are you alone?
She is terrible at cooking.
Are you sure you want to call the police? I asked her.
Exports in January were up 20% over the same period of last year.
simp: 一月的出口量比去年同期上升了两成。
trad: 一月的出口量比去年同期上升了兩成。

eng: I am 19 years old.
The girl is drinking tea.
He can also speak French.
We have lots of things to do.
Her daughter is bad at cooking.
Religion is regarded by the common people as true, by the wise as false, and by the rulers as useful.
simp: 宗教在一般人的眼中是真理，在智者的眼中是谎言，而在统治者的眼中则是一种工具。
trad: 宗教在一般人的眼中是真理，在智者的眼中是謊言，而在統治者的眼中則是一種工具。

eng: He is my best friend.
He will come.
More than half the residents are opposed to the plan.
simp: 有过半数的居民反对这个计划。
trad: 有過半數的居民反對這個計劃。

eng: He was the first man to float in space.
simp: 他是世上第一个在太空中飘浮的人。

eng: The result is calculated according to general reading table created by World Health Organization (WHO) - the same for male and female regardless the age.

eng: BMI categories (underweight, overweight or obese) from general reading table are inappropriate for athletes, children, the elderly, and the infirm.
