eng: Tom couldn't control himself.
She walked very carefully.
He is trying to keep up with the current of the times.
Bill is skillful in arguing and debating.
Don't throw trash here.
He can read English easily.
They forgot to lock the door.
Everyone feels pessimistic.
He found me a taxi.
simp: 他帮我打到一辆出租车。
trad: 他幫我打到一輛出租車。

eng: Let's take advantage of the long weekend.
Children can't swim in this river.
simp: 小孩儿不能在这条河里游泳。
trad: 小孩兒不能在這條河裏遊泳。

eng: I have two children away at university.
simp: 我有两个出去上大学的孩子。
trad: 我有兩個出去上大學的孩子。

eng: The business hasn't been paying for the last six months.
simp: 这家企业近6个月以来一直在欠薪。
trad: 這家企業近6個月以來一直在欠薪。

eng: The bus doesn't always come on time.
simp: 巴士不总是能准点到达。
trad: 巴士不總是能準點到達。

eng: The girl brushed past me.
The blouse costs twelve libras.
As the train came to a halt, all of the passengers wondered what was happening.
simp: 当列车停止时，所有的乘客都想知道发生了什么。
trad: 當列車停止時，所有的乘客都想知道發生了什麼。

eng: Garvey speaks up for racial pride.
simp: Garvey毫无保留地宣扬种族主义。
trad: Garvey毫無保留地宣揚種族主義。

eng: I hope that you are very well.
Ten to one they'll miss the train.
simp: 他们十有八九要赶不上火车了。
trad: 他們十有八九要趕不上火車了。

eng: Cherry trees are now in bloom in Washington.
simp: 华盛顿的樱花现在开放。
trad: 華盛頓的櫻花現在開放。

eng: His quick temper will get him in trouble one day.
simp: 他的急脾气迟早会惹祸上身。
trad: 他的急脾氣遲早會惹禍上身。

eng: Young man, enjoy yourself while you are young!
simp: 年轻人，要趁着年轻过得愉快！
trad: 年輕人，要趁著年輕過得愉快！

eng: They kept on walking.
He is a lump of selfishness.
simp: 他是个极其自私自利的人。
trad: 他是個極其自私自利的人。

eng: Feel free to ask any questions.
He regrets his having wasted his money.
simp: 他后悔自己的挥金如土。
trad: 他後悔自己的揮金如土。

eng: Nobody but John has heard of it.
simp: 除了约翰没人听说过这事。
trad: 除了約翰沒人聽說過這事。

eng: The coral reef is the region's prime attraction.
simp: 珊瑚礁是这个地区的主要景点。
trad: 珊瑚礁是這個地區的主要景點。

eng: She is going to Bob's.
My father grows rice.
She should have arrived home by now.
simp: 她现在应该已经到家了。
trad: 她現在應該已經到家了。

eng: Could you please tell me again why you are late?
simp: 你能再向我解释一遍你为什么迟到了吗？
trad: 你能再向我解釋一遍你為什麼遲到了嗎？

eng: I am speculating that he may win the game.
simp: 我在推测他可能赢得比赛。
trad: 我在推測他可能贏得比賽。

eng: I have supported you throughout.
simp: 我至始至终都在支持你。
trad: 我至始至終都在支持你。

eng: Mr Gilmore is so well-known as to need no introduction.
simp: Gilmore先生如此有名，就不必介绍了。
trad: Gilmore先生如此有名，就不必介紹了。

eng: I've learned so much from my mistakes, I'm thinking of making a few more!!
simp: 我从我的错误里学到了这么多，现在我想再犯几个错！
trad: 我從我的錯誤裏學到了這麼多，現在我想再犯幾個錯！

eng: These things constitute a balanced meal.
simp: 这些东西构成了一顿营养均衡的饭。
trad: 這些東西構成了一頓營養均衡的飯。

eng: All those dots are viral focuses.
simp: 这些点都是病毒集中的地方。
trad: 這些點都是病毒集中的地方。

eng: Mary is Tom's secretary.
I left the window open all through the night.
He could pass the examination, could not he?
I intend to become a lawyer.
I dislike how he smiles.
Excuse me. Is the supermarket open?
simp: 打扰一下，超市现在营业吗？
trad: 打擾一下，超市現在營業嗎？

eng: We have still a lot of food left.
Go to the patio.
I must think over the matter before giving my answer.
simp: 我在回答之前必须考虑周全。
trad: 我在回答之前必須考慮周全。

eng: He was disappointed that things didn't turn out as he'd hoped.
simp: 事情没能如他所愿让他感到失望。
trad: 事情沒能如他所願讓他感到失望。

eng: The fact that television frequently limits communication within families is already well known.
simp: 电视限制家庭成员的沟通的事实已经广为人知。
trad: 電視限制家庭成員的溝通的事實已經廣為人知。

eng: The armed forces occupied the entire territory.
The movie received mixed reviews.
simp: 影片得到的评价褒贬不一。
trad: 影片得到的評價褒貶不一。

eng: Once there lived an old man in a village.
simp: 曾经在一个村落里住着一位老人。
trad: 曾經在一個村落裏住著一位老人。

eng: Our people thirst for independence.
They were forced to kill and eat several of their horses.
simp: 他们被迫杀掉他们的几匹马来吃。
trad: 他們被迫殺掉他們的幾匹馬來吃。

eng: Her line of reasoning is attractive, but ultimately fallacious.
simp: 她说理的主线引人注目，但从根本上是靠不住的。
trad: 她說理的主線引人註目，但從根本上是靠不住的。

eng: In a few minutes we'll be landing at New Tokyo International Airport.
simp: 我们将于几分钟内降落在新东京国际机场。
trad: 我們將於幾分鐘內降落在新東京國際機場。

eng: I forgot to save the file before switching off.
Tom had a hunch that Mary was seeing someone else.
simp: 汤姆预感到玛丽在见别人。
trad: 湯姆預感到瑪麗在見別人。

eng: In the afternoon I must arrange for the trip.
simp: 下午我必须为旅行做准备了。
trad: 下午我必須為旅行做準備了。

eng: This book will do more harm than good.
You can only let the matter take its own course.
I met a certain Mr Smith.
simp: 我见了一个叫史密斯的男人。
trad: 我見了一個叫史密斯的男人。

eng: She was asked to convince him to get his son or someone else to paint the house.
simp: 她被要求去说服他以让他或者他的儿子或者是别的人来粉刷屋子。
trad: 她被要求去說服他以讓他或者他的兒子或者是別的人來粉刷屋子。

eng: We are having a serious talk about your future.
simp: 我们在严肃地谈论你的未来。
trad: 我們在嚴肅地談論你的未來。

eng: When watching TV, please ensure that the room is brightly lit and watch from a distance.
simp: 看电视的时候请确保屋子够亮，观看时保持距离。
trad: 看電視的時候請確保屋子夠亮，觀看時保持距離。

eng: Can you put up with the way he behaves?
simp: 你能容忍他做事的方式么？
trad: 你能容忍他做事的方式麼？

eng: Our boss begrudged us even a small raise in pay.
simp: 我们的老板就连给我们涨一点工资都舍不得。
trad: 我們的老板就連給我們漲一點工資都舍不得。

eng: Would you let me know when Tom comes?
simp: 你能让我知道汤姆什么时候来吗？
trad: 你能讓我知道湯姆什麼時候來嗎？

eng: He made mistakes on purpose to annoy me.
simp: 他为了惹恼我故意犯错。
trad: 他為了惹惱我故意犯錯。

eng: The telephone on my desk rang persistently and loudly.
simp: 我桌上的电话一直大声响铃。
trad: 我桌上的電話一直大聲響鈴。

eng: She came to Tokyo when she was eighteen years old.
He is not the man that he was when I first knew him.
simp: 他已经不是我最初见他那时的那个人了。
trad: 他已經不是我最初見他那時的那個人了。

eng: This meal is adequate for three.
In a word, you hate me, don't you?
She said that she was ill.
It is very hot here in summer.
Jean has fallen out with Paul over the education of their children.
simp: Jean和Paul为他们孩子的教育吵了起来。
trad: Jean和Paul為他們孩子的教育吵了起來。

eng: That is not my line.
Tom can't tell Mary his real feelings.
simp: 汤姆不能把他的真实感受告诉玛丽。
trad: 湯姆不能把他的真實感受告訴瑪麗。

eng: She sent me the enclosed check.
simp: 她把随附的支票寄给了我。
trad: 她把隨附的支票寄給了我。

eng: Add water and mix to a firm dough.
simp: 加水，和成一个结实的面团。
trad: 加水，和成一個結實的面團。

eng: When she heard that, she broke into tears.
Empty the drawer of its contents.
Almost no students get full marks in Chinese classics.
simp: 很少有学生能在古汉语考试上拿满分。
trad: 很少有學生能在古漢語考試上拿滿分。

eng: He owes his success both to working hard and to good luck.
simp: 他的成功要归结于他的辛勤工作和好运气。
trad: 他的成功要歸結於他的辛勤工作和好運氣。

eng: I was very much surprised at the news.
simp: 我对消息感到十分惊讶。
trad: 我對消息感到十分驚訝。

eng: A glass of cold water is very refreshing in hot weather.
simp: 一杯冷水在暑热的天气里十分提神。
trad: 一杯冷水在暑熱的天氣裏十分提神。

eng: She has an agreeable voice.
To make an excuse for having stayed out late.
She cannot be relied on because she often tells lies.
simp: 她不靠谱因为她经常说谎。
trad: 她不靠譜因為她經常說謊。

eng: The idea was brought into shape.
Please give me a break.
She is eager to live in Australia.
You can never have too much ego.
My father has the same car as Mr Kimura's.
simp: 我父亲的车和木村先生的一样。
trad: 我父親的車和木村先生的一樣。

eng: The meeting will have broken up by the time you arrive there.
simp: 等你到的时候应该已经散会了。
trad: 等你到的時候應該已經散會了。

eng: The paper is too big for the envelope.
simp: 这张纸太大，塞不进信封里。
trad: 這張紙太大，塞不進信封裏。

eng: That's an unusual hobby she's got, the transfer student. "She's cute so it's fine with me."
simp: “她的爱好不寻常啊，这个转学生。”“她长得可爱，所以对我来说还行。”
trad: “她的愛好不尋常啊，這個轉學生。”“她長得可愛，所以對我來說還行。”

eng: He met Sammy Davis, Jr. on his way home.
simp: 他在回家路上遇到了小萨米·戴维斯先生。
trad: 他在回家路上遇到了小薩米·戴維斯先生。

eng: Please call the police.
He was kind enough to lend me some money.
simp: 他够大方，借了我一点钱。
trad: 他夠大方，借了我一點錢。

eng: He threw a stone at the big dog.
simp: 他朝着大狗扔了块石头。
trad: 他朝著大狗扔了塊石頭。

eng: This guitar is so expensive that I can't buy it.
simp: 这吉他太贵了，我没法买下。
trad: 這吉他太貴了，我沒法買下。

eng: Tom doesn't like doing homework.
I sighed with relief to hear it.
simp: 我听到消息松了一口气。
trad: 我聽到消息松了一口氣。

eng: Electricity is very useful.
I get dressed and then I will take my breakfast.
simp: 我穿好衣服，然后吃早饭。
trad: 我穿好衣服，然後吃早飯。

eng: Tom wants a glass of water.
The door clicked shut.
He was looked up to by all his friends.
Will Juma go to the market with Hasani? "No, he will go alone."
simp: “Juma会和Hasani一起去赶集么？”“不，他会一个人去。”
trad: “Juma會和Hasani一起去趕集麼？”“不，他會一個人去。”

eng: For quantities of 20 or more, we can allow you a special discount of 10% on the prices quoted.
I'm just another man.
I agree with some of your opinions.
simp: 我同意你一部分的意见。
trad: 我同意你一部分的意見。

eng: What do you think I was doing?
He caught the traveler's diarrhea.
simp: 他感染了旅行者的痢疾。
trad: 他感染了旅行者的痢疾。

eng: I must catch the first train.
She's busy now and can't speak to you.
simp: 她现在忙，不能跟你说话。
trad: 她現在忙，不能跟你說話。

eng: I was surprised at his strong resemblance to his father.
simp: 他像极了他父亲，这让我震惊。
trad: 他像極了他父親，這讓我震驚。

eng: Is that true?
Do you cook by gas or electricity?
simp: 你们做饭用天然气还是用电？
trad: 你們做飯用天然氣還是用電？

eng: I don't see why not.
It is too late.
The children were playing in the dirt.
Balls are round.
That place's food is great, and their prices are good, but the fly in the ointment is their terrible location.
simp: 那家馆子物美价廉，美中不足的是他们糟糕的位置。
trad: 那家館子物美價廉，美中不足的是他們糟糕的位置。

eng: One learns grammar from language, not language from grammar.
simp: 人是从语言里学会语法，而非从语法里学会语言的。
trad: 人是從語言裏學會語法，而非從語法裏學會語言的。

eng: Only 3 out of the 98 passengers survived.
April showers bring May flowers.
Let's draw lots to decide who goes first.
Jack is the tallest boy in his class.
I didn't go to school last Monday.
Without a wife, a man is worth nothing.
simp: 男人没了妻子就一点价值都没有了。
trad: 男人沒了妻子就一點價值都沒有了。

eng: He turns a deaf ear to me.
Mr Wood came into the field.
International problems must be solved by diplomacy, not war.
simp: 国际问题必须靠外交而非战争解决。
trad: 國際問題必須靠外交而非戰爭解決。

eng: That was the only way we could defend ourselves against all this terrible shooting.
simp: 那是我们在枪林弹雨中自保的唯一方法。
trad: 那是我們在槍林彈雨中自保的唯一方法。

eng: The floor in this area needs to be redone.
simp: 这个地区的路面需要重新铺设。
trad: 這個地區的路面需要重新鋪設。

eng: His health has enabled him to succeed in life.
simp: 他健康的身体使他能在生活中成功。
trad: 他健康的身體使他能在生活中成功。

eng: There is lightning.
The flowers in my garden have withered in the cold.
simp: 我花园里的花在寒冷的天气下枯萎了。
trad: 我花園裏的花在寒冷的天氣下枯萎了。

eng: Tom helps Mary because he wants to, not because he has to.
simp: 汤姆帮玛莉的忙，不是出于责任，而是出于自愿。
trad: 湯姆幫瑪莉的忙，不是出於責任，而是出於自願。

eng: I didn't even kiss her.
simp: 我连亲也没有亲过她一下。
trad: 我連親也沒有親過她一下。

eng: I am sure we have a lot in common.
simp: 我们肯定有很多共通点。
trad: 我們肯定有很多共通點。

eng: When will she return home?
What more could I want?
From time to time, he goes to Tokyo on business.
simp: 他时不时会去北京公干。
trad: 他時不時會去北京公幹。

eng: I enjoy eating hot soup.
Please call me up if you want me.
simp: 需要我的时候就打给我吧。
trad: 需要我的時候就打給我吧。

eng: How did you come here?
His new novel will come out next month.
simp: 他的新小说将会在下个月出版。
trad: 他的新小說將會在下個月出版。

eng: There is no air on the moon.
You came out of the room.
The noise woke her up.
I am working on my new book.
A cat just came out of the basket.
simp: 有隻猫刚刚从篮子里爬了出来。
trad: 有隻貓剛剛從籃子裏爬了出來。

eng: She didn't know what to do.
Tom hasn't played the guitar for years.
simp: 汤姆已经有许多年没弹过吉他了。
trad: 湯姆已經有許多年沒彈過吉他了。

eng: There is nothing wrong with boys wearing cosmetics.
simp: 男孩化粧没有甚麽问题。
trad: 男孩化粧沒有甚麼問題。

eng: He pointed out how important it is to observe the law.
simp: 他指出了遵守法律的重要性。
trad: 他指出了遵守法律的重要性。

eng: Please remain calm.
They want to participate in the Olympic Games.
A nuclear war will bring about the destruction of mankind.
simp: 核战争将会为人类带来灭亡。
trad: 核戰爭將會為人類帶來滅亡。

eng: What kind of book do you want?
How huge that airship is!
You can't get ahead if you don't work hard.
I only happened to pass here just now.
She is less intelligent than you.
I am very grateful to you for your advice.
It is not clear what the writer is trying to say.
Yesterday my uncle bought a dog.
You're the girl of my dreams.
Take care when you cross the street.
No one wanted to talk about it.
He always sits up late at night.
There's no one more deaf than he who does not want to listen.
simp: 不愿意聆听的人，才是真正的聋子。
trad: 不願意聆聽的人，才是真正的聾子。

eng: Are there many flowers in the garden?
He objects to being treated like a child.
simp: 他不想被当成孩子看待。
trad: 他不想被當成孩子看待。

eng: I think that you should break up with your boyfriend.
simp: 我觉得你应该跟男友分手。
trad: 我覺得你應該跟男友分手。

eng: She was able to be ready early this morning, because she finished packing last night.
simp: 她昨晚已经收拾好行李，所以今天早上没费多少工夫就准备好出门。
trad: 她昨晚已經收拾好行李，所以今天早上沒費多少工夫就準備好出門。

eng: We should look after our parents.
simp: 我们应该好好照顾父母。
trad: 我們應該好好照顧父母。

eng: I applied for a job as a lifeguard at the community pool.
simp: 我去了公共游泳池应徵当救生员。
trad: 我去了公共遊泳池應徵當救生員。

eng: His girlfriend is Japanese.
Tom isn't tall.
I love Fist of the North Star!
Where are my watches?
That sounds like a fairly good proposal.
He seems to be very sleepy.
That was where the two armies would fight again.
simp: 此地为两军再次交战之地。
trad: 此地為兩軍再次交戰之地。

eng: We wear wool in winter.
Tom doesn't need money to have a good time.
simp: 汤姆无须钱财也能享受。
trad: 湯姆無須錢財也能享受。

eng: Nobody can understand it.
The writer is very humorous.
He did not know where to go.
We need not only adequate water but clean water.
simp: 我们不止需要足够的食水，还需要乾淨的食水。
trad: 我們不止需要足夠的食水，還需要乾淨的食水。

eng: I hope that she will help me.
I regret having said that to him.
simp: 我很后悔和他说了那番话。
trad: 我很後悔和他說了那番話。

eng: Tom loves studying music.
She is weakest at science.
Have you ever been to Tokyo?
A passport is usually necessary when you travel overseas.
simp: 海外旅行通常都要用到护照。
trad: 海外旅行通常都要用到護照。

eng: Staying at home is boring.
The cost of living in the United States was rising.
Those homeless people are living hand-to-mouth.
simp: 那些无家可归的人每天过着仅够煳口的生活。
trad: 那些無家可歸的人每天過著僅夠糊口的生活。

eng: No matter how hard I try...
Tom cut down a tree in his yard.
simp: 汤姆在后院砍伐了一棵树。
trad: 湯姆在後院砍伐了一棵樹。

eng: They're able students.
This goblet is made of gold.
It is he who is to blame.
Don't cut the cake with a knife.
The surest way to prevent war is not to fear it.
simp: 预防战争的最佳方法，就是勇敢地去面对它。
trad: 預防戰爭的最佳方法，就是勇敢地去面對它。

eng: He seldom stays home on Sundays.
simp: 他星期天很少留在家中。
trad: 他星期天很少留在家中。

eng: With great effort he climbed up the tree.
simp: 他费了不少劲，爬上了那棵树。
trad: 他費了不少勁，爬上了那棵樹。

eng: Won't you come with me?
I can't afford to buy such an expensive car.
simp: 我买不起这么贵的轿车。
trad: 我買不起這麼貴的轎車。

eng: It is possible that you have already read this book.
simp: 有可能已经读过这本书了。
trad: 有可能已經讀過這本書了。

eng: Millions long for immortality who do not know what to do with themselves on a rainy Sunday afternoon.
simp: 世界上有数之不尽的人渴望自己能长生不老，但这些人却连一个下雨的星期天下午也不懂得该怎麽打发。
trad: 世界上有數之不盡的人渴望自己能長生不老，但這些人卻連一個下雨的星期天下午也不懂得該怎麼打發。

eng: These pictures always remind me of the old days.
simp: 这些照片总是让我想起昔日时光。
trad: 這些照片總是讓我想起昔日時光。

eng: What are you eyeing?
It is true that he is poor, but he is contented.
simp: 无可厚非，他是穷，不过他却知足。
trad: 無可厚非，他是窮，不過他卻知足。

eng: I picked out a new hat at the store.
simp: 我在商店选了一个新帽子。
trad: 我在商店選了一個新帽子。

eng: We ran out of gas.
We ran out of gas.
What's his most recent novel?
simp: 他最新的小说叫甚麽名字？
trad: 他最新的小說叫甚麼名字？

eng: The flowers withered up.
Laughter is a human instinct, and when it comes to instinct, cultural barriers don't exist.
simp: 欢笑是人之本能，有了欢笑， 就没了文化隔阂。
trad: 歡笑是人之本能，有了歡笑， 就沒了文化隔閡。

eng: The prisoners fought one another like so many mad people.
simp: 囚犯们像疯子一样互相殴斗。
trad: 囚犯們像瘋子一樣互相毆鬥。

eng: This poison is very effective in getting rid of roaches.
simp: 这毒药用来治蟑螂很有效。
trad: 這毒藥用來治蟑螂很有效。

eng: Why did you wake me up to tell me something that big? Now, I'll never be able to concentrate on my work!
simp: 你为什么要唤我起来，告诉我如此晴天霹雳的消息? 现在你教我如何认真工作?
trad: 你為什麼要喚我起來，告訴我如此晴天霹靂的消息? 現在你教我如何認真工作?

eng: Tom eats like a pig.
The man is starving.
We have three dogs, one white and two black.
simp: 我们有三只狗,一白两黑.
trad: 我們有三只狗,一白兩黑.

eng: I must have my work finished by tomorrow.
simp: 明日之前必须把工作做完.
trad: 明日之前必須把工作做完.

eng: Even though he explained to me over and over again the meaning of this poem, I still don't get it.
simp: 虽然他对我反复解释这首诗的意思，我还是不懂。
trad: 雖然他對我反復解釋這首詩的意思，我還是不懂。

eng: Because the entrance was locked, we couldn't enter the house.
simp: 由于大门锁着，我们无法入屋。
trad: 由於大門鎖著，我們無法入屋。

eng: I don't feel like translating this sentence.
simp: 我不想为这句子做翻译。
trad: 我不想為這句子做翻譯。

eng: I got an invitation to a party tonight that I know would be a lot of fun but I have to be in my best form for tomorrow's meeting so I had to turn it down.
simp: 虽受邀参加今晚一个精彩万分的派对，奈何明日不得不打起精神出席会议，只好推辞了。
trad: 雖受邀參加今晚一個精彩萬分的派對，奈何明日不得不打起精神出席會議，只好推辭了。

eng: I've had it for today. I'm too tired.
The doctor administered medicine to the patient.
My father allowed me to go to the concert.
I'm so embarrassed I could dig a hole and crawl into it.
simp: 我窘得想找个洞鑽进去。
trad: 我窘得想找個洞鑽進去。

eng: Tom won $10,000 in the lottery.
simp: 汤姆买彩票赢了一万元。
trad: 湯姆買彩票贏了一萬元。

eng: She'll try it once more.
I feel like somehow I've stopped thinking of translation as something enjoyable.
simp: 不知怎麽的，我觉得翻译好像已经不再是一件乐事了。
trad: 不知怎麼的，我覺得翻譯好像已經不再是一件樂事了。

eng: A scary horror movie is only a movie. Once you turn off the screen it's all over, but life...you're stuck in it.
simp: 多恐怖的恐怖电影，也只不过是一部电影；你把荧幕关掉，就甚麽事也没有了。可是人生……你想躲也躲不掉。
trad: 多恐怖的恐怖電影，也只不過是一部電影；你把熒幕關掉，就甚麼事也沒有了。可是人生……你想躲也躲不掉。

eng: I dare say there'll be taxis at the station.
simp: 我敢说那车站一定有计程车。
trad: 我敢說那車站一定有計程車。

eng: People are concerned about racial problems.
You're a bug.
You're a bug.
He resigned from the job to take the responsibility for the loss.
simp: 为了这次的损失，他扛起责任，辞职了。
trad: 為了這次的損失，他扛起責任，辭職了。

eng: That is as much as I dare spend on it.
At any rate, we have no means of helping him.
simp: 无论如何，我们也帮不了他。
trad: 無論如何，我們也幫不了他。

eng: Have you ever done it?
He likes to sing in the bathtub.
simp: 他很喜欢一边洗澡一边唱歌。
trad: 他很喜歡一邊洗澡一邊唱歌。

eng: He bowed to the Queen.
You'd better not tell him.
We waited a long time, but she didn't show up.
simp: 我们等了好久，但是她还是没有出现。
trad: 我們等了好久，但是她還是沒有出現。

eng: He did it all out of kindness.
I intend to study abroad in America next year.
simp: 我打算明年去美国留学。
trad: 我打算明年去美國留學。

eng: Since there is no air on the moon, there is no sound at all.
simp: 月球上没有空气，也自然没有声音。
trad: 月球上沒有空氣，也自然沒有聲音。

eng: Tom kicked Mary.
Tom said that he felt sorry for Mary.
We have a traitor among us.
Times are changing.
How to use a router to limit network speed ?
simp: 怎么用路由器限制网速？
trad: 怎麼用路由器限制網速？

eng: I am looking forward to seeing the film with her.
simp: 我向往着和她一起看那部电影.
trad: 我向往著和她一起看那部電影.

eng: I wrote a letter to my parents at home.
simp: 我向乡里的父母写了信.
trad: 我向鄉裏的父母寫了信.

eng: I will be your guarantor.
Scream it loud!
He was sitting there with a pipe in his mouth.
simp: 他口里含着烟斗,坐在那儿.
trad: 他口裏含著煙鬥,坐在那兒.

eng: He stole my money from the safe.
simp: 他从保险箱里把我的钱偷走了.
trad: 他從保險箱裏把我的錢偷走了.

eng: My mother is active.
I'm holding a book.
Her novel was translated into Japanese.
simp: 她的小说被翻译成了日文。
trad: 她的小說被翻譯成了日文。

eng: You can come to my party, but you have to bring me a gift.
simp: 你可以来我的派对,不过,你得带来一件礼物.
trad: 你可以來我的派對,不過,你得帶來一件禮物.

eng: A young man is singing in front of the door.
simp: 有位年轻人在门前唱歌.
trad: 有位年輕人在門前唱歌.

eng: You get in my way?
She was very pleased when her son returned home safe and sound.
simp: 儿子平安无事回家时,她高兴极了.
trad: 兒子平安無事回家時,她高興極了.

eng: You are as white as a sheet.
Isn't it a bit small?
She has very neat handwriting.
Faster, higher, stronger.
I feel restless when I have to wait too long for my friend to show up.
simp: 等朋友等太久时,会感到烦躁.
trad: 等朋友等太久時,會感到煩躁.

eng: They worship every Sunday.
simp: 他们每星期天举行朝拜.
trad: 他們每星期天舉行朝拜.

eng: The smell of roses filled the room.
simp: 玫瑰的芬芳弥漫了整个房间.
trad: 玫瑰的芬芳彌漫了整個房間.

eng: But I haven't looked up this tracking number on the DHL website.
simp: 但是我在DHL的网站上没有查到这个运单号。
trad: 但是我在DHL的網站上沒有查到這個運單號。

eng: He is not as old as he seems.
simp: 他并没有看起来那么老。
trad: 他並沒有看起來那麼老。

eng: I could not help laughing at his haircut.
simp: 我忍不住取笑他的发型。
trad: 我忍不住取笑他的發型。

eng: I may have made a mistake.
She is just going shopping.
You are fantastic.
He has been absent from work for a week.
The man died in a car accident.
Don't mix up comets and asteroids.
simp: 不要把流星和小行星搞溷了。
trad: 不要把流星和小行星搞混了。

eng: Tom fell into the pool.
I was laughed at in school today.
simp: 我今天在学校被嘲笑了。
trad: 我今天在學校被嘲笑了。

eng: Let's do it another time.
There is a post office in front of the station.
Tom likes to have fun.
Mary announced her engagement to Tom.
He grieved at the death of his best friend.
simp: 他为他最要好的朋友的死感到悲伤。
trad: 他為他最要好的朋友的死感到悲傷。

eng: The value of the dollar declines as the rate of inflation rises.
simp: 随着通货膨胀的发展美元贬值了。
trad: 隨著通貨膨脹的發展美元貶值了。

eng: Plot is important!
Bob has the habit of going to bed at 10:00.
He's fluent in Japanese.
Attached is my monthly report.
Today she turns ten years old.
The train headed for the station.
Let's decide by coin toss.
Tom is hesitant to visit Mary in the hospital.
simp: 对于是否要去医院探望Mary,Tom有点犹豫不决。
trad: 對於是否要去醫院探望Mary,Tom有點猶豫不決。

eng: My mother bought me a pretty dress this past Sunday.
simp: 上周日妈妈给我买了件漂亮的衣服。
trad: 上周日媽媽給我買了件漂亮的衣服。

eng: I've got to finish this essay by tomorrow.
simp: 明天我会完成这篇文章。
trad: 明天我會完成這篇文章。

eng: You know what I mean.
He is what we call a walking dictionary.
Tom is still just a boy.
The man who was smoking said, "He doesn't come here any more."
simp: 那个抽烟的男人说：他再也不来了。
trad: 那個抽煙的男人說：他再也不來了。

eng: They didn't have to speak about our school.
simp: 他们没必要谈论我们的学校。
trad: 他們沒必要談論我們的學校。

eng: People living in a big city tend to lack exercise.
simp: 住在大城市的人们一般都缺乏锻炼。
trad: 住在大城市的人們一般都缺乏鍛煉。

eng: What prevented you from coming yesterday?
simp: 是什么原因导致你昨天没来。
trad: 是什麼原因導致你昨天沒來。

eng: It was a nightmare.
Tom worked all day and was completely worn out.
simp: Tom工作了一天，感到筋疲力尽。
trad: Tom工作了一天，感到筋疲力盡。

eng: Everyone around the area works hard.
simp: 这个地区的人工作很勤奋。
trad: 這個地區的人工作很勤奮。

eng: Tom seems to have packed everything but the kitchen sink.
simp: Tom把除了厨房水槽之外的所有东西都打包了。
trad: Tom把除了廚房水槽之外的所有東西都打包了。

eng: I'm sure he will go far in the business world.
simp: 我坚信他在商业界会有所作为。
trad: 我堅信他在商業界會有所作為。

eng: I wish I had more time to talk with her.
simp: 我希望我能和她多谈一会儿。
trad: 我希望我能和她多談一會兒。

eng: I made a deposit of $1,000 at the bank.
She is brushing her hair.
None of them would admit to being the culprit.
simp: 他们没有一个人承认自己是犯人。
trad: 他們沒有一個人承認自己是犯人。

eng: The story is not in accord with the facts.
The victim had been beaten up and left for dead.
simp: 这个受害者被揍了一顿然后被放任不管。
trad: 這個受害者被揍了一頓然後被放任不管。

eng: When he was a student, he went to the disco only once.
simp: 当他还是个学生时，他只去过迪厅一次。
trad: 當他還是個學生時，他只去過迪廳一次。

eng: You can trust him with any job.
simp: 任何工作你都可以放心的交给他。
trad: 任何工作你都可以放心的交給他。

eng: The picture reminds me of my family.
simp: 这张图片让我想起了我的家人。
trad: 這張圖片讓我想起了我的家人。

eng: The train makes 20 miles an hour.
The train makes 20 miles an hour.
He lied to us.
It was you that suggested seeing that movie.
simp: 是你提议去看这个电影的。
trad: 是你提議去看這個電影的。

eng: I will never violate a law again.
That's enough.
There is a tendency for people to think that hang gliding is dangerous.
simp: 人们普遍认为悬挂式滑翔运动时危险的。
trad: 人們普遍認為懸掛式滑翔運動時危險的。

eng: The baby weighed seven pounds at birth.
That's enough.
You definitely can't compare Marseilles and Lyons.
simp: 你绝不可把马赛和里昂相比。
trad: 你絕不可把馬賽和裏昂相比。

eng: He was very anxious on the eve of the exam.
That country has a severe climate.
Do you remember the town he was born in?
simp: 你还记得他出生的小镇吗？
trad: 你還記得他出生的小鎮嗎？

eng: If you take my advice, you'll see a doctor.
simp: 你要是听我的意见就去看医生。
trad: 你要是聽我的意見就去看醫生。

eng: He and I have a near-telepathic understanding of each other. No sooner does one of us say something than the other is already responding.
simp: 他和我简直心有灵犀，才刚说一句，另一方已经回应。
trad: 他和我簡直心有靈犀，才剛說一句，另一方已經回應。

eng: I live in Hyogo Prefecture.
I will write a letter to Judy.
We painted the house green.
I prefer staying at home to going fishing.
If I do not get the item this week, I will make a complaint to PayPal.
simp: 如果本周我收不到货，我就向paypal投诉。
trad: 如果本周我收不到貨，我就向paypal投訴。

eng: I will post lots of pictures, so it will be like you were there with me.
simp: 我会给你寄很多照片，让你感觉就像我在那里陪你一样。
trad: 我會給你寄很多照片，讓你感覺就像我在那裏陪你一樣。

eng: This is the coffee shop I first met my wife in.
simp: 这就是我和妻子第一次见面的咖啡馆。
trad: 這就是我和妻子第一次見面的咖啡館。

eng: Are you for the war or against it?
Soccer players make a lot of money.
simp: 足球运动员可以挣很多钱。
trad: 足球運動員可以掙很多錢。

eng: I don't understand him sometimes.
He is something of a musician.
simp: 他是个音乐家之类的人。
trad: 他是個音樂家之類的人。

eng: We still have an old tube television.
simp: 我们还有个老式电视机。
trad: 我們還有個老式電視機。

eng: This law will deprive us of our basic rights.
simp: 这项法律会剥夺我们的基本权利。
trad: 這項法律會剝奪我們的基本權利。

eng: For a long time society was strongly hierarchal and unequal, primarily composed of peasants. The most backward, impoverished population, were crushed by the weight of the taxes, wars, and famines.
simp: 在过去一个相当长的时期里，社会都是等级制度森严并且极度不公的，做为社会阶级中最大一部分的贫农常常被赋税，战争，饥荒压得喘不过气来，痛苦不堪。
trad: 在過去一個相當長的時期裏，社會都是等級制度森嚴並且極度不公的，做為社會階級中最大一部分的貧農常常被賦稅，戰爭，饑荒壓得喘不過氣來，痛苦不堪。

eng: Can you let me by?
The following is a summary of the President's speech.
simp: 下面是总统讲话的概要。
trad: 下面是總統講話的概要。

eng: He isn't like his brother.
Who wrote the Bible?
She killed him with a knife.
Violence is the cancer of our society.
Pleasure is always in the past or in the future, never in the present.
simp: 快乐存在于过去和未来，唯独不存在于现在。
trad: 快樂存在於過去和未來，唯獨不存在於現在。

eng: She loves the doll like her own sister.
simp: 她像喜爱自己的亲妹妹一样喜欢这个娃娃。
trad: 她像喜愛自己的親妹妹一樣喜歡這個娃娃。

eng: We spread out and began to search through the woods.
simp: 我们分散开来并在树林中展开搜索。
trad: 我們分散開來並在樹林中展開搜索。

eng: How many sandwiches are there left?
She slapped him in the face.
Smiling is a cheap way to be prettier.
simp: 变美丽的最简单方法就是微笑。
trad: 變美麗的最簡單方法就是微笑。

eng: I don't plan to hang out tonight. I need to prepare for my lessons.
simp: 我今晚不准备出去玩，我要预备功课。
trad: 我今晚不準備出去玩，我要預備功課。

eng: Keep the change!
The boy is kind.
Keep the dog out.
The curtain fell.
This is never going to end.
Turn off the gas.
Turn up the TV.
Don't turn up the volume of TV anymore.
simp: 不要再调大电视的声音了。
trad: 不要再調大電視的聲音了。

eng: Call the police!
Open the bottle.
The leaves fell.
The light is on.
Get on the horse.
He likes to get on the horse and go out.
We lost the game.
Clean up the room.
He threw the ball.
He turned the key.
I won the lottery.
Is the bath clean?
Keep to the right.
Put out the light.
She's in the bath.
The doorbell rang.
The meeting ended.
The pain has gone.
His speech bored me.
It's not possible to study with so much noise!
simp: 在这么嘈杂的环境中无法学习。
trad: 在這麼嘈雜的環境中無法學習。

eng: I'll get there as soon as I can.
simp: 我会尽可能早地到那儿。
trad: 我會盡可能早地到那兒。

eng: I spent 10 dollars on it.
simp: 我在这东西上花了十美元。
trad: 我在這東西上花了十美元。

eng: There are several ways to measure speed.
What's your major field?
The weather is fine today!
Little Zhang is a good guy!
Don't let this opportunity slip away!
Don't miss the train this afternoon!
That's not a bad idea.
A GPS device can pinpoint your location anywhere in the world.
simp: 无论你在世界的哪一个角落，你也可以使用全球定位仪来找出你的所在。
trad: 無論你在世界的哪一個角落，你也可以使用全球定位儀來找出你的所在。

eng: I thought it was true.
I was happy to see her.
I'm glad that you will come.
It was ages since we had had such a good time.
simp: 我们很久没有在一起这样快乐过了。
trad: 我們很久沒有在一起這樣快樂過了。

eng: My wife wants to adopt a child.
simp: 我妻子想收养一个孩子。
trad: 我妻子想收養一個孩子。

eng: Spring is my favorite season.
simp: 春天是我最喜爱的季节。
trad: 春天是我最喜愛的季節。

eng: I've scolded him many times.
It is very hot here in the summer.
My father had me wash the car.
He's younger than me.
I remember seeing him.
They must really hate me.
Japan is in Asia.
I have no idea who she is.
It's a very sad story.
simp: 这是一个非常悲伤的故事。
trad: 這是一個非常悲傷的故事。

eng: I've missed another chance.
The price of the book was $5.
I won't be here tomorrow.
Why don't you go home?
Please show me another one.
They arrived late because of the storm.
What will you have for lunch today?
Why didn't you read the magazine?
simp: 你为什么不读这杂志呢？
trad: 你為什麼不讀這雜誌呢？

eng: It's strange that Ken doesn't agree with us.
simp: 很奇怪肯竟然没有同意我们。
trad: 很奇怪肯竟然沒有同意我們。

eng: Her argument was not based on facts.
simp: 她的观点没有基于事实。
trad: 她的觀點沒有基於事實。

eng: We find it difficult to decide which one to buy.
simp: 我们觉得很难决定买哪一个。
trad: 我們覺得很難決定買哪一個。

eng: Her dream is to visit Paris.
Her feelings are easily hurt.
simp: 她很容易受到感情上的伤害。
trad: 她很容易受到感情上的傷害。

eng: He is twice as old as she is.
Why did he do such a thing?
simp: 为什么他会做这样的事呢？
trad: 為什麼他會做這樣的事呢？

eng: Two men are checking on what's wrong with the car.
simp: 两个男人在检查汽车出了什么故障。
trad: 兩個男人在檢查汽車出了什麼故障。

eng: If a man had 11 sheep and all but 9 died, how many sheep would he have left?
simp: 如果一个人有11只羊，除了9只之外，其他全部死了，那么他还剩下几只羊呢？
trad: 如果一個人有11只羊，除了9只之外，其他全部死了，那麼他還剩下幾只羊呢？

eng: This is not important.
I wish I were a good singer.
Two years ago I went to China.
It's amazing.
Enough!
I need to go to work.
Tom burst into tears.
I would like to brush up my English.
Whether he comes or not, the result will be the same.
simp: 他来还是不来，结果是一样的。
trad: 他來還是不來，結果是一樣的。

eng: Someone told me that this boy cannot hear.
simp: 有人告诉我这个男孩耳聋。
trad: 有人告訴我這個男孩耳聾。

eng: Is this a pen or a pencil?
simp: 这是一只钢笔还是铅笔？
trad: 這是一只鋼筆還是鉛筆？

eng: I took the fact for granted.
One is Japanese and the other is Italian.
simp: 一个是日本人，另一个是意大利人。
trad: 一個是日本人，另一個是意大利人。

eng: This machine was of great use to us all.
simp: 这个机器对我们都很有用。
trad: 這個機器對我們都很有用。

eng: We eat a meal three times a day.
Tom didn't agree to do it.
Jane is no less beautiful than her mother.
simp: 简的美丽丝毫不逊色于她母亲。
trad: 簡的美麗絲毫不遜色於她母親。

eng: She began crying.
I don't believe you. You're always telling lies.
simp: 我不相信你。你总是说谎。
trad: 我不相信你。你總是說謊。

eng: Please be quiet, everybody.
She wears a lot of makeup.
Tom is going out this afternoon with Mary.
simp: 今天下午汤姆和玛丽会一起出去。
trad: 今天下午湯姆和瑪麗會一起出去。

eng: I caught sight of a parade on my way home.
simp: 在回家的路上，我看到一场阅兵式。
trad: 在回家的路上，我看到一場閱兵式。

eng: I do not know when she will come back.
simp: 我不知道她什么时候会回来。
trad: 我不知道她什麼時候會回來。

eng: The girl was gazing at the doll.
Hungary and Slovakia are neighbors.
simp: 匈牙利和斯洛伐克是邻国。
trad: 匈牙利和斯洛伐克是鄰國。

eng: Thanks. Maybe we'll come back.
simp: 谢谢。也许我们会回来的。
trad: 謝謝。也許我們會回來的。

eng: I don't know his address.
It's very hard getting a taxi in this city.
simp: 在这个城市，很难打到的。
trad: 在這個城市，很難打到的。

eng: The lake was frozen.
Could you lend me the book?
Tom doesn't have a fever.
She always cries when he is drunk.
Our teacher has a wonderful sense of humor.
simp: 我们的老师非常有幽默感。
trad: 我們的老師非常有幽默感。

eng: We have two examinations during this term.
simp: 这个学期我们有两次考试。
trad: 這個學期我們有兩次考試。

eng: He was made a fool of by his neighbors.
simp: 他被他的邻居们愚弄了。
trad: 他被他的鄰居們愚弄了。

eng: I like L.A. better.
Weather permitting, I'll start tomorrow.
simp: 天气允许，我明天就开始。
trad: 天氣允許，我明天就開始。

eng: The river that flows through London is the Thames.
simp: 流经伦敦的河是泰晤士河。
trad: 流經倫敦的河是泰晤士河。

eng: Please turn off the light before you go to bed.
The family is watching a movie together.
We have ample time to catch our train.
simp: 我们有充裕的时间赶上火车。
trad: 我們有充裕的時間趕上火車。

eng: Tom doesn't like any kind of spicy food.
simp: 汤姆不喜欢任何辣的食物。
trad: 湯姆不喜歡任何辣的食物。

eng: He has plenty of money in the bank.
simp: 他在银行里有大量钱财。
trad: 他在銀行裏有大量錢財。

eng: I must make up for the loss.
I give you a book.
You shouldn't go out for a few days.
A dog will bark at strangers.
My brother has become a priest.
simp: 我的兄弟已经成为了牧师。
trad: 我的兄弟已經成為了牧師。

eng: The shop is open from Monday to Saturday.
simp: 这家店从星期一到星期六都营业。
trad: 這家店從星期一到星期六都營業。

eng: There were few children in the room.
Your hair is pretty.
I am very interested in these stories.
simp: 我对这些故事很感兴趣。
trad: 我對這些故事很感興趣。

eng: I like English very much.
He dried his wet clothes by the fire.
simp: 他在火旁烘干他的湿衣服。
trad: 他在火旁烘幹他的濕衣服。

eng: I hate Mondays.
Don't talk about it in my mother's presence.
simp: 我妈在的时候别讨论这件事。
trad: 我媽在的時候別討論這件事。

eng: I haven't eaten for many days.
She likes to listen to music.
They settled in Canada.
simp: 他们在加拿大安家落户。
trad: 他們在加拿大安家落戶。

eng: Everybody likes to goof off.
I am working to save for my college tuition.
simp: 我工作是为了攒大学学费。
trad: 我工作是為了攢大學學費。

eng: At first, I thought I was sick.
Install Linux!
Tux is the mascot for Linux.
simp: Tux 是 Linux 的吉祥物。
trad: Tux 是 Linux 的吉祥物。

eng: I should read the book.
She pulled him out of the mud.
simp: 她把他从烂泥中拽出来了。
trad: 她把他從爛泥中拽出來了。

eng: Do you think I'm made of money?
He is afraid of his own shadow.
That car is really expensive.
I met him by chance on the train this morning.
simp: 今天早上我在火车上偶遇他。
trad: 今天早上我在火車上偶遇他。

eng: I really like my coworkers.
The air felt a little cold.
Her skin is whiter than snow.
His illness is caused by bad weather.
simp: 他的病是糟糕的天气导致的。
trad: 他的病是糟糕的天氣導致的。

eng: I want a little bit of coffee. I don't want anything else.
simp: 我要喝一点咖啡，我不要别的。
trad: 我要喝一點咖啡，我不要別的。

eng: Every day I come to university by bus.
It started raining as soon as we got home.
simp: 我们才一到家就下起雨来了。
trad: 我們才一到家就下起雨來了。

eng: He broke in on our conversation.
It is careless of her to make such a mistake.
simp: 她犯这样的错真的很粗心。
trad: 她犯這樣的錯真的很粗心。

eng: Tom doesn't trust the police.
We'll get a phone call from him tonight for sure.
simp: 今晚我们肯定会接到他的电话。
trad: 今晚我們肯定會接到他的電話。

eng: Don't shout at me.
How is your business going?
He is aware of his danger.
The writer is living in a log cabin.
simp: 那个作家生活在小木屋中。
trad: 那個作家生活在小木屋中。

eng: You and I are the same age.
It's my belief that knowledge is power.
We must not laugh at the poor.
I know where he comes from.
He has gone to Britain.
Get up early in the morning.
Some of them seem to be too difficult.
The longer I stayed in Paris, the more I liked it.
simp: 在巴黎待得越久，我就越喜欢巴黎。
trad: 在巴黎待得越久，我就越喜歡巴黎。

eng: Money answers all things.
His response was contrary to our expectations.
simp: 他的回应出乎我们的意料。
trad: 他的回應出乎我們的意料。

eng: I was able to find out his address.
She stared at a UFO in silence.
simp: 她注视着一个不明飞行物，哑口无言。
trad: 她註視著一個不明飛行物，啞口無言。

eng: Don't put your things in the passage.
He has an eye for antiques.
They thought he was the son of the Sun.
simp: 他们认为他是太阳之子。
trad: 他們認為他是太陽之子。

eng: You can keep this dictionary if necessary.
simp: 有必要的话，你就留着这本字典吧。
trad: 有必要的話，你就留著這本字典吧。

eng: That woman over there is Ana.
simp: 那边的那个女子是安娜。
trad: 那邊的那個女子是安娜。

eng: It was so cold yesterday that I stayed home.
simp: 昨天太冷了，我只好待在家里。
trad: 昨天太冷了，我只好待在家裏。

eng: Yesterday I spent the whole day working.
simp: 昨天我一整天都在工作。
trad: 昨天我一整天都在工作。

eng: I use to ride my bike on weekends.
simp: 我以前常在週末骑脚踏车。
trad: 我以前常在週末騎腳踏車。

eng: In Japan, the new school year begins in April.
simp: 日本的新学年在四月开始。
trad: 日本的新學年在四月開始。

eng: I got a phone call from him just as I was about to go to bed.
simp: 我正要上床的时候接到了他打来的电话。
trad: 我正要上床的時候接到了他打來的電話。

eng: No one knows what'll happen in the future.
simp: 没有人知道未来会发生什麽事。
trad: 沒有人知道未來會發生什麼事。

eng: This is the cutest puppy I've ever seen.
simp: 这是我见过最可爱的小狗。
trad: 這是我見過最可愛的小狗。

eng: Are Protestants tired of the Bible?
simp: 新教徒对圣经感到厌烦了吗?
trad: 新教徒對聖經感到厭煩了嗎?

eng: I am not Canadian.
It goes without saying that health is important.
War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
simp: 战争即和平，自由即奴役，无知即力量。
trad: 戰爭即和平，自由即奴役，無知即力量。

eng: My roommate is learning Chinese.
I can't play tennis that well.
I'll see to it.
He lied to my face.
Do I need to transfer?
He had to stay in bed.
I gave my cold to him.
The teacher lined the children up in order of height.
simp: 老师按照身高给孩子们排队。
trad: 老師按照身高給孩子們排隊。

eng: Mother made a doll for me.
simp: 妈妈给我做了一个洋娃娃。
trad: 媽媽給我做了一個洋娃娃。

eng: She is qualified as a nurse.
Money isn't the only thing that matters.
I will help you if I have finished my work by four.
simp: 如果我在4点之前能完成工作，我会来帮助你。
trad: 如果我在4點之前能完成工作，我會來幫助你。

eng: This rule does not apply in all cases.
simp: 这条规则不是任何情况下都奏效的。
trad: 這條規則不是任何情況下都奏效的。

eng: He stuck to his promise.
Let's get married!
He gave in.
Count me in.
Come on, everything will be alright.
I thought he was going to fail the exam, but he passed after all.
simp: 本以为他不会及格，但最终还是及格了。
trad: 本以為他不會及格，但最終還是及格了。

eng: You have the choice of soup or salad.
simp: 你有两种选择，汤，或沙拉。
trad: 你有兩種選擇，湯，或沙拉。

eng: She’s a doctor now.
Hope to see you next time I'm in N.Y.
simp: 希望下次在纽约见到你。
trad: 希望下次在紐約見到你。

eng: He's writing a long letter.
It is said that the younger generation today is apathetic.
simp: 有人说新一代的人很冷漠。
trad: 有人說新一代的人很冷漠。

eng: Which is more complete, the first edition or the second?
simp: 第一还是第二的版本比较齐全？
trad: 第一還是第二的版本比較齊全？

eng: Which one is more expensive?
You may get a serious disease.
I absolutely don't know that woman.
simp: 我完全不认识那个女人。
trad: 我完全不認識那個女人。

eng: Sit beside me.
I couldn't make her out at all.
simp: 她真是让我莫不着头脑。
trad: 她真是讓我莫不著頭腦。

eng: Tom fell asleep with his clothes on.
I like you.
I want to clean the house before my parents come.
simp: 我想在我父母来之前收拾干净屋子。
trad: 我想在我父母來之前收拾幹凈屋子。

eng: Apart from some fruit, he hasn't eaten anything.
simp: 除了水果，他什么都没吃。
trad: 除了水果，他什麼都沒吃。

eng: This saying suddenly became popular.
simp: 这个说法一下子就流行开来了。
trad: 這個說法一下子就流行開來了。

eng: I'm already able to write Chinese characters.
What are you punishing them for?
Why are you visiting the United Kingdom?
Science begins when you ask why and how.
simp: 为何如何？你疑问的当下就是科学的开端。
trad: 為何如何？你疑問的當下就是科學的開端。

eng: Why are your ears so big?
simp: 为什麽你的耳朵这麽大？
trad: 為什麼你的耳朵這麼大？

eng: You can't equate nationalism with fascism.
simp: 你不能将民族主义与法西斯溷为一谈。
trad: 你不能將民族主義與法西斯混為一談。

eng: Nashi are tinned in this factory.
simp: 水梨在这家工厂进行装罐。
trad: 水梨在這家工廠進行裝罐。

eng: Some people are difficult to please.
We speak the same language, don't we?
simp: 我们说的是同样的语言，不是吗？
trad: 我們說的是同樣的語言，不是嗎？

eng: Bright ideas never occur to me.
simp: 我总想不出什麽好点子。
trad: 我總想不出什麼好點子。

eng: You have a point there.
Tom sold Mary his car.
simp: 汤姆把他的汽车卖给了玛丽。
trad: 湯姆把他的汽車賣給了瑪麗。

eng: He is very busy writing stories.
He lived here for a time.
simp: 他在这儿住了有一段时间了。
trad: 他在這兒住了有一段時間了。

eng: The doctor called him back.
It cost him 50 dollars to rent a car in Hawaii.
simp: 他花了50美元在夏威夷租了一辆汽车。
trad: 他花了50美元在夏威夷租了一輛汽車。

eng: I am not acquainted with her.
It's a waste of time and money.
simp: 这是在浪费时间和金钱。
trad: 這是在浪費時間和金錢。

eng: Their traditional life style no longer exists.
simp: 他们传统的生活方式不再存在。
trad: 他們傳統的生活方式不再存在。

eng: Answer my question carefully.
I can't believe that you were the smartest kid in your class.
simp: 我不敢相信你是你们班里面最聪明的孩子。
trad: 我不敢相信你是你們班裏面最聰明的孩子。

eng: There are fifty members in this club.
simp: 这个俱乐部里有50个会员。
trad: 這個俱樂部裏有50個會員。

eng: I deeply appreciate your advice and kindness.
simp: 我深深地感激你的建议和好心。
trad: 我深深地感激你的建議和好心。

eng: I don't know what you mean.
It is close to eleven. It's about time we went to bed.
simp: 快11点了。我们该上床睡觉了。
trad: 快11點了。我們該上床睡覺了。

eng: There is no admission fee for children under five.
simp: 五岁以下的小孩票价全面。
trad: 五歲以下的小孩票價全面。

eng: What would you do if you had ten thousand dollars?
simp: 如果你有一万美元，你想做什么呢？
trad: 如果你有一萬美元，你想做什麼呢？

eng: It was Mr. Smith that taught me how to use that machine.
simp: 是史密斯先生教我使用那台机器的。
trad: 是史密斯先生教我使用那臺機器的。

eng: This is a problem you have to solve by yourself.
simp: 这是一个你必须自己解决的问题。
trad: 這是一個你必須自己解決的問題。

eng: There are subtle differences between the two pictures.
simp: 这两张图片之间有细致的差异。
trad: 這兩張圖片之間有細致的差異。

eng: There is a castle in the background of the picture.
simp: 图片的背景是一座城堡。
trad: 圖片的背景是一座城堡。

eng: Please wait for me at the entrance of the building.
simp: 请在建筑的入口处等我。
trad: 請在建築的入口處等我。

eng: One hundred and fifty people entered the marathon race.
Having met the girl before, I recognized her at once.
simp: 因为曾遇见过那个女孩，我马上就认出来了。
trad: 因為曾遇見過那個女孩，我馬上就認出來了。

eng: You'll have three relationships before you meet your true soulmate.
simp: 应该要经历三段感情才能遇到真命天子。
trad: 應該要經歷三段感情才能遇到真命天子。

eng: I may be antisocial, but it doesn't mean I don't talk to people.
simp: 我或许不善于社交,但这并不意味我不和别人交谈。
trad: 我或許不善於社交,但這並不意味我不和別人交談。

eng: That is intriguing.
I went on reading.
You deserve to succeed.
I met a friend.
When I call on you, I'll let you know in advance.
simp: 我若拜访你，会让你提前知道的。
trad: 我若拜訪你，會讓你提前知道的。

eng: Everyone will accept that idea in principle.
simp: 每个人都将在原则上同意那个想法。
trad: 每個人都將在原則上同意那個想法。

eng: Tom is afraid of heights.
She's my daughter.
Do it as soon as possible.
I saw him playing baseball.
Choose a book carefully.
Do you like this book?
Which countries have you visited?
She might know that we are here.
simp: 她或许知道我们在这儿。
trad: 她或許知道我們在這兒。

eng: She loves chocolate, too.
Tom hasn't talked to Mary in years.
simp: 汤姆多年没有和玛丽说话了。
trad: 湯姆多年沒有和瑪麗說話了。

eng: What you said is not true.
Ellen was so tired that she went to bed early.
simp: 艾伦太累了，于是早早地上床睡觉了。
trad: 艾倫太累了，於是早早地上床睡覺了。

eng: Diligence is absent from his character.
simp: 他的字典里没有勤奋这个词。
trad: 他的字典裏沒有勤奮這個詞。

eng: She doesn't have any friends.
I do not know how to use it.
Let's take a break now.
simp: 现在，让我们休息一会儿吧。
trad: 現在，讓我們休息一會兒吧。

eng: I speak Swedish.
I sure hope this is a dream.
simp: 我当然希望这是一个梦。
trad: 我當然希望這是一個夢。

eng: By the time that he tried 966, Dima was beginning to give up hope.
simp: 当迪马尝试了打九六六的时候， 他开始了放弃希望。
trad: 當迪馬嘗試了打九六六的時候， 他開始了放棄希望。

eng: I learn the language by myself.
I haven't met her.
The city has a large population.
This is the worst book I've ever read.
simp: 这是我读过的书里面写的最差的一本了。
trad: 這是我讀過的書裏面寫的最差的一本了。

eng: Green stands for hope.
I have ten pens more than you do.
Do you think that he is equal to the task?
simp: 你认为他能够胜任这个任务吗?
trad: 你認為他能夠勝任這個任務嗎?

eng: I don't feel like studying English today.
I can't face this life alone.
simp: 我无法独自面对这种生活。
trad: 我無法獨自面對這種生活。

eng: Tom deserves to be blamed.
He often sits by me and listens to music.
simp: 他经常坐在我旁边听音乐。
trad: 他經常坐在我旁邊聽音樂。

eng: I wish I could go to the party with you.
simp: 我希望我能和你一起参加派对。
trad: 我希望我能和你一起參加派對。

eng: He is very young.
She is much younger than Tom.
I hope to see you this Friday.
They can speak English.
I can speak Spanish.
He likes tea.
His speech moved us.
He attributed his success to good luck.
simp: 他把他的成功归功于好运。
trad: 他把他的成功歸功於好運。

eng: He attributes his success to good luck.
simp: 他将他的成功归功于好运。
trad: 他將他的成功歸功於好運。

eng: I don't mind if it's a little cold.
I don't care if it's a bit cold.
I don't mind if it's hot.
I don't mind if the weather is hot.
You can buy stamps at any post office.
simp: 你在任何一家邮局都能买到邮票。
trad: 你在任何一家郵局都能買到郵票。

eng: Don't let your feelings show.
I'll show you how to catch fish.
simp: 我会向你展示怎样捕鱼。
trad: 我會向你展示怎樣捕魚。

eng: I couldn't find it anywhere.
simp: 我在任何地方都没能找到。
trad: 我在任何地方都沒能找到。

eng: Do you know when they will arrive?
simp: 你知道他们什么时候到吗？
trad: 你知道他們什麼時候到嗎？

eng: Do you know when they will arrive? "At eleven-thirty this evening."
simp: 你知道他们什么时候到吗？ 今晚11点半。
trad: 你知道他們什麼時候到嗎？ 今晚11點半。

eng: Ask me something easier.
Why are you busy today?
How soon will the meeting begin?
It looks like an apple.
If it looks like an apple and it tastes like an apple, it's probably an apple.
simp: 如果看起来像个苹果而且吃起来也像苹果的话，可能就是苹果。
trad: 如果看起來像個蘋果而且吃起來也像蘋果的話，可能就是蘋果。

eng: Tom's dog bit him playfully.
He was late for the 7:30 bus.
I've always wanted to climb Mt. Fuji.
Tom pretended to not hear a thing.
Open your eyes, please.
Keep your mouth shut and your eyes open.
Open your mouth and close your eyes.
Keep your eyes closed until I tell you to open them.
simp: 闭着你的眼睛直到我告诉你睁开为止。
trad: 閉著你的眼睛直到我告訴你睜開為止。

eng: Keep your eyes wide open!
You must keep your eyes open.
I enjoyed talking with him at the party.
simp: 聚会上我和他谈得很愉快。
trad: 聚會上我和他談得很愉快。

eng: I enjoyed talking with him.
He's had many unhappy experiences.
simp: 他有许多不愉快的经历。
trad: 他有許多不愉快的經歷。

eng: How well do you know Tom?
Do you know Tom well?
Someone is knocking on the door.
He and his companion asked me to come along with them.
simp: 他和他的伙伴让我跟他们一起去。
trad: 他和他的夥伴讓我跟他們一起去。

eng: Come along with me and go fishing.
Of course I accepted his offer of support.
simp: 当然我接受了他的支援请求。
trad: 當然我接受了他的支援請求。

eng: Of course you'll catch a cold if you fall asleep under the kotatsu. You have to learn to take care of yourself.
simp: 如果你睡在kotatsu下当然会感冒。你要学会照顾好自己。
trad: 如果你睡在kotatsu下當然會感冒。你要學會照顧好自己。

eng: I'm sorry I don't agree with you on that matter.
simp: 很抱歉那个问题我不赞成你。
trad: 很抱歉那個問題我不贊成你。

eng: Let me tell you the reasons that I don't agree with you.
simp: 让我来告诉你我不赞成你的理由。
trad: 讓我來告訴你我不贊成你的理由。

eng: I don't agree with you smoking.
I don't agree with you on this point.
To tell the truth, I don't agree with you.
She warned him not to go out at night alone.
simp: 她警告他晚上不要一个人出去。
trad: 她警告他晚上不要一個人出去。

eng: He appears to be strong and healthy.
Don't leave the TV on.
Eat your soup before it gets cold.
Have you already eaten supper?
This is my business address.
Tom doesn't like me.
She doesn't have a driver's license.
Do you think I'm crazy?
We were nearly frozen to death.
I don't want to go there. He doesn't want to go either.
simp: 我不想去那儿，他也不想。
trad: 我不想去那兒，他也不想。

eng: Drunk driving is a serious problem.
I had no trouble finding his office.
simp: 我毫不费劲就找到他的公司。
trad: 我毫不費勁就找到他的公司。

eng: Would you lend me a pencil?
We should always obey laws.
May I put it down here?
simp: 我可以把它放在这儿吗？
trad: 我可以把它放在這兒嗎？

eng: Could I borrow a pencil?
Mary is very attached to the little girl.
simp: 玛莉很喜欢那个小女孩。
trad: 瑪莉很喜歡那個小女孩。

eng: Betty White is very popular with Americans.
simp: Betty White 很受美国人欢迎。
trad: Betty White 很受美國人歡迎。

eng: The burglar gained access to the house through this door.
simp: 窃贼是从这扇门进到屋子裡的。
trad: 竊賊是從這扇門進到屋子裡的。

eng: The rumor is believed to be true.
simp: 这则谣言令人信以为真。
trad: 這則謠言令人信以為真。

eng: So I stopped reading.
Tom said that he didn't want to see or speak to anyone.
simp: Tom 说他不想看到或跟任何人交谈。
trad: Tom 說他不想看到或跟任何人交談。

eng: Tom came to Japan for the first time when he was three.
simp: Tom 在三岁的时候第一次来日本。
trad: Tom 在三歲的時候第一次來日本。

eng: He was slightly injured in a traffic accident.
simp: 他在车祸事故中只受了轻伤。
trad: 他在車禍事故中只受了輕傷。

eng: I'm afraid I cannot make myself understood in English.
simp: 我怕我的英文无人能理解。
trad: 我怕我的英文無人能理解。

eng: He missed the train by a minute.
simp: 他差一分钟就能赶上火车。
trad: 他差一分鐘就能趕上火車。

eng: I want to say goodbye.
I already know what you want!
simp: 我已经知道你想要什么！
trad: 我已經知道你想要什麼！

eng: He will come tomorrow.
You have three cats.
Where is your house?
Where is your house?
Where is your house?
I have three cousins.
She won everything.
He won everything.
It is easy to read this book.
I live in Milan.
December has thirty-one days.
Without a doubt!
She asked him questions.
I smell gas.
I want a sword!
We are good friends.
His book is very interesting.
Her book is very interesting.
Are you busy at work?
Do you have younger brothers?
He is a student, he studies Chinese at the Università degli Studi di Parma.
simp: 他是学生，他在帕尔玛大学学中文。
trad: 他是學生，他在帕爾瑪大學學中文。

eng: Why don't you take a break?
Let me introduce it.
The train is arriving!
She loves to read Chinese books.
If and only if the ice-cream is vanilla flavour will Xiao Wang eat it.
simp: 当且仅当冰淇淋是香草口味，小王会吃这个冰淇淋。
trad: 當且僅當冰淇淋是香草口味，小王會吃這個冰淇淋。

eng: I was able to help her.
How was your summer vacation?
I love the trunk.
No context, no text.
simp: 没有上下文就没有词义。
trad: 沒有上下文就沒有詞義。

eng: You can take a horse to water, but you can't make him drink.
simp: 你可以把马带到河边可是不能迫它喝水。
trad: 你可以把馬帶到河邊可是不能迫它喝水。

eng: Her daughter has become a beautiful woman.
simp: 她的女儿已经变成一个漂亮的女人。
trad: 她的女兒已經變成一個漂亮的女人。

eng: There is no water.
My cat is mad.
The boy has learned to read.
I log in to Tatoeba once a week.
simp: 我每周登录 tatoeba 一次。
trad: 我每周登錄 tatoeba 一次。

eng: I am not certain about that.
I am playing volleyball now.
I arrived at school on time.
I bought it for ten dollars.
I crossed the river by boat.
I didn't catch what he said.
I don't go to school by bus.
I don't know either of them.
simp: 他们中的任何一位我都不认识。
trad: 他們中的任何一位我都不認識。

eng: I don't want either of them.
Get out! I don't want to talk to you!
I don't want to talk to you.
I feel like going on a trip.
I fell asleep while reading.
While I was reading in bed last night, I fell asleep with the light on.
simp: 我昨晚在床上看书的时候点着灯就睡了。
trad: 我昨晚在床上看書的時候點著燈就睡了。

eng: I found the boy fast asleep.
simp: 我发觉男孩儿酣然入睡了。
trad: 我發覺男孩兒酣然入睡了。

eng: I have been to the barber's.
Where have you been? "I've been to the barber's."
simp: 你去哪儿了？我去了理发店。
trad: 你去哪兒了？我去了理發店。

eng: I have nothing better to do.
simp: 我没有其他更好的事情去做。
trad: 我沒有其他更好的事情去做。

eng: I haven't seen you for ages. Do you remember when I saw you last?
simp: 好久不见了。记得上次我什么时候看见你的吗？
trad: 好久不見了。記得上次我什麼時候看見你的嗎？

eng: I lent my friend some money.
I must help her at any cost.
simp: 我必须不惜一切代价帮助她。
trad: 我必須不惜一切代價幫助她。

eng: I need someone to talk with.
I need to search for my pen.
I only took a bite of bread.
I play tennis an hour a day.
I saw a strange woman there.
simp: 我看见一位陌生女人在那儿。
trad: 我看見一位陌生女人在那兒。

eng: I should not have said that.
I slipped the letter to him.
I stayed up late last night.
I stayed up till very late last night.
I think he's a great writer.
simp: 我认为他是位伟大的作家。
trad: 我認為他是位偉大的作家。

eng: He's not such a great writer and I think he knows it.
simp: 他不是那么出色的作家我想他知道这一点。
trad: 他不是那麼出色的作家我想他知道這一點。

eng: I threw a stone at the bird.
simp: 我扔了块石头打向鸟儿。
trad: 我扔了塊石頭打向鳥兒。

eng: I want to learn how to swim.
I've always wanted to learn how to swim.
simp: 我一直想学习如何游泳。
trad: 我一直想學習如何遊泳。

eng: I want to visit Korea.
I was born on April 3, 1950.
I will not attend the party.
I will not see him any more.
I'd like to join your group.
I'd like to see your sister.
I'll act as a guide for you.
I'll be back by six o'clock.
I'll be back in ten minutes.
I'll be seventeen next year.
I'll buy a watch for my son.
I'll have to think about it.
I'll see you next Wednesday.
I'll try my best today, too.
I'm afraid I have to go now.
I'm going to propose to her.
I'm looking over his report.
I'm seeing her this evening.
I'm starting to dislike her.
I'm used to staying up late at night.
I'm just worried about my weight.
I'm worried about my weight.
Is there a cat on the table?
It happened a long time ago.
simp: 这事发生在很多年以前。
trad: 這事發生在很多年以前。

eng: It is a nice view from here.
It's boring to stay at home.
Let's start with Lesson Ten.
In the morning, I write in the park.
simp: 我每天早上在公园写作。
trad: 我每天早上在公園寫作。

eng: What did she buy at the shop?
Did you buy it on the black market?
I'm a loser.
He's so tall!
I've got a feeling that Tom won't graduate this year.
simp: 我觉得汤姆今年不会毕业。
trad: 我覺得湯姆今年不會畢業。

eng: I was thinking that I would go there by bicycle, but it began to rain.
simp: 刚想骑单车去，却下起雨了。
trad: 剛想騎單車去，卻下起雨了。

eng: The lamp was suspended from the branch of a tree.
Why are you speaking loudly?
Not only you but also I was involved.
simp: 不止你， 连我也被牵连了。
trad: 不止你， 連我也被牽連了。

eng: I'll never leave you.
Why are you worrying about something that doesn't matter so much?
simp: 你为甚麽要为这种无关重要的事情忧心呢？
trad: 你為甚麼要為這種無關重要的事情憂心呢？

eng: At first, I thought he was your brother.
simp: 我起初以为他是你哥哥。
trad: 我起初以為他是你哥哥。

eng: At first, I thought he was your brother.
simp: 我起初以为他是你弟弟。
trad: 我起初以為他是你弟弟。

eng: I was very tired, so I fell asleep right away.
simp: 我累得很，所以马上就睡着了。
trad: 我累得很，所以馬上就睡著了。

eng: We plan to go hiking tomorrow.
More and more married couples share household chores.
simp: 夫妻分担家务的情况愈来愈普遍。
trad: 夫妻分擔家務的情況愈來愈普遍。

eng: He really likes music a lot.
He started to speak English.
He threw a stone at the dog.
He told me his life's story.
simp: 他跟我讲了他的人生故事。
trad: 他跟我講了他的人生故事。

eng: He was standing at the door.
He went to London via Paris.
He's always been kind to me.
His advice didn't help much.
simp: 他的忠告没起到太大的作用。
trad: 他的忠告沒起到太大的作用。

eng: How do you account for that?
How do you account for that?
How many books does he have?
How old do you think she is?
How old do you think Tom is?
I agree with you absolutely.
I am dying for a cold drink.
Has she ever fallen in love?
He accomplished his mission.
He arrived after I had left.
He can pull strings for you.
He did not know what to say.
He doesn't always come late.
He doesn't have any friends.
He doesn't have any friends to play with.
He flew a kite with his son.
simp: 他和他的儿子放风筝了。
trad: 他和他的兒子放風箏了。

eng: He got engaged to my cousin.
simp: 他和我的堂姊妹订婚了。
trad: 他和我的堂姊妹訂婚了。

eng: He had barely enough to eat.
He has more books than I do.
He is an old friend of mine.
He is still very much alive.
Although old, he is still very much alive.
simp: 虽然上了年纪,他依旧充满活力。
trad: 雖然上了年紀,他依舊充滿活力。

eng: He is unfit to be a teacher.
He likes to read newspapers.
He looks like an honest man.
We need food, clothes and a home in order to live.
simp: 食物、衣服和住所都是生活的必需品。
trad: 食物、衣服和住所都是生活的必需品。

eng: I didn't have the courage to tell her the truth.
simp: 我没有勇气把事实告诉她。
trad: 我沒有勇氣把事實告訴她。

eng: I'd just woken up and was still drowsy.
simp: 我那时刚刚起床，还迷迷煳煳的。
trad: 我那時剛剛起床，還迷迷糊糊的。

eng: These cotton socks bear washing well.
She took no notice of what her father said.
simp: 她把她父亲的话都当成了耳边风。
trad: 她把她父親的話都當成了耳邊風。

eng: I hope we don't have to wait for too long.
simp: 希望我们不需要等太久。
trad: 希望我們不需要等太久。

eng: She waited and waited, but he never returned.
simp: 她等了又等，但他始终未有回来。
trad: 她等了又等，但他始終未有回來。

eng: I felt the house shake.
He scrunched down in his seat so that I wouldn't see him.
simp: 他不想让我见到他，于是便在位子里缩作了一团。
trad: 他不想讓我見到他，於是便在位子裏縮作了一團。

eng: He studies hardest of all the students.
simp: 他是众多学生之中最勤奋用功的一个。
trad: 他是眾多學生之中最勤奮用功的一個。

eng: It is an advantage to be able to use a computer.
simp: 懂得用电脑是一种优势。
trad: 懂得用電腦是一種優勢。

eng: He never fails to write to his parents once a month.
simp: 他每个月都会写一封信给他的父母，风雨不改。
trad: 他每個月都會寫一封信給他的父母，風雨不改。

eng: Father took us to the zoo yesterday.
simp: 爸爸昨天带了我们去动物园。
trad: 爸爸昨天帶了我們去動物園。

eng: My father has lived in Nagoya for 30 years.
simp: 我父亲在名古屋已经住了三十年了。
trad: 我父親在名古屋已經住了三十年了。

eng: If you want to learn a language well, learn it yourself.
simp: 语言一定要自学才会学得好。
trad: 語言一定要自學才會學得好。

eng: She is getting breakfast ready.
On the plate was a piece of chicken, a potato and some green peas.
simp: 盘子上盛着一块鸡肉、一块马铃薯和一些青豆。
trad: 盤子上盛著一塊雞肉、一塊馬鈴薯和一些青豆。

eng: This is a useful book and, what is more, it is not expensive.
simp: 这本书很实用，而且价钱也很相宜。
trad: 這本書很實用，而且價錢也很相宜。

eng: It fell upon me to take care of my mother.
simp: 照顾母亲的责任落在了我身上。
trad: 照顧母親的責任落在了我身上。

eng: Whatever language you study, it takes time.
simp: 学习语言永远不是一朝一夕的事。
trad: 學習語言永遠不是一朝一夕的事。

eng: Why are men never happy? Because they always want the impossible.
simp: 人为甚麽永远不会满足？因为他们总想得到不可能得到的东西。
trad: 人為甚麼永遠不會滿足？因為他們總想得到不可能得到的東西。

eng: To hide the fact that she's a princess, she disguised herself as a boy and escaped the palace.
simp: 她为了掩饰自己公主的身份，女扮男装，逃出了皇宫。
trad: 她為了掩飾自己公主的身份，女扮男裝，逃出了皇宮。

eng: I wrote a letter last night.
We have got two daughters and two sons.
simp: 我们有两个女儿和两个儿子。
trad: 我們有兩個女兒和兩個兒子。

eng: He is enjoying his school life.
simp: 他很享受他的校园生活。
trad: 他很享受他的校園生活。

eng: I promise you I won't ever leave you.
simp: 我答应你我永远不会离开你。
trad: 我答應你我永遠不會離開你。

eng: She has an encyclopedic knowledge of cooking.
simp: 她是一部活生生的厨艺百科全书。
trad: 她是一部活生生的廚藝百科全書。

eng: They worked together to put out the fire.
simp: 他们同心协力地把火扑熄了。
trad: 他們同心協力地把火撲熄了。

eng: My boss has the ability to read books very fast.
simp: 我的老闆看书可以看得很快。
trad: 我的老闆看書可以看得很快。

eng: If I win the lottery, I'll be able to live high on the hog.
simp: 如果我中了彩劵，就一辈子衣食无忧了。
trad: 如果我中了彩劵，就一輩子衣食無憂了。

eng: She hid behind the door and held her breath.
simp: 她屏着气息，躲了在门的后面。
trad: 她屏著氣息，躲了在門的後面。

eng: He cannot afford to buy a car.
He gave her a peck on the cheek.
simp: 他在她的脸上轻轻的亲了一下。
trad: 他在她的臉上輕輕的親了一下。

eng: Language is peculiar to man.
No comment.
This game is based on a novel.
simp: 这款游戏基于一本小说。
trad: 這款遊戲基於一本小說。

eng: You shouldn't share too much private information on the social networks.
simp: 你不应该在社交网络上分享过多私人信息。
trad: 你不應該在社交網絡上分享過多私人信息。

eng: She can't write or read.
Not every child likes apples.
simp: 不是每一个孩子喜欢吃苹果。
trad: 不是每一個孩子喜歡吃蘋果。

eng: We are happy to see you again.
simp: 我们很高兴再次见到你。
trad: 我們很高興再次見到你。

eng: Languages aren't his forte.
The popular singer committed suicide.
His voice is pleasant to listen to.
His voice is pleasant to listen to.
The largest bedroom faces south.
He has a nice income.
He sang while working.
He can't seem to understand that poem.
simp: 他似乎无法理解那首诗。
trad: 他似乎無法理解那首詩。

eng: What is the total amount of money you spent?
Tom doesn't have a ticket for tonight's concert.
simp: 汤姆没有今晚音乐会的门票。
trad: 湯姆沒有今晚音樂會的門票。

eng: Memorising the cards in a deck in order is certainly a difficult task, but manageable.
simp: 把一叠扑克牌的排列次序背熟，虽然绝不是一件易事，却也不是没有可能的。
trad: 把一疊撲克牌的排列次序背熟，雖然絕不是一件易事，卻也不是沒有可能的。

eng: The initiative measurably improved quality of life for the villagers.
simp: 计划使村民的生活改善了不少。
trad: 計劃使村民的生活改善了不少。

eng: I would like to learn how to dance.
You're the only one who can help me.
simp: 你是唯一一个能够帮我的人。
trad: 你是唯一一個能夠幫我的人。

eng: They supplied us with food.
simp: 他们为我们提供了食物。
trad: 他們為我們提供了食物。

eng: He could be found at 6 o'clock every morning in the barn, milking the cows.
simp: 他每天早上六点都会在牲口棚给母牛挤牛奶。
trad: 他每天早上六點都會在牲口棚給母牛擠牛奶。

eng: He has impeccable manners, which means you can never be sure what he actually thinks!
simp: 他是一个极有礼貌的人 ﹣ 也就是说，他内心的想法永远没有人能看得穿！
trad: 他是一個極有禮貌的人 ﹣ 也就是說，他內心的想法永遠沒有人能看得穿！

eng: What kind of movie do you want to watch?
simp: 你想看甚麽类型的电影？
trad: 你想看甚麼類型的電影？

eng: A good idea occurred to me last night.
simp: 我昨晚想到了一个好点子。
trad: 我昨晚想到了一個好點子。

eng: The sky grew darker and darker.
All humanity will suffer if a nuclear war breaks out.
simp: 一旦爆发核战争，受苦的将会是全人类。
trad: 一旦爆發核戰爭，受苦的將會是全人類。

eng: How can you be so indifferent to your wife's trouble?
simp: 你妻子遇上麻烦，你怎麽还一副事不关己，己不劳心的样子？
trad: 你妻子遇上麻煩，你怎麼還一副事不關己，己不勞心的樣子？

eng: Look! The train has arrived!
Japan has an economy that is supported by hard-working company employees in big cities.
simp: 日本的经济是由一群勤奋工作的大城市上班族支撑起的。
trad: 日本的經濟是由一群勤奮工作的大城市上班族支撐起的。

eng: These students work hard, but it's not that much efficient.
simp: 这些学生很努力，但效率不太高。
trad: 這些學生很努力，但效率不太高。

eng: Good medicine is bitter.
Doctors refused to perform a second operation.
simp: 医生们拒绝做第二次手术。
trad: 醫生們拒絕做第二次手術。

eng: Are there French speakers in Canada?
simp: 在加拿大有人说法语吗？
trad: 在加拿大有人說法語嗎？

eng: I asked him if he knew her address.
simp: 我问他是否知道她的住址。
trad: 我問他是否知道她的住址。

eng: The town is situated 1,500 meters above sea level.
I was at home then.
Can you give me a discount?
He died recently.
Our school's principal is very old.
The teacher told Mary to shut up.
My uncle's company launched a new product last month.
simp: 舅舅的公司上个月推出了一项新产品。
trad: 舅舅的公司上個月推出了一項新產品。

eng: Obey your teachers.
Who will be elected chairman?
Where are you now?
Too much humility is pride.
She lives in London.
He was alone at the time.
Do not drink beer before going to bed.
Are you busy now?
Are you busy now?
Are you busy now?
The big fire reduced the whole town to ashes.
simp: 那场大火把整个小镇烧成了灰烬。
trad: 那場大火把整個小鎮燒成了灰燼。

eng: He is anything but a gentleman.
John felt the presence of a ghost in the dark room.
simp: 约翰感觉到那黑漆漆的房间里有鬼。
trad: 約翰感覺到那黑漆漆的房間裏有鬼。

eng: Wine helps digest food.
Do you really want to see a French film?
simp: 你想看法国电影，真的吗？
trad: 你想看法國電影，真的嗎？

eng: Should I take this medicine?
It's against the rules to smoke at the office.
simp: 在办公室吸烟违背我们的原则。
trad: 在辦公室吸煙違背我們的原則。

eng: I like tennis.
Please stop crying.
She is Russian.
You must reboot your computer.
simp: 你必须重新启动你的电脑。
trad: 你必須重新啟動你的電腦。

eng: I hate it when my clothes smell of smoke.
simp: 我讨厌我的衣服有烟味。
trad: 我討厭我的衣服有煙味。

eng: I have been obsessed with French recently.
They like to sing.
I can speak Chinese, but I can't read it.
simp: 我会说中文，但是我不会读中文。
trad: 我會說中文，但是我不會讀中文。

eng: The reason is because I can speak Chinese.
I can speak Chinese.
See you next week.
This idea is a misperception, and makes no sense.
simp: 这个看法是个错觉，并且没道理。
trad: 這個看法是個錯覺，並且沒道理。

eng: America has the world’s largest economy, and its army is the most powerful.
simp: 美国是世界最大的经济体并拥有最强的军队。
trad: 美國是世界最大的經濟體並擁有最強的軍隊。

eng: I’d certainly like to go and watch a film, but I’m not sure if I have time.
simp: 我倒是很想去看电影，可是不知道有没有时间。
trad: 我倒是很想去看電影，可是不知道有沒有時間。

eng: She’s a foreigner, but speaks Chinese excellently.
simp: 她是外国人，不过她中文说得非常好。
trad: 她是外國人，不過她中文說得非常好。

eng: We ordered the products on time. However, they won’t be dispatched until next month.
simp: 我们按时预定了产品。然而，要到下个月后才能发货。
trad: 我們按時預定了產品。然而，要到下個月後才能發貨。

eng: The city government wants to set up special cycle lanes. However, a lot of drivers oppose the idea.
simp: 市政府想建设专门的自行车道。但是，很多司机反对这个主意。
trad: 市政府想建設專門的自行車道。但是，很多司機反對這個主意。

eng: Usually I cycle or get the bus to work.
simp: 我通常骑自行车或乘公交车去上班。
trad: 我通常騎自行車或乘公交車去上班。

eng: Would you like to go for a drink or something to eat?
simp: 你想出去喝几杯或吃个饭吗？
trad: 你想出去喝幾杯或吃個飯嗎？

eng: Do you want to eat noodles or rice?
Let’s either speak Chinese, or not speak at all.
simp: 咱们要么说汉语，要么就别说话。
trad: 咱們要麼說漢語，要麼就別說話。

eng: Let’s drink wine or beer.
simp: 我们要么喝葡萄酒，要么喝啤酒。
trad: 我們要麼喝葡萄酒，要麼喝啤酒。

eng: Correlation does not imply causation.
simp: 相关关系不导致因果关系。
trad: 相關關系不導致因果關系。

eng: If you’re hungry, have something to eat.
If you like beer, you might like wine.
simp: 要是你喜欢啤酒，你可能喜欢葡萄酒。
trad: 要是你喜歡啤酒，你可能喜歡葡萄酒。

eng: If you don’t do more exercise, you’ll be unhealthy.
simp: 如果不多运动，你身体就不好。
trad: 如果不多運動，你身體就不好。

eng: If your visa expires, you must leave China.
simp: 如果签证过期，你就必须离开中国。
trad: 如果簽證過期，你就必須離開中國。

eng: If you’re going to be like this I’ll just leave.
If she didn’t see you then there’s nothing to worry about.
simp: 她没看到你的话就没有什么担心的。
trad: 她沒看到你的話就沒有什麼擔心的。

eng: If you go to Beijing, definitely have a look at Tiananmen Square.
simp: 要是去北京的话，一定要看一下天安门广场。
trad: 要是去北京的話，一定要看一下天安門廣場。

eng: Only if you study hard will you be able to get into university.
simp: 只有你好好学习才可以考得上大学。
trad: 只有你好好學習才可以考得上大學。

eng: You can only come to China if you’ve got a visa.
simp: 只有得了签证才可以来中国。
trad: 只有得了簽證才可以來中國。

eng: As long as you’ve prepared, you won’t have any problems.
simp: 只要你准备了，你就不会遇到问题。
trad: 只要你準備了，你就不會遇到問題。

eng: As long as good people do nothing, evil will triumph.
simp: 只要好人袖手旁观，恶人就会得胜。
trad: 只要好人袖手旁觀，惡人就會得勝。

eng: Unless there is reliable evidence for it, we should not believe anything.
simp: 除非有可靠的证据，我们不应该相信任何事。
trad: 除非有可靠的證據，我們不應該相信任何事。

eng: I won’t forgive you unless you apologise sincerely.
simp: 我不要原谅你，除非你真诚地抱歉。
trad: 我不要原諒你，除非你真誠地抱歉。

eng: You can come in if and only if you know our password.
simp: 当且仅当你知道我们的密码你才可以进来。
trad: 當且僅當你知道我們的密碼你才可以進來。

eng: A person is a bachelor if and only if that person is a marriageable man who has never married.
simp: 当且仅当一个人是个没有结婚并可以结婚的男人，那个人是个未娶。
trad: 當且僅當一個人是個沒有結婚並可以結婚的男人，那個人是個未娶。

eng: I think he's a man of ability.
simp: 我觉得他是一个有能力的人。
trad: 我覺得他是一個有能力的人。

eng: Some boats are on the lake.
The big cities are full of allurements.
I almost forgot it.
Today is my birthday.
My mobile has been stolen.
Am I in London?
This is your color!
I like curls.
I live in Tbilisi.
You blockhead!
I have a proposal.
Do the people of your country eat rice?
Water the flowers before you have breakfast.
He spent the night at his uncle's place.
Parents often sacrifice themselves to ensure that their children receive a good education.
simp: 父母为了确保孩子受到良好的教育常常牺牲自己。
trad: 父母為了確保孩子受到良好的教育常常犧牲自己。

eng: Please take the pillow and blanket and give them to me.
simp: 请把枕头和毯子拿给我。
trad: 請把枕頭和毯子拿給我。

eng: To err is to be human.
Letters from Fiona came gradually less and less.
simp: 费欧娜的来信渐渐减少了。
trad: 費歐娜的來信漸漸減少了。

eng: I'm out riding my bike.
I live here.
He's a very good teacher, so his children really listen to him.
simp: 他很会教育人所以他的孩子都很听话。
trad: 他很會教育人所以他的孩子都很聽話。

eng: My mother could speak five languages.
I can't visit you every day.
They have watched TV serials this evening.
simp: 他们今晚看了电视连续剧。
trad: 他們今晚看了電視連續劇。

eng: How far is it from here to the museum?
He doesn't look willing to come to the concert.
simp: 他好像不怎麽想来听音乐会。
trad: 他好像不怎麼想來聽音樂會。

eng: The car continued to put on speed.
The Swiss keyboard doesn't have a ß.
simp: 瑞士的键盘没有「ß」这个符号。
trad: 瑞士的鍵盤沒有「ß」這個符號。

eng: A fortune teller once told Christopher Columbus that he would become a famous man. Columbus, in turn, got angry and demanded his money back - claiming that even a child could state something so obvious.
simp: 从前有个占卜师告诉哥伦布他将来会成名。哥伦布听到了，就生气地要求退钱：「这麽简单的事实，就连三岁小孩也懂！」
trad: 從前有個占蔔師告訴哥倫布他將來會成名。哥倫布聽到了，就生氣地要求退錢：「這麼簡單的事實，就連三歲小孩也懂！」

eng: There were many children in the room.
He was a great teacher so his children were very obedient.
simp: 他很会教育人所以他的孩子都很听话.
trad: 他很會教育人所以他的孩子都很聽話.

eng: The box is empty.
Do you have enough money?
He even called me an idiot.
I don't have friends to play with.
Spring has come.
He has been secretly in love with her.
It is said that Peng Zu was the grandson of a celestial emperor.
simp: 传说彭祖是天帝的孙子。
trad: 傳說彭祖是天帝的孫子。

eng: I have no books to read.
He is a painter, but he can't paint in the traditional Chinese style.
simp: 他是个画家，但他不会画国画。
trad: 他是個畫家，但他不會畫國畫。

eng: This is a present for you.
The train was so crowded that I had to stand all the way.
simp: 火车拥挤极了，我整趟车程都没有位子坐。
trad: 火車擁擠極了，我整趟車程都沒有位子坐。

eng: Things change from time to time, and one should change with them.
simp: 世事变幻无常，人不能因循守旧、一成不变。
trad: 世事變幻無常，人不能因循守舊、一成不變。

eng: Are you in a good mood?
No one is more hardworking than you all.
How did you reply?
At worst, I will get an average mark.
simp: 再不济我也能拿个平均分。
trad: 再不濟我也能拿個平均分。

eng: Do you want to eat?
Her house is across the river.
Tom didn't know that Mary liked to cook.
simp: 汤姆之前不知道玛丽喜欢做饭。
trad: 湯姆之前不知道瑪麗喜歡做飯。

eng: How long have you been doing this?
We've lost 3 to 0.
I forgot to call him today.
simp: 我今天忘记给他打电话了。
trad: 我今天忘記給他打電話了。

eng: Like any company, we've got to look ahead and plan for the future.
simp: 和其他公司一样，我们得向前看，规划好未来。
trad: 和其他公司一樣，我們得向前看，規劃好未來。

eng: They stopped talking.
Please remember me to all your family.
The lesson of history is always that things have been otherwise in different times and places and thus could now be otherwise as well.
simp: 历史课总是根据时间和地点的差异在不同情况下显示出不同的结论，即便是现在发生的也可能是相反的。
trad: 歷史課總是根據時間和地點的差異在不同情況下顯示出不同的結論，即便是現在發生的也可能是相反的。

eng: You will exist but you will never know what it is to live.
simp: 你活着，但是却不知道为什么活着。
trad: 你活著，但是卻不知道為什麼活著。

eng: To make matters worse, he isn't even conscious of annoying his neighbors.
simp: 让事情更糟糕的是，他没有注意到他打扰到了邻居。
trad: 讓事情更糟糕的是，他沒有註意到他打擾到了鄰居。

eng: This is because you approach everything as a total person, with no loose ends hanging out to signify divided intentions.
simp: 这是因为你总是全身心处理每一件事情，没有让鸡毛蒜皮的问题分散了你的目标。
trad: 這是因為你總是全身心處理每一件事情，沒有讓雞毛蒜皮的問題分散了你的目標。

eng: They still attacked us, despite clearly agreeing to sign the non-agression pact.
simp: 明明签订了互不侵犯条约，竟然还来攻击我们。
trad: 明明簽訂了互不侵犯條約，竟然還來攻擊我們。

eng: The Oscar ceremonies are Hollywood's biggest extravaganza.
simp: 奥斯卡颁奖典礼，是好莱坞最盛大的活动。
trad: 奧斯卡頒獎典禮，是好萊塢最盛大的活動。

eng: This is the room where the body was found.
simp: 这就是发现尸体的房间。
trad: 這就是發現屍體的房間。

eng: I wish you were close to me.
My premonition turned out to be right.
simp: 我的预感被证明是正确的。
trad: 我的預感被證明是正確的。

eng: Thousands of people lost their jobs.
She's still dependent on her parents.
simp: 她现在依然依靠父母生活。
trad: 她現在依然依靠父母生活。

eng: His pictures were hung on the wall.
I think you should take the test again.
simp: 我的意见是，你该再次参加测试。
trad: 我的意見是，你該再次參加測試。

eng: The committee meets twice a month.
simp: 委员会一个月召开两次。
trad: 委員會一個月召開兩次。

eng: You want to leave it like that?
How many students are there in your school?
Let's have our composition corrected by the teacher.
simp: 让我们把作文交给老师批改吧。
trad: 讓我們把作文交給老師批改吧。

eng: They were very excited.
This guidebook might be of use to you on your trip.
simp: 这本导游册子或许会对你的旅行有帮助。
trad: 這本導遊冊子或許會對你的旅行有幫助。

eng: I had great admiration for his generosity.
simp: 我很钦佩他的慷慨大方。
trad: 我很欽佩他的慷慨大方。

eng: I love to travel abroad.
Hi, I have an appointment with the general manager. This is my interview notice.
simp: 您好，我跟总经理有约十点见面，这是我的面试通知。
trad: 您好，我跟總經理有約十點見面，這是我的面試通知。

eng: I'm not afraid of facing pressure. When problems arise, I will quickly think of ways to find the solutions.
simp: 我不怕面对压力,有问题的时候,我就会很快地想办法去解决
trad: 我不怕面對壓力,有問題的時候,我就會很快地想辦法去解決

eng: If you are patient in one moment of anger, you will escape a hundred days of sorrow.
simp: 忍一时,风平浪静. 让一步, 海阔天空.
trad: 忍一時,風平浪靜. 讓一步, 海闊天空.

eng: Man must take a lesson from difficult situation and bad condition which befall in her/his life.
simp: 人要从狗勐酒酸的典故中吸取教训。
trad: 人要從狗猛酒酸的典故中吸取教訓。

eng: Magnanimity is a great treasure; harmonious affinity with others is wonderful, Detachment from name and gain averts trouble; happiness makes older people feel young.
Optimism is like the lamp of hope. Pessimism [or negativity] is like a drug of sorrow.
simp: 乐观如明灯,照亮希望的前程. 消极如毒品,腐蚀健康的心灵.
trad: 樂觀如明燈,照亮希望的前程. 消極如毒品,腐蝕健康的心靈.

eng: Beauty without bounty avails naught.
simp: 没有仁爱的美丽毫无用处
trad: 沒有仁愛的美麗毫無用處

eng: To speak without think is to shoot without look.
simp: 不思就说等于无的放矢。
trad: 不思就說等於無的放矢。

eng: A flattering friend is your worst enemy.
simp: 只会说好听话的朋友,是你最可怕的敌人.
trad: 只會說好聽話的朋友,是你最可怕的敵人.

eng: A friend in need is a friend indeed.
simp: 不能共患难的人, 不是真正的朋友
trad: 不能共患難的人, 不是真正的朋友

eng: If you have no character to lose, people will have no faith in you.
simp: 如果你没有尝试过失败的角色，那么人们也就不会相信你。
trad: 如果你沒有嘗試過失敗的角色，那麼人們也就不會相信你。

eng: He got married quickly.
I don't know what to say.
That will be funny.
I'm a little touched.
I love Natasha.
I must learn seriously.
Why you give him this gift?
simp: 为什么你送给他这个礼物？
trad: 為什麼你送給他這個禮物？

eng: Let's study a specific example.
simp: 让我们来学习一个特殊的例子。
trad: 讓我們來學習一個特殊的例子。

eng: Up to now, how many books do you think you've read?
simp: 到目前为止，你认为你阅读过多少书籍？
trad: 到目前為止，你認為你閱讀過多少書籍？

eng: We had a meal after noon.
Don't bother me.
These are called shoes.
The library is in the middle of the city.
When I was a child, I spent most of my time indoors reading.
simp: 当我是个孩子的时候，我会把大部分时间都用于室内阅读。
trad: 當我是個孩子的時候，我會把大部分時間都用於室內閱讀。

eng: To be in love is not the same as loving. You can be in love with a woman and still hate her.
simp: 被爱和爱一个人不同。你可以被一个人爱着的同时，却恨着这个人。
trad: 被愛和愛一個人不同。你可以被一個人愛著的同時，卻恨著這個人。

eng: The late Mr Smith was a doctor.
simp: 故去的斯密斯曾经是个医生。
trad: 故去的斯密斯曾經是個醫生。

eng: Let us go home.
Do you study every day?
Do you study every day?
Tomorrow it will rain.
Today I'm feeling melancholic.
I studied English, French and Chinese.
simp: 我从前学习英文、德文和中文。
trad: 我從前學習英文、德文和中文。

eng: He is an Italian.
The child is wearing a belly-slip made of silk.
simp: 这个小孩穿着一件丝绸织成的肚兜.
trad: 這個小孩穿著一件絲綢織成的肚兜.

eng: Are there any students from Korea in your class?
simp: 你们 班 有 韩国 学生 吗 ?
trad: 你們 班 有 韓國 學生 嗎 ?

eng: The clothes at this boutique are particularly expensive.
simp: 这家精品店的服装卖得很贵.
trad: 這家精品店的服裝賣得很貴.

eng: She likes to wear dark colours.
simp: 她喜欢穿深颜色的衣服。
trad: 她喜歡穿深顏色的衣服。

eng: Is it difficult to learn Chinese?
simp: 学习 汉语 难 不 难?
trad: 學習 漢語 難 不 難?

eng: I like to learn Chinese and English.
A reward will be paid to anyone who brings back the money that he lost.
simp: 凡能将他遗失的钱寻回者可得到酬金。
trad: 凡能將他遺失的錢尋回者可得到酬金。

eng: Don' t worry, you shall get the answer this afternoon.
simp: 别着急，今天下午你就可得到答复了.
trad: 別著急，今天下午你就可得到答復了.

eng: Hmm, I think something happened. Wait a second, I will try to figure it out.
simp: 喔，好像是有这麽回事，你稍等，我查一查。
trad: 喔，好像是有這麼回事，你稍等，我查一查。

eng: Shougongsha is an old Chinese technique to test woman's virginity.
simp: 守宫砂是中国古代用来验证女人贞操的方法.
trad: 守宮砂是中國古代用來驗證女人貞操的方法.

eng: The question was impossible for us to answer.
simp: 我们没办法回答这个问题。
trad: 我們沒辦法回答這個問題。

eng: Do it right now, before you forget.
She married him last year.
She hung a little Picasso on the wall of the drawing room.
simp: 她把小毕卡思的绘画放在画间的墙上。
trad: 她把小畢卡思的繪畫放在畫間的墻上。

eng: Are you married or are you single?
I am leaving work, so let's talk another day.
I have already finished reading this book.
My driving instructor says I should be more patient.
simp: 我的驾校老师说我应该更耐心一点。
trad: 我的駕校老師說我應該更耐心一點。

eng: I haven't washed my hair.
How would you feel if your wife left you?
simp: 如果你的妻子离开了你，你会怎么想？
trad: 如果你的妻子離開了你，你會怎麼想？

eng: The weather report says it will rain tomorrow afternoon.
simp: 天气预报说明天下午会下雨。
trad: 天氣預報說明天下午會下雨。

eng: What's your favorite television program?
simp: 你最喜欢的电视节目是什么？
trad: 你最喜歡的電視節目是什麼？

eng: There were few students remaining in the classroom.
simp: 教室里没剩下几个学生了。
trad: 教室裏沒剩下幾個學生了。

eng: I have good eyesight.
Can you fetch the children from school?
Excuse me, could you pass me the sugar?
simp: 打扰一下，你能把糖递给我吗？
trad: 打擾一下，你能把糖遞給我嗎？

eng: The concert lasted about three hours.
simp: 演唱会大概开了三个小时。
trad: 演唱會大概開了三個小時。

eng: I want to buy the dress.
The religion was in its glory in those days.
simp: 这个宗教当时处于全盛时期。
trad: 這個宗教當時處於全盛時期。

eng: Tom has no choice but to go.
simp: 汤姆除了去之外别无选择。
trad: 湯姆除了去之外別無選擇。

eng: Finally, it's Friday.
Accidents are inevitable.
He fell into the habit of keeping late hours.
Curtains and carpets were renewed.
simp: 窗帘和地毯都重新换过了。
trad: 窗簾和地毯都重新換過了。

eng: She asked him to sit down.
What kind of wine do you have?
My child dislikes the dentist.
simp: 我的小孩不喜欢那个牙医。
trad: 我的小孩不喜歡那個牙醫。

eng: You can make up to 80,000 yen a month in that part-time job.
simp: 你做那份兼职工作最多能赚到八万日元。
trad: 你做那份兼職工作最多能賺到八萬日元。

eng: Zamenhof, the creator of Esperanto, was an ophthalmologist.
simp: 世界语的创始人柴门霍夫是一个眼科医生。
trad: 世界語的創始人柴門霍夫是一個眼科醫生。

eng: He was angry with his son.
He went blind in the accident.
simp: 他在这次事故中失明了。
trad: 他在這次事故中失明了。

eng: We have five English classes a week.
simp: 我们一周有五节英语课。
trad: 我們一周有五節英語課。

eng: All you have to do is sit here.
simp: 你只要坐在这儿就行了。
trad: 你只要坐在這兒就行了。

eng: He is my classmate.
When taking drugs, follow the directions on the bottle carefully.
simp: 吃药之前一定要仔细看说明书。
trad: 吃藥之前一定要仔細看說明書。

eng: He studied hard so as to pass the examination.
simp: 他为了通过这场考试很努力地学习。
trad: 他為了通過這場考試很努力地學習。

eng: I was often there.
I think it will be fine.
Tom is eager to live in Boston.
simp: 汤姆急着想在波士顿住下。
trad: 湯姆急著想在波士頓住下。

eng: The car won't start because the battery has run down.
simp: 车发动不了因为电池没电了。
trad: 車發動不了因為電池沒電了。

eng: Please make sure that the door is locked.
simp: 请务必确认门是锁着的。
trad: 請務必確認門是鎖著的。

eng: I found them lying on the artificial grass.
simp: 我发现他们正躺在人工草皮上。
trad: 我發現他們正躺在人工草皮上。

eng: In order to apply, you have to go in person.
simp: 要申请的话，你得亲自去。
trad: 要申請的話，你得親自去。

eng: He's very forgetful of things.
So, what else is new?
She's completely crazy about him.
I feel lethargic.
I haven't eaten breakfast yet.
The train slowed and blared its horn as it approached the railway crossing.
simp: 火车在快到交叉路口的时候减速、按喇叭。
trad: 火車在快到交叉路口的時候減速、按喇叭。

eng: I am in the habit of taking a shower in the morning.
The stream is not very swift.
She replied that she had never seen the man before.
simp: 她回答说她从来没有见过那个男人。
trad: 她回答說她從來沒有見過那個男人。

eng: Never have I seen such a big whale.
simp: 我从来没见过那么大一条鲸。
trad: 我從來沒見過那麼大一條鯨。

eng: Mary gave me an American doll.
simp: 玛丽给了我一个美国洋娃娃。
trad: 瑪麗給了我一個美國洋娃娃。

eng: Juvenile crimes have been increasing recently.
simp: 少年犯罪最近一直在增长。
trad: 少年犯罪最近一直在增長。

eng: There was a crack in my tennis racket, so I sent it out to be repaired.
simp: 我的网球拍裂了，所以我把它拿去修了。
trad: 我的網球拍裂了，所以我把它拿去修了。

eng: They made him the chairman of a club.
simp: 他们选他做俱乐部主席。
trad: 他們選他做俱樂部主席。

eng: He was seriously injured in a traffic accident.
simp: 他在一场交通事故中严重受伤。
trad: 他在一場交通事故中嚴重受傷。

eng: It was not until the baby was fed that he stopped crying.
simp: 这个婴儿直到吃饱了才停下不哭。
trad: 這個嬰兒直到吃飽了才停下不哭。

eng: I saw you cooking.
In all fairness, he did do his best.
simp: 说句实话，他真的尽力了。
trad: 說句實話，他真的盡力了。

eng: How many kinds of birds are in your backyard?
She approved of my plan.
She has a tender heart.
I won the gold medal.
Tom can't cook very well so he often eats out.
simp: 汤姆不怎么会烧饭所以他经常出去吃。
trad: 湯姆不怎麼會燒飯所以他經常出去吃。

eng: I never felt at ease in my father's company.
simp: 我在我爸的公司一直感觉不自在。
trad: 我在我爸的公司一直感覺不自在。

eng: The man is old.
She persists in saying that her analysis is correct.
simp: 她坚持认为自己的分析是正确的。
trad: 她堅持認為自己的分析是正確的。

eng: Take your coat in case it rains.
simp: 带上你的外套以防下雨。
trad: 帶上你的外套以防下雨。

eng: Am I in your way?
You bought the ticket for the train?
They just taught me to swear.
How much time did it take you to learn Chinese so well?
simp: 你花多长时间汉语学这么好。
trad: 你花多長時間漢語學這麼好。

eng: I am immediately in awe of you!
Whether you know him or not, you have to support his opinion.
simp: 不管你认不认识他，你都应该支持他的想法。
trad: 不管你認不認識他，你都應該支持他的想法。

eng: Who did you meet there?
She said that she had to be back before dawn.
simp: 她说她黄昏之前必须回来。
trad: 她說她黃昏之前必須回來。

eng: This toy car runs on batteries.
simp: 这个玩具汽车是装电池的。
trad: 這個玩具汽車是裝電池的。

eng: The meeting lasted until 5.
She studied English in the morning.
When you go abroad, it is useful to learn at least some polite phrases in the local language.
simp: 你出国的时候学一些当地的礼貌用语还是很有用的。
trad: 你出國的時候學一些當地的禮貌用語還是很有用的。

eng: When I was growing up, I never imagined that I would become famous.
simp: 我小的时候从没想过自己会出名。
trad: 我小的時候從沒想過自己會出名。

eng: Let's hide behind the curtain.
I don't get enough challenge in this job.
simp: 这份工作没什么挑战性。
trad: 這份工作沒什麼挑戰性。

eng: She gave him a massage.
He is fresh from college, so he has no experience.
simp: 他刚刚大学毕业，所以没什么经验。
trad: 他剛剛大學畢業，所以沒什麼經驗。

eng: I made known my intentions to my parents.
simp: 我把我的意图告诉了我父母。
trad: 我把我的意圖告訴了我父母。

eng: What's the flight's scheduled arrival time?
I need to find something interesting to do.
simp: 我得找点有意思的事做。
trad: 我得找點有意思的事做。

eng: It's good exercise to climb hills.
The translation is quite true to the original.
He is able to swim quickly.
He ran to catch up to his brother.
The sun appeared on the horizon.
In my point of view, a car does more harm than good.
simp: 在我看来，汽车是弊大于利。
trad: 在我看來，汽車是弊大於利。

eng: It's a pity that you should leave Japan.
simp: 你要离开日本真是个遗憾。
trad: 你要離開日本真是個遺憾。

eng: That house with the red roof is Tom's house.
simp: 那个有红色房顶的是汤姆的家。
trad: 那個有紅色房頂的是湯姆的家。

eng: Can you play the violin?
I know that I should not tell him a lie.
simp: 我知道我不应该跟他说谎。
trad: 我知道我不應該跟他說謊。

eng: We must wash all these dirty plates.
simp: 我们必须把这些脏盘子全部洗掉。
trad: 我們必須把這些臟盤子全部洗掉。

eng: It took me five hours to drive from here to Tokyo.
simp: 从这儿开到东京我花了五个小时。
trad: 從這兒開到東京我花了五個小時。

eng: He doesn't live in my neighborhood.
simp: 他跟我不住在一个小区。
trad: 他跟我不住在一個小區。

eng: Tom is nervous.
He rejected our offer.
This rule allows no exception.
Eggs are cheap this season.
Your Chinese is awesome already.
simp: 你的中文已经登峰造极了。
trad: 你的中文已經登峰造極了。

eng: Everyone has the right to the protection of the moral and material interests resulting from any scientific, literary or artistic production of which he is the author.
simp: 人人对由于他所创作的任何科学、文学或美术作品而产生的精神的和物质的利益，有享受保护的权利。
trad: 人人對由於他所創作的任何科學、文學或美術作品而產生的精神的和物質的利益，有享受保護的權利。

eng: Your father is Japanese.
Your father is Japanese.
His watch is ten minutes slow.
This is my first time.
My name is Ludwig.
My name is Ludwig.
She's Tom's sister.
She's Tom's older sister.
Do you know how my friends describe me?
simp: 你知道我朋友怎么形容我？
trad: 你知道我朋友怎麼形容我？

eng: To be honest, I've never heard of this place before.
simp: 说实话，我以前没听说过这个地方。
trad: 說實話，我以前沒聽說過這個地方。

eng: I'd like to meet your older sister.
I'd like to meet your older sister.
The children rolled down the hill.
You don't seem to understand their good intentions.
simp: 你似乎没有明白他们的意图。
trad: 你似乎沒有明白他們的意圖。

eng: She came at once.
simp: Tā lìkè jiù láile. 她立刻就来了。
trad: Tā lìkè jiù láile. 她立刻就來了。

eng: Seen from a distance, the hill looks like an elephant.
simp: Cóng yuǎnchù kàn，nàzuòshān xiàng yìtóu dàxiàng。 从远处看，那座山像一头大象。
trad: Cóng yuǎnchù kàn，nàzuòshān xiàng yìtóu dàxiàng。 從遠處看，那座山像一頭大象。

eng: With North Korea's announcement on the 26th of its nuclear development plan based upon the agreement stemming from the Six Party Talks, and the United States' commencement of procedures to remove North Korea from its designation on the list of State Sponsors of Terrorism, the families of abductees have expressed growing unease that it may constitute an abandonment of the abductee issue.
simp: 随着北朝鲜在26号宣布了按照六方谈话上达成的共识所制定的核计划发展，美国将其从美国的恐怖主义捐助国的名单上去除。被绑架者的家属表达了不安，因为这有可能造成对绑架问题的放弃。
trad: 隨著北朝鮮在26號宣布了按照六方談話上達成的共識所制定的核計劃發展，美國將其從美國的恐怖主義捐助國的名單上去除。被綁架者的家屬表達了不安，因為這有可能造成對綁架問題的放棄。

eng: If you don't know what your goal is, you'll never be able to achieve it.
simp: 如果你不知道你的目标是什么，那么你永远不能完成它。
trad: 如果你不知道你的目標是什麼，那麼你永遠不能完成它。

eng: I feel bad about not having gone to his funeral.
simp: 我因为没有参加他的葬礼而感到很糟糕。
trad: 我因為沒有參加他的葬禮而感到很糟糕。

eng: They were looking for a place at which they could pitch the tent.
simp: 他们在找一个可以搭帐篷的地方。
trad: 他們在找一個可以搭帳篷的地方。

eng: I left my tennis racket on the train.
simp: 我把我的网球拍落在火车上了。
trad: 我把我的網球拍落在火車上了。

eng: I visited American friends in Oakland.
simp: 我拜访了奥克兰的美国朋友们。
trad: 我拜訪了奧克蘭的美國朋友們。

eng: There were fifty persons in all.
Mary has not started yet.
He entertained us with jokes all evening.
simp: 整个晚上他都在开玩笑逗我们开心。
trad: 整個晚上他都在開玩笑逗我們開心。

eng: He doesn't need to get up so early.
I was moved by her love for other people.
simp: 我被她对别人的爱心所感动。
trad: 我被她對別人的愛心所感動。

eng: I prefer going outside to staying on Facebook.
simp: 比起上Facebook，我更喜欢去外面。
trad: 比起上Facebook，我更喜歡去外面。

eng: In France did you work at the embassy or in the consulate?
simp: 在法国，你在大使馆工作还是领事馆？
trad: 在法國，你在大使館工作還是領事館？

eng: You need a key to open the box.
simp: 你需要用一把钥匙打开那个盒子。
trad: 你需要用一把鑰匙打開那個盒子。

eng: Your opinion is very constructive.
Getting nowhere.
When are you going on summer vacation?
Catch as catch can.
I saw him at one time or another.
The facts proved that our worries were unnecessary.
simp: 事实证明了我们的担心是多余的。
trad: 事實證明了我們的擔心是多余的。

eng: He frankly expressed his own view.
simp: 他坦率地提出了自己的看法
trad: 他坦率地提出了自己的看法
