eng: I went to bed early, for I was tired.
simp: 我很早上床睡觉了，因为很累。
trad: 我很早上床睡覺了，因為很累。

eng: Burj Khalifa is currently the tallest skyscraper in the world.
simp: 哈里发塔是现时世界上最高的摩天大楼。
trad: 哈裏發塔是現時世界上最高的摩天大樓。

eng: Why are you meowing?
Burj Khalifa is currently the tallest skyscraper in the world.
simp: 哈里发塔是现时世界上最高的摩天大楼。
trad: 哈裏發塔是現時世界上最高的摩天大樓。

eng: Root beer is considered a classic American carbonated soft drink.
simp: 麦根沙士被视为一种经典的美式碳酸饮品。
trad: 麥根沙士被視為一種經典的美式碳酸飲品。

eng: She advised him to drink more milk.
Brush your teeth.
The coat doesn't have any pockets.
Would you do me a favor?
That's a tower.
Do not think that love, in order to be genuine, has to be extraordinary. What we need is to love without getting tired.
simp: 不要觉得真诚的爱必需惊天动地。我们需要的，是不会倦怠的爱。
trad: 不要覺得真誠的愛必需驚天動地。我們需要的，是不會倦怠的愛。

eng: Love loves love.
Love loves love.
Life would be so much better if you didn't care so much.
simp: 如果你不计较太多，生活会更容易些。
trad: 如果你不計較太多，生活會更容易些。

eng: Tom was shocked.
Tom was shocked.
I'll be with you forever.
I'll miss her forever.
We'll be friends forever.
She'll love him forever.
I want to be with you forever.
He read English Literature at Oxford University.
simp: 他在牛津大学修了英语文学。
trad: 他在牛津大學修了英語文學。

eng: Do you speak Esperanto?
He was very old.
I use this.
If you have a thought, please raise your hand.
I'm still busy.
I like it very much.
What time is dinner served?
This is a world where the sun doesn't shine.
simp: 这是一个没有阳光的世界。
trad: 這是一個沒有陽光的世界。

eng: Didn't you see the man?
Didn't you see the man?
Didn't you see the man?
This area is still underdeveloped because of a lack of interest from the government.
simp: 因为缺乏的政府的关注，这个区域还不发达。
trad: 因為缺乏的政府的關註，這個區域還不發達。

eng: I go to the office by car, and I try to leave home as early as I can so that I can avoid the traffic jams.
simp: 我开车去办公室，我试图尽可能早的从家里出发，以便能避开交通拥堵。
trad: 我開車去辦公室，我試圖盡可能早的從家裏出發，以便能避開交通擁堵。

eng: It's more difficult than you think.
I'm too happy!
I'm afraid I can't help you. You must ask someone else.
simp: 我担心可能帮不了你，你需要找其他人帮忙。
trad: 我擔心可能幫不了你，你需要找其他人幫忙。

eng: I couldn't remember ever having met her.
I knocked on the door, but nobody answered.
simp: 我敲门，但是没有人回应。
trad: 我敲門，但是沒有人回應。

eng: Thank you for inviting me to dinner.
It is fun to speak in English.
The president is difficult to approach.
I'm tracking a buck.
Get well soon!
I haven't gotten any messages from him since then.
simp: 从那以后，我再也没有他的音信了。
trad: 從那以後，我再也沒有他的音信了。

eng: They didn't listen.
Didn't you see the man?
She always dresses very simply.
simp: 她穿的衣服总是很朴素。
trad: 她穿的衣服總是很樸素。

eng: I bought a book yesterday.
I want to be a sport reporter.
He is respected by everyone.
We lead a very ordinary life.
simp: 我们过着十分平凡的生活。
trad: 我們過著十分平凡的生活。

eng: I have the complete works of Shakespeare.
simp: 我有莎士比亚的作品全集。
trad: 我有莎士比亞的作品全集。

eng: Gestural language had, however, serious limitations, since it could not be used in the dark or at distance.
simp: 可是，手语也绝对不是万能的，当四周太暗，或者距离太远的时候，它就完全派不上用场。
trad: 可是，手語也絕對不是萬能的，當四周太暗，或者距離太遠的時候，它就完全派不上用場。

eng: Please divide the pizza into three parts.
Divide the pizza in three.
You are a good person.
You are a good person.
Tom is a good person.
No thank you, I don't need a plastic bag.
simp: 不，谢谢。我不需要塑料袋。
trad: 不，謝謝。我不需要塑料袋。

eng: I learn the language by myself.
I come from Italy and I speak Italian.
simp: 我来自义大利，会说义大利文。
trad: 我來自義大利，會說義大利文。

eng: I come from Italy and I speak Italian.
simp: 我从意大利来了，我会说意大利语。
trad: 我從意大利來了，我會說意大利語。

eng: When a team makes its entrance, the captain leads the way.
Can I try on this pair of shoes?
simp: 我可以试一下这双鞋吗？
trad: 我可以試一下這雙鞋嗎？

eng: My name is Luis.
Youths who are caught violating the new rules on behaviour will lose their right to free travel, and will have to complete unpaid community work to earn it back.
simp: 被判严重违反新的行为准则的青少年将失去免费乘坐公交车的权利，如果想重新取得必须做无报酬的社区工作。
trad: 被判嚴重違反新的行為準則的青少年將失去免費乘坐公交車的權利，如果想重新取得必須做無報酬的社區工作。

eng: In order to deal with repeat offenders, Mr Johnson is also establishing a "two strikes and you're out" policy - serious breaches of the rules will result in permanent removal of free travel rights.
simp: 为了惩处累犯，约翰逊先生也创造了“二振出局”的政策，再次严重违反准则将永久失去免费旅行权利。
trad: 為了懲處累犯，約翰遜先生也創造了“二振出局”的政策，再次嚴重違反準則將永久失去免費旅行權利。

eng: Previously, Mr Johnson also proposed banning the consumption of alcohol on public transport in the capital, which is believed to have reduced the crime rate on trains and buses.
simp: 约翰逊先生以前还倡议禁止在首都公交上饮酒，有人认为这个倡议有效减少了火车和公车上的犯罪率。
trad: 約翰遜先生以前還倡議禁止在首都公交上飲酒，有人認為這個倡議有效減少了火車和公車上的犯罪率。

eng: The war in Europe was carried into Africa.
Computers are certainly playing an important role in our life, whether we like it or not.
simp: 无论我们是否喜欢电脑，它在我们的生活中始终起着重要的作用。
trad: 無論我們是否喜歡電腦，它在我們的生活中始終起著重要的作用。

eng: He enthusiastically engaged himself into this honorable undertaking
simp: 她热忱地投身于这份光荣的事业。
trad: 她熱忱地投身於這份光榮的事業。

eng: Some medicines can be harmful for the body
simp: 有些药品会对身体产生危害。
trad: 有些藥品會對身體產生危害。

eng: Ruminants are a kind of mammals
simp: 牛是一种反刍类的哺乳动物。
trad: 牛是一種反芻類的哺乳動物。

eng: What's happened has happened; there's no use in whining and complaining.
simp: 要发生的已经发生了，你摇头叹息也没用。
trad: 要發生的已經發生了，你搖頭嘆息也沒用。

eng: I love Arabic.
I can't remember the melody of that song.
simp: 我想不起那首歌的旋律。
trad: 我想不起那首歌的旋律。

eng: We are flying above the clouds.
I work in a hospital.
The news spread all over Japan.
Some scientists predict that the world oil reserves will be used up within a century.
simp: 有科学家预计地球的石油储备将会在十年内耗尽。
trad: 有科學家預計地球的石油儲備將會在十年內耗盡。

eng: Apart from the cost, it will take long to build the bridge.
simp: 撇开费用不说，建这座桥也会耗费不少的时间。
trad: 撇開費用不說，建這座橋也會耗費不少的時間。

eng: You'd better avoid discussion of religion and politics.
simp: 你最好别提到宗教和政治这些话题。
trad: 你最好別提到宗教和政治這些話題。

eng: Prolonging the discussion will bring us nowhere.
simp: 继续讨论下去，也不会有甚麽结果。
trad: 繼續討論下去，也不會有甚麼結果。

eng: I don't know what kind of person he is.
simp: 我不知道他是怎麽样的一个人。
trad: 我不知道他是怎麼樣的一個人。

eng: He has a Picasso.
Whose chair is this? "It is mine."
His main object in life was to become rich.
simp: 他主要的人生目标就是成为一个有钱人。
trad: 他主要的人生目標就是成為一個有錢人。

eng: She gives most of her spare time to playing the piano.
simp: 她把大部分的空馀时间都花在弹钢琴上。
trad: 她把大部分的空餘時間都花在彈鋼琴上。

eng: Tom has already drunk three cups of coffee.
simp: 汤姆已经喝了三杯咖啡了。
trad: 湯姆已經喝了三杯咖啡了。

eng: You cannot be too careful in crossing a street.
simp: 过马路小心点总没有错的。
trad: 過馬路小心點總沒有錯的。

eng: He seems to know all about her past.
simp: 他对她的过去似乎瞭如指掌。
trad: 他對她的過去似乎瞭如指掌。

eng: I have black eyes.
I was sure I had never seen her before.
You're the tallest one.
John is my best friend.
Where are your things?
Where are your things?
Where are your things?
Where is my book?
Rubber is not hard: it gives way to pressure.
simp: 橡皮不硬，在压力下会变形。
trad: 橡皮不硬，在壓力下會變形。

eng: The weather promises to clear up.
He is a promising student.
simp: 他是一位有前途的学生。
trad: 他是一位有前途的學生。

eng: In spite of the tyrant’s persecution, the hero valiantly carried on the struggle.
simp: 尽管受到暴君的迫害，英雄还顽强地斗争。
trad: 盡管受到暴君的迫害，英雄還頑強地鬥爭。

eng: We express our gratitude for Mr Smith's outstanding, challenging speech.
simp: 我们对史密斯先生杰出的，给人启发的讲话表示感激。
trad: 我們對史密斯先生傑出的，給人啟發的講話表示感激。

eng: It's a long story.
You’re getting into deep water.
Are you for or against the proposal?
simp: 你赞成还是反对这个建议？
trad: 你贊成還是反對這個建議？

eng: The washing-up machine at home was regarded as a rival to the worker at the kitchen sink.
simp: 有人把家用洗碗机当作站在洗碗池者的对手。
trad: 有人把家用洗碗機當作站在洗碗池者的對手。

eng: Heating water does not change its chemical composition.
simp: 把水加热不改变它的化学成分。
trad: 把水加熱不改變它的化學成分。

eng: She is not only good at running; she is also good at singing.
simp: 她不仅擅长跑步，也擅长唱歌。
trad: 她不僅擅長跑步，也擅長唱歌。

eng: In China’s approach to relations with other countries, we find a welcome emphasis on the principle of equality of states.
simp: 中国处理于其他国家的联系中，我们欢迎他们重视国与国平等的原则。
trad: 中國處理於其他國家的聯系中，我們歡迎他們重視國與國平等的原則。

eng: He is below contempt.
We intended to let you in on the secret.
simp: 我们图谋告诉你那个秘密。
trad: 我們圖謀告訴你那個秘密。

eng: We went to the dance.
History develops through the replacement of the old by the new.
simp: 新事物取代旧事物推动历史发展。
trad: 新事物取代舊事物推動歷史發展。

eng: I recognised him immediately.
Miss Wang has a trace of obstinacy in her, but she is still a good student.
simp: 王小姐有一点固执，但是她还算是一个好学生。
trad: 王小姐有一點固執，但是她還算是一個好學生。

eng: They refused to talk to me in spite of my earnest request.
simp: 尽管我提出了热切的要求，他们拒绝跟我说话。
trad: 盡管我提出了熱切的要求，他們拒絕跟我說話。

eng: He spoke with evident glee.
simp: 他说话时，显然带着高兴的表情。
trad: 他說話時，顯然帶著高興的表情。

eng: If there's an emergency, you must run out of the house through this exit.
simp: 有紧急情况时，必须通过这个出口跑出房子。
trad: 有緊急情況時，必須通過這個出口跑出房子。

eng: The first electronic computers went into operation in 1945.
simp: 最早一批电脑1945年投入使用。
trad: 最早一批電腦1945年投入使用。

eng: As everyone knows, air is a mixture of gases.
simp: 众所周知，空气是多种气体的溷合体。
trad: 眾所周知，空氣是多種氣體的混合體。

eng: His thesis summed up the new achievements made in computers, artificial satellites and rockets.
simp: 他的论文总结了电脑，人造卫星和火箭三个的新成就。
trad: 他的論文總結了電腦，人造衛星和火箭三個的新成就。

eng: God knows what their fate will be.
simp: 谁知道他们的命运到底是什么。
trad: 誰知道他們的命運到底是什麼。

eng: Just think of the difficulties!
Before the 15th century it was generally believed that the Earth was at the centre of the universe.
simp: 在15世纪以前，人们曾经普遍认为地球位于宇宙的中心
trad: 在15世紀以前，人們曾經普遍認為地球位於宇宙的中心

eng: Another factor to be taken into consideration is that the present situation is favourable to us.
simp: 将要考虑的另一个重要因素是，目前的情况对我们有利。
trad: 將要考慮的另一個重要因素是，目前的情況對我們有利。

eng: Ignorance is the mother of fear as well as of admiration.
simp: 无知是害怕之母，也是崇拜之母。
trad: 無知是害怕之母，也是崇拜之母。

eng: It is clear that no one has anything new to suggest.
simp: 显然没有人有新的建议
trad: 顯然沒有人有新的建議

eng: Life is too short to worry about things like that.
simp: 人生短暂，用来担心这种事情，实在太浪费了。
trad: 人生短暫，用來擔心這種事情，實在太浪費了。

eng: They are very interested in astronomy.
simp: 他们对天文学十分感兴趣。
trad: 他們對天文學十分感興趣。

eng: Our baby was born healthy.
simp: 我们的婴儿出生得健康。
trad: 我們的嬰兒出生得健康。

eng: Teachers in kindergarten are sometimes referred to as leaders of children.
simp: 幼儿园老师有时被称为孩子王。
trad: 幼兒園老師有時被稱為孩子王。

eng: They send their child to a part-time nursery.
simp: 他们送孩子去了幼儿园的半托班。
trad: 他們送孩子去了幼兒園的半托班。

eng: She is a child-care worker in a kindergarten.
simp: 她是幼儿园里的保育员。
trad: 她是幼兒園裏的保育員。

eng: There is a kindergarten at the other end of the street.
simp: 横街的那端有一个幼儿园。
trad: 橫街的那端有一個幼兒園。

eng: The teacher of the kindergarten told the pupils to respect, and cherish each other.
simp: 幼儿园的老师告诉小朋友们要互敬互爱。
trad: 幼兒園的老師告訴小朋友們要互敬互愛。

eng: Nowadays, some kindergartens are carrying out bilingual teaching, and so all the children can speak a little English.
simp: 现在有些幼儿园推行的是双语教学，小朋友们都能滴里嘟噜地说上几句英语。
trad: 現在有些幼兒園推行的是雙語教學，小朋友們都能滴裏嘟嚕地說上幾句英語。

eng: The teachers are playing games with students in the kindergarden.
simp: 幼儿园里，老师正在带领小朋友们嘻戏。
trad: 幼兒園裏，老師正在帶領小朋友們嘻戲。

eng: The little child drools whenever he hears of something delicious.
simp: 小家伙一听到有好吃的，口涎就流出来好长！
trad: 小家夥一聽到有好吃的，口涎就流出來好長！

eng: Many pictures are placed on Xiaoding's desk.
simp: 小丁的桌子上放着很多照片。
trad: 小丁的桌子上放著很多照片。

eng: Renmei is waiting for Xueyou in the dorm.
simp: 人美在宿舍等着学友呢。
trad: 人美在宿舍等著學友呢。

eng: Xueyou is looking at the new pictures Renmei took in Beijing.
simp: 学友看着人美在北京照的新照片。
trad: 學友看著人美在北京照的新照片。

eng: Teacher Wang is drinking the Longjing tea (he) brought from China.
simp: 王老师喝着从中国带来的龙井茶。
trad: 王老師喝著從中國帶來的龍井茶。

eng: Xiaoding's father's name is written down on the envelope.
simp: 信封上写着小丁爸爸的名字。
trad: 信封上寫著小丁爸爸的名字。

eng: Two American students live in this dorm.
simp: 这间宿舍住着两个美国留学生。
trad: 這間宿舍住著兩個美國留學生。

eng: Xiaoding asked Teacher Lin while holding a picture: "Is this picture of you taken in the Beijing University Library?"
simp: 小丁拿着一张照片问林老师：“您的这张照片是在北大图书馆照的吗？”
trad: 小丁拿著一張照片問林老師：“您的這張照片是在北大圖書館照的嗎？”

eng: Kaikai is wearing blue clothes to go to the kindergarten.
simp: 开开穿着一件蓝衣服去幼儿园
trad: 開開穿著一件藍衣服去幼兒園

eng: Shihai is carrying a Chinese grammar book to go to Teacher Wang's place and ask questions.
simp: 世海拿着一本中文语法书去王老师那儿问问题。
trad: 世海拿著一本中文語法書去王老師那兒問問題。

eng: Xiaoding and Xueyou are sitting there listening to Teacher Wang talk.
simp: 小丁和学友坐着听王老师说话。
trad: 小丁和學友坐著聽王老師說話。

eng: Xueyou's hand is holding a map of Beijing.
simp: 学友的手里正拿着北京地图呢。
trad: 學友的手裏正拿著北京地圖呢。

eng: When Xueyou came to see Teacher Lin, it was raining outside.
simp: 学友来看林老师的时候，外边正下着雨呢。
trad: 學友來看林老師的時候，外邊正下著雨呢。

eng: Xueyou is holding a map of China.
The skin of a shark is much rougher than that of a tuna fish.
simp: 鲨鱼的皮比鲔鱼的皮粗糙多了。
trad: 鯊魚的皮比鮪魚的皮粗糙多了。

eng: Instead of going to school, he stayed at home.
simp: 他没有上学，留在了家中。
trad: 他沒有上學，留在了家中。

eng: It is 7:30.
I am suspicious of him.
His view seems to be too optimistic.
simp: 他的看法似乎太乐观了。
trad: 他的看法似乎太樂觀了。

eng: It has been the driest June for thirty years.
simp: 这是三十年以来雨下得最少的六月。
trad: 這是三十年以來雨下得最少的六月。

eng: What did they hit you with?
simp: 他们是用甚麽来打你的？
trad: 他們是用甚麼來打你的？

eng: Yes and no.
simp: 可以说是，也可以说不是。
trad: 可以說是，也可以說不是。

eng: This town hasn't changed much in the last ten years.
simp: 这小镇在过去的十年内并没有多大的改变。
trad: 這小鎮在過去的十年內並沒有多大的改變。

eng: He gave several examples of how we could change things.
simp: 他提出了几个改变事物的方法。
trad: 他提出了幾個改變事物的方法。

eng: This microscope magnifies objects by 100 times.
simp: 这台显微镜能把物体放大一百倍。
trad: 這臺顯微鏡能把物體放大一百倍。

eng: Traffic lights are used to regulate traffic.
simp: 交通灯是用来控制交通的。
trad: 交通燈是用來控制交通的。

eng: Let me see your wound.
It's easy to distinguish good from evil.
Tom has many friends.
If you want to keep healthy, you should do more exercises.
simp: 要想身体健康， 就应该多锻练身体。
trad: 要想身體健康， 就應該多鍛練身體。

eng: If you want to study Chinese well, you should communicate with Chinese people more often.
simp: 要想学好中文， 就应该多跟中国人交流.
trad: 要想學好中文， 就應該多跟中國人交流.

eng: If you want to truly understand the language and culture of a country, you should go to study and live in that country for a period of time.
simp: 要真正了解一个国家的语言和文化， 就应该去那个国家学习和生活一段时间。
trad: 要真正了解一個國家的語言和文化， 就應該去那個國家學習和生活一段時間。

eng: Guohua knows many foreign students, there are Japanese, Koreans, French, as well as Americans.
simp: 国华认识很多外国留学生， 有日本人， 韩国人， 法国人， 还有美国人。
trad: 國華認識很多外國留學生， 有日本人， 韓國人， 法國人， 還有美國人。

eng: We must not speak ill of others behind their backs.
simp: 我们不应该在背后说别人的坏话。
trad: 我們不應該在背後說別人的壞話。

eng: Ulaanbaatar is the capital of Mongolia.
simp: 乌兰巴托是蒙古的首都。
trad: 烏蘭巴托是蒙古的首都。

eng: It's three o'clock now; I'll come again in an hour.
simp: 现在是三时正，我一个小时后再来吧。
trad: 現在是三時正，我一個小時後再來吧。

eng: There is no life without electricity and water.
simp: 我们没有电力和水就不能生活。
trad: 我們沒有電力和水就不能生活。

eng: Talking about 108, that's the number of worldly passions. "What worldly passions have you got then?" "I could say, but it'll get censored out."
simp: 「说到一百零八，这不就是代表烦恼的数字吗。」「那麽你有甚麽烦恼呀？」「告诉你并不是不可以，但是内容会给河蟹掉的。」
trad: 「說到一百零八，這不就是代表煩惱的數字嗎。」「那麼你有甚麼煩惱呀？」「告訴你並不是不可以，但是內容會給河蟹掉的。」

eng: I visited the house in which Shakespeare was born.
simp: 我到了莎士比亚出生的房子参观。
trad: 我到了莎士比亞出生的房子參觀。

eng: The news quickly spread.
I'm fat.
It was a pleasant day, but there were few people in the park.
simp: 那天天气很好，但公园里人并不多。
trad: 那天天氣很好，但公園裏人並不多。

eng: Stock prices dropped.
Every day the boy would come.
Cut the cake with that knife.
He may come today.
I felt myself being lifted up.
simp: 我感觉到自己的身体被提了起来。
trad: 我感覺到自己的身體被提了起來。

eng: I'll monitor your progress from my computer.
simp: 我会用我的电脑监察你的进度。
trad: 我會用我的電腦監察你的進度。

eng: This word is also French in origin.
simp: 这个字也是由法语衍生出来的。
trad: 這個字也是由法語衍生出來的。

eng: We have important issues to discuss.
simp: 我们有些重要的事要谈。
trad: 我們有些重要的事要談。

eng: My opinion is the one that counts!
simp: 我的意见才是最重要的！
trad: 我的意見才是最重要的！

eng: Few things are more enraging to me than the sight of an animal being beaten.
simp: 没有甚麽比看见动物被虐打更能惹起我的怒火。
trad: 沒有甚麼比看見動物被虐打更能惹起我的怒火。

eng: Loneliness and being alone are not the same thing.
Some of the photos have been taken at the risk of life.
simp: 有些相片是冒着生命危险拍的。
trad: 有些相片是冒著生命危險拍的。

eng: There are no tables in the room.
Kate has become a full member of the royal family.
simp: 凯萨琳已成为皇室的正式成员。
trad: 凱薩琳已成為皇室的正式成員。

eng: A senior royal told CNN that the Duchess of Cambridge has fulfilled all of her objectives one year after marrying Prince William and has become a "full member" of the British monarchy.
simp: 英国皇家的一位高级人员告诉了CNN，剑桥公爵夫人嫁给威廉王子 一年之后，达到了所有的目标，并且成功地成为了英国皇室的“正式成员”。
trad: 英國皇家的一位高級人員告訴了CNN，劍橋公爵夫人嫁給威廉王子 一年之後，達到了所有的目標，並且成功地成為了英國皇室的“正式成員”。

eng: St James Palace represents her, William and his brother Harry, and now regards her "induction" as complete.
simp: 代表她、威廉还有他的弟弟哈利的圣詹姆斯宫现在认为，凯萨琳的“入会时期”已经结束了。
trad: 代表她、威廉還有他的弟弟哈利的聖詹姆斯宮現在認為，凱薩琳的“入會時期”已經結束了。

eng: The source also said that the Duchess of Cambridge feels "fulfilled" by her achievements over the last twelve months.
simp: 知情者也说，剑桥公爵夫人对近十二个月的成就也感觉“满意”。
trad: 知情者也說，劍橋公爵夫人對近十二個月的成就也感覺“滿意”。

eng: Do you know what it is like to be really hungry?
simp: 你尝过真正飢饿的滋味吗？
trad: 你嘗過真正飢餓的滋味嗎？

eng: Before Kate was married last year, some expressed concerns that as she was born a commoner, she would struggle with the pressure of being thrust into the public eye.
simp: 凯萨琳去年结婚之前，有人表达了担心说，因为她出生于平民家庭，可能要与被突然置于公众视野来的压力搏斗。
trad: 凱薩琳去年結婚之前，有人表達了擔心說，因為她出生於平民家庭，可能要與被突然置於公眾視野來的壓力搏鬥。

eng: Her smooth entry into the ranks of the royal family will help to dispel these fears.
simp: 证实她顺利地过渡入皇室组织，有帮于消除这些焦虑。
trad: 證實她順利地過渡入皇室組織，有幫於消除這些焦慮。

eng: I no longer have the energy to talk.
We are watching TV.
Tom is Mary's best friend.
simp: 汤姆是玛莉最要好的朋友。
trad: 湯姆是瑪莉最要好的朋友。

eng: The movie was interesting, as I had expected.
simp: 不出我所料，那部电影相当有趣。
trad: 不出我所料，那部電影相當有趣。

eng: Tom doesn't know any French.
What would you attempt to do if you knew you could not fail?
simp: 如果你有一次绝对不会失败的机会，你会选择做甚麽事情呢？
trad: 如果你有一次絕對不會失敗的機會，你會選擇做甚麼事情呢？

eng: He sat down at the piano and plonked out as best he could the "Happy Birthday" song.
simp: 他在钢琴面前坐了下来，勉勉强强地弹了一首生日歌。
trad: 他在鋼琴面前坐了下來，勉勉強強地彈了一首生日歌。

eng: The two scholars wrangled over the meaning of an obscure Tibetan phrase.
simp: 两位学者为一句意思含煳的藏文句子争论了一番。
trad: 兩位學者為一句意思含糊的藏文句子爭論了一番。

eng: You can see that the architect paid scrupulous attention to detail.
simp: 这位建筑师显然是一位无微不至的建筑师。
trad: 這位建築師顯然是一位無微不至的建築師。

eng: French people don't think of anything as impossible.
simp: 法国人觉得世界上没有不可能的事。
trad: 法國人覺得世界上沒有不可能的事。

eng: Tom felt very lonely.
We must have something to live for.
simp: 人生在世，总要有目标和追求的。
trad: 人生在世，總要有目標和追求的。

eng: A sensible man wouldn't say such a thing in public.
simp: 稍有头脑的人都不会在公众场合里说出这种话来。
trad: 稍有頭腦的人都不會在公眾場合裏說出這種話來。

eng: He is always finding fault with others.
simp: 他总是在挑剔别人的毛病。
trad: 他總是在挑剔別人的毛病。

eng: Peter talks with his parents in the United States on the phone at least once a week.
simp: 彼得每星期都至少会和身在美国的父母谈一次电话。
trad: 彼得每星期都至少會和身在美國的父母談一次電話。

eng: It's in times like these that the character of a person becomes apparent.
simp: 路遥知马力，日久见人心。
trad: 路遙知馬力，日久見人心。

eng: We can deliver within a week.
simp: 一周时间内，我们就可以送货。
trad: 一周時間內，我們就可以送貨。

eng: Skin shouldn't be exposed to sunlight for too long.
simp: 不要把皮肤长时间暴露在阳光里。
trad: 不要把皮膚長時間暴露在陽光裏。

eng: This is mine, and that's yours.
I take back everything I said.
But CNN has learned that, due to her husband's guidance, Kate feels she has already adapted to her new life.
simp: 但是CNN获悉，由于她丈夫的指导，凯萨琳感觉已经适应了新的生活。
trad: 但是CNN獲悉，由於她丈夫的指導，凱薩琳感覺已經適應了新的生活。

eng: She would never judge her own accomplishments, but she has succeeded in achieving what she set out to do in her first year, the source said.
simp: 知情者说，“她从来不会评判自己的成就，但是她成功地做好了她第一年决心做的事。”
trad: 知情者說，“她從來不會評判自己的成就，但是她成功地做好了她第一年決心做的事。”

eng: They are often together, and go to the opera or visit art galleries.
simp: 他们经常在一块儿，去看歌剧或者浏览画廊。
trad: 他們經常在一塊兒，去看歌劇或者瀏覽畫廊。

eng: They get on well together.
In the documentary, CNN explores how the royal family has supported their latest member as she finds her feet.
simp: CNN纪录片当中探究皇室最新成员在适应的时候他们是如何支持她的。
trad: CNN紀錄片當中探究皇室最新成員在適應的時候他們是如何支持她的。

eng: The source made reference to Kate and the Queen being seen chatting and smiling together last March.
simp: 知情者提到去年三月有人看女王和凯萨琳笑着聊天的时候。
trad: 知情者提到去年三月有人看女王和凱薩琳笑著聊天的時候。

eng: The Queen has gone to a lot of trouble for the Duchess.
simp: 女王为公爵夫人费心做了很多。
trad: 女王為公爵夫人費心做了很多。

eng: When they were in Leicester it was obvious that they had a very warm relationship.
simp: 在莱斯特的时候很明显她们有很亲暖的关系。
trad: 在萊斯特的時候很明顯她們有很親暖的關系。

eng: She has achieved her goals.
The aggressors are bound to be defeated.
They were given a hearty welcome.
simp: 他们受到了热情的欢迎。
trad: 他們受到了熱情的歡迎。

eng: Last year the region was visited by the worst drought in 60 years.
simp: 去年那个地区遭受了60年来最严重的干旱。
trad: 去年那個地區遭受了60年來最嚴重的幹旱。

eng: He was dismissed by the boss of the factory.
The famous hotel was practically destroyed by a large fire.
simp: 着名的酒店几乎被大火烧毁了。
trad: 著名的酒店幾乎被大火燒毀了。

eng: Most letters from his wife were read to him by the nurse in the hospital.
simp: 他住院时，大部分太太给他写的信由护士读给他听。
trad: 他住院時，大部分太太給他寫的信由護士讀給他聽。

eng: An old worker was found repairing machinery in the workshop.
simp: 有人发现一个老工人在车间修好机器。
trad: 有人發現一個老工人在車間修好機器。

eng: He was considered very qualified for the job.
simp: 人们认为，他完全能胜任这个工作。
trad: 人們認為，他完全能勝任這個工作。

eng: A new classroom building was built in our institute last year.
simp: 去年我们学院建了一个新教学楼。
trad: 去年我們學院建了一個新教學樓。

eng: He was injured in the leg.
The result of the invention of the steam engine was that human power was replaced by mechanical power.
simp: 机械力代替人力, 这是蒸汽机发明的结果。
trad: 機械力代替人力, 這是蒸汽機發明的結果。

eng: It is important that we build up our health.
simp: 增强我们的健康,这个很重要。
trad: 增強我們的健康,這個很重要。

eng: It doesn’t matter whether he will stay with us or leave.
simp: 不管他离开还是跟我们在一起, 都可以。
trad: 不管他離開還是跟我們在一起, 都可以。

eng: It goes without saying that he will come to the discussion.
simp: 毫无疑问，他会来参加讨论。
trad: 毫無疑問，他會來參加討論。

eng: It’s clear that we’re going to the church.
We expressed the hope that they could go abroad again to study geography.
simp: 我们表达希望，他们再一次能出国学习地理。
trad: 我們表達希望，他們再一次能出國學習地理。

eng: Then arose the question of where we were to get the necessary machinery.
simp: 于是出现了一个问题，哪里能找我们需要的机器。
trad: 於是出現了一個問題，哪裏能找我們需要的機器。

eng: He was allowed to go swimming on condition that he be kept near the other boys.
simp: 允许他去游泳只有一个条件，他不能离其他的男孩儿太原。
trad: 允許他去遊泳只有一個條件，他不能離其他的男孩兒太原。

eng: It occurred to me that he might be in the library.
simp: 我突然想到，他可能在图书馆 。
trad: 我突然想到，他可能在圖書館 。

eng: Can you produce any evidence that he was not at home that night?
simp: 你能不能提供他那天晚上没在家的证明？
trad: 你能不能提供他那天晚上沒在家的證明？

eng: The discovery that electric currents can be produced by magnetism is extremely important in the field of electricity.
simp: 磁能生产电流的发明，在电力领域非常重要。
trad: 磁能生產電流的發明，在電力領域非常重要。

eng: He would remind people again that it was decided not only by him but by many others.
simp: 他会再一次提醒人们说，这个不仅是他一个人的决定，而是很多其他人的决定。
trad: 他會再一次提醒人們說，這個不僅是他一個人的決定，而是很多其他人的決定。

eng: Smith replied that he was sorry.
simp: 史密斯回答说，他很抱歉。
trad: 史密斯回答說，他很抱歉。

eng: Every nation, rich or poor, has its strengths and weaknesses.
simp: 每个国家，无论贫富，都有其长，都有其短。
trad: 每個國家，無論貧富，都有其長，都有其短。

eng: People, old and young, all came out to greet the guests.
simp: 无论老幼，人们都出来迎接贵客。
trad: 無論老幼，人們都出來迎接貴客。

eng: She likes all the dresses he bought for her, old and new.
simp: 她喜欢他给她买的所有长裙，无论新买的还是旧的。
trad: 她喜歡他給她買的所有長裙，無論新買的還是舊的。

eng: We very much enjoyed the meal we had at her home last Sunday.
simp: 我们上个星期天在她家吃得非常开心。
trad: 我們上個星期天在她家吃得非常開心。

eng: In the darkness, she could hear him and his guests chatting and laughing.
simp: 在黑暗，她能听到他和客人说笑。
trad: 在黑暗，她能聽到他和客人說笑。

eng: The city isn't the one I left six years ago.
simp: 城市已经不是我六年前离开时的城市。
trad: 城市已經不是我六年前離開時的城市。

eng: It's changed so much, there are some places I don't even recognise.
simp: 变化得那么大，有些地方我都认不出来的。
trad: 變化得那麼大，有些地方我都認不出來的。

eng: Things are the same, but people have changed.
He's the only survivor in the village.
simp: 他是村子里面唯一在世的人。
trad: 他是村子裏面唯一在世的人。

eng: The man wearing glasses is an old Chinese author.
simp: 带着眼镜的那位老先生是一位中国小说家。
trad: 帶著眼鏡的那位老先生是一位中國小說家。

eng: That's why I don't approve of your plan.
simp: 那是我不赞同你的计划的原因。
trad: 那是我不贊同你的計劃的原因。

eng: He was too embarrassed to utter a word in front of the crowd.
simp: 他太难为情，在大众人前一句话也说不出来。
trad: 他太難為情，在大眾人前一句話也說不出來。

eng: He is not too old to do it.
Chinese is not too difficult to learn.
The change is too small to be observed.
An increase in the number of cars will affect the urban environment.
simp: 车辆增多会影响到城市的环境。
trad: 車輛增多會影響到城市的環境。

eng: Turn the volume up so that the students at the back can hear.
simp: 声音大声一点，以便让坐在后边的学生能听到。
trad: 聲音大聲一點，以便讓坐在後邊的學生能聽到。

eng: He crept out of the room very carefully to avoid waking her up.
simp: 他很小心地熘出房间，以免惊醒她。
trad: 他很小心地溜出房間，以免驚醒她。

eng: She wrote down their name so as not to forget it.
simp: 为了不要忘掉，她把那个人的名字写下来。
trad: 為了不要忘掉，她把那個人的名字寫下來。

eng: A few fragments of dead leaves floated on the pond.
simp: 池塘里漂浮着零星的几片落叶。
trad: 池塘裏漂浮著零星的幾片落葉。

eng: If you want to truly understand the language and culture of a country, you should go to study and live in that country for a period of time.
simp: 要真正了解一个国家的语言和文化, 就应该去那个国家学习和生活一段时间.
trad: 要真正了解一個國家的語言和文化, 就應該去那個國家學習和生活一段時間.

eng: If you want to study Chinese well, you should communicate with Chinese people more often.
simp: 要想学好中文, 就应该多跟中国人交流.
trad: 要想學好中文, 就應該多跟中國人交流.

eng: If you want to keep healthy, you should do more exercises.
simp: 要想身体健康, 就应该多锻练身体.
trad: 要想身體健康, 就應該多鍛練身體.

eng: It's hard, but I'm going to make it!
simp: 这并不容易，但我一定做到的！
trad: 這並不容易，但我一定做到的！

eng: At one time, people would not have hesitated to light up a cigarette in stations, restaurants, or hospital waiting rooms.
simp: 在以前的人的眼中，在车站、餐厅、医院的等候室里抽烟并没有甚麽问题。
trad: 在以前的人的眼中，在車站、餐廳、醫院的等候室裏抽煙並沒有甚麼問題。

eng: It's gravity that makes satellites move around the Earth.
simp: 让卫星环绕地球的是重力。
trad: 讓衛星環繞地球的是重力。

eng: The night was cold.
The snow lay on the ground, frozen into a thick, hard crust.
simp: 地上覆盖着积雪，冻成了又硬又厚的壳。
trad: 地上覆蓋著積雪，凍成了又硬又厚的殼。

eng: When pressure is lower, the boiling point is lower.
It's getting hotter and hotter.
She had scarcely finished speaking when he cut in.
simp: 她几乎没有说完话，就被他打断了。
trad: 她幾乎沒有說完話，就被他打斷了。

eng: It was a stormy day, and the snow was falling fast.
simp: 这天刮着暴风雪，雪下得很大。
trad: 這天刮著暴風雪，雪下得很大。

eng: A goatherd drove his goats, all white with snow, into a deserted cave for shelter.
simp: 一个牧羊人把赶着全身盖白雪的山羊进去被遗弃的山洞躲避暴风雪。
trad: 一個牧羊人把趕著全身蓋白雪的山羊進去被遺棄的山洞躲避暴風雪。

eng: I'm not a poet; I couldn't write a single line to depict its beauty.
simp: 我不是诗人，无法描绘它的美丽。
trad: 我不是詩人，無法描繪它的美麗。

eng: A square has four angles.
Milk is sold by the pint.
Beer is sold by the pint.
The first electronic computer was produced in our country in 1941.
simp: 我们的国家1941年设计了第一台电子计算机。
trad: 我們的國家1941年設計了第一臺電子計算機。

eng: I have received a letter from a friend.
simp: 我收到了朋友的一封信。
trad: 我收到了朋友的一封信。

eng: I have received your letter and read it with delight.
simp: 我收到了你的来信，很高兴地读了。
trad: 我收到了你的來信，很高興地讀了。

eng: This truck has a maximum load of 5 tons.
simp: 这辆卡车最大的载重量是5吨。
trad: 這輛卡車最大的載重量是5噸。

eng: The piston does not come into contact with the cylinder cover.
simp: 这个活塞不接触汽缸盖。
trad: 這個活塞不接觸汽缸蓋。

eng: The Pacific Ocean alone covers an area larger than that of all continents put together.
simp: 仅太平洋的面积就比所有的大陆的总和面积还要大。
trad: 僅太平洋的面積就比所有的大陸的總和面積還要大。

eng: Who did you come with?
I have three dogs. One is male and the other two are female.
simp: 我养了三隻狗，一隻是雄的，其馀两隻是雌的。
trad: 我養了三隻狗，一隻是雄的，其餘兩隻是雌的。

eng: Our team is seeded in the ping-pong competition.
simp: 我们队是这次乒乓球比赛得标的热门队。
trad: 我們隊是這次乒乓球比賽得標的熱門隊。

eng: The China National Table Tennis Team had a month's closed training in winter.
simp: 中国乒乓球队进行了一个月的封闭式冬训。
trad: 中國乒乓球隊進行了一個月的封閉式冬訓。

eng: They tried to use an iron bar to pry open the lock.
simp: 他们试图用一根铁棒撬开锁。
trad: 他們試圖用一根鐵棒撬開鎖。

eng: Opera in English is, in the main, just about as sensible as baseball in Italian.
simp: 以英语唱的歌剧，大致上和以意大利语玩的棒球般过得去。
trad: 以英語唱的歌劇，大致上和以意大利語玩的棒球般過得去。

eng: He deserves six of the best for being so rude.
simp: 他这样粗鲁，该棒打几下。
trad: 他這樣粗魯，該棒打幾下。

eng: Whenever he moved, the wound sent pains all along his arm.
simp: 他只要一动, 伤口就连带整个胳膊都疼。
trad: 他只要一動, 傷口就連帶整個胳膊都疼。

eng: Take two aspirins for your headache.
simp: 你头疼吃两片阿司匹林吧.
trad: 你頭疼吃兩片阿司匹林吧.

eng: The doctor has given her some tablets to take away the pain.
simp: 医生给了她一些止疼药片。
trad: 醫生給了她一些止疼藥片。

eng: You are not a student.
Tom likes trying out new things.
simp: 汤姆很喜欢尝试新事物。
trad: 湯姆很喜歡嘗試新事物。

eng: They looked at the rubbish, then they looked at each other.
simp: 他们看了看那堆垃圾，再互相望了一眼。
trad: 他們看了看那堆垃圾，再互相望了一眼。

eng: People used to be afraid of the future. Today, it is the future that should be afraid of people.
simp: 从前人们害怕未来。现在，是未来该害怕人们。
trad: 從前人們害怕未來。現在，是未來該害怕人們。

eng: What do I think, you say ... well then, I'll give you my candid opinion.
simp: 你问我怎麽想？……好吧，那我就把我的心底话说出来吧。
trad: 你問我怎麼想？……好吧，那我就把我的心底話說出來吧。

eng: The station is nearby.
A little reflection will show you that you are wrong.
simp: 只要你细心想一想，就会明白自己的错处了。
trad: 只要你細心想一想，就會明白自己的錯處了。

eng: She wanted him to tell her that he loved her.
Men's wants become greater in proportion to the increase in their income.
simp: 人收入愈高，慾望就愈大。
trad: 人收入愈高，慾望就愈大。

eng: Love is seeing her in your dreams.
simp: 爱便是在你的梦中梦见她。
trad: 愛便是在你的夢中夢見她。

eng: He ignored the existing laws.
He seduced her with false promises.
simp: 他用虚假的诺言欺骗了他。
trad: 他用虛假的諾言欺騙了他。

eng: With all its sham, drudgery and broken dreams; it is still a beautiful world.
simp: 虽然虚伪、苦痛还有破碎的梦伴随着我，但这仍然是一个美丽的世界。
trad: 雖然虛偽、苦痛還有破碎的夢伴隨著我，但這仍然是一個美麗的世界。

eng: Why don't you give her some flowers?
She meant this gift for you.
Keep this information under your hat.
simp: 不要把这些资料洩露出去。
trad: 不要把這些資料洩露出去。

eng: He's gone to Nagoya on business.
Is it possible to determine the diameter from the circumference?
simp: 用圆周能不能求得直径？
trad: 用圓周能不能求得直徑？

eng: A Japanese person would never do such a thing.
simp: 日本人是不会做这种事的。
trad: 日本人是不會做這種事的。

eng: Because my mother is sick, my father will cook today.
simp: 母亲病了，所以今天由父亲下厨。
trad: 母親病了，所以今天由父親下廚。

eng: I was shocked by the dog that sprang out of the darkness.
simp: 黑暗中突然有一隻狗冒了出来，把我吓了一跳。
trad: 黑暗中突然有一隻狗冒了出來，把我嚇了一跳。

eng: I don't like chocolate.
Instead of eating real food, we just ate junk food all day.
simp: 我们整天吃的都是杂七杂八的零嘴，并没有甚麽正规的食物下过肚。
trad: 我們整天吃的都是雜七雜八的零嘴，並沒有甚麼正規的食物下過肚。

eng: Sometimes things that happen do not make sense.
simp: 有时候，发生的事情并不是合情合理的。
trad: 有時候，發生的事情並不是合情合理的。

eng: That's our house.
He's just as tall as the other boys in his class.
simp: 他和他班上其他男生一样高。
trad: 他和他班上其他男生一樣高。

eng: This is how Scott and his men arrived at the South Pole.
simp: 这是史考特和他的伙伴到达南极的方法。
trad: 這是史考特和他的夥伴到達南極的方法。

eng: Please take that baggage to the post office.
simp: 请将这些行李拿到邮局那边。
trad: 請將這些行李拿到郵局那邊。

eng: One of my suitcases is large, and the other one is medium.
simp: 我的手提包，一只是大的，另一只是中号的。
trad: 我的手提包，一只是大的，另一只是中號的。

eng: My gloves are size medium.
Get me one in size m please.
A large or medium-sized one?
You only need a medium size.
I believe the medium size will fit you better.
simp: 我认为中号会更适合您。
trad: 我認為中號會更適合您。

eng: They've sold their house and car in preparation for leaving the country.
simp: 他们卖掉了房子和汽车准备出国.
trad: 他們賣掉了房子和汽車準備出國.

eng: If you want to sell your old sofa, why not put an advertisement in the local paper?
simp: 你若打算卖掉旧沙发, 何不在本地报纸上登个广告呢?
trad: 你若打算賣掉舊沙發, 何不在本地報紙上登個廣告呢?

eng: Need they have sold the farm?
simp: 他们那时非得把农场卖掉吗?
trad: 他們那時非得把農場賣掉嗎?

eng: He solved the problem in five minutes that I had struggled with for two hours.
simp: 他用五分钟就把我烦脑了两个小时的问题解决了。
trad: 他用五分鐘就把我煩腦了兩個小時的問題解決了。

eng: I looked for you everywhere and didn't find you.
simp: 我到处找你，但却找不到你。
trad: 我到處找你，但卻找不到你。

eng: I don't like the way this fruit smells.
simp: 我不太喜欢这水果的气味。
trad: 我不太喜歡這水果的氣味。

eng: I cannot cook as well as my mother does.
simp: 我的厨艺比不上我的母亲。
trad: 我的廚藝比不上我的母親。

eng: Hundreds of people were waiting outside the ticket office.
simp: 数以百计的人在售票处等候着。
trad: 數以百計的人在售票處等候著。

eng: Let's be frank in this question.
simp: 咱们一起坦诚地谈谈这个问题吧。
trad: 咱們一起坦誠地談談這個問題吧。

eng: Walking from the station to the house takes only five minutes.
simp: 从车站步行到那房子只需要五分钟的时间。
trad: 從車站步行到那房子只需要五分鐘的時間。

eng: The snail retreated into its shell.
Snails have been eating our lettuces.
simp: 蜗牛一直在吃我们的莴苣。
trad: 蝸牛一直在吃我們的萵苣。

eng: I cannot overcome my repugnance to eating snails.
simp: 吃蜗牛真恶心, 我可受不了.
trad: 吃蝸牛真惡心, 我可受不了.

eng: A snail's shell is spiral in form.
The snail drew in its feelers.
The snail draws in its feelers.
simp: 这只蜗牛将触角缩了回去。
trad: 這只蝸牛將觸角縮了回去。

eng: Farmers are very busy during the harvest.
simp: 在收获季节里农民非常忙碌。
trad: 在收獲季節裏農民非常忙碌。

eng: Winter is the coldest season in a year.
simp: 冬季是一年中最冷的季节。
trad: 冬季是一年中最冷的季節。

eng: Constantly blowing his nose in allergy season.
simp: 在过敏的季节不断地擤他的鼻子.
trad: 在過敏的季節不斷地擤他的鼻子.

eng: The paper was beginning to peel off the walls.
The cut is no longer weeping and is starting to heal.
simp: 伤口已不流脓, 渐渐愈合了
trad: 傷口已不流膿, 漸漸愈合了

eng: They watched her gradually weaken as the disease progressed.
simp: 他们观察到她随着病情变化身体也渐渐衰弱下去。
trad: 他們觀察到她隨著病情變化身體也漸漸衰弱下去。

eng: His hopes faded.
His visits became less frequent as time passed.
A fish bone has stuck in my throat.
simp: 一根鱼刺卡在我嗓子里了。
trad: 一根魚刺卡在我嗓子裏了。

eng: I have a bowl of cereal every morning.
simp: 我每天早晨吃一碗麦片粥。
trad: 我每天早晨吃一碗麥片粥。

eng: Go and help wash up at the sink!
simp: 到洗涤槽去帮忙洗碗盘吧！
trad: 到洗滌槽去幫忙洗碗盤吧！

eng: Weigongcun subway station has three exits.
simp: 魏公村地铁站有3个出口。
trad: 魏公村地鐵站有3個出口。

eng: It's lucky that his parents are so equable.
simp: 值得庆幸的是他双亲性情非常温和。
trad: 值得慶幸的是他雙親性情非常溫和。

eng: It's fairly mild for this time of year.
simp: 就现在这个节气来说天气是相当温和了。
trad: 就現在這個節氣來說天氣是相當溫和了。

eng: They traveled together.
The storm sent the temperature down.
simp: 暴风雨袭来, 气温随之下降。
trad: 暴風雨襲來, 氣溫隨之下降。

eng: The thermometer fell to zero last night.
simp: 昨夜温度计显示气温下降到零度。
trad: 昨夜溫度計顯示氣溫下降到零度。

eng: The temperature today is seventy degrees Fahrenheit.
simp: 今天气温是华氏七十度。
trad: 今天氣溫是華氏七十度。

eng: There was a drop in temperature after the rain.
Even after sunset there was little moderation in the temperature.
simp: 甚至在日落之后，气温也不见降低。
trad: 甚至在日落之後，氣溫也不見降低。

eng: A large quantity of air-conditioners has been sold since the temperature is high.
simp: 因为气温很高，有大量空调售出。
trad: 因為氣溫很高，有大量空調售出。

eng: The temperature has stayed hot this week.
You're just comforting yourself with a fantasy!
That's the spirit!
I want to ask him for his phone number.
simp: 我想问他的电话号码是多少。
trad: 我想問他的電話號碼是多少。

eng: What he did really shows the right spirit!
simp: 他做的这件事真是精神可嘉！
trad: 他做的這件事真是精神可嘉！

eng: Admittedly, it wasn't the best meal I've ever eaten.
simp: 不可否认，那并不是我吃过最好的一顿饭。
trad: 不可否認，那並不是我吃過最好的一頓飯。

eng: Over the past ten years, people have become increasingly aware that they need to change their eating habits.
simp: 十年来，人们越来越强烈地意识到需要改变自己的饮食习惯。
trad: 十年來，人們越來越強烈地意識到需要改變自己的飲食習慣。

eng: Modern healthy eating experts put emphasis on eating wholemeal bread and eating more vegetables.
simp: 现代的健康饮食专家强调要吃全麦面包，多吃蔬菜。
trad: 現代的健康飲食專家強調要吃全麥面包，多吃蔬菜。

eng: Computers seem to play the role of the human brain, so they're often called "electric brains".
simp: 计算机似乎有着人类大脑一样的作用，所以常常被称为电脑 。
trad: 計算機似乎有著人類大腦一樣的作用，所以常常被稱為電腦 。

eng: He survived an accident last year, but still drives recklessly.
simp: 他去年在事故中幸存了，可是他仍然很鲁莽地开车。
trad: 他去年在事故中幸存了，可是他仍然很魯莽地開車。

eng: She took Chinese medicine, which relieved her symptoms.
simp: 她吃了中药，所以症状减轻了。
trad: 她吃了中藥，所以癥狀減輕了。

eng: We know that a cat, whose eyes take in much more light than human eyes, can see clearly at night.
simp: 我们知道猫科动物的眼睛能够接受比人类的眼睛多得多的光线，所以夜裡的时候能看得清楚。
trad: 我們知道貓科動物的眼睛能夠接受比人類的眼睛多得多的光線，所以夜裡的時候能看得清楚。

eng: The jobless became desperate for work – any work that would help them to support their families.
simp: 失业者渴望工作，所以任何有助于养家煳口的工作都可以。
trad: 失業者渴望工作，所以任何有助於養家糊口的工作都可以。

eng: My brother may have acute appendicitis, in which case he’d have to have an operation.
simp: 我弟弟可能得了急性阑尾炎，要是这样他必须做个手术。
trad: 我弟弟可能得了急性闌尾炎，要是這樣他必須做個手術。

eng: They spoke of their high exam grades with understandable pride.
simp: 他们很骄傲地谈到考试中的好成绩，这种骄傲是可以理解的。
trad: 他們很驕傲地談到考試中的好成績，這種驕傲是可以理解的。

eng: Mary smiled, but her voice had some irritation in it.
simp: 玛丽微笑，但是声音带着些许气恼。
trad: 瑪麗微笑，但是聲音帶著些許氣惱。

eng: His failure to observe traffic regulations resulted in a serious accident.
simp: 因为他未能遵守交通规则，结果发生了严重的事故。
trad: 因為他未能遵守交通規則，結果發生了嚴重的事故。

eng: The journalist wanted to write an article that would draw public attention to the issue.
simp: 记者想写一篇文章，以便吸引公众对那件事情的注意。
trad: 記者想寫一篇文章，以便吸引公眾對那件事情的註意。

eng: I tried to in vain to deal with the problem.
simp: 我想解决这个问题，可是白费功夫。
trad: 我想解決這個問題，可是白費功夫。

eng: Who here has a panda at home? "I do!"
simp: 「呢度有冇人屋企养熊猫㗎？」「我！」
trad: 「呢度有冇人屋企養熊貓㗎？」「我！」

eng: I will definitely attend your funeral.
simp: 我一定会去参加你的葬礼的。
trad: 我一定會去參加你的葬禮的。

eng: Don't worry, Dima attempted to put the woman at ease. "It's not mine."
simp: 「别担心，」狄马尝试让店员镇定下来：「那不是我的血。」
trad: 「別擔心，」狄馬嘗試讓店員鎮定下來：「那不是我的血。」

eng: Oh, well... thought Dima. "I suppose that I can't be picky at a time like this."
simp: 「唉，算了吧，」狄马心想：「这实在不是挑三挑四的时候。」
trad: 「唉，算了吧，」狄馬心想：「這實在不是挑三挑四的時候。」

eng: She wiped her wet hair with a towel.
simp: 她用毛巾把头髮抹乾了。
trad: 她用毛巾把頭髮抹乾了。

eng: Plan your work before you start it.
simp: 开始工作前要先做好计划。
trad: 開始工作前要先做好計劃。

eng: You have to put an adjective after "不够."
simp: 不够后面要再加个形容词
trad: 不夠後面要再加個形容詞

eng: She wants to work in a hospital.
How about you?
How about you?
John is good at chess.
simp: 约翰国际象棋下得很好。
trad: 約翰國際象棋下得很好。

eng: No thank you, I don't need a plastic bag.
simp: 不用，谢谢。不需要塑料袋。
trad: 不用，謝謝。不需要塑料袋。

eng: The sun is about to set.
Stop!
It's not us.
This is Doraemon.
Aah! Hang on a minute!
Hang on a minute. There's quite a few black chess pieces over there.
Oh no, there are more straight ahead!
Woof, woof, woof!
Full speed ahead!
You're picking on someone smaller than you again!
So cute!
Mother will be furious for sure!
That idea's not bad.
We took an examination in math last week.
simp: 我们上个星期去了数学的考试。
trad: 我們上個星期去了數學的考試。

eng: What's the next station?
Tell me what happened.
My brother bought an electric guitar.
simp: 我的兄弟买了电子吉他。
trad: 我的兄弟買了電子吉他。

eng: If there's no solution, then there's no problem.
simp: 没有解决的方法，也就不会有问题。
trad: 沒有解決的方法，也就不會有問題。

eng: This winter we experienced many rainstorms.
simp: 这个冬天我们经历了许多场暴风雨。
trad: 這個冬天我們經歷了許多場暴風雨。

eng: She might be leaving.
I want to buy a new car.
My hovercraft is full of eels.
Give me back my money!
That sounds very tempting.
Yes, yes, of course.
This isn't Little Black is it?
Is this your family's cat?
Sorry to let you wait for so long.
JingXiang is so cute.
There’s work and there’s your life’s work.
simp: 有的工作只是工作，有的工作是你毕生的事业。
trad: 有的工作只是工作，有的工作是你畢生的事業。

eng: Are you still a virgin?
What do you want to do today?
What fruit do you like the best?
What fruit do you like the best?
I like the cold.
Does this cap belong to you?
Antares is a red star.
simp: 心宿二（天蝎座星）是一颗红色的星星。
trad: 心宿二（天蠍座星）是一顆紅色的星星。

eng: Don't get so excited!
Be a good child!
I would always go swimming in the sea when I was little.
simp: 我小时候经常在海里游泳。
trad: 我小時候經常在海裏遊泳。

eng: This dictionary is no good.
What do you think of this place?
simp: 你觉得这套房子怎么样？
trad: 你覺得這套房子怎麼樣？

eng: She threw off her shoes and socks in anger.
simp: 她很生气地把鞋子，袜子脱掉。
trad: 她很生氣地把鞋子，襪子脫掉。

eng: I'm fine too.
Foxes eat hens.
You will be killed!
But that's not the last train, right?
simp: 可是这不是最后一班火车，对吧？
trad: 可是這不是最後一班火車，對吧？

eng: When it comes to animals, this can't be considered as being something cruel.
simp: 对动物来说这不是什么残酷的事情。
trad: 對動物來說這不是什麼殘酷的事情。

eng: It's been snowing all night.
Have you seen this man?
There are 30 students in our class.
Have you still not finished paying for my bike?
simp: 你还没有为我的自行车付完款吗？
trad: 你還沒有為我的自行車付完款嗎？

eng: The telephone was invented by Bell.
Could you tell me?
Only peace can save the world.
simp: 只有和平能够拯救世界。
trad: 只有和平能夠拯救世界。

eng: There are a lot of books in our school's library.
simp: 我们学校的图书馆藏书很多。
trad: 我們學校的圖書館藏書很多。

eng: I'll open the window a bit.
No, you misunderstood.
Oww, it hurts. I'll pay attention next time.
simp: 我下次会注意啦，好痛喔。
trad: 我下次會註意啦，好痛喔。

eng: I know!
Found him, he is over there.
He is not angry anymore.
Tom is very talented.
What were you doing this morning?
The teacher has never made fun of the students' mistakes.
simp: 老师从来不拿学生们的错误来开玩笑。
trad: 老師從來不拿學生們的錯誤來開玩笑。

eng: She is always trying new things.
Some of the money was stolen.
Close your eyes.
I can't bear to deal with her anymore.
Leave me a bit of ice cream.
Circumstances are entirely favorable to us.
That tradition has fallen into desuetude.
simp: 那习俗已经不再盛行了。
trad: 那習俗已經不再盛行了。

eng: I refuse to be taken in by her guile.
simp: 我是不会被她的诡计骗倒的。
trad: 我是不會被她的詭計騙倒的。

eng: Hackers are adept at getting around computer security measures.
simp: 黑客很会利用电脑安全措拖的漏洞。
trad: 黑客很會利用電腦安全措拖的漏洞。

eng: I'll eat almost anything, but I'm very fickle when it comes to cheese.
simp: 我是甚麽都吃的那种人，但是吃起司却很讲心情。
trad: 我是甚麼都吃的那種人，但是吃起司卻很講心情。

eng: Fingernails grow nearly four times faster than toenails.
simp: 手甲的生长速度比脚甲快四倍。
trad: 手甲的生長速度比腳甲快四倍。

eng: What are you looking at?
What are you doing?
What happened to you?
Stay here and wait for her.
He went to Tokyo on business.
Workaholics view holidays as a waste of time.
simp: 在工作狂的眼中，放假就是在浪费时间。
trad: 在工作狂的眼中，放假就是在浪費時間。

eng: Could be, could be.
Lower your voices!
No worries! This is good enough!
Is she Japanese?
I am afraid of dogs.
He should have been a lawyer.
simp: 他本应该成为一个律师。
trad: 他本應該成為一個律師。

eng: That tall man is Mr Smith.
simp: 那个高个男人是史密斯先生。
trad: 那個高個男人是史密斯先生。

eng: I like to go fishing with my father.
simp: 我喜欢和父亲一起去钓鱼。
trad: 我喜歡和父親一起去釣魚。

eng: Internet is very slow.
Translation is a scholarly discipline.
It is presently very difficult to calm down and treat oneself with a book.
simp: 现在很难静下心来好好看一本书。
trad: 現在很難靜下心來好好看一本書。

eng: Excessive choice results in the inability to choose.
simp: 选择太多导致无法选择。
trad: 選擇太多導致無法選擇。

eng: The shards of thought were scattered on the ground.
No one knows his real name.
simp: 没有人知道他的真名字。
trad: 沒有人知道他的真名字。

eng: Which is your book?
Which is your book?
Which is your book?
Which is your book?
I can't put up with it.
I can not stomach it.
What kind of person is she?
Does anyone speak English?
Because he is wealthy, he can go there.
simp: 因为他有钱，所以能去那儿。
trad: 因為他有錢，所以能去那兒。

eng: The air was polluted by exhaust gas.
The air was polluted by exhaust gas.
They were very tired indeed.
He is a doctor and an author.
simp: 他是一个医生和一个作家。
trad: 他是一個醫生和一個作家。

eng: The moon moves around the earth.
The situation there was critical.
You're reliable.
Where can I buy it?
I get it.
Do not play with the key.
I think the eggs that I just ate were rotten.
simp: 我觉得我刚吃的鸡蛋坏了。
trad: 我覺得我剛吃的雞蛋壞了。

eng: He's always busy.
Is the rat alive or dead?
simp: 这隻老鼠是死还是活的？
trad: 這隻老鼠是死還是活的？

eng: It is said that truth always triumphs.
Boys run fast.
Invite your friend for dinner.
Since my mother was sick, I stayed home from school.
simp: 既然母亲病了，我就待在家里没去上学。
trad: 既然母親病了，我就待在家裏沒去上學。

eng: His wife is quite a talented woman.
Who is reading?
I saw a group of foreigners on my way to school this morning.
simp: 今天早上在去学校的路上，我看到了一群外国人。
trad: 今天早上在去學校的路上，我看到了一群外國人。

eng: Yesterday, an explosion occurred at the fireworks factory.
simp: 昨晚，烟花厂发生了爆炸。
trad: 昨晚，煙花廠發生了爆炸。

eng: The problem is that the money is not of such importance as the time.
simp: 问题在于，金钱没有时间那样重要。
trad: 問題在於，金錢沒有時間那樣重要。

eng: When children play Go, they use a board with 5x5 or 7x7 lines.
simp: 孩子们下围棋，会使用5x5或者7x7的棋盘。
trad: 孩子們下圍棋，會使用5x5或者7x7的棋盤。

eng: I have numerous books on my bookshelf.
simp: 我有大量的书在我的书架上。
trad: 我有大量的書在我的書架上。

eng: I see dead people.
She may be proud of her daughter.
simp: 她可以为她的女儿感到骄傲。
trad: 她可以為她的女兒感到驕傲。

eng: A huge monster is coming down the mountain.
simp: 从山上走来一只巨大的怪物。
trad: 從山上走來一只巨大的怪物。

eng: A true scientist would not approach the question this way.
simp: 真正的科学家不会这样去思考。
trad: 真正的科學家不會這樣去思考。

eng: Which is your favorite song?
A hundred years is called a century.
simp: 一百年被叫做一个世纪。
trad: 一百年被叫做一個世紀。

eng: One hundred years is called a century.
Seeing those tasks, I did not feel the burden.
simp: 看到这些作业，我毫无压力。
trad: 看到這些作業，我毫無壓力。

eng: Opinions vary from person to person.
I think what you say is true.
She doesn't have as much patience as you do.
She said that she gets up at six every morning.
simp: 她说她每天早上六点起床。
trad: 她說她每天早上六點起床。

eng: Students must keep silent during a class.
simp: 学生在课堂上必须保持安静。
trad: 學生在課堂上必須保持安靜。

eng: On my way to the theater I saw a traffic accident.
simp: 在去剧院的路上，我看到了一起车祸。
trad: 在去劇院的路上，我看到了一起車禍。

eng: It was dark when I reached the hotel.
simp: 我到旅馆的时候，天已经黑了。
trad: 我到旅館的時候，天已經黑了。

eng: Yes, I understand!
But no one wanted to hear it.
I don't like summer.
He told us an interesting story.
simp: 他给我们讲了一个有趣的故事。
trad: 他給我們講了一個有趣的故事。

eng: Tatoeba is a dictionary.
Because of the change in Canadian marriage laws, many American homosexuals came to Canada to get married.
simp: 由于加拿大婚姻法的改变，所以很多美国同性恋者去了加拿大结婚。
trad: 由於加拿大婚姻法的改變，所以很多美國同性戀者去了加拿大結婚。

eng: A female friend of mine loves to go to gay bars with me.
simp: 我的一个女性朋友喜欢跟我一起去同志酒吧。
trad: 我的一個女性朋友喜歡跟我一起去同誌酒吧。

eng: Gay marriage is permitted in less than 20% of countries.
simp: 世界上允许同性婚姻的国家不超过20%。
trad: 世界上允許同性婚姻的國家不超過20%。

eng: To be black is better than to be gay. If you were born black, at least you don't have to think about how to tell your mother about this.
simp: 做一个黑人好过做一个同志。如果你生下来就是黑人，至少你不用烦恼怎么向你的母亲说这件事。
trad: 做一個黑人好過做一個同誌。如果你生下來就是黑人，至少你不用煩惱怎麼向你的母親說這件事。

eng: I'm gay.
She's a blog addict.
Mr. Crouch, what are you doing?
What is he so angry about?
simp: 他在对什么大发雷霆啊？
trad: 他在對什麼大發雷霆啊？

eng: Tom is no longer a lazy child.
simp: 汤姆再也不是懒惰的孩子了。
trad: 湯姆再也不是懶惰的孩子了。

eng: How odd!
In the distance I hear the sound of softly murmuring roads.
simp: 我听到轻柔的沙沙声从远方的路上传来。
trad: 我聽到輕柔的沙沙聲從遠方的路上傳來。

eng: Starting tomorrow, it's going to snow for a week.
simp: 雪从明天开始下，一直持续一个星期。
trad: 雪從明天開始下，一直持續一個星期。

eng: I'm studying at the University of Hyogo.
simp: 我在兵库县立大学学习。
trad: 我在兵庫縣立大學學習。

eng: If you ask her too directly whether she has a friend, she will become suspicious and answer: "Why did you ask me that?".
simp: 如果你太直接问她有没有朋友，她会怀疑且反问：“你为什么要这样问？”
trad: 如果你太直接問她有沒有朋友，她會懷疑且反問：“你為什麼要這樣問？”

eng: Our math teacher drew a circle on the blackboard.
simp: 我们的数学老师在黑板上画了一个圆。
trad: 我們的數學老師在黑板上畫了一個圓。

eng: It says in the Bible, "Man shall not live on bread alone."
simp: 圣经里有一句话，叫做“人不能只靠面包生活”。
trad: 聖經裏有一句話，叫做“人不能只靠面包生活”。

eng: I am more beautiful than you.
Your theory has no scientific basis.
simp: 你的理论并没有科学根据。
trad: 你的理論並沒有科學根據。

eng: Soccer is the most popular of all sports.
simp: 足球是所有体育运动中最受欢迎的。
trad: 足球是所有體育運動中最受歡迎的。

eng: They're self sufficient.
She's my first love.
And if I were gay, would that be a crime?
simp: 如果我是同志那又怎样？这能构成犯罪吗？
trad: 如果我是同誌那又怎樣？這能構成犯罪嗎？

eng: Who took me here?
At first, I felt they were right to have fired me.
simp: 刚开始我还觉得他们解僱我是对的。
trad: 剛開始我還覺得他們解僱我是對的。

eng: Tom didn't want to interrupt Mary while she was studying.
She borrows novels from Tom.
Fuck, we're old!
They boil water for tea.
We have two ears.
Excuse me. Can you direct me to the nearest subway station?
simp: 打扰一下。请问你能告诉我最近的地铁站在哪吗？
trad: 打擾一下。請問你能告訴我最近的地鐵站在哪嗎？

eng: I love Spanish!
Oranges contain a lot of vitamin C.
simp: 橙子含有大量的维生素 C。
trad: 橙子含有大量的維生素 C。

eng: Work hard so that you may earn your living.
simp: 努力工作才能养活自己。
trad: 努力工作才能養活自己。

eng: Drawing is a lot of fun; it helps me to relax.
simp: 画画能带给我很多乐趣，也能让我放松自己。
trad: 畫畫能帶給我很多樂趣，也能讓我放松自己。

eng: I guess I'm never going to get married.
What are you concerned about?
Try to have a positive attitude about everything.
simp: 试着用积极的态度去面对任何事情。
trad: 試著用積極的態度去面對任何事情。

eng: You're much less likely to get a good position if you don't speak English.
simp: 如果你不会说英语，你就很难得到一个好的职位。
trad: 如果你不會說英語，你就很難得到一個好的職位。

eng: You're right, I'm sorry.
Waaaa...
This firm ranks second in the oil trade.
simp: 这家公司在石油行业排名第二。
trad: 這家公司在石油行業排名第二。

eng: The humble man is getting along with his neighbors.
simp: 那个谦逊的男人跟邻里相处得很好。
trad: 那個謙遜的男人跟鄰裏相處得很好。

eng: Musical talent can be developed if it's properly trained.
simp: 如果训练得当的话，音乐才能是可以培养出来的。
trad: 如果訓練得當的話，音樂才能是可以培養出來的。

eng: I'm truly grateful!
Not in there.
He doesn't drink coffee.
Your cooking is delicious.
I understand!
I would really like to know why he did such a thing.
simp: 我真的很想知道他为甚麽会做出这种事来。
trad: 我真的很想知道他為甚麼會做出這種事來。

eng: The shop was crowded with young people.
He almost never gets angry.
simp: 他几乎从来都不会生气。
trad: 他幾乎從來都不會生氣。

eng: You can omit the last chapter of the book.
simp: 你可以删去书里面的最后一章。
trad: 你可以刪去書裏面的最後一章。

eng: Did you buy it today or yesterday?
simp: 你是今天买还是昨天买的？
trad: 你是今天買還是昨天買的？

eng: I know you're probably mad about what I said yesterday.
simp: 我知道我昨天说的那番话把你弄得很生气。
trad: 我知道我昨天說的那番話把你弄得很生氣。

eng: I hope we will be able to keep in touch.
simp: 希望我们能够保持联络吧。
trad: 希望我們能夠保持聯絡吧。

eng: Jane could not believe it when her date polished off an entire chocolate cake.
simp: 珍的男朋友一口气把整个巧克力蛋糕吃得一乾二淨，把珍看得目瞪口呆。
trad: 珍的男朋友一口氣把整個巧克力蛋糕吃得一乾二淨，把珍看得目瞪口呆。

eng: She looks very elegant.
I prefer cakes or candies to alcohol, but I do drink.
simp: 比起酒来，我比较喜欢蛋糕、糖果，可是酒我也不是完全不喝的。
trad: 比起酒來，我比較喜歡蛋糕、糖果，可是酒我也不是完全不喝的。

eng: Sometimes the hardest thing and the right thing are the same thing.
simp: 有时候，最难走的路，就是最该走的路。
trad: 有時候，最難走的路，就是最該走的路。

eng: My faith in the next generation is increasing.
simp: 我对我们的下一代愈来愈有信心了。
trad: 我對我們的下一代愈來愈有信心了。

eng: I'm still in school.
The slippery snake slithered right out of his hand.
simp: 那条蛇滑熘熘的，一下子就从他的手中掉了出来。
trad: 那條蛇滑溜溜的，一下子就從他的手中掉了出來。

eng: My father retired at the age of 65.
simp: 我的父亲65岁的时候退休了。
trad: 我的父親65歲的時候退休了。

eng: Plato is my friend, but the truth is worth more to me.
simp: 柏拉图是我的朋友，但于我，真理比这更重要。
trad: 柏拉圖是我的朋友，但於我，真理比這更重要。

eng: It is sometimes hard to choose between dreams and reality.
simp: 梦想和现实有时真的很难取舍。
trad: 夢想和現實有時真的很難取舍。

eng: You are allowed to use the hotel's swimming pool.
simp: 你有权使用旅馆的游泳池。
trad: 你有權使用旅館的遊泳池。

eng: A big tree has fallen in the storm.
simp: 一棵大树在风暴中倒下了。
trad: 一棵大樹在風暴中倒下了。

eng: Please replace the empty ink cartridge in the printer.
simp: 请把打印机里面的空的墨粉鼓换掉。
trad: 請把打印機裏面的空的墨粉鼓換掉。

eng: Come, Emilia! Your father is waiting for you.
simp: 快来，Emilia! 你爸爸在等你呢。
trad: 快來，Emilia! 你爸爸在等你呢。

eng: Mastering a foreign language involves a lot of patience.
simp: 学好一门外语需要坚韧不拔的毅力。
trad: 學好一門外語需要堅韌不拔的毅力。

eng: Waiter needed.
Here is my email address.
Excuse me, could you please show me your driving licence?
simp: 打扰了，你能给我看一下你的驾照吗?
trad: 打擾了，你能給我看一下你的駕照嗎?

eng: Where is the police station?
How much is four times six?
How much is four times six?
The set of prime numbers is countable.
Do you like school?
Do you like school?
You have to leave.
You have to leave.
In addition to English, he speaks German.
I'm waiting for my girlfriend.
He is not here.
She could not refrain from tears.
My parents don't know.
I studied for more than two hours, and afterward I went to bed.
simp: 我学习了两个多小时，然后就去睡觉了。
trad: 我學習了兩個多小時，然後就去睡覺了。

eng: Do I have to write a letter?
He lost consciousness under the influence of the anesthetic.
simp: 在麻醉剂的作用下，他昏了过去。
trad: 在麻醉劑的作用下，他昏了過去。

eng: Tom isn't accustomed to walking barefooted.
simp: 汤姆不习惯光着脚漫步。
trad: 湯姆不習慣光著腳漫步。

eng: Tom isn't accustomed to walking barefooted.
She is lacking in common sense.
He is lacking in common sense.
Don't worry. She doesn't understand German.
It's really awesome.
He doesn't have any knowledge about American democracy.
simp: 他一点都不知道美国的民主。
trad: 他一點都不知道美國的民主。

eng: I already apologized.
She has no real friends.
He had the right idea.
I will go to Australia by train.
simp: 我将乘火车去澳大利亚。
trad: 我將乘火車去澳大利亞。

eng: I've forgotten his name.
Stand up.
The prevention of forest fires is everyone's responsibility.
I teach Chinese.
I was glad at the news.
simp: 我听到那消息，十分高兴。
trad: 我聽到那消息，十分高興。

eng: An hour has sixty minutes, and a minute has sixty seconds.
simp: 一个小时有六十分钟，一分钟有六十秒。
trad: 一個小時有六十分鐘，一分鐘有六十秒。

eng: I have done everything I was supposed to do.
simp: 我要做的事情都已经做了。
trad: 我要做的事情都已經做了。

eng: Please come home as quickly as possible.
The Beatles consisted of four musicians.
simp: The Beatles 由四个音乐家组成。
trad: The Beatles 由四個音樂家組成。

eng: What is your advice?
I like to take things apart to see what makes them tick.
simp: 我喜欢把东西拆开，看看里面的结构。
trad: 我喜歡把東西拆開，看看裏面的結構。

eng: We associate Darwin with the theory of evolution.
simp: 一提到进化论，我们就会想起达尔文。
trad: 一提到進化論，我們就會想起達爾文。

eng: I haven't seen him for a very long time.
The students are talking about language and culture.
simp: 学生们在探讨语言和文化。
trad: 學生們在探討語言和文化。

eng: Bye!
Bye!
Our plane took off exactly on time at six.
simp: 我们的飞机准时在六时正起飞了。
trad: 我們的飛機準時在六時正起飛了。

eng: She asked me whether I liked the plan or not.
simp: 她问我喜不喜欢这个计划。
trad: 她問我喜不喜歡這個計劃。

eng: What am I to do now?
Life is like licking honey off a cactus.
simp: 生活就像是舔仙人掌上的蜂蜜。
trad: 生活就像是舔仙人掌上的蜂蜜。

eng: Dennis can be very wild sometimes.
It is clear that the Americans can't even solve their own problems, so how can they possibly think themselves capable of dealing with the rest of the world's problems?
simp: 显然，美国人连他们自己的问题都解决不了，所以他们怎么可能认为自己有足够的能力解决其他国家的问题呢？
trad: 顯然，美國人連他們自己的問題都解決不了，所以他們怎麼可能認為自己有足夠的能力解決其他國家的問題呢？

eng: This girl is always smiling, but she's not happy.
simp: 这个女孩总是微笑着，但她并不幸福。
trad: 這個女孩總是微笑著，但她並不幸福。

eng: His daily behavior is not consistent with his principles.
simp: 他的日常行为并不和他的原则相一致。
trad: 他的日常行為並不和他的原則相一致。

eng: Brian left his belongings behind.
simp: Brian 丢下了自己的财产。
trad: Brian 丟下了自己的財產。

eng: Who saw the funeral today?
I am pronouncing Chinese words.
You swim better than me.
This story is true.
I like that person.
Is laughter a quality of man only?
He was moved to tears when he heard the news.
simp: 当他听到那个新闻的时候，他感动得哭了。
trad: 當他聽到那個新聞的時候，他感動得哭了。

eng: Yesterday night, I was almost bitten to death by the laboratory mosquitoes.
simp: 昨天晚上，我快被实验室的蚊子咬死了。
trad: 昨天晚上，我快被實驗室的蚊子咬死了。

eng: Only adults may watch that film.
simp: 只有成人可以看那种电影。
trad: 只有成人可以看那種電影。

eng: These pants fit me well.
simp: 这些裤子我穿起来很合身。
trad: 這些褲子我穿起來很合身。

eng: Sometimes Dennis is really crazy.
simp: 有时候， Dennis真的很疯狂。
trad: 有時候， Dennis真的很瘋狂。

eng: Hope is a little voice whispering "maybe" when it seems the entire world is shouting "no"!
simp: 希望就是当整个世界都在说“不“的时候轻声地说“还有可能”。
trad: 希望就是當整個世界都在說“不“的時候輕聲地說“還有可能”。

eng: I owe it you that I am still alive.
Tom doesn't think this is a coincidence.
simp: 汤姆不认为这是一个巧合。
trad: 湯姆不認為這是一個巧合。

eng: It seems very interesting.
She has 1001 wishes.
There's no need to be polite with this kind of person.
This man is not reliable.
They found out.
Even though my friend was a vegetarian, I didn't tell him that the soup had some meat in it.
simp: 我的朋友是吃素的，可是我没有告诉他汤里有肉。
trad: 我的朋友是吃素的，可是我沒有告訴他湯裏有肉。

eng: Words fly, texts remain.
simp: 说话就如过眼云烟，文字却能流传千古。
trad: 說話就如過眼雲煙，文字卻能流傳千古。

eng: Tom had to go himself.
Your answer is wrong.
Welcome to our home.
He is fluent in French.
Madonna is able to sing.
She showed him the photo.
They all envied my new car.
He knows how to cut the engine.
When was the last time you cut the engine?
simp: 你最后一次关掉引擎是什么时候？
trad: 你最後一次關掉引擎是什麼時候？

eng: He knows how to read Chinese.
You're not dogs.
It's been a while. How are you?
I will study English at home.
She doesn't have the ticket.
Luckily she won a scholarship.
simp: 她很幸运地赢得了奖学金。
trad: 她很幸運地贏得了獎學金。

eng: Your opinion is very important to us.
simp: 您的意见对我们很重要。
trad: 您的意見對我們很重要。

eng: The school won't turn on the air conditioning, so the students are going to throw their hot water flasks off of the balcony in protest.
simp: 学校不给开空调，学生们就会从阳台上扔热水瓶抗议。
trad: 學校不給開空調，學生們就會從陽臺上扔熱水瓶抗議。

eng: Mr. Wang learnt German because he wanted to go to Germany.
simp: 王先生学德文，因为他想去德国。
trad: 王先生學德文，因為他想去德國。

eng: How is it going?
I never touch beer.
You all right?
Tom isn't a fool.
If you ever come back to me, I'll never treat you badly again.
simp: 如果你肯回到我的身边，我一定会永远好好待你。
trad: 如果你肯回到我的身邊，我一定會永遠好好待你。

eng: I'm afraid he won't be here until 1:00.
simp: 恐怕他要一点钟以后才能来到。
trad: 恐怕他要一點鐘以後才能來到。

eng: Mr. Wang learnt German because he wanted to work in Germany.
simp: 王先生学德文，因为他想在德国工作。
trad: 王先生學德文，因為他想在德國工作。

eng: Do you cook by gas or electricity?
Do you cook by gas or electricity?
simp: 你煮饭用天然气还是电力？
trad: 你煮飯用天然氣還是電力？

eng: Don't cry.
I have little money with me.
I trust him.
My eyes feel itchy.
She is a British citizen but her native land is France.
simp: 她是一个英国公民，但她是在法国出生的。
trad: 她是一個英國公民，但她是在法國出生的。

eng: This isn't good.
You made me laugh.
Have you ever written a blog?
My notebook is pink.
We need more workers.
I have never been to Germany.
He puts on a show of being impartial and unbiased, but I think he's just a guy with no opinion of his own.
simp: 他总在别人面前装出大公无私的样子，但依我看，他只不过是个没有主见的傢伙。
trad: 他總在別人面前裝出大公無私的樣子，但依我看，他只不過是個沒有主見的傢夥。

eng: Thanks for your advice.
She should be there now because she left an hour ago.
simp: 她是在一个小时前出发的，所以现在应该已经到了。
trad: 她是在一個小時前出發的，所以現在應該已經到了。

eng: It rained today so he can't come anymore.
simp: 今天下雨，所以他不能来了。
trad: 今天下雨，所以他不能來了。

eng: It's raining but never mind, I can still go.
simp: 下雨也没关係，我还是可以去。
trad: 下雨也沒關係，我還是可以去。

eng: I'm a dog.
Do you have any idea what they're talking about?
simp: 你知道他们在说甚麽吗？
trad: 你知道他們在說甚麼嗎？

eng: The pupils listened eagerly during his speech.
simp: 他演讲的时候，学生们都听得十分入神。
trad: 他演講的時候，學生們都聽得十分入神。

eng: Get down here!
I'm currently a teacher at this school.
simp: 我现在在这所学校任教。
trad: 我現在在這所學校任教。

eng: Quit chattering.
You haven't even updated the firmware?
Perhaps it's because the web is slow.
Every Jack has his Jill.
Do you know the boy in the picture?
simp: 你认识画里面的男孩吗？
trad: 你認識畫裏面的男孩嗎？

eng: Do you have any idea when the bank closes?
simp: 你知道银行什么时候关门吗？
trad: 你知道銀行什麼時候關門嗎？

eng: I didn't literally translate from English into Japanese.
simp: 我没有把英语直译成日语。
trad: 我沒有把英語直譯成日語。

eng: We know it's difficult, but please don't translate literally.
simp: 我们知道这很困难，但请不要直译。
trad: 我們知道這很困難，但請不要直譯。

eng: You've cut my hair too short.
simp: 你把我的头发剪得太短了。
trad: 你把我的頭發剪得太短了。

eng: I think you will find it convenient to put a short-cut on the desktop.
simp: 我想你迟早会知道在桌面建立一个快捷方式是有多方便。
trad: 我想你遲早會知道在桌面建立一個快捷方式是有多方便。

eng: Hey, that rhymes!
I admit that I was careless.
He was drowned.
He was drowned.
You ought to ask him for advice.
It depends on the context.
I don't like you anymore.
You understand me.
The real problem is not whether machines think but whether men do.
simp: 真正的问题不是机器有没有思想，而是人类有没有思想。
trad: 真正的問題不是機器有沒有思想，而是人類有沒有思想。

eng: The passengers all went aboard the ship.
I hope he comes tomorrow.
It's a lot of fun to learn Esperanto.
My whole body itches.
Have you ever eaten a banana pie?
I've changed my website's layout.
simp: 我改了一下我的网站的布局。
trad: 我改了一下我的網站的布局。

eng: He's sleeping like a baby.
simp: 他正睡着，像个婴儿一样。
trad: 他正睡著，像個嬰兒一樣。

eng: Goodbyes are always sad.
I suggest that we go out on Friday.
simp: 我建议我们星期五出去玩。
trad: 我建議我們星期五出去玩。

eng: Could you please repeat that?
I need your advice.
I'm getting ready for the worst.
simp: 我已经做好了最坏的打算。
trad: 我已經做好了最壞的打算。

eng: Take good care of yourself.
If we knew what we were doing, it wouldn't be called research, would it?
simp: 如果我们知道我们在做什么，那么这不能称之为研究，是吗？
trad: 如果我們知道我們在做什麼，那麼這不能稱之為研究，是嗎？

eng: I'm innocent.
I'm not guilty.
I love life.
I am really tired of living.
You need to reboot your computer.
You need to reboot your computer.
simp: 你们需要重新启动电脑。
trad: 你們需要重新啟動電腦。

eng: You need to reboot your computer.
I don't have enough RAM.
I don't like myself.
The cellphone came with several applications already pre-installed.
simp: 这部手机和一些预装的应用一起出售。
trad: 這部手機和一些預裝的應用一起出售。

eng: He should apologize for being rude to the guests.
simp: 他应该为自己对客人的粗鲁无礼而道歉。
trad: 他應該為自己對客人的粗魯無禮而道歉。

eng: It's a good deal.
Do you like rap?
I'm going to take my car.
He doesn't look his age.
There isn't any solution.
It's well done.
I was expecting it!
I don't expect anything from you.
simp: 我不指望从你身上得到什么。
trad: 我不指望從你身上得到什麼。

eng: Why aren't you coming with us?
simp: 你为什么不和我们一起来？
trad: 你為什麼不和我們一起來？

eng: He came several times.
I'm going to take a bath.
I have to give back the book before Saturday.
simp: 我必须在礼拜六之前把书还回去。
trad: 我必須在禮拜六之前把書還回去。

eng: Would you like to come?
I don't know if he would have done it for me.
simp: 我不知道他是否已经为我做好了。
trad: 我不知道他是否已經為我做好了。

eng: Make yourself at home.
You took the wrong key.
Florence is the most beautiful city in Italy.
simp: 佛罗伦萨是意大利最美丽的城市。
trad: 佛羅倫薩是意大利最美麗的城市。

eng: I talked to friends.
He is the last man to steal.
simp: 他是最后一个偷东西的人。
trad: 他是最後一個偷東西的人。

eng: Why are you arguing with the manager?
simp: 你为什么要和经理争论？
trad: 你為什麼要和經理爭論？

eng: It's a trap!
Why are people always called Tom in random sentences?
simp: 为什么随机句子中的人总是叫汤姆？
trad: 為什麼隨機句子中的人總是叫湯姆？

eng: Can you swim underwater?
I don't care for Alice.
Tom has never been on time.
simp: 汤姆从来都没有准时过。
trad: 湯姆從來都沒有準時過。

eng: It's absolutely impossible for me to go on like this.
simp: 让我像这样继续下去是绝对不可能的。
trad: 讓我像這樣繼續下去是絕對不可能的。

eng: I remember this word.
Why are you burning these pictures?
simp: 为什么你要烧这些图片呢？
trad: 為什麼你要燒這些圖片呢？

eng: Declarations of variables are extremely important in C and C++.
simp: 变量的声明在C和C++中极其重要。
trad: 變量的聲明在C和C++中極其重要。

eng: Sixty-four-bit software will not run on 32-bit architecture.
simp: 64位的软件在32位架构的系统上跑不起来。
trad: 64位的軟件在32位架構的系統上跑不起來。

eng: I've started Android programming.
simp: 我已经开始了我的安卓编程之旅。
trad: 我已經開始了我的安卓編程之旅。

eng: I'm developing an Android application.
simp: 我正在开发一个安卓应用。
trad: 我正在開發一個安卓應用。

eng: Do you know how to use these command line tools?
simp: 你知道怎样使用这些命令行工具吗？
trad: 你知道怎樣使用這些命令行工具嗎？

eng: I would like to buy a present for my wife. I thought about a scarf.
simp: 我想给妻子买一件礼物。我打算买一条围巾。
trad: 我想給妻子買一件禮物。我打算買一條圍巾。

eng: There are many lakes in the area where you live.
simp: 在你生活的地方有许多湖泊。
trad: 在你生活的地方有許多湖泊。

eng: It's hard to find a suitable translation.
Data compression algorithms can be classified in two categories: those with data loss and those without data loss.
simp: 压缩数据的算法能分为两种：一种会造成数据损失，另一种则不会。
trad: 壓縮數據的算法能分為兩種：一種會造成數據損失，另一種則不會。

eng: I want you to tell me the truth.
simp: 我想要你把真相告诉我。
trad: 我想要你把真相告訴我。

eng: I am disgusted with him.
How much money do you have hidden under your bed?
simp: 你在你的床下面藏了多少钱？
trad: 你在你的床下面藏了多少錢？

eng: Uh...how does this work?
I am fond of Australian food.
If you want to be credible, tell people only what they believe.
simp: 如果你想使他人相信你的话，那就只说他已经相信的东西吧。
trad: 如果你想使他人相信你的話，那就只說他已經相信的東西吧。

eng: Nearly all Japanese have dark hair.
simp: 几乎所有的日本人头发都是黑色的。
trad: 幾乎所有的日本人頭發都是黑色的。

eng: They never give up.
He has made little progress in his English.
simp: 他的英语有了小小的进步。
trad: 他的英語有了小小的進步。

eng: Children, listen!
I don't like the way she speaks.
simp: 我不喜欢她说话的态度。
trad: 我不喜歡她說話的態度。

eng: He told me he would go to Venice.
simp: 他告诉过我他会去威尼斯。
trad: 他告訴過我他會去威尼斯。

eng: Who are those guys?
I don't agree with him.
Her garden is a work of art.
simp: 她的花园是一件艺术作品。
trad: 她的花園是一件藝術作品。

eng: I don't want to fail my exams.
This place has a mysterious atmosphere.
simp: 这个地方有一种神秘的气氛。
trad: 這個地方有一種神秘的氣氛。

eng: I would like to retract my previous statement.
simp: 我想撤回我之前的陈述。
trad: 我想撤回我之前的陳述。

eng: Don't underestimate my power.
You ask me to do the impossible.
simp: 你让我做不可能做到的事情。
trad: 你讓我做不可能做到的事情。

eng: This will be a good souvenir of my trip around the United States.
simp: 这将是我环绕美国旅行中一个很好的纪念品。
trad: 這將是我環繞美國旅行中一個很好的紀念品。

eng: You are as tall as I am.
You are no better at remembering things than I am.
simp: 你记事情的能力并不比我好多少。
trad: 你記事情的能力並不比我好多少。

eng: Tell me about it!
I have to take medicine.
Where have you been?
Where were you?
I am praying in my room.
simp: 我正在我的房间里祈祷。
trad: 我正在我的房間裏祈禱。

eng: I have two big brothers.
Some were late.
Tom is the last person I want to see right now.
simp: 汤姆是我现在想见到的最后一个人。
trad: 湯姆是我現在想見到的最後一個人。

eng: Tom doesn't know when Mary will leave Boston.
simp: 汤姆不知道玛丽是什么时候离开波士顿的。
trad: 湯姆不知道瑪麗是什麼時候離開波士頓的。

eng: Let me introduce my parents to you.
simp: 让我给你介绍一下我的父母。
trad: 讓我給你介紹一下我的父母。

eng: I'll drive you to the airport.
He's not sure he wants to do this.
simp: 他不知道自己是不是真的想这样做。
trad: 他不知道自己是不是真的想這樣做。

eng: It's no use regretting it now.
Do you have a pen?
Time is up.
She is among the best artists of today.
simp: 她是现今最优秀的艺术家之一。
trad: 她是現今最優秀的藝術家之一。

eng: Don't intrude on her privacy.
He intruded on her privacy.
He pays with a credit card.
He had his hat blown off by the strong wind.
simp: 他的帽子给强风吹走了。
trad: 他的帽子給強風吹走了。

eng: Oh, no! I almost forgot!
You are to come with me.
It'll definitely rain.
You have no sense of direction.
You should pay your rent in advance.
You have to learn standard English.
You are not at all wrong.
You can rely on him.
Nobody's going to shed any tears if that old building gets torn down.
simp: 没有人会为这个旧建筑物的拆除而落泪。
trad: 沒有人會為這個舊建築物的拆除而落淚。

eng: You ought to thank him.

I am honored to be in the timeless city of Cairo, and to be hosted by two remarkable institutions. For over a thousand years, Al-Azhar has stood as a beacon of Islamic learning, and for over a century, Cairo University has been a source of Egypt's advancement.
simp: 我很荣幸能来到开罗这座不朽的城市，并受到两所着名学府的招待。千载以来，艾资哈尔大学一直担任着伊斯兰教育的指路明灯；百年以来，开罗大学亦一直是埃及全国的发展泉源。
trad: 我很榮幸能來到開羅這座不朽的城市，並受到兩所著名學府的招待。千載以來，艾資哈爾大學一直擔任著伊斯蘭教育的指路明燈；百年以來，開羅大學亦一直是埃及全國的發展泉源。

eng: I don't agree with the theory that one should learn Latin in order to better understand English.
simp: 有人说，要深入理解英语，就必须先学好拉丁语。我不同意这种说法。
trad: 有人說，要深入理解英語，就必須先學好拉丁語。我不同意這種說法。

eng: I see that he is an able man.
No sign of the enemy in our surroundings.
simp: 在我们的周围没有敌人的迹象。
trad: 在我們的周圍沒有敵人的跡象。

eng: Julia's native language is Italian.
You must pay attention to his advice.
simp: 你一定要注意他的建议。
trad: 你一定要註意他的建議。

eng: You should have accepted his advice.
simp: 你本应该接受他的建议。
trad: 你本應該接受他的建議。

eng: You must build up your courage.
What I want isn't tea, but coffee.
simp: 我要的不是茶，而是咖啡。
trad: 我要的不是茶，而是咖啡。

eng: Tom helped Mary move the furniture.
They are reading her book.
I've read many kinds of books.
simp: 我已经读过很多种类的书了。
trad: 我已經讀過很多種類的書了。

eng: Can you see?
Are we done?
Are there any questions?
All the desk drawers were empty.
simp: 所有的办公桌抽屉都是空的。
trad: 所有的辦公桌抽屜都是空的。

eng: Do you own a gun?
Did you like it?
Come with me now.
I don't want to quit this job.
I don't want to miss my train.
I don't want to go there again.
I had no choice.
simp: 那时我没有选择的余地。
trad: 那時我沒有選擇的余地。

eng: I love this song.
I work too much.
These shoes are too tight. They hurt.
She has a daughter who is a pianist.
Where is Mary?
People tend to look at others with bias.
simp: 人们趋向于带着偏见看待他人。
trad: 人們趨向於帶著偏見看待他人。

eng: Tom and Mary have a lot in common.
simp: 汤姆和玛丽有很多共同点。
trad: 湯姆和瑪麗有很多共同點。

eng: The price of meat dropped.
His comment was concise and to the point.
simp: 他的评论简洁且击中要害。
trad: 他的評論簡潔且擊中要害。

eng: I am John.
Many students like to study in the morning.
simp: 许多学生喜欢在早上学习。
trad: 許多學生喜歡在早上學習。

eng: Look out for the wild dog!
I'm afraid of heights.
Note that the maximum doesn't always exist.
simp: 注意，最大值不总是存在的。
trad: 註意，最大值不總是存在的。

eng: I don't like to mix business with pleasure.
simp: 我不喜欢把生意和快乐溷在一起。
trad: 我不喜歡把生意和快樂混在一起。

eng: You must pay attention to him.
Are you meeting someone here?
They say that he is an able man.
simp: 他们说他是一个很能干的人。
trad: 他們說他是一個很能幹的人。

eng: Can you tell wheat from barley?
simp: 你能辨别小麦和大麦吗？
trad: 你能辨別小麥和大麥嗎？

eng: I ran as fast as possible to catch up with her.
They had to stay at home all day.
simp: 他们不得不整天呆在家里。
trad: 他們不得不整天呆在家裏。

eng: Come as soon as possible.
Tom and Mary are playing beach volleyball.
simp: 汤姆和玛丽在打沙滩排球。
trad: 湯姆和瑪麗在打沙灘排球。

eng: His name was on the tip of my tongue, but I couldn't remember it.
simp: 我都快要说出他的名字了，可就是记不起来。
trad: 我都快要說出他的名字了，可就是記不起來。

eng: He gave it a new name.
A lack of exercise is bad for your health.
Because I was afraid of hurting his feelings, I didn't tell him the complete truth.
simp: 因为我怕会伤害他的感情，所以我没有把真相告诉他。
trad: 因為我怕會傷害他的感情，所以我沒有把真相告訴他。

eng: I like this dog.
The fact is, I think, very important.
simp: 我认为这个事实很重要。
trad: 我認為這個事實很重要。

eng: I'd like a doll, a new bicycle.....and peace on earth!
simp: 我想要一个洋娃娃，一辆新自行车……以及世界和平。
trad: 我想要一個洋娃娃，一輛新自行車……以及世界和平。

eng: You ought not to make fun of them.
I think I'm going crazy.
I am a good boy.
I'm a good guy.
Many people cannot understand the way hackers behave.
simp: 很多人无法理解黑客们的行为。
trad: 很多人無法理解黑客們的行為。

eng: Please say that again!
Pfirsichbaeumchen is from Germany.
Tell me; who is this young man?
simp: 告诉我，这个年轻人是谁？
trad: 告訴我，這個年輕人是誰？

eng: Where is the book?
It's not funny.
I have a home.
I think she's an honest woman.
simp: 我认为她是一个诚实的女人。
trad: 我認為她是一個誠實的女人。

eng: Do we have enough food?
Just then, the bus stopped.
simp: 就在那时，公交车停住了。
trad: 就在那時，公交車停住了。

eng: This is a map of the city of Sendai.
simp: 这是一张仙台市的地图。
trad: 這是一張仙臺市的地圖。

eng: This table is wooden.
Tom folded the paper before handing it to Mary.
simp: 在传给玛丽之前，汤姆把纸条折了起来。
trad: 在傳給瑪麗之前，湯姆把紙條折了起來。

eng: Thousands of people rushed to Nome.
simp: 数以千计的人涌向了诺姆。
trad: 數以千計的人湧向了諾姆。

eng: I didn't add this sentence.
Do you keep in contact with your high school classmates?
simp: 你还和你的高中同学保持联系吗？
trad: 你還和你的高中同學保持聯系嗎？

eng: I was unable to go to his birthday party.
simp: 我那时没法去他的生日派对。
trad: 我那時沒法去他的生日派對。

eng: Do you know me?
Are we acquaintances?
I don't care for wealth and fame.
I am going to watch TV this evening.
simp: 今天晚上我打算看电视。
trad: 今天晚上我打算看電視。

eng: Suspenders are safest.
It's not a pig; it's a monkey.
China is about twenty-five times as large as Japan.
simp: 中国的版图大概是日本的二十五倍。
trad: 中國的版圖大概是日本的二十五倍。

eng: What do you call this insect in English?
simp: 这种昆虫在英语中叫什么？
trad: 這種昆蟲在英語中叫什麼？

eng: I don't like to use Google Translator.
Welcome to Tatoeba!
I don't like to use Google's auto-translation, but I do use it for comparison.
simp: 我也不喜欢谷歌翻译，但是我经常会使用它作为参考。
trad: 我也不喜歡谷歌翻譯，但是我經常會使用它作為參考。

eng: You are adding new names to the list, aren't you?
simp: 你在把新的名字放在程序里面。
trad: 你在把新的名字放在程序裏面。

eng: She plays golf every weekend.
simp: 她每周末都打高尔夫球。
trad: 她每周末都打高爾夫球。

eng: I wrote a letter.
She took the book back to the library.
Yesterday, the weather was very nice.
I have seen him on TV but not in the flesh.
simp: 我在电视上看到过他，不过没有看到过他本人。
trad: 我在電視上看到過他，不過沒有看到過他本人。

eng: Yana studies astrophysics in Yekaterinburg.
simp: 亚娜在叶卡捷琳堡学习天体物理学。
trad: 亞娜在葉卡捷琳堡學習天體物理學。

eng: He has a dog.
I like your room.
I like your city.
She doesn't like people who aren't punctual.
It looks good.
You're in big trouble.
I'm not living with him anymore.
simp: 我不再跟他一起生活了。
trad: 我不再跟他一起生活了。

eng: Can we save the planet?
simp: 我们能拯救这颗星球吗？
trad: 我們能拯救這顆星球嗎？

eng: That's a stupid question!
Do you feel lucky?
Let me help you. Your bag looks very heavy.
simp: 让我来帮你吧。你的包看起来很重。
trad: 讓我來幫你吧。你的包看起來很重。

eng: This makes me smile to death!
My brother has lived in England for more than thirty years.
simp: 我哥哥已经在英格兰生活三十多年了。
trad: 我哥哥已經在英格蘭生活三十多年了。

eng: I have to go back to the office.
My sister has a job.
I'm always hungry.
Tom is bigger than me.
The thing that left the biggest impression from China, is the Chinese food.
simp: 中国让人印象最深的就是中国菜.
trad: 中國讓人印象最深的就是中國菜.

eng: What country has the absolute advantage in the production of corn?
simp: 哪一个国家拥有生产玉米的绝对优势？
trad: 哪一個國家擁有生產玉米的絕對優勢？

eng: I have two older sisters.
Do good to those who hate you.
Do good to those who hate you.
Do good to those who hate you.
Do good to those who hate you.
As long as you finish eating your food, then you can play with your friends.
simp: 只要你吃完你的饭就可以跟朋友玩。
trad: 只要你吃完你的飯就可以跟朋友玩。

eng: Inside my backpack there are many colored pens, red ones, blue ones, green ones, etc.
simp: 我的书包裡有很多彩色笔，红的，蓝的，绿的，等等。
trad: 我的書包裡有很多彩色筆，紅的，藍的，綠的，等等。

eng: Are you speaking to me?
The investor stole the capital of his client.
simp: 投资者把他客户的资金窃取了.
trad: 投資者把他客戶的資金竊取了.

eng: The purpose of antitrust law is to stop the abusive influence of the market by big companies.
simp: 反垄断法律的目的是停止滥用市场影响力的大公司.
trad: 反壟斷法律的目的是停止濫用市場影響力的大公司.

eng: We know who they are.
I cannot write traditional characters, but I am fine reading them.
simp: 我不会写繁体字，但我可以读。
trad: 我不會寫繁體字，但我可以讀。

eng: Assets have earning power or some other value to their owner.
simp: 资产盈利能力或一些其他的价值，它们的主人。
trad: 資產盈利能力或一些其他的價值，它們的主人。

eng: Balance of payments is total of all the money coming into a country from abroad less all of the money going out of the country during the same period.
simp: 贸易支付差额是所有的钱从国外进入一个国家的所有的钱走出去的国家在同一时期。
trad: 貿易支付差額是所有的錢從國外進入一個國家的所有的錢走出去的國家在同一時期。

eng: Mr Wood had no sons.
Frankly speaking, he is wrong.
She said to herself, "I am very happy."
People can't live forever.
Tom sent me an interesting text.
simp: 汤姆给我发了一条有趣的短信。
trad: 湯姆給我發了一條有趣的短信。

eng: You may make use of his library.
simp: 你可以利用他的图书馆。
trad: 你可以利用他的圖書館。

eng: You can trust him to keep his word.
simp: 你可以相信他会信守诺言。
trad: 你可以相信他會信守諾言。

eng: You should get your hair cut.
You don't have to go to school on Sunday.
Are you a Japanese student?
Are you a Japanese student?
What do you want to be when you grow up?
All you have to do is to take care of yourself.
simp: 你要做的只是照顾好你自己。
trad: 你要做的只是照顧好你自己。

eng: You look as healthy as ever.
simp: 你看起来和以前一样健康。
trad: 你看起來和以前一樣健康。

eng: They are at lunch.
I am studying kanji.
My name is Tom.
My name is Tom.
Where's the cat?
I was the second to last person to hear the bad news.
simp: 我是倒数第二个得知这个坏消息的。
trad: 我是倒數第二個得知這個壞消息的。

eng: I'd like to teach you Chinese in exchange for another language.
simp: 我想用汉语交换另一种语言.
trad: 我想用漢語交換另一種語言.

eng: I've memorized the model number of the charger.
simp: 我把充电器的型号记下了。
trad: 我把充電器的型號記下了。

eng: How many batteries do you have right now?
China is an advocate for the Diaoyu Island's sovereignty.
simp: 中国主张钓鱼岛的主权。
trad: 中國主張釣魚島的主權。

eng: I have a lot of money.
Don't try to pull a fast one on me!
He's always short of money.
I am short of money.
I learned a lot about Greek culture.
simp: 我了解了很多希腊的文化。
trad: 我了解了很多希臘的文化。

eng: We'd like to have some wine.
He had no money.
I had a little fever this morning.
Are you sure you don't want me to go with you?
simp: 你确定不要我跟你一起去吗？
trad: 你確定不要我跟你一起去嗎？

eng: I think we are still in Poland!
Last night I was dead drunk and fell asleep without having a bath.
simp: 昨夜，我烂醉了，我没洗澡就睡觉了。
trad: 昨夜，我爛醉了，我沒洗澡就睡覺了。

eng: I want to travel around the world.
Idiot!
Where in Turkey do you live?
You're working too hard. Take it easy for a while.
simp: 你工作太勤奋了。休息一会吧。
trad: 你工作太勤奮了。休息一會吧。

eng: Rabbits have long ears and short tails.
simp: 兔子长着长长的耳朵和短短的尾巴。
trad: 兔子長著長長的耳朵和短短的尾巴。

eng: You shouldn't associate with men like that.
simp: 你不应该把我和那样的人联系在一起。
trad: 你不應該把我和那樣的人聯系在一起。

eng: Which is larger, Japan or England?
He put the book on the shelf.
She trusts him.
He told me that she was sick.
He advised me not to believe what she says.
He asked me if I knew her telephone number.
simp: 他问我知不知道她的电话号码。
trad: 他問我知不知道她的電話號碼。

eng: He let me leave the room.
I hope that some scientist will soon discover a cure for AIDS.
simp: 真希望科学家们能早点找到艾滋病的治疗方法。
trad: 真希望科學家們能早點找到艾滋病的治療方法。

eng: She writes to her pen pal in London twice a month.
simp: 她每两个月给在伦敦的笔友写一封信。
trad: 她每兩個月給在倫敦的筆友寫一封信。

eng: You need to stop posting private photos on Facebook.
simp: 别再往Facebook上发私人照片了。
trad: 別再往Facebook上發私人照片了。

eng: It isn't likely that she will come.
Tom gave Mary all the money he had.
simp: 汤姆把他的所有钱都给了玛丽。
trad: 湯姆把他的所有錢都給了瑪麗。

eng: Interest on loans is high at present.
The doors on the left side will open.
I hid myself under the bed.
There's someone trapped in the car.
You are a student.
You are a student.
You are a student.
Not a sound was heard in the room.
simp: 房间里静悄悄的，听不到一丝声音。
trad: 房間裏靜悄悄的，聽不到一絲聲音。

eng: She can speak Spanish well.
simp: 她能说一口流利的西班牙语。
trad: 她能說一口流利的西班牙語。

eng: The Chinese government released on 25th "Diaoyu Islands are China's inherent territory "White Paper.
simp: 25日,中国政府发布《钓鱼岛是中国的固有领土》白皮书。
trad: 25日,中國政府發布《釣魚島是中國的固有領土》白皮書。

eng: I cannot fry these eggs. They are rotten.
simp: 这些鸡蛋坏掉了，不能拿来煎。
trad: 這些雞蛋壞掉了，不能拿來煎。

eng: Be careful what you say, Andrea; the walls have ears.
simp: 安德里亚，说话注意点，小心隔墙有耳。
trad: 安德裏亞，說話註意點，小心隔墻有耳。

eng: I know that downloading music from the internet without paying is wrong, but I do it anyway.
simp: 虽然我知道从网上免费下载音乐是不对的，但我还是照样下载。
trad: 雖然我知道從網上免費下載音樂是不對的，但我還是照樣下載。

eng: He lost his reason when he saw his house burn down.
simp: 看着自己的房子被烧得精光，他顿时丧失了理智。
trad: 看著自己的房子被燒得精光，他頓時喪失了理智。

eng: He left the room in a rage.
Tom asked Mary to marry him.
Why has this happened?
There is no school today.
A long time ago, there lived an old king on a small island.
simp: 很久很久以前，在一座小岛上，住着一个老国王。
trad: 很久很久以前，在一座小島上，住著一個老國王。

eng: After all his efforts, he also failed this time.
simp: 虽然这次他很努力，但最后还是失败了。
trad: 雖然這次他很努力，但最後還是失敗了。

eng: Thank you for the present you gave my son.
simp: 谢谢你送给我儿子礼物。
trad: 謝謝你送給我兒子禮物。

eng: Tom doesn't want Mary to go.
Why not? I'd be happy to.
I'd be happy to help you.
I hope I will have a chance to see you next time I'm in New York.
simp: 希望下次我在纽约还可以有机会见到你。
trad: 希望下次我在紐約還可以有機會見到你。

eng: I wish I could go to Japan.
Would you mind if I shut the window? I have a slight cold.
simp: 你不介意我关窗吧？我有点着凉了。
trad: 你不介意我關窗吧？我有點著涼了。

eng: Excuse me but, would you mind if I opened the window?
simp: 不好意思，请问我可以开窗吗？
trad: 不好意思，請問我可以開窗嗎？

eng: I've heard you've been sick.
What's this song? I've heard it before, but I can't remember the name.
simp: 这是什么歌？我以前听过，但是我想不起歌名了。
trad: 這是什麼歌？我以前聽過，但是我想不起歌名了。

eng: Save the rainforest!
He worked all day yesterday.
Mother bought me a new bicycle.
simp: 妈妈给我买了一辆新的自行车。
trad: 媽媽給我買了一輛新的自行車。

eng: I don't like these sweets.
I'm content with my salary.
simp: 对于自己的工资，我感到挺满足。
trad: 對於自己的工資，我感到挺滿足。

eng: She wants to live in the city.
I don't like teachers who like students who don't like asking questions.
simp: 我讨厌不喜欢学生问问题的老师。
trad: 我討厭不喜歡學生問問題的老師。

eng: You didn't say anything.
I just want a clear answer.
simp: 我只想要一个明确的答桉。
trad: 我只想要一個明確的答案。

eng: You can use this phone.
I need a new car.
We're just friends.
I was too tired to care for anything but bed.
I sold the house to advantage.
simp: 我把房子卖了个好价钱。
trad: 我把房子賣了個好價錢。

eng: Tom didn't feel like eating lunch.
I sent you an e-mail.
This book is mine.
I waited for him till ten.
My birthday approaches.
simp: 我的生日马上就要到了。
trad: 我的生日馬上就要到了。

eng: I don't speak Spanish.
I don't have any money in my pockets.
When do you come and see me?
I think you're the most beautiful girl I've ever seen.
simp: 我想你是我一生中见过最漂亮的女孩。
trad: 我想你是我一生中見過最漂亮的女孩。

eng: When I was in college, I could forget to bring my music player or my camera and still be ok. These days, if I forget my smartphone, I'm screwed!
simp: 我上大学的时候，忘了带随身听、相机，只不过是鸡毛蒜皮的小事；可是到了这个年代，忘了带智能手机，麻烦可就大了！
trad: 我上大學的時候，忘了帶隨身聽、相機，只不過是雞毛蒜皮的小事；可是到了這個年代，忘了帶智能手機，麻煩可就大了！

eng: Will this stuff jeopardize my health?
simp: 这些东西对健康有害吗？
trad: 這些東西對健康有害嗎？

eng: Don't worry!
My mother tongue is Japanese.
What is the book about?
She is never late for school.
Tom isn't here.
She read the book all night.
Christmas is only a few days away.
What languages are spoken in America?
simp: 在美国人们说哪些语言？
trad: 在美國人們說哪些語言？

eng: There's a book about dancing on the desk.
simp: 桌子上有一本关于舞蹈的书。
trad: 桌子上有一本關於舞蹈的書。

eng: She's been absent from school for five days.
That's the reason he became angry.
The beach is an ideal place for children to play.
simp: 海滩是一个供孩子们玩乐的理想场所。
trad: 海灘是一個供孩子們玩樂的理想場所。

eng: In 1900, he left England, and he never returned.
simp: 1900年他离开英格兰后，就没有再回来。
trad: 1900年他離開英格蘭後，就沒有再回來。

eng: No hobby is as cheap as reading, nor provides such long lasting enjoyment.
simp: 没有任何娱乐像阅读这般廉价，也没有任何愉悦像阅读这般持久。
trad: 沒有任何娛樂像閱讀這般廉價，也沒有任何愉悅像閱讀這般持久。

eng: The fuel gauge is broken.
The only sound to be heard was the ticking of the clock.
simp: 唯一能听到的声音是钟的滴答声。
trad: 唯一能聽到的聲音是鐘的滴答聲。

eng: The sports world should, at this time, eliminate the collusion with criminal organizations.
simp: 在这个时候，体育世界应当减少犯罪组织的勾结。
trad: 在這個時候，體育世界應當減少犯罪組織的勾結。

eng: The boy was not abased by the laughter of his classmates.
simp: 那个男孩没有因为他同学的笑而谦卑。
trad: 那個男孩沒有因為他同學的笑而謙卑。

eng: The flowers will look more beautiful in the vase.
simp: 把这些花插在花瓶里会更好看。
trad: 把這些花插在花瓶裏會更好看。

eng: You will find both of the books interesting.
simp: 你将认识到这两本书都很有意思
trad: 你將認識到這兩本書都很有意思

eng: She took advantage of my ignorance.
John is clever.
Kyiv is the capital of Ukraine.
I feel like singing in the rain.
I'm a nurse.
There should be something for us to talk about.
simp: 我们之间应该有共同话题。
trad: 我們之間應該有共同話題。

eng: He wrote me a long letter.
simp: 他给我写了一封很长的信。
trad: 他給我寫了一封很長的信。

eng: Tom gave up all hope.
How did such a strange thing come about?
simp: 怎么会发生这么奇怪的事？
trad: 怎麼會發生這麼奇怪的事？

eng: He acted like he owned the place.
simp: 他把自己当成了这里的主人。
trad: 他把自己當成了這裏的主人。

eng: She picked up beautiful stones.
simp: 她捡了许多漂亮的小石头。
trad: 她撿了許多漂亮的小石頭。

eng: I go to bed early at night.
I go to bed early at night.
I didn't go to the party because I was sick.
simp: 我病了，所以那次聚会没去。
trad: 我病了，所以那次聚會沒去。

eng: Tom maintained his innocence.
I'm a light sleeper.
How wide is it?
The door locks automatically.
Scientists seem to have known the truth.
simp: 科学家们似乎已经知道真相了。
trad: 科學家們似乎已經知道真相了。

eng: Tom can't drive a car yet.
She will get along with my grandmother.
simp: 她应该能跟我奶奶相处得来。
trad: 她應該能跟我奶奶相處得來。

eng: I came, I saw, I conquered.
