Tom drew a straight line on the paper.
simp: 汤姆在纸上画了一道直线。
trad: 湯姆在紙上畫了一道直線。

eng: Tom asked Mary about John.
simp: 汤姆向玛丽打听有关约翰的事。
trad: 湯姆向瑪麗打聽有關約翰的事。

eng: Are you happy?
I think of him as one of my good friends.
simp: 我把他当成自己的好友之一。
trad: 我把他當成自己的好友之一。

eng: Tom did a cartwheel.
Tom talked with Mary all night.
simp: 汤姆和玛丽聊了一个晚上。
trad: 湯姆和瑪麗聊了一個晚上。

eng: The story concluded abruptly.
simp: 这个故事仓促地结了尾。
trad: 這個故事倉促地結了尾。

eng: A hot bath and then bed.
simp: 先洗个热水澡，然后上床睡觉。
trad: 先洗個熱水澡，然後上床睡覺。

eng: Tom died two years ago in a plane crash.
simp: 汤姆死于两年前的一次空难。
trad: 湯姆死於兩年前的一次空難。

eng: What is written on the road sign? - ONE WAY.
simp: 路标上写的什么？- 单向行驶。
trad: 路標上寫的什麼？- 單向行駛。

eng: My father went to Hong Kong on business.
simp: 爸爸因为做生意去了香港。
trad: 爸爸因為做生意去了香港。

eng: Tom was mugged.
Let's start right away.
Compare your answers with the teacher's.
simp: 把你的答桉和老师的比较一下。
trad: 把你的答案和老師的比較一下。

eng: Are you going to sing here?
How old will you be next year?
I would like to go to the concert with you.
simp: 我想和你一起去音乐会。
trad: 我想和你一起去音樂會。

eng: You or I will be chosen.
The sky was completely dark.
There is a hole in your sock.
I want a few empty glasses.
Banks open at nine o'clock.
You can see a lot of stars in the sky.
simp: 你能看到天空中的繁星。
trad: 你能看到天空中的繁星。

eng: Eating fish is good for your health.
Don't go to extremes.
Happy Moon Festival!
This poem was written last night.
Mom likes to eat fish-head.
She's dieting.
He's a DJ.
I have just finished eating.
You must be joking!
I trust you.
Have a good weekend.
Stay and have a drink with us.
simp: 留下来和我们一起喝酒吧。
trad: 留下來和我們一起喝酒吧。

eng: Everyone, say cheese.
Don't put anything in the bag.
simp: 不要把所有东西都放到包里面。
trad: 不要把所有東西都放到包裏面。

eng: I think you're jealous.
Let's write in turns.
All his sentences are short.
Close the door and open the window!
She is constantly in and out of hospital.
simp: 她一直在进进出出医院。
trad: 她一直在進進出出醫院。

eng: He asked me if I was busy.
It's not that I don't like your English, but for me it's important to use every opportunity to practise Russian.
simp: 并不是我不喜欢你的英语，只是对我而言，利用每一个可能的机会来练习俄语很重要。
trad: 並不是我不喜歡你的英語，只是對我而言，利用每一個可能的機會來練習俄語很重要。

eng: The sky cleared up soon after the storm.
simp: 风暴之后不久,天空就晴朗起来了。
trad: 風暴之後不久,天空就晴朗起來了。

eng: Mid-Autumn Day is a traditional holiday in China.
simp: 中秋节是中国的传统节日。
trad: 中秋節是中國的傳統節日。

eng: On Mid-Autumn Day, families gather, eat moon cake together, and watch the moon.
simp: 在中秋节，家人团聚，一起吃月饼、赏月。
trad: 在中秋節，家人團聚，一起吃月餅、賞月。

eng: She phoned her husband to come immediately.
simp: 她打电话给他丈夫，让他立刻过来。
trad: 她打電話給他丈夫，讓他立刻過來。

eng: I would have liked to come with you, but I didn't have time.
simp: 我想和你一起去，但是我没有时间。
trad: 我想和你一起去，但是我沒有時間。

eng: He absconded with the money.
I had to abstain from smoking while I was in the hospital.
simp: 在医院的时候，我不得不戒烟。
trad: 在醫院的時候，我不得不戒煙。

eng: John ignored my advice.
simp: 约翰对我的建议置若罔闻。
trad: 約翰對我的建議置若罔聞。

eng: Christopher Columbus wasn't an explorer because he loved the sea. He was an explorer because he hated Spanish jails.
simp: 克里斯托弗·哥伦布之所以成为探险家，不是因为他热爱大海，而是因为他讨厌西班牙的监狱。
trad: 克裏斯托弗·哥倫布之所以成為探險家，不是因為他熱愛大海，而是因為他討厭西班牙的監獄。

eng: I'll need at least three days to translate that thesis.
simp: 要翻译那篇论文，我最少需要三天时间。
trad: 要翻譯那篇論文，我最少需要三天時間。

eng: Generally speaking, boys can run faster than girls.
simp: 一般来说，男生跑得比女生快。
trad: 一般來說，男生跑得比女生快。

eng: Tom could only understand a little French then.
simp: 那个时候汤姆只会一点点法语。
trad: 那個時候湯姆只會一點點法語。

eng: We saw the tower in the distance.
simp: 我们远远地就看见了那座塔。
trad: 我們遠遠地就看見了那座塔。

eng: Who do you love?
Have you lost weight?
A soccer team consists of eleven players.
simp: 一个足球队由十一个球员组成。
trad: 一個足球隊由十一個球員組成。

eng: When does the game start?
He stole my watch.
I live in Yokohama.
What kind of people do you like best?
The mountain is not as high as Mt. Fuji.
The child was paralyzed with fear.
simp: 那个孩子被吓得一动也不能动。
trad: 那個孩子被嚇得一動也不能動。

eng: She adores her older brother.
There are more than 4000 languages in the world.
simp: 全世界有超过4000多种的语言。
trad: 全世界有超過4000多種的語言。

eng: Teachers also make mistakes.
Hi! Do you work here?
Ania is interested in computers.
simp: Ania 对计算机很感兴趣。
trad: Ania 對計算機很感興趣。

eng: Tomás is my brother.
Tomás is my brother.
He is too shy to talk to girls.
simp: 他很害羞，都不敢和女孩子说话。
trad: 他很害羞，都不敢和女孩子說話。

eng: She talks a lot.
It was cold, so we lit a fire.
simp: 天气很冷，我们生起了火。
trad: 天氣很冷，我們生起了火。

eng: What's your favorite French wine?
simp: 你喜欢哪一种法国红酒？
trad: 你喜歡哪一種法國紅酒？

eng: Laws are like cobwebs, which may catch small flies, but let wasps and hornets break through.
simp: 法网就像蜘蛛网，网得住苍蝇蚊子，网不住豺狼老虎。
trad: 法網就像蜘蛛網，網得住蒼蠅蚊子，網不住豺狼老虎。

eng: Tomorrow, I will ask him.
He likes not only baseball but football as well.
simp: 他不但喜欢棒球，还喜欢足球。
trad: 他不但喜歡棒球，還喜歡足球。

eng: There really is such a thing as Internet addiction.
I owe him 100 yen.
Private detectives were hired to look into the strange case.
simp: 私家侦探们受雇调查这桩奇怪的桉件。
trad: 私家偵探們受雇調查這樁奇怪的案件。

eng: He who helps others, in turn shall be helped by them.
He received a golden watch as a prize.
Children imitate their friends rather than their parents.
simp: 比起父母，儿童更喜欢模彷自己的同龄人。
trad: 比起父母，兒童更喜歡模仿自己的同齡人。

eng: He tried to enlarge his sphere of influence.
simp: 他试图扩大自己的势力范围。
trad: 他試圖擴大自己的勢力範圍。

eng: Would you mind leaving it until tomorrow?
What's the sense of working so hard?
simp: 这么拼命工作有什么意义？
trad: 這麼拼命工作有什麼意義？

eng: You have to overcome the difficulties.
You have to overcome the difficulties.
To tell the truth, I don't really like her.
Only a few people came to the meeting yesterday.
simp: 参加昨天会议的只有几个人。
trad: 參加昨天會議的只有幾個人。

eng: Tom doesn't agree with Mary at all.
Are you a Filipino?
He has earned a lot of money.
He promised to be here at 6.
He lay injured on the ground.
simp: 他因为负伤倒在了地上。
trad: 他因為負傷倒在了地上。

eng: Tom died of a drug overdose.
His condition got worse every day.
simp: 他的身体状况每况愈下。
trad: 他的身體狀況每況愈下。

eng: Please wash it.
He acts quickly.
This cloth irons well.
The report is utterly false.
There are no taxis, so I must walk.
simp: 我只能走路，因为打不到出租车。
trad: 我只能走路，因為打不到出租車。

eng: I don't want dinner.
I am not in a situation to discuss this problem.
simp: 我不在讨论这个问题的状态。
trad: 我不在討論這個問題的狀態。

eng: Where do they live?
The committee inquired into the cause of the accident.
simp: 委员会调查了事故的原因。
trad: 委員會調查了事故的原因。

eng: She cannot have told a lie.
I got up early so as to be in time for the train.
simp: 为了赶上那趟火车，我特意起了个大早。
trad: 為了趕上那趟火車，我特意起了個大早。

eng: She is busy learning English.
Mary and John both can't swim.
simp: 玛丽和约翰两人都不会游泳。
trad: 瑪麗和約翰兩人都不會遊泳。

eng: I hear you wanted to see me?
simp: 我听说，你想来见我了吗？
trad: 我聽說，你想來見我了嗎？

eng: I like math least of all.
This factory's productive capacity is 250 cars a week.
simp: 这家工厂每周能够生产250台车。
trad: 這家工廠每周能夠生產250臺車。

eng: He regained consciousness and was able to talk.
simp: 他恢复了意识，还能开口说话了。
trad: 他恢復了意識，還能開口說話了。

eng: Don't get angry.
She didn't say even one word to me.
There's no one but me here.
I don't know how I should do it.
She has been ill for a long time and she is still too weak to get about.
simp: 她病了很久，现在还很虚弱，无法随意走动。
trad: 她病了很久，現在還很虛弱，無法隨意走動。

eng: Please don't interrupt me.
I love my daughter.
What are you going to do with your first pay?
simp: 你的第一份工资要怎么花？
trad: 你的第一份工資要怎麼花？

eng: He is only someone's stooge.
simp: 他无非是别人的跟屁虫。
trad: 他無非是別人的跟屁蟲。

eng: This rose is very beautiful.
She was born in a remote village in Nepal.
simp: 她出生于尼泊尔的一个偏远小山村。
trad: 她出生於尼泊爾的一個偏遠小山村。

eng: Tom doesn't know what to say.
These two are standing abreast.
I can't remember when he moved to Boston.
simp: 我不记得他什么时候搬去波士顿了。
trad: 我不記得他什麼時候搬去波士頓了。

eng: I'm sure it wouldn't be too hard to find out who hacked into our system.
simp: 要找出入侵我们系统的黑客，我相信不会太难。
trad: 要找出入侵我們系統的黑客，我相信不會太難。

eng: She doesn't have enough experience.
Tom is reading a book.
That young man is our teacher.
simp: 那位帅哥是我们的老师。
trad: 那位帥哥是我們的老師。

eng: He soon got used to the new surroundings.
simp: 他很快就适应了新的环境。
trad: 他很快就適應了新的環境。

eng: She is the most boring girl I ever knew.
simp: 她是我认识的最烦人的女孩。
trad: 她是我認識的最煩人的女孩。

eng: Not every country belongs to the U.N.
simp: 不是所有国家都加入了联合国。
trad: 不是所有國家都加入了聯合國。

eng: There are many cultures on Earth.
simp: 地球上存在多种多样的文化。
trad: 地球上存在多種多樣的文化。

eng: May I borrow this CD?
He must succeed to his father's business.
simp: 他必须继承父亲的事业。
trad: 他必須繼承父親的事業。

eng: How beautiful you are!
He has a good school record.
Is there something you want to get off your chest? Come on, you can tell me.
simp: 你是不是有什么心事？来，跟我说说吧。
trad: 你是不是有什麼心事？來，跟我說說吧。

eng: He cried: "Help!"
She wants to know who sent the flowers.
He's three years older than her.
She's absent because she's sick.
Help me with my homework, please.
Danger! High voltage.
She laughed the way schoolgirls do, with her hand over her mouth.
simp: 她捂着嘴，笑得跟个小女生似的。
trad: 她捂著嘴，笑得跟個小女生似的。

eng: Caution! Wet Paint
Some verbs in some languages can have up to one hundred different meanings.
simp: 在一些语言中，部分动词可能会有上百种不同的意思。
trad: 在一些語言中，部分動詞可能會有上百種不同的意思。

eng: Tom doesn't know whether Mary likes him or not.
simp: 汤姆不清楚玛丽是否喜欢他。
trad: 湯姆不清楚瑪麗是否喜歡他。

eng: He explained to Mary why he was late for her birthday party.
simp: 他向玛丽解释自己为什么会在她的生日聚会上迟到。
trad: 他向瑪麗解釋自己為什麼會在她的生日聚會上遲到。

eng: My idea went against his.
simp: 我的想法跟他的正好相反。
trad: 我的想法跟他的正好相反。

eng: Thanks for the invite.
Does John want to see a Korean movie?
Albania wants to join the European Union.
simp: 阿尔巴尼亚想加入欧盟。
trad: 阿爾巴尼亞想加入歐盟。

eng: I bought a book yesterday.
You'll have to get a move on if you want to catch the train.
simp: 要想赶上火车就动作快点。
trad: 要想趕上火車就動作快點。

eng: Wounds heal as time passes.
Only six people came to the party.
simp: 这次聚会只来了六个人。
trad: 這次聚會只來了六個人。

eng: It's a little scary.
It's a weapon.
He lived a simple life.
She used to love him.
He had a certain charm.
I will tell him about it when he comes next time.
simp: 等他下次来时，我会把这件事告诉他。
trad: 等他下次來時，我會把這件事告訴他。

eng: Do you come here often?
Tom wanted to get to know Mary better.
simp: 汤姆想进一步了解玛丽。
trad: 湯姆想進一步了解瑪麗。

eng: I need a tool for pulling weeds in my garden.
simp: 我需要工具来给花园除草。
trad: 我需要工具來給花園除草。

eng: I am not accustomed to walking long distances.
To all appearances, she is healthy.
simp: 无论从哪方面看，她很健康。
trad: 無論從哪方面看，她很健康。

eng: I think I will take a vacation this week.
simp: 我觉得我这个星期要度假了。
trad: 我覺得我這個星期要度假了。

eng: I am ready.
I am allergic to pollen.
For my part I prefer to stay at home and read a novel.
simp: 至于我比较喜欢待在家看小说。
trad: 至於我比較喜歡待在家看小說。

eng: I thought that Tom was kind.
There are many jobs available in the computer industry.
simp: 计算机产业能够提供相当多的就业岗位。
trad: 計算機產業能夠提供相當多的就業崗位。

eng: You have a big nose.
He likes to watch the birds fly above his head.
simp: 他喜欢看着鸟儿从头上飞过。
trad: 他喜歡看著鳥兒從頭上飛過。

eng: Peru is the third largest country in South America after Brazil and Argentina.
simp: 秘鲁是排在巴西和阿根廷之后的南美第三大国家。
trad: 秘魯是排在巴西和阿根廷之後的南美第三大國家。

eng: I want to forget her.
Could I have a cup of coffee?
German is not as difficult as Icelandic.
You are busy now, aren't you?
The moon doesn't have light of its own.
What's your favorite brand of yogurt?
simp: 你喜欢什么牌子的酸奶？
trad: 你喜歡什麼牌子的酸奶？

eng: Excuse me for interrupting you, but would you mind opening the window?
simp: 对不起，打扰一下，能帮忙开下窗子吗？
trad: 對不起，打擾一下，能幫忙開下窗子嗎？

eng: Tom is clearing the garden.
Have you finished eating your lunch?
The man next door said he goes for a jog every morning.
simp: 隔壁帅哥说他每天都去慢跑。
trad: 隔壁帥哥說他每天都去慢跑。

eng: To whom did you give the book?
I got a fish bone stuck in my throat.
You have only to ask him if he'd like to join us.
simp: 你只要问他想不想加入我们就可以了。
trad: 你只要問他想不想加入我們就可以了。

eng: His room is always tidy.
simp: 他的房间总是那么整洁干净。
trad: 他的房間總是那麼整潔幹凈。

eng: Cabbage can be eaten raw.
They released the prisoner.
She came to see us yesterday.
I feed my dog once a day.
You're right in a sense.
simp: 从某种意义来说，你是对的。
trad: 從某種意義來說，你是對的。

eng: Can you help me with the washing up?
Tom sat silently for 30 minutes.
simp: 汤姆静静地坐了半个小时。
trad: 湯姆靜靜地坐了半個小時。

eng: Are you excited?
Tom and Mary went deer hunting.
I painted the fence green.
The longer we waited, the more impatient we became.
That country abounds in oil.
I want to have fun.
I like classical music more than modern music.
simp: 我更喜欢古典音乐，而不是现代音乐。
trad: 我更喜歡古典音樂，而不是現代音樂。

eng: If you study earnestly, you can expect to pass the exam.
simp: 如果你认真学习，就有希望通过考试。
trad: 如果你認真學習，就有希望通過考試。

eng: These two lines cut across each other at right angles.
I got out of the car at 40th Street.
simp: 我在第四十大街下了车。
trad: 我在第四十大街下了車。

eng: She seems to devote all her effects to her career.
simp: 她似乎把自己所有的精力都投入到了事业上。
trad: 她似乎把自己所有的精力都投入到了事業上。

eng: My wallet has been stolen.
He was too tired to walk any farther.
You have to trust me.
I got my right leg injured.
I can't make out what the man is saying.
simp: 我听不清那个男的在说些什么。
trad: 我聽不清那個男的在說些什麼。

eng: Please get into the car.
I really am sorry.
Tom and Mary live under the same roof.
simp: 汤姆和玛丽住在同一个屋檐下。
trad: 湯姆和瑪麗住在同一個屋檐下。

eng: I've noticed that having fun doesn't interfere at all with your studies. I just can't.
simp: 我发现你玩绝对不耽误学习。我就不行。
trad: 我發現你玩絕對不耽誤學習。我就不行。

eng: Every student was asked one question.
simp: 每个学生都被问了一个问题。
trad: 每個學生都被問了一個問題。

eng: When is school over?
There's no toilet paper.
Please bring me two pieces of chalk.
simp: 给我拿两根粉笔来，谢谢。
trad: 給我拿兩根粉筆來，謝謝。

eng: Don't blame it on her.
We suspect him of telling a lie.
It may, indeed, be a mistake.
Does your friend speak Esperanto?
I have not more than ten books.
His hands were covered with mud.
The government will provide interest-free loans to firms that participate in the program.
simp: 政府将会对参与该项计划的企业提供无息贷款。
trad: 政府將會對參與該項計劃的企業提供無息貸款。

eng: I'm washing the dishes.
Today I turn four years old.
Tom appealed to his mother to buy a new toy for him.
simp: 汤姆请求妈妈给他买新玩具。
trad: 湯姆請求媽媽給他買新玩具。

eng: She's busy now and can't speak to you.
simp: 她现在忙，不能跟您说话。
trad: 她現在忙，不能跟您說話。

eng: She's busy now and can't speak to you.
simp: 她现在忙，不能跟你们说话。
trad: 她現在忙，不能跟你們說話。

eng: Even if it rains, the game will be played.
simp: 就算下雨，比赛也将照常进行。
trad: 就算下雨，比賽也將照常進行。

eng: We have five days to go before the summer vacation.
We have five days to go before the summer vacation.
Tom treated Mary like a slave.
simp: 汤姆把玛丽当成自己的奴隶一样看待。
trad: 湯姆把瑪麗當成自己的奴隸一樣看待。

eng: Felipe has two cars and one motorcycle.
simp: 菲利普有两辆汽车和一台摩托车。
trad: 菲利普有兩輛汽車和一臺摩托車。

eng: This is an instructive book.
simp: 这是本有教育意义的书。
trad: 這是本有教育意義的書。

eng: Have you already booked our seats on a plane?
Shall we go and eat?
They are satisfied with the contract.
She believes her son is still alive.
simp: 她相信自己的儿子还活着。
trad: 她相信自己的兒子還活著。

eng: I asked her to dance.
Tom has a bad reputation.
We'll talk about this in detail later.
I know nothing about music.
They assemble planes.
The economic situation grew worse.
Don't let them fool you.
She was cooking dinner at that time.
Can you hear the noise of the waves on the beach?
simp: 你能听到沙滩上海浪的声音吗？
trad: 你能聽到沙灘上海浪的聲音嗎？

eng: What did you find?
It cost me 5,000 yen to repair my bicycle.
He was granted permission to leave early.
I feel well today.
The report proved true as a result of their investigation.
simp: 他们的调查结果显示这篇报导是真实的。
trad: 他們的調查結果顯示這篇報導是真實的。

eng: Swimming in the pond is dangerous.
She's been in the hospital for a month.
My friends started the trip three days ago.
simp: 我的朋友三天前开始旅行。
trad: 我的朋友三天前開始旅行。

eng: Tom was in a hurry so he left his breakfast only half eaten.
simp: Tom赶时间，所以早餐只吃了一半。
trad: Tom趕時間，所以早餐只吃了一半。

eng: No matter what you do you must always do it to the best of your ability.
simp: 不管你做什麽都要尽全力。
trad: 不管你做什麼都要盡全力。

eng: This room is not big.
She wants to go out with him.
I watched the basketball game on TV.
simp: 我看了电视播的篮球赛。
trad: 我看了電視播的籃球賽。

eng: After this he went down to Capernaum with his mother and brothers and his disciples.
simp: 这之后他与他的母亲、兄弟和门徒们一起去了迦百农。
trad: 這之後他與他的母親、兄弟和門徒們一起去了迦百農。

eng: I've just finished writing a letter.
Who took care of the dog while you were away?
simp: 你不在的时候谁照看狗？
trad: 你不在的時候誰照看狗？

eng: I'm waiting for the train.
Ancient people liked to tell stories of bravery.
simp: 古人喜欢讲关于勇气的故事。
trad: 古人喜歡講關於勇氣的故事。

eng: I greet my teacher on the street.
simp: 我在街上遇到我的老师。
trad: 我在街上遇到我的老師。

eng: We were waiting for the shop to open.
They attained their goal.
Suzanne is two years older than me.
They are taking a walk.
He was known to the English as King Philip.
simp: 他是英国人所知的菲利普国王。
trad: 他是英國人所知的菲利普國王。

eng: Is this ticket good for this bus?
simp: 这张票这辆巴士能用吗？
trad: 這張票這輛巴士能用嗎？

eng: A century is one hundred years.
I'm not allowed to drink alcohol.
When do I get started?
They sell everything here.
Truer words were never spoken.
Tom bought a lottery ticket.
I didn't understand what you said.
I'll miss you very much.
We broadcast news on the hour.
Please bring me some medicine for airsickness.
I love watching basketball.
Whose book is this on the desk?
We were founded upon the ideal that all are created equal, and we have shed blood and struggled for centuries to give meaning to those words – within our borders, and around the world.
simp: 我们的建国理念是“人人生而平等”。几个世纪以来，我们一直在全国乃至世界范围内为实践上述理念的真谛而浴血奋斗。
trad: 我們的建國理念是“人人生而平等”。幾個世紀以來，我們一直在全國乃至世界範圍內為實踐上述理念的真諦而浴血奮鬥。

eng: The old bridge is in danger of collapse.
simp: 那座老桥正面临坍塌的危险。
trad: 那座老橋正面臨坍塌的危險。

eng: Do you think he still wants to marry me?
He is actually not the manager.
Koalas can only be seen in Australia.
simp: 树袋熊只有在澳大利亚才能看得到。
trad: 樹袋熊只有在澳大利亞才能看得到。

eng: Tom doesn't live near his office.
simp: 汤姆住得离公司并不近。
trad: 湯姆住得離公司並不近。

eng: I am unable to walk as fast as he can.
His age didn't enter into our decision not to employ him.
simp: 我们决定不录用他时，并没有考虑他的年龄问题。
trad: 我們決定不錄用他時，並沒有考慮他的年齡問題。

eng: Can you make out what he is trying to say?
simp: 你明白他想说些什么吗？
trad: 你明白他想說些什麼嗎？

eng: Can you make out what he is trying to say?
simp: 你们明白他想说些什么吗？
trad: 你們明白他想說些什麼嗎？

eng: I am tired of my monotonous life.
simp: 我厌倦了现在单调的生活。
trad: 我厭倦了現在單調的生活。

eng: He looked me over from head to foot.
simp: 他把我从头到脚打量了一番。
trad: 他把我從頭到腳打量了一番。

eng: You should take a day off.
I thought I told you that you should get to the concert early.
simp: 难道我没有告诉你演唱会的时候要早点去吗？
trad: 難道我沒有告訴你演唱會的時候要早點去嗎？

eng: I can never make my son to eat any vegetables.
simp: 不管我用什么招数，儿子就是不肯吃青菜。
trad: 不管我用什麼招數，兒子就是不肯吃青菜。

eng: You really shouldn't use pirated software.
simp: 你真的不该用盗版软件。
trad: 你真的不該用盜版軟件。

eng: He looked asleep, but he was really dead.
simp: 他看起来像是睡着了，其实已经死了。
trad: 他看起來像是睡著了，其實已經死了。

eng: What are you guys drinking?
I am still waiting to be told what happened.
simp: 谁来告诉我到底发生了什么事？
trad: 誰來告訴我到底發生了什麼事？

eng: Give it to me.
I'm not your mother.
I'm not your father.
I'm not your daughter.
I'm not your son.
Why don't we go to the bookstore on foot?
simp: 不如我们走着去书店吧？
trad: 不如我們走著去書店吧？

eng: If you stand on this stool, you can reach the top of the closet.
simp: 站在这个凳子上的话，你可以摸到衣柜顶。
trad: 站在這個凳子上的話，你可以摸到衣櫃頂。

eng: Vesak is a Buddhist holiday which celebrates the birth, enlightenment and death of the Buddha.
simp: 卫塞节是佛教的一个节日，纪念佛陀的诞生、成道和涅槃。
trad: 衛塞節是佛教的一個節日，紀念佛陀的誕生、成道和涅槃。

eng: The weather is forecast scientifically.
simp: 天气的预报是很科学的。
trad: 天氣的預報是很科學的。

eng: I am anxious about your health.
He won't be easily discouraged, because he's a tough guy.
simp: 他很坚强，不会那么容易灰心。
trad: 他很堅強，不會那麼容易灰心。

eng: I cannot calculate this. I am not an engineer.
simp: 我不是工程师，不会算这个。
trad: 我不是工程師，不會算這個。

eng: The baby was sleeping soundly in his mother's arms.
simp: 宝宝在妈妈的怀里睡得很香。
trad: 寶寶在媽媽的懷裏睡得很香。

eng: Is it free?
You'll have to study harder from now on.
simp: 从现在起，你要更努力学习了。
trad: 從現在起，你要更努力學習了。

eng: This book is easy enough for a five-year-old child to read.
simp: 这本书五岁小孩都能读。
trad: 這本書五歲小孩都能讀。

eng: Are you seriously thinking about not going?
That is a hotel.
But earthquakes are still as frightening as ever.
simp: 但是地震仍然是最可怕的事。
trad: 但是地震仍然是最可怕的事。

eng: If that were true, what would you do?
simp: 如果那是真的，你怎么办？
trad: 如果那是真的，你怎麼辦？

eng: Tom just does what he's told to do.
I understood what she said.
California is about as large as Japan.
simp: 加利福尼亚大概有日本那么大。
trad: 加利福尼亞大概有日本那麼大。

eng: I hope it will be the only one.
How many worms did you find?
Marc regrets his mistake.
Mary has already left on her trip.
simp: 玛丽早已出发旅行去了。
trad: 瑪麗早已出發旅行去了。

eng: Tom couldn't understand why no one else wanted to go to the zoo.
simp: 汤姆想不通为啥没人想去动物园了。
trad: 湯姆想不通為啥沒人想去動物園了。

eng: She's running from home.
I never dreamed that there would be a typhoon.
simp: 我做梦也没想到那儿会有台风。
trad: 我做夢也沒想到那兒會有臺風。

eng: I was really disappointed when I found out that I hadn't passed the exam.
simp: 当我发现我没通过测验时我实在是太沮丧了。
trad: 當我發現我沒通過測驗時我實在是太沮喪了。

eng: The first term starts in April.
I want to be a nurse.
I feel flattered.
Teenagers often wear strange clothes.
There is nothing new transpired since I wrote you last.
simp: 上次写信以来没有什么新鲜事发生。
trad: 上次寫信以來沒有什麼新鮮事發生。

eng: I don't doubt that he will help me.
Australia is the largest country in Oceania.
simp: 澳大利亚是大洋洲最大的国家。
trad: 澳大利亞是大洋洲最大的國家。

eng: I love autumn.
Do you think I'm qualified for that job?
simp: 你觉得我能胜任那个工作吗？
trad: 你覺得我能勝任那個工作嗎？

eng: I'd like more detailed information.
My heart beat when I heard my name called.
simp: 当我听到我的名字时，我的心都快跳出来了。
trad: 當我聽到我的名字時，我的心都快跳出來了。

eng: Help me find an empty room for myself.
Tom bought a gift for Mary.
simp: 汤姆给玛丽买了件礼物。
trad: 湯姆給瑪麗買了件禮物。

eng: I can't get over it.
He put his things carelessly in the drawer.
simp: 他小心地把他的东西放进了抽屉。
trad: 他小心地把他的東西放進了抽屜。

eng: Tom confessed that he had stolen the money.
She's not old enough to get a driver's license.
His life is in danger.
This sword has a strange history.
This is the tallest tree I have ever seen.
simp: 这是我见过的最高的树。
trad: 這是我見過的最高的樹。

eng: Tom didn't sleep very well last night.
We organized a project team.
simp: 我们组织了一个专桉团队。
trad: 我們組織了一個專案團隊。

eng: As was the custom in those days, he married young.
simp: 如当时的习惯，他很年轻便成婚了。
trad: 如當時的習慣，他很年輕便成婚了。

eng: The car broke down, so they had to walk.
simp: 因为车子坏了，他们只好步行。
trad: 因為車子壞了，他們只好步行。

eng: At a rough estimate, I would say the job will take two weeks.
simp: 我想这工作粗略估计得花上两个星期的时间。
trad: 我想這工作粗略估計得花上兩個星期的時間。

eng: There are few mistakes in your composition.
How can I deactivate my account on this site?
simp: 我要怎麽停用我在这个网站上的帐户？
trad: 我要怎麼停用我在這個網站上的帳戶？

eng: There was something written on the stone, and they tried to make out what it was.
simp: 石头上面写着什麽东西，他们想要弄清楚。
trad: 石頭上面寫著什麼東西，他們想要弄清楚。

eng: She smokes excessively.
Michael is a man's name but "Michelle" is a lady's name.
simp: 「米迦勒」是男人的名字，但「蜜雪儿」是女人的名字。
trad: 「米迦勒」是男人的名字，但「蜜雪兒」是女人的名字。

eng: No one can deprive of your human rights.
simp: 没有人能剥夺你的人权。
trad: 沒有人能剝奪你的人權。

eng: Can it be that you don't have a bit of creativity, to the point of always inventing the same apology?
simp: 你是没创意到连每次道歉的说词都一成不变吗？
trad: 你是沒創意到連每次道歉的說詞都一成不變嗎？

eng: Bob was somewhat chubbier than his brother.
She introduced me to him at the party.
simp: 她在派对上将我介绍给他。
trad: 她在派對上將我介紹給他。

eng: Do you know the girl standing by the window?
simp: 你知道站在窗边的女孩是谁吗？
trad: 你知道站在窗邊的女孩是誰嗎？

eng: Tokyo, as you know, is one of the financial centers of the world.
simp: 如你所知，东京是全球金融中心之一。
trad: 如你所知，東京是全球金融中心之一。

eng: I know a good lawyer who can help you.
simp: 我认识一个不错的律师，他可以帮你。
trad: 我認識一個不錯的律師，他可以幫你。

eng: There's no doubt that he likes taking walks.
Tom always feels hungry at least one hour before lunch.
simp: 汤姆总是在离午餐至少还要一个小时之前就饿了。
trad: 湯姆總是在離午餐至少還要一個小時之前就餓了。

eng: She often eats breakfast there.
This book will be of great use to you.
simp: 这本书会对你有很大的用处。
trad: 這本書會對你有很大的用處。

eng: Tom can't move this bookcase without a little help.
simp: 如果没人帮点忙的话，汤姆是没办法移动书柜的。
trad: 如果沒人幫點忙的話，湯姆是沒辦法移動書櫃的。

eng: She may be cute, but I don't like her.
simp: 她虽然可爱，但是我不喜欢她。
trad: 她雖然可愛，但是我不喜歡她。

eng: I'm not your mother.
I'm not your mother.
I had a dream where a baby was playing with a knife.
Not only the student but their teacher is looking forward to holiday.
simp: 老师和学生一样盼望假期。
trad: 老師和學生一樣盼望假期。

eng: Can you pass me that thingamajig?
simp: 能把那玩意儿递给我吗？
trad: 能把那玩意兒遞給我嗎？

eng: I do not know whether to take it as a compliment or an insult.
I took advantage of an opportunity.
This car is going to break down.
Mark your maximum efforts.
The crowd is going nuts.
Japanese people are considered to be polite.
simp: 人们都以为日本人是讲究礼貌的。
trad: 人們都以為日本人是講究禮貌的。

eng: The demand is huge.
Tom can't even write his own name.
simp: 汤姆连自己的名字都不会写。
trad: 湯姆連自己的名字都不會寫。

eng: They eat meat once a week.
The bicycle is racing to finish.
My roommate is too talkative.
He died when he was 54 years old.
We were all amused with the comedy.
simp: 我们都被这出喜剧逗乐了。
trad: 我們都被這出喜劇逗樂了。

eng: What does she think about my car?
The shop is just in front of the station.
It is unfair.
I never dreamed that I would win first prize.
simp: 我从没想到我会得头奖。
trad: 我從沒想到我會得頭獎。

eng: This is my old bicycle.
His daughters want to be lawyers.
simp: 他的女儿们都想成为律师。
trad: 他的女兒們都想成為律師。

eng: She went to the station to see her teacher off.
simp: 她去车站给她老师送行。
trad: 她去車站給她老師送行。

eng: You are on the wrong plane.
We talked in a low voice so as not to be heard.
simp: 我们小声谈话以免被人听到。
trad: 我們小聲談話以免被人聽到。

eng: Man eats to live, he does not live to eat.
simp: 人为生而食，非为食而活。
trad: 人為生而食，非為食而活。

eng: Whether you will succeed or not depends on your efforts.
He can do it better than me.
I am reading short stories.
We admired the beauty of the scenery.
We should judge matters on a broader basis.
A moldy loaf of bread lay on the table.
simp: 台子上有个发霉的面包。
trad: 臺子上有個發黴的面包。

eng: Tatoeba: We've got more sentences than your mom could ever say in her lifetime.
simp: Tatoeba:我们有的句子比你妈这辈子说的都多。
trad: Tatoeba:我們有的句子比你媽這輩子說的都多。

eng: How many of you will there be?
The average man fails not because he lacks ability, but because he lacks ability to concentrate.
simp: 通常人们失败并非能力不足，而是不够专注。
trad: 通常人們失敗並非能力不足，而是不夠專註。

eng: They vacationed in France last year.
We had little rain last month.
I buy a videotape.
However, some people in the audience were not pleased with the results.
simp: 尽管如此，观众中仍有些人不满意这个结果。
trad: 盡管如此，觀眾中仍有些人不滿意這個結果。

eng: Exercise outdoors.
I know all that.
As far as I know, he is the shortest student in this school.
simp: 据我所知，他是这所学校最差的学生。
trad: 據我所知，他是這所學校最差的學生。

eng: No, it isn't possible.
We associate Egypt with the Nile.
simp: 讲到埃及就想到了尼罗河。
trad: 講到埃及就想到了尼羅河。

eng: We ate way too much last night.
Tom wanted to talk to Mary face to face.
simp: 汤姆想和玛丽面对面交谈。
trad: 湯姆想和瑪麗面對面交談。

eng: There are many stores on either side of the street.
Prices continued to rise.
Were you at home last night?
Tom must be from Boston.
The book is full of far-flung theories without any basis in scientific fact.
simp: 书中满是遥不可及、没有科学根据的理论。
trad: 書中滿是遙不可及、沒有科學根據的理論。

eng: He has to support his mother and his sister.
simp: 他要供养他的妈妈和妹妹。
trad: 他要供養他的媽媽和妹妹。

eng: The truth will clear soon.
The judgement went against him.
Let's take a 10-minute break.
For how long did the Maya culture flourish?
This is the first time I've ever lied to my father and I am ashamed of myself.
simp: 我很惭愧，这是我第一次对我爸说谎。
trad: 我很慚愧，這是我第一次對我爸說謊。

eng: Pay what you want.
I walked around aimlessly.
Why does the phone have to ring all the time only when I'm busy? I can't get any work done because of it.
simp: 为什么电话老在我忙的时候响？我都没法干活了。
trad: 為什麼電話老在我忙的時候響？我都沒法幹活了。

eng: Please take off your shirt.
I'd rather go hungry than eat this.
simp: 我宁愿饿着也不吃这个。
trad: 我寧願餓著也不吃這個。

eng: Tom didn't have lunch.
I received my birthday present.
I went out in spite of the rain.
simp: 尽管下着雨，我还是出了门。
trad: 盡管下著雨，我還是出了門。

eng: There are not less than five hundred students here.
simp: 这儿有不少于500名的学生。
trad: 這兒有不少於500名的學生。

eng: There are not less than five hundred students here.
simp: 这儿有不少于五百名的学生。
trad: 這兒有不少於五百名的學生。

eng: He took a glance at the girl.
When he saw a policeman coming, he began to run like anything.
simp: 看到警察走来，他勐地跑了开去。
trad: 看到警察走來，他猛地跑了開去。

eng: This room is very warm.
A day full of sunshine and a heart full of wishes...
simp: 充满阳光的天和充满愿望的心...
trad: 充滿陽光的天和充滿願望的心...

eng: He admits being involved in the scandal.
simp: 他承认自己与这宗丑闻有牵连。
trad: 他承認自己與這宗醜聞有牽連。

eng: Do not translate this sentence!
Tomorrow I'm going to Shanghai.
I'm going to buy some things with you.
I work here.
The scenery of the city reminded me of London.
simp: 这座城市的景色让我想起了伦敦。
trad: 這座城市的景色讓我想起了倫敦。

eng: I don't really like Xiaomi and i think that Xiaomi's are for losers. They're like a knock off phone.
simp: 我似乎不太喜欢小米，我觉得小米是屌丝用的手机，就是个山寨机。
trad: 我似乎不太喜歡小米，我覺得小米是屌絲用的手機，就是個山寨機。

eng: There are two major political parties in the United States: the conservative Republican Party, and the liberal Democratic Party.
simp: 美国有两大政党，一是较为保守的共和党，一是较为自由的民主党。
trad: 美國有兩大政黨，一是較為保守的共和黨，一是較為自由的民主黨。

eng: His jokes really slay me.
He ate all of it.
I have lost my cap.
Do you have any information on classical music concerts?
simp: 你对古典音乐会有什么可说的吗？
trad: 你對古典音樂會有什麼可說的嗎？

eng: In case of an emergency, get in touch with my agent right away.
simp: 如遇情况紧急，请立即联系我的代理。
trad: 如遇情況緊急，請立即聯系我的代理。

eng: It is a matter of principle with him to answer your questions honestly.
simp: 诚实地回答你的问题对他来说是个原则问题。
trad: 誠實地回答你的問題對他來說是個原則問題。

eng: Fire!
I'll go to the library with you tomorrow.
simp: 我明天要跟你去图书馆。
trad: 我明天要跟你去圖書館。

eng: I'm Finnish.
Don't worry.
Do you have brothers and sisters?
Do you have children?
I've lost my pen.
Let go of him!
The colour is a bit too dark.
Do you have one a little bigger than these?
simp: 有没有比这些稍微大一点的？
trad: 有沒有比這些稍微大一點的？

eng: I want to change the world.
I still believe in love.
I want to dance.
Baseless speculations.
Could you please tell me again who your father is?
simp: 能再说一遍你爸是谁吗？
trad: 能再說一遍你爸是誰嗎？

eng: It is just noon.
He is absorbed in the study of Latin.
simp: 他专心致志地学习拉丁语。
trad: 他專心致誌地學習拉丁語。

eng: The movie was less funny than the book.
I can't swallow these tablets without a drink of water.
simp: 不喝水我咽不下这些药片。
trad: 不喝水我咽不下這些藥片。

eng: The radio was invented by Marconi.
My mother gave me her sewing machine.
simp: 妈妈把她的缝纫机给我了。
trad: 媽媽把她的縫紉機給我了。

eng: He concentrated on his studies.
This story is based on actual events.
simp: 这个故事是基于真实事件写的。
trad: 這個故事是基於真實事件寫的。

eng: We should take into account she is still young.
I am going to enquire at the service desk if there are any restaurants around here.
simp: 我要去柜台打听这裡附近有没有餐厅。
trad: 我要去櫃臺打聽這裡附近有沒有餐廳。

eng: I really just want to make friends.
simp: 我纯粹只是喜欢交朋友。
trad: 我純粹只是喜歡交朋友。

eng: He seemed worried about his health.
simp: 他看起来很担心自己的健康。
trad: 他看起來很擔心自己的健康。

eng: He does not have the money for buying a new car.
He can't afford to buy a new car.
Would you like to take a stroll around the park with me?
You are really very productive today.
simp: 你今天真的很有生产力。
trad: 你今天真的很有生產力。

eng: I have already completed 4 out of 6 tasks on my to-do list today.
simp: 我已经完成了我今天6点任务列表的4点。
trad: 我已經完成了我今天6點任務列表的4點。

eng: I can't think of anything to say.
Tom wanted Mary to leave right away.
simp: 汤姆想要玛丽马上离开。
trad: 湯姆想要瑪麗馬上離開。

eng: Did you play tennis yesterday?
I didn't sleep well last night so I have little energy today.
simp: 昨天晚上没睡好，所以我今天精神不振。
trad: 昨天晚上沒睡好，所以我今天精神不振。

eng: The Taiwanese dollar appreciated, causing Taiwanese exports to slump.
simp: 台币上涨，造成台湾的出口贸易萎糜不振。
trad: 臺幣上漲，造成臺灣的出口貿易萎糜不振。

eng: The Taiwanese dollar appreciated, causing Taiwanese exports to slump.
simp: 台币上涨，造成台湾的出口贸易不振。
trad: 臺幣上漲，造成臺灣的出口貿易不振。

eng: It started again!
I only missed one day of work because of a cold and my desk is piled high with papers.
simp: 我才感冒一天没来上班，桌上就堆满了文件。
trad: 我才感冒一天沒來上班，桌上就堆滿了文件。

eng: The only solution is to escape.
I called at Nancy's house on my way home from school.
simp: 在放学回家的路上，我拜访了Nancy家。
trad: 在放學回家的路上，我拜訪了Nancy家。

eng: Steam is coming out of the engine.
simp: 蒸汽从发动机冒了出来。
trad: 蒸汽從發動機冒了出來。

eng: They are always at each other's throats.
The man swimming in the river is my friend.
simp: 在河里游泳的家伙是我朋友。
trad: 在河裏遊泳的家夥是我朋友。

eng: My mother bought my brother a yellow umbrella.
simp: 妈妈给弟弟买了个黄雨伞。
trad: 媽媽給弟弟買了個黃雨傘。

eng: Tom eats the same food day in and day out.
simp: Tom一天又一天的吃同样的食物。
trad: Tom一天又一天的吃同樣的食物。

eng: The electricity came on again in a few minutes.
The point we must clarify here is that the lines between amateur and professional in sport are beginning to disappear.
simp: 我们必须阐明这个观点，在运动项目上，业余选手和专业选手的界限开始消失了。
trad: 我們必須闡明這個觀點，在運動項目上，業余選手和專業選手的界限開始消失了。

eng: Can you swim as fast as he can?
The old woman fell and could not get up.
simp: 那个老太太摔倒了爬不起来。
trad: 那個老太太摔倒了爬不起來。

eng: I'm working right now.
Tom didn't show up for work today.
We lived from hand to mouth in those days.
simp: 这些日子我们勉强煳口。
trad: 這些日子我們勉強糊口。

eng: I want to lose weight.
The golf course is completely deserted, there is not a single person!
simp: 高尔夫球场门可罗雀，一个人都没有！
trad: 高爾夫球場門可羅雀，一個人都沒有！

eng: Today I walked 10 kilometers.
Holy cow!
In the hands of a skilled designer, any two colors can go well together.
simp: 无论是多麽不协和的两种颜色，在技术高超的设计师手里，也能化成悦目的配搭。
trad: 無論是多麼不協和的兩種顏色，在技術高超的設計師手裏，也能化成悅目的配搭。

eng: I want to buy.
I am off today.
He couldn't wait to try out his new surfboard.
simp: 他迫不及待地想试一下他的新冲浪板。
trad: 他迫不及待地想試一下他的新沖浪板。

eng: This city is cold and lonely without you.
simp: 没有你这个城市孤单又冷清。
trad: 沒有你這個城市孤單又冷清。

eng: Everybody had a hard time.
You'd better go to bed at once.
Foreigners are interesting, aren't they?
simp: 外国人真有意思，不是吗？
trad: 外國人真有意思，不是嗎？

eng: Have any letters arrived for me?
I prefer to forget the past.
I know you don't want to talk to me.
simp: 我知道你不想跟我说话。
trad: 我知道你不想跟我說話。

eng: When his food supply ran short, he had to look for a new place to live.
simp: 他的食物供给不足的的时候，他不得不去找新的地方居住。
trad: 他的食物供給不足的的時候，他不得不去找新的地方居住。

eng: Spanish is much easier than German.
simp: 西班牙语比德语简单多了。
trad: 西班牙語比德語簡單多了。

eng: It is your business to take care of them.
simp: 照顾他们是你自己的事儿。
trad: 照顧他們是你自己的事兒。

eng: I thought that you wanted to see me.
The boy was very sharp at physics.
simp: 这个男孩儿精通物理学。
trad: 這個男孩兒精通物理學。

eng: Would you like a little more salad?
simp: 请问您要多来点儿沙拉吗？
trad: 請問您要多來點兒沙拉嗎？

eng: She's good at bargaining the price down.
The news left me uneasy.
simp: 这个消息让我感到不安。
trad: 這個消息讓我感到不安。

eng: I would often take part in an English speech contest in my school days.
simp: 当年我在学校的时候经常参加英语演讲比赛。
trad: 當年我在學校的時候經常參加英語演講比賽。

eng: As you are tired, you had better rest.
Her face turned red suddenly.
Draw a straight line here.
Thank you for baking this delicious cake.
Could you put it in plain language?
Don't you think it's strange that he's not here?
simp: 他不在这儿你不觉得这很奇怪吗？
trad: 他不在這兒你不覺得這很奇怪嗎？

eng: Turning to the right, you will find the city hall in front of you.
simp: 向右转，你就可以看到市政厅位于正前方。
trad: 向右轉，你就可以看到市政廳位於正前方。

eng: The back seat of the car will hold three passengers.
My family is still working, so they can't go to Texas right away.
simp: 因为我家庭还在工作，所以他们就去不了德克萨斯。
trad: 因為我家庭還在工作，所以他們就去不了德克薩斯。

eng: Is it OK if we don't go to Costco this time?
simp: 这次我们不去好市多可以吗？
trad: 這次我們不去好市多可以嗎？

eng: Who was it that broke the window yesterday?
simp: 昨天是谁把窗子打破的？
trad: 昨天是誰把窗子打破的？

eng: Even a child can read this.
Give me a chance!
You seem to be an honest man.
You must clear the table.
simp: 你必须把桌子清理干净。
trad: 你必須把桌子清理幹凈。

eng: You work hard.
You don't know how worried I am.
simp: 你不知道我有多担心啊。
trad: 你不知道我有多擔心啊。

eng: You must do your best.
You look very charming today.
simp: 今天你看起来很迷人啊。
trad: 今天你看起來很迷人啊。

eng: You seem to be an honest man.
You are the master of your own destiny.
simp: 你才是自己命运的主人。
trad: 你才是自己命運的主人。

eng: You must come back before nine o'clock.
simp: 你必须在九点之前回来。
trad: 你必須在九點之前回來。

eng: You can get a loan from a bank.
You broke the rule.
You've done a perfect job.
simp: 你做了一项完美的工作。
trad: 你做了一項完美的工作。

eng: Do you know if he has a girlfriend?
simp: 你知道他有没有女朋友吗？
trad: 你知道他有沒有女朋友嗎？

eng: Tom denied that he had ever met Mary.
simp: 汤姆否认自己曾经见过玛丽。
trad: 湯姆否認自己曾經見過瑪麗。

eng: The moment she was alone, she opened the letter.
simp: 等到周围只有她一个人的时候，她迫不及待地打开了那封信。
trad: 等到周圍只有她一個人的時候，她迫不及待地打開了那封信。

eng: Tom didn't want to work with Mary.
simp: 汤姆不愿意和玛丽一起工作。
trad: 湯姆不願意和瑪麗一起工作。

eng: When it comes to sweets, I just can't control myself.
simp: 一看到甜点，我就无法自拔。
trad: 一看到甜點，我就無法自拔。

eng: We're willing to help you.
Your behavior is creating a lot of problems.
simp: 你的行为引起了许多的麻烦。
trad: 你的行為引起了許多的麻煩。

eng: He told me that she will not tell him what happened to me on the day he saw me talking about the story about the girl who got killed.
simp: 他告诉我她不会跟他说出他看到我讲关于一名女孩被杀的故事的那天我发生的事。
trad: 他告訴我她不會跟他說出他看到我講關於一名女孩被殺的故事的那天我發生的事。

eng: His eyes betrayed his fear.
simp: 他的眼睛掩饰不了内心的恐慌。
trad: 他的眼睛掩飾不了內心的恐慌。

eng: It is not manly to speak ill of others behind their backs.
simp: 在背后说别人坏话不是大丈夫所为。
trad: 在背後說別人壞話不是大丈夫所為。

eng: I was told to go not by boat but by plane, which advice I followed.
simp: 别人建议我坐飞机而不是坐船去，于是我选择了坐飞机。
trad: 別人建議我坐飛機而不是坐船去，於是我選擇了坐飛機。

eng: What do we eat tonight?
He will be my deputy while I am away.
simp: 我不在的时候，他将是我的代理人。
trad: 我不在的時候，他將是我的代理人。

eng: The rich sometimes despise the poor.
simp: 富人有时会看不起穷人。
trad: 富人有時會看不起窮人。

eng: I am ashamed of your despicable deed.
simp: 我为你的卑鄙行径刚到羞耻。
trad: 我為你的卑鄙行徑剛到羞恥。

eng: My boss detained me more than 30 minutes.
simp: 老板多留了我三十分钟。
trad: 老板多留了我三十分鐘。

eng: The artist is eternally a boy.
simp: 那个艺术家永远保持着赤子之心。
trad: 那個藝術家永遠保持著赤子之心。

eng: The gardener planted a rose tree in the middle of the garden.
simp: 园丁在花园的中央种了一棵玫瑰树。
trad: 園丁在花園的中央種了一棵玫瑰樹。

eng: It is true that he is young, but he is very reliable.
simp: 确实，他还年轻，但是很靠得住。
trad: 確實，他還年輕，但是很靠得住。

eng: I've got my friend on the line right now.
simp: 我正在和朋友打电话呢。
trad: 我正在和朋友打電話呢。

eng: I met him just now.
I suggested that we should go to the movies.
simp: 我建议我们应该去看电影。
trad: 我建議我們應該去看電影。

eng: There was a large crowd in the park.
Mike is the team's captain.
No one voted against it.
My father grew old.
Tom got so absorbed in his work that he forgot to eat.
simp: 汤姆太专注于他的工作，以至于忘了吃饭。
trad: 湯姆太專註於他的工作，以至於忘了吃飯。

eng: He hid it behind the door.
The lights aren't on.
Tom worries a lot about money.
Young as he is, he is a good doctor.
simp: 他虽然年轻，但是位好医生。
trad: 他雖然年輕，但是位好醫生。

eng: It's not quite certain.
What kind of woman do you think I am?
I don't think that he's honest.
The chocolate is going to melt if you keep it out of the fridge.
simp: 巧克力不放在冰箱里的话会融化的。
trad: 巧克力不放在冰箱裏的話會融化的。

eng: What's your favorite item of clothing?
Roll the ball to me.
Bring me a sheet of paper, please.
The driver said that the first bus starts at 6:00 a.m.
simp: 这个司机说第一班公交车于早上6点发车。
trad: 這個司機說第一班公交車於早上6點發車。

eng: There is a man at the door who wants to see you.
I held my breath and waited.
You only started this job an hour ago.
simp: 你仅仅是一个小时前才开始这份工作的。
trad: 你僅僅是一個小時前才開始這份工作的。

eng: I'm only going to write small sentences without commas.
simp: 我只是想写一些没有逗号的小句子。
trad: 我只是想寫一些沒有逗號的小句子。

eng: I wonder why John is always late for school.
simp: 我真想不明白为什么约翰上课总是迟到。
trad: 我真想不明白為什麼約翰上課總是遲到。

eng: I hope you will answer me soon.
I knew you'd come.
So far we have been quite successful.
simp: 到目前为止，我们还是相当成功的。
trad: 到目前為止，我們還是相當成功的。

eng: You have to give three months' rent as a deposit.
simp: 你必须付三个月的房租作为押金。
trad: 你必須付三個月的房租作為押金。

eng: May I use this telephone? "Go ahead."
simp: “可以用一下这部电话吗？”“请随意。”
trad: “可以用一下這部電話嗎？”“請隨意。”

eng: Do you know how to use a computer?
Nothing could stop him.
It wasn't our fault... We all had to do it.
simp: 这不是我们的错……大家都是逼不得已才这么做。
trad: 這不是我們的錯……大家都是逼不得已才這麼做。

eng: Many thousands on both sides had been wounded.
The letter will arrive in a week or so.
simp: 这封信约一个星期左右到达。
trad: 這封信約一個星期左右到達。

eng: He was proud of his daughter.
simp: 他为自己的女儿感到骄傲。
trad: 他為自己的女兒感到驕傲。

eng: One night he came home very tired and sad.
simp: 某天晚上，他又累又沮丧地回到了家。
trad: 某天晚上，他又累又沮喪地回到了家。

eng: The television doesn't work.
Jackson fell from his horse.
simp: 杰克逊从马背上掉了下来。
trad: 傑克遜從馬背上掉了下來。

eng: He is always with me.
She spends her leisure time making dolls.
simp: 她利用空闲时间做布娃娃。
trad: 她利用空閑時間做布娃娃。

eng: Who is this boy?
I can't really read her.
Go up the stairs.
Lend me some money, if you have any.
Please continue with your story.
You are responsible for the result.
It's not practical.
All at once, I heard a cry.
simp: 突然，我听到了一声喊叫。
trad: 突然，我聽到了一聲喊叫。

eng: He can't even read, let alone write.
simp: 他连字都不会念，更别说写了。
trad: 他連字都不會念，更別說寫了。

eng: My mother's going to kill me.
Tom thought he heard some gunshots.
simp: 汤姆认为他听到了几声枪声。
trad: 湯姆認為他聽到了幾聲槍聲。

eng: The train left before they got to the station.
simp: 火车在他们赶到车站之前就开走了。
trad: 火車在他們趕到車站之前就開走了。

eng: He spoke with a Taiwanese accent mixed in.
simp: 他说话夹杂着台湾口音。
trad: 他說話夾雜著臺灣口音。

eng: You can believe him, he's not an untrustworthy person.
simp: 你可以相信他，他不是那种不守信用的人。
trad: 你可以相信他，他不是那種不守信用的人。

eng: I finally feel appreciated.
On what grounds are you arresting me?
She lives nearby.
I am pretty pleased with you.
He's Taro's younger brother.
It's not something I'm very good at.
With her help, my French improved little by little.
simp: 在她的帮助下，我的法语逐渐进步了。
trad: 在她的幫助下，我的法語逐漸進步了。

eng: The birds flew to the south.
Tom can't find Mary.
What time do you start work?
You don't have to answer quickly.
It is so early.
I don't think she cares very much.
The police will look into the case.
I didn't expect that result.
simp: 我没有期望得到这样的结果。
trad: 我沒有期望得到這樣的結果。

eng: No one lived on the island at that time.
simp: 那个时候，没有人在这个岛上生活。
trad: 那個時候，沒有人在這個島上生活。

eng: Sales should double this year.
I'm a citizen of the world.
The truth can be more painful than a lie.
simp: 真相可能比谎言更令人痛苦。
trad: 真相可能比謊言更令人痛苦。

eng: What time will you get to the station?
What will you have?
You are too ready to speak ill of others.
simp: 你太喜欢说他人坏话了。
trad: 你太喜歡說他人壞話了。

eng: You have a good sense of humor.
You are no longer a mere child.
simp: 你不再只是一个孩子了。
trad: 你不再只是一個孩子了。

eng: How many months have you been pregnant?
The country had been devastated by long war.
simp: 这个国家被长期的战争毁坏了。
trad: 這個國家被長期的戰爭毀壞了。

eng: You guys having fun?
Cats can climb trees, but dogs can't.
Where did you shake hands with them?
simp: 你在哪里和他们握的手？
trad: 你在哪裏和他們握的手？

eng: A vector is a unit vector if its norm is 1.
simp: 模为1的向量是单位向量。
trad: 模為1的向量是單位向量。

eng: Ask Tom.
I can't locate the source of the problem.
simp: 我无法找到问题的根源。
trad: 我無法找到問題的根源。

eng: You seem to have mistaken me for my elder brother.
simp: 你似乎把我当成我哥哥了。
trad: 你似乎把我當成我哥哥了。

eng: She turned down every proposal.
She has been absent since last Wednesday.
simp: 从上周三起，她一直缺席。
trad: 從上周三起，她一直缺席。

eng: The failure in business left me penniless.
simp: 生意上的失败让我身无分文。
trad: 生意上的失敗讓我身無分文。

eng: Don't speak unless you have something worth saying.
simp: 除非你有什么值得说的话要说，否则就别吭声。
trad: 除非你有什麼值得說的話要說，否則就別吭聲。

eng: Your plan requires a large amount of money.
simp: 你的计划需要一大笔钱。
trad: 你的計劃需要一大筆錢。

eng: Tom isn't here. "Then where is he?"
simp: “汤姆不在那儿。”“那么他在哪儿？”
trad: “湯姆不在那兒。”“那麼他在哪兒？”

eng: We should all help provide starving people with food.
simp: 我们应该尽可能的帮忙提供食物给饥饿中的人们.
trad: 我們應該盡可能的幫忙提供食物給饑餓中的人們.

eng: Tom, would you please give these starving people something to eat?
simp: 汤姆你能给那些饥肠辘辘的人们一些吃的吗?
trad: 湯姆你能給那些饑腸轆轆的人們一些吃的嗎?

eng: It caught me by surprise.
He rolled his eyes.
Is this fake?
I'm sorry about last night.
We should all help provide starving people with food.
simp: 我们应该尽量的提供一些食物给那些饥肠辘辘的人们.
trad: 我們應該盡量的提供一些食物給那些饑腸轆轆的人們.

eng: It's because I love her.
I owe her one.
They must be Americans.
I advised him to be independent of his parents.
It was a national scandal.
simp: 这是一件全国性的丑闻。
trad: 這是一件全國性的醜聞。

eng: I got hurt today.
What is the capital of the United States?
My health is my only capital.
Telephone him if the message is important.
simp: 如果这条消息很重要，那就打电话告诉他。
trad: 如果這條消息很重要，那就打電話告訴他。

eng: Mary told John the secret.
simp: 玛丽把那个秘密告诉给了约翰。
trad: 瑪麗把那個秘密告訴給了約翰。

eng: The tiger laid in the middle of the cage.
Can you wrap it up for me? It's a gift.
simp: 可以帮我包起来吗？我拿来送人的。
trad: 可以幫我包起來嗎？我拿來送人的。

eng: I am going to Osaka station.
She asked us if we would like to cook.
Have you told her mother?
Have you told his mother?
Have you already been to the Korean Peninsula?
This is the house in which the prime minister lives.
Kate did her homework in the kitchen.
simp: 凯特在厨房里做的作业。
trad: 凱特在廚房裏做的作業。

eng: Tom saved her from the fire.
simp: 汤姆把她从火灾中救了出来。
trad: 湯姆把她從火災中救了出來。

eng: Tom showed her the letter from Santa Claus.
simp: 汤姆给她看了圣诞老人寄来的信。
trad: 湯姆給她看了聖誕老人寄來的信。

eng: Tom told her that he had written that poem two years before.
simp: 汤姆告诉她那首诗是自己两年前写的。
trad: 湯姆告訴她那首詩是自己兩年前寫的。

eng: Tom was unhappy because she wouldn't ask him anything.
simp: 汤姆很不高兴，因为她从来不征求他的意见。
trad: 湯姆很不高興，因為她從來不征求他的意見。

eng: Tom knocked him down.
simp: 汤姆把他揍得满地找牙。
trad: 湯姆把他揍得滿地找牙。

eng: Tom recommended the novel to them.
simp: 汤姆向他们推荐了那本小说。
trad: 湯姆向他們推薦了那本小說。

eng: Tom is liked by his friends.
simp: 汤姆的朋友都很喜欢他。
trad: 湯姆的朋友都很喜歡他。

eng: Tom will be scolded by his father.
simp: 汤姆会被他老爸教训的。
trad: 湯姆會被他老爸教訓的。

eng: Tom is as tall as any student in his class is.
simp: 汤姆不比他班上的其他同学矮。
trad: 湯姆不比他班上的其他同學矮。

eng: Tom thanked me for the gift.
Tom advised him not to buy the secondhand car.
Tom is tall and likewise strong.
Tom is in bed with a fever.
simp: 汤姆发烧了，正躺在床上。
trad: 湯姆發燒了，正躺在床上。

eng: Tom received a heavy blow on the head.
simp: 汤姆的头部受了重重的一击。
trad: 湯姆的頭部受了重重的一擊。

eng: Tom told us that he had a headache.
Tom took his girlfriend out on Saturday night.
simp: 周六晚上汤姆带他女朋友出去约会了。
trad: 周六晚上湯姆帶他女朋友出去約會了。

eng: Tom is interested in mountaineering.
Tom has less money than his brother does.
Tom has less money than his brother does.
Tom called to her across the street.
simp: 汤姆在街的那边向她打招呼。
trad: 湯姆在街的那邊向她打招呼。

eng: Tom looked at the tall man suspiciously.
simp: 汤姆用怀疑的目光盯着那个高个子男人。
trad: 湯姆用懷疑的目光盯著那個高個子男人。

eng: Tom talked too much and let the secret slip.
simp: 汤姆话太多，不小心把秘密泄露了出去。
trad: 湯姆話太多，不小心把秘密泄露了出去。

eng: Tom stood on the platform in Westminster Underground Station.
simp: 汤姆站在威斯敏斯特地铁站的站台上。
trad: 湯姆站在威斯敏斯特地鐵站的站臺上。

eng: Tom is ill at ease among strangers.
simp: 周围全是陌生人，这让汤姆感到很不自在。
trad: 周圍全是陌生人，這讓湯姆感到很不自在。

eng: Tom attached the string to the kite.
simp: 汤姆把线拴在了风筝上。
trad: 湯姆把線拴在了風箏上。

eng: Tom is not a lazy boy. As a matter of fact, he works hard.
simp: 汤姆其实并不懒，相反他很勤奋。
trad: 湯姆其實並不懶，相反他很勤奮。

eng: Tom regretted having wasted a great deal of his life.
simp: 汤姆为自己浪费了大好的青春年华感到非常后悔。
trad: 湯姆為自己浪費了大好的青春年華感到非常後悔。

eng: Tom can run fast.
Tom is head and shoulders above others.
simp: 汤姆比其他人都优秀能干。
trad: 湯姆比其他人都優秀能幹。

eng: Tom broke the window pane.
Tom expected to leave early in the morning, but he overslept.
simp: 汤姆本想早上早点出发，结果却睡过头了。
trad: 湯姆本想早上早點出發，結果卻睡過頭了。

eng: Tom never used to smoke, but he does now.
simp: 汤姆以前从不抽烟，不过现在开始抽了。
trad: 湯姆以前從不抽煙，不過現在開始抽了。

eng: Tom is more clever than honest.
simp: 与其说汤姆诚实，不如说他聪明。
trad: 與其說湯姆誠實，不如說他聰明。

eng: As Tom is honest, I like him.
simp: 我喜欢汤姆，因为他很诚实。
trad: 我喜歡湯姆，因為他很誠實。

eng: Tom is too honest a boy to tell a lie.
simp: 汤姆太老实了，连撒谎都不会。
trad: 湯姆太老實了，連撒謊都不會。

eng: What's your favorite season of the year?
simp: 一年之中，你最喜欢哪个季节？
trad: 一年之中，你最喜歡哪個季節？

eng: Ken already went to England.
This is a great moment.
Tom criticized Mary in front of everyone.
simp: 汤姆在所有人面前批评了玛丽。
trad: 湯姆在所有人面前批評了瑪麗。

eng: Tom is out of his mind.
What do you think Tom's waist size is?
simp: 你认为汤姆的腰围是多少？
trad: 你認為湯姆的腰圍是多少？

eng: Tom and Mary even always wear the same color clothes.
simp: 汤姆和玛丽甚至经常穿同样颜色的衣服。
trad: 湯姆和瑪麗甚至經常穿同樣顏色的衣服。

eng: To my surprise, he easily came up with a plan.
simp: 令我吃惊的是，他很容易就想出了一个方桉。
trad: 令我吃驚的是，他很容易就想出了一個方案。

eng: This car is the latest model.
He doesn't trust the doctor any more.
simp: 他再也不相信那个医生了。
trad: 他再也不相信那個醫生了。

eng: He has access to the American Embassy.
simp: 他有权出入美国大使馆。
trad: 他有權出入美國大使館。

eng: I think she's interested in you.
The importation of rare wild animals to this country is strictly prohibited.
simp: 该国严禁进口稀有野生动物。
trad: 該國嚴禁進口稀有野生動物。

eng: Smoking is strictly prohibited.
Parking is prohibited here.
The future pilot is trained in a mock cockpit.
simp: 未来飞行员将在模拟操作室中训练。
trad: 未來飛行員將在模擬操作室中訓練。

eng: The future pilot is trained in a mock cockpit.
simp: 未来飞行员会在虚拟驾驶舱里训练。
trad: 未來飛行員會在虛擬駕駛艙裏訓練。

eng: Tom became a hero.
She has a gift for prophecy.
Lignite is a fossil fuel.
They water the fruit trees.
Every step in the experiment was deliberate.
simp: 该实验的每一步都是经过深思熟虑的。
trad: 該實驗的每一步都是經過深思熟慮的。

eng: I didn't do anything.
Who's your favorite DJ?
This is not a spider, it's a monster!
simp: 这不是一只蜘蛛，而是一个怪物。
trad: 這不是一只蜘蛛，而是一個怪物。

eng: I think you need to spend a little more time on your homework.
simp: 我觉得你应该多花点时间在作业上。
trad: 我覺得你應該多花點時間在作業上。

eng: A wooden building can easily catch fire.
I bought an old lamp.
The statue was carved from a block of cherry wood.
simp: 这座凋像是由樱木凋刻而成。
trad: 這座雕像是由櫻木雕刻而成。

eng: He cured my illness.
He is sure to succeed.
I haven't decided whether to study at university or to get a job.
simp: 去读大学还是去上班，我还没决定。
trad: 去讀大學還是去上班，我還沒決定。

eng: That movie is worth seeing.
He is free from pride.
He's a friend of my brother's.
Poor health prohibited him from traveling.
simp: 因为健康状况不佳，他没去成旅行。
trad: 因為健康狀況不佳，他沒去成旅行。

eng: Please wait until the end of this month.
I always get nervous just before a match.
simp: 比赛前我一直都很紧张。
trad: 比賽前我一直都很緊張。

eng: We are all longing for peace in the world.
In Japan, it rains quite a bit during our rainy season which is from mid-June until mid-July.
simp: 在日本，在我们的雨季常常下雨，雨季一般在六月中旬至七月中旬。
trad: 在日本，在我們的雨季常常下雨，雨季一般在六月中旬至七月中旬。

eng: It is very hot in the summer in Japan.
He has gone to London.
The rich are apt to look down upon the poor.
I speak English every day.
See you later.
He makes three times more money than I do.
He earns three times more than me.
The recent advances in medicine are remarkable.
simp: 医学的最新进展颇为显着。
trad: 醫學的最新進展頗為顯著。

eng: You shouldn't say that kind of thing when children are around.
simp: 孩子们在旁边的时候，你不应该说那种事。
trad: 孩子們在旁邊的時候，你不應該說那種事。

eng: You look just like your older brother.
simp: 你看起来很像你的哥哥。
trad: 你看起來很像你的哥哥。

eng: You don't get up as early as your sister, do you?
simp: 你比你妹妹起得晚，不是么？
trad: 你比你妹妹起得晚，不是麼？

eng: The economy is picking up.
My eyesight is getting worse.
Why do you want to be a nurse?
simp: 你为什么想成为护士呢？
trad: 你為什麼想成為護士呢？

eng: The police accused him of theft.
I don't eat chicken skin.
Don't rely too much on others.
Silk is very precious.
She is at work right now.
That's my sole concern.
I don't like silence.
Put the radio on, please.
Turn on the radio.
Is he going to swim tomorrow? "Yes, he is."
I don't understand German at all.
Good morning!
Our baby cannot talk yet.
This is the house where I live.
Take off your hat when you enter a classroom.
Take off your hat when you enter a classroom.
simp: 进教室的时候请把帽子摘了。
trad: 進教室的時候請把帽子摘了。

eng: He has books galore.
Peace to his ashes!
Nobody wants you to do that.
Tony speaks English as well as you do.
simp: 托尼说英语说得跟你一样好。
trad: 托尼說英語說得跟你一樣好。

eng: Tom wanted to stay home and relax instead of hiking with his children.
simp: 汤姆想待在家休息而不是和他的孩子们出去远足。
trad: 湯姆想待在家休息而不是和他的孩子們出去遠足。

eng: I thought I was dreaming.
He was arrested for abusing public funds.
simp: 他因滥用公共基金而被捕。
trad: 他因濫用公共基金而被捕。

eng: Give me the number.
Happy Mother's Day!
Yukiko likes potatoes.
I don't want to live my life in fear.
I believe you're honest.
Why do you study every day?
simp: 为什么你每天都学习呢？
trad: 為什麼你每天都學習呢？

eng: I told her what should be done.
simp: 我告诉了她应该做什么。
trad: 我告訴了她應該做什麼。

eng: I like learning languages.
His house is somewhere about here.
He still loves her.
The more public the work, the more criticism you receive.
simp: 工作越公开，批评就越多。
trad: 工作越公開，批評就越多。

eng: He's absent-minded.
We have to do our best.
This is my bag.
He commanded me to leave the room immediately.
simp: 他命令我立刻离开这个房间。
trad: 他命令我立刻離開這個房間。

eng: From the time he got up, his beliefs began to sway.
simp: 从那时起，他的信仰开始摇动了。
trad: 從那時起，他的信仰開始搖動了。

eng: No students went there yesterday.
I want to give Mom a plant.
French is my mother tongue.
No problem at all!
No problem at all!
No problem at all!
No problem!
I took Ann for her sister.
simp: 我把 Ann 当成她姐姐了。
trad: 我把 Ann 當成她姐姐了。

eng: I would like to go to sleep now.
I'm surprised that you don't know about their marriage.
simp: 我很惊讶，你竟然不知道他们结婚。
trad: 我很驚訝，你竟然不知道他們結婚。

eng: I don't like being made a fool of.
How was your summer?
That won't work!
I would like to play golf.
I was getting ready to go out. At that time, the telephone rang.
simp: 我正准备出门呢，就在那时，电话铃响了。
trad: 我正準備出門呢，就在那時，電話鈴響了。

eng: Go get some water.
When you go to play at a friends house you need to be well behaved and obedient.
simp: 你去朋友家玩要守规矩，要听话。
trad: 你去朋友家玩要守規矩，要聽話。

eng: I could have done better if I had had more time.
simp: 如果时间充裕，我可以做得更好的。
trad: 如果時間充裕，我可以做得更好的。

eng: Are you underage?
simp: 你是小屁孩吗? 你未成年吗?
trad: 你是小屁孩嗎? 你未成年嗎?

eng: Are you underage?
Are you sure about this?
There seemed to be no answer to the problem.
simp: 这个问题似乎没有答桉。
trad: 這個問題似乎沒有答案。

eng: You forgot to turn off the light.
Gestures are very important in human communication.
simp: 在人类的交流活动中，身体语言非常重要。
trad: 在人類的交流活動中，身體語言非常重要。

eng: He came by car.
Playing baseball is a sport, and climbing mountains is a sport, too.
simp: 打棒球是一种运动，登山也是一种运动。
trad: 打棒球是一種運動，登山也是一種運動。

eng: Do you have enough food?
He studied very hard.
Tom got in the car and started the engine.
simp: 汤姆上了车，启动了发动机。
trad: 湯姆上了車，啟動了發動機。

eng: I don't feed my dog in the morning.
It is a serious problem.
Can you see the difference?
simp: 你能看出有什么不同吗？
trad: 你能看出有什麼不同嗎？

eng: How can I get to the hospital by bus?
simp: 去医院要坐哪一路公交？
trad: 去醫院要坐哪一路公交？

eng: It is difficult to replace an employee that is as qualified as he is.
simp: 要找人代替像他这么有资历的员工很难。
trad: 要找人代替像他這麼有資歷的員工很難。

eng: Unfortunately I must decline your invitation.
simp: 很遗憾我无法接受您的邀请。
trad: 很遺憾我無法接受您的邀請。

eng: This story was written by my friend.
simp: 这个故事是我朋友写的。
trad: 這個故事是我朋友寫的。

eng: They consider it impolite to disagree with someone they don't know very well.
simp: 他们认为，去反驳一个不认识的人有些不礼貌。
trad: 他們認為，去反駁一個不認識的人有些不禮貌。

eng: I am proud of my father.
Oh, I was disconnected.
She loves Tom, not me.
I was very impressed by his story.

eng: That's why I told you that you shouldn't go alone.

trad: 因此我跟你說，你不要一個人去。

eng: I've spent an entire hour waiting for my friend.

eng: It looks like you're thinking about something else.

eng: I think we'd better sing that English song!

eng: He was the first to help her.

simp: 喏，这是我的秘密。很简单。只有用心才能看到本质的东西。精髓是眼睛看不见的。
trad: 喏，這是我的秘密。很簡單。只有用心才能看到本質的東西。精髓是眼睛看不見的。

trad: 湯姆把手伸向了書架上最高的一本詞典。

eng: Ten minutes later, our car ran out of gas.
simp: 我们的车再过十分钟就没油了。
trad: 我們的車再過十分鐘就沒油了。

eng: My father died of a subarachnoid hemorrhage when I was fourteen.
simp: 我十四岁的时候，父亲死于蛛网膜下出血。
trad: 我十四歲的時候，父親死於蛛網膜下出血。

eng: He held a ball.
He leaned on his elbows.
Tom is on good terms with John.
I don't know who named this dog Pochi.
simp: 我不知道是谁把这条狗取名叫波奇的。
trad: 我不知道是誰把這條狗取名叫波奇的。

eng: I wrote a letter asking him to return a bit earlier.
simp: 我写了封信，叫他早点回。
trad: 我寫了封信，叫他早點回。

eng: He has three brothers.
He has three brothers.
I have a newspaper clipping file.
The tree leaves turned red.
He confessed to the murder.
This guy looks like a fox.
I hope you'll get better soon.
This store is currently selling vegetables.
I found the rare edition that I've been looking so long for.
simp: 找到了寻找已久的珍本。
trad: 找到了尋找已久的珍本。

eng: Her acute observation skills make her a very suitable photographer.
simp: 她因为敏锐的观察力，很适合当一名摄影师。
trad: 她因為敏銳的觀察力，很適合當一名攝影師。

eng: A country is a dangerous machine.
It is the duty of every patriot to protect his country from its government.
simp: 爱国者的责任就是保护国家不受政府侵犯。
trad: 愛國者的責任就是保護國家不受政府侵犯。

eng: Dignity doesn't cost anything, but I'm the only one who truly possesses it!
simp: 尊严不值钱，却是我唯一真正拥有的！
trad: 尊嚴不值錢，卻是我唯一真正擁有的！

eng: Life's short, so I use Python!
I was ashamed to go out in old clothes.
simp: 穿旧衣服出门令我感觉颜面扫地。
trad: 穿舊衣服出門令我感覺顏面掃地。

eng: There are four seasons in this country.
Please show me the schedule.
simp: 请让我看一下日程安排！
trad: 請讓我看一下日程安排！

eng: Not all of us were satisfied with the system.
simp: 我们没有人满意此系统。
trad: 我們沒有人滿意此系統。

eng: What did you do at that moment?
I want to climb this mountain.
Public feeling against air pollution has at last became vocal.
simp: 终于，公众关于空气污染的意见成为直言不讳得。
trad: 終於，公眾關於空氣汙染的意見成為直言不諱得。

eng: I'm going to buy some bread.
I can't drink milk.
I can't drink milk.
May I take a photo?
simp: 请问可以给您拍张照片吗？
trad: 請問可以給您拍張照片嗎？

eng: A user should have freedom with respect to both hardware and software. An operating system should be open, not closed.
simp: 用户应该拥有硬件和软件的使用自由，操作系统应该是开放的，而不是封闭的。
trad: 用戶應該擁有硬件和軟件的使用自由，操作系統應該是開放的，而不是封閉的。

eng: On the client side, very time-consuming operations should run asynchronously so as to avoid freezing the browser. The best example is the operation of Ajax.
simp: 在浏览器端，耗时很长的操作都应该异步执行，避免浏览器失去响应，最好的例子就是 Ajax 操作。
trad: 在瀏覽器端，耗時很長的操作都應該異步執行，避免瀏覽器失去響應，最好的例子就是 Ajax 操作。

eng: How can one achieve such brilliant results?
simp: 这样辉煌的成绩，是如何取得的？
trad: 這樣輝煌的成績，是如何取得的？

eng: According to one study, Amazon's sales go down by 1% for every 100-millisecond lag in its loading times.
simp: 有研究称，打开速度每慢100毫秒，Amazon 的销售额就下降1%。
trad: 有研究稱，打開速度每慢100毫秒，Amazon 的銷售額就下降1%。

eng: The reform of the Chinese healthcare system is an acknowledgement of its failure.
simp: 中国的医疗改革，公认是失败的。
trad: 中國的醫療改革，公認是失敗的。

eng: In its graphical representation, the normal distribution is a bell-shaped curve, with the value growing as one moves closer to the middle and decreasing as one moves away.
simp: 在图形上，正态分布是一种钟形曲线，越接近中心，取值越大，越远离中心，取值越小。
trad: 在圖形上，正態分布是一種鐘形曲線，越接近中心，取值越大，越遠離中心，取值越小。

eng: Most of us have, to some extent, experienced being caught in a cycle like this one: Facing the browser, you hit, like you always do, Ctrl-T to open a new tab, type in the first letter of the website you always visit, and hit "enter"... just to see if anything new has happened.
simp: 我们中的许多人多多少少都经历过这样的循环：面对着浏览器，习惯性地Ctrl-T打开一个新的标签页，敲下常去网址的首字母然后回车，只为了看看有没有啥新鲜事发生。
trad: 我們中的許多人多多少少都經歷過這樣的循環：面對著瀏覽器，習慣性地Ctrl-T打開一個新的標簽頁，敲下常去網址的首字母然後回車，只為了看看有沒有啥新鮮事發生。

eng: Person of the future: "The calendar of this Unix machine that the ancients built only goes up to January 19, 2038. As such, I am convinced that this marks the day of the Earth's destruction."
simp: 未来的人类：“古代文明人所创造的这台Unix机器、它的历法只到2038年1月19日这一天就为止了，因此我确信那一天必将是地球灭亡之日。”
trad: 未來的人類：“古代文明人所創造的這臺Unix機器、它的歷法只到2038年1月19日這一天就為止了，因此我確信那一天必將是地球滅亡之日。”

eng: That book's over here.
You're full of yourself.
As if!
I have diarrhea.
But, of course, hindsight is 20-20.
simp: 但是，当然啦，事后诸葛亮总是好当。
trad: 但是，當然啦，事後諸葛亮總是好當。

eng: Junko is a beautiful girl.
Give your passport number and your date of birth.
simp: 给你的护照号和你的出生日期。
trad: 給你的護照號和你的出生日期。

eng: Please send me a letter as soon as you arrive.
simp: 你到了之后请马上给我写一封信。
trad: 你到了之後請馬上給我寫一封信。

eng: Do you have some time?
I've never seen you cook. Can you cook anything at all?
simp: 我从来没看见过你做饭.有你会做的东西吗?
trad: 我從來沒看見過你做飯.有你會做的東西嗎?

eng: It's hard for foreigners to learn Japanese.
simp: 对外国人来说,学日文挺难的.
trad: 對外國人來說,學日文挺難的.

eng: That boy has good brains.
What'd I do?
What'd I do?
Your parents used to really love us.
simp: 你的家长原来很爱我们.
trad: 你的家長原來很愛我們.

eng: Someone left their umbrella in the hall.
simp: 有人把他们的雨伞落在走道里。
trad: 有人把他們的雨傘落在走道裏。

eng: Tom likes being alone.
Could you tell me your name again?
simp: 请你再告诉我一遍你的名字?
trad: 請你再告訴我一遍你的名字?

eng: Its color is red.
I'm going to have a shower.
He believes that he can prove it.
You are not authorized to enter there.
I said I would make her happy.
Tom went to Boston three years ago.
simp: 汤姆三年前去了波士顿。
trad: 湯姆三年前去了波士頓。

eng: I'll call you.
I like reading.
Are you Tom?
Don't worry, we're on our way.
Tom doesn't know the difference between Iraq and Iran.
simp: 汤姆不知道伊拉克和伊朗有什么区别。
trad: 湯姆不知道伊拉克和伊朗有什麼區別。

eng: You can't speak English, can you?
Fear is more harmful than the sharpest of swords.
Big Brother is watching you.
One must have conviction in law, or its existence will be superficial only.
simp: 法律必须被信仰，否则形同虚设。
trad: 法律必須被信仰，否則形同虛設。

eng: An ounce of wit that is bought is worse a pound that is taught.
simp: 花代价所换来的一点才智，抵过别人传授的数倍不止。
trad: 花代價所換來的一點才智，抵過別人傳授的數倍不止。

eng: It hurts to see Mary suffer so.
simp: 看到玛丽那样痛苦我很难过。
trad: 看到瑪麗那樣痛苦我很難過。

eng: I need the exact address so that I may go there.
simp: 我需要精确的地址，以便我能去你那儿。
trad: 我需要精確的地址，以便我能去你那兒。

eng: The more precise the calculations, the stronger the friendship.
simp: 算帐愈是精确, 友谊愈是坚定。
trad: 算帳愈是精確, 友誼愈是堅定。

eng: We made an agreement to meet exactly at ten.
simp: 我们彼此同意在十点整见面。
trad: 我們彼此同意在十點整見面。

eng: This cartographer is famous for the precision in his maps.
simp: 此製图员出名于其製图的精准性。
trad: 此製圖員出名於其製圖的精準性。

eng: Our teacher is someone who likes precision, and always demands precise answers of her students.
simp: 老师性喜精准——她总是要求精确的答桉。
trad: 老師性喜精準——她總是要求精確的答案。

eng: Can you explain the exact meaning of this word?
simp: 你能否说出这个词的精确意思?
trad: 你能否說出這個詞的精確意思?

eng: Her life goal is to marry a rich man.
simp: 她的人生目标就是找个有钱的老公。
trad: 她的人生目標就是找個有錢的老公。

eng: I'm someone ambitious - someone who knows very well what he is after.
simp: 我是有志向的人——清楚自己的目标。
trad: 我是有誌向的人——清楚自己的目標。

eng: The taller the tree, the more likely it is to be struck by lightning.
I aimed at a sparrow, but shot down a goose.
Unexpectedly, I struck fortune.
Is your mother tongue Chinese?
A very beautiful picture is hanging on the wall.
simp: 牆上挂着极漂亮的图画。
trad: 牆上掛著極漂亮的圖畫。

eng: It's impossible to get there by noon.
Tom has three cats.
Where do you use Esperanto?

In reality, translation is akin to working for peanuts, since the corresponding meaning of something in one language is often hidden in some deep and impenetrable recesses of the other. As a result, the translator is forced to search all over... Never mind that the picky reader is very difficult to fool.
simp: 翻译其实是一件吃力不讨好的事，因为一种语言在另一种语言中的对应物藏在往往隐藏在深不可测之处，翻译者需要百般寻觅，而且，挑剔的读者很难煳弄。
trad: 翻譯其實是一件吃力不討好的事，因為一種語言在另一種語言中的對應物藏在往往隱藏在深不可測之處，翻譯者需要百般尋覓，而且，挑剔的讀者很難糊弄。

eng: He commands the respect of a king.
The poor man has no relatives.
Almost everyone in our village is related to one another.
simp: 我们村里所有的村民几乎彼此都是亲戚。
trad: 我們村裏所有的村民幾乎彼此都是親戚。

eng: I often visit my relatives.
We are now in-laws, seeing as our kids got married.
simp: 我们成亲家了, 因为我们的孩子们结婚了。
trad: 我們成親家了, 因為我們的孩子們結婚了。

eng: All of my wife's relatives are my in-laws.
simp: 我太太的所有亲戚都是我的姻亲。
trad: 我太太的所有親戚都是我的姻親。

eng: Someone locked me in the room.
simp: 有人把我锁在这房间裡。
trad: 有人把我鎖在這房間裡。

eng: I always lock my room.
He missed on purpose so as not to kill me.
simp: 他故意射偏, 因为不想射死我。
trad: 他故意射偏, 因為不想射死我。

eng: I don't have any sisters.
Smog was very heavy today.
He set a precedent.
He wound a bandage around the wound.
The bandage was wound around the wound.
Many soldiers were wounded in the battle.
simp: 许多战士会战中挂彩了。
trad: 許多戰士會戰中掛彩了。

eng: Life is so complicated.
I eat here.
I miss you.
Don't understand.
I have heard the story.
I burned myself with boiling water.
My watch gains one minute a day.
simp: 我的手錶每天快一分钟。
trad: 我的手錶每天快一分鐘。

eng: Are you Arabic?
Don't get me started.
Somewhere in this world, there must be an apple that needs me.
simp: 在这个世界上的某个地方肯定有一个苹果需要我。
trad: 在這個世界上的某個地方肯定有一個蘋果需要我。

eng: What's your hobby?
What's your favorite beverage?
simp: 你最喜欢的饮料是什么？
trad: 你最喜歡的飲料是什麼？

eng: This is a miracle.
The atomic bomb is the offspring of 20th century physics.
simp: 原子弹是二十世纪物理学的产物。
trad: 原子彈是二十世紀物理學的產物。

eng: You look just like my sister.
You look just like my sister.
Tom's fearless.
She looks young.
He looks young.
My opinion is the same as theirs.
Our country abounds in products.
The actress' skin has makeup on it.
simp: 演员的皮肤是化过妆的。
trad: 演員的皮膚是化過妝的。

eng: Be nice to others.
He recounted the accident to me as if he had seen it with his own eyes.
simp: 他讲起那场事故，讲得彷佛他亲眼所见。
trad: 他講起那場事故，講得仿佛他親眼所見。

eng: Are you a teacher or a student?
Jim likes to play the drum.
He forced me to go there.
Mother is never impatient with us.
simp: 母亲从来没有因为我们而不耐烦。
trad: 母親從來沒有因為我們而不耐煩。

eng: Good morning.
He looks like a sportsman, but he is a writer.
simp: 他看起来像个运动员，但是其实是个作家。
trad: 他看起來像個運動員，但是其實是個作家。

eng: I'm a cat.
She spoke Japanese well.
He said that he gets up at 6 o'clock every day.
simp: 他说他每天早上六点起床。
trad: 他說他每天早上六點起床。

eng: I like eating melons from Hami.
Do you like Japanese food?
He has bought a banana case.
The word you use depends on your intended meaning.
simp: 你所说的话取决于你的本意。
trad: 你所說的話取決於你的本意。

eng: I hate you!
Taste buds are very useful.
They drink coffee at home.
I don't know either.
We're buying movie tickets.
At the library.
They're in math class.
Her diploma.
She's trying on a coat.
He's buying apples.
She's going out to buy some things.
The shopping bag that they're carrying.
No, I still prefer eating vegetables.
They're at the bar drinking.
They're at the eatery looking at the menu.
Eggplant, carrot, tomato.
He's at the bank exchanging money.
He's at the post office sending a package to a friend.
simp: 他在邮局给朋友寄包裹。
trad: 他在郵局給朋友寄包裹。

eng: Three streets, as well as a park and a hospital.
simp: 三条马路，还有医院和公园。
trad: 三條馬路，還有醫院和公園。

eng: It's because he got lost.
In the desert, I think.
We should classify them before throwing them out.
simp: 我们在扔掉之前得分类。
trad: 我們在扔掉之前得分類。

eng: Just about everything can be recycled.
Because there's pollution in the cities.
They like the beautiful stars and moon.
simp: 他们喜欢美丽的星星和月亮。
trad: 他們喜歡美麗的星星和月亮。

eng: Come from India.
She's still single.
She has three children.
She's Brazilian.
They met in Spain seven years ago.
simp: 他们七年前在西班牙认识的。
trad: 他們七年前在西班牙認識的。

eng: He's Austrian.
Yes, Fitzpatrick. He comes from the U.S.
My dear mother.
He wears Chinese-style clothes.
Are you a student?
Have you been well?
Are the train tickets expensive?
Is your child a boy or a girl?
Yes, I'm a student too.
Erkin likes her too.
We helped them as well.
Regardless of whether you come tomorrow or not, let me know.
simp: 不管您明天来不来，请通知我。
trad: 不管您明天來不來，請通知我。

eng: Whether he studies or goes into business, I won't stop him.
simp: 不管他是上学还是做生意，我不会反对。
trad: 不管他是上學還是做生意，我不會反對。

eng: I wish everyone luck in the coming year, as well as success in their work and studies.
simp: 祝各位来年好运，学习事业成功。
trad: 祝各位來年好運，學習事業成功。

eng: I'm amazed at your fluency in English.
simp: 你流利的英语让我很吃惊。
trad: 你流利的英語讓我很吃驚。

eng: Try to explain this.
This river abounds in trout.
What's your favorite way to cook trout?
He works really hard, and his co-workers respect him for it.
simp: 他很努力工作，所以他的同事们都尊敬他。
trad: 他很努力工作，所以他的同事們都尊敬他。

eng: I'm not hungry.
Do you think that chest hair is sexy?
simp: 你觉得胸毛是性感的吗？
trad: 你覺得胸毛是性感的嗎？

eng: The island is a paradise for children.
simp: 这个岛是孩子们的天堂。
trad: 這個島是孩子們的天堂。

eng: Do you like San Francisco?
Get on the horse immediately!
The children went to play in the park.
simp: 小孩子们到公园去玩玩。
trad: 小孩子們到公園去玩玩。

eng: He's a specialist in economics.
This road is under repair.
Have you got this number memorized?
What do you want to do tomorrow?
What do you want to learn?
Where are your keys?
I finished buying a dozen eggs.
Are these eggs sold by the dozen?
Mary wants a dozen eggs.
The apples are sold by the dozen.
Do you want to go to the cinema or the theater?
simp: 您想去电影院还是去剧院吗？
trad: 您想去電影院還是去劇院嗎？

eng: That's just useless.
We give him an apple.
I'm a foreigner.
The murmur of the brook lulls me to sleep.
What time is your plane?
simp: 你的飞机什么时候起飞呢？
trad: 你的飛機什麼時候起飛呢？

eng: Can you teach me how to play the bagpipes?
simp: 你会不会教我学吹气风笛？
trad: 你會不會教我學吹氣風笛？

eng: You'll never be able to revive someone who is only pretending to be dead.
simp: 你永远都无法救活一个装死的人。
trad: 你永遠都無法救活一個裝死的人。

eng: Whose pen is this?
God does not exist.
He speaks Chinese.
She speaks Chinese.
Just what time period is "Hong Fan" a product of? Although people have debated this issue for ages, there is still no clear consensus to this day.
simp: 《洪范》到底是什么时代的作品, 千百年来人们见仁见智, 至今仍无定论。
trad: 《洪範》到底是什麼時代的作品, 千百年來人們見仁見智, 至今仍無定論。

eng: How many years have you studied Mandarin for?
Do you study Mandarin there?
Tom has never eaten raw horse meat.
Is this jasmine tea?
Tom does not like this color.
This is something I must face alone.
simp: 这件事我必须自己面对。
trad: 這件事我必須自己面對。

eng: Are they able to read these words?
simp: 他们懂得读这几个字吗？
trad: 他們懂得讀這幾個字嗎？

eng: I've had black rice congee thrice in one day!
simp: 我一天吃了三次黑米粥！
trad: 我一天吃了三次黑米粥！

eng: Chongqing is a hilly city with winding streets.
simp: 重庆是一座丘陵的城市，道路弯弯曲曲的。
trad: 重慶是一座丘陵的城市，道路彎彎曲曲的。

eng: How many arms does an octopus have?
How many arms does a squid have?
He closed the door.
This isn't love.
Tom doesn't know whether Mary is happy or not.
simp: 汤姆不知道玛丽是高兴呢，还是不高兴。
trad: 湯姆不知道瑪麗是高興呢，還是不高興。

eng: I am Egyptian.
Daddy, i love you!
What are you lingering for? Hurry up and go.
simp: 你磨蹭什么呀，快点去吧。
trad: 你磨蹭什麼呀，快點去吧。

eng: How have you been recently?
He does not have any friends.
He doesn't have any friends.
The water turned to ice.
I like the way she laughs at my jokes.
simp: 我喜欢她因我的笑话而欢笑的样子。
trad: 我喜歡她因我的笑話而歡笑的樣子。

eng: Can you translate this song for me?

trad: 你能為我翻譯這首歌嗎？

eng: I just don't want to marry Tom.

eng: What would you like to be in the future?

simp: 汤姆在性教育课上睡着了。
trad: 湯姆在性教育課上睡著了。

eng: Tom seems to be an honest man.
simp: 汤姆似乎是个诚实的人。
trad: 湯姆似乎是個誠實的人。

eng: Are you Julius?

I'd also like to have a try.
Field hockey is not very popular in China.
simp: 曲棍球在中国不是很流行。
trad: 曲棍球在中國不是很流行。

eng: Even the air's spicy here.

trad: 這兒連空氣都有辣味兒

eng: Neither students nor teachers should ever stop learning.
simp: 不管是学生还是老师，两个都必须不停地学习下去。
trad: 不管是學生還是老師，兩個都必須不停地學習下去。

eng: Mandarin, English, and Arabic are all examples of the world's most widely spoken languages.
simp: 汉语也好，英语也好，阿拉伯语也好，都属于世界上最多人用的语言。
trad: 漢語也好，英語也好，阿拉伯語也好，都屬於世界上最多人用的語言。

eng: Whether you like it or not, we have to do it that way.
simp: 不管你想不想，我们必要那样做。
trad: 不管你想不想，我們必要那樣做。

eng: The Uyghurs' cuisine has all kinds of dishes.
simp: 维族人的饭菜各种各样。
trad: 維族人的飯菜各種各樣。

eng: He believes that there is a spy among us.
simp: 他认为我们当中有一个奸细。
trad: 他認為我們當中有一個奸細。

eng: They decided to fight mano-a-mano.

trad: 不許逐字逐句地翻譯這個句子。

eng: Yana lives in London.
Do you want to trade our two sheep, one for another?
simp: 我们把这两头羊就一头换一头怎么样？
trad: 我們把這兩頭羊就一頭換一頭怎麼樣？

eng: The policemen searched one house after another in looking for the thief.
simp: 为了把小偷抓住，警察逐家逐户地搜查了。
trad: 為了把小偷抓住，警察逐家逐戶地搜查了。

eng: You're not satisfied, are you?
The birds soar in the air.
This room's pretty awesome, eh?
simp: 这个房间太棒了，难道不是么？
trad: 這個房間太棒了，難道不是麼？

eng: Do you want us to call you a taxi?
simp: 你要不要我们给你叫辆出租车？
trad: 你要不要我們給你叫輛出租車？

eng: How've ya' been lately?
You've been well lately?
How's it going lately?
Everything's still going well?
You guys need to go brush your teeth!
She fell in love with her boyfriend's younger brother.
simp: 她爱上了她男友的弟弟。
trad: 她愛上了她男友的弟弟。

eng: I need your cooperation.
He was extremely happy at having successfully solved the problem.
simp: 成功地解决了这个问题，对此他感到十分高兴。
trad: 成功地解決了這個問題，對此他感到十分高興。

eng: I've got a few friends.
She made tea for me.
You're an idiot!
You're an idiot!
Worries are like ghosts - those who aren't afraid of them can't suffer at their hands.
simp: 忧愁就像魔鬼：谁不怕它，它就不能伤害谁。
trad: 憂愁就像魔鬼：誰不怕它，它就不能傷害誰。

eng: Worries are like ghosts - those who aren't afraid of them can't suffer at their hands.
simp: 忧愁就像魔鬼一样，它伤害不了不害怕它的人。
trad: 憂愁就像魔鬼一樣，它傷害不了不害怕它的人。

eng: I'll go with you when pigs fly.
simp: 山无棱，天地合，我就跟你走。
trad: 山無棱，天地合，我就跟你走。

eng: I'll go with you when the end of the world arrives.
simp: 世界末日来临的时候，我就跟你走。
trad: 世界末日來臨的時候，我就跟你走。

eng: Smoking or health, the choice is yours.
simp: 吸烟还是健康，选择权在你
trad: 吸煙還是健康，選擇權在你

eng: How are you getting along with your new classmates?
simp: 你跟新同学相处的怎么样？
trad: 你跟新同學相處的怎麼樣？

eng: I am relieved that you are safe.
Let's just pray it never happens again.
simp: 我们一起祈祷这样的事别再发生了
trad: 我們一起祈禱這樣的事別再發生了

eng: I'd like to leave a message for Tom.
What are you going to use this car for?
This textbook is good.
There is nothing wrong with him.
I filled this glass with milk.
simp: 我把这个杯子倒满了牛奶
trad: 我把這個杯子倒滿了牛奶

eng: I really want to know her name.
The sun sets in the west.
The boy observed the birds all day.
I'm going to shoot him dead.
Tom asked Mary to marry him, but she turned down his proposal.
simp: 汤姆向玛丽求婚，但是她拒绝了。
trad: 湯姆向瑪麗求婚，但是她拒絕了。

eng: Why do you like Hawaii?
Is there a TV in your bedroom?

simp: 这个女人生了一个女婴。
trad: 這個女人生了一個女嬰。

eng: Thank you for the Christmas gift.

I guess it's only a joke.
Tom pretty much forgot about the meeting.
simp: 汤姆差不多忘了开会的事儿。
trad: 湯姆差不多忘了開會的事兒。

eng: We don't have another choice.
We don't have any other choice.
Well, girls, it's time to go.
simp: 那么，女孩们，是时候出发了。
trad: 那麼，女孩們，是時候出發了。

eng: My house looks toward the sea.
Yesterday I saw an old acquaintance whom I hadn't seen in ten years.
simp: 我昨天见了一个十年没见的熟人。
trad: 我昨天見了一個十年沒見的熟人。

eng: He is lying on the bench.
Tom has never been punctual.
I don't want to talk to you, Tom.

Do you need a car?

simp: 我鼓励学生们更努力地学习。
trad: 我鼓勵學生們更努力地學習。

eng: She'll cry even when no one is looking.
simp: 没人盯着她的时候，她甚至会哭。
trad: 沒人盯著她的時候，她甚至會哭。

eng: My father will possibly come on the next train.
simp: 我父亲可能会乘下一列火车来。
trad: 我父親可能會乘下一列火車來。

eng: Did you have a good weekend?
Most students are preparing for the final exams.
simp: 大多数学生都在为期末考试复习。
trad: 大多數學生都在為期末考試復習。

eng: Goodbye, she said.

simp: 我在这项计划上投入了所有精力。
trad: 我在這項計劃上投入了所有精力。

eng: It would appear that you're wrong.

simp: 警察抓住了那个男孩的手臂。
trad: 警察抓住了那個男孩的手臂。

eng: Many people can't, and do not want to, make the effort to understand others.
simp: 许多人不能而且不想去理解别人。
trad: 許多人不能而且不想去理解別人。

eng: These shoes are too big for me.
simp: 这双鞋对我来说太大了。
trad: 這雙鞋對我來說太大了。

eng: What places are you planning to visit in your travels? And how? And why?
simp: 你打算去哪些地方旅行？怎么去？为什么？
trad: 你打算去哪些地方旅行？怎麼去？為什麼？

eng: I've got a toothache. I just can't bear this pain anymore.
simp: 牙疼。我无法忍受这种疼痛。
trad: 牙疼。我無法忍受這種疼痛。

eng: My father works at a factory.
Is there a discount if you pay in cash?
simp: 用现金付的话会有折扣吗?
trad: 用現金付的話會有折扣嗎?

eng: He was a very good skier when he was little.

simp: 我一个人把两个小孩扶养长大。
trad: 我一個人把兩個小孩扶養長大。

eng: My shoulder really aches.
Can you tell those twins apart?
simp: 你可以分出那对双胞胎中谁是谁吗?
trad: 你可以分出那對雙胞胎中誰是誰嗎?

eng: He was aware that I was around, but didn't come to greet me.
simp: 他注意到我在场，但是没向我打招呼。
trad: 他註意到我在場，但是沒向我打招呼。

eng: I hope that you give this book a read.
How long will you be in Tokyo for?

simp: 我们队输了第一场比赛。
trad: 我們隊輸了第一場比賽。

eng: I was entirely bummed out by the results.
As there was no bus, I had no choice but to walk.
simp: 因为没有公车，我只得走路。
trad: 因為沒有公車，我只得走路。

eng: You're seriously going to eat this?
You've got a lot of willpower.
Can I see the menu, please?

simp: 当她看到妈妈没在生她的气，她的双眼因为幸福而闪烁了。
trad: 當她看到媽媽沒在生她的氣，她的雙眼因為幸福而閃爍了。

eng: He jumped out of bed.

simp: 在西班牙日历中，一周的开始是周一。
trad: 在西班牙日歷中，一周的開始是周一。

eng: Would you be willing to show me how to do that?
simp: 你愿意告诉我怎么做吗？
trad: 你願意告訴我怎麼做嗎？

eng: The teacher pointed out your mistakes.
How do I use chopsticks?

Oh my god! I've killed a pregnant woman!
I'm out of it.

You understand German, right?
You understand German, right?

That's okay.

simp: 你说普通话不好的包括你自己。
trad: 你說普通話不好的包括你自己。

eng: You can't put toothpaste back in the tube.

simp: 他醒了过来，发现自己正躺在一间不见天日的狭小囚室里。
trad: 他醒了過來，發現自己正躺在一間不見天日的狹小囚室裏。

eng: It's a lot of trouble to write my name, because it takes 50 strokes to write both my first and last names.
simp: 我的姓、名一共有五十划，写起来麻烦得很。
trad: 我的姓、名一共有五十劃，寫起來麻煩得很。

eng: Teacher Zhang teaches Chinese to his students at school every day.
simp: 张老师每天在教室教学生中文。
trad: 張老師每天在教室教學生中文。

eng: It's spring everywhere in the motherland.
Teacher Zhang teaches Chinese to his students at school every day.
simp: 张老师每天在学校教学生中文。
trad: 張老師每天在學校教學生中文。

eng: You sing songs to me.
We are the Borg.
I'm short.

simp: 如果你把你抱怨的时间用在练习篮球上，你或许早已不必抱怨。
trad: 如果你把你抱怨的時間用在練習籃球上，你或許早已不必抱怨。

eng: The number is unfortunately busy.
Almost all the American TV series of the last few years were written by homosexuals.
simp: 这几年美剧的编剧几乎都是同性恋。
trad: 這幾年美劇的編劇幾乎都是同性戀。

eng: Thanks, guys. "Don't mention it."
I'd be delighted if you could come with us.
simp: 你能来的话我会很开心。
trad: 你能來的話我會很開心。

eng: She fell in love with her boyfriend's older brother.
simp: 她爱上了她男友的哥哥。
trad: 她愛上了她男友的哥哥。

eng: She fell in love with her friend's younger brother.
simp: 她爱上了她朋友的弟弟。
trad: 她愛上了她朋友的弟弟。

eng: She made tea for me.

simp: 网络积极分子想跟最高领袖见面。
trad: 網絡積極分子想跟最高領袖見面。

eng: A conservative is not always a reactionary.
simp: 保守分子不一定是反动分子。
