simp: 酸性会腐蚀含有金属的物质。
trad: 酸性會腐蝕含有金屬的物質。

eng: It is subject to interpretation.
simp: 这件事靠个人的立场来解释。
trad: 這件事靠個人的立場來解釋。

eng: I want to close the door.
I don't want to open the window.
I don't want to learn your language.
The cat sleeps on the chair.
I am an office worker.
It was for a dead person rather than a living one that we were searching.
simp: 即使明天天寒地冻，路远马亡，我也要有对简单生活和梦想的追求。
trad: 即使明天天寒地凍，路遠馬亡，我也要有對簡單生活和夢想的追求。

eng: He hasn't actually been to America.
He plunged into the lake fully clothed.
simp: 他连衣服也没有脱就跳进了湖里。
trad: 他連衣服也沒有脫就跳進了湖裏。

eng: He was hanged during the Revolution.
simp: 革命的时候他被吊死了。
trad: 革命的時候他被吊死了。

eng: Scientists deal mainly with physical matters.
simp: 科学家处理大多数物理的事物。
trad: 科學家處理大多數物理的事物。

eng: Some students like English, and others like physics.
simp: 有些学生喜欢英语，有些喜欢物理。
trad: 有些學生喜歡英語，有些喜歡物理。

eng: Generally speaking, men are physically stronger than women.
simp: 一般说来，男生的肌肉比女生发达。
trad: 一般說來，男生的肌肉比女生發達。

eng: Physically impossible.
I'm from Kyoto.
The only important things in life are love and work.
simp: 生命中唯一重要的事情是爱情和工作。
trad: 生命中唯一重要的事情是愛情和工作。

eng: I have a hangover.
Emily hates climbing.
My sister worked as a secretary before she got married.
simp: 我的姐姐结婚前是个秘书.
trad: 我的姐姐結婚前是個秘書.

eng: I have a good-paying job with excellent hours.
simp: 我有一份工资很高工作时间理想的工作.
trad: 我有一份工資很高工作時間理想的工作.

eng: My brother’s in the army. He was just promoted to the rank of major.
simp: 我的哥哥在军队里.他刚刚被提升为少校.
trad: 我的哥哥在軍隊裏.他剛剛被提升為少校.

eng: You should have known better than to lend him money.
simp: 早知如此，就不应该借钱给他。
trad: 早知如此，就不應該借錢給他。

eng: You're right.
She writes me every week.
simp: 她每个星期发送给我信件。
trad: 她每個星期發送給我信件。

eng: Frankly speaking, I don't like you.
The world is a small village.
They want to get married.
My name is Jisung.
No, thank you. I'm just looking.
What's your favorite breakfast food?
simp: 早饭的时候你最喜欢什么菜？
trad: 早飯的時候你最喜歡什麼菜？

eng: I went to London.
What a pretty girl!
Honey in the mouth and poison in the heart.
You drive me nuts!
Are you busy?
Tom didn't like Mary.
This castle is beautiful.
My uncle lives in New York.
Africa is a very large continent.
simp: 非洲是一块非常大的大陆。
trad: 非洲是一塊非常大的大陸。

eng: She fell of her horse.
You can't park on this street.
I like speaking in French.
Pandas are beautiful animals.
You've won!
You've won!
You've won!
He didn't want to go to Japan.
Where is the Russian embassy?
I was able to find the book I was looking for.
I do not understand the exact meaning of this sentence.
simp: 我不是很清楚这个句子的意思。
trad: 我不是很清楚這個句子的意思。

eng: I can't sleep because of the noise.
simp: 因为太闹，所以我睡不着觉。
trad: 因為太鬧，所以我睡不著覺。

eng: I hear she is going to get married next month.
simp: 我听说，她下个月结婚了。
trad: 我聽說，她下個月結婚了。

eng: Our team lost, 2-0.
I have brown hair.
She's promised to give me a ring.
Mary used to play with dolls.
He went home three hours later.
Anybody knows who Florence is?
Hurry up, or you will be late.
David is at home.
David is at home.
Tom got on the airplane.
Let's take a picture.
This sounds fishy.
I like soups with lots of vegetables.
simp: 我喜欢有很多蔬菜的汤。
trad: 我喜歡有很多蔬菜的湯。

eng: You don't have to be so nervous.
Tom can give you an answer tomorrow.
She went there by herself.
I asked her if he liked Chinese food.
simp: 我问他喜不喜欢中国菜。
trad: 我問他喜不喜歡中國菜。

eng: I'm alive in Tokyo.
I like this one.
Tom and Mary have broken up. "That's ancient history."
simp: 《Tom和Mary离开了。》《这是的从前的故事。》
trad: 《Tom和Mary離開了。》《這是的從前的故事。》

eng: It's late already. Hurry up!
We weren't able to buy tickets, so we didn't go to the concert.
simp: 因为我们不可能买票了，所以我们没去音乐会。
trad: 因為我們不可能買票了，所以我們沒去音樂會。

eng: Little by little, the bird made his nest.
Well, I'll tell you how to spell my name.
simp: 好的，我会告诉你怎么写我的名字。
trad: 好的，我會告訴你怎麼寫我的名字。

eng: Please wash my back.
He saw a pretty girl.
When will I get to Tokyo?
He did not like children.
Do not eat too much cake.
Where was the princess?
She can speak both English and German.
Why learn Klingon?
Paper burns easily.
I'm not a doctor, but a teacher.
She turned her old dress into a skirt.
simp: 她把旧连衣裙换了一条裙子。
trad: 她把舊連衣裙換了一條裙子。

eng: When will I get to Tokyo?
You're just like your father.
My brother is a teacher.
My brother is a teacher.
I helped my father water the flowers.
simp: 我帮助我爸爸给花浇水。
trad: 我幫助我爸爸給花澆水。

eng: Karima hasn't read the letter yet.
The word is no longer in use.
The meeting is held twice a month.
Tom knows how to cook spaghetti.
Tom knows how to cook spaghetti.
I'm glad you liked my friends.
simp: 我高兴你喜欢我的朋友们。
trad: 我高興你喜歡我的朋友們。

eng: I'm glad you liked my friends.
simp: 我高兴你喜欢我的朋友。
trad: 我高興你喜歡我的朋友。

eng: She wanted to help them.
She wanted to help them.
Why wouldn't you listen to his advice?
He departed for London the day before yesterday.
I hate soccer.
I'm drinking water in the kitchen.
It's a crying shame that they weren't insured against fire.
simp: 这简直是太可惜了，他们没有买火险。
trad: 這簡直是太可惜了，他們沒有買火險。

eng: The excitement reached its peak.
You said Mary was beautiful, but I didn't think she would be this beautiful.
simp: 你说玛丽很美丽，但我没有想到她是这么美丽。
trad: 你說瑪麗很美麗，但我沒有想到她是這麼美麗。

eng: They are watching what's happening closely.
simp: 他们在仔细观看发生了什么。
trad: 他們在仔細觀看發生了什麼。

eng: We arrived here at six yesterday evening.
simp: 昨天晚上六点钟我们来到了这里。
trad: 昨天晚上六點鐘我們來到了這裏。

eng: I remember hearing that music somewhere.
simp: 我记得在哪儿听到那音乐。
trad: 我記得在哪兒聽到那音樂。

eng: Mathematics is the language with which God has written the universe.
simp: 数学是神用来撰写宇宙的语言。
trad: 數學是神用來撰寫宇宙的語言。

eng: These shoes are killing me.
simp: 这些鞋子真是要了我的命。
trad: 這些鞋子真是要了我的命。

eng: Tom has next to nothing in his wallet.
simp: 汤姆的钱包里几乎没有什么。
trad: 湯姆的錢包裏幾乎沒有什麼。

eng: Tom was unable to remember what he had eaten for breakfast.
simp: 汤姆未能记得他在早餐吃了什么。
trad: 湯姆未能記得他在早餐吃了什麼。

eng: Most students agree with the proposal, and made a list of arguments in favour of it.
simp: 大多数学生同意这个建议，并列出了他们同意的理由。
trad: 大多數學生同意這個建議，並列出了他們同意的理由。

eng: I intend to get full marks.
Had it not been for his help, I should have failed.
simp: 如果没有他的帮助，我可能已经失败了。
trad: 如果沒有他的幫助，我可能已經失敗了。

eng: I prefer tea over coffee.
This cat is very fat.
What are you doing?
They agree.
We must wait.
Tom will be busy at this time tomorrow.
simp: 汤姆将忙于在明天的这个时候。
trad: 湯姆將忙於在明天的這個時候。

eng: We know that Tom has been shot. That's all we know.
simp: 我们知道，汤姆被枪杀。这就是我们所知道的一切。
trad: 我們知道，湯姆被槍殺。這就是我們所知道的一切。

eng: I'm perfectly happy being alone.
I didn't know what it meant.
Does that hurt?
Tom fixed the roof of his house just yesterday.
simp: 汤姆昨天修好了他家的屋顶。
trad: 湯姆昨天修好了他家的屋頂。

eng: The CEO is very satisfied with the result.
The CEO is very disappointed with the result.
The result is opposite to what we expected.
simp: 结果与我们预期的相反。
trad: 結果與我們預期的相反。

eng: The outcome of the test shows that the system has already fulfilled all design requirements.
simp: 测试的结果显示，系统已经满足了所有设计要求。
trad: 測試的結果顯示，系統已經滿足了所有設計要求。

eng: No one could predict the outcome of this cooperation.
simp: 没人能够预言这次合作的结果。
trad: 沒人能夠預言這次合作的結果。

eng: This ticket is made ​​out of paper.
This chair is made of plastic.
You need to consider the consequences before making any modifications to existing code.
simp: 对现有代码做出任何修改前，你需要考虑后果。
trad: 對現有代碼做出任何修改前，你需要考慮後果。

eng: Because of a flaw in the original design, our website is vulnerable to SQL injection attacks.
simp: 由于最初设计中的一个缺陷，我们的网站易受到SQL注入攻击。
trad: 由於最初設計中的一個缺陷，我們的網站易受到SQL註入攻擊。

eng: Due to lack of manpower, we need more time than expectations to handle this task.
simp: 由于人力不足，我们需要比预期更多的时间来承担这项任务。
trad: 由於人力不足，我們需要比預期更多的時間來承擔這項任務。

eng: As a result of the server breakdown, total PV of yesterday dropped by 30% compared with normal.
simp: 由于服务器故障，昨天的总PV与正常相比下降了30%。
trad: 由於服務器故障，昨天的總PV與正常相比下降了30%。

eng: In consequence of some badly coded functions, the system is unstable most of the time.
simp: 由于一些写得糟糕的函数，系统大多数情况下不稳定。
trad: 由於一些寫得糟糕的函數，系統大多數情況下不穩定。

eng: In consequence of a new agreement between two competitors, we need to readjust our strategies.
simp: 由于两个竞争对手的一项新协议，我们需要重新调整战略。
trad: 由於兩個競爭對手的一項新協議，我們需要重新調整戰略。

eng: We have optimized the database indexing, and as a result, system efficiency has improved by 50%.
simp: 我们优化了数据库索引，结果系统效率提高了50%。
trad: 我們優化了數據庫索引，結果系統效率提高了50%。

eng: As a consequence, additional tests must be carried out to ensure complete security.
simp: 因此，必须进行额外的测试以确保完整的安全性。
trad: 因此，必須進行額外的測試以確保完整的安全性。

eng: QA team has discovered a serious bug. In consequence, it is recommended that all works be reviewed from the beginning.
simp: QA团队发现了一个重大bug，因此，建议重新审查所有工作。
trad: QA團隊發現了一個重大bug，因此，建議重新審查所有工作。

eng: According to latest survey, 99% of employees want a free iPad.
simp: 根据最新的调查，99%的员工想要一个免费的iPad。
trad: 根據最新的調查，99%的員工想要一個免費的iPad。

eng: The whole plan is only based on his personal opinions.
simp: 整个计划只是基于他的个人看法。
trad: 整個計劃只是基於他的個人看法。

eng: The calculation of the budget for next year is based on the costs this year.
simp: 明年预算的计算是基于今年的成本的。
trad: 明年預算的計算是基於今年的成本的。

eng: Judging from current situations, this project will absolutely succeed.
simp: 根据当前的状况，这个项目绝对会成功。
trad: 根據當前的狀況，這個項目絕對會成功。

eng: For the sake of long-term interests, we have decided to sell the development department.
simp: 为了长期利益，我们决定把开发部门卖掉。
trad: 為了長期利益，我們決定把開發部門賣掉。

eng: In order to complete the development on schedule, we request that other unrelated tasks be delayed for the moment.
simp: 为了按期完成开发，我们请求暂时推迟其他不相关的任务。
trad: 為了按期完成開發，我們請求暫時推遲其他不相關的任務。

eng: Every function should have comments describing its purpose in order to avoid confusions.
simp: 每一个函数都应该有描述其目的的注释以避免误解。
trad: 每一個函數都應該有描述其目的的註釋以避免誤解。

eng: In order to progress the project smoothly, we have revised the plan several times.
simp: 为了顺利推进项目，我们已经修订了几次计划。
trad: 為了順利推進項目，我們已經修訂了幾次計劃。

eng: Not complying with the naming conventions will result in parse errors.
simp: 不遵守命名规则会导致解析错误。
trad: 不遵守命名規則會導致解析錯誤。

eng: If small mistakes are not corrected at once, they may lead to serious problems.
simp: 如果小错误不被立即纠正，可能会导致严重问题。
trad: 如果小錯誤不被立即糾正，可能會導致嚴重問題。

eng: We are open to all suggestions regarding the new design of the website.
simp: 关于网站的新设计，我们乐于接受任何建议。
trad: 關於網站的新設計，我們樂於接受任何建議。

eng: This new project in Java doesn't concern me at all, because I'm a PHP developer.
simp: 这个新的Java项目完全与我无关，因为我是一个PHP程序员。
trad: 這個新的Java項目完全與我無關，因為我是一個PHP程序員。

eng: He is going to take charge of a project concerning the future of the company.
simp: 他将要负责一个关系公司前途的项目。
trad: 他將要負責一個關系公司前途的項目。

eng: The infrastructure of an application is directly related to its overall performance.
simp: 一个应用的架构直接关系到它的整体性能。
trad: 一個應用的架構直接關系到它的整體性能。

eng: This process must be stopped immediately, otherwise the server will breakdown.
simp: 这个进程必须立即停止，否则服务器会故障。
trad: 這個進程必須立即停止，否則服務器會故障。

eng: Our conclusion is based on previous studies into the problem.
simp: 我们的结论基于之前对这个问题的研究。
trad: 我們的結論基於之前對這個問題的研究。

eng: We have come to the conclusion that this plan is not feasible currently.
simp: 我们得出结论，这个计划目前是不可行的。
trad: 我們得出結論，這個計劃目前是不可行的。

eng: In conclusion, the next step is to decide what we should do for the next step.
simp: 总之，下一步是要决定我们下一步应该做什么。
trad: 總之，下一步是要決定我們下一步應該做什麼。

eng: A wooden bowl.
This plastic chair is very cheap.
This television is very heavy.
My book is very heavy.
Is this restaurant open?
Does this fit?
This update will be released at 10 o'clock this morning.
simp: 这个更新会在今天上午10点发布。
trad: 這個更新會在今天上午10點發布。

eng: They will contact us before midday today.
simp: 他们会在今天中午之前联系我们。
trad: 他們會在今天中午之前聯系我們。

eng: They will hold a meeting at 2 o'clock this afternoon.
simp: 他们今天下午2点会举行一个会议。
trad: 他們今天下午2點會舉行一個會議。

eng: We shall fix all bugs today before leaving the office.
simp: 我们应该在今天下班前解决所有bug。
trad: 我們應該在今天下班前解決所有bug。

eng: All bugs should be fixed today before we leave.
simp: 所有bug应该在今天下班前解决。
trad: 所有bug應該在今天下班前解決。

eng: The server reboot is scheduled at 9 o'clock this evening.
simp: 服务器重启预定在今晚9点。
trad: 服務器重啟預定在今晚9點。

eng: Tomorrow I'm going back home.
Children often wet their beds at night.
simp: 小孩子晚上尿床也是常有的.
trad: 小孩子晚上尿床也是常有的.

eng: This one won't.
She knows how to cook.
I hope my dream will come true.
Do you like oysters?
We apologize for the delay and regret any inconvenience it may have caused.
simp: 我们对这次的延迟表示抱歉，并对可能造成的不便表示遗憾。
trad: 我們對這次的延遲表示抱歉，並對可能造成的不便表示遺憾。

eng: Since all tasks are completed without delay, we are ready to start next phase of development.
simp: 既然所有的任务都按时完成了，我们已经准备好开始下一阶段的开发了。
trad: 既然所有的任務都按時完成了，我們已經準備好開始下一階段的開發了。

eng: Testing is delayed by two days, as a consequence, we need to reschedule the release date.
simp: 测试延迟了两天，因此，我们需要重新安排发布日期。
trad: 測試延遲了兩天，因此，我們需要重新安排發布日期。

eng: Although the accident has delayed progress by one month, we have managed to catch up with the schedule.
simp: 尽管事故使进度延迟了一个月，我们还是设法赶上了日程表。
trad: 盡管事故使進度延遲了一個月，我們還是設法趕上了日程表。

eng: The schedule is only slightly affected by this delay.
simp: 日程表只受到了这次延误的轻微影响。
trad: 日程表只受到了這次延誤的輕微影響。

eng: A good programmer will influence everyone around him.
simp: 一个好的程序员会影响他身边的每一个人。
trad: 一個好的程序員會影響他身邊的每一個人。

eng: This incident has made a great impact on the progress of the project.
simp: 这个事件极大影响了项目进度。
trad: 這個事件極大影響了項目進度。

eng: With this upgrade, one obvious impact is that users will be obliged to reset their passwords.
simp: 这次升级的一个明显影响是用户会被强制重置密码。
trad: 這次升級的一個明顯影響是用戶會被強制重置密碼。

eng: All these new blocks will undoubtedly impact the loading speed of the home page.
simp: 这些新模块毫无疑问会影响主页的加载速度。
trad: 這些新模塊毫無疑問會影響主頁的加載速度。

eng: Thanks to his great help, we were able to solve the problem in 30 minutes.
simp: 多亏他的大力帮助，我们在30分钟内解决了问题。
trad: 多虧他的大力幫助，我們在30分鐘內解決了問題。

eng: I will be back to join you in one month.
simp: 我会在一个月后回来和你们见面。
trad: 我會在一個月後回來和你們見面。

eng: According to schedule, this task should be finished within this week.
simp: 根据时间表，这个任务应该在这周内结束。
trad: 根據時間表，這個任務應該在這周內結束。

eng: Once this process is started, we can get the result within one hour.
simp: 这个进程一旦开始，我们能在一小时内得到结果。
trad: 這個進程一旦開始，我們能在一小時內得到結果。

eng: It is a basic quality of an employee to complete his tasks within a fixed time.
simp: 在限定时间内完成任务是一个职员的基本素质。
trad: 在限定時間內完成任務是一個職員的基本素質。

eng: The plan is to recruit 5 Java engineers before the end of next month.
simp: 计划是在下月底之前招聘5名Java工程师。
trad: 計劃是在下月底之前招聘5名Java工程師。

eng: Do not make any modifications before you get confirmations.
simp: 在得到确认之前不要进行任何修改。
trad: 在得到確認之前不要進行任何修改。

eng: This problem was troubling us until last night when we found the cause and fixed it.
simp: 这个问题一直困扰着我们，直到昨晚我们找到了原因并修复了它。
trad: 這個問題一直困擾著我們，直到昨晚我們找到了原因並修復了它。

eng: Judging from current situations, this task will not be finished until next week.
simp: 根据现在的情况，这个任务在下周之前无法结束。
trad: 根據現在的情況，這個任務在下周之前無法結束。

eng: Firstly, let's check the attendance.
simp: 首先，我们检查出勤情况。
trad: 首先，我們檢查出勤情況。

eng: In the first place, I would like to announce several new regulations.
simp: 首先，我想宣布几条新制度。
trad: 首先，我想宣布幾條新制度。

eng: First of all, power off your cellphones and remain silent.
simp: 首先，关闭手机，保持安静。
trad: 首先，關閉手機，保持安靜。

eng: Before anything else, let's welcome a new member to our company.
simp: 首先，让我们欢迎公司的一个新成员。
trad: 首先，讓我們歡迎公司的一個新成員。

eng: Secondly, is there any project scheduled to be released today?
simp: 其次，按照日程今天有将要发布的项目吗？
trad: 其次，按照日程今天有將要發布的項目嗎？

eng: Thirdly, each team leader please report your progress.
simp: 第三，请每个项目主管报告进度。
trad: 第三，請每個項目主管報告進度。

eng: In addition, we will issue the 'employee of the month' award afterwards.
simp: 另外，之后我们会颁发“每月最佳员工”奖。
trad: 另外，之後我們會頒發“每月最佳員工”獎。

eng: Lastly, is there anything else to share with the group ?
simp: 最后，还有其他要和大家分享的吗？
trad: 最後，還有其他要和大家分享的嗎？

eng: The evil robber in the county who did all kinds of evil bandits is under arrested today, the locals are all happy to hear this, spreading the good news and celebrating for this event !
simp: 曾经在县城里作恶多端的土匪今日终于被警方捕获，当地民众喜大普奔 ！
trad: 曾經在縣城裏作惡多端的土匪今日終於被警方捕獲，當地民眾喜大普奔 ！

eng: The proletarians have nothing to lose but their chains.
simp: 无产者在这个革命中失去的只是锁链。
trad: 無產者在這個革命中失去的只是鎖鏈。

eng: By the way, today is the 8th of June — my wife's birthday.
simp: 话事话，今日係六月八号，我老婆生日。
trad: 話事話，今日係六月八號，我老婆生日。

eng: I want to go to the store.
I don't care what you say, I hate you!
simp: 我不管你说， 我恨你！
trad: 我不管你說， 我恨你！

eng: Her good looks gained her the favor of many men.
simp: 她漂亮的外表赢得了很多男士的好感。
trad: 她漂亮的外表贏得了很多男士的好感。

eng: Say that again, please.
Get out of my house.
Go away from the window.
Go away from the window.
God save Ukraine!
Where were these pictures taken at?
simp: 这些照片是在哪儿拍的？
trad: 這些照片是在哪兒拍的？

eng: A bird can fly.
I can not sleep well.
My boyfriend and I had sex on the first date.
simp: 我和男友第一次约会就发生了性关系。
trad: 我和男友第一次約會就發生了性關系。

eng: We don't do it.
It seems that he likes collecting stamps.
There are some beautiful roses in the vase.
simp: 有一些漂亮的花在花瓶。
trad: 有一些漂亮的花在花瓶。

eng: This book deals with life in the United Kingdom.
simp: 这本书关于生活在英国。
trad: 這本書關於生活在英國。

eng: I can tell you're tired.
They're closed today.
My boyfriend looks like your girlfriend.
simp: 我的男朋友看起来像你的女朋友。
trad: 我的男朋友看起來像你的女朋友。

eng: You have to go to the meeting.
He came yesterday to see you.
I hope you stop telling me lies.
Those flowers are beautiful.
I'm going upstairs.
Onwards, to glory!
The fundamental cause of the problem is that in the modern world, idiots are full of confidence, while the intelligent are full of doubt.
simp: 问题的根源是，在当今世界，愚人充满了自信，而智者充满了怀疑。
trad: 問題的根源是，在當今世界，愚人充滿了自信，而智者充滿了懷疑。

eng: His life was full of ups and downs.
simp: 他的人生充满了起起落落。
trad: 他的人生充滿了起起落落。

eng: Man differs from animals in that he can speak and think.
I was like that when I was younger.
simp: 我是小孩子的时候，我是一样。
trad: 我是小孩子的時候，我是一樣。

eng: Life is like a box of chocolates.
We can rest.
She has a bit of a bad temper.
We all fell asleep.
She really does like animals.
Let him in.
He already knew about it.
The library is the meeting place of all human dreams.
simp: 图书馆是人类的所有梦想交汇的地方。
trad: 圖書館是人類的所有夢想交匯的地方。

eng: Tom's definitely not stupid. He's stupid lazy.
simp: 汤姆绝不是笨。他只是懒而已。
trad: 湯姆絕不是笨。他只是懶而已。

eng: Don't you want to know the reason?
Don't you want to know why?
No matter how hard the training was, she never cried.
simp: 不管训练多么艰苦，她都没有哭过。
trad: 不管訓練多麼艱苦，她都沒有哭過。

eng: I saw it with my own eyes.
Come back.
Some beaches had failed to comply with environmental regulations.
simp: 一些海滩没能遵守环保规定。
trad: 一些海灘沒能遵守環保規定。

eng: We don't think so.
I was kicked in the back.
I dare say he is innocent.
I advertised my house in the newspaper.
simp: 我在报纸上刊登了我的房子的广告。
trad: 我在報紙上刊登了我的房子的廣告。

eng: We'll talk later.
His memory never ceases to astonish me.
simp: 他的记忆力总让我吃惊。
trad: 他的記憶力總讓我吃驚。

eng: I am folding my dress.
You were at my wedding.
It's weird isn't it?
It doesn't matter what you think.
I'm really sorry about what happened last night.
simp: 我对昨天晚上发生的事情感到非常的抱歉。
trad: 我對昨天晚上發生的事情感到非常的抱歉。

eng: Someone ate all my cupcakes.
simp: 某人把我的杯形蛋糕吃完了。
trad: 某人把我的杯形蛋糕吃完了。

eng: I want to talk to your uncle.
simp: 我想和你的舅舅谈一谈。
trad: 我想和你的舅舅談一談。

eng: He is my youngest brother.
What just happened?
You've had a very restless night.
simp: 你度过了很不安宁的一夜。
trad: 你度過了很不安寧的一夜。

eng: Ha ha, I just dreamt that I won five million RMB.
simp: 哈哈，我刚才做了一个梦，梦见我中了五百万。
trad: 哈哈，我剛才做了一個夢，夢見我中了五百萬。

eng: I had a really weird dream yesterday.
simp: 我昨晚做了一个很奇怪的梦。
trad: 我昨晚做了一個很奇怪的夢。

eng: Sleep well tonight. Sweet dreams.
simp: 祝你今晚睡个好觉，做个好梦。
trad: 祝你今晚睡個好覺，做個好夢。

eng: Argh, I was so embarrassed today. I wore my clothes inside-out.
simp: 哎，今天真丢人，我把衣服穿反了。
trad: 哎，今天真丟人，我把衣服穿反了。

eng: You're holding the book upside-down. This is upside-down and this is right-side up.
simp: 你把书拿反了，这是反面，这才是正面。
trad: 你把書拿反了，這是反面，這才是正面。

eng: Driver, you're driving in the opposite direction. I want to go east. Why are you driving west?
simp: 师傅，方向反了，我要去东边，你怎么往西边开？
trad: 師傅，方向反了，我要去東邊，你怎麼往西邊開？

eng: I often wonder if he'll suddenly appear at that coffee shop on the corner.
simp: 我常常想他会不会突然地出现在街角的咖啡店呢？
trad: 我常常想他會不會突然地出現在街角的咖啡店呢？

eng: Did something happen between the two of you? Why hasn't he been coming to pick you up recently?
simp: 你们俩之间是不是出现了什么问题？他怎么最近都不来接你了？
trad: 你們倆之間是不是出現了什麼問題？他怎麼最近都不來接你了？

eng: If a tiger suddenly appeared in front of me, I'd be scared to death.
simp: 如果一只老虎突然出现在我面前，我肯定吓死了。
trad: 如果一只老虎突然出現在我面前，我肯定嚇死了。

eng: Suddenly, he took out a ring, kneeled on the ground, and asked me to marry him.
simp: 突然，他拿出了一个戒指，跪在地上，向我求婚。
trad: 突然，他拿出了一個戒指，跪在地上，向我求婚。

eng: Yesterday a friend of mine that I hadn't seen in years gave me a call out of the blue asking to borrow money.
simp: 昨天一个很多年没联系的朋友突然打电话给我，问我借钱。
trad: 昨天一個很多年沒聯系的朋友突然打電話給我，問我借錢。

eng: The weather was great just a moment ago. How is it suddenly raining now?
simp: 刚才天气还很好，怎么会突然下雨了呢？
trad: 剛才天氣還很好，怎麼會突然下雨了呢？

eng: You ask me how deep my love is for you? The moon represents my heart.
simp: 你问我爱你有多深，月亮代表我的心。
trad: 你問我愛你有多深，月亮代表我的心。

eng: Do you know what it means for a man to give a woman perfume?
simp: 你知道男孩子送女孩子香水代表什么吗？
trad: 你知道男孩子送女孩子香水代表什麼嗎？

eng: I represent all of the students in the class when I thank you for the help that you've given us.
simp: 我代表全班同学谢谢你给我们的帮助。
trad: 我代表全班同學謝謝你給我們的幫助。

eng: What kind of reaction did you have when he came looking for you?
simp: 他来找你的时候，当时你是什么反应？
trad: 他來找你的時候，當時你是什麼反應？

eng: She was really upset at the time. She cried in the dorm the entire day.
simp: 她当时很伤心，在宿舍哭了整整一天。
trad: 她當時很傷心，在宿舍哭了整整一天。

eng: I wasn't in the office then. I don't know what happened.
simp: 当时我不在办公室，我不知道发生了什么事。
trad: 當時我不在辦公室，我不知道發生了什麼事。

eng: The Olympics are starting today. What are you feeling?
simp: 奥运会今天就要开幕了。你有什么感觉？
trad: 奧運會今天就要開幕了。你有什麼感覺？

eng: Ah, it's almost time for exams. I'm dead!
simp: 哎，马上就要考试了。我死定了！
trad: 哎，馬上就要考試了。我死定了！

eng: Hurry up or we'll be late.
simp: 快一点，否则就要迟到了。
trad: 快一點，否則就要遲到了。

eng: The World Cup is going to start on the 11th.
simp: 世界杯 11 号就要开始了。
trad: 世界杯 11 號就要開始了。

eng: Hurry up. We're about to pass that car up ahead.
simp: 快点儿，马上就要超过前面那辆车了。
trad: 快點兒，馬上就要超過前面那輛車了。

eng: I am Wang Wei.
So this is your company?
It's really pretty here.
If you don't let me go, I'll still go.
This is really good. Buy this one.
simp: 这个就很好，就买这个吧。
trad: 這個就很好，就買這個吧。

eng: It seems he's gotten thinner lately.
You're really getting prettier and prettier.
She's getting married next month.
A variety of books are displayed there.
simp: 那里展示着各种各样的书。
trad: 那裏展示著各種各樣的書。

eng: We handle all type of books, both new and old.
simp: 我们经营各种书籍，包括新的和旧的。
trad: 我們經營各種書籍，包括新的和舊的。

eng: What you did brought disgrace on the whole class.
simp: 你的行为使全班的人丢脸。
trad: 你的行為使全班的人丟臉。

eng: I really miss the old days.
Actions are successfully achieved with deliberation but ruined by carelessness.
Not knowing where to get off the bus, I asked the driver.
simp: 因为我不知道应该在哪里下巴士，我问了司机。
trad: 因為我不知道應該在哪裏下巴士，我問了司機。

eng: The Germans are very crafty.
You shouldn't do things by halves.
How do you account for your being late?
You should have refused his request flatly.
simp: 你应该直接拒绝他的要求。
trad: 你應該直接拒絕他的要求。

eng: What is the meaning of this joke?
simp: 这个笑话的意思是什么？
trad: 這個笑話的意思是什麼？

eng: The world tolerates conceit from those who are successful, but not from anybody else.
simp: 世界只能容忍有成就的人的自傲。
trad: 世界只能容忍有成就的人的自傲。

eng: She sells seashells by the seashore.
Mary is a doctor.
I was as sober as a judge.
That is the essence of the matter.
I don't want to.
He is good at solving complicated mathematical problems.
The Devil made me do it.
Some people were hanging around at the entrance.
His bitter words still rankle in my mind.
simp: 他尖刻的话语仍然在我心中挥之不去。
trad: 他尖刻的話語仍然在我心中揮之不去。

eng: Could you please find the missing key. I can't open the pantry.
simp: 你能帮忙寻找丢失的钥匙吗? 我打不开食品柜。
trad: 你能幫忙尋找丟失的鑰匙嗎? 我打不開食品櫃。

eng: They did the right thing.
Tom is really worried.
I'll leave immediately.
Lock the office.
She has green eyes.
The children already went to school.
The Geneva University Library has a good reading room.
simp: 日内瓦大学有一间很好的阅览室。
trad: 日內瓦大學有一間很好的閱覽室。

eng: What's the most convenient way to get to Tokyo Station?
simp: 去东京站怎么走最方便？
trad: 去東京站怎麼走最方便？

eng: I'd like to see you again next week.
simp: 我希望下周还能见到你。
trad: 我希望下周還能見到你。

eng: This is a present for you.
I know the history of Europe very well.
I miss my wife.
Yesterday was Thursday.
Even smart people are sometimes absent-minded.
simp: 就连聪明人有时候也会走神。
trad: 就連聰明人有時候也會走神。

eng: I have no idea where he has gone.
simp: 我完全不知道他去哪里了。
trad: 我完全不知道他去哪裏了。

eng: Do you guys go to the same school?
Why didn't you go?
Tom is our French teacher.
simp: 汤姆是我们的法语老师。
trad: 湯姆是我們的法語老師。

eng: This is pure hypocrisy!
He is a biologist.
You cannot do this.
Are there dogs that eat raw fish?
I find the problem easier than I originally believed it to be.
simp: 我发现问题比我原以为的容易。
trad: 我發現問題比我原以為的容易。

eng: It's noisy around here, so speak a little louder.
simp: 这里有点吵，请你讲话大点声。
trad: 這裏有點吵，請你講話大點聲。

eng: The matter is of no importance.
They cannot stop him.
Bill brought me this book.
simp: 比尔给我带来了这本书。
trad: 比爾給我帶來了這本書。

eng: He secretly showed me her picture.
simp: 他偷偷地给我看了她的照片。
trad: 他偷偷地給我看了她的照片。

eng: I don't know the exact length of this bridge.
simp: 我不确定那座桥到底有多长。
trad: 我不確定那座橋到底有多長。

eng: Who helps your mother?
My data-burning software is showing an error message.
simp: 我的刻录软件显示了一个错误信息。
trad: 我的刻錄軟件顯示了一個錯誤信息。

eng: Here are your keys.
I'm very grateful to you.
The room is empty.
They look healthy.
A person is worth more than money.
He tried to talk to us in French.
Tell us your thoughts.
We're all angry.
What time shall I come?
The square was illuminated by bright lights.
simp: 广场被鲜明的灯火照亮。
trad: 廣場被鮮明的燈火照亮。

eng: Rev. King and his supporters were threatened.
simp: 金牧师和他的支持者们受到威胁。
trad: 金牧師和他的支持者們受到威脅。

eng: This movie is highly controversial.
People should sleep at least 7 hours each night.
simp: 人每晚必须至少睡7个小时。
trad: 人每晚必須至少睡7個小時。

eng: He speaks English very well.
Go home quickly.
On the one hand we suffered a heavy loss, but on the other hand we learned a great deal from the experience.
simp: 一方面我们虽然蒙受了损失，但另一方面我们从这次经验中学到了很多。
trad: 一方面我們雖然蒙受了損失，但另一方面我們從這次經驗中學到了很多。

eng: Don't break a mirror.
Tom has to go to work.
You do me wrong.
Gimme three.
This moment will nap, you will have a dream; But this moment study,you will interpret a dream.
simp: 此刻打盹，你将做梦；而此刻学习，你将圆梦。
trad: 此刻打盹，你將做夢；而此刻學習，你將圓夢。

eng: I leave uncultivated today, was precisely yesterday perishes tomorrow which person of the body implored.
simp: 我荒废的今日，正是昨日殒身之人祈求的明日。
trad: 我荒廢的今日，正是昨日殞身之人祈求的明日。

eng: When people meet, first impressions determine more than 50 percent of whatever happens next.
simp: 在人际交往中，第一印象决定着将要发生的事情内容的百分之五十以上。
trad: 在人際交往中，第一印象決定著將要發生的事情內容的百分之五十以上。

eng: Pride goes before a fall.
If you want something to be done right, sometimes you've just got to do it yourself.
simp: 如果你想做对一件事，有时候你得亲力亲为。
trad: 如果你想做對一件事，有時候你得親力親為。

eng: Let's not discuss it.
It seems that Jeff knows who she is.
It's my fault, not yours.
simp: 这是我的错，不是你的错。
trad: 這是我的錯，不是你的錯。

eng: I have a tool.
The stage was sprinkled with flower petals.
I feel bad for him.
The boy scratched his ear.
Everyone has something that's troubling him.
Tom didn't know anyone.
Tom stole my wallet. "Are you sure about that?"
This work is beyond me.
The excited children couldn’t go to sleep all night long.
simp: 这些兴奋的孩子整个晚上无法入睡。
trad: 這些興奮的孩子整個晚上無法入睡。

eng: In China, the history began thirty years ago; we can't know what happened any farther back than thirty years.
simp: 在中国，历史以三十年为极限，我们不可能知道三十年以前的事。
trad: 在中國，歷史以三十年為極限，我們不可能知道三十年以前的事。

eng: Life is a magnificent gown full of lice.
simp: 生命是一袭华美的袍子，爬满了虱子。
trad: 生命是一襲華美的袍子，爬滿了虱子。

eng: The horse is black.
The milk is sour.
The horse is white.
I'm drinking milk.
His book is red.
I always have to wear a tie because of my job.
simp: 因为这份工作的关係，我总是要打领带。
trad: 因為這份工作的關係，我總是要打領帶。

eng: You are a good cook, aren't you?
I have no time to have a rest.
I think I'm coming down with a fever.
simp: 我觉得我有点要发烧了。
trad: 我覺得我有點要發燒了。

eng: Yesterday I read an article about acid rain.
simp: 昨天我读了关于酸雨的文章。
trad: 昨天我讀了關於酸雨的文章。

eng: John, you've been working too hard. Have a seat and rest awhile.
simp: 约翰，你工作太辛苦了。坐下来休息一会儿。
trad: 約翰，你工作太辛苦了。坐下來休息一會兒。

eng: Don't look at Tom. Look at me.
She wants to move out and find a place of her own.
simp: 她想搬出去，找个属于自己的地方。

That word is of Greek origin.
simp: 那个词是由希腊语衍生出来的。
trad: 那個詞是由希臘語衍生出來的。

eng: Compass needles point to the north.
simp: 指南针的指针指向北边。
trad: 指南針的指針指向北邊。

eng: That word is of Greek origin.
I'm a little tired.
He said, "Let's take a short rest."
simp: 他说: "让我们休息一会儿"。
trad: 他說: "讓我們休息一會兒"。

eng: The photos are taken by a pro, so they'll turn out well.
simp: 照片是专业摄影师拍的，所以不会有问题。
trad: 照片是專業攝影師拍的，所以不會有問題。

eng: Subtract two from ten and you have eight.
Start over.
Can you give me a discount?
Can you give me a discount?
Can you give me a discount?
The house was full of colorful art objects.
simp: 房子里放满了五颜六色的艺术品。
trad: 房子裏放滿了五顏六色的藝術品。

eng: I can't bring myself to eat anything.
I can't hear what you're saying.
I can't really describe it.
I can't find my glasses. I may have left them behind in the train.
simp: 我搵唔到副眼镜，可能漏咗喺电车到。
trad: 我搵唔到副眼鏡，可能漏咗喺電車到。

eng: The two sentences are both coherent.
Here is your menu.
I'm not fussy.
We will help him if he asks us.
simp: 如果他问我们的话，我们是会帮忙的。
trad: 如果他問我們的話，我們是會幫忙的。

eng: Tell me what this means.
simp: 告诉我这个有什么意思。
trad: 告訴我這個有什麼意思。

eng: Tom looks about a hundred years old.
Don't pay attention to her.
Is Tom here, too?
On his nose grew a small pimple.
simp: 他的鼻子上长了一个小疙瘩。
trad: 他的鼻子上長了一個小疙瘩。

eng: Many important historical events took place 7000 years B.C.
simp: 公元前七千年中发生了很多重要的历史事件。
trad: 公元前七千年中發生了很多重要的歷史事件。

eng: There are 56 ethnic groups in China.
She is aged seventeen.
The boy carved his name into the tree.
simp: 男孩把他的名字刻在树上。
trad: 男孩把他的名字刻在樹上。

eng: He carved a Buddha statue from wood.
simp: 他用一块木头刻出一尊佛像。
trad: 他用一塊木頭刻出一尊佛像。

eng: I'm the boss.
He's always punctual.
This book is so cool.
I'm often here.
Is there a quiet corner in here where I can study?
simp: 这儿有没有比较安静的地方我可以学习的？
trad: 這兒有沒有比較安靜的地方我可以學習的？

eng: Go get your helmet.
The kids are picking flowers in the garden.
simp: 孩子们正在花园里摘花。
trad: 孩子們正在花園裏摘花。

eng: She looks young, but she's actually over forty.
simp: 她看起来是年轻的，但实际上她四十多岁了。
trad: 她看起來是年輕的，但實際上她四十多歲了。

eng: Would you like some tea? "Yes, please."
Will he come? "No, I don't think so."
Come with us.
Thousands upon thousands of soldiers died in the war.
simp: 这场战争死了数以百万计的军人。
trad: 這場戰爭死了數以百萬計的軍人。

eng: He gave his seat to the old man.
It took him three months to learn to ride a bicycle.
simp: 他学了三个月才学会了骑自行车。
trad: 他學了三個月才學會了騎自行車。

eng: I read a book.
I read his book.
Thousands upon thousands of soldiers died in the war.
simp: 数以百万计的军人战死沙场。
trad: 數以百萬計的軍人戰死沙場。

eng: I bought these medications for my father.
simp: 这些药是给我父亲买的。
trad: 這些藥是給我父親買的。

eng: Have you done your homework?
Have you brushed your teeth?
Can you come over to my house tonight?
simp: 你今晚能不能到我家来？
trad: 你今晚能不能到我家來？

eng: The boy who lives next door often comes home late.
simp: 住在隔壁的男孩常常回家很晚。
trad: 住在隔壁的男孩常常回家很晚。

eng: The boy who lives next door often comes home late.
simp: 住在隔壁的男孩常常很晚回来。
trad: 住在隔壁的男孩常常很晚回來。

eng: Without water, you could not live.
We're learning Chinese.
I am British.
Can you speak English?
What he says is total nonsense.
There isn't a grain of truth in what he says.
There isn't a grain of truth in what he says.
Her son was killed in the accident.
He was killed in the war.
This time, I really mean it.
They both fell in love with the same woman.
simp: 两个人都爱上了同一个女的。
trad: 兩個人都愛上了同一個女的。

eng: I'm Tom's wife.
Just say what you want to say.
We think alike.
When my grandmother was young, her body was very slim. Now in her old age she's grown plump.
simp: 我奶奶年轻的时候身材很苗条，现在年纪大了就发福了。
trad: 我奶奶年輕的時候身材很苗條，現在年紀大了就發福了。

eng: Today is mom's birthday. I ordered a cake.
simp: 今天妈妈生日，我订了一个蛋糕。
trad: 今天媽媽生日，我訂了一個蛋糕。

eng: Starting next month, I'm not subscribing to a newspaper.
simp: 下个月开始我不订报纸了。
trad: 下個月開始我不訂報紙了。

eng: I booked a seat at this restaurant.
simp: 我在这家餐厅订了位子。
trad: 我在這家餐廳訂了位子。

eng: Through the Internet, we can make many friends.
simp: 通过网络，我们可以结交很多朋友。
trad: 通過網絡，我們可以結交很多朋友。

eng: I came to work here though his introduction.
simp: 通过他的介绍，我来到这里工作。
trad: 通過他的介紹，我來到這裏工作。

eng: Through this match, I realized my inadequacies.
simp: 通过这次比赛，我意识到自己的不足。
trad: 通過這次比賽，我意識到自己的不足。

eng: New programmes will appear in the fall on television.
simp: 秋季将有新节目在电视上出现。
trad: 秋季將有新節目在電視上出現。

eng: Are there any good programs on TV today?
simp: 今天电视有什么好节目？
trad: 今天電視有什麼好節目？

eng: The programme is over.
By frugality she managed to get along on her small salary.
simp: 凭着节俭，她设法以自己微薄的薪水生活。
trad: 憑著節儉，她設法以自己微薄的薪水生活。

eng: Would you prefer milk or coffee?
Did you enjoy the performance last night?
He became very elated at the news.
simp: 他听到这个消息非常喜欢。
trad: 他聽到這個消息非常喜歡。

eng: The company is starting to implement the new management system from next month.
simp: 公司从下个月开始推行新的管理制度。
trad: 公司從下個月開始推行新的管理制度。

eng: The “One Only Child Parent for Two Children” policy is already in effect in Shanghai. In the future, it's possible that it will be implemented throughout China.
simp: “单独二胎”政策已经在上海实施，将来可能会在全国推行。
trad: “單獨二胎”政策已經在上海實施，將來可能會在全國推行。

eng: Promoting Mandarin Chinese is China's national plan.
simp: 推行普通话，是中国的国策。
trad: 推行普通話，是中國的國策。

eng: In order to alleviate employment pressures, the nation has established a series of relevant policies.
simp: 为了缓解就业压力，国家已经制定了一系列相关政策。
trad: 為了緩解就業壓力，國家已經制定了一系列相關政策。

eng: This kind of medicine can temporarily alleviate pain. If you need it, just take it.
simp: 这种药可以暂时缓解身体的疼痛，你需要的话就拿去吧。
trad: 這種藥可以暫時緩解身體的疼痛，你需要的話就拿去吧。

eng: His humor charmingly eased the embarrassing atmosphere at dinner time and made me breathe a sigh of relief.
simp: 他的幽默巧妙地缓解了晚餐时尴尬的气氛，让我松了一口气。
trad: 他的幽默巧妙地緩解了晚餐時尷尬的氣氛，讓我松了一口氣。

eng: There are many regrets in a person's life. It's not possible to do everything well.
simp: 人生总有太多遗憾，不可能做到事事完美。
trad: 人生總有太多遺憾，不可能做到事事完美。

eng: Every time I leave, I'm of full the regret that I haven't fully said goodbye.
simp: 我很遗憾每次离开的时候，都没有好好地道别。
trad: 我很遺憾每次離開的時候，都沒有好好地道別。

eng: The regrettable thing is that he didn't even play at his highest level in the finals.
simp: 令人遗憾的是，他并没有在决赛发挥他的最佳水平。
trad: 令人遺憾的是，他並沒有在決賽發揮他的最佳水平。

eng: One needs to do their best in all things, and more importantly work within their abilities.
simp: 凡事要尽力而为，更要量力而行。
trad: 凡事要盡力而為，更要量力而行。

eng: One can't go beyond one's limits with exercising and stay within the bounds of what one can do. Otherwise, it can have negative effects on the body.
simp: 不能过度运动，要量力而行，否则反而对身体造成负面影响。
trad: 不能過度運動，要量力而行，否則反而對身體造成負面影響。

eng: One needs to buy a house that's within one's means, but one also needs to grasp an opportunity.
simp: 买房要量力而行，但也要把握时机。
trad: 買房要量力而行，但也要把握時機。

eng: This thing can't be rushed; it needs long-term planning.
simp: 这件事情不能心急，要从长计议。
trad: 這件事情不能心急，要從長計議。

eng: Everyone agrees to stay here for the night and make long-term itinerary decisions tomorrow.
simp: 大家同意先在这里住一晚，行程的事情明天再从长计议。
trad: 大家同意先在這裏住一晚，行程的事情明天再從長計議。

eng: Although the decision to implement this plan has already been made, the finer points still need to be planned out.
simp: 这个计划虽然已经决定实施了，但是具体细节还需要从长计议。
trad: 這個計劃雖然已經決定實施了，但是具體細節還需要從長計議。

eng: Go forward, then turn right, go through the traffic light, and you're there.
simp: 你往前走，然后往右转，过了红绿灯就到了。
trad: 你往前走，然後往右轉，過了紅綠燈就到了。

eng: Of the two of them, one heads east and one heads west.
simp: 他们俩一个往东，一个往西。
trad: 他們倆一個往東，一個往西。

eng: In the autumn, swallows will fly south.
simp: 秋天的时候，燕子会往南飞。
trad: 秋天的時候，燕子會往南飛。

eng: When he's in class, he continuously sits next to me.
simp: 他上课的时候一直坐在我的旁边。
trad: 他上課的時候一直坐在我的旁邊。

eng: When I was talking with him, he was constantly looking to his side.
simp: 我跟他说话的时候，他一直往旁边看。
trad: 我跟他說話的時候，他一直往旁邊看。

eng: I think I've seen that person next to Xiao Li before.
simp: 小李旁边的那个人我好像在哪里见过。
trad: 小李旁邊的那個人我好像在哪裏見過。

eng: I'm really sorry to make you wait.
simp: 真不好意思，让您久等了。
trad: 真不好意思，讓您久等了。

eng: The food at this hot pot restaurant really tastes pretty good. Let's come here again next time.
simp: 这家火锅店的味道真不错，下次我们再来吃吧。
trad: 這家火鍋店的味道真不錯，下次我們再來吃吧。

eng: Your room is really clean.
He does things for himself. He doesn't like to bother other people.
simp: 自己可以做的事情，他不喜欢去麻烦别人。
trad: 自己可以做的事情，他不喜歡去麻煩別人。

eng: This problem is really annoying.
He encountered difficulties in his work.
simp: 他在工作上遇到了麻烦。
trad: 他在工作上遇到了麻煩。

eng: The weather is really great!
Your boyfriend is really handsome.
You're really a great person.
This piece of clothing is really pretty.
Your house is really great!
Keep walking straight ahead.
The plane bound for Beijing is going to take off soon.
simp: 飞往北京的飞机就要起飞了。
trad: 飛往北京的飛機就要起飛了。

eng: This train is bound for Zhongshan Park.
simp: 本次列车开往中山公园。
trad: 本次列車開往中山公園。

eng: I can go to your house tomorrow.
He ate poisonous mushrooms.
Boiling water evaporates and turns into a gas.
Read one sentence each.
Who do you live with?
I know these students.
There are thousands of participants at today's event.
simp: 有成千的人来参加今天的集会。
trad: 有成千的人來參加今天的集會。

eng: This kind of cloth is both cheap and sturdy.
Before understanding the situation clearly, he hastily gave his opinion.
simp: 他还没有把情况了解清楚就急忙发表意见。
trad: 他還沒有把情況了解清楚就急忙發表意見。

eng: We must work hard to complete the project.
He's still here in the classroom studying.
simp: 他仍然还在教室里学习。
trad: 他仍然還在教室裏學習。

eng: If you already know, why are you still asking?
simp: 你既然已经知道了，还问什么？
trad: 你既然已經知道了，還問什麼？

eng: In a month, the weather won't be as hot as it is now.
simp: 一个月后，天气就不会像现在这么热了。
trad: 一個月後，天氣就不會像現在這麼熱了。

eng: He just came back from the library.
He has worked in Hanoi before.
It's too late now.
Since you all say that, I must think again.
simp: 既然你们这么说，那让我再想想。
trad: 既然你們這麼說，那讓我再想想。

eng: Child, why are you crying? Tell me.
simp: 孩子，你为什么哭呀？说给我听听。
trad: 孩子，你為什麼哭呀？說給我聽聽。

eng: When he finished speaking, he stood up and walked away.
We should help each other.
He went back to the village after he graduated.
The military power of this country is very advanced.
simp: 这个国家的军事力量很先进。
trad: 這個國家的軍事力量很先進。

eng: The development of economy has brought other social problems.
simp: 经济的增长带来了其他的社会问题。
trad: 經濟的增長帶來了其他的社會問題。

eng: We have investigated his criminal record.
simp: 我们调查了他的犯规记录。
trad: 我們調查了他的犯規記錄。

eng: The Red Cross constantly supplies food to the disaster areas.
simp: 红十字会不断地给灾区提供食物援助。
trad: 紅十字會不斷地給災區提供食物援助。

eng: He is a little bit unhappy today.
They have a secret understanding between them.
I should go to bed.
The world's evil almost always comes from ignorance.
simp: 世上的罪恶差不多总是由愚昧无知造成的。
trad: 世上的罪惡差不多總是由愚昧無知造成的。

eng: China is perhaps the only country in the world where the temperature is controlled by the government.
simp: 中国也许是世界上唯一一个由政府控制温度的国家。
trad: 中國也許是世界上唯一一個由政府控制溫度的國家。

eng: Turpan is indeed very hot. Even the government is unable to control the temperature.
simp: 吐鲁番实在太热了，连政府也控制不了这里的温度。
trad: 吐魯番實在太熱了，連政府也控制不了這裏的溫度。

eng: I always rest for an hour after dinner.
simp: 晚饭后，我总要休息一个小时。
trad: 晚飯後，我總要休息一個小時。

eng: The football game is now on the air.
simp: 电视台现在正在播放足球赛。
trad: 電視臺現在正在播放足球賽。

eng: The football game is now on the air.
simp: 现在电视台正在播放足球赛。
trad: 現在電視臺正在播放足球賽。

eng: The football game is now on the air.
They are reading a book.
Can they finish this before the deadline?
simp: 他们能不能在最后期限之前完成这项工作?
trad: 他們能不能在最後期限之前完成這項工作?

eng: Time is precious.
Can you fill in for me at the meeting?
simp: 你能代替我出席会议吗?
trad: 你能代替我出席會議嗎?

eng: It has been windy for two days.
I hope you will like it.
I want to say nothing but sorry.
She paid no heed to our warnings.
simp: 她不把我们的警告放在心上。
trad: 她不把我們的警告放在心上。

eng: Remember to shut the windows.
She folded the quilt.
We cannot change the past.
He sat in on some of the board's policy-making meetings.
simp: 他参加了董事会的一些决策会议。
trad: 他參加了董事會的一些決策會議。

eng: What color is your dress?
simp: 你的衣服是什么颜色的？
trad: 你的衣服是什麼顏色的？

eng: I have no idea of how to send a fax.
There are several kinds of cloud formations.
simp: 云层的构成方式有好几种。
trad: 雲層的構成方式有好幾種。

eng: Human tissue is made up of cells.
simp: 人体的组织是由细胞构成的。
trad: 人體的組織是由細胞構成的。

eng: Do you like to gamble?
They played strip poker.
The assistant referee held up his flag to show the referee that the ball was still in play.
simp: 助理裁判向主裁判举旗示意比赛继续。
trad: 助理裁判向主裁判舉旗示意比賽繼續。

eng: Philip hates traveling for away games. He always gets really tired and never plays well.
simp: 菲利普不喜欢客场比赛，他总是容易感到很疲惫。
trad: 菲利普不喜歡客場比賽，他總是容易感到很疲憊。

eng: When the goalkeeper touched the ball, the referee awarded the other team a corner kick.
simp: 守门员用手碰到了球，裁判给了对方一个角球。
trad: 守門員用手碰到了球，裁判給了對方一個角球。

eng: The players sat in the locker room while they listened to their coach speak.
simp: 球员们坐在更衣室里听教练讲话。
trad: 球員們坐在更衣室裏聽教練講話。

eng: England always does well in the World Cup matches because of their strong defenders.
simp: 因为有强大的后卫，英格兰队在世界杯比赛中总是表现良好。
trad: 因為有強大的後衛，英格蘭隊在世界杯比賽中總是表現良好。

eng: The game ended in a draw, and the final score was 2-2.
simp: 比赛以平局结束，最后比分是二比二。
trad: 比賽以平局結束，最後比分是二比二。

eng: In the last minute, Marcello score an equalizing goal.
simp: 在最后一分钟，马塞洛射进一球，将比赛打成平局。
trad: 在最後一分鐘，馬塞洛射進一球，將比賽打成平局。

eng: They were lucky the game went into extra time because they ended up winning.
simp: 他们很幸运比赛进入加时赛，因为他们最终获胜。
trad: 他們很幸運比賽進入加時賽，因為他們最終獲勝。

eng: Michael needs to get fit over the summer.
simp: 迈克尔需要在夏天恢复体能。
trad: 邁克爾需要在夏天恢復體能。

eng: He fouled because he pushed over the other player.
simp: 他犯规了，因为他推倒了对方。
trad: 他犯規了，因為他推倒了對方。

eng: The referee blew his whistle twice to tell everyone it was full-time.
simp: 裁判吹哨两次，向大家宣布已经终场。
trad: 裁判吹哨兩次，向大家宣布已經終場。

eng: The goalkeeper for France dived to the ground and saved Ronaldo’s shot.
simp: 法国队守门员扑到地上截住了罗纳尔多的射门。
trad: 法國隊守門員撲到地上截住了羅納爾多的射門。

eng: The players ran off the pitch and had a meeting during half-time.
simp: 球员们跑下场，在中场休息时开了一个会。
trad: 球員們跑下場，在中場休息時開了一個會。

eng: The referee blew the whistle and called a hand ball on him.
simp: 裁判吹响了口哨，判定他手球。
trad: 裁判吹響了口哨，判定他手球。

eng: Ronaldo’s teammate passed the ball high to him. He jumped up and headed it into the goal.
simp: 罗纳尔多的队友传给他一个高球，他纵身一跳，头球进门。
trad: 羅納爾多的隊友傳給他一個高球，他縱身一跳，頭球進門。

eng: Most teams perform better when they have a home game.
simp: 很多球队在主场都会踢得更好。
trad: 很多球隊在主場都會踢得更好。

eng: Do you have any idea what time is kickoff?
simp: 你知道什么时候要中线开球吗？
trad: 你知道什麼時候要中線開球嗎？

eng: Who do you think is going to win the match?
Mesut Ozil is one of the best midfielders in the world.
simp: 梅苏特·厄齐尔是世界上最好的中场之一。
trad: 梅蘇特·厄齊爾是世界上最好的中場之一。

eng: Messi had been very close to scoring a goal, the referee blew his whistle to say that he was offside.
simp: 梅西差一点就进球了，但裁判吹哨说他越位。
trad: 梅西差一點就進球了，但裁判吹哨說他越位。

eng: Frank Lampard passed the ball to Beckham. Beckham kicked the ball and scored!
simp: 弗兰克·兰帕德传球给贝克汉姆，贝克汉姆射门，球进了！
trad: 弗蘭克·蘭帕德傳球給貝克漢姆，貝克漢姆射門，球進了！

eng: Bale fouled and the team got a penalty kick.
simp: 贝尔被犯规了，球队获得了任意球。
trad: 貝爾被犯規了，球隊獲得了任意球。

eng: The fans went silent as they nervously watched the penalty shootout between the two teams.
simp: 球迷们安静下来，绷紧神经，观看两支球队的点球大战。
trad: 球迷們安靜下來，繃緊神經，觀看兩支球隊的點球大戰。

eng: Because it had been raining for a couple of days, the pitch was muddy and difficult to play on.
simp: 球队已经训练了几天，所以这个足球场有些泥泞，不太好用了。
trad: 球隊已經訓練了幾天，所以這個足球場有些泥濘，不太好用了。

eng: He was handed a red card for starting a fight with the other team and as a result, their team lost.
simp: 他因为和对方球员打架而被红牌罚下场。
trad: 他因為和對方球員打架而被紅牌罰下場。

eng: Ronaldo shot the ball right into the back of the net to score the winning goal.
simp: 罗纳尔多一脚射门，打进制胜一球。
trad: 羅納爾多一腳射門，打進制勝一球。

eng: There weren't many spectators at the game because of the rain.
simp: 因为下雨了，球场上没有很多观众。
trad: 因為下雨了，球場上沒有很多觀眾。

eng: There was a lot of excitement in the stands as the fans cheered for their teams.
simp: 球迷们在为自己喜欢的球队欢呼，看台上总是一片热闹的景象。
trad: 球迷們在為自己喜歡的球隊歡呼，看臺上總是一片熱鬧的景象。

eng: Lionel Messi is one of the best strikers in the world. He has scored the most goals ever for Barcelona.
simp: 里奥· 梅西是世界上最杰出的前锋之一，他是巴塞罗那进球最多的球员。
trad: 裏奧· 梅西是世界上最傑出的前鋒之一，他是巴塞羅那進球最多的球員。

eng: When Sir Alex Ferguson saw that his players were getting tired, he always substituted them.
simp: 当亚历克斯·弗格森看到自己的球员劳累时，他总是叫替补上场。
trad: 當亞歷克斯·弗格森看到自己的球員勞累時，他總是叫替補上場。

eng: When Mike tried to tackle the other player, he pushed him and he was given a yellow card and a warning.
simp: 当迈克试图铲球的时候，他用手推了对方球员一把，结果得到了黄牌警告。
trad: 當邁克試圖鏟球的時候，他用手推了對方球員一把，結果得到了黃牌警告。

eng: Jake quickly threw the ball in to his teammate.
simp: 杰克快速掷界外球给他的队友。
trad: 傑克快速擲界外球給他的隊友。

eng: The manager and coach stood on the touchline shouting out instructions to their team.
simp: 足球教练站在边线上对自己的队伍喊出指令。
trad: 足球教練站在邊線上對自己的隊伍喊出指令。

eng: The players made a wall as Lionel Messi went to shoot.
simp: 当里奥梅西射门时，球员们筑起一道人墙。
trad: 當裏奧梅西射門時，球員們築起一道人墻。

eng: Bale needs to be more careful when playing because he’s already been given one yellow card.
simp: 贝尔在踢球时需要更加小心，因为他已经得了一次黄牌了。
trad: 貝爾在踢球時需要更加小心，因為他已經得了一次黃牌了。

eng: England’s goalkeeper was criticized for the amount of goals he conceded.
simp: 英格兰的守门员因为自己失球过多而被批评。
trad: 英格蘭的守門員因為自己失球過多而被批評。

eng: It was evident that everyone was upset when Atletico Madrid suffered defeat.
simp: 马德里竞技遭遇失败后，很明显大家都很生气。
trad: 馬德裏競技遭遇失敗後，很明顯大家都很生氣。

eng: Because all of the teams in the Premier League are really strong, the goal difference is usually small.
simp: 因为在甲级联赛中，所有队伍都很有实力，净胜球差异很小。
trad: 因為在甲級聯賽中，所有隊伍都很有實力，凈勝球差異很小。

eng: In the last World Cup, New Zealand was knocked out of the competition by Mexico.
simp: 在上一届世界杯上，新西兰在比赛中被墨西哥淘汰。
trad: 在上一屆世界杯上，新西蘭在比賽中被墨西哥淘汰。

eng: At the end of the first half Real Madrid were in the lead, but Chelsea won in the end.
simp: 皇家马德里在上半场处于领先，但切尔西最终赢得了比赛。
trad: 皇家馬德裏在上半場處於領先，但切爾西最終贏得了比賽。

eng: I think the final score between Barcelona and Real Madrid will be 2-0.
simp: 我觉得巴塞罗那和皇家马德里的最终比分将会是二比零。
trad: 我覺得巴塞羅那和皇家馬德裏的最終比分將會是二比零。

eng: I think that Brazil has the strongest football team in the world and they have a good chance of winning the 2014 World Cup.
simp: 我认为，巴西拥有世界上最强大的足球队，他们很有可能在2014年世界杯中获胜。
trad: 我認為，巴西擁有世界上最強大的足球隊，他們很有可能在2014年世界杯中獲勝。

eng: The referee, according to principle of advantage, raised his hand and motioned for the advance to continue.
simp: 裁判根据有利原则，举起手示意继续进攻。
trad: 裁判根據有利原則，舉起手示意繼續進攻。

eng: Jack’s coach decided to keep him on the bench for being late to training.
simp: 由于训练迟到，杰克的教练决定把他留在替补席。
trad: 由於訓練遲到，傑克的教練決定把他留在替補席。

eng: Ronaldo is famous for his bicycle kick. When he does it, the fans go crazy.
simp: 罗纳尔多以他的倒勾球而闻名。当他展示倒勾球的时候，球迷们都沸腾了。
trad: 羅納爾多以他的倒勾球而聞名。當他展示倒勾球的時候，球迷們都沸騰了。

eng: Jonathan was booked because he got into a fight with a player on the other team.
simp: 乔纳森吃牌了，因为与对方球员打架。
trad: 喬納森吃牌了，因為與對方球員打架。

eng: Torres booted the ball to his teammate.
simp: 托雷斯把球踢给了队友。
trad: 托雷斯把球踢給了隊友。

eng: The opposition formed a line in the box to try and block Messi from scoring.
simp: 对方球员在禁区内组成一道防线，试图阻截梅西的射门。
trad: 對方球員在禁區內組成一道防線，試圖阻截梅西的射門。

eng: The coin toss decides who will kick off the match.
simp: 裁判抛硬币来决定谁来开球。
trad: 裁判拋硬幣來決定誰來開球。

eng: When the ball was dead, Luis ran up to the ball and booted it.
simp: 在死球期间，路易斯跑向球，一脚踢上去。
trad: 在死球期間，路易斯跑向球，一腳踢上去。

eng: All the top teams of the UK are in the premier division.
simp: 英国所有的顶尖球队都在超级联赛中。
trad: 英國所有的頂尖球隊都在超級聯賽中。

eng: The players sat and listened to their coach give them a pep talk in the changing rooms.
simp: 球员们坐在更衣室，听教练给他们打气。
trad: 球員們坐在更衣室，聽教練給他們打氣。

eng: The manager shouted out to his players to mark the opposition.
simp: 教练对自己的球员大喊，让他盯守对方球员。
trad: 教練對自己的球員大喊，讓他盯守對方球員。

eng: John Motson is one of the most famous British commentators.
simp: 约翰莫斯顿是英国最有名的评论员之一。
trad: 約翰莫斯頓是英國最有名的評論員之一。

eng: The Spain is great at keeping possession.
Sheffield Wednesday is playing their usual long-ball game.
simp: 谢菲尔德星期三队在踢他们习惯的长传球。
trad: 謝菲爾德星期三隊在踢他們習慣的長傳球。

eng: As usual the Spanish team are showing off their skills at one-touch football.
simp: 西班牙队像往常一样炫耀他们一脚传球的球技。
trad: 西班牙隊像往常一樣炫耀他們一腳傳球的球技。

eng: Ronaldo is a prolific goal scorer and it’s almost guaranteed that he will score a goal in every match.
simp: 罗纳尔多是一个多产射手，基本上他能在每一场比赛中进球。
trad: 羅納爾多是一個多產射手，基本上他能在每一場比賽中進球。

eng: Atletico Madrid surprised everyone with their win against Barcelona as they’ve always been the underdogs in the Spanish league.
simp: 每个人都很惊讶马德里竞技会战胜巴塞罗那，因为他们在西班牙联赛中总是失败者。
trad: 每個人都很驚訝馬德裏競技會戰勝巴塞羅那，因為他們在西班牙聯賽中總是失敗者。

eng: Look at those guys play! They’re really getting stuck in!
simp: 看那些踢球的队员们！他们真是全神贯注啊！
trad: 看那些踢球的隊員們！他們真是全神貫註啊！

eng: Wow, she’s got a lot of pace, I’m impressed!
simp: 哇，她真是神速啊，真让我印象深刻！
trad: 哇，她真是神速啊，真讓我印象深刻！

eng: Jose screamed “man on” when he saw a player from the opposition behind Marcello.
simp: 当何塞看到马塞洛后面有一个对方球员时，他大喊“背后有人”。
trad: 當何塞看到馬塞洛後面有一個對方球員時，他大喊“背後有人”。

eng: Peter’s one of the best goalkeepers ever. He’s always able to pull of great saves.
simp: 波特是最棒的守门员之一。他常常可以有世界级的扑救。
trad: 波特是最棒的守門員之一。他常常可以有世界級的撲救。

eng: They're children.
When did you last wipe someone's tears away?
simp: 你最后一次替别人擦眼泪是什么时候？
trad: 你最後一次替別人擦眼淚是什麼時候？

eng: They're children.
I would very much like to go.
As the saying goes: Speech is silver, silence is gold.
simp: 常言道：言语是银，沉默是金。
trad: 常言道：言語是銀，沈默是金。

eng: Don't eat too much and disrupt the stomach's normal digestion process.
simp: 不要因为吃得太多而扰乱胃的正常消化。
trad: 不要因為吃得太多而擾亂胃的正常消化。

eng: Which cup is yours?
I didn't like the interface of that operating system.
simp: 我不喜欢这个操作系统的页面。
trad: 我不喜歡這個操作系統的頁面。

eng: You must take off your shoes here.
simp: 在这里，你一定要脱掉鞋子。
trad: 在這裏，你一定要脫掉鞋子。

eng: I'm ill, aren't I?
This place has everything.
Why aren't you in there?
They're watching.
Have you got a light?
It's fucking hot.
That's your car.
I'm going to check upstairs.
I still like you.
I like being my own boss.
He didn't use to be like that.
I'll get in touch with Tom.
You don't have to explain.
Do you want to go there?
Do not drink water!
He insulted her.
This is a television.
We don't need you anymore.
As often as she tried, she failed.
simp: 她每次的尝试都失败了
trad: 她每次的嘗試都失敗了

eng: She has a sense of humor.
She turned the doorknob slowly.
She slowly moved forward.
Long-sleeved shirts are good for cold weather.
simp: 长袖比较适合冷的天气。
trad: 長袖比較適合冷的天氣。

eng: If you drink instant coffee you do not need a coffee pot.
simp: 如果你喝速溶咖啡，就不需要咖啡壶了。
trad: 如果你喝速溶咖啡，就不需要咖啡壺了。

eng: The coffee pot is full of coffee.
A picnic is easier on everyone if you use a paper plate.
simp: 用纸质餐盘的话，野餐就方便多了。
trad: 用紙質餐盤的話，野餐就方便多了。

eng: I have a separate notebook for each class.
simp: 每堂课我都分别有一本笔记。
trad: 每堂課我都分別有一本筆記。

eng: The man is writing in the notebook.
simp: 男人正在笔记本上写东西。
trad: 男人正在筆記本上寫東西。

eng: The woman has a fever.
He has a fever of 102 degrees.
The cat likes sitting in the chair more than I do.
simp: 这只猫比我更喜欢坐在椅子上。
trad: 這只貓比我更喜歡坐在椅子上。

eng: It is easier to study when you are sitting in a comfortable chair.
simp: 当你坐在一把舒适的椅子上的时候，更容易学习。
trad: 當你坐在一把舒適的椅子上的時候，更容易學習。

eng: She didn't want him to play poker.
Anyone up for a game of poker?
Don't, under any circumstances, play poker with Tom.
simp: 无论怎样都不要和汤姆玩扑克。
trad: 無論怎樣都不要和湯姆玩撲克。

eng: Tom said he wanted to play poker with us.
simp: 汤姆说要跟我们玩扑克。
trad: 湯姆說要跟我們玩撲克。

eng: Don't sit here if you're not going to play poker with us.
simp: 不跟我们玩扑克就不要坐在这里。
trad: 不跟我們玩撲克就不要坐在這裏。

eng: Tom has Mary's address.
On sunny days, the beach is very crowded.
Today's weather is sunny with occasional clouds.
Tom doesn't like to play poker at all.
simp: 汤姆一点也不喜欢玩扑克。
trad: 湯姆一點也不喜歡玩撲克。

eng: I like to play poker.
He knows how to play poker.
Game over.
I think that, in tough times, you can cry as much as you want.
simp: 我想, 在艰难的时候, 你想哭就使劲哭吧。
trad: 我想, 在艱難的時候, 你想哭就使勁哭吧。

eng: Do you and Tom spend a lot of time together?
simp: 你和汤姆呆在一起的时间很多吗?
trad: 你和湯姆呆在一起的時間很多嗎?

eng: Do you spend a lot of time with Tom?
simp: 你是否花了大把时间和汤姆在一起?
trad: 你是否花了大把時間和湯姆在一起?

eng: I look forward to it.
My name's Ricardo, and you?
I think everybody should learn another language.
simp: 我认为大家都应该学另外一种语言。
trad: 我認為大家都應該學另外一種語言。

eng: Without science, there is no future.
The express train will take you between major cities non-stop.
simp: 特快火车会带着你在主要城市穿梭，期间不停。
trad: 特快火車會帶著你在主要城市穿梭，期間不停。

eng: The express train is moving down the track.
The man is making a telephone call.
simp: 男人正在用座机打电话。
trad: 男人正在用座機打電話。

eng: The blue telephone is on the table.
The straits were too narrow for the cruise ship.
simp: 这个海峡对游艇来说太窄了。
trad: 這個海峽對遊艇來說太窄了。

eng: The man is hiking on a narrow path.
simp: 他在一条狭窄的道路上走。
trad: 他在一條狹窄的道路上走。

eng: His cell phone is off.
I have to go to the toilet.
Where is your dog?
I invited a Chinese friend to my apartment.
simp: 我请了一位中国朋友来我的公寓。
trad: 我請了一位中國朋友來我的公寓。

eng: You don't need to call me.
We watch TV every day.
Why is my brother stupid?
simp: 为什么我的兄弟是笨蛋？
trad: 為什麼我的兄弟是笨蛋？

eng: He slid his arms around her and kissed her.
simp: 他垂下手臂环绕住她然后亲吻。
trad: 他垂下手臂環繞住她然後親吻。

eng: Tom has been wounded.
There are 5 people in my family.
You are my best friend.
She made a deposit at the bank.
I know Tom.
I don't know when he will come back.
simp: 不知道他什么时候回来。
trad: 不知道他什麼時候回來。

eng: Choose the one you like.
I'm not afraid of anything.
I don't know how she should deal with that issue.
simp: 不知道她应该怎么处理那个问题。
trad: 不知道她應該怎麼處理那個問題。

eng: I want him to read this.
Knowing and doing are two different things.
She sang softly.
Books are scattered around the room.
I think this book is easy.
We've ordered Chinese food.
I live near the sea so I often go to the beach.
simp: 我住在海边所以经常去海滩。
trad: 我住在海邊所以經常去海灘。

eng: I don't know what I'm going to do next.
simp: 我不知道下一步做什么。
trad: 我不知道下一步做什麼。

eng: I don't know when he'll come.
simp: 我不知道他什么时候来。
trad: 我不知道他什麼時候來。

eng: Mary bought a skirt and a blouse.
simp: 玛丽买了一件衬衫和一条连衣裙。
trad: 瑪麗買了一件襯衫和一條連衣裙。

eng: Tom has just finished eating dinner.
Do you still love Tom?
The pain is unbearable.
Liisa was in a bad mood.
The device is portable.
The woman is in front of a big rock.
The boys are asking questions.
The boy is asking a question.
They gave different versions of the accident.
simp: 人们对于这场事故有很多种说法。
trad: 人們對於這場事故有很多種說法。

eng: That's good.
Tom is being silly, isn't he?
Three soldiers who came back from the war are renting a house at the edge of a small town on the shore of the Inland Sea and live together.
simp: 三个退伍军人在内海一个小镇边上租了一套房子，并生活在一起。
trad: 三個退伍軍人在內海一個小鎮邊上租了一套房子，並生活在一起。

eng: Tomorrow will be better!
I'm not kidding.
As you can see, we're still working.
simp: 如你所见，我们仍在工作。
trad: 如你所見，我們仍在工作。

eng: Excuse me, can I join you?
simp: 请问，我可以加入你们吗？
trad: 請問，我可以加入你們嗎？

eng: Have a good dream!
When did you fall in love with me?
If you were gone, I'd die.
simp: 你要不在了，那我就不在了。
trad: 你要不在了，那我就不在了。

eng: Tell me what happened.
What does the police officer do?
That's my hobby.
Ah, I forgot to buy tofu.
I dreamed of you yesterday. "Seriously? And what was I doing?"
simp: “我昨天梦到了你。”“当真？那我（在你梦中）在做什么？”
trad: “我昨天夢到了你。”“當真？那我（在你夢中）在做什麼？”

eng: I am forever busy.
I remember it well.
I don't speak a word of French.
simp: 我没有说法语的一个字
trad: 我沒有說法語的一個字

eng: You don't need to leave immediately.
Do you have a driver's license with you?
I understand what she's saying.
He's a good driver.
Tom is tall and strong.
There still aren't any highways in this mountain region. All goods are transported on the backs of people and horses.
simp: 那多山地区还没有高速路。所有货运被驮在人的背上或在马的背上
trad: 那多山地區還沒有高速路。所有貨運被馱在人的背上或在馬的背上

eng: His house is cleaned thoroughly once a week.
simp: 他的家每周彻底打扫一次。
trad: 他的家每周徹底打掃一次。

eng: We can't just fire Tom.
simp: 我们不能仅仅就这样炒了汤姆
trad: 我們不能僅僅就這樣炒了湯姆

eng: I don't know what we'll do.
simp: 我不知道我们将会做什么。
trad: 我不知道我們將會做什麼。

eng: Every minute counts.
I didn't expect to see you at a place like this.
simp: 我都没想过会在这里碰见你。
trad: 我都沒想過會在這裏碰見你。

eng: Come on, trust me.
Come on, touch it.
Come on, let's go.
Come on, hurry up.
Were you able to do everything you wanted to get done?
simp: 你是不是有能力做到你想要完成的所有事情呢？
trad: 你是不是有能力做到你想要完成的所有事情呢？

eng: Tom wanted to know if Mary had a boyfriend.
simp: 汤姆想知道玛丽是否有男朋友？
trad: 湯姆想知道瑪麗是否有男朋友？

eng: He always comes to show his appreciation during the New Year and holidays.
simp: 过年过节时，他总是来慰劳。
trad: 過年過節時，他總是來慰勞。

eng: You can't judge a person by appearance, just as you can't measure the sea with a pint pot.
simp: 人不可貌相，海水不可斗量。
trad: 人不可貌相，海水不可鬥量。

eng: Tom's girlfriend threatened to leave him.
simp: 汤姆的女朋友威胁要离开他。
trad: 湯姆的女朋友威脅要離開他。

eng: It was lucky I was able to speak to Tom before he left for Boston.
simp: 在汤姆前往波士顿之前，我能和他说话可真算是走了运。
trad: 在湯姆前往波士頓之前，我能和他說話可真算是走了運。

eng: He teaches us history.
Don't carry too much baggage when you travel.
simp: 旅行时不要带太多行李。
trad: 旅行時不要帶太多行李。

eng: What he said cannot be true.
He turned off the TV and began to study.
simp: 他关掉了电视开始学习。
trad: 他關掉了電視開始學習。

eng: He wants to marry my daughter.
I want to sit down.
We believe in Buddhism.
My husband is always reading in bed.
simp: 我丈夫总是在床上看书。
trad: 我丈夫總是在床上看書。

eng: He lives in Tokyo.
I lived in a small town.
simp: 我曾经居住在一个小镇上。
trad: 我曾經居住在一個小鎮上。

eng: He was a professor at Cambridge University.
simp: 他曾经是剑桥大学的教授。
trad: 他曾經是劍橋大學的教授。

eng: Natasha was born in Russia, but she doesn’t speak Russian.
simp: 娜塔莎在俄罗斯出生，但是她不讲俄语。
trad: 娜塔莎在俄羅斯出生，但是她不講俄語。

eng: Chinese is a language that has four tones.
Moscow is the capital of Russia.
simp: 莫斯科是俄罗斯的首都。
trad: 莫斯科是俄羅斯的首都。

eng: How did you do in your exam?
I am boring.
Lake Baikal in Russia is the deepest lake in the world.
simp: 俄罗斯的贝加尔湖是世界上最深的湖泊。
trad: 俄羅斯的貝加爾湖是世界上最深的湖泊。

eng: The hair dresser is cutting the hair with scissors.
simp: 理发师正在用剪刀剪头发。
trad: 理發師正在用剪刀剪頭發。

eng: Use scissors to cut out the pictures.
Your hands are so cold.
It's very cold here in January.
I'm three years younger than he is.
On a hot summer day, the air conditioner works all day to keep us cool.
simp: 炎炎夏日，空调全天开放让我们保持凉爽。
trad: 炎炎夏日，空調全天開放讓我們保持涼爽。

eng: I'm really glad you're here.
Tom has a beautiful car.
You have beautiful eyes.
You're really beautiful.
You're a beautiful woman.
Some people clung to tree branches for several hours to avoid being washed away by the floodwaters.
simp: 为了不被洪水冲走，有的人紧紧地抱着树干长达数个钟头。
trad: 為了不被洪水沖走，有的人緊緊地抱著樹幹長達數個鐘頭。

eng: Tom and Mary are both only children.
Tom wanted to comfort Mary.
Mary is two months pregnant.
Are you looking for work?
Are you looking for work?
There weren't any cats.
There was no cat.
My father has been living in Nagoya for 30 years.
simp: 我父亲住在名古屋有30年了。
trad: 我父親住在名古屋有30年了。

eng: Is it obligatory to rent a car?
I'm really sorry to hear that.
simp: 听到这样的消息我真的很难过。
trad: 聽到這樣的消息我真的很難過。

eng: I won't be wearing a tie.
She knows the Chinese characters very well.
She tattled on me to her teacher.
simp: 她向她的老师打了我的小报告。
trad: 她向她的老師打了我的小報告。

eng: Your homework is one important part of the learning experience.
simp: 家庭作业是学习中很重要的一部分。
trad: 家庭作業是學習中很重要的一部分。

eng: The girl is doing homework.
simp: 这个女孩正在做家庭作业。
trad: 這個女孩正在做家庭作業。

eng: External air conditioners are quite cheap.
I fully agree with your point of view.
I'm too tired.
Tom likes squirrels.
May I use your car today?
simp: 我今天可以使用你的汽车吗?
trad: 我今天可以使用你的汽車嗎?

eng: May I use your car today?
simp: 我今天可以借用你的汽车吗?
trad: 我今天可以借用你的汽車嗎?

eng: He deposited the prize money in the bank.
They deserve it.
I am a banana.
I bought the pig yesterday.
He is always online.
It's written in black and white. How can you be in doubt?
simp: 这是白纸黑字写在这儿的你怎么还怀疑？
trad: 這是白紙黑字寫在這兒的你怎麼還懷疑？

eng: He had no friends, no money, no home...but he played happily all the same.
simp: 他没有朋友，没有钱，没有房子。。。他照样玩得很开心。
trad: 他沒有朋友，沒有錢，沒有房子。。。他照樣玩得很開心。

eng: There are islands in the sea.
There are islands in the sea.
He is not like the person I imagined.
simp: 他不是我所想像的那样人。
trad: 他不是我所想像的那樣人。

eng: He's carrying an umbrella because it's raining.
simp: 他带着雨伞因为下雨了。
trad: 他帶著雨傘因為下雨了。

eng: Nothing lasts forever, not for a long time, anyone can find an excuse to go ahead.
simp: 没有什么永远，没有什么很久，找个借口谁都可以先走。
trad: 沒有什麼永遠，沒有什麼很久，找個借口誰都可以先走。

eng: You gave up.
What were the contents of the letter?
I think I know who it is.
He is quick at learning a foreign language.
His accent suggests he is a foreigner.
simp: 他的口音显露出他是外国人。
trad: 他的口音顯露出他是外國人。

eng: What do you call this?
How do you say...?
The alarm clock is set for 5 a.m.
I depend on the alarm clock to wake up on time every morning.
simp: 每天早上我都要靠闹钟来按时叫醒我。
trad: 每天早上我都要靠鬧鐘來按時叫醒我。

eng: The employees work at the office.
I usually work from 9 AM to 5 PM, but today I worked until 10 PM.
simp: 我通常从上午九点工作到下午五点，但是今天晚上我十点才下班。
trad: 我通常從上午九點工作到下午五點，但是今天晚上我十點才下班。

eng: He gets up at 8 a.m. every morning.
Traffic conditions on the highway are normal this morning.
simp: 今天早上高速公路上的交通状况正常。
trad: 今天早上高速公路上的交通狀況正常。

eng: I jog in the morning.
The homemaker vacuumed the carpet.
Every Tuesday morning the housekeeper vacuums.
simp: 每周二早上主妇用吸尘器清扫。
trad: 每周二早上主婦用吸塵器清掃。

eng: Don't you know?
He's a foreigner. He doesn't understand what we're saying.
simp: 他是老外,他听不懂我们说的话。
trad: 他是老外,他聽不懂我們說的話。

eng: I don't speak Chinese.
I am bored.
If it rains tomorrow, we won't go.
simp: 如果明天下雨的话，我们就不去。
trad: 如果明天下雨的話，我們就不去。

eng: This is an old letter.
I know I'm wrong.
We can't choose where we come from, but we can choose where we go from there.
simp: 我们不能选择从哪里来，却能选择往哪里去。
trad: 我們不能選擇從哪裏來，卻能選擇往哪裏去。

eng: Who is your brother?
I write Chinese characters very slowly.
What's his job?
I'll tell you the truth now.
simp: 现在我来告诉你的真相。
trad: 現在我來告訴你的真相。

eng: We haven't contacted each other for quite a while. I am very happy to write to you.
simp: 我们好久没有联系了，很高兴能给你写信。
trad: 我們好久沒有聯系了，很高興能給你寫信。

eng: May I kiss you?
I am nearly as tall as she.
I am nearly as tall as she.
Why do I have to go to school?
You need to see a doctor.
I will translate.
I should congratulate you.
Do you have a hobby, Tom?
Do you have a hobby, Tom?
That's what I said.
Did you pass your exams?
Nowadays mobile phones are very popular.
You're still young, but not permanently.
simp: 你还年轻，可是没有永久。
trad: 你還年輕，可是沒有永久。

eng: Her French is not fluent.
I'm sorry, I do not understand. Can you repeat it a little slower?
simp: 对不起，我听不懂。你能慢点儿再说一遍吗？
trad: 對不起，我聽不懂。你能慢點兒再說一遍嗎？

eng: I want to live in the city.
How is this dish made?
They never admit their own mistakes.
I like the way you talk.
Life is hard.
I want to stay home.
I feel exhausted because of jet lag.
simp: 我因为时差而感到疲惫。
trad: 我因為時差而感到疲憊。

eng: If they could eat in a restaurant every night, they would. They hate cooking.
simp: 若可以每晚都在餐厅吃饭，他们会这麽做的。他们讨厌下厨。
trad: 若可以每晚都在餐廳吃飯，他們會這麼做的。他們討厭下廚。

eng: I want to go to the movies today.
My uncles come to see me from time to time.
simp: 我的叔叔们（舅舅们）有时会来探望我。
trad: 我的叔叔們（舅舅們）有時會來探望我。

eng: We became friends when I was in Taiwan.
simp: 我在台湾时，我们成为好朋友。
trad: 我在臺灣時，我們成為好朋友。

eng: Nobody can know everything.
He's thinking about this difficult problem.
He still hasn't given me the money I lent him.
simp: 他还没有给我我借给他的钱。
trad: 他還沒有給我我借給他的錢。

eng: Don't forget to call me.
China developed very quickly.
He has lived here for a long time.
Do you know this girl?
Do you know this girl?
simp: 你认识不认识这个女孩？
trad: 你認識不認識這個女孩？

eng: Oh, my God!
Excuse me, where's the Bank of China?
I know that some of your students don't like you.
simp: 我知道你的一些学生不喜欢你。
trad: 我知道你的一些學生不喜歡你。

eng: I will not come.
I really don't understand what you're talking about.
simp: 我真的不明白你在说什么呢。
trad: 我真的不明白你在說什麼呢。

eng: I know everything about you.
Where do you come from?
Where do you come from?
Police officer, I didn't do anything!
Honestly, I really like you.
simp: 说实在的，我真的喜欢你。
trad: 說實在的，我真的喜歡你。

eng: This is the future.
Oh, I forgot my keys.
He needs ten hours to get dressed.
simp: 他需要十个小时来穿衣服。
trad: 他需要十個小時來穿衣服。

eng: He hasn't come already, has he?
His class makes us despair.
You make a decision for yourself on this matter.
simp: 这件事你自己决定就是了。
trad: 這件事你自己決定就是了。

eng: He always dresses very casually, and doesn't care about color or style.
simp: 他穿衣服一向很随便，颜色、样式都无所谓。
trad: 他穿衣服一向很隨便，顏色、樣式都無所謂。

eng: Upon seeing how ridiculous he looked, everyone could not help but laughing.
simp: 看到他那可笑的样子，大家忍不住笑了。
trad: 看到他那可笑的樣子，大家忍不住笑了。

eng: She is an expert at telling lies.
I need a place where I can study.
simp: 我需要个可以读书的地方。
trad: 我需要個可以讀書的地方。

eng: You need to leave.
Did you notice any suspicious places?
simp: 你有注意到什麽可疑的地方吗？
trad: 你有註意到什麼可疑的地方嗎？

eng: He was a millionaire not long ago.
He can't distinguish between good and evil.
The first thing I did after getting home was taking my shoes off.
simp: 我到家后做的第一件事便是脱鞋。
trad: 我到家後做的第一件事便是脫鞋。

eng: I don't want to lose you.
She went down that road.
Everything you saw was an illusion.
He didn't die in vain.
I'm sure you can understand.
It's OK, thanks.
While cleaning, we saw some of his things.
simp: 清理的时候，我们看到了些他的东西。
trad: 清理的時候，我們看到了些他的東西。

eng: Do you really not care that I'm going alone?
simp: 你真的不介意我一个人去吗？
trad: 你真的不介意我一個人去嗎？

eng: Do I need a reservation?
Nine o'clock should be O.K.
I'd like to reserve a table for two.
simp: 我想要预约2个人的位子。
trad: 我想要預約2個人的位子。

eng: What do you have for today's special?
During that time I didn’t expect to have a problem.
simp: 当时我没想到这个问题。
trad: 當時我沒想到這個問題。

eng: Our company has many projects to do.
simp: 我们公司有很多项目要做。
trad: 我們公司有很多項目要做。

eng: The school rules that students cannot smoke.
simp: 学校规定学生不能抽烟。
trad: 學校規定學生不能抽煙。

eng: Their common aim was to make the project successful.
simp: 这些人共同的目标是把这个项目做成功。
trad: 這些人共同的目標是把這個項目做成功。

eng: We are waiting for him to make another decision.
simp: 我们在等他做另一个决定。
trad: 我們在等他做另一個決定。

eng: He is the prime minister of this country.
Are you a chemistry student?
He is studying.
Where do you study?
Are they students?
Are you students?
He is always complaining about how small his room is.
simp: 他总是抱怨他的房间小。
trad: 他總是抱怨他的房間小。

eng: I'll remember you forever.
He is always preparing.
You are always fighting.
It's always raining.
I just threw up.
That little boy can walk.
Can he drive?
Did you know that before?
There are islands in the sea.
Santa lives at the North Pole.
It's already over.
Was Julian wrong?
I have self-studied half a semester's worth of German.
simp: 我自学了半个学期的德文。
trad: 我自學了半個學期的德文。

eng: Tom is always daydreaming.
This seems very difficult!
They married in secret.
Has Tom gone insane?
I've already told him that.
simp: 我早就和他说过这些了。
trad: 我早就和他說過這些了。

eng: My purse was stolen.
Shut up!
I won't stay silent.
Are you crying?
Are you guys crying?
Marriage is the main cause of divorce.
simp: 婚姻是造成离婚的主因。
trad: 婚姻是造成離婚的主因。

eng: I got arrested.
Are you a vampire?
After standing for 6 hours, Antonio's legs became stiff.
simp: Antonio站了六个小时后，腿变得僵硬。
trad: Antonio站了六個小時後，腿變得僵硬。

eng: Do you want to go too?
That war hurt the country.
simp: 那场战争对国家造成伤害。
trad: 那場戰爭對國家造成傷害。

eng: Did you hear how quickly he speaks?
simp: 你有听到他说得有多快吗？
trad: 你有聽到他說得有多快嗎？

eng: The password is "Muiriel".
Learning should not be forced, but rather encouraged.
simp: 学习不该被强迫，而是该被鼓励。
trad: 學習不該被強迫，而是該被鼓勵。

eng: The color red is beautiful, but it can't beat blue.
simp: 红色很漂亮，但还比不过蓝色。
trad: 紅色很漂亮，但還比不過藍色。

eng: Tom is looking for a job.
Tom doesn't have a good French-English dictionary.
simp: Tom没有一本好的法英字典。
trad: Tom沒有一本好的法英字典。

eng: Tom is there alone.
He became thought of as the best lawyer in this city.
simp: 他被认为是这个城市裡最好的律师。
trad: 他被認為是這個城市裡最好的律師。

eng: I feel like you are laughing at us.
This is delicious.
You don't accept credit cards?
Asia has many rural villages.
I love you, Tom.
What books did you buy?
I am studying Japanese.
She doesn't use salt when cooking.
Do you feel tired?
Whose pizza is this?
This movie is very popular among young people.
simp: 这部电影在年轻人之间很流行。
trad: 這部電影在年輕人之間很流行。

eng: I am looking for a native speaker who can correct this paper for me.
simp: 我正在寻找可以帮我修改这篇论文的母语人士。
trad: 我正在尋找可以幫我修改這篇論文的母語人士。

eng: This is a very important meeting.
This wooden chair costs sixty pounds.
simp: 这张木製的椅子六十英镑。
trad: 這張木製的椅子六十英鎊。

eng: He wrote a new book.
I just got a letter from Brazil.
simp: 我刚收到一封来自巴西的信。
trad: 我剛收到一封來自巴西的信。

eng: I was also invited.
I know everybody here.
Unfortunately, my neighbor was involved in a traffic accident, and is currently in a coma.
simp: 很不幸地，我得邻居被捲入交通事故，呈现昏迷状态。
trad: 很不幸地，我得鄰居被捲入交通事故，呈現昏迷狀態。

eng: I want more.
Nobody knows why.
I'm so stupid.
Why are you here?
If I were invisible, I wouldn't have to wear anything.
simp: 若我是隐形的，就不用穿衣服了。
trad: 若我是隱形的，就不用穿衣服了。

eng: I'm starving!
I passed a language test.
simp: 我通过了一个语言的考试。
trad: 我通過了一個語言的考試。

eng: In Hungary, everyone speaks Hungarian.
I can't take this pain any more.
The horse stopped and refused to go any further.
simp: 马停了下来，而且拒绝移动。
trad: 馬停了下來，而且拒絕移動。

eng: She's my type.
That's not a horse, it's a donkey.
Yamamoto is also a friend of mine.
simp: 山本也是我的一个朋友。
trad: 山本也是我的一個朋友。

eng: This computer is yours, right?
simp: 这台电脑是你的，不是吗？
trad: 這臺電腦是你的，不是嗎？

eng: Kate's dad walks home from the bus stop.
simp: Kate的爸爸从车站走路回家。
trad: Kate的爸爸從車站走路回家。

eng: This horrible hot weather is killing me.
We're out of tissue paper, so I need to go buy some.
simp: 卫生纸用完了，我必须去买。
trad: 衛生紙用完了，我必須去買。

eng: A bit of juice, please.
Run.
Tom wants me to stay away from him.
That's called true love.
She is good at speaking English.
Tom begged for Maria's forgiveness.
I don't know much about Japan.
Do you know how to dance?
She sat down and lit a cigarette.
That little boy wears glasses.
I should learn Esperanto.
That's quite to my taste.
What will I find in the box?
simp: 看看我会在盒子裡找到什麽?
