trad: 臺灣島的面積是三萬六千平方公裏。

eng: So tasty!
I want to become rich.
I want to eat something tasty.
Do you feel bored?
The audience seems to feel bored.
Learning foreign languages is boring.
Happy Easter!
Do it again, the same as last time.
Who is your teacher?
You should help him.
I will help him to the best of my ability.
simp: 我将会尽我所能地帮助他。
trad: 我將會盡我所能地幫助他。

eng: Shouting at your computer will not help.
simp: 对你的电脑吼一点帮助也没有。
trad: 對你的電腦吼一點幫助也沒有。

eng: Wine helps with digestion.
We were very sorry we couldn't help them.
simp: 我们很遗憾无法帮助他们。
trad: 我們很遺憾無法幫助他們。

eng: If it were not for your help, I could not succeed.
simp: 没有你的帮忙，我无法达成。
trad: 沒有你的幫忙，我無法達成。

eng: Nobody knows why he turns down my help.
simp: 没有人知道他为何拒绝我帮忙。
trad: 沒有人知道他為何拒絕我幫忙。

eng: They helped each other do homework.
His pride prevented him from asking others for help.
simp: 他的骄傲不允许他向人求助。
trad: 他的驕傲不允許他向人求助。

eng: Soap can clean grime.
Can you help me wash these dishes?
simp: 你能帮我洗这些碗盘吗？
trad: 你能幫我洗這些碗盤嗎？

eng: Poor cat.
She adores cats.
Cats hate water.
Cats are smart.
Though tears may flow down your face, I won't look back.
simp: 任凭眼泪在你脸上滑过，我头也不回
trad: 任憑眼淚在你臉上滑過，我頭也不回

eng: He has enormous potential.
She is full of potential.
The future belongs to the few among us who are still willing to get their hands dirty.
simp: 未来属于我们当中那些仍然愿意弄脏自己双手的少数人。
trad: 未來屬於我們當中那些仍然願意弄臟自己雙手的少數人。

eng: We are sorry we can't help you.
simp: 我们很遗憾没能帮助你们。
trad: 我們很遺憾沒能幫助你們。

eng: We have a new neighbour.
Why do you hate me?
My sister and I went to the castle.
My wife is afraid to drive my new car.
simp: 我的妻子害怕开我的新车。
trad: 我的妻子害怕開我的新車。

eng: This is where Tom usually parks his car.
simp: 汤姆通常把他的车停在这里。
trad: 湯姆通常把他的車停在這裏。

eng: If I won the lottery, I'd buy a new car.
simp: 如果我中了彩票，我会买辆新车。
trad: 如果我中了彩票，我會買輛新車。

eng: ... Otherwise it is (or will be) hard to avoid a counterproductive situation.
simp: ...不然难免会有适得其反的情况出现。
trad: ...不然難免會有適得其反的情況出現。

eng: Bracelet is the same in French.
simp: 英文"Bracelet"在法文的意思是相同的。
trad: 英文"Bracelet"在法文的意思是相同的。

eng: Tom doesn't eat red meat.
I still don't know your name.
simp: 我到现在还是不知道你的名字。
trad: 我到現在還是不知道你的名字。

eng: I don't have a computer.
Tom doesn't know what he should do.
They both cried after hearing the tragic news.
simp: 听到这件悲剧，他俩尽皆哭泣。
trad: 聽到這件悲劇，他倆盡皆哭泣。

eng: Tom hasn't called Mary yet.
Tom has been expecting Mary.
Will you wait a moment?
Will you wait a minute?
Pick up the phone.
Please be ready in fifteen minutes.
He was accredited to the United States to represent Japan.
simp: 他被任命为驻美日本大使。
trad: 他被任命為駐美日本大使。

eng: This building is a capsule hotel lodging men and women.
simp: 那个建筑物是男女都可以住宿的胶囊酒店。
trad: 那個建築物是男女都可以住宿的膠囊酒店。

eng: The lie got him in trouble when his boss found out the truth.
simp: 当他的上司察觉他的谎言，麻烦来了。
trad: 當他的上司察覺他的謊言，麻煩來了。

eng: No matter how much I consider it I do not understand.
simp: 无论怎么去想我都搞不清楚。
trad: 無論怎麼去想我都搞不清楚。

eng: In towns, speed is limited to 50 km/h.
simp: 在市区内，数度被限制在每小时五十公里以内。
trad: 在市區內，數度被限制在每小時五十公裏以內。

eng: AI means Artificial Intelligence.
I remember having seen her somewhere.
simp: 我记得好像在哪里见过她。
trad: 我記得好像在哪裏見過她。

eng: Tom certainly is good at baseball.
simp: 汤姆打棒球打的非常好。
trad: 湯姆打棒球打的非常好。

eng: I'm a high school student.
Give her a moment.
The chicken is raw.
The chicken is undercooked.
The chicken is pink.
I admit that I was a little drunk.
The picture is hanging on the wall.
How can you be so cruel?
Is there anything that worries you right now?
simp: 现在有什么烦恼的事情吗？
trad: 現在有什麼煩惱的事情嗎？

eng: The flash wasn't working, so he couldn't take a picture in the dark.
simp: 因为闪光灯坏了，他不能在黑暗中拍照。
trad: 因為閃光燈壞了，他不能在黑暗中拍照。

eng: Suddenly, a ship appeared through the fog.
simp: 突然，从茫茫大雾中出现了一艘船。
trad: 突然，從茫茫大霧中出現了一艘船。

eng: Tom is extremely romantic.
Are we going to surrender to these monsters?
simp: 我们要向这个怪兽投降吗？
trad: 我們要向這個怪獸投降嗎？

eng: Do you have a steady boyfriend?
simp: 你有一个固定的男朋友吗？
trad: 你有一個固定的男朋友嗎？

eng: Tom added both his and Mary's name to the list.
simp: 汤姆将他自己和玛丽的名字添加到了名单上。
trad: 湯姆將他自己和瑪麗的名字添加到了名單上。

eng: Where were you? "I was at a friend's house."
She's afraid of losing money.
The blanket is still wet.
We met at the church.
Who told you that Tom and I are dating?
simp: 谁告诉你我和汤姆在交往的？
trad: 誰告訴你我和湯姆在交往的？

eng: What's wrong, honey?
Those tulips are beautiful.
The music was very loud.
Anyone can attend my lectures, but not everyone can understand them.
simp: 所有人都能来上我的课，但是不是每个人都能理解我的课。
trad: 所有人都能來上我的課，但是不是每個人都能理解我的課。

eng: I'm from Rome.
Turn right at the next intersection.
simp: 请在下一个十字路口右转。
trad: 請在下一個十字路口右轉。

eng: Mary and Alice are a legally married same sex couple.
simp: Mary和Alice是一对合法结婚的同性伴侣。
trad: Mary和Alice是一對合法結婚的同性伴侶。

eng: It was a very stupid decision.
simp: 这是一个十分愚蠢的决定。
trad: 這是一個十分愚蠢的決定。

eng: You need to put more water in the vase.
simp: 你需要往花瓶里加更多的水。
trad: 你需要往花瓶裏加更多的水。

eng: Mary put some flowers in the vase.
simp: 玛丽把一些花放进了花瓶。
trad: 瑪麗把一些花放進了花瓶。

eng: Tom bought a rose for Mary.
simp: 汤姆给玛丽买了一束玫瑰花。
trad: 湯姆給瑪麗買了一束玫瑰花。

eng: Everyone was drunk, except me.
simp: 所有人都喝醉了，除了我。
trad: 所有人都喝醉了，除了我。

eng: Everyone was drunk.
Can you name one of their songs?
simp: 你能够说出一首他们的歌的名字吗？
trad: 你能夠說出一首他們的歌的名字嗎？

eng: I'll bet you a hundred dollars that Tom is gay.
simp: 我和你赌一百元，汤姆是同性恋。
trad: 我和你賭一百元，湯姆是同性戀。

eng: Tom doesn't look like his father at all.
simp: 汤姆和他的父亲长得一点也不像。
trad: 湯姆和他的父親長得一點也不像。

eng: Hanako and Taro went to eat some sushi.
simp: 花子和太郎去吃了寿司。
trad: 花子和太郎去吃了壽司。

eng: We have to leave in five minutes.
simp: 我们必须在五分钟之内离开。
trad: 我們必須在五分鐘之內離開。

eng: Where did you see him?
The blueberry cake he made was delicious.
simp: 他做的蓝莓蛋糕很美味。
trad: 他做的藍莓蛋糕很美味。

eng: Be my guest.
As you wish.
Have you gone nuts?
Since communism became obsolete and the dictatorship of the proletariat is out of date, capitalism proves to be the best so far, even though it itself is still a threat for humanity.
simp: 共产主义失败了，而无产阶级专政现在也经被淘汰了。虽然资本主义逐渐取而代之，但现在的资本主义对于人类还是一个威胁。
trad: 共產主義失敗了，而無產階級專政現在也經被淘汰了。雖然資本主義逐漸取而代之，但現在的資本主義對於人類還是一個威脅。

eng: I'll prove it to you.
We want you to marry Tom.
simp: 我们希望你和汤姆能结婚。
trad: 我們希望你和湯姆能結婚。

eng: Stop bothering me.
He made me his own assistant.
They treat me like a child.
We had a lot to drink.
Our colleague's mother passed away.
simp: 我们同事的母亲过世了。
trad: 我們同事的母親過世了。

eng: I suggest that, out of politeness, we drink as little as possible.
simp: 我建议，为了礼貌起见，我们尽可能少喝。
trad: 我建議，為了禮貌起見，我們盡可能少喝。

eng: I can't lift a suitcase heavier than 30 kilos.
simp: 我没法举起超过30千克的箱子。
trad: 我沒法舉起超過30千克的箱子。

eng: He is just passing the blame onto others.
The computer is undoubtedly a valuable tool.
simp: 电脑无疑是一项有价值的工具。
trad: 電腦無疑是一項有價值的工具。

eng: There are many beautiful castles in northern Germany.
simp: 在德国北部有很多美丽的城堡？
trad: 在德國北部有很多美麗的城堡？

eng: He promised not to tell anyone about it.
simp: 他承诺不会和任何人说这件事。
trad: 他承諾不會和任何人說這件事。

eng: I want to buy a few pairs of sunglasses.
I live in Malta.
He got off the bus.
We're intimate friends.
It is exactly three o'clock now.
Do you happen to know them?
This fairy tale is easy enough for a seven-year-old child to read.
simp: 这个童话故事很浅白，七岁的小孩也看得懂。
trad: 這個童話故事很淺白，七歲的小孩也看得懂。

eng: The red fish is swimming in the ocean.
All I want to do is go fishing.
simp: 我唯一想做的是去钓鱼。
trad: 我唯一想做的是去釣魚。

eng: Could you ask her to call me?
simp: 你能请她打电话给我吗？
trad: 你能請她打電話給我嗎？

eng: What does this mean in Arabic?
simp: 这在阿拉伯语中代表什么？
trad: 這在阿拉伯語中代表什麼？

eng: What does that mean in Arabic?
simp: 那在阿拉伯语中代表什么意思？
trad: 那在阿拉伯語中代表什麼意思？

eng: I'm just writing a letter to my girlfriend.
simp: 我只是在写一封信给我的女友。
trad: 我只是在寫一封信給我的女友。

eng: I think perfection is ugly, he said. "Somewhere in the things that humans make, I want to see scars, failure, disorder, distortion."
simp: “我认为完美是丑陋的”，他说道。“人们做的事情，我希望看到的是创伤，失败，溷乱，扭曲。”
trad: “我認為完美是醜陋的”，他說道。“人們做的事情，我希望看到的是創傷，失敗，混亂，扭曲。”

eng: What do you think was the most read article this year on the Japanese version of Wikipedia?
simp: 你认为今年在维基百科上被最多人阅读的日文版本的文章是哪篇？
trad: 你認為今年在維基百科上被最多人閱讀的日文版本的文章是哪篇？

eng: I'd like to try this on. Where are the fitting rooms?
simp: 我想试试这件。请问哪里是试衣间？
trad: 我想試試這件。請問哪裏是試衣間？

eng: Nonsense!
Really?
You are always digging at me about my clothes.
Admitting what you say, I still think you are in the wrong.
simp: 虽然我承认你说的,但是我仍然认为你是错的。
trad: 雖然我承認你說的,但是我仍然認為你是錯的。

eng: I want to reserve a first-class stateroom.
She is obstinate.
You filthy beast, get out of here!
This is the dilemma.
It's a slip of the pen.
I'll beat you up!
A Mexican taught him Spanish.
simp: 一个墨西哥人教了他西班牙文。
trad: 一個墨西哥人教了他西班牙文。

eng: I can speak Spanish fluently.
simp: 我能流利地说西班牙文。
trad: 我能流利地說西班牙文。

eng: Yaguatí speaks Spanish and Guaraní.
simp: Yaguatí说西班牙语和瓜拉尼语。
trad: Yaguatí說西班牙語和瓜拉尼語。

eng: He is capable of teaching Spanish.
simp: 他有能力教授西班牙文。
trad: 他有能力教授西班牙文。

eng: It's been raining all the time lately.
Address the matters, and not the people involved.
Well done!
What planet are you from?
I'm from a different planet.
Earth is a planet.
Mars is "the Red Planet".
That planet is called Saturn.
Tom got mercury poisoning from eating canned tuna every day.
simp: Tom汞中毒，因为他每天吃罐装鲔鱼。
trad: Tom汞中毒，因為他每天吃罐裝鮪魚。

eng: Would you like to know how to prevent getting wrinkles?
simp: 你想要知道如何避免皱纹吗？
trad: 你想要知道如何避免皺紋嗎？

eng: The family is the fundamental unit of society.
She shrugged her shoulders.
Do you know the difference between a microscope and a telescope?
simp: 你知道显微镜和望远镜的差别吗？
trad: 你知道顯微鏡和望遠鏡的差別嗎？

eng: Venus has no moons.
You know that's not right.
For some reason she didn't come home last night.
simp: 不知道怎么回事，她昨天晚上没回家。
trad: 不知道怎麼回事，她昨天晚上沒回家。

eng: I don't understand any French.
Tom is totally into you.
Does that make me weird?
Are you sure that Tom is behind this?
How long has Tom been living in Boston?
simp: 汤姆住在波士顿多久了？
trad: 湯姆住在波士頓多久了？

eng: This is a book about public policy.
simp: 这是一本关于公共政策的书。
trad: 這是一本關於公共政策的書。

eng: It would be better with your younger sister.
It can be better with your younger sister.
simp: 有时候和你妹妹一起更好。
trad: 有時候和你妹妹一起更好。

eng: He has a master's degree in mathematics.
simp: 他有一个数学硕士学位。
trad: 他有一個數學碩士學位。

eng: He is a tutor for the math department.
Last year I was a TA for calculus.
simp: 去年我是一个微积分学助教。
trad: 去年我是一個微積分學助教。

eng: If you have questions, please come to my office hours.
simp: 如果你有问题，请来我的办公室几小时。
trad: 如果你有問題，請來我的辦公室幾小時。

eng: The professor has office hours every Tuesday afternoon.
simp: 每个星期二下午是这个教授的办公时间。
trad: 每個星期二下午是這個教授的辦公時間。

eng: Mathematicians love to prove things.
My parents are going to buy a new CD.
simp: 我的父母准备买一个新的光盘。
trad: 我的父母準備買一個新的光盤。

eng: Congratulations!
How many books do you read per month?
How much does he earn per month?
How much does he spend per month?
How much is the rent per month?
This pencil is better than that one.
I would like to become a poet.
I have to fight.
You can't be young.
Tom does not know the difference between charcoal and carbon.
What a pity that I did not see it.
I wanted to go, but I forgot.
simp: 我本来想走的，但后来忘了。
trad: 我本來想走的，但後來忘了。

eng: I was bored, so I fell asleep.
You definitely should not skip this step.
simp: 无论如何都不要跳过这一步。
trad: 無論如何都不要跳過這一步。

eng: Do you drink beer?
I think this is true.
The chemical symbol "H" stands for hydrogen.
Dad bought a book for me.
You're very smart.
Food is always necessary for life.
simp: 对生命来说，食物永远是必要的。
trad: 對生命來說，食物永遠是必要的。

eng: We waited in the park for a long time.
I want a good dictionary.
My wife often called me when I was travelling abroad.
simp: 我在国外旅行的时候，我老婆老给我打电话。
trad: 我在國外旅行的時候，我老婆老給我打電話。

eng: The boy can count to ten.
Who wants to be a millionaire?
I live in Tehran.
You are a good driver.
Auckland is a city in New Zealand.
simp: 奥克兰是一座新西兰的城市。
trad: 奧克蘭是一座新西蘭的城市。

eng: Exercise is good for your health.
We're conservative.
It's a matter of life and death.
simp: 这是一个生和死的问题。
trad: 這是一個生和死的問題。

eng: It's eight o'clock.
He won't be back tomorrow.
Even if she doesn't like you, you still have to finish the work.
simp: 即便她不喜欢你，你也要完成工作。
trad: 即便她不喜歡你，你也要完成工作。

eng: Remember to brush your teeth.
Please serve the guests some coffee, dear.
simp: 亲爱的，给客人端点咖啡吧。
trad: 親愛的，給客人端點咖啡吧。

eng: I'm scared of wild animals.
You're the new secretary, aren't you?
simp: 您是新来的秘书吧，不是吗？
trad: 您是新來的秘書吧，不是嗎？

eng: You disappoint me.
Don't cry.
I am short.
Look, she said.
Eating raw eggs could be bad for you.
I have to pick one of them.
He asked if I like mathematics.
My mom gets out of bed before me.
Jupiter is the largest planet in the Solar System.
simp: 木星是太阳系中最大的行星。
trad: 木星是太陽系中最大的行星。

eng: Can you speak Low German?
The bed took up a lot of space.
We have physical education.
Does she like my hat?
I will never set my foot there again.
simp: 我再也不会踏进这个地方。
trad: 我再也不會踏進這個地方。

eng: Try this!
I counted to two hundred.
Tom refused to talk to me.
You're not allowed to smoke here.
Tom's children can't speak French.
simp: 汤姆的孩子不会说法语。
trad: 湯姆的孩子不會說法語。

eng: Tom is fat.
You're contradicting yourself.
My father will not let me marry him.
simp: 我父亲不允许我嫁给他。
trad: 我父親不允許我嫁給他。

eng: You can go wherever you want.
Tom abstained from voting.
I didn't pay attention to what they were saying.
simp: 他们说了什么，我并不注意。
trad: 他們說了什麼，我並不註意。

eng: I've always wanted to visit Turkey.
The machine generated large amounts of electricity.
Give me a cigarette.
Ukrainian girls are the prettiest in the world.
simp: 乌克兰姑娘是全世界最漂亮的姑娘。
trad: 烏克蘭姑娘是全世界最漂亮的姑娘。

eng: You need a car if you live in the suburbs.
simp: 要住在郊区的话，汽车是必需的。
trad: 要住在郊區的話，汽車是必需的。

eng: At first there will be many unrecognized words and grammatical forms, but don't be scared.
simp: 一开始会有很多不认识的单词和语法形式，但是不要害怕。
trad: 一開始會有很多不認識的單詞和語法形式，但是不要害怕。

eng: I can't believe Tom was able to do this all by himself.
simp: 没法相信，汤姆没人帮助自己一个人就做到了这些。
trad: 沒法相信，湯姆沒人幫助自己一個人就做到了這些。

eng: My father died when I was seven.
simp: 我七岁时，我父亲去世了。
trad: 我七歲時，我父親去世了。

eng: She likes oranges.
He asked me if I know her phone number.
simp: 他问我，是不是知道她的电话号码。
trad: 他問我，是不是知道她的電話號碼。

eng: I've told you not to give me any hickies!
simp: 我都跟你说过了，不要留吻痕！
trad: 我都跟你說過了，不要留吻痕！

eng: She married a musician.
simp: 她和一位音乐家结了婚。
trad: 她和一位音樂家結了婚。

eng: Imagine that you have a time machine.
simp: 想象一下，假如你有一台时光机。
trad: 想象一下，假如你有一臺時光機。

eng: My father has a restaurant.
Appearance isn't all.
You promised to take care of them.
simp: 你答应过，会照顾他们的。
trad: 你答應過，會照顧他們的。

eng: Speak!
Not everybody can be an artist.
simp: 不是所有人都能当艺术家的。
trad: 不是所有人都能當藝術家的。

eng: He's writing his mother a letter.
He is but a child.
My elder son is Lech Zaręba.
His son wants to be a lawyer.
Tom studies philosophy at college.
simp: 汤姆在大学里学的是哲学。
trad: 湯姆在大學裏學的是哲學。

eng: He speaks too fast.
Where do you want to go today?
How did you find my house?
simp: 你怎么找到我的房子的？
trad: 你怎麼找到我的房子的？

eng: That is how I learned English.
simp: 我就是这么学会英语的。
trad: 我就是這麼學會英語的。

eng: I like this book very much.
I carried on singing.
She is already sleeping.
The next concert will take place in June.
simp: 下一场音乐会将在六月份举办。
trad: 下一場音樂會將在六月份舉辦。

eng: He replied that he did not know.
She knows that you know.
Is she a computer programmer?
She fooled him.
He spoke to me in German.
Why should Japanese people have to study English? Foreigners should have to study Japanese! "What you say makes sense!"
simp: “为什么日本人必须学英语？倒应该是外国人需要学习日语！”“你说得有道理！”
trad: “為什麼日本人必須學英語？倒應該是外國人需要學習日語！”“你說得有道理！”

eng: That's the reason she doesn't want to be with him anymore.
simp: 这就是她为什么不愿意再跟他在一起的原因。
trad: 這就是她為什麼不願意再跟他在一起的原因。

eng: That's the village I was born in.
She is a native speaker of Serbian.
simp: 塞尔维亚语是她的母语。
trad: 塞爾維亞語是她的母語。

eng: The new moon came out.
The tall woman is beautiful.
That way I kill two birds with one stone.
It takes 165 years for Neptune to orbit around the sun.
simp: 海王星绕行太阳一周要花一百六十五年。
trad: 海王星繞行太陽一周要花一百六十五年。

eng: Once upon a time there was a dwarf that lived in the forest.
simp: 从前有个侏儒住在森林裡。
trad: 從前有個侏儒住在森林裡。

eng: Russia is larger than Pluto.
When I was your age, Pluto was a planet.
simp: 当我在你这个年纪时，冥王星是行星。
trad: 當我在你這個年紀時，冥王星是行星。

eng: Since it is the oval track, the distance between the planets and the sun differs at times.
simp: 由于轨道是椭圆形的，行星和太阳之间的距离不会总是相同。
trad: 由於軌道是橢圓形的，行星和太陽之間的距離不會總是相同。

eng: Isn't he the graduate student of the University of Rome?
simp: 他不是罗马大学的研究生吗?
trad: 他不是羅馬大學的研究生嗎?

eng: I'd like to be a graduate student through the test after graduation.
simp: 大学毕业以后我也想考研究生。
trad: 大學畢業以後我也想考研究生。

eng: What did you guys go see?
Tom is a friend of my friend's.
Why don't we order the pizza?
simp: 为什么我们不订披萨呢？
trad: 為什麼我們不訂披薩呢？

eng: It is very important to master English in short time.
simp: 短时间内掌握英语是很重要的。
trad: 短時間內掌握英語是很重要的。

eng: I'll see as I walk along.
I don't know whether he's younger or older than me.
simp: 我不知道他比我大还是小。
trad: 我不知道他比我大還是小。

eng: The young man is a doctor.
Chinese food is no less nice than French food is.
On hearing the news, she fainted.
I think I mistakenly deleted that file.
simp: 我觉得我是误删了这个文件。
trad: 我覺得我是誤刪了這個文件。

eng: Please don't mistake my meaning.
Hands up! This is a robbery.
Are you for or against his idea?
simp: 您赞成还是反对他的想法？
trad: 您贊成還是反對他的想法？

eng: It's you I've come for.
It was two months ago when I arrived in Tokyo.
Five multiplies two equals ten.
You are a fast learner.
That hurts! Stop it!
I apologize for this methods in getting you here.
simp: 我很抱歉用这种方式把你请来。
trad: 我很抱歉用這種方式把你請來。

eng: I don't care.
Mr.Goat Butt never told me there would be a partner.
simp: 羊屁股先生可没告诉我还有搭档。
trad: 羊屁股先生可沒告訴我還有搭檔。

eng: That's why no one wants to work with you.
simp: 所以别人都不愿意和你合作。
trad: 所以別人都不願意和你合作。

eng: He's my underling.
You should go.
I'm checking for laser beam alarm triggers.
simp: 我在检查这里有没有激光警报装置。
trad: 我在檢查這裏有沒有激光警報裝置。

eng: Tom's house has a nice garden.
simp: 汤姆的住宅有一个不错的花园。
trad: 湯姆的住宅有一個不錯的花園。

eng: The guests are in the kitchen.
Before going to bed, I took three pills to stop a cold.
simp: 睡觉前我吃了三片药来治疗感冒。
trad: 睡覺前我吃了三片藥來治療感冒。

eng: Tom is a Briton.
Who are you looking for, Tom?
Is she a computer programmer?
I never thought that would happen.
simp: 我从来没想到会发生那种事。
trad: 我從來沒想到會發生那種事。

eng: Could you tell me your name and your number?
simp: 你能告诉我你的姓名和手机号码吗？
trad: 你能告訴我你的姓名和手機號碼嗎？

eng: What is your marital status?
simp: 能告诉我你的婚姻状况吗？
trad: 能告訴我你的婚姻狀況嗎？

eng: Tom's daughter pretended not to know him when he came to pick her up from school in his battered old car.
simp: 当汤姆开着他破旧的雷泽车来接女儿放学时，他的女儿假装不认识他。
trad: 當湯姆開著他破舊的雷澤車來接女兒放學時，他的女兒假裝不認識他。

eng: The large crowd roared in approval as Mark Knopfler played the first few bars of "Money for Nothing".
simp: 就像马克·诺弗勒早期演唱的歌曲《金钱无用》一样，绝大多数的人依然高呼赞成“金钱无用论”。
trad: 就像馬克·諾弗勒早期演唱的歌曲《金錢無用》一樣，絕大多數的人依然高呼贊成“金錢無用論”。

eng: It took a long time for me to get accustomed to the Venezuelan accent.
simp: 我花了好长时间才适应了委内瑞拉的口音。
trad: 我花了好長時間才適應了委內瑞拉的口音。

eng: Open your eyes, people!
simp: 人们啊，擦亮你的眼睛吧！
trad: 人們啊，擦亮你的眼睛吧！

eng: A person who likes flowers can't be evil.
simp: 一个爱花的人坏不到哪里去。
trad: 一個愛花的人壞不到哪裏去。

eng: They say that Marie Antoinette was responsible for the French Revolution.
simp: 有人说，玛丽·安托瓦内特对法国大革命有着不可推卸的责任。
trad: 有人說，瑪麗·安托瓦內特對法國大革命有著不可推卸的責任。

eng: I've got it right here.
Actinium was discovered by André-Louis Debierne in 1899.
Don't let this information leak out.
simp: 不要让这些信息泄露出去。
trad: 不要讓這些信息泄露出去。

eng: He bought this truck from Poland.
simp: 他在波兰买的这辆卡车。
trad: 他在波蘭買的這輛卡車。

eng: She has seen better days.
I am very interested in learning Chinese.
Life can only be understood backwards, but it must be lived forwards.
simp: 只有向后看才能理解生活，但要生活得好，则必须向前看。
trad: 只有向後看才能理解生活，但要生活得好，則必須向前看。

eng: Masturbation leads to insanity.
People from the so-called first world look at us Latinos as if we hadn't invented the wheel yet.
simp: 所谓的先进国家经常把拉丁美洲人看成石器时代的原始人。
trad: 所謂的先進國家經常把拉丁美洲人看成石器時代的原始人。

eng: She has changed greatly since I last saw her.
simp: 她和以前比起来变了很多
trad: 她和以前比起來變了很多

eng: Probably.
This laptop is thin and light.
simp: 这个笔记本电脑又薄又轻。
trad: 這個筆記本電腦又薄又輕。

eng: Why should I care what you think?
simp: 为什麽我应该在乎你怎麽想？
trad: 為什麼我應該在乎你怎麼想？

eng: I want to go to Hawaii.
What were you in prison for?
I'd say you earned it.
That settles that.
Don't you feel honored?
Tom is a wanted criminal.
I destroyed all the evidence.
This event benefits no one.
simp: 这件事对谁都没有好处。
trad: 這件事對誰都沒有好處。

eng: To his credit he knows what he's talking about.
You must study five pages per day.
The economic situation of the country worsened.
simp: 这个国家的经济环境变得更糟糕了。
trad: 這個國家的經濟環境變得更糟糕了。

eng: Is love just a game to you?
simp: 爱情对你来说是否只是一个游戏？
trad: 愛情對你來說是否只是一個遊戲？

eng: Ten years ago, our parents died in a car crash.
simp: 十年前，我们的父母死于一场车祸。
trad: 十年前，我們的父母死於一場車禍。

eng: The due date for submitting the application is this Friday.
simp: 提交申请的最后期限是星期五。
trad: 提交申請的最後期限是星期五。

eng: We know it's hard to quit smoking.
There's no coffee left.
They abandon their children.
simp: 他们放弃了他们的孩子。
trad: 他們放棄了他們的孩子。

eng: I also prefer white chocolate to regular chocolate.
simp: 比起普通的巧克力，我更喜欢白巧克力。
trad: 比起普通的巧克力，我更喜歡白巧克力。

eng: You remind me of Tom.
Tom is prepared to accept the consequences.
My hovercraft is full of eels.
simp: 我的气垫船装满了鳝鱼
trad: 我的氣墊船裝滿了鱔魚

eng: How many teachers of Spanish are there at this high school?
simp: 学校里有多少位教西班牙语的老师呢？
trad: 學校裏有多少位教西班牙語的老師呢？

eng: What are they saying?
What are they saying?
If you marry a chicken follow the chicken, if you marry a dog follow the dog.
I can manage on my own.
The king abused his power.
I don't like salad.
He went to Berlin last year.
When are you going to Europe?
I didn't lie to you.
I have a question I need to ask you.
I heard you got married.
What a shame!
I feel depressed often.
You got off easy.
It's quite large.
That is a pagoda.
Tom slit his own throat.
They flunked their exams.
Is it really possible?
She was the last guest.
Has something good happened?
Most toothpastes contain fluoride.
simp: 大多数牙膏里含有氟化物。
trad: 大多數牙膏裏含有氟化物。

eng: It is a great joy to see your own sentences translated into a multitude of other languages.
simp: 看到你自己的句子被翻译成多种语言是一件很开心的事情。
trad: 看到你自己的句子被翻譯成多種語言是一件很開心的事情。

eng: I want people to appreciate the beauty of my native language, and I want to experience how beautiful other languages can be, too.
simp: 我想要人们欣赏我的母语的优美，并且我也想要感受其他语言的美妙。
trad: 我想要人們欣賞我的母語的優美，並且我也想要感受其他語言的美妙。

eng: I invited her to the movies.
I doubt that he's a lawyer.
Why didn't you bring your hat today?
simp: 为什么你今天没有把帽子带来？
trad: 為什麼你今天沒有把帽子帶來？

eng: Could you translate this sentence?
I can cook.
We're not late.
Tom doesn't know where Mary lives.
simp: 汤姆不知道玛丽住在哪里。
trad: 湯姆不知道瑪麗住在哪裏。

eng: I asked because I thought you knew.
simp: 我以为你知道所以我就问问。
trad: 我以為你知道所以我就問問。

eng: You can never know what will happen.
simp: 你永远不知道会发生什么。
trad: 你永遠不知道會發生什麼。

eng: I don't understand Hungarian, sorry.
simp: 我不懂匈牙利语，对不起。
trad: 我不懂匈牙利語，對不起。

eng: We actually intended to go to the beach tomorrow, but it's expected to rain.
simp: 我们本来准备明天去海边的，但是预计明天有雨。
trad: 我們本來準備明天去海邊的，但是預計明天有雨。

eng: I'm Turkish.
Ah, those Russians!
The flight was cancelled.
The word ‘antonym’ is antonymous to ‘synonym’.
simp: 反义词这个单词是同义词的反义词
trad: 反義詞這個單詞是同義詞的反義詞

eng: When it comes to movies I like anything, as long as it's not horror.
simp: 什么种的电影我都喜欢，除非恐怖片
trad: 什麼種的電影我都喜歡，除非恐怖片

eng: Happy Qixi Festival!
I have nothing to say with regard to that problem.
simp: 对于这个问题我无可奉告。
trad: 對於這個問題我無可奉告。

eng: Take off your clothes!
You're not old enough to get a driver's license.
simp: 你还没到可以拿驾驶执照的年龄。
trad: 你還沒到可以拿駕駛執照的年齡。

eng: It was once very peaceful there, only now you'll sometimes here the sound of passing vehicles.
simp: 那儿曾经很宁静，只不过偶尔会有一些过往车辆的声音。
trad: 那兒曾經很寧靜，只不過偶爾會有一些過往車輛的聲音。

eng: I have to share this room with my friend at present.
simp: 眼下我不得不和我朋友同住这间房间。
trad: 眼下我不得不和我朋友同住這間房間。

eng: I prefer apples to oranges.
simp: 比起橘子，我更喜欢苹果。
trad: 比起橘子，我更喜歡蘋果。

eng: I just heard something.
simp: 我只是听到了一些消息。
trad: 我只是聽到了一些消息。

eng: Isn't that mine?
He had his socks on inside out.
simp: 他将袜子的里外穿反了。
trad: 他將襪子的裏外穿反了。

eng: The movie was so good I'd like to see it again.
simp: 这部电影实在太棒了，我还想再看一遍。
trad: 這部電影實在太棒了，我還想再看一遍。

eng: Did you see anything unusual lately?
simp: 最近你有看见什么不寻常的事吗？
trad: 最近你有看見什麼不尋常的事嗎？

eng: That river flows into the Pacific.
Good night.
Today is the fifth of March.
No one listens anymore.
No one goes there anymore.
I can't thank you enough.
I grew up in the mountains.
The plane had five hundred passengers on board.
simp: 飞机上载有五百名乘客。
trad: 飛機上載有五百名乘客。

eng: There wasn't a dry eye in the house.
simp: 房间里的人无一不泪流满面。
trad: 房間裏的人無一不淚流滿面。

eng: Mary is fairly plain, but Tom thinks she's the bee's knees.
simp: 玛丽是个平澹无奇的人，但是汤姆却认为她出类拔萃。
trad: 瑪麗是個平淡無奇的人，但是湯姆卻認為她出類拔萃。

eng: May I see you in private?
That's the badger!
I'm sorry for the late response.
I wish that we could spend more time together.
simp: 我希望我们有更多时间呆在一起。
trad: 我希望我們有更多時間呆在一起。

eng: Merry Christmas, my love!
If you can read this, it means that you can speak one language!
simp: 如果你能将它读出来，那就意味着你会说这门语言。
trad: 如果你能將它讀出來，那就意味著你會說這門語言。

eng: Please let me off at the next stop.
Tomorrow's going to be a big day.
He's a professor at the National University.
simp: 他是国立大学的一名教授。
trad: 他是國立大學的一名教授。

eng: Is Tom well?
Mom, I'm hungry.
Who's your girlfriend?
Are you saying you don't want to go to Tom's party?
simp: 你的意思是你不想去汤姆的派对？
trad: 你的意思是你不想去湯姆的派對？

eng: You don't speak English in your home.
Where can I borrow a car?
She drank straight from the bottle.
I wonder what happened to her.
simp: 我想知道在他身上发生什么事了。
trad: 我想知道在他身上發生什麼事了。

eng: My gums bleed.
Can you have a look at my gums?
simp: 你可以检查我的牙龈吗？
trad: 你可以檢查我的牙齦嗎？

eng: Do your gums bleed?
My back still hurts.
What is the matter with you?
You shouldn't have done that.
I am Tom's grandfather.
Tom goes for a walk every morning.
Let me think.
It's really dark here. I can't see anything.
simp: 这裡真的很暗，我什麽都看不到。
trad: 這裡真的很暗，我什麼都看不到。

eng: I wish I could stop thinking about Tom.
The room is cold.
I really don't need any help.
When I came home, my little sister was playing the guitar.
simp: 我回到家时，我姊姊在弹吉他。
trad: 我回到家時，我姊姊在彈吉他。

eng: That is a circus!
I like flowers.
Write everything down.
Write your goals down.
Tom wrote us postcards.
Who wrote these stories?
That song was written by Tom.
This is a well-written article.
simp: 这是篇写得很好的文章。
trad: 這是篇寫得很好的文章。

eng: Tom wrote a letter to Mary this morning.
Why worry about it?
Why worry about Tom?
Should we be worried?
Should Tom be worried?
Tom should be worried.
Tom and Mary have a daughter and a son.
They're young, but they have experience.
simp: 他们还年轻，但他们有经验。
trad: 他們還年輕，但他們有經驗。

eng: Tom and Mary have three cats and two dogs.
Tom and Mary have three sons and a daughter.
simp: Tom和Mary有三个儿子和一个女儿。
trad: Tom和Mary有三個兒子和一個女兒。

eng: We're having an office party tomorrow.
simp: 我们明天有个办公室派对。
trad: 我們明天有個辦公室派對。

eng: Tom is single and has a three-year-old daughter.
simp: Tom单身，他有个三岁的女儿。
trad: Tom單身，他有個三歲的女兒。

eng: Why have you been late to school every day this week?
simp: 为什麽你这个礼拜每天上学都迟到？
trad: 為什麼你這個禮拜每天上學都遲到？

eng: Right now, we have blueberries, blackberries, cherries, strawberries, peaches and nectarines.
simp: 现在我们有蓝莓、黑莓、樱桃、草莓、桃子和油桃。
trad: 現在我們有藍莓、黑莓、櫻桃、草莓、桃子和油桃。

eng: You're lucky to have such a good job.
simp: 你很幸运能有这麽好的工作。
trad: 你很幸運能有這麼好的工作。

eng: We've never had this problem before.
simp: 我们从前从没有过这个问题。
trad: 我們從前從沒有過這個問題。

eng: Tom shouldn't have been here today.
Tom is divorced and has a daughter.
Since when do you learn Japanese?
simp: 你从什麽时候开始学日文？
trad: 你從什麼時候開始學日文？

eng: Tom has a veterinary background.
Tom's house has three bedrooms.
Tom has no brothers or sisters.
Tom has a girlfriend in Boston.
Tom has a 13-year-old daughter.
Tom had numerous girlfriends.
Tom has a twin brother.
Tom has no siblings.
Tom had no children.
We have many goals.
We have three kids.
Monday is Tom's thirtieth birthday.
simp: 星期一是Tom的三十岁生日。
trad: 星期一是Tom的三十歲生日。

eng: Old people often talk to themselves.
Definitely!
Unbelievable!
Nonsense!
I kissed her on her forehead.
I went running past them.
simp: 我跑着从他们面前经过。
trad: 我跑著從他們面前經過。

eng: I'll wait for you in front of the school.
The scar on his forehead really stands out.
simp: 他额头上的疤痕很醒目。
trad: 他額頭上的疤痕很醒目。

eng: He cleared his throat.
I'm leaving tonight. "Don't give me that!"
I'm leaving tonight. "Don't give me that!"
With those words he brought the meeting to an end.
simp: 说完这些话，他结束了会议。
trad: 說完這些話，他結束了會議。

eng: I haven't seen her at all lately.
The others are leaving. What do you say we wait for them to go away and talk for a while?
simp: 其他人正在离开呢，要不要等他们走完了我们聊聊？
trad: 其他人正在離開呢，要不要等他們走完了我們聊聊？

eng: He came across an outstanding young person.
simp: 他遇到了一个优秀的年轻人。
trad: 他遇到了一個優秀的年輕人。

eng: Damn, it's hot!
The world is just like a book, and every step you take is like turning a page.
simp: 世界就像是一本书，走一步等于翻了一页。
trad: 世界就像是一本書，走一步等於翻了一頁。

eng: Let's just rest here for a little while, my feet are aching so much I can't walk.
simp: 我们要不在这里一下吧。我的脚好痛走不动了。
trad: 我們要不在這裏一下吧。我的腳好痛走不動了。

eng: Okay, I got it. Cut the BS.
simp: 我已经知道了呀，别在一旁瞎BB。
trad: 我已經知道了呀，別在一旁瞎BB。

eng: A timely snow promises a good harvest.
He has his own room.
I owe a lot of money.
Don't let appearances deceive you.
No matter what you do, don't laugh!
It's been a long time since we last saw each other.
Kiss me, you fool!
Thanks for your quick answer.
That was one of the best times of my life.
simp: 那是我一生中最美好的时光之一。
trad: 那是我一生中最美好的時光之一。

eng: I don't want to play anymore.
A lot of our mistakes come from a lack of patience.
simp: 许多错误源自于我们缺乏耐心。
trad: 許多錯誤源自於我們缺乏耐心。

eng: deal with a man as he deals with you.
He made Tom lose hope.
Sad!
That is a dog.
Who invented glasses?
Who invented that?
I'm used to it by now.
I'm doing my homework.
I used to eat pizza, but now I don't.
simp: 我以前吃披萨，但现在不了。
trad: 我以前吃披薩，但現在不了。

eng: It's really bad for your eyes.
Gao Dao is usually really suave, but he seems completely smitten in front of his girlfriend.
simp: 高岛平时虽然一副很帅气的样子，但是在他女友面前却是一副神魂颠倒的样子。
trad: 高島平時雖然一副很帥氣的樣子，但是在他女友面前卻是一副神魂顛倒的樣子。

eng: I'm so disappointed in him.
Pride goes before a fall.
She wants to do it on her own.
Marie doesn't remember having turned the light off.
I love egg yolks.
Such is life!
I'm getting endlessly annoyed by this foolishness.
simp: 我对这种愚蠢的行为表示非常的气愤。
trad: 我對這種愚蠢的行為表示非常的氣憤。

eng: I speak a little Polish, just enough to make myself understood.
simp: 我会一点儿波兰语，受众人群：我自己...
trad: 我會一點兒波蘭語，受眾人群：我自己...

eng: I want to write a lot of sentences.
I like the way it sounds.
What do you plan on doing with the money?
Tom wants us to hang the TV on the wall.
It's hard to steal from a thief.
simp: 想从贼身上捞点儿什么是很难的
trad: 想從賊身上撈點兒什麼是很難的

eng: We don't have any eggs left either.
She is like a beautiful dream.
The government will adopt enforcement measures to solve this problem.
simp: 政府将采取强制措施来解决这一问题。
trad: 政府將采取強制措施來解決這一問題。

eng: World population has rapidly increased.
The weather is exceptionally frigid.
Living costs have increased rapidly.
Desperate times call for desperate measures.
simp: 非常时期需要非常措施。
trad: 非常時期需要非常措施。

eng: I admit, my wording is a bit direct.
simp: 我承认，我的用词有点直接。
trad: 我承認，我的用詞有點直接。

eng: We're amazed by the rapid growth in import quantities.
simp: 进口数量的急速增长让我们感到惊讶。
trad: 進口數量的急速增長讓我們感到驚訝。

eng: Ten years after the wedding, everything is just routine.
simp: 婚姻走过十个年头一切只是例行公事。
trad: 婚姻走過十個年頭一切只是例行公事。

eng: Such questioning is routine police business.
simp: 这样讯问只是警察例行公事。
trad: 這樣訊問只是警察例行公事。

eng: Some people prefer conformity, while others seek novelty.
simp: 有些人喜欢循规蹈矩，而有些人总喜欢寻求刺激。
trad: 有些人喜歡循規蹈矩，而有些人總喜歡尋求刺激。

eng: I'm Japanese, but I don't live in Japan.
simp: 我是日本人，但不住在日本。
trad: 我是日本人，但不住在日本。

eng: Because they’re watching television.
I prefer not to talk about it.
Excuse me. Where's the metro?
What is your name?
How much is the ticket?
How can I return home?
You can take a taxi.
Is there a metro station here?
The metro station is quite far.
What stop is this?
Where is the taxi?
Let's go by taxi.
Where do you want to go?
Where did you go?
Is there anyone here?
Excuse me, where is the metro?
Do you like noodles with beef?
She felt dazed.
She felt blue.
However vast the darkness, we must supply our own light.
simp: 不论黑暗如何辽阔，我们都必须提供自身的光明。
trad: 不論黑暗如何遼闊，我們都必須提供自身的光明。

eng: Every new day could be your last.
simp: 每天都可能是你的忌日。
trad: 每天都可能是你的忌日。

eng: Sun lights the landscape, pain illuminates the soul.
simp: 阳光照亮田野，痛苦点亮心灵。
trad: 陽光照亮田野，痛苦點亮心靈。

eng: Shh! Don't make a sound. We are playing hide-and-seek now. If you want to talk, go find somewhere else to hide.
simp: Shh！不要出声……我们现在捉迷藏，要搞的话快点找一个地方躲藏一边了。
trad: Shh！不要出聲……我們現在捉迷藏，要搞的話快點找一個地方躲藏一邊了。

eng: He weighs 80 kilos.
They haven't given up at all.
I did not order this.
Will you tell me how to get to Shinjuku?
simp: 请问你可以告诉我如何可以到达新宿吗？
trad: 請問你可以告訴我如何可以到達新宿嗎？

eng: I'm getting too old for this job.
simp: 对于这份工作来说，我的年龄太老了。
trad: 對於這份工作來說，我的年齡太老了。

eng: Money can't buy everything.
simp: 金钱不能买到所有的东西。
trad: 金錢不能買到所有的東西。

eng: I had an umbrella with me but my friend did not.
simp: 我带了一把雨伞但是我朋友没有带。
trad: 我帶了一把雨傘但是我朋友沒有帶。

eng: No abduction had been reported in that town since 1965.
simp: 直到1965年这个城镇才出现绑架的报道。
trad: 直到1965年這個城鎮才出現綁架的報道。

eng: If the lion is the king of beasts, the eagle is the king of birds.
simp: 狮子是兽类之王的话，鹰就是鸟类之王。
trad: 獅子是獸類之王的話，鷹就是鳥類之王。

eng: I love that book.
Tom thinks there's hope.
If it's raining tomorrow, then we'll go there in the car.
simp: 如果明天下雨，我们就坐车去那儿。
trad: 如果明天下雨，我們就坐車去那兒。

eng: Tom should've discussed that with you.
simp: 汤姆应该跟你讨论过那事了。
trad: 湯姆應該跟你討論過那事了。

eng: Tom should've already discussed that with you.
simp: 汤姆应该已经跟你讨论过那事了。
trad: 湯姆應該已經跟你討論過那事了。

eng: Who's worried about Tom?
I'm not a native speaker.
I've already tried that.
I like freedom.
I like learning various languages.
simp: 我喜欢学习各种各样的语言。
trad: 我喜歡學習各種各樣的語言。

eng: I have a free spirit.
I love music.
I really like Hebrew.
I live in Beijing now.
The smoggy air of Beijing makes me feel gloomy.
simp: 北京的雾霾天气让我心情不太好。
trad: 北京的霧霾天氣讓我心情不太好。

eng: If people have friendly relationships, I hope the world will be a better place.
simp: 我希望人们友好相处，世界更加美好。
trad: 我希望人們友好相處，世界更加美好。

eng: I couldn't get the point of his speech.
simp: 我不能抓到他演讲的重点。
trad: 我不能抓到他演講的重點。

eng: I want a new shirt. What do you want?
simp: 我要一件新衬衫。你想要什么？
trad: 我要一件新襯衫。你想要什麼？

eng: The date of manufacture is shown on the lid.
Tom is so hot.
I thought you'd be full after eating that big steak.
simp: 我觉得吃完那块大牛排你就饱了。
trad: 我覺得吃完那塊大牛排你就飽了。

eng: I had hoped that my mother would live until I got married.
simp: 我曾经希望我妈妈能活到我结婚的时候。
trad: 我曾經希望我媽媽能活到我結婚的時候。

eng: He threw a piece of meat to a dog.
The two of us don't belong here.
I used to play tennis.
I'm going to the bank.
Better run away immediately!
I'm glad you were right.
I want to make a pie.
Oh my goodness!
Customs include food, celebrations and dancing.
simp: 风俗习惯包括食物，庆祝和舞蹈。
trad: 風俗習慣包括食物，慶祝和舞蹈。

eng: I'm feeling the breath of life.
There is no time for explanation.
Today is a cloudy day.
I like to take a walk after meals.
I don't feel very good when I haven't eaten breakfast.
simp: 没吃早饭，我有些不舒服。
trad: 沒吃早飯，我有些不舒服。

eng: Beijing has started to get colder.
I should put on more clothes.
I like to talk about tasty food with my friends.
simp: 我喜欢和朋友一起讨论好吃的。
trad: 我喜歡和朋友一起討論好吃的。

eng: My friends are all really nice.
I think that all the world's languages are very interesting.
simp: 我觉得世界上的语言都很有意思。
trad: 我覺得世界上的語言都很有意思。

eng: I will continue to study Latin, because it is really interesting.
simp: 我要坚持学习拉丁语，因为它非常有趣。
trad: 我要堅持學習拉丁語，因為它非常有趣。

eng: Is that even a word?
He's got pneumonia no wonder he is coughing nonstop.
simp: 他得了肺炎，难怪他在不停的咳嗽。
trad: 他得了肺炎，難怪他在不停的咳嗽。

eng: She got hepatitis no wonder she is losing so much weight.
simp: 她得了肝炎，难怪越来越瘦了。
trad: 她得了肝炎，難怪越來越瘦了。

eng: I would like to but I have a required course tonight.
simp: 我不是不想听，但是今晚我有必修课。
trad: 我不是不想聽，但是今晚我有必修課。

eng: Have you ever been to Paris?
I don't need anything.
He dressed up as a woman.
More coffee, please.
I shot the horse because it had trouble breathing.
simp: 我枪杀了那匹马，因为他已呼吸困难。
trad: 我槍殺了那匹馬，因為他已呼吸困難。

eng: Tom has lived in Boston for over a year.
simp: 汤姆住在波士顿已经一年多了。
trad: 湯姆住在波士頓已經一年多了。

eng: I'm gonna call the police!
The girl's father is a doctor.
simp: 那个女孩的爸爸是医生。
trad: 那個女孩的爸爸是醫生。

eng: George, if you are not listening to the radio then turn it off.
simp: 乔治，如果你不听广播，就把它关掉。
trad: 喬治，如果你不聽廣播，就把它關掉。

eng: She likes seafood.
Why do you like smearing China so much?
simp: 为什么你这么喜欢黑中国？
trad: 為什麼你這麼喜歡黑中國？

eng: You're hurt.
It wasn't my fault.
I know you're going to say no.
Tom was very scared.
Tom was very scared.
I've never known anyone as hypocritical as you.
simp: 我从来没有见过谁像你这么虚伪的。
trad: 我從來沒有見過誰像你這麼虛偽的。

eng: If I understood you right you want to break up with me!
simp: 如果我没会错意的话，你是想和我分手。
trad: 如果我沒會錯意的話，你是想和我分手。

eng: Come and dance with me.
What do you think I should wear on my date tomorrow?
simp: 你觉得我明天约会穿什么好呢？
trad: 你覺得我明天約會穿什麼好呢？

eng: You're irresistible.
A cat came out from under the desk.
There's no reason to be afraid.
This is not a sentence.
I'm going to make you a drink.
Is it safe to skate on this lake?
simp: 在这个湖上滑冰安全吗？
trad: 在這個湖上滑冰安全嗎？

eng: I have been under a lot of pressure lately.
I've had a lot of work to do lately.
simp: 我最近有很多事情要做。
trad: 我最近有很多事情要做。

eng: I have my feet firmly planted on the ground.
I saw Roy and he asked me to pass this along to you.
simp: 我见了罗伊，他叫我把这个转交给你。
trad: 我見了羅伊，他叫我把這個轉交給你。

eng: He's afraid of that dog.
I want to live in Tampa.
Yesterday my big brother went to Fukushima to help the locals. I'm very afraid of the rise in radiation levels.
simp: 昨天哥哥去福岛给当地居民帮忙了。我对放射量的增加很害怕。
trad: 昨天哥哥去福島給當地居民幫忙了。我對放射量的增加很害怕。

eng: The five yuan coins are brass, and the ten yuan coins are made out of bronze.
simp: 5元硬币是黄铜，10元硬币是青铜做的。
trad: 5元硬幣是黃銅，10元硬幣是青銅做的。

eng: I love this man.
I don't like drinking.
I don't like homework.
I don't like studying.
I don't like sushi.
I don't like eggs.
I don't like eggs.
I don't like anything.
I don't like you.
I don't like tea.
I don't like wine.
I don't like winter.
I don't like kids.
They're typical youngsters.
This picture frame can make the picture rise in value.
You all were very good before, and now you're even better.
simp: 你们从前很好，现在更好了。
trad: 你們從前很好，現在更好了。

eng: The city was full of starving soldiers.
simp: 城市裡充满了飢饿的士兵。
trad: 城市裡充滿了飢餓的士兵。

eng: You can't read too many books.
One can't earn too much money.
Drinking more water won't do you any harm.
You may take this.
Nobody knows why she doesn't like me.
simp: 没有人知道为什么她不喜欢我。
trad: 沒有人知道為什麼她不喜歡我。

eng: Tom found a job in Boston.
simp: 汤姆在波士顿找了份工作。
trad: 湯姆在波士頓找了份工作。

eng: The air is very good in Beijing today.
What Tom really wanted was enough money to buy Mary some flowers.
simp: 汤姆真正想要的是有足够的钱给玛丽买一些花。
trad: 湯姆真正想要的是有足夠的錢給瑪麗買一些花。

eng: If you want to, call me this afternoon.
simp: 如果你想的话，今天下午给我打电话。
trad: 如果你想的話，今天下午給我打電話。

eng: She's going to return to her country.
She has her eyes closed.
Let's not mistake precision for accuracy.
simp: 不要把精确和准确搞错。
trad: 不要把精確和準確搞錯。

eng: Ah Mei is an adorable girl.
We've seen all-round improvements lately.
simp: 近来各方面都有所改进。
trad: 近來各方面都有所改進。

eng: Reformers aim to improve the government.
simp: 改革者的目标是要改进政府。
trad: 改革者的目標是要改進政府。

eng: We are planning changes to the manufacturing process.
simp: 我们算计着改革生产流程。
trad: 我們算計著改革生產流程。

eng: He's proposing a suggestion for altering the research method.
simp: 他提出改革研究方法的意见。
trad: 他提出改革研究方法的意見。

eng: How far is it to this university?
Should I go this way, or that way?
simp: 我该走这条路，还是那条路？
trad: 我該走這條路，還是那條路？

eng: I can't see anything without my glasses.
simp: 我没带眼镜就什么都看不到。
trad: 我沒帶眼鏡就什麼都看不到。

eng: This company and I have signed a three-year contract.
simp: 我跟公司签了一份三年的合同。
trad: 我跟公司簽了一份三年的合同。

eng: She used the apples to make the jam.
Let them decide.
Do you have a red pencil?
Someone told me about that.
The accident took place at that corner.
He looked around, but he saw no one.
simp: 他看向四周，但没看到任何人。
trad: 他看向四周，但沒看到任何人。

eng: The orphans were taken to the orphanage.
simp: 孤儿们被带到这间育幼院。
trad: 孤兒們被帶到這間育幼院。

eng: We bought a comfortable new armchair.
simp: 我们买了张舒适的扶手椅。
trad: 我們買了張舒適的扶手椅。

eng: Linda is the most beautiful woman in the whole world.
I wasn't quite sure what to say.
So he didn't go to school.
I lent Tom a book about Germany.
simp: 我借给Tom一本关于德国的书。
trad: 我借給Tom一本關於德國的書。

eng: I can't stand to live alone.
I have to explain this to Tom.
I won't talk to you until you've realized your mistake.
simp: 在你意识到你的错误前，我都不会和你说话。
trad: 在你意識到你的錯誤前，我都不會和你說話。

eng: When you hurt others, you also hurt yourself.
simp: 你若是伤害别人，你也会伤害到自己。
trad: 你若是傷害別人，你也會傷害到自己。

eng: Treat him well.
Trick or treat.
You were treated unfairly.
The association counts thirty members.
simp: 这个协会有三十个会员。
trad: 這個協會有三十個會員。

eng: Dan lied to his associates.
He's just a business associate.
I applied for membership in the association.
Where is the city hall?
I left Japan ten years ago.
You really are an idiot.
I don't want to swim.
Do you want to know?
Let me know.
They don't have to know.
We want to know.
Please let us know.
What do you want to know?
We are going to the lake to have lunch.
He can overcome any obstacle.
Could you please transfer me to Mr. Smith?
I don't believe that.
My income has decreased ten percent.
simp: 我的收入减少了百分之十。
trad: 我的收入減少了百分之十。

eng: There is clearly a problem.
Don't you think the name "The Sacred War" sounds a bit sarcastic?
simp: 你不觉得这个名字很讽刺吗，「神圣的战争」？
trad: 你不覺得這個名字很諷刺嗎，「神聖的戰爭」？

eng: Our work is almost done.
We like to play soccer.
Whose tea is this?
Tom said I was the only one who believed him.
It's cloudy today.
I'm pretty busy right now.
Hurry up!
We need more.
Tell us more.
He wants more.
They want more.
Let's make some more.
Do you want more?
Slow down.
I will call back a bit later.
Give me some more milk!
We need some more coffee.
I will be back late.
Try to be a bit more modest.
Speak louder!
What else did he say?
I'm going to study harder.
Have some more.
She wants more
She is taller than me.
Which one is easier?
I need to take notes.
Why are you trying to hide your feelings?
simp: 为什么你要试图隐藏自己的情感？
trad: 為什麼你要試圖隱藏自己的情感？

eng: Mary hung her clothes on the clothesline.
simp: 玛丽把她的衣服挂在晾衣绳上。
trad: 瑪麗把她的衣服掛在晾衣繩上。

eng: Could we go somewhere else?
Could we go somewhere and talk?
simp: 我们能去别的地方谈谈吗？
trad: 我們能去別的地方談談嗎？

eng: You're going to wreck your eyesight if you play games all the time.
simp: 要是你老打游戏的话，你的视力会下降的。
trad: 要是你老打遊戲的話，你的視力會下降的。

eng: Tom worked hard to get the work done on time.
simp: 汤姆努力工作按时完成工作。
trad: 湯姆努力工作按時完成工作。

eng: Tom worked very hard and earned a lot of money.
simp: 汤姆努力工作挣了好多钱。
trad: 湯姆努力工作掙了好多錢。

eng: Tom would still be alive if he had been wearing his seat belt.
simp: 要是汤姆系上安全带的话，他就不会死的。
trad: 要是湯姆系上安全帶的話，他就不會死的。

eng: I feel that I am a burden to everyone, that no one will ever love me.
simp: 感觉自己对别人而言就是个累赘，不会有人爱上我的。
trad: 感覺自己對別人而言就是個累贅，不會有人愛上我的。

eng: I confess that I'm tired.
I don't like to socialize.
I know I'm a burden; you don't have to repeat it.
simp: 我知道自己是个累赘，你没必要反复提。
trad: 我知道自己是個累贅，你沒必要反復提。

eng: What vegetables do you want to buy?
Try some.
This is an old device.
This is an old unit.
I had nothing in common with them.
simp: 我同他们没有过共同之处。
trad: 我同他們沒有過共同之處。

eng: I think Tom's cheating.
Tom did better this time than he did last time.
simp: 汤姆这次做得比上次好。
trad: 湯姆這次做得比上次好。

eng: Tom comes here three or four times a month.
simp: 汤姆一个月来这里三四次。
trad: 湯姆一個月來這裏三四次。

eng: Tom carried the chairs to the next room.
simp: 汤姆把椅子拿到了下个房间。
trad: 湯姆把椅子拿到了下個房間。

eng: Tom can't come to work today because he doesn't feel well.
simp: 汤姆今天不舒服所以没来上班。
trad: 湯姆今天不舒服所以沒來上班。

eng: Tom can swim faster than anyone else I know.
simp: 汤姆是我认识的人当中游泳最快的。
trad: 湯姆是我認識的人當中遊泳最快的。

eng: Tom wouldn't dare show his face around here again.
simp: 汤姆不敢再到这里露面。
trad: 湯姆不敢再到這裏露面。

eng: Tom wouldn't let anyone else in the room.
simp: 汤姆不让任何人进房间。
trad: 湯姆不讓任何人進房間。

eng: Tom wrote Mary a long letter, but he didn't send it to her.
simp: 汤姆给玛丽写了封长信，可是没有寄给她。
trad: 湯姆給瑪麗寫了封長信，可是沒有寄給她。

eng: Tom wrung out the towel and hung it up to dry.
simp: 汤姆拧干毛巾挂起来晾干。
trad: 湯姆擰幹毛巾掛起來晾幹。

eng: What Tom said doesn't apply in this situation.

I feel that I'm a burden to everyone, that no one will ever love me, that I'm better off dead, because that way I wouldn't hurt anyone. However, on the other hand, I want to keep living and show everyone that I'm strong.
simp: 觉得自己对别人而言就是个负担，没有人会爱上我，最好死了算了，因为那样我就不会伤害任何人了，可是话说回来，我想活下去，证明给别人看我很坚强。
trad: 覺得自己對別人而言就是個負擔，沒有人會愛上我，最好死了算了，因為那樣我就不會傷害任何人了，可是話說回來，我想活下去，證明給別人看我很堅強。

eng: Tom was there physically, but not mentally.
Since no one was interested to listen to me, I just kept quiet.
simp: 因为没人有兴趣听，所以我闭上嘴。
trad: 因為沒人有興趣聽，所以我閉上嘴。

eng: If you're not listening to the radio, turn it off.
simp: 要是你不在听广播的话，就关掉它。
trad: 要是你不在聽廣播的話，就關掉它。

eng: In this kind of weather, it's best to stay home and not go outside.
simp: 这种天气下最好待在家里不要外出。
trad: 這種天氣下最好待在家裏不要外出。

eng: Will I be the only one going to the party?
simp: 会不会只有我一个人去聚会？
trad: 會不會只有我一個人去聚會？

eng: He is the man we were talking about.
simp: 他就是我谈论过得那个人。
trad: 他就是我談論過得那個人。

eng: Tom came over to my house for dinner yesterday.
simp: 汤姆昨天来我家吃晚饭。
trad: 湯姆昨天來我家吃晚飯。

eng: Tom came a little earlier today than he usually does.
simp: 汤姆今天来得比往常要早一些。
trad: 湯姆今天來得比往常要早一些。

eng: Tom bought a pair of black leather shoes.
simp: 汤姆买了一双黑色皮鞋。
trad: 湯姆買了一雙黑色皮鞋。

eng: Are you planning to be at Tom and Mary's wedding?
simp: 你打算参加汤姆和玛丽的婚礼吗？
trad: 你打算參加湯姆和瑪麗的婚禮嗎？

eng: He is determined to succeed at any price.
simp: 他执意不惜一切代价获得成功。
trad: 他執意不惜一切代價獲得成功。

eng: A rainbow has seven colors.
And what if I say "no"?
Tom is writing a letter to his best friend.
simp: 汤姆正给他的好友写信。
trad: 湯姆正給他的好友寫信。

eng: Even crooked tree gives shade.
Find someone who respects you.
Reluctantly, he started the engine and drove off.
simp: 他不情愿地启动引擎开车走了。
trad: 他不情願地啟動引擎開車走了。

eng: My questions were met with a frosty silence.
simp: 我的问题遭到了冷寂的沉默。
trad: 我的問題遭到了冷寂的沈默。

eng: She practised as a barrister for many years.
Do you still practise your religion?
He was banned from practising medicine.
They seldom watch television these days.
simp: 这些天他们很少看电视。
trad: 這些天他們很少看電視。

eng: Tom was unsatisfied with the results.
Tom wasn't as handsome as Mary said he was.
simp: 汤姆并不是玛丽说得那样英俊。
trad: 湯姆並不是瑪麗說得那樣英俊。

eng: Tom whispered something to Mary and she smiled.
simp: 汤姆小声对玛丽说了什么，玛丽笑了。
trad: 湯姆小聲對瑪麗說了什麼，瑪麗笑了。

eng: Tom couldn't go to college because his family didn't have enough money.
simp: 因为家里钱不够所以汤姆没能念大学。
trad: 因為家裏錢不夠所以湯姆沒能念大學。

eng: You've done what you needed to do.
I won't need any help.
Every time he comes here, he orders the same dish.
simp: 每次他来这里点一样的菜。
trad: 每次他來這裏點一樣的菜。

eng: He never found out the truth.
We know him to be a brave man.
simp: 我们知道他是个勇敢的人。
trad: 我們知道他是個勇敢的人。

eng: I don't remember my grandmother's face accurately.
I reckon he will be back soon.
I want you to bring Tom a letter.
simp: 我想让你给汤姆带个信。
trad: 我想讓你給湯姆帶個信。

eng: Don't be so disgusting.
I am not a good swimmer.
Is that an area you are familiar with?
Even a child could do it.
Which book are you reading?
Mary is the prettiest girl in class.
simp: 玛丽是班里面长得最漂亮的女孩。
trad: 瑪麗是班裏面長得最漂亮的女孩。

eng: We are staying at home because it's raining.
simp: 因为下雨了，所以我们就待在家里面。
trad: 因為下雨了，所以我們就待在家裏面。

eng: My father walks.
Can I sit here?
That girl is arrogant because of her beauty.
simp: 那个女孩因为长得漂亮所以很自大。
trad: 那個女孩因為長得漂亮所以很自大。

eng: Love if you want to be loved!
He disappeared without a trace.
simp: 他消失了，不留一丝踪迹。
trad: 他消失了，不留一絲蹤跡。

eng: I wonder what else Tom wants.
simp: 我想知道汤姆还要别的什么。
trad: 我想知道湯姆還要別的什麼。

eng: I lost my key about here.
simp: 我的钥匙就是在这附近丢失的。
trad: 我的鑰匙就是在這附近丟失的。

eng: He is an independent thinker.
I warmed myself in the bath.
simp: 我泡了个澡身体暖和起来了。
trad: 我泡了個澡身體暖和起來了。

eng: It was truly depressing.
You aren't Japanese.
His salary is high.
The cake is delicious.
Hug Tom.
I asked Tom what he was reading.
I'm prepared to accept the consequences.
God created all men equal but men think it differently.
simp: 神平等造人而人心各异。
trad: 神平等造人而人心各異。

eng: I live in Qatar.
Tom can't remember anything.
I love my wife.
John is a good friend.
Tom kissed Mary on the cheek.
I take a walk every day except when it rains.
simp: 除了雨天我每天都散步。
trad: 除了雨天我每天都散步。

eng: I swear, I saw an alien!
simp: 我发誓我看到了外星人。
trad: 我發誓我看到了外星人。

eng: He was framed by his wife.

Our Father who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name. Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done, on earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread, and forgive us our trespasses, as we forgive those who trespass against us, and lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
simp: 我们在天上的父，愿人都尊你的命为圣。愿你的国降临。愿你的旨意行在地上如同行在天上。我们日用的饮食，今日赐给我们，免我们的债，如同我们免了人的债，不叫我们遇见试探，救我们脱离凶恶。
trad: 我們在天上的父，願人都尊你的命為聖。願你的國降臨。願你的旨意行在地上如同行在天上。我們日用的飲食，今日賜給我們，免我們的債，如同我們免了人的債，不叫我們遇見試探，救我們脫離兇惡。

eng: Be careful with it.
Many people envy Tom's success.
simp: 许多人嫉妒汤姆的成功。
trad: 許多人嫉妒湯姆的成功。

eng: He's my new friend.
Tom complained that Mary never helped him.
simp: 汤姆埋怨玛丽从来不帮他。
trad: 湯姆埋怨瑪麗從來不幫他。

eng: Please say hello to your family.
I thank you from the bottom of my heart.
What would you like to do in the future?
Phrases are syntactical units.
That goes without saying.
I didn't mean to keep it secret.
Let me read the paper when you have finished with it.
Your sneakers are dirty; take them off before you come in.
simp: 你的运动鞋太脏了，进来前脱掉。
trad: 你的運動鞋太臟了，進來前脫掉。

eng: You had better take an umbrella with you in case it rains.
simp: 以防下雨你最好带把伞。
trad: 以防下雨你最好帶把傘。

eng: I'm really busy.
Drink and eat.
He's sitting at an empty table.
If I had taken that plane, I would be dead now.
simp: 要是我坐了那架飞机的话，我现在早就死了。
trad: 要是我坐了那架飛機的話，我現在早就死了。

eng: I still have another sister.
Tom complains all the time.
He couldn't stand the bitterness of the coffee.
I can't believe you are eating something the doctor has told you repeatedly you shouldn't eat.
simp: 真的不敢相信你在吃医生叮嘱不要食用的东西。
trad: 真的不敢相信你在吃醫生叮囑不要食用的東西。

eng: Is Tom in a lot of trouble?
simp: 汤姆是不是麻烦事很多？
trad: 湯姆是不是麻煩事很多？

eng: Tom has lost his interest in studying French.
simp: 汤姆已经对学法语不感兴趣了。
trad: 湯姆已經對學法語不感興趣了。

eng: I never regretted having helped him.
We love our mother almost without knowing it, without feeling it, as it is as natural as to live.
simp: 我们爱自己的母亲，几乎不无从知晓，无从感受，就像是活着的本能。
trad: 我們愛自己的母親，幾乎不無從知曉，無從感受，就像是活著的本能。

eng: Let's go ahead and eat.
I smell smoke in the elevator.
simp: 我在电梯里面闻到烟味。
trad: 我在電梯裏面聞到煙味。

eng: He's an idiot sometimes.
She will forever live on in our memories.
simp: 她会永远活在我们的记忆里面。
trad: 她會永遠活在我們的記憶裏面。

eng: I will never forget the day when I first met him.
simp: 我永远不会忘记那天我第一次与他见面。
trad: 我永遠不會忘記那天我第一次與他見面。

eng: He was late as usual.
Tom was there this morning.
To keep early hours makes you healthy.
We will continue the meeting after some light refreshments.
simp: 茶点过后我们接着开会。
trad: 茶點過後我們接著開會。

eng: The explorers discovered a skeleton in the cave.
simp: 探险家们在洞穴里发现了骸骨。
trad: 探險家們在洞穴裏發現了骸骨。

eng: You are much too modest.
I promise that I'll come.
I wish I could go with you.
She is busy with the care of her children.
Tom can keep a secret.
We're doing the best we can.
Tell me how to play the game.
After that his life got even tougher.
simp: 自那以后他便过起了艰难的生活。
trad: 自那以後他便過起了艱難的生活。

eng: It's the police, perhaps we should get out of their way.
simp: 是警察，也许我们应该让道。
trad: 是警察，也許我們應該讓道。

eng: Everyone hates know-it-alls.
simp: 人人讨厌自作聪明的人。
trad: 人人討厭自作聰明的人。

eng: He became an orphan when he was ten.
I felt a drop of rain on my head.
simp: 我感觉有滴雨落在头上。
trad: 我感覺有滴雨落在頭上。

eng: If you had a time machine, where would you go?
simp: 要是你有架时光机，你想去哪儿？
trad: 要是你有架時光機，你想去哪兒？

eng: Can you speak French well?
Why are we wasting time with this?
simp: 为什么我们在这上面浪费时间？
trad: 為什麼我們在這上面浪費時間？

eng: I had nothing to hide.
She had my mother take care of the baby.
Tom enjoyed himself at the party.
simp: 汤姆在晚会玩的很开心。
trad: 湯姆在晚會玩的很開心。

eng: I cannot follow your logic.
They add pictures to their album.
simp: 他们在相册里面加了些图片。
trad: 他們在相冊裏面加了些圖片。

eng: She isn't pregnant.
This is mine.
I was bitten by a mosquito.
Love is selfish.
You aren't invited.
She stabbed him in the back.
simp: 她在他的背上戳了一下。
trad: 她在他的背上戳了一下。

eng: They fell into the conversation immediately.
You're very resourceful.
Happiness is not to be loved, but to love.
simp: 被爱不一定是幸福，去爱才真的幸福。
trad: 被愛不一定是幸福，去愛才真的幸福。

eng: At what age will I be able to withstand what now hurts me so easily, makes me disheartened and anxious?
simp: 到了多少岁之后 ，我才能变得不会轻易地被某些东西伤害， 沮丧 ，旁徨失措呢。
trad: 到了多少歲之後 ，我才能變得不會輕易地被某些東西傷害， 沮喪 ，旁徨失措呢。

eng: This is my camera.
My father is a good person.
What are you writing?
It's too expensive!
We drank a little.
It's about to rain.
But it's too expensive!
We know she lives in the city.
My parents are from China.
simp: 我的父母是从中国来的。
trad: 我的父母是從中國來的。

eng: Don't listen to her.
He has long hair.
How do you say "lung"?
This is true love.
No, I don't understand.
The students are all learning English.
Don't touch me.
I'm interested in oriental pottery.
How do you know?
Scott traded a watch for a book, and then traded the book for money.
simp: 斯科特先用一块手表换了一本书，再把书换成了钱。
trad: 斯科特先用一塊手表換了一本書，再把書換成了錢。

eng: Their mother calls them.
simp: 他们的妈妈给他们打电话。
trad: 他們的媽媽給他們打電話。

eng: I must write books.
This is a big dog.
You must eat fruits.
Julia sings.
Her mother calls her.
Today we have a lot of food.
The number 4 is considered an unlucky number in Japan.
simp: 四在日本是一个不幸的数字。
trad: 四在日本是一個不幸的數字。

eng: He has red flowers.
I don't have a guitar.
Where is the tree?
I just got bitten by a mosquito.
I didn't mean to spook you.
Tom and Mary could learn a lot from each other.
simp: 汤姆和玛丽可以互相学习很多。
trad: 湯姆和瑪麗可以互相學習很多。

eng: What the devil are you doing?
Tom doesn't need to know where I'm going.
simp: 汤姆不必知道我要去哪。
trad: 湯姆不必知道我要去哪。

eng: This wine tastes good.
When you're done sweeping, I'll mop.
What sort of yogurt do you like best?
Everyone is waiting in the other room.
simp: 大家都在另外的房里等着。
trad: 大家都在另外的房裏等著。

eng: I have a ball-point pen, but I want another.
simp: 我有一支圆珠笔，可是我还想再要一支。
trad: 我有一支圓珠筆，可是我還想再要一支。

eng: Tom fell into the ice-cold water of the river.
simp: 汤姆掉进了冰冷的河水里。
trad: 湯姆掉進了冰冷的河水裏。

eng: I don't know where I'd begin.
simp: 我不知道在哪里开始好。
trad: 我不知道在哪裏開始好。

eng: Who would want to kill me?
Is it true that Tom can't read or write?
simp: 汤姆真的不能读或写字吗？
trad: 湯姆真的不能讀或寫字嗎？

eng: The boy reading a book is John.
simp: 读书的那个男孩子是约翰。
trad: 讀書的那個男孩子是約翰。

eng: We can't see them.
Are we afraid of dying?
This dog jumped.
Lions, wolves, elephants, and horses are all animals.
simp: 狮子，狼，大象，马，这些都是动物。
trad: 獅子，狼，大象，馬，這些都是動物。

eng: Give me the sword.
We've found her.
Eat it.
Eat it.
She has a dog and six cats.
Where did you see her?
Is there central heating in this building?
simp: 这栋楼里面有中央暖气系统吗？
trad: 這棟樓裏面有中央暖氣系統嗎？

eng: My first day in the university was rather boring.
simp: 我大学里的第一天相当没意思。
trad: 我大學裏的第一天相當沒意思。

eng: I'm not a child, but sometimes you talk to me as if I were a child.
simp: 我不是小孩子，但有时你跟我说话就好像我是小孩子一样。
trad: 我不是小孩子，但有時你跟我說話就好像我是小孩子一樣。

eng: When will that new school open?
simp: 那是新学校什么时候开学？
trad: 那是新學校什麼時候開學？

eng: She resembles her aunt.
A fork fell off the table.
Is Natasha a common name in Russia?
simp: 娜塔莎在俄罗斯是一个常见的名字吗？
trad: 娜塔莎在俄羅斯是一個常見的名字嗎？

eng: What's the matter? "I can't find my keys." "Which ones?" "My bicycle ones."
simp: “怎么了？” “我找不到我的钥匙了。” “什么钥匙？” “我的自行车钥匙。”
trad: “怎麼了？” “我找不到我的鑰匙了。” “什麼鑰匙？” “我的自行車鑰匙。”

eng: Sorry, I zoned out.
I'm not feeling that hungry yet.
Just name a time and I'll be there.
Tom is the head of the company in name only. His son makes all the important decisions.
simp: 汤姆名义上市公司的领导。他儿子做所有重大决策。
trad: 湯姆名義上市公司的領導。他兒子做所有重大決策。

eng: Tom is a Christian in name only. He never goes to church.
simp: 汤姆名义上是基督徒。他从来不去做礼拜。
trad: 湯姆名義上是基督徒。他從來不去做禮拜。

eng: Tom told me that he had lost his textbook.

eng: Tom told me that he won't come to school tomorrow.

eng: Tom told me that he'd like to become a doctor.

eng: Tom told me that his father had passed away.

eng: Tom told us this morning that he and Mary were moving to Boston.

eng: Tom took out his key and opened the door.

trad: 湯姆本該往左轉卻往右轉了。

eng: Tom wanted Mary's phone number, but she refused to give it to him.
simp: 汤姆想要玛丽的电话号码但是被拒绝了。

eng: I'm a determined, organized, and responsible person.
simp: 我是个有决心、有条理、有责任的人。

His salary is high.

simp: 就算我富有，我也不会给他钱。
trad: 就算我富有，我也不會給他錢。

I can drive a car.

trad: 倫敦是個大城市，遊客必須乘公交或地鐵才能出行。

eng: It started raining.
Tom has to protect himself.

trad: 你是我見過的最漂亮的女孩。

eng: She is different from how she looks.
simp: 她不是她看起来的那样。

trad: 當我離開購物中心，車子不在我停的地方。

simp: 我们用了一整天打扑克。

eng: Is Tom an illiteracy?

trad: 我才不管別人怎麼想我。

eng: You guys looked mad.

simp: 她的英语比法语说得好。
trad: 她的英語比法語說得好。

eng: Tom likes me the most.

eng: Tom was too scared to say anything.
He is too young to undertake this work.
simp: 他太年轻，无法胜任这项工作。

simp: 我喜欢游泳，但我不想在这里游。
trad: 我喜歡遊泳，但我不想在這裏遊。

eng: This is a nice place, but i don't want to live here.
simp: 这是个好地方，但我不想住在这儿。
trad: 這是個好地方，但我不想住在這兒。

eng: There are so many example sentences using "Tom" and "Mike". It's very strange.

eng: I don't know how to say this in Japanses

simp: 理所当然，修理费用比15元还要多更多，但是我非常感激他们找到了解决的办法。
trad: 理所當然，修理費用比15元還要多更多，但是我非常感激他們找到了解決的辦法。

eng: Tom was stealing money for the last two years, and Mary knew it all the time.

trad: 過去兩年以來湯姆都在偷錢，而且這段時間裡瑪莉都知道。

eng: Tom didn't like the idea.

trad: 湯姆沒有告訴我她的名字。

eng: Whose car is this?
Whose car is this?

simp: 一位妇女带了一张旧照片给摄影师，照片上是她过世的丈夫，她的丈夫戴着一顶帽子。
trad: 一位婦女帶了一張舊照片給攝影師，照片上是她過世的丈夫，她的丈夫戴著一頂帽子。

eng: A woman brought an old picture of her dead husband, wearing a hat, to the photographer.
simp: 一个女人带了一张她去世的丈夫的旧照片给摄影师，照片中她的丈夫戴着一顶帽子。
trad: 一個女人帶了一張她去世的丈夫的舊照片給攝影師，照片中她的丈夫戴著一頂帽子。

eng: The police followed him to Paris.

trad: 你可以告訴我如何到火車站嗎?

I need an assistant who speaks French.

trad: 我需要一個會說法語的助理。

eng: The feeling of the first time is like sunny.

trad: 這是初次的感覺，好像天空般晴朗。

eng: Nothing can resist me to yearn for freedom.
simp: 没有什么可以阻挡，我对自由的向往。
trad: 沒有什麼可以阻擋，我對自由的向往。

eng: Is this way of talk will more typical?
simp: 这样说是不是更加地道呢？
trad: 這樣說是不是更加地道呢？

eng: What a pity that the number of foolish people is more than clear people.
simp: 可惜，世界上的愚人总比聪明人要多。
trad: 可惜，世界上的愚人總比聰明人要多。

simp: 听说大数据技术现在很热门。

eng: The difference between a standalone sentence and a sentence in the middle of an essay is that the latter has context.

trad: 獨立的句子和文章中的句子的區別在於後者具備上下文。

eng: Goodbye, Ian.
What a huge setback will make a people suicide.
simp: 一个人得遇到多大的挫折才会自杀？
trad: 一個人得遇到多大的挫折才會自殺？

eng: A people have good ability in network is an ordinary people in modern society.
simp: 一个在网络世界叱吒风云的人物，在现实社会中也只是平凡人而已。
trad: 一個在網絡世界叱咤風雲的人物，在現實社會中也只是平凡人而已。

eng: If earth will go into the Glacial period,what will you prepare.
simp: 如果地球下个月将进入冰河期，你将如何准备？
trad: 如果地球下個月將進入冰河期，你將如何準備？

eng: PHP is the best language in the world.
simp: PHP 是世界上最好的语言。
trad: PHP 是世界上最好的語言。

eng: After authenticating,this people's ideology is not healthy.

simp: 这家报社在当地知名度颇高。
trad: 這家報社在當地知名度頗高。

eng: The privacy of people is a joke.
simp: 个人隐私就是一个笑话。
trad: 個人隱私就是一個笑話。

eng: Are you afraid of insects?
I'm a swot.
There are two things you must remember them is you can't make women frightened,and don't waste good wine.
simp: 佳人不可唐突，好酒不可糟蹋，这两件事你以后一定要牢记在心。
trad: 佳人不可唐突，好酒不可糟蹋，這兩件事你以後一定要牢記在心。

eng: Even if an intelligent man loves a woman deeply, he will never show his love to her, but merely keep it in his heart.
simp: 聪明的男人就算爱极了一个女人，也只是藏在心里，绝不会将他的爱在她面前表现出来。
trad: 聰明的男人就算愛極了一個女人，也只是藏在心裏，絕不會將他的愛在她面前表現出來。

eng: I hated him.
This message will self-destruct in five seconds.
simp: 这则讯息将在五秒后自动销毁。
trad: 這則訊息將在五秒後自動銷毀。

eng: The service here is awful.
Did you ever get married?

simp: 这场灾难的唯一幸存者是一个婴儿。
trad: 這場災難的唯一幸存者是一個嬰兒。

eng: I'm two years younger than Tom.
I don't know his last name.
You'd better keep your money for a rainy day.
Is Tom living in Boston?
Tom is now living in Boston.

Call her at 3.
Twice I have tried to kill myself.
simp: 我曾两次试图自杀未遂。
trad: 我曾兩次試圖自殺未遂。

eng: Bob also can drive.
I heard nothing about that.
Are you saying that you give up?
Who's going to believe that?
What is your native language?
Please don't tell your parents this.

simp: 那是我第一次见到汤姆如此生气。
trad: 那是我第一次見到湯姆如此生氣。

eng: I've just spoken to your French teacher and he says you're doing well in his class.
simp: 我刚跟你的法语老师谈过话，他说你在课堂上表现得很好。
trad: 我剛跟你的法語老師談過話，他說你在課堂上表現得很好。

eng: I've just returned from the post office.
They gave away the ending.

My mother speaks French better than my father speaks English, so they usually speak to each other in French.
simp: 我母亲的法语比我父亲的英语要好，所以他们通常用法语交流。
trad: 我母親的法語比我父親的英語要好，所以他們通常用法語交流。

simp: 我父母通常用法语对话，即使我母亲的母语是英语。
trad: 我父母通常用法語對話，即使我母親的母語是英語。

eng: Do you weigh more than Tom?

eng: Is there anything in the box?
Is there anything in the box?

trad: 不要放任何東西在箱子上面。

eng: Don't put anything on top of the box.

eng: Tom began to learn French about three years ago.

eng: Don't worry about what he said.
Who is your favourite director
Alaska is a U.S. state.
simp: 阿拉斯加是美国的一个州
trad: 阿拉斯加是美國的一個州

eng: Everyone's used to calling Shanghai "Módū" and calling Beijing "Dìdū".
simp: 大家习惯把上海称为魔都，把北京称为帝都。
trad: 大家習慣把上海稱為魔都，把北京稱為帝都。

eng: If you buy me an ice cream, I'll give you a kiss.
simp: 如果你买给我冰淇淋，我就亲你一下。
trad: 如果你買給我冰淇淋，我就親你一下。

eng: Did I say something I shouldn't have?
simp: 我说了什麽我不应该说的吗?
trad: 我說了什麼我不應該說的嗎?

eng: Tom spends most of his spare time practising the guitar.
simp: 汤姆把他大部分的空閒时间花在练习吉他上。
trad: 湯姆把他大部分的空閒時間花在練習吉他上。

eng: How much is this umbrella?
I love roads.
My name is Irakli.
I had four children.
I'll give you money.
I'll give you an apple.
She is always at school.
The engineer is working in France.
simp: 这位工程师正在法国工作。
trad: 這位工程師正在法國工作。

eng: That four-year plan has to be approved.
simp: 那个四年计划必须获得批准。
trad: 那個四年計劃必須獲得批準。

eng: I ate all my oranges.
simp: 我吃掉了我所有的橘子。
trad: 我吃掉了我所有的橘子。

eng: What do you mean? What do you want to tell me?
simp: 你什么意思？你到底想对我说什么？
trad: 你什麼意思？你到底想對我說什麼？

eng: The main problem with Tom is that he has no sense of humor.
simp: 汤姆的主要问题是他一点幽默感都没有
trad: 湯姆的主要問題是他一點幽默感都沒有

eng: I was poor at English.
He often comes to see me.
This restaurant is particular about cutlery
simp: 这家饭馆的餐具很讲究
trad: 這家飯館的餐具很講究

eng: He againest monopoly. He has been to against monopoly.
simp: 他反对垄断。他曾经/以前反对垄断
trad: 他反對壟斷。他曾經/以前反對壟斷

eng: Christmas Gingerbread / honey cake is a traditional dessert of Germany
simp: 圣诞姜饼/蜂蜜饼是一种传统的德国点心
trad: 聖誕姜餅/蜂蜜餅是一種傳統的德國點心

eng: He is an honest person, and he always be lied.
simp: 他是个忠厚老实的人，不免上当。
trad: 他是個忠厚老實的人，不免上當。

eng: Do you know me?
Do you miss me?
Don't get angry at me!
You are not answering the question correctly.
Bro, what's your family name?
We'll meet again.
That's one of the things that I like about Tom.
simp: 这是我喜欢汤姆的一个方面。
trad: 這是我喜歡湯姆的一個方面。

eng: If not now, when?
simp: 如果不是现在，那是什么时候？
trad: 如果不是現在，那是什麼時候？

eng: No! Absolutely not!
Um... can we join your group?
simp: 嗯。。。我可以加入你的小组嘛
trad: 嗯。。。我可以加入你的小組嘛

eng: This deal is mine, so you need to just settle down and agree with me.
simp: 这笔交易是我的，所以你需要去冷静并且同意我
trad: 這筆交易是我的，所以你需要去冷靜並且同意我

eng: Well... the teacher said that we have to go into a group of 3-5 people, so this isn't going to work.
simp: 嗯。。。老师说我们必须加入一个3-5人的小组，所以我们没办法开始工作
trad: 嗯。。。老師說我們必須加入一個3-5人的小組，所以我們沒辦法開始工作

eng: I'm sure that it'll be fun!
Junior, why don't we go into a group together?
simp: Junior，我们为何不一起加入同一个小组呢
trad: Junior，我們為何不一起加入同一個小組呢

eng: This store has lots of great gifts.
simp: 这家商店有大量的极好的礼物
trad: 這家商店有大量的極好的禮物

eng: I'm going to count up slowly to three, Mary, and you'll wake up. "I'm already awake, Mister Kant."
simp: “我将缓慢的数到三，Mary，然后你就要起来了。”“我已经起来了，Mister Kant。”
trad: “我將緩慢的數到三，Mary，然後你就要起來了。”“我已經起來了，Mister Kant。”

eng: Being at least bilingual is a must in today's world.
simp: 在当今的世界，拥有双语种是必要的
trad: 在當今的世界，擁有雙語種是必要的

eng: The students went all over the classroom looking for their friends and buddies, unfortunately to the point at which Junior couldn't find anyone!
simp: 学生们仔细的检查整个教室以寻找他们的朋友们和伙伴们，不幸的没有任何一个低年级学生可以找到任何人
trad: 學生們仔細的檢查整個教室以尋找他們的朋友們和夥伴們，不幸的沒有任何一個低年級學生可以找到任何人

eng: Okay! Does everyone understand?
simp: 好的！所有人都了解了吗？
trad: 好的！所有人都了解了嗎？

eng: We'll be going outside to observe nature for this. Thus, a good pencil, eraser, and possibly a paint brush, is required.
simp: 我们将要到室外去观察大自然。因此，一支好的笔，橡皮和大概一支画笔是必需的。
trad: 我們將要到室外去觀察大自然。因此，一支好的筆，橡皮和大概一支畫筆是必需的。

eng: Alrighty kids! So for this art project, all of you guys will split into groups of 3 - 5 people.
simp: 好了孩子们！所以为了这个美术计划，你们所有人都将被分离并加入3-5人的小组
trad: 好了孩子們！所以為了這個美術計劃，你們所有人都將被分離並加入3-5人的小組

eng: There is absolutely no reason that you should even attempt to speak with the Chinese girls, or at least these ones. They're so rude!
simp: 你完全没有理由去试图和那些中国女孩子交流，或者至少那些人。他们非常的粗鲁！
trad: 你完全沒有理由去試圖和那些中國女孩子交流，或者至少那些人。他們非常的粗魯！

eng: You'd better eat something.
It would be better if you would eat more.
simp: 如果你吃的多一点，你将会比现在好一点
trad: 如果你吃的多一點，你將會比現在好一點

eng: I tried to draw a stick figure, but I failed when I started to draw the circle. It looked like a loop-sided oval.
simp: 我试图画条纹图形，但是当我画圆的时候我失败了。它看起来像一个椭圆的圆环。
trad: 我試圖畫條紋圖形，但是當我畫圓的時候我失敗了。它看起來像一個橢圓的圓環。

eng: You'd better eat!
Did you not know that?
In life, you gain and lose things, but also can't force things to happen.
simp: 在人生中，你将会收获和失去，当时你不会强迫事情去发生
trad: 在人生中，你將會收獲和失去，當時你不會強迫事情去發生

eng: Courage is a strange thing: One can never be sure of it.
simp: 勇气是一个奇怪的东西：没有任何人对它有把握
trad: 勇氣是一個奇怪的東西：沒有任何人對它有把握

eng: The Old Testament forbids eating shellfish.
simp: 旧约书中禁止食用贝类等有壳的水生动物。
trad: 舊約書中禁止食用貝類等有殼的水生動物。

eng: Tom can't sleep without a light on.
simp: Tom 没办法在没有亮灯的时候入睡。
trad: Tom 沒辦法在沒有亮燈的時候入睡。

eng: I was like that too, when I was younger.
simp: 当我年轻的时候，我也喜欢这个。
trad: 當我年輕的時候，我也喜歡這個。

eng: She again told tales out of school.
simp: 她又开始讲起了学校的秘密。
trad: 她又開始講起了學校的秘密。

eng: Don't worry, I'm sure that I can find someone else!
simp: 别担心，我确定我能找到其他的人。
trad: 別擔心，我確定我能找到其他的人。

eng: We're sorry, Ami, but you can't be part of our group because it would... you know... exceed the 5-people-per-group limit.
simp: 我们很抱歉，Ami，但是你不能加入我们的小组因为..你知道的...小组成员不能超过五个人。
trad: 我們很抱歉，Ami，但是你不能加入我們的小組因為..你知道的...小組成員不能超過五個人。

eng: I'm sorry, Tom, but seeing how much you've dissapointed me, I'm afraid that I am unable to believe in your abilities.
simp: 我很抱歉，Tom，但是看看你的让我失望了多少次，恐怕我没办法再相信你的能力了。
trad: 我很抱歉，Tom，但是看看你的讓我失望了多少次，恐怕我沒辦法再相信你的能力了。

eng: I don't want to marry a stupid man!
simp: 我不会嫁给一个愚蠢的男人。
trad: 我不會嫁給一個愚蠢的男人。

eng: How tall do most palm trees grow?
Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
simp: 曾经试过，曾经失败过。没关系，再试一次，再次失败，更好地失败。
trad: 曾經試過，曾經失敗過。沒關系，再試一次，再次失敗，更好地失敗。

eng: Tom was the best friend I've ever known, but he also disappointed me.
simp: Tom 是我曾经的朋友里最好的，但是他依然让我失望了。
trad: Tom 是我曾經的朋友裏最好的，但是他依然讓我失望了。

eng: Wherever you go, I will go too.
simp: 无论你去了哪里，我将永伴你身。
trad: 無論你去了哪裏，我將永伴你身。

eng: Who will commemorate me when I'm dead?
simp: 当我死去的时候，谁将庆祝呢？
trad: 當我死去的時候，誰將慶祝呢？

eng: Are you saying Tom's hiding something from us?
simp: 你说Tom对我们隐藏了一些事情？
trad: 你說Tom對我們隱藏了一些事情？

eng: Instead of him, my brother was arrested.
simp: 我的兄弟被捕了而不是他。
trad: 我的兄弟被捕了而不是他。

eng: To hope is better than to despair.
You're the one who decided to do this job, right?
simp: 你是决定做这个工作的那个人，对吗？
trad: 你是決定做這個工作的那個人，對嗎？

eng: You chose this job yourself, right?
simp: 你自己选择了这份工作，是吗？
trad: 你自己選擇了這份工作，是嗎？

eng: Everyone here already seems to be with a partner... what am I going to do?
simp: 这里的所有人似乎都已经和伙伴在一起了...那我接下来应该怎么做？
trad: 這裏的所有人似乎都已經和夥伴在一起了...那我接下來應該怎麼做？

eng: I'm living the dream.
Am I seriously the only one who isn't bilingual here?
simp: 严肃的讲在这里只有我一个人不会双语的吗？
trad: 嚴肅的講在這裏只有我一個人不會雙語的嗎？

eng: Tom's eyes were glued to the screen.
simp: Tom的眼睛被荧幕吸引住了。
trad: Tom的眼睛被熒幕吸引住了。

eng: It's clear that he has no intention of marrying you.
simp: 这非常清楚的表明了他没有想娶你的意图。
trad: 這非常清楚的表明了他沒有想娶你的意圖。

eng: Tom told me that he has no intention of marrying you.
simp: Tom告诉我他们有想要娶你的想法。
trad: Tom告訴我他們有想要娶你的想法。

eng: Man is the only animal that talks.
simp: 人类是唯一彼此交谈的动物。
trad: 人類是唯一彼此交談的動物。

eng: I'd like to dance.
Man is the only animal that can talk.
simp: 人类是唯一能够彼此交谈的动物。
trad: 人類是唯一能夠彼此交談的動物。

eng: Don't make fun of me. I'm serious.
simp: 不要和我开玩笑。我是很严肃的。
trad: 不要和我開玩笑。我是很嚴肅的。

eng: Why should it be necessary?
Not all Germans like to drink beer.
simp: 不是所有的德国人都喜欢喝啤酒。
trad: 不是所有的德國人都喜歡喝啤酒。

eng: What does this key unlock?
What got him so upset?
Did you bring them?
Doing the laundry is my job.
He wants no kind of flowers.
simp: 他不想要任何种类的花。
trad: 他不想要任何種類的花。

eng: He aimed, but missed.
It feels like it's going to absorb you into another world.
simp: 它的感觉像是它把你吸到了另外一个世界。
trad: 它的感覺像是它把你吸到了另外一個世界。

eng: What should I look for?
They decided the date for the trip.
simp: 他们决定了远足的日期了。
trad: 他們決定了遠足的日期了。

eng: Are you able to play organ?
Where else should we go?
simp: 我们要去其他的什么地方？
trad: 我們要去其他的什麼地方？

eng: What steps should we take?
simp: 我们应该走出什么样的步伐。
trad: 我們應該走出什麼樣的步伐。

eng: Which way should we go?
simp: 我们应该往哪个方向走？
trad: 我們應該往哪個方向走？

eng: I really enjoy your company.
Why should anyone be surprised?
simp: 为什么任何人应该感到惊喜？
trad: 為什麼任何人應該感到驚喜？

eng: Why should I hire Tom?
Dan learnt about Linda's death in the news.
simp: Dan在新闻中了解到Linda的去世。
trad: Dan在新聞中了解到Linda的去世。

eng: Why don't you go and join her?
This is cold.
The huge explosion killed six people.
Dream on!
I can't approve the proposal by myself.
simp: 我觉得我无法赞成这个建议。
trad: 我覺得我無法贊成這個建議。

eng: I spread cheese on bread.
You should be a diplomat.
You should know that's impossible.
simp: 你应该知道这是不可能的。
trad: 你應該知道這是不可能的。

eng: Mama had a crippled face.
I think Tom needs something to write.
We are still doing well.
I yearn for the university.
I feel a yearning for the university.
simp: 我对于上大学有一种渴望。
trad: 我對於上大學有一種渴望。

eng: Austria is one of the largest producers of electricity in Europe.
simp: 澳大利亚在欧洲是最大的电能生产国之一。
trad: 澳大利亞在歐洲是最大的電能生產國之一。

eng: You wish!
There are daisies around the steel building.
simp: 那里有许多雏菊围绕着钢铁大厦。
trad: 那裏有許多雛菊圍繞著鋼鐵大廈。

eng: There are daisies next to the steel building.
simp: 在钢铁大厦的旁边有许多的雏菊。
trad: 在鋼鐵大廈的旁邊有許多的雛菊。

eng: The truth and simplicity of nature is always the most important foundation of noteworthy art.
simp: 大自然的真实和质朴往往是值得注意的艺术中最重要的基石。
trad: 大自然的真實和質樸往往是值得註意的藝術中最重要的基石。

eng: You have beautiful legs.
Is the water in the Black Sea actually black?
simp: 黑海里的水事实上是黑的吗？
trad: 黑海裏的水事實上是黑的嗎？

eng: In the evening quiet, we enjoy the song of the euphonious nightingale.
simp: 在安静的晚上，我们沉浸在夜莺悦耳的歌声中。
trad: 在安靜的晚上，我們沈浸在夜鶯悅耳的歌聲中。

eng: Why should we help?
simp: 为什么我们应该要帮助？
trad: 為什麼我們應該要幫助？

eng: I should've declined.
Why should you think that?
simp: 为什么你对于这个有这样的想法？
trad: 為什麼你對於這個有這樣的想法？

eng: Are you finished?
You should run for city council.
simp: 你应该去竞选城市委员会。
trad: 你應該去競選城市委員會。

eng: You should take up golf.
simp: 你应该开始从事高尔夫。
trad: 你應該開始從事高爾夫。

eng: Tom made his servants eat in the dark.
simp: 汤姆让他的仆人们在黑暗下进餐。
trad: 湯姆讓他的仆人們在黑暗下進餐。

eng: Old dogs can learn new tricks.
simp: 老的犬可以学新的诡计。
trad: 老的犬可以學新的詭計。

eng: Second best is never enough.
simp: 第二优秀是远远不够的。
trad: 第二優秀是遠遠不夠的。

eng: Courage is very important. Like a muscle, it is strengthened by use.
simp: 勇气是非常重要的。比如肌肉，经常使用才得以加强。
trad: 勇氣是非常重要的。比如肌肉，經常使用才得以加強。

eng: Why should it be different?
simp: 为什么它应该要变得不一样？
trad: 為什麼它應該要變得不一樣？

eng: He left for Europe a week ago, that is, on the tenth of May.
simp: 他在一周前离开去往欧洲，就是说，是在五月十号。
trad: 他在一周前離開去往歐洲，就是說，是在五月十號。

eng: That's the other reason I'm here.
simp: 那是我在这里的另外一个理由。
trad: 那是我在這裏的另外一個理由。

eng: Tom can't tie a tie.
Tom seems to hardly ever get his homework done on time.
simp: Tom似乎没办法准时完成他的作业。
trad: Tom似乎沒辦法準時完成他的作業。

eng: Tom is looking for someone to take Mary's place.
I saw more than Tom knows.
Tell Tom I'll be there in a minute.
simp: 告诉Tom我将在一分钟内到达这里。
trad: 告訴Tom我將在一分鐘內到達這裏。

eng: Everybody is alive.
Maybe we should talk.
I've got to try to find Tom.
What are those numbers?
We have a problem here.
That's exactly what I wanted to see happen.
simp: 这刚好是我想看到它发生的。
trad: 這剛好是我想看到它發生的。

eng: Tom needs to get into shape.
We lost it.
Tom has recently become forgetful.
He plays golf two or three times a month.
simp: 他一个月玩两到三次高尔夫。
trad: 他一個月玩兩到三次高爾夫。

eng: He was sitting there.
We have no choice but to risk it.
simp: 我们别无选择只能冒着危险。
trad: 我們別無選擇只能冒著危險。

eng: Did you get my letter?
simp: 你收到了我发的邮件了吗？
trad: 你收到了我發的郵件了嗎？

eng: We're both reasonable people.
simp: 我们是两个通情达理的人。
trad: 我們是兩個通情達理的人。

eng: Are you not feeling well?
Let's talk about this tomorrow.
Put your guns down.
Tom dealt the cards.
Is Tom able to speak French?
Do you want to know why I lied to Tom?
simp: 你想知道为什么我对Tom说话吗？
trad: 你想知道為什麼我對Tom說話嗎？

eng: Tom was dressed like a pirate.
Hang on till I get to you.
simp: 坚持下去直到我找到你。
trad: 堅持下去直到我找到你。

eng: We almost had Tom convinced.
I saw a helicopter flying overhead.
simp: 我看见一架直升飞机在头顶飞。
trad: 我看見一架直升飛機在頭頂飛。

eng: We have all we need for now.
simp: 我们现在拥有了所有我们想要的。
trad: 我們現在擁有了所有我們想要的。

eng: How do we get out of here?
simp: 我们该怎么从这里出去。
trad: 我們該怎麼從這裏出去。

eng: I don't know whether Tom will eat with us or not.
simp: 我不知道Tom是否和我们一起吃饭。
trad: 我不知道Tom是否和我們一起吃飯。

eng: Tom doesn't pay much attention to how he dresses.
simp: Tom没有花费精力去打扮自己。
trad: Tom沒有花費精力去打扮自己。

eng: You could say that.
Tom was a little late.
Were you able to do it?
Mary grabbed her purse and left.
simp: Mary霸占了她的包包并且离开了。
trad: Mary霸占了她的包包並且離開了。

eng: When I was a child, I used to swim in that pond.
simp: 当我还是个孩子的时候，我在这个泳池里游过泳。
trad: 當我還是個孩子的時候，我在這個泳池裏遊過泳。

eng: I'm going to check.
I haven't started anything yet.
I like your shoes.
Tom has no intention of asking Mary to the upcoming dance.
simp: Tom没有意图去邀请Mary去即将来临的舞会。
trad: Tom沒有意圖去邀請Mary去即將來臨的舞會。

eng: Tom is anxious to see you.

trad: 我讓Tom在做完作業後看一點電視。

eng: You're drinking out of my cup.

eng: That's a huge challenge.
Tom went to Boston for a week.

trad: Tom每個禮拜都回去一次波士頓。

eng: Tom bought a camera at a store not too far from here.
simp: Tom在离这里不远的一家商店里买了一台相机。
trad: Tom在離這裏不遠的一家商店裏買了一臺相機。

eng: Tom says he's not feeling any better.
If I were you, I'd want to know what Tom is doing right now.
simp: 如果我是你，我不会想去知道Tom现在正在做什么。
trad: 如果我是你，我不會想去知道Tom現在正在做什麼。

eng: I think Tom is awake.

simp: Tom说他在这次的航行中读了一本书。
trad: Tom說他在這次的航行中讀了一本書。

eng: I was just talking about Tom.
Would you give me a hint?
simp: 你可以给我一个提示吗？
trad: 你可以給我一個提示嗎？

eng: My car cost more than yours did.
simp: 我的车子的开销比你的要多。
trad: 我的車子的開銷比你的要多。

eng: They work really hard.

eng: Both you and I are men.

trad: 你打算和你的家人去做什麼？

eng: Tom ate only one sandwich.
I can't find what I want.

simp: Tatoeba：比起没有句子，没有感觉更好。
trad: Tatoeba：比起沒有句子，沒有感覺更好。

eng: I know what it's like to lose someone.
simp: 我知道这看起来像是失去了某人。
trad: 我知道這看起來像是失去了某人。

eng: Tom was not apologetic.

simp: 你们两个做了什么有趣的事情呢？
trad: 你們兩個做了什麼有趣的事情呢？

eng: Let me die.
This dictionary is mine.
Ask him his name.
What happened that night?

simp: 我喜欢花时间和Tom在一起。
trad: 我喜歡花時間和Tom在一起。

eng: We're out of stock now.

We took a walk in the park.

simp: 我们试图让手指互相交错。
trad: 我們試圖讓手指互相交錯。

eng: Tom often goes cross-country skiing.

Tom can't cross the border.

simp: 你的名字已经从名单删除了。
trad: 你的名字已經從名單刪除了。

eng: It didn't cross my mind.
Some people criticized our decision.
simp: 一些人批评了我们的决定。
trad: 一些人批評了我們的決定。

eng: Shouldn't Tom be doing this, too?

simp: 根据2016年发表的一项研究，德国是世界上最好的国家，加拿大是第二好的国家。
trad: 根據2016年發表的一項研究，德國是世界上最好的國家，加拿大是第二好的國家。

eng: Mary tied an apron around her waist and then took the turkey out of the oven.
simp: Mary试图把围裙围在腰上，然后把烤鸡从炉子里拿出来。

eng: Judy looked at me.
Hello!
I'm British.

trad: 別嚇我！我的護照不見了！

eng: Yesterday he saw a big man.

trad: 昨天他遇到了高大的男人。

eng: He's also just a politician.
simp: 他也只是个政治家而已。
trad: 他也只是個政治家而已。

eng: The simplest way is often the best way to solve a problem.
simp: 解决问题最简便的方法往往是最好的办法。
trad: 解決問題最簡便的方法往往是最好的辦法。

eng: People usually don't like what they don't understand.

eng: My mother opened the door very carefully.

trad: 我仍舊無法相信我居然做了這種事。

trad: 你上次跟瑪麗說是什麼時候？

trad: 你不要擔心，我會保護你的。

Hello!

trad: 歐洲人試著去教化部落的人

eng: I am Armenian.
I don't want to go home.
There is a bottle of wine on the table.
I was overseas at the time.
I want to see your boss.
I don't like animals.

Did they sign?
Did they sign?
Did they sign?
Did they sign?

trad: 看看瑪麗那漂亮的房子

eng: He differs from his brother.
Set me free!
I have two cats.
I go to school.
Thank you!
I don't understand.
Tom isn't a fool.
Can I have a few words with you?

simp: 一些操作系统上有全角字符的文件名会显示为乱码，所以下载时请改成适当的文件名。
trad: 一些操作系統上有全角字符的文件名會顯示為亂碼，所以下載時請改成適當的文件名。

eng: They will follow her.
Bring me a glass of water.

Don't talk rubbish.

eng: Goodbye!
Help yourself and God will help you.

trad: 我再也不相信任何人了！

eng: I can't believe anyone anymore.

trad: 我再也無法相信任何人了。

eng: Give a hug to your parents before you get far away from your hometown.

eng: My Lord I lose the game.

eng: You need to have quick reactions to play these computer games.

eng: He has gotten fat.

simp: 她把所有的业余时间都用在钓鱼上了。

eng: I was compelled to follow her.

eng: You want to watch a French film, is that right?

eng: You can use a telescope to look at the stars.
simp: 你可以用望远镜看星星。

eng: I need to inspect the wound, said the doctor.

eng: I cry every time I watch this movie.

eng: We hope Tom is OK.

eng: Tom and I aren't friends. We're just coworkers.

trad: 湯姆跟我不是朋友，我們只是同事。

trad: 湯姆在唱卡拉OK時喜歡什麼類型的歌曲呢?

eng: The best way to lose weight is to eat less and exercise more.

eng: Happy International Women's Day!

I like surrealism.

simp: 我认为你需要更努力学习。
trad: 我認為你需要更努力學習。

eng: When they pass through strong wind, the planes rock like this, but don't worry.
simp: 当飞机穿越强风时，它们会像这样摇晃，但是别担心。
trad: 當飛機穿越強風時，它們會像這樣搖晃，但是別擔心。

eng: Some are deceived by fair words.

eng: May I have coupon tickets?

trad: 我們通常以為只有在星期日和假期，時間才屬於我們自己。

eng: The house whose roof you can see is Mr Baker's.
simp: 你能看到屋顶的那栋房子是贝克先生的。

eng: We enjoy reading books.

trad: 昨晚我做了一個可怕的噩夢。

eng: Where do you work now?

simp: 汤姆跟着玛丽进入了房间。
trad: 湯姆跟著瑪麗進入了房間。

eng: You're impatient.

simp: 你写这份报告花了多长时间？
trad: 你寫這份報告花了多長時間？

eng: Tom is looking for a good job.
I hope we find Tom.
simp: 我希望我们能找到汤姆。
trad: 我希望我們能找到湯姆。

We'll come back tomorrow.

simp: 汤姆在他的院子里种了三棵苹果树。
trad: 湯姆在他的院子裏種了三棵蘋果樹。

eng: Wait!
How come?
Time is money.

She married him.
I'm looking for you.
Tom isn't an angel.
We're waiting for Tom.
Does Tom drink coffee?
I also like you.
That changed everything.
Let's meet at the station at eight tomorrow morning.
It's all your fault.
You're an optimist.

simp: 她十三岁的时候离家出走了。
trad: 她十三歲的時候離家出走了。

eng: I'll let Tom tell you.
Tom has been quite cooperative.

trad: 湯姆看起來一點也不開心。

eng: We've been watching you.

simp: 汤姆想知道玛丽在哪里学会了法语。
trad: 湯姆想知道瑪麗在哪裏學會了法語。

trad: 湯姆沒有告訴我他不會遊泳。

eng: There's no one in your bedroom.

You can no longer hurt me.
How did Tom get out of jail?
She is graceful.
We often talk about the weather.
Where is my newspaper?

Tom sat down.
I can see Tom.
Tom got fat.
Did Thomas get sick?
Tom swam.
Sorry!
I'm single.
Don't know.
Today is Wednesday.

trad: 如果某天你發現你一無所長你會怎麼辦？

eng: She has never seen the ocean.
Don't tell him that I'm here.
Yesterday evening I had a terrible nightmare.
There are lots of people who say that's a lie.
The beach was packed with tourists.

simp: 解决失业最好的办法是去工作
trad: 解決失業最好的辦法是去工作

eng: Congratulations!

simp: 我老是忘记人们的名字。
trad: 我老是忘記人們的名字。

simp: 我感觉大家都在关注我。
trad: 我感覺大家都在關註我。

eng: How do you feel?

simp: 这样对待他似乎不太公平。
trad: 這樣對待他似乎不太公平。

eng: Every cloud has a silver lining.

eng: Tom always meddles in affairs that do not concern him.

trad: 為什麼你要幹涉一件跟你完全不相幹的事呢？

eng: People shouldn't be allowed to invade countries whose names they can't pronounce correctly.

eng: I despise you.

simp: 当迈克返回到简的家的时候，她睡得正熟。

eng: You like Bob more than Tom.

eng: The little girl opened the window.

eng: He made a speech.
How long did that take?
They bought the same camera as you.
simp: 他们买了跟你同款的相机。
trad: 他們買了跟你同款的相機。

eng: Tom is a clever kid.
Tom made a choice.
Tom fell asleep.
Tom is laughing.
Tom is really handsome.
Tom runs fast.
What kind of a person is Tom?
Tom has blue eyes.
Do you like swimming?
Tom has low blood pressure.
Tom has high blood pressure.
Tom can't swim.
Tom had a heat stroke.
We're good friends, nothing more.
Tom is a Vietnam veteran.
simp: 汤姆是一个越军退役军人。
trad: 湯姆是一個越軍退役軍人。

eng: Two persons were killed when an elevated bike path collapsed in Rio.
simp: 当里约热内卢的一条高架自行车道倒塌时，有2人被砸死了。
trad: 當裏約熱內盧的一條高架自行車道倒塌時，有2人被砸死了。

eng: A bike path collapsed in Rio.
simp: 里约热内卢的一条自行车道倒塌了。

eng: An elevated seaside bike path collapsed in Rio.

trad: 裏約熱內盧的一條海邊的高架自行車道倒塌了。

eng: Tom took part in a local bike race.
