trad: 湯姆參加了當地的一個自行車比賽

eng: You're not going in the right direction.
Tom and Mary own a small organic farm.
simp: 汤姆和玛丽拥有一个小型的有机农场。
trad: 湯姆和瑪麗擁有一個小型的有機農場。

eng: He paid no attention to her.
She paid no attention to him.
Tom learned to ride a bike when he was ten.
simp: 汤姆在10岁的时候就学骑了自行车。
trad: 湯姆在10歲的時候就學騎了自行車。

eng: Tom smiled at Mary, and she smiled back.
simp: 汤姆对玛丽笑了笑，她也笑着回应了。
trad: 湯姆對瑪麗笑了笑，她也笑著回應了。

eng: I interviewed him.
Tom sat on a tree trunk.
Why did you not tell me the truth?
simp: 为什么你不告诉我真相？
trad: 為什麼你不告訴我真相？

eng: Do you know for sure that Tom is behind that?
simp: 你确信汤姆躲在那后面吗？
trad: 你確信湯姆躲在那後面嗎？

eng: Tom admitted that he is afraid.
Tom admitted his fear.
Limit the consumption of white sugar and salt.
What am I hearing now?
I know that gentleman only by name.
simp: 我只知道那个绅士的名字。
trad: 我只知道那個紳士的名字。

eng: I do not know that dance.
I do not know how to read nor write.
I cannot lift him.
I worked for him for ten years.
My hand was burned.
Is there any difference whether I clean my room today, tomorrow, or the day after tomorrow?
simp: 我今天、明天还是后天清理我的房间有什么不同吗？
trad: 我今天、明天還是後天清理我的房間有什麼不同嗎？

eng: That piece of furniture is not fitting for the living room.
simp: 那件家具不适合摆在客厅。
trad: 那件家具不適合擺在客廳。

eng: The animals already ate enough.
In my opinion, the meeting was a success.
simp: 在我看来，这次会议很成功。
trad: 在我看來，這次會議很成功。

eng: The accident happened right before our eyes.
simp: 这场事故发生在我们的眼皮子底下。
trad: 這場事故發生在我們的眼皮子底下。

eng: The number of officials doubled last year.
simp: 去年官员的数量成倍增加了。
trad: 去年官員的數量成倍增加了。

eng: He needs to be punished.
The clan system is a key component of traditional Chinese culture.
simp: 宗族制度是中国传统文化的重要组成部分。
trad: 宗族制度是中國傳統文化的重要組成部分。

eng: It makes sense.
Sensing danger, he ran away.
simp: 他一嗅到风声不对，就逃之夭夭了。
trad: 他一嗅到風聲不對，就逃之夭夭了。

eng: Tom wanted to say goodbye.
Who likes beans?
Tom is quite drunk now.
Tom never did what we asked him to do.
simp: 我们叫汤姆做什么，他从来不做。
trad: 我們叫湯姆做什麼，他從來不做。

eng: No arrests were ever made.
simp: 根本就没实施过逮捕行动。
trad: 根本就沒實施過逮捕行動。

eng: I'm glad we hired you for this job.
simp: 我很高兴我们录用了你来担任这份工作。
trad: 我很高興我們錄用了你來擔任這份工作。

eng: Everyone was fine.
It's bad manners to point at people.
Tom went into the kitchen and poured himself a cup of coffee.
simp: 汤姆进了厨房，给自己倒了杯咖啡。
trad: 湯姆進了廚房，給自己倒了杯咖啡。

eng: You should stay away from Tom.
Don't forget to take out the garbage.
I'm still angry.
I don't doubt it.
I've tried to contact Tom.
Tom will never see you again.
simp: 汤姆以后再也不会见你了。
trad: 湯姆以後再也不會見你了。

eng: Tom will never see you again.
simp: 汤姆永远也不会见你了。
trad: 湯姆永遠也不會見你了。

eng: Tom will never see you again.
Tom glanced away.
simp: 汤姆瞥了一眼就移开目光了。
trad: 湯姆瞥了一眼就移開目光了。

eng: Tom didn't understand what the teacher said.
simp: 汤姆没明白老师说了什么。
trad: 湯姆沒明白老師說了什麼。

eng: Tom gave Mary a flashlight.
simp: 汤姆给了玛丽一把手电筒。
trad: 湯姆給了瑪麗一把手電筒。

eng: Everybody will die.
Tom needs a change of scenery.
Why do that now?
I hope I'm not boring you.
Shame on you guys.
I'm very lonely.
Everyone in the room checked their watches at the same time.
simp: 房间里的所有人都同时看了看自己的手表。
trad: 房間裏的所有人都同時看了看自己的手表。

eng: I had a vision.
I had a vision.
Tom follows orders.
I haven't done that since high school.
simp: 高中毕业之后我就没那样做过了。
trad: 高中畢業之後我就沒那樣做過了。

eng: I have a few friends who speak French well.
simp: 我有一些法语说得好的朋友。
trad: 我有一些法語說得好的朋友。

eng: Tom's mother is a nurse at the hospital that's across the street from where Mary lives.
simp: 汤姆的妈妈是一名护士，她所在的医院就在玛丽住的那条街的对面。
trad: 湯姆的媽媽是一名護士，她所在的醫院就在瑪麗住的那條街的對面。

eng: Both Tom and Mary can speak French.
simp: 汤姆和玛丽两个人都会说法语。
trad: 湯姆和瑪麗兩個人都會說法語。

eng: I was quite annoyed.
He behaved like a madman.
He will be very busy next month.
I thought Tom would enjoy the party.
simp: 我以为汤姆会喜欢这个聚会。
trad: 我以為湯姆會喜歡這個聚會。

eng: I found a good place to buy fruit a couple of days ago.
simp: 前几天我发现了一个买水果的好地方。
trad: 前幾天我發現了一個買水果的好地方。

eng: I ripped my pants.
Tom knows a lot of stuff about Mary.
simp: 汤姆知道玛丽的很多事。
trad: 湯姆知道瑪麗的很多事。

eng: How many hours a day do you sleep?
That's exactly how I feel.
That car belongs in a museum.
simp: 那辆车属于一家博物馆。
trad: 那輛車屬於一家博物館。

eng: I saw you kissing Tom.
simp: 我看到了你在吻汤姆了。
trad: 我看到了你在吻湯姆了。

eng: They should be scared.
Is anything bothering you?
Tom is used to getting up early.
Tom was popular.
I think you're stupid.
You should've told me yesterday.
I have to say no.
Are you still living with your parents?
simp: 你依然和父母住一起吗？
trad: 你依然和父母住一起嗎？

eng: This is a stupid design.
I don't anticipate a problem.
This is really terrible.
Tom says he left a note.
I want to make sure nothing will happen to Tom.
simp: 我想要确定什么都没有发生在汤姆身上。
trad: 我想要確定什麼都沒有發生在湯姆身上。

eng: Who else uses this room?
Tom had a lot of problems at the school.
simp: 汤姆在学校遇到了很多问题。
trad: 湯姆在學校遇到了很多問題。

eng: They were afraid.
Tom doubled his investment in a year.
simp: 汤姆一年内增加了一倍的投资。
trad: 湯姆一年內增加了一倍的投資。

eng: Tom took over after I left.
That's no big deal.
Tom searched inside the closet.
I talked to Tom last night.
I can call Tom if you want.
simp: 如果你想要的话，我可以打电话给汤姆。
trad: 如果你想要的話，我可以打電話給湯姆。

eng: I'll be flying to Boston.
Mary came home from school in tears because her friends had teased her.
simp: 玛丽哭着从学校跑回了家里，因为她的朋友捉弄了她。
trad: 瑪麗哭著從學校跑回了家裏，因為她的朋友捉弄了她。

eng: I wonder if anything happened to him.
simp: 我怀疑有什么事在他身上发生了。
trad: 我懷疑有什麼事在他身上發生了。

eng: Someone is watching.
I'll send a letter to my mother.
simp: 我会给我的母亲寄封信。
trad: 我會給我的母親寄封信。

eng: Come on. I want to show you something.
simp: 来吧。我想让你看点东西。
trad: 來吧。我想讓你看點東西。

eng: Tom is overweight.
I want some fresh eggs.
simp: 我想要一些新鲜的鸡蛋。
trad: 我想要一些新鮮的雞蛋。

eng: Tom felt hungry.
Is anybody in there?
Tom is a good friend of Mary's.
simp: 汤姆是玛丽的一个好朋友。
trad: 湯姆是瑪麗的一個好朋友。

eng: Have a nice day, Tom.
simp: 汤姆，希望你今天玩得开心。
trad: 湯姆，希望你今天玩得開心。

eng: It was amazingly easy.
I wonder why nobody told me.
simp: 不知道为什么没有人告诉过我。
trad: 不知道為什麼沒有人告訴過我。

eng: It took a long time to take in what she was saying.
simp: 花了很久才能听懂她在说什么。
trad: 花了很久才能聽懂她在說什麼。

eng: Kissing a person who smokes is like licking an ashtray.
simp: 亲吻一个抽烟的人就像在舔烟灰缸。
trad: 親吻一個抽煙的人就像在舔煙灰缸。

eng: Please eat some cake.
You look very good.
I think you're really amazing.
simp: 我觉得你真是让人大吃一惊。
trad: 我覺得你真是讓人大吃一驚。

eng: Do you think Tom is too young?
simp: 你觉得汤姆是不是太嫩了？
trad: 你覺得湯姆是不是太嫩了？

eng: You don't believe Tom, do you?
You need to know.
Tom doesn't really love Mary.
I want you to sleep on it.
Do you have a lot of pens?
I don't want to lose you again.
Tom asked for Mary's permission to leave early.
simp: 汤姆请玛丽允许他早走。
trad: 湯姆請瑪麗允許他早走。

eng: You didn't protect me.
We went to the races.
Tom decided not to wait.
During the exam, Tom cheated off Mary.
simp: 在考试的时候，汤姆作弊抄了玛丽的答桉。
trad: 在考試的時候，湯姆作弊抄了瑪麗的答案。

eng: You have to be proactive.
Tom tried to return the swimsuit for a larger size, but the clerk told him that wasn't allowed.
simp: 汤姆试过还回泳衣来换成更大一号的，但是员工告诉他那是不被允许的。
trad: 湯姆試過還回泳衣來換成更大一號的，但是員工告訴他那是不被允許的。

eng: Don't you miss anything?
Don't you miss anything?
Tom can't afford this.
It's going to rain, for sure.
I've never seen Tom so angry.
simp: 我从没见过汤姆那么生气。
trad: 我從沒見過湯姆那麼生氣。

eng: My mother was an alcoholic.
I'm going to be a millionaire.
simp: 我就要成为百万富翁了。
trad: 我就要成為百萬富翁了。

eng: Tom frequently talks in his sleep.
We don't live in Boston.
I'm doubling my prices.
I can't keep up with Tom.
I tried to convince Tom to come home.
I really don't sing.
I have an urgent message from Tom.
simp: 我收到汤姆的一条紧急消息。
trad: 我收到湯姆的一條緊急消息。

eng: Tom is obese, isn't he?
I wanted to smack you.
Tom lied to the others.
Let's go as soon as it stops raining.
I didn't want to humiliate you.
I thought Tom had a soccer game tonight.
simp: 我以为汤姆今晚有足球比赛。
trad: 我以為湯姆今晚有足球比賽。

eng: I want you guys to do me a favor.
simp: 我想要大家伙帮我个忙。
trad: 我想要大家夥幫我個忙。

eng: It's so hard.
There was complete silence.
Tom isn't dumb.
Tom should've finished it by now.
simp: 汤姆现在应该已经完成了。
trad: 湯姆現在應該已經完成了。

eng: Tom got rid of his old books.
I want my dinner brought to my room.
simp: 我想要我的晚餐送到房间里来。
trad: 我想要我的晚餐送到房間裏來。

eng: We don't even need this.
Tom heard a shout.
I won’t be fooled.
Tom asked me to tell you he didn't plan on going to Boston with you.
simp: 汤姆让我告诉你他没有计划和你一起去波士顿。
trad: 湯姆讓我告訴你他沒有計劃和你一起去波士頓。

eng: Dozens are still missing.
I'm a big football fan.
She wrote him a long letter, but he didn't read it.
simp: 她给他写了一封长信，但是他没有看。
trad: 她給他寫了一封長信，但是他沒有看。

eng: Deal with them.
I threw away my shoes.
simp: 我把自己的鞋子扔掉了。
trad: 我把自己的鞋子扔掉了。

eng: Tom mostly kept to himself.
I can't even remember what Tom looks like.
simp: 我甚至不能记起来汤姆长什么样。
trad: 我甚至不能記起來湯姆長什麼樣。

eng: Tom asked me about you.
It rarely snows in this area.
Here's how we do it.
Why would they need to do that?
simp: 为什么他们会需要那么做呢？
trad: 為什麼他們會需要那麼做呢？

eng: Tom, I want you to handle this one.
simp: 汤姆，我想要你来操作这一个。
trad: 湯姆，我想要你來操作這一個。

eng: You seem to know everything.
They all have come.
We didn't get an apology.
She told him that she believed in astrology.
simp: 她告诉了他自己相信占星术。
trad: 她告訴了他自己相信占星術。

eng: We want Tom.
I consider myself fairly fluent in French.
simp: 我认为自己的法语相当流利。
trad: 我認為自己的法語相當流利。

eng: How do I sign up?
What I want is some peace and quiet.
simp: 我所想要的是一点平和和安静。
trad: 我所想要的是一點平和和安靜。

eng: I had fun last night.
Let me ask a stupid question.
simp: 我来问个有点傻的问题。
trad: 我來問個有點傻的問題。

eng: Can you tell me a little about yourself?
simp: 你能稍微告诉我关于自己的事情吗？
trad: 你能稍微告訴我關於自己的事情嗎？

eng: It's none of your business.
It is like looking for a needle in a haystack.
Are you feeling under the weather?
Let your hair down a little.
We were driven to the wall.
simp: 我们被逼得走投无路了。
trad: 我們被逼得走投無路了。

eng: It is high time you were in bed.
A fish out of water.
I'm as hungry as a horse.
simp: 我饿得跟饿虎扑羊似的。
trad: 我餓得跟餓虎撲羊似的。

eng: He is my Mr Right.
He is just a Mr Nobody.
simp: 他不过是个无名小卒而已。
trad: 他不過是個無名小卒而已。

eng: When there is no tigers in mountains, the monkey becomes the king.
simp: 山上无老虎，猴子称大王。
trad: 山上無老虎，猴子稱大王。

eng: Perfect!
Wonderful!
Listen.
Stop grumbling.
Money talks.
Please hurry.
Look out!
Wash up.
I try.
All aboard!
Listen carefully.
Work slowly.
Drive slowly.
Step aside.
Sit tight.
Who cares?
Study hard.
Come along.
Hello, Tom.
Behave yourself.
Stop talking.
Years passed.
Straighten up.
Grab him.
He tries.
He accelerated.
She tried.
She smiled.
She cried.
She walks.
That hurts.
Turn around.
Turn right.
Thanks anyway.
Stuff happens.
Kiss me.
Stop that!
He ran.
You run.
He runs.
Someone came.
Keep listening.
Trust me.
Champagne, please.
Everybody lies.
Tom blushed.
Be realistic!
Tom disappeared.
Read this.
Open fire!
Hop in.
Tom overslept.
Quit gambling.
Look around.
Oh no!
Get real.
Nice timing.
Hold on.
Dogs bark.
They won.
Stay sharp.
Welcome back.
Keep trying.
Look there.
Call security!
Stop meddling.
Call home!
Nobody asked.
Stop reading.
Join us.
I lost.
Please reconsider.
Stay down!
Keep reading.
Lie still.
Hurry home.
Pace yourself.
Release him.
Stand back!
Everyone noticed.
Hang on!
Coffee, please.
Stop yelling!
How beautiful!
How curious!
How lovely!
Keep it.
Take it.
Call us.
Be nice.
Be kind.
Be fair.
Be calm.
We laughed.
Stand aside.
Please sing.
Stop staring.
Feel this.
Follow us.
Get Tom.
Grab that.
Grab this.
Grab Tom.
Hold fire.
Hold this.
Stop shooting.
Break it up!
The "family manager" is a profession, occupation, vocation.
simp: “一家之主”是一份专业工作、事业和使命。
trad: “一家之主”是一份專業工作、事業和使命。

eng: He is a dentist by profession.
Don't quit your day job.
His political career has ended.
Tom sneaked up behind Mary.
simp: 汤姆鬼鬼祟祟地遛近了玛丽身后。
trad: 湯姆鬼鬼祟祟地遛近了瑪麗身後。

eng: Tom's thrilled.
Tom watched in horror.
I heard a car pull up.
simp: 我听到一辆车停了下来。
trad: 我聽到一輛車停了下來。

eng: Will I have a scar?
Tom's check bounced.
You'll bounce back.
Linda likes eating chocolate.
Action!
The best wealth is knowledge, average wealth is children, and the smallest wealth is material objects.
simp: 最好的财富是知识，一般的财富是孩子，最小的财富是物质。
trad: 最好的財富是知識，一般的財富是孩子，最小的財富是物質。

eng: You're your own worst enemy.
simp: 你是你自己最大的敌人。
trad: 你是你自己最大的敵人。

eng: You'll never see that again.
simp: 你以后再也不会看到它了。
trad: 你以後再也不會看到它了。

eng: You'll never know the truth.
You sound like a politician.
You have to start somewhere.
You have to have confidence.
Will this year be different?
Who can tell the difference?
Where are those posters now?
simp: 那些海报现在都到哪里去了？
trad: 那些海報現在都到哪裏去了？

eng: Where are those people from?
What's your opinion on that?
simp: 关于那个你有什么看法？
trad: 關於那個你有什麼看法？

eng: What's the weather like now?
What's the idea behind that?
What's so special about Tom?
simp: 汤姆有什么很与众不同的地方吗？
trad: 湯姆有什麼很與眾不同的地方嗎？

eng: What were the meetings like?
What was that meeting about?
What trips are you planning?
What do you want to tell me?
I won't stay here for long.
We're not scared of anybody.
We're going downtown.
That actually makes a lot of sense.
Life is very hard.
Why did you begin without me?
simp: 为什么你不等等我就开始了？
trad: 為什麼你不等等我就開始了？

eng: Don't begin without me.
Tom is old enough to go to school.
simp: 汤姆年纪足够去上学了。
trad: 湯姆年紀足夠去上學了。

eng: Tom is teaching me to how to sail.
simp: 汤姆正在教我怎么开帆船。
trad: 湯姆正在教我怎麼開帆船。

eng: Tom was puzzled by what Mary said.
simp: 汤姆被玛丽说的话给难倒了。
trad: 湯姆被瑪麗說的話給難倒了。

eng: Tom is reading a book in his room.
simp: 汤姆正在自己房间里看书。
trad: 湯姆正在自己房間裏看書。

eng: Tom is waiting in the living room.
Tom is waiting for Mary to return.
simp: 汤姆正在等着玛丽回来。
trad: 湯姆正在等著瑪麗回來。

eng: Tom is anxious to know the result.
Tom has been really busy recently.
Tom knows how to behave in public.
simp: 汤姆知道在公众场合怎么样自处。
trad: 湯姆知道在公眾場合怎麼樣自處。

eng: (Do you) need my help at all?
Why is the summer holiday not here already!
simp: 暑假怎么还不快点来啊。
trad: 暑假怎麼還不快點來啊。

eng: Looks like its gonna be a long old day.
simp: 看来今天会是漫长的一天啊。
trad: 看來今天會是漫長的一天啊。

eng: I never expected I would end up crying today.
simp: 我没想到今天居然会哭的。
trad: 我沒想到今天居然會哭的。

eng: Why are you so good at cooking?
simp: 为什么你做饭那么拿手呢？
trad: 為什麼你做飯那麼拿手呢？

eng: I just want you to give me back that book you borrowed a few days ago.
simp: 我只是想要你把我前些日子借给你的书还回来。
